genesis 1:1	bereishit bara 'elohim 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez. genesis 1:2	veha'arez hayetah tohu vabohu vekhoshekh 'al penei tehom veruakh 'elohim merakhefet 'al penei hamayim. genesis 1:3	vayomer 'elohim yehi 'or vayhi 'or. genesis 1:4	vayar 'elohim 'et ha'or ki tob vayabdel 'elohim ben ha'or uben hakhoshekh. genesis 1:5	vayiqra 'elohim la'or yom velakhoshekh qara layelah vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom 'ekhad. genesis 1:6	vayomer 'elohim yehi raqia' betokh hamayim vihi mabdil ben mayim lamayim. genesis 1:7	vaya'as 'elohim 'et haraqia' vayabdel ben hamayim 'asher mitakhat laraqia' uben hamayim 'asher mei'al laraqia' vayhi khen. genesis 1:8	vayiqra 'elohim laraqia' shamayim vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom sheini. genesis 1:9	vayomer 'elohim yiqavu hamayim mitakhat hashamayim 'el maqom 'ekhad veteira'eh hayabashah vayhi khen. genesis 1:10	vayiqra 'elohim layabashah 'erez ulemiqveh hamayim qara yamim vayar 'elohim ki tob. genesis 1:11	vayomer 'elohim tadshei ha'arez deshe 'eiseb mazria' zera' 'ez peri 'oseh peri lemino 'asher zar'o bo 'al ha'arez vayhi khen. genesis 1:12	vatozei ha'arez deshe 'eiseb mazria' zera' lemineihu ve'ez 'oseh peri 'asher zar'o bo lemineihu vayar 'elohim ki tob. genesis 1:13	vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom shelishi. genesis 1:14	vayomer 'elohim yehi me'orot birqia' hashamayim lehabdil ben hayom uben halayelah vehayu le'otot ulemo'adim uleyamim veshanim. genesis 1:15	vehayu lim'orot birqia' hashamayim leha'ir 'al ha'arez vayhi khen. genesis 1:16	vaya'as 'elohim 'et shenei hame'orot hagedolim 'et hama'or hagadol lememshelet hayom ve'et hama'or haqaton lememshelet halaylah ve'et hakokhabim. genesis 1:17	vayiten 'otam 'elohim birqia' hashamayim leha'ir 'al ha'arez. genesis 1:18	velimshol bayom ubalaylah ulahabdil ben ha'or uben hakhoshekh vayar 'elohim ki tob. genesis 1:19	vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom rebi'i. genesis 1:20	vayomer 'elohim yishrezu hamayim sherez nefesh khayah ve'of ye'ofef 'al ha'arez 'al penei reqia' hashamayim. genesis 1:21	vayibra 'elohim 'et hataninim hagedolim ve'et kal nefesh hakhayah haromeset 'asher sharezu hamayim lemineihem ve'et kal 'of kanaf lemineihu vayar 'elohim ki tob. genesis 1:22	vaybarekh 'otam 'elohim leimor peru urebu umil'u 'et hamayim bayamim veha'of yireb ba'arez. genesis 1:23	vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom khamishi. genesis 1:24	vayomer 'elohim tozei ha'arez nefesh khayah leminah beheimah varemes vekhayto 'erez leminah vayhi khen. genesis 1:25	vaya'as 'elohim 'et khayat ha'arez leminah ve'et habeheimah leminah ve'et kal remes ha'adamah lemineihu vayar 'elohim ki tob. genesis 1:26	vayomer 'elohim na'aseh 'adam bezalmeinu kidmuteinu veyirdu bidgat hayam ube'of hashamayim ubabeheimah ubekhal ha'arez ubekhal haremes haromes 'al ha'arez. genesis 1:27	vayibra 'elohim 'et ha'adam bezalmo bezelem 'elohim bara 'oto zakhar uneqeibah bara 'otam. genesis 1:28	vaybarekh 'otam 'elohim vayomer lahem 'elohim peru urebu umil'u 'et ha'arez vekhibshuha uredu bidgat hayam ube'of hashamayim ubekhal khayah haromeset 'al ha'arez. genesis 1:29	vayomer 'elohim hineh natati lakhem 'et kal 'eiseb zoreia' zera' 'asher 'al penei khal ha'arez ve'et kal ha'ez 'asher bo feri 'ez zoreia' zara' lakhem yihyeh le'akhlah genesis 1:30	ulekhal khayat ha'arez ulekhal 'of hashamayim ulekhol romes 'al ha'arez 'asher bo nefesh khayah 'et kal yereq 'eiseb le'akhlah vayhi khen. genesis 1:31	vayar 'elohim 'et kal 'asher 'asah vehineh tob me'od vayhi 'ereb vayhi boqer yom hashishi. genesis 2:1	vaykhulu hashamayim veha'arez vekhal zeba'am. genesis 2:2	vaykhal 'elohim bayom hashebi'i melakhto 'asher 'asah vayishbot bayom hashebi'i mikal melakhto 'asher 'asah. genesis 2:3	vaybarekh 'elohim 'et yom hashebi'i vayqadesh 'oto ki bo shabat mikal melakhto 'asher bara 'elohim la'asot. genesis 2:4	'eleh toldot hashamayim veha'arez behibare'am beyom 'asot yhvh 'elohim 'erez veshamayim. genesis 2:5	vekhol siakh hasadeh terem yihyeh ba'arez vekhal 'eiseb hasadeh terem yizmakh ki lo himtir yhvh 'elohim 'al ha'arez ve'adam 'ayin la'abod 'et ha'adamah. genesis 2:6	ve'ed ya'aleh min ha'arez vehishqah 'et kal penei ha'adamah. genesis 2:7	vayizer yhvh 'elohim 'et ha'adam 'afar min ha'adamah vayipakh be'apav nishmat khayim vayhi ha'adam lenefesh khayah. genesis 2:8	vayita' yhvh 'elohim gan be'eiden miqedem vayasem sham 'et ha'adam 'asher yazar. genesis 2:9	vayazmakh yhvh 'elohim min ha'adamah kal 'ez nekhmad lemar'eh vetob lema'akhal ve'ez hakhayim betokh hagan ve'ez hada'at tob vara'. genesis 2:10	venahar yozei mei'eiden lehashqot 'et hagan umisham yipared vehayah le'arba'ah rashim. genesis 2:11	shem ha'ekhad pishon hu hasobeb 'et kal 'erez hakhavilah 'asher sham hazahab. genesis 2:12	uzahab ha'arez hahiv tob sham habedolakh ve'eben hashoham. genesis 2:13	veshem hanahar hasheini gikhon hu hasobeb 'et kal 'erez kush. genesis 2:14	veshem hanahar hashelishi khideqel hu haholekh qidmat 'ashur vehanahar harebi'i hu ferat. genesis 2:15	vayiqakh yhvh 'elohim 'et ha'adam vayanikheihu began 'eiden le'abedah uleshamerah. genesis 2:16	vayzav yhvh 'elohim 'al ha'adam leimor mikol 'ez hagan 'akhol tokhel. genesis 2:17	umei'ez hada'at tob vara' lo tokhal mimenu ki beyom 'akhalekha mimenu mot tamut. genesis 2:18	vayomer yhvh 'elohim lo tob heyot ha'adam lebado 'e'eseh lo 'eizer kenegdo. genesis 2:19	vayizer yhvh 'elohim min ha'adamah kal khayat hasadeh ve'et kal 'of hashamayim vayabei 'el ha'adam lir'ot mah yiqra lo vekhol 'asher yiqra lo ha'adam nefesh khayah hu shemo. genesis 2:20	vayiqra ha'adam sheimot lekhal habeheimah ule'of hashamayim ulekhol khayat hasadeh ule'adam lo maza 'eizer kenegdo. genesis 2:21	vayapel yhvh 'elohim tardeimah 'al ha'adam vayishan vayiqakh 'akhat mizal'otav vayisgor basar takhtenah. genesis 2:22	vayiben yhvh 'elohim 'et hazeila' 'asher laqakh min ha'adam le'ishah vaybi'eha 'el ha'adam. genesis 2:23	vayomer ha'adam zot hapa'am 'ezem mei'azamai ubasar mibesari lezot yiqarei 'ishah ki mei'ish luqokhah zot. genesis 2:24	'al ken ya'azab 'ish 'et 'abiv ve'et 'imo vedabaq be'ishto vehayu lebasar 'ekhad. genesis 2:25	vayihyu sheneihem 'arumim ha'adam ve'ishto velo yitboshashu. genesis 3:1	vehanakhash hayah 'arum mikol khayat hasadeh 'asher 'asah yhvh 'elohim vayomer 'el ha'ishah 'af ki 'amar 'elohim lo tokhelu mikol 'ez hagan. genesis 3:2	vatomer ha'ishah 'el hanakhash miperi 'ez hagan nokhel. genesis 3:3	umiperi ha'ez 'asher betokh hagan 'amar 'elohim lo tokhelu mimenu velo tige'u bo pen temutun. genesis 3:4	vayomer hanakhash 'el ha'ishah lo mot temutun. genesis 3:5	ki yodeia' 'elohim ki beyom 'akhalekhem mimenu venifqekhu 'eineikhem vihyitem keilohim yode'ei tob vara'. genesis 3:6	vateire ha'ishah ki tob ha'ez lema'akhal vekhi ta'avah hu la'einayim venekhmad ha'ez lehaskil vatiqakh mipiryo vatokhal vatiten gam le'ishah 'imah vayokhal. genesis 3:7	vatipaqakhnah 'einei sheneihem vayeide'u ki 'eirumim hem vayitperu 'aleh te'einah vaya'asu lahem khagorot. genesis 3:8	vayishme'u 'et qol yhvh 'elohim mithalekh bagan leruakh hayom vayitkhabei ha'adam ve'ishto mipenei yhvh 'elohim betokh 'ez hagan. genesis 3:9	vayiqra yhvh 'elohim 'el ha'adam vayomer lo 'ayekah. genesis 3:10	vayomer 'et qolekha shama'ti bagan va'ira ki 'eirom 'anokhi va'eikhabei. genesis 3:11	vayomer mi higid lekha ki 'eirom 'atah hamin ha'ez 'asher zivitikha lebilti 'akhal mimenu 'akhaleta. genesis 3:12	vayomer ha'adam ha'ishah 'asher natatah 'imadi hi natenah li min ha'ez va'okhel. genesis 3:13	vayomer yhvh 'elohim la'ishah mah zot 'asit vatomer ha'ishah hanakhash hishi'ani va'okhel. genesis 3:14	vayomer yhvh 'elohim 'el hanakhash ki 'asita zot 'arur 'atah mikal habeheimah umikol khayat hasadeh 'al gekhonekha teilekh ve'afar tokhal kal yemei khayekha. genesis 3:15	ve'eibah 'ashit beinekha uben ha'ishah uben zar'akha uben zar'ah hu yeshufekha rosh ve'atah teshufenu 'aqeb. genesis 3:16	'el ha'ishah 'amar harbah 'arbeh 'izebonekh veheironekh be'ezeb teiledi banim ve'el 'ishekh teshuqatekh vehu yimshal bakh. genesis 3:17	ule'adam 'amar ki shama'ta leqol 'ishtekha vatokhal min ha'ez 'asher zivitikha leimor lo tokhal mimenu 'arurah ha'adamah ba'aburekha be'izabon tokhalenah kol yemei khayekha. genesis 3:18	veqoz vedardar tazmiakh lakh ve'akhalta 'et 'eiseb hasadeh. genesis 3:19	bezei'at 'apekha tokhal lekhem 'ad shubekha 'el ha'adamah ki mimenah luqakheta ki 'afar 'atah ve'el 'afar tashub. genesis 3:20	vayiqra ha'adam shem 'ishto khavah ki hi hayetah 'em kal khai. genesis 3:21	vaya'as yhvh 'elohim le'adam ule'ishto katenot 'or vayalbishem. genesis 3:22	vayomer yhvh 'elohim hen ha'adam hayah ke'akhad mimenu lada'at tob vara' ve'atah pen yishlakh yado velaqakh gam mei'ez hakhayim ve'akhal vakhai le'olam. genesis 3:23	vayshalekheihu yhvh 'elohim migan 'eiden la'abod 'et ha'adamah 'asher luqakh misham. genesis 3:24	vaygaresh 'et ha'adam vayashken miqedem legan 'eiden 'et hakerubim ve'et lahat hakhereb hamithapekhet lishmor 'et derekh 'ez hakhayim. genesis 4:1	veha'adam yada' 'et khavah 'ishto vatahar vateiled 'et qayin vatomer qaniti 'ish 'et yhvh. genesis 4:2	vatosef laledet 'et 'akhiv 'et habel vayhi hebel ro'eh zon veqayin hayah 'obed 'adamah. genesis 4:3	vayhi miqez yamim vayabei qayin miperi ha'adamah minkhah yhvh. genesis 4:4	vehebel heibi gam hu mibekhorot zono umeikhelbeihen vayisha' yhvh 'el hebel ve'el minkhato. genesis 4:5	ve'el qayin ve'el minkhato lo sha'ah vayikhar leqayin me'od vayipelu panav. genesis 4:6	vayomer yhvh 'el qayin lamah kharah lakh velamah nafelu fanekha. genesis 4:7	halo 'im teitib se'et ve'im lo teitib lapetakh khatat robez ve'eilekha teshuqato ve'atah timshal bo. genesis 4:8	vayomer qayin 'el hebel 'akhiv vayhi bihyotam basadeh vayaqam qayin 'el hebel 'akhiv vayahargeihu. genesis 4:9	vayomer yhvh 'el qayin 'ei hebel 'akhikha vayomer lo yada'ti hashomer 'akhi 'anokhi. genesis 4:10	vayomer meh 'asita qol demei 'akhikha zo'aqim 'eilai min ha'adamah. genesis 4:11	ve'atah 'arur 'atah min ha'adamah 'asher pazetah 'et piha laqakhat 'et demei 'akhikha miyadekha. genesis 4:12	ki ta'abod 'et ha'adamah lo tosef tet kokhah lakh na' vanad tihyeh ba'arez. genesis 4:13	vayomer qayin 'el yhvh gadol 'avoni mineso. genesis 4:14	hen geirashta 'oti hayom mei'al penei ha'adamah umipanekha 'esater vehayiti na' vanad ba'arez vehayah khal moze'i yahargeini. genesis 4:15	vayomer lo yhvh lakhen kal horeg qayin shib'atayim yuqam vayasem yhvh leqayin 'ot lebilti hakot 'oto kal moze'o. genesis 4:16	vayeizei qayin milifnei yhvh vayeisheb be'erez nod qidmat 'eiden. genesis 4:17	vayeida' qayin 'et 'ishto vatahar vateiled 'et khanokh vayhi boneh 'ir vayiqra shem ha'ir keshem beno khanokh. genesis 4:18	vayivaled lakhanokh 'et 'irad ve'irad yalad 'et mekhuya'el umekhiya'el yalad 'et metusha'el umetusha'el yalad 'et lamekh. genesis 4:19	vayiqakh lo lemekh shetei nashim shem ha'akhat 'adah veshem hasheinit zilah. genesis 4:20	vateiled 'adah 'et yabal hu hayah 'abi yosheb 'ohel umiqneh. genesis 4:21	veshem 'akhiv yubal hu hayah 'abi kal tofes kinor ve'ugab. genesis 4:22	vezilah gam hi yaledah 'et tubal qayin lotesh kal khoresh nekhoshet ubarzel va'akhot tubal qayin na'amah. genesis 4:23	vayomer lemekh lenashav 'adah vezilah shema'an qoli neshei lemekh ha'zenah 'imrati ki 'ish haragti lefiz'i veyeled lekhaburati. genesis 4:24	ki shib'atayim yuqam qayin velemekh shib'im veshib'ah. genesis 4:25	vayeida' 'adam 'od 'et 'ishto vateiled ben vatiqra 'et shemo shet ki shat li 'elohim zera' 'akher takhat hebel ki harago qayin. genesis 4:26	uleshet gam hu yulad ben vayiqra 'et shemo 'enosh 'az hukhal liqro beshem yhvh. genesis 5:1	zeh seifer toldot 'adam beyom bero 'elohim 'adam bidmut 'elohim 'asah 'oto. genesis 5:2	zakhar uneqeibah bera'am vaybarekh 'otam vayiqra 'et shemam 'adam beyom hibare'am. genesis 5:3	vaykhi 'adam sheloshim ume'at shanah vayoled bidmuto kezalmo vayiqra 'et shemo shet. genesis 5:4	vayihyu yemei 'adam 'akharei holido 'et shet shemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 5:5	vayihyu kal yemei 'adam 'asher khai tesha' mei'ot shanah usheloshim shanah vayamot. genesis 5:6	vaykhi shet khamesh shanim ume'at shanah vayoled 'et 'enosh. genesis 5:7	vaykhi shet 'akharei holido 'et 'enosh sheba' shanim ushemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 5:8	vayihyu kal yemei shet shetem 'esreh shanah utesha' mei'ot shanah vayamot. genesis 5:9	vaykhi 'enosh tish'im shanah vayoled 'et qeinan. genesis 5:10	vaykhi 'enosh 'akharei holido 'et qeinan khamesh 'esreh shanah ushemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 5:11	vayihyu kal yemei 'enosh khamesh shanim utesha' mei'ot shanah vayamot. genesis 5:12	vaykhi qeinan shib'im shanah vayoled 'et mahalal'el. genesis 5:13	vaykhi qeinan 'akharei holido 'et mahalal'el 'arba'im shanah ushemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 5:14	vayihyu kal yemei qeinan 'eser shanim utesha' mei'ot shanah vayamot. genesis 5:15	vaykhi mahalal'el khamesh shanim veshishim shanah vayoled 'et yared. genesis 5:16	vaykhi mahalal'el 'akharei holido 'et yered sheloshim shanah ushemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 5:17	vayihyu kal yemei mahalal'el khamesh vetish'im shanah ushemoneh mei'ot shanah vayamot. genesis 5:18	vaykhi yered shetayim veshishim shanah ume'at shanah vayoled 'et khanokh. genesis 5:19	vaykhi yered 'akharei holido 'et khanokh shemoneh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 5:20	vayihyu kal yemei yered shetayim veshishim shanah utesha' mei'ot shanah vayamot. genesis 5:21	vaykhi khanokh khamesh veshishim shanah vayoled 'et metushalakh. genesis 5:22	vayithalekh khanokh 'et ha'elohim 'akharei holido 'et metushelakh shelosh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 5:23	vayhi kal yemei khanokh khamesh veshishim shanah ushelosh mei'ot shanah. genesis 5:24	vayithalekh khanokh 'et ha'elohim ve'einenu ki laqakh 'oto 'elohim. genesis 5:25	vaykhi metushelakh sheba' ushemonim shanah ume'at shanah vayoled 'et lamekh. genesis 5:26	vaykhi metushelakh 'akharei holido 'et lemekh shetayim ushemonim shanah usheba' mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 5:27	vayihyu kal yemei metushelakh teisha' veshishim shanah utesha' mei'ot shanah vayamot. genesis 5:28	vaykhi lemekh shetayim ushemonim shanah ume'at shanah vayoled ben. genesis 5:29	vayiqra 'et shemo noakh leimor zeh yenakhameinu mima'aseinu umei'izebon yadeinu min ha'adamah 'asher 'eirerah yhvh. genesis 5:30	vaykhi lemekh 'akharei holido 'et noakh khamesh vetish'im shanah vakhamesh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 5:31	vayhi kal yemei lemekh sheba' veshib'im shanah usheba' mei'ot shanah vayamot. genesis 5:32	vayhi noakh ben khamesh mei'ot shanah vayoled noakh 'et shem 'et kham ve'et yafet. genesis 6:1	vayhi ki heikhel ha'adam larob 'al penei ha'adamah ubanot yuledu lahem. genesis 6:2	vayir'u benei ha'elohim 'et benot ha'adam ki tobot henah vayiqkhu lahem nashim mikol 'asher bakharu. genesis 6:3	vayomer yhvh lo yadon rukhi ba'adam le'olam beshagam hu basar vehayu yamav mei'ah ve'esrim shanah. genesis 6:4	hanefilim hayu ba'arez bayamim hahem vegam 'akharei khen 'asher yabo'u benei ha'elohim 'el benot ha'adam veyaledu lahem hemah hagiborim 'asher mei'olam 'anshei hashem. genesis 6:5	vayar yhvh ki rabah ra'at ha'adam ba'arez vekhal yeizer makhshebot libo raq ra' kal hayom. genesis 6:6	vayinakhem yhvh ki 'asah 'et ha'adam ba'arez vayit'azeb 'el libo. genesis 6:7	vayomer yhvh 'emkheh 'et ha'adam 'asher barati mei'al penei ha'adamah mei'adam 'ad beheimah 'ad remes ve'ad 'of hashamayim ki nikhamti ki 'asitim. genesis 6:8	venoakh maza khen be'einei yhvh. genesis 6:9	'eleh toldot noakh noakh 'ish zadiq tamim hayah bedorotav 'et ha'elohim hithalekh noakh. genesis 6:10	vayoled noakh sheloshah banim 'et shem 'et kham ve'et yafet. genesis 6:11	vatishakhet ha'arez lifnei ha'elohim vatimalei ha'arez khamas. genesis 6:12	vayar 'elohim 'et ha'arez vehineh nishkhatah ki hishkhit kal basar 'et darko 'al ha'arez. genesis 6:13	vayomer 'elohim lenoakh qez kal basar ba lefanai ki male'ah ha'arez khamas mipeneihem vehini mashkhitam 'et ha'arez. genesis 6:14	'aseh lekha teibat 'azei gofer qinim ta'aseh 'et hateibah vekhafarta 'otah mibayit umikhuz bakofer. genesis 6:15	vezeh 'asher ta'aseh 'otah shelosh mei'ot 'amah 'orekh hateibah khamishim 'amah rakhebah usheloshim 'amah qomatah. genesis 6:16	zohar ta'aseh lateibah ve'el 'amah tekhalenah milma'lah ufetakh hateibah bezidah tasim takhtiyim sheniyim ushelishim ta'aseha. genesis 6:17	va'ani hini meibi 'et hamabul mayim 'al ha'arez leshakhet kal basar 'asher bo ruakh khayim mitakhat hashamayim kol 'asher ba'arez yigva'. genesis 6:18	vahaqimoti 'et beriti 'itakh ubata 'el hateibah 'atah ubanekha ve'ishtekha uneshei banekha 'itakh. genesis 6:19	umikal hakhai mikal basar shenayim mikol tabi 'el hateibah lehakhayot 'itakh zakhar uneqeibah yihyu. genesis 6:20	meiha'of lemineihu umin habeheimah leminah mikol remes ha'adamah lemineihu shenayim mikol yabo'u 'eilekha lehakhayot. genesis 6:21	ve'atah qakh lekha mikal ma'akhal 'asher yei'akhel ve'asafta 'eilekha vehayah lekha velahem le'akhlah genesis 6:22	vaya'as noakh kekhol 'asher zivah 'oto 'elohim ken 'asah. genesis 7:1	vayomer yhvh lenoakh bo 'atah vekhal beitekha 'el hateibah ki 'otekha ra'iti zadiq lefanai bador hazeh. genesis 7:2	mikol habeheimah hatehorah tiqakh lekha shib'ah shib'ah 'ish ve'ishto umin habeheimah 'asher lo tehorah hi shenayim 'ish ve'ishto. genesis 7:3	gam mei'of hashamayim shib'ah shib'ah zakhar uneqeibah lekhayot zera' 'al penei khal ha'arez. genesis 7:4	ki leyamim 'od shib'ah 'anokhi mamtir 'al ha'arez 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im layelah umakhiti 'et kal hayqum 'asher 'asiti mei'al penei ha'adamah. genesis 7:5	vaya'as noakh kekhol 'asher zivahu yhvh. genesis 7:6	venoakh ben shesh mei'ot shanah vehamabul hayah mayim 'al ha'arez. genesis 7:7	vayabo noakh ubanav ve'ishto uneshei banav 'ito 'el hateibah mipenei mei hamabul. genesis 7:8	min habeheimah hatehorah umin habeheimah 'asher 'einenah tehorah umin ha'of vekhol 'asher romes 'al ha'adamah. genesis 7:9	shenayim shenayim ba'u 'el noakh 'el hateibah zakhar uneqeibah ka'asher zivah 'elohim 'et noakh. genesis 7:10	vayhi leshib'at hayamim umei hamabul hayu 'al ha'arez. genesis 7:11	bishnat shesh mei'ot shanah lekhayei noakh bakhodesh hasheini beshib'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh bayom hazeh nibqe'u kal ma'yenot tehom rabah va'arubot hashamayim niftakhu. genesis 7:12	vayhi hageshem 'al ha'arez 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im layelah. genesis 7:13	be'ezem hayom hazeh ba noakh veshem vekham vayefet benei noakh ve'eishet noakh usheloshet neshei banav 'itam 'el hateibah. genesis 7:14	hemah vekhal hakhayah leminah vekhal habeheimah leminah vekhal haremes haromes 'al ha'arez lemineihu vekhal ha'of lemineihu kol zipor kal kanaf. genesis 7:15	vayabo'u 'el noakh 'el hateibah shenayim shenayim mikal habasar 'asher bo ruakh khayim. genesis 7:16	vehaba'im zakhar uneqeibah mikal basar ba'u ka'asher zivah 'oto 'elohim vayisgor yhvh ba'ado. genesis 7:17	vayhi hamabul 'arba'im yom 'al ha'arez vayirbu hamayim vayis'u 'et hateibah vataram mei'al ha'arez. genesis 7:18	vayigberu hamayim vayirbu me'od 'al ha'arez vateilekh hateibah 'al penei hamayim. genesis 7:19	vehamayim gaberu me'od me'od 'al ha'arez vaykhusu kal heharim hagebohim 'asher takhat kal hashamayim. genesis 7:20	khamesh 'esreh 'amah milma'lah gaberu hamayim vaykhusu heharim. genesis 7:21	vayigva' kal basar haromes 'al ha'arez ba'of ubabeheimah ubakhayah ubekhal hasherez hashorez 'al ha'arez vekhol ha'adam. genesis 7:22	kol 'asher nishmat ruakh khayim be'apav mikol 'asher bekharabah meitu. genesis 7:23	vayimakh 'et kal hayqum 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah mei'adam 'ad beheimah 'ad remes ve'ad 'of hashamayim vayimakhu min ha'arez vayisha'er 'akh noakh va'asher 'ito bateibah. genesis 7:24	vayigberu hamayim 'al ha'arez khamishim ume'at yom. genesis 8:1	vayizkor 'elohim 'et noakh ve'et kal hakhayah ve'et kal habeheimah 'asher 'ito bateibah vaya'aber 'elohim ruakh 'al ha'arez vayashoku hamayim. genesis 8:2	vayisakheru ma'yenot tehom va'arubot hashamayim vayikalei hageshem min hashamayim. genesis 8:3	vayashubu hamayim mei'al ha'arez halokh vashob vayakhseru hamayim miqzeh khamishim ume'at yom. genesis 8:4	vatanakh hateibah bakhodesh hashebi'i beshib'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh 'al harei 'ararat. genesis 8:5	vehamayim hayu halokh vekhasor 'ad hakhodesh ha'asiri ba'asiri be'ekhad lakhodesh nir'u rashei heharim. genesis 8:6	vayhi miqez 'arba'im yom vayiftakh noakh 'et khalon hateibah 'asher 'asah. genesis 8:7	vayshalakh 'et ha'oreb vayeizei yazo vashob 'ad yeboshet hamayim mei'al ha'arez. genesis 8:8	vayshalakh 'et hayonah mei'ito lir'ot haqalu hamayim mei'al penei ha'adamah. genesis 8:9	velo maze'ah hayonah manoakh lekhaf raglah vatashab 'eilav 'el hateibah ki mayim 'al penei khal ha'arez vayishlakh yado vayiqakheha vayabei 'otah 'eilav 'el hateibah. genesis 8:10	vayakhel 'od shib'at yamim 'akheirim vayosef shalakh 'et hayonah min hateibah. genesis 8:11	vatabo 'eilav hayonah le'et 'ereb vehineh 'aleh zayit taraf befiha vayeida' noakh ki qalu hamayim mei'al ha'arez. genesis 8:12	vayiyakhel 'od shib'at yamim 'akheirim vayshalakh 'et hayonah velo yasefah shub 'eilav 'od. genesis 8:13	vayhi be'akhat veshesh mei'ot shanah barishon be'ekhad lakhodesh kharebu hamayim mei'al ha'arez vayasar noakh 'et mikhseh hateibah vayar vehineh kharebu penei ha'adamah. genesis 8:14	ubakhodesh hasheini beshib'ah ve'esrim yom lakhodesh yabeshah ha'arez. genesis 8:15	vaydaber 'elohim 'el noakh leimor. genesis 8:16	zei min hateibah 'atah ve'ishtekha ubanekha uneshei banekha 'itakh. genesis 8:17	kal hakhayah 'asher 'itekha mikal basar ba'of ubabeheimah ubekhal haremes haromes 'al ha'arez hozei hayzei 'itakh vesharezu ba'arez ufaru verabu 'al ha'arez. genesis 8:18	vayeizei noakh ubanav ve'ishto uneshei banav 'ito. genesis 8:19	kal hakhayah kal haremes vekhal ha'of kol romes 'al ha'arez lemishpekhoteihem yaze'u min hateibah. genesis 8:20	vayiben noakh mizbeiakh yhvh vayiqakh mikol habeheimah hatehorah umikol ha'of hatahor vaya'al 'olot bamizbeiakh. genesis 8:21	vayarakh yhvh 'et reiakh hanikhoakh vayomer yhvh 'el libo lo 'osif leqalel 'od 'et ha'adamah ba'abur ha'adam ki yeizer leb ha'adam ra' mine'urav velo 'osif 'od lehakot 'et kal khai ka'asher 'asiti. genesis 8:22	'od kal yemei ha'arez zera' veqazir veqor vakhom veqayiz vakhoref veyom valaylah lo yishbotu. genesis 9:1	vaybarekh 'elohim 'et noakh ve'et banav vayomer lahem peru urebu umil'u 'et ha'arez. genesis 9:2	umora'akhem vekhitekhem yihyeh 'al kal khayat ha'arez ve'al kal 'of hashamayim bekhol 'asher tirmos ha'adamah ubekhal degei hayam beyedkhem nitanu. genesis 9:3	kal remes 'asher hu khai lakhem yihyeh le'akhlah keyereq 'eiseb natati lakhem 'et kol. genesis 9:4	'akh basar benafsho damo lo tokheilu. genesis 9:5	ve'akh 'et dimkhem lenafshoteikhem 'edrosh miyad kal khayah 'edreshenu umiyad ha'adam miyad 'ish 'akhiv 'edrosh 'et nefesh ha'adam. genesis 9:6	shofekh dam ha'adam ba'adam damo yishafekh ki bezelem 'elohim 'asah 'et ha'adam. genesis 9:7	ve'atem peru urebu shirzu ba'arez urebu bah. genesis 9:8	vayomer 'elohim 'el noakh ve'el banav 'ito leimor. genesis 9:9	va'ani hini meiqim 'et beriti 'itekhem ve'et zar'akhem 'akhareikhem. genesis 9:10	ve'et kal nefesh hakhayah 'asher 'itekhem ba'of babeheimah ubekhal khayat ha'arez 'itekhem mikol yoze'ei hateibah lekhol khayat ha'arez. genesis 9:11	vahaqimoti 'et beriti 'itekhem velo yikaret kal basar 'od mimei hamabul velo yihyeh 'od mabul leshakhet ha'arez. genesis 9:12	vayomer 'elohim zot 'ot haberit 'asher 'ani noten beini ubeineikhem uben kal nefesh khayah 'asher 'itekhem ledorot 'olam. genesis 9:13	'et qashti natati be'anan vehayetah le'ot berit beini uben ha'arez. genesis 9:14	vehayah be'ani 'anan 'al ha'arez venir'atah haqeshet be'anan. genesis 9:15	vezakharti 'et beriti 'asher beini ubeineikhem uben kal nefesh khayah bekhal basar velo yihyeh 'od hamayim lemabul leshakhet kal basar. genesis 9:16	vehayetah haqeshet be'anan ure'itiha lizkor berit 'olam ben 'elohim uben kal nefesh khayah bekhal basar 'asher 'al ha'arez. genesis 9:17	vayomer 'elohim 'el noakh zot 'ot haberit 'asher haqimoti beini uben kal basar 'asher 'al ha'arez. genesis 9:18	vayihyu benei noakh hayoze'im min hateibah shem vekham vayafet vekham hu 'abi khena'an. genesis 9:19	sheloshah 'eleh benei noakh umei'eleh nafezah khal ha'arez. genesis 9:20	vayakhel noakh 'ish ha'adamah vayita' karem. genesis 9:21	vayeishet min hayayin vayishkar vayitgal betokh 'aholoh genesis 9:22	vayar kham 'abi khena'an 'et 'ervat 'abiv vayaged lishnei 'ekhav bakhuz. genesis 9:23	vayiqakh shem vayefet 'et hasimlah vayasimu 'al shekhem sheneihem vayeilekhu 'akhoranit vaykhasu 'et 'ervat 'abihem ufeneihem 'akhoranit ve'ervat 'abihem lo ra'u. genesis 9:24	vayiqez noakh miyeino vayeida' 'et 'asher 'asah lo beno haqatan. genesis 9:25	vayomer 'arur kena'an 'ebed 'abadim yihyeh le'ekhav. genesis 9:26	vayomer barukh yhvh 'elohei shem vihi khena'an 'ebed lamo. genesis 9:27	yaft 'elohim leyefet veyishkon be'aholei shem vihi khena'an 'ebed lamo. genesis 9:28	vaykhi noakh 'akhar hamabul shelosh mei'ot shanah vakhamishim shanah. genesis 9:29	vayihyu kal yemei noakh tesha' mei'ot shanah vakhamishim shanah vayamot. genesis 10:1	ve'eleh toldot benei noakh shem kham vayafet vayivaledu lahem banim 'akhar hamabul. genesis 10:2	benei yefet gomer umagog umadai veyavan vetubal umeshekh vetiras. genesis 10:3	ubenei gomer 'ashkanaz verifat vetogarmah. genesis 10:4	ubenei yavan 'elishah vetarshish kitim vedodanim. genesis 10:5	mei'eleh nifredu 'iyei hagoyim be'arzotam 'ish lilshono lemishpekhotam begoyeihem. genesis 10:6	ubenei kham kush umizrayim ufut ukhena'an. genesis 10:7	ubenei khush seba vakhavilah vesabtah vera'mah vesabtekha ubenei ra'mah sheba udedan. genesis 10:8	vekhush yalad 'et nimrod hu heikhel lihyot gibor ba'arez. genesis 10:9	hu hayah gibor zayid lifnei yhvh 'al ken yei'amar kenimrod gibor zayid lifnei yhvh. genesis 10:10	vatehi reishit mamlakhto babel ve'erekh ve'akad vekhalneh be'erez shin'ar. genesis 10:11	min ha'arez hahiv yaza 'ashur vayiben 'et nineveh ve'et rekhobot 'ir ve'et kalakh. genesis 10:12	ve'et resen ben nineveh uben kalakh hi ha'ir hagedolah. genesis 10:13	umizrayim yalad 'et ludim ve'et 'anamim ve'et lehabim ve'et naftukhim. genesis 10:14	ve'et patrusim ve'et kaslukhim 'asher yaze'u misham pelishtim ve'et kaftorim. genesis 10:15	ukhena'an yalad 'et zidon bekhoro ve'et khet. genesis 10:16	ve'et haybusi ve'et ha'emori ve'et hagirgashi. genesis 10:17	ve'et hakhivi ve'et ha'arqi ve'et hasini. genesis 10:18	ve'et ha'arvadi ve'et hazemari ve'et hakhamati ve'akhar nafozu mishpekhot hakena'ani. genesis 10:19	vayhi gebul hakena'ani mizidon bo'akhah gerarah 'ad 'azah bo'akhah sedomah va'amorah ve'admah uzeboyim 'ad lasha'. genesis 10:20	'eleh benei kham lemishpekhotam lilshonotam be'arzotam begoyeihem. genesis 10:21	uleshem yulad gam hu 'abi kal benei 'eiber 'akhi yefet hagadol. genesis 10:22	benei shem 'eilam ve'ashur ve'arpakhshad velud va'aram. genesis 10:23	ubenei 'aram 'uz vekhul vegeter vamash. genesis 10:24	ve'arpakhshad yalad 'et shalakh veshelakh yalad 'et 'eiber. genesis 10:25	ule'eiber yulad shenei banim shem ha'ekhad peleg ki beyamav niflegah ha'arez veshem 'akhiv yaqetan. genesis 10:26	veyaqetan yalad 'et 'almodad ve'et shalef ve'et khazarmavet ve'et yarakh. genesis 10:27	ve'et hadoram ve'et 'uzal ve'et diqlah. genesis 10:28	ve'et 'obal ve'et 'abima'el ve'et sheba. genesis 10:29	ve'et 'ofir ve'et khavilah ve'et yobab kal 'eleh benei yaqetan. genesis 10:30	vayhi moshabam mimeisha bo'akhah sefarah har haqedem. genesis 10:31	'eleh benei shem lemishpekhotam lilshonotam be'arzotam legoyeihem. genesis 10:32	'eleh mishpekhot benei noakh letoldotam begoyeihem umei'eleh nifredu hagoyim ba'arez 'akhar hamabul. genesis 11:1	vayhi khal ha'arez safah 'ekhat udebarim 'akhadim. genesis 11:2	vayhi benase'am miqedem vayimze'u biq'ah be'erez shin'ar vayeishebu sham. genesis 11:3	vayomeru 'ish 'el rei'eihu habah nilbenah lebeinim venisrefah lisreifah vatehi lahem halebeinah le'aben vehakheimar hayah lahem lakhomer. genesis 11:4	vayomeru habah nibneh lanu 'ir umigdal verosho bashamayim vena'aseh lanu shem pen nafuz 'al penei khal ha'arez. genesis 11:5	vayeired yhvh lir'ot 'et ha'ir ve'et hamigdal 'asher banu benei ha'adam. genesis 11:6	vayomer yhvh hen 'am 'ekhad vesafah 'akhat lekhulam vezeh hakhilam la'asot ve'atah lo yibazer meihem kol 'asher yazemu la'asot. genesis 11:7	habah neiredah venabelah sham sefatam 'asher lo yishme'u 'ish sefat rei'eihu. genesis 11:8	vayafez yhvh 'otam misham 'al penei khal ha'arez vayakhdelu libnot ha'ir. genesis 11:9	'al ken qara shemah babel ki sham balal yhvh sefat kal ha'arez umisham hefizam yhvh 'al penei kal ha'arez. genesis 11:10	'eleh toldot shem m ben me'at shanah vayoled 'et 'arpakhshad shenatayim 'akhar hamabul. genesis 11:11	vaykhi shem 'akharei holido 'et 'arpakhshad khamesh mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 11:12	ve'arpakhshad khai khamesh usheloshim shanah vayoled 'et shalakh. genesis 11:13	vaykhi 'arpakhshad 'akharei holido 'et shelakh shalosh shanim ve'arba' mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 11:14	veshelakh khai sheloshim shanah vayoled 'et 'eiber. genesis 11:15	vaykhi shelakh 'akharei holido 'et 'eiber shalosh shanim ve'arba' mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 11:16	vaykhi 'eiber 'arba' usheloshim shanah vayoled 'et paleg. genesis 11:17	vaykhi 'eiber 'akharei holido 'et peleg sheloshim shanah ve'arba' mei'ot shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 11:18	vaykhi feleg sheloshim shanah vayoled 'et re'u. genesis 11:19	vaykhi feleg 'akharei holido 'et re'u teisha' shanim umatayim shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 11:20	vaykhi re'u shetayim usheloshim shanah vayoled 'et serug. genesis 11:21	vaykhi re'u 'akharei holido 'et serug sheba' shanim umatayim shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 11:22	vaykhi serug sheloshim shanah vayoled 'et nakhor. genesis 11:23	vaykhi serug 'akharei holido 'et nakhor matayim shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 11:24	vaykhi nakhor teisha' ve'esrim shanah vayoled 'et tarakh. genesis 11:25	vaykhi nakhor 'akharei holido 'et terakh tesha' 'esreh shanah ume'at shanah vayoled banim ubanot. genesis 11:26	vaykhi terakh shib'im shanah vayoled 'et 'abram 'et nakhor ve'et haran. genesis 11:27	ve'eleh toldot terakh terakh holid 'et 'abram 'et nakhor ve'et haran veharan holid 'et lot. genesis 11:28	vayamat haran 'al penei terakh 'abiv be'erez moladto be'ur kasdim. genesis 11:29	vayiqakh 'abram venakhor lahem nashim shem 'eishet 'abram sarai veshem 'eishet nakhor milkah bat haran 'abi milkah va'abi yiskah. genesis 11:30	vatehi sarai 'aqarah 'en lah valad. genesis 11:31	vayiqakh terakh 'et 'abram beno ve'et lot ben haran ben beno ve'et sarai kalato 'eishet 'abram beno vayeize'u 'itam mei'ur kasdim lalekhet 'arzah kena'an vayabo'u 'ad kharan vayeishebu sham. genesis 11:32	vayihyu yemei terakh khamesh shanim umatayim shanah vayamat terakh bekharan. genesis 12:1	vayomer yhvh 'el 'abram lekh lekha mei'arzekha umimoladtekha umibet 'abikha 'el ha'arez 'asher 'ar'eka. genesis 12:2	ve'e'eskha lego gadol va'abarekhkha va'agadelah shemekha vehyeh berakhah. genesis 12:3	va'abarakhah mebarekhekha umeqalelkha 'a'or venibrekhu bekha kol mishpekhot ha'adamah. genesis 12:4	vayeilekh 'abram ka'asher diber 'eilav yhvh vayeilekh 'ito lot ve'abram ben khamesh shanim veshib'im shanah bezeito meikharan. genesis 12:5	vayiqakh 'abram 'et sarai 'ishto ve'et lot ben 'akhiv ve'et kal rekhusham 'asher rakhashu ve'et hanefesh 'asher 'asu bekharan vayeize'u lalekhet 'arzah kena'an vayabo'u 'arzah kena'an. genesis 12:6	vaya'abor 'abram ba'arez 'ad meqom shekhem 'ad 'eilon moreh vehakena'ani 'az ba'arez. genesis 12:7	vayeira yhvh 'el 'abram vayomer lezar'akha 'eten 'et ha'arez hazot vayiben sham mizbeiakh yhvh hanir'eh 'eilav. genesis 12:8	vaya'teq misham haharah miqedem lebet 'el vayet 'aholoh bet 'el miyam veha'ai miqedem vayiben sham mizbeiakh yhvh vayiqra beshem yhvh. genesis 12:9	vayisa' 'abram halokh venasoa' hanegbah. genesis 12:10	vayhi ra'ab ba'arez vayeired 'abram mizraymah lagur sham ki khabed hara'ab ba'arez. genesis 12:11	vayhi ka'asher hiqrib labo mizrayemah vayomer 'el sarai 'ishto hineh na yada'ti ki 'ishah yefat mar'eh 'at. genesis 12:12	vehayah ki yir'u 'otakh hamizrim ve'ameru 'ishto zot veharegu 'oti ve'otakh yekhayu. genesis 12:13	'imri na 'akhoti 'at lema'an yitab li ba'aburekh vekhayetah nafshi biglalekh. genesis 12:14	vayhi kebo 'abram mizrayemah vayir'u hamizrim 'et ha'ishah ki yafah hi me'od. genesis 12:15	vayir'u 'otah sarei far'oh vayhalu 'otah 'el par'oh vatuqakh ha'ishah bet par'oh. genesis 12:16	ule'abram heitib ba'aburah vayhi lo zon ubaqar vakhamorim va'abadim ushefakhot va'atonot ugemalim. genesis 12:17	vaynaga' yhvh 'et par'oh nega'im gedolim ve'et beito 'al debar sarai 'eishet 'abram. genesis 12:18	vayiqra far'oh le'abram vayomer mah zot 'asita li lamah lo higadta li ki 'ishtekha hi genesis 12:19	lamah 'amarta 'akhoti hi va'eqakh 'otah li le'ishah ve'atah hineh 'ishtekha qakh valekh. genesis 12:20	vayzav 'alav par'oh 'anashim vayshalekhu 'oto ve'et 'ishto ve'et kal 'asher lo. genesis 13:1	vaya'al 'abram mimizrayim hu ve'ishto vekhal 'asher lo velot 'imo hanegbah. genesis 13:2	ve'abram kabed me'od bamiqneh bakesef ubazahab. genesis 13:3	vayeilekh lemasa'av minegeb ve'ad bet 'el 'ad hamaqom 'asher hayah sham 'aholoh 'aholo batekhilah ben bet 'el uben ha'ai. genesis 13:4	'el meqom hamizbeiakh 'asher 'asah sham barishonah vayiqra sham 'abram beshem yhvh. genesis 13:5	vegam lelot haholekh 'et 'abram hayah zon ubaqar ve'ohalim. genesis 13:6	velo nasa 'otam ha'arez lashebet yakhdav ki hayah rekhusham rab velo yakhelu lashebet yakhdav. genesis 13:7	vayhi rib ben ro'ei miqneh 'abram uben ro'ei miqneh lot vehakena'ani vehaperizi 'az yosheb ba'arez. genesis 13:8	vayomer 'abram 'el lot 'al na tehi meribah beini ubeinekha uben ro'ai uben ro'ekha ki 'anashim 'akhim 'anakhenu. genesis 13:9	halo khal ha'arez lefanekha hipared na mei'alai 'im hasemol ve'eiminah ve'im hayamin ve'asme'ilah. genesis 13:10	vayisa lot 'et 'einav vayar 'et kal kikar hayarden ki khulah mashqeh lifnei shakhet yhvh 'et sedom ve'et 'amorah kegan yhvh ke'erez mizrayim bo'akhah zo'ar. genesis 13:11	vayibkhar lo lot 'et kal kikar hayarden vayisa' lot miqedem vayiparedu 'ish mei'al 'akhiv. genesis 13:12	'abram yashab be'erez kena'an velot yashab be'arei hakikar vaye'ehal 'ad sedom. genesis 13:13	ve'anshei sedom ra'im vekhata'im yhvh me'od. genesis 13:14	yhvh 'amar 'el 'abram 'akharei hipared lot mei'imo sa na 'einekha ure'eh min hamaqom 'asher 'atah sham zafonah vanegbah vaqeidemah vayamah. genesis 13:15	ki 'et kal ha'arez 'asher 'atah ro'eh lekha 'etenenah ulezar'akha 'ad 'olam. genesis 13:16	vesamti 'et zar'akha ka'afar ha'arez 'asher 'im yukhal 'ish limnot 'et 'afar ha'arez gam zar'akha yimaneh. genesis 13:17	qum hithalekh ba'arez le'arekah ulerakhebah ki lekha 'etenenah. genesis 13:18	vaye'ehal 'abram vayabo vayeisheb be'eilonei mamrei 'asher bekhebron vayiben sham mizbeiakh yhvh. genesis 14:1	vayhi bimei 'amrafel melekh shin'ar 'aryokh melekh 'elasar kedarela'omer melekh 'eilam vetid'al melekh goyim. genesis 14:2	'asu milkhamah 'et bera' melekh sedom ve'et birsha' melekh 'amorah shin'ab melekh 'admah veshem'eiber melekh zeboyim zeboyim umelekh bela' hi zo'ar. genesis 14:3	kal 'eleh khaberu 'el 'eimeq hasidim hu yam hamelakh. genesis 14:4	shetem 'esreh shanah 'abedu 'et kedarela'omer ushelosh 'esreh shanah maradu. genesis 14:5	ube'arba' 'esreh shanah ba khedarela'omer vehamelakhim 'asher 'ito vayaku 'et refa'im be'ashterot qarnayim ve'et hazuzim beham ve'et ha'eimim beshaveh qiryatayim. genesis 14:6	ve'et hakhori beharram sei'ir 'ad 'el paran 'asher 'al hamidbar. genesis 14:7	vayashubu vayabo'u 'el 'en mishpat hi qadesh vayaku 'et kal sedeh ha'amaleiqi vegam 'et ha'emori hayosheb bekhazon tamar. genesis 14:8	vayeizei melekh sedom umelekh 'amorah umelekh 'admah umelekh zeboyim zeboyim umelekh bela' hi zo'ar vaya'arkhu 'itam milkhamah be'eimeq hasidim. genesis 14:9	'et kedarela'omer melekh 'eilam vetid'al melekh goyim ve'amrafel melekh shin'ar ve'aryokh melekh 'elasar 'arba'ah melakhim 'et hakhamishah. genesis 14:10	ve'eimeq hasidim be'erot be'erot kheimar vayanusu melekh sedom va'amorah vayipelu shamah vehanish'arim herah nasu. genesis 14:11	vayiqkhu 'et kal rekhush sedom va'amorah ve'et kal 'akhelam vayeileikhu. genesis 14:12	vayiqkhu 'et lot ve'et rekhusho ben 'akhi 'abram vayeileikhu vehu yosheb bisdom. genesis 14:13	vayabo hapalit vayaged le'abram ha'ibri vehu shokhen be'eilonei mamrei ha'emori 'akhi 'eshkol va'akhi 'aner vehem ba'alei berit 'abram. genesis 14:14	vayishma' 'abram ki nishbah 'akhiv vayareq 'et khanikhav yelidei beito shemonah 'asar ushelosh mei'ot vayirdof 'ad dan. genesis 14:15	vayeikhaleq 'aleihem laylah hu va'abadav vayakem vayirdefem 'ad khobah 'asher misemol ledamaseq. genesis 14:16	vayasheb 'et kal harekhush vegam 'et lot 'akhiv urekhusho heishib vegam 'et hanashim ve'et ha'am. genesis 14:17	vayeizei melekh sedom liqrato 'akharei shubo meihakot 'et la'omer ve'et hamelakhim 'asher 'ito 'el 'eimeq shaveh hu 'eimeq hamelekh. genesis 14:18	umalki zedeq melekh shalem hozi lekhem vayayin vehu khohen le'el 'elyon. genesis 14:19	vaybarekheihu vayomar barukh 'abram le'el 'elyon qoneh shamayim va'arez. genesis 14:20	ubarukh 'el 'elyon 'asher migen zarekha beyadekha vayiten lo ma'aser mikol. genesis 14:21	vayomer melekh sedom 'el 'abram ten li hanefesh veharekhush qakh lakh. genesis 14:22	vayomer 'abram 'el melekh sedom harimoti yadi 'el yhvh 'el 'elyon qoneh shamayim va'arez. genesis 14:23	'im mikhut ve'ad serokh na'al ve'im 'eqakh mikal 'asher lakh velo tomar 'ani he'esharti 'et 'abram. genesis 14:24	bil'adai raq 'asher 'akhelu hane'arim vekheileq ha'anashim 'asher halekhu 'iti 'aner 'eshkol umamrei hem yiqkhu khelqam. genesis 15:1	'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh hayah debar yhvh 'el 'abram bamakhazeh leimor 'al tira 'abram 'anokhi magen lakh sekharekha harbeh me'od. genesis 15:2	vayomer 'abram 'adonai yhvh mah titen li ve'anokhi holekh 'ariri uben mesheq beiti hu dameseq 'eli'ezer. genesis 15:3	vayomer 'abram hen li lo natatah zara' vehineh ben beiti yoresh 'oti. genesis 15:4	vehineh debar yhvh 'eilav leimor lo yirashekha zeh ki 'im 'asher yeizei mimei'ekha hu yirashekha. genesis 15:5	vayozei 'oto hakhuzah vayomer habet na hashamaymah usefor hakokhabim 'im tukhal lispor 'otam vayomer lo koh yihyeh zar'ekha. genesis 15:6	vehe'emin yhvh vayakhshebeha lo zedaqah. genesis 15:7	vayomer 'eilav 'ani yhvh 'asher hozeitikha mei'ur kasdim latet lekha 'et ha'arez hazot lerishtah. genesis 15:8	vayomar 'adonai yhvh bamah 'eida' ki 'irashenah. genesis 15:9	vayomer 'eilav qekhah li 'eglah meshuleshet ve'ez meshuleshet ve'ayil meshulash vetor vegozal. genesis 15:10	vayiqakh lo 'et kal 'eleh vaybater 'otam batavekh vayiten 'ish bitro liqrat rei'eihu ve'et hazipor lo batar. genesis 15:11	vayeired ha'ayit 'al hapegarim vayasheb 'otam 'abram. genesis 15:12	vayhi hashemesh labo vetardeimah nafelah 'al 'abram vehineh 'eimah khasheikhah gedolah nofelet 'alav. genesis 15:13	vayomer le'abram yadoa' teida' ki ger yihyeh zar'akha be'erez lo lahem va'abadum ve'inu 'otam 'arba' mei'ot shanah. genesis 15:14	vegam 'et hago 'asher ya'abodu dan 'anokhi ve'akharei khen yeize'u birkhush gadol. genesis 15:15	ve'atah tabo 'el 'abotekha beshalom tiqaber beseibah tobah. genesis 15:16	vedor rebi'i yashubu henah ki lo shalem 'avon ha'emori 'ad henah. genesis 15:17	vayhi hashemesh ba'ah va'alatah hayah vehineh tanur 'ashan velapid 'esh 'asher 'abar ben hagezarim ha'eleh. genesis 15:18	bayom hahu karat yhvh 'et 'abram berit leimor lezar'akha natati 'et ha'arez hazot minehar mizrayim 'ad hanahar hagadol nehar perat. genesis 15:19	'et haqeini ve'et haqenizi ve'et haqadmoni. genesis 15:20	ve'et hakhiti ve'et haperizi ve'et harefa'im. genesis 15:21	ve'et ha'emori ve'et hakena'ani ve'et hagirgashi ve'et haybusi. genesis 16:1	vesarai 'eishet 'abram lo yaledah lo velah shifkhah mizrit ushemah hagar. genesis 16:2	vatomer sarai 'el 'abram hineh na 'azarani yhvh miledet bo na 'el shifkhati 'ulai 'ibaneh mimenah vayishma' 'abram leqol sarai. genesis 16:3	vatiqakh sarai 'eishet 'abram 'et hagar hamizrit shifkhatah miqez 'eser shanim leshebet 'abram be'erez kena'an vatiten 'otah le'abram 'ishah lo le'ishah. genesis 16:4	vayabo 'el hagar vatahar vateire ki haratah vateiqal gebirtah be'eineha. genesis 16:5	vatomer sarai 'el 'abram khamasi 'alekha 'anokhi natati shifkhati bekheiqekha vateire ki haratah va'eiqal be'eineha yishpot yhvh beini ubeinekha genesis 16:6	vayomer 'abram 'el sarai hineh shifkhatekh beyadekh 'asi lah hatob be'einayikh vate'aneha sarai vatibrakh mipaneha. genesis 16:7	vayimza'ah mal'akh yhvh 'al 'en hamayim bamidbar 'al ha'ayin bederekh shur. genesis 16:8	vayomar hagar shifkhat sarai 'ei mizeh bat ve'anah teileikhi vatomer mipenei sarai gebirti 'anokhi borakhat. genesis 16:9	vayomer lah mal'akh yhvh shubi 'el gebirtekh vehit'ani takhat yadeha. genesis 16:10	vayomer lah mal'akh yhvh harbah 'arbeh 'et zar'ekh velo yisafer meirob. genesis 16:11	vayomer lah mal'akh yhvh hinakh harah veyoladt ben veqarat shemo yishma'el ki shama' yhvh 'el 'aneyekh. genesis 16:12	vehu yihyeh pere 'adam yado bakol veyad kol bo ve'al penei khal 'ekhav yishkon. genesis 16:13	vatiqra shem yhvh hadober 'eileha 'atah 'el ro'i ki 'amerah hagam halom ra'iti 'akharei ro'i. genesis 16:14	'al ken qara labe'er be'er lakhai ro'i hineh ben qadesh uben bared. genesis 16:15	vateiled hagar le'abram ben vayiqra 'abram shem beno 'asher yaledah hagar yishma'el. genesis 16:16	ve'abram ben shemonim shanah veshesh shanim beledet hagar 'et yishma'el le'abram. genesis 17:1	vayhi 'abram ben tish'im shanah veteisha' shanim vayeira yhvh 'el 'abram vayomer 'eilav 'ani 'el shadai hithalekh lefanai vehyeh tamim. genesis 17:2	ve'etenah beriti beini ubeinekha ve'arbeh 'otkha bim'od me'od. genesis 17:3	vayipol 'abram 'al panav vaydaber 'ito 'elohim leimor. genesis 17:4	'ani hineh beriti 'itakh vehayita le'ab hamon goyim. genesis 17:5	velo yiqarei 'od 'et shimkha 'abram vehayah shimkha 'abraham ki 'ab hamon goyim netatikha. genesis 17:6	vehifreiti 'otekha bim'od me'od unetatikha legoyim umelakhim mimekha yeizei'u. genesis 17:7	vahaqimoti 'et beriti beini ubeinekha uben zar'akha 'akharekha ledorotam librit 'olam lihyot lekha leilohim ulezar'akha 'akharekha. genesis 17:8	venatati lekha ulezar'akha 'akharekha 'et 'erez megurekha 'et kal 'erez kena'an la'akhuzat 'olam vehayiti lahem leilohim. genesis 17:9	vayomer 'elohim 'el 'abraham ve'atah 'et beriti tishmor 'atah vezar'akha 'akharekha ledorotam. genesis 17:10	zot beriti 'asher tishmeru beini ubeineikhem uben zar'akha 'akharekha himol lakhem kal zakhar. genesis 17:11	unemaltem 'et besar 'arelatkhem vehayah le'ot berit beini ubeineikhem. genesis 17:12	uben shemonat yamim yimol lakhem kal zakhar ledoroteikhem yelid bayit umiqnat kesef mikol ben neikhar 'asher lo mizar'akha hu. genesis 17:13	himol yimol yelid beitekha umiqnat kaspekha vehayetah beriti bibsarkhem librit 'olam. genesis 17:14	ve'arel zakhar 'asher lo yimol 'et besar 'arelato venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha 'et beriti heifar. genesis 17:15	vayomer 'elohim 'el 'abraham sarai 'ishtekha lo tiqra 'et shemah sarai ki sarah shemah. genesis 17:16	ubeirakhti 'otah vegam natati mimenah lekha ben ubeirakhtiha vehayetah legoyim malkhei 'amim mimenah yihyu. genesis 17:17	vayipol 'abraham 'al panav vayizkhaq vayomer belibo haleben mei'ah shanah yivaled ve'im sarah habat tish'im shanah teiled. genesis 17:18	vayomer 'abraham 'el ha'elohim lu yishma'el yikhyeh lefanekha. genesis 17:19	vayomer 'elohim 'abal sarah 'ishtekha yoledet lekha ben veqarata 'et shemo yizkhaq vahaqimoti 'et beriti 'ito librit 'olam lezar'o 'akharav. genesis 17:20	uleyishma'el shema'tikha hineh beirakhti 'oto vehifreiti 'oto vehirbeiti 'oto bim'od me'od shenem 'asar nesi'im yolid unetativ lego gadol. genesis 17:21	ve'et beriti 'aqim 'et yizkhaq 'asher teiled lekha sarah lamo'ed hazeh bashanah ha'akheret. genesis 17:22	vaykhal ledaber 'ito vaya'al 'elohim mei'al 'abraham. genesis 17:23	vayiqakh 'abraham 'et yishma'el beno ve'et kal yelidei beito ve'et kal miqnat kaspo kal zakhar be'anshei bet 'abraham vayamal 'et besar 'arelatam be'ezem hayom hazeh ka'asher diber 'ito 'elohim. genesis 17:24	ve'abraham ben tish'im vateisha' shanah behimolo besar 'arelato. genesis 17:25	veyishma'el beno ben shelosh 'esreh shanah behimolo 'et besar 'arelato. genesis 17:26	be'ezem hayom hazeh nimol 'abraham veyishma'el beno. genesis 17:27	vekhal 'anshei beito yelid bayit umiqnat kesef mei'et ben neikhar nimolu 'ito. genesis 18:1	vayeira 'eilav yhvh be'eilonei mamrei vehu yosheb petakh ha'ohel kekhom hayom. genesis 18:2	vayisa 'einav vayar vehineh sheloshah 'anashim nizabim 'alav vayar vayaraz liqratam mipetakh ha'ohel vayishtakhu 'arezah. genesis 18:3	vayomar 'adonai 'im na mazati khen be'einekha 'al na ta'abor mei'al 'abdekha. genesis 18:4	yuqakh na me'at mayim verakhazu ragleikhem vehisha'anu takhat ha'ez. genesis 18:5	ve'eqkhah fat lekhem vesa'adu libekhem 'akhar ta'aboru ki 'al ken 'abartem 'al 'abdekhem vayomeru ken ta'aseh ka'asher dibarta. genesis 18:6	vaymaher 'abraham ha'ohelah 'el sarah vayomer mahari shelosh se'im qemakh solet lushi va'asi 'ugot. genesis 18:7	ve'el habaqar raz 'abraham vayiqakh ben baqar rakh vatob vayiten 'el hana'ar vaymaher la'asot 'oto. genesis 18:8	vayiqakh khem'ah vekhalab uben habaqar 'asher 'asah vayiten lifneihem vehu 'omed 'aleihem takhat ha'ez vayokheilu. genesis 18:9	vayomeru 'eilav 'ayeh sarah 'ishtekha vayomer hineh ba'ohel. genesis 18:10	vayomer shob 'ashub 'eilekha ka'et khayah vehineh ben lesarah 'ishtekha vesarah shoma'at petakh ha'ohel vehu 'akharav. genesis 18:11	ve'abraham vesarah zeqeinim ba'im bayamim khadal lihyot lesarah 'orakh kanashim. genesis 18:12	vatizkhaq sarah beqirbah leimor 'akharei beloti hayetah li 'ednah vadoni zaqen. genesis 18:13	vayomer yhvh 'el 'abraham lamah zeh zakhaqah sarah leimor ha'af 'umnam 'eiled va'ani zaqanti. genesis 18:14	hayipalei yhvh dabar lamo'ed 'ashub 'eilekha ka'et khayah ulesarah ben. genesis 18:15	vatekhakhesh sarah leimor lo zakhaqti ki yarei'ah vayomer lo ki zakhaqet. genesis 18:16	vayaqumu misham ha'anashim vayashqifu 'al penei sedom ve'abraham holekh 'imam leshalekham. genesis 18:17	yhvh 'amar hamkhaseh 'ani mei'abraham 'asher 'ani 'oseh. genesis 18:18	ve'abraham hayo yihyeh lego gadol ve'azum venibrekhu bo kol goyei ha'arez. genesis 18:19	ki yeda'tiv lema'an 'asher yezaveh 'et banav ve'et beito 'akharav veshameru derekh yhvh la'asot zedaqah umishpat lema'an habi yhvh 'al 'abraham 'et 'asher diber 'alav. genesis 18:20	vayomer yhvh za'aqat sedom va'amorah ki rabah vekhatatam ki khabedah me'od. genesis 18:21	'eiradah na ve'er'eh hakeza'aqatah haba'ah 'eilai 'asu kalah ve'im lo 'eida'ah. genesis 18:22	vayifnu misham ha'anashim vayeilekhu sedomah ve'abraham 'odenu 'omed lifnei yhvh. genesis 18:23	vayigash 'abraham vayomar ha'af tispeh zadiq 'im rasha'. genesis 18:24	'ulai yesh khamishim zadiqim betokh ha'ir ha'af tispeh velo tisa lamaqom lema'an khamishim hazadiqim 'asher beqirbah. genesis 18:25	khalilah lekha mei'asot kadabar hazeh lehamit zadiq 'im rasha' vehayah khazadiq karasha' khalilah lakh hashofet kal ha'arez lo ya'aseh mishpat. genesis 18:26	vayomer yhvh 'im 'emza bisdom khamishim zadiqim betokh ha'ir venasati lekhal hamaqom ba'aburam. genesis 18:27	vaya'an 'abraham vayomar hineh na ho'alti ledaber 'el 'adonai ve'anokhi 'afar va'eifer. genesis 18:28	'ulai yakhserun khamishim hazadiqim khamishah hatashkhit bakhamishah 'et kal ha'ir vayomer lo 'ashkhit 'im 'emza sham 'arba'im vakhamishah. genesis 18:29	vayosef 'od ledaber 'eilav vayomar 'ulai yimaze'un sham 'arba'im vayomer lo 'e'eseh ba'abur ha'arba'im. genesis 18:30	vayomer 'al na yikhar ladonai va'adabeirah 'ulai yimaze'un sham sheloshim vayomer lo 'e'eseh 'im 'emza sham sheloshim. genesis 18:31	vayomer hineh na ho'alti ledaber 'el 'adonai 'ulai yimaze'un sham 'esrim vayomer lo 'ashkhit ba'abur ha'esrim. genesis 18:32	vayomer 'al na yikhar ladonai va'adaberah 'akh hapa'am 'ulai yimaze'un sham 'asarah vayomer lo 'ashkhit ba'abur ha'asarah. genesis 18:33	vayeilekh yhvh ka'asher kilah ledaber 'el 'abraham ve'abraham shab limqomo. genesis 19:1	vayabo'u shenei hamal'akhim sedomah ba'ereb velot yosheb besha'ar sedom vayar lot vayaqam liqratam vayishtakhu 'apayim 'arezah. genesis 19:2	vayomer hineh na 'adonai suru na 'el bet 'abdekhem velinu verakhazu ragleikhem vehishkamtem vahalakhtem ledarkekhem vayomeru lo ki barekhob nalin. genesis 19:3	vayifzar bam me'od vayasuru 'eilav vayabo'u 'el beito vaya'as lahem mishteh umazot 'afah vayokheilu. genesis 19:4	terem yishkabu ve'anshei ha'ir 'anshei sedom nasabu 'al habayit mina'ar ve'ad zaqen kal ha'am miqazeh. genesis 19:5	vayiqre'u 'el lot vayomeru lo 'ayeh ha'anashim 'asher ba'u 'eilekha halayelah hozi'em 'eileinu veneide'ah 'otam. genesis 19:6	vayeizei 'aleihem lot hapetkhah vehadelet sagar 'akharav. genesis 19:7	vayomar 'al na 'akhai tarei'u. genesis 19:8	hineh na li shetei banot 'asher lo yade'u 'ish 'ozi'ah na 'ethen 'aleikhem va'asu lahen katob be'eineikhem raq la'anashim ha'el 'al ta'asu dabar ki 'al ken ba'u bezel qorati. genesis 19:9	vayomeru gesh hale'ah vayomeru ha'ekhad ba lagur vayishpot shafot 'atah nara' lekha meihem vayifzeru ba'ish belot me'od vayigeshu lishbor hadalet. genesis 19:10	vayishlekhu ha'anashim 'et yadam vayabi'u 'et lot 'aleihem habayetah ve'et hadelet sagaru. genesis 19:11	ve'et ha'anashim 'asher petakh habayit hiku basanveirim miqaton ve'ad gadol vayil'u limzo hapatakh. genesis 19:12	vayomeru ha'anashim 'el lot 'od mi lekha foh khatan ubanekha ubenotekha vekhol 'asher lekha ba'ir hozei min hamaqom. genesis 19:13	ki mashkhitim 'anakhnu 'et hamaqom hazeh ki gadelah za'aqatam 'et penei yhvh vayshalekheinu yhvh leshakhatah. genesis 19:14	vayeizei lot vaydaber 'el khatanav loqekhei benotav vayomer qumu ze'u min hamaqom hazeh ki mashkhit yhvh 'et ha'ir vayhi khimzakheq be'einei khatanav. genesis 19:15	ukhemo hashakhar 'alah vaya'izu hamal'akhim belot leimor qum qakh 'et 'ishtekha ve'et shetei benotekha hanimza'ot pen tisafeh ba'avon ha'ir. genesis 19:16	vayitmahmah vayakhaziqu ha'anashim beyado ubeyad 'ishto ubeyad shetei benotav bekhemlat yhvh 'alav vayozi'uhu vayanikhuhu mikhuz la'ir. genesis 19:17	vayhi khehozi'am 'otam hakhuzah vayomer himalet 'al nafshekha 'al tabit 'akharekha ve'al ta'amod bekhal hakikar haharah himalet pen tisafeh. genesis 19:18	vayomer lot 'aleihem 'al na 'adonai. genesis 19:19	hineh na maza 'abdekha khen be'einekha vatagdel khasdekha 'asher 'asita 'imadi lehakhayot 'et nafshi ve'anokhi lo 'ukhal lehimalet haharah pen tidbaqani hara'ah vamati. genesis 19:20	hineh na ha'ir hazot qerobah lanus shamah vehi miz'ar 'imaletah na shamah halo miz'ar hi utekhi nafshi. genesis 19:21	vayomer 'eilav hineh nasati fanekha gam ladabar hazeh lebilti hafeki 'et ha'ir 'asher dibarta. genesis 19:22	maher himalet shamah ki lo 'ukhal la'asot dabar 'ad bo'akha shamah 'al ken qara shem ha'ir zo'ar. genesis 19:23	hashemesh yaza 'al ha'arez velot ba zo'arah. genesis 19:24	yhvh himtir 'al sedom ve'al 'amorah gaferit va'esh mei'et yhvh min hashamayim. genesis 19:25	vayahafokh 'et he'arim ha'el ve'et kal hakikar ve'et kal yoshebei he'arim vezemakh ha'adamah. genesis 19:26	vatabet 'ishto mei'akharav vatehi nezib melakh. genesis 19:27	vayashkem 'abraham baboqer 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amad sham 'et penei yhvh. genesis 19:28	vayashqef 'al penei sedom va'amorah ve'al kal penei 'erez hakikar vayar vehineh 'alah qitor ha'arez keqitor hakibshan. genesis 19:29	vayhi beshakhet 'elohim 'et 'arei hakikar vayizkor 'elohim 'et 'abraham vayshalakh 'et lot mitokh hahafeikhah bahafokh 'et he'arim 'asher yashab bahen lot. genesis 19:30	vaya'al lot mizo'ar vayeisheb bahar ushetei benotav 'imo ki yarei lashebet bezo'ar vayeisheb bame'arah hu ushetei benotav. genesis 19:31	vatomer habekhirah 'el haze'irah 'abinu zaqen ve'ish 'en ba'arez labo 'aleinu kederekh kal ha'arez. genesis 19:32	lekhah nashqeh 'et 'abinu yayin venishkebah 'imo unekhayeh mei'abinu zara'. genesis 19:33	vatashqena 'et 'abihen yayin balaylah hu vatabo habekhirah vatishkab 'et 'abiha velo yada' beshikhbah ubequmah genesis 19:34	vayhi mimakhorat vatomer habekhirah 'el haze'irah hen shakhabti 'emesh 'et 'abi nashqenu yayin gam halaylah ubo'i shikhbi 'imo unekhayeh mei'abinu zara'. genesis 19:35	vatashqena gam balaylah hahu 'et 'abihen yayin vataqam haze'irah vatishkab 'imo velo yada' beshikhbah ubequmah. genesis 19:36	vataharena shetei benot lot mei'abihen. genesis 19:37	vateiled habekhirah ben vatiqra shemo mo'ab hu 'abi mo'ab 'ad hayom. genesis 19:38	vehaze'irah gam hi yaledah ben vatiqra shemo ben 'ami hu 'abi benei 'amon 'ad hayom. genesis 20:1	vayisa' misham 'abraham 'arzah hanegeb vayeisheb ben qadesh uben shur vayagar bigrar. genesis 20:2	vayomer 'abraham 'el sarah 'ishto 'akhoti hi vayishlakh 'abimelekh melekh gerar vayiqakh 'et sarah. genesis 20:3	vayabo 'elohim 'el 'abimelekh bakhalom halayelah vayomer lo hinekha met 'al ha'ishah 'asher laqakhta vehiv be'ulat ba'al. genesis 20:4	va'abimelekh lo qarab 'eileha vayomar 'adonai hago gam zadiq taharog. genesis 20:5	halo hu 'amar li 'akhoti hi vehi gam hi 'amerah 'akhi hu betam lebabi ubeniqyon kapai 'asiti zot. genesis 20:6	vayomer 'eilav ha'elohim bakhalom gam 'anokhi yada'ti ki betam lebabekha 'asita zot va'ekhsokh gam 'anokhi 'otkha meikhato li 'al ken lo netatikha lingoa' 'eileha. genesis 20:7	ve'atah hasheb 'eishet ha'ish ki nabi hu veyitpalel ba'adkha vekhyeh ve'im 'einekha meishib da' ki mot tamut 'atah vekhal 'asher lakh. genesis 20:8	vayashkem 'abimelekh baboqer vayiqra lekhal 'abadav vaydaber 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh be'azeneihem vayire'u ha'anashim me'od. genesis 20:9	vayiqra 'abimelekh le'abraham vayomer lo meh 'asita lanu umeh khatati lakh ki heibeita 'alai ve'al mamlakhti khata'ah gedolah ma'asim 'asher lo yei'asu 'asita 'imadi. genesis 20:10	vayomer 'abimelekh 'el 'abraham mah ra'ita ki 'asita 'et hadabar hazeh. genesis 20:11	vayomer 'abraham ki 'amarti raq 'en yir'at 'elohim bamaqom hazeh vaharaguni 'al debar 'ishti. genesis 20:12	vegam 'amenah 'akhoti bat 'abi hi 'akh lo bat 'imi vatehi li le'ishah. genesis 20:13	vayhi ka'asher hit'u 'oti 'elohim mibet 'abi va'omar lah zeh khasdekh 'asher ta'asi 'imadi 'el kal hamaqom 'asher nabo shamah 'imri li 'akhi hu. genesis 20:14	vayiqakh 'abimelekh zon ubaqar va'abadim ushefakhot vayiten le'abraham vayasheb lo 'et sarah 'ishto. genesis 20:15	vayomer 'abimelekh hineh 'arzi lefanekha batob be'einekha sheb. genesis 20:16	ulesarah 'amar hineh natati 'elef kesef le'akhikh hineh hu lakh kesut 'einayim lekhol 'asher 'itakh ve'et kol venokhakhat. genesis 20:17	vayitpalel 'abraham 'el ha'elohim vayirpa 'elohim 'et 'abimelekh ve'et 'ishto ve'amhotav vayeileidu. genesis 20:18	ki 'azor 'azar yhvh be'ad kal rekhem lebet 'abimelekh 'al debar sarah 'eishet 'abraham. genesis 21:1	yhvh paqad 'et sarah ka'asher 'amar vaya'as yhvh lesarah ka'asher diber. genesis 21:2	vatahar vateiled sarah le'abraham ben lizqunav lamo'ed 'asher diber 'oto 'elohim. genesis 21:3	vayiqra 'abraham 'et shem beno hanolad lo 'asher yaledah lo sarah yizkhaq. genesis 21:4	vayamal 'abraham 'et yizkhaq beno ben shemonat yamim ka'asher zivah 'oto 'elohim. genesis 21:5	ve'abraham ben me'at shanah behivaled lo 'et yizkhaq beno. genesis 21:6	vatomer sarah zekhoq 'asah li 'elohim kal hashomeia' yizkhaq li. genesis 21:7	vatomer mi milel le'abraham heiniqah banim sarah ki yaladti ben lizqunav. genesis 21:8	vayigdal hayeled vayigamal vaya'as 'abraham mishteh gadol beyom higamel 'et yizkhaq. genesis 21:9	vateire sarah 'et ben hagar hamizrit 'asher yaledah le'abraham mezakheq. genesis 21:10	vatomer le'abraham garesh ha'amah hazot ve'et benah ki lo yirash ben ha'amah hazot 'im beni 'im yizkhaq. genesis 21:11	vayeira' hadabar me'od be'einei 'abraham 'al 'odot beno. genesis 21:12	vayomer 'elohim 'el 'abraham 'al yeira' be'einekha 'al hana'ar ve'al 'amatekha kol 'asher tomar 'eilekha sarah shema' beqolah ki beyizkhaq yiqarei lekha zara'. genesis 21:13	vegam 'et ben ha'amah lego 'asimenu ki zar'akha hu. genesis 21:14	vayashkem 'abraham baboqer vayiqakh lekhem vekheimat mayim vayiten 'el hagar sam 'al shikhmah ve'et hayeled vayshalekheha vateilekh vateita' bemidbar be'er shaba'. genesis 21:15	vayikhlu hamayim min hakheimet vatashlekh 'et hayeled takhat 'akhad hasikhim. genesis 21:16	vateilekh vateisheb lah mineged harkheq kimtakhavei qeshet ki 'amerah 'al 'er'eh bemot hayaled vateisheb mineged vatisa 'et qolah vateibek. genesis 21:17	vayishma' 'elohim 'et qol hana'ar vayiqra mal'akh 'elohim 'el hagar min hashamayim vayomer lah mah lakh hagar 'al tire'i ki shama' 'elohim 'el qol hana'ar ba'asher hu sham. genesis 21:18	qumi se'i 'et hana'ar vehakhaziqi 'et yadekh bo ki lego gadol 'asimenu. genesis 21:19	vayifqakh 'elohim 'et 'eineha vateire be'er mayim vateilekh vatemalei 'et hakheimet mayim vatashq 'et hana'ar. genesis 21:20	vayhi 'elohim 'et hana'ar vayigdal vayeisheb bamidbar vayhi robeh qashat. genesis 21:21	vayeisheb bemidbar paran vatiqakh lo 'imo 'ishah mei'erez mizrayim. genesis 21:22	vayhi ba'et hahiv vayomer 'abimelekh ufikhol sar zeba'o 'el 'abraham leimor 'elohim 'imekha bekhol 'asher 'atah 'oseh. genesis 21:23	ve'atah hishabe'ah li beilohim henah 'im tishqor li ulenini ulenekhdi kakhesed 'asher 'asiti 'imekha ta'aseh 'imadi ve'im ha'arez 'asher gartah bah. genesis 21:24	vayomer 'abraham 'anokhi 'ishabeia'. genesis 21:25	vehokhiakh 'abraham 'et 'abimelekh 'al 'odot be'er hamayim 'asher gazelu 'abdei 'abimelekh. genesis 21:26	vayomer 'abimelekh lo yada'ti mi 'asah 'et hadabar hazeh vegam 'atah lo higadta li vegam 'anokhi lo shama'ti bilti hayom. genesis 21:27	vayiqakh 'abraham zon ubaqar vayiten la'abimelekh vayikhretu sheneihem berit. genesis 21:28	vayazeb 'abraham 'et sheba' kibsot hazon lebadehen. genesis 21:29	vayomer 'abimelekh 'el 'abraham mah henah sheba' kebasot ha'eleh 'asher hizabta lebadanah. genesis 21:30	vayomer ki 'et sheba' kebasot tiqakh miyadi ba'abur tihyeh li le'eidah ki khafarti 'et habe'er hazot. genesis 21:31	'al ken qara lamaqom hahu be'er shaba' ki sham nishbe'u sheneihem. genesis 21:32	vayikhretu berit bib'er shaba' vayaqam 'abimelekh ufikhol sar zeba'o vayashubu 'el 'erez pelishtim. genesis 21:33	vayita' 'eshel bib'er shaba' vayiqra sham beshem yhvh 'el 'olam. genesis 21:34	vayagar 'abraham be'erez pelishtim yamim rabim. genesis 22:1	vayhi 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh veha'elohim nisah 'et 'abraham vayomer 'eilav 'abraham vayomer hineini. genesis 22:2	vayomer qakh na 'et binkha 'et yekhidekha 'asher 'ahabta 'et yizkhaq velekh lekha 'el 'erez hamoriyah veha'aleihu sham le'olah 'al 'akhad heharim 'asher 'omar 'eilekha. genesis 22:3	vayashkem 'abraham baboqer vayakhabosh 'et khamoro vayiqakh 'et shenei ne'arav 'ito ve'et yizkhaq beno vaybaqa' 'azei 'olah vayaqam vayeilekh 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amar lo ha'elohim. genesis 22:4	bayom hashelishi vayisa 'abraham 'et 'einav vayar 'et hamaqom meirakhoq. genesis 22:5	vayomer 'abraham 'el ne'arav shebu lakhem poh 'im hakhamor va'ani vehana'ar neilekhah 'ad koh venishtakhaveh venashubah 'aleikhem. genesis 22:6	vayiqakh 'abraham 'et 'azei ha'olah vayasem 'al yizkhaq beno vayiqakh beyado 'et ha'esh ve'et hama'akhelet vayeilekhu sheneihem yakhdav. genesis 22:7	vayomer yizkhaq 'el 'abraham 'abiv vayomer 'abi vayomer hineni beni vayomer hineh ha'esh veha'eizim ve'ayeh haseh le'olah. genesis 22:8	vayomer 'abraham 'elohim yir'eh lo haseh le'olah beni vayeilekhu sheneihem yakhdav. genesis 22:9	vayabo'u 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amar lo ha'elohim vayiben sham 'abraham 'et hamizbeiakh vaya'arokh 'et ha'eizim vaya'aqod 'et yizkhaq beno vayasem 'oto 'al hamizbeiakh mima'al la'eizim. genesis 22:10	vayishlakh 'abraham 'et yado vayiqakh 'et hama'akhelet lishkhot 'et beno. genesis 22:11	vayiqra 'eilav mal'akh yhvh min hashamayim vayomer 'abraham 'abraham vayomer hineini. genesis 22:12	vayomer 'al tishlakh yadekha 'el hana'ar ve'al ta'as lo me'umah ki 'atah yada'ti ki yerei 'elohim 'atah velo khasakhta 'et binkha 'et yekhidekha mimeni. genesis 22:13	vayisa 'abraham 'et 'einav vayar vehineh 'ayil 'akhar ne'ekhaz basebakh beqarnav vayeilekh 'abraham vayiqakh 'et ha'ayil vaya'aleihu le'olah takhat beno. genesis 22:14	vayiqra 'abraham shem hamaqom hahu yhvh yir'eh 'asher yei'amer hayom behar yhvh yeira'eh. genesis 22:15	vayiqra mal'akh yhvh 'el 'abraham sheinit min hashamayim. genesis 22:16	vayomer bi nishba'ti ne'um yhvh ki ya'an 'asher 'asita 'et hadabar hazeh velo khasakhta 'et binkha 'et yekhidekha. genesis 22:17	ki barekh 'abarekhkha veharbah 'arbeh 'et zar'akha kekhokhbei hashamayim vekhakhol 'asher 'al sefat hayam veyirash zar'akha 'et sha'ar 'oyebav. genesis 22:18	vehitbarakhu bezar'akha kol goyei ha'arez 'eiqeb 'asher shama'ta beqoli. genesis 22:19	vayashab 'abraham 'el ne'arav vayaqumu vayeilekhu yakhdav 'el be'er shaba' vayeisheb 'abraham bib'er shaba'. genesis 22:20	vayhi 'akharei hadebarim ha'eleh vayugad le'abraham leimor hineh yaledah milkah gam hi banim lenakhor 'akhikha. genesis 22:21	'et 'uz bekhoro ve'et buz 'akhiv ve'et qemu'el 'abi 'aram. genesis 22:22	ve'et kesed ve'et khazo ve'et pildash ve'et yidlaf ve'et betu'el. genesis 22:23	ubetu'el yalad 'et ribqah shemonah 'eleh yaledah milkah lenakhor 'akhi 'abraham. genesis 22:24	ufilagsho ushemah re'umah vateiled gam hi 'et tebakh ve'et gakham ve'et takhash ve'et ma'akhah. genesis 23:1	vayihyu khayei sarah mei'ah shanah ve'esrim shanah vesheba' shanim shenei khayei sarah. genesis 23:2	vatamat sarah beqiryat 'arba' hi khebron be'erez kena'an vayabo 'abraham lispod lesarah velibkotah. genesis 23:3	vayaqam 'abraham mei'al penei meito vaydaber 'el benei khet leimor. genesis 23:4	ger vetoshab 'anokhi 'imakhem tenu li 'akhuzat qeber 'imakhem ve'eqberah meiti milefanai. genesis 23:5	vaya'anu benei khet 'et 'abraham leimor lo. genesis 23:6	shema'einu 'adoni nesi 'elohim 'atah betokheinu bemibkhar qebareinu qebor 'et meitekha 'ish mimenu 'et qibro lo yikhleh mimekha miqebor meitekha. genesis 23:7	vayaqam 'abraham vayishtakhu le'am ha'arez libnei khet. genesis 23:8	vaydaber 'itam leimor 'im yesh 'et nafshekhem liqbor 'et meiti milefanai shema'uni ufig'u li be'efron ben zokhar. genesis 23:9	veyiten li 'et me'arat hamakhpeilah 'asher lo 'asher biqzeh sadeihu bekhesef malei yitenenah li betokhkhem la'akhuzat qaber. genesis 23:10	ve'efron yosheb betokh benei khet vaya'an 'efron hakhiti 'et 'abraham be'azenei benei khet lekhol ba'ei sha'ar 'iro leimor. genesis 23:11	lo 'adoni shema'eini hasadeh natati lakh vehame'arah 'asher bo lekha netatiha le'einei benei 'ami netatiha lakh qebor meitekha. genesis 23:12	vayishtakhu 'abraham lifnei 'am ha'arez. genesis 23:13	vaydaber 'el 'efron be'azenei 'am ha'arez leimor 'akh 'im 'atah lu shema'eini natati kesef hasadeh qakh mimeni ve'eqberah 'et meiti shamah. genesis 23:14	vaya'an 'efron 'et 'abraham leimor lo. genesis 23:15	'adoni shema'eini 'erez 'arba' mei'ot sheqel kesef beini ubeinekha mah hi ve'et meitekha qebor. genesis 23:16	vayishma' 'abraham 'el 'efron vayishqol 'abraham le'efron 'et hakesef 'asher diber be'azenei benei khet 'arba' mei'ot sheqel kesef 'ober lasokher. genesis 23:17	vayaqam sedeh 'efron 'asher bamakhpeilah 'asher lifnei mamrei hasadeh vehame'arah 'asher bo vekhal ha'ez 'asher basadeh 'asher bekhal gebulo sabib. genesis 23:18	le'abraham lemiqnah le'einei benei khet bekhol ba'ei sha'ar 'iro. genesis 23:19	ve'akharei khen qabar 'abraham 'et sarah 'ishto 'el me'arat sedeh hamakhpeilah 'al penei mamrei hi khebron be'erez kena'an. genesis 23:20	vayaqam hasadeh vehame'arah 'asher bo le'abraham la'akhuzat qaber mei'et benei khet. genesis 24:1	ve'abraham zaqen ba bayamim yhvh beirakh 'et 'abraham bakol. genesis 24:2	vayomer 'abraham 'el 'abdo zeqan beito hamoshel bekhal 'asher lo sim na yadekha takhat yereikhi. genesis 24:3	ve'ashbi'akha yhvh 'elohei hashamayim veilohei ha'arez 'asher lo tiqakh 'ishah libni mibenot hakena'ani 'asher 'anokhi yosheb beqirbo. genesis 24:4	ki 'el 'arzi ve'el moladti teilekh velaqakhta 'ishah libni leyizkhaq. genesis 24:5	vayomer 'eilav ha'ebed 'ulai lo tobeh ha'ishah lalekhet 'akharai 'el ha'arez hazot hehasheb 'ashib 'et binkha 'el ha'arez 'asher yazata misham. genesis 24:6	vayomer 'eilav 'abraham hishamer lekha pen tashib 'et beni shamah. genesis 24:7	yhvh 'elohei hashamayim 'asher leqakhani mibet 'abi umei'erez moladti va'asher diber li va'asher nishba' li leimor lezar'akha 'eten 'et ha'arez hazot hu yishlakh mal'akho lefanekha velaqakhta 'ishah libni misham. genesis 24:8	ve'im lo tobeh ha'ishah lalekhet 'akharekha veniqita mishebu'ati zot raq 'et beni lo tasheb shamah. genesis 24:9	vayasem ha'ebed 'et yado takhat yerekh 'abraham 'adonav vayishaba' lo 'al hadabar hazeh. genesis 24:10	vayiqakh ha'ebed 'asarah gemalim migemalei 'adonav vayeilekh vekhal tub 'adonav beyado vayaqam vayeilekh 'el 'aram naharayim 'el 'ir nakhor. genesis 24:11	vayabrekh hagemalim mikhuz la'ir 'el be'er hamayim le'et 'ereb le'et zet hasho'abot. genesis 24:12	vayomar yhvh 'elohei 'adoni 'abraham haqreh na lefanai hayom va'aseh khesed 'im 'adoni 'abraham. genesis 24:13	hineh 'anokhi nizab 'al 'en hamayim ubenot 'anshei ha'ir yoze'ot lish'ob mayim. genesis 24:14	vehayah hana'ara 'asher 'omar 'eileha hati na khadekh ve'eshteh ve'amerah sheteh vegam gemalekha 'ashqeh 'otah hokhakhta le'abdekha leyizkhaq ubah 'eida' ki 'asita khesed 'im 'adoni. genesis 24:15	vayhi hu terem kilah ledaber vehineh ribqah yozet 'asher yuledah libtu'el ben milkah 'eishet nakhor 'akhi 'abraham vekhadah 'al shikhmah. genesis 24:16	vehana'ara tobat mar'eh me'od betulah ve'ish lo yeda'ah vateired ha'aynah vatemalei khadah vata'al. genesis 24:17	vayaraz ha'ebed liqratah vayomer hagmi'ini na me'at mayim mikadekh. genesis 24:18	vatomer sheteh 'adoni vatemaher vatored kadah 'al yadah vatashqeihu. genesis 24:19	vatekhal lehashqoto vatomer gam ligmalekha 'esh'ab 'ad 'im kilu lishtot. genesis 24:20	vatemaher vate'ar kadah 'el hashoqet vataraz 'od 'el habe'er lish'ob vatish'ab lekhal gemalav. genesis 24:21	veha'ish mishta'eh lah makharish lada'at hahizliakh yhvh darko 'im lo. genesis 24:22	vayhi ka'asher kilu hagemalim lishtot vayiqakh ha'ish nezem zahab beqa' mishqalo ushenei zemidim 'al yadeha 'asarah zahab mishqalam. genesis 24:23	vayomer bat mi 'at hagidi na li hayesh bet 'abikh maqom lanu lalin. genesis 24:24	vatomer 'eilav bat betu'el 'anokhi ben milkah 'asher yaledah lenakhor. genesis 24:25	vatomer 'eilav gam teben gam mispo rab 'imanu gam maqom lalun. genesis 24:26	vayiqod ha'ish vayishtakhu yhvh. genesis 24:27	vayomer barukh yhvh 'elohei 'adoni 'abraham 'asher lo 'azab khasdo va'amito mei'im 'adoni 'anokhi baderekh nakhani yhvh bet 'akhei 'adoni. genesis 24:28	vataraz hana'ara vataged lebet 'imah kadebarim ha'eleh. genesis 24:29	uleribqah 'akh ushemo laban vayaraz laban 'el ha'ish hakhuzah 'el ha'ayin. genesis 24:30	vayhi kir'ot 'et hanezem ve'et hazemidim 'al yedei 'akhoto ukheshame'o 'et dibrei ribqah 'akhoto leimor koh diber 'eilai ha'ish vayabo 'el ha'ish vehineh 'omed 'al hagemalim 'al ha'ayin. genesis 24:31	vayomer bo berukh yhvh lamah ta'amod bakhuz ve'anokhi piniti habayit umaqom lagemalim. genesis 24:32	vayabo ha'ish habaytah vayfatakh hagemalim vayiten teben umispo lagemalim umayim lirkhoz raglav veraglei ha'anashim 'asher 'ito. genesis 24:33	vayisem vayusam lefanav le'ekhol vayomer lo 'okhal 'ad 'im dibarti debarai vayomer daber. genesis 24:34	vayomar 'ebed 'abraham 'anokhi. genesis 24:35	yhvh beirakh 'et 'adoni me'od vayigdal vayiten lo zon ubaqar vekhesef vezahab va'abadim ushefakhot ugemalim vakhamorim. genesis 24:36	vateiled sarah 'eishet 'adoni ben ladoni 'akharei ziqnatah vayiten lo 'et kal 'asher lo. genesis 24:37	vayashbi'eini 'adoni leimor lo tiqakh 'ishah libni mibenot hakena'ani 'asher 'anokhi yosheb be'arzo. genesis 24:38	'im lo 'el bet 'abi teilekh ve'el mishpakhti velaqakhta 'ishah libni. genesis 24:39	va'omar 'el 'adoni 'ulai lo teilekh ha'ishah 'akharai. genesis 24:40	vayomer 'eilai yhvh 'asher hithalakhti lefanav yishlakh mal'akho 'itakh vehizliakh darkekha velaqakhta 'ishah libni mimishpakhti umibet 'abi. genesis 24:41	'az tinaqeh mei'alati ki tabo 'el mishpakhti ve'im lo yitenu lakh vehayita naqi mei'alati. genesis 24:42	va'abo hayom 'el ha'ayin va'omar yhvh 'elohei 'adoni 'abraham 'im yeshkha na mazliakh darki 'asher 'anokhi holekh 'aleha. genesis 24:43	hineh 'anokhi nizab 'al 'en hamayim vehayah ha'almah hayozet lish'ob ve'amarti 'eileha hashqini na me'at mayim mikadekh. genesis 24:44	ve'amerah 'eilai gam 'atah sheteh vegam ligmalekha 'esh'ab hi ha'ishah 'asher hokhiakh yhvh leben 'adoni. genesis 24:45	'ani terem 'akhaleh ledaber 'el libi vehineh ribqah yozet vekhadah 'al shikhmah vateired ha'aynah vatish'ab va'omar 'eileha hashqini na. genesis 24:46	vatemaher vatored kadah mei'aleha vatomer sheteh vegam gemalekha 'ashqeh va'eishet vegam hagemalim hishqatah. genesis 24:47	va'esh'al 'otah va'omar bat mi 'at vatomer bat betu'el ben nakhor 'asher yaledah lo milkah va'asim hanezem 'al 'apah vehazemidim 'al yadeha. genesis 24:48	va'eqod va'eshtakhaveh yhvh va'abarekh 'et yhvh 'elohei 'adoni 'abraham 'asher hinkhani bederekh 'emet laqakhat 'et bat 'akhi 'adoni libno. genesis 24:49	ve'atah 'im yeshkhem 'osim khesed ve'emet 'et 'adoni hagidu li ve'im lo hagidu li ve'efneh 'al yamin 'o 'al semol. genesis 24:50	vaya'an laban ubetu'el vayomeru yhvh yaza hadabar lo nukhal daber 'eilekha ra' 'o tob. genesis 24:51	hineh ribqah lefanekha qakh valekh utehi 'ishah leben 'adonekha ka'asher diber yhvh. genesis 24:52	vayhi ka'asher shama' 'ebed 'abraham 'et dibreihem vayishtakhu 'arzah yhvh. genesis 24:53	vayozei ha'ebed kelei khesef ukhelei zahab ubegadim vayiten leribqah umigdanot natan le'akhiha ule'imah. genesis 24:54	vayokhelu vayishtu hu veha'anashim 'asher 'imo vayalinu vayaqumu baboqer vayomer shalekhuni ladoni. genesis 24:55	vayomer 'akhiha ve'imah teisheb hana'ara 'itanu yamim 'o 'asor 'akhar teilekh. genesis 24:56	vayomer 'aleihem 'al te'akharu 'oti yhvh hizliakh darki shalekhuni ve'eilekhah ladoni. genesis 24:57	vayomeru niqra lana'ara venish'alah 'et piha. genesis 24:58	vayiqre'u leribqah vayomeru 'eileha hateilekhi 'im ha'ish hazeh vatomer 'eilekh. genesis 24:59	vayshalekhu 'et ribqah 'akhotam ve'et meiniqtah ve'et 'ebed 'abraham ve'et 'anashav. genesis 24:60	vaybarakhu 'et ribqah vayomeru lah 'akhoteinu 'at hayi le'alfei rebabah veyirash zar'ekh 'et sha'ar sone'av. genesis 24:61	vataqam ribqah vena'aroteha vatirkabnah 'al hagemalim vateilakhnah 'akharei ha'ish vayiqakh ha'ebed 'et ribqah vayeilakh. genesis 24:62	veyizkhaq ba mibo be'er lakhai ro'i vehu yosheb be'erez hanegeb. genesis 24:63	vayeizei yizkhaq lasuakh basadeh lifnot 'areb vayisa 'einav vayar vehineh gemalim ba'im. genesis 24:64	vatisa ribqah 'et 'eineha vateire 'et yizkhaq vatipol mei'al hagamal. genesis 24:65	vatomer 'el ha'ebed mi ha'ish halazeh haholekh basadeh liqrateinu vayomer ha'ebed hu 'adoni vatiqakh haza'if vatitkas. genesis 24:66	vaysaper ha'ebed leyizkhaq 'et kal hadebarim 'asher 'asah. genesis 24:67	vaybi'eha yizkhaq ha'ohelah sarah 'imo vayiqakh 'et ribqah vatehi lo le'ishah vaye'ehabeha vayinakhem yizkhaq 'akharei 'imo. genesis 25:1	vayosef 'abraham vayiqakh 'ishah ushemah qeturah. genesis 25:2	vateiled lo 'et zimran ve'et yaqeshan ve'et medan ve'et midyan ve'et yishbaq ve'et shuakh. genesis 25:3	veyaqeshan yalad 'et sheba ve'et dedan ubenei dedan hayu 'ashurim uletushim ule'umim. genesis 25:4	ubenei midyan 'eifah va'eifer vakhanokh va'abida' ve'elda'ah kal 'eleh benei qeturah. genesis 25:5	vayiten 'abraham 'et kal 'asher lo leyizkhaq. genesis 25:6	velibnei hapilagshim 'asher le'abraham natan 'abraham matanot vayshalekhem mei'al yizkhaq beno be'odenu khai qeidemah 'el 'erez qedem. genesis 25:7	ve'eleh yemei shenei khayei 'abraham 'asher khai me'at shanah veshib'im shanah vekhamesh shanim. genesis 25:8	vayigva' vayamat 'abraham beseibah tobah zaqen vesabeia' vayei'asef 'el 'amav. genesis 25:9	vayiqberu 'oto yizkhaq veyishma'el banav 'el me'arat hamakhpeilah 'el sedeh 'efron ben zokhar hakhiti 'asher 'al penei mamrei. genesis 25:10	hasadeh 'asher qanah 'abraham mei'et benei khet shamah qubar 'abraham vesarah 'ishto. genesis 25:11	vayhi 'akharei mot 'abraham vaybarekh 'elohim 'et yizkhaq beno vayeisheb yizkhaq 'im be'er lakhai ro'i. genesis 25:12	ve'eleh toledot yishma'el ben 'abraham 'asher yaledah hagar hamizrit shifkhat sarah le'abraham. genesis 25:13	ve'eleh shemot benei yishma'el bishmotam letoldotam bekhor yishma'el nebayot veqeidar ve'adbe'el umibsam. genesis 25:14	umishma' vedumah umasa. genesis 25:15	khadad veteima yetur nafish vaqeidemah. genesis 25:16	eleh hem benei yishma'el ve'eleh shemotam bekhazreihem ubetirotam shenem 'asar nesi'im le'umotam. genesis 25:17	ve'eleh shenei khayei yishma'el me'at shanah usheloshim shanah vesheba' shanim vayigva' vayamat vayei'asef 'el 'amav. genesis 25:18	vayishkenu meikhavilah 'ad shur 'asher 'al penei mizrayim bo'akhah 'ashurah 'al penei khal 'ekhav nafal. genesis 25:19	ve'eleh toldot yizkhaq ben 'abraham 'abraham holid 'et yizkhaq. genesis 25:20	vayhi yizkhaq ben 'arba'im shanah beqakhto 'et ribqah bat betu'el ha'arami mipadan 'aram 'akhot laban ha'arami lo le'ishah. genesis 25:21	vaye'tar yizkhaq yhvh lenokhakh 'ishto ki 'aqarah hi vayei'ater lo yhvh vatahar ribqah 'ishto. genesis 25:22	vayitrozazu habanim beqirbah vatomer 'im ken lamah zeh 'anokhi vateilekh lidrosh 'et yhvh. genesis 25:23	vayomer yhvh lah shenei goyim goyim bebitnekh ushenei le'umim mimei'ayikh yipareidu ule'om mil'om ye'emaz verab ya'abod za'ir. genesis 25:24	vayimle'u yameha laledet vehineh tomim bebitnah. genesis 25:25	vayeizei harishon 'admoni kulo ke'aderet sei'ar vayiqre'u shemo 'eisav. genesis 25:26	ve'akharei khen yaza 'akhiv veyado 'okhezet ba'aqeb 'eisav vayiqra shemo ya'aqob veyizkhaq ben shishim shanah beledet 'otam. genesis 25:27	vayigdelu hane'arim vayhi 'eisav 'ish yodeia' zayid 'ish sadeh veya'aqob 'ish tam yosheb 'ohalim. genesis 25:28	vaye'ehab yizkhaq 'et 'eisav ki zayid befiv veribqah 'ohebet 'et ya'aqob. genesis 25:29	vayazed ya'aqob nazid vayabo 'eisav min hasadeh vehu 'ayef. genesis 25:30	vayomer 'eisav 'el ya'aqob hal'iteini na min ha'adom ha'adom hazeh ki 'ayef 'anokhi 'al ken qara shemo 'edom. genesis 25:31	vayomer ya'aqob mikhrah khayom 'et bekhoratekha li. genesis 25:32	vayomer 'eisav hineh 'anokhi holekh lamut velamah zeh li bekhorah. genesis 25:33	vayomer ya'aqob hishabe'ah li kayom vayishaba' lo vayimkor 'et bekhorato leya'aqob. genesis 25:34	veya'aqob natan le'eisav lekhem unezid 'adashim vayokhal vayeishet vayaqam vayeilakh vayibez 'eisav 'et habekhorah. genesis 26:1	vayhi ra'ab ba'arez milebad hara'ab harishon 'asher hayah bimei 'abraham vayeilekh yizkhaq 'el 'abimelekh melekh pelishtim gerarah. genesis 26:2	vayeira 'eilav yhvh vayomer 'al teired mizrayemah shekhon ba'arez 'asher 'omar 'eilekha. genesis 26:3	gur ba'arez hazot ve'ehyeh 'imekha va'abarekheka ki lekha ulezar'akha 'eten 'et kal ha'arazot ha'el vahaqimoti 'et hashebu'ah 'asher nishba'ti le'abraham 'abikha. genesis 26:4	vehirbeiti 'et zar'akha kekhokhbei hashamayim venatati lezar'akha 'et kal ha'arazot ha'el vehitbarakhu bezar'akha kol goyei ha'arez. genesis 26:5	'eiqeb 'asher shama' 'abraham beqoli vayishmor mishmarti mizvotai khuqotai vetorotai. genesis 26:6	vayeisheb yizkhaq bigrar. genesis 26:7	vayish'alu 'anshei hamaqom le'ishto vayomer 'akhoti hi ki yarei leimor 'ishti pen yaharguni 'anshei hamaqom 'al ribqah ki tobat mar'eh hi. genesis 26:8	vayhi ki 'arekhu lo sham hayamim vayashqef 'abimelekh melekh pelishtim be'ad hakhalon vayar vehineh yizkhaq mezakheq 'et ribqah 'ishto. genesis 26:9	vayiqra 'abimelekh leyizkhaq vayomer 'akh hineh 'ishtekha hi ve'ekh 'amarta 'akhoti hi vayomer 'eilav yizkhaq ki 'amarti pen 'amut 'aleha. genesis 26:10	vayomer 'abimelekh mah zot 'asita lanu kim'at shakhab 'akhad ha'am 'et 'ishtekha veheibeita 'aleinu 'asham. genesis 26:11	vayzav 'abimelekh 'et kal ha'am leimor hanogeia' ba'ish hazeh ube'ishto mot yumat. genesis 26:12	vayizra' yizkhaq ba'arez hahiv vayimza bashanah hahiv mei'ah she'arim vaybarakheihu yhvh. genesis 26:13	vayigdal ha'ish vayeilekh halokh vegadel 'ad ki gadal me'od. genesis 26:14	vayhi lo miqneh zon umiqneh baqar va'abudah rabah vayqan'u 'oto pelishtim. genesis 26:15	vekhal habe'eirot 'asher khaferu 'abdei 'abiv bimei 'abraham 'abiv sitemum pelishtim vaymal'um 'afar. genesis 26:16	vayomer 'abimelekh 'el yizkhaq lekh mei'imanu ki 'azamta mimenu me'od. genesis 26:17	vayeilekh misham yizkhaq vayikhan benakhal gerar vayeisheb sham. genesis 26:18	vayashab yizkhaq vayakhpor 'et be'eirot hamayim 'asher khaferu bimei 'abraham 'abiv vaysatemum pelishtim 'akharei mot 'abraham vayiqra lahen sheimot kasheimot 'asher qara lahen 'abiv. genesis 26:19	vayakhperu 'abdei yizkhaq banakhal vayimze'u sham be'er mayim khayim. genesis 26:20	vayaribu ro'ei gerar 'im ro'ei yizkhaq leimor lanu hamayim vayiqra shem habe'er 'eiseq ki hit'asequ 'imo. genesis 26:21	vayakhperu be'er 'akheret vayaribu gam 'aleha vayiqra shemah sitnah. genesis 26:22	vaya'teq misham vayakhpor be'er 'akheret velo rabu 'aleha vayiqra shemah rekhobot vayomer ki 'atah hirkhib yhvh lanu ufarinu ba'arez. genesis 26:23	vaya'al misham be'er shaba'. genesis 26:24	vayeira 'eilav yhvh balaylah hahu vayomer 'anokhi 'elohei 'abraham 'abikha 'al tira ki 'itekha 'anokhi ubeirakhtikha vehirbeiti 'et zar'akha ba'abur 'abraham 'abdi. genesis 26:25	vayiben sham mizbeiakh vayiqra beshem yhvh vayet sham 'aholo vayikhru sham 'abdei yizkhaq be'er. genesis 26:26	va'abimelekh halakh 'eilav migerar va'akhuzat meirei'eihu ufikhol sar zeba'o. genesis 26:27	vayomer 'aleihem yizkhaq madua' batem 'eilai ve'atem seneitem 'oti vateshalekhuni mei'itekhem. genesis 26:28	vayomeru ra'o ra'inu ki hayah yhvh 'imakh vanomer tehi na 'alah beinoteinu beineinu ubeinekha venikhretah berit 'imakh. genesis 26:29	'im ta'aseh 'imanu ra'ah ka'asher lo nega'anukha vekha'asher 'asinu 'imekha raq tob vaneshaleikhakha beshalom 'atah 'atah berukh yhvh. genesis 26:30	vaya'as lahem mishteh vayokhelu vayishtu. genesis 26:31	vayashkimu baboqer vayishabe'u 'ish le'akhiv vayshalekhem yizkhaq vayeilekhu mei'ito beshalom. genesis 26:32	vayhi bayom hahu vayabo'u 'abdei yizkhaq vayagidu lo 'al 'odot habe'er 'asher khafaru vayomeru lo mazanu mayim. genesis 26:33	vayiqra 'otah shib'ah 'al ken shem ha'ir be'er sheba' 'ad hayom hazeh. genesis 26:34	vayhi 'eisav ben 'arba'im shanah vayiqakh 'ishah 'et yehudit bat be'eiri hakhiti ve'et basemat bat 'eilon hakhiti. genesis 26:35	vatihyena morat ruakh leyizkhaq uleribqah. genesis 27:1	vayhi ki zaqen yizkhaq vatikhhena 'einav meire'ot vayiqra 'et 'eisav beno hagadol vayomer 'eilav beni vayomer 'eilav hineini. genesis 27:2	vayomer hineh na zaqanti lo yada'ti yom moti. genesis 27:3	ve'atah sa na kheilekha telyekha veqashtekha vezei hasadeh vezudah li zeidah zayid. genesis 27:4	va'aseh li mat'amim ka'asher 'ahabti vehabi'ah li ve'okheilah ba'abur tebarekhkha nafshi beterem 'amut. genesis 27:5	veribqah shoma'at bedaber yizkhaq 'el 'eisav beno vayeilekh 'eisav hasadeh lazud zayid lehabi. genesis 27:6	veribqah 'amerah 'el ya'aqob benah leimor hineh shama'ti 'et 'abikha medaber 'el 'eisav 'akhikha leimor. genesis 27:7	habi'ah li zayid va'aseh li mat'amim ve'okheilah va'abarekhkhah lifnei yhvh lifnei moti. genesis 27:8	ve'atah beni shema' beqoli la'asher 'ani mezavah 'otakh. genesis 27:9	lekh na 'el hazon veqakh li misham shenei gedayei 'izim tobim ve'e'eseh 'otam mat'amim le'abikha ka'asher 'aheb. genesis 27:10	veheibeita le'abikha ve'akhal ba'abur 'asher yebarekhkha lifnei moto. genesis 27:11	vayomer ya'aqob 'el ribqah 'imo hen 'eisav 'akhi 'ish sa'ir ve'anokhi 'ish khalaq. genesis 27:12	'ulai yemusheini 'abi vehayiti be'einav kimta'teia' veheibeiti 'alai qelalah velo berakhah. genesis 27:13	vatomer lo 'imo 'alai qilatekha beni 'akh shema' beqoli velekh qakh li. genesis 27:14	vayeilekh vayiqakh vayabei le'imo vata'as 'imo mat'amim ka'asher 'aheb 'abiv. genesis 27:15	vatiqakh ribqah 'et bigdei 'eisav benah hagadol hakhamudot
