'asher 'itah babayit vatalbesh 'et ya'aqob benah haqatan. genesis 27:16	ve'et 'orot gedayei ha'izim hilbishah 'al yadav ve'al khelqat zavarav. genesis 27:17	vatiten 'et hamat'amim ve'et halekhem 'asher 'asatah beyad ya'aqob benah. genesis 27:18	vayabo 'el 'abiv vayomer 'abi vayomer hineni mi 'atah beni. genesis 27:19	vayomer ya'aqob 'el 'abiv 'anokhi 'eisav bekhorekha 'asiti ka'asher dibarta 'eilai qum na shebah ve'akhelah mizeidi ba'abur tebarakhani nafshekha. genesis 27:20	vayomer yizkhaq 'el beno mah zeh miharta limzo beni vayomer ki hiqrah yhvh 'elohekha lefanai. genesis 27:21	vayomer yizkhaq 'el ya'aqob geshah na va'amushkha beni ha'atah zeh beni 'eisav 'im lo. genesis 27:22	vayigash ya'aqob 'el yizkhaq 'abiv vaymusheihu vayomer haqol qol ya'aqob vehayadayim yedei 'eisav. genesis 27:23	velo hikiro ki hayu yadav kidei 'eisav 'akhiv se'irot vaybarekheihu. genesis 27:24	vayomer 'atah zeh beni 'eisav vayomer 'ani. genesis 27:25	vayomer hagishah li ve'okhelah mized beni lema'an tebarekhkha nafshi vayagesh lo vayokhal vayabei lo yayin vayeishet. genesis 27:26	vayomer 'eilav yizkhaq 'abiv geshah na usheqah li beni. genesis 27:27	vayigash vayishaq lo vayarakh 'et reiakh begadav vaybarakheihu vayomer re'eh reiakh beni kereiakh sadeh 'asher beirakho yhvh. genesis 27:28	veyiten lekha ha'elohim mital hashamayim umishmanei ha'arez verob dagan vetirosh. genesis 27:29	ya'abdukha 'amim veyishtakhu veyishtakhavu lekha le'umim heveh gebir le'akhekha veyishtakhavu lekha benei 'imekha 'orerekha 'arur umebarakhekha barukh. genesis 27:30	vayhi ka'asher kilah yizkhaq lebarekh 'et ya'aqob vayhi 'akh yazo yaza ya'aqob mei'et penei yizkhaq 'abiv ve'eisav 'akhiv ba mizeido. genesis 27:31	vaya'as gam hu mat'amim vayabei le'abiv vayomer le'abiv yaqum 'abi veyokhal mized beno ba'abur tebarakhani nafshekha. genesis 27:32	vayomer lo yizkhaq 'abiv mi 'atah vayomer 'ani binkha bekhorekha 'eisav. genesis 27:33	vayekherad yizkhaq kharadah gedolah 'ad me'od vayomer mi 'eifo hu hazad zayid vayabei li va'okhal mikol beterem tabo va'abarakheihu gam barukh yihyeh. genesis 27:34	kishmoa' 'eisav 'et dibrei 'abiv vayiz'aq ze'aqah gedolah umarah 'ad me'od vayomer le'abiv barakheini gam 'ani 'abi. genesis 27:35	vayomer ba 'akhikha bemirmah vayiqakh birkhatekha. genesis 27:36	vayomer hakhi qara shemo ya'aqob vaya'qebeini zeh fa'amayim 'et bekhorati laqakh vehineh 'atah laqakh birkhati vayomar halo 'azalta li berakhah. genesis 27:37	vaya'an yizkhaq vayomer le'eisav hen gebir samtiv lakh ve'et kal 'ekhav natati lo la'abadim vedagan vetirosh semakhtiv ulekhah 'eifo mah 'e'eseh beni. genesis 27:38	vayomer 'eisav 'el 'abiv habrakhah 'akhat hi lekha 'abi barakheini gam 'ani 'abi vayisa 'eisav qolo vayeibek. genesis 27:39	vaya'an yizkhaq 'abiv vayomer 'eilav hineh mishmanei ha'arez yihyeh moshabekha umital hashamayim mei'al. genesis 27:40	ve'al kharbekha tikhyeh ve'et 'akhikha ta'abod vehayah ka'asher tarid ufaraqta 'ulo mei'al zavarekha. genesis 27:41	vayistom 'eisav 'et ya'aqob 'al haberakhah 'asher beirakho 'abiv vayomer 'eisav belibo yiqrebu yemei 'eibel 'abi ve'ahargah 'et ya'aqob 'akhi. genesis 27:42	vayugad leribqah 'et dibrei 'eisav benah hagadol vatishlakh vatiqra leya'aqob benah haqatan vatomer 'eilav hineh 'eisav 'akhikha mitnakhem lekha leharegekha. genesis 27:43	ve'atah beni shema' beqoli vequm berakh lekha 'el laban 'akhi kharanah. genesis 27:44	veyashabta 'imo yamim 'akhadim 'ad 'asher tashub khamat 'akhikha. genesis 27:45	'ad shub 'af 'akhikha mimekha veshakhakh 'et 'asher 'asita lo veshalakhti uleqakhtikha misham lamah 'eshkal gam sheneikhem yom 'ekhad. genesis 27:46	vatomer ribqah 'el yizkhaq qazti bekhayai mipenei benot khet 'im loqeiakh ya'aqob 'ishah mibenot khet ka'eleh mibenot ha'arez lamah li khayim. genesis 28:1	vayiqra yizkhaq 'el ya'aqob vaybarekh 'oto vayzaveihu vayomer lo lo tiqakh 'ishah mibenot kena'an. genesis 28:2	qum lekh padenah 'aram beitah betu'el 'abi 'imekha veqakh lekha misham 'ishah mibenot laban 'akhi 'imekha. genesis 28:3	ve'el shadai yebarekh 'otekha veyafrekha veyarbekha vehayita liqhal 'amim. genesis 28:4	veyiten lekha 'et birkat 'abraham lekha ulezar'akha 'itakh lerishtekha 'et 'erez megurekha 'asher natan 'elohim le'abraham. genesis 28:5	vayishlakh yizkhaq 'et ya'aqob vayeilekh padenah 'aram 'el laban ben betu'el ha'arami 'akhi ribqah 'em ya'aqob ve'eisav. genesis 28:6	vayar 'eisav ki beirakh yizkhaq 'et ya'aqob veshilakh 'oto padenah 'aram laqakhat lo misham 'ishah bebarakho 'oto vayzav 'alav leimor lo tiqakh 'ishah mibenot kena'an. genesis 28:7	vayishma' ya'aqob 'el 'abiv ve'el 'imo vayeilekh padenah 'aram. genesis 28:8	vayar 'eisav ki ra'ot benot kena'an be'einei yizkhaq 'abiv. genesis 28:9	vayeilekh 'eisav 'el yishma'el vayiqakh 'et makhalat bat yishma'el ben 'abraham 'akhot nebayot 'al nashav lo le'ishah. genesis 28:10	vayeizei ya'aqob mibe'er shaba' vayeilekh kharanah. genesis 28:11	vayifga' bamaqom vayalen sham ki ba hashemesh vayiqakh mei'abnei hamaqom vayasem mera'ashotav vayishkab bamaqom hahu. genesis 28:12	vayakhalom vehineh sulam muzab 'arzah verosho magia' hashamayemah vehineh mal'akhei 'elohim 'olim veyoredim bo. genesis 28:13	vehineh yhvh nizab 'alav vayomar 'ani yhvh 'elohei 'abraham 'abikha veilohei yizkhaq ha'arez 'asher 'atah shokheb 'aleha lekha 'etenenah ulezar'ekha. genesis 28:14	vehayah zar'akha ka'afar ha'arez ufarazta yamah vaqeidemah vezafonah vanegbah venibrakhu bekha kal mishpekhot ha'adamah ubezar'ekha. genesis 28:15	vehineh 'anokhi 'imakh ushemartikha bekhol 'asher teilekh vahashibotikha 'el ha'adamah hazot ki lo 'e'ezabekha 'ad 'asher 'im 'asiti 'et 'asher dibarti lakh. genesis 28:16	vayiqaz ya'aqob mishenato vayomer 'akhen yesh yhvh bamaqom hazeh ve'anokhi lo yada'eti. genesis 28:17	vayira vayomar mah nora hamaqom hazeh 'en zeh ki 'im bet 'elohim vezeh sha'ar hashamayim. genesis 28:18	vayashkem ya'aqob baboqer vayiqakh 'et ha'eben 'asher sam mera'ashotav vayasem 'otah mazeibah vayizoq shemen 'al roshah. genesis 28:19	vayiqra 'et shem hamaqom hahu bet 'el ve'ulam luz shem ha'ir larishonah. genesis 28:20	vayidar ya'aqob neder leimor 'im yihyeh 'elohim 'imadi ushemarani baderekh hazeh 'asher 'anokhi holekh venatan li lekhem le'ekhol ubeged lilbosh. genesis 28:21	veshabti beshalom 'el bet 'abi vehayah yhvh li leilohim. genesis 28:22	veha'eben hazot 'asher samti mazeibah yihyeh bet 'elohim vekhol 'asher titen li 'aser 'a'aserenu lakh. genesis 29:1	vayisa ya'aqob raglav vayeilekh 'arzah benei qedem. genesis 29:2	vayar vehineh be'er basadeh vehineh sham sheloshah 'edrei zon robezim 'aleha ki min habe'er hahiv yashqu ha'adarim veha'eben gedolah 'al pi habe'er. genesis 29:3	vene'esfu shamah khal ha'adarim vegalalu 'et ha'eben mei'al pi habe'er vehishqu 'et hazon veheishibu 'et ha'eben 'al pi habe'er limqomah. genesis 29:4	vayomer lahem ya'aqob 'akhai mei'ayin 'atem vayomeru meikharan 'anakhenu. genesis 29:5	vayomer lahem hayda'tem 'et laban ben nakhor vayomeru yada'enu. genesis 29:6	vayomer lahem hashalom lo vayomeru shalom vehineh rakhel bito ba'ah 'im hazon. genesis 29:7	vayomer hen 'od hayom gadol lo 'et hei'asef hamiqneh hashqu hazon ulekhu re'u. genesis 29:8	vayomeru lo nukhal 'ad 'asher yei'asefu kal ha'adarim vegalalu 'et ha'eben mei'al pi habe'er vehishqinu hazon. genesis 29:9	'odenu medaber 'imam verakhel ba'ah 'im hazon 'asher le'abiha ki ro'ah hi genesis 29:10	vayhi ka'asher ra'ah ya'aqob 'et rakhel bat laban 'akhi 'imo ve'et zon laban 'akhi 'imo vayigash ya'aqob vayagel 'et ha'eben mei'al pi habe'er vayashq 'et zon laban 'akhi 'imo. genesis 29:11	vayishaq ya'aqob lerakhel vayisa 'et qolo vayeibek. genesis 29:12	vayaged ya'aqob lerakhel ki 'akhi 'abiha hu vekhi ben ribqah hu vataraz vataged le'abiha. genesis 29:13	vayhi khishmoa' laban 'et sheima' ya'aqob ben 'akhoto vayaraz liqrato vaykhabeq lo vaynasheq lo vaybi'eihu 'el beito vaysaper lelaban 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. genesis 29:14	vayomer lo laban 'akh 'azmi ubesari 'atah vayeisheb 'imo khodesh yamim. genesis 29:15	vayomer laban leya'aqob hakhi 'akhi 'atah va'abadtani khinam hagidah li mah maskurtekha. genesis 29:16	ulelaban shetei banot shem hagedolah lei'ah veshem haqetanah rakhel. genesis 29:17	ve'einei lei'ah rakot verakhel hayetah yefat to'ar vifat mar'eh. genesis 29:18	vaye'ehab ya'aqob 'et rakhel vayomer 'e'ebadekha sheba' shanim berakhel bitekha haqetanah. genesis 29:19	vayomer laban tob titi 'otah lakh mititi 'otah le'ish 'akher shebah 'imadi. genesis 29:20	vaya'abod ya'aqob berakhel sheba' shanim vayihyu be'einav keyamim 'akhadim be'ahabato 'otah. genesis 29:21	vayomer ya'aqob 'el laban habah 'et 'ishti ki male'u yamai ve'abo'ah 'eileha. genesis 29:22	vaye'esof laban 'et kal 'anshei hamaqom vaya'as mishteh. genesis 29:23	vayhi ba'ereb vayiqakh 'et lei'ah bito vayabei 'otah 'eilav vayabo 'eileha. genesis 29:24	vayiten laban lah 'et zilpah shifkhato lelei'ah bito shifkhah. genesis 29:25	vayhi baboqer vehineh hi lei'ah vayomer 'el laban mah zot 'asita li halo berakhel 'abadti 'imakh velamah rimitani. genesis 29:26	vayomer laban lo yei'aseh khen bimqomeinu latet haze'irah lifnei habekhirah. genesis 29:27	malei shebua' zot venitenah lekha gam 'et zot ba'abodah 'asher ta'abod 'imadi 'od sheba' shanim 'akheirot. genesis 29:28	vaya'as ya'aqob ken vaymalei shebua' zot vayiten lo 'et rakhel bito lo le'ishah. genesis 29:29	vayiten laban lerakhel bito 'et bilhah shifkhato lah leshifkhah. genesis 29:30	vayabo gam 'el rakhel vaye'ehab gam 'et rakhel milei'ah vaya'abod 'imo 'od sheba' shanim 'akheirot. genesis 29:31	vayar yhvh ki senu'ah lei'ah vayiftakh 'et rakhmah verakhel 'aqarah. genesis 29:32	vatahar lei'ah vateiled ben vatiqra shemo re'uben ki 'amerah ki ra'ah yhvh be'anyi ki 'atah ye'ehabani 'ishi. genesis 29:33	vatahar 'od vateiled ben vatomer ki shama' yhvh ki senu'ah 'anokhi vayiten li gam 'et zeh vatiqra shemo shim'on. genesis 29:34	vatahar 'od vateiled ben vatomer 'atah hapa'am yilaveh 'ishi 'eilai ki yaladti lo sheloshah banim 'al ken qara shemo leivi. genesis 29:35	vatahar 'od vateiled ben vatomer hapa'am 'odeh 'et yhvh 'al ken qare'ah shemo yehudah vata'amod miledet. genesis 30:1	vateire rakhel ki lo yaledah leya'aqob vateqanei rakhel ba'akhotah vatomer 'el ya'aqob habah li banim ve'im 'ayin meitah 'anokhi. genesis 30:2	vayikhar 'af ya'aqob berakhel vayomer hatakhat 'elohim 'anokhi 'asher mana' mimekh peri baten. genesis 30:3	vatomer hineh 'amati bilhah bo 'eileha veteiled 'al birkai ve'ibaneh gam 'anokhi mimenah. genesis 30:4	vatiten lo 'et bilhah shifkhatah le'ishah vayabo 'eileha ya'aqob. genesis 30:5	vatahar bilhah vateiled leya'aqob ben. genesis 30:6	vatomer rakhel danani 'elohim vegam shama' beqoli vayiten li ben 'al ken qare'ah shemo dan. genesis 30:7	vatahar 'od vateiled bilhah shifkhat rakhel ben sheini leya'aqob. genesis 30:8	vatomer rakhel naftulei 'elohim niftalti 'im 'akhoti gam yakholeti vatiqra shemo naftali. genesis 30:9	vateire lei'ah ki 'amedah miledet vatiqakh 'et zilpah shifkhatah vatiten 'otah leya'aqob le'ishah. genesis 30:10	vateiled zilpah shifkhat lei'ah leya'aqob ben. genesis 30:11	vatomer lei'ah begad ba gad vatiqra 'et shemo gad. genesis 30:12	vateiled zilpah shifkhat lei'ah ben sheini leya'aqob. genesis 30:13	vatomer lei'ah be'asheri ki 'isheruni banot vatiqra 'et shemo 'asher. genesis 30:14	vayeilekh re'uben bimei qezir khitim vayimza duda'im basadeh vayabei 'otam 'el lei'ah 'imo vatomer rakhel 'el lei'ah teni na li miduda'ei benekh. genesis 30:15	vatomer lah ham'at qakhtekh 'et 'ishi velaqakhat gam 'et duda'ei beni vatomer rakhel lakhen yishkab 'imakh halaylah takhat duda'ei benekh. genesis 30:16	vayabo ya'aqob min hasadeh ba'ereb vateizei lei'ah liqrato vatomer 'eilai tabo ki sakhor sekhartikha beduda'ei beni vayishkab 'imah balaylah hu. genesis 30:17	vayishma' 'elohim 'el lei'ah vatahar vateiled leya'aqob ben khamishi. genesis 30:18	vatomer lei'ah natan 'elohim sekhari 'asher natati shifkhati le'ishi vatiqra shemo yisashkhar. genesis 30:19	vatahar 'od lei'ah vateiled ben shishi leya'aqob genesis 30:20	vatomer lei'ah zebadani 'elohim 'oti zeibed tob hapa'am yizbeleini 'ishi ki yaladti lo shishah banim vatiqra 'et shemo zebulun. genesis 30:21	ve'akhar yaledah bat vatiqra 'et shemah dinah. genesis 30:22	vayizkor 'elohim 'et rakhel vayishma' 'eileha 'elohim vayiftakh 'et rakhmah. genesis 30:23	vatahar vateiled ben vatomer 'asaf 'elohim 'et kherpati. genesis 30:24	vatiqra 'et shemo yosef leimor yosef yhvh li ben 'akher. genesis 30:25	vayhi ka'asher yaledah rakhel 'et yosef vayomer ya'aqob 'el laban shalekheini ve'eilekhah 'el meqomi ule'arzi. genesis 30:26	tenah 'et nashai ve'et yeladai 'asher 'abadti 'otekha bahen ve'eileikhah ki 'atah yada'ta 'et 'abodati 'asher 'abadtikha. genesis 30:27	vayomer 'eilav laban 'im na mazati khen be'einekha nikhashti vaybarakheini yhvh biglalekha. genesis 30:28	vayomar naqebah sekharekha 'alai ve'eteinah. genesis 30:29	vayomer 'eilav 'atah yada'ta 'et 'asher 'abadtikha ve'et 'asher hayah miqnekha 'iti. genesis 30:30	ki me'at 'asher hayah lekha lefanai vayifroz larob vaybarekh yhvh 'otekha leragli ve'atah matai 'e'eseh gam 'anokhi lebeiti. genesis 30:31	vayomer mah 'eten lakh vayomer ya'aqob lo titen li me'umah 'im ta'aseh li hadabar hazeh 'ashubah 'er'eh zonekha 'eshmor. genesis 30:32	'e'ebor bekhal zonekha hayom haser misham kal seh naqod vetalu vekhal seh khum bakesabim vetalu venaqod ba'izim vehayah sekhari. genesis 30:33	ve'anetah bi zidqati beyom makhar ki tabo 'al sekhari lefanekha kol 'asher 'einenu naqod vetalu ba'izim vekhum bakesabim ganub hu 'iti. genesis 30:34	vayomer laban hen lu yehi khidbarekha. genesis 30:35	vayasar bayom hahu 'et hateyashim ha'aqudim vehatelu'im ve'et kal ha'izim hanequdot vehatelu'ot kol 'asher laban bo vekhal khum bakesabim vayiten beyad banav. genesis 30:36	vayasem derekh sheloshet yamim beino uben ya'aqob veya'aqob ro'eh 'et zon laban hanotarot. genesis 30:37	vayiqakh lo ya'aqob maqal libneh lakh veluz ve'ermon vayfazel bahen pezalot lebanot makhsof halaban 'asher 'al hamaqlot. genesis 30:38	vayazeg 'et hamaqlot 'asher pizel barohatim beshiqatot hamayim 'asher tabona hazon lishtot lenokhakh hazon vayeikhamnah bebo'an lishtot. genesis 30:39	vayekhemu hazon 'el hamaqlot vateiladna hazon 'aqudim nequdim utelu'im. genesis 30:40	vehakesabim hifrid ya'aqob vayiten penei hazon 'el 'aqod vekhal khum bezon laban vayashet lo 'adarim lebado velo shatam 'al zon laban. genesis 30:41	vehayah bekhal yakhem hazon hamqusharot vesam ya'aqob 'et hamaqlot le'einei hazon barohatim leyakhmenah bamaqlot. genesis 30:42	ubeha'atif hazon lo yasim vehayah ha'atufim lelaban vehaqeshurim leya'aqob. genesis 30:43	vayifroz ha'ish me'od me'od vayhi lo zon rabot ushefakhot va'abadim ugemalim vakhamorim. genesis 31:1	vayishma' 'et dibrei benei laban leimor laqakh ya'aqob 'et kal 'asher le'abinu umei'asher le'abinu 'asah 'et kal hakabod hazeh. genesis 31:2	vayar ya'aqob 'et penei laban vehineh 'einenu 'imo kitmol shilshom. genesis 31:3	vayomer yhvh 'el ya'aqob shub 'el 'erez 'abotekha ulemoladtekha ve'ehyeh 'imakh. genesis 31:4	vayishlakh ya'aqob vayiqra lerakhel ulelei'ah hasadeh 'el zono. genesis 31:5	vayomer lahen ro'eh 'anokhi 'et penei 'abikhen ki 'einenu 'eilai kitmol shilshom veilohei 'abi hayah 'imadi. genesis 31:6	ve'ateinah yeda'ten ki bekhal kokhi 'abadti 'et 'abikhen. genesis 31:7	va'abikhen heitel bi vehekhelif 'et maskurti 'aseret monim velo netano 'elohim lehara' 'imadi. genesis 31:8	'im koh yomar nequdim yihyeh sekharekha veyaledu khal hazon nequdim ve'im koh yomar 'aqudim yihyeh sekharekha veyaledu khal hazon 'aqudim. genesis 31:9	vayazel 'elohim 'et miqneh 'abikhem vayiten li. genesis 31:10	vayhi be'et yakhem hazon va'esa 'einai va'eire bakhalom vehineh ha'atudim ha'olim 'al hazon 'aqudim nequdim uberudim. genesis 31:11	vayomer 'eilai mal'akh ha'elohim bakhalom ya'aqob va'omar hineini. genesis 31:12	vayomer sa na 'einekha ure'eh kal ha'atudim ha'olim 'al hazon 'aqudim nequdim uberudim ki ra'iti 'et kal 'asher laban 'oseh lakh. genesis 31:13	'anokhi ha'el bet 'el 'asher mashakhta sham mazeibah 'asher nadarta li sham neder 'atah qum zei min ha'arez hazot veshub 'el 'erez moladtekha. genesis 31:14	vata'an rakhel velei'ah vatomarnah lo ha'od lanu kheileq venakhalah bebet 'abinu. genesis 31:15	halo nakheriyot nekhshabnu lo ki mekharanu vayokhal gam 'akhol 'et kaspeinu. genesis 31:16	ki khal ha'osher 'asher hizil 'elohim mei'abinu lanu hu ulebaneinu ve'atah kol 'asher 'amar 'elohim 'eilekha 'aseh. genesis 31:17	vayaqam ya'aqob vayisa 'et banav ve'et nashav 'al hagemalim. genesis 31:18	vayinhag 'et kal miqneihu ve'et kal rekhusho 'asher rakhash miqneh qinyano 'asher rakhash befadan 'aram labo 'el yizkhaq 'abiv 'arzah kena'an. genesis 31:19	velaban halakh ligzoz 'et zono vatignob rakhel 'et haterafim 'asher le'abiha. genesis 31:20	vayignob ya'aqob 'et leb laban ha'arami 'al beli higid lo ki boreiakh hu. genesis 31:21	vayibrakh hu vekhal 'asher lo vayaqam vaya'abor 'et hanahar vayasem 'et panav har hagil'ad. genesis 31:22	vayugad lelaban bayom hashelishi ki barakh ya'aqob. genesis 31:23	vayiqakh 'et 'ekhav 'imo vayirdof 'akharav derekh shib'at yamim vayadbeq 'oto behar hagil'ad. genesis 31:24	vayabo 'elohim 'el laban ha'arami bakhalom halayelah vayomer lo hishamer lekha pen tedaber 'im ya'aqob mitob 'ad ra'. genesis 31:25	vayaseg laban 'et ya'aqob veya'aqob taqa' 'et 'aholo bahar velaban taqa' 'et 'ekhav behar hagil'ad. genesis 31:26	vayomer laban leya'aqob meh 'asita vatignob 'et lebabi vatenaheg 'et benotai kishbuyot khareb. genesis 31:27	lamah nakhbeita libroakh vatignob 'oti velo higadta li va'ashaleikhakha besimkhah ubeshirim betof ubekhinor. genesis 31:28	velo netashtani lenasheq lebanai velibnotai 'atah hiskalta 'aso. genesis 31:29	yesh le'el yadi la'asot 'imakhem ra' veilohei 'abikhem 'emesh 'amar 'eilai leimor hishamer lekha midaber 'im ya'aqob mitob 'ad ra'. genesis 31:30	ve'atah halokh halakhta ki nikhsof nikhsaftah lebet 'abikha lamah ganabta 'et 'elohai. genesis 31:31	vaya'an ya'aqob vayomer lelaban ki yareiti ki 'amarti pen tigzol 'et benotekha mei'imi. genesis 31:32	'im 'asher timza 'et 'elohekha lo yikhyeh neged 'akheinu haker lekha mah 'imadi veqakh lakh velo yada' ya'aqob ki rakhel genabatam. genesis 31:33	vayabo laban be'ohel ya'aqob ube'ohel lei'ah ube'ohel shetei ha'amahot velo maza vayeizei mei'ohel lei'ah vayabo be'ohel rakhel. genesis 31:34	verakhel laqekhah 'et haterafim vatesimem bekhar hagamal vateisheb 'aleihem vaymashesh laban 'et kal ha'ohel velo maza. genesis 31:35	vatomer 'el 'abiha 'al yikhar be'einei 'adoni ki lo 'ukhal laqum mipanekha ki derekh nashim li vaykhapes velo maza 'et haterafim. genesis 31:36	vayikhar leya'aqob vayareb belaban vaya'an ya'aqob vayomer lelaban mah pish'i mah khatati ki dalaqta 'akharai. genesis 31:37	ki mishashta 'et kal keilai mah mazata mikol kelei beitekha sim koh neged 'akhai ve'akhekha veyokhikhu ben sheneinu. genesis 31:38	zeh 'esrim shanah 'anokhi 'imakh rekheilekha ve'izekha lo shikeilu ve'eilei zonekha lo 'akhaleti. genesis 31:39	tereifah lo heibeiti 'eilekha 'anokhi 'akhatenah miyadi tebaqshenah genubti yom ugenubti layelah. genesis 31:40	hayiti bayom 'akhalani khoreb veqerakh balayelah vatidad shenati mei'einai. genesis 31:41	zeh li 'esrim shanah bebeitekha 'abadtikha 'arba' 'esreh shanah bishtei benotekha veshesh shanim bezonekha vatakhalef 'et maskurti 'aseret monim. genesis 31:42	lulei 'elohei 'abi 'elohei 'abraham ufakhad yizkhaq hayah li ki 'atah reiqam shilakhtani 'et 'aneyi ve'et yegia' kapai ra'ah 'elohim vayokhakh 'amesh. genesis 31:43	vaya'an laban vayomer 'el ya'aqob habanot benotai vehabanim banai vehazon zoni vekhol 'asher 'atah ro'eh li hu velibnotai mah 'e'eseh la'eleh hayom 'o libneihen 'asher yaladu. genesis 31:44	ve'atah lekhah nikhretah berit 'ani va'atah vehayah le'ed beini ubeinekha. genesis 31:45	vayiqakh ya'aqob 'aben vayrimeha mazeibah. genesis 31:46	vayomer ya'aqob le'ekhav liqtu 'abanim vayiqkhu 'abanim vaya'asu gal vayokhelu sham 'al hagal. genesis 31:47	vayiqra lo laban yegar sahaduta veya'aqob qara lo gal'ed. genesis 31:48	vayomer laban hagal hazeh 'ed beini ubeinekha hayom 'al ken qara shemo gal'ed. genesis 31:49	vehamizpah 'asher 'amar yizef yhvh beini ubeinekha ki nisater 'ish meirei'eihu. genesis 31:50	'im te'aneh 'et benotai ve'im tiqakh nashim 'al benotai 'en 'ish 'imanu re'eh 'elohim 'ed beini ubeinekha. genesis 31:51	vayomer laban leya'aqob hineh hagal hazeh vehineh hamazeibah 'asher yariti beini ubeinekha. genesis 31:52	'ed hagal hazeh ve'eidah hamazeibah 'im 'ani lo 'e'ebor 'eilekha 'et hagal hazeh ve'im 'atah lo ta'abor 'eilai 'et hagal hazeh ve'et hamazeibah hazot lera'ah. genesis 31:53	'elohei 'abraham veilohei nakhor yishpetu beineinu 'elohei 'abihem vayishaba' ya'aqob befakhad 'abiv yizkhaq. genesis 31:54	vayizbakh ya'aqob zebakh bahar vayiqra le'ekhav le'ekhal lakhem vayokhelu lekhem vayalinu bahar. genesis 31:55	vayashkem laban baboqer vaynasheq lebanav velibnotav vaybarekh 'ethem vayeilekh vayashab laban limqomo. genesis 32:1	veya'aqob halakh ledarko vayifge'u bo mal'akhei 'elohim. genesis 32:2	vayomer ya'aqob ka'asher ra'am makhaneh 'elohim zeh vayiqra shem hamaqom hahu makhanayim. genesis 32:3	vayishlakh ya'aqob mal'akhim lefanav 'el 'eisav 'akhiv 'arzah sei'ir sedeh 'edom. genesis 32:4	vayzav 'otam leimor koh tomerun ladoni le'eisav koh 'amar 'abdekha ya'aqob 'im laban garti va'eikhar 'ad 'atah. genesis 32:5	vayhi li shor vakhamor zon ve'ebed veshifkhah va'eshlekhah lehagid ladoni limzo khen be'einekha. genesis 32:6	vayashubu hamal'akhim 'el ya'aqob leimor banu 'el 'akhikha 'el 'eisav vegam holekh liqratekha ve'arba' mei'ot 'ish 'imo. genesis 32:7	vayira ya'aqob me'od vayeizer lo vayakhaz 'et ha'am 'asher 'ito ve'et hazon ve'et habaqar vehagemalim lishnei makhanot. genesis 32:8	vayomer 'im yabo 'eisav 'el hamakhaneh ha'akhat vehikahu vehayah hamakhaneh hanish'ar lifleitah. genesis 32:9	vayomer ya'aqob 'elohei 'abi 'abraham veilohei 'abi yizkhaq yhvh ha'omer 'eilai shub le'arzekha ulemoladtekha ve'eitibah 'imakh. genesis 32:10	qatoneti mikol hakhasadim umikal ha'emet 'asher 'asita 'et 'abdekha ki bemaqli 'abarti 'et hayarden hazeh ve'atah hayiti lishnei makhanot. genesis 32:11	hazileini na miyad 'akhi miyad 'eisav ki yarei 'anokhi 'oto pen yabo vehikani 'em 'al banim. genesis 32:12	ve'atah 'amarta heiteb 'eitib 'imakh vesamti 'et zar'akha kekhol hayam 'asher lo yisafer meirob. genesis 32:13	vayalen sham balaylah hahu vayiqakh min haba beyado minkhah le'eisav 'akhiv. genesis 32:14	'izim matayim uteyashim 'esrim rekheilim matayim ve'eilim 'esrim. genesis 32:15	gemalim meiniqot ubeneihem sheloshim parot 'arba'im ufarim 'asarah 'atonot 'esrim va'yarim 'asarah. genesis 32:16	vayiten beyad 'abadav 'eider 'eider lebado vayomer 'el 'abadav 'ibru lefanai verevakh tasimu ben 'eider uben 'eider. genesis 32:17	vayzav 'et harishon leimor ki yifgashekha 'eisav 'akhi vish'eilekha leimor lemi 'atah ve'anah teilekh ulemi 'eleh lefanekha. genesis 32:18	ve'amarta le'abdekha leya'aqob minkhah hi shelukhah ladoni le'eisav vehineh gam hu 'akhareinu. genesis 32:19	vayzav gam 'et hasheini gam 'et hashelishi gam 'et kal haholekhim 'akharei ha'adarim leimor kadabar hazeh tedaberun 'el 'eisav bemoza'akhem 'oto. genesis 32:20	va'amartem gam hineh 'abdekha ya'aqob 'akhareinu ki 'amar 'akhaperah fanav baminkhah haholekhet lefanai ve'akharei khen 'er'eh fanav 'ulai yisa fanai. genesis 32:21	vata'abor haminkhah 'al panav vehu lan balaylah hahu bamakhaneh. genesis 32:22	vayaqam balaylah hu vayiqakh 'et shetei nashav ve'et shetei shifkhotav ve'et 'akhad 'asar yeladav vaya'abor 'et ma'abar yaboq. genesis 32:23	vayiqakhem vaya'abirem 'et hanakhal vaya'aber 'et 'asher lo genesis 32:24	vayivater ya'aqob lebado vayei'abeq 'ish 'imo 'ad 'alot hashakhar. genesis 32:25	vayar ki lo yakhol lo vayiga' bekhaf yereikho vateiqa' kaf yerekh ya'aqob behei'abeqo 'imo. genesis 32:26	vayomer shalekheini ki 'alah hashakhar vayomer lo 'ashaleikhakha ki 'im beirakhtani. genesis 32:27	vayomer 'eilav mah shemekha vayomer ya'aqob. genesis 32:28	vayomer lo ya'aqob yei'amer 'od shimkha ki 'im yisra'el ki sarita 'im 'elohim ve'im 'anashim vatukhal. genesis 32:29	vayish'al ya'aqob vayomer hagidah na shemekha vayomer lamah zeh tish'al lishmi vaybarekh 'oto sham. genesis 32:30	vayiqra ya'aqob shem hamaqom peni'el ki ra'iti 'elohim panim 'el panim vatinazel nafshi. genesis 32:31	vayizrakh lo hashemesh ka'asher 'abar 'et penu'el vehu zoleia' 'al yereikho. genesis 32:32	'al ken lo yokhelu benei yisra'el 'et gid hanasheh 'asher 'al kaf hayarekh 'ad hayom hazeh ki naga' bekhaf yerekh ya'aqob begid hanasheh. genesis 33:1	vayisa ya'aqob 'einav vayar vehineh 'eisav ba ve'imo 'arba' mei'ot 'ish vayakhaz 'et hayladim 'al lei'ah ve'al rakhel ve'al shetei hashefakhot. genesis 33:2	vayasem 'et hashefakhot ve'et yaldeihen rishonah ve'et lei'ah viladeha 'akharonim ve'et rakhel ve'et yosef 'akharonim. genesis 33:3	vehu 'abar lifneihem vayishtakhu 'arzah sheba' pe'amim 'ad gishto 'ad 'akhiv. genesis 33:4	vayaraz 'eisav liqrato vaykhabeqeihu vayipol 'al zavarav vayishaqeihu vayibku. genesis 33:5	vayisa 'et 'einav vayar 'et hanashim ve'et hayladim vayomer mi 'eleh lakh vayomar hayladim 'asher khanan 'elohim 'et 'abdekha. genesis 33:6	vatigashna hashefakhot henah veyaldeihen vatishtakhavena. genesis 33:7	vatigash gam lei'ah viladeha vayishtakhavu ve'akhar nigash yosef verakhel vayishtakhavu. genesis 33:8	vayomer mi lekha kal hamakhaneh hazeh 'asher pagasheti vayomer limzo khen be'einei 'adoni. genesis 33:9	vayomer 'eisav yesh li rab 'akhi yehi lekha 'asher lakh. genesis 33:10	vayomer ya'aqob 'al na 'im na mazati khen be'einekha velaqakhta minkhati miyadi ki 'al ken ra'iti fanekha kir'ot penei 'elohim vatirzeini. genesis 33:11	qakh na 'et birkhati 'asher hubat lakh ki khanani 'elohim vekhi yesh li khol vayifzar bo vayiqakh. genesis 33:12	vayomer nis'ah veneileikhah ve'eilekhah lenegdekha. genesis 33:13	vayomer 'eilav 'adoni yodeia' ki hayladim rakim vehazon vehabaqar 'alot 'alai udefaqum yom 'ekhad vameitu kal hazon. genesis 33:14	ya'abar na 'adoni lifnei 'abdo va'ani 'etnahalah le'iti leregel hamelakhah 'asher lefanai uleregel hayladim 'ad 'asher 'abo 'el 'adoni sei'irah. genesis 33:15	vayomer 'eisav 'azigah na 'imekha min ha'am 'asher 'iti vayomer lamah zeh 'emza khen be'einei 'adoni. genesis 33:16	vayashab bayom hahu 'eisav ledarko sei'irah. genesis 33:17	veya'aqob nasa' sukotah vayiben lo bayit ulemiqneihu 'asah sukot 'al ken qara shem hamaqom sukot. genesis 33:18	vayabo ya'aqob shalem 'ir shekhem 'asher be'erez kena'an bebo'o mipadan 'aram vayikhan 'et penei ha'ir. genesis 33:19	vayiqen 'et khelqat hasadeh 'asher natah sham 'aholo miyad benei khamor 'abi shekhem bemei'ah qesitah. genesis 33:20	vayazeb sham mizbeiakh vayiqra lo 'el 'elohei yisra'el. genesis 34:1	vateizei dinah bat lei'ah 'asher yaledah leya'aqob lir'ot bibnot ha'arez. genesis 34:2	vayar 'otah shekhem ben khamor hakhivi nesi ha'arez vayiqakh 'otah vayishkab 'otah vai'aneha. genesis 34:3	vatidbaq nafsho bedinah bat ya'aqob vaye'ehab 'et hana'ara vaydaber 'al leb hana'ara. genesis 34:4	vayomer shekhem 'el khamor 'abiv leimor qakh li 'et hayaldah hazot le'ishah. genesis 34:5	veya'aqob shama' ki timei 'et dinah bito ubanav hayu 'et miqneihu basadeh vehekherish ya'aqob 'ad bo'am. genesis 34:6	vayeizei khamor 'abi shekhem 'el ya'aqob ledaber 'ito. genesis 34:7	ubenei ya'aqob ba'u min hasadeh keshame'am vayit'azebu ha'anashim vayikhar lahem me'od ki nebalah 'asah beyisra'el lishkab 'et bat ya'aqob vekhen lo yei'aseh. genesis 34:8	vaydaber khamor 'itam leimor shekhem beni khasheqah nafsho bebitekhem tenu na 'otah lo le'ishah. genesis 34:9	vehitkhatenu 'otanu benoteikhem titenu lanu ve'et benoteinu tiqkhu lakhem. genesis 34:10	ve'itanu teisheibu veha'arez tihyeh lifneikhem shebu usekharuha vehei'akhazu bah. genesis 34:11	vayomer shekhem 'el 'abih ve'el 'akheha 'emza khen be'eineikhem va'asher tomeru 'eilai 'eten. genesis 34:12	harbu 'alai me'od mohar umatan ve'etenah ka'asher tomeru 'eilai utenu li 'et hana'ara le'ishah. genesis 34:13	vaya'anu benei ya'aqob 'et shekhem ve'et khamor 'abiv bemirmah vaydabeiru 'asher timei 'et dinah 'akhotam. genesis 34:14	vayomeru 'aleihem lo nukhal la'asot hadabar hazeh latet 'et 'akhoteinu le'ish 'asher lo 'arelah ki kherpah hi lanu. genesis 34:15	'akh bezot nei'ot lakhem 'im tihyu khamonu lehimol lakhem kal zakhar. genesis 34:16	venatanu 'et benoteinu lakhem ve'et benoteikhem niqakh lanu veyashabnu 'itekhem vehayinu le'am 'ekhad. genesis 34:17	ve'im lo tishme'u 'eileinu lehimol velaqakhnu 'et biteinu vehalakhenu. genesis 34:18	vayitebu dibreihem be'einei khamor ube'einei shekhem ben khamor. genesis 34:19	velo 'eikhar hana'ar la'asot hadabar ki khafez bebat ya'aqob vehu nikhbad mikol bet 'abiv. genesis 34:20	vayabo khamor ushekhem beno 'el sha'ar 'iram vaydaberu 'el 'anshei 'iram leimor. genesis 34:21	ha'anashim ha'eleh sheleimim hem 'itanu veyeishebu ba'arez veyiskharu 'otah veha'arez hineh rakhabat yadayim lifneihem 'et benotam niqakh lanu lenashim ve'et benoteinu niten lahem. genesis 34:22	'akh bezot yei'otu lanu ha'anashim lashebet 'itanu lihyot le'am 'ekhad behimol lanu kal zakhar ka'asher hem nimolim. genesis 34:23	miqneihem veqinyanam vekhal behemtam halo lanu hem 'akh nei'otah lahem veyeishebu 'itanu. genesis 34:24	vayishme'u 'el khamor ve'el shekhem beno kal yoze'ei sha'ar 'iro vayimolu kal zakhar kal yoze'ei sha'ar 'iro. genesis 34:25	vayhi bayom hashelishi bihyotam ko'abim vayiqkhu shenei benei ya'aqob shim'on veleivi 'akhei dinah 'ish kharbo vayabo'u 'al ha'ir betakh vayahargu kal zakhar. genesis 34:26	ve'et khamor ve'et shekhem beno haregu lefi khareb vayiqkhu 'et dinah mibet shekhem vayeizei'u. genesis 34:27	benei ya'aqob ba'u 'al hakhalalim vayabozu ha'ir 'asher time'u 'akhotam. genesis 34:28	'et zonam ve'et beqaram ve'et khamoreihem ve'et 'asher ba'ir ve'et 'asher basadeh laqakhu. genesis 34:29	ve'et kal kheilam ve'et kal tapam ve'et nesheihem shabu vayabozu ve'et kal 'asher babayit. genesis 34:30	vayomer ya'aqob 'el shim'on ve'el leivi 'akhartem 'oti lehab'isheini beyosheb ha'arez bakena'ani ubaperizi va'ani metei mispar vene'esfu 'alai vehikuni venishmadti 'ani ubeiti. genesis 34:31	vayomeru hakhzonah ya'aseh 'et 'akhoteinu. genesis 35:1	vayomer 'elohim 'el ya'aqob qum 'aleh bet 'el vesheb sham va'aseh sham mizbeiakh la'el hanir'eh 'eilekha bebarekhakha mipenei 'eisav 'akhikha. genesis 35:2	vayomer ya'aqob 'el beito ve'el kal 'asher 'imo hasiru 'et 'elohei haneikhar 'asher betokhekhem vehitaharu vehakhalifu simloteikhem. genesis 35:3	venaqumah vena'aleh bet 'el ve'e'eseh sham mizbeiakh la'el ha'oneh 'oti beyom zarati vayhi 'imadi baderekh 'asher halakheti. genesis 35:4	vayitenu 'el ya'aqob 'et kal 'elohei haneikhar 'asher beyadam ve'et hanezamim 'asher be'azeneihem vayitmon 'otam ya'aqob takhat ha'eilah 'asher 'im shekhem. genesis 35:5	vayisa'u vayhi khitat 'elohim 'al he'arim 'asher sebiboteihem velo radefu 'akharei benei ya'aqob. genesis 35:6	vayabo ya'aqob luzah 'asher be'erez kena'an hi bet 'el hu vekhal ha'am 'asher 'imo. genesis 35:7	vayiben sham mizbeiakh vayiqra lamaqom 'el bet 'el ki sham niglu 'eilav ha'elohim bebarekho mipenei 'akhiv. genesis 35:8	vatamat deborah meineqet ribqah vatiqaber mitakhat lebet 'el takhat ha'alon vayiqra shemo 'alon bakhut. genesis 35:9	vayeira 'elohim 'el ya'aqob 'od bebo'o mipadan 'aram vaybarekh 'oto. genesis 35:10	vayomer lo 'elohim shimkha ya'aqob lo yiqarei shimkha 'od ya'aqob ki 'im yisra'el yihyeh shemekha vayiqra 'et shemo yisra'el. genesis 35:11	vayomer lo 'elohim 'ani 'el shadai pereh urebeh go uqehal goyim yihyeh mimeka umelakhim meikhalazekha yeizei'u. genesis 35:12	ve'et ha'arez 'asher natati le'abraham uleyizkhaq lekha 'etenenah ulezar'akha 'akharekha 'eten 'et ha'arez. genesis 35:13	vaya'al mei'alav 'elohim bamaqom 'asher diber 'ito. genesis 35:14	vayazeb ya'aqob mazeibah bamaqom 'asher diber 'ito mazebet 'aben vayasekh 'aleha nesekh vayizoq 'aleha shamen. genesis 35:15	vayiqra ya'aqob 'et shem hamaqom 'asher diber 'ito sham 'elohim bet 'el. genesis 35:16	vayis'u mibet 'el vayhi 'od kibrat ha'arez labo 'efratah vateiled rakhel vateqash belidtah. genesis 35:17	vayhi behaqshotah belidtah vatomer lah hamyaledet 'al tire'i ki gam zeh lakh ben. genesis 35:18	vayhi bezet nafshah ki meitah vatiqra shemo ben 'oni ve'abiv qara lo binyamin. genesis 35:19	vatamat rakhel vatiqaber bederekh 'efratah hi bet lakhem. genesis 35:20	vayazeb ya'aqob mazeibah 'al qeburatah hi mazebet qeburat rakhel 'ad hayom. genesis 35:21	vayisa' yisra'el vayet 'aholoh meihale'ah lemigdal 'eider. genesis 35:22	vayhi bishkon yisra'el ba'arez hahiv vayeilekh re'uben vayishkab 'et bilhah pilegesh 'abiv vayishma' yisra'el vayihyu benei ya'aqob shenem 'asar. genesis 35:23	benei lei'ah bekhor ya'aqob re'uben veshim'on veleivi vihudah veyisashkhar uzebulun. genesis 35:24	benei rakhel yosef ubinyamin. genesis 35:25	ubenei bilhah shifkhat rakhel dan venaftali. genesis 35:26	ubenei zilpah shifkhat lei'ah gad ve'asher 'eleh benei ya'aqob 'asher yulad lo befadan 'aram. genesis 35:27	vayabo ya'aqob 'el yizkhaq 'abiv mamrei qiryat ha'arba' hi khebron 'asher gar sham 'abraham veyizkhaq. genesis 35:28	vayihyu yemei yizkhaq me'at shanah ushemonim shanah. genesis 35:29	vayigva' yizkhaq vayamat vayei'asef 'el 'amav zaqen useba' yamim vayiqberu 'oto 'eisav veya'aqob banav. genesis 36:1	ve'eleh toledot 'eisav hu 'edom. genesis 36:2	'eisav laqakh 'et nashav mibenot kena'an 'et 'adah bat 'eilon hakhiti ve'et 'aholibamah bat 'anah bat zib'on hakhivi. genesis 36:3	ve'et basemat bat yishma'el 'akhot nebayot. genesis 36:4	vateiled 'adah le'eisav 'et 'elifaz ubasemat yaledah 'et re'u'el. genesis 36:5	ve'aholibamah yaledah 'et 'yosh ye'ush ve'et ya'lam ve'et qorakh 'eleh benei 'eisav 'asher yuledu lo be'erez kena'an. genesis 36:6	vayiqakh 'eisav 'et nashav ve'et banav ve'et benotav ve'et kal nafshot beito ve'et miqneihu ve'et kal behemto ve'et kal qinyano 'asher rakhash be'erez kena'an vayeilekh 'el 'erez mipenei ya'aqob 'akhiv. genesis 36:7	ki hayah rekhusham rab mishebet yakhdav velo yakhelah 'erez megureihem laset 'otam mipenei miqneihem. genesis 36:8	vayeisheb 'eisav behar sei'ir 'eisav hu 'edom. genesis 36:9	ve'eleh toledot 'eisav 'abi 'edom behar sei'ir. genesis 36:10	'eleh shemot benei 'eisav 'elifaz ben 'adah 'eishet 'eisav re'u'el ben basemat 'eishet 'eisav. genesis 36:11	vayihyu benei 'elifaz teiman 'omar zefo vega'tam uqenaz. genesis 36:12	vetimna' hayetah filegesh le'elifaz ben 'eisav vateiled le'elifaz 'et 'amaleq 'eleh benei 'adah 'eishet 'eisav. genesis 36:13	ve'eleh benei re'u'el nakhat vazerakh shamah umizah 'eleh hayu benei basemat 'eishet 'eisav. genesis 36:14	ve'eleh hayu benei 'aholibamah bat 'anah bat zib'on 'eishet 'eisav vateiled le'eisav 'et 'yosh ye'ush ve'et ya'lam ve'et qorakh. genesis 36:15	'eleh 'alufei benei 'eisav benei 'elifaz bekhor 'eisav 'aluf teiman 'aluf 'omar 'aluf zefo 'aluf qenaz. genesis 36:16	'aluf qorakh 'aluf ga'tam 'aluf 'amaleq 'eleh 'alufei 'elifaz be'erez 'edom 'eleh benei 'adah. genesis 36:17	ve'eleh benei re'u'el ben 'eisav 'aluf nakhat 'aluf zerakh 'aluf shamah 'aluf mizah 'eleh 'alufei re'u'el be'erez 'edom 'eleh benei basemat 'eishet 'eisav. genesis 36:18	ve'eleh benei 'aholibamah 'eishet 'eisav 'aluf ye'ush 'aluf ya'lam 'aluf qorakh 'eleh 'alufei 'aholibamah bat 'anah 'eishet 'eisav. genesis 36:19	'eleh benei 'eisav ve'eleh 'alufeihem hu 'edom. genesis 36:20	'eleh benei sei'ir hakhori yoshebei ha'arez lotan veshobal vezib'on va'anah. genesis 36:21	vedishon ve'eizer vedishan 'eleh 'alufei hakhori benei sei'ir be'erez 'edom. genesis 36:22	vayihyu benei lotan khori veheimam va'akhot lotan timna'. genesis 36:23	ve'eleh benei shobal 'alvan umanakhat ve'eibal shefo ve'onam. genesis 36:24	ve'eleh benei zib'on ve'ayah va'anah hu 'anah 'asher maza 'et hayeimim bamidbar bir'oto 'et hakhamorim lezib'on 'abiv. genesis 36:25	ve'eleh benei 'anah dishon ve'aholibamah bat 'anah. genesis 36:26	ve'eleh benei dishan khemdan ve'eshban veyitran ukheran. genesis 36:27	'eleh benei 'eizer bilhan veza'avan va'aqan. genesis 36:28	'eleh benei dishan 'uz va'aran. genesis 36:29	'eleh 'alufei hakhori 'aluf lotan 'aluf shobal 'aluf zib'on 'aluf 'anah. genesis 36:30	'aluf dishon 'aluf 'eizer 'aluf dishan 'eleh 'alufei hakhori le'alufeihem be'erez sei'ir. genesis 36:31	ve'eleh hamelakhim 'asher malekhu be'erez 'edom lifnei melakh melekh libnei yisra'el. genesis 36:32	vayimlokh be'edom bela' ben be'or veshem 'iro dinhabah. genesis 36:33	vayamat bala' vayimlokh takhtav yobab ben zerakh mibazerah. genesis 36:34	vayamat yobab vayimlokh takhtav khusham mei'erez hateimani. genesis 36:35	vayamat khusham vayimlokh takhtav hadad ben bedad hamakeh 'et midyan bisdeh mo'ab veshem 'iro 'avit. genesis 36:36	vayamat hadad vayimlokh takhtav samlah mimasreiqah. genesis 36:37	vayamat samlah vayimlokh takhtav sha'ul meirekhobot hanahar. genesis 36:38	vayamat sha'ul vayimlokh takhtav ba'al khanan ben 'akhbor. genesis 36:39	vayamat ba'al khanan ben 'akhbor vayimlokh takhtav hadar veshem 'iro pa'u veshem 'ishto meheitab'el bat matred bat mei zahab. genesis 36:40	ve'eleh shemot 'alufei 'eisav lemishpekhotam limqomotam bishmotam 'aluf timna' 'aluf 'alvah 'aluf yetet. genesis 36:41	'aluf 'aholibamah 'aluf 'eilah 'aluf pinon. genesis 36:42	'aluf qenaz 'aluf teiman 'aluf mibzar. genesis 36:43	'aluf magdi'el 'aluf 'iram 'eleh 'alufei 'edom lemoshebotam be'erez 'akhuzatam hu 'eisav 'abi 'edom. genesis 37:1	vayeisheb ya'aqob be'erez megurei 'abiv be'erez kena'an. genesis 37:2	'eleh toledot ya'aqob yosef ben sheba' 'esreh shanah hayah ro'eh 'et 'ekhav bazon vehu na'ar 'et benei bilhah ve'et benei zilpah neshei 'abiv vayabei yosef 'et dibatam ra'ah 'el 'abihem. genesis 37:3	veyisra'el 'ahab 'et yosef mikal banav ki ben zequnim hu lo ve'asah lo ketonet pasim. genesis 37:4	vayir'u 'ekhav ki 'oto 'ahab 'abihem mikal 'ekhav vayisne'u 'oto velo yakhelu dabero leshalom. genesis 37:5	vayakhalom yosef khalom vayaged le'ekhav vayosifu 'od seno 'oto. genesis 37:6	vayomer 'aleihem shim'u na hakhalom hazeh 'asher khalameti. genesis 37:7	vehineh 'anakhnu me'alemim 'alumim betokh hasadeh vehineh qamah 'alumati vegam nizabah vehineh tesubenah 'alumoteikhem vatishtakhavena la'alumati. genesis 37:8	vayomeru lo 'ekhav hamalokh timlokh 'aleinu 'im mashol timshol banu vayosifu 'od seno 'oto 'al khalomotav ve'al debarav. genesis 37:9	vayakhalom 'od khalom 'akher vaysaper 'oto le'ekhav vayomer hineh khalamti khalom 'od vehineh hashemesh vehayareiakh ve'akhad 'asar kokhabim mishtakhavim li. genesis 37:10	vaysaper 'el 'abiv ve'el 'ekhav vayig'ar bo 'abiv vayomer lo mah hakhalom hazeh 'asher khalameta habo nabo 'ani ve'imekha ve'akhekha lehishtakhavot lekha 'arezah. genesis 37:11	vayqan'u bo 'ekhav ve'abiv shamar 'et hadabar. genesis 37:12	vayeilekhu 'ekhav lir'ot 'et zon 'abihem bishkhem. genesis 37:13	vayomer yisra'el 'el yosef halo 'akhekha ro'im bishkhem lekhah ve'eshlakhakha 'aleihem vayomer lo hineini. genesis 37:14	vayomer lo lekh na re'eh 'et shelom 'akhekha ve'et shelom hazon vahashibeini dabar vayishlakheihu mei'eimeq khebron vayabo shekhemah. genesis 37:15	vayimza'eihu 'ish vehineh to'eh basadeh vayish'aleihu ha'ish leimor mah tebaqesh. genesis 37:16	vayomer 'et 'akhai 'anokhi mebaqesh hagidah na li 'eifoh hem ro'im. genesis 37:17	vayomer ha'ish nase'u mizeh ki shama'ti 'omerim neilekhah dotayenah vayeilekh yosef 'akhar 'ekhav vayimza'em bedotan. genesis 37:18	vayir'u 'oto meirakhoq ubeterem yiqrab 'aleihem vayitnakelu 'oto lahamito. genesis 37:19	vayomeru 'ish 'el 'akhiv hineh ba'al hakhalomot halazeh ba. genesis 37:20	ve'atah lekhu venahargeihu venashlikheihu be'akhad haborot ve'amarnu khayah ra'ah 'akhalatehu venir'eh mah yihyu khalomotav. genesis 37:21	vayishma' re'uben vayazileihu miyadam vayomer lo nakenu nafesh. genesis 37:22	vayomer 'aleihem re'uben 'al tishpekhu dam hashlikhu 'oto 'el habor hazeh 'asher bamidbar veyad 'al tishlekhu bo lema'an hazil 'oto miyadam lahashibo 'el 'abiv. genesis 37:23	vayhi ka'asher ba yosef 'el 'ekhav vayafshitu 'et yosef 'et kutaneto 'et ketonet hapasim 'asher 'alav. genesis 37:24	vayiqakhuhu vayashlikhu 'oto haborah vehabor req 'en bo mayim. genesis 37:25	vayeishebu le'ekhal lekhem vayis'u 'eineihem vayir'u vehineh 'orekhat yishme'eilim ba'ah migil'ad ugemaleihem nose'im nekhot uzeri valot holkhim lehorid mizrayemah. genesis 37:26	vayomer yehudah 'el 'ekhav mah beza' ki naharog 'et 'akhinu vekhisinu 'et damo. genesis 37:27	lekhu venimkerenu layishme'eilim veyadeinu 'al tehi bo ki 'akhinu besareinu hu vayishme'u 'ekhav. genesis 37:28	vaya'abru 'anashim midyanim sokharim vayimshekhu vaya'alu 'et yosef min habor vayimkeru 'et yosef layishme'eilim be'esrim kasef vayabi'u 'et yosef mizrayemah. genesis 37:29	vayashab re'uben 'el habor vehineh 'en yosef babor vayiqra' 'et begadav. genesis 37:30	vayashab 'el 'ekhav vayomar hayeled 'einenu va'ani 'anah 'ani ba. genesis 37:31	vayiqkhu 'et ketonet yosef vayishkhatu se'ir 'izim vayitbelu 'et hakutonet badam. genesis 37:32	vayshalekhu 'et ketonet hapasim vayabi'u 'el 'abihem vayomeru zot mazanu haker na haketonet binkha hi 'im lo. genesis 37:33	vayakirah vayomer ketonet beni khayah ra'ah 'akhalatehu tarof toraf yosef. genesis 37:34	vayiqra' ya'aqob simlotav vayasem saq bematenav vayit'abel 'al beno yamim rabim. genesis 37:35	vayaqumu khal banav vekhal benotav lenakhamo vayma'en lehitnakhem vayomer ki 'eired 'el beni 'abel she'olah vayeibek 'oto 'abiv. genesis 37:36	vehamedanim makheru 'oto 'el mizrayim lefotifar seris par'oh sar hatabakhim. genesis 38:1	vayhi ba'et hahiv vayeired yehudah mei'et 'ekhav vayet 'ad 'ish 'adulami ushemo khirah. genesis 38:2	vayar sham yehudah bat 'ish kena'ani ushemo shua' vayiqakheha vayabo 'eileha. genesis 38:3	vatahar vateiled ben vayiqra 'et shemo 'er. genesis 38:4	vatahar 'od vateiled ben vatiqra 'et shemo 'onan. genesis 38:5	vatosef 'od vateiled ben vatiqra 'et shemo sheilah vehayah bikhzib belidtah 'oto. genesis 38:6	vayiqakh yehudah 'ishah le'er bekhoro ushemah tamar. genesis 38:7	vayhi 'er bekhor yehudah ra' be'einei yhvh vaymiteihu yhvh. genesis 38:8	vayomer yehudah le'onan bo 'el 'eishet 'akhikha veyabem 'otah vehaqem zera' le'akhikha. genesis 38:9	vayeida' 'onan ki lo lo yihyeh hazara' vehayah 'im ba 'el 'eishet 'akhiv veshikhet 'arzah lebilti netan zera' le'akhiv. genesis 38:10	vayeira' be'einei yhvh 'asher 'asah vayamet gam 'oto. genesis 38:11	vayomer yehudah letamar kalato shebi 'almanah bet 'abikh 'ad yigdal sheilah beni ki 'amar pen yamut gam hu ke'ekhav vateilekh tamar vateisheb bet 'abiha. genesis 38:12	vayirbu hayamim vatamat bat shua' 'eishet yehudah vayinakhem yehudah vaya'al 'al gozazei zono hu vekhirah rei'eihu ha'adulami timnatah. genesis 38:13	vayugad letamar leimor hineh khamikh 'oleh timnatah lagoz zono. genesis 38:14	vatasar bigdei 'almenutah mei'aleha vatekhas baza'if vatit'alaf vateisheb befetakh 'einayim 'asher 'al derekh timnatah ki ra'atah ki gadal sheilah vehiv lo nitenah lo le'ishah. genesis 38:15	vayir'eha yehudah vayakhshebeha lezonah ki khisetah paneha. genesis 38:16	vayet 'eileha 'el haderekh vayomer habah na 'abo 'eilayikh ki lo yada' ki khalato hi vatomer mah titen li ki tabo 'eilai. genesis 38:17	vayomer 'anokhi 'ashalakh gedi 'izim min hazon vatomer 'im titen 'eirabon 'ad shalekhekha. genesis 38:18	vayomer mah ha'eirabon 'asher 'eten lakh vatomer khotamekha ufetilekha umatekha 'asher beyadekha vayiten lah vayabo 'eileha vatahar lo. genesis 38:19	vataqam vateilekh vatasar ze'ifah mei'aleha vatilbash bigdei 'almenutah. genesis 38:20	vayishlakh yehudah 'et gedi ha'izim beyad rei'eihu ha'adulami laqakhat ha'eirabon miyad ha'ishah velo meza'ah. genesis 38:21	vayish'al 'et 'anshei meqomah leimor 'ayeh haqedeishah hi ba'einayim 'al hadarekh vayomeru lo hayetah bazeh qedeishah. genesis 38:22	vayashab 'el yehudah vayomer lo mezatiha vegam 'anshei hamaqom 'ameru lo hayetah bazeh qedeishah. genesis 38:23	vayomer yehudah tiqakh lah pen nihyeh labuz hineh shalakhti hagedi hazeh ve'atah lo mezatah. genesis 38:24	vayhi kemishlosh khodashim vayugad lihudah leimor zanetah tamar kalatekha vegam hineh harah liznunim vayomer yehudah hozi'uha vetisaref. genesis 38:25	hi muzet vehi shalekhah 'el khamiha leimor le'ish 'asher 'eleh lo 'anokhi harah vatomer haker na lemi hakhotemet vehapetilim vehamateh ha'eleh. genesis 38:26	vayaker yehudah vayomer zadeqah mimeni ki 'al ken lo netatiha lesheilah beni velo yasaf 'od leda'tah genesis 38:27	vayhi be'et lidtah vehineh te'omim bebitnah. genesis 38:28	vayhi belidtah vayiten yad vatiqakh hamyaledet vatiqshor 'al yado shani leimor zeh yaza rishonah. genesis 38:29	vayhi kemeishib yado vehineh yaza 'akhiv vatomer mah parazta 'alekha parez vayiqra shemo parez. genesis 38:30	ve'akhar yaza 'akhiv 'asher 'al yado hashani vayiqra shemo zarakh. genesis 39:1	veyosef hurad mizrayemah vayiqneihu potifar seris par'oh sar hatabakhim 'ish mizri miyad hayishme'eilim 'asher horiduhu shamah. genesis 39:2	vayhi yhvh 'et yosef vayhi 'ish mazliakh vayhi bebet 'adonav hamizri. genesis 39:3	vayar 'adonav ki yhvh 'ito vekhol 'asher hu 'oseh yhvh mazliakh beyado. genesis 39:4	vayimza yosef khen be'einav vaysharet 'oto vayafqideihu 'al beito vekhal yesh lo natan beyado. genesis 39:5	vayhi mei'az hifqid 'oto bebeito ve'al kal 'asher yesh lo vaybarekh yhvh 'et bet hamizri biglal yosef vayhi birkat yhvh bekhal 'asher yesh lo babayit ubasadeh. genesis 39:6	vaya'azob kal 'asher lo beyad yosef velo yada' 'ito me'umah ki 'im halekhem 'asher hu 'okhel vayhi yosef yefeh to'ar vifeh mar'eh. genesis 39:7	vayhi 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh vatisa 'eishet 'adonav 'et 'eineha 'el yosef vatomer shikhbah 'imi. genesis 39:8	vayma'en vayomer 'el 'eishet 'adonav hen 'adoni lo yada' 'iti mah babayit vekhol 'asher yesh lo natan beyadi. genesis 39:9	'einenu gadol babayit hazeh mimeni velo khasakh mimeni me'umah ki 'im 'otakh ba'asher 'at 'ishto ve'ekh 'e'eseh hara'ah hagedolah hazot vekhatati leilohim. genesis 39:10	vayhi kedaberah 'el yosef yom yom velo shama' 'eileha lishkab 'ezlah lihyot 'imah. genesis 39:11	vayhi kehayom hazeh vayabo habaytah la'asot melakhto ve'en 'ish mei'anshei habayit sham babayit. genesis 39:12	vatitpeseihu bebigdo leimor shikhbah 'imi vaya'azob bigdo beyadah vayanas vayeizei hakhuzah. genesis 39:13	vayhi kir'otah ki 'azab bigdo beyadah vayanas hakhuzah. genesis 39:14	vatiqra le'anshei beitah vatomer lahem leimor re'u heibi lanu 'ish 'ibri lezakheq banu ba 'eilai lishkab 'imi va'eqra beqol gadol. genesis 39:15	vayhi kheshame'o ki harimoti qoli va'eqra vaya'azob bigdo 'ezli vayanas vayeizei hakhuzah. genesis 39:16	vatanakh bigdo 'ezlah 'ad bo 'adonav 'el beito. genesis 39:17	vatedaber 'eilav kadebarim ha'eleh leimor ba 'eilai ha'ebed ha'ibri 'asher heibeita lanu lezakheq bi. genesis 39:18	vayhi kaharimi qoli va'eqra vaya'azob bigdo 'ezli vayanas hakhuzah. genesis 39:19	vayhi khishmoa' 'adonav 'et dibrei 'ishto 'asher diberah 'eilav leimor kadebarim ha'eleh 'asah li 'abdekha vayikhar 'apo. genesis 39:20	vayiqakh 'adonei yosef 'oto vayiteneihu 'el bet hasohar meqom 'asher 'asurei 'asirei hamelekh 'asurim vayhi sham bebet hasohar. genesis 39:21	vayhi yhvh 'et yosef vayet 'eilav khased vayiten khino be'einei sar bet hasohar. genesis 39:22	vayiten sar bet hasohar beyad yosef 'et kal ha'asirim 'asher bebet hasohar ve'et kal 'asher 'osim sham hu hayah 'oseh. genesis 39:23	'en sar bet hasohar ro'eh 'et kal me'umah beyado ba'asher yhvh 'ito va'asher hu 'oseh yhvh mazliakh. genesis 40:1	vayhi 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh khate'u mashqeh melekh mizrayim veha'ofeh la'adoneihem lemelekh mizrayim. genesis 40:2	vayiqzof par'oh 'al shenei sarisav 'al sar hamashqim ve'al sar ha'ofim. genesis 40:3	vayiten 'otam bemishmar bet sar hatabakhim 'el bet hasohar meqom 'asher yosef 'asur sham. genesis 40:4	vayifqod sar hatabakhim 'et yosef 'itam vaysharet 'otam vayihyu yamim bemishmar. genesis 40:5	vayakhalmu khalom sheneihem 'ish khalomo belaylah 'ekhad 'ish kefitron khalomo hamashqeh veha'ofeh 'asher lemelekh mizrayim 'asher 'asurim bebet hasohar. genesis 40:6	vayabo 'aleihem yosef baboqer vayar 'otam vehinam zo'afim. genesis 40:7	vayish'al 'et serisei far'oh 'asher 'ito bemishmar bet 'adonav leimor madua' peneikhem ra'im hayom. genesis 40:8	vayomeru 'eilav khalom khalamnu ufoter 'en 'oto vayomer 'aleihem yosef halo leilohim pitronim saperu na li. genesis 40:9	vaysaper sar hamashqim 'et khalomo leyosef vayomer lo bakhalomi vehineh gefen lefanai. genesis 40:10	ubagefen sheloshah sarigim vehi kheforakhat 'aletah nizah hibshilu 'ashkeloteha 'anabim. genesis 40:11	vekhos par'oh beyadi va'eqakh 'et ha'anabim va'eskhat 'otam 'el kos par'oh va'eten 'et hakos 'al kaf par'oh. genesis 40:12	vayomer lo yosef zeh pitrono sheloshet hasarigim sheloshet yamim hem. genesis 40:13	be'od sheloshet yamim yisa far'oh 'et roshekha vahashibekha 'al kanekha venatata khos par'oh beyado kamishpat harishon 'asher hayita mashqeihu. genesis 40:14	ki 'im zekhartani 'itekha ka'asher yitab lakh ve'asita na 'imadi khased vehizkartani 'el par'oh vehozeitani min habayit hazeh. genesis 40:15	ki gunob gunabti mei'erez ha'ibrim vegam poh lo 'asiti me'umah ki samu 'oti babor. genesis 40:16	vayar sar ha'ofim ki tob patar vayomer 'el yosef 'af 'ani bakhalomi vehineh sheloshah salei khori 'al roshi. genesis 40:17	ubasal ha'elyon mikol ma'akhal par'oh ma'aseh 'ofeh veha'of 'okhel 'otam min hasal mei'al roshi. genesis 40:18	vaya'an yosef vayomer zeh pitrono sheloshet hasalim sheloshet yamim hem. genesis 40:19	be'od sheloshet yamim yisa far'oh 'et roshekha mei'alekha vetalah 'otkha 'al 'ez ve'akhal ha'of 'et besarekha mei'alekha. genesis 40:20	vayhi bayom hashelishi yom huledet 'et par'oh vaya'as mishteh lekhal 'abadav vayisa 'et rosh sar hamashqim ve'et rosh sar ha'ofim betokh 'abadav. genesis 40:21	vayasheb 'et sar hamashqim 'al mashqeihu vayiten hakos 'al kaf par'oh. genesis 40:22	ve'et sar ha'ofim talah ka'asher patar lahem yosef. genesis 40:23	velo zakhar sar hamashqim 'et yosef vayishkakheihu. genesis 41:1	vayhi miqez shenatayim yamim ufar'oh kholem vehineh 'omed 'al hai'or. genesis 41:2	vehineh min hai'or 'olot sheba' parot yefot mar'eh uberi'ot basar vatir'enah ba'akhu. genesis 41:3	vehineh sheba' parot 'akheirot 'olot 'akhareihen min hai'or ra'ot mar'eh vedaqot basar vata'amodenah 'eizel haparot 'al sefat hai'or. genesis 41:4	vatokhalnah haparot ra'ot hamar'eh vedaqot habasar 'et sheba' haparot yefot hamar'eh vehaberi'ot vayiqaz par'oh. genesis 41:5	vayishan vayakhalom sheinit vehineh sheba' shibolim 'olot beqaneh 'ekhad beri'ot vetobot. genesis 41:6	vehineh sheba' shibolim daqot ushedufot qadim zomekhot 'akhareihen. genesis 41:7	vatibla'nah hashibolim hadaqot 'et sheba' hashibolim haberi'ot vehamelei'ot vayiqaz par'oh vehineh khalom. genesis 41:8	vayhi baboqer vatipa'em rukho vayishlakh vayiqra 'et kal khartumei mizrayim ve'et kal khakhameha vaysaper par'oh lahem 'et khalomo ve'en poter 'otam lefar'oh. genesis 41:9	vaydaber sar hamashqim 'et par'oh leimor 'et khata'ai 'ani mazkir hayom. genesis 41:10	par'oh qazaf 'al 'abadav vayiten 'oti bemishmar bet sar hatabakhim 'oti ve'et sar ha'ofim. genesis 41:11	vanakhalmah khalom belaylah 'ekhad 'ani vahu 'ish kefitron khalomo khalamenu. genesis 41:12	vesham 'itanu na'ar 'ibri 'ebed lesar hatabakhim vanesaper lo vayiftar lanu 'et khalomoteinu 'ish kakhalomo patar. genesis 41:13	vayhi ka'asher patar lanu ken hayah 'oti heishib 'al kani ve'oto talah. genesis 41:14	vayishlakh par'oh vayiqra 'et yosef vayrizuhu min habor vaygalakh vaykhalef simlotav vayabo 'el par'oh. genesis 41:15	vayomer par'oh 'el yosef khalom khalamti ufoter 'en 'oto va'ani shama'ti 'alekha leimor tishma' khalom liftor 'oto. genesis 41:16	vaya'an yosef 'et par'oh leimor bil'adai 'elohim ya'aneh 'et shelom par'oh. genesis 41:17	vaydaber par'oh 'el yosef bakhalomi hini 'omed 'al sefat hai'or. genesis 41:18	vehineh min hai'or 'olot sheba' parot beri'ot basar vifot to'ar vatir'enah ba'akhu. genesis 41:19	vehineh sheba' parot 'akheirot 'olot 'akhareihen dalot vera'ot to'ar me'od veraqot basar lo ra'iti khahenah bekhal 'erez mizrayim laroa'. genesis 41:20	vatokhalnah haparot haraqot vehara'ot 'et sheba' haparot harishonot haberi'ot. genesis 41:21	vatabonah 'el qirbenah velo noda' ki ba'u 'el qirbenah umar'eihen ra' ka'asher batekhilah va'iqaz. genesis 41:22	va'eire bakhalomi vehineh sheba' shibolim 'olot beqaneh 'ekhad melei'ot vetobot. genesis 41:23	vehineh sheba' shibolim zenumot daqot shedufot qadim zomekhot 'akhareihem. genesis 41:24	vatibla'na hashibolim hadaqot 'et sheba' hashibolim hatobot va'omar 'el hakhartumim ve'en magid li. genesis 41:25	vayomer yosef 'el par'oh khalom par'oh 'ekhad hu 'et 'asher ha'elohim 'oseh higid lefar'oh. genesis 41:26	sheba' parot hatobot sheba' shanim henah vesheba' hashibolim hatobot sheba' shanim henah khalom 'ekhad hu. genesis 41:27	vesheba' haparot haraqot vehara'ot ha'olot 'akhareihen sheba' shanim henah vesheba' hashibolim hareiqot shedufot haqadim yihyu sheba' shenei ra'ab. genesis 41:28	hu hadabar 'asher dibarti 'el par'oh 'asher ha'elohim 'oseh her'ah 'et par'oh. genesis 41:29	hineh sheba' shanim ba'ot saba' gadol bekhal 'erez mizrayim. genesis 41:30	veqamu sheba' shenei ra'ab 'akhareihen venishkakh kal hasaba' be'erez mizrayim vekhilah hara'ab 'et ha'arez. genesis 41:31	velo yivada' hasaba' ba'arez mipenei hara'ab hahu 'akharei khen ki khabed hu me'od. genesis 41:32	ve'al hishanot hakhalom 'el par'oh pa'amayim ki nakhon hadabar mei'im ha'elohim umemaher ha'elohim la'asoto. genesis 41:33	ve'atah yeire far'oh 'ish nabon vekhakham vishiteihu 'al 'erez mizrayim. genesis 41:34	ya'aseh far'oh veyafqed peqidim 'al ha'arez vekhimesh 'et 'erez mizrayim besheba' shenei hasaba'. genesis 41:35	veyiqbezu 'et kal 'okhel hashanim hatobot haba'ot ha'eleh veyizberu bar takhat yad par'oh 'okhel be'arim veshamaru. genesis 41:36	vehayah ha'okhel lefiqadon la'arez lesheba' shenei hara'ab 'asher tihyena be'erez mizrayim velo tikaret ha'arez bara'ab. genesis 41:37	vayitab hadabar be'einei far'oh ube'einei kal 'abadav. genesis 41:38	vayomer par'oh 'el 'abadav hanimza khazeh 'ish 'asher ruakh 'elohim bo. genesis 41:39	vayomer par'oh 'el yosef 'akharei hodia' 'elohim 'otkha 'et kal zot 'en nabon vekhakham kamokha. genesis 41:40	'atah tihyeh 'al beiti ve'al pikha yishaq kal 'ami raq hakisei 'egdal mimeka. genesis 41:41	vayomer par'oh 'el yosef re'eh natati 'otekha 'al kal 'erez mizrayim. genesis 41:42	vayasar par'oh 'et taba'to mei'al yado vayiten 'otah 'al yad yosef vayalbesh 'oto bigdei shesh vayasem rebid hazahab 'al zavaro. genesis 41:43	vayarkeb 'oto bemirkebet hamishneh 'asher lo vayiqre'u lefanav 'abrekh venaton 'oto 'al kal 'erez mizrayim. genesis 41:44	vayomer par'oh 'el yosef 'ani far'oh ubil'adekha lo yarim 'ish 'et yado ve'et raglo bekhal 'erez mizrayim. genesis 41:45	vayiqra far'oh shem yosef zafenat pa'neiakh vayiten lo 'et 'asenat bat poti fera' kohen 'on le'ishah vayeizei yosef 'al 'erez mizrayim. genesis 41:46	veyosef ben sheloshim shanah be'amedo lifnei par'oh melekh mizrayim vayeizei yosef milifnei far'oh vaya'bor bekhal 'erez mizrayim. genesis 41:47	vata'as ha'arez besheba' shenei hasaba' liqmazim. genesis 41:48	vayiqboz 'et kal 'okhel sheba' shanim 'asher hayu be'erez mizrayim vayiten 'okhel be'arim 'okhel sedeh ha'ir 'asher sebiboteha natan betokhah. genesis 41:49	vayizbor yosef bar kekhol hayam harbeh me'od 'ad ki khadal lispor ki 'en mispar. genesis 41:50	uleyosef yulad shenei banim beterem tabo shenat hara'ab 'asher yaledah lo 'asenat bat poti fera' kohen 'on. genesis 41:51	vayiqra yosef 'et shem habekhor menasheh ki nashani 'elohim 'et kal 'amali ve'et kal bet 'abi. genesis 41:52	ve'et shem hasheini qara 'efrayim ki hifrani 'elohim be'erez 'aneyi. genesis 41:53	vatikhlenah sheba' shenei hasaba' 'asher hayah be'erez mizrayim. genesis 41:54	vatekhilenah sheba' shenei hara'ab labo ka'asher 'amar yosef vayhi ra'ab bekhal ha'arazot ubekhal 'erez mizrayim hayah lakhem. genesis 41:55	vatir'ab kal 'erez mizrayim vayiz'aq ha'am 'el par'oh lalakhem vayomer par'oh lekhal mizrayim lekhu 'el yosef 'asher yomar lakhem ta'asu. genesis 41:56	vehara'ab hayah 'al kal penei ha'arez vayiftakh yosef 'et kal 'asher bahem vayishbor lemizrayim vayekhezaq hara'ab be'erez mizrayim. genesis 41:57	vekhal ha'arez ba'u mizraymah lishbor 'el yosef ki khazaq hara'ab bekhal ha'arez. genesis 42:1	vayar ya'aqob ki yesh sheber bemizrayim vayomer ya'aqob lebanav lamah titra'u. genesis 42:2	vayomer hineh shama'ti ki yesh sheber bemizrayim redu shamah veshibru lanu misham venikhyeh velo namut. genesis 42:3	vayeiredu 'akhei yosef 'asarah lishbor bar mimizrayim. genesis 42:4	ve'et binyamin 'akhi yosef lo shalakh ya'aqob 'et 'ekhav ki 'amar pen yiqra'enu 'ason. genesis 42:5	vayabo'u benei yisra'el lishbor betokh haba'im ki hayah hara'ab be'erez kena'an. genesis 42:6	veyosef hu hashalit 'al ha'arez hu hamashbir lekhal 'am ha'arez vayabo'u 'akhei yosef vayishtakhavu lo 'apayim 'arezah. genesis 42:7	vayar yosef 'et 'ekhav vayakirem vayitnaker 'aleihem vaydaber 'itam qashot vayomer 'aleihem mei'ayin batem vayomeru mei'erez kena'an lishbar 'okhel. genesis 42:8	vayaker yosef 'et 'ekhav vehem lo hikiruhu. genesis 42:9	vayizkor yosef 'et hakhalomot 'asher khalam lahem vayomer 'aleihem meragelim 'atem lir'ot 'et 'ervat ha'arez batem. genesis 42:10	vayomeru 'eilav lo 'adoni va'abadekha ba'u lishbar 'okhel. genesis 42:11	kulanu benei 'ish 'ekhad nakhenu keinim 'anakhnu lo hayu 'abadekha meragelim. genesis 42:12	vayomer 'aleihem lo ki 'ervat ha'arez batem lir'ot. genesis 42:13	vayomeru shenem 'asar 'abadekha 'akhim 'anakhnu benei 'ish 'ekhad be'erez kena'an vehineh haqaton 'et 'abinu hayom veha'ekhad 'einenu. genesis 42:14	vayomer 'aleihem yosef hu 'asher dibarti 'aleikhem leimor meragelim 'atem. genesis 42:15	bezot tibakheinu khei far'oh 'im teize'u mizeh ki 'im bebo 'akhikhem haqaton henah. genesis 42:16	shilkhu mikem 'ekhad veyiqakh 'et 'akhikhem ve'atem hei'aseru veyibakhanu dibreikhem ha'emet 'itekhem ve'im lo khei far'oh ki meragelim 'atem. genesis 42:17	vaye'esof 'otam 'el mishmar sheloshet yamim. genesis 42:18	vayomer 'aleihem yosef bayom hashelishi zot 'asu vikhyu 'et ha'elohim 'ani yarei. genesis 42:19	'im keinim 'atem 'akhikhem 'ekhad yei'aser bebet mishmarkhem ve'atem lekhu habi'u sheber ra'abon bateikhem. genesis 42:20	ve'et 'akhikhem haqaton tabi'u 'eilai veyei'amenu dibreikhem velo tamutu vaya'asu khen. genesis 42:21	vayomeru 'ish 'el 'akhiv 'abal 'asheimim 'anakhnu 'al 'akhinu 'asher ra'inu zarat nafsho behitkhano 'eileinu velo shama'enu 'al ken ba'ah 'eileinu hazarah hazot. genesis 42:22	vaya'an re'uben 'otam leimor halo 'amarti 'aleikhem leimor 'al tekhet'u bayeled velo shema'tem vegam damo hineh nidrash. genesis 42:23	vehem lo yade'u ki shomeia' yosef ki hameiliz beinotam. genesis 42:24	vayisob mei'aleihem vayeibek vayashab 'aleihem vaydaber 'aleihem vayiqakh mei'itam 'et shim'on vaye'esor 'oto le'eineihem. genesis 42:25	vayzav yosef vaymal'u 'et keleihem bar ulehashib kaspeihem 'ish 'el saqo velatet lahem zeidah ladarekh vaya'as lahem ken. genesis 42:26	vayis'u 'et shibram 'al khamoreihem vayeilekhu misham. genesis 42:27	vayiftakh ha'ekhad 'et saqo latet mispo lakhamoro bamalon vayar 'et kaspo vehineh hu befi 'amtakhto. genesis 42:28	vayomer 'el 'ekhav hushab kaspi vegam hineh be'amtakhti vayeizei libam vayekherdu 'ish 'el 'akhiv leimor mah zot 'asah 'elohim lanu. genesis 42:29	vayabo'u 'el ya'aqob 'abihem 'arzah kena'an vayagidu lo 'et kal haqorot 'otam leimor. genesis 42:30	diber ha'ish 'adonei ha'arez 'itanu qashot vayiten 'otanu kimragelim 'et ha'arez. genesis 42:31	vanomer 'eilav keinim 'anakhenu lo hayinu meragelim. genesis 42:32	shenem 'asar 'anakhnu 'akhim benei 'abinu ha'ekhad 'einenu vehaqaton hayom 'et 'abinu be'erez kena'an. genesis 42:33	vayomer 'eileinu ha'ish 'adonei ha'arez bezot 'eida' ki kheinim 'atem 'akhikhem ha'ekhad hanikhu 'iti ve'et ra'abon bateikhem qekhu valeikhu. genesis 42:34	vehabi'u 'et 'akhikhem haqaton 'eilai ve'eide'ah ki lo meragelim 'atem ki kheinim 'atem 'et 'akhikhem 'eten lakhem ve'et ha'arez tiskharu. genesis 42:35	vayhi hem meriqim saqeihem vehineh 'ish zeror kaspo besaqo vayir'u 'et zerorot kaspeihem hemah va'abihem vayira'u. genesis 42:36	vayomer 'aleihem ya'aqob 'abihem 'oti shikaltem yosef 'einenu veshim'on 'einenu ve'et binyamin tiqakhu 'alai hayu khulanah. genesis 42:37	vayomer re'uben 'el 'abiv leimor 'et shenei banai tamit 'im lo 'abi'enu 'eilekha tenah 'oto 'al yadi va'ani 'ashibenu 'eilekha. genesis 42:38	vayomer lo yeired beni 'imakhem ki 'akhiv met vehu lebado nish'ar uqera'ahu 'ason baderekh 'asher teilekhu bah vehoradtem 'et seibati beyagon she'olah. genesis 43:1	vehara'ab kabed ba'arez. genesis 43:2	vayhi ka'asher kilu le'ekhol 'et hasheber 'asher heibi'u mimizrayim vayomer 'aleihem 'abihem shubu shibru lanu me'at 'okhel. genesis 43:3	vayomer 'eilav yehudah leimor ha'ed hei'id banu ha'ish leimor lo tir'u fanai bilti 'akhikhem 'itekhem. genesis 43:4	'im yeshkha meshaleiakh 'et 'akhinu 'itanu neiredah venishberah lekha 'okhel. genesis 43:5	ve'im 'einekha meshaleiakh lo neired ki ha'ish 'amar 'eileinu lo tir'u fanai bilti 'akhikhem 'itekhem. genesis 43:6	vayomer yisra'el lamah harei'otem li lehagid la'ish ha'od lakhem 'akh. genesis 43:7	vayomeru sha'ol sha'al ha'ish lanu ulemoladteinu leimor ha'od 'abikhem khai hayesh lakhem 'akh vanaged lo 'al pi hadebarim ha'eleh hayadoa' neida' ki yomar horidu 'et 'akhikhem. genesis 43:8	vayomer yehudah 'el yisra'el 'abiv shilkhah hana'ar 'iti venaqumah veneileikhah venikhyeh velo namut gam 'anakhnu gam 'atah gam tapeinu. genesis 43:9	'anokhi 'e'erbenu miyadi tebaqshenu 'im lo habi'otiv 'eilekha vehizagtiv lefanekha vekhatati lekha kal hayamim. genesis 43:10	ki lulei hitmahmahenu ki 'atah shabnu zeh fa'amayim. genesis 43:11	vayomer 'aleihem yisra'el 'abihem 'im ken 'eifo zot 'asu qekhu mizimrat ha'arez bikhleikhem vehoridu la'ish minkhah me'at zori ume'at debash nekhot valot batenim usheqeidim. genesis 43:12	vekhesef mishneh qekhu beyedkhem ve'et hakesef hamushab befi 'amtekhoteikhem tashibu beyedkhem 'ulai mishgeh hu. genesis 43:13	ve'et 'akhikhem qakhu vequmu shubu 'el ha'ish. genesis 43:14	ve'el shadai yiten lakhem rakhamim lifnei ha'ish veshilakh lakhem 'et 'akhikhem 'akher ve'et binyamin va'ani ka'asher shakholeti shakhaleti. genesis 43:15	vayiqkhu ha'anashim 'et haminkhah hazot umishneh kesef laqekhu beyadam ve'et binyamin vayaqumu vayeiredu mizrayim vaya'amdu lifnei yosef. genesis 43:16	vayar yosef 'itam 'et binyamin vayomer la'asher 'al beito habei 'et ha'anashim habayetah uteboakh tebakh vehakhen ki 'iti yokhelu ha'anashim bazahorayim. genesis 43:17	vaya'as ha'ish ka'asher 'amar yosef vayabei ha'ish 'et ha'anashim beitah yosef. genesis 43:18	vayire'u ha'anashim ki hube'u bet yosef vayomeru 'al debar hakesef hashab be'amtekhoteinu batekhilah 'anakhnu muba'im lehitgolel 'aleinu ulehitnapel 'aleinu velaqakhat 'otanu la'abadim ve'et khamoreinu. genesis 43:19	vayigeshu 'el ha'ish 'asher 'al bet yosef vaydaberu 'eilav petakh habayit. genesis 43:20	vayomeru bi 'adoni yarod yaradnu batekhilah lishbar 'okhel. genesis 43:21	vayhi ki banu 'el hamalon vaniftekhah 'et 'amtekhoteinu vehineh khesef 'ish befi 'amtakhto kaspeinu bemishqalo vanasheb 'oto beyadeinu. genesis 43:22	vekhesef 'akher horadnu beyadeinu lishbar 'okhel lo yada'nu mi sam kaspeinu be'amtekhoteinu. genesis 43:23	vayomer shalom lakhem 'al tira'u 'eloheikhem veilohei 'abikhem natan lakhem matmon be'amtekhoteikhem kaspekhem ba 'eilai vayozei 'aleihem 'et shim'on. genesis 43:24	vayabei ha'ish 'et ha'anashim beitah yosef vayiten mayim vayirkhazu ragleihem vayiten mispo lakhamoreihem. genesis 43:25	vayakhinu 'et haminkhah 'ad bo yosef bazahorayim ki shame'u ki sham yokhelu lakhem. genesis 43:26	vayabo yosef habaytah vayabi''u lo 'et haminkhah 'asher beyadam habayetah vayishtakhavu lo 'arezah. genesis 43:27	vayish'al lahem leshalom vayomer hashalom 'abikhem hazaqen 'asher 'amartem ha'odenu khai. genesis 43:28	vayomeru shalom le'abdekha le'abinu 'odenu khai vayiqedu vayishtakhu vayishtakhavu genesis 43:29	vayisa 'einav vayar 'et binyamin 'akhiv ben 'imo vayomer hazeh 'akhikhem haqaton 'asher 'amartem 'eilai vayomar 'elohim yakhenekha beni. genesis 43:30	vaymaher yosef ki nikhmeru rakhamav 'el 'akhiv vaybaqesh libkot vayabo hakhadrah vayeibek shamah. genesis 43:31	vayirkhaz panav vayeizei vayit'apaq vayomer simu lakhem. genesis 43:32	vayasimu lo lebado velahem lebadam velamizrim ha'okhelim 'ito lebadam ki lo yukhelun hamizrim le'ekhol 'et ha'ibrim lekhem ki to'eibah hi lemizrayim. genesis 43:33	vayeishebu lefanav habekhor kibkhorato vehaza'ir kiz'irato vayitmehu ha'anashim 'ish 'el rei'eihu. genesis 43:34	vayisa mas'ot mei'et panav 'aleihem vateireb mas'at binyamin mimas'ot kulam khamesh yadot vayishtu vayishkeru 'imo. genesis 44:1	vayzav 'et 'asher 'al beito leimor malei 'et 'amtekhot ha'anashim 'okhel ka'asher yukhelun se'et vesim kesef 'ish befi 'amtakhto. genesis 44:2	ve'et gebi'i gebia' hakesef tasim befi 'amtakhat haqaton ve'et kesef shibro vaya'as kidbar yosef 'asher diber. genesis 44:3	haboqer 'or veha'anashim shulekhu hemah vakhamoreihem. genesis 44:4	hem yaze'u 'et ha'ir lo hirkhiqu veyosef 'amar la'asher 'al beito qum redof 'akharei ha'anashim vehisagtam ve'amarta 'aleihem lamah shilamtem ra'ah takhat tobah. genesis 44:5	halo zeh 'asher yishteh 'adoni bo vehu nakhesh yenakhesh bo harei'otem 'asher 'asitem. genesis 44:6	vayasigem vaydaber 'aleihem 'et hadebarim ha'eleh. genesis 44:7	vayomeru 'eilav lamah yedaber 'adoni kadebarim ha'eleh khalilah la'abadekha mei'asot kadabar hazeh. genesis 44:8	hen kesef 'asher mazanu befi 'amtekhoteinu heshibonu 'eilekha mei'erez kena'an ve'ekh nignob mibet 'adonekha kesef 'o zahab. genesis 44:9	'asher yimazei 'ito mei'abadekha vamet vegam 'anakhnu nihyeh ladoni la'abadim. genesis 44:10	vayomer gam 'atah khedibreikhem ken hu 'asher yimazei 'ito yihyeh li 'abed ve'atem tihyu neqiyim. genesis 44:11	vaymaharu vayoridu 'ish 'et 'amtakhto 'arezah vayiftekhu 'ish 'amtakhto. genesis 44:12	vaykhapes bagadol heikhel ubaqaton kilah vayimazei hagabia' be'amtakhat binyamin. genesis 44:13	vayiqre'u simlotam vaya'amos 'ish 'al khamoro vayashubu ha'irah. genesis 44:14	vayabo yehudah ve'ekhav beitah yosef vehu 'odenu sham vayipelu lefanav 'arezah. genesis 44:15	vayomer lahem yosef mah hama'aseh hazeh 'asher 'asitem halo yeda'tem ki nakhesh yenakhesh 'ish 'asher kamoni. genesis 44:16	vayomer yehudah mah nomar ladoni mah nedaber umah niztadaq ha'elohim maza 'et 'avon 'abadekha hinenu 'abadim ladoni gam 'anakhnu gam 'asher nimza hagabia' beyado. genesis 44:17	vayomer khalilah li mei'asot zot ha'ish 'asher nimza hagabia' beyado hu yihyeh li 'abed ve'atem 'alu leshalom 'el 'abikhem. genesis 44:18	vayigash 'eilav yehudah vayomer bi 'adoni yedaber na 'abdekha dabar be'azenei 'adoni ve'al yikhar 'apekha be'abdekha ki khamokha kefar'oh. genesis 44:19	'adoni sha'al 'et 'abadav leimor hayesh lakhem 'ab 'o 'akh. genesis 44:20	vanomer 'el 'adoni yesh lanu 'ab zaqen veyeled zequnim qatan ve'akhiv met vayivater hu lebado le'imo ve'abiv 'aheibo. genesis 44:21	vatomer 'el 'abadekha horiduhu 'eilai ve'asimah 'eini 'alav. genesis 44:22	vanomer 'el 'adoni lo yukhal hana'ar la'azob 'et 'abiv ve'azab 'et 'abiv vamet. genesis 44:23	vatomer 'el 'abadekha 'im lo yeired 'akhikhem haqaton 'itekhem lo tosifun lir'ot panai. genesis 44:24	vayhi ki 'alinu 'el 'abdekha 'abi vanaged lo 'et dibrei 'adoni. genesis 44:25	vayomer 'abinu shubu shibru lanu me'at 'okhel. genesis 44:26	vanomer lo nukhal laredet 'im yesh 'akhinu haqaton 'itanu veyaradnu ki lo nukhal lir'ot penei ha'ish ve'akhinu haqaton 'einenu 'itanu. genesis 44:27	vayomer 'abdekha 'abi 'eileinu 'atem yeda'tem ki shenayim yaledah li 'ishti. genesis 44:28	vayeizei ha'ekhad mei'iti va'omar 'akh tarof toraf velo re'itiv 'ad henah. genesis 44:29	uleqakhtem gam 'et zeh mei'im panai veqarahu 'ason vehoradtem 'et seibati bera'ah she'olah. genesis 44:30	ve'atah kebo'i 'el 'abdekha 'abi vehana'ar 'einenu 'itanu venafsho qeshurah benafsho. genesis 44:31	vehayah kir'oto ki 'en hana'ar vamet vehoridu 'abadekha 'et seibat 'abdekha 'abinu beyagon she'olah. genesis 44:32	ki 'abdekha 'arab 'et hana'ar mei'im 'abi leimor 'im lo 'abi'enu 'eilekha vekhatati le'abi kal hayamim. genesis 44:33	ve'atah yeisheb na 'abdekha takhat hana'ar 'ebed ladoni vehana'ar ya'al 'im 'ekhav. genesis 44:34	ki 'ekh 'e'eleh 'el 'abi vehana'ar 'einenu 'iti pen 'er'eh bara' 'asher yimza 'et 'abi. genesis 45:1	velo yakhol yosef lehit'apeq lekhol hanizabim 'alav vayiqra hozi'u khal 'ish mei'alai velo 'amad 'ish 'ito behitvada' yosef 'el 'ekhav. genesis 45:2	vayiten 'et qolo bibkhi vayishme'u mizrayim vayishma' bet par'oh. genesis 45:3	vayomer yosef 'el 'ekhav 'ani yosef ha'od 'abi khai velo yakhelu 'ekhav la'anot 'oto ki nibhalu mipanav. genesis 45:4	vayomer yosef 'el 'ekhav geshu na 'eilai vayigashu vayomer 'ani yosef 'akhikhem 'asher mekhartem 'oti mizrayemah. genesis 45:5	ve'atah 'al tei'azebu ve'al yikhar be'eineikhem ki mekhartem 'oti henah ki lemikhyah shelakhani 'elohim lifneikhem. genesis 45:6	ki zeh shenatayim hara'ab beqereb ha'arez ve'od khamesh shanim 'asher 'en kharish veqazir genesis 45:7	vayishlakheini 'elohim lifneikhem lasum lakhem she'eirit ba'arez ulehakhayot lakhem lifleitah gedolah. genesis 45:8	ve'atah lo 'atem shelakhtem 'oti henah ki ha'elohim vaysimeini le'ab lefar'oh ule'adon lekhal beito umoshel bekhal 'erez mizrayim. genesis 45:9	maharu va'alu 'el 'abi va'amartem 'eilav koh 'amar binkha yosef samani 'elohim le'adon lekhal mizrayim redah 'eilai 'al ta'amod. genesis 45:10	veyashabta be'erez goshen vehayita qarob 'eilai 'atah ubanekha ubenei banekha vezonekha ubeqarekha vekhal 'asher lakh. genesis 45:11	vekhilkalti 'otekha sham ki 'od khamesh shanim ra'ab pen tivaresh 'atah ubeitekha vekhal 'asher lakh. genesis 45:12	vehineh 'eineikhem ro'ot ve'einei 'akhi binyamin ki fi hamdaber 'aleikhem. genesis 45:13	vehigadtem le'abi 'et kal kebodi bemizrayim ve'et kal 'asher re'item umihartem vehoradtem 'et 'abi henah. genesis 45:14	vayipol 'al zaverei binyamin 'akhiv vayeibek ubinyamin bakhah 'al zavarav. genesis 45:15	vaynasheq lekhal 'ekhav vayeibek 'aleihem ve'akharei khen diberu 'ekhav 'ito. genesis 45:16	vehaqol nishma' bet par'oh leimor ba'u 'akhei yosef vayitab be'einei far'oh ube'einei 'abadav. genesis 45:17	vayomer par'oh 'el yosef 'emor 'el 'akhekha zot 'asu ta'anu 'et be'irekhem ulekhu bo'u 'arzah kena'an. genesis 45:18	uqekhu 'et 'abikhem ve'et bateikhem ubo'u 'eilai ve'etenah lakhem 'et tub 'erez mizrayim ve'ikhlu 'et kheileb ha'arez. genesis 45:19	ve'atah zuveitah zot 'asu qekhu lakhem mei'erez mizrayim 'agalot letapekhem velinsheikhem unesatem 'et 'abikhem ubatem. genesis 45:20	ve'einekhem 'al takhos 'al keleikhem ki tub kal 'erez mizrayim lakhem hu. genesis 45:21	vaya'asu khen benei yisra'el vayiten lahem yosef 'agalot 'al pi far'oh vayiten lahem zeidah ladarekh. genesis 45:22	lekhulam natan la'ish khalifot semalot ulebinyamin natan shelosh mei'ot kesef vekhamesh khalifot semalot. genesis 45:23	ule'abiv shalakh kezot 'asarah khamorim nose'im mitub mizrayim ve'eser 'atonot nose'ot bar valekhem umazon le'abiv ladarekh. genesis 45:24	vayshalakh 'et 'ekhav vayeileikhu vayomer 'aleihem 'al tirgezu badarekh. genesis 45:25	vaya'alu mimizrayim vayabo'u 'erez kena'an 'el ya'aqob 'abihem. genesis 45:26	vayagidu lo leimor 'od yosef khai vekhi hu moshel bekhal 'erez mizrayim vayafag libo ki lo he'emin lahem. genesis 45:27	vaydaberu 'eilav 'et kal dibrei yosef 'asher diber 'aleihem vayar 'et ha'agalot 'asher shalakh yosef laset 'oto vatekhi ruakh ya'aqob 'abihem. genesis 45:28	vayomer yisra'el rab 'od yosef beni khai 'eilekhah ve'er'enu beterem 'amut. genesis 46:1	vayisa' yisra'el vekhal 'asher lo vayabo be'eirah shaba' vayizbakh zebakhim leilohei 'abiv yizkhaq. genesis 46:2	vayomer 'elohim leyisra'el bemar'ot halaylah vayomer ya'aqob ya'aqob vayomer hineini. genesis 46:3	vayomer 'anokhi ha'el 'elohei 'abikha 'al tira meiredah mizraymah ki lego gadol 'asimekha sham. genesis 46:4	'anokhi 'eired 'imekha mizraymah ve'anokhi 'a'alkha gam 'aloh veyosef yashit yado 'al 'einekha. genesis 46:5	vayaqam ya'aqob mibe'er shaba' vayis'u benei yisra'el 'et ya'aqob 'abihem ve'et tapam ve'et nesheihem ba'agalot 'asher shalakh par'oh laset 'oto. genesis 46:6	vayiqkhu 'et miqneihem ve'et rekhusham 'asher rakheshu be'erez kena'an vayabo'u mizrayemah ya'aqob vekhal zar'o 'ito. genesis 46:7	banav ubenei banav 'ito benotav ubenot banav vekhal zar'o heibi 'ito mizrayemah. genesis 46:8	ve'eleh shemot benei yisra'el haba'im mizraymah ya'aqob ubanav bekhor ya'aqob re'uben. genesis 46:9	ubenei re'uben khanokh ufalu vekhezron vekharmi. genesis 46:10	ubenei shim'on yemu'el veyamin ve'ohad veyakhin vezokhar vesha'ul ben hakena'anit. genesis 46:11	ubenei leivi geireshon qehat umerari. genesis 46:12	ubenei yehudah 'er ve'onan vesheilah vaferez vazarakh vayamat 'er ve'onan be'erez kena'an vayihyu benei ferez khezron vekhamul. genesis 46:13	ubenei yisashkhar tola' ufuvah veyob veshimron. genesis 46:14	ubenei zebulun sered ve'eilon veyakhle'el. genesis 46:15	'eleh benei lei'ah 'asher yaledah leya'aqob befadan 'aram ve'et dinah bito kal nefesh banav ubenotav sheloshim veshalosh. genesis 46:16	ubenei gad zifyon vekhagi shuni ve'ezbon 'eiri va'arodi ve'ar'eili. genesis 46:17	ubenei 'asher yimnah veyishvah veyishvi uberi'ah veserakh 'akhotam ubenei beri'ah kheber umalki'el. genesis 46:18	'eleh benei zilpah 'asher natan laban lelei'ah bito vateiled 'et 'eleh leya'aqob shesh 'esreh nafesh. genesis 46:19	benei rakhel 'eishet ya'aqob yosef ubinyamin. genesis 46:20	vayivaled leyosef be'erez mizrayim 'asher yaledah lo 'asenat bat poti fera' kohen 'on 'et menasheh ve'et 'efrayim. genesis 46:21	ubenei binyamin bela' vabekher ve'ashbel geira vena'aman 'eikhi varosh mupim vekhupim va'ared. genesis 46:22	'eleh benei rakhel 'asher yulad leya'aqob kal nefesh 'arba'ah 'asar. genesis 46:23	ubenei dan khushim. genesis 46:24	ubenei naftali yakhze'el veguni veyeizer veshilem. genesis 46:25	'eleh benei bilhah 'asher natan laban lerakhel bito vateiled 'et 'eleh leya'aqob kal nefesh shib'ah. genesis 46:26	kal hanefesh haba'ah leya'aqob mizraymah yoze'ei yereikho milebad neshei benei ya'aqob kal nefesh shishim vashesh. genesis 46:27	ubenei yosef 'asher yulad lo bemizrayim nefesh shenayim kal hanefesh lebet ya'aqob haba'ah mizraymah shib'im. genesis 46:28	ve'et yehudah shalakh lefanav 'el yosef lehorot lefanav goshenah vayabo'u 'arzah goshen. genesis 46:29	vaye'sor yosef merkabto vaya'al liqrat yisra'el 'abiv goshenah vayeira 'eilav vayipol 'al zavarav vayeibek 'al zavarav 'od. genesis 46:30	vayomer yisra'el 'el yosef 'amutah hapa'am 'akharei re'oti 'et panekha ki 'odkha khai. genesis 46:31	vayomer yosef 'el 'ekhav ve'el bet 'abiv 'e'eleh ve'agidah lefar'oh ve'omerah 'eilav 'akhai ubet 'abi 'asher be'erez kena'an ba'u 'eilai. genesis 46:32	veha'anashim ro'ei zon ki 'anshei miqneh hayu vezonam ubeqaram vekhal 'asher lahem heibi'u. genesis 46:33	vehayah ki yiqra lakhem par'oh ve'amar mah ma'aseikhem. genesis 46:34	va'amartem 'anshei miqneh hayu 'abadekha mine'ureinu ve'ad 'atah gam 'anakhnu gam 'aboteinu ba'abur teishebu be'erez goshen ki to'abat mizrayim kal ro'eh zon. genesis 47:1	vayabo yosef vayaged lefar'oh vayomer 'abi ve'akhai vezonam ubeqaram vekhal 'asher lahem ba'u mei'erez kena'an vehinam be'erez goshen. genesis 47:2	umiqzeh 'ekhav laqakh khamishah 'anashim vayazigem lifnei far'oh. genesis 47:3	vayomer par'oh 'el 'ekhav mah ma'aseikhem vayomeru 'el par'oh ro'eh zon 'abadekha gam 'anakhnu gam 'aboteinu. genesis 47:4	vayomeru 'el par'oh lagur ba'arez banu ki 'en mir'eh lazon 'asher la'abadekha ki khabed hara'ab be'erez kena'an ve'atah yeishebu na 'abadekha be'erez goshen. genesis 47:5	vayomer par'oh 'el yosef leimor 'abikha ve'akhekha ba'u 'eilekha. genesis 47:6	'erez mizrayim lefanekha hi bemeitab ha'arez hosheb 'et 'abikha ve'et 'akhekha yeishebu be'erez goshen ve'im yada'ta veyesh bam 'anshei khayil vesamtam sarei miqneh 'al 'asher li. genesis 47:7	vayabei yosef 'et ya'aqob 'abiv vaya'amideihu lifnei far'oh vaybarekh ya'aqob 'et par'oh. genesis 47:8	vayomer par'oh 'el ya'aqob kamah yemei shenei khayekha. genesis 47:9	vayomer ya'aqob 'el par'oh yemei shenei megurai sheloshim ume'at shanah me'at vera'im hayu yemei shenei khayai velo hisigu 'et yemei shenei khayei 'abotai bimei megureihem. genesis 47:10	vaybarekh ya'aqob 'et par'oh vayeizei milifnei far'oh. genesis 47:11	vayosheb yosef 'et 'abiv ve'et 'ekhav vayiten lahem 'akhuzah be'erez mizrayim bemeitab ha'arez be'erez ra'meses ka'asher zivah far'oh. genesis 47:12	vaykhalkel yosef 'et 'abiv ve'et 'ekhav ve'et kal bet 'abiv lekhem lefi hataf. genesis 47:13	velekhem 'en bekhal ha'arez ki khabed hara'ab me'od vateilah 'erez mizrayim ve'erez kena'an mipenei hara'ab. genesis 47:14	vaylaqet yosef 'et kal hakesef hanimza be'erez mizrayim ube'erez kena'an basheber 'asher hem shoberim vayabei yosef 'et hakesef beitah far'oh. genesis 47:15	vayitom hakesef mei'erez mizrayim umei'erez kena'an vayabo'u khal mizrayim 'el yosef leimor habah lanu lekhem velamah namut negdekha ki 'afes kasef. genesis 47:16	vayomer yosef habu miqneikhem ve'etenah lakhem bemiqneikhem 'im 'afes kasef. genesis 47:17	vayabi'u 'et miqneihem 'el yosef vayiten lahem yosef lekhem basusim ubemiqneh hazon ubemiqneh habaqar ubakhamorim vaynahalem balekhem bekhal miqneihem bashanah hahiv. genesis 47:18	vatitom hashanah hahiv vayabo'u 'eilav bashanah hasheinit vayomeru lo lo nekhakhed mei'adoni ki 'im tam hakesef umiqneh habeheimah 'el 'adoni lo nish'ar lifnei 'adoni bilti 'im geviyateinu ve'admateinu. genesis 47:19	lamah namut le'einekha gam 'anakhnu gam 'admateinu qeneh 'otanu ve'et 'admateinu balakhem venihyeh 'anakhnu ve'admateinu 'abadim lefar'oh veten zera' venikhyeh velo namut veha'adamah lo teisham. genesis 47:20	vayiqen yosef 'et kal 'admat mizrayim lefar'oh ki makheru mizrayim 'ish sadeihu ki khazaq 'aleihem hara'ab vatehi ha'arez lefar'oh. genesis 47:21	ve'et ha'am he'ebir 'oto le'arim miqzeh gebul mizrayim ve'ad qazeihu. genesis 47:22	raq 'admat hakohanim lo qanah ki khoq lakohanim mei'et par'oh ve'akhelu 'et khuqam 'asher natan lahem par'oh 'al ken lo makheru 'et 'admatam. genesis 47:23	vayomer yosef 'el ha'am hen qaniti 'etkhem hayom ve'et 'admatkhem lefar'oh hei lakhem zera' uzera'tem 'et ha'adamah. genesis 47:24	vehayah batebu'ot unetatem khamishit lefar'oh ve'arba' hayadot yihyeh lakhem lezera' hasadeh ule'akhelekhem vela'asher bebateikhem vele'ekhol letapekhem. genesis 47:25	vayomeru hekheyitanu nimza khen be'einei 'adoni vehayinu 'abadim lefar'oh. genesis 47:26	vayasem 'otah yosef lekhoq 'ad hayom hazeh 'al 'admat mizrayim lefar'oh lakhomesh raq 'admat hakohanim lebadam lo hayetah lefar'oh. genesis 47:27	vayeisheb yisra'el be'erez mizrayim be'erez goshen vayei'akhazu bah vayifru vayirbu me'od. genesis 47:28	vaykhi ya'aqob be'erez mizrayim sheba' 'esreh shanah vayhi yemei ya'aqob shenei khayav sheba' shanim ve'arba'im ume'at shanah. genesis 47:29	vayiqrebu yemei yisra'el lamut vayiqra libno leyosef vayomer lo 'im na mazati khen be'einekha sim na yadekha takhat yereikhi ve'asita 'imadi khesed ve'emet 'al na tiqbereini bemizrayim. genesis 47:30	veshakhabti 'im 'abotai unesatani mimizrayim uqebartani biqburatam vayomar 'anokhi 'e'eseh khidbarekha. genesis 47:31	vayomer hishabe'ah li vayishaba' lo vayishtakhu yisra'el 'al rosh hamitah. genesis 48:1	vayhi 'akharei hadebarim ha'eleh vayomer leyosef hineh 'abikha kholeh vayiqakh 'et shenei banav 'imo 'et menasheh ve'et 'efrayim. genesis 48:2	vayaged leya'aqob vayomer hineh binkha yosef ba 'eilekha vayitkhazeq yisra'el vayeisheb 'al hamitah. genesis 48:3	vayomer ya'aqob 'el yosef 'el shadai nir'ah 'eilai beluz be'erez kena'an vaybarekh 'oti. genesis 48:4	vayomer 'eilai hini mafrekha vehirbitikha unetatikha liqhal 'amim venatati 'et ha'arez hazot lezar'akha 'akharekha 'akhuzat 'olam. genesis 48:5	ve'atah shenei banekha hanoladim lekha be'erez mizrayim 'ad bo'i 'eilekha mizraymah li hem 'efrayim umenasheh kir'uben veshim'on yihyu li. genesis
