48:6	umoladtekha 'asher holadta 'akhareihem lekha yihyu 'al shem 'akheihem yiqare'u benakhalatam. genesis 48:7	va'ani bebo'i mipadan meitah 'alai rakhel be'erez kena'an baderekh be'od kibrat 'erez labo 'efratah va'eqbereha sham bederekh 'efrat hi bet lakhem. genesis 48:8	vayar yisra'el 'et benei yosef vayomer mi 'eleh. genesis 48:9	vayomer yosef 'el 'abiv banai hem 'asher natan li 'elohim bazeh vayomar qakhem na 'eilai va'abarakhem. genesis 48:10	ve'einei yisra'el kabedu mizoqen lo yukhal lir'ot vayagesh 'otam 'eilav vayishaq lahem vaykhabeq lahem. genesis 48:11	vayomer yisra'el 'el yosef re'oh fanekha lo filaleti vehineh her'ah 'oti 'elohim gam 'et zar'ekha. genesis 48:12	vayozei yosef 'otam mei'im birkav vayishtakhu le'apav 'arezah. genesis 48:13	vayiqakh yosef 'et sheneihem 'et 'efrayim bimino misemol yisra'el ve'et menasheh bismolo mimin yisra'el vayagesh 'eilav. genesis 48:14	vayishlakh yisra'el 'et yemino vayashet 'al rosh 'efrayim vehu haza'ir ve'et semolo 'al rosh menasheh sikel 'et yadav ki menasheh habekhor. genesis 48:15	vaybarekh 'et yosef vayomar ha'elohim 'asher hithalekhu 'abotai lefanav 'abraham veyizkhaq ha'elohim haro'eh 'oti mei'odi 'ad hayom hazeh. genesis 48:16	hamal'akh hago'el 'oti mikal ra' yebarekh 'et hane'arim veyiqarei bahem shemi veshem 'abotai 'abraham veyizkhaq veyidgu larob beqereb ha'arez. genesis 48:17	vayar yosef ki yashit 'abiv yad yemino 'al rosh 'efrayim vayeira' be'einav vayitmokh yad 'abiv lehasir 'otah mei'al rosh 'efrayim 'al rosh menasheh. genesis 48:18	vayomer yosef 'el 'abiv lo khen 'abi ki zeh habekhor sim yeminekha 'al rosho. genesis 48:19	vayma'en 'abiv vayomer yada'ti beni yada'ti gam hu yihyeh le'am vegam hu yigdal ve'ulam 'akhiv haqaton yigdal mimenu vezar'o yihyeh melo hagoyim. genesis 48:20	vaybarakhem bayom hahu leimor bekha yebarekh yisra'el leimor yesimkha 'elohim ke'efrayim vekhimnasheh vayasem 'et 'efrayim lifnei menasheh. genesis 48:21	vayomer yisra'el 'el yosef hineh 'anokhi met vehayah 'elohim 'imakhem veheishib 'etkhem 'el 'erez 'aboteikhem. genesis 48:22	va'ani natati lekha shekhem 'akhad 'al 'akhekha 'asher laqakhti miyad ha'emori bekharbi ubeqashti. genesis 49:1	vayiqra ya'aqob 'el banav vayomer hei'asefu ve'agidah lakhem 'et 'asher yiqra 'etkhem be'akharit hayamim. genesis 49:2	hiqabezu veshim'u benei ya'aqob veshim'u 'el yisra'el 'abikhem. genesis 49:3	re'uben bekhori 'atah kokhi vereishit 'oni yeter se'et veyeter 'az. genesis 49:4	pakhaz kamayim 'al totar ki 'alita mishkebei 'abikha 'az khilalta yezu'i 'alah. genesis 49:5	shim'on veleivi 'akhim kelei khamas mekheiroteihem. genesis 49:6	besodam 'al tabo nafshi biqhalam 'al teikhad kebodi ki be'apam haregu 'ish ubirzonam 'iqeru shor. genesis 49:7	'arur 'apam ki 'az ve'ebratam ki qashatah 'akhaleqem beya'aqob va'afizem beyisra'el. genesis 49:8	yehudah 'atah yodukha 'akhekha yadekha be'oref 'oyebekha yishtakhavu lekha benei 'abikha. genesis 49:9	gur 'aryeh yehudah miteref beni 'alita kara' rabaz ke'aryeh ukhelabi mi yeqimenu. genesis 49:10	lo yasur sheibet mihudah umekhoqeq miben raglav 'ad ki yabo shiloh shilo velo yiqehat 'amim. genesis 49:11	'oseri lagefen 'iroh 'iro velasoreiqah beni 'atono kibes bayayin lebusho ubedam 'anabim sutoh suto. genesis 49:12	khakhlili 'einayim miyayin uleben shinayim meikhalab. genesis 49:13	zebulun lekhof yamim yishkon vehu lekhof 'oniyot veyarkhato 'al zidon. genesis 49:14	yisashkhar khamor garem robez ben hamishpetayim. genesis 49:15	vayar menukhah ki tob ve'et ha'arez ki na'eimah vayet shikhmo lisbol vayhi lemas 'obed. genesis 49:16	dan yadin 'amo ke'akhad shibtei yisra'el. genesis 49:17	yehi dan nakhash 'alei derekh shefifon 'alei 'orakh hanoshekh 'iqebei sus vayipol rokhebo 'akhor. genesis 49:18	lishu'atekha qiviti yhvh. genesis 49:19	gad gedud yegudenu vehu yagud 'aqeb. genesis 49:20	mei'asher shemeinah lakhmo vehu yiten ma'adanei melekh. genesis 49:21	naftali 'ayalah shelukhah hanoten 'imrei shafer. genesis 49:22	ben porat yosef ben porat 'alei 'ayin banot za'adah 'alei shur. genesis 49:23	vaymararuhu varobu vayistemuhu ba'alei khizim. genesis 49:24	vateisheb be'eitan qashto vayafozu zero'ei yadav midei 'abir ya'aqob misham ro'eh 'eben yisra'el. genesis 49:25	mei'el 'abikha veya'zereka ve'et shadai vibarekheka birkhot shamayim mei'al birkhot tehom robezet takhat birkhot shadayim varakham. genesis 49:26	birkhot 'abikha gaberu 'al birkhot horai 'ad ta'avat gib'ot 'olam tihyen lerosh yosef uleqadeqod nezir 'ekhav. genesis 49:27	binyamin ze'eb yitraf baboqer yokhal 'ad vela'ereb yekhaleq shalal. genesis 49:28	kal 'eleh shibtei yisra'el shenem 'asar vezot 'asher diber lahem 'abihem vaybarekh 'otam 'ish 'asher kebirkhato beirakh 'otam. genesis 49:29	vayzav 'otam vayomer 'aleihem 'ani ne'esaf 'el 'ami qibru 'oti 'el 'abotai 'el hame'arah 'asher bisdeh 'efron hakhiti. genesis 49:30	bame'arah 'asher bisdeh hamakhpeilah 'asher 'al penei mamrei be'erez kena'an 'asher qanah 'abraham 'et hasadeh mei'et 'efron hakhiti la'akhuzat qaber. genesis 49:31	shamah qaberu 'et 'abraham ve'et sarah 'ishto mah qaberu 'et yizkhaq ve'et ribqah 'ishto veshamah qabarti 'et lei'ah. genesis 49:32	miqneh hasadeh vehame'arah 'asher bo mei'et benei khet. genesis 49:33	vaykhal ya'aqob lezavot 'et banav vaye'esof raglav 'el hamitah vayigva' vayei'asef 'el 'amav. genesis 50:1	vayipol yosef 'al penei 'abiv vayeibek 'alav vayishaq lo. genesis 50:2	vayzav yosef 'et 'abadav 'et harofe'im lakhanot 'et 'abiv vayakhantu harofe'im 'et yisra'el. genesis 50:3	vayimle'u lo 'arba'im yom ki ken yimle'u yemei hakhanutim vayibku 'oto mizrayim shib'im yom. genesis 50:4	vaya'abru yemei bekhito vaydaber yosef 'el bet par'oh leimor 'im na mazati khen be'eineikhem daberu na be'azenei far'oh leimor. genesis 50:5	'abi hishbi'ani leimor hineh 'anokhi met beqibri 'asher kariti li be'erez kena'an shamah tiqbereini ve'atah 'e'eleh na ve'eqberah 'et 'abi ve'ashubah. genesis 50:6	vayomer par'oh 'aleh uqebor 'et 'abikha ka'asher hishbi'ekha. genesis 50:7	vaya'al yosef liqbor 'et 'abiv vaya'alu 'ito kal 'abdei far'oh ziqnei beito vekhol ziqnei 'erez mizrayim. genesis 50:8	vekhol bet yosef ve'ekhav ubet 'abiv raq tapam vezonam ubeqaram 'azebu be'erez goshen. genesis 50:9	vaya'al 'imo gam rekheb gam parashim vayhi hamakhaneh kabed me'od. genesis 50:10	vayabo'u 'ad goren ha'atad 'asher be'eiber hayarden vayispedu sham misped gadol vekhabed me'od vaya'as le'abiv 'eibel shib'at yamim. genesis 50:11	vayar yosheb ha'arez hakena'ani 'et ha'eibel begoren ha'atad vayomeru 'eibel kabed zeh lemizrayim 'al ken qara shemah 'abel mizrayim 'asher be'eiber hayarden. genesis 50:12	vaya'asu banav lo ken ka'asher zivam. genesis 50:13	vayis'u 'oto banav 'arzah kena'an vayiqberu 'oto bim'arat sedeh hamakhpeilah 'asher qanah 'abraham 'et hasadeh la'akhuzat qeber mei'et 'efron hakhiti 'al penei mamrei. genesis 50:14	vayashab yosef mizraymah hu ve'ekhav vekhal ha'olim 'ito liqbor 'et 'abiv 'akharei qabero 'et 'abiv. genesis 50:15	vayir'u 'akhei yosef ki met 'abihem vayomeru lu yistemeinu yosef vehasheb yashib lanu 'et kal hara'ah 'asher gamalnu 'oto. genesis 50:16	vayzavu 'el yosef leimor 'abikha zivah lifnei moto leimor. genesis 50:17	koh tomeru leyosef 'ana sa na pesha' 'akhekha vekhatatam ki ra'ah gemalukha ve'atah sa na lefesha' 'abdei 'elohei 'abikha vayeibek yosef bedaberam 'eilav. genesis 50:18	vayeilekhu gam 'ekhav vayipelu lefanav vayomeru hinenu lekha la'abadim. genesis 50:19	vayomer 'aleihem yosef 'al tira'u ki hatakhat 'elohim 'ani. genesis 50:20	ve'atem khashabtem 'alai ra'ah 'elohim khashabah letobah lema'an 'asoh kayom hazeh lehakhayot 'am rab. genesis 50:21	ve'atah 'al tira'u 'anokhi 'akhalkel 'etkhem ve'et tapekhem vaynakhem 'otam vaydaber 'al libam. genesis 50:22	vayeisheb yosef bemizrayim hu ubet 'abiv vaykhi yosef mei'ah va'eser shanim. genesis 50:23	vayar yosef le'efrayim benei shileishim gam benei makhir ben menasheh yuledu 'al birkei yosef. genesis 50:24	vayomer yosef 'el 'ekhav 'anokhi met veilohim paqod yifqod 'etkhem vehe'elah 'etkhem min ha'arez hazot 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba' le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob. genesis 50:25	vayashba' yosef 'et benei yisra'el leimor paqod yifqod 'elohim 'etkhem veha'alitem 'et 'azmotai mizeh. genesis 50:26	vayamat yosef ben mei'ah va'eser shanim vayakhantu 'oto vayisem ba'aron bemizrayim. 

exodus 1:1	ve'eleh shemot benei yisra'el haba'im mizrayemah 'et ya'aqob 'ish ubeito ba'u. exodus 1:2	re'uben shim'on leivi vihudah. exodus 1:3	yisashkhar zebulun ubeneyamin exodus 1:4	dan venaftali gad ve'asher. exodus 1:5	vayhi kal nefesh yoze'ei yerekh ya'aqob shib'im nafesh veyosef hayah bemizrayim. exodus 1:6	vayamat yosef vekhal 'ekhav vekhol hador hahu. exodus 1:7	ubenei yisra'el paru vayishrezu vayirbu vaya'azmu bim'od me'od vatimalei ha'arez 'otam. exodus 1:8	vayaqam melekh khadash 'al mizrayim 'asher lo yada' 'et yosef. exodus 1:9	vayomer 'el 'amo hineh 'am benei yisra'el rab ve'azum mimenu. exodus 1:10	habah nitkhakemah lo pen yirbeh vehayah ki tiqrenah milkhamah venosaf gam hu 'al sone'einu venilkham banu ve'alah min ha'arez. exodus 1:11	vayasimu 'alav sarei misim lema'an 'anoto besiblotam vayiben 'arei miskenot lefar'oh 'et pitom ve'et ra'amses. exodus 1:12	vekha'asher ye'anu 'oto ken yirbeh vekhen yifroz vayaquzu mipenei benei yisra'el. exodus 1:13	vaya'abidu mizrayim 'et benei yisra'el befarekh. exodus 1:14	vaymareru 'et khayeihem ba'abodah qashah bekhomer ubilbeinim ubekhal 'abodah basadeh 'et kal 'abodatam 'asher 'abedu bahem befarekh. exodus 1:15	vayomer melekh mizrayim lamyaledot ha'ibriyot 'asher shem ha'akhat shifrah veshem hasheinit pu'ah. exodus 1:16	vayomer beyaledkhen 'et ha'ibriyot ure'iten 'al ha'abenayim 'im ben hu vahamiten 'oto ve'im bat hi vakhayah. exodus 1:17	vatirena hamyaledot 'et ha'elohim velo 'asu ka'asher diber 'aleihen melekh mizrayim vatekhayena 'et hayladim. exodus 1:18	vayiqra melekh mizrayim lamyaledot vayomer lahen madua' 'asiten hadabar hazeh vatekhayena 'et hayladim. exodus 1:19	vatomarna hamyaledot 'el par'oh ki lo khanashim hamizriyot ha'ibriyot ki khayot henah beterem tabo 'aleihen hamyaledet veyaladu. exodus 1:20	vayeiteb 'elohim lamyaledot vayireb ha'am vaya'azmu me'od. exodus 1:21	vayhi ki yare'u hamyaledot 'et ha'elohim vaya'as lahem batim. exodus 1:22	vayzav par'oh lekhal 'amo leimor kal haben hayilod hai'orah tashlikhuhu vekhal habat tekhayun. exodus 2:1	vayeilekh 'ish mibet leivi vayiqakh 'et bat leivi. exodus 2:2	vatahar ha'ishah vateiled ben vateire 'oto ki tob hu vatizpeneihu sheloshah yerakhim. exodus 2:3	velo yakhelah 'od hazefino vatiqakh lo teibat gome vatakhmerah bakheimar ubazafet vatasem bah 'et hayeled vatasem basuf 'al sefat hai'or. exodus 2:4	vateitazab 'akhoto meirakhoq ledei'ah mah yei'aseh lo. exodus 2:5	vateired bat par'oh lirkhoz 'al hai'or vena'aroteha holekhot 'al yad hai'or vateire 'et hateibah betokh hasuf vatishlakh 'et 'amatah vatiqakheha exodus 2:6	vatiftakh vatir'eihu 'et hayeled vehineh na'ar bokheh vatakhmol 'alav vatomer miyaldei ha'ibrim zeh. exodus 2:7	vatomer 'akhoto 'el bat par'oh ha'eilekh veqarati lakh 'ishah meineqet min ha'ibriyot veteiniq lakh 'et hayaled. exodus 2:8	vatomer lah bat par'oh leikhi vateilekh ha'almah vatiqra 'et 'em hayaled. exodus 2:9	vatomer lah bat par'oh heilikhi 'et hayeled hazeh veheiniqihu li va'ani 'eten 'et sekharekh vatiqakh ha'ishah hayeled vateniqeihu. exodus 2:10	vayigdal hayeled vatebi'eihu lebat par'oh vayhi lah leben vatiqra shemo mosheh vatomer ki min hamayim meshitihu. exodus 2:11	vayhi bayamim hahem vayigdal mosheh vayeizei 'el 'ekhav vayar besiblotam vayar 'ish mizri makeh 'ish 'ibri mei'ekhav. exodus 2:12	vayifen koh vakhoh vayar ki 'en 'ish vayakh 'et hamizri vayitmeneihu bakhol. exodus 2:13	vayeizei bayom hasheini vehineh shenei 'anashim 'ibrim nizim vayomer larasha' lamah takeh rei'ekha. exodus 2:14	vayomer mi samekha le'ish sar veshofet 'aleinu halharegeini 'atah 'omer ka'asher haragta 'et hamizri vayira mosheh vayomar 'akhen noda' hadabar. exodus 2:15	vayishma' par'oh 'et hadabar hazeh vaybaqesh laharog 'et mosheh vayibrakh mosheh mipenei far'oh vayeisheb be'erez midyan vayeisheb 'al habe'er. exodus 2:16	ulekhohen midyan sheba' banot vatabonah vatidlenah vatemalenah 'et harehatim lehashqot zon 'abihen. exodus 2:17	vayabo'u haro'im vaygareshum vayaqam mosheh vayoshi'an vayashq 'et zonam. exodus 2:18	vatabonah 'el re'u'el 'abihen vayomer madua' miharten bo hayom. exodus 2:19	vatomarna 'ish mizri hizilanu miyad haro'im vegam daloh dalah lanu vayashq 'et hazon. exodus 2:20	vayomer 'el benotav ve'ayo lamah zeh 'azabten 'et ha'ish qir'en lo veyokhal lakhem. exodus 2:21	vayo'el mosheh lashebet 'et ha'ish vayiten 'et ziporah bito lemosheh. exodus 2:22	vateiled ben vayiqra 'et shemo geireshom ki 'amar ger hayiti be'erez nakheriyah. exodus 2:23	vayhi bayamim harabim hahem vayamat melekh mizrayim vayei'anekhu benei yisra'el min ha'abodah vayiz'aqu vata'al shav'atam 'el ha'elohim min ha'abodah. exodus 2:24	vayishma' 'elohim 'et na'aqatam vayizkor 'elohim 'et berito 'et 'abraham 'et yizkhaq ve'et ya'aqob. exodus 2:25	vayar 'elohim 'et benei yisra'el vayeida' 'elohim. exodus 3:1	umosheh hayah ro'eh 'et zon yitro khoteno kohen midyan vayinhag 'et hazon 'akhar hamidbar vayabo 'el har ha'elohim khoreibah. exodus 3:2	vayeira mal'akh yhvh 'eilav belabat 'esh mitokh haseneh vayar vehineh haseneh bo'er ba'esh vehaseneh 'einenu 'ukal. exodus 3:3	vayomer mosheh 'asurah na ve'er'eh 'et hamar'eh hagadol hazeh madua' lo yib'ar haseneh. exodus 3:4	vayar yhvh ki sar lir'ot vayiqra 'eilav 'elohim mitokh haseneh vayomer mosheh mosheh vayomer hineini. exodus 3:5	vayomer 'al tiqrab halom shal ne'alekha mei'al raglekha ki hamaqom 'asher 'atah 'omed 'alav 'admat qodesh hu. exodus 3:6	vayomer 'anokhi 'elohei 'abikha 'elohei 'abraham 'elohei yizkhaq veilohei ya'aqob vayaster mosheh panav ki yarei meihabit 'el ha'elohim. exodus 3:7	vayomer yhvh ra'oh ra'iti 'et 'oni 'ami 'asher bemizrayim ve'et za'aqatam shama'ti mipenei nogesav ki yada'ti 'et makh'obav. exodus 3:8	va'eired lehazilo miyad mizrayim uleha'aloto min ha'arez hahiv 'el 'erez tobah urekhabah 'el 'erez zabat khalab udebash 'el meqom hakena'ani vehakhiti veha'emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi. exodus 3:9	ve'atah hineh za'aqat benei yisra'el ba'ah 'eilai vegam ra'iti 'et halakhaz 'asher mizrayim lokhazim 'otam. exodus 3:10	ve'atah lekhah ve'eshlakhakha 'el par'oh vehozei 'et 'ami benei yisra'el mimizrayim. exodus 3:11	vayomer mosheh 'el ha'elohim mi 'anokhi ki 'eilekh 'el par'oh vekhi 'ozi 'et benei yisra'el mimizrayim. exodus 3:12	vayomer ki 'ehyeh 'imakh vezeh lekha ha'ot ki 'anokhi shelakhtikha behozi'akha 'et ha'am mimizrayim ta'abdun 'et ha'elohim 'al hahar hazeh. exodus 3:13	vayomer mosheh 'el ha'elohim hineh 'anokhi ba 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarti lahem 'elohei 'aboteikhem shelakhani 'aleikhem ve'ameru li mah shemo mah 'omar 'aleihem. exodus 3:14	vayomer 'elohim 'el mosheh 'ehyeh 'asher 'ehyeh vayomer koh tomar libnei yisra'el 'ehyeh shelakhani 'aleikhem. exodus 3:15	vayomer 'od 'elohim 'el mosheh koh tomar 'el benei yisra'el yhvh 'elohei 'aboteikhem 'elohei 'abraham 'elohei yizkhaq veilohei ya'aqob shelakhani 'aleikhem zeh shemi le'olam vezeh zikhri ledor dor. exodus 3:16	lekh ve'asafta 'et ziqnei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem yhvh 'elohei 'aboteikhem nir'ah 'eilai 'elohei 'abraham yizkhaq veya'aqob leimor paqod paqadti 'etkhem ve'et he'asui lakhem bemizrayim. exodus 3:17	va'omar 'a'aleh 'etkhem mei'oni mizrayim 'el 'erez hakena'ani vehakhiti veha'emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi 'el 'erez zabat khalab udebash. exodus 3:18	veshame'u leqolekha ubata 'atah veziqnei yisra'el 'el melekh mizrayim va'amartem 'eilav yhvh 'elohei ha'ibriyim niqrah 'aleinu ve'atah neilakhah na derekh sheloshet yamim bamidbar venizbekhah yhvh 'eloheinu. exodus 3:19	va'ani yada'ti ki lo yiten 'etkhem melekh mizrayim lahalokh velo beyad khazaqah. exodus 3:20	veshalakhti 'et yadi vehikeiti 'et mizrayim bekhol nifle'otai 'asher 'e'eseh beqirbo ve'akharei khen yeshalakh 'etkhem. exodus 3:21	venatati 'et khen ha'am hazeh be'einei mizrayim vehayah ki teileikhun lo teilekhu reiqam. exodus 3:22	vesha'alah 'ishah mishekhentah umigarat beitah kelei khesef ukhelei zahab usemalot vesamtem 'al beneikhem ve'al benoteikhem venizaltem 'et mizrayim. exodus 4:1	vaya'an mosheh vayomer vehen lo ya'aminu li velo yishme'u beqoli ki yomeru lo nir'ah 'eilekha yhvh. exodus 4:2	vayomer 'eilav yhvh mazeh mah zeh beyadekha vayomer mateh. exodus 4:3	vayomer hashlikheihu 'arzah vayashlikheihu 'arzah vayhi lenakhash vayanas mosheh mipanav. exodus 4:4	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh shelakh yadekha ve'ekhoz biznabo vayishlakh yado vayakhazeq bo vayhi lemateh bekhapo. exodus 4:5	lema'an ya'aminu ki nir'ah 'eilekha yhvh 'elohei 'abotam 'elohei 'abraham 'elohei yizkhaq veilohei ya'aqob. exodus 4:6	vayomer yhvh lo 'od habei na yadekha bekheiqekha vayabei yado bekheiqo vayozi'ah vehineh yado mezora'at kashaleg. exodus 4:7	vayomer hasheb yadekha 'el kheiqekha vayasheb yado 'el kheiqo vayozi'ah meikheiqo vehineh shabah kibsaro. exodus 4:8	vehayah 'im lo ya'aminu lakh velo yishme'u leqol ha'ot harishon vehe'eminu leqol ha'ot ha'akharon. exodus 4:9	vehayah 'im lo ya'aminu gam lishnei ha'otot ha'eleh velo yishme'un leqolekha velaqakhta mimeimei hai'or veshafakhta hayabashah vehayu hamayim 'asher tiqakh min hai'or vehayu ledam bayabashet. exodus 4:10	vayomer mosheh 'el yhvh bi 'adonai lo 'ish debarim 'anokhi gam mitemol gam mishilshom gam mei'az daberkha 'el 'abdekha ki khebad peh ukhebad lashon 'anokhi. exodus 4:11	vayomer yhvh 'eilav mi sam peh la'adam 'o mi yasum 'ilem 'o kheiresh 'o fiqeiakh 'o 'iver halo 'anokhi yhvh. exodus 4:12	ve'atah lekh ve'anokhi 'ehyeh 'im pikha vehoreitikha 'asher tedaber. exodus 4:13	vayomer bi 'adonai shelakh na beyad tishlakh. exodus 4:14	vayikhar 'af yhvh bemosheh vayomer halo 'aharon 'akhikha haleivi yada'ti ki daber yedaber hu vegam hineh hu yozei liqratekha vera'akha vesamakh belibo. exodus 4:15	vedibarta 'eilav vesamta 'et hadebarim befiv ve'anokhi 'ehyeh 'im pikha ve'im pihu vehoreiti 'etkhem 'et 'asher ta'asun. exodus 4:16	vediber hu lekha 'el ha'am vehayah hu yihyeh lekha lefeh ve'atah tihyeh lo leilohim. exodus 4:17	ve'et hamateh hazeh tiqakh beyadekha 'asher ta'aseh bo 'et ha'otot. exodus 4:18	vayeilekh mosheh vayashab 'el yeter khoteno vayomer lo 'eilekhah na ve'ashubah 'el 'akhai 'asher bemizrayim ve'er'eh ha'odam khayim vayomer yitro lemosheh lekh leshalom. exodus 4:19	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh bemidyan lekh shub mizrayim ki meitu kal ha'anashim hambaqshim 'et nafshekha. exodus 4:20	vayiqakh mosheh 'et 'ishto ve'et banav vayarkibem 'al hakhamor vayashab 'arzah mizrayim vayiqakh mosheh 'et mateh ha'elohim beyado. exodus 4:21	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh belekhtekha lashub mizraymah re'eh kal hamofetim 'asher samti beyadekha va'asitam lifnei far'oh va'ani 'akhazeq 'et libo velo yeshalakh 'et ha'am. exodus 4:22	ve'amarta 'el par'oh koh 'amar yhvh beni bekhori yisra'el. exodus 4:23	va'omar 'eilekha shalakh 'et beni veya'abdeini vatema'en leshalekho hineh 'anokhi horeg 'et binkha bekhorekha. exodus 4:24	vayhi baderekh bamalon vayifgesheihu yhvh vaybaqesh hamito. exodus 4:25	vatiqakh ziporah zor vatikhrot 'et 'arelat benah vataga' leraglav vatomer ki khatan damim 'atah li. exodus 4:26	vayiref mimenu 'az 'amerah khatan damim lamulot. exodus 4:27	vayomer yhvh 'el 'aharon lekh liqrat mosheh hamidbarah vayeilekh vayifgesheihu behar ha'elohim vayishaq lo. exodus 4:28	vayaged mosheh le'aharon 'et kal dibrei yhvh 'asher shelakho ve'et kal ha'otot 'asher zivahu. exodus 4:29	vayeilekh mosheh ve'aharon vaya'asfu 'et kal ziqnei benei yisra'el. exodus 4:30	vaydaber 'aharon 'et kal hadebarim 'asher diber yhvh 'el mosheh vaya'as ha'otot le'einei ha'am. exodus 4:31	vaya'amen ha'am vayishme'u ki faqad yhvh 'et benei yisra'el vekhi ra'ah 'et 'aneyam vayiqedu vayishtakhavu exodus 5:1	ve'akhar ba'u mosheh ve'aharon vayomeru 'el par'oh koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el shalakh 'et 'ami veyakhogu li bamidbar. exodus 5:2	vayomer par'oh mi yhvh 'asher 'eshma' beqolo leshalakh 'et yisra'el lo yada'ti 'et yhvh vegam 'et yisra'el lo 'ashaleiakh. exodus 5:3	vayomeru 'elohei ha'ibrim niqra 'aleinu neilakhah na derekh sheloshet yamim bamidbar venizbekhah yhvh 'eloheinu pen yifga'einu badeber 'o bekhareb. exodus 5:4	vayomer 'aleihem melekh mizrayim lamah mosheh ve'aharon tafri'u 'et ha'am mima'asav lekhu lesibloteikhem. exodus 5:5	vayomer par'oh hen rabim 'atah 'am ha'arez vehishbatem 'otam misiblotam. exodus 5:6	vayzav par'oh bayom hahu 'et hanogesim ba'am ve'et shoterav leimor. exodus 5:7	lo tosifun latet teben la'am lilbon halebeinim kitmol shilshom hem yeilekhu veqosheshu lahem teben. exodus 5:8	ve'et matkonet halebeinim 'asher hem 'osim temol shilshom tasimu 'aleihem lo tigre'u mimenu ki nirpim hem 'al ken hem zo'aqim leimor neilekhah nizbekhah leiloheinu. exodus 5:9	tikhbad ha'abodah 'al ha'anashim veya'asu bah ve'al yish'u bedibrei shaqer. exodus 5:10	vayeize'u nogesei ha'am veshoterav vayomeru 'el ha'am leimor koh 'amar par'oh 'eineni noten lakhem teben. exodus 5:11	'atem lekhu qekhu lakhem teben mei'asher timza'u ki 'en nigra' mei'abodatkhem dabar. exodus 5:12	vayafez ha'am bekhal 'erez mizrayim leqoshesh qash lateben. exodus 5:13	vehanogesim 'azim leimor kalu ma'aseikhem debar yom beyomo ka'asher bihyot hateben. exodus 5:14	vayuku shoterei benei yisra'el 'asher samu 'aleihem nogesei far'oh leimor madua' lo khilitem khaqekhem lilbon kitmol shilshom gam temol gam hayom. exodus 5:15	vayabo'u shoterei benei yisra'el vayiz'aqu 'el par'oh leimor lamah ta'aseh khoh la'abadekha. exodus 5:16	teben 'en nitan la'abadekha ulebeinim 'omerim lanu 'asu vehineh 'abadekha mukim vekhatat 'amekha. exodus 5:17	vayomer nirpim 'atem nirpim 'al ken 'atem 'omerim neilekhah nizbekhah yhvh. exodus 5:18	ve'atah lekhu 'ibdu veteben lo yinaten lakhem vetokhen lebeinim titenu. exodus 5:19	vayir'u shoterei benei yisra'el 'otam bera' leimor lo tigre'u milibneikhem debar yom beyomo. exodus 5:20	vayifge'u 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon nizabim liqratam bezeitam mei'et par'oh. exodus 5:21	vayomeru 'aleihem yeire yhvh 'aleikhem veyishpot 'asher hib'ashtem 'et reikheinu be'einei far'oh ube'einei 'abadav latet khereb beyadam leharegeinu. exodus 5:22	vayashab mosheh 'el yhvh vayomar 'adonai lamah harei'otah la'am hazeh lamah zeh shelakhtani. exodus 5:23	umei'az bati 'el par'oh ledaber bishmekha heira' la'am hazeh vehazel lo hizalta 'et 'amekha. exodus 6:1	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'atah tir'eh 'asher 'e'eseh lefar'oh ki beyad khazaqah yeshalekhem ubeyad khazaqah yegareshem mei'arzo. exodus 6:2	vaydaber 'elohim 'el mosheh vayomer 'eilav 'ani yhvh. exodus 6:3	va'eira 'el 'abraham 'el yizkhaq ve'el ya'aqob be'el shadai ushemi yhvh lo noda'ti lahem. exodus 6:4	vegam haqimoti 'et beriti 'itam latet lahem 'et 'erez kena'an 'et 'erez megureihem 'asher garu bah. exodus 6:5	vegam 'ani shama'ti 'et na'aqat benei yisra'el 'asher mizrayim ma'abidim 'otam va'ezkor 'et beriti. exodus 6:6	lakhen 'emor libnei yisra'el 'ani yhvh vehozeiti 'etkhem mitakhat siblot mizrayim vehizalti 'etkhem mei'abodatam vega'alti 'etkhem bizroa' netuyah ubishfatim gedolim. exodus 6:7	velaqakhti 'etkhem li le'am vehayiti lakhem leilohim vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem hamozi 'etkhem mitakhat siblot mizrayim. exodus 6:8	veheibeiti 'etkhem 'el ha'arez 'asher nasati 'et yadi latet 'otah le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob venatati 'otah lakhem morashah 'ani yhvh. exodus 6:9	vaydaber mosheh ken 'el benei yisra'el velo shame'u 'el mosheh miqozer ruakh umei'abodah qashah. exodus 6:10	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. exodus 6:11	bo daber 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim vishalakh 'et benei yisra'el mei'arzo. exodus 6:12	vaydaber mosheh lifnei yhvh leimor hen benei yisra'el lo shame'u 'eilai ve'ekh yishma'eini far'oh va'ani 'aral sefatayim. exodus 6:13	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon vayzavem 'el benei yisra'el ve'el par'oh melekh mizrayim lehozi 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim. exodus 6:14	'eleh rashei bet 'abotam benei re'uben bekhor yisra'el khanokh ufalu khezron vekharmi 'eleh mishpekhot re'uben. exodus 6:15	ubenei shim'on yemu'el veyamin ve'ohad veyakhin vezokhar vesha'ul ben hakena'anit 'eleh mishpekhot shim'on. exodus 6:16	ve'eleh shemot benei leivi letoledotam geireshon uqehat umerari ushenei khayei leivi sheba' usheloshim ume'at shanah. exodus 6:17	benei geireshon libni veshim'i lemishpekhotam. exodus 6:18	ubenei qehat 'amram veyizhar vekhebron ve'uzi'el ushenei khayei qehat shalosh usheloshim ume'at shanah. exodus 6:19	ubenei merari makhli umushi 'eleh mishpekhot haleivi letoledotam. exodus 6:20	vayiqakh 'amram 'et yokhebed dodato lo le'ishah vateiled lo 'et 'aharon ve'et mosheh ushenei khayei 'amram sheba' usheloshim ume'at shanah. exodus 6:21	ubenei yizhar qorakh vanefeg vezikhri. exodus 6:22	ubenei 'uzi'el misha'el ve'elzafan vesitri. exodus 6:23	vayiqakh 'aharon 'et 'elisheba' bat 'aminadab 'akhot nakhshon lo le'ishah vateiled lo 'et nadab ve'et 'abihu 'et 'el'azar ve'et 'itamar. exodus 6:24	ubenei qorakh 'asir ve'elqanah va'abi'asaf 'eleh mishpekhot haqarekhi. exodus 6:25	ve'el'azar ben 'aharon laqakh lo mibenot puti'el lo le'ishah vateiled lo 'et pinekhas 'eleh rashei 'abot halviyim lemishpekhotam. exodus 6:26	hu 'aharon umosheh 'asher 'amar yhvh lahem hozi'u 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim 'al zib'otam. exodus 6:27	hem hamdaberim 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim lehozi 'et benei yisra'el mimizrayim hu mosheh ve'aharon. exodus 6:28	vayhi beyom diber yhvh 'el mosheh be'erez mizrayim. exodus 6:29	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor 'ani yhvh daber 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim 'et kal 'asher 'ani dober 'eilekha. exodus 6:30	vayomer mosheh lifnei yhvh hen 'ani 'aral sefatayim ve'ekh yishma' 'eilai par'oh. exodus 7:1	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh re'eh netatikha 'elohim lefar'oh ve'aharon 'akhikha yihyeh nebi'ekha. exodus 7:2	'atah tedaber 'et kal 'asher 'azaveka ve'aharon 'akhikha yedaber 'el par'oh veshilakh 'et benei yisra'el mei'arzo. exodus 7:3	va'ani 'aqsheh 'et leb par'oh vehirbeiti 'et 'ototai ve'et moftai be'erez mizrayim. exodus 7:4	velo yishma' 'aleikhem par'oh venatati 'et yadi bemizrayim vehozeiti 'et zib'otai 'et 'ami benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim bishfatim gedolim. exodus 7:5	veyade'u mizrayim ki 'ani yhvh bintoti 'et yadi 'al mizrayim vehozeiti 'et benei yisra'el mitokham. exodus 7:6	vaya'as mosheh ve'aharon ka'asher zivah yhvh 'otam ken 'asu. exodus 7:7	umosheh ben shemonim shanah ve'aharon ben shalosh ushemonim shanah bedaberam 'el par'oh. exodus 7:8	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. exodus 7:9	ki yedaber 'aleikhem par'oh leimor tenu lakhem mofet ve'amarta 'el 'aharon qakh 'et matekha vehashlekh lifnei far'oh yehi letanin. exodus 7:10	vayabo mosheh ve'aharon 'el par'oh vaya'asu khen ka'asher zivah yhvh vayashlekh 'aharon 'et mateihu lifnei far'oh velifnei 'abadav vayhi letanin. exodus 7:11	vayiqra gam par'oh lakhakhamim velamkhashefim vaya'asu gam hem khartumei mizrayim belahateihem ken. exodus 7:12	vayashlikhu 'ish mateihu vayihyu letaninim vayibla' mateh 'aharon 'et matotam. exodus 7:13	vayekhezaq leb par'oh velo shama' 'aleihem ka'asher diber yhvh. exodus 7:14	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh kabed leb par'oh mei'en leshalakh ha'am. exodus 7:15	lekh 'el par'oh baboqer hineh yozei hamaymah venizabta liqrato 'al sefat hai'or vehamateh 'asher nehpakh lenakhash tiqakh beyadekha. exodus 7:16	ve'amarta 'eilav yhvh 'elohei ha'ibrim shelakhani 'eilekha leimor shalakh 'et 'ami veya'abduni bamidbar vehineh lo shama'ta 'ad koh. exodus 7:17	koh 'amar yhvh bezot teida' ki 'ani yhvh hineh 'anokhi makeh bamateh 'asher beyadi 'al hamayim 'asher bai'or venehefkhu ledam. exodus 7:18	vehadagah 'asher bai'or tamut uba'ash hai'or venil'u mizrayim lishtot mayim min hai'or. exodus 7:19	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'emor 'el 'aharon qakh matekha uneteh yadekha 'al meimei mizrayim 'al naharotam 'al ye'oreihem ve'al 'agmeihem ve'al kal miqveh meimeihem veyihyu dam vehayah dam bekhal 'erez mizrayim uba'eizim uba'abanim. exodus 7:20	vaya'asu khen mosheh ve'aharon ka'asher zivah yhvh vayarem bamateh vayakh 'et hamayim 'asher bai'or le'einei far'oh ule'einei 'abadav vayeihafekhu kal hamayim 'asher bai'or ledam. exodus 7:21	vehadagah 'asher bai'or meitah vayib'ash hai'or velo yakhelu mizrayim lishtot mayim min hai'or vayhi hadam bekhal 'erez mizrayim. exodus 7:22	vaya'asu khen khartumei mizrayim belateihem vayekhezaq leb par'oh velo shama' 'aleihem ka'asher diber yhvh. exodus 7:23	vayifen par'oh vayabo 'el beito velo shat libo gam lazot. exodus 7:24	vayakhperu khal mizrayim sebibot hai'or mayim lishtot ki lo yakhelu lishtot mimeimei hai'or. exodus 7:25	vayimalei shib'at yamim 'akharei hakot yhvh 'et hai'or. exodus 8:1	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh bo 'el par'oh ve'amarta 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh shalakh 'et 'ami veya'abduni. exodus 8:2	ve'im ma'en 'atah leshaleiakh hineh 'anokhi nogef 'et kal gebulekha bazfarde'im. exodus 8:3	vesharaz hai'or zefarde'im ve'alu uba'u bebeitekha ubakhadar mishkabekha ve'al mitatekha ubebet 'abadekha ube'amekha ubetanurekha ubemish'arotekha. exodus 8:4	ubekhah ube'amekha ubekhal 'abadekha ya'alu hazfarde'im. exodus 8:5	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'emor 'el 'aharon neteh 'et yadekha bematekha 'al haneharot 'al hai'orim ve'al ha'agamim veha'al 'et hazfarde'im 'al 'erez mizrayim. exodus 8:6	vayet 'aharon 'et yado 'al meimei mizrayim vata'al hazefardeia' vatekhas 'et 'erez mizrayim. exodus 8:7	vaya'asu khen hakhartumim belateihem vaya'alu 'et hazfarde'im 'al 'erez mizrayim. exodus 8:8	vayiqra far'oh lemosheh ule'aharon vayomer ha'tiru 'el yhvh veyaser hazfarde'im mimeni umei'ami va'ashalekhah 'et ha'am veyizbekhu yhvh. exodus 8:9	vayomer mosheh lefar'oh hitpa'er 'alai lematai 'a'tir lekha vela'abadekha ule'amekha lehakhrit hazafarde'im mimekha umibatekha raq bai'or tisha'arnah. exodus 8:10	vayomer lemakhar vayomer kidbarekha lema'an teida' ki 'en yhvh 'eloheinu. exodus 8:11	vesaru hazfarde'im mimekha umibatekha umei'abadekha umei'amekha raq bai'or tisha'arnah. exodus 8:12	vayeizei mosheh ve'aharon mei'im par'oh vayiz'aq mosheh 'el yhvh 'al debar hazfarde'im 'asher sam lefar'oh. exodus 8:13	vaya'as yhvh kidbar mosheh vayamutu hazfarde'im min habatim min hakhazeirot umin hasadot. exodus 8:14	vayizberu 'otam khomarim khomarim vatib'ash ha'arez. exodus 8:15	vayar par'oh ki hayetah harevakhah vehakhbed 'et libo velo shama' 'aleihem ka'asher diber yhvh. exodus 8:16	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'emor 'el 'aharon neteh 'et matekha vehakh 'et 'afar ha'arez vehayah lekhinim bekhal 'erez mizrayim. exodus 8:17	vaya'asu khen vayet 'aharon 'et yado bemateihu vayakh 'et 'afar ha'arez vatehi hakinam ba'adam ubabeheimah kal 'afar ha'arez hayah khinim bekhal 'erez mizrayim. exodus 8:18	vaya'asu khen hakhartumim belateihem lehozi 'et hakinim velo yakholu vatehi hakinam ba'adam ubabeheimah. exodus 8:19	vayomeru hakhartumim 'el par'oh 'ezba' 'elohim hi vayekhezaq leb par'oh velo shama' 'aleihem ka'asher diber yhvh. exodus 8:20	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh hashkem baboqer vehityazeb lifnei far'oh hineh yozei hamayemah ve'amarta 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh shalakh 'ami veya'abduni. exodus 8:21	ki 'im 'einekha meshaleiakh 'et 'ami hini mashliakh bekha uba'abadekha ube'amekha ubebatekha 'et he'arob umale'u batei mizrayim 'et he'arob vegam ha'adamah 'asher hem 'aleha. exodus 8:22	vehifleiti bayom hahu 'et 'erez goshen 'asher 'ami 'omed 'aleha lebilti heyot sham 'arob lema'an teida' ki 'ani yhvh beqereb ha'arez. exodus 8:23	vesamti fedut ben 'ami uben 'amekha lemakhar yihyeh ha'ot hazeh. exodus 8:24	vaya'as yhvh ken vayabo 'arob kabed beitah far'oh ubet 'abadav ubekhal 'erez mizrayim tishakhet ha'arez mipenei he'arob. exodus 8:25	vayiqra far'oh 'el mosheh ule'aharon vayomer lekhu zibkhu leiloheikhem ba'arez. exodus 8:26	vayomer mosheh lo nakhon la'asot ken ki to'abat mizrayim nizbakh yhvh 'eloheinu hen nizbakh 'et to'abat mizrayim le'eineihem velo yisqelunu. exodus 8:27	derekh sheloshet yamim neilekh bamidbar vezabakhnu yhvh 'eloheinu ka'asher yomar 'eileinu. exodus 8:28	vayomer par'oh 'anokhi 'ashalakh 'etkhem uzebakhtem yhvh 'eloheikhem bamidbar raq harkheq lo tarkhiqu lalekhet ha'tiru ba'adi. exodus 8:29	vayomer mosheh hineh 'anokhi yozei mei'imakh veha'tarti 'el yhvh vesar he'arob mipar'oh mei'abadav umei'amo makhar raq 'al yosef par'oh hatel lebilti shalakh 'et ha'am lizboakh yhvh. exodus 8:30	vayeizei mosheh mei'im par'oh vaye'tar 'el yhvh. exodus 8:31	vaya'as yhvh kidbar mosheh vayasar he'arob mipar'oh mei'abadav umei'amo lo nish'ar 'ekhad. exodus 8:32	vayakhbed par'oh 'et libo gam bapa'am hazot velo shilakh 'et ha'am. exodus 9:1	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh bo 'el par'oh vedibarta 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei ha'ibrim shalakh 'et 'ami veya'abduni. exodus 9:2	ki 'im ma'en 'atah leshaleiakh ve'odkha makhaziq bam. exodus 9:3	hineh yad yhvh hoyah bemiqnekha 'asher basadeh basusim bakhamorim bagemalim babaqar ubazon deber kabed me'od. exodus 9:4	vehiflah yhvh ben miqneh yisra'el uben miqneh mizrayim velo yamut mikal libnei yisra'el dabar. exodus 9:5	vayasem yhvh mo'ed leimor makhar ya'aseh yhvh hadabar hazeh ba'arez. exodus 9:6	vaya'as yhvh 'et hadabar hazeh mimakhorat vayamat kol miqneh mizrayim umimiqneh benei yisra'el lo met 'ekhad. exodus 9:7	vayishlakh par'oh vehineh lo met mimiqneh yisra'el 'ad 'ekhad vayikhbad leb par'oh velo shilakh 'et ha'am. exodus 9:8	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon qekhu lakhem melo khafeneikhem piakh kibshan uzeraqo mosheh hashamaymah le'einei far'oh. exodus 9:9	vehayah le'abaq 'al kal 'erez mizrayim vehayah 'al ha'adam ve'al habeheimah lishkhin poreiakh 'aba'bu'ot bekhal 'erez mizrayim. exodus 9:10	vayiqkhu 'et piakh hakibshan vaya'amdu lifnei far'oh vayizroq 'oto mosheh hashamayemah vayhi shekhin 'aba'bu'ot poreiakh ba'adam ubabeheimah. exodus 9:11	velo yakhelu hakhartumim la'amod lifnei mosheh mipenei hashekhin ki hayah hashekhin bakhartumim ubekhal mizrayim. exodus 9:12	vaykhazeq yhvh 'et leb par'oh velo shama' 'aleihem ka'asher diber yhvh 'el mosheh. exodus 9:13	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh hashkem baboqer vehityazeb lifnei far'oh ve'amarta 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei ha'ibrim shalakh 'et 'ami veya'abduni. exodus 9:14	ki bapa'am hazot 'ani sholeiakh 'et kal mageifotai 'el libekha uba'abadekha ube'amekha ba'abur teida' ki 'en kamoni bekhal ha'arez. exodus 9:15	ki 'atah shalakhti 'et yadi va'akh 'otkha ve'et 'amekha badaber vatikakhed min ha'arez. exodus 9:16	ve'ulam ba'abur zot he'emadtikha ba'abur har'otekha 'et kokhi ulema'an saper shemi bekhal ha'arez. exodus 9:17	'odkha mistolel be'ami lebilti shalekham. exodus 9:18	hini mamtir ka'et makhar barad kabed me'od 'asher lo hayah khamohu bemizrayim lemin hayom hivasedah ve'ad 'atah. exodus 9:19	ve'atah shelakh ha'ez 'et miqnekha ve'et kal 'asher lekha basadeh kal ha'adam vehabeheimah 'asher yimazei basadeh velo yei'asef habaytah veyarad 'aleihem habarad vameitu. exodus 9:20	hayarei 'et debar yhvh mei'abdei par'oh heinis 'et 'abadav ve'et miqneihu 'el habatim. exodus 9:21	va'asher lo sam libo 'el debar yhvh vaya'azob 'et 'abadav ve'et miqneihu basadeh. exodus 9:22	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh neteh 'et yadekha 'al hashamayim vihi barad bekhal 'erez mizrayim 'al ha'adam ve'al habeheimah ve'al kal 'eiseb hasadeh be'erez mizrayim. exodus 9:23	vayet mosheh 'et mateihu 'al hashamayim yhvh natan qolot ubarad vatihalakh 'esh 'arezah vayamter yhvh barad 'al 'erez mizrayim. exodus 9:24	vayhi barad ve'esh mitlaqakhat betokh habarad kabed me'od 'asher lo hayah khamohu bekhal 'erez mizrayim mei'az hayetah lego. exodus 9:25	vayakh habarad bekhal 'erez mizrayim 'et kal 'asher basadeh mei'adam ve'ad beheimah ve'et kal 'eiseb hasadeh hikah habarad ve'et kal 'ez hasadeh shiber. exodus 9:26	raq be'erez goshen 'asher sham benei yisra'el lo hayah barad. exodus 9:27	vayishlakh par'oh vayiqra lemosheh ule'aharon vayomer 'aleihem khatati hapa'am yhvh hazadiq va'ani ve'ami haresha'im. exodus 9:28	ha'tiru 'el yhvh verab mihyot qolot 'elohim ubarad va'ashalekhah 'etkhem velo tosifun la'amod. exodus 9:29	vayomer 'eilav mosheh kezeiti 'et ha'ir 'efros 'et kapai 'el yhvh haqolot yekhdalun vehabarad lo yihyeh 'od lema'an teida' ki yhvh ha'arez. exodus 9:30	ve'atah va'abadekha yada'ti ki terem tire'un mipenei yhvh 'elohim. exodus 9:31	vehapishtah vehase'orah nukatah ki hase'orah 'abib vehapishtah gib'ol. exodus 9:32	vehakhitah vehakusemet lo nuku ki 'afilot henah. exodus 9:33	vayeizei mosheh mei'im par'oh 'et ha'ir vayifros kapav 'el yhvh vayakhdelu haqolot vehabarad umatar lo nitakh 'arezah. exodus 9:34	vayar par'oh ki khadal hamatar vehabarad vehaqolot vayosef lakhato vayakhbed libo hu va'abadav. exodus 9:35	vayekhezaq leb par'oh velo shilakh 'et benei yisra'el ka'asher diber yhvh beyad mosheh. exodus 10:1	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh bo 'el par'oh ki 'ani hikhbadti 'et libo ve'et leb 'abadav lema'an shiti 'ototai 'eleh beqirbo. exodus 10:2	ulema'an tesaper be'azenei binkha uben binkha 'et 'asher hit'alalti bemizrayim ve'et 'ototai 'asher samti bam vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. exodus 10:3	vayabo mosheh ve'aharon 'el par'oh vayomeru 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei ha'ibrim 'ad matai mei'anta lei'anot mipanai shalakh 'ami veya'abduni. exodus 10:4	ki 'im ma'en 'atah leshaleiakh 'et 'ami hini meibi makhar 'arbeh bigbulekha. exodus 10:5	vekhisah 'et 'en ha'arez velo yukhal lir'ot 'et ha'arez ve'akhal 'et yeter hapeleitah hanish'eret lakhem min habarad ve'akhal 'et kal ha'ez hazomeiakh lakhem min hasadeh. exodus 10:6	umale'u batekha ubatei khal 'abadekha ubatei khal mizrayim 'asher lo ra'u 'abotekha va'abot 'abotekha miyom heyotam 'al ha'adamah 'ad hayom hazeh vayifen vayeizei mei'im par'oh. exodus 10:7	vayomeru 'abdei far'oh 'eilav 'ad matai yihyeh zeh lanu lemoqesh shalakh 'et ha'anashim veya'abdu 'et yhvh 'eloheihem haterem teida' ki 'abedah mizrayim. exodus 10:8	vayushab 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon 'el par'oh vayomer 'aleihem lekhu 'ibdu 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem mi vami haholekhim. exodus 10:9	vayomer mosheh bin'areinu ubizqeineinu neilekh bebaneinu ubibnoteinu bezoneinu ubibqareinu neilekh ki khag yhvh lanu. exodus 10:10	vayomer 'aleihem yehi khen yhvh 'imakhem ka'asher 'ashalakh 'etkhem ve'et tapekhem re'u ki ra'ah neged peneikhem. exodus 10:11	lo khen lekhu na hagebarim ve'ibdu 'et yhvh ki 'otah 'atem mebaqshim vaygaresh 'otam mei'et penei far'oh. exodus 10:12	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh neteh yadekha 'al 'erez mizrayim ba'arbeh veya'al 'al 'erez mizrayim veyokhal 'et kal 'eiseb ha'arez 'et kal 'asher hish'ir habarad. exodus 10:13	vayet mosheh 'et mateihu 'al 'erez mizrayim yhvh nihag ruakh qadim ba'arez kal hayom hahu vekhal halayelah haboqer hayah veruakh haqadim nasa 'et ha'arbeh. exodus 10:14	vaya'al ha'arbeh 'al kal 'erez mizrayim vayanakh bekhol gebul mizrayim kabed me'od lefanav lo hayah khen 'arbeh kamohu ve'akharav lo yihyeh ken. exodus 10:15	vaykhas 'et 'en kal ha'arez vatekhshakh ha'arez vayokhal 'et kal 'eiseb ha'arez ve'et kal peri ha'ez 'asher hotir habarad velo notar kal yereq ba'ez ube'eiseb hasadeh bekhal 'erez mizrayim. exodus 10:16	vaymaher par'oh liqro lemosheh ule'aharon vayomer khatati yhvh 'eloheikhem velakhem. exodus 10:17	ve'atah sa na khatati 'akh hapa'am veha'tiru yhvh 'eloheikhem veyaser mei'alai raq 'et hamavet hazeh. exodus 10:18	vayeizei mei'im par'oh vaye'tar 'el yhvh. exodus 10:19	vayahafokh yhvh ruakh yam khazaq me'od vayisa 'et ha'arbeh vayitqa'eihu yamah suf lo nish'ar 'arbeh 'ekhad bekhol gebul mizrayim. exodus 10:20	vaykhazeq yhvh 'et leb par'oh velo shilakh 'et benei yisra'el. exodus 10:21	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh neteh yadekha 'al hashamayim vihi khoshekh 'al 'erez mizrayim veyamesh khoshekh. exodus 10:22	vayet mosheh 'et yado 'al hashamayim vayhi khoshekh 'afeilah bekhal 'erez mizrayim sheloshet yamim. exodus 10:23	lo ra'u 'ish 'et 'akhiv velo qamu 'ish mitakhtav sheloshet yamim ulekhal benei yisra'el hayah 'or bemoshebotam. exodus 10:24	vayiqra far'oh 'el mosheh vayomer lekhu 'ibdu 'et yhvh raq zonekhem ubeqarkhem yuzag gam tapekhem yeilekh 'imakhem. exodus 10:25	vayomer mosheh gam 'atah titen beyadeinu zebakhim ve'olot ve'asinu yhvh 'eloheinu. exodus 10:26	vegam miqneinu yeilekh 'imanu lo tisha'er parsah ki mimenu niqakh la'abod 'et yhvh 'eloheinu va'anakhnu lo neida' mah na'abod 'et yhvh 'ad bo'einu shamah. exodus 10:27	vaykhazeq yhvh 'et leb par'oh velo 'abah leshalekham. exodus 10:28	vayomer lo far'oh lekh mei'alai hishamer lekha 'el tosef re'ot panai ki beyom re'otekha fanai tamut. exodus 10:29	vayomer mosheh ken dibarta lo 'osif 'od re'ot panekha. exodus 11:1	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'od nega' 'ekhad 'abi 'al par'oh ve'al mizrayim 'akharei khen yeshalakh 'etkhem mizeh keshalekho kalah garesh yegaresh 'etkhem mizeh. exodus 11:2	daber na be'azenei ha'am veyish'alu 'ish mei'et rei'eihu ve'ishah mei'et re'utah kelei khesef ukhelei zahab. exodus 11:3	vayiten yhvh 'et khen ha'am be'einei mizrayim gam ha'ish mosheh gadol me'od be'erez mizrayim be'einei 'abdei far'oh ube'einei ha'am. exodus 11:4	vayomer mosheh koh 'amar yhvh kakhazot halaylah 'ani yozei betokh mizrayim. exodus 11:5	umet kal bekhor be'erez mizrayim mibekhor par'oh hayosheb 'al kis'o 'ad bekhor hashifkhah 'asher 'akhar hareikhayim vekhol bekhor beheimah. exodus 11:6	vehayetah ze'aqah gedolah bekhal 'erez mizrayim 'asher kamohu lo nihyatah vekhamohu lo tosif. exodus 11:7	ulekhol benei yisra'el lo yekheraz keleb leshono lemei'ish ve'ad beheimah lema'an teide'un 'asher yafleh yhvh ben mizrayim uben yisra'el. exodus 11:8	veyaredu khal 'abadekha 'eleh 'eilai vehishtakhavu li leimor zei 'atah vekhal ha'am 'asher beraglekha ve'akharei khen 'eizei vayeizei mei'im par'oh bakhori 'af. exodus 11:9	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh lo yishma' 'aleikhem par'oh lema'an rebot moftai be'erez mizrayim. exodus 11:10	umosheh ve'aharon 'asu 'et kal hamofetim ha'eleh lifnei far'oh vaykhazeq yhvh 'et leb par'oh velo shilakh 'et benei yisra'el mei'arzo. exodus 12:1	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon be'erez mizrayim leimor. exodus 12:2	hakhodesh hazeh lakhem rosh khodashim rishon hu lakhem lekhadeshei hashanah. exodus 12:3	daberu 'el kal 'adat yisra'el leimor be'asor lakhodesh hazeh veyiqkhu lahem 'ish seh lebet 'abot seh labayit. exodus 12:4	ve'im yim'at habayit mihyot miseh velaqakh hu ushekheino haqarob 'el beito bemikhsat nefashot 'ish lefi 'akhelo takhosu 'al haseh. exodus 12:5	seh tamim zakhar ben shanah yihyeh lakhem min hakebasim umin ha'izim tiqakhu. exodus 12:6	vehayah lakhem lemishmeret 'ad 'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh hazeh veshakhatu 'oto kol qehal 'adat yisra'el ben ha'arbayim. exodus 12:7	velaqekhu min hadam venatenu 'al shetei hamezuzot ve'al hamashqof 'al habatim 'asher yokhelu 'oto bahem. exodus 12:8	ve'akhelu 'et habasar balaylah hazeh zeli 'esh umazot 'al merorim yokheluhu. exodus 12:9	'al tokhelu mimenu na ubashel mebushal bamayim ki 'im zeli 'esh rosho 'al kera'av ve'al qirbo. exodus 12:10	velo totiru mimenu 'ad boqer vehanotar mimenu 'ad boqer ba'esh tisrofu. exodus 12:11	vekhakhah tokhelu 'oto mateneikhem khagurim na'aleikhem beragleikhem umaqelkhem beyedkhem va'akhaltem 'oto bekhipazon pesakh hu yhvh. exodus 12:12	ve'abarti be'erez mizrayim balaylah hazeh vehikeiti khal bekhor be'erez mizrayim mei'adam ve'ad beheimah ubekhal 'elohei mizrayim 'e'eseh shefatim 'ani yhvh. exodus 12:13	vehayah hadam lakhem le'ot 'al habatim 'asher 'atem sham vera'iti 'et hadam ufasakhti 'aleikhem velo yihyeh bakhem negef lemashkhit behakoti be'erez mizrayim. exodus 12:14	vehayah hayom hazeh lakhem lezikaron vekhagotem 'oto khag yhvh ledoroteikhem khuqat 'olam tekhaguhu. exodus 12:15	shib'at yamim mazot tokheilu 'akh bayom harishon tashbitu se'or mibateikhem ki kal 'okhel khamez venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miyisra'el miyom harishon 'ad yom hashebi'i. exodus 12:16	ubayom harishon miqra qodesh ubayom hashebi'i miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melakhah lo yei'aseh bahem 'akh 'asher yei'akhel lekhal nefesh hu lebado yei'aseh lakhem. exodus 12:17	ushemartem 'et hamazot ki be'ezem hayom hazeh hozeiti 'et zib'oteikhem mei'erez mizrayim ushemartem 'et hayom hazeh ledoroteikhem khuqat 'olam. exodus 12:18	barishon be'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh ba'ereb tokhelu mazot 'ad yom ha'ekhad ve'esrim lakhodesh ba'areb. exodus 12:19	shib'at yamim se'or lo yimazei bebateikhem ki kal 'okhel makhmezet venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'adat yisra'el bager ube'ezrakh ha'arez. exodus 12:20	kal makhmezet lo tokheilu bekhol mosheboteikhem tokhelu mazot. exodus 12:21	vayiqra mosheh lekhal ziqnei yisra'el vayomer 'aleihem mishkhu uqekhu lakhem zon lemishpekhoteikhem veshakhatu hapasakh. exodus 12:22	uleqakhtem 'agudat 'eizob utebaltem badam 'asher basaf vehiga'tem 'el hamashqof ve'el shetei hamezuzot min hadam 'asher basaf ve'atem lo teize'u 'ish mipetakh beito 'ad boqer. exodus 12:23	ve'abar yhvh lingof 'et mizrayim vera'ah 'et hadam 'al hamashqof ve'al shetei hamezuzot ufasakh yhvh 'al hapetakh velo yiten hamashkhit labo 'el bateikhem lingof. exodus 12:24	ushemartem 'et hadabar hazeh lekhaq lekha ulebanekha 'ad 'olam. exodus 12:25	vehayah ki tabo'u 'el ha'arez 'asher yiten yhvh lakhem ka'asher diber ushemartem 'et ha'abodah hazot. exodus 12:26	vehayah ki yomeru 'aleikhem beneikhem mah ha'abodah hazot lakhem. exodus 12:27	va'amartem zebakh pesakh hu yhvh 'asher pasakh 'al batei benei yisra'el bemizrayim benagepo 'et mizrayim ve'et bateinu hizil vayiqod ha'am vayishtakhavu. exodus 12:28	vayeilekhu vaya'asu benei yisra'el ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh ve'aharon ken 'asu. exodus 12:29	vayhi bakhazi halaylah yhvh hikah khal bekhor be'erez mizrayim mibekhor par'oh hayosheb 'al kis'o 'ad bekhor hashebi 'asher bebet habor vekhol bekhor beheimah. exodus 12:30	vayaqam par'oh laylah hu vekhal 'abadav vekhal mizrayim vatehi ze'aqah gedolah bemizrayim ki 'en bayit 'asher 'en sham met. exodus 12:31	vayiqra lemosheh ule'aharon laylah vayomer qumu ze'u mitokh 'ami gam 'atem gam benei yisra'el ulekhu 'ibdu 'et yhvh kedaberkhem. exodus 12:32	gam zonekhem gam beqarkhem qekhu ka'asher dibartem valeikhu ubeirakhtem gam 'oti. exodus 12:33	vatekhezaq mizrayim 'al ha'am lemaher leshalekham min ha'arez ki 'ameru kulanu meitim. exodus 12:34	vayisa ha'am 'et bezeiqo terem yekhmaz mish'arotam zerurot besimlotam 'al shikhmam. exodus 12:35	ubenei yisra'el 'asu kidbar mosheh vayish'alu mimizrayim kelei khesef ukhelei zahab usemalot. exodus 12:36	yhvh natan 'et khen ha'am be'einei mizrayim vayash'ilum vaynazelu 'et mizrayim. exodus 12:37	vayis'u benei yisra'el meira'meses sukotah keshesh mei'ot 'elef ragli hagebarim lebad mitaf. exodus 12:38	vegam 'eireb rab 'alah 'itam vezon ubaqar miqneh kabed me'od. exodus 12:39	vayofu 'et habazeq 'asher hozi'u mimizrayim 'ugot mazot ki lo khamez ki goreshu mimizrayim velo yakhelu lehitmahmeiah vegam zeidah lo 'asu lahem. exodus 12:40	umoshab benei yisra'el 'asher yashebu bemizrayim sheloshim shanah ve'arba' mei'ot shanah. exodus 12:41	vayhi miqez sheloshim shanah ve'arba' mei'ot shanah vayhi be'ezem hayom hazeh yaze'u kal zib'ot yhvh mei'erez mizrayim. exodus 12:42	lel shimurim hu yhvh lehozi'am mei'erez mizrayim hu halaylah hazeh yhvh shimurim lekhal benei yisra'el ledorotam. exodus 12:43	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh ve'aharon zot khuqat hapasakh kal ben neikhar lo yokhal bo. exodus 12:44	vekhal 'ebed 'ish miqnat kasef umaltah 'oto 'az yokhal bo. exodus 12:45	toshab vesakhir lo yokhal bo. exodus 12:46	bebayit 'ekhad yei'akhel lo tozi min habayit min habasar khuzah ve'ezem lo tishberu bo. exodus 12:47	kal 'adat yisra'el ya'asu 'oto. exodus 12:48	vekhi yagur 'itekha ger ve'asah fesakh yhvh himol lo khal zakhar ve'az yiqrab la'asoto vehayah ke'ezrakh ha'arez vekhal 'arel lo yokhal bo. exodus 12:49	torah 'akhat yihyeh la'ezrakh velager hagar betokhkhem. exodus 12:50	vaya'asu kal benei yisra'el ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon ken 'asu. exodus 12:51	vayhi be'ezem hayom hazeh hozi yhvh 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim 'al zib'otam. exodus 13:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. exodus 13:2	qadesh li khal bekhor peter kal rekhem bibnei yisra'el ba'adam ubabeheimah li hu. exodus 13:3	vayomer mosheh 'el ha'am zakhor 'et hayom hazeh 'asher yezatem mimizrayim mibet 'abadim ki bekhozeq yad hozi yhvh 'etkhem mizeh velo yei'akhel khamez. exodus 13:4	hayom 'atem yoze'im bekhodesh ha'abib. exodus 13:5	vehayah khi yebi'akha yhvh 'el 'erez hakena'ani vehakhiti veha'emori vehakhivi vehaybusi 'asher nishba' la'abotekha latet lakh 'erez zabat khalab udebash ve'abadta 'et ha'abodah hazot bakhodesh hazeh. exodus 13:6	shib'at yamim tokhal mazot ubayom hashebi'i khag yhvh. exodus 13:7	mazot yei'akhel 'et shib'at hayamim velo yeira'eh lekha khamez velo yeira'eh lekha se'or bekhal gebulekha. exodus 13:8	vehigadta lebinkha bayom hahu leimor ba'abur zeh 'asah yhvh li bezeiti mimizrayim. exodus 13:9	vehayah lekha le'ot 'al yadekha ulezikaron ben 'einekha lema'an tihyeh torat yhvh befikha ki beyad khazaqah hozi'akha yhvh mimizrayim. exodus 13:10	veshamarta 'et hakhuqah hazot lemo'adah miyamim yamimah. exodus 13:11	vehayah ki yebi'akha yhvh 'el 'erez hakena'ani ka'asher nishba' lekha vela'abotekha unetanah lakh. exodus 13:12	veha'abarta khal peter rekhem yhvh vekhal peter sheger beheimah 'asher yihyeh lekha hazekharim yhvh. exodus 13:13	vekhal peter khamor tifdeh beseh ve'im lo tifdeh va'arafto vekhol bekhor 'adam bebanekha tifdeh. exodus 13:14	vehayah ki yish'alekha binkha makhar leimor mah zot ve'amarta 'eilav bekhozeq yad hozi'anu yhvh mimizrayim mibet 'abadim. exodus 13:15	vayhi ki hiqshah far'oh leshalekheinu vayaharog yhvh kal bekhor be'erez mizrayim mibekhor 'adam ve'ad bekhor beheimah 'al ken 'ani zobeiakh yhvh kal peter rekhem hazekharim vekhal bekhor banai 'efdeh. exodus 13:16	vehayah le'ot 'al yadekhah uletotafot ben 'einekha ki bekhozeq yad hozi'anu yhvh mimizrayim. exodus 13:17	vayhi beshalakh par'oh 'et ha'am velo nakham 'elohim derekh 'erez pelishtim ki qarob hu ki 'amar 'elohim pen yinakhem ha'am bir'otam milkhamah veshabu mizrayemah. exodus 13:18	vayaseb 'elohim 'et ha'am derekh hamidbar yam suf vakhamushim 'alu benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim. exodus 13:19	vayiqakh mosheh 'et 'azmot yosef 'imo ki hashbeia' hishbia' 'et benei yisra'el leimor paqod yifqod 'elohim 'etkhem veha'alitem 'et 'azmotai mizeh 'itekhem. exodus 13:20	vayis'u misukot vayakhanu be'eitam biqzeh hamidbar. exodus 13:21	yhvh holekh lifneihem yomam be'amud 'anan lankhotam haderekh velaylah be'amud 'esh leha'ir lahem lalekhet yomam valayelah. exodus 13:22	lo yamish 'amud he'anan yomam ve'amud ha'esh layelah lifnei ha'am. exodus 14:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. exodus 14:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el veyashubu veyakhanu lifnei pi hakhirot ben migdol uben hayam lifnei ba'al zefon nikhkho takhanu 'al hayam. exodus 14:3	ve'amar par'oh libnei yisra'el nebukhim hem ba'arez sagar 'aleihem hamidbar. exodus 14:4	vekhizaqti 'et leb par'oh veradaf 'akhareihem ve'ikabedah befar'oh ubekhal kheilo veyade'u mizrayim ki 'ani yhvh vaya'asu khen. exodus 14:5	vayugad lemelekh mizrayim ki barakh ha'am vayeihafekh lebab par'oh va'abadav 'el ha'am vayomru mah zot 'asinu ki shilakhnu 'et yisra'el mei'abedeinu. exodus 14:6	vaye'sor 'et rikhbo ve'et 'amo laqakh 'imo. exodus 14:7	vayiqakh shesh mei'ot rekheb bakhur vekhol rekheb mizrayim veshalishim 'al kulo. exodus 14:8	vaykhazeq yhvh 'et leb par'oh melekh mizrayim vayirdof 'akharei benei yisra'el ubenei yisra'el yoze'im beyad ramah. exodus 14:9	vayirdefu mizrayim 'akhareihem vayasigu 'otam khonim 'al hayam kal sus rekheb par'oh ufarashav vekheilo 'al pi hakhirot lifnei ba'al zefon. exodus 14:10	ufar'oh hiqrib vayis'u benei yisra'el 'et 'eineihem vehineh mizrayim noseia' 'akhareihem vayire'u me'od vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el yhvh. exodus 14:11	vayomeru 'el mosheh hamibeli 'en qebarim bemizrayim leqakhtanu lamut bamidbar mah zot 'asita lanu lehozi'anu mimizrayim. exodus 14:12	halo zeh hadabar 'asher dibarnu 'eilekha bemizrayim leimor khadal mimenu vena'abdah 'et mizrayim ki tob lanu 'abod 'et mizrayim mimuteinu bamidbar. exodus 14:13	vayomer mosheh 'el ha'am 'al tira'u hityazbu ure'u 'et yeshu'at yhvh 'asher ya'aseh lakhem hayom ki 'asher re'item 'et mizrayim hayom lo tosifu lir'otam 'od 'ad 'olam. exodus 14:14	yhvh yilakhem lakhem ve'atem takharishun. exodus 14:15	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh mah tiz'aq 'eilai daber 'el benei yisra'el veyisa'u. exodus 14:16	ve'atah harem 'et matekha uneteh 'et yadekha 'al hayam ubeqa'eihu veyabo'u benei yisra'el betokh hayam bayabashah. exodus 14:17	va'ani hini mekhazeq 'et leb mizrayim veyabo'u 'akhareihem ve'ikabedah befar'oh ubekhal kheilo berikhbo ubefarashav. exodus 14:18	veyade'u mizrayim ki 'ani yhvh behikabedi befar'oh berikhbo ubefarashav. exodus 14:19	vayisa' mal'akh ha'elohim haholekh lifnei makhaneh yisra'el vayeilekh mei'akhareihem vayisa' 'amud he'anan mipeneihem vaya'amod mei'akhareihem. exodus 14:20	vayabo ben makhaneh mizrayim uben makhaneh yisra'el vayhi he'anan vehakhoshekh vaya'er 'et halayelah velo qarab zeh 'el zeh kal halayelah. exodus 14:21	vayet mosheh 'et yado 'al hayam vayolekh yhvh 'et hayam beruakh qadim 'azah kal halaylah vayasem 'et hayam lekharabah vayibaqe'u hamayim. exodus 14:22	vayabo'u benei yisra'el betokh hayam bayabashah vehamayim lahem khomah miminam umisemolam. exodus 14:23	vayirdefu mizrayim vayabo'u 'akhareihem kol sus par'oh rikhbo ufarashav 'el tokh hayam. exodus 14:24	vayhi be'ashmoret haboqer vayashqef yhvh 'el makhaneh mizrayim be'amud 'esh ve'anan vayaham 'et makhaneh mizrayim. exodus 14:25	vayasar 'et 'ofan markebotav vaynahageihu bikhbeidut vayomer mizrayim 'anusah mipenei yisra'el ki yhvh nilkham lahem bemizrayim exodus 14:26	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh neteh 'et yadekha 'al hayam veyashubu hamayim 'al mizrayim 'al rikhbo ve'al parashav. exodus 14:27	vayet mosheh 'et yado 'al hayam vayashab hayam lifnot boqer le'eitano umizrayim nasim liqrato vayna'er yhvh 'et mizrayim betokh hayam. exodus 14:28	vayashubu hamayim vaykhasu 'et harekheb ve'et haparashim lekhol khel par'oh haba'im 'akhareihem bayam lo nish'ar bahem 'ad 'ekhad. exodus 14:29	ubenei yisra'el halekhu bayabashah betokh hayam vehamayim lahem khomah miminam umisemolam exodus 14:30	vayosha' yhvh bayom hahu 'et yisra'el miyad mizrayim vayar yisra'el 'et mizrayim met 'al sefat hayam. exodus 14:31	vayar yisra'el 'et hayad hagedolah 'asher 'asah yhvh bemizrayim vayire'u ha'am 'et yhvh vaya'aminu yhvh ubemosheh 'abdo. exodus 15:1	'az yashir mosheh ubenei yisra'el 'et hashirah hazot yhvh vayomeru leimor 'ashirah yhvh ki ga'oh ga'ah sus verokhebo ramah bayam. exodus 15:2	'azi vezimrat yah vayhi li lishu'ah zeh 'eili ve'anveihu 'elohei 'abi va'aromemenhu. exodus 15:3	yhvh 'ish milkhamah yhvh shemo. exodus 15:4	markebot par'oh vekheilo yarah bayam umibkhar shalishav tube'u beyam suf. exodus 15:5	tehomot yekhasyumu yaredu bimzolot kemo 'aben. exodus 15:6	yeminekha yhvh ne'dari bakoakh yeminekha yhvh tir'az 'oyeb. exodus 15:7	uberob ge'onkha taharos qamekha teshalakh kharonekha yokheleimo kaqash. exodus 15:8	uberuakh 'apekha ne'ermu mayim nizebu khemo ned nozelim qafe'u tehomot beleb yam. exodus 15:9	'amar 'oyeb 'erdof 'asig 'akhaleq shalal timla'eimo nafshi 'ariq kharbi torisheimo yadi. exodus 15:10	nashafta berukhakha kisamo yam zalalu ka'oferet bemayim 'adirim. exodus 15:11	mi khamokhah ba'eilim yhvh mi kamokhah ne'dar baqodesh nora tehilot 'oseh fele. exodus 15:12	natita yeminekha tibla'eimo 'arez. exodus 15:13	nakhita bekhasdekha 'am zu ga'aleta neihalta be'azekha 'el neveh qadshekha exodus 15:14	shame'u 'amim yirgazun khil 'akhaz yoshebei pelashet. exodus 15:15	'az nibhalu 'alufei 'edom 'eilei mo'ab yokhazeimo ra'ad namogu kol yoshebei khena'an. exodus 15:16	tipol 'aleihem 'eimatah vafakhad bigdol zero'akha yidemu ka'aben 'ad ya'abor 'amekha yhvh 'ad ya'abor 'am zu qanita. exodus 15:17	tebi'eimo vetita'eimo behar nakhalatekha makhon leshibtekha pa'alta yhvh miqedash 'adonai konu yadekha. exodus 15:18	yhvh yimlokh le'olam va'ed. exodus 15:19	ki ba sus par'oh berikhbo ubefarashav bayam vayasheb yhvh 'aleihem 'et mei hayam ubenei yisra'el halekhu bayabashah betokh hayam. exodus 15:20	vatiqakh miryam hanebi'ah 'akhot 'aharon 'et hatof beyadah vateizena khal hanashim 'akhareha betupim ubimkholot. exodus 15:21	vata'an lahem miryam shiru yhvh ki ga'oh ga'ah sus verokhebo ramah bayam. exodus 15:22	vayasa' mosheh 'et yisra'el miyam suf vayeize'u 'el midbar shur vayeilekhu sheloshet yamim bamidbar velo maze'u mayim. exodus 15:23	vayabo'u maratah velo yakhelu lishtot mayim mimarah ki marim hem 'al ken qara shemah marah. exodus 15:24	vayilonu ha'am 'al mosheh leimor mah nishteh. exodus 15:25	vayiz'aq 'el yhvh vayoreihu yhvh 'ez vayashlekh 'el hamayim vayimtequ hamayim sham sam lo khoq umishpat vesham nisahu. exodus 15:26	vayomer 'im shamoa' tishma' leqol yhvh 'elohekha vehayashar be'einav ta'aseh veha'azanta lemizvotav veshamarta kal khuqav kal hamakhalah 'asher samti bemizrayim lo 'asim 'alekha ki 'ani yhvh rofe'ekha. exodus 15:27	vayabo'u 'eilimah vesham shetem 'esreh 'einot mayim veshib'im temarim vayakhanu sham 'al hamayim. exodus 16:1	vayis'u mei'eilim vayabo'u kal 'adat benei yisra'el 'el midbar sin 'asher ben 'eilim uben sinai bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hasheini lezeitam mei'erez mizrayim. exodus 16:2	vayilinu vayilonu kal 'adat benei yisra'el 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon bamidbar. exodus 16:3	vayomeru 'aleihem benei yisra'el mi yiten muteinu beyad yhvh be'erez mizrayim beshibteinu 'al sir habasar be'akheleinu lekhem lasoba' ki hozeitem 'otanu 'el hamidbar hazeh lehamit 'et kal haqahal hazeh bara'ab. exodus 16:4	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh hini mamtir lakhem lekhem min hashamayim veyaza ha'am velaqetu debar yom beyomo lema'an 'anasenu hayeilekh betorati 'im lo. exodus 16:5	vehayah bayom hashishi veheikhinu 'et 'asher yabi'u vehayah mishneh 'al 'asher yilqetu yom yom. exodus 16:6	vayomer mosheh ve'aharon 'el kal benei yisra'el 'ereb vida'tem ki yhvh hozi 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim. exodus 16:7	uboqer ure'item 'et kebod yhvh beshame'o 'et telunoteikhem 'al yhvh venakhnu mah ki talonu talinu 'aleinu. exodus 16:8	vayomer mosheh betet yhvh lakhem ba'ereb basar le'ekhol velekhem baboqer lisboa' bishmoa' yhvh 'et telunoteikhem 'asher 'atem malinim 'alav venakhnu mah lo 'aleinu telunoteikhem ki 'al yhvh. exodus 16:9	vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon 'emor 'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el qirbu lifnei yhvh ki shama' 'et telunoteikhem. exodus 16:10	vayhi kedaber 'aharon 'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el vayifnu 'el hamidbar vehineh kebod yhvh nir'ah be'anan. exodus 16:11	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. exodus 16:12	shama'ti 'et telunot benei yisra'el daber 'aleihem leimor ben ha'arbayim tokhelu basar ubaboqer tisbe'u lakhem vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. exodus 16:13	vayhi ba'ereb vata'al haselav vatekhas 'et hamakhaneh ubaboqer hayetah shikhbat hatal sabib lamakhaneh. exodus 16:14	vata'al shikhbat hatal vehineh 'al penei hamidbar daq mekhuspas daq kakefor 'al ha'arez. exodus 16:15	vayir'u benei yisra'el vayomeru 'ish 'el 'akhiv man hu ki lo yade'u mah hu vayomer mosheh 'aleihem hu halekhem 'asher natan yhvh lakhem le'akhlah exodus 16:16	zeh hadabar 'asher zivah yhvh liqtu mimenu 'ish lefi 'akhelo 'omer lagulgolet mispar nafshoteikhem 'ish la'asher be'aholo tiqakhu. exodus 16:17	vaya'asu khen benei yisra'el vayilqetu hamarbeh vehamam'it. exodus 16:18	vayamodu ba'omer velo he'dif hamarbeh vehamam'it lo hekhsir 'ish lefi 'akhelo laqatu. exodus 16:19	vayomer mosheh 'aleihem 'ish 'al yoter mimenu 'ad boqer. exodus 16:20	velo shame'u 'el mosheh vayotiru 'anashim mimenu 'ad boqer vayarum tola'im vayib'ash vayiqzof 'aleihem mosheh. exodus 16:21	vayilqetu 'oto baboqer baboqer 'ish kefi 'akhelo vekham hashemesh venamas. exodus 16:22	vayhi bayom hashishi laqetu lekhem mishneh shenei ha'omer la'ekhad vayabo'u kal nesi'ei ha'eidah vayagidu lemosheh. exodus 16:23	vayomer 'aleihem hu 'asher diber yhvh shabaton shabat qodesh yhvh makhar 'et 'asher tofu 'eifu ve'et 'asher tebashelu basheilu ve'et kal ha'odef hanikhu lakhem lemishmeret 'ad haboqer. exodus 16:24	vayanikhu 'oto 'ad haboqer ka'asher zivah mosheh velo hib'ish verimah lo hayetah bo. exodus 16:25	vayomer mosheh 'ikhluhu hayom ki shabat hayom yhvh hayom lo timza'uhu basadeh. exodus 16:26	sheishet yamim tilqetuhu ubayom hashebi'i shabat lo yihyeh bo. exodus 16:27	vayhi bayom hashebi'i yaze'u min ha'am lilqot velo maza'u. exodus 16:28	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'ad 'anah mei'antem lishmor mizvotai vetorotai. exodus 16:29	re'u ki yhvh natan lakhem hashabat 'al ken hu noten lakhem bayom hashishi lekhem yomayim shebu 'ish takhtav 'al yeizei 'ish mimeqomo bayom hashebi'i. exodus 16:30	vayishbetu ha'am bayom hashebi'i. exodus 16:31	vayiqre'u bet yisra'el 'et shemo man vehu kezera' gad laban veta'mo kezapikhit bidbash. exodus 16:32	vayomer mosheh zeh hadabar 'asher zivah yhvh melo ha'omer mimenu lemishmeret ledoroteikhem lema'an yir'u 'et halekhem 'asher he'ekhalti 'etkhem bamidbar behozi'i 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim. exodus 16:33	vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon qakh zinzenet 'akhat veten shamah melo ha'omer man vehanakh 'oto lifnei yhvh lemishmeret ledoroteikhem. exodus 16:34	ka'asher zivah yhvh 'el mosheh vayanikheihu 'aharon lifnei ha'eidut lemishmaret. exodus 16:35	ubenei yisra'el 'akhelu 'et haman 'arba'im shanah 'ad bo'am 'el 'erez noshabet 'et haman 'akhelu 'ad bo'am 'el qezeh 'erez kena'an. exodus 16:36	veha'omer 'asirit ha'eifah hu. exodus 17:1	vayis'u kal 'adat benei yisra'el mimidbar sin lemas'eihem 'al pi yhvh vayakhanu birfidim ve'en mayim lishtot ha'am. exodus 17:2	vayareb ha'am 'im mosheh vayomeru tenu lanu mayim venishteh vayomer lahem mosheh mah teribun 'imadi mah tenasun 'et yhvh. exodus 17:3	vayizma sham ha'am lamayim vayalen ha'am 'al mosheh vayomer lamah zeh he'elitanu mimizrayim lehamit 'oti ve'et banai ve'et miqnai bazama. exodus 17:4	vayiz'aq mosheh 'el yhvh leimor mah 'e'eseh la'am hazeh 'od me'at useqaluni. exodus 17:5	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'abor lifnei ha'am veqakh 'itekha miziqnei yisra'el umatekha 'asher hikita bo 'et hai'or qakh beyadekha vehalakheta. exodus 17:6	hini 'omed lefanekha sham 'al hazur bekhoreb vehikita bazur veyaze'u mimenu mayim veshatah ha'am vaya'as ken mosheh le'einei ziqnei yisra'el. exodus 17:7	vayiqra shem hamaqom masah umeribah 'al rib benei yisra'el ve'al nasotam 'et yhvh leimor hayesh yhvh beqirbeinu 'im 'ayin. exodus 17:8	vayabo 'amaleq vayilakhem 'im yisra'el birfidim. exodus 17:9	vayomer mosheh 'el yehoshua' bekhar lanu 'anashim vezei hilakhem ba'amaleq makhar 'anokhi nizab 'al rosh hagib'ah umateh ha'elohim beyadi. exodus 17:10	vaya'as yehoshua' ka'asher 'amar lo mosheh lehilakhem ba'amaleq umosheh 'aharon vekhur 'alu rosh hagib'ah. exodus 17:11	vehayah ka'asher yarim mosheh yado vegabar yisra'el vekha'asher yaniakh yado vegabar 'amaleq. exodus 17:12	videi mosheh kebeidim vayiqkhu 'eben vayasimu takhtav vayeisheb 'aleha ve'aharon vekhur tamekhu beyadav mizeh 'ekhad umizeh 'ekhad vayhi yadav 'emunah 'ad bo hashamesh. exodus 17:13	vayakhalosh yehoshua' 'et 'amaleq ve'et 'amo lefi khareb. exodus 17:14	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh ketob zot zikaron baseifer vesim be'azenei yehoshua' ki makhoh 'emkheh 'et zeikher 'amaleq mitakhat hashamayim. exodus 17:15	vayiben mosheh mizbeiakh vayiqra shemo yhvh nisi. exodus 17:16	vayomer ki yad 'al kes yah milkhamah yhvh ba'amaleq midor dor. exodus 18:1	vayishma' yitro khohen midyan khoten mosheh 'et kal 'asher 'asah 'elohim lemosheh uleyisra'el 'amo ki hozi yhvh 'et yisra'el mimizrayim. exodus 18:2	vayiqakh yitro khoten mosheh 'et ziporah 'eishet mosheh 'akhar shilukheha. exodus 18:3	ve'et shenei baneha 'asher shem ha'ekhad geireshom ki 'amar ger hayiti be'erez nakheriyah. exodus 18:4	veshem ha'ekhad 'eli'ezer ki 'elohei 'abi be'ezri vayazileini meikhereb par'oh. exodus 18:5	vayabo yitro khoten mosheh ubanav ve'ishto 'el mosheh 'el hamidbar 'asher hu khoneh sham har ha'elohim. exodus 18:6	vayomer 'el mosheh 'ani khotenkha yitro ba 'eilekha ve'ishtekha ushenei baneha 'imah. exodus 18:7	vayeizei mosheh liqrat khoteno vayishtakhu vayishaq lo vayish'alu 'ish lerei'eihu leshalom vayabo'u ha'ohelah. exodus 18:8	vaysaper mosheh lekhoteno 'et kal 'asher 'asah yhvh lefar'oh ulemizrayim 'al 'odot yisra'el 'et kal hatela'ah 'asher meza'atam baderekh vayazilem yhvh. exodus 18:9	vayikhad yitro 'al kal hatobah 'asher 'asah yhvh leyisra'el 'asher hizilo miyad mizrayim. exodus 18:10	vayomer yitro barukh yhvh 'asher hizil 'etkhem miyad mizrayim umiyad par'oh 'asher hizil 'et ha'am mitakhat yad mizrayim. exodus 18:11	'atah yada'ti ki gadol yhvh mikal ha'elohim ki badabar 'asher zadu 'aleihem. exodus 18:12	vayiqakh yitro khoten mosheh 'olah uzebakhim leilohim vayabo 'aharon vekhol ziqnei yisra'el le'ekhal lekhem 'im khoten mosheh lifnei ha'elohim. exodus 18:13	vayhi mimakhorat vayeisheb mosheh lishpot 'et ha'am vaya'amod ha'am 'al mosheh min haboqer 'ad ha'areb. exodus 18:14	vayar khoten mosheh 'et kal 'asher hu 'oseh la'am vayomer mah hadabar hazeh 'asher 'atah 'oseh la'am madua' 'atah yosheb lebadekha vekhal ha'am nizab 'alekha min boqer 'ad 'areb. exodus 18:15	vayomer mosheh lekhoteno ki yabo 'eilai ha'am lidrosh 'elohim. exodus 18:16	ki yihyeh lahem dabar ba 'eilai veshafati ben 'ish uben rei'eihu vehoda'ti 'et khuqei ha'elohim ve'et torotav. exodus 18:17	vayomer khoten mosheh 'eilav lo tob hadabar 'asher 'atah 'oseh. exodus 18:18	nabol tibol gam 'atah gam ha'am hazeh 'asher 'imakh ki khabed mimekha hadabar lo tukhal 'asohu lebadekha. exodus 18:19	'atah shema' beqoli 'i'azekha vihi 'elohim 'imakh heyeh 'atah la'am mul ha'elohim veheibeita 'atah 'et hadebarim 'el ha'elohim. exodus 18:20	vehizhartah 'ethem 'et hakhuqim ve'et hatorot vehoda'ta lahem 'et haderekh yeilekhu bah ve'et hama'aseh 'asher ya'asun. exodus 18:21	ve'atah tekhezeh mikal ha'am 'anshei khayil yir'ei 'elohim 'anshei 'emet sone'ei baza' vesamta 'aleihem sarei 'alafim sarei mei'ot sarei khamishim vesarei 'asarot. exodus 18:22	veshafetu 'et ha'am bekhal 'et vehayah kal hadabar hagadol yabi'u 'eilekha vekhal hadabar haqaton yishpetu hem vehaqel mei'alekha venase'u 'itakh. exodus 18:23	'im 'et hadabar hazeh ta'aseh vezivekha 'elohim veyakhaleta 'amod vegam kal ha'am hazeh 'al meqomo yabo beshalom. exodus 18:24	vayishma' mosheh leqol khoteno vaya'as kol 'asher 'amar. exodus 18:25	vayibkhar mosheh 'anshei khayil mikal yisra'el vayiten 'otam rashim 'al ha'am sarei 'alafim sarei mei'ot sarei khamishim vesarei 'asarot. exodus 18:26	veshafetu 'et ha'am bekhal 'et 'et hadabar haqasheh yebi'un 'el mosheh vekhal hadabar haqaton yishputu hem. exodus 18:27	vayshalakh mosheh 'et khoteno vayeilekh lo 'el 'arzo. exodus 19:1	bakhodesh hashelishi lezet benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim bayom hazeh ba'u midbar sinai. exodus 19:2	vayis'u meirefidim vayabo'u midbar sinai vayakhanu bamidbar vayikhan sham yisra'el neged hahar. exodus 19:3	umosheh 'alah 'el ha'elohim vayiqra 'eilav yhvh min hahar leimor koh tomar lebet ya'aqob vetaged libnei yisra'el. exodus 19:4	'atem re'item 'asher 'asiti lemizrayim va'esa 'etkhem 'al kanfei nesharim va'abi 'etkhem 'eilai. exodus 19:5	ve'atah 'im shamoa' tishme'u beqoli ushemartem 'et beriti vihyitem li segulah mikal ha'amim ki li kal ha'arez. exodus 19:6	ve'atem tihyu li mamlekhet kohanim vego qadosh 'eleh hadebarim 'asher tedaber 'el benei yisra'el. exodus 19:7	vayabo mosheh vayiqra leziqnei ha'am vayasem lifneihem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh 'asher zivahu yhvh. exodus 19:8	vaya'anu khal ha'am yakhdav vayomeru kol 'asher diber yhvh na'aseh vayasheb mosheh 'et dibrei ha'am 'el yhvh. exodus 19:9	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh hineh 'anokhi ba 'eilekha be'ab he'anan ba'abur yishma' ha'am bedaberi 'imakh vegam bekha ya'aminu le'olam vayaged mosheh 'et dibrei ha'am 'el yhvh. exodus 19:10	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh lekh 'el ha'am veqidashtam hayom umakhar vekhibesu simlotam. exodus 19:11	vehayu nekhonim layom hashelishi ki bayom hashelishi yeired yhvh le'einei khal ha'am 'al har sinai. exodus 19:12	vehigbalta 'et ha'am sabib leimor hishameru lakhem 'alot bahar unegoa' beqazeihu kal hanogeia' bahar mot yumat. exodus 19:13	lo tiga' bo yad ki saqol yisaqel 'o yaroh yiyareh 'im beheimah 'im 'ish lo yikhyeh bimshokh hayobel hemah ya'alu bahar. exodus 19:14	vayeired mosheh min hahar 'el ha'am vayqadesh 'et ha'am vaykhabesu simlotam. exodus 19:15	vayomer 'el ha'am heyu nekhonim lishloshet yamim 'al tigeshu 'el 'ishah. exodus 19:16	vayhi bayom hashelishi bihyot haboqer vayhi qolot uberaqim ve'anan kabed 'al hahar veqol shofar khazaq me'od vayekherad kal ha'am 'asher bamakhaneh. exodus 19:17	vayozei mosheh 'et ha'am liqrat ha'elohim min hamakhaneh vayityazebu betakhtit hahar. exodus 19:18	vehar sinai 'ashan kulo mipenei 'asher yarad 'alav yhvh ba'esh vaya'al 'ashano ke'eshen hakibshan vayekherad kal hahar me'od. exodus 19:19	vayhi qol hashofar holekh vekhazeq me'od mosheh yedaber veha'elohim ya'anenu beqol. exodus 19:20	vayeired yhvh 'al har sinai 'el rosh hahar vayiqra yhvh lemosheh 'el rosh hahar vaya'al mosheh. exodus 19:21	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh red ha'ed ba'am pen yehersu 'el yhvh lir'ot venafal mimenu rab. exodus 19:22	vegam hakohanim hanigashim 'el yhvh yitqadashu pen yifroz bahem yhvh. exodus 19:23	vayomer veha'am 'al yehersu la'alot 'el yhvh pen yifraz bam. exodus 19:25	vayeired mosheh 'el ha'am vayomer 'aleihem. exodus 20:1	vaydaber 'elohim 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh leimor. exodus 20:2	'anokhi yhvh va'asher ba'arez mitakhat va'asher bamayim mitakhat la'arez exodus 20:5	lo tishtakhveh lahem velo ta'abedem ki 'anokhi yhvh 'elohekha 'el qana poqed 'avon 'abot 'al banim 'al shileishim ve'al ribei'im 20:8	zakhor 'et yom hashabat leqadesho exodus 20:9	sheishet yamim ta'abod ve'asita kal melakhtekha exodus 20:10	veyom hashebi'i shabat yhvh 'elohekha lo ta'aseh khal melakhah 'atah ubinkha ubitekha 20:14	lo tne'af. exodus 20:15	lo tgenob. exodus 20:16	lo ta'aneh berei'akha 'ed shaqer. exodus 20:17	lo takhmod bet rei'ekha lo takhmod 'eishet rei'ekha ve'abdo va'amato veshoro vakhamoro vekhol 20:26	velo ta'aleh bema'alot 'al mizbekhi 'asher lo tigaleh 'ervatekha 'alav. exodus 21:1	ve'eleh hamishpatim 'asher tasim lifneihem. exodus 21:2	ki tiqneh 'ebed 'ibri shesh shanim ya'abod ubashebi'it zahab sabib. exodus 25:12	veyazaqta lo 'arba' tabe'ot zahab venatatah 'al 'arba' pa'amotav ushetei taba'ot 'al zal'o ha'ekhat ushetei taba'ot 'al zal'o hasheinit. exodus 25:13	ve'asita badei 'azei 25:16	venatata 'el ha'aron 'et ha'eidut 'asher 'eten 'eilekha. exodus 25:17	ve'asita khaporet zahab tahor 'amatayim vakheizi 'arekah ve'amah vakheizi rakhebah. exodus 25:18	ve'asita shenayim kerubim zahab miqshah ta'aseh 'otam mishenei qezot hakaporet. exodus 25:19	va'aseh kerub 'ekhad miqazah mizeh ukherub 'ekhad miqazah mizeh min hakaporet ta'asu 'et hakerubim 'al shenei qezotav. exodus 25:20	vehayu hakerubim poresei khenafayim lema'lah sokhekhim bekhanfeihem 'al hakaporet ufeneihem 'ish 'el 'akhiv 'el hakaporet yihyu penei hakerubim. exodus 25:21	venatata 'et hakaporet 'al ha'aron milma'elah ve'el ha'aron titen 'et ha'eidut 'asher 'eten 'eilekha. exodus 25:22	veno'adti lekha sham vedibarti 'itekha mei'al hakaporet miben shenei hakerubim 'asher 'al 'aron ha'eidut 'et kal 'asher 'azaveh 'otkha 'el benei yisra'el. exodus 25:23	ve'asita shulkhan 'azei shitim 'amatayim 'areko ve'amah rakhebo ve'amah vakheizi qomato. exodus 25:24	vezipita 'oto zahab tahor ve'asita lo zer zahab sabib. exodus 25:25	ve'asita lo misgeret tofakh sabib ve'asita zer zahab lemisgarto sabib. exodus 25:26	ve'asita lo 'arba' tabe'ot zahab venatata 'et hataba'ot 'al 'arba' hapei'ot 'asher le'arba' raglav. exodus 25:27	le'umat hamisgeret tihyena hataba'ot lebatim lebadim laset 'et hashulkhan. exodus 25:28	ve'asita 'et habadim 'azei shitim vezipita 'otam zahab venisa bam 'et hashulkhan. exodus 25:29	ve'asita qe'arotav vekhapotav uqesotav umenaqiyotav 'asher yusakh bahen zahab tahor ta'aseh 'otam. exodus 25:30	venatata 'al hashulkhan lekhem panim lefanai tamid. exodus 25:31	ve'asita menorat zahab tahor miqshah tei'aseh hamenorah yereikhah veqanah gebi'eha kaftoreha uferakheha mimenah yihyu. exodus 25:32	veshishah qanim yoze'im mizideha sheloshah qenei menorah mizidah ha'ekhad usheloshah qenei menorah mizidah hasheini. exodus 25:33	sheloshah gebi'im meshuqadim baqaneh ha'ekhad kaftor vaferakh usheloshah gebi'im meshuqadim baqaneh ha'ekhad kaftor vafarakh ken lesheishet haqanim hayoze'im min hamenorah. exodus 25:34	ubamenorah 'arba'ah gebi'im meshuqadim kaftoreha uferakheha. exodus 25:35	vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah lesheishet haqanim hayoze'im min hamenorah. exodus 25:36	kaftoreihem uqenotam mimenah yihyu kulah miqshah 'akhat zahab tahor. exodus 25:37	ve'asita 'et neiroteha shib'ah vehe'elah 'et neiroteha vehei'ir 'al 'eiber paneha. exodus 25:38	umalqakheha umakhtoteha zahab tahor. exodus 25:39	kikar zahab tahor ya'aseh 'otah 'et kal hakeilim ha'eleh. exodus 25:40	ure'eh va'aseh betabnitam 'asher 'atah mare'eh bahar. exodus 26:1	ve'et hamishkan ta'aseh 'eser yeri'ot shesh mashezar utekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani kerubim ma'aseh khosheb ta'aseh 'otam. exodus 26:2	'orekh hayri'ah ha'akhat shemoneh ve'esrim ba'amah verokhab 'arba' ba'amah hayri'ah ha'ekhat midah 'akhat lekhal hayri'ot. exodus 26:3	khamesh hayri'ot tihyena khoberot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah vekhamesh yeri'ot khoberot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah. exodus 26:4	ve'asita lul'ot tekheilet 'al sefat hayri'ah ha'ekhat miqazah bakhobaret vekhen ta'aseh bisfat hayri'ah haqizonah bamakhberet hasheinit. exodus 26:5	khamishim lula'ot ta'aseh bayri'ah ha'ekhat vakhamishim lula'ot ta'aseh biqzeh hayri'ah 'asher bamakhberet hasheinit maqbilot halula'ot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah. exodus 26:6	ve'asita khamishim qarsei zahab vekhibarta 'et hayri'ot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah baqerasim vehayah hamishkan 'ekhad. exodus 26:7	ve'asita yeri'ot 'izim le'ohel 'al hamishkan 'ashtei 'esreh yeri'ot ta'aseh 'otam. exodus 26:8	'orekh hayri'ah ha'akhat sheloshim ba'amah verokhab 'arba' ba'amah hayri'ah ha'ekhat midah 'akhat le'ashtei 'esreh yeri'ot. exodus 26:9	vekhibarta 'et khamesh hayri'ot lebad ve'et shesh hayri'ot lebad vekhafalta 'et hayri'ah hashishit 'el mul penei ha'ohel. exodus 26:10	ve'asita khamishim lula'ot 'al sefat hayri'ah ha'ekhat haqizonah bakhobaret vakhamishim lula'ot 'al sefat hayri'ah hakhoberet hasheinit. exodus 26:11	ve'asita qarsei nekhoshet khamishim veheibeita 'et haqerasim balula'ot vekhibarta 'et ha'ohel vehayah 'ekhad. exodus 26:12	veserakh ha'odef biri'ot ha'ohel khazi hayri'ah ha'odefet tisrakh 'al 'akhorei hamishkan. exodus 26:13	veha'amah mizeh veha'amah mizeh ba'odef be'orekh yeri'ot ha'ohel yihyeh saruakh 'al zidei hamishkan mizeh umizeh lekhasoto. exodus 26:14	ve'asita mikhseh la'ohel 'orot 'eilim me'adamim umikhseh 'orot tekhashim milma'elah. exodus 26:15	ve'asita 'et haqerashim lamishkan 'azei shitim 'omedim. exodus 26:16	'eser 'amot 'orekh haqaresh ve'amah vakhazi ha'amah rokhab haqeresh ha'ekhad. exodus 26:17	shetei yadot laqeresh ha'ekhad meshulabot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah ken ta'aseh lekhol qarshei hamishkan. exodus 26:18	ve'asita 'et haqerashim lamishkan 'esrim qeresh lif'at negbah teimanah. exodus 26:19	ve'arba'im 'adnei khesef ta'aseh takhat 'esrim haqaresh shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad lishtei yedotav ushenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad lishtei yedotav. exodus 26:20	ulezela' hamishkan hasheinit lif'at zafon 'esrim qaresh. exodus 26:21	ve'arba'im 'adneihem kasef shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad ushenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad. exodus 26:22	uleyarketei hamishkan yamah ta'aseh shishah qerashim. exodus 26:23	ushenei qerashim ta'aseh limquz'ot hamishkan bayarkhatayim. exodus 26:24	veyihyu to'amim milematah veyakhdav yihyu tamim 'al rosho 'el hataba'at ha'ekhat ken yihyeh lishneihem lishnei hamiqzo'ot yihyu. exodus 26:25	vehayu shemonah qerashim ve'adneihem kesef shishah 'asar 'adanim shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad ushenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad. exodus 26:26	ve'asita berikhim 'azei shitim khamishah leqarshei zela' hamishkan ha'ekhad. exodus 26:27	vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei zela' hamishkan hasheinit vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei zela' hamishkan layarkhatayim yamah. exodus 26:28	vehaberiakh hatikhon betokh haqerashim mabriakh min haqazeh 'el haqazeh. exodus 26:29	ve'et haqerashim tezapeh zahab ve'et tabe'oteihem ta'aseh zahab batim laberikhim vezipita 'et haberikhim zahab. exodus 26:30	vahaqeimota 'et hamishkan kemishpato 'asher hare'eita bahar. exodus 26:31	ve'asita farokhet tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ma'aseh khosheb ya'aseh 'otah kerubim. exodus 26:32	venatatah 'otah 'al 'arba'ah 'amudei shitim mezupim zahab vaveihem zahab 'al 'arba'ah 'adnei khasef. exodus 26:33	venatatah 'et haparokhet takhat haqerasim veheibeita shamah mibet laparokhet 'et 'aron ha'eidut vehibdilah haparokhet lakhem ben haqodesh uben qodesh haqodashim. exodus 26:34	venatata 'et hakaporet 'al 'aron ha'eidut beqodesh haqodashim. exodus 26:35	vesamta 'et hashulkhan mikhuz laparokhet ve'et hamenorah nokhakh hashulkhan 'al zela' hamishkan teimanah vehashulkhan titen 'al zela' zafon. exodus 26:36	ve'asita masakh lefetakh ha'ohel tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ma'aseh roqem. exodus 26:37	ve'asita lamasakh khamishah yihyeh hamizbeiakh veshalosh 'amot qomato. exodus 27:2	ve'asita qarnotav 'al 'arba' pinotav mimenu tihyena qarnotav vezipita 'oto nekhoshet. exodus 27:3	ve'asita sirotav ledasheno veya'av umizreqotav umizlegotav umakhtotav lekhal keilav ta'aseh nekhoshet. exodus 27:4	ve'asita lo mikhbar ma'aseh reshet nekhoshet ve'asita 'al hareshet 'arba' tabe'ot nekhoshet 'al 'arba' qezotav. exodus 27:5	venatatah 'otah takhat karkob hamizbeiakh milematah vehayetah hareshet 'ad khazi hamizbeiakh. exodus 27:6	ve'asita badim lamizbeiakh badei 'azei shitim vezipita 'otam nekhoshet. exodus 27:7	vehuba 'et badav bataba'ot vehayu habadim 'al shetei zal'ot hamizbeiakh bis'et 'oto. exodus 27:8	nebub lukhot ta'aseh 'oto ka'asher her'ah 'otekha bahar ken ya'asu. exodus 27:9	ve'asita 'et vakhashuqeihem kasef. exodus 27:11	vekhen lif'at zafon ba'orekh qela'im mei'ah 'orekh ve'amdu ve'amudav 'esrim ve'adneihem 'esrim nekhoshet vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kasef. exodus 27:12	verokhab ve'adneihem nekhoshet. exodus 27:18	'orekh hekhazer mei'ah ba'amah verokhab khamishim bakhamishim veqomah khamesh 'amot shesh mashezar ve'adneihem nekhoshet. exodus 27:19	lekhol kelei hamishkan bekhol 'abodato vekhal yeteidotav vekhal yitdot hekhazer nekhoshet. exodus 27:20	ve'atah tezaveh 'et benei yisra'el veyiqkhu 'eilekha shemen zayit zakh katit lama'or leha'alot ner tamid. exodus 27:21	be'ohel mo'ed mikhuz laparokhet 'asher 'al ha'eidut ya'arokh 'oto 'aharon ubanav mei'ereb 'ad boqer lifnei yhvh khuqat 'olam ledorotam mei'et benei yisra'el. exodus 28:1	ve'atah haqreb 'eilekha 'et 'aharon 28:3	ve'atah tedaber 'el kal khakhmei leb 'asher mileitiv ruakh khakhmah ve'asu 'et bigdei 'aharon leqadesho lekhahano li. exodus 28:4	ve'eleh habegadim 'asher ya'asu khoshen ve'eifod ume'il ukhetonet 28:8	vekheisheb 'afudato 'asher 'alav kema'aseihu mimenu yihyeh zahab tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar. exodus 28:9	velaqakhta 'et shetei 'abnei shoham ufitakhta 'aleihem shemot ha'abotot 'al hamishbezot. exodus 28:15	ve'asita khoshen mishpat ma'aseh khosheb kema'aseh 'eifod ta'asenu zahab tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ta'aseh 'oto. exodus 28:16	rabua' yihyeh kaful zeret 'areko vezeret rakhebo. exodus 28:17	umileita bo milu'at 'eben 'arba'ah turim 'aben tur 'odem pitdah ubareqet hatur ha'ekhad. exodus 28:18	vehatur hasheini nofekh sapir veyahalom. hakhoshen 'al sefato 'asher 'el 'eiber ha'eifod bayetah. exodus 28:27	ve'asita shetei tabe'ot zahab venatatah 'otam 'al shetei khitfot ha'eifod milematah mimul panav le'umat mekhbarto mima'al 28:29	venasa 'aharon 'et shemot benei yisra'el bekhoshen hamishpat 'al libo bebo'o 'el haqodesh lezikaron lifnei yhvh tamid. exodus 28:30	venatata 'el khoshen hamishpat 'et ha'urim ve'et hatumim
