betokho safah yihyeh lefiv sabib ma'aseh 'oreg kefi takhra yihyeh lo lo yiqareia'. exodus 28:33	ve'asita 'al shulav rimonei tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani 'al shulav sabib ufa'amonei zahab betokham sabib. exodus 28:34	pa'amon zahab verimon pa'amon zahab verimon 'al shulei hame'il sabib. exodus 28:35	vehayah 'al 'aharon lesharet venishma' qolo bebo'o 'el haqodesh lifnei yhvh ubezeito velo yamut. exodus 28:36	ve'asita ziz zahab tahor ufitakhta 'alav pitukhei khotam qodesh yhvh. exodus 28:37	vesamta 'oto 'al petil tekheilet vehayah 'al hamiznafet 'el mul penei hamiznefet yihyeh. 28:39	veshibazta haketonet shesh ve'asita miznefet shesh ve'abnet ta'aseh ma'aseh roqem. exodus 28:40	velibnei 'aharon ta'aseh khutonot ve'asita lahem 'abneitim umigba'ot ta'aseh lahem lekhabod 'olam lo ulezar'o 'akharav. exodus 29:1	vezeh hadabar 'asher ta'aseh lahem leqadesh 'otam lekhahen li leqakh par 'ekhad ben baqar ve'eilim shenayim temimim. exodus 29:2	velekhem mazot vekhalot mazot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen solet khitim ta'aseh 'otam. exodus 29:3	venatata 'otam 'al sal 'ekhad vehiqrabta 'otam basal ve'et hapar ve'et shenei ha'eilim. exodus 29:4	ve'et 'aharon ve'et banav taqrib 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed verakhazta 'otam bamayim. exodus 29:5	velaqakhta 'et habegadim vehilbashta 'et 'aharon 'et hakutonet ve'et me'il ha'eifod ve'et ha'eifod ve'et 'aharon veyad banav. exodus 29:10	vehiqrabta 'et hapar lifnei 'ohel mo'ed vesamakh 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh hapar. exodus 29:11	veshakhata 'et hapar lifnei yhvh petakh 'ohel mo'ed. exodus 29:12	velaqakhta midam hapar venatatah 'al qarnot hamizbeiakh be'ezba'ekha ve'et kal hadam tishpokh 'el yesod hamizbeiakh. exodus 29:13	velaqakhta 'et kal hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb ve'et exodus 29:15	ve'et ha'ayil ha'ekhad tiqakh vesamekhu 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh ha'ayil. exodus 29:16	veshakhata 'et ha'ayil velaqakhta 'et damo vezaraqta 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. exodus 29:17	ve'et ha'ayil tenateiakh lintakhav verakhazta qirbo ukhera'av venatata 'al netakhav ve'al rosho. exodus 29:18	vehiqtarta 'et kal ha'ayil hamizbeikhah 'olah hu yhvh reiakh nikhoakh 'isheh yhvh hu. exodus 29:19	velaqakhta 'et ha'ayil hasheini vesamakh 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh ha'ayil. exodus 29:20	veshakhata 'et ha'ayil velaqakhta midamo venatatah 'al tenukh 'ozen 'aharon ve'al tenukh 'ozen banav haymanit ve'al bohen yadam haymanit ve'al bohen raglam haymanit vezaraqta 'et hadam 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. exodus 29:21	velaqakhta min hadam 'asher 'al hamizbeiakh umishemen hamishkhah vehizeita 'al 'aharon ve'al begadav ve'al banav ve'al bigdei banav 'ito veqadash hu ubegadav ubanav ubigdei banav 'ito. exodus 29:22	velaqakhta min ha'ayil hakheileb veha'alyah ve'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb ve'et yoteret hakabed ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen ve'et shoq hayamin ki 'el milu'im hu. exodus 29:23	vekhikar lekhem 'akhat vakhalat lekhem shemen 'akhat veraqiq 'ekhad misal hamazot 'asher lifnei yhvh. exodus 29:24	vesamta hakol 'al kapei 'aharon ve'al kapei banav veheinafta 'otam tenufah lifnei yhvh. exodus 29:25	velaqakhta 'otam miyadam vehiqtarta hamizbeikhah 'al ha'olah lereiakh nikhoakh lifnei yhvh 'isheh hu yhvh. exodus 29:26	velaqakhta 'et hekhazeh mei'el hamilu'im 'asher le'aharon veheinafta 'oto tenufah lifnei yhvh vehayah lekha lemanah. exodus 29:27	veqidashta 'et khazeh hatenufah ve'et shoq haterumah 'asher hunaf va'asher huram mei'el hamilu'im mei'asher le'aharon umei'asher lebanav. exodus 29:28	vehayah le'aharon ulebanav lekhaq 'olam mei'et benei yisra'el ki terumah hu uterumah yihyeh mei'et benei yisra'el mizibkhei shalmeihem terumatam yhvh. exodus 29:29	ubigdei haqodesh 'asher le'aharon yihyu lebanav 'akharav lemashekhah bahem ulemalei bam 'et yadam. exodus 29:30	shib'at yamim yilbasham hakohen takhtav mibanav 'asher yabo 'el 'ohel mo'ed lesharet baqodesh. exodus 29:31	ve'et 'el hamilu'im tiqakh ubishalta 'et besaro bemaqom qadosh. exodus 29:32	ve'akhal 'aharon ubanav 'et besar ha'ayil ve'et halekhem 'asher basal petakh 'ohel mo'ed. exodus 29:33	ve'akhelu 'otam 'asher kupar bahem lemalei 'et yadam leqadesh 'otam vezar lo yokhal ki qodesh hem. exodus 29:34	ve'im yivater mibesar hamilu'im umin halekhem 'ad haboqer vesarafta 'et hanotar ba'esh lo yei'akhel ki qodesh hu. exodus 29:35	ve'asita le'aharon ulebanav kakhah kekhol 'asher ziviti 'otakhah shib'at yamim temalei yadam. exodus 29:36	ufar khatat ta'aseh layom 'al hakipurim vekhiteita 'al hamizbeiakh bekhaperkha 'alav umashakhta 'oto leqadesho. exodus 29:37	shib'at yamim tekhaper 'al hamizbeiakh veqidashta 'oto vehayah hamizbeiakh qodesh qadashim kal hanogeia' bamizbeiakh yiqdash. exodus 29:38	vezeh 'asher ta'aseh 'al hamizbeiakh kebasim benei shanah shenayim layom tamid. exodus 29:39	'et hakebes ha'ekhad ta'aseh baboqer ve'et hakebes hasheini ta'aseh ben ha'arbayim. exodus 29:40	ve'isaron solet balul beshemen katit reba' hahin veneisekh rebi'it hahin yayin lakebes ha'ekhad. exodus 29:41	ve'et hakebes hasheini ta'aseh ben ha'arbayim keminkhat haboqer ukheniskah ta'aseh lah lereiakh nikhoakh 'isheh yhvh. exodus 29:42	'olat tamid ledoroteikhem petakh 'ohel mo'ed lifnei yhvh 'asher 'iva'ed lakhem shamah ledaber 'eilekha sham. exodus 29:43	veno'adti shamah libnei yisra'el veniqdash bikhbodi. exodus 29:44	veqidashti 'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et hamizbeiakh ve'et 'aharon ve'et banav 'aqadesh lekhahen li. exodus 29:45	veshakhanti betokh benei yisra'el vehayiti lahem leilohim. exodus 29:46	veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheihem 'asher hozeiti 'otam mei'erez mizrayim leshakheni betokham 'ani yhvh 'eloheihem. exodus 30:1	ve'asita mizbeiakh miqtar qetoret 'azei shitim ta'aseh 'oto. exodus 30:2	'amah 'areko ve'amah rakhebo rabua' yihyeh ve'amatayim qomato mimenu qarnotav. exodus 30:3	vezipita 'oto zahab tahor 'et gago ve'et qirotav sabib ve'et qarnotav ve'asita lo zer zahab sabib. exodus 30:4	ushetei tabe'ot zahab ta'aseh lo mitakhat lezeiro 'al shetei zal'otav ta'aseh 'al shenei zidav vehayah lebatim lebadim laset 'oto bahemah. exodus 30:5	ve'asita 'et habadim 'azei shitim vezipita 'otam zahab. exodus 30:6	venatatah 'oto lifnei haparokhet 'asher 'al 'aron ha'eidut lifnei hakaporet 'asher 'al ha'eidut 'asher 'iva'ed lekha shamah. exodus 30:7	vehiqtir 'alav 'aharon qetoret samim baboqer baboqer beheitibo 'et haneirot yaqtirenah. exodus 30:8	ubeha'alot 'aharon 'et haneirot ben ha'arbayim yaqtirenah qetoret tamid lifnei yhvh ledoroteikhem. exodus 30:9	lo ta'alu 'alav qetoret zarah ve'olah uminkhah veneisekh lo tisekhu 'alav. exodus 30:10	vekhiper 'aharon 'al qarnotav 'akhat bashanah midam khatat hakipurim 'akhat bashanah yekhaper 'alav ledoroteikhem qodesh qadashim hu yhvh. exodus 30:11	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. exodus 30:12	ki tisa 'et rosh benei yisra'el lifqudeihem venatenu 'ish kofer nafsho yhvh bifqod 'otam velo yihyeh bahem negef bifqod 'otam. exodus 30:13	zeh yitenu kal ha'ober 'al hapequdim makhazit hasheqel besheqel haqodesh 'esrim geirah hasheqel makhazit hasheqel terumah yhvh. exodus 30:14	kol ha'ober 'al hapequdim miben 'esrim shanah vama'elah yiten terumat yhvh. exodus 30:15	he'ashir lo yarbeh vehadal lo yam'it mimakhazit hashaqel latet 'et terumat yhvh lekhaper 'al nafshoteikhem. exodus 30:16	velaqakhta 'et kesef hakipurim mei'et benei yisra'el venatata 'oto 'al 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed vehayah libnei yisra'el lezikaron lifnei yhvh lekhaper 'al nafshoteikhem. exodus 30:17	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. exodus 30:18	ve'asita kiyor nekhoshet vekhano nekhoshet lerakhezah venatata 'oto ben 'ohel mo'ed uben hamizbeiakh venatata shamah mayim. exodus 30:19	verakhazu 'aharon ubanav mimenu 'et yedeihem ve'et ragleihem. exodus 30:20	bebo'am 'el 'ohel mo'ed yirkhazu mayim velo yamutu 'o begishtam 'el hamizbeiakh lesharet lehaqtir 'isheh yhvh. exodus 30:21	verakhazu yedeihem veragleihem velo yamutu vehayetah lahem khaq 'olam lo ulezar'o ledorotam. exodus 30:22	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. exodus 30:23	ve'atah qakh lekha besamim rosh mar deror khamesh mei'ot veqineman besem makhazito khamishim umatayim uqeneh bosem khamishim umatayim. exodus 30:24	veqidah khamesh mei'ot besheqel haqodesh veshemen zayit hin. exodus 30:25	ve'asita 'oto men mishkhat qodesh roqakh mirqakhat ma'aseh roqeiakh shemen mishkhat qodesh yihyeh. exodus 30:26	umashakhta bo 'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et 'aron ha'eidut. exodus 30:27	ve'et hashulkhan ve'et kal keilav ve'et hamenorah ve'et keileha ve'et mizbakh haqetoret. exodus 30:28	ve'et mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal keilav ve'et hakiyor ve'et kano. exodus 30:29	veqidashta 'otam vehayu qodesh qadashim kal hanogeia' bahem yiqdash. exodus 30:30	ve'et 'aharon ve'et banav timshakh veqidashta 'otam lekhahen li. exodus 30:31	ve'el benei yisra'el tedaber leimor men mishkhat qodesh yihyeh zeh li ledoroteikhem. exodus 30:32	'al besar 'adam lo yisakh ubematkunto lo ta'asu kamohu qodesh hu qodesh yihyeh lakhem. exodus 30:33	'ish 'asher yirqakh kamohu va'asher yiten mimenu 'al zar venikhrat mei'amav. exodus 30:34	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh qakh lekha samim nataf ushekheilet vekhelbenah samim ulebonah zakah bad bebad yihyeh. exodus 30:35	ve'asita 'otah qetoret roqakh ma'aseh roqeiakh memulakh tahor qodesh. exodus 30:36	veshakhaqta mimenah hadeq venatatah mimenah lifnei ha'eidut be'ohel mo'ed 'asher 'iva'ed lekha shamah qodesh qadashim tihyeh lakhem. exodus 30:37	vehaqetoret 'asher ta'aseh bematkuntah lo ta'asu lakhem qodesh tihyeh lekha yhvh. exodus 30:38	'ish 'asher ya'aseh khamoha lehariakh bah venikhrat mei'amav. exodus 31:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. exodus 31:2	re'eh qarati beshem bezal'el ben 'uri ben khur lemateh yehudah. exodus 31:3	va'amalei 'oto ruakh 'elohim bekhakhemah ubitbunah ubeda'at ubekhal melakhah. exodus 31:4	lakhshob makhashabot la'asot bazahab ubakesef ubanekhoshet. exodus 31:5	ubakharoshet 'eben lemalot ubakharoshet 'ez la'asot bekhal melakhah. exodus 31:6	va'ani hineh natati 'ito 'et 'aholi'ab ben 'akhisamakh lemateh dan ubeleb kal khakham leb natati khakhmah ve'asu 'et kal 'asher zivitikha. exodus 31:7	'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et ha'aron la'eidut ve'et hakaporet 'asher 'alav ve'et kal kelei ha'ohel. exodus 31:8	ve'et hashulkhan ve'et keilav ve'et hamenorah hatehorah ve'et kal keileha ve'et mizbakh haqetoret. exodus 31:9	ve'et mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal keilav ve'et hakiyor ve'et kano. exodus 31:10	ve'et bigdei haserad ve'et bigdei haqodesh le'aharon hakohen ve'et bigdei banav lekhahen. exodus 31:11	ve'et shemen hamishkhah ve'et qetoret hasamim laqodesh kekhol 'asher zivitikha ya'asu. exodus 31:12	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. exodus 31:13	ve'atah daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor 'akh 'et shabetotai tishmoru ki 'ot hi beini ubeineikhem ledoroteikhem lada'at ki 'ani yhvh meqadishkhem. exodus 31:14	ushemartem 'et hashabat ki qodesh hi lakhem mekhaleha mot yumat ki kal ha'oseh bah melakhah venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miqereb 'ameha. exodus 31:15	sheishet yamim yei'aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi'i shabat shabaton qodesh yhvh kal ha'oseh melakhah beyom hashabat mot yumat. exodus 31:16	veshameru benei yisra'el 'et hashabat la'asot 'et hashabat ledorotam berit 'olam. exodus 31:17	beini uben benei yisra'el 'ot hi le'olam ki sheishet yamim 'asah yhvh 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez ubayom hashebi'i shabat vayinafash. exodus 31:18	vayiten 'el mosheh kekhaloto ledaber 'ito behar sinai shenei lukhot ha'eidut lukhot 'eben ketubim be'ezba' 'elohim. exodus 32:1	vayar ha'am ki boshesh mosheh laredet min hahar vayiqahel ha'am 'al 'aharon vayomeru 'eilav qum 'aseh lanu 'elohim 'asher yeilekhu lefaneinu ki zeh mosheh ha'ish 'asher he'elanu mei'erez mizrayim lo yada'nu meh hayah lo. exodus 32:2	vayomer 'aleihem 'aharon parequ nizmei hazahab 'asher be'azenei nesheikhem beneikhem ubenoteikhem vehabi'u 'eilai. exodus 32:3	vayitparequ kal ha'am 'et nizmei hazahab 'asher be'azeneihem vayabi'u 'el 'aharon. exodus 32:4	vayiqakh miyadam vayazar 'oto bakheret vaya'aseihu 'eigel maseikhah vayomeru 'eleh 'elohekha yisra'el 'asher he'elukha mei'erez mizrayim. exodus 32:5	vayar 'aharon vayiben mizbeiakh lefanav vayiqra 'aharon vayomar khag yhvh makhar. exodus 32:6	vayashkimu mimakhorat vaya'alu 'olot vayagishu shelamim vayeisheb ha'am le'ekhol veshato vayaqumu lezakheq. exodus 32:7	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh lekh red ki shikhet 'amekha 'asher he'eleita mei'erez mizrayim. exodus 32:8	saru maher min haderekh 'asher zivitim 'asu lahem 'eigel maseikhah vayishtakhavu lo vayizbekhu lo vayomeru 'eleh 'elohekha yisra'el 'asher he'elukha mei'erez mizrayim. exodus 32:9	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh ra'iti 'et ha'am hazeh vehineh 'am qesheh 'oref hu. exodus 32:10	ve'atah hanikhah li veyikhar 'api bahem va'akhalem ve'e'eseh 'otkha lego gadol. exodus 32:11	vaykhal mosheh 'et penei yhvh 'elohav vayomer lamah yhvh yekhereh 'apekha be'amekha 'asher hozeita mei'erez mizrayim bekhoakh gadol ubeyad khazaqah. exodus 32:12	lamah yomeru mizrayim leimor bera'ah hozi'am laharog 'otam beharim ulekhalotam mei'al penei ha'adamah ub meikharon 'apekha vehinakhem 'al hara'ah le'amekha. exodus 32:13	zekhor le'abraham leyizkhaq uleyisra'el 'abadekha 'asher nishba'ta lahem bakh vatedaber 'aleihem 'arbeh 'et zar'akhem kekhokhbei hashamayim vekhal ha'arez hazot 'asher 'amarti 'eten lezar'akhem venakhalu le'olam. exodus 32:14	vayinakhem yhvh 'al hara'ah 'asher diber la'asot le'amo. exodus 32:15	vayifen vayeired mosheh min hahar ushenei lukhot ha'eidut beyado lukhot ketubim mishenei 'ebreihem mizeh umizeh hem ketubim. exodus 32:16	vehalukhot ma'aseh 'elohim hemah vehamikhtab mikhtab 'elohim hu kharut 'al halukhot. exodus 32:17	vayishma' yehoshua' 'et qol ha'am berei'oh vayomer 'el mosheh qol milkhamah bamakhaneh exodus 32:18	vayomer 'en qol 'anot geburah ve'en qol 'anot khalushah qol 'anot 'anokhi shomeia'. exodus 32:19	vayhi ka'asher qarab 'el hamakhaneh vayar 'et ha'eigel umekholot vayikhar 'af mosheh vayashlekh miyado miyadav 'et halukhot vayshaber 'otam takhat hahar. exodus 32:20	vayiqakh 'et ha'eigel 'asher 'asu vayisrof ba'esh vayitkhan 'ad 'asher daq vayizer 'al penei hamayim vayashq 'et benei yisra'el. exodus 32:21	vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon meh 'asah lekha ha'am hazeh ki heibeita 'alav khata'ah gedolah. exodus 32:22	vayomer 'aharon 'al yikhar 'af 'adoni 'atah yada'ta 'et ha'am ki bera' hu. exodus 32:23	vayomeru li 'aseh lanu 'elohim 'asher yeilekhu lefaneinu ki zeh mosheh ha'ish 'asher he'elanu mei'erez mizrayim lo yada'nu meh hayah lo. exodus 32:24	va'omar lahem lemi zahab hitparaqu vayitenu li va'ashlikheihu ba'esh vayeizei ha'eigel hazeh. exodus 32:25	vayar mosheh 'et ha'am ki farua' hu ki fera'oh 'aharon leshimzah beqameihem. exodus 32:26	vaya'amod mosheh besha'ar hamakhaneh vayomer mi yhvh 'eilai vayei'asefu 'eilav kal benei leivi. exodus 32:27	vayomer lahem koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el simu 'ish kharbo 'al yereikho 'ibru exodus 32:29	vayomer mosheh mil'u yedkhem hayom yhvh ki 'ish bibno ube'akhiv velatet 'aleikhem hayom berakhah. exodus 32:30	vayhi mimakhorat vayomer mosheh 'el ha'am 'atem khatatem khata'ah gedolah ve'atah 'e'eleh 'el yhvh 'ulai 'akhaperah be'ad khatatkhem. exodus 32:31	vayashab mosheh 'el yhvh vayomar 'ana khata ha'am hazeh khata'ah gedolah vaya'asu lahem 'elohei zahab. exodus 32:32	ve'atah 'im tisa khatatam ve'im 'ayin mekheini na misifrekha 'asher katabeta. exodus 32:33	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh mi 'asher khata li 'emkhenu misifri. exodus 32:34	ve'atah lekh nekheh 'et ha'am 'el 'asher 'e'eleh beqirbekha vekhilitikha ve'atah hored 'edyekha mei'alekha ve'eide'ah mah 'e'eseh lakh. exodus 33:6	vayitnazelu benei yisra'el 'et 'edyam meihar khoreb. exodus 33:7	umosheh yiqakh 'et ha'ohel venatah lo mikhuz lamakhaneh harkheq min hamakhaneh veqara lo 'ohel mo'ed vehayah kal mebaqesh yhvh yeizei 'el 'ohel mo'ed 'asher mikhuz lamakhaneh. exodus 33:8	vehayah kezet mosheh 'el ha'ohel yaqumu kal ha'am venizebu 'ish petakh 'aholo vehibitu 'akharei mosheh 'ad bo'o ha'ohelah. exodus 33:9	vehayah kebo mosheh ha'ohelah yeired 'amud he'anan ve'amad petakh ha'ohel vediber 'im mosheh. exodus 33:10	vera'ah khal ha'am 'et 'amud he'anan 'omed petakh ha'ohel veqam kal ha'am vehishtakhavu 'ish petakh 'aholo. exodus 33:11	vediber yhvh 'el mosheh panim 'el panim ka'asher yedaber 'ish 'el rei'eihu veshab 'el hamakhaneh umeshareto yehoshua' bin nun na'ar lo yamish mitokh ha'ohel. exodus 33:12	vayomer mosheh 'el yhvh re'eh 'atah 'omer 'eilai ha'al 'et ha'am hazeh ve'atah lo hoda'tani 'et 'asher tishlakh 'imi ve'atah 'amarta yeda'tikha beshem vegam mazata khen be'einai. exodus 33:13	ve'atah 'im na mazati khen be'einekha hodi'eini na 'et derakhekha ve'eida'akha lema'an 'emza khen be'einekha ure'eh ki 'amekha hago hazeh. exodus 33:14	vayomar panai yeileikhu vahanikhoti lakh. exodus 33:15	vayomer 'eilav 'im 'en panekha holekhim 'al ta'aleinu mizeh. exodus 33:16	ubameh yivada' 'eifo ki mazati khen be'einekha 'ani ve'amekha halo belekhtekha 'imanu venifleinu 'ani ve'amekha mikal ha'am 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah. exodus 33:17	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh gam 'et hadabar hazeh 'asher dibarta 'e'eseh ki mazata khen be'einai va'eida'akha beshem. exodus 33:18	vayomar har'eini na 'et kebodekha. exodus 33:19	vayomer 'ani 'a'abir kal tubi 'al panekha veqarati beshem yhvh lefanekha vekhanoti 'et 'asher 'akhon verikhamti 'et 'asher 'arakhem. exodus 33:20	vayomer lo tukhal lir'ot 'et panai ki lo yir'ani ha'adam vakhai. exodus 33:21	vayomer yhvh hineh maqom 'iti venizabta 34:1	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh pesal lekha shenei lukhot 'abanim karishonim vekhatabti 'al halukhot 'et hadebarim 'asher hayu 'al halukhot harishonim 'asher shibarta. exodus 34:2	vehyeh nakhon laboqer ve'alita baboqer 'el har sinai venizabta li sham 'al rosh hahar. exodus 34:3	ve'ish lo ya'aleh 'imakh vegam 'ish 'al yeira bekhal hahar gam hazon vehabaqar 'al yir'u 'el mul hahar hahu. exodus 34:4	vayifsol shenei lukhot 'abanim karishonim vayashkem mosheh baboqer vaya'al 'el har sinai ka'asher zivah yhvh 'oto vayiqakh beyado shenei lukhot 'abanim. exodus 34:5	vayeired yhvh be'anan vayityazeb 'imo sham vayiqra beshem yhvh. exodus 34:6	vaya'abor yhvh 'al panav vayiqra yhvh yhvh 'el rakhum vekhanun 'erekh 'apayim verab khesed ve'emet. exodus 34:7	nozer khesed la'alafim nosei 'avon vafesha' vekhata'ah venaqeh lo yenaqeh poqed 'avon 'abot 'al banim ve'al benei banim 'al shileishim ve'al ribei'im. exodus 34:8	vaymaher mosheh vayiqod 'arzah vayishtakhu. exodus 34:9	vayomer 'im na mazati khen be'einekha 'adonai yeilekh na 'adonai beqirbeinu ki 'am qesheh 'oref hu vesalakhta la'avoneinu ulekhatateinu unekhaltanu. exodus 34:10	vayomer hineh 'anokhi koret berit neged kal 'amekha 'e'eseh nifla'ot 'asher lo nibre'u bekhal ha'arez ubekhal hagoyim vera'ah khal ha'am 'asher 'atah beqirbo 'et ma'aseh yhvh ki nora hu 'asher 'ani 'oseh 'imakh. exodus 34:11	shemar lekha 'et 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom hini goresh mipanekha 'et ha'emori vehakena'ani vehakhiti vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi. exodus 34:12	hishamer lekha pen tikhrot berit leyosheb ha'arez 'asher 'atah ba 'aleha pen yihyeh lemoqesh beqirbekha. exodus 34:13	ki 'et mizbekhotam titozun ve'et mazeibotam teshabeirun ve'et 'asheirav tikhrotun. exodus 34:14	ki lo tishtakhaveh le'el 'akher ki yhvh qana shemo 'el qana hu. exodus 34:15	pen tikhrot berit leyosheb ha'arez vezanu 'akharei 'eloheihem vezabekhu leiloheihem veqara lekha ve'akhalta mizibkho. exodus 34:16	velaqakhta mibenotav lebanekha vezanu benotav 'akharei 'eloheihen vehiznu 'et banekha 'akharei 'eloheihen. exodus 34:17	'elohei maseikhah lo ta'aseh lakh. exodus 34:18	'et khag hamazot tishmor shib'at yamim tokhal mazot 'asher zivitikha lemo'ed khodesh ha'abib ki bekhodesh ha'abib yazata mimizrayim. exodus 34:19	kal peter rekhem li vekhal miqnekha tizakhar peter shor vaseh. exodus 34:20	ufeter khamor tifdeh beseh ve'im lo tifdeh va'arafto kol bekhor banekha tifdeh velo yeira'u fanai reiqam. exodus 34:21	sheishet yamim ta'abod ubayom hashebi'i tishbot bekharish ubaqazir tishbot. exodus 34:22	vekhag shabu'ot ta'aseh lekha bikurei qezir khitim vekhag ha'asif tequfat hashanah. exodus 34:23	shalosh pe'amim bashanah yeira'eh kal zekhurekha 'et penei ha'adon yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. exodus 34:24	ki 'orish goyim mipanekha vehirkhabti 'et gebulekha velo yakhmod 'ish 'et 'arzekha ba'alotekha leira'ot 'et penei yhvh 'elohekha shalosh pe'amim bashanah. exodus 34:25	lo tishkhat 'al khamez dam zibkhi velo yalin laboqer zebakh khag hapasakh. exodus 34:26	reishit bikurei 'admatekha tabi bet yhvh 'elohekha lo tebashel gedi bakhaleb 'imo. exodus 34:27	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh ketab lekha 'et hadebarim ha'eleh ki 'al pi hadebarim ha'eleh karati 'itekha berit ve'et yisra'el. exodus 34:28	vayhi sham 'im yhvh 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im laylah lekhem lo 'akhal umayim lo shatah vayikhtob 'al halukhot 'et dibrei haberit 'aseret hadebarim. exodus 34:29	vayhi beredet mosheh meihar sinai ushenei lukhot ha'eidut beyad mosheh beridto min hahar umosheh lo yada' ki qaran 'or panav bedabero 'ito. exodus 34:30	vayar 'aharon vekhal benei yisra'el 'et mosheh vehineh qaran 'or panav vayire'u migeshet 'eilav. exodus 34:31	vayiqra 'aleihem mosheh vayashubu 'eilav 'aharon vekhal hanesi'im ba'eidah vaydaber mosheh 'aleihem. exodus 34:32	ve'akharei khen nigeshu kal benei yisra'el vayzavem 'et kal 'asher diber yhvh 'ito behar sinai. exodus 34:33	vaykhal mosheh midaber 'itam vayiten 'al panav masveh. exodus 34:34	ubebo mosheh lifnei yhvh ledaber 'ito yasir 'et hamasveh 'ad zeito veyaza vediber 'el benei yisra'el 'et 'asher yezuveh. exodus 34:35	vera'u benei yisra'el 'et penei mosheh ki qaran 'or penei mosheh veheishib mosheh 'et hamasveh 'al panav 'ad bo'o ledaber 'ito. exodus 35:1	vayaqhel mosheh 'et kal 'adat benei yisra'el vayomer 'aleihem 'eleh hadebarim 'asher zivah yhvh la'asot 'otam. exodus 35:2	sheishet yamim tei'aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi'i yihyeh lakhem qodesh shabat shabaton yhvh kal ha'oseh bo melakhah yumat. exodus 35:3	lo teba'aru 'esh bekhol mosheboteikhem beyom hashabat. exodus 35:4	vayomer mosheh 'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el leimor zeh hadabar 'asher zivah yhvh leimor. exodus 35:5	qekhu mei'itekhem terumah yhvh kol nedib libo yebi'eha 'et terumat yhvh zahab vakhesef unekhoshet. exodus 35:6	utekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh ve'izim. exodus 35:7	ve'orot 'eilim me'adamim ve'orot tekhashim va'azei sitim exodus 35:8	veshemen lama'or ubesamim leshemen hamishkhah veliqtoret hasamim. exodus 35:9	ve'abnei shoham ve'abnei milu'im la'eifod velakhoshen. exodus 35:10	vekhal khakham leb bakhem yabo'u veya'asu 'et kal 'asher zivah yhvh. exodus 35:11	'et hamishkan 'et 'aholo ve'et mikhseihu 'et qerasav ve'et qerashav 'et berikhav 'et 'amudav ve'et 'adanav. exodus 35:12	'et ha'aron ve'et badav 'et hakaporet ve'et parokhet hamasakh. exodus 35:13	'et hashulkhan ve'et badav ve'et kal keilav ve'et lekhem hapanim. exodus 35:14	ve'et menorat hama'or ve'et keileha ve'et neiroteha ve'et shemen hama'or. exodus 35:15	ve'et mizbakh haqetoret ve'et badav ve'et shemen hamishkhah ve'et qetoret hasamim ve'et masakh hapetakh lefetakh hamishkan. exodus 35:16	'et mizbakh ha'olah ve'et mikhbar hanekhoshet 'asher lo 'et badav ve'et kal keilav 'et hakiyor ve'et kano. exodus 35:17	'et qal'ei hekhazer 'et 'amudav ve'et 'adaneha ve'et masakh sha'ar hekhazer. exodus 35:18	'et yitdot hamishkan ve'et yitdot hekhazer ve'et meitereihem. exodus 35:19	'et bigdei haserad lesharet baqodesh 'et bigdei haqodesh le'aharon hakohen ve'et bigdei banav lekhahen. exodus 35:20	vayeize'u kal 'adat benei yisra'el milifnei mosheh. exodus 35:21	vayabo'u kal 'ish 'asher nesa'o libo vekhol 'asher nadebah rukho 'oto heibi'u 'et terumat yhvh limlekhet 'ohel mo'ed ulekhal 'abodato ulebigdei haqodesh. exodus 35:22	vayabo'u ha'anashim 'al hanashim kol nedib leb heibi'u khakh vanezem vetaba'at vekhumaz kal keli zahab vekhal 'ish 'asher heinif tenufat zahab yhvh. exodus 35:23	vekhal 'ish 'asher nimza 'ito tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh ve'izim ve'orot 'eilim me'adamim ve'orot tekhashim heibi'u. exodus 35:24	kal meirim terumat kesef unekhoshet heibi'u 'et terumat yhvh vekhol 'asher nimza 'ito 'azei shitim lekhal melekhet ha'abodah heibi'u. exodus 35:25	vekhal 'ishah khakhmat leb beyadeha tavu vayabi'u matveh 'et hatekheilet ve'et ha'argaman 'et tola'at hashani ve'et hashesh. exodus 35:26	vekhal hanashim 'asher nasa liban 'otanah bekhakhemah tavu 'et ha'izim. exodus 35:27	vehanesi'im heibi'u 'et 'abnei hashoham ve'et 'abnei hamilu'im la'eifod velakhoshen. exodus 35:28	ve'et habosem ve'et hashamen lema'or uleshemen hamishkhah veliqtoret hasamim. exodus 35:29	kal 'ish ve'ishah 'asher nadab libam 'otam lehabi lekhal hamelakhah 'asher zivah yhvh la'asot beyad mosheh heibi'u benei yisra'el nedabah yhvh. exodus 35:30	vayomer mosheh 'el benei yisra'el re'u qara yhvh beshem bezal'el ben 'uri ben khur lemateh yehudah. exodus 35:31	vaymalei 'oto ruakh 'elohim bekhakhemah bitbunah ubeda'at ubekhal melakhah. exodus 35:32	velakhshob makhashabot la'asot bazahab ubakesef ubanekhoshet. exodus 35:33	ubakharoshet 'eben lemalot ubakharoshet 'ez la'asot bekhal melekhet makhashabet. exodus 35:34	ulehorot natan belibo hu ve'aholi'ab ben 'akhisamakh lemateh dan. exodus 35:35	milei 'otam khakhemat leb la'asot kal melekhet kharash vekhosheb veroqem batekheilet uba'argaman betola'at hashani ubashesh ve'oreg 'osei kal melakhah vekhoshebei makhashabot. exodus 36:1	ve'asah bezal'el ve'aholi'ab vekhol 'ish khakham leb 'asher natan yhvh khakhmah utebunah bahemah lada'at la'asot 'et kal melekhet 'abodat haqodesh lekhol 'asher zivah yhvh. exodus 36:2	vayiqra mosheh 'el bezal'el ve'el 'aholi'ab ve'el kal 'ish khakham leb 'asher natan yhvh khakhmah belibo kol 'asher nesa'o libo leqarebah 'el hamelakhah la'asot 'otah. exodus 36:3	vayiqkhu milifnei mosheh 'et kal haterumah 'asher heibi'u benei yisra'el limlekhet 'abodat haqodesh la'asot 'otah vehem heibi'u 'eilav 'od nedabah baboqer baboqer. exodus 36:4	vayabo'u kal hakhakhamim ha'osim 'et kal melekhet haqodesh 'ish 'ish mimelakhto 'asher hemah 'osim. exodus 36:5	vayomeru 'el mosheh leimor marbim ha'am lehabi midei ha'abodah lamelakhah 'asher zivah yhvh la'asot 'otah. exodus 36:6	vayzav mosheh vaya'abiru qol bamakhaneh leimor 'ish ve'ishah 'al ya'asu 'od melakhah litrumat haqodesh vayikalei ha'am meihabi. exodus 36:7	vehamelakhah hayetah dayam lekhal hamelakhah la'asot 'otah vehoter. exodus 36:8	vaya'asu khal khakham leb be'osei hamelakhah 'et hamishkan 'eser yeri'ot shesh mashezar utekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani kerubim ma'aseh khosheb 'asah 'otam. exodus 36:9	'orekh hayri'ah ha'akhat shemoneh ve'esrim ba'amah verokhab 'arba' ba'amah hayri'ah ha'ekhat midah 'akhat lekhal hayri'ot. exodus 36:10	vaykhaber 'et khamesh hayri'ot 'akhat 'el 'ekhat vekhamesh yeri'ot khibar 'akhat 'el 'ekhat. exodus 36:11	vaya'as lul'ot tekheilet 'al sefat hayri'ah ha'ekhat miqazah bamakhbaret ken 'asah bisfat hayri'ah haqizonah bamakhberet hasheinit. exodus 36:12	khamishim lula'ot 'asah bayri'ah ha'ekhat vakhamishim lula'ot 'asah biqzeh hayri'ah 'asher bamakhberet hasheinit maqbilot halula'ot 'akhat 'el 'ekhat. exodus 36:13	vaya'as khamishim qarsei zahab vaykhaber 'et hayri'ot 'akhat 'el 'akhat baqerasim vayhi hamishkan 'ekhad. exodus 36:14	vaya'as yeri'ot 'izim le'ohel 'al hamishkan 'ashtei 'esreh yeri'ot 'asah 'otam. exodus 36:15	'orekh hayri'ah ha'akhat sheloshim ba'amah ve'arba' 'amot rokhab hayri'ah ha'ekhat midah 'akhat le'ashtei 'esreh yeri'ot. exodus 36:16	vaykhaber 'et khamesh hayri'ot lebad ve'et shesh hayri'ot lebad. exodus 36:17	vaya'as lula'ot khamishim 'al sefat hayri'ah haqizonah bamakhbaret vakhamishim lula'ot 'asah 'al sefat hayri'ah hakhoberet hasheinit. exodus 36:18	vaya'as qarsei nekhoshet khamishim lekhaber 'et ha'ohel lihyot 'ekhad. exodus 36:19	vaya'as mikhseh la'ohel 'orot 'eilim me'adamim umikhseh 'orot tekhashim milma'elah. exodus 36:20	vaya'as 'et haqerashim lamishkan 'azei shitim 'omedim. exodus 36:21	'eser 'amot 'orekh haqaresh ve'amah vakhazi ha'amah rokhab haqeresh ha'ekhad. exodus 36:22	shetei yadot laqeresh ha'ekhad meshulabot 'akhat 'el 'ekhat ken 'asah lekhol qarshei hamishkan. exodus 36:23	vaya'as 'et haqerashim lamishkan 'esrim qerashim lif'at negeb teimanah. exodus 36:24	ve'arba'im 'adnei khesef 'asah takhat 'esrim haqerashim shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad lishtei yedotav ushenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad lishtei yedotav. exodus 36:25	ulezela' hamishkan hasheinit lif'at zafon 'asah 'esrim qerashim. exodus 36:26	ve'arba'im 'adneihem kasef shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad ushenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad. exodus 36:27	uleyarketei hamishkan yamah 'asah shishah qerashim. exodus 36:28	ushenei qerashim 'asah limquz'ot hamishkan bayarkhatayim. exodus 36:29	vehayu to'amim milematah veyakhdav yihyu tamim 'el rosho 'el hataba'at ha'ekhat ken 'asah lishneihem lishnei hamiqzo'ot. exodus 36:30	vehayu shemonah qerashim ve'adneihem kesef shishah 'asar 'adanim shenei 'adanim shenei 'adanim takhat haqeresh ha'ekhad. exodus 36:31	vaya'as berikhei 'azei shitim khamishah leqarshei zela' hamishkan ha'ekhat. exodus 36:32	vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei zela' hamishkan hasheinit vakhamishah berikhim leqarshei hamishkan layarkhatayim yamah. exodus 36:33	vaya'as 'et haberiakh hatikhon libroakh betokh haqerashim min haqazeh 'el haqazeh. exodus 36:34	ve'et haqerashim zipah zahab ve'et tabe'otam 'asah zahab batim laberikhim vayzaf 'et haberikhim zahab. exodus 36:35	vaya'as 'et haparokhet tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ma'aseh khosheb 'asah 'otah kerubim. exodus 36:36	vaya'as lah 'arba'ah 'amudei shitim vayzapem zahab vaveihem zahab vayizoq lahem 'arba'ah 'adnei khasef. exodus 36:37	vaya'as masakh lefetakh ha'ohel tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ma'aseh roqem. exodus 36:38	ve'et 'amudav khamishah ve'et vaveihem vezipah rasheihem vakhashuqeihem zahab ve'adneihem khamishah nekhoshet. exodus 37:1	vaya'as bezal'el 'et ha'aron 'azei shitim 'amatayim vakheizi 'areko ve'amah vakheizi rakhebo ve'amah vakheizi qomato. exodus 37:2	vayzapeihu zahab tahor mibayit umikhuz vaya'as lo zer zahab sabib. exodus 37:3	vayizoq lo 'arba' tabe'ot zahab 'al 'arba' pa'amotav ushetei taba'ot 'al zal'o ha'ekhat ushetei taba'ot 'al zal'o hasheinit. exodus 37:4	vaya'as badei 'azei shitim vayzaf 'otam zahab. exodus 37:5	vayabei 'et habadim bataba'ot 'al zal'ot ha'aron laset 'et ha'aron. exodus 37:6	vaya'as kaporet zahab tahor 'amatayim vakheizi 'arekah ve'amah vakheizi rakhebah. exodus 37:7	vaya'as shenei kherubim zahab miqshah 'asah 'otam mishenei qezot hakaporet. exodus 37:8	kerub 'ekhad miqazah mizeh ukherub 'ekhad miqazah mizeh min hakaporet 'asah 'et hakerubim mishenei qizvoto qezotav. exodus 37:9	vayihyu hakerubim poresei khenafayim lema'lah sokhekhim bekhanfeihem 'al hakaporet ufeneihem 'ish 'el 'akhiv 'el hakaporet hayu penei hakerubim. exodus 37:10	vaya'as 'et hashulkhan 'azei shitim 'amatayim 'areko ve'amah rakhebo ve'amah vakheizi qomato. exodus 37:11	vayzaf 'oto zahab tahor vaya'as lo zer zahab sabib. exodus 37:12	vaya'as lo misgeret tofakh sabib vaya'as zer zahab lemisgarto sabib. exodus 37:13	vayizoq lo 'arba' tabe'ot zahab vayiten 'et hataba'ot 'al 'arba' hapei'ot 'asher le'arba' raglav. exodus 37:14	le'umat hamisgeret hayu hataba'ot batim labadim laset 'et hashulkhan. exodus 37:15	vaya'as 'et habadim 'azei shitim vayzaf 'otam zahab laset 'et hashulkhan. exodus 37:16	vaya'as 'et hakeilim 'asher 'al hashulkhan 'et qe'arotav ve'et kapotav ve'et menaqiyotav ve'et haqesavot 'asher yusakh bahen zahab tahor. exodus 37:17	vaya'as 'et hamenorah zahab tahor miqshah 'asah 'et hamenorah yereikhah veqanah gebi'eha kaftoreha uferakheha mimenah hayu. exodus 37:18	veshishah qanim yoze'im mizideha sheloshah qenei menorah mizidah ha'ekhad usheloshah qenei menorah mizidah hasheini. exodus 37:19	sheloshah gebi'im meshuqadim baqaneh ha'ekhad kaftor vaferakh usheloshah gebi'im meshuqadim beqaneh 'ekhad kaftor vafarakh ken lesheishet haqanim hayoze'im min hamenorah. exodus 37:20	ubamenorah 'arba'ah gebi'im meshuqadim kaftoreha uferakheha. exodus 37:21	vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah vekhaftor takhat shenei haqanim mimenah lesheishet haqanim hayoze'im mimenah. exodus 37:22	kaftoreihem uqenotam mimenah hayu kulah miqshah 'akhat zahab tahor. exodus 37:23	vaya'as 'et neiroteha shib'ah umalqakheha umakhtoteha zahab tahor. exodus 37:24	kikar zahab tahor 'asah 'otah ve'et kal keileha. exodus 37:25	vaya'as 'et mizbakh haqetoret 'azei shitim 'amah 'areko ve'amah rakhebo rabua' ve'amatayim qomato mimenu hayu qarnotav. exodus 37:26	vayzaf 'oto zahab tahor 'et gago ve'et qirotav sabib ve'et qarnotav vaya'as lo zer zahab sabib. exodus 37:27	ushetei tabe'ot zahab 'asah lo mitakhat lezeiro 'al shetei zal'otav 'al shenei zidav lebatim lebadim laset 'oto bahem. exodus 37:28	vaya'as 'et habadim 'azei shitim vayzaf 'otam zahab. exodus 37:29	vaya'as 'et shemen hamishkhah qodesh ve'et qetoret hasamim tahor ma'aseh roqeiakh. exodus 38:1	vaya'as 'et mizbakh ha'olah 'azei shitim khamesh 'amot 'areko vekhamesh 'amot rakhebo rabua' veshalosh 'amot qomato. exodus 38:2	vaya'as qarnotav 'al 'arba' pinotav mimenu hayu qarnotav vayzaf 'oto nekhoshet. exodus 38:3	vaya'as 'et kal kelei hamizbeiakh 'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizraqot 'et hamizlagot ve'et hamakhtot kal keilav 'asah nekhoshet. exodus 38:4	vaya'as lamizbeiakh mikhbar ma'aseh reshet nekhoshet takhat karkubo milematah 'ad khezyo. exodus 38:5	vayizoq 'arba' taba'ot be'arba' haqezavot lemikhbar hanekhoshet batim labadim. exodus 38:6	vaya'as 'et habadim 'azei shitim vayzaf 'otam nekhoshet. exodus 38:7	vayabei 'et habadim bataba'ot 'al zal'ot hamizbeiakh laset 'oto bahem nebub lukhot 'asah 'oto. exodus 38:8	vaya'as 'et hakiyor nekhoshet ve'et kano nekhoshet bemar'ot hazobe'ot 'asher zabe'u petakh 'ohel mo'ed. exodus 38:9	vaya'as 'et hekhazer lif'at negeb teimanah qal'ei hekhazer shesh mashezar mei'ah ba'amah. exodus 38:10	'amudeihem 'esrim ve'adneihem 'esrim nekhoshet vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kasef. exodus 38:11	velif'at zafon mei'ah ba'amah 'amudeihem 'esrim ve'adneihem 'esrim nekhoshet vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kasef. exodus 38:12	velif'at yam qela'im khamishim ba'amah 'amudeihem 'asarah ve'adneihem 'asarah vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kasef. exodus 38:13	velif'at qeidemah mizrakhah khamishim 'amah. exodus 38:14	qela'im khamesh 'esreh 'amah 'el hakatef 'amudeihem sheloshah ve'adneihem sheloshah. exodus 38:15	velakatef hasheinit mizeh umizeh lesha'ar hekhazer qela'im khamesh 'esreh 'amah 'amudeihem sheloshah ve'adneihem sheloshah. exodus 38:16	kal qal'ei hekhazer sabib shesh mashezar. exodus 38:17	veha'adanim la'amudim nekhoshet vavei ha'amudim vakhashuqeihem kesef vezipui rasheihem kasef vehem mekhushaqim kesef kol 'amudei hekhazer. exodus 38:18	umasakh sha'ar hekhazer ma'aseh roqem tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ve'esrim 'amah 'orekh veqomah berokhab khamesh 'amot le'umat qal'ei hekhazer. exodus 38:19	ve'amudeihem 'arba'ah ve'adneihem 'arba'ah nekhoshet vaveihem kesef vezipui rasheihem vakhashuqeihem kasef. exodus 38:20	vekhal hayteidot lamishkan velekhazer sabib nekhoshet. exodus 38:21	'eleh fequdei hamishkan mishkan ha'eidut 'asher puqad 'al pi mosheh 'abodat halviyim beyad 'itamar ben 'aharon hakohen. exodus 38:22	ubezal'el ben 'uri ben khur lemateh yehudah 'asah 'et kal 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 38:23	ve'ito 'aholi'ab ben 'akhisamakh lemateh dan kharash vekhosheb veroqem batekheilet uba'argaman ubetola'at hashani ubashesh. exodus 38:24	kal hazahab he'asui lamelakhah bekhol melekhet haqodesh vayhi zehab hatenufah teisha' ve'esrim kikar usheba' mei'ot usheloshim sheqel besheqel haqodesh. exodus 38:25	vekhesef pequdei ha'eidah me'at kikar ve'elef usheba' mei'ot vakhamishah veshib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh. exodus 38:26	beqa' lagulgolet makhazit hasheqel besheqel haqodesh lekhol ha'ober 'al hapequdim miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah leshesh mei'ot 'elef usheloshet 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot vakhamishim. exodus 38:27	vayhi me'at kikar hakesef lazeqet 'et 'adnei haqodesh ve'et 'adnei haparokhet me'at 'adanim lim'at hakikar kikar la'aden. exodus 38:28	ve'et ha'elef usheba' hamei'ot vakhamishah veshib'im 'asah vavim la'amudim vezipah rasheihem vekhishaq 'otam. exodus 38:29	unekhoshet hatenufah shib'im kikar ve'alpayim ve'arba' mei'ot shaqel. exodus 38:30	vaya'as bah 'et 'adnei petakh 'ohel mo'ed ve'et mizbakh hanekhoshet ve'et mikhbar hanekhoshet 'asher lo ve'et kal kelei hamizbeiakh. exodus 38:31	ve'et 'adnei hekhazer sabib ve'et 'adnei sha'ar hekhazer ve'et kal yitdot hamishkan ve'et kal yitdot hekhazer sabib. exodus 39:1	umin hatekheilet veha'argaman vetola'at hashani 'asu bigdei serad lesharet baqodesh vaya'asu 'et bigdei haqodesh 'asher le'aharon ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 39:2	vaya'as 'et ha'eifod zahab tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar. exodus 39:3	vayraqe'u 'et pakhei hazahab veqizez petilim la'asot betokh hatekheilet ubetokh ha'argaman ubetokh tola'at hashani ubetokh hashesh ma'aseh khosheb. exodus 39:4	keteifot 'asu lo khoberot 'al shenei qizvoto qezotav khubar. exodus 39:5	vekheisheb 'afudato 'asher 'alav mimenu hu kema'aseihu zahab tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 39:6	vaya'asu 'et 'abnei hashoham musabot mishbezot zahab mefutakhot pitukhei khotam 'al shemot benei yisra'el. exodus 39:7	vayasem 'otam 'al kitfot ha'eifod 'abnei zikaron libnei yisra'el ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 39:8	vaya'as 'et hakhoshen ma'aseh khosheb kema'aseh 'eifod zahab tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani veshesh mashezar. exodus 39:9	rabua' hayah kaful 'asu 'et hakhoshen zeret 'areko vezeret rakhebo kaful. exodus 39:10	vaymal'u bo 'arba'ah turei 'aben tur 'odem pitdah ubareqet hatur ha'ekhad. exodus 39:11	vehatur hasheini nofekh sapir veyahalom. exodus 39:12	vehatur hashelishi leshem shebo ve'akhlamah. exodus 39:13	vehatur harebi'i tarshish shoham veyashefeh musabot mishbezot zahab bemilu'otam. exodus 39:14	veha'abanim 'al shemot benei yisra'el henah shetem 'esreh 'al shemotam pitukhei khotam 'ish 'al shemo lishnem 'asar shabet. exodus 39:15	vaya'asu 'al hakhoshen sharsherot gablut ma'aseh 'abot zahab tahor. exodus 39:16	vaya'asu shetei mishbezot zahab ushetei tabe'ot zahab vayitenu 'et shetei hataba'ot 'al shenei qezot hakhoshen. exodus 39:17	vayitenu shetei ha'abotot hazahab 'al shetei hataba'ot 'al qezot hakhoshen. exodus 39:18	ve'et shetei qezot shetei ha'abotot natenu 'al shetei hamishbezot vayitenum 'al kitfot ha'eifod 'el mul panav. exodus 39:19	vaya'asu shetei tabe'ot zahab vayasimu 'al shenei qezot hakhoshen 'al sefato 'asher 'el 'eiber ha'eifod bayetah. exodus 39:20	vaya'asu shetei tabe'ot zahab vayitenum 'al shetei khitfot ha'eifod milmatah mimul panav le'umat mekhbarto mima'al lekheisheb ha'eifod. exodus 39:21	vayirkesu 'et hakhoshen mitabe'otav 'el tabe'ot ha'eifod biftil tekheilet lihyot 'al kheisheb ha'eifod velo yizakh hakhoshen mei'al ha'eifod ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 39:22	vaya'as 'et me'il ha'eifod ma'aseh 'oreg kelil tekheilet. exodus 39:23	ufi hame'il betokho kefi takhra safah lefiv sabib lo yiqareia'. exodus 39:24	vaya'asu 'al shulei hame'il rimonei tekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani mashezar. exodus 39:25	vaya'asu fa'amonei zahab tahor vayitenu 'et hapa'amonim betokh harimonim 'al shulei hame'il sabib betokh harimonim. exodus 39:26	pa'amon verimon pa'amon verimon 'al shulei hame'il sabib lesharet ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 39:27	vaya'asu 'et hakatenot shesh ma'aseh 'oreg le'aharon ulebanav. exodus 39:28	ve'et hamiznefet shesh ve'et pa'arei hamigba'ot shesh ve'et mikhnesei habad shesh mashezar. exodus 39:29	ve'et ha'abnet shesh mashezar utekheilet ve'argaman vetola'at shani ma'aseh roqem ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 39:30	vaya'asu 'et ziz neizer haqodesh zahab tahor vayikhtebu 'alav mikhtab pitukhei khotam qodesh yhvh. exodus 39:31	vayitenu 'alav petil tekheilet latet 'al hamiznefet milma'elah ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 39:32	vateikhel kal 'abodat mishkan 'ohel mo'ed vaya'asu benei yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh ken 'asu. exodus 39:33	vayabi'u 'et hamishkan 'el mosheh 'et ha'ohel ve'et kal keilav qerasav qerashav berikho berikhav ve'amudav va'adanav. exodus 39:34	ve'et mikhseh 'orot ha'eilim ham'adamim ve'et mikhseh 'orot hatekhashim ve'et parokhet hamasakh. exodus 39:35	'et 'aron ha'eidut ve'et badav ve'et hakaporet. exodus 39:36	'et hashulkhan 'et kal keilav ve'et lekhem hapanim. exodus 39:37	'et hamenorah hatehorah 'et neiroteha neirot hama'arakhah ve'et kal keileha ve'et shemen hama'or. exodus 39:38	ve'et mizbakh hazahab ve'et shemen hamishkhah ve'et qetoret hasamim ve'et masakh petakh ha'ohel. exodus 39:39	'et mizbakh hanekhoshet ve'et mikhbar hanekhoshet 'asher lo 'et badav ve'et kal keilav 'et hakiyor ve'et kano. exodus 39:40	'et qal'ei hekhazer 'et 'amudeha ve'et 'adaneha ve'et hamasakh lesha'ar hekhazer 'et meitarav viteidoteha ve'et kal kelei 'abodat hamishkan le'ohel mo'ed. exodus 39:41	'et bigdei haserad lesharet baqodesh 'et bigdei haqodesh le'aharon hakohen ve'et bigdei banav lekhahen. exodus 39:42	kekhol 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh ken 'asu benei yisra'el 'et kal ha'abodah. exodus 39:43	vayar mosheh 'et kal hamelakhah vehineh 'asu 'otah ka'asher zivah yhvh ken 'asu vaybarekh 'otam mosheh. exodus 40:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. exodus 40:2	beyom hakhodesh harishon be'ekhad lakhodesh taqim 'et mishkan 'ohel mo'ed. exodus 40:3	vesamta sham 'et 'aron ha'eidut vesakota 'al ha'aron 'et haparokhet. exodus 40:4	veheibeita 'et hashulkhan ve'arakhta 'et 'erko veheibeita 'et hamenorah veha'aleita 'et neiroteha. exodus 40:5	venatatah 'et mizbakh hazahab liqtoret lifnei 'aron ha'eidut vesamta 'et masakh hapetakh lamishkan. exodus 40:6	venatatah 'et mizbakh ha'olah lifnei petakh mishkan 'ohel mo'ed. exodus 40:7	venatata 'et hakiyor ben 'ohel mo'ed uben hamizbeiakh venatata sham mayim. exodus 40:8	vesamta 'et hekhazer sabib venatata 'et masakh sha'ar hekhazer. exodus 40:9	velaqakhta 'et shemen hamishkhah umashakhta 'et hamishkan ve'et kal 'asher bo veqidashta 'oto ve'et kal keilav vehayah qodesh. exodus 40:10	umashakhta 'et mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal keilav veqidashta 'et hamizbeiakh vehayah hamizbeiakh qodesh qadashim. exodus 40:11	umashakhta 'et hakiyor ve'et kano veqidashta 'oto. exodus 40:12	vehiqrabta 'et 'aharon ve'et banav 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed verakhazta 'otam bamayim. exodus 40:13	vehilbashta 'et 'aharon 'et bigdei haqodesh umashakhta 'oto veqidashta 'oto vekhihen li. exodus 40:14	ve'et banav taqrib vehilbashta 'otam kutonot. exodus 40:15	umashakhta 'otam ka'asher mashakhta 'et 'abihem vekhihanu li vehayetah lihyot lahem mashekhatam likhhunat 'olam ledorotam exodus 40:16	vaya'as mosheh kekhol 'asher zivah yhvh 'oto ken 'asah. exodus 40:17	vayhi bakhodesh harishon bashanah hasheinit be'ekhad lakhodesh huqam hamishkan. exodus 40:18	vayaqem mosheh 'et hamishkan vayiten 'et 'adanav vayasem 'et qerashav vayiten 'et berikhav vayaqem 'et 'amudav. exodus 40:19	vayifros 'et ha'ohel 'al hamishkan vayasem 'et mikhseh ha'ohel 'alav milma'elah ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 40:20	vayiqakh vayiten 'et ha'eidut 'el ha'aron vayasem 'et habadim 'al ha'aron vayiten 'et hakaporet 'al ha'aron milma'elah. exodus 40:21	vayabei 'et ha'aron 'el hamishkan vayasem 'et parokhet hamasakh vayasekh 'al 'aron ha'eidut ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 40:22	vayiten 'et hashulkhan be'ohel mo'ed 'al yerekh hamishkan zafonah mikhuz laparokhet. exodus 40:23	vaya'arokh 'alav 'eirekh lekhem lifnei yhvh ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 40:24	vayasem 'et hamenorah be'ohel mo'ed nokhakh hashulkhan 'al yerekh hamishkan negbah. exodus 40:25	vaya'al haneirot lifnei yhvh ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 40:26	vayasem 'et mizbakh hazahab be'ohel mo'ed lifnei haparokhet. exodus 40:27	vayaqter 'alav qetoret samim ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 40:28	vayasem 'et masakh hapetakh lamishkan. exodus 40:29	ve'et mizbakh ha'olah sam petakh mishkan 'ohel mo'ed vaya'al 'alav 'et ha'olah ve'et haminkhah ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 40:30	vayasem 'et hakiyor ben 'ohel mo'ed uben hamizbeiakh vayiten shamah mayim lerakhezah. exodus 40:31	verakhazu mimenu mosheh ve'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem ve'et ragleihem. exodus 40:32	bebo'am 'el 'ohel mo'ed ubeqarebatam 'el hamizbeiakh yirkhazu ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. exodus 40:33	vayaqem 'et hekhazer sabib lamishkan velamizbeiakh vayiten 'et masakh sha'ar hekhazer vaykhal mosheh 'et hamelakhah. exodus 40:34	vaykhas he'anan 'et 'ohel mo'ed ukhebod yhvh malei 'et hamishkan. exodus 40:35	velo yakhol mosheh labo 'el 'ohel mo'ed ki shakhan 'alav he'anan ukhebod yhvh malei 'et hamishkan. exodus 40:36	ubehei'alot he'anan mei'al hamishkan yis'u benei yisra'el bekhol mas'eihem. exodus 40:37	ve'im lo yei'aleh he'anan velo yis'u 'ad yom hei'aloto. exodus 40:38	ki 'anan yhvh 'al hamishkan yomam ve'esh tihyeh laylah bo le'einei khal bet yisra'el bekhal mas'eihem. 

leviticus 1:1	vayiqra 'el mosheh vaydaber yhvh 'eilav mei'ohel mo'ed leimor. leviticus 1:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'adam ki yaqrib mikem qarban yhvh min habeheimah min habaqar umin hazon taqribu 'et qarebankhem. leviticus 1:3	'im 'olah qarebano min habaqar zakhar tamim yaqribenu 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed yaqrib 'oto lirzono lifnei yhvh. leviticus 1:4	vesamakh yado 'al rosh ha'olah venirzah lo lekhaper 'alav. leviticus 1:5	veshakhat 'et ben habaqar lifnei yhvh vehiqribu benei 'aharon hakohanim 'et hadam vezarequ 'et hadam 'al hamizbeiakh sabib 'asher petakh 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 1:6	vehifshit 'et ha'olah venitakh 'otah lintakheha. leviticus 1:7	venatenu benei 'aharon hakohen 'esh 'al hamizbeiakh ve'arekhu 'eizim 'al ha'esh. leviticus 1:8	ve'arekhu benei 'aharon hakohanim 'et hanetakhim 'et harosh ve'et hapader 'al ha'eizim 'asher 'al ha'esh 'asher 'al hamizbeiakh. leviticus 1:9	veqirbo ukhera'av yirkhaz bamayim vehiqtir hakohen 'et hakol hamizbeikhah 'olah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. leviticus 1:10	ve'im min hazon qarebano min hakesabim 'o min ha'izim le'olah zakhar tamim yaqribenu. leviticus 1:11	veshakhat 'oto 'al yerekh hamizbeiakh zafonah lifnei yhvh vezarequ benei 'aharon hakohanim 'et damo 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. leviticus 1:12	venitakh 'oto lintakhav ve'et rosho ve'et pidro ve'arakh hakohen 'otam 'al ha'eizim 'asher 'al ha'esh 'asher 'al hamizbeiakh. leviticus 1:13	vehaqereb vehakera'ayim yirkhaz bamayim vehiqrib hakohen 'et hakol vehiqtir hamizbeikhah 'olah hu 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. leviticus 1:14	ve'im min ha'of 'olah qarebano yhvh vehiqrib min hatorim 'o min benei hayonah 'et qarebano. leviticus 1:15	vehiqribo hakohen 'el hamizbeiakh umalaq 'et rosho vehiqtir hamizbeikhah venimzah damo 'al qir hamizbeiakh. leviticus 1:16	veheisir 'et mur'ato benozatah vehishlikh 'otah 'eizel hamizbeiakh qeidemah 'el meqom hadashen. leviticus 1:17	veshisa' 'oto bikhnafav lo yabdil vehiqtir 'oto hakohen hamizbeikhah 'al ha'eizim 'asher 'al ha'esh 'olah hu 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. leviticus 2:1	venefesh ki taqrib qareban minkhah yhvh solet yihyeh qarebano veyazaq 'aleha shemen venatan 'aleha lebonah. leviticus 2:2	vehebi'ah 'el benei 'aharon hakohanim veqamaz misham melo qumzo misaletah umishamnah 'al kal lebonatah vehiqtir hakohen 'et 'azkaratah hamizbeikhah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. leviticus 2:3	vehanoteret min haminkhah le'aharon ulebanav qodesh qadashim mei'ishei yhvh. leviticus 2:4	vekhi taqrib qareban minkhah ma'afeh tanur solet khalot mazot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen. leviticus 2:5	ve'im minkhah 'al hamakhabat qarebanekha solet belulah bashemen mazah tihyeh. leviticus 2:6	patot 'otah pitim veyazaqta 'aleha shamen minkhah hi leviticus 2:7	ve'im minkhat markheshet qarebanekha solet bashemen tei'aseh. leviticus 2:8	veheibeita 'et haminkhah 'asher yei'aseh mei'eleh yhvh vehiqribah 'el hakohen vehigishah 'el hamizbeiakh. leviticus 2:9	veheirim hakohen min haminkhah 'et 'azkaratah vehiqtir hamizbeikhah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. leviticus 2:10	vehanoteret min haminkhah le'aharon ulebanav qodesh qadashim mei'ishei yhvh. leviticus 2:11	kal haminkhah 'asher taqribu yhvh lo tei'aseh khamez ki khal se'or vekhal debash lo taqtiru mimenu 'isheh yhvh. leviticus 2:12	qareban reishit taqribu 'otam yhvh ve'el hamizbeiakh lo ya'alu lereiakh nikhoakh. leviticus 2:13	vekhal qareban minkhatekha bamelakh timlakh velo tashbit melakh berit 'elohekha mei'al minkhatekha 'al kal qarebanekha taqrib melakh. leviticus 2:14	ve'im taqrib minkhat bikurim yhvh 'abib qalui ba'esh geres karmel taqrib 'et minkhat bikurekha. leviticus 2:15	venatata 'aleha shemen vesamta 'aleha lebonah minkhah hi leviticus 2:16	vehiqtir hakohen 'et 'azkaratah migirsah umishamnah 'al kal lebonatah 'isheh yhvh. leviticus 3:1	ve'im zebakh shelamim qarebano 'im min habaqar hu maqrib 'im zakhar 'im neqeibah tamim yaqribenu lifnei yhvh. leviticus 3:2	vesamakh yado 'al rosh qarebano ushekhato petakh 'ohel mo'ed vezarequ benei 'aharon hakohanim 'et hadam 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. leviticus 3:3	vehiqrib mizebakh hashelamim 'isheh yhvh 'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb ve'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb. leviticus 3:4	ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen 'asher 'al hakesalim ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed 'al hakelayot yesirenah. leviticus 3:5	vehiqtiru 'oto benei 'aharon hamizbeikhah 'al ha'olah 'asher 'al ha'eizim 'asher 'al ha'esh 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. leviticus 3:6	ve'im min hazon qarebano lezebakh shelamim yhvh zakhar 'o neqeibah tamim yaqribenu. leviticus 3:7	'im keseb hu maqrib 'et qarebano vehiqrib 'oto lifnei yhvh. leviticus 3:8	vesamakh 'et yado 'al rosh qarebano veshakhat 'oto lifnei 'ohel mo'ed vezarequ benei 'aharon 'et damo 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. leviticus 3:9	vehiqrib mizebakh hashelamim 'isheh yhvh khelbo ha'alyah temimah le'umat he'azeh yesirenah ve'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb ve'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb. leviticus 3:10	ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen 'asher 'al hakesalim ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed 'al hakelayot yesirenah. leviticus 3:11	vehiqtiro hakohen hamizbeikhah lekhem 'isheh yhvh. leviticus 3:12	ve'im 'ez qarebano vehiqribo lifnei yhvh. leviticus 3:13	vesamakh 'et yado 'al rosho veshakhat 'oto lifnei 'ohel mo'ed vezarequ benei 'aharon 'et damo 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. leviticus 3:14	vehiqrib mimenu qarebano 'isheh yhvh 'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb ve'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb. leviticus 3:15	ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen 'asher 'al hakesalim ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed 'al hakelayot yesirenah. leviticus 3:16	vehiqtiram hakohen hamizbeikhah lekhem 'isheh lereiakh nikhoakh kal kheileb yhvh. leviticus 3:17	khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem bekhol mosheboteikhem kal kheileb vekhal dam lo tokheilu. leviticus 4:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 4:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor nefesh ki tekheta bishgagah mikol mizvot yhvh 'asher lo tei'asenah ve'asah mei'akhat meihenah. leviticus 4:3	'im hakohen hamashiakh yekheta le'ashmat ha'am vehiqrib 'al khatato 'asher khata par ben baqar tamim yhvh lekhatat. leviticus 4:4	veheibi 'et hapar 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed lifnei yhvh vesamakh 'et yado 'al rosh hapar veshakhat 'et hapar lifnei yhvh. leviticus 4:5	velaqakh hakohen hamashiakh midam hapar veheibi 'oto 'el 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 4:6	vetabal hakohen 'et 'ezba'o badam vehizah min hadam sheba' pe'amim lifnei yhvh 'et penei parokhet haqodesh. leviticus 4:7	venatan hakohen min hadam 'al qarnot mizbakh qetoret hasamim lifnei yhvh 'asher be'ohel mo'ed ve'et kal dam hapar yishpokh 'el yesod mizbakh ha'olah 'asher petakh 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 4:8	ve'et kal kheileb par hakhatat yarim mimenu 'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'al haqereb ve'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb. leviticus 4:9	ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen 'asher 'al hakesalim ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed 'al hakelayot yesirenah. leviticus 4:10	ka'asher yuram mishor zebakh hashelamim vehiqtiram hakohen 'al mizbakh ha'olah. leviticus 4:11	ve'et 'or hapar ve'et kal besaro 'al rosho ve'al kera'av veqirbo ufirsho. leviticus 4:12	vehozi 'et kal hapar 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh 'el maqom tahor 'el shefekh hadeshen vesaraf 'oto 'al 'eizim ba'esh 'al shefekh hadeshen yisaref. leviticus 4:13	ve'im kal 'adat yisra'el yishgu vene'lam dabar mei'einei haqahal ve'asu 'akhat mikal mizvot yhvh 'asher lo tei'asenah ve'asheimu. leviticus 4:14	venod'ah hakhatat 'asher khate'u 'aleha vehiqribu haqahal par ben baqar lekhatat veheibi'u 'oto lifnei 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 4:15	vesamekhu ziqnei ha'eidah 'et yedeihem 'al rosh hapar lifnei yhvh veshakhat 'et hapar lifnei yhvh. leviticus 4:16	veheibi hakohen hamashiakh midam hapar 'el 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 4:17	vetabal hakohen 'ezba'o min hadam vehizah sheba' pe'amim lifnei yhvh 'et penei haparokhet. leviticus 4:18	umin hadam yiten 'al qarnot hamizbeiakh 'asher lifnei yhvh 'asher be'ohel mo'ed ve'et kal hadam yishpokh 'el yesod mizbakh ha'olah 'asher petakh 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 4:19	ve'et kal khelbo yarim mimenu vehiqtir hamizbeikhah. leviticus 4:20	ve'asah lapar ka'asher 'asah lefar hakhatat ken ya'aseh lo vekhiper 'aleihem hakohen venislakh lahem. leviticus 4:21	vehozi 'et hapar 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vesaraf 'oto ka'asher saraf 'et hapar harishon khatat haqahal hu. leviticus 4:22	'asher nasi yekheta ve'asah 'akhat mikal mizvot yhvh 'elohav 'asher lo tei'asenah bishgagah ve'ashem. leviticus 4:23	'o hoda' 'eilav khatato 'asher khata bah veheibi 'et qarebano se'ir 'izim zakhar tamim. leviticus 4:24	vesamakh yado 'al rosh hasa'ir veshakhat 'oto bimqom 'asher yishkhat 'et ha'olah lifnei yhvh khatat hu. leviticus 4:25	velaqakh hakohen midam hakhatat be'ezba'o venatan 'al qarnot mizbakh ha'olah ve'et damo yishpokh 'el yesod mizbakh ha'olah. leviticus 4:26	ve'et kal khelbo yaqtir hamizbeikhah kekheileb zebakh hashelamim vekhiper 'alav hakohen meikhatato venislakh lo. leviticus 4:27	ve'im nefesh 'akhat tekheta bishgagah mei'am ha'arez ba'asotah 'akhat mimizvot yhvh 'asher lo tei'asenah ve'ashem. leviticus 4:28	'o hoda' 'eilav khatato 'asher khata veheibi qarebano se'irat 'izim temimah neqeibah 'al khatato 'asher khata. leviticus 4:29	vesamakh 'et yado 'al rosh hakhatat veshakhat 'et hakhatat bimqom ha'olah. leviticus 4:30	velaqakh hakohen midamah be'ezba'o venatan 'al qarnot mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal damah yishpokh 'el yesod hamizbeiakh. leviticus 4:31	ve'et kal khelbah yasir ka'asher husar kheileb mei'al zebakh hashelamim vehiqtir hakohen hamizbeikhah lereiakh nikhoakh yhvh vekhiper 'alav hakohen venislakh lo. leviticus 4:32	ve'im kebes yabi qarebano lekhatat neqeibah temimah yebi'enah. leviticus 4:33	vesamakh 'et yado 'al rosh hakhatat veshakhat 'otah lekhatat bimqom 'asher yishkhat 'et ha'olah. leviticus 4:34	velaqakh hakohen midam hakhatat be'ezba'o venatan 'al qarnot mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal damah yishpokh 'el yesod hamizbeiakh. leviticus 4:35	ve'et kal khelbah yasir ka'asher yusar kheileb hakeseb mizebakh hashelamim vehiqtir hakohen 'otam hamizbeikhah 'al 'ishei yhvh vekhiper 'alav hakohen 'al khatato 'asher khata venislakh lo. leviticus 5:1	venefesh ki tekheta veshame'ah qol 'alah vehu 'ed 'o ra'ah 'o yada' 'im lo yagid venasa 'avono. leviticus 5:2	'o nefesh 'asher tiga' bekhal dabar tamei 'o beniblat khayah temei'ah 'o beniblat beheimah temei'ah 'o beniblat sherez tamei vene'lam mimenu vehu tamei ve'ashem. leviticus 5:3	'o khi yiga' betum'at 'adam lekhol tum'ato 'asher yitma bah vene'lam mimenu vehu yada' ve'ashem. leviticus 5:4	'o nefesh ki tishaba' lebatei bisfatayim lehara' 'o leheitib lekhol 'asher yebatei ha'adam bishbu'ah vene'lam mimenu vehu yada' ve'ashem le'akhat mei'eleh. leviticus 5:5	vehayah khi ye'sham le'akhat mei'eleh vehitvadah 'asher khata 'aleha. leviticus 5:6	veheibi 'et 'ashamo yhvh 'al khatato 'asher khata neqeibah min hazon kisbah 'o se'irat 'izim lekhatat vekhiper 'alav hakohen meikhatato. leviticus 5:7	ve'im lo tagi' yado dei seh veheibi 'et 'ashamo 'asher khata shetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah yhvh 'ekhad lekhatat ve'ekhad le'olah. leviticus 5:8	veheibi 'otam 'el hakohen vehiqrib 'et 'asher lakhatat rishonah umalaq 'et rosho mimul 'arepo velo yabdil. leviticus 5:9	vehizah midam hakhatat 'al qir hamizbeiakh vehanish'ar badam yimazeh 'el yesod hamizbeiakh khatat hu. leviticus 5:10	ve'et hasheini ya'aseh 'olah kamishpat vekhiper 'alav hakohen meikhatato 'asher khata venislakh lo. leviticus 5:11	ve'im lo tasig yado lishtei torim 'o lishnei benei yonah veheibi 'et qarebano 'asher khata 'asirit ha'eifah solet lekhatat lo yasim 'aleha shemen velo yiten 'aleha lebonah ki khatat hi. leviticus 5:12	vehebi'ah 'el hakohen veqamaz hakohen mimenah melo qumzo 'et 'azkaratah vehiqtir hamizbeikhah 'al 'ishei yhvh khatat hi leviticus 5:13	vekhiper 'alav hakohen 'al khatato 'asher khata mei'akhat mei'eleh venislakh lo vehayetah lakohen kaminkhah. leviticus 5:14	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 5:15	nefesh ki tim'ol ma'al vekhate'ah bishgagah miqadeshei yhvh veheibi 'et 'ashamo yhvh 'ayil tamim min hazon be'erkekha kesef sheqalim besheqel haqodesh le'asham. leviticus 5:16	ve'et 'asher khata min haqodesh yeshalem ve'et khamishito yosef 'alav venatan 'oto lakohen vehakohen yekhaper 'alav be'el ha'asham venislakh lo. leviticus 5:17	ve'im nefesh ki tekheta ve'asetah 'akhat mikal mizvot yhvh 'asher lo tei'asenah velo yada' ve'ashem venasa 'avono. leviticus 5:18	veheibi 'ayil tamim min hazon be'erkekha le'asham 'el hakohen vekhiper 'alav hakohen 'al shiggato 'asher shagag vehu lo yada' venislakh lo. leviticus 5:19	'asham hu 'ashom 'asham yhvh. leviticus 6:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 6:2	nefesh ki tekheta uma'alah ma'al yhvh vekhikhesh ba'amito befiqadon 'o bitsumet yad 'o begazel 'o 'ashaq 'et 'amito. leviticus 6:3	'o maza 'abeidah vekhikhesh bah venishba' 'al shaqer 'al 'akhat mikol 'asher ya'aseh ha'adam lakhato bahenah. leviticus 6:4	vehayah ki yekheta ve'ashem veheishib 'et hagezeilah 'asher gazal 'o 'et ha'osheq 'asher 'ashaq 'o 'et hapiqadon 'asher hafeqad 'ito 'o 'et ha'abeidah 'asher maza. leviticus 6:5	'o mikol 'asher yishaba' 'alav lasheqer veshilam 'oto berosho vakhamishitav yosef 'alav la'asher hu lo yitenenu beyom 'ashmato. leviticus 6:6	ve'et 'ashamo yabi yhvh 'ayil tamim min hazon be'erkekha le'asham 'el hakohen. leviticus 6:7	vekhiper 'alav hakohen lifnei yhvh venislakh lo 'al 'akhat mikol 'asher ya'aseh le'ashmah bah. leviticus 6:8	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 6:9	zav 'et 'aharon ve'et banav leimor zot torat ha'olah hi ha'olah 'al moqdah 'al hamizbeiakh kal halaylah 'ad haboqer ve'esh hamizbeiakh tuqad bo. leviticus 6:10	velabash hakohen mido bad umikhnesei bad yilbash 'al besaro veheirim 'et hadeshen 'asher tokhal ha'esh 'et ha'olah 'al hamizbeiakh vesamo 'eizel hamizbeiakh. leviticus 6:11	ufashat 'et begadav velabash begadim 'akheirim vehozi 'et hadeshen 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh 'el maqom tahor. leviticus 6:12	veha'esh 'al hamizbeiakh tuqad bo lo tikhbeh ubi'er 'aleha hakohen 'eizim baboqer baboqer ve'arakh 'aleha ha'olah vehiqtir 'aleha khelbei hashelamim. leviticus 6:13	'esh tamid tuqad 'al hamizbeiakh lo tikhbeh leviticus 6:14	vezot torat haminkhah haqreb 'otah benei 'aharon lifnei yhvh 'el penei hamizbeiakh. leviticus 6:15	veheirim mimenu bequmzo misolet haminkhah umishamnah ve'et kal halebonah 'asher 'al haminkhah vehiqtir hamizbeiakh reiakh nikhoakh 'azkaratah yhvh. leviticus 6:16	vehanoteret mimenah yokhelu 'aharon ubanav mazot tei'akhel bemaqom qadosh bakhazar 'ohel mo'ed yokheluha. leviticus 6:17	lo tei'afeh khamez khelqam natati 'otah mei'ishai qodesh qadashim hi kakhatat vekha'asham. leviticus 6:18	kal zakhar bibnei 'aharon yokhalenah khaq 'olam ledoroteikhem mei'ishei yhvh kol 'asher yiga' bahem yiqdash. leviticus 6:19	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 6:20	zeh qareban 'aharon ubanav 'asher yaqribu yhvh beyom himashakh 'oto 'asirit ha'eifah solet minkhah tamid makhazitah baboqer umakhazitah ba'areb. leviticus 6:21	'al makhabat bashemen tei'aseh murbekhet tebi'enah tufinei minkhat pitim taqrib reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. leviticus 6:22	vehakohen hamashiakh takhtav mibanav ya'aseh 'otah khaq 'olam yhvh kalil taqetar. leviticus 6:23	vekhal minkhat kohen kalil tihyeh lo tei'akhel. leviticus 6:24	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 6:25	daber 'el 'aharon ve'el banav leimor zot torat hakhatat bimqom 'asher tishakhet ha'olah tishakhet hakhatat lifnei yhvh qodesh qadashim hi leviticus 6:26	hakohen hamkhatei 'otah yokhalenah bemaqom qadosh tei'akhel bakhazar 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 6:27	kol 'asher yiga' bibsarah yiqdash va'asher yizeh midamah 'al habeged 'asher yizeh 'aleha tekhabes bemaqom qadosh. leviticus 6:28	ukheli kheres 'asher tebushal bo yishaber ve'im bikhli nekhoshet bushalah umoraq veshutaf bamayim. leviticus 6:29	kal zakhar bakohanim yokhal 'otah qodesh qadashim hi leviticus 6:30	vekhal khatat 'asher yuba midamah 'el 'ohel mo'ed lekhaper baqodesh lo tei'akhel ba'esh tisaref. leviticus 7:1	vezot torat ha'asham qodesh qadashim hu. leviticus 7:2	bimqom 'asher yishkhatu 'et ha'olah yishkhatu 'et ha'asham ve'et damo yizroq 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. leviticus 7:3	ve'et kal khelbo yaqrib mimenu 'et ha'alyah ve'et hakheileb hamkhaseh 'et haqereb. leviticus 7:4	ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et hakheileb 'asher 'aleihen 'asher 'al hakesalim ve'et hayoteret 'al hakabed 'al hakelayot yesirenah. leviticus 7:5	vehiqtir 'otam hakohen hamizbeikhah 'isheh yhvh 'asham hu. leviticus 7:6	kal zakhar bakohanim yokhelenu bemaqom qadosh yei'akhel qodesh qadashim hu. leviticus 7:7	kakhatat ka'asham torah 'akhat lahem hakohen 'asher yekhaper bo lo yihyeh. leviticus 7:8	vehakohen hamaqrib 'et 'olat 'ish 'or ha'olah 'asher hiqrib lakohen lo yihyeh. leviticus 7:9	vekhal minkhah 'asher tei'afeh batanur vekhal na'asah bamarkheshet ve'al makhabat lakohen hamaqrib 'otah lo tihyeh. leviticus 7:10	vekhal minkhah belulah bashemen vakhareibah lekhal benei 'aharon tihyeh 'ish ke'akhiv. leviticus 7:11	vezot torat zebakh hashelamim 'asher yaqrib yhvh. leviticus 7:12	'im 'al todah yaqribenu vehiqrib 'al zebakh hatodah khalot mazot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen vesolet murbekhet khalot belulot bashamen. leviticus 7:13	'al khalot lekhem khamez yaqrib qarebano 'al zebakh todat shelamav. leviticus 7:14	vehiqrib mimenu 'ekhad mikal qarban terumah yhvh lakohen hazoreq 'et dam hashelamim lo yihyeh. leviticus 7:15	ubesar zebakh todat shelamav beyom qarebano yei'akhel lo yaniakh mimenu 'ad boqer. leviticus 7:16	ve'im neder 'o nedabah zebakh qarebano beyom haqribo 'et zibkho yei'akhel umimakhorat vehanotar mimenu yei'akhel. leviticus 7:17	vehanotar mibesar hazabakh bayom hashelishi ba'esh yisaref. leviticus 7:18	ve'im hei'akhol yei'akhel mibesar zebakh shelamav bayom hashelishi lo yeirazeh hamaqrib 'oto lo yeikhasheb lo pigul yihyeh vehanefesh ha'okhelet mimenu 'avonah tisa. leviticus 7:19	vehabasar 'asher yiga' bekhal tamei lo yei'akhel ba'esh yisaref vehabasar kal tahor yokhal basar. leviticus 7:20	vehanefesh 'asher tokhal basar mizebakh hashelamim 'asher yhvh vetum'ato 'alav venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha. leviticus 7:21	venefesh ki tiga' bekhal tamei betum'at 'adam 'o bibheimah temei'ah 'o bekhal sheqez tamei ve'akhal mibesar zebakh hashelamim 'asher yhvh venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha. leviticus 7:22	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 7:23	daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor kal kheileb shor vekheseb va'ez lo tokheilu. leviticus 7:24	vekheileb nebeilah vekheileb tereifah yei'aseh lekhal melakhah ve'akhol lo tokheluhu. leviticus 7:25	ki kal 'okhel kheileb min habeheimah 'asher yaqrib mimenah 'isheh yhvh venikhretah hanefesh ha'okhelet mei'ameha. leviticus 7:26	vekhal dam lo tokhelu bekhol mosheboteikhem la'of velabeheimah. leviticus 7:27	kal nefesh 'asher tokhal kal dam venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha. leviticus 7:28	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 7:29	daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor hamaqrib 'et zebakh shelamav yhvh yabi 'et qarebano yhvh mizebakh shelamav. leviticus 7:30	yadav tebi'enah 'et 'ishei yhvh 'et hakheileb 'al hekhazeh yebi'enu 'et hekhazeh lehanif 'oto tenufah lifnei yhvh. leviticus 7:31	vehiqtir hakohen 'et hakheileb hamizbeikhah vehayah hekhazeh le'aharon ulebanav. leviticus 7:32	ve'et shoq hayamin titenu terumah lakohen mizibkhei shalmeikhem. leviticus 7:33	hamaqrib 'et dam hashelamim ve'et hakheileb mibenei 'aharon lo tihyeh shoq hayamin lemanah. leviticus 7:34	ki 'et khazeh hatenufah ve'et shoq haterumah laqakhti mei'et benei yisra'el mizibkhei shalmeihem va'eten 'otam le'aharon hakohen ulebanav lekhaq 'olam mei'et benei yisra'el. leviticus 7:35	zot mishkhat 'aharon umishkhat banav mei'ishei yhvh beyom hiqrib 'otam lekhahen yhvh. leviticus 7:36	'asher zivah yhvh latet lahem beyom mashekho 'otam mei'et benei yisra'el khuqat 'olam ledorotam. leviticus 7:37	zot hatorah la'olah laminkhah velakhatat vela'asham velamilu'im ulezebakh hashelamim. leviticus 7:38	'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh behar sinai beyom zavoto 'et benei yisra'el lehaqrib 'et qarebeneihem yhvh bemidbar sinai. leviticus 8:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 8:2	qakh 'et 'aharon ve'et banav 'ito ve'et habegadim ve'et shemen hamishkhah ve'et par hakhatat ve'et shenei ha'eilim ve'et sal hamazot. leviticus 8:3	ve'et kal ha'eidah haqhel 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 8:4	vaya'as mosheh ka'asher zivah yhvh 'oto vatiqahel ha'eidah 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 8:5	vayomer mosheh 'el ha'eidah zeh hadabar 'asher zivah yhvh la'asot. leviticus 8:6	vayaqreb mosheh 'et 'aharon ve'et banav vayirkhaz 'otam bamayim. leviticus 8:7	vayiten 'alav 'et hakutonet vayakhgor 'oto ba'abnet vayalbesh 'oto 'et hame'il vayiten 'alav 'et ha'eifod vayakhgor 'oto bekheisheb ha'eifod vaye'pod lo bo. leviticus 8:8	vayasem 'alav 'et hakhoshen vayiten 'el hakhoshen 'et ha'urim ve'et hatumim. leviticus 8:9	vayasem 'et hamiznefet 'al rosho vayasem 'al hamiznefet 'el mul panav 'et ziz hazahab neizer haqodesh ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. leviticus 8:10	vayiqakh mosheh 'et shemen hamishkhah vayimshakh 'et hamishkan ve'et kal 'asher bo vayqadesh 'otam. leviticus 8:11	vayaz mimenu 'al hamizbeiakh sheba' pe'amim vayimshakh 'et hamizbeiakh ve'et kal keilav ve'et hakiyor ve'et kano leqadesham. leviticus 8:12	vayizoq mishemen hamishkhah 'al rosh 'aharon vayimshakh 'oto leqadesho. leviticus 8:13	vayaqreb mosheh 'et benei 'aharon vayalbishem kutonot vayakhgor 'otam 'abnet vayakhabosh lahem migba'ot ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. leviticus 8:14	vayagesh 'et par hakhatat vayismokh 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh par hakhatat. leviticus 8:15	vayishkhat vayiqakh mosheh 'et hadam vayiten 'al qarnot hamizbeiakh sabib be'ezba'o vaykhatei 'et hamizbeiakh ve'et hadam yazaq 'el yesod hamizbeiakh vayqadesheihu lekhaper 'alav. leviticus 8:16	vayiqakh 'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb ve'et yoteret hakabed ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et khelbehen vayaqter mosheh hamizbeikhah. leviticus 8:17	ve'et hapar ve'et 'oro ve'et besaro ve'et pirsho saraf ba'esh mikhuz lamakhaneh ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. leviticus 8:18	vayaqreb 'et 'el ha'olah vayismekhu 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh ha'ayil. leviticus 8:19	vayishkhat vayizroq mosheh 'et hadam 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. leviticus 8:20	ve'et ha'ayil nitakh lintakhav vayaqter mosheh 'et harosh ve'et hanetakhim ve'et hapader. leviticus 8:21	ve'et haqereb ve'et hakera'ayim rakhaz bamayim vayaqter mosheh 'et kal ha'ayil hamizbeikhah 'olah hu lereiakh nikhoakh 'isheh hu yhvh ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. leviticus 8:22	vayaqreb 'et ha'ayil hasheini 'el hamilu'im vayismekhu 'aharon ubanav 'et yedeihem 'al rosh ha'ayil. leviticus 8:23	vayishkhat vayiqakh mosheh midamo vayiten 'al tenukh 'ozen 'aharon haymanit ve'al bohen yado haymanit ve'al bohen raglo haymanit. leviticus 8:24	vayaqreb 'et benei 'aharon vayiten mosheh min hadam 'al tenukh 'azenam haymanit ve'al bohen yadam haymanit ve'al bohen raglam haymanit vayizroq mosheh 'et hadam 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. leviticus 8:25	vayiqakh 'et hakheileb ve'et ha'alyah ve'et kal hakheileb 'asher 'al haqereb ve'et yoteret hakabed ve'et shetei hakelayot ve'et khelbehen ve'et shoq hayamin. leviticus 8:26	umisal hamazot 'asher lifnei yhvh laqakh khalat mazah 'akhat vekhalat lekhem shemen 'akhat veraqiq 'ekhad vayasem 'al hakhalabim ve'al shoq hayamin. leviticus 8:27	vayiten 'et hakol 'al kapei 'aharon ve'al kapei banav vayanef 'otam tenufah lifnei yhvh. leviticus 8:28	vayiqakh mosheh 'otam mei'al kapeihem vayaqter hamizbeikhah 'al ha'olah milu'im hem lereiakh nikhoakh 'isheh hu yhvh. leviticus 8:29	vayiqakh mosheh 'et hekhazeh vaynifeihu tenufah lifnei yhvh mei'el hamilu'im lemosheh hayah lemanah ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. leviticus 8:30	vayiqakh mosheh mishemen hamishkhah umin hadam 'asher 'al hamizbeiakh vayaz 'al 'aharon 'al begadav ve'al banav ve'al bigdei banav 'ito vayqadesh 'et 'aharon 'et begadav ve'et banav ve'et bigdei banav 'ito. leviticus 8:31	vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon ve'el banav bashelu 'et habasar petakh 'ohel mo'ed vesham tokhelu 'oto ve'et halekhem 'asher besal hamilu'im ka'asher ziveiti leimor 'aharon ubanav yokheluhu. leviticus 8:32	vehanotar babasar ubalakhem ba'esh tisrofu. leviticus 8:33	umipetakh 'ohel mo'ed lo teize'u shib'at yamim 'ad yom melot yemei milu'eikhem ki shib'at yamim yemalei 'et yedkhem. leviticus 8:34	ka'asher 'asah bayom hazeh zivah yhvh la'asot lekhaper 'aleikhem. leviticus 8:35	ufetakh 'ohel mo'ed teishebu yomam valaylah shib'at yamim ushemartem 'et mishmeret yhvh velo tamutu ki khen zuveiti. leviticus 8:36	vaya'as 'aharon ubanav 'et kal hadebarim 'asher zivah yhvh beyad mosheh. leviticus 9:1	vayhi bayom hashemini qara mosheh le'aharon ulebanav uleziqnei yisra'el. leviticus 9:2	vayomer 'el 'aharon qakh lekha 'eigel ben baqar lekhatat ve'ayil le'olah temimim vehaqreb lifnei yhvh. leviticus 9:3	ve'el benei yisra'el tedaber leimor qekhu se'ir 'izim lekhatat ve'eigel vakhebes benei shanah temimim le'olah. leviticus 9:4	veshor va'ayil lishlamim lizboakh lifnei yhvh uminkhah belulah bashamen ki hayom yhvh nir'ah 'aleikhem. leviticus 9:5	vayiqkhu 'et 'asher zivah mosheh 'el penei 'ohel mo'ed vayiqrebu kal ha'eidah vaya'amdu lifnei yhvh. leviticus 9:6	vayomer mosheh zeh hadabar 'asher zivah yhvh ta'asu veyeira 'aleikhem kebod yhvh. leviticus 9:7	vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon qerab 'el hamizbeiakh va'aseh 'et khatatekha ve'et 'olatekha vekhaper ba'adkha ube'ad ha'am va'aseh 'et qareban ha'am vekhaper ba'adam ka'asher zivah yhvh. leviticus 9:8	vayiqrab 'aharon 'el hamizbeiakh vayishkhat 'et 'eigel hakhatat 'asher lo. leviticus 9:9	vayaqribu benei 'aharon 'et hadam 'eilav vayitbol 'ezba'o badam vayiten 'al qarnot hamizbeiakh ve'et hadam yazaq 'el yesod hamizbeiakh. leviticus 9:10	ve'et hakheileb ve'et hakelayot ve'et hayoteret min hakabed min hakhatat hiqtir hamizbeikhah ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. leviticus 9:11	ve'et habasar ve'et ha'or saraf ba'esh mikhuz lamakhaneh. leviticus 9:12	vayishkhat 'et ha'olah vayamzi'u benei 'aharon 'eilav 'et hadam vayizreqeihu 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. leviticus 9:13	ve'et ha'olah himzi'u 'eilav lintakheha ve'et harosh vayaqter 'al hamizbeiakh. leviticus 9:14	vayirkhaz 'et haqereb ve'et hakera'ayim vayaqter 'al ha'olah hamizbeikhah. leviticus 9:15	vayaqreb 'et qareban ha'am vayiqakh 'et se'ir hakhatat 'asher la'am vayishkhateihu vaykhate'eihu karishon. leviticus 9:16	vayaqreb 'et ha'olah vaya'aseha kamishpat. leviticus 9:17	vayaqreb 'et haminkhah vaymalei khapo mimenah vayaqter 'al hamizbeiakh milebad 'olat haboqer. leviticus 9:18	vayishkhat 'et hashor ve'et ha'ayil zebakh hashelamim 'asher la'am vayamzi'u benei 'aharon 'et hadam 'eilav vayizreqeihu 'al hamizbeiakh sabib. leviticus 9:19	ve'et hakhalabim min hashor umin ha'ayil ha'alyah vehamkhaseh vehakelayot veyoteret hakabed. leviticus 9:20	vayasimu 'et hakhalabim 'al hekhazot vayaqter hakhalabim hamizbeikhah. leviticus 9:21	ve'et hekhazot ve'et shoq hayamin heinif 'aharon tenufah lifnei yhvh ka'asher zivah mosheh. leviticus 9:22	vayisa 'aharon 'et yado yadav 'el ha'am vaybarekhem vayeired mei'asot hakhatat veha'olah vehashelamim. leviticus 9:23	vayabo mosheh ve'aharon 'el 'ohel mo'ed vayeize'u vaybarakhu 'et ha'am vayeira khebod yhvh 'el kal ha'am. leviticus 9:24	vateizei 'esh milifnei yhvh vatokhal 'al hamizbeiakh 'et ha'olah ve'et hakhalabim vayar kal ha'am vayaronu vayipelu 'al peneihem. leviticus 10:1	vayiqkhu benei 'aharon nadab va'abihu 'ish makhtato vayitenu bahen 'esh vayasimu 'aleha qetoret vayaqribu lifnei yhvh 'esh zarah 'asher lo zivah 'otam. leviticus 10:2	vateizei 'esh milifnei yhvh vatokhal 'otam vayamutu lifnei yhvh. leviticus 10:3	vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon hu 'asher diber yhvh leimor biqrobai 'eqadesh ve'al penei khal ha'am 'ekabed vayidom 'aharon. leviticus 10:4	vayiqra mosheh 'el misha'el ve'el 'elzafan benei 'uzi'el dod 'aharon vayomer 'aleihem qirbu se'u 'et 'akheikhem mei'et penei haqodesh 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh. leviticus 10:5	vayiqrebu vayisa'um bekhutonotam 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh ka'asher diber mosheh. leviticus 10:6	vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon ule'el'azar ule'itamar banav rasheikhem 'al tifra'u ubigdeikhem lo tifromu velo tamutu ve'al kal ha'eidah yiqzof va'akheikhem kal bet yisra'el yibku 'et hasereifah 'asher saraf yhvh. leviticus 10:7	umipetakh 'ohel mo'ed lo teize'u pen tamutu ki shemen mishkhat yhvh 'aleikhem vaya'asu kidbar mosheh. leviticus 10:8	vaydaber yhvh 'el 'aharon leimor. leviticus 10:9	yayin vesheikhar 'al teishet 'atah ubanekha 'itakh bebo'akhem 'el 'ohel mo'ed velo tamutu khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem. leviticus 10:10	ulahabdil ben haqodesh uben hakhol uben hatamei uben hatahor. leviticus 10:11	ulehorot 'et benei yisra'el 'et kal hakhuqim 'asher diber yhvh 'aleihem beyad mosheh. leviticus 10:12	vaydaber mosheh 'el 'aharon ve'el 'el'azar ve'el 'itamar banav hanotarim qekhu 'et haminkhah hanoteret mei'ishei yhvh ve'ikhluha mazot 'eizel hamizbeiakh ki qodesh qadashim hi leviticus 10:13	va'akhaltem 'otah bemaqom qadosh ki khaqekha vekhaq banekha hi mei'ishei yhvh ki khen zuveiti. leviticus 10:14	ve'et khazeh hatenufah ve'et shoq haterumah tokhelu bemaqom tahor 'atah ubanekha ubenotekha 'itakh ki khaqekha vekhaq banekha nitenu mizibkhei shalmei benei yisra'el. leviticus 10:15	shoq haterumah vakhazeh hatenufah 'al 'ishei hakhalabim yabi'u lehanif tenufah lifnei yhvh vehayah lekha ulebanekha 'itekha lekhaq 'olam ka'asher zivah yhvh. leviticus 10:16	ve'et se'ir hakhatat darosh darash mosheh vehineh soraf vayiqzof 'al 'el'azar ve'al 'itamar benei 'aharon hanotarim leimor. leviticus 10:17	madua' lo 'akhaltem 'et hakhatat bimqom haqodesh ki qodesh qadashim hi ve'otah natan lakhem laset 'et 'avon ha'eidah lekhaper 'aleihem lifnei yhvh. leviticus 10:18	hen lo huba 'et damah 'el haqodesh penimah 'akhol tokhelu 'otah baqodesh ka'asher ziveiti. leviticus 10:19	vaydaber 'aharon 'el mosheh hen hayom hiqribu 'et khatatam ve'et 'olatam lifnei yhvh vatiqrenah 'oti ka'eleh ve'akhalti khatat hayom hayitab be'einei yhvh. leviticus 10:20	vayishma' mosheh vayitab be'einav. leviticus 11:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor 'aleihem. leviticus 11:2	daberu 'el benei yisra'el leimor zot hakhayah 'asher tokhelu mikal habeheimah 'asher 'al ha'arez. leviticus 11:3	kol mafreset parsah veshosa'at shesa' perasot ma'alat geirah babeheimah 'otah tokheilu. leviticus 11:4	'akh 'et zeh lo tokhelu mima'alei hageirah umimafrisei haparsah 'et hagamal ki ma'aleh geirah hu ufarsah 'einenu mafris tamei hu lakhem. leviticus 11:5	ve'et hashafan ki ma'aleh geirah hu ufarsah lo yafris tamei hu lakhem. leviticus 11:6	ve'et ha'arnebet ki ma'alat geirah hi ufarsah lo hifrisah temei'ah hi lakhem. leviticus 11:7	ve'et hakhazir ki mafris parsah hu veshosa' shesa' parsah vehu geirah lo yigar tamei hu lakhem. leviticus 11:8	mibesaram lo tokheilu ubeniblatam lo tiga'u temei'im hem lakhem. leviticus 11:9	'et zeh tokhelu mikol 'asher bamayim kol 'asher lo senapir veqasqeset bamayim bayamim ubanekhalim 'otam tokheilu. leviticus 11:10	vekhol 'asher 'en lo senapir veqasqeset bayamim ubanekhalim mikol sherez hamayim umikol nefesh hakhayah 'asher bamayim sheqez hem lakhem. leviticus 11:11	vesheqez yihyu lakhem mibesaram lo tokheilu ve'et niblatam teshaqeizu. leviticus 11:12	kol 'asher 'en lo senapir veqasqeset bamayim sheqez hu lakhem. leviticus 11:13	ve'et 'eleh teshaqezu min ha'of lo yei'akhelu sheqez hem 'et hanesher ve'et haperes ve'et ha'azeniyah. leviticus 11:14	ve'et hada'ah ve'et ha'ayah leminah. leviticus 11:15	'et kal 'oreb lemino. leviticus 11:16	ve'et bat haya'anah ve'et hatakhmas ve'et hashakhaf ve'et hanez lemineihu. leviticus 11:17	ve'et hakos ve'et hashalakh ve'et hayanshuf. leviticus 11:18	ve'et hatinshemet ve'et haqa'at ve'et harakham. leviticus 11:19	ve'et hakhasidah ha'anafah leminah ve'et hadukhifat ve'et ha'atalef. leviticus 11:20	kol sherez ha'of haholekh 'al 'arba' sheqez hu lakhem. leviticus 11:21	'akh 'et zeh tokhelu mikol sherez ha'of haholekh 'al 'arba' 'asher lo lo khera'ayim mima'al leraglav lenater bahen 'al ha'arez. leviticus 11:22	'et 'eleh meihem tokheilu 'et ha'arbeh lemino ve'et hasale'am lemineihu ve'et hakhargol lemineihu ve'et hekhagab lemineihu. leviticus 11:23	vekhol sherez ha'of 'asher lo 'arba' raglayim sheqez hu lakhem. leviticus 11:24	ule'eleh titama'u kal hanogeia' beniblatam yitma 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 11:25	vekhal hanosei miniblatam yekhabes begadav vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 11:26	lekhal habeheimah 'asher hi mafreset parsah veshesa' 'einenah shosa'at vegeirah 'einenah ma'alah temei'im hem lakhem kal hanogeia' bahem yitma. leviticus 11:27	vekhol holekh 'al kapav bekhal hakhayah haholekhet 'al 'arba' temei'im hem lakhem kal hanogeia' beniblatam yitma 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 11:28	vehanosei 'et niblatam yekhabes begadav vetamei 'ad ha'areb temei'im hemah lakhem. leviticus 11:29	vezeh lakhem hatamei basherez hashorez 'al ha'arez hakholed veha'akhbar vehazab lemineihu. leviticus 11:30	veha'anaqah vehakoakh vehaleta'ah vehakhomet vehatinshamet. leviticus 11:31	'eleh hatemei'im lakhem bekhal hasharez kal hanogeia' bahem bemotam yitma 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 11:32	vekhol 'asher yipol 'alav meihem bemotam yitma mikal keli 'ez 'o beged 'o 'or 'o saq kal keli 'asher yei'aseh melakhah bahem bamayim yuba vetamei 'ad ha'ereb vetaher. leviticus 11:33	vekhal keli kheres 'asher yipol meihem 'el tokho kol 'asher betokho yitma ve'oto tishboru. leviticus 11:34	mikal ha'okhel 'asher yei'akhel 'asher yabo 'alav mayim yitma vekhal mashqeh 'asher yishateh bekhal keli yitma. leviticus 11:35	vekhol 'asher yipol miniblatam 'alav yitma tanur vekhirayim yutaz temei'im hem utemei'im yihyu lakhem. leviticus 11:36	'akh ma'yan ubor miqveh mayim yihyeh tahor venogeia' beniblatam yitma. leviticus 11:37	vekhi yipol miniblatam 'al kal zera' zeirua' 'asher yizareia' tahor hu. leviticus 11:38	vekhi yutan mayim 'al zera' venafal miniblatam 'alav tamei hu lakhem. leviticus 11:39	vekhi yamut min habeheimah 'asher hi lakhem le'akhlah hanogeia' beniblatah yitma 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 11:40	veha'okhel miniblatah yekhabes begadav vetamei 'ad ha'areb vehanosei 'et niblatah yekhabes begadav vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 11:41	vekhal hasherez hashorez 'al ha'arez sheqez hu lo yei'akhel. leviticus 11:42	kol holekh 'al gakhon vekhol holekh 'al 'arba' 'ad kal marbeh raglayim lekhal hasherez hashorez 'al ha'arez lo tokhelum ki sheqez hem. leviticus 11:43	'al teshaqezu 'et nafshoteikhem bekhal hasherez hashorez velo titame'u bahem venitmeitem bam. leviticus 11:44	ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem vehitqadishtem vihyitem qedoshim ki qadosh 'ani velo tetame'u 'et nafshoteikhem bekhal hasherez haromes 'al ha'arez. leviticus 11:45	ki 'ani yhvh hama'aleh 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim lihyot lakhem leilohim vihyitem qedoshim ki qadosh 'ani. leviticus 11:46	zot torat habeheimah veha'of vekhol nefesh hakhayah haromeset bamayim ulekhal nefesh hashorezet 'al ha'arez. leviticus 11:47	lehabdil ben hatamei uben hatahor uben hakhayah hane'ekhelet uben hakhayah 'asher lo tei'akhel. leviticus
