12:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 12:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor 'ishah ki tazria' veyaledah zakhar vetame'ah shib'at yamim kimei nidat devotah titma. leviticus 12:3	ubayom hashemini yimol besar 'arelato. leviticus 12:4	usheloshim yom usheloshet yamim teisheb bidmei tahorah bekhal qodesh lo tiga' ve'el hamiqdash lo tabo 'ad melot yemei tahorah. leviticus 12:5	ve'im neqeibah teiled vetame'ah shebu'ayim kenidatah veshishim yom vesheishet yamim teisheb 'al demei tahorah. leviticus 12:6	ubimlot yemei tahorah leben 'o lebat tabi kebes ben shenato le'olah uben yonah 'o tor lekhatat 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed 'el hakohen. leviticus 12:7	vehiqribo lifnei yhvh vekhiper 'aleha vetaharah mimeqor dameha zot torat hayoledet lazakhar 'o laneqeibah. leviticus 12:8	ve'im lo timza yadah dei seh velaqekhah shetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah 'ekhad le'olah ve'ekhad lekhatat vekhiper 'aleha hakohen vetaheirah. leviticus 13:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. leviticus 13:2	'adam ki yihyeh be'or besaro se'et 'o sapakhat 'o baheret vehayah be'or besaro lenega' zara'at vehuba 'el 'aharon hakohen 'o 'el 'akhad mibanav hakohanim. leviticus 13:3	vera'ah hakohen 'et hanega' be'or habasar vesei'ar banega' hafakh laban umar'eh hanega' 'amoq mei'or besaro nega' zara'at hu vera'ahu hakohen vetimei 'oto. leviticus 13:4	ve'im baheret lebanah hi be'or besaro ve'amoq 'en mar'eha min ha'or use'arah lo hafakh laban vehisgir hakohen 'et hanega' shib'at yamim. leviticus 13:5	vera'ahu hakohen bayom hashebi'i vehineh hanega' 'amad be'einav lo fasah hanega' ba'or vehisgiro hakohen shib'at yamim sheinit. leviticus 13:6	vera'ah hakohen 'oto bayom hashebi'i sheinit vehineh keihah hanega' velo fasah hanega' ba'or vetiharo hakohen mispakhat hi vekhibes begadav vetaher. leviticus 13:7	ve'im pasoh tifseh hamispakhat ba'or 'akharei heira'oto 'el hakohen letahorato venir'ah sheinit 'el hakohen. leviticus 13:8	vera'ah hakohen vehineh pasetah hamispakhat ba'or vetime'o hakohen zara'at hi leviticus 13:9	nega' zara'at ki tihyeh be'adam vehuba 'el hakohen. leviticus 13:10	vera'ah hakohen vehineh se'et lebanah ba'or vehi hafekhah sei'ar laban umikhyat basar khai bas'et. leviticus 13:11	zara'at noshenet hi be'or besaro vetime'o hakohen lo yasgirenu ki tamei hu. leviticus 13:12	ve'im paroakh tifrakh hazara'at ba'or vekhisetah hazara'at 'et kal 'or hanega' meirosho ve'ad raglav lekhal mar'eh 'einei hakohen. leviticus 13:13	vera'ah hakohen vehineh khisetah hazara'at 'et kal besaro vetihar 'et hanaga' kulo hafakh laban tahor hu. leviticus 13:14	ubeyom heira'ot bo basar khai yitma. leviticus 13:15	vera'ah hakohen 'et habasar hakhai vetime'o habasar hakhai tamei hu zara'at hu. leviticus 13:16	'o khi yashub habasar hakhai venehpakh lelaban uba 'el hakohen. leviticus 13:17	vera'ahu hakohen vehineh nehpakh hanega' lelaban vetihar hakohen 'et hanega' tahor hu. leviticus 13:18	ubasar ki yihyeh bo be'oro shekhin venirpa. leviticus 13:19	vehayah bimqom hashekhin se'et lebanah 'o baheret lebanah 'adamdamet venir'ah 'el hakohen. leviticus 13:20	vera'ah hakohen vehineh mar'eha shafal min ha'or use'arah hafakh laban vetime'o hakohen nega' zara'at hi bashekhin parakhah. leviticus 13:21	ve'im yir'enah hakohen vehineh 'en bah sei'ar laban ushefalah 'einenah min ha'or vehi kheihah vehisgiro hakohen shib'at yamim. leviticus 13:22	ve'im pasoh tifseh ba'or vetimei hakohen 'oto nega' hi leviticus 13:23	ve'im takhteha ta'amod habaheret lo fasatah zarebet hashekhin hi vetiharo hakohen. leviticus 13:24	'o basar ki yihyeh be'oro mikhvat 'esh vehayetah mikhyat hamikhvah baheret lebanah 'adamdemet 'o lebanah. leviticus 13:25	vera'ah 'otah hakohen vehineh nehpakh sei'ar laban babaheret umar'eha 'amoq min ha'or zara'at hi bamikhvah parakhah vetimei 'oto hakohen nega' zara'at hi leviticus 13:26	ve'im yir'enah hakohen vehineh 'en babeheret sei'ar laban ushefalah 'einenah min ha'or vehiv kheihah vehisgiro hakohen shib'at yamim. leviticus 13:27	vera'ahu hakohen bayom hashebi'i 'im pasoh tifseh ba'or vetimei hakohen 'oto nega' zara'at hi leviticus 13:28	ve'im takhteha ta'amod habaheret lo fasetah ba'or vehiv kheihah se'et hamikhvah hi vetiharo hakohen ki zarebet hamikhvah hi leviticus 13:29	ve'ish 'o 'ishah ki yihyeh bo naga' berosh 'o bezaqan. leviticus 13:30	vera'ah hakohen 'et hanega' vehineh mar'eihu 'amoq min ha'or ubo sei'ar zahob daq vetimei 'oto hakohen neteq hu zara'at harosh 'o hazaqan hu. leviticus 13:31	vekhi yir'eh hakohen 'et nega' haneteq vehineh 'en mar'eihu 'amoq min ha'or vesei'ar shakhor 'en bo vehisgir hakohen 'et nega' haneteq shib'at yamim. leviticus 13:32	vera'ah hakohen 'et hanega' bayom hashebi'i vehineh lo fasah haneteq velo hayah bo sei'ar zahob umar'eh haneteq 'en 'amoq min ha'or. leviticus 13:33	vehitgalakh ve'et haneteq lo yegaleiakh vehisgir hakohen 'et haneteq shib'at yamim sheinit. leviticus 13:34	vera'ah hakohen 'et haneteq bayom hashebi'i vehineh lo fasah haneteq ba'or umar'eihu 'einenu 'amoq min ha'or vetihar 'oto hakohen vekhibes begadav vetaher. leviticus 13:35	ve'im pasoh yifseh haneteq ba'or 'akharei tahorato. leviticus 13:36	vera'ahu hakohen vehineh pasah haneteq ba'or lo yebaqer hakohen lasei'ar hazahob tamei hu. leviticus 13:37	ve'im be'einav 'amad haneteq vesei'ar shakhor zamakh bo nirpa haneteq tahor hu vetiharo hakohen. leviticus 13:38	ve'ish 'o 'ishah ki yihyeh be'or besaram beharot beharot lebanot. leviticus 13:39	vera'ah hakohen vehineh be'or besaram beharot keihot lebanot bohaq hu parakh ba'or tahor hu. leviticus 13:40	ve'ish ki yimaret rosho qeireiakh hu tahor hu. leviticus 13:41	ve'im mipe'at panav yimaret rosho gibeiakh hu tahor hu. leviticus 13:42	vekhi yihyeh baqarakhat 'o bagabakhat nega' laban 'adamdam zara'at porakhat hi beqarakhto 'o begabakhto. leviticus 13:43	vera'ah 'oto hakohen vehineh se'et hanega' lebanah 'adamdemet beqarakhto 'o begabakhto kemar'eh zara'at 'or basar. leviticus 13:44	'ish zarua' hu tamei hu tamei yetame'enu hakohen berosho nig'o. leviticus 13:45	vehazarua' 'asher bo hanega' begadav yihyu ferumim verosho yihyeh farua' ve'al safam ya'teh vetamei tamei yiqra. leviticus 13:46	kal yemei 'asher hanega' bo yitma tamei hu badad yeisheb mikhuz lamakhaneh moshabo. leviticus 13:47	vehabeged ki yihyeh bo nega' zara'at bebeged zemer 'o bebeged pishtim. leviticus 13:48	'o bishti 'o be'eireb lapishtim velazamer 'o be'or 'o bekhal melekhet 'or. leviticus 13:49	vehayah hanega' yeraqraq 'o 'adamdam babeged 'o ba'or 'o basheti 'o ba'eireb 'o bekhal keli 'or nega' zara'at hu vehare'ah 'et hakohen. leviticus 13:50	vera'ah hakohen 'et hanaga' vehisgir 'et hanega' shib'at yamim. leviticus 13:51	vera'ah 'et hanega' bayom hashebi'i ki fasah hanega' babeged 'o basheti 'o ba'eireb 'o ba'or lekhol 'asher yei'aseh ha'or limlakhah zara'at mam'eret hanega' tamei hu. leviticus 13:52	vesaraf 'et habeged 'o 'et hasheti 'o 'et ha'eireb bazemer 'o bapishtim 'o 'et kal keli ha'or 'asher yihyeh bo hanaga' ki zara'at mam'eret hi ba'esh tisaref. leviticus 13:53	ve'im yir'eh hakohen vehineh lo fasah hanega' babeged 'o basheti 'o ba'eireb 'o bekhal keli 'or. leviticus 13:54	vezivah hakohen vekhibesu 'et 'asher bo hanaga' vehisgiro shib'at yamim sheinit. leviticus 13:55	vera'ah hakohen 'akharei hukabes 'et hanega' vehineh lo hafakh hanega' 'et 'eino vehanega' lo fasah tamei hu ba'esh tisrefenu pekhetet hi beqarakhto 'o begabakhto. leviticus 13:56	ve'im ra'ah hakohen vehineh keihah hanega' 'akharei hukabes 'oto veqara' 'oto min habeged 'o min ha'or 'o min hasheti 'o min ha'eireb. leviticus 13:57	ve'im teira'eh 'od babeged 'o basheti 'o ba'eireb 'o bekhal keli 'or porakhat hi ba'esh tisrefenu 'et 'asher bo hanaga'. leviticus 13:58	vehabeged 'o hasheti 'o ha'eireb 'o khal keli ha'or 'asher tekhabes vesar meihem hanaga' vekhubas sheinit vetaher. leviticus 13:59	zot torat nega' zara'at beged hazemer 'o hapishtim 'o hasheti 'o ha'eireb 'o kal keli 'or letaharo 'o letame'o. leviticus 14:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 14:2	zot tihyeh torat hamezora' beyom tahorato vehuba 'el hakohen. leviticus 14:3	veyaza hakohen 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vera'ah hakohen vehineh nirpa nega' hazara'at min hazarua'. leviticus 14:4	vezivah hakohen velaqakh lamitaher shetei ziporim khayot tehorot ve'ez 'erez usheni tola'at ve'eizob. leviticus 14:5	vezivah hakohen veshakhat 'et hazipor ha'ekhat 'el keli kheres 'al mayim khayim. leviticus 14:6	'et hazipor hakhayah yiqakh 'otah ve'et 'ez ha'erez ve'et sheni hatola'at ve'et ha'eizob vetabal 'otam ve'et hazipor hakhayah bedam hazipor hashekhutah 'al hamayim hakhayim. leviticus 14:7	vehizah 'al hamitaher min hazara'at sheba' pe'amim vetiharo veshilakh 'et hazipor hakhayah 'al penei hasadeh. leviticus 14:8	vekhibes hamitaher 'et begadav vegilakh 'et kal se'aro verakhaz bamayim vetaher ve'akhar yabo 'el hamakhaneh veyashab mikhuz le'aholo shib'at yamim. leviticus 14:9	vehayah bayom hashebi'i yegalakh 'et kal se'aro 'et rosho ve'et zeqano ve'et gabot 'einav ve'et kal se'aro yegaleiakh vekhibes 'et begadav verakhaz 'et besaro bamayim vetaher. leviticus 14:10	ubayom hashemini yiqakh shenei khebasim temimim vekhabsah 'akhat bat shenatah temimah usheloshah 'esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen velog 'ekhad shamen. leviticus 14:11	vehe'emid hakohen hamtaher 'et ha'ish hamitaher ve'otam lifnei yhvh petakh 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 14:12	velaqakh hakohen 'et hakebes ha'ekhad vehiqrib 'oto le'asham ve'et log hashamen veheinif 'otam tenufah lifnei yhvh. leviticus 14:13	veshakhat 'et hakebes bimqom 'asher yishkhat 'et hakhatat ve'et ha'olah bimqom haqodesh ki kakhatat ha'asham hu lakohen qodesh qadashim hu. leviticus 14:14	velaqakh hakohen midam ha'asham venatan hakohen 'al tenukh 'ozen hamitaher haymanit ve'al bohen yado haymanit ve'al bohen raglo haymanit. leviticus 14:15	velaqakh hakohen milog hashamen veyazaq 'al kaf hakohen hasemalit. leviticus 14:16	vetabal hakohen 'et 'ezba'o haymanit min hashemen 'asher 'al kapo hasemalit vehizah min hashemen be'ezba'o sheba' pe'amim lifnei yhvh. leviticus 14:17	umiyeter hashemen 'asher 'al kapo yiten hakohen 'al tenukh 'ozen hamitaher haymanit ve'al bohen yado haymanit ve'al bohen raglo haymanit 'al dam ha'asham. leviticus 14:18	vehanotar bashemen 'asher 'al kaf hakohen yiten 'al rosh hamitaher vekhiper 'alav hakohen lifnei yhvh. leviticus 14:19	ve'asah hakohen 'et hakhatat vekhiper 'al hamitaher mitum'ato ve'akhar yishkhat 'et ha'olah. leviticus 14:20	vehe'elah hakohen 'et ha'olah ve'et haminkhah hamizbeikhah vekhiper 'alav hakohen vetaher. leviticus 14:21	ve'im dal hu ve'en yado maseget velaqakh kebes 'ekhad 'asham litnufah lekhaper 'alav ve'isaron solet 'ekhad balul bashemen leminkhah velog shamen. leviticus 14:22	ushetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah 'asher tasig yado vehayah 'ekhad khatat veha'ekhad 'olah. leviticus 14:23	veheibi 'otam bayom hashemini letahorato 'el hakohen 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed lifnei yhvh. leviticus 14:24	velaqakh hakohen 'et kebes ha'asham ve'et log hashamen veheinif 'otam hakohen tenufah lifnei yhvh. leviticus 14:25	veshakhat 'et kebes ha'asham velaqakh hakohen midam ha'asham venatan 'al tenukh 'ozen hamitaher haymanit ve'al bohen yado haymanit ve'al bohen raglo haymanit. leviticus 14:26	umin hashemen yizoq hakohen 'al kaf hakohen hasemalit. leviticus 14:27	vehizah hakohen be'ezba'o haymanit min hashemen 'asher 'al kapo hasemalit sheba' pe'amim lifnei yhvh. leviticus 14:28	venatan hakohen min hashemen 'asher 'al kapo 'al tenukh 'ozen hamitaher haymanit ve'al bohen yado haymanit ve'al bohen raglo haymanit 'al meqom dam ha'asham. leviticus 14:29	vehanotar min hashemen 'asher 'al kaf hakohen yiten 'al rosh hamitaher lekhaper 'alav lifnei yhvh. leviticus 14:30	ve'asah 'et ha'ekhad min hatorim 'o min benei hayonah mei'asher tasig yado. leviticus 14:31	'et 'asher tasig yado 'et ha'ekhad khatat ve'et ha'ekhad 'olah 'al haminkhah vekhiper hakohen 'al hamitaher lifnei yhvh. leviticus 14:32	zot torat 'asher bo nega' zara'at 'asher lo tasig yado betahorato. leviticus 14:33	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. leviticus 14:34	ki tabo'u 'el 'erez kena'an 'asher 'ani noten lakhem la'akhuzah venatati nega' zara'at bebet 'erez 'akhuzatkhem. leviticus 14:35	uba 'asher lo habayit vehigid lakohen leimor kenega' nir'ah li babayit. leviticus 14:36	vezivah hakohen ufinu 'et habayit beterem yabo hakohen lir'ot 'et hanega' velo yitma kal 'asher babayit ve'akhar ken yabo hakohen lir'ot 'et habayit. leviticus 14:37	vera'ah 'et hanega' vehineh hanega' beqirot habayit sheqa'arurot yeraqraqot 'o 'adamdamot umar'eihen shafal min haqir. leviticus 14:38	veyaza hakohen min habayit 'el petakh habayit vehisgir 'et habayit shib'at yamim. leviticus 14:39	veshab hakohen bayom hashebi'i vera'ah vehineh pasah hanega' beqirot habayit. leviticus 14:40	vezivah hakohen vekhilezu 'et ha'abanim 'asher bahen hanaga' vehishlikhu 'ethen 'el mikhuz la'ir 'el maqom tamei. leviticus 14:41	ve'et habayit yaqzia' mibayit sabib veshafekhu 'et he'afar 'asher hiqzu 'el mikhuz la'ir 'el maqom tamei. leviticus 14:42	velaqekhu 'abanim 'akheirot veheibi'u 'el takhat ha'abanim ve'afar 'akher yiqakh vetakh 'et habayit. leviticus 14:43	ve'im yashub hanega' ufarakh babayit 'akhar khilez 'et ha'abanim ve'akharei hiqzot 'et habayit ve'akharei hitoakh. leviticus 14:44	uba hakohen vera'ah vehineh pasah hanega' babayit zara'at mam'eret hi babayit tamei hu. leviticus 14:45	venataz 'et habayit 'et 'abanav ve'et 'eizav ve'et kal 'afar habayit vehozi 'el mikhuz la'ir 'el maqom tamei. leviticus 14:46	vehaba 'el habayit kal yemei hisgir 'oto yitma 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 14:47	vehashokheb babayit yekhabes 'et begadav veha'okhel babayit yekhabes 'et begadav. leviticus 14:48	ve'im bo yabo hakohen vera'ah vehineh lo fasah hanega' babayit 'akharei hitoakh 'et habayit vetihar hakohen 'et habayit ki nirpa hanaga'. leviticus 14:49	velaqakh lekhatei 'et habayit shetei ziporim ve'ez 'erez usheni tola'at ve'eizob. leviticus 14:50	veshakhat 'et hazipor ha'ekhat 'el keli kheres 'al mayim khayim. leviticus 14:51	velaqakh 'et 'ez ha'erez ve'et ha'eizob ve'et sheni hatola'at ve'et hazipor hakhayah vetabal 'otam bedam hazipor hashekhutah ubamayim hakhayim vehizah 'el habayit sheba' pe'amim. leviticus 14:52	vekhitei 'et habayit bedam hazipor ubamayim hakhayim ubazipor hakhayah ube'ez ha'erez uba'eizob ubishni hatola'at. leviticus 14:53	veshilakh 'et hazipor hakhayah 'el mikhuz la'ir 'el penei hasadeh vekhiper 'al habayit vetaher. leviticus 14:54	zot hatorah lekhal nega' hazara'at velanateq. leviticus 14:55	ulezara'at habeged velabayit. leviticus 14:56	velas'et velasapakhat velabeharet. leviticus 14:57	lehorot beyom hatamei ubeyom hatahor zot torat hazara'at. leviticus 15:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. leviticus 15:2	daberu 'el benei yisra'el va'amartem 'aleihem 'ish 'ish ki yihyeh zab mibesaro zobo tamei hu. leviticus 15:3	vezot tihyeh tum'ato bezobo rar besaro 'et zobo 'o hekhtim besaro mizobo tum'ato hi leviticus 15:4	kal hamishkab 'asher yishkab 'alav hazab yitma vekhal hakeli 'asher yeisheb 'alav yitma. leviticus 15:5	ve'ish 'asher yiga' bemishkabo yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:6	vehayosheb 'al hakeli 'asher yeisheb 'alav hazab yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:7	vehanogeia' bibsar hazab yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:8	vekhi yaroq hazab batahor vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:9	vekhal hamerkab 'asher yirkab 'alav hazab yitma. leviticus 15:10	vekhal hanogeia' bekhol 'asher yihyeh takhtav yitma 'ad ha'areb vehanosei 'otam yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:11	vekhol 'asher yiga' bo hazab veyadav lo shataf bamayim vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:12	ukheli kheres 'asher yiga' bo hazab yishaber vekhal keli 'ez yishatef bamayim. leviticus 15:13	vekhi yithar hazab mizobo vesafar lo shib'at yamim letahorato vekhibes begadav verakhaz besaro bemayim khayim vetaher. leviticus 15:14	ubayom hashemini yiqakh lo shetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah uba lifnei yhvh 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed unetanam 'el hakohen. leviticus 15:15	ve'asah 'otam hakohen 'ekhad khatat veha'ekhad 'olah vekhiper 'alav hakohen lifnei yhvh mizobo. leviticus 15:16	ve'ish ki teizei mimenu shikhbat zara' verakhaz bamayim 'et kal besaro vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:17	vekhal beged vekhal 'or 'asher yihyeh 'alav shikhbat zara' vekhubas bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:18	ve'ishah 'asher yishkab 'ish 'otah shikhbat zara' verakhazu bamayim vetame'u 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:19	ve'ishah ki tihyeh zabah dam yihyeh zobah bibsarah shib'at yamim tihyeh benidatah vekhal hanogeia' bah yitma 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:20	vekhol 'asher tishkab 'alav benidatah yitma vekhol 'asher teisheb 'alav yitma. leviticus 15:21	vekhal hanogeia' bemishkabah yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:22	vekhal hanogeia' bekhal keli 'asher teisheb 'alav yekhabes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:23	ve'im 'al hamishkab hu 'o 'al hakeli 'asher hi yoshebet 'alav benage'o bo yitma 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:24	ve'im shakhob yishkab 'ish 'otah utehi nidatah 'alav vetamei shib'at yamim vekhal hamishkab 'asher yishkab 'alav yitma. leviticus 15:25	ve'ishah ki yazub zob damah yamim rabim belo 'et nidatah 'o khi tazub 'al nidatah kal yemei zob tum'atah kimei nidatah tihyeh temei'ah hi leviticus 15:26	kal hamishkab 'asher tishkab 'alav kal yemei zobah kemishkab nidatah yihyeh lah vekhal hakeli 'asher teisheb 'alav tamei yihyeh ketum'at nidatah. leviticus 15:27	vekhal hanogeia' bam yitma vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. leviticus 15:28	ve'im taharah mizobah vesaferah lah shib'at yamim ve'akhar tithar. leviticus 15:29	ubayom hashemini tiqakh lah shetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah veheibi'ah 'otam 'el hakohen 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 15:30	ve'asah hakohen 'et ha'ekhad khatat ve'et ha'ekhad 'olah vekhiper 'aleha hakohen lifnei yhvh mizob tum'atah. leviticus 15:31	vehizartem 'et benei yisra'el mitum'atam velo yamutu betum'atam betame'am 'et mishkani 'asher betokham. leviticus 15:32	zot torat hazab va'asher teizei mimenu shikhbat zera' letame'ah bah. leviticus 15:33	vehadavah benidatah vehazab 'et zobo lazakhar velaneqeibah ule'ish 'asher yishkab 'im temei'ah. leviticus 16:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh 'akharei mot shenei benei 'aharon beqarebatam lifnei yhvh vayamutu. leviticus 16:2	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh daber 'el 'aharon 'akhikha ve'al yabo bekhal 'et 'el haqodesh mibet laparokhet 'el penei hakaporet 'asher 'al ha'aron velo yamut ki be'anan 'eira'eh 'al hakaporet. leviticus 16:3	bezot yabo 'aharon 'el haqodesh befar ben baqar lekhatat ve'ayil le'olah. leviticus 16:4	ketonet bad qodesh yilbash umikhnesei bad yihyu 'al besaro ube'abnet bad yakhgor ubemiznefet bad yiznof bigdei qodesh hem verakhaz bamayim 'et besaro ulebeisham. leviticus 16:5	umei'et 'adat benei yisra'el yiqakh shenei se'irei 'izim lekhatat ve'ayil 'ekhad le'olah. leviticus 16:6	vehiqrib 'aharon 'et par hakhatat 'asher lo vekhiper ba'ado ube'ad beito. leviticus 16:7	velaqakh 'et shenei hase'irim vehe'emid 'otam lifnei yhvh petakh 'ohel mo'ed. leviticus 16:8	venatan 'aharon 'al shenei hase'irim goralot goral 'ekhad yhvh vegoral 'ekhad la'azazel. leviticus 16:9	vehiqrib 'aharon 'et hasa'ir 'asher 'alah 'alav hagoral yhvh ve'asahu khatat. leviticus 16:10	vehasa'ir 'asher 'alah 'alav hagoral la'azazel ya'omad khai lifnei yhvh lekhaper 'alav leshalakh 'oto la'azazel hamidbarah. leviticus 16:11	vehiqrib 'aharon 'et par hakhatat 'asher lo vekhiper ba'ado ube'ad beito veshakhat 'et par hakhatat 'asher lo. leviticus 16:12	velaqakh melo hamakhtah gakhalei 'esh mei'al hamizbeiakh milifnei yhvh umelo khafenav qetoret samim daqah veheibi mibet laparokhet. leviticus 16:13	venatan 'et haqetoret 'al ha'esh lifnei yhvh vekhisah 'anan haqetoret 'et hakaporet 'asher 'al ha'eidut velo yamut. leviticus 16:14	velaqakh midam hapar vehizah be'ezba'o 'al penei hakaporet qeidemah velifnei hakaporet yazeh sheba' pe'amim min hadam be'ezba'o. leviticus 16:15	veshakhat 'et se'ir hakhatat 'asher la'am veheibi 'et damo 'el mibet laparokhet ve'asah 'et damo ka'asher 'asah ledam hapar vehizah 'oto 'al hakaporet velifnei hakaporet. leviticus 16:16	vekhiper 'al haqodesh mitum'ot benei yisra'el umipish'eihem lekhal khatotam vekhen ya'aseh le'ohel mo'ed hashokhen 'itam betokh tum'otam. leviticus 16:17	vekhal 'adam lo yihyeh be'ohel mo'ed bebo'o lekhaper baqodesh 'ad zeito vekhiper ba'ado ube'ad beito ube'ad kal qehal yisra'el. leviticus 16:18	veyaza 'el hamizbeiakh 'asher lifnei yhvh vekhiper 'alav velaqakh midam hapar umidam hasa'ir venatan 'al qarnot hamizbeiakh sabib. leviticus 16:19	vehizah 'alav min hadam be'ezba'o sheba' pe'amim vetiharo veqidesho mitum'ot benei yisra'el. leviticus 16:20	vekhilah mikaper 'et haqodesh ve'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et hamizbeiakh vehiqrib 'et hasa'ir hekhai. leviticus 16:21	vesamakh 'aharon 'et shetei yado yadav 'al rosh hasa'ir hakhai vehitvadah 'alav 'et kal 'avonot benei yisra'el ve'et kal pish'eihem lekhal khatotam venatan 'otam 'al rosh hasa'ir veshilakh beyad 'ish 'iti hamidbarah. leviticus 16:22	venasa hasa'ir 'alav 'et kal 'avonotam 'el 'erez gezeirah veshilakh 'et hasa'ir bamidbar. leviticus 16:23	uba 'aharon 'el 'ohel mo'ed ufashat 'et bigdei habad 'asher labash bebo'o 'el haqodesh vehinikham sham. leviticus 16:24	verakhaz 'et besaro bamayim bemaqom qadosh velabash 'et begadav veyaza ve'asah 'et 'olato ve'et 'olat ha'am vekhiper ba'ado ube'ad ha'am. leviticus 16:25	ve'et kheileb hakhatat yaqtir hamizbeikhah. leviticus 16:26	vehamshaleiakh 'et hasa'ir la'azazel yekhabes begadav verakhaz 'et besaro bamayim ve'akharei khen yabo 'el hamakhaneh. leviticus 16:27	ve'et par hakhatat ve'et se'ir hakhatat 'asher huba 'et damam lekhaper baqodesh yozi 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vesarefu ba'esh 'et 'orotam ve'et besaram ve'et pirsham. leviticus 16:28	vehasoref 'otam yekhabes begadav verakhaz 'et besaro bamayim ve'akharei khen yabo 'el hamakhaneh. leviticus 16:29	vehayetah lakhem lekhuqat 'olam bakhodesh hashebi'i be'asor lakhodesh te'anu 'et nafshoteikhem vekhal melakhah lo ta'asu ha'ezrakh vehager hagar betokhkhem. leviticus 16:30	ki bayom hazeh yekhaper 'aleikhem letaher 'etkhem mikol khatoteikhem lifnei yhvh titharu. leviticus 16:31	shabat shabaton hi lakhem ve'initem 'et nafshoteikhem khuqat 'olam. leviticus 16:32	vekhiper hakohen 'asher yimshakh 'oto va'asher yemalei 'et yado lekhahen takhat 'abiv velabash 'et bigdei habad bigdei haqodesh. leviticus 16:33	vekhiper 'et miqdash haqodesh ve'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et hamizbeiakh yekhaper ve'al hakohanim ve'al kal 'am haqahal yekhaper. leviticus 16:34	vehayetah zot lakhem lekhuqat 'olam lekhaper 'al benei yisra'el mikal khatotam 'akhat bashanah vaya'as ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. leviticus 17:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 17:2	daber 'el 'aharon ve'el banav ve'el kal benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem zeh hadabar 'asher zivah yhvh leimor. leviticus 17:3	'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el 'asher yishkhat shor 'o kheseb 'o 'ez bamakhaneh 'o 'asher yishkhat mikhuz lamakhaneh. leviticus 17:4	ve'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed lo hebi'o lehaqrib qarban yhvh lifnei mishkan yhvh dam yeikhasheb la'ish hahu dam shafakh venikhrat ha'ish hahu miqereb 'amo. leviticus 17:5	lema'an 'asher yabi'u benei yisra'el 'et zibkheihem 'asher hem zobekhim 'al penei hasadeh vehebi'um yhvh 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed 'el hakohen vezabekhu zibkhei shelamim yhvh 'otam. leviticus 17:6	vezaraq hakohen 'et hadam 'al mizbakh yhvh petakh 'ohel mo'ed vehiqtir hakheileb lereiakh nikhoakh yhvh. leviticus 17:7	velo yizbekhu 'od 'et zibkheihem lase'irim 'asher hem zonim 'akhareihem khuqat 'olam tihyeh zot lahem ledorotam. leviticus 17:8	va'aleihem tomar 'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el umin hager 'asher yagur betokham 'asher ya'aleh 'olah 'o zabakh. leviticus 17:9	ve'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed lo yebi'enu la'asot 'oto yhvh venikhrat ha'ish hahu mei'amav. leviticus 17:10	ve'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el umin hager hagar betokham 'asher yokhal kal dam venatati fanai banefesh ha'okhelet 'et hadam vehikhrati 'otah miqereb 'amah. leviticus 17:11	ki nefesh habasar badam hi va'ani netativ lakhem 'al hamizbeiakh lekhaper 'al nafshoteikhem ki hadam hu banefesh yekhaper. leviticus 17:12	'al ken 'amarti libnei yisra'el kal nefesh mikem lo tokhal dam vehager hagar betokhkhem lo yokhal dam. leviticus 17:13	ve'ish 'ish mibenei yisra'el umin hager hagar betokham 'asher yazud zed khayah 'o 'of 'asher yei'akhel veshafakh 'et damo vekhisahu be'afar. leviticus 17:14	ki nefesh kal basar damo benafsho hu va'omar libnei yisra'el dam kal basar lo tokheilu ki nefesh kal basar damo hi kal 'okhelav yikaret. leviticus 17:15	vekhal nefesh 'asher tokhal nebeilah utereifah ba'ezrakh ubager vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'ereb vetaher. leviticus 17:16	ve'im lo yekhabes ubesaro lo yirkhaz venasa 'avono. leviticus 18:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 18:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 18:3	kema'aseh 'erez mizrayim 'asher yeshabtem bah lo ta'asu ukhema'aseh 'erez kena'an 'asher 'ani meibi 'etkhem shamah lo ta'asu ubekhuqoteihem lo teileikhu. leviticus 18:4	'et mishpatai ta'asu ve'et khuqotai tishmeru lalekhet bahem 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 18:5	ushemartem 'et khuqotai ve'et mishpatai 'asher ya'aseh 'otam ha'adam vakhai bahem 'ani yhvh. leviticus 18:6	'ish 'ish 'el kal she'er besaro lo tiqrebu legalot 'ervah 'ani yhvh. leviticus 18:7	'ervat 'abikha ve'ervat 'imekha lo tegaleh 'imekha hi lo tegaleh 'ervatah. leviticus 18:8	'ervat 'eishet 'abikha lo tegaleh 'ervat 'abikha hi leviticus 18:9	'ervat 'akhotkha bat 'abikha 'o bat 'imekha moledet bayit 'o moledet khuz lo tegaleh 'ervatan. leviticus 18:10	'ervat bat binkha 'o bat bitekha lo tegaleh 'ervatan ki 'ervatekha henah. leviticus 18:11	'ervat bat 'eishet 'abikha moledet 'abikha 'akhotkha hi lo tegaleh 'ervatah. leviticus 18:12	'ervat 'akhot 'abikha lo tegaleh she'er 'abikha hi leviticus 18:13	'ervat 'akhot 'imekha lo tegaleh ki she'er 'imekha hi leviticus 18:14	'ervat 'akhi 'abikha lo tegaleh 'el 'ishto lo tiqrab dodatekha hi leviticus 18:15	'ervat kalatekha lo tegaleh 'eishet binkha hi lo tegaleh 'ervatah. leviticus 18:16	'ervat 'eishet 'akhikha lo tegaleh 'ervat 'akhikha hi leviticus 18:17	'ervat 'ishah ubitah lo tegaleh 'et bat benah ve'et bat bitah lo tiqakh legalot 'ervatah sha'arah henah zimah hi leviticus 18:18	ve'ishah 'el 'akhotah lo tiqakh lizror legalot 'ervatah 'aleha bekhayeha. leviticus 18:19	ve'el 'ishah benidat tum'atah lo tiqrab legalot 'ervatah. leviticus 18:20	ve'el 'eishet 'amitekha lo titen shekhabetekha lezara' letame'ah bah. leviticus 18:21	umizar'akha lo titen leha'abir lamolekh velo tekhalel 'et shem 'elohekha 'ani yhvh. leviticus 18:22	ve'et zakhar lo tishkab mishkebei 'ishah to'eibah hi leviticus 18:23	ubekhal beheimah lo titen shekhabetekha letame'ah bah ve'ishah lo ta'amod lifnei beheimah lerib'ah tebel hu. leviticus 18:24	'al titame'u bekhal 'eleh ki bekhal 'eleh nitme'u hagoyim 'asher 'ani meshaleiakh mipeneikhem. leviticus 18:25	vatitma ha'arez va'efqod 'avonah 'aleha vataqi ha'arez 'et yoshebeha. leviticus 18:26	ushemartem 'atem 'et khuqotai ve'et mishpatai velo ta'asu mikol hato'eibot ha'eleh ha'ezrakh vehager hagar betokhkhem. leviticus 18:27	ki 'et kal hato'eibot ha'el 'asu 'anshei ha'arez 'asher lifneikhem vatitma ha'arez. leviticus 18:28	velo taqi ha'arez 'etkhem betama'akhem 'otah ka'asher qa'ah 'et hago 'asher lifneikhem. leviticus 18:29	ki kal 'asher ya'aseh mikol hato'eibot ha'eleh venikhretu hanefashot ha'osot miqereb 'amam. leviticus 18:30	ushemartem 'et mishmarti lebilti 'asot meikhuqot hato'eibot 'asher na'asu lifneikhem velo titame'u bahem 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 19:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor leviticus 19:2	daber 'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem qedoshim tihyu ki qadosh 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 19:3	'ish 'imo ve'abiv tira'u ve'et shabetotai tishmoru 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 19:4	'al tifnu 'el ha'elilim veilohei maseikhah lo ta'asu lakhem 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 19:5	vekhi tizbekhu zebakh shelamim yhvh lirzonekhem tizbakhuhu. leviticus 19:6	beyom zibkhakhem yei'akhel umimakhorat vehanotar 'ad yom hashelishi ba'esh yisaref. leviticus 19:7	ve'im hei'akhol yei'akhel bayom hashelishi pigul hu lo yeirazeh. leviticus 19:8	ve'okhelav 'avono yisa ki 'et qodesh yhvh khilel venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha. leviticus 19:9	ubequzrekhem 'et qezir 'arzekhem lo tekhaleh pe'at sadekha liqzor veleqet qezirekha lo telaqet. leviticus 19:10	vekharmekha lo te'olel uferet karmekha lo telaqet le'ani velager ta'azob 'otam 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 19:11	lo tignobu velo tekhakhashu velo teshaqeru 'ish ba'amito. leviticus 19:12	velo tishabe'u bishmi lashaqer vekhilalta 'et shem 'elohekha 'ani yhvh. leviticus 19:13	lo ta'ashoq 'et rei'akha velo tigzol lo talin pe'ulat sakhir 'itekha 'ad boqer. leviticus 19:14	lo teqalel kheiresh velifnei 'iver lo titen mikhshol veyareita mei'elohekha 'ani yhvh. leviticus 19:15	lo ta'asu 'avel bamishpat lo tisa fenei dal velo tehdar penei gadol bezedeq tishpot 'amitekha. leviticus 19:16	lo teilekh rakhil be'amekha lo ta'amod 'al dam rei'ekha 'ani yhvh. leviticus 19:17	lo tisna 'et 'akhikha bilbabekha hokheiakh tokhiakh 'et 'amitekha velo tisa 'alav khet. leviticus 19:18	lo tiqom velo titor 'et benei 'amekha ve'ahabta lerei'akha kamokha 'ani yhvh. leviticus 19:19	'et khuqotai tishmoru behemtekha lo tarbia' kil'ayim sadekha lo tizra' kil'ayim ubeged kil'ayim sha'atnez lo ya'aleh 'alekha. leviticus 19:20	ve'ish ki yishkab 'et 'ishah shikhbat zera' vehiv shifkhah nekherefet le'ish vehafedeh lo nifdatah 'o khufshah lo nitan lah biqoret tihyeh lo yumetu ki lo khupashah. leviticus 19:21	veheibi 'et 'ashamo yhvh 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed 'el 'asham. leviticus 19:22	vekhiper 'alav hakohen be'el ha'asham lifnei yhvh 'al khatato 'asher khata venislakh lo meikhatato 'asher khata. leviticus 19:23	vekhi tabo'u 'el ha'arez uneta'tem kal 'ez ma'akhal va'araltem 'arelato 'et piryo shalosh shanim yihyeh lakhem 'areilim lo yei'akhel. leviticus 19:24	ubashanah harebi'it yihyeh kal piryo qodesh hilulim yhvh. leviticus 19:25	ubashanah hakhamishit tokhelu 'et piryo lehosif lakhem tebu'ato 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 19:26	lo tokhelu 'al hadam lo tenakhashu velo te'oneinu. leviticus 19:27	lo taqifu pe'at roshekhem velo tashkhit 'et pe'at zeqanekha. leviticus 19:28	veseret lanefesh lo titenu bibsarkhem ukhetobet qa'aqa' lo titenu bakhem 'ani yhvh. leviticus 19:29	'al tekhalel 'et bitekha lehaznotah velo tizneh ha'arez umale'ah ha'arez zimah. leviticus 19:30	'et shabetotai tishmoru umiqdashi tira'u 'ani yhvh. leviticus 19:31	'al tifnu 'el ha'obot ve'el hayide'onim 'al tebaqshu letame'ah bahem 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 19:32	mipenei seibah taqum vehadarta penei zaqen veyareita mei'elohekha 'ani yhvh. leviticus 19:33	vekhi yagur 'itekha ger be'arzekhem lo tonu 'oto. leviticus 19:34	ke'ezrakh mikem yihyeh lakhem hager hagar 'itekhem ve'ahabta lo kamokha ki geirim heyitem be'erez mizrayim 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 19:35	lo ta'asu 'avel bamishpat bamidah bamishqal ubamesurah. leviticus 19:36	mozenei zedeq 'abnei zedeq 'eifat zedeq vehin zedeq yihyeh lakhem 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem 'asher hozeiti 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim. leviticus 19:37	ushemartem 'et kal khuqotai ve'et kal mishpatai va'asitem 'otam 'ani yhvh. leviticus 20:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 20:2	ve'el benei yisra'el tomar 'ish 'ish mibenei yisra'el umin hager hagar beyisra'el 'asher yiten mizar'o lamolekh mot yumat 'am ha'arez yirgemuhu ba'aben. leviticus 20:3	va'ani 'eten 'et panai ba'ish hahu vehikhrati 'oto miqereb 'amo ki mizar'o natan lamolekh lema'an tamei 'et miqdashi ulekhalel 'et shem qadshi leviticus 20:4	ve'im ha'lem ya'limu 'am ha'arez 'et 'eineihem min ha'ish hahu betito mizar'o lamolekh lebilti hamit 'oto. leviticus 20:5	vesamti 'ani 'et panai ba'ish hahu ubemishpakhto vehikhrati 'oto ve'et kal hazonim 'akharav liznot 'akharei hamolekh miqereb 'amam. leviticus 20:6	vehanefesh 'asher tifneh 'el ha'obot ve'el hayide'onim liznot 'akhareihem venatati 'et panai banefesh hahiv vehikhrati 'oto miqereb 'amo. leviticus 20:7	vehitqadishtem vihyitem qedoshim ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 20:8	ushemartem 'et khuqotai va'asitem 'otam 'ani yhvh meqadishkhem. leviticus 20:9	ki 'ish 'ish 'asher yeqalel 'et 'abiv ve'et 'imo mot yumat 'abiv ve'imo qilel damav bo. leviticus 20:10	ve'ish 'asher yin'af 'et 'eishet 'ish 'asher yin'af 'et 'eishet rei'eihu mot yumat hano'ef vehano'afet. leviticus 20:11	ve'ish 'asher yishkab 'et 'eishet 'abiv 'ervat 'abiv gilah mot yumetu sheneihem demeihem bam. leviticus 20:12	ve'ish 'asher yishkab 'et kalato mot yumetu sheneihem tebel 'asu demeihem bam. leviticus 20:13	ve'ish 'asher yishkab 'et zakhar mishkebei 'ishah to'eibah 'asu sheneihem mot yumatu demeihem bam. leviticus 20:14	ve'ish 'asher yiqakh 'et 'ishah ve'et 'imah zimah hi ba'esh yisrefu 'oto ve'ethen velo tihyeh zimah betokhkhem. leviticus 20:15	ve'ish 'asher yiten shekhabeto bibheimah mot yumat ve'et habeheimah taharogu. leviticus 20:16	ve'ishah 'asher tiqrab 'el kal beheimah lerib'ah 'otah veharagta 'et ha'ishah ve'et habeheimah mot yumatu demeihem bam. leviticus 20:17	ve'ish 'asher yiqakh 'et 'akhoto bat 'abiv 'o bat 'imo vera'ah 'et 'ervatah vehi tir'eh 'et 'ervato khesed hu venikhretu le'einei benei 'amam 'ervat 'akhoto gilah 'avono yisa. leviticus 20:18	ve'ish 'asher yishkab 'et 'ishah davah vegilah 'et 'ervatah 'et meqorah he'erah vehi giletah 'et meqor dameha venikhretu sheneihem miqereb 'amam. leviticus 20:19	ve'ervat 'akhot 'imekha va'akhot 'abikha lo tegaleh ki 'et she'eiro he'erah 'avonam yisa'u. leviticus 20:20	ve'ish 'asher yishkab 'et dodato 'ervat dodo gilah khet'am yisa'u 'aririm yamutu. leviticus 20:21	ve'ish 'asher yiqakh 'et 'eishet 'akhiv nidah hi 'ervat 'akhiv gilah 'aririm yihyu. leviticus 20:22	ushemartem 'et kal khuqotai ve'et kal mishpatai va'asitem 'otam velo taqi 'etkhem ha'arez 'asher 'ani meibi 'etkhem shamah lashebet bah. leviticus 20:23	velo teilekhu bekhuqot hago 'asher 'ani meshaleiakh mipeneikhem ki 'et kal 'eleh 'asu va'aquz bam. leviticus 20:24	va'omar lakhem 'atem tireshu 'et 'admatam va'ani 'etenenah lakhem lareshet 'otah 'erez zabat khalab udebash 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem 'asher hibdalti 'etkhem min ha'amim. leviticus 20:25	vehibdaltem ben habeheimah hatehorah latemei'ah uben ha'of hatamei latahor velo teshaqezu 'et nafshoteikhem babeheimah uba'of ubekhol 'asher tirmos ha'adamah 'asher hibdalti lakhem letamei. leviticus 20:26	vihyitem li qedoshim ki qadosh 'ani yhvh va'abdil 'etkhem min ha'amim lihyot li. leviticus 20:27	ve'ish 'o 'ishah ki yihyeh bahem 'ob 'o yide'oni mot yumatu ba'eben yirgemu 'otam demeihem bam. leviticus 21:1	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'emor 'el hakohanim benei 'aharon ve'amarta 'aleihem lenefesh lo yitama be'amav. leviticus 21:2	ki 'im lish'eiro haqarob 'eilav le'imo ule'abiv velibno ulebito ule'akhiv. leviticus 21:3	vela'akhoto habetulah haqerobah 'eilav 'asher lo hayetah le'ish lah yitama. leviticus 21:4	lo yitama ba'al be'amav leheikhalo. leviticus 21:5	lo yiqrekhah yiqrekhu qarekhah berosham ufe'at zeqanam lo yegaleikhu ubibsaram lo yisretu saratet. leviticus 21:6	qedoshim yihyu leiloheihem velo yekhalelu shem 'eloheihem ki 'et 'ishei yhvh lekhem 'eloheihem hem maqribim vehayu qodesh. leviticus 21:7	'ishah zonah vakhalalah lo yiqakhu ve'ishah gerushah mei'ishah lo yiqakhu ki qadosh hu leilohav. leviticus 21:8	veqidashto ki 'et lekhem 'elohekha hu maqrib qadosh yihyeh lakh ki qadosh 'ani yhvh meqadishkhem. leviticus 21:9	ubat 'ish kohen ki teikhel liznot 'et 'abiha hi mekhalelet ba'esh tisaref. leviticus 21:10	vehakohen hagadol mei'ekhav 'asher yuzaq 'al rosho shemen hamishkhah umilei 'et yado lilbosh 'et habegadim 'et rosho lo yifra' ubegadav lo yifrom. leviticus 21:11	ve'al kal nafshot met lo yabo le'abiv ule'imo lo yitama. leviticus 21:12	umin hamiqdash lo yeizei velo yekhalel 'et miqdash 'elohav ki neizer shemen mishkhat 'elohav 'alav 'ani yhvh. leviticus 21:13	vehu 'ishah bibtuleha yiqakh. leviticus 21:14	'almanah ugerushah vakhalalah zonah 'et 'eleh lo yiqakh ki 'im betulah mei'amav yiqakh 'ishah. leviticus 21:15	velo yekhalel zar'o be'amav ki 'ani yhvh meqadesho. leviticus 21:16	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 21:17	daber 'el 'aharon leimor 'ish mizar'akha ledorotam 'asher yihyeh bo mum lo yiqrab lehaqrib lekhem 'elohav. leviticus 21:18	ki khal 'ish 'asher bo mum lo yiqrab 'ish 'iver 'o fiseiakh 'o kharum 'o sarua'. leviticus 21:19	'o 'ish 'asher yihyeh bo sheber ragel 'o sheber yad. leviticus 21:20	'o giben 'o daq 'o tebalul be'eino 'o garab 'o yalefet 'o meroakh 'ashekh. leviticus 21:21	kal 'ish 'asher bo mum mizera' 'aharon hakohen lo yigash lehaqrib 'et 'ishei yhvh mum bo 'et lekhem 'elohav lo yigash lehaqrib. leviticus 21:22	lekhem 'elohav miqadeshei haqodashim umin haqodashim yokhel. leviticus 21:23	'akh 'el haparokhet lo yabo ve'el hamizbeiakh lo yigash ki mum bo velo yekhalel 'et miqdashai ki 'ani yhvh meqadesham. leviticus 21:24	vaydaber mosheh 'el 'aharon ve'el banav ve'el kal benei yisra'el. leviticus 22:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 22:2	daber 'el 'aharon ve'el banav veyinazeru miqadeshei benei yisra'el velo yekhalelu 'et shem qadshi 'asher hem maqdishim li 'ani yhvh. leviticus 22:3	'emor 'aleihem ledoroteikhem kal 'ish 'asher yiqrab mikal zar'akhem 'el haqodashim 'asher yaqdishu benei yisra'el yhvh vetum'ato 'alav venikhretah hanefesh hahiv milefanai 'ani yhvh. leviticus 22:4	'ish 'ish mizera' 'aharon vehu zarua' 'o zab baqodashim lo yokhal 'ad 'asher yithar vehanogeia' bekhal temei nefesh 'o 'ish 'asher teizei mimenu shikhbat zara'. leviticus 22:5	'o 'ish 'asher yiga' bekhal sherez 'asher yitma lo 'o be'adam 'asher yitma lo lekhol tum'ato. leviticus 22:6	nefesh 'asher tiga' bo vetame'ah 'ad ha'areb velo yokhal min haqodashim ki 'im rakhaz besaro bamayim. leviticus 22:7	uba hashemesh vetaher ve'akhar yokhal min haqodashim ki lakhmo hu. leviticus 22:8	nebeilah utereifah lo yokhal letame'ah bah 'ani yhvh. leviticus 22:9	veshameru 'et mishmarti velo yis'u 'alav khet umeitu bo ki yekhaleluhu 'ani yhvh meqadesham. leviticus 22:10	vekhal zar lo yokhal qodesh toshab kohen vesakhir lo yokhal qodesh. leviticus 22:11	vekhohen ki yiqneh nefesh qinyan kaspo hu yokhal bo vilid beito hem yokhelu belakhmo. leviticus 22:12	ubat kohen ki tihyeh le'ish zar hi bitrumat haqodashim lo tokhel. leviticus 22:13	ubat kohen ki tihyeh 'almanah ugerushah vezera' 'en lah veshabah 'el bet 'abiha kin'ureha milekhem 'abiha tokhel vekhal zar lo yokhal bo. leviticus 22:14	ve'ish ki yokhal qodesh bishgagah veyasaf khamishito 'alav venatan lakohen 'et haqodesh. leviticus 22:15	velo yekhalelu 'et qadeshei benei yisra'el 'et 'asher yarimu yhvh. leviticus 22:16	vehisi'u 'otam 'avon 'ashmah be'akhelam 'et qadesheihem ki 'ani yhvh meqadesham. leviticus 22:17	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 22:18	daber 'el 'aharon ve'el banav ve'el kal benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el umin hager beyisra'el 'asher yaqrib qarebano lekhal nidreihem ulekhal nidbotam 'asher yaqribu yhvh le'olah. leviticus 22:19	lirzonekhem tamim zakhar babaqar bakesabim uba'izim. leviticus 22:20	kol 'asher bo mum lo taqribu ki lo lerazon yihyeh lakhem. leviticus 22:21	ve'ish ki yaqrib zebakh shelamim yhvh lefalei neder 'o lindabah babaqar 'o bazon tamim yihyeh lerazon kal mum lo yihyeh bo. leviticus 22:22	'averet 'o shabur 'o kharuz 'o yabelet 'o garab 'o yalefet lo taqribu 'eleh yhvh ve'isheh lo titenu meihem 'al hamizbeiakh yhvh. leviticus 22:23	veshor vaseh sarua' veqalut nedabah ta'aseh 'oto uleneider lo yeirazeh. leviticus 22:24	uma'ukh vekhatut venatuq vekharut lo taqribu yhvh ube'arzekhem lo ta'asu. leviticus 22:25	umiyad ben neikhar lo taqribu 'et lekhem 'eloheikhem mikal 'eleh ki mashekhatam bahem mum bam lo yeirazu lakhem. leviticus 22:26	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 22:27	shor 'o kheseb 'o 'ez ki yivaled vehayah shib'at yamim takhat 'imo umiyom hashemini vahale'ah yeirazeh leqareban 'isheh yhvh. leviticus 22:28	veshor 'o seh 'oto ve'et beno lo tishkhatu beyom 'ekhad. leviticus 22:29	vekhi tizbekhu zebakh todah yhvh lirzonekhem tizbakhu. leviticus 22:30	bayom hahu yei'akhel lo totiru mimenu 'ad boqer 'ani yhvh. leviticus 22:31	ushemartem mizvotai va'asitem 'otam 'ani yhvh. leviticus 22:32	velo tekhalelu 'et shem qadshi veniqdashti betokh benei yisra'el 'ani yhvh meqadishkhem. leviticus 22:33	hamozi 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim lihyot lakhem leilohim 'ani yhvh. leviticus 23:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 23:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem mo'adei yhvh 'asher tiqre'u 'otam miqra'ei qodesh 'eleh hem mo'adai. leviticus 23:3	sheishet yamim tei'aseh melakhah ubayom hashebi'i shabat shabaton miqra qodesh kal melakhah lo ta'asu shabat hi yhvh bekhol mosheboteikhem. leviticus 23:4	'eleh mo'adei yhvh miqra'ei qodesh 'asher tiqre'u 'otam bemo'adam. leviticus 23:5	bakhodesh harishon be'arba'ah 'asar lakhodesh ben ha'arbayim pesakh yhvh. leviticus 23:6	ubakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hazeh khag hamazot yhvh shib'at yamim mazot tokheilu. leviticus 23:7	bayom harishon miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. leviticus 23:8	vehiqrabtem 'isheh yhvh shib'at yamim bayom hashebi'i miqra qodesh kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. leviticus 23:9	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 23:10	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki tabo'u 'el ha'arez 'asher 'ani noten lakhem uqezartem 'et qezirah vahabeitem 'et 'omer reishit qezirekhem 'el hakohen. leviticus 23:11	veheinif 'et ha'omer lifnei yhvh lirzonekhem mimakhorat hashabat yenifenu hakohen. leviticus 23:12	va'asitem beyom hanifekhem 'et ha'omer kebes tamim ben shenato le'olah yhvh. leviticus 23:13	uminkhato shenei 'esronim solet belulah bashemen 'isheh yhvh reiakh nikhoakh veniskoh yayin rebi'it hahin. leviticus 23:14	velekhem veqali vekharmel lo tokhelu 'ad 'ezem hayom hazeh 'ad habi'akhem 'et qareban 'eloheikhem khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem bekhol mosheboteikhem. leviticus 23:15	usefartem lakhem mimakhorat hashabat miyom habi'akhem 'et 'omer hatenufah sheba' shabatot temimot tihyenah. leviticus 23:16	'ad mimakhorat hashabat hashebi'it tisperu khamishim yom vehiqrabtem minkhah khadashah yhvh. leviticus 23:17	mimosheboteikhem tabi''u lekhem tenufah tayim shenei 'esronim solet tihyenah khamez tei'afenah bikurim yhvh. leviticus 23:18	vehiqrabtem 'al halekhem shib'at kebasim temimim benei shanah ufar ben baqar 'ekhad ve'eilim shenayim yihyu 'olah yhvh uminkhatam veniskeihem 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. leviticus 23:19	va'asitem se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat ushenei khebasim benei shanah lezebakh shelamim. leviticus 23:20	veheinif hakohen 'otam 'al lekhem habikurim tenufah lifnei yhvh 'al shenei kebasim qodesh yihyu yhvh lakohen. leviticus 23:21	uqeratem be'ezem hayom hazeh miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu khuqat 'olam bekhal mosheboteikhem ledoroteikhem. leviticus 23:22	ubequzrekhem 'et qezir 'arzekhem lo tekhaleh pe'at sadekha bequzrekha veleqet qezirekha lo telaqet le'ani velager ta'azob 'otam 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 23:23	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 23:24	daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor bakhodesh hashebi'i be'ekhad lakhodesh yihyeh lakhem shabaton zikhron teru'ah miqra qodesh. leviticus 23:25	kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu vehiqrabtem 'isheh yhvh. leviticus 23:26	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 23:27	'akh be'asor lakhodesh hashebi'i hazeh yom hakipurim hu miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem ve'initem 'et nafshoteikhem vehiqrabtem 'isheh yhvh. leviticus 23:28	vekhal melakhah lo ta'asu be'ezem hayom hazeh ki yom kipurim hu lekhaper 'aleikhem lifnei yhvh 'eloheikhem leviticus 23:29	ki khal hanefesh 'asher lo te'uneh be'ezem hayom hazeh venikhretah mei'ameha. leviticus 23:30	vekhal hanefesh 'asher ta'aseh kal melakhah be'ezem hayom hazeh veha'abadti 'et hanefesh hahiv miqereb 'amah. leviticus 23:31	kal melakhah lo ta'asu khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem bekhol mosheboteikhem. leviticus 23:32	shabat shabaton hu lakhem ve'initem 'et nafshoteikhem betish'ah lakhodesh ba'ereb mei'ereb 'ad 'ereb tishbetu shabatekhem. leviticus 23:33	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 23:34	daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hashebi'i hazeh khag hasukot shib'at yamim yhvh. leviticus 23:35	bayom harishon miqra qodesh kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. leviticus 23:36	shib'at yamim taqribu 'isheh yhvh bayom hashemini miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem vehiqrabtem 'isheh yhvh 'azeret hi kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. leviticus 23:37	'eleh mo'adei yhvh 'asher tiqre'u 'otam miqra'ei qodesh lehaqrib 'isheh yhvh 'olah uminkhah zebakh unesakhim debar yom beyomo. leviticus 23:38	milebad shabetot yhvh umilebad matenoteikhem umilebad kal nidreikhem umilebad kal nidboteikhem 'asher titenu yhvh. leviticus 23:39	'akh bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hashebi'i be'asepekhem 'et tebu'at ha'arez takhogu 'et khag yhvh shib'at yamim bayom harishon shabaton ubayom hashemini shabaton. leviticus 23:40	uleqakhtem lakhem bayom harishon peri 'ez hadar kapot temarim va'anaf 'ez 'abot ve'arbei nakhal usemakhtem lifnei yhvh 'eloheikhem shib'at yamim. leviticus 23:41	vekhagotem 'oto khag yhvh shib'at yamim bashanah khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem bakhodesh hashebi'i takhogu 'oto. leviticus 23:42	basukot teishebu shib'at yamim kal ha'ezrakh beyisra'el yeishebu basukot. leviticus 23:43	lema'an yeide'u doroteikhem ki basukot hoshabti 'et benei yisra'el behozi'i 'otam mei'erez mizrayim 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 23:44	vaydaber mosheh 'et mo'adei yhvh 'el benei yisra'el. leviticus 24:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 24:2	zav 'et benei yisra'el veyiqkhu 'eilekha shemen zayit zakh katit lama'or leha'alot ner tamid. leviticus 24:3	mikhuz lefarokhet ha'eidut be'ohel mo'ed ya'arokh 'oto 'aharon mei'ereb 'ad boqer lifnei yhvh tamid khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem. leviticus 24:4	'al hamenorah hatehorah ya'arokh 'et haneirot lifnei yhvh tamid. leviticus 24:5	velaqakhta solet ve'afita 'otah shetem 'esreh khalot shenei 'esronim yihyeh hakhalah ha'ekhat. leviticus 24:6	vesamta 'otam shetayim ma'arakhot shesh hama'arakhet 'al hashulkhan hatahor lifnei yhvh. leviticus 24:7	venatata 'al hama'arekhet lebonah zakah vehayetah lalekhem le'azkarah 'isheh yhvh. leviticus 24:8	beyom hashabat beyom hashabat ya'arkhenu lifnei yhvh tamid mei'et benei yisra'el berit 'olam. leviticus 24:9	vehayetah le'aharon ulebanav va'akhaluhu bemaqom qadosh ki qodesh qadashim hu lo mei'ishei yhvh khaq 'olam. leviticus 24:10	vayeizei ben 'ishah yisre'eilit vehu ben 'ish mizri betokh benei yisra'el vayinazu bamakhaneh ben hayisre'eilit ve'ish hayisre'eili. leviticus 24:11	vayiqob ben ha'ishah hayisre'eilit 'et hashem vayqalel vayabi'u 'oto 'el mosheh veshem 'imo shelomit bat dibri lemateh dan. leviticus 24:12	vayanikhuhu bamishmar lifrosh lahem 'al pi yhvh. leviticus 24:13	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 24:14	hozei 'et hamqalel 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vesamekhu khal hashome'im 'et yedeihem 'al rosho veragemu 'oto kal ha'eidah. leviticus 24:15	ve'el benei yisra'el tedaber leimor 'ish 'ish ki yeqalel 'elohav venasa khet'o. leviticus 24:16	venoqeb shem yhvh mot yumat ragom yirgemu bo kal ha'eidah kager ka'ezrakh benaqebo shem yumat. leviticus 24:17	ve'ish ki yakeh kal nefesh 'adam mot yumat. leviticus 24:18	umakeh nefesh beheimah yeshalemenah nefesh takhat nafesh. leviticus 24:19	ve'ish ki yiten mum ba'amito ka'asher 'asah ken yei'aseh lo. leviticus 24:20	ber takhat sheber 'ayin takhat 'ayin shen takhat shen ka'asher yiten mum ba'adam ken yinaten bo. leviticus 24:21	umakeh beheimah yeshalemenah umakeh 'adam yumat. leviticus 24:22	mishpat 'ekhad yihyeh lakhem kager ka'ezrakh yihyeh ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 24:23	vaydaber mosheh 'el benei yisra'el vayozi'u 'et hamqalel 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vayirgemu 'oto 'aben ubenei yisra'el 'asu ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. leviticus 25:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh behar sinai leimor. leviticus 25:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki tabo'u 'el ha'arez 'asher 'ani noten lakhem veshabetah ha'arez shabat yhvh. leviticus 25:3	shesh shanim tizra' sadekha veshesh shanim tizmor karmekha ve'asafta 'et tebu'atah. leviticus 25:4	ubashanah hashebi'it shabat shabaton yihyeh la'arez shabat yhvh sadekha lo tizra' vekharmekha lo tizmor. leviticus 25:5	'et sefiakh qezirekha lo tiqzor ve'et 'inebei nezirekha lo tibzor shenat shabaton yihyeh la'arez. leviticus 25:6	vehayetah shabat ha'arez lakhem le'akhlah lekha ule'abdekha vela'amatekha veliskhirekha uletoshabekha hagarim 'imakh. leviticus 25:7	velibhemtekha velakhayah 'asher be'arzekha tihyeh khal tebu'atah le'ekhol. leviticus 25:8	vesafarta lekha ba' shabetot shanim sheba' shanim sheba' pe'amim vehayu lekha yemei ba' shabetot hashanim teisha' ve'arba'im shanah. leviticus 25:9	veha'abarta shofar teru'ah bakhodesh hashebi'i be'asor lakhodesh beyom hakipurim ta'abiru shofar bekhal 'arzekhem. leviticus 25:10	veqidashtem 'et shenat hakhamishim shanah uqeratem deror ba'arez lekhal yoshebeha yobel hi tihyeh lakhem veshabtem 'ish 'el 'akhuzato ve'ish 'el mishpakhto tashubu. leviticus 25:11	yobel hi shenat hakhamishim shanah tihyeh lakhem lo tizra'u velo tiqzeru 'et sefikheha velo tibzeru 'et nezireha. leviticus 25:12	ki yobel hi qodesh tihyeh lakhem min hasadeh tokhelu 'et tebu'atah. leviticus 25:13	bishnat hayobel hazot tashubu 'ish 'el 'akhuzato. leviticus 25:14	vekhi timkeru mimkar la'amitekha 'o qanoh miyad 'amitekha 'al tonu 'ish 'et 'akhiv. leviticus 25:15	bemispar shanim 'akhar hayobel tiqneh mei'et 'amitekha bemispar shenei tebu'ot yimkar lakh. leviticus 25:16	lefi rob hashanim tarbeh miqnato ulefi me'ot hashanim tam'it miqnato ki mispar tebu'ot hu mokher lakh. leviticus 25:17	velo tonu 'ish 'et 'amito veyareita mei'elohekha ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 25:18	va'asitem 'et khuqotai ve'et mishpatai tishmeru va'asitem 'otam vishabtem 'al ha'arez labetakh. leviticus 25:19	venatenah ha'arez piryah va'akhaltem lasoba' vishabtem labetakh 'aleha. leviticus 25:20	vekhi tomeru mah nokhal bashanah hashebi'it hen lo nizra' velo ne'esof 'et tebu'ateinu. leviticus 25:21	veziviti 'et birkhati lakhem bashanah hashishit ve'asat 'et hatebu'ah lishlosh hashanim. leviticus 25:22	uzera'tem 'et hashanah hasheminit va'akhaltem min hatebu'ah yashan 'ad hashanah hateshi'it 'ad bo tebu'atah tokhelu yashan. leviticus 25:23	veha'arez lo timakher lizmitut ki li ha'arez ki geirim vetoshabim 'atem 'imadi. leviticus 25:24	ubekhol 'erez 'akhuzatkhem ge'ulah titenu la'arez. leviticus 25:25	ki yamukh 'akhikha umakhar mei'akhuzato uba go'alo haqarob 'eilav vega'al 'et mimkar 'akhiv. leviticus 25:26	ve'ish ki lo yihyeh lo go'el vehisigah yado umaza kedei ge'ulato. leviticus 25:27	vekhishab 'et shenei mimkaro veheishib 'et ha'odef la'ish 'asher makhar lo veshab la'akhuzato. leviticus 25:28	ve'im lo maze'ah yado dei hashib lo vehayah mimkaro beyad haqoneh 'oto 'ad shenat hayobel veyaza bayobel veshab la'akhuzato. leviticus 25:29	ve'ish ki yimkor bet moshab 'ir khomah vehayetah ge'ulato 'ad tom shenat mimkaro yamim tihyeh ge'ulato. leviticus 25:30	ve'im lo yiga'el 'ad melot lo shanah temimah veqam habayit 'asher ba'ir 'asher lo lo khomah lazemitut laqoneh 'oto ledorotav lo yeizei bayobel. leviticus 25:31	ubatei hakhazeirim 'asher 'en lahem khomah sabib 'al sedeh ha'arez yeikhasheb ge'ulah tihyeh lo ubayobel yeizei. leviticus 25:32	ve'arei halviyim batei 'arei 'akhuzatam ge'ulat 'olam tihyeh lalviyim. leviticus 25:33	va'asher yig'al min halviyim veyaza mimkar bayit ve'ir 'akhuzato bayobel ki batei 'arei halviyim hi 'akhuzatam betokh benei yisra'el. leviticus 25:34	usedeh migrash 'areihem lo yimakher ki 'akhuzat 'olam hu lahem. leviticus 25:35	vekhi yamukh 'akhikha umatah yado 'imakh vehekhezaqta bo ger vetoshab vakhai 'imakh. leviticus 25:36	'al tiqakh mei'ito neshekh vetarbit veyareita mei'elohekha vekhei 'akhikha 'imakh. leviticus 25:37	'et kaspekha lo titen lo beneshekh ubemarbit lo titen 'akhelekha. leviticus 25:38	'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem 'asher hozeiti 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim latet lakhem 'et 'erez kena'an lihyot lakhem leilohim. leviticus 25:39	vekhi yamukh 'akhikha 'imakh venimkar lakh lo ta'abod bo 'abodat 'abed. leviticus 25:40	kesakhir ketoshab yihyeh 'imakh 'ad shenat hayobel ya'abod 'imakh. leviticus 25:41	veyaza mei'imakh hu ubanav 'imo veshab 'el mishpakhto ve'el 'akhuzat 'abotav yashub. leviticus 25:42	ki 'abadai hem 'asher hozeiti 'otam mei'erez mizrayim lo yimakheru mimkeret 'abed. leviticus 25:43	lo tirdeh bo befarekh veyareita mei'elohekha. leviticus 25:44	ve'abdekha va'amatekha 'asher yihyu lakh mei'et hagoyim 'asher sebiboteikhem meihem tiqnu 'ebed ve'amah. leviticus 25:45	vegam mibenei hatoshabim hagarim 'imakhem meihem tiqnu umimishpakhtam 'asher 'imakhem 'asher holidu be'arzekhem vehayu lakhem la'akhuzah. leviticus 25:46	vehitnakhaltem 'otam libneikhem 'akhareikhem lareshet 'akhuzah le'olam bahem ta'abodu ube'akheikhem benei yisra'el 'ish be'akhiv lo tirdeh bo befarekh. leviticus 25:47	vekhi tasig yad ger vetoshab 'imakh umakh 'akhikha 'imo venimkar leger toshab 'imakh 'o le'eiqer mishpakhat ger. leviticus 25:48	'akharei nimkar ge'ulah tihyeh lo 'ekhad mei'ekhav yig'alenu. leviticus 25:49	'o dodo 'o ben dodo yig'alenu 'o mishe'er besaro mimishpakhto yig'alenu 'o hisigah yado venig'al. leviticus 25:50	vekhishab 'im qoneihu mishenat himakhero lo 'ad shenat hayobel vehayah kesef mimkaro bemispar shanim kimei sakhir yihyeh 'imo. leviticus 25:51	'im 'od rabot bashanim lefihen yashib ge'ulato mikesef miqnato. leviticus 25:52	ve'im me'at nish'ar bashanim 'ad shenat hayobel vekhishab lo kefi shanav yashib 'et ge'ulato. leviticus 25:53	kiskhir shanah beshanah yihyeh 'imo lo yirdenu beferekh le'einekha. leviticus 25:54	ve'im lo yiga'el be'eleh veyaza bishnat hayobel hu ubanav 'imo. leviticus 25:55	ki li benei yisra'el 'abadim 'abadai hem 'asher hozeiti 'otam mei'erez mizrayim 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 26:1	lo ta'asu lakhem 'elilim ufesel umazeibah lo taqimu lakhem ve'eben maskit lo titenu be'arzekhem lehishtakhavot 'aleha ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. leviticus 26:2	'et shabetotai tishmoru umiqdashi tira'u 'ani yhvh. leviticus 26:3	'im bekhuqotai teileikhu ve'et mizvotai tishmeru va'asitem 'otam. leviticus 26:4	venatati gishmeikhem be'itam venatenah ha'arez yebulah ve'ez hasadeh yiten piryo. leviticus 26:5	vehisig lakhem dayish 'et bazir ubazir yasig 'et zara' va'akhaltem lakhmekhem lasoba' vishabtem labetakh be'arzekhem. leviticus 26:6	venatati shalom ba'arez ushekhabtem ve'en makharid vehishbati khayah ra'ah min ha'arez vekhereb lo ta'abor be'arzekhem. leviticus 26:7	uredaftem 'et 'oyebeikhem venafelu lifneikhem lekhareb leviticus 26:8	veradefu mikem khamishah mei'ah umei'ah mikem rebabah yirdofu venafelu 'oyebeikhem lifneikhem lekhareb. leviticus 26:9	ufaniti 'aleikhem vehifreiti 'etkhem vehirbeiti 'etkhem vahaqimoti 'et beriti 'itekhem. leviticus 26:10	va'akhaltem yashan noshan veyashan mipenei khadash tozi'u. leviticus 26:11	venatati mishkani betokhkhem velo tig'al nafshi 'etkhem. leviticus 26:12	vehithalakhti betokhkhem vehayiti lakhem leilohim ve'atem tihyu li le'am. leviticus 26:13	'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem 'asher hozeiti 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim mihyot lahem 'abadim va'eshbor motot 'ulekhem va'olekh 'etkhem qomiyut. leviticus 26:14	ve'im lo tishme'u li velo ta'asu 'et kal hamizvot ha'eleh. leviticus 26:15	ve'im bekhuqotai tim'asu ve'im 'et mishpatai tig'al nafshekhem lebilti 'asot 'et kal mizvotai lehafrekhem 'et beriti. leviticus 26:16	'af 'ani 'e'eseh zot lakhem vehifqadti 'aleikhem behalah 'et hashakhefet ve'et haqadakhat mekhalot 'einayim umedibot nafesh uzera'tem lariq zar'akhem va'akhaluhu 'oyebeikhem. leviticus 26:17	venatati fanai bakhem venigaftem lifnei 'oyebeikhem veradu bakhem sone'eikhem venastem ve'en rodef 'etkhem. leviticus 26:18	ve'im 'ad 'eleh lo tishme'u li veyasafti leyaserah 'etkhem sheba' 'al khatoteikhem. leviticus 26:19	veshabarti 'et ge'on 'uzekhem venatati 'et shemeikhem kabarzel ve'et 'arzekhem kanekhushah. leviticus 26:20	vetam lariq kokhakhem velo titen 'arzekhem 'et yebulah ve'ez ha'arez lo yiten piryo. leviticus 26:21	ve'im teilekhu 'imi qeri velo tobu lishmoa' li veyasafti 'aleikhem makah sheba' kekhatoteikhem. leviticus 26:22	vehishlakhti bakhem 'et khayat hasadeh veshikelah 'etkhem vehikhritah 'et behemtekhem vehim'itah 'etkhem venashamu darkheikhem. leviticus 26:23	ve'im be'eleh lo tivaseru li vahalakhtem 'imi qeri. leviticus 26:24	vehalakhti 'af 'ani 'imakhem beqeri vehikeiti 'etkhem gam 'ani sheba' 'al khatoteikhem. leviticus 26:25	veheibeiti 'aleikhem khereb noqemet neqam berit vene'esaftem 'el 'areikhem veshilakhti deber betokhkhem venitatem beyad 'oyeb. leviticus 26:26	beshibri lakhem mateh lekhem ve'afu 'eser nashim lakhmekhem betanur 'ekhad veheishibu lakhmekhem bamishqal va'akhaltem velo tisba'u. leviticus 26:27	ve'im bezot lo tishme'u li vahalakhtem 'imi beqeri. leviticus 26:28	vehalakhti 'imakhem bakhamat qeri veyisarti 'etkhem 'af 'ani sheba' 'al khatoteikhem leviticus 26:29	va'akhaltem besar beneikhem ubesar benoteikhem tokheilu. leviticus 26:30	vehishmadti 'et bamoteikhem vehikhrati 'et khamaneikhem venatati 'et pigreikhem 'al pigrei giluleikhem vega'alah nafshi 'etkhem. leviticus 26:31	venatati 'et 'areikhem kharebah vahashimoti 'et miqdesheikhem velo 'ariakh bereiakh nikhokhakhem. leviticus 26:32	vahashimoti 'ani 'et ha'arez veshamemu 'aleha 'oyebeikhem hayoshebim bah. leviticus 26:33	ve'etkhem 'ezareh bagoyim vahariqoti 'akhareikhem khareb vehayetah 'arzekhem shemamah ve'areikhem yihyu kharebah. leviticus 26:34	'az tirzeh ha'arez 'et shabetoteha kol yemei hoshamah ve'atem be'erez 'oyebeikhem 'az tishbat ha'arez vehirzat 'et shabetoteha. leviticus 26:35	kal yemei hashamah tishbot 'et 'asher lo shabetah beshabetoteikhem beshibtekhem 'aleha. leviticus 26:36	vehanish'arim bakhem veheibeiti morekh bilbabam be'arzot 'oyebeihem veradaf 'otam qol 'aleh nidaf venasu menusat khereb venafelu ve'en rodef. leviticus 26:37	vekhashelu 'ish be'akhiv kemipenei khereb verodef 'ayin velo tihyeh lakhem tequmah lifnei 'oyebeikhem. leviticus 26:38	va'abadtem bagoyim ve'akhelah 'etkhem 'erez 'oyebeikhem. leviticus 26:39	vehanish'arim bakhem yimaqu ba'avonam be'arzot 'oyebeikhem ve'af ba'avonot 'abotam 'itam yimaqu. leviticus 26:40	vehitvadu 'et 'avonam ve'et 'avon 'abotam bema'alam 'asher ma'alu bi ve'af 'asher halekhu 'imi beqeri. leviticus 26:41	'af 'ani 'eilekh 'imam beqeri veheibeiti 'otam be'erez 'oyebeihem 'o 'az yikana' lebabam he'arel ve'az yirzu 'et 'avonam. leviticus 26:42	vezakharti 'et beriti ya'aqob ve'af 'et beriti yizkhaq ve'af 'et beriti 'abraham 'ezkor veha'arez 'ezkor. leviticus 26:43	veha'arez tei'azeb meihem vetirez 'et shabetoteha baheshamah meihem vehem yirzu 'et 'avonam ya'an ubeya'an bemishpatai ma'asu ve'et khuqotai ga'alah nafsham. leviticus 26:44	ve'af gam zot bihyotam be'erez 'oyebeihem lo me'astim velo ge'altim lekhalotam lehafer beriti 'itam ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheihem. leviticus 26:45	vezakharti lahem berit rishonim 'asher hozeiti 'otam mei'erez mizrayim le'einei hagoyim lihyot lahem leilohim 'ani yhvh. leviticus 26:46	'eleh hakhuqim vehamishpatim vehatorot 'asher natan yhvh beino uben benei yisra'el behar sinai beyad mosheh. leviticus 27:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. leviticus 27:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'ish ki yafli neder be'erkekha nefashot yhvh. leviticus 27:3	vehayah 'erkekha hazakhar miben 'esrim shanah ve'ad ben shishim shanah vehayah 'erkekha khamishim sheqel kesef besheqel haqodesh. leviticus 27:4	ve'im neqeibah hi vehayah 'erkekha sheloshim shaqel. leviticus 27:5	ve'im miben khamesh shanim ve'ad ben 'esrim shanah vehayah 'erkekha hazakhar 'esrim sheqalim velaneqeibah 'aseret sheqalim. leviticus 27:6	ve'im miben khodesh ve'ad ben khamesh shanim vehayah 'erkekha hazakhar khamishah sheqalim kasef velaneqeibah 'erkekha sheloshet sheqalim kasef. leviticus 27:7	ve'im miben shishim shanah vama'lah 'im zakhar vehayah 'erkekha khamishah 'asar shaqel velaneqeibah 'asarah sheqalim. leviticus 27:8	ve'im makh hu mei'erkekha vehe'emido lifnei hakohen vehe'erikh 'oto hakohen 'al pi 'asher tasig yad hanoder ya'arikhenu hakohen. leviticus 27:9	ve'im beheimah 'asher yaqribu mimenah qarban yhvh kol 'asher yiten mimenu yhvh yihyeh qodesh. leviticus 27:10	lo yakhalifenu velo yamir 'oto tob bera' 'o ra' betob ve'im hamer yamir beheimah bibheimah vehayah hu utemurato yihyeh qodesh. leviticus 27:11	ve'im kal beheimah temei'ah 'asher lo yaqribu mimenah qarban yhvh vehe'emid 'et habeheimah lifnei hakohen. leviticus 27:12	vehe'erikh hakohen 'otah ben tob uben ra' ke'erkekha hakohen ken yihyeh. leviticus 27:13	ve'im ga'ol yig'alenah veyasaf khamishito 'al 'erkekha. leviticus 27:14	ve'ish ki yaqdish 'et beito qodesh yhvh vehe'erikho hakohen ben tob uben ra' ka'asher ya'arikh 'oto hakohen ken yaqum. leviticus 27:15	ve'im hamaqdish yig'al 'et beito veyasaf khamishit kesef 'erkekha 'alav vehayah lo. leviticus 27:16	ve'im misedeh 'akhuzato yaqdish 'ish yhvh vehayah 'erkekha lefi zar'o zera' khomer se'orim bakhamishim sheqel kasef. leviticus 27:17	'im mishenat hayobel yaqdish sadeihu ke'erkekha yaqum. leviticus 27:18	ve'im 'akhar hayobel yaqdish sadeihu vekhishab lo hakohen 'et hakesef 'al pi hashanim hanotarot 'ad shenat hayobel venigra' mei'erkekha. leviticus 27:19	ve'im ga'ol yig'al 'et hasadeh hamaqdish 'oto veyasaf khamishit kesef 'erkekha 'alav veqam lo. leviticus 27:20	ve'im lo yig'al 'et hasadeh ve'im makhar 'et hasadeh le'ish 'akher lo yiga'el 'od. leviticus 27:21	vehayah hasadeh bezeito bayobel qodesh yhvh kisdeh hakheirem lakohen tihyeh 'akhuzato. leviticus 27:22	ve'im 'et sedeh miqnato 'asher lo misedeh 'akhuzato yaqdish yhvh. leviticus 27:23	vekhishab lo hakohen 'et mikhsat ha'erkekha 'ad shenat hayobel venatan 'et ha'erkekha bayom hahu qodesh yhvh. leviticus 27:24	bishnat hayobel yashub hasadeh la'asher qanahu mei'ito la'asher lo 'akhuzat ha'arez. leviticus 27:25	vekhal 'erkekha yihyeh besheqel haqodesh 'esrim geirah yihyeh hashaqel. leviticus 27:26	'akh bekhor 'asher yebukar yhvh bibheimah lo yaqdish 'ish 'oto 'im shor 'im seh yhvh hu. leviticus 27:27	ve'im babeheimah hatemei'ah ufadah be'erkekha veyasaf khamishito 'alav ve'im lo yiga'el venimkar be'erkekha. leviticus 27:28	'akh kal kheirem 'asher yakharim 'ish yhvh mikal 'asher lo mei'adam ubeheimah umisedeh 'akhuzato lo yimakher velo yiga'el kal kheirem qodesh qadashim hu yhvh. leviticus 27:29	kal kheirem 'asher yakhoram min ha'adam lo yipadeh mot yumat. leviticus 27:30	vekhal ma'sar ha'arez mizera' ha'arez miperi ha'ez yhvh hu qodesh yhvh. leviticus 27:31	ve'im ga'ol yig'al 'ish mima'asro khamishito yosef 'alav. leviticus 27:32	vekhal ma'sar baqar vazon kol 'asher ya'abor takhat hashabet ha'asiri yihyeh qodesh yhvh. leviticus 27:33	lo yebaqer ben tob lara' velo yemirenu ve'im hamer yemirenu vehayah hu utemurato yihyeh qodesh lo yiga'el. leviticus 27:34	'eleh hamizvot 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh 'el benei yisra'el behar sinai. 

numbers 1:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh bemidbar sinai be'ohel mo'ed be'ekhad lakhodesh hasheini bashanah hasheinit lezeitam mei'erez mizrayim leimor. numbers 1:2	se'u 'et rosh kal 'adat benei yisra'el lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot kal zakhar legulgelotam. numbers 1:3	miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kal yozei zaba beyisra'el tifqedu 'otam lezib'otam 'atah ve'aharon. numbers 1:4	ve'itekhem yihyu 'ish 'ish lamateh 'ish rosh lebet 'abotav hu. numbers 1:5	ve'eleh shemot ha'anashim 'asher ya'amdu 'itekhem lir'uben 'elizur ben shedei'ur. numbers 1:6	leshim'on shelumi'el ben zurishadai. numbers 1:7	lihudah nakhshon ben 'aminadab. numbers 1:8	leyisashkhar netan'el ben zu'ar. numbers 1:9	lizbulun 'eli'ab ben kheilon. numbers 1:10	libnei yosef le'efrayim 'elishama' ben 'amihud limnasheh gamli'el ben pedahzur. numbers 1:11	lebinyamin 'abidan ben gid'oni. numbers 1:12	ledan 'akhi'ezer ben 'amishadai. numbers 1:13	le'asher pag'i'el ben 'akheran. numbers 1:14	legad 'elyasaf ben de'u'el. numbers 1:15	lenaftali 'akhira' ben 'einan. numbers 1:16	'eleh qeri'ei qeru'ei ha'eidah nesi'ei matot 'abotam rashei 'alfei yisra'el hem. numbers 1:17	vayiqakh mosheh ve'aharon 'et ha'anashim ha'eleh 'asher niqebu besheimot. numbers 1:18	ve'et kal ha'eidah hiqhilu be'ekhad lakhodesh hasheini vayityaldu 'al mishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah legulgelotam. numbers 1:19	ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh vayifqedem bemidbar sinai. numbers 1:20	vayihyu benei re'uben bekhor yisra'el toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot legulgelotam kal zakhar miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:21	pequdeihem lemateh re'uben shishah ve'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. numbers 1:22	libnei shim'on toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam pequdav bemispar sheimot legulgelotam kal zakhar miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:23	pequdeihem lemateh shim'on tish'ah vakhamishim 'elef ushelosh mei'ot. numbers 1:24	libnei gad toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:25	pequdeihem lemateh gad khamishah ve'arba'im 'elef veshesh mei'ot vakhamishim. numbers 1:26	libnei yehudah toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:27	pequdeihem lemateh yehudah 'arba'ah veshib'im 'elef veshesh mei'ot. numbers 1:28	libnei yisashkhar toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:29	pequdeihem lemateh yisashkhar 'arba'ah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. numbers 1:30	libnei zebulun toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:31	pequdeihem lemateh zebulun shib'ah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. numbers 1:32	libnei yosef libnei 'efrayim toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:33	pequdeihem lemateh 'efrayim 'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. numbers 1:34	libnei menasheh toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:35	pequdeihem lemateh menasheh shenayim usheloshim 'elef umatayim. numbers 1:36	libnei binyamin toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:37	pequdeihem lemateh binyamin khamishah usheloshim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. numbers 1:38	libnei dan toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:39	pequdeihem lemateh dan shenayim veshishim 'elef usheba' mei'ot. numbers 1:40	libnei 'asher toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:41	pequdeihem lemateh 'asher 'ekhad ve'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. numbers 1:42	benei naftali toldotam lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam bemispar sheimot miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kol yozei zaba. numbers 1:43	pequdeihem lemateh naftali sheloshah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. numbers 1:44	'eleh hapequdim 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon unesi'ei yisra'el shenem 'asar 'ish 'ish 'ekhad lebet 'abotav hayu. numbers 1:45	vayihyu kal pequdei benei yisra'el lebet 'abotam miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah kal yozei zaba beyisra'el. numbers 1:46	vayihyu kal hapequdim shesh mei'ot 'elef usheloshet 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot vakhamishim. numbers 1:47	vehalviyim lemateh 'abotam lo hatepaqedu betokham. numbers 1:48	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 1:49	'akh 'et mateh leivi lo tifqod ve'et rosham lo tisa betokh benei yisra'el. numbers 1:50	ve'atah hafqed 'et halviyim 'al mishkan ha'eidut ve'al kal keilav ve'al kal 'asher lo hemah yis'u 'et hamishkan ve'et kal keilav vehem yesharetuhu vesabib lamishkan yakhanu. numbers 1:51	ubinsoa' hamishkan yoridu 'oto halviyim ubakhanot hamishkan yaqimu 'oto halviyim vehazar haqareb yumat. numbers 1:52	vekhanu benei yisra'el 'ish 'al makhaneihu ve'ish 'al diglo lezib'otam. numbers 1:53	vehalviyim yakhanu sabib lemishkan ha'eidut velo yihyeh qezef 'al 'adat benei yisra'el veshameru halviyim 'et mishmeret mishkan ha'eidut. numbers 1:54	vaya'asu benei yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh ken 'asu. numbers 2:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. numbers 2:2	'ish 'al diglo be'otot lebet 'abotam yakhanu benei yisra'el mineged sabib le'ohel mo'ed yakhanu. numbers 2:3	vehakhonim qeidemah mizrakhah degel makhaneh yehudah lezib'otam venasi libnei yehudah nakhshon ben 'aminadab. numbers 2:4	uzeba'o ufequdeihem 'arba'ah veshib'im 'elef veshesh mei'ot. numbers 2:5	vehakhonim 'alav mateh yisashkhar venasi libnei yisashkhar netan'el ben zu'ar. numbers 2:6	uzeba'o ufequdav 'arba'ah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. numbers 2:7	mateh zebulun venasi libnei zebulun 'eli'ab ben kheilon. numbers 2:8	uzeba'o ufequdav shib'ah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. numbers 2:9	kal hapequdim lemakhaneh yehudah me'at 'elef ushemonim 'elef vesheishet 'alafim ve'arba' mei'ot lezib'otam rishonah yisa'u. numbers 2:10	degel makhaneh re'uben teimanah lezib'otam venasi libnei re'uben 'elizur ben shedei'ur. numbers 2:11	uzeba'o ufequdav shishah ve'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. numbers 2:12	vehakhonim 'alav mateh shim'on venasi libnei shim'on shelumi'el ben zuri shadai numbers 2:13	uzeba'o ufequdeihem tish'ah vakhamishim 'elef ushelosh mei'ot. numbers 2:14	vemateh gad venasi libnei gad 'elyasaf ben re'u'el. numbers 2:15	uzeba'o ufequdeihem khamishah ve'arba'im 'elef veshesh mei'ot vakhamishim. numbers 2:16	kal hapequdim lemakhaneh re'uben me'at 'elef ve'ekhad vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot vakhamishim lezib'otam usheniyim yisa'u. numbers 2:17	venasa' 'ohel mo'ed makhaneh halviyim betokh hamakhanot ka'asher yakhanu ken yisa'u 'ish 'al yado ledigleihem. numbers 2:18	degel makhaneh 'efrayim lezib'otam yamah venasi libnei 'efrayim 'elishama' ben 'amihud. numbers 2:19	uzeba'o ufequdeihem 'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. numbers 2:20	ve'alav mateh menasheh venasi libnei menasheh gamli'el ben pedahzur. numbers 2:21	uzeba'o ufequdeihem shenayim usheloshim 'elef umatayim. numbers 2:22	umateh binyamin venasi libnei binyamin 'abidan ben gid'oni. numbers 2:23	uzeba'o ufequdeihem khamishah usheloshim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. numbers 2:24	kal hapequdim lemakhaneh 'efrayim me'at 'elef ushemonat 'alafim umei'ah lezib'otam ushelishim yisa'u. numbers 2:25	degel makhaneh dan zafonah lezib'otam venasi libnei dan 'akhi'ezer ben 'amishadai. numbers 2:26	uzeba'o ufequdeihem shenayim veshishim 'elef usheba' mei'ot. numbers 2:27	vehakhonim 'alav mateh 'asher venasi libnei 'asher pag'i'el ben 'akheran. numbers 2:28	uzeba'o ufequdeihem 'ekhad ve'arba'im 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. numbers 2:29	umateh naftali venasi libnei naftali 'akhira' ben 'einan. numbers 2:30	uzeba'o ufequdeihem sheloshah vakhamishim 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot. numbers 2:31	kal hapequdim lemakhaneh dan me'at 'elef veshib'ah vakhamishim 'elef veshesh mei'ot la'akharonah yis'u ledigleihem. numbers 2:32	'eleh pequdei benei yisra'el lebet 'abotam kal pequdei hamakhanot lezib'otam shesh mei'ot 'elef usheloshet 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot vakhamishim. numbers 2:33	vehalviyim lo hatepaqedu betokh benei yisra'el ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. numbers 2:34	vaya'asu benei yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh ken khanu ledigleihem vekhen nasa'u 'ish lemishpekhotav 'al bet 'abotav. numbers 3:1	ve'eleh toldot 'aharon umosheh beyom diber yhvh 'et mosheh behar sinai. numbers 3:2	ve'eleh shemot benei 'aharon habekhor nadab va'abihu 'el'azar ve'itamar. numbers 3:3	'eleh shemot benei 'aharon hakohanim hameshukhim 'asher milei yadam lekhahen. numbers 3:4	vayamat nadab va'abihu lifnei yhvh behaqribam 'esh zarah lifnei yhvh bemidbar sinai ubanim lo hayu lahem vaykhahen 'el'azar ve'itamar 'al penei 'aharon 'abihem. numbers 3:5	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 3:6	haqreb 'et mateh leivi veha'amadta 'oto lifnei 'aharon hakohen vesheiretu 'oto. numbers 3:7	veshameru 'et mishmarto ve'et mishmeret kal ha'eidah lifnei 'ohel mo'ed la'abod 'et 'abodat hamishkan. numbers 3:8	veshameru 'et kal kelei 'ohel mo'ed ve'et mishmeret benei yisra'el la'abod 'et 'abodat hamishkan. numbers 3:9	venatatah 'et halviyim le'aharon ulebanav netunim netunim hemah lo mei'et benei yisra'el. numbers 3:10	ve'et 'aharon ve'et banav tifqod veshameru 'et kehunatam vehazar haqareb yumat. numbers 3:11	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 3:12	va'ani hineh laqakhti 'et halviyim mitokh benei yisra'el takhat kal bekhor peter rekhem mibenei yisra'el vehayu li halviyim. numbers 3:13	ki li kal bekhor beyom hakoti khal bekhor be'erez mizrayim hiqdashti li khal bekhor beyisra'el mei'adam 'ad beheimah li yihyu 'ani yhvh. numbers 3:14	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh bemidbar sinai leimor. numbers 3:15	peqod 'et benei leivi lebet 'abotam lemishpekhotam kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'lah tifqedem. numbers 3:16	vayifqod 'otam mosheh 'al pi yhvh ka'asher zuvah. numbers 3:17	vayihyu 'eleh benei leivi bishmotam geireshon uqehat umerari. numbers 3:18	ve'eleh shemot benei geireshon lemishpekhotam libni veshim'i. numbers 3:19	ubenei qehat lemishpekhotam 'amram veyizhar khebron ve'uzi'el. numbers 3:20	ubenei merari lemishpekhotam makhli umushi 'eleh hem mishpekhot haleivi lebet 'abotam. numbers 3:21	legeireshon mishpakhat halibni umishpakhat hashim'i 'eleh hem mishpekhot hageireshuni. numbers 3:22	pequdeihem bemispar kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'elah pequdeihem shib'at 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot. numbers 3:23	mishpekhot hageireshuni 'akharei hamishkan yakhanu yamah. numbers 3:24	unesi bet 'ab lageireshuni 'elyasaf ben la'el. numbers 3:25	umishmeret benei geireshon be'ohel mo'ed hamishkan veha'ohel mikhseihu umasakh petakh 'ohel mo'ed. numbers 3:26	veqal'ei hekhazer ve'et masakh petakh hekhazer 'asher 'al hamishkan ve'al hamizbeiakh sabib ve'et meitarav lekhol 'abodato. numbers 3:27	veliqhat mishpakhat ha'amrami umishpakhat hayizhari umishpakhat hakhebroni umishpakhat ha'azi'eili 'eleh hem mishpekhot haqehati. numbers 3:28	bemispar kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'elah shemonat 'alafim veshesh mei'ot shomerei mishmeret haqodesh. numbers 3:29	mishpekhot benei qehat yakhanu 'al yerekh hamishkan teimanah. numbers 3:30	unesi bet 'ab lemishpekhot haqehati 'elizafan ben 'uzi'el. numbers 3:31	umishmartam ha'aron vehashulkhan vehamenorah vehamizbekhot ukhelei haqodesh 'asher yesharetu bahem vehamasakh vekhol 'abodato. numbers 3:32	unesi nesi'ei haleivi 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen pequdat shomerei mishmeret haqodesh. numbers 3:33	limrari mishpakhat hamakhli umishpakhat hamushi 'eleh hem mishpekhot merari. numbers 3:34	ufequdeihem bemispar kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'elah sheishet 'alafim umatayim. numbers 3:35	unesi bet 'ab lemishpekhot merari zuri'el ben 'abikhayil 'al yerekh hamishkan yakhanu zafonah. numbers 3:36	ufequdat mishmeret benei merari qarshei hamishkan uberikhav ve'amudav va'adanav vekhal keilav vekhol 'abodato. numbers 3:37	ve'amudei hekhazer sabib ve'adneihem viteidotam umeitereihem. numbers 3:38	vehakhonim lifnei hamishkan qeidemah lifnei 'ohel mo'ed mizrakhah mosheh ve'aharon ubanav shomerim mishmeret hamiqdash lemishmeret benei yisra'el vehazar haqareb yumat. numbers 3:39	kal pequdei halviyim 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon 'al pi yhvh lemishpekhotam kal zakhar miben khodesh vama'lah shenayim ve'esrim 'alef. numbers 3:40	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh peqod kal bekhor zakhar libnei yisra'el miben khodesh vama'elah vesa 'et mispar shemotam. numbers 3:41	velaqakhta 'et halviyim li 'ani yhvh takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra'el ve'et behemat halviyim takhat kal bekhor bebehemat benei yisra'el. numbers 3:42	vayifqod mosheh ka'asher zivah yhvh 'oto 'et kal bekhor bibnei yisra'el. numbers 3:43	vayhi khal bekhor zakhar bemispar sheimot miben khodesh vama'lah lifqudeihem shenayim ve'esrim 'elef sheloshah veshib'im umatayim. numbers 3:44	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 3:45	qakh 'et halviyim takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra'el ve'et behemat halviyim takhat behemtam vehayu li halviyim 'ani yhvh. numbers 3:46	ve'et peduyei hasheloshah vehashib'im vehamatayim ha'odefim 'al halviyim mibekhor benei yisra'el. numbers 3:47	velaqakhta khameishet khameishet sheqalim lagulgolet besheqel haqodesh tiqakh 'esrim geirah hashaqel. numbers 3:48	venatatah hakesef le'aharon ulebanav peduyei ha'odefim bahem. numbers 3:49	vayiqakh mosheh 'et kesef hapidyom mei'et ha'odefim 'al peduyei halviyim. numbers 3:50	mei'et bekhor benei yisra'el laqakh 'et hakasef khamishah veshishim ushelosh mei'ot va'elef besheqel haqodesh. numbers 3:51	vayiten mosheh 'et kesef hapeduyim le'aharon ulebanav 'al pi yhvh ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. numbers 4:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. numbers 4:2	naso 'et rosh benei qehat mitokh benei leivi lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam. numbers 4:3	miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah kal ba lazaba la'asot melakhah be'ohel mo'ed. numbers 4:4	zot 'abodat benei qehat be'ohel mo'ed qodesh haqodashim. numbers 4:5	uba 'aharon ubanav binsoa' hamakhaneh vehoridu 'et parokhet hamasakh vekhisu bah 'et 'aron ha'eidut. numbers 4:6	venatenu 'alav kesui 'or takhash ufaresu beged kelil tekheilet milma'elah vesamu badav. numbers 4:7	ve'al shulkhan hapanim yifresu beged tekheilet venatenu 'alav 'et haqe'arot ve'et hakapot ve'et hamenaqiyot ve'et qesot hanasekh velekhem hatamid 'alav yihyeh. numbers 4:8	ufaresu 'aleihem beged tola'at shani vekhisu 'oto bemikhseh 'or takhash vesamu 'et badav. numbers 4:9	velaqekhu beged tekheilet vekhisu 'et menorat hama'or ve'et neiroteha ve'et malqakheha ve'et makhtoteha ve'et kal kelei shamnah 'asher yesharetu lah bahem. numbers 4:10	venatenu 'otah ve'et kal keileha 'el mikhseh 'or takhash venatenu 'al hamot. numbers 4:11	ve'al mizbakh hazahab yifresu beged tekheilet vekhisu 'oto bemikhseh 'or takhash vesamu 'et badav. numbers 4:12	velaqekhu 'et kal kelei hasharet 'asher yesharetu bam baqodesh venatenu 'el beged tekheilet vekhisu 'otam bemikhseh 'or takhash venatenu 'al hamot. numbers 4:13	vedishenu 'et hamizbeiakh ufaresu 'alav beged 'argaman. numbers 4:14	venatenu 'alav 'et kal keilav 'asher yesharetu 'alav bahem 'et hamakhtot 'et hamizlagot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizraqot kol kelei hamizbeiakh ufaresu 'alav kesui 'or takhash vesamu badav. numbers 4:15	vekhilah 'aharon ubanav lekhasot 'et haqodesh ve'et kal kelei haqodesh binsoa' hamakhaneh ve'akharei khen yabo'u benei qehat laset velo yige'u 'el haqodesh vameitu 'eleh masa benei qehat be'ohel mo'ed. numbers 4:16	ufequdat 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen shemen hama'or uqetoret hasamim uminkhat hatamid veshemen hamishkhah pequdat kal hamishkan vekhal 'asher bo beqodesh ubekheilav. numbers 4:17	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. numbers 4:18	'al takhritu 'et sheibet mishpekhot haqehati mitokh halviyim. numbers 4:19	vezot 'asu lahem vekhayu velo yamutu begishtam 'et qodesh haqodashim 'aharon ubanav yabo'u vesamu 'otam 'ish 'ish 'al 'abodato ve'el masa'o. numbers 4:20	velo yabo'u lir'ot kebala' 'et haqodesh vameitu. numbers 4:21	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 4:22	naso 'et rosh benei geireshon gam hem lebet 'abotam lemishpekhotam. numbers 4:23	miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah 'ad ben khamishim shanah tifqod 'otam kal haba lizbo zaba la'abod 'abodah be'ohel mo'ed. numbers 4:24	zot 'abodat mishpekhot hageireshuni la'abod ulemasa. numbers 4:25	venase'u 'et yeri'ot hamishkan ve'et 'ohel mo'ed mikhseihu umikhseh hatakhash 'asher 'alav milma'elah ve'et masakh petakh 'ohel mo'ed. numbers 4:26	ve'et qal'ei hekhazer ve'et masakh petakh sha'ar hekhazer 'asher 'al hamishkan ve'al hamizbeiakh sabib ve'et meitereihem ve'et kal kelei 'abodatam ve'et kal 'asher yei'aseh lahem ve'abadu. numbers 4:27	'al pi 'aharon
