ubanav tihyeh kal 'abodat benei hageireshuni lekhal masa'am ulekhol 'abodatam ufeqadtem 'aleihem bemishmeret 'et kal masa'am. numbers 4:28	zot 'abodat mishpekhot benei hageireshuni be'ohel mo'ed umishmartam beyad 'itamar ben 'aharon hakohen. numbers 4:29	benei merari lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam tifqod 'otam. numbers 4:30	miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah tifqedem kal haba lazaba la'abod 'et 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed. numbers 4:31	vezot mishmeret masa'am lekhal 'abodatam be'ohel mo'ed qarshei hamishkan uberikhav ve'amudav va'adanav. numbers 4:32	ve'amudei hekhazer sabib ve'adneihem viteidotam umeitereihem lekhal keleihem ulekhol 'abodatam ubesheimot tifqedu 'et kelei mishmeret masa'am. numbers 4:33	zot 'abodat mishpekhot benei merari lekhal 'abodatam be'ohel mo'ed beyad 'itamar ben 'aharon hakohen. numbers 4:34	vayifqod mosheh ve'aharon unesi'ei ha'eidah 'et benei haqehati lemishpekhotam ulebet 'abotam. numbers 4:35	miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah kal haba lazaba la'abodah be'ohel mo'ed. numbers 4:36	vayihyu fequdeihem lemishpekhotam 'alpayim sheba' mei'ot vakhamishim. numbers 4:37	'eleh fequdei mishpekhot haqehati kal ha'obed be'ohel mo'ed 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon 'al pi yhvh beyad mosheh. numbers 4:38	ufequdei benei geireshon lemishpekhotam ulebet 'abotam. numbers 4:39	miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah kal haba lazaba la'abodah be'ohel mo'ed. numbers 4:40	vayihyu pequdeihem lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam 'alpayim veshesh mei'ot usheloshim. numbers 4:41	'eleh fequdei mishpekhot benei geireshon kal ha'obed be'ohel mo'ed 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon 'al pi yhvh. numbers 4:42	ufequdei mishpekhot benei merari lemishpekhotam lebet 'abotam. numbers 4:43	miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah kal haba lazaba la'abodah be'ohel mo'ed. numbers 4:44	vayihyu fequdeihem lemishpekhotam sheloshet 'alafim umatayim. numbers 4:45	'eleh fequdei mishpekhot benei merari 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon 'al pi yhvh beyad mosheh. numbers 4:46	kal hapequdim 'asher paqad mosheh ve'aharon unesi'ei yisra'el 'et halviyim lemishpekhotam ulebet 'abotam. numbers 4:47	miben sheloshim shanah vama'lah ve'ad ben khamishim shanah kal haba la'abod 'abodat 'abodah va'abodat masa be'ohel mo'ed. numbers 4:48	vayihyu pequdeihem shemonat 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot ushemonim. numbers 4:49	'al pi yhvh paqad 'otam beyad mosheh 'ish 'ish 'al 'abodato ve'al masa'o ufequdav 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. numbers 5:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 5:2	zav 'et benei yisra'el vishalekhu min hamakhaneh kal zarua' vekhal zab vekhol tamei lanafesh. numbers 5:3	mizakhar 'ad neqeibah teshaleikhu 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh teshalekhum velo yetame'u 'et makhaneihem 'asher 'ani shokhen betokham. numbers 5:4	vaya'asu khen benei yisra'el vayshalekhu 'otam 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh ka'asher diber yhvh 'el mosheh ken 'asu benei yisra'el. numbers 5:5	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 5:6	daber 'el benei yisra'el 'ish 'o 'ishah ki ya'asu mikal khatot ha'adam lim'ol ma'al yhvh ve'ashemah hanefesh hahiv. numbers 5:7	vehitvadu 'et khatatam 'asher 'asu veheishib 'et 'ashamo berosho vakhamishito yosef 'alav venatan la'asher 'asham lo. numbers 5:8	ve'im 'en la'ish go'el lehashib ha'asham 'eilav ha'asham hamushab yhvh lakohen milebad 'el hakipurim 'asher yekhaper bo 'alav. numbers 5:9	vekhal terumah lekhal qadeshei benei yisra'el 'asher yaqribu lakohen lo yihyeh. numbers 5:10	ve'ish 'et qodashav lo yihyu 'ish 'asher yiten lakohen lo yihyeh. numbers 5:11	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 5:12	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'ish 'ish ki tisteh 'ishto uma'alah bo ma'al. numbers 5:13	veshakhab 'ish 'otah shikhbat zera' vene'lam mei'einei 'ishah venisterah vehi nitma'ah ve'ed 'en bah vehiv lo nitpasah. numbers 5:14	ve'abar 'alav ruakh qin'ah veqinei 'et 'ishto vehiv nitma'ah 'o 'abar 'alav ruakh qin'ah veqinei 'et 'ishto vehi lo nitma'ah. numbers 5:15	veheibi ha'ish 'et 'ishto 'el hakohen veheibi 'et qarebanah 'aleha 'asirit ha'eifah qemakh se'orim lo yizoq 'alav shemen velo yiten 'alav lebonah ki minkhat qena'ot hu minkhat zikaron mazkeret 'avon. numbers 5:16	vehiqrib 'otah hakohen vehe'emidah lifnei yhvh. numbers 5:17	velaqakh hakohen mayim qedoshim bikhli khares umin he'afar 'asher yihyeh beqarqa' hamishkan yiqakh hakohen venatan 'el hamayim. numbers 5:18	vehe'emid hakohen 'et ha'ishah lifnei yhvh ufara' 'et rosh ha'ishah venatan 'al kapeha 'et minkhat hazikaron minkhat qena'ot hi ubeyad hakohen yihyu mei hamarim ham'ararim numbers 5:19	vehishbia' 'otah hakohen ve'amar 'el ha'ishah 'im lo shakhab 'ish 'otakh ve'im lo satit tum'ah takhat 'ishekh hinaqi mimei hamarim ham'ararim ha'eleh. numbers 5:20	ve'at ki satit takhat 'ishekh vekhi nitmet vayiten 'ish bakh 'et shekhabeto mibal'adei 'ishekh. numbers 5:21	vehishbia' hakohen 'et ha'ishah bishbu'at ha'alah ve'amar hakohen la'ishah yiten yhvh 'otakh le'alah velishbu'ah betokh 'amekh betet yhvh 'et yereikhekh nofelet ve'et bitnekh zabah. numbers 5:22	uba'u hamayim ham'arerim ha'eleh bemei'ayikh lazbot beten velanpil yarekh ve'amerah ha'ishah 'amen 'amen. numbers 5:23	vekhatab 'et ha'alot ha'eleh hakohen baseifer umakhah 'el mei hamarim. numbers 5:24	vehishqah 'et ha'ishah 'et mei hamarim ham'ararim uba'u bah hamayim ham'ararim lemarim. numbers 5:25	velaqakh hakohen miyad ha'ishah 'et minkhat haqena'ot veheinif 'et haminkhah lifnei yhvh vehiqrib 'otah 'el hamizbeiakh. numbers 5:26	veqamaz hakohen min haminkhah 'et 'azkaratah vehiqtir hamizbeikhah ve'akhar yashqeh 'et ha'ishah 'et hamayim. numbers 5:27	vehishqah 'et hamayim vehayetah 'im nitme'ah vatim'ol ma'al be'ishah uba'u bah hamayim ham'ararim lemarim vezabetah bitnah venafelah yereikhah vehayetah ha'ishah le'alah beqereb 'amah. numbers 5:28	ve'im lo nitme'ah ha'ishah utehorah hi veniqetah venizre'ah zara'. numbers 5:29	zot torat haqena'ot 'asher tisteh 'ishah takhat 'ishah venitma'ah. numbers 5:30	'o 'ish 'asher ta'abor 'alav ruakh qin'ah veqinei 'et 'ishto vehe'emid 'et ha'ishah lifnei yhvh ve'asah lah hakohen 'et kal hatorah hazot. numbers 5:31	veniqah ha'ish mei'avon veha'ishah hahiv tisa 'et 'avonah. numbers 6:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 6:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'ish 'o 'ishah ki yafli lindor neder nazir lehazir yhvh. numbers 6:3	miyayin vesheikhar yazir khomez yayin vekhomez sheikhar lo yishteh vekhal mishrat 'anabim lo yishteh va'anabim lakhim vibeishim lo yokhel. numbers 6:4	kol yemei nizro mikol 'asher yei'aseh migefen hayayin meikharzanim ve'ad zag lo yokhel. numbers 6:5	kal yemei neder nizro ta'ar lo ya'abor 'al rosho 'ad melot hayamim 'asher yazir yhvh qadosh yihyeh gadel pera' se'ar rosho. numbers 6:6	kal yemei haziro yhvh 'al nefesh met lo yabo. numbers 6:7	le'abiv ule'imo le'akhiv ule'akhoto lo yitama lahem bemotam ki neizer 'elohav 'al rosho. numbers 6:8	kol yemei nizro qadosh hu yhvh. numbers 6:9	vekhi yamut met 'alav befeta' pit'om vetimei rosh nizro vegilakh rosho beyom tahorato bayom hashebi'i yegalekhenu. numbers 6:10	ubayom hashemini yabi shetei torim 'o shenei benei yonah 'el hakohen 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. numbers 6:11	ve'asah hakohen 'ekhad lekhatat ve'ekhad le'olah vekhiper 'alav mei'asher khata 'al hanafesh veqidash 'et rosho bayom hahu. numbers 6:12	vehizir yhvh 'et yemei nizro veheibi kebes ben shenato le'asham vehayamim harishonim yipelu ki tamei nizro. numbers 6:13	vezot torat hanazir beyom melot yemei nizro yabi 'oto 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. numbers 6:14	vehiqrib 'et qarebano yhvh kebes ben shenato tamim 'ekhad le'olah vekhabsah 'akhat bat shenatah temimah lekhatat ve'ayil 'ekhad tamim lishlamim. numbers 6:15	vesal mazot solet khalot belulot bashemen ureqiqei mazot meshukhim bashamen uminkhatam veniskeihem. numbers 6:16	vehiqrib hakohen lifnei yhvh ve'asah 'et khatato ve'et 'olato. numbers 6:17	ve'et ha'ayil ya'aseh zebakh shelamim yhvh 'al sal hamazot ve'asah hakohen 'et minkhato ve'et nisko. numbers 6:18	vegilakh hanazir petakh 'ohel mo'ed 'et rosh nizro velaqakh 'et se'ar rosh nizro venatan 'al ha'esh 'asher takhat zebakh hashelamim. numbers 6:19	velaqakh hakohen 'et hazeroa' besheilah min ha'ayil vekhalat mazah 'akhat min hasal ureqiq mazah 'ekhad venatan 'al kapei hanazir 'akhar hitgalekho 'et nizro. numbers 6:20	veheinif 'otam hakohen tenufah lifnei yhvh qodesh hu lakohen 'al khazeh hatenufah ve'al shoq haterumah ve'akhar yishteh hanazir yayin. numbers 6:21	zot torat hanazir 'asher yidor qarebano yhvh 'al nizro milebad 'asher tasig yado kefi nidro 'asher yidor ken ya'aseh 'al torat nizro. numbers 6:22	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 6:23	daber 'el 'aharon ve'el banav leimor koh tebarakhu 'et benei yisra'el 'amor lahem. numbers 6:24	yebarekhkha yhvh veyishmerekha. numbers 6:25	ya'er yhvh panav 'eilekha vikhuneka. numbers 6:26	yisa yhvh panav 'eilekha veyasem lekha shalom. numbers 6:27	vesamu 'et shemi 'al benei yisra'el va'ani 'abarakhem. numbers 7:1	vayhi beyom kalot mosheh lehaqim 'et hamishkan vayimshakh 'oto vayqadesh 'oto ve'et kal keilav ve'et hamizbeiakh ve'et kal keilav vayimshakhem vayqadesh 'otam. numbers 7:2	vayaqribu nesi'ei yisra'el rashei bet 'abotam hem nesi'ei hamatot hem ha'omedim 'al hapequdim. numbers 7:3	vayabi'u 'et qarebanam lifnei yhvh shesh 'eglot zab ushenei 'asar baqar 'agalah 'al shenei hanesi'im veshor le'ekhad vayaqribu 'otam lifnei hamishkan. numbers 7:4	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 7:5	qakh mei'itam vehayu la'abod 'et 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed venatatah 'otam 'el halviyim 'ish kefi 'abodato. numbers 7:6	vayiqakh mosheh 'et ha'agalot ve'et habaqar vayiten 'otam 'el halviyim. numbers 7:7	'et shetei ha'agalot ve'et 'arba'at habaqar natan libnei geireshon kefi 'abodatam. numbers 7:8	ve'et 'arba' ha'agalot ve'et shemonat habaqar natan libnei merari kefi 'abodatam beyad 'itamar ben 'aharon hakohen. numbers 7:9	velibnei qehat lo natan ki 'abodat haqodesh 'aleihem bakatef yisa'u. numbers 7:10	vayaqribu hanesi'im 'et khanukat hamizbeiakh beyom himashakh 'oto vayaqribu hanesi'im 'et qarebanam lifnei hamizbeiakh. numbers 7:11	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh nasi 'ekhad layom nasi 'ekhad layom yaqribu 'et qarebanam lakhanukat hamizbeiakh. numbers 7:12	vayhi hamaqrib bayom harishon 'et qarebano nakhshon ben 'aminadab lemateh yehudah. numbers 7:13	veqarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. numbers 7:14	kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. numbers 7:15	par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. numbers 7:16	se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. numbers 7:17	ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban nakhshon ben 'aminadab. numbers 7:18	bayom hasheini hiqrib netan'el ben zu'ar nesi yisashkhar. numbers 7:19	hiqrib 'et qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. numbers 7:20	kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. numbers 7:21	par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. numbers 7:22	se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. numbers 7:23	ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban netan'el ben zu'ar. numbers 7:24	bayom hashelishi nasi libnei zebulun 'eli'ab ben kheilon. numbers 7:25	qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. numbers 7:26	kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. numbers 7:27	par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. numbers 7:28	se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. numbers 7:29	ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban 'eli'ab ben kheilon. numbers 7:30	bayom harebi'i nasi libnei re'uben 'elizur ben shedei'ur. numbers 7:31	qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. numbers 7:32	kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret numbers 7:33	par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. numbers 7:34	se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. numbers 7:35	ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban 'elizur ben shedei'ur. numbers 7:36	bayom hakhamishi nasi libnei shim'on shelumi'el ben zurishadai. numbers 7:37	qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. numbers 7:38	kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. numbers 7:39	par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. numbers 7:40	se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat numbers 7:41	ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban shelumi'el ben zurishadai. numbers 7:42	bayom hashishi nasi libnei gad 'elyasaf ben de'u'el. numbers 7:43	qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. numbers 7:44	kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. numbers 7:45	par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'elyasaf ben de'u'el. numbers 7:48	bayom hashebi'i nasi libnei 'efrayim 'elishama' ben 'amihud. numbers 7:49	qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im nasi libnei dan 'akhi'ezer ben 'amishadai. numbers 7:67	qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah libnei 'asher pag'i'el ben 'akheran. numbers 7:73	qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah naftali 'akhira' ben 'einan. numbers 7:79	qarebano qa'arat kesef 'akhat sheloshim umei'ah mishqalah mizraq 'ekhad kesef shib'im sheqel besheqel haqodesh sheneihem melei'im solet belulah bashemen leminkhah. numbers 7:80	kaf 'akhat 'asarah zahab melei'ah qetoret. numbers 7:81	par 'ekhad ben baqar 'ayil 'ekhad kebes 'ekhad ben shenato le'olah. numbers 7:82	se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. numbers 7:83	ulezebakh hashelamim baqar shenayim 'eilim khamishah 'atudim khamishah kebasim benei shanah khamishah zeh qareban 'akhira' ben 'einan. numbers 7:84	zot khanukat hamizbeiakh beyom himashakh 'oto mei'et nesi'ei yisra'el qa'arot kesef shetem 'esreh mizreqei khesef shenem 'asar kapot zahab shetem 'esreh. numbers 7:85	sheloshim umei'ah haqe'arah ha'akhat kesef veshib'im hamizraq ha'ekhad kol kesef hakeilim 'alpayim ve'arba' mei'ot besheqel haqodesh. numbers 7:86	kapot zahab shetem 'esreh melei'ot qetoret 'asarah 'asarah hakaf besheqel haqodesh kal zehab hakapot 'esrim umei'ah. numbers 7:87	kal habaqar la'olah shenem 'asar parim 'eilim shenem 'asar kebasim benei shanah shenem 'asar uminkhatam use'irei 'izim shenem 'asar lekhatat. numbers 7:88	vekhol beqar zebakh hashelamim 'esrim ve'arba'ah parim 'eilim shishim 'atudim shishim kebasim benei shanah shishim zot khanukat hamizbeiakh 'akharei himashakh 'oto. numbers 7:89	ubebo mosheh 'el 'ohel mo'ed ledaber 'ito vayishma' 'et haqol midaber 'eilav mei'al hakaporet 'asher 'al 'aron ha'eidut miben shenei hakerubim vaydaber 'eilav. numbers 8:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 8:2	daber 'el 'aharon ve'amarta 'eilav beha'alotekha 'et haneirot 'el mul penei hamenorah ya'iru shib'at haneirot. numbers 8:3	vaya'as ken 'aharon 'el mul penei hamenorah he'elah neiroteha ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. numbers 8:4	vezeh ma'aseh hamenorah miqshah zahab 'ad yereikhah 'ad pirkhah miqshah hi kamar'eh 'asher her'ah yhvh 'et mosheh ken 'asah 'et hamenorah. numbers 8:5	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 8:6	qakh 'et halviyim mitokh benei yisra'el vetiharta 'otam. numbers 8:7	vekhoh ta'aseh lahem letaharam hazeh 'aleihem mei khatat vehe'ebiru ta'ar 'al kal besaram vekhibesu bigdeihem vehiteharu. numbers 8:8	velaqekhu par ben baqar uminkhato solet belulah bashamen ufar sheini ben baqar tiqakh lekhatat. numbers 8:9	vehiqrabta 'et halviyim lifnei 'ohel mo'ed vehiqhalta 'et kal 'adat benei yisra'el. numbers 8:10	vehiqrabta 'et halviyim lifnei yhvh vesamekhu benei yisra'el 'et yedeihem 'al halviyim. numbers 8:11	veheinif 'aharon 'et halviyim tenufah lifnei yhvh mei'et benei yisra'el vehayu la'abod 'et 'abodat yhvh. numbers 8:12	vehalviyim yismekhu 'et yedeihem 'al rosh haparim va'aseh 'et ha'ekhad khatat ve'et ha'ekhad 'olah yhvh lekhaper 'al halviyim. numbers 8:13	veha'amadta 'et halviyim lifnei 'aharon velifnei banav veheinafta 'otam tenufah yhvh. numbers 8:14	vehibdalta 'et halviyim mitokh benei yisra'el vehayu li halviyim. numbers 8:15	ve'akharei khen yabo'u halviyim la'abod 'et 'ohel mo'ed vetiharta 'otam veheinafta 'otam tenufah. numbers 8:16	ki netunim netunim hemah li mitokh benei yisra'el takhat pitrat kal rekhem bekhor kol mibenei yisra'el laqakhti 'otam li. numbers 8:17	ki li khal bekhor bibnei yisra'el ba'adam ubabeheimah beyom hakoti khal bekhor be'erez mizrayim hiqdashti 'otam li. numbers 8:18	va'eqakh 'et halviyim takhat kal bekhor bibnei yisra'el. numbers 8:19	va'etenah 'et halviyim netunim le'aharon ulebanav mitokh benei yisra'el la'abod 'et 'abodat benei yisra'el be'ohel mo'ed ulekhaper 'al benei yisra'el velo yihyeh bibnei yisra'el negef begeshet benei yisra'el 'el haqodesh. numbers 8:20	vaya'as mosheh ve'aharon vekhal 'adat benei yisra'el lalviyim kekhol 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh lalviyim ken 'asu lahem benei yisra'el. numbers 8:21	vayitkhate'u halviyim vaykhabesu bigdeihem vayanef 'aharon 'otam tenufah lifnei yhvh vaykhaper 'aleihem 'aharon letaharam. numbers 8:22	ve'akharei khen ba'u halviyim la'abod 'et 'abodatam be'ohel mo'ed lifnei 'aharon velifnei banav ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh 'al halviyim ken 'asu lahem. numbers 8:23	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 8:24	zot 'asher lalviyim miben khamesh ve'esrim shanah vama'lah yabo lizbo zaba ba'abodat 'ohel mo'ed. numbers 8:25	umiben khamishim shanah yashub mizeba ha'abodah velo ya'abod 'od. numbers 8:26	vesheiret 'et 'ekhav be'ohel mo'ed lishmor mishmeret va'abodah lo ya'abod kakhah ta'aseh lalviyim bemishmerotam. numbers 9:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh bemidbar sinai bashanah hasheinit lezeitam mei'erez mizrayim bakhodesh harishon leimor. numbers 9:2	veya'asu benei yisra'el 'et hapasakh bemo'ado. numbers 9:3	be'arba'ah 'asar yom bakhodesh hazeh ben ha'arbayim ta'asu 'oto bemo'ado kekhal khuqotav ukhekhal mishpatav ta'asu 'oto. numbers 9:4	vaydaber mosheh 'el benei yisra'el la'asot hapasakh. numbers 9:5	vaya'asu 'et hapesakh barishon be'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh ben ha'arbayim bemidbar sinai kekhol 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh ken 'asu benei yisra'el. numbers 9:6	vayhi 'anashim 'asher hayu temei'im lenefesh 'adam velo yakhelu la'asot hapesakh bayom hahu vayiqrebu lifnei mosheh velifnei 'aharon bayom hahu. numbers 9:7	vayomeru ha'anashim hahemah 'eilav 'anakhnu temei'im lenefesh 'adam lamah nigara' lebilti haqrib 'et qareban yhvh bemo'ado betokh benei yisra'el. numbers 9:8	vayomer 'aleihem mosheh 'imdu ve'eshme'ah mah yezaveh yhvh lakhem. numbers 9:9	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 9:10	daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor 'ish 'ish ki yihyeh tamei lanefesh 'o bederekh rekhoqah lakhem 'o ledoroteikhem ve'asah fesakh yhvh. numbers 9:11	bakhodesh hasheini be'arba'ah 'asar yom ben ha'arbayim ya'asu 'oto 'al mazot umerorim yokheluhu. numbers 9:12	lo yash'iru mimenu 'ad boqer ve'ezem lo yishberu bo kekhal khuqat hapesakh ya'asu 'oto. numbers 9:13	veha'ish 'asher hu tahor ubederekh lo hayah vekhadal la'asot hapesakh venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mei'ameha ki qareban yhvh lo hiqrib bemo'ado khet'o yisa ha'ish hahu. numbers 9:14	vekhi yagur 'itekhem ger ve'asah fesakh yhvh kekhuqat hapesakh ukhemishpato ken ya'aseh khuqah 'akhat yihyeh lakhem velager ule'ezrakh ha'arez. numbers 9:15	ubeyom haqim 'et hamishkan kisah he'anan 'et hamishkan le'ohel ha'eidut uba'ereb yihyeh 'al hamishkan kemar'eh 'esh 'ad boqer. numbers 9:16	ken yihyeh tamid he'anan yekhasenu umar'eh 'esh layelah. numbers 9:17	ulefi hei'alot he'anan mei'al ha'ohel ve'akharei khen yis'u benei yisra'el ubimqom 'asher yishkan sham he'anan sham yakhanu benei yisra'el. numbers 9:18	'al pi yhvh yis'u benei yisra'el ve'al pi yhvh yakhanu kal yemei 'asher yishkon he'anan 'al hamishkan yakhanu. numbers 9:19	ubeha'arikh he'anan 'al hamishkan yamim rabim veshameru benei yisra'el 'et mishmeret yhvh velo yisa'u. numbers 9:20	veyesh 'asher yihyeh he'anan yamim mispar 'al hamishkan 'al pi yhvh yakhanu ve'al pi yhvh yisa'u. numbers 9:21	veyesh 'asher yihyeh he'anan mei'ereb 'ad boqer vena'alah he'anan baboqer venasa'u 'o yomam valaylah vena'alah he'anan venasa'u. numbers 9:22	'o yomayim 'o khodesh 'o yamim beha'arikh he'anan 'al hamishkan lishkon 'alav yakhanu benei yisra'el velo yisa'u ubehei'aloto yisa'u. numbers 9:23	'al pi yhvh yakhanu ve'al pi yhvh yisa'u 'et mishmeret yhvh shamaru 'al pi yhvh beyad mosheh. numbers 10:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 10:2	'aseh lekha shetei khazozrot kesef miqshah ta'aseh 'otam vehayu lekha lemiqra ha'eidah ulemasa' 'et hamakhanot. numbers 10:3	vetaqe'u bahen veno'adu 'eilekha kal ha'eidah 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed. numbers 10:4	ve'im be'akhat yitqa'u veno'adu 'eilekha hanesi'im rashei 'alfei yisra'el. numbers 10:5	uteqa'tem teru'ah venase'u hamakhanot hakhonim qeidemah. numbers 10:6	uteqa'tem teru'ah sheinit venase'u hamakhanot hakhonim teimanah teru'ah yitqe'u lemas'eihem. numbers 10:7	ubehaqhil 'et haqahal titqe'u velo tari'u. numbers 10:8	ubenei 'aharon hakohanim yitqe'u bakhazozerot vehayu lakhem lekhuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem. numbers 10:9	vekhi tabo'u milkhamah be'arzekhem 'al hazar hazorer 'etkhem vaharei'otem bakhazozerot vanizkartem lifnei yhvh 'eloheikhem venosha'tem mei'oyebeikhem. numbers 10:10	ubeyom simkhatkhem ubemo'adeikhem uberashei khadesheikhem uteqa'tem bakhazozerot 'al 'oloteikhem ve'al zibkhei shalmeikhem vehayu lakhem lezikaron lifnei 'eloheikhem 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. numbers 10:11	vayhi bashanah hasheinit bakhodesh hasheini be'esrim bakhodesh na'alah he'anan mei'al mishkan ha'eidut. numbers 10:12	vayis'u benei yisra'el lemas'eihem mimidbar sinai vayishkon he'anan bemidbar paran. numbers 10:13	vayis'u barishonah 'al pi yhvh beyad mosheh. numbers 10:14	vayisa' degel makhaneh benei yehudah barishonah lezib'otam ve'al zeba'o nakhshon ben 'aminadab. numbers 10:15	ve'al zeba mateh benei yisashkhar netan'el ben zu'ar. numbers 10:16	ve'al zeba mateh benei zebulun 'eli'ab ben kheilon. numbers 10:17	vehurad hamishkan venase'u benei geireshon ubenei merari nose'ei hamishkan. numbers 10:18	venasa' degel makhaneh re'uben lezib'otam ve'al zeba'o 'elizur ben shedei'ur. numbers 10:19	ve'al zeba mateh benei shim'on shelumi'el ben zuri shadai. numbers 10:20	ve'al zeba mateh benei gad 'elyasaf ben de'u'el. numbers 10:21	venase'u haqehatim nose'ei hamiqdash veheiqimu 'et hamishkan 'ad bo'am. numbers 10:22	venasa' degel makhaneh benei 'efrayim lezib'otam ve'al zeba'o 'elishama' ben 'amihud. numbers 10:23	ve'al zeba mateh benei menasheh gamli'el ben pedah zur numbers 10:24	ve'al zeba mateh benei binyamin 'abidan ben gid'oni. numbers 10:25	venasa' degel makhaneh benei dan me'asef lekhal hamakhanot lezib'otam ve'al zeba'o 'akhi'ezer ben 'amishadai numbers 10:26	ve'al zeba mateh benei 'asher pag'i'el ben 'akheran. numbers 10:27	ve'al zeba mateh benei naftali 'akhira' ben 'einan. numbers 10:28	'eleh mas'ei benei yisra'el lezib'otam vayisa'u. numbers 10:29	vayomer mosheh lekhobab ben re'u'el hamidyani khoten mosheh nose'im 'anakhnu 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amar yhvh 'oto 'eten lakhem lekhah 'itanu veheitabnu lakh ki yhvh diber tob 'al yisra'el. numbers 10:30	vayomer 'eilav lo 'eilekh ki 'im 'el 'arzi ve'el moladti 'eilekh. numbers 10:31	vayomer 'al na ta'azob 'otanu ki 'al ken yada'ta khanoteinu bamidbar vehayita lanu le'einayim. numbers 10:32	vehayah ki teilekh 'imanu vehayah hatob hahu 'asher yeitib yhvh 'imanu veheitabnu lakh. numbers 10:33	vayis'u meihar yhvh derekh sheloshet yamim va'aron berit yhvh noseia' lifneihem derekh sheloshet yamim latur lahem menukhah. numbers 10:34	va'anan yhvh 'aleihem yomam benase'am min hamakhaneh. numbers 10:35	vayhi binsoa' ha'aron vayomer mosheh qumah yhvh veyafuzu 'oyebekha veyanusu mesan'ekha mipanekha. numbers 10:36	ubenukhoh yomar shubah yhvh ribbot 'alfei yisra'el. numbers 11:1	vayhi ha'am kemit'onenim ra' be'azenei yhvh vayishma' yhvh vayikhar 'apo vatib'ar bam 'esh yhvh vatokhal biqzeh hamakhaneh. numbers 11:2	vayiz'aq ha'am 'el mosheh vayitpalel mosheh 'el yhvh vatishqa' ha'esh. numbers 11:3	vayiqra shem hamaqom hahu tab'eirah ki ba'arah bam 'esh yhvh. numbers 11:4	vehasafsuf 'asher beqirbo hit'avu ta'avah vayashubu vayibku gam benei yisra'el vayomeru mi ya'akhileinu basar. numbers 11:5	zakharnu 'et hadagah 'asher nokhal bemizrayim khinam 'et haqishu'im ve'et ha'abatikhim ve'et hekhazir ve'et habezalim ve'et hashumim. numbers 11:6	ve'atah nafsheinu yebeishah 'en kol bilti 'el haman 'eineinu. numbers 11:7	vehaman kizra' gad hu ve'eino ke'en habedolakh. numbers 11:8	shatu ha'am velaqetu vetakhanu bareikhayim 'o dakhu bamedokhah ubishelu baparur ve'asu 'oto 'ugot vehayah ta'mo keta'am leshad hashamen. numbers 11:9	uberedet hatal 'al hamakhaneh layelah yeired haman 'alav. numbers 11:10	vayishma' mosheh 'et ha'am bokheh lemishpekhotav 'ish lefetakh 'aholo vayikhar 'af yhvh me'od ube'einei mosheh ra'. numbers 11:11	vayomer mosheh 'el yhvh lamah harei'ota le'abdekha velamah lo mazati khen be'einekha lasum 'et masa kal ha'am hazeh 'alai. numbers 11:12	he'anokhi hariti 'et kal ha'am hazeh 'im 'anokhi yelidtihu ki tomar 'eilai sa'eihu bekheiqekha ka'asher yisa ha'omen 'et hayoneq 'al ha'adamah 'asher nishba'ta la'abotav. numbers 11:13	mei'ayin li basar latet lekhal ha'am hazeh ki yibku 'alai leimor tenah lanu basar venokheilah. numbers 11:14	lo 'ukhal 'anokhi lebadi laset 'et kal ha'am hazeh ki khabed mimeni. numbers 11:15	ve'im kakhah 'at 'oseh li haregeini na harog 'im mazati khen be'einekha ve'al 'er'eh bera'ati. numbers 11:16	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'esfah li shib'im 'ish miziqnei yisra'el 'asher yada'ta ki hem ziqnei ha'am veshoterav velaqakhta 'otam 'el 'ohel mo'ed vehityazebu sham 'imakh. numbers 11:17	veyaradti vedibarti 'imekha sham ve'azalti min haruakh 'asher 'alekha vesamti 'aleihem venase'u 'itekha bemasa ha'am velo tisa 'atah lebadekha. numbers 11:18	ve'el ha'am tomar hitqadeshu lemakhar va'akhaltem basar ki bekhitem be'azenei yhvh leimor mi ya'akhileinu basar ki tob lanu bemizrayim venatan yhvh lakhem basar va'akhaltem. numbers 11:19	lo yom 'ekhad tokhelun velo yomayim velo khamishah yamim velo 'asarah yamim velo 'esrim yom. numbers 11:20	'ad khodesh yamim 'ad 'asher yeizei mei'apekhem vehayah lakhem lezara ya'an ki me'astem 'et yhvh 'asher beqirbekhem vatibku lefanav leimor lamah zeh yazanu mimizrayim. numbers 11:21	vayomer mosheh shesh mei'ot 'elef ragli ha'am 'asher 'anokhi beqirbo ve'atah 'amarta basar 'eten lahem ve'akhelu khodesh yamim. numbers 11:22	hazon ubaqar yishakhet lahem umaza lahem 'im 'et kal degei hayam yei'asef lahem umaza lahem. numbers 11:23	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh hayad yhvh tiqzar 'atah tir'eh hayiqrekha debari 'im lo. numbers 11:24	vayeizei mosheh vaydaber 'el ha'am 'et dibrei yhvh vaye'esof shib'im 'ish miziqnei ha'am vaya'amed 'otam sebibot ha'ohel. numbers 11:25	vayeired yhvh be'anan vaydaber 'eilav vayazel min haruakh 'asher 'alav vayiten 'al shib'im 'ish hazeqeinim vayhi kenoakh 'aleihem haruakh vayitnabe'u velo yasafu. numbers 11:26	vayisha'aru shenei 'anashim bamakhaneh shem ha'ekhad 'eldad veshem hasheini meidad vatanakh 'aleihem haruakh vehemah baketubim velo yaze'u ha'ohelah vayitnabe'u bamakhaneh. numbers 11:27	vayaraz hana'ar vayaged lemosheh vayomar 'eldad umeidad mitnabe'im bamakhaneh. numbers 11:28	vaya'an yehoshua' bin nun mesharet mosheh mibekhurav vayomar 'adoni mosheh kela'em. numbers 11:29	vayomer lo mosheh hamqanei 'atah li umi yiten kal 'am yhvh nebi'im ki yiten yhvh 'et rukho 'aleihem. numbers 11:30	vayei'asef mosheh 'el hamakhaneh hu veziqnei yisra'el. numbers 11:31	veruakh nasa' mei'et yhvh vayagaz salvim min hayam vayitosh 'al hamakhaneh kederekh yom koh ukhederekh yom koh sebibot hamakhaneh ukhe'amatayim 'al penei ha'arez. numbers 11:32	vayaqam ha'am kal hayom hahu vekhal halaylah vekhol yom hamakhorat vaya'asfu 'et haselav hamam'it 'asaf 'asarah khomarim vayishtekhu lahem shatoakh sebibot hamakhaneh. numbers 11:33	habasar 'odenu ben shineihem terem yikaret ve'af yhvh kharah ba'am vayakh yhvh ba'am makah rabah me'od. numbers 11:34	vayiqra 'et shem hamaqom hahu qibrot hata'avah ki sham qaberu 'et ha'am hamit'avim. numbers 11:35	miqibrot hata'avah nase'u ha'am khazeirot vayihyu bakhazeirot. numbers 12:1	vatedaber miryam ve'aharon bemosheh 'al 'odot ha'ishah hakushit 'asher laqakh ki 'ishah khushit laqakh. numbers 12:2	vayomeru haraq 'akh bemosheh diber yhvh halo gam banu diber vayishma' yhvh. numbers 12:3	veha'ish mosheh 'anav 'anav me'od mikol ha'adam 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah. numbers 12:4	vayomer yhvh pit'om 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon ve'el miryam ze'u shelashetekhem 'el 'ohel mo'ed vayeize'u shelashetam. numbers 12:5	vayeired yhvh be'amud 'anan vaya'amod petakh ha'ohel vayiqra 'aharon umiryam vayeize'u sheneihem. numbers 12:6	vayomer shim'u na debarai 'im yihyeh nebi'akhem yhvh bamar'ah 'eilav 'etvada' bakhalom 'adaber bo. numbers 12:7	lo khen 'abdi mosheh bekhal beiti ne'eman hu. numbers 12:8	peh 'el peh 'adaber bo umar'eh velo bekhidot utemunat yhvh yabit umadua' lo yereitem ledaber be'abdi bemosheh. numbers 12:9	vayikhar 'af yhvh bam vayeilakh. numbers 12:10	vehe'anan sar mei'al ha'ohel vehineh miryam mezora'at kashaleg vayifen 'aharon 'el miryam vehineh mezora'at. numbers 12:11	vayomer 'aharon 'el mosheh bi 'adoni 'al na tashet 'aleinu khatat 'asher no'alnu va'asher khatanu. numbers 12:12	'al na tehi kamet 'asher bezeito meirekhem 'imo vayei'akhel khazi besaro. numbers 12:13	vayiz'aq mosheh 'el yhvh leimor 'el na refa na lah. numbers 12:14	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh ve'abiha yaroq yaraq befaneha halo tikalem shib'at yamim tisager shib'at yamim mikhuz lamakhaneh ve'akhar tei'asef. numbers 12:15	vatisager miryam mikhuz lamakhaneh shib'at yamim veha'am lo nasa' 'ad hei'asef miryam. numbers 12:16	ve'akhar nase'u ha'am meikhazeirot vayakhanu bemidbar paran. numbers 13:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 13:2	shelakh lekha 'anashim veyaturu 'et 'erez kena'an 'asher 'ani noten libnei yisra'el 'ish 'ekhad 'ish 'ekhad lemateh 'abotav tishlakhu kol nasi bahem. numbers 13:3	vayishlakh 'otam mosheh mimidbar paran 'al pi yhvh kulam 'anashim rashei benei yisra'el hemah. numbers 13:4	ve'eleh shemotam lemateh re'uben shamua' ben zakur. numbers 13:5	lemateh shim'on shafat ben khori. numbers 13:6	lemateh yehudah kaleb ben yefuneh. numbers 13:7	lemateh yisashkhar yig'al ben yosef. numbers 13:8	lemateh 'efrayim hosheia' bin nun. numbers 13:9	lemateh binyamin palti ben rafu. numbers 13:10	lemateh zebulun gadi'el ben sodi. numbers 13:11	lemateh yosef lemateh menasheh gadi ben susi. numbers 13:12	lemateh dan 'ami'el ben gemali. numbers 13:13	lemateh 'asher setur ben mikha'el. numbers 13:14	lemateh naftali nakhbi ben vafesi. numbers 13:15	lemateh gad ge'u'el ben makhi. numbers 13:16	'eleh shemot ha'anashim 'asher shalakh mosheh latur 'et ha'arez vayiqra mosheh lehosheia' bin nun yehoshua'. numbers 13:17	vayishlakh 'otam mosheh latur 'et 'erez kena'an vayomer 'aleihem 'alu zeh banegeb va'alitem 'et hahar. numbers 13:18	ure'item 'et ha'arez mah hi ve'et ha'am hayosheb 'aleha hekhazaq hu harafeh ham'at hu 'im rab. numbers 13:19	umah ha'arez 'asher hu yosheb bah hatobah hi 'im ra'ah umah he'arim 'asher hu yosheb bahenah habemakhanim 'im bemibzarim. numbers 13:20	umah ha'arez hashemeinah hi 'im razah hayesh bah 'ez 'im 'ayin vehitkhazaqtem uleqakhtem miperi ha'arez vehayamim yemei bikurei 'anabim. numbers 13:21	vaya'alu vayaturu 'et ha'arez mimidbar zin 'ad rekhob lebo khamat. numbers 13:22	vaya'alu banegeb vayabo 'ad khebron vesham 'akhiman sheishai vetalmai yelidei ha'anaq vekhebron sheba' shanim nibnetah lifnei zo'an mizrayim. numbers 13:23	vayabo'u 'ad nakhal 'eshkol vayikhretu misham zemorah ve'eshkol 'anabim 'ekhad vayisa'uhu bamot bishnayim umin harimonim umin hate'einim. numbers 13:24	lamaqom hahu qara nakhal 'eshkol 'al 'odot ha'eshkol 'asher karetu misham benei yisra'el. numbers 13:25	vayashubu mitur ha'arez miqez 'arba'im yom. numbers 13:26	vayeilekhu vayabo'u 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon ve'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el 'el midbar paran qadeishah vayashibu 'otam dabar ve'et kal ha'eidah vayar'um 'et peri ha'arez. numbers 13:27	vaysaperu lo vayomeru banu 'el ha'arez 'asher shelakhtanu vegam zabat khalab udebash hi vezeh piryah. numbers 13:28	'efes ki 'az ha'am hayosheb ba'arez vehe'arim bezurot gedolot me'od vegam yelidei ha'anaq ra'inu sham. numbers 13:29	'amaleq yosheb be'erez hanegeb vehakhiti vehaybusi veha'emori yosheb bahar vehakena'ani yosheb 'al hayam ve'al yad hayarden. numbers 13:30	vayahas kaleb 'et ha'am 'el mosheh vayomer 'aloh na'aleh veyarashnu 'otah ki yakhol nukhal lah. numbers 13:31	veha'anashim 'asher 'alu 'imo 'ameru lo nukhal la'alot 'el ha'am ki khazaq hu mimenu. numbers 13:32	vayozi'u dibat ha'arez 'asher taru 'otah 'el benei yisra'el leimor ha'arez 'asher 'abarnu bah latur 'otah 'erez 'okhelet yoshebeha hi vekhal ha'am 'asher ra'inu betokhah 'anshei midot. numbers 13:33	vesham ra'inu 'et hanefilim benei 'anaq min hanefilim vanehi be'eineinu kakhagabim vekhen hayinu be'eineihem. numbers 14:1	vatisa kal ha'eidah vayitenu 'et qolam vayibku ha'am balaylah hahu. numbers 14:2	vayilonu 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon kol benei yisra'el vayomeru 'aleihem kal ha'eidah lu matnu be'erez mizrayim 'o bamidbar hazeh lu matenu. numbers 14:3	velamah yhvh meibi 'otanu 'el ha'arez hazot linpol bakhereb nasheinu vetapeinu yihyu labaz halo tob lanu shub mizrayemah. numbers 14:4	vayomeru 'ish 'el 'akhiv nitenah rosh venashubah mizrayemah. numbers 14:5	vayipol mosheh ve'aharon 'al peneihem lifnei kal qehal 'adat benei yisra'el. numbers 14:6	vihoshua' bin nun vekhaleb ben yefuneh min hatarim 'et ha'arez qare'u bigdeihem. numbers 14:7	vayomeru 'el kal 'adat benei yisra'el leimor ha'arez 'asher 'abarnu bah latur 'otah tobah ha'arez me'od me'od. numbers 14:8	'im khafez banu yhvh veheibi 'otanu 'el ha'arez hazot unetanah lanu 'erez 'asher hi zabat khalab udebash. numbers 14:9	'akh yhvh 'al timrodu ve'atem 'al tire'u 'et 'am ha'arez ki lakhmeinu hem sar zilam mei'aleihem yhvh 'itanu 'al tira'um. numbers 14:10	vayomeru kal ha'eidah lirgom 'otam ba'abanim ukhebod yhvh nir'ah be'ohel mo'ed 'el kal benei yisra'el. numbers 14:11	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'ad 'anah yena'azuni ha'am hazeh ve'ad 'anah lo ya'aminu bi bekhol ha'otot 'asher 'asiti beqirbo. numbers 14:12	'akenu badeber ve'orishenu ve'e'eseh 'otekha lego gadol ve'azum mimenu. numbers 14:13	vayomer mosheh 'el yhvh veshame'u mizrayim ki he'elita bekhokhakha 'et ha'am hazeh miqirbo. numbers 14:14	ve'ameru 'el yosheb ha'arez hazot shame'u ki 'atah yhvh beqereb ha'am hazeh 'asher 'ayin be'ayin nir'ah 'atah yhvh va'ananekha 'omed 'aleihem ube'amud 'anan 'atah holekh lifneihem yomam ube'amud 'esh layelah. numbers 14:15	veheimatah 'et ha'am hazeh ke'ish 'ekhad ve'ameru hagoyim 'asher shame'u 'et shim'akha leimor. numbers 14:16	mibilti yekholet yhvh lehabi 'et ha'am hazeh 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba' lahem vayishkhatem bamidbar. numbers 14:17	ve'atah yigdal na koakh 'adonai ka'asher dibarta leimor. numbers 14:18	yhvh 'erekh 'apayim verab khesed nosei 'avon vafasha' venaqeh lo yenaqeh poqed 'avon 'abot 'al banim 'al shileishim ve'al ribei'im. numbers 14:19	selakh na la'avon ha'am hazeh kegodel khasdekha vekha'asher nasatah la'am hazeh mimizrayim ve'ad henah. numbers 14:20	vayomer yhvh salakhti kidbarekha. numbers 14:21	ve'ulam khai 'ani veyimalei khebod yhvh 'et kal ha'arez. numbers 14:22	ki khal ha'anashim haro'im 'et kebodi ve'et 'ototai 'asher 'asiti bemizrayim ubamidbar vaynasu 'oti zeh 'eser pe'amim velo shame'u beqoli. numbers 14:23	'im yir'u 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti la'abotam vekhal mena'azai lo yir'uha. numbers 14:24	ve'abdi khaleb 'eiqeb hayetah ruakh 'akheret 'imo vaymalei 'akharai vahabi'otiv 'el ha'arez 'asher ba shamah vezar'o yorishenah. numbers 14:25	veha'amaleiqi vehakena'ani yosheb ba'eimeq makhar penu use'u lakhem hamidbar derekh yam suf. numbers 14:26	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. numbers 14:27	'ad matai la'eidah hara'ah hazot 'asher hemah malinim 'alai 'et telunot benei yisra'el 'asher hemah malinim 'alai shama'eti. numbers 14:28	'emor 'aleihem khai 'ani ne'um yhvh 'im lo ka'asher dibartem be'azenai ken 'e'eseh lakhem. numbers 14:29	bamidbar hazeh yipelu figreikhem vekhal pequdeikhem lekhal misparkhem miben 'esrim shanah vama'elah 'asher halinotem 'alai. numbers 14:30	'im 'atem tabo'u 'el ha'arez 'asher nasati 'et yadi leshaken 'etkhem bah ki 'im kaleb ben yefuneh vihoshua' bin nun. numbers 14:31	vetapekhem 'asher 'amartem labaz yihyeh veheibeiti 'otam veyade'u 'et ha'arez 'asher me'astem bah. numbers 14:32	ufigreikhem 'atem yipelu bamidbar hazeh. numbers 14:33	ubeneikhem yihyu ro'im bamidbar 'arba'im shanah venase'u 'et zenuteikhem 'ad tom pigreikhem bamidbar. numbers 14:34	bemispar hayamim 'asher tartem 'et ha'arez 'arba'im yom yom lashanah yom lashanah tis'u 'et 'avonoteikhem 'arba'im shanah vida'tem 'et tenu'ati. numbers 14:35	'ani yhvh dibarti 'im lo zot 'e'eseh lekhal ha'eidah hara'ah hazot hano'adim 'alai bamidbar hazeh yitamu vesham yamutu. numbers 14:36	veha'anashim 'asher shalakh mosheh latur 'et ha'arez vayashubu vayilonu vayalinu 'alav 'et kal ha'eidah lehozi dibah 'al ha'arez. numbers 14:37	vayamutu ha'anashim mozi'ei dibat ha'arez ra'ah bamageifah lifnei yhvh. numbers 14:38	vihoshua' bin nun vekhaleb ben yefuneh khayu min ha'anashim hahem haholekhim latur 'et ha'arez. numbers 14:39	vaydaber mosheh 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'el kal benei yisra'el vayit'abelu ha'am me'od. numbers 14:40	vayashkimu baboqer vaya'alu 'el rosh hahar leimor hinenu ve'alinu 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amar yhvh ki khatanu. numbers 14:41	vayomer mosheh lamah zeh 'atem 'oberim 'et pi yhvh vehiv lo tizlakh. numbers 14:42	'al ta'alu ki 'en yhvh beqirbekhem velo tinagefu lifnei 'oyebeikhem. numbers 14:43	ki ha'amaleiqi vehakena'ani sham lifneikhem unefaltem bekhareb ki 'al ken shabtem mei'akharei yhvh velo yihyeh yhvh 'imakhem. numbers 14:44	vaya'pilu la'alot 'el rosh hahar va'aron berit yhvh umosheh lo mashu miqereb hamakhaneh. numbers 14:45	vayeired ha'amaleiqi vehakena'ani hayosheb bahar hahu vayakum vayaketum 'ad hakharemah. numbers 15:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 15:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki tabo'u 'el 'erez mosheboteikhem 'asher 'ani noten lakhem. numbers 15:3	va'asitem 'isheh yhvh 'olah 'o zebakh lefalei neder 'o bindabah 'o bemo'adeikhem la'asot reiakh nikhoakh yhvh min habaqar 'o min hazon. numbers 15:4	vehiqrib hamaqrib qarebano yhvh minkhah solet 'isaron balul birbi'it hahin shamen. numbers 15:5	veyayin lanesekh rebi'it hahin ta'aseh 'al ha'olah 'o lazabakh lakebes ha'ekhad. numbers 15:6	'o la'ayil ta'aseh minkhah solet shenei 'esronim belulah bashemen shelishit hahin. numbers 15:7	veyayin lanesekh shelishit hahin taqrib reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. numbers 15:8	vekhi ta'aseh ben baqar 'olah 'o zabakh lefalei neder 'o shelamim yhvh. numbers 15:9	vehiqrib 'al ben habaqar minkhah solet sheloshah 'esronim balul bashemen khazi hahin. numbers 15:10	veyayin taqrib lanesekh khazi hahin 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. numbers 15:11	kakhah yei'aseh lashor ha'ekhad 'o la'ayil ha'ekhad 'o laseh bakebasim 'o ba'izim. numbers 15:12	kamispar 'asher ta'asu kakhah ta'asu la'ekhad kemisparam. numbers 15:13	kal ha'ezrakh ya'aseh kakhah 'et 'eleh lehaqrib 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. numbers 15:14	vekhi yagur 'itekhem ger 'o 'asher betokhkhem ledoroteikhem ve'asah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh ka'asher ta'asu ken ya'aseh. numbers 15:15	haqahal khuqah 'akhat lakhem velager hagar khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem kakhem kager yihyeh lifnei yhvh. numbers 15:16	torah 'akhat umishpat 'ekhad yihyeh lakhem velager hagar 'itekhem. numbers 15:17	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 15:18	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem bebo'akhem 'el ha'arez 'asher 'ani meibi 'etkhem shamah. numbers 15:19	vehayah ba'akhalekhem milekhem ha'arez tarimu terumah yhvh. numbers 15:20	reishit 'arisoteikhem khalah tarimu terumah kitrumat goren ken tarimu 'otah. numbers 15:21	meireishit 'arisoteikhem titenu yhvh terumah ledoroteikhem. numbers 15:22	vekhi tishgu velo ta'asu 'et kal hamizvot ha'eleh 'asher diber yhvh 'el mosheh. numbers 15:23	'et kal 'asher zivah yhvh 'aleikhem beyad mosheh min hayom 'asher zivah yhvh vahale'ah ledoroteikhem. numbers 15:24	vehayah 'im mei'einei ha'eidah ne'estah lishgagah ve'asu khal ha'eidah par ben baqar 'ekhad le'olah lereiakh nikhoakh yhvh uminkhato venisko kamishpat use'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat. numbers 15:25	vekhiper hakohen 'al kal 'adat benei yisra'el venislakh lahem ki shegagah hi vehem heibi'u 'et qarebanam 'isheh yhvh vekhatatam lifnei yhvh 'al shiggatam. numbers 15:26	venislakh lekhal 'adat benei yisra'el velager hagar betokham ki lekhal ha'am bishgagah. numbers 15:27	ve'im nefesh 'akhat tekheta bishgagah vehiqribah 'ez bat shenatah lekhatat. numbers 15:28	vekhiper hakohen 'al hanefesh hashogeget bekhet'ah bishgagah lifnei yhvh lekhaper 'alav venislakh lo. numbers 15:29	ha'ezrakh bibnei yisra'el velager hagar betokham torah 'akhat yihyeh lakhem la'oseh bishgagah. numbers 15:30	vehanefesh 'asher ta'aseh beyad ramah min ha'ezrakh umin hager 'et yhvh hu megadef venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miqereb 'amah. numbers 15:31	ki debar yhvh bazah ve'et mizvato heifar hikaret tikaret hanefesh hahiv 'avonah bah. numbers 15:32	vayihyu benei yisra'el bamidbar vayimze'u 'ish meqoshesh 'eizim beyom hashabat. numbers 15:33	vayaqribu 'oto hamoze'im 'oto meqoshesh 'eizim 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon ve'el kal ha'eidah. numbers 15:34	vayanikhu 'oto bamishmar ki lo forash mah yei'aseh lo. numbers 15:35	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh mot yumat ha'ish ragom 'oto ba'abanim kal ha'eidah mikhuz lamakhaneh. numbers 15:36	vayozi'u 'oto kal ha'eidah 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh vayirgemu 'oto ba'abanim vayamot ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. numbers 15:37	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 15:38	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ve'asu lahem zizit 'al kanfei bigdeihem ledorotam venatenu 'al zizit hakanaf petil tekheilet. numbers 15:39	vehayah lakhem lezizit ure'item 'oto uzekhartem 'et kal mizvot yhvh va'asitem 'otam velo taturu 'akharei lebabkhem ve'akharei 'eineikhem 'asher 'atem zonim 'akhareihem. numbers 15:40	lema'an tizkeru va'asitem 'et kal mizvotai vihyitem qedoshim leiloheikhem. numbers 15:41	'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem 'asher hozeiti 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim lihyot lakhem leilohim 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. numbers 16:1	vayiqakh qorakh ben yizhar ben qehat ben leivi vedatan va'abiram benei 'eli'ab ve'on ben pelet benei re'uben. numbers 16:2	vayaqumu lifnei mosheh va'anashim mibenei yisra'el khamishim umatayim nesi'ei 'eidah qeri'ei mo'ed 'anshei shem. numbers 16:3	vayiqahalu 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon vayomeru 'aleihem rab lakhem ki khal ha'eidah kulam qedoshim ubetokham yhvh umadua' titnase'u 'al qehal yhvh. numbers 16:4	vayishma' mosheh vayipol 'al panav. numbers 16:5	vaydaber 'el qorakh ve'el kal 'adato leimor boqer veyoda' yhvh 'et 'asher lo ve'et haqadosh vehiqrib 'eilav ve'et 'asher yibkhar bo yaqrib 'eilav. numbers 16:6	zot 'asu qekhu lakhem makhtot qorakh vekhal 'adato. numbers 16:7	utenu bahen 'esh vesimu 'aleihen qetoret lifnei yhvh makhar vehayah ha'ish 'asher yibkhar yhvh hu haqadosh rab lakhem benei leivi. numbers 16:8	vayomer mosheh 'el qorakh shim'u na benei leivi. numbers 16:9	ham'at mikem ki hibdil 'elohei yisra'el 'etkhem mei'adat yisra'el lehaqrib 'etkhem 'eilav la'abod 'et 'abodat mishkan yhvh vela'amod lifnei ha'eidah lesharetam. numbers 16:10	vayaqreb 'otekha ve'et kal 'akhekha benei leivi 'itakh ubiqashtem gam kehunah. numbers 16:11	lakhen 'atah vekhal 'adatekha hano'adim 'al yhvh ve'aharon mah hu ki tilonu talinu 'alav. numbers 16:12	vayishlakh mosheh liqro ledatan vela'abiram benei 'eli'ab vayomeru lo na'aleh. numbers 16:13	ham'at ki he'elitanu mei'erez zabat khalab udebash lahamiteinu bamidbar ki tistarer 'aleinu gam histarer. numbers 16:14	'af lo 'el 'erez zabat khalab udebash habi'otanu vatiten lanu nakhalat sadeh vakharem ha'einei ha'anashim hahem tenaqer lo na'aleh. numbers 16:15	vayikhar lemosheh me'od vayomer 'el yhvh 'al teifen 'el minkhatam lo khamor 'ekhad meihem nasati velo harei'oti 'et 'akhad meihem. numbers 16:16	vayomer mosheh 'el qorakh 'atah vekhal 'adatekha heyu lifnei yhvh 'atah vahem ve'aharon makhar. numbers 16:17	uqekhu 'ish makhtato unetatem 'aleihem qetoret vehiqrabtem lifnei yhvh 'ish makhtato khamishim umatayim makhtot ve'atah ve'aharon 'ish makhtato. numbers 16:18	vayiqkhu 'ish makhtato vayitenu 'aleihem 'esh vayasimu 'aleihem qetoret vaya'amdu petakh 'ohel mo'ed umosheh ve'aharon. numbers 16:19	vayaqhel 'aleihem qorakh 'et kal ha'eidah 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed vayeira khebod yhvh 'el kal ha'eidah. numbers 16:20	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. numbers 16:21	hibadelu mitokh ha'eidah hazot va'akhaleh 'otam keraga'. numbers 16:22	vayipelu 'al peneihem vayomeru 'el 'elohei harukhot lekhal basar ha'ish 'ekhad yekheta ve'al kal ha'eidah tiqzof. numbers 16:23	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 16:24	daber 'el ha'eidah leimor hei'alu misabib lemishkan qorakh datan va'abiram. numbers 16:25	vayaqam mosheh vayeilekh 'el datan va'abiram vayeilekhu 'akharav ziqnei yisra'el. numbers 16:26	vaydaber 'el ha'eidah leimor suru na mei'al 'aholei ha'anashim haresha'im ha'eleh ve'al tige'u bekhal 'asher lahem pen tisafu bekhal khatotam. numbers 16:27	vayei'alu mei'al mishkan qorekh datan va'abiram misabib vedatan va'abiram yaze'u nizabim petakh 'aholeihem unesheihem ubeneihem vetapam. numbers 16:28	vayomer mosheh bezot teide'un ki yhvh shelakhani la'asot 'et kal hama'asim ha'eleh ki lo milibi. numbers 16:29	'im kemot kal ha'adam yemutun 'eleh ufequdat kal ha'adam yipaqed 'aleihem lo yhvh shelakhani. numbers 16:30	ve'im beri'ah yibra yhvh ufazetah ha'adamah 'et piha ubale'ah 'otam ve'et kal 'asher lahem veyaredu khayim she'olah vida'tem ki ni'azu ha'anashim ha'eleh 'et yhvh. numbers 16:31	vayhi kekhaloto ledaber 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh vatibaqa' ha'adamah 'asher takhteihem. numbers 16:32	vatiftakh ha'arez 'et piha vatibla' 'otam ve'et bateihem ve'et kal ha'adam 'asher leqorakh ve'et kal harakhush. numbers 16:33	vayeiredu hem vekhal 'asher lahem khayim she'olah vatekhas 'aleihem ha'arez vayobedu mitokh haqahal. numbers 16:34	vekhal yisra'el 'asher sebiboteihem nasu leqolam ki 'ameru pen tibla'einu ha'arez. numbers 16:35	ve'esh yaze'ah mei'et yhvh vatokhal 'et hakhamishim umatayim 'ish maqribei haqetoret. numbers 16:36	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 16:37	'emor 'el 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen veyarem 'et hamakhtot miben hasereifah ve'et ha'esh zereh hale'ah ki qadeishu. numbers 16:38	'et makhtot hakhata'im ha'eleh benafshotam ve'asu 'otam riqu'ei fakhim zipui lamizbeiakh ki hiqribum lifnei yhvh vayiqdashu veyihyu le'ot libnei yisra'el. numbers 16:39	vayiqakh 'el'azar hakohen 'et makhtot hanekhoshet 'asher hiqribu haserufim vayraqe'um zipui lamizbeiakh. numbers 16:40	zikaron libnei yisra'el lema'an 'asher lo yiqrab 'ish zar 'asher lo mizera' 'aharon hu lehaqtir qetoret lifnei yhvh velo yihyeh kheqorakh vekha'adato ka'asher diber yhvh beyad mosheh lo. numbers 16:41	vayilonu kal 'adat benei yisra'el mimakhorat 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon leimor 'atem hamitem 'et 'am yhvh. numbers 16:42	vayhi behiqahel ha'eidah 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon vayifnu 'el 'ohel mo'ed vehineh khisahu he'anan vayeira kebod yhvh. numbers 16:43	vayabo mosheh ve'aharon 'el penei 'ohel mo'ed. numbers 16:44	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 16:45	heiromu mitokh ha'eidah hazot va'akhaleh 'otam keraga' vayipelu 'al peneihem. numbers 16:46	vayomer mosheh 'el 'aharon qakh 'et hamakhtah veten 'aleha 'esh mei'al hamizbeiakh vesim qetoret veholekh meheirah 'el ha'eidah vekhaper 'aleihem ki yaza haqezef milifnei yhvh heikhel hanagef. numbers 16:47	vayiqakh 'aharon ka'asher diber mosheh vayaraz 'el tokh haqahal vehineh heikhel hanegef ba'am vayiten 'et haqetoret vaykhaper 'al ha'am. numbers 16:48	vaya'amod ben hameitim uben hakhayim vatei'azar hamageifah. numbers 16:49	vayihyu hameitim bamageifah 'arba'ah 'asar 'elef usheba' mei'ot milebad hameitim 'al debar qorakh. numbers 16:50	vayashab 'aharon 'el mosheh 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed vehamageifah ne'ezarah. numbers 17:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 17:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el veqakh mei'itam mateh mateh lebet 'ab mei'et kal nesi'eihem lebet 'abotam shenem 'asar matot 'ish 'et shemo tikhtob 'al mateihu. numbers 17:3	ve'et shem 'aharon tikhtob 'al mateh leivi ki mateh 'ekhad lerosh bet 'abotam. numbers 17:4	vehinakhtam be'ohel mo'ed lifnei ha'eidut 'asher 'iva'ed lakhem shamah. numbers 17:5	vehayah ha'ish 'asher 'ebkhar bo mateihu yifrakh vahashikoti mei'alai 'et telunot benei yisra'el 'asher hem malinim 'aleikhem. numbers 17:6	vaydaber mosheh 'el benei yisra'el vayitenu 'eilav kal nesi'eihem mateh lenasi 'ekhad mateh lenasi 'ekhad lebet 'abotam shenem 'asar matot umateh 'aharon betokh matotam. numbers 17:7	vayanakh mosheh 'et hamatot lifnei yhvh be'ohel ha'eidut. numbers 17:8	vayhi mimakhorat vayabo mosheh 'el 'ohel ha'eidut vehineh parakh mateh 'aharon lebet leivi vayozei ferakh vayazez ziz vayigmol sheqeidim. numbers 17:9	vayozei mosheh 'et kal hamatot milifnei yhvh 'el kal benei yisra'el vayir'u vayiqkhu 'ish mateihu. numbers 17:10	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh hasheb 'et mateh 'aharon lifnei ha'eidut lemishmeret le'ot libnei meri utekhal telunotam mei'alai velo yamutu. numbers 17:11	vaya'as mosheh ka'asher zivah yhvh 'oto ken 'asah. numbers 17:12	vayomeru benei yisra'el 'el mosheh leimor hen gava'nu 'abadnu kulanu 'abadnu. numbers 17:13	kol haqareb haqareb 'el mishkan yhvh yamut ha'im tamnu ligvoa'. numbers 18:1	vayomer yhvh 'el 'aharon 'atah ubanekha ubet 'abikha 'itakh tis'u 'et 'avon hamiqdash ve'atah ubanekha 'itakh tis'u 'et 'avon kehunatkhem. numbers 18:2	vegam 'et 'akhekha mateh leivi sheibet 'abikha haqreb 'itakh veyilavu 'alekha visharetukha ve'atah ubanekha 'itakh lifnei 'ohel ha'eidut. numbers 18:3	veshameru mishmartekha umishmeret kal ha'ohel 'akh 'el kelei haqodesh ve'el hamizbeiakh lo yiqrabu velo yamutu gam hem gam 'atem. numbers 18:4	venilvu 'alekha veshameru 'et mishmeret 'ohel mo'ed lekhol 'abodat ha'ohel vezar lo yiqrab 'aleikhem. numbers 18:5	ushemartem 'et mishmeret haqodesh ve'et mishmeret hamizbeiakh velo yihyeh 'od qezef 'al benei yisra'el. numbers 18:6	va'ani hineh laqakhti 'et 'akheikhem halviyim mitokh benei yisra'el lakhem matanah netunim yhvh la'abod 'et 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed. numbers 18:7	ve'atah ubanekha 'itekha tishmeru 'et kehunatkhem lekhal debar hamizbeiakh ulemibet laparokhet va'abadtem 'abodat matanah 'eten 'et kehunatkhem vehazar haqareb yumat. numbers 18:8	vaydaber yhvh 'el 'aharon va'ani hineh natati lekha 'et mishmeret terumotai lekhal qadeshei benei yisra'el lekha netatim lemashekhah ulebanekha lekhaq 'olam. numbers 18:9	zeh yihyeh lekha miqodesh haqodashim min ha'esh kal qarebanam lekhal minkhatam ulekhal khatatam ulekhal 'ashamam 'asher yashibu li qodesh qadashim lekha hu ulebanekha. numbers 18:10	beqodesh haqodashim tokhalenu kal zakhar yokhal 'oto qodesh yihyeh lakh. numbers 18:11	vezeh lekha terumat matanam lekhal tenufot benei yisra'el lekha netatim ulebanekha velibnotekha 'itekha lekhaq 'olam kal tahor bebeitekha yokhal 'oto. numbers 18:12	kol kheileb yizhar vekhal kheileb tirosh vedagan reishitam 'asher yitenu yhvh lekha netatim. numbers 18:13	bikurei kal 'asher be'arzam 'asher yabi'u yhvh lekha yihyeh kal tahor bebeitekha yokhalenu. numbers 18:14	kal kheirem beyisra'el lekha yihyeh. numbers 18:15	kal peter rekhem lekhal basar 'asher yaqribu yhvh ba'adam ubabeheimah yihyeh lakh 'akh padoh tifdeh 'et bekhor ha'adam ve'et bekhor habeheimah hatemei'ah tifdeh. numbers 18:16	ufeduyav miben khodesh tifdeh be'erkekha kesef khameishet sheqalim besheqel haqodesh 'esrim geirah hu. numbers 18:17	'akh bekhor shor 'o bekhor keseb 'o bekhor 'ez lo tifdeh qodesh hem 'et damam tizroq 'al hamizbeiakh ve'et khelbam taqtir 'isheh lereiakh nikhoakh yhvh. numbers 18:18	ubesaram yihyeh lakh kakhazeh hatenufah ukheshoq hayamin lekha yihyeh. numbers 18:19	kol terumot haqodashim 'asher yarimu benei yisra'el yhvh natati lekha ulebanekha velibnotekha 'itekha lekhaq 'olam berit melakh 'olam hi lifnei yhvh lekha ulezar'akha 'itakh. numbers 18:20	vayomer yhvh 'el 'aharon be'arzam lo tinkhal vekheileq lo yihyeh lekha betokham 'ani khelqekha venakhalatekha betokh benei yisra'el. numbers 18:21	velibnei leivi hineh natati kal ma'aser beyisra'el lenakhalah kheilef 'abodatam 'asher hem 'obedim 'et 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed. numbers 18:22	velo yiqrebu 'od benei yisra'el 'el 'ohel mo'ed laset khet lamut. numbers 18:23	ve'abad haleivi hu 'et 'abodat 'ohel mo'ed vehem yis'u 'avonam khuqat 'olam ledoroteikhem ubetokh benei yisra'el lo yinkhalu nakhalah. numbers 18:24	ki 'et ma'sar benei yisra'el 'asher yarimu yhvh terumah natati lalviyim lenakhalah 'al ken 'amarti lahem betokh benei yisra'el lo yinkhalu nakhalah. numbers 18:25	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 18:26	ve'el halviyim tedaber ve'amarta 'aleihem ki tiqkhu mei'et benei yisra'el 'et hama'aser 'asher natati lakhem mei'itam benakhalatkhem vahareimotem mimenu terumat yhvh ma'aser min hama'aser. numbers 18:27	venekhshab lakhem terumatkhem kadagan min hagoren vekhamlei'ah min hayaqeb. numbers 18:28	ken tarimu gam 'atem terumat yhvh mikol ma'seroteikhem 'asher tiqkhu mei'et benei yisra'el unetatem mimenu 'et terumat yhvh le'aharon hakohen. numbers 18:29	mikol matenoteikhem tarimu 'et kal terumat yhvh mikal khelbo 'et miqdesho mimenu. numbers 18:30	ve'amarta 'aleihem baharimekhem 'et khelbo mimenu venekhshab lalviyim kitbu'at goren vekhitbu'at yaqeb. numbers 18:31	va'akhaltem 'oto bekhal maqom 'atem ubeitekhem ki sakhar hu lakhem kheilef 'abodatkhem be'ohel mo'ed. numbers 18:32	velo tis'u 'alav khet baharimekhem 'et khelbo mimenu ve'et qadeshei benei yisra'el lo tekhalelu velo tamutu. numbers 19:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon leimor. numbers 19:2	zot khuqat hatorah 'asher zivah yhvh leimor daber 'el benei yisra'el veyiqkhu 'eilekha farah 'adumah temimah 'asher 'en bah mum 'asher lo 'alah 'aleha 'ol. numbers 19:3	unetatem 'otah 'el 'el'azar hakohen vehozi 'otah 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh veshakhat 'otah lefanav. numbers 19:4	velaqakh 'el'azar hakohen midamah be'ezba'o vehizah 'el nokhakh penei 'ohel mo'ed midamah sheba' pe'amim. numbers 19:5	vesaraf 'et haparah le'einav 'et 'orah ve'et besarah ve'et damah 'al pirshah yisrof. numbers 19:6	velaqakh hakohen 'ez 'erez ve'eizob usheni tola'at vehishlikh 'el tokh sereifat haparah. numbers 19:7	vekhibes begadav hakohen verakhaz besaro bamayim ve'akhar yabo 'el hamakhaneh vetamei hakohen 'ad ha'areb. numbers 19:8	vehasoref 'otah yekhabes begadav bamayim verakhaz besaro bamayim vetamei 'ad ha'areb. numbers 19:9	ve'asaf 'ish tahor 'et 'eifer haparah vehiniakh mikhuz lamakhaneh bemaqom tahor vehayetah la'adat benei yisra'el lemishmeret lemei nidah khatat hi numbers 19:10	vekhibes ha'osef 'et 'eifer haparah 'et begadav vetamei 'ad ha'areb vehayetah libnei yisra'el velager hagar betokham lekhuqat 'olam. numbers 19:11	hanogeia' bemet lekhal nefesh 'adam vetamei shib'at yamim. numbers 19:12	hu yitkhata bo bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi'i yithar ve'im lo yitkhata bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi'i lo yithar. numbers 19:13	kal hanogeia' bemet benefesh ha'adam 'asher yamut velo yitkhata 'et mishkan yhvh timei venikhretah hanefesh hahiv miyisra'el ki mei nidah lo zoraq 'alav tamei yihyeh 'od tum'ato bo. numbers 19:14	zot hatorah 'adam ki yamut be'ohel kal haba 'el ha'ohel vekhal 'asher ba'ohel yitma shib'at yamim. numbers 19:15	vekhol keli fatuakh 'asher 'en zamid patil 'alav tamei hu. numbers 19:16	vekhol 'asher yiga' 'al penei hasadeh bakhalal khereb 'o bemet 'o be'ezem 'adam 'o beqaber yitma shib'at yamim. numbers 19:17	velaqekhu latamei mei'afar sereifat hakhatat venatan 'alav mayim khayim 'el keli. numbers 19:18	velaqakh 'eizob vetabal bamayim 'ish tahor vehizah 'al ha'ohel ve'al kal hakeilim ve'al hanefashot 'asher hayu sham ve'al hanogeia' ba'ezem 'o bekhalal 'o bamet 'o baqaber. numbers 19:19	vehizah hatahor 'al hatamei bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi'i vekhite'o bayom hashebi'i vekhibes begadav verakhaz bamayim vetaher ba'areb. numbers 19:20	ve'ish 'asher yitma velo yitkhata venikhretah hanefesh hahiv mitokh haqahal ki 'et miqdash yhvh timei mei nidah lo zoraq 'alav tamei hu. numbers 19:21	vehayetah lahem lekhuqat 'olam umazeh mei hanidah yekhabes begadav vehanogeia' bemei hanidah yitma 'ad ha'areb. numbers 19:22	vekhol 'asher yiga' bo hatamei yitma vehanefesh hanoga'at titma 'ad ha'areb. numbers 20:1	vayabo'u benei yisra'el kal ha'eidah midbar zin bakhodesh harishon vayeisheb ha'am beqadesh vatamat sham miryam vatiqaber sham. numbers 20:2	velo hayah mayim la'eidah vayiqahalu 'al mosheh ve'al 'aharon. numbers 20:3	vayareb ha'am 'im mosheh vayomeru leimor velu gava'nu bigva' 'akheinu lifnei yhvh. numbers 20:4	velamah habeitem 'et qehal yhvh 'el hamidbar hazeh lamut sham 'anakhnu ube'ireinu. numbers 20:5	velamah he'elitunu mimizrayim lehabi 'otanu 'el hamaqom hara' hazeh lo meqom zera' ute'einah vegefen verimon umayim 'ayin lishtot. numbers 20:6	vayabo mosheh ve'aharon mipenei haqahal 'el petakh 'ohel mo'ed vayipelu 'al peneihem vayeira khebod yhvh 'aleihem. numbers 20:7	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 20:8	qakh 'et hamateh vehaqhel 'et ha'eidah 'atah ve'aharon 'akhikha vedibartem 'el hasela' le'eineihem venatan meimav vehozeita lahem mayim min hasela' vehishqita 'et ha'eidah ve'et be'iram. numbers 20:9	vayiqakh mosheh 'et hamateh milifnei yhvh ka'asher zivahu. numbers 20:10	vayaqhilu mosheh ve'aharon 'et haqahal 'el penei hasala' vayomer lahem shim'u na hamorim hamin hasela' hazeh nozi lakhem mayim. numbers 20:11	vayarem mosheh 'et yado vayakh 'et hasela' bemateihu pa'amayim vayeize'u mayim rabim vateishet ha'eidah ube'iram. numbers 20:12	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon ya'an lo he'emantem bi lehaqdisheini le'einei benei yisra'el lakhen lo tabi'u 'et haqahal hazeh 'el ha'arez 'asher natati lahem. numbers 20:13	hemah mei meribah 'asher rabu benei yisra'el 'et yhvh vayiqadesh bam. numbers 20:14	vayishlakh mosheh mal'akhim miqadesh 'el melekh 'edom koh 'amar 'akhikha yisra'el 'atah yada'ta 'et kal hatela'ah 'asher meza'atenu. numbers 20:15	vayeiredu 'aboteinu mizraymah vaneisheb bemizrayim yamim rabim vayarei'u lanu mizrayim vela'aboteinu. numbers 20:16	vaniz'aq 'el yhvh vayishma' qoleinu vayishlakh mal'akh vayozi'einu mimizrayim vehineh 'anakhnu beqadesh 'ir qezeh gebulekha. numbers 20:17	na'berah na be'arzekha lo na'abor besadeh ubekherem velo nishteh mei be'er derekh hamelekh neilekh lo niteh yamin usemol 'ad 'asher na'abor gebulekha. numbers 20:18	vayomer 'eilav 'edom lo ta'abor bi pen bakhereb 'eizei liqratekha. numbers 20:19	vayomeru 'eilav benei yisra'el bamsilah na'aleh ve'im meimekha nishteh 'ani umiqnai venatati mikhram raq 'en dabar beraglai 'e'eborah. numbers 20:20	vayomer lo ta'abor vayeizei 'edom liqrato be'am kabed ubeyad khazaqah. numbers 20:21	vayma'en 'edom neton 'et yisra'el 'abor bigbulo vayet yisra'el mei'alav. numbers 20:22	vayis'u miqadesh vayabo'u benei yisra'el kal ha'eidah hor hahar. numbers 20:23	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh ve'el 'aharon behor hahar 'al gebul 'erez 'edom leimor. numbers 20:24	yei'asef 'aharon 'el 'amav ki lo yabo 'el ha'arez 'asher natati libnei yisra'el 'al 'asher meritem 'et pi lemei meribah. numbers 20:25	qakh 'et 'aharon ve'et 'el'azar beno veha'al 'otam hor hahar. numbers 20:26	vehafshet 'et 'aharon 'et begadav vehilbashtam 'et 'el'azar beno ve'aharon yei'asef umet sham. numbers 20:27	vaya'as mosheh ka'asher zivah yhvh vaya'alu 'el hor hahar le'einei kal ha'eidah. numbers 20:28	vayafshet mosheh 'et 'aharon 'et begadav vayalbesh 'otam 'et 'el'azar beno vayamat 'aharon sham berosh hahar vayeired mosheh ve'el'azar min hahar. numbers 20:29	vayir'u kal ha'eidah ki gava' 'aharon vayibku 'et 'aharon sheloshim yom kol bet yisra'el. numbers 21:1	vayishma' hakena'ani melekh 'arad yosheb hanegeb ki ba yisra'el derekh ha'atarim vayilakhem beyisra'el vayishb mimenu shebi. numbers 21:2	vayidar yisra'el neder yhvh vayomar 'im naton titen 'et ha'am hazeh beyadi vehakharamti 'et 'areihem. numbers 21:3	vayishma' yhvh beqol yisra'el vayiten 'et hakena'ani vayakharem 'ethem ve'et 'areihem vayiqra shem hamaqom kharemah. numbers 21:4	vayis'u meihor hahar derekh yam suf lisbob 'et 'erez 'edom vatiqzar nefesh ha'am badarekh. numbers 21:5	vaydaber ha'am beilohim ubemosheh lamah he'elitunu mimizrayim lamut bamidbar ki 'en lekhem ve'en mayim venafsheinu qazah balekhem haqeloqel. numbers 21:6	vayshalakh yhvh ba'am 'et hanekhashim haserafim vaynashekhu 'et ha'am vayamat 'am rab miyisra'el. numbers 21:7	vayabo ha'am 'el mosheh vayomeru khatanu ki dibarnu yhvh vabakh hitpalel 'el yhvh veyaser mei'aleinu 'et hanakhash vayitpalel mosheh be'ad ha'am. numbers 21:8	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'aseh lekha saraf vesim 'oto 'al nes vehayah kal hanashukh vera'ah 'oto vakhai. numbers 21:9	vaya'as mosheh nekhash nekhoshet vaysimeihu 'al hanes vehayah 'im nashakh hanakhash 'et 'ish vehibit 'el nekhash hanekhoshet vakhai. numbers 21:10	vayis'u benei yisra'el vayakhanu be'obot. numbers 21:11	vayis'u mei'obot vayakhanu be'iyei ha'abarim bamidbar 'asher 'al penei mo'ab mimizrakh hashamesh. numbers 21:12	misham nasa'u vayakhanu benakhal zared. numbers 21:13	misham nasa'u vayakhanu mei'eiber 'arnon 'asher bamidbar hayozei migebul ha'emori ki 'arnon gebul mo'ab ben mo'ab uben ha'emori. numbers 21:14	'al ken yei'amar beseifer milkhamot yhvh 'et vaheb besufah ve'et hanekhalim 'arnon. numbers 21:15	ve'eshed hanekhalim 'asher natah leshebet 'ar venish'an ligbul mo'ab. numbers 21:16	umisham be'eirah hi habe'er 'asher 'amar yhvh lemosheh 'esof 'et ha'am ve'etenah lahem mayim. numbers 21:17	'az yashir yisra'el 'et hashirah hazot 'ali be'er 'enu lah. numbers 21:18	be'er khafaruha sarim karuha nedibei ha'am bimkhoqeq bemish'anotam umimidbar matanah. numbers 21:19	umimatanah nakhali'el uminakhali'el bamot. numbers 21:20	umibamot hagai 'asher bisdeh mo'ab rosh hapisgah venishqafah 'al penei hayshimon. numbers 21:21	vayishlakh yisra'el mal'akhim 'el sikhon melekh ha'emori leimor. numbers 21:22	'e'berah be'arzekha lo niteh besadeh ubekherem lo nishteh mei be'er bederekh hamelekh neilekh 'ad 'asher na'abor gebulekha. numbers 21:23	velo natan sikhon 'et yisra'el 'abor bigbulo vaye'esof sikhon 'et kal 'amo vayeizei liqrat yisra'el hamidbarah vayabo yahezah vayilakhem beyisra'el. numbers 21:24	vayakeihu yisra'el lefi khareb vayirash 'et 'arzo mei'arnon 'ad yaboq 'ad benei 'amon ki 'az gebul benei 'amon. numbers 21:25	vayiqakh yisra'el 'et kal he'arim ha'eleh vayeisheb yisra'el bekhal 'arei ha'emori bekheshbon ubekhal benoteha. numbers 21:26	ki kheshbon 'ir sikhon melekh ha'emori hi vehu nilkham bemelekh mo'ab harishon vayiqakh 'et kal 'arzo miyado 'ad 'arnon. numbers 21:27	'al ken yomeru hamoshelim bo'u kheshbon tibaneh vetikonen 'ir sikhon. numbers 21:28	ki 'esh yaze'ah meikheshbon lehabah miqiryat sikhon 'akhelah 'ar mo'ab ba'alei bamot 'arnon. numbers 21:29	'o lekha mo'ab 'abadta 'am kemosh natan banav peleitim ubenotav bashebit lemelekh 'emori sikhon. numbers 21:30	vaniram 'abad kheshbon 'ad dibon vanashim 'ad nofakh 'asher 'ad meideba. numbers 21:31	vayeisheb yisra'el be'erez ha'emori. numbers 21:32	vayishlakh mosheh leragel 'et ya'zer vayilkedu benoteha vayiresh vayoresh 'et ha'emori 'asher sham. numbers 21:33	vayifnu vaya'alu derekh habashan vayeizei 'og melekh habashan liqratam hu vekhal 'amo lamilkhamah 'edre'i. numbers 21:34	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh 'al tira 'oto ki beyadekha natati 'oto ve'et kal 'amo ve'et 'arzo ve'asita lo ka'asher 'asita lesikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher yosheb bekheshbon. numbers 21:35	vayaku 'oto ve'et banav ve'et kal 'amo 'ad bilti hish'ir lo sarid vayireshu 'et 'arzo. numbers 22:1	vayis'u benei yisra'el vayakhanu be'arbot mo'ab mei'eiber leyarden yereikho. numbers 22:2	vayar balaq ben zipor 'et kal 'asher 'asah yisra'el la'emori. numbers 22:3	vayagar mo'ab mipenei ha'am me'od ki rab hu vayaqaz mo'ab mipenei benei yisra'el. numbers 22:4	vayomer mo'ab 'el ziqnei midyan 'atah yelakhakhu haqahal 'et kal sebiboteinu kilkhokh hashor 'et yereq hasadeh ubalaq ben zipor melekh lemo'ab ba'et hahiv. numbers 22:5	vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el bil'am ben be'or petorah 'asher 'al hanahar 'erez benei 'amo liqro lo leimor hineh 'am yaza mimizrayim hineh khisah 'et 'en ha'arez vehu yosheb mimuli. numbers 22:6	ve'atah lekhah na 'arah li 'et ha'am hazeh ki 'azum hu mimeni 'ulai 'ukhal nakeh bo va'agareshenu min ha'arez ki yada'ti 'et 'asher tebarekh meborakh va'asher ta'or yu'ar. numbers 22:7	vayeilekhu ziqnei mo'ab veziqnei midyan uqesamim beyadam vayabo'u 'el bil'am vaydaberu 'eilav dibrei balaq. numbers 22:8	vayomer 'aleihem linu foh halaylah vahashiboti 'etkhem dabar ka'asher yedaber yhvh 'eilai vayeishebu sarei mo'ab 'im bil'am. numbers 22:9	vayabo 'elohim 'el bil'am vayomer mi ha'anashim ha'eleh 'imakh. numbers 22:10	vayomer bil'am 'el ha'elohim balaq ben zipor melekh mo'ab shalakh 'eilai. numbers 22:11	hineh ha'am hayozei mimizrayim vaykhas 'et 'en ha'arez 'atah lekhah qabah li 'oto 'ulai 'ukhal lehilakhem bo vegeirashtiv. numbers 22:12	vayomer 'elohim 'el bil'am lo teilekh 'imahem lo ta'or 'et ha'am ki barukh hu. numbers 22:13	vayaqam bil'am baboqer vayomer 'el sarei balaq lekhu 'el 'arzekhem ki mei'en yhvh letiti lahalokh 'imakhem. numbers 22:14	vayaqumu sarei mo'ab vayabo'u 'el balaq vayomeru mei'en bil'am halokh 'imanu. numbers 22:15	vayosef 'od balaq sheloakh sarim rabim venikhbadim mei'eleh. numbers 22:16	vayabo'u 'el bil'am vayomeru lo koh 'amar balaq ben zipor 'al na timana' meihalokh 'eilai. numbers 22:17	ki khabed 'akhabedkha me'od vekhol 'asher tomar 'eilai 'e'eseh ulekhah na qabah li 'et ha'am hazeh. numbers 22:18	vaya'an bil'am vayomer 'el 'abdei balaq 'im yiten li balaq melo beito kesef vezahab lo 'ukhal la'abor 'et pi yhvh 'elohai la'asot qetanah 'o gedolah. numbers 22:19	ve'atah shebu na bazeh gam 'atem halayelah ve'eide'ah mah yosef yhvh daber 'imi. numbers 22:20	vayabo 'elohim 'el bil'am laylah vayomer lo 'im liqro lekha ba'u ha'anashim qum lekh 'itam ve'akh 'et hadabar 'asher 'adaber 'eilekha 'oto ta'aseh. numbers 22:21	vayaqam bil'am baboqer vayakhabosh 'et 'atono vayeilekh 'im sarei mo'ab. numbers 22:22	vayikhar 'af 'elohim ki holekh hu vayityazeb mal'akh yhvh baderekh lesatan lo vehu rokheb 'al 'atono ushenei ne'arav 'imo. numbers 22:23	vateire ha'aton 'et mal'akh yhvh nizab baderekh vekharbo shelufah beyado vatet ha'aton min haderekh vateilekh basadeh vayakh bil'am 'et ha'aton lehatotah hadarekh. numbers 22:24	vaya'amod mal'akh yhvh bemish'ol hakeramim gader mizeh vegader mizeh. numbers 22:25	vateire ha'aton 'et mal'akh yhvh vatilakhez 'el haqir vatilkhaz 'et regel bil'am 'el haqir vayosef lehakotah. numbers 22:26	vayosef mal'akh yhvh 'abor vaya'amod bemaqom zar 'asher 'en derekh lintot yamin usemol. numbers 22:27	vateire ha'aton 'et mal'akh yhvh vatirbaz takhat bil'am vayikhar 'af bil'am vayakh 'et ha'aton bamaqel. numbers 22:28	vayiftakh yhvh 'et pi ha'aton vatomer lebil'am meh 'asiti lekha ki hikitani zeh shalosh regalim. numbers 22:29	vayomer bil'am la'aton ki hit'alalt bi lu yesh khereb beyadi ki 'atah haragtikh. numbers 22:30	vatomer ha'aton 'el bil'am halo 'anokhi 'atonekha 'asher rakhabta 'alai mei'odkha 'ad hayom hazeh hahasken hiskanti la'asot lekha koh vayomer lo. numbers 22:31	vaygal yhvh 'et 'einei bil'am vayar 'et mal'akh yhvh nizab baderekh vekharbo shelufah beyado vayiqod vayishtakhu le'apav. numbers 22:32	vayomer 'eilav mal'akh yhvh 'al mah hikita 'et 'atonekha zeh shalosh regalim hineh 'anokhi yazati lesatan ki yarat haderekh lenegdi. numbers 22:33	vatir'ani ha'aton vatet lefanai zeh shalosh regalim 'ulai natetah mipanai ki 'atah gam 'otekhah haragti ve'otah hekheyeiti. numbers 22:34	vayomer bil'am 'el mal'akh yhvh khatati ki lo yada'ti ki 'atah nizab liqrati badarekh ve'atah 'im ra' be'einekha 'ashubah li. numbers 22:35	vayomer mal'akh yhvh 'el bil'am lekh 'im ha'anashim ve'efes 'et hadabar 'asher 'adaber 'eilekha 'oto tedaber vayeilekh bil'am 'im sarei balaq. numbers 22:36	vayishma' balaq ki ba bil'am vayeizei liqrato 'el 'ir mo'ab 'asher 'al gebul 'arnon 'asher biqzeh hagebul. numbers 22:37	vayomer balaq 'el bil'am halo shaloakh shalakhti 'eilekha liqro lakh lamah lo halakhta 'eilai ha'umnam lo 'ukhal kabedekha. numbers 22:38	vayomer bil'am 'el balaq hineh bati 'eilekha 'atah hayakhol 'ukhal daber me'umah hadabar 'asher yasim 'elohim befi 'oto 'adaber. numbers 22:39	vayeilekh bil'am 'im balaq vayabo'u qiryat khuzot. numbers 22:40	vayizbakh balaq baqar vazon vayshalakh lebil'am velasarim 'asher 'ito. numbers 22:41	vayhi baboqer vayiqakh balaq 'et bil'am vaya'aleihu bamot ba'al vayar misham qezeh ha'am. numbers 23:1	vayomer bil'am 'el balaq beneh li bazeh shib'ah mizbekhot vehakhen li bazeh shib'ah farim veshib'ah 'eilim. numbers 23:2	vaya'as balaq ka'asher diber bil'am vaya'al balaq ubil'am par va'ayil bamizbeiakh. numbers 23:3	vayomer bil'am lebalaq hityazeb 'al 'olatekha ve'eilekhah 'ulai yiqareh yhvh liqrati udebar mah yar'eini vehigadti lakh vayeilekh shefi. numbers 23:4	vayiqar 'elohim 'el bil'am vayomer 'eilav 'et shib'at hamizbekhot 'arakhti va'a'al par va'ayil bamizbeiakh. numbers 23:5	vayasem yhvh dabar befi bil'am vayomer shub 'el balaq vekhoh tedaber. numbers 23:6	vayashab 'eilav vehineh nizab 'al 'olato hu vekhal sarei mo'ab. numbers 23:7	vayisa meshalo vayomar min 'aram yankheini balaq melekh mo'ab meiharrei qedem lekhah 'arah li ya'aqob ulekhah zo'amah yisra'el. numbers 23:8	mah 'eqob lo qaboh 'el umah 'ez'om lo za'am yhvh. numbers 23:9	ki meirosh zurim 'er'enu umigeba'ot 'ashurenu hen 'am lebadad yishkon ubagoyim lo yitkhashab. numbers 23:10	mi manah 'afar ya'aqob umispar 'et roba' yisra'el tamot nafshi mot yesharim utehi 'akhariti kamohu. numbers 23:11	vayomer balaq 'el bil'am meh 'asita li laqob 'oyebai leqakhtikha vehineh beirakhta barekh. numbers 23:12	vaya'an vayomar halo 'et 'asher yasim yhvh befi 'oto 'eshmor ledaber. numbers 23:13	vayomer 'eilav balaq lekha lekhah 'iti 'el maqom 'akher 'asher tir'enu misham 'efes qazeihu tir'eh vekhulo lo tir'eh veqabeno li misham. numbers 23:14	vayiqakheihu sedeh zofim 'el rosh hapisgah vayiben shib'ah mizbekhot vaya'al par va'ayil bamizbeiakh. numbers 23:15	vayomer 'el balaq hityazeb koh 'al 'olatekha ve'anokhi 'iqareh koh. numbers 23:16	vayiqar yhvh 'el bil'am vayasem dabar befiv vayomer shub 'el balaq vekhoh tedaber. numbers 23:17	vayabo 'eilav vehino nizab 'al 'olato vesarei mo'ab 'ito vayomer lo balaq mah diber yhvh. numbers 23:18	vayisa meshalo vayomar qum balaq ushama' ha'azinah 'adai beno zipor. numbers 23:19	lo 'ish 'el vikhazeb uben 'adam veyitnekham hahu 'amar velo ya'aseh vediber velo yeqimenah. numbers 23:20	hineh barekh laqakheti ubeirekh velo 'ashibenah. numbers 23:21	lo hibit 'aven beya'aqob velo ra'ah 'amal beyisra'el yhvh 'elohav 'imo uteru'at melekh bo. numbers 23:22	'el mozi'am mimizrayim keto'afot re'em lo. numbers 23:23	ki lo nakhash beya'aqob velo qesem beyisra'el ka'et yei'amer leya'aqob uleyisra'el mah pa'al 'el. numbers 23:24	hen 'am kelabi yaqum vekha'ari yitnasa lo yishkab 'ad yokhal teref vedam khalalim yishteh. numbers 23:25	vayomer balaq 'el bil'am gam qob lo tiqobenu gam barekh lo tebarakhenu. numbers 23:26	vaya'an bil'am vayomer 'el balaq halo dibarti 'eilekha leimor kol 'asher yedaber yhvh 'oto 'e'eseh. numbers 23:27	vayomer balaq 'el bil'am lekhah na 'eqakhakha 'el maqom 'akher 'ulai yishar be'einei ha'elohim veqaboto li misham. numbers 23:28	vayiqakh balaq 'et bil'am rosh hape'or hanishqaf 'al penei hayshimon. numbers 23:29	vayomer bil'am 'el balaq beneh li bazeh shib'ah mizbekhot vehakhen li bazeh shib'ah farim veshib'ah 'eilim. numbers 23:30	vaya'as balaq ka'asher 'amar bil'am vaya'al par va'ayil bamizbeiakh. numbers 24:1	vayar bil'am ki tob be'einei yhvh lebarekh 'et yisra'el velo halakh kefa'am befa'am liqrat nekhashim vayashet 'el hamidbar panav. numbers 24:2	vayisa bil'am 'et 'einav vayar 'et yisra'el shokhen lishbatav vatehi 'alav ruakh 'elohim. numbers 24:3	vayisa meshalo vayomar ne'um bil'am beno be'or une'um hageber shetum ha'ayin. numbers 24:4	ne'um shomeia' 'imrei 'el 'asher makhazeh shadai yekhezeh nofel ugelui 'einayim. numbers 24:5	mah tobu 'ohalekha ya'aqob mishkenotekha yisra'el. numbers 24:6	kinkhalim nitayu keganot 'alei nahar ka'ahalim nata' yhvh ka'arazim 'alei mayim. numbers 24:7	yizal mayim midaleyav vezar'o bemayim rabim veyarom mei'agag malko vetinasei malkhuto. numbers 24:8	'el mozi'o mimizrayim keto'afot re'em lo 27:1	vatiqrabnah benot zelafekhad ben kheifer ben gil'ad ben makhir ben menasheh lemishpekhot menasheh ben yosef ve'eleh shemot benotav makhlah no'ah vekhagelah umilkah vetirzah. numbers 28:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 28:2	zav 'et benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem 'et qarebani lakhmi le'ishai reiakh nikhokhi tishmeru lehaqrib li bemo'ado. numbers 28:3	ve'amarta lahem
