28:5	va'asirit ha'eifah solet leminkhah belulah beshemen katit rebi'it hahin. numbers 28:6	'olat tamid ha'asuyah behar sinai lereiakh nikhoakh 'isheh yhvh. numbers 28:7	venisko rebi'it hahin lakebes ha'ekhad baqodesh hasekh nesekh sheikhar yhvh. numbers 28:8	ve'et hakebes hasheini ta'aseh ben ha'arbayim keminkhat haboqer ukhenisko ta'aseh 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh. numbers 28:9	ubeyom hashabat shenei khebasim benei shanah temimim ushenei 'esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen venisko. numbers 28:10	'olat shabat beshabato 'al 'olat hatamid veniskah. numbers 28:11	uberashei khadesheikhem taqribu 'olah yhvh parim benei baqar shenayim ve'ayil 'ekhad kebasim benei shanah shib'ah temimim. numbers 28:12	usheloshah 'esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen lapar ha'ekhad ushenei 'esronim solet minkhah belulah bashemen la'ayil ha'ekhad. numbers 28:13	ve'isaron 'isaron solet minkhah belulah bashemen lakebes ha'ekhad 'olah reiakh nikhoakh 'isheh yhvh. numbers 28:14	veniskeihem khazi hahin yihyeh lapar ushelishit hahin la'ayil urebi'it hahin lakebes yayin zot 'olat khodesh bekhadesho lekhadeshei hashanah. numbers 28:15	use'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhatat yhvh 'al 'olat hatamid yei'aseh venisko. numbers 28:16	ubakhodesh harishon be'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh pesakh yhvh. numbers 28:17	ubakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hazeh khag shib'at yamim mazot yei'akhel. numbers 28:18	bayom harishon miqra qodesh kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. numbers 28:19	vehiqrabtem 'isheh 'olah yhvh parim benei baqar shenayim ve'ayil 'ekhad veshib'ah khebasim benei shanah temimim yihyu lakhem. numbers 28:20	uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen sheloshah 'esronim lapar ushenei 'esronim la'ayil ta'asu. numbers 28:21	'isaron 'isaron ta'aseh lakebes ha'ekhad leshib'at hakebasim. numbers 28:22	use'ir khatat 'ekhad lekhaper 'aleikhem. numbers 28:23	milebad 'olat haboqer 'asher le'olat hatamid ta'asu 'et 'eleh. numbers 28:24	ka'eleh ta'asu layom shib'at yamim lekhem 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh 'al 'olat hatamid yei'aseh venisko. numbers 28:25	ubayom hashebi'i miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. numbers 28:26	ubeyom habikurim behaqribekhem minkhah khadashah yhvh beshabu'oteikhem miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. numbers 28:27	vehiqrabtem 'olah lereiakh nikhoakh yhvh parim benei baqar shenayim 'ayil 'ekhad shib'ah khebasim benei shanah. numbers 28:28	uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen sheloshah 'esronim lapar ha'ekhad shenei 'esronim la'ayil ha'ekhad. numbers 28:29	'isaron 'isaron lakebes ha'ekhad leshib'at hakebasim. numbers 28:30	se'ir 'izim 'ekhad lekhaper 'aleikhem. numbers 28:31	milebad 'olat hatamid uminkhato ta'asu temimim yihyu lakhem veniskeihem. numbers 29:1	ubakhodesh hashebi'i be'ekhad lakhodesh miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu yom teru'ah yihyeh lakhem. numbers 29:2	va'asitem 'olah lereiakh nikhoakh yhvh par ben baqar 'ekhad 'ayil 'ekhad kebasim benei shanah shib'ah temimim. numbers 29:3	uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen sheloshah 'esronim lapar shenei 'esronim la'ayil. numbers 29:4	ve'isaron 'ekhad lakebes ha'ekhad leshib'at hakebasim. numbers 29:5	use'ir 'izim 'ekhad khatat lekhaper 'aleikhem. numbers 29:6	milebad 'olat hakhodesh uminkhatah ve'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskeihem kemishpatam lereiakh nikhoakh 'isheh yhvh. numbers 29:7	ube'asor lakhodesh hashebi'i hazeh miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem ve'initem 'et nafshoteikhem kal melakhah lo ta'asu. numbers 29:8	vehiqrabtem 'olah yhvh reiakh nikhoakh par ben baqar 'ekhad 'ayil 'ekhad kebasim benei shanah shib'ah temimim yihyu lakhem. numbers 29:9	uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen sheloshah 'esronim lapar shenei 'esronim la'ayil ha'ekhad. numbers 29:10	'isaron 'isaron lakebes ha'ekhad leshib'at hakebasim. numbers 29:11	se'ir 'izim 'ekhad khatat milebad khatat hakipurim ve'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskeihem. numbers 29:12	ubakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh hashebi'i miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu vekhagotem khag yhvh shib'at yamim. numbers 29:13	vehiqrabtem 'olah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh parim benei baqar sheloshah 'asar 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim yihyu. numbers 29:14	uminkhatam solet belulah bashamen sheloshah 'esronim lapar ha'ekhad lishloshah 'asar parim shenei 'esronim la'ayil ha'ekhad lishnei ha'eilim. numbers 29:15	ve'isaron 'isaron lakebes ha'ekhad le'arba'ah 'asar kebasim. numbers 29:16	use'ir 'izim 'ekhad khatat milebad 'olat hatamid minkhatah veniskah. numbers 29:17	ubayom hasheini parim benei baqar shenem 'asar 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. numbers 29:18	uminkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. numbers 29:19	use'ir 'izim 'ekhad khatat milebad 'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskeihem. numbers 29:20	ubayom hashelishi parim 'ashtei 'asar 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. numbers 29:21	uminkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. numbers 29:22	use'ir khatat 'ekhad milebad 'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskah. numbers 29:23	ubayom harebi'i parim 'asarah 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. numbers 29:24	minkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. numbers 29:25	use'ir 'izim 'ekhad khatat milebad 'olat hatamid minkhatah veniskah. numbers 29:26	ubayom hakhamishi parim tish'ah 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. numbers 29:27	uminkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. numbers 29:28	use'ir khatat 'ekhad milebad 'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskah. numbers 29:29	ubayom hashishi parim shemonah 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. numbers 29:30	uminkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. numbers 29:31	use'ir khatat 'ekhad milebad 'olat hatamid minkhatah unesakheha. numbers 29:32	ubayom hashebi'i parim shib'ah 'eilim shenayim kebasim benei shanah 'arba'ah 'asar temimim. numbers 29:33	uminkhatam veniskeihem laparim la'eilim velakebasim bemisparam kemishpatam. numbers 29:34	use'ir khatat 'ekhad milebad 'olat hatamid minkhatah veniskah. numbers 29:35	bayom hashemini 'azeret tihyeh lakhem kal melekhet 'abodah lo ta'asu. numbers 29:36	vehiqrabtem 'olah 'isheh reiakh nikhoakh yhvh par 'ekhad 'ayil 'ekhad kebasim benei shanah shib'ah temimim. numbers 29:37	minkhatam veniskeihem lapar la'ayil velakebasim bemisparam kamishpat. numbers 29:38	use'ir khatat 'ekhad milebad 'olat hatamid uminkhatah veniskah. numbers 29:39	'eleh ta'asu yhvh bemo'adeikhem lebad minidreikhem venidboteikhem le'oloteikhem uleminkhoteikhem uleniskeikhem uleshalmeikhem. numbers 29:40	vayomer mosheh 'el benei yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. numbers 30:1	vaydaber mosheh 'el rashei hamatot libnei yisra'el leimor zeh hadabar 'asher zivah yhvh. numbers 30:2	'ish ki yidor neder yhvh 'o hishaba' shebu'ah le'sor 'isar 'al nafsho lo yakhel debaro kekhal hayozei mipiv ya'aseh. numbers 30:3	ve'ishah ki tidor neder yhvh ve'aserah 'isar bebet 'abiha bin'ureha. numbers 30:4	veshama' 'abiha 'et nidrah ve'esarah 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah vehekherish lah 'abiha veqamu kal nedareha vekhal 'isar 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah yaqum. numbers 30:5	ve'im heini 'abiha 'otah beyom shame'o kal nedareha ve'esareha 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah lo yaqum yhvh yislakh lah ki heini 'abiha 'otah. numbers 30:6	ve'im hayo tihyeh le'ish unedareha 'aleha 'o mibta sefateha 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah. numbers 30:7	veshama' 'ishah beyom shame'o vehekherish lah veqamu nedareha ve'esareha 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah yaqumu. numbers 30:8	ve'im beyom shemoa' 'ishah yani 'otah veheifer 'et nidrah 'asher 'aleha ve'et mibta sefateha 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah yhvh yislakh lah. numbers 30:9	veneider 'almanah ugerushah kol 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah yaqum 'aleha. numbers 30:10	ve'im bet 'ishah nadarah 'o 'aserah 'isar 'al nafshah bishbu'ah. numbers 30:11	veshama' 'ishah vehekherish lah lo heini 'otah veqamu kal nedareha vekhal 'isar 'asher 'aserah 'al nafshah yaqum. numbers 30:12	ve'im hafer yafer 'otam 'ishah beyom shame'o kal moza sefateha lindareha ule'isar nafshah lo yaqum 'ishah hafeiram yhvh yislakh lah. numbers 30:13	kal neider vekhal shebu'at 'isar le'anot nafesh 'ishah yeqimenu ve'ishah yefeirenu. numbers 30:14	ve'im hakharesh yakharish lah 'ishah miyom 'el yom veheiqim 'et kal nedareha 'o 'et kal 'esareha 'asher 'aleha heiqim 'otam ki hekherish lah beyom shame'o. numbers 30:15	ve'im hafer yafer 'otam 'akharei shame'o venasa 'et 'avonah. numbers 30:16	'eleh hakhuqim 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh ben 'ish le'ishto ben 'ab lebito bin'ureha bet 'abiha. numbers 31:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 31:2	neqom niqmat benei yisra'el mei'et hamidyanim 'akhar tei'asef 'el 'amekha. numbers 31:3	vaydaber mosheh 'el ha'am leimor heikhalezu mei'itekhem 'anashim lazaba veyihyu 'al midyan latet niqmat yhvh bemidyan. numbers 31:4	'elef lamateh 'elef lamateh lekhol matot yisra'el tishlekhu lazaba. numbers 31:5	vayimaseru mei'alfei yisra'el 'elef lamateh shenem 'asar 'elef khaluzei zaba. numbers 31:6	vayishlakh 'otam mosheh 'elef lamateh lazaba 'otam ve'et pinekhas ben 'el'azar hakohen lazaba ukhelei haqodesh vakhazozerot hateru'ah beyado. numbers 31:7	vayizbe'u 'al midyan ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh vayahargu kal zakhar. numbers 31:8	ve'et malkhei midyan haregu 'al khaleihem 'et 'evi ve'et reqem ve'et zur ve'et khur ve'et reba' khameishet malkhei midyan ve'et bil'am ben be'or haregu bekhareb. numbers 31:9	vayishbu benei yisra'el 'et neshei midyan ve'et tapam ve'et kal behemtam ve'et kal miqneihem ve'et kal kheilam bazazu. numbers 31:10	ve'et kal 'areihem bemoshebotam ve'et kal tirotam sarefu ba'esh. numbers 31:11	vayiqkhu 'et kal hashalal ve'et kal hamalqoakh ba'adam ubabeheimah. numbers 31:12	vayabi'u 'el mosheh ve'el 'el'azar hakohen ve'el 'adat benei yisra'el 'et hashebi ve'et hamalqoakh ve'et hashalal 'el hamakhaneh 'el 'arbot mo'ab 'asher 'al yarden yereikho. numbers 31:13	vayeize'u mosheh ve'el'azar hakohen vekhal nesi'ei ha'eidah liqratam 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh. numbers 31:14	vayiqzof mosheh 'al pequdei hekhayil sarei ha'alafim vesarei hamei'ot haba'im mizeba hamilkhamah. numbers 31:15	vayomer 'aleihem mosheh hakhiyitem kal neqeibah. numbers 31:16	hen henah hayu libnei yisra'el bidbar bil'am limsar ma'al yhvh 'al debar pe'or vatehi hamageifah ba'adat yhvh. numbers 31:17	ve'atah hirgu khal zakhar bataf vekhal 'ishah yoda'at 'ish lemishkab zakhar harogu. numbers 31:18	vekhol hataf banashim 'asher lo yade'u mishkab zakhar hakhayu lakhem. numbers 31:19	ve'atem khanu mikhuz lamakhaneh shib'at yamim kol horeg nefesh vekhol nogeia' bekhalal titkhate'u bayom hashelishi ubayom hashebi'i 'atem ushebikhem. numbers 31:20	vekhal beged vekhal keli 'or vekhal ma'aseh 'izim vekhal keli 'ez titkhata'u. numbers 31:21	vayomer 'el'azar hakohen 'el 'anshei hazaba haba'im lamilkhamah zot khuqat hatorah 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. numbers 31:22	'akh 'et hazahab ve'et hakasef 'et hanekhoshet 'et habarzel 'et habedil ve'et ha'ofaret. numbers 31:23	kal dabar 'asher yabo ba'esh ta'abiru ba'esh vetaher 'akh bemei nidah yitkhata vekhol 'asher lo yabo ba'esh ta'abiru bamayim. numbers 31:24	vekhibastem bigdeikhem bayom hashebi'i utehartem ve'akhar tabo'u 'el hamakhaneh. numbers 31:25	vayomer yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 31:26	sa 'et rosh malqoakh hashebi ba'adam ubabeheimah 'atah ve'el'azar hakohen verashei 'abot ha'eidah. numbers 31:27	vekhazita 'et hamalqoakh ben tofesei hamilkhamah hayoze'im lazaba uben kal ha'eidah. numbers 31:28	vahareimota mekhes yhvh mei'et 'anshei hamilkhamah hayoze'im lazaba 'ekhad nefesh meikhamesh hamei'ot min ha'adam umin habaqar umin hakhamorim umin hazon. numbers 31:29	mimakhazitam tiqakhu venatatah le'el'azar hakohen terumat yhvh. numbers 31:30	umimakhazit benei yisra'el tiqakh 'ekhad 'akhuz min hakhamishim min ha'adam min habaqar min hakhamorim umin hazon mikal habeheimah venatatah 'otam lalviyim shomerei mishmeret mishkan yhvh. numbers 31:31	vaya'as mosheh ve'el'azar hakohen ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. numbers 31:32	vayhi hamalqoakh yeter habaz 'asher bazezu 'am hazaba zon shesh mei'ot 'elef veshib'im 'elef vakhameishet 'alafim numbers 31:33	ubaqar shenayim veshib'im 'alef. numbers 31:34	vakhamorim 'ekhad veshishim 'alef. numbers 31:35	venefesh 'adam min hanashim 'asher lo yade'u mishkab zakhar kal nefesh shenayim usheloshim 'alef. numbers 31:36	vatehi hamekhezah kheileq hayoze'im bazaba mispar hazon shelosh mei'ot 'elef usheloshim 'elef veshib'at 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot. numbers 31:37	vayhi hamekhes yhvh min hazon shesh mei'ot khamesh veshib'im. numbers 31:38	vehabaqar shishah usheloshim 'alef umikhsam yhvh shenayim veshib'im. numbers 31:39	vakhamorim sheloshim 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot umikhsam yhvh 'ekhad veshishim. numbers 31:40	venefesh 'adam shishah 'asar 'alef umikhsam yhvh shenayim usheloshim nafesh. numbers 31:41	vayiten mosheh 'et mekhes terumat yhvh le'el'azar hakohen ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. numbers 31:42	umimakhazit benei yisra'el 'asher khazah mosheh min ha'anashim hazobe'im. numbers 31:43	vatehi mekhezat ha'eidah min hazon shelosh mei'ot 'elef usheloshim 'elef shib'at 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot. numbers 31:44	ubaqar shishah usheloshim 'alef. numbers 31:45	vakhamorim sheloshim 'elef vakhamesh mei'ot. numbers 31:46	venefesh 'adam shishah 'asar 'alef. numbers 31:47	vayiqakh mosheh mimakhazit benei yisra'el 'et ha'akhuz 'ekhad min hakhamishim min ha'adam umin habeheimah vayiten 'otam lalviyim shomerei mishmeret mishkan yhvh ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. numbers 31:48	vayiqrebu 'el mosheh hapequdim 'asher le'alfei hazaba sarei ha'alafim vesarei hamei'ot. numbers 31:49	vayomeru 'el mosheh 'abadekha nase'u 'et rosh 'anshei hamilkhamah 'asher beyadeinu velo nifqad mimenu 'ish. numbers 31:50	vanaqreb 'et qareban yhvh 'ish 'asher maza kheli zahab 'ez'adah vezamid taba'at 'agil vekhumaz lekhaper 'al nafshoteinu lifnei yhvh. numbers 31:51	vayiqakh mosheh ve'el'azar hakohen 'et hazahab mei'itam kol keli ma'aseh. numbers 31:52	vayhi kal zehab haterumah 'asher heirimu yhvh shishah 'asar 'elef sheba' mei'ot vakhamishim shaqel mei'et sarei ha'alafim umei'et sarei hamei'ot. numbers 31:53	'anshei hazaba bazezu 'ish lo. numbers 31:54	vayiqakh mosheh ve'el'azar hakohen 'et hazahab mei'et sarei ha'alafim vehamei'ot vayabi'u 'oto 'el 'ohel mo'ed zikaron libnei yisra'el lifnei yhvh. numbers 32:1	umiqneh rab hayah libnei re'uben velibnei gad 'azum me'od vayir'u 'et 'erez ya'zer ve'et 'erez gil'ad vehineh hamaqom meqom miqneh. numbers 32:2	vayabo'u benei gad ubenei re'uben vayomeru 'el mosheh ve'el 'el'azar hakohen ve'el nesi'ei ha'eidah leimor. numbers 32:3	'atarot vedibon veya'zer venimrah vekheshbon ve'el'aleh usebam unebo ube'on. numbers 32:4	ha'arez 'asher hikah yhvh lifnei 'adat yisra'el 'erez miqneh hi vela'abadekha miqneh. numbers 32:5	vayomeru 'im mazanu khen be'einekha yutan 'et ha'arez hazot la'abadekha la'akhuzah 'al ta'abireinu 'et hayarden. numbers 32:6	vayomer mosheh libnei gad velibnei re'uben ha'akheikhem yabo'u lamilkhamah ve'atem teishebu foh. numbers 32:7	velamah tenu'un teni'un 'et leb benei yisra'el mei'abor 'el ha'arez 'asher natan lahem yhvh. numbers 32:8	koh 'asu 'aboteikhem beshalekhi 'otam miqadesh barneia' lir'ot 'et ha'arez. numbers 32:9	vaya'alu 'ad nakhal 'eshkol vayir'u 'et ha'arez vayani'u 'et leb benei yisra'el lebilti bo 'el ha'arez 'asher natan lahem yhvh. numbers 32:10	vayikhar 'af yhvh bayom hahu vayishaba' leimor. numbers 32:11	'im yir'u ha'anashim ha'olim mimizrayim miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah 'et ha'adamah 'asher nishba'ti le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob ki lo mil'u 'akharai. numbers 32:12	bilti kaleb ben yefuneh haqenizi vihoshua' bin nun ki mil'u 'akharei yhvh. numbers 32:13	vayikhar 'af yhvh beyisra'el vayni'em bamidbar 'arba'im shanah 'ad tom kal hador ha'oseh hara' be'einei yhvh. numbers 32:14	vehineh qamtem takhat 'aboteikhem tarbut 'anashim khata'im lispot 'od 'al kharon 'af yhvh 'el yisra'el. numbers 32:15	ki teshubun mei'akharav veyasaf 'od lehanikho bamidbar veshikhatem lekhal ha'am hazeh. numbers 32:16	vayigeshu 'eilav vayomeru gidrot zon nibneh lemiqneinu poh ve'arim letapeinu. numbers 32:17	va'anakhnu neikhalez khushim lifnei benei yisra'el 'ad 'asher 'im habi'onum 'el meqomam veyashab tapeinu be'arei hamibzar mipenei yoshebei ha'arez. numbers 32:18	lo nashub 'el bateinu 'ad hitnakhel benei yisra'el 'ish nakhalato. numbers 32:19	ki lo ninkhal 'itam mei'eiber layarden vahale'ah ki ba'ah nakhalateinu 'eileinu mei'eiber hayarden mizrakhah. numbers 32:20	vayomer 'aleihem mosheh 'im ta'asun 'et hadabar hazeh 'im teikhalezu lifnei yhvh lamilkhamah. numbers 32:21	ve'abar lakhem kal khaluz 'et hayarden lifnei yhvh 'ad horisho 'et 'oyebav mipanav. numbers 32:22	venikhbeshah ha'arez lifnei yhvh ve'akhar tashubu vihyitem neqiyim yhvh umiyisra'el vehayetah ha'arez hazot lakhem la'akhuzah lifnei yhvh. numbers 32:23	ve'im lo ta'asun ken hineh khatatem yhvh ude'u khatatkhem 'asher timza 'etkhem. numbers 32:24	benu lakhem 'arim letapekhem ugedeirot lezona'akhem vehayozei mipikhem ta'asu. numbers 32:25	vayomer benei gad ubenei re'uben 'el mosheh leimor 'abadekha ya'asu ka'asher 'adoni mezaveh. numbers 32:26	tapeinu nasheinu miqneinu vekhal behemteinu yihyu sham be'arei hagil'ad. numbers 32:27	va'abadekha ya'abru kal khaluz zaba lifnei yhvh lamilkhamah ka'asher 'adoni dober. numbers 32:28	vayzav lahem mosheh 'et 'el'azar hakohen ve'et yehoshua' bin nun ve'et rashei 'abot hamatot libnei yisra'el. numbers 32:29	vayomer mosheh 'aleihem 'im ya'abru benei gad ubenei re'uben 'itekhem 'et hayarden kal khaluz lamilkhamah lifnei yhvh venikhbeshah ha'arez lifneikhem unetatem lahem 'et 'erez hagil'ad la'akhuzah. numbers 32:30	ve'im lo ya'abru khaluzim 'itekhem venokhazu betokhekhem be'erez kena'an. numbers 32:31	vaya'anu benei gad ubenei re'uben leimor 'et 'asher diber yhvh 'el 'abadekha ken na'aseh. numbers 32:32	nakhnu na'abor khaluzim lifnei yhvh 'erez kena'an ve'itanu 'akhuzat nakhalateinu mei'eiber layarden. numbers 32:33	vayiten lahem mosheh libnei gad velibnei re'uben velakhazi sheibet menasheh ben yosef 'et mamlekhet sikhon melekh ha'emori ve'et mamlekhet 'og melekh habashan ha'arez le'areha bigbulot 'arei ha'arez sabib. numbers 32:34	vayibnu benei gad 'et dibon ve'et 'atarot ve'et 'aro'er. numbers 32:35	ve'et 'atrot shofan ve'et ya'zer veyagebohah. numbers 32:36	ve'et bet nimrah ve'et bet haran 'arei mibzar vegidrot zon. numbers 32:37	ubenei re'uben banu 'et kheshbon ve'et 'el'alei ve'et qiryatayim. numbers 32:38	ve'et nebo ve'et ba'al me'on musabot shem ve'et sibmah vayiqre'u besheimot 'et shemot he'arim 'asher banu. numbers 32:39	vayeilekhu benei makhir ben menasheh gil'adah vayilkeduha vayoresh 'et ha'emori 'asher bah. numbers 32:40	vayiten mosheh 'et hagil'ad lemakhir ben menasheh vayeisheb bah. numbers 32:41	veya'ir ben menasheh halakh vayilkod 'et khavoteihem vayiqra 'ethen khavot ya'ir. numbers 32:42	venobakh halakh vayilkod 'et qenat ve'et benoteha vayiqra lah nobakh bishmo. numbers 33:1	'eleh mas'ei benei yisra'el 'asher yaze'u mei'erez mizrayim lezib'otam beyad mosheh ve'aharon. numbers 33:2	vayikhtob mosheh 'et moza'eihem lemas'eihem 'al pi yhvh ve'eleh mas'eihem lemoza'eihem. numbers 33:3	vayis'u meira'meses bakhodesh harishon bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh harishon mimakhorat hapesakh yaze'u benei yisra'el beyad ramah le'einei kal mizrayim. numbers 33:4	umizrayim meqaberim 'et 'asher hikah yhvh bahem kal bekhor ubeiloheihem 'asah yhvh shefatim. numbers 33:5	vayis'u benei yisra'el meira'meses vayakhanu besukot. numbers 33:6	vayis'u misukot vayakhanu be'eitam 'asher biqzeh hamidbar. numbers 33:7	vayis'u mei'eitam vayashab 'al pi hakhirot 'asher 'al penei ba'al zefon vayakhanu lifnei migdol. numbers 33:8	vayis'u mipenei hakhirot vaya'abru betokh hayam hamidbarah vayeilekhu derekh sheloshet yamim bemidbar 'eitam vayakhanu bemarah. numbers 33:9	vayis'u mimarah vayabo'u 'eilimah ube'eilim shetem 'esreh 'einot mayim veshib'im temarim vayakhanu sham. numbers 33:10	vayis'u mei'eilim vayakhanu 'al yam suf. numbers 33:11	vayis'u miyam suf vayakhanu bemidbar sin. numbers 33:12	vayis'u mimidbar sin vayakhanu bedafeqah. numbers 33:13	vayis'u midafeqah vayakhanu be'alush. numbers 33:14	vayis'u mei'alush vayakhanu birfidim velo hayah sham mayim la'am lishtot. numbers 33:15	vayis'u meirefidim vayakhanu bemidbar sinai. numbers 33:16	vayis'u mimidbar sinai vayakhanu beqibrot hata'avah. numbers 33:17	vayis'u miqibrot hata'avah vayakhanu bakhazeirot. numbers 33:18	vayis'u meikhazeirot vayakhanu beritmah. numbers 33:19	vayis'u meiritmah vayakhanu berimon parez. numbers 33:20	vayis'u meirimon parez vayakhanu belibnah. numbers 33:21	vayis'u milibnah vayakhanu berisah. numbers 33:22	vayis'u meirisah vayakhanu biqheilatah. numbers 33:23	vayis'u miqeheilatah vayakhanu behar shafer. numbers 33:24	vayis'u meihar shafer vayakhanu bakharadah. numbers 33:25	vayis'u meikharadah vayakhanu bemaqheilot. numbers 33:26	vayis'u mimaqheilot vayakhanu betakhat. numbers 33:27	vayis'u mitakhat vayakhanu betarakh. numbers 33:28	vayis'u mitarakh vayakhanu bemitqah. numbers 33:29	vayis'u mimitqah vayakhanu bekhashmonah. numbers 33:30	vayis'u meikhashmonah vayakhanu bemoseirot. numbers 33:31	vayis'u mimoseirot vayakhanu bibnei ya'aqan. numbers 33:32	vayis'u mibenei ya'aqan vayakhanu bekhor hagidgad. numbers 33:33	vayis'u meikhor hagidgad vayakhanu beyatebatah. numbers 33:34	vayis'u miyatebatah vayakhanu be'abronah. numbers 33:35	vayis'u mei'abronah vayakhanu be'ezyon gaber. numbers 33:36	vayis'u mei'ezyon gaber vayakhanu bemidbar zin hi qadesh. numbers 33:37	vayis'u miqadesh vayakhanu behor hahar biqzeh 'erez 'edom. numbers 33:38	vaya'al 'aharon hakohen 'el hor hahar 'al pi yhvh vayamat sham bishnat ha'arba'im lezet benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim bakhodesh hakhamishi be'ekhad lakhodesh. numbers 33:39	ve'aharon ben shalosh ve'esrim ume'at shanah bemoto behor hahar. numbers 33:40	vayishma' hakena'ani melekh 'arad vehu yosheb banegeb be'erez kena'an bebo benei yisra'el. numbers 33:41	vayis'u meihor hahar vayakhanu bezalmonah. numbers 33:42	vayis'u mizalmonah vayakhanu befunon. numbers 33:43	vayis'u mipunon vayakhanu be'obot. numbers 33:44	vayis'u mei'obot vayakhanu be'iyei ha'abarim bigbul mo'ab. numbers 33:45	vayis'u mei'iyim vayakhanu bedibon gad. numbers 33:46	vayis'u midibon gad vayakhanu be'almon diblatayemah. numbers 33:47	vayis'u mei'almon diblatayemah vayakhanu beharei ha'abarim lifnei nebo. numbers 33:48	vayis'u meiharei ha'abarim vayakhanu be'arbot mo'ab 'al yarden yereikho. numbers 33:49	vayakhanu 'al hayarden mibet hayshimot 'ad 'abel hashitim be'arbot mo'ab. numbers 33:50	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh be'arbot mo'ab 'al yarden yereikho leimor. numbers 33:51	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden 'el 'erez kena'an. numbers 33:52	vehorashtem 'et kal yoshebei ha'arez mipeneikhem ve'ibadtem 'et kal maskiyotam ve'et kal zalmei maseikhotam te'abeidu ve'et kal bamotam tashmidu. numbers 33:53	vehorashtem 'et ha'arez vishabtem bah ki lakhem natati 'et ha'arez lareshet 'otah. numbers 33:54	vehitnakhaltem 'et ha'arez begoral lemishpekhoteikhem larab tarbu 'et nakhalato velam'at tam'it 'et nakhalato 'el 'asher yeizei lo shamah hagoral lo yihyeh lematot 'aboteikhem titnekhalu. numbers 33:55	ve'im lo torishu 'et yoshebei ha'arez mipeneikhem vehayah 'asher totiru meihem lesikim be'eineikhem velizninim bezideikhem vezararu 'etkhem 'al ha'arez 'asher 'atem yoshebim bah. numbers 33:56	vehayah ka'asher dimiti la'asot lahem 'e'eseh lakhem. numbers 34:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 34:2	zav 'et benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki 'atem ba'im 'el ha'arez kena'an zot ha'arez 'asher tipol lakhem benakhalah 'erez kena'an ligbuloteha. numbers 34:3	vehayah lakhem pe'at negeb mimidbar zin 'al yedei 'edom vehayah lakhem gebul negeb miqzeh yam hamelakh qeidemah. numbers 34:4	venasab lakhem hagebul minegeb lema'aleh 'aqrabim ve'abar zinah vehayah vehayu toz'otav minegeb leqadesh barneia' veyaza khazar 'adar ve'abar 'azmonah. numbers 34:5	venasab hagebul mei'azmon nakhlah mizrayim vehayu toz'otav hayamah. numbers 34:6	ugebul yam vehayah lakhem hayam hagadol ugebul zeh yihyeh lakhem gebul yam. numbers 34:7	vezeh yihyeh lakhem gebul zafon min hayam hagadol teta'u lakhem hor hahar. numbers 34:8	meihor hahar teta'u lebo khamat vehayu toz'ot hagebul zedadah. numbers 34:9	veyaza hagebul zifronah vehayu toz'otav khazar 'einan zeh yihyeh lakhem gebul zafon. numbers 34:10	vehit'avitem lakhem ligbul qeidemah meikhazar 'einan shefamah. numbers 34:11	veyarad hagebul mishefam hariblah miqedem la'ayin veyarad hagebul umakhah 'al ketef yam kineret qeidemah. numbers 34:12	veyarad hagebul hayardeinah vehayu toz'otav yam hamelakh zot tihyeh lakhem ha'arez ligbuloteha sabib. numbers 34:13	vayzav mosheh 'et benei yisra'el leimor zot ha'arez 'asher titnakhalu 'otah begoral 'asher zivah yhvh latet letish'at hamatot vakhazi hamateh. numbers 34:14	ki laqekhu mateh benei har'ubeini lebet 'abotam umateh benei hagadi lebet 'abotam vakhazi mateh menasheh laqekhu nakhalatam. numbers 34:15	shenei hamatot vakhazi hamateh laqekhu nakhalatam mei'eiber leyarden yereikho qeidemah mizrakhah. numbers 34:16	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 34:17	'eleh shemot ha'anashim 'asher yinkhalu lakhem 'et ha'arez 'el'azar hakohen vihoshua' bin nun. numbers 34:18	venasi 'ekhad nasi 'ekhad mimateh tiqkhu linkhol 'et ha'arez. numbers 34:19	ve'eleh shemot ha'anashim lemateh yehudah kaleb ben yefuneh. numbers 34:20	ulemateh benei shim'on shemu'el ben 'amihud. numbers 34:21	lemateh binyamin 'elidad ben kislon. numbers 34:22	ulemateh benei dan nasi buqi ben yageli. numbers 34:23	libnei yosef lemateh benei menasheh nasi khani'el ben 'eifod. numbers 34:24	ulemateh benei 'efrayim nasi qemu'el ben shiftan. numbers 34:25	ulemateh benei zebulun nasi 'elizafan ben parnakh. numbers 34:26	ulemateh benei yisashkhar nasi palti'el ben 'azan. numbers 34:27	ulemateh benei 'asher nasi 'akhihud ben shelomi. numbers 34:28	ulemateh benei naftali nasi pedah'el ben 'amihud. numbers 34:29	'eleh 'asher zivah yhvh lenakhel 'et benei yisra'el be'erez kena'an. numbers 35:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh be'arbot mo'ab 'al yarden yereikho leimor. numbers 35:2	zav 'et benei yisra'el venatenu lalviyim minakhalat 'akhuzatam 'arim lashabet umigrash le'arim sebiboteihem titenu lalviyim. numbers 35:3	vehayu he'arim lahem lashabet umigresheihem yihyu libhemtam velirkhusham ulekhol khayatam. numbers 35:4	umigreshei he'arim 'asher titenu lalviyim miqir ha'ir vakhuzah 'elef 'amah sabib. numbers 35:5	umadotem mikhuz la'ir 'et pe'at qeidemah 'alpayim ba'amah ve'et pe'at negeb 'alpayim ba'amah ve'et pe'at yam 'alpayim ba'amah ve'et pe'at zafon 'alpayim ba'amah veha'ir batavekh zeh yihyeh lahem migreshei he'arim. numbers 35:6	ve'et he'arim 'asher titenu lalviyim 'et shesh 'arei hamiqlat 'asher titenu lanus shamah harozeiakh va'aleihem titenu 'arba'im ushetayim 'ir. numbers 35:7	kal he'arim 'asher titenu lalviyim 'arba'im ushemoneh 'ir 'ethen ve'et migresheihen. numbers 35:8	vehe'arim 'asher titenu mei'akhuzat benei yisra'el mei'et harab tarbu umei'et ham'at tam'itu 'ish kefi nakhalato 'asher yinkhalu yiten mei'arav lalviyim. numbers 35:9	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh leimor. numbers 35:10	daber 'el benei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem ki 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden 'arzah kena'an. numbers 35:11	vehiqritem lakhem 'arim 'arei miqlat tihyenah lakhem venas shamah rozeiakh makeh nefesh bishgagah. numbers 35:12	vehayu lakhem he'arim lemiqlat migo'el velo yamut harozeiakh 'ad 'amedo lifnei ha'eidah lamishpat. numbers 35:13	vehe'arim 'asher titeinu shesh 'arei miqlat tihyenah lakhem. numbers 35:14	'et shelosh he'arim titenu mei'eiber layarden ve'et shelosh he'arim titenu be'erez kena'an 'arei miqlat tihyenah. numbers 35:15	libnei yisra'el velager velatoshab betokham tihyenah shesh he'arim ha'eleh lemiqlat lanus shamah kal makeh nefesh bishgagah. numbers 35:16	ve'im bikhli barzel hikahu vayamot rozeiakh hu mot yumat harozeiakh. numbers 35:17	ve'im be'eben yad 'asher yamut bah hikahu vayamot rozeiakh hu mot yumat harozeiakh. numbers 35:18	'o bikhli 'ez yad 'asher yamut bo hikahu vayamot rozeiakh hu mot yumat harozeiakh. numbers 35:19	go'el hadam hu yamit 'et harozeiakh befig'o bo hu yemitenu. numbers 35:20	ve'im besin'ah yehdafenu 'o hishlikh 'alav bizdiyah vayamot. numbers 35:21	'o be'eibah hikahu beyado vayamot mot yumat hamakeh rozeiakh hu go'el hadam yamit 'et harozeiakh befig'o bo. numbers 35:22	ve'im befeta' belo 'eibah hadafo 'o hishlikh 'alav kal keli belo zediyah. numbers 35:23	'o bekhal 'eben 'asher yamut bah belo re'ot vayapel 'alav vayamot vehu lo 'oyeb lo velo mebaqesh ra'ato. numbers 35:24	veshafetu ha'eidah ben hamakeh uben go'el hadam 'al hamishpatim ha'eleh. numbers 35:25	vehizilu ha'eidah 'et harozeiakh miyad go'el hadam veheishibu 'oto ha'eidah 'el 'ir miqlato 'asher nas shamah veyashab bah 'ad mot hakohen hagadol 'asher mashakh 'oto beshemen haqodesh. numbers 35:26	ve'im yazo yeizei harozeiakh 'et gebul 'ir miqlato 'asher yanus shamah. numbers 35:27	umaza 'oto go'el hadam mikhuz ligbul 'ir miqlato verazakh go'el hadam 'et harozeiakh 'en lo dam. numbers 35:28	ki be'ir miqlato yeisheb 'ad mot hakohen hagadol ve'akharei mot hakohen hagadol yashub harozeiakh 'el 'erez 'akhuzato. numbers 35:29	vehayu 'eleh lakhem lekhuqat mishpat ledoroteikhem bekhol mosheboteikhem. numbers 35:30	kal makeh nefesh lefi 'eidim yirzakh 'et harozeiakh ve'ed 'ekhad lo ya'aneh benefesh lamut. numbers 35:31	velo tiqkhu khofer lenefesh rozeiakh 'asher hu rasha' lamut ki mot yumat. numbers 35:32	velo tiqkhu khofer lanus 'el 'ir miqlato lashub lashebet ba'arez 'ad mot hakohen. numbers 35:33	velo takhanifu 'et ha'arez 'asher 'atem bah ki hadam hu yakhanif 'et ha'arez vela'arez lo yekhupar ladam 'asher shupakh bah ki 'im bedam shofekho. numbers 35:34	velo tetamei 'et ha'arez 'asher 'atem yoshebim bah 'asher 'ani shokhen betokhah ki 'ani yhvh shokhen betokh benei yisra'el. numbers 36:1	vayiqrebu rashei ha'abot lemishpakhat benei gil'ad ben makhir ben menasheh mimishpekhot benei yosef vaydaberu lifnei mosheh velifnei hanesi'im rashei 'abot libnei yisra'el. numbers 36:2	vayomeru 'et 'adoni zivah yhvh latet 'et ha'arez benakhalah begoral libnei yisra'el vadoni zuvah yhvh latet 'et nakhalat zelafekhad 'akhinu libnotav. numbers 36:3	vehayu le'ekhad mibenei shibtei benei yisra'el lenashim venigre'ah nakhalatan minakhalat 'aboteinu venosaf 'al nakhalat hamateh 'asher tihyenah lahem umigoral nakhalateinu yigareia'. numbers 36:4	ve'im yihyeh hayobel libnei yisra'el venosfah nakhalatan 'al nakhalat hamateh 'asher tihyenah lahem uminakhalat mateh 'aboteinu yigara' nakhalatan. numbers 36:5	vayzav mosheh 'et benei yisra'el 'al pi yhvh leimor ken mateh benei yosef doberim. numbers 36:6	zeh hadabar 'asher zivah yhvh libnot zelafekhad leimor latob be'eineihem tihyenah lenashim 'akh lemishpakhat mateh 'abihem tihyenah lenashim. numbers 36:7	velo tisob nakhalah libnei yisra'el mimateh 'el mateh ki 'ish benakhalat mateh 'abotav yidbequ benei yisra'el. numbers 36:8	vekhal bat yoreshet nakhalah mimatot benei yisra'el le'ekhad mimishpakhat mateh 'abiha tihyeh le'ishah lema'an yireshu benei yisra'el 'ish nakhalat 'abotav. numbers 36:9	velo tisob nakhalah mimateh lemateh 'akher ki 'ish benakhalato yidbequ matot benei yisra'el. numbers 36:10	ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh ken 'asu benot zelafekhad. numbers 36:11	vatihyenah makhlah tirzah vekhagelah umilkah veno'ah benot zelafekhad libnei dodeihen lenashim. numbers 36:12	mimishpekhot benei menasheh ben yosef hayu lenashim vatehi nakhalatan 'al mateh mishpakhat 'abihen. numbers 36:13	'eleh hamizvot vehamishpatim 'asher zivah yhvh beyad mosheh 'el benei yisra'el be'arbot mo'ab 'al yarden yereikho. 

deuteronomy 1:1	'eleh hadebarim 'asher diber mosheh 'el kal yisra'el be'eiber hayarden bamidbar ba'arabah mol suf ben paran uben tofel velaban vakhazeirot vedi zahab. deuteronomy 1:2	'akhad 'asar yom meikhoreb derekh har sei'ir 'ad qadesh barneia'. deuteronomy 1:3	vayhi be'arba'im shanah be'ashtei 'asar khodesh be'ekhad lakhodesh diber mosheh 'el benei yisra'el kekhol 'asher zivah yhvh 'oto 'aleihem. deuteronomy 1:4	'akharei hakoto 'et sikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher yosheb bekheshbon ve'et 'og melekh habashan 'asher yosheb be'ashtarot be'edre'i. deuteronomy 1:5	be'eiber hayarden be'erez mo'ab ho'il mosheh bei'er 'et hatorah hazot leimor. deuteronomy 1:6	yhvh 'eloheinu diber 'eileinu bekhoreb leimor rab lakhem shebet bahar hazeh. deuteronomy 1:7	penu use'u lakhem ubo'u har ha'emori ve'el kal shekheinav ba'arabah bahar ubashefeilah ubanegeb ubekhof hayam 'erez hakena'ani vehalebanon 'ad hanahar hagadol nehar perat. deuteronomy 1:8	re'eh natati lifneikhem 'et ha'arez bo'u ureshu 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba' yhvh la'aboteikhem le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob latet lahem ulezar'am 'akhareihem. deuteronomy 1:9	va'omar 'aleikhem ba'et hahiv leimor lo 'ukhal lebadi se'et 'etkhem. deuteronomy 1:10	yhvh 'eloheikhem hirbah 'etkhem vehinekhem hayom kekhokhbei hashamayim larob. deuteronomy 1:11	yhvh 'elohei 'aboteikhem yosef 'aleikhem kakhem 'elef pe'amim vibarekh 'etkhem ka'asher diber lakhem. deuteronomy 1:12	'eikhah 'esa lebadi tarekhakhem umasa'akhem veribekhem. deuteronomy 1:13	habu lakhem 'anashim khakhamim unebonim vidu'im leshibteikhem va'asimem berasheikhem. deuteronomy 1:14	vata'anu 'oti vatomeru tob hadabar 'asher dibarta la'asot. deuteronomy 1:15	va'eqakh 'et rashei shibteikhem 'anashim khakhamim vidu'im va'eten 'otam rashim 'aleikhem sarei 'alafim vesarei mei'ot vesarei khamishim vesarei 'asarot veshoterim leshibteikhem. deuteronomy 1:16	va'azaveh 'et shofeteikhem ba'et hahiv leimor shamoa' ben 'akheikhem ushefatem zedeq ben 'ish uben 'akhiv uben geiro. deuteronomy 1:17	lo takiru fanim bamishpat kaqaton kagadol tishma'un lo taguru mipenei 'ish ki hamishpat leilohim hu vehadabar 'asher yiqsheh mikem taqribun 'eilai ushema'tiv. deuteronomy 1:18	va'azaveh 'etkhem ba'et hahiv 'et kal hadebarim 'asher ta'asun. deuteronomy 1:19	vanisa' meikhoreb vaneilekh 'et kal hamidbar hagadol vehanora hahu 'asher re'item derekh har ha'emori ka'asher zivah yhvh 'eloheinu 'otanu vanabo 'ad qadesh barneia'. deuteronomy 1:20	va'omar 'aleikhem batem 'ad har ha'emori 'asher yhvh 'eloheinu noten lanu. deuteronomy 1:21	re'eh natan yhvh 'elohekha lefanekha 'et ha'arez 'aleh resh ka'asher diber yhvh 'elohei 'abotekha lakh 'al tira ve'al teikhat. deuteronomy 1:22	vatiqrebun 'eilai kulekhem vatomeru nishlekhah 'anashim lefaneinu veyakhperu lanu 'et ha'arez veyashibu 'otanu dabar 'et haderekh 'asher na'aleh bah ve'et he'arim 'asher nabo 'aleihen. deuteronomy 1:23	vayitab be'einai hadabar va'eqakh mikem shenem 'asar 'anashim 'ish 'ekhad lashabet. deuteronomy 1:24	vayifnu vaya'alu haharah vayabo'u 'ad nakhal 'eshkol vayragelu 'otah. deuteronomy 1:25	vayiqkhu beyadam miperi ha'arez vayoridu 'eileinu vayashibu 'otanu dabar vayomeru tobah ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'eloheinu noten lanu. deuteronomy 1:26	velo 'abitem la'alot vatamru 'et pi yhvh 'eloheikhem. deuteronomy 1:27	vateiragenu be'aholeikhem vatomeru besin'at yhvh 'otanu hozi'anu mei'erez mizrayim latet 'otanu beyad ha'emori lehashmideinu. deuteronomy 1:28	'anah 'anakhnu 'olim 'akheinu heimasu 'et lebabeinu leimor 'am gadol varam mimenu 'arim gedolot ubezurot bashamayim vegam benei 'anaqim ra'inu sham. deuteronomy 1:29	va'omar 'aleikhem lo ta'arzun velo tire'un meihem. deuteronomy 1:30	yhvh 'eloheikhem haholekh lifneikhem hu yilakhem lakhem kekhol 'asher 'asah 'itekhem bemizrayim le'eineikhem. deuteronomy 1:31	ubamidbar 'asher ra'ita 'asher nesa'akha yhvh 'elohekha ka'asher yisa 'ish 'et beno bekhal haderekh 'asher halakhtem 'ad bo'akhem 'ad hamaqom hazeh. deuteronomy 1:32	ubadabar hazeh 'einekhem ma'aminim yhvh 'eloheikhem. deuteronomy 1:33	haholekh lifneikhem baderekh latur lakhem maqom lakhanotekhem ba'esh laylah lar'otekhem baderekh 'asher teilekhu bah ube'anan yomam. deuteronomy 1:34	vayishma' yhvh 'et qol dibreikhem vayiqzof vayishaba' leimor. deuteronomy 1:35	'im yir'eh 'ish ba'anashim ha'eleh hador hara' hazeh 'et ha'arez hatobah 'asher nishba'ti latet la'aboteikhem. deuteronomy 1:36	zulati kaleb ben yefuneh hu yir'enah velo 'eten 'et ha'arez 'asher darakh bah ulebanav ya'an 'asher milei 'akharei yhvh. deuteronomy 1:37	gam bi hit'anaf yhvh biglalkhem leimor gam 'atah lo tabo sham. deuteronomy 1:38	yehoshua' bin nun ha'omed lefanekha hu yabo shamah 'oto khazeq ki hu yankhilenah 'et yisra'el. deuteronomy 1:39	vetapekhem 'asher 'amartem labaz yihyeh ubeneikhem 'asher lo yade'u hayom tob vara' hemah yabo'u shamah velahem 'etenenah vehem yirashuha. deuteronomy 1:40	ve'atem penu lakhem use'u hamidbarah derekh yam suf. deuteronomy 1:41	vata'anu vatomeru 'eilai khatanu yhvh 'anakhnu na'aleh venilkhamnu kekhol 'asher zivanu yhvh 'eloheinu vatakhgeru 'ish 'et kelei milkhamto vatahinu la'alot haharah. deuteronomy 1:42	vayomer yhvh 'eilai 'emor lahem lo ta'alu velo tilakhamu ki 'eineni beqirbekhem velo tinagefu lifnei 'oyebeikhem. deuteronomy 1:43	va'adaber 'aleikhem velo shema'tem vatamru 'et pi yhvh vatazidu vata'alu haharah. deuteronomy 1:44	vayeizei ha'emori hayosheb bahar hahu liqratkhem vayirdefu 'etkhem ka'asher ta'asenah hadeborim vayaketu 'etkhem besei'ir 'ad kharemah. deuteronomy 1:45	vatashubu vatibku lifnei yhvh velo shama' yhvh beqolekhem velo he'ezin 'aleikhem. deuteronomy 1:46	vateishebu beqadesh yamim rabim kayamim 'asher yeshabtem. deuteronomy 2:1	vaneifen vanisa' hamidbarah derekh yam suf ka'asher diber yhvh 'eilai vanasab 'et har sei'ir yamim rabim. deuteronomy 2:2	vayomer yhvh 'eilai leimor. deuteronomy 2:3	rab lakhem sob 'et hahar hazeh penu lakhem zafonah. deuteronomy 2:4	ve'et ha'am zav leimor 'atem 'oberim bigbul 'akheikhem benei 'eisav hayoshebim besei'ir veyire'u mikem venishmartem me'od. deuteronomy 2:5	'al titgaru bam ki lo 'eten lakhem mei'arzam 'ad midrakh kaf ragel ki yerushah le'eisav natati 'et har sei'ir. deuteronomy 2:6	'okhel tishberu mei'itam bakesef va'akhaltem vegam mayim tikhru mei'itam bakesef ushetitem. deuteronomy 2:7	ki yhvh 'elohekha beirakhkha bekhol ma'aseh yadekha yada' lekhtekha 'et hamidbar hagadol hazeh zeh 'arba'im shanah yhvh 'elohekha 'imakh lo khasarta dabar. deuteronomy 2:8	vana'abor mei'et 'akheinu benei 'eisav hayoshebim besei'ir miderekh ha'arabah mei'eilat umei'ezyon gaber vaneifen vana'abor derekh midbar mo'ab. deuteronomy 2:9	vayomer yhvh 'eilai 'el tazar 'et mo'ab ve'al titgar bam milkhamah ki lo 'eten lekha mei'arzo yerushah ki libnei lot natati 'et 'ar yerushah deuteronomy 2:10	ha'eimim lefanim yashebu bah 'am gadol verab varam ka'anaqim. deuteronomy 2:11	refa'im yeikhashebu 'af hem ka'anaqim vehamo'abim yiqre'u lahem 'eimim. deuteronomy 2:12	ubesei'ir yashebu hakhorim lefanim ubenei 'eisav yirashum vayashmidum mipeneihem vayeishebu takhtam ka'asher 'asah yisra'el le'erez yerushato 'asher natan yhvh lahem. deuteronomy 2:13	'atah qumu ve'ibru lakhem 'et nakhal zared vana'abor 'et nakhal zared. deuteronomy 2:14	vehayamim 'asher halakhnu miqadesh barneia' 'ad 'asher 'abarnu 'et nakhal zered sheloshim ushemoneh shanah 'ad tom kal hador 'anshei hamilkhamah miqereb hamakhaneh ka'asher nishba' yhvh lahem. deuteronomy 2:15	vegam yad yhvh hayetah bam lehumam miqereb hamakhaneh 'ad tumam. deuteronomy 2:16	vayhi kha'asher tamu kal 'anshei hamilkhamah lamut miqereb ha'am. deuteronomy 2:17	vaydaber yhvh 'eilai leimor. deuteronomy 2:18	'atah 'ober hayom 'et gebul mo'ab 'et 'ar. deuteronomy 2:19	veqarabta mul benei 'amon 'al tezurem ve'al titgar bam ki lo 'eten mei'erez benei 'amon lekha yerushah ki libnei lot netatiha yerushah. deuteronomy 2:20	'erez refa'im teikhasheb 'af hi refa'im yashebu bah lefanim veha'amonim yiqre'u lahem zamzumim. deuteronomy 2:21	'am gadol verab varam ka'anaqim vayashmidem yhvh mipeneihem vayirashum vayeishebu takhtam. deuteronomy 2:22	ka'asher 'asah libnei 'eisav hayoshebim besei'ir 'asher hishmid 'et hakhori mipeneihem vayirashum vayeishebu takhtam 'ad hayom hazeh. deuteronomy 2:23	veha'avim hayoshebim bakhazeirim 'ad 'azah kaftorim hayoze'im mikaftor hishmidum vayeishebu takhtam. deuteronomy 2:24	qumu se'u ve'ibru 'et nakhal 'arnon re'eh natati beyadekha 'et sikhon melekh kheshbon ha'emori ve'et 'arzo hakhel rash vehitgar bo milkhamah. deuteronomy 2:25	hayom hazeh 'akhel tet pakhdekha veyir'atekha 'al penei ha'amim takhat kal hashamayim 'asher yishme'un shim'akha veragezu vekhalu mipanekha deuteronomy 2:26	va'eshlakh mal'akhim mimidbar qedeimot 'el sikhon melekh kheshbon dibrei shalom leimor. deuteronomy 2:27	'e'berah be'arzekha baderekh baderekh 'eilekh lo 'asur yamin usemol. deuteronomy 2:28	'okhel bakesef tashbireini ve'akhalti umayim bakesef titen li veshatiti raq 'e'berah beraglai. deuteronomy 2:29	ka'asher 'asu li benei 'eisav hayoshebim besei'ir vehamo'abim hayoshebim be'ar 'ad 'asher 'e'ebor 'et hayarden 'el ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'eloheinu noten lanu. deuteronomy 2:30	velo 'abah sikhon melekh kheshbon ha'abireinu bo ki hiqshah yhvh 'elohekha 'et rukho ve'imez 'et lebabo lema'an tito beyadekha kayom hazeh. deuteronomy 2:31	vayomer yhvh 'eilai re'eh hakhiloti tet lefanekha 'et sikhon ve'et 'arzo hakhel rash lareshet 'et 'arzo. deuteronomy 2:32	vayeizei sikhon liqrateinu hu vekhal 'amo lamilkhamah yahezah. deuteronomy 2:33	vayiteneihu yhvh 'eloheinu lefaneinu vanakh 'oto ve'et beno banav ve'et kal 'amo. deuteronomy 2:34	vanilkod 'et kal 'arav ba'et hahiv vanakharem 'et kal 'ir metim vehanashim vehataf lo hish'arnu sarid. deuteronomy 2:35	raq habeheimah bazaznu lanu ushelal he'arim 'asher lakhadenu. deuteronomy 2:36	mei'aro'er 'asher 'al sefat nakhal 'arnon veha'ir 'asher banakhal ve'ad hagil'ad lo hayetah qiryah 'asher sagebah mimenu 'et hakol natan yhvh 'eloheinu lefaneinu. deuteronomy 2:37	raq 'el 'erez benei 'amon lo qarabeta kal yad nakhal yaboq ve'arei hahar vekhol 'asher zivah yhvh 'eloheinu. deuteronomy 3:1	vaneifen vana'al derekh habashan vayeizei 'og melekh habashan liqrateinu hu vekhal 'amo lamilkhamah 'edre'i. deuteronomy 3:2	vayomer yhvh 'eilai 'al tira 'oto ki beyadekha natati 'oto ve'et kal 'amo ve'et 'arzo ve'asita lo ka'asher 'asita lesikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher yosheb bekheshbon. deuteronomy 3:3	vayiten yhvh 'eloheinu beyadeinu gam 'et 'og melekh habashan ve'et kal 'amo vanakeihu 'ad bilti hish'ir lo sarid. deuteronomy 3:4	vanilkod 'et kal 'arav ba'et hahiv lo hayetah qiryah 'asher lo laqakhnu mei'itam shishim 'ir kal khebel 'argob mamlekhet 'og babashan. deuteronomy 3:5	kal 'eleh 'arim bezurot khomah gebohah delatayim uberiakh lebad mei'arei haperazi harbeh me'od. deuteronomy 3:6	vanakharem 'otam ka'asher 'asinu lesikhon melekh kheshbon hakharem kal 'ir metim hanashim vehataf. deuteronomy 3:7	vekhal habeheimah ushelal he'arim bazonu lanu. deuteronomy 3:8	vaniqakh ba'et hahiv 'et ha'arez miyad shenei malkhei ha'emori 'asher be'eiber hayarden minakhal 'arnon 'ad har khermon. deuteronomy 3:9	zidonim yiqre'u lekhermon siryon veha'emori yiqre'u lo senir. deuteronomy 3:10	kol 'arei hamishor vekhal hagil'ad vekhal habashan 'ad salkhah ve'edre'i 'arei mamlekhet 'og babashan. deuteronomy 3:11	ki raq 'og melekh habashan nish'ar miyeter harefa'im hineh 'arso 'eres barzel haloh hi berabat benei 'amon teisha' 'amot 'arekah ve'arba' 'amot rakhebah be'amat 'ish. deuteronomy 3:12	ve'et ha'arez hazot yarashnu ba'et hahiv mei'aro'er 'asher 'al nakhal 'arnon vakhazi har hagil'ad ve'arav natati laru'ubeini velagadi. deuteronomy 3:13	veyeter hagil'ad vekhal habashan mamlekhet 'og natati lakhazi sheibet hamnasheh kol khebel ha'argob lekhal habashan hahu yiqarei 'erez refa'im. deuteronomy 3:14	ya'ir ben menasheh laqakh 'et kal khebel 'argob 'ad gebul hageshuri vehama'akhati vayiqra 'otam 'al shemo 'et habashan khavot ya'ir 'ad hayom hazeh. deuteronomy 3:15	ulemakhir natati 'et hagil'ad. deuteronomy 3:16	velaru'ubeini velagadi natati min hagil'ad ve'ad nakhal 'arnon tokh hanakhal ugebul ve'ad yaboq hanakhal gebul benei 'amon. deuteronomy 3:17	veha'arabah vehayarden ugebul mikineret ve'ad yam ha'arabah yam hamelakh takhat 'ashdot hapisgah mizrakhah. deuteronomy 3:18	va'azav 'etkhem ba'et hahiv leimor yhvh 'eloheikhem natan lakhem 'et ha'arez hazot lerishtah khaluzim ta'abru lifnei 'akheikhem benei yisra'el kal benei khayil. deuteronomy 3:19	raq nesheikhem vetapekhem umiqneikhem yada'ti ki miqneh rab lakhem yeishebu be'areikhem 'asher natati lakhem. deuteronomy 3:20	'ad 'asher yaniakh yhvh la'akheikhem kakhem veyareshu gam hem 'et ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'eloheikhem noten lahem be'eiber hayarden veshabtem 'ish lirushato 'asher natati lakhem. deuteronomy 3:21	ve'et yehoshua' ziveiti ba'et hahiv leimor 'einekha haro'ot 'et kal 'asher 'asah yhvh 'eloheikhem lishnei hamelakhim ha'eleh ken ya'aseh yhvh lekhal hamamlakhot 'asher 'atah 'ober shamah. deuteronomy 3:22	lo tira'um ki yhvh 'eloheikhem hu hanilkham lakhem. deuteronomy 3:23	va'etkhanan 'el yhvh ba'et hahiv leimor. deuteronomy 3:24	'adonai yhvh 'atah hakhilota lehar'ot 'et 'abdekha 'et gadelekha ve'et yadekha hakhazaqah 'asher mi 'el bashamayim uba'arez 'asher ya'aseh khema'asekha vekhigburotekha. deuteronomy 3:25	'e'berah na ve'er'eh 'et ha'arez hatobah 'asher be'eiber hayarden hahar hatob hazeh vehalebanon. deuteronomy 3:26	vayit'aber yhvh bi lema'ankhem velo shama' 'eilai vayomer yhvh 'eilai rab lakh 'al tosef daber 'eilai 'od badabar hazeh. deuteronomy 3:27	'aleh rosh hapisgah vesa 'einekha yamah vezafonah veteimanah umizrakhah ure'eh be'einekha ki lo ta'abor 'et hayarden hazeh. deuteronomy 3:28	vezav 'et yehoshua' vekhazeqeihu ve'amezeihu ki hu ya'abor lifnei ha'am hazeh vehu yankhil 'otam 'et ha'arez 'asher tir'eh. deuteronomy 3:29	vaneisheb bagai mul bet pe'or. deuteronomy 4:1	ve'atah yisra'el shema' 'el hakhuqim ve'el hamishpatim 'asher 'anokhi melamed 'etkhem la'asot lema'an tikhyu ubatem virishtem 'et ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'elohei 'aboteikhem noten lakhem. deuteronomy 4:2	lo tosifu 'al hadabar 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem velo tigre'u mimenu lishmor 'et mizvot yhvh 'eloheikhem 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem. deuteronomy 4:3	'eineikhem haro'ot 'et 'asher 'asah yhvh beba'al pe'or ki khal ha'ish 'asher halakh 'akharei ba'al pe'or hishmido yhvh 'elohekha miqirbekha. deuteronomy 4:4	ve'atem hadebeiqim yhvh 'eloheikhem khayim kulekhem hayom. deuteronomy 4:5	re'eh limadti 'etkhem khuqim umishpatim ka'asher zivani yhvh 'elohai la'asot ken beqereb ha'arez 'asher 'atem ba'im shamah lerishtah. deuteronomy 4:6	ushemartem va'asitem ki hi khakhematkhem ubinatkhem le'einei ha'amim 'asher yishme'un 'et kal hakhuqim ha'eleh ve'ameru raq 'am khakham venabon hago hagadol hazeh. deuteronomy 4:7	ki mi go gadol 'asher lo 'elohim qerobim 'eilav yhvh 'eloheinu bekhal qare'einu 'eilav. deuteronomy 4:8	umi go gadol 'asher lo khuqim umishpatim zadiqim kekhol hatorah hazot 'asher 'anokhi noten lifneikhem hayom. deuteronomy 4:9	raq hishamer lekha ushemor nafshekha me'od pen tishkakh 'et hadebarim 'asher ra'u 'einekha ufen yasuru milebabekha kol yemei khayekha vehoda'tam lebanekha velibnei banekha. deuteronomy 4:10	yom 'asher 'amadta lifnei yhvh 'elohekha bekhoreb be'emor yhvh 'eilai haqhel li 'et ha'am ve'ashmi'em 'et debarai 'asher yilmedun leyir'ah 'oti kal hayamim 'asher hem khayim 'al ha'adamah ve'et beneihem yelameidun. deuteronomy 4:11	vatiqrebun vata'amdun takhat hahar vehahar bo'er ba'esh 'ad leb hashamayim khoshekh 'anan va'arafel. deuteronomy 4:12	vaydaber yhvh 'aleikhem mitokh ha'esh qol debarim 'atem shome'im utemunah 'einekhem ro'im zulati qol. deuteronomy 4:13	vayaged lakhem 'et berito 'asher zivah 'etkhem la'asot 'aseret hadebarim vayikhtebem 'al shenei lukhot 'abanim. deuteronomy 4:14	ve'oti zivah yhvh ba'et hahiv lelamed 'etkhem khuqim umishpatim la'asotekhem 'otam ba'arez 'asher 'atem 'oberim shamah lerishtah. deuteronomy 4:15	venishmartem me'od lenafshoteikhem ki lo re'item kal temunah beyom diber yhvh 'aleikhem bekhoreb mitokh ha'esh. deuteronomy 4:16	pen tashkhitun va'asitem lakhem pesel temunat kal samel tabnit zakhar 'o neqeibah. deuteronomy 4:17	tabnit kal beheimah 'asher ba'arez tabnit kal zipor kanaf 'asher ta'uf bashamayim. deuteronomy 4:18	tabnit kal romes ba'adamah tabnit kal dagah 'asher bamayim mitakhat la'arez. deuteronomy 4:19	ufen tisa 'einekha hashamaymah vera'ita 'et hashemesh ve'et hayareiakh ve'et hakokhabim kol zeba hashamayim venidakhta vehishtakhavita lahem va'abadtam 'asher khalaq yhvh 'elohekha 'otam lekhol ha'amim takhat kal hashamayim. deuteronomy 4:20	ve'etkhem laqakh yhvh vayozi 'etkhem mikur habarzel mimizrayim lihyot lo le'am nakhalah kayom hazeh. deuteronomy 4:21	yhvh hit'anef bi 'al dibreikhem vayishaba' lebilti 'aberi 'et hayarden ulebilti bo 'el ha'arez hatobah 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah. deuteronomy 4:22	ki 'anokhi met ba'arez hazot 'eineni 'ober 'et hayarden ve'atem 'oberim virishtem 'et ha'arez hatobah hazot. deuteronomy 4:23	hishameru lakhem pen tishkekhu 'et berit yhvh 'eloheikhem 'asher karat 'imakhem va'asitem lakhem pesel temunat kol 'asher zivekha yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 4:24	ki yhvh 'elohekha 'esh 'okhelah hu 'el qana. deuteronomy 4:25	ki tolid banim ubenei banim venoshantem ba'arez vehishkhatem va'asitem pesel temunat kol va'asitem hara' be'einei yhvh 'elohekha lehakh'iso. deuteronomy 4:26	ha'idoti bakhem hayom 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez ki 'abod tobeidun maher mei'al ha'arez 'asher 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden shamah lerishtah lo ta'arikhun yamim 'aleha ki hishamed tishameidun. deuteronomy 4:27	veheifiz yhvh 'etkhem ba'amim venish'artem metei mispar bagoyim 'asher yenaheg yhvh 'etkhem shamah. deuteronomy 4:28	va'abadtem sham 'elohim ma'aseh yedei 'adam 'ez va'eben 'asher lo yir'un velo yishme'un velo yokhelun velo yerikhun. deuteronomy 4:29	ubiqashtem misham 'et yhvh 'elohekha umazata ki tidreshenu bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha. deuteronomy 4:30	bazar lekha umeza'ukha kol hadebarim ha'eleh be'akharit hayamim veshabta 'ad yhvh 'elohekha veshama'ta beqolo. deuteronomy 4:31	ki 'el rakhum yhvh 'elohekha lo yarpekha velo yashkhitekha velo yishkakh 'et berit 'abotekha 'asher nishba' lahem. deuteronomy 4:32	ki she'al na leyamim rishonim 'asher hayu lefanekha lemin hayom 'asher bara 'elohim 'adam 'al ha'arez ulemiqzeh hashamayim ve'ad qezeh hashamayim hanihyah kadabar hagadol hazeh 'o hanishma' kamohu. deuteronomy 4:33	hashama' 'am qol 'elohim medaber mitokh ha'esh ka'asher shama'ta 'atah vayekhi. deuteronomy 4:34	'o hanisah 'elohim labo laqakhat lo go miqereb go bemasot be'otot ubemoftim ubemilkhamah ubeyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah ubemora'im gedolim kekhol 'asher 'asah lakhem yhvh 'eloheikhem bemizrayim le'einekha. deuteronomy 4:35	'atah hare'eita lada'at ki yhvh hu ha'elohim 'en 'od milbado. deuteronomy 4:36	min hashamayim hishmi'akha 'et qolo leyasereka ve'al ha'arez her'akha 'et 'isho hagedolah udebarav shama'ta mitokh ha'esh. deuteronomy 4:37	vetakhat ki 'ahab 'et 'abotekha vayibkhar bezar'o 'akharav vayozi'akha befanav bekhokho hagadol mimizrayim. deuteronomy 4:38	lehorish goyim gedolim va'azumim mimekha mipanekha lahabi'akha latet lekha 'et 'arzam nakhalah kayom hazeh. deuteronomy 4:39	veyada'ta hayom vahasheibota 'el lebabekha ki yhvh hu ha'elohim bashamayim mima'al ve'al ha'arez mitakhat 'en 'od. deuteronomy 4:40	veshamarta 'et khuqav ve'et mizvotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom 'asher yitab lekha ulebanekha 'akharekha ulema'an ta'arikh yamim 'al ha'adamah 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha kal hayamim. deuteronomy 4:41	'az yabdil mosheh shalosh 'arim be'eiber hayarden mizrekhah shamesh. deuteronomy 4:42	lanus shamah rozeiakh 'asher yirzakh 'et rei'eihu bibli da'at vehu lo sonei lo mitemol shilshom venas 'el 'akhat min he'arim ha'el vakhai. deuteronomy 4:43	'et bezer bamidbar be'erez hamishor laru'ubeini ve'et ramot bagil'ad lagadi ve'et golan babashan lamnashi. deuteronomy 4:44	vezot hatorah 'asher sam mosheh lifnei benei yisra'el. deuteronomy 4:45	'eleh ha'eidot vehakhuqim vehamishpatim 'asher diber mosheh 'el benei yisra'el bezeitam mimizrayim. deuteronomy 4:46	be'eiber hayarden bagai mul bet pe'or be'erez sikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher yosheb bekheshbon 'asher hikah mosheh ubenei yisra'el bezeitam mimizrayim. deuteronomy 4:47	vayireshu 'et 'arzo ve'et
