4:49	vekhal ha'arabah 'eiber hayarden mizrakhah ve'ad yam ha'arabah takhat 'ashdot hapisgah. deuteronomy 5:1	vayiqra mosheh 'el kal yisra'el vayomer 'aleihem shema' yisra'el 'et hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim 'asher 'anokhi dober be'azeneikhem hayom ulemadtem 'otam ushemartem la'asotam. deuteronomy 5:2	yhvh 'eloheinu karat 'imanu berit bekhoreb. deuteronomy 5:3	lo 'et 'aboteinu karat yhvh 'et haberit hazot ki 'itanu 'anakhnu 'eleh foh hayom kulanu khayim. deuteronomy 5:4	panim befanim diber yhvh 'imakhem bahar mitokh ha'esh. deuteronomy 5:5	'anokhi 'omed ben yhvh ubeineikhem ba'et hahiv lehagid lakhem 'et debar yhvh ki yereitem mipenei ha'esh velo 'alitem bahar leimor. deuteronomy 5:6	'anokhi yhvh 'elohekha 'asher hozeitikha mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim. deuteronomy 5:7	lo yihyeh lekha 'elohim 'akheirim 'al panaya. deuteronomy 5:8	lo ta'aseh lekha fesel kal temunah 'asher bashamayim mima'al va'asher ba'arez mitakhat va'asher bamayim mitakhat la'arez. deuteronomy 5:9	lo tishtakhaveh lahem velo ta'abedem ki 'anokhi yhvh 'elohekha 'el qana poqed 'avon 'abot 'al banim ve'al shileishim ve'al ribei'im lesone'ai. deuteronomy 5:10	ve'oseh khesed la'alafim le'ohabai uleshomerei mizvoto mizvotai. deuteronomy 5:11	lo tisa 'et shem yhvh 'elohekha lashav ki lo yenaqeh yhvh 'et 'asher yisa 'et shemo lashav. deuteronomy 5:12	shamor 'et yom hashabat leqadesho ka'asher zivekha yhvh 'elohekha deuteronomy 5:13	sheishet yamim ta'abod ve'asita kla melakhtekha. deuteronomy 5:14	veyom hashebi'i shabat yhvh 'elohekha lo ta'aseh khal melakhah 'atah ubinkha ubitekha ve'abdekha va'amatekha veshorkha vakhamorekha vekhal behemtekha vegeirekha 'asher bish'arekha lema'an yanuakh 'abdekha va'amatekha kamokha. deuteronomy 5:15	vezakharta ki 'ebed hayita be'erez mizrayim vayozi'akha yhvh 'elohekha misham beyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah 'al ken zivekha yhvh 'elohekha la'asot 'et yom hashabat. deuteronomy 5:16	kabed 'et 'abikha ve'et 'imekha ka'asher zivekha yhvh 'elohekha lema'an ya'arikhun yamekha ulema'an yitab lakh 'al ha'adamah 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lakh. deuteronomy 5:17	lo trezakh. deuteronomy 5:18	velo tne'af. deuteronomy 5:19	velo tgenob. deuteronomy 5:20	velo ta'aneh berei'akha 'ed shav. deuteronomy 5:21	velo takhmod 'eishet rei'ekha velo tit'aveh bet rei'ekha sadeihu ve'abdo va'amato shoro vakhamoro vekhol 'asher lerei'ekha. deuteronomy 5:22	'et hadebarim ha'eleh diber yhvh 'el kal qehalkhem bahar mitokh ha'esh he'anan veha'arafel qol gadol velo yasaf vayikhtebem 'al shenei lukhot 'abanim vayitenem 'eilai. deuteronomy 5:23	vayhi keshame'akhem 'et haqol mitokh hakhoshekh vehahar bo'er ba'esh vatiqrebun 'eilai kal rashei shibteikhem veziqneikhem. deuteronomy 5:24	vatomeru hen her'anu yhvh 'eloheinu 'et kebodo ve'et gadelo ve'et qolo shama'nu mitokh ha'esh hayom hazeh ra'inu ki yedaber 'elohim 'et ha'adam vakhai. deuteronomy 5:25	ve'atah lamah namut ki tokheleinu ha'esh hagedolah hazot 'im yosefim 'anakhnu lishmoa' 'et qol yhvh 'eloheinu 'od vamatenu. deuteronomy 5:26	ki mi khal basar 'asher shama' qol 'elohim khayim medaber mitokh ha'esh kamonu vayekhi. deuteronomy 5:27	qerab 'atah ushama' 'et kal 'asher yomar yhvh 'eloheinu ve'at tedaber 'eileinu 'et kal 'asher yedaber yhvh 'eloheinu 'eilekha veshama'nu ve'asinu. deuteronomy 5:28	vayishma' yhvh 'et qol dibreikhem bedaberkhem 'eilai vayomer yhvh 'eilai ma'ti 'et qol dibrei ha'am hazeh 'asher diberu 'eilekha heitibu kal 'asher dibeiru. deuteronomy 5:29	mi yiten vehayah lebabam zeh lahem leyir'ah 'oti velishmor 'et kal mizvotai kal hayamim lema'an yitab lahem velibneihem le'olam. deuteronomy 5:30	lekh 'emor lahem shubu lakhem le'aholeikhem. deuteronomy 5:31	ve'atah poh 'amod 'imadi va'adaberah 'eilekha 'et kal hamizvah vehakhuqim vehamishpatim 'asher telamedem ve'asu ba'arez 'asher 'anokhi noten lahem lerishtah. deuteronomy 5:32	ushemartem la'asot ka'asher zivah yhvh 'eloheikhem 'etkhem lo tasuru yamin usemol. deuteronomy 5:33	bekhal haderekh 'asher zivah yhvh 'eloheikhem 'etkhem teileikhu lema'an tikhyun vetob lakhem veha'arakhtem yamim ba'arez 'asher tirashun. deuteronomy 6:1	vezot hamizvah hakhuqim vehamishpatim 'asher zivah yhvh 'eloheikhem lelamed 'etkhem la'asot ba'arez 'asher 'atem 'oberim shamah lerishtah. deuteronomy 6:2	lema'an tira 'et yhvh 'elohekha lishmor 'et kal khuqotav umizvotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha 'atah ubinkha uben binkha kol yemei khayekha ulema'an ya'arikhun yamekha. deuteronomy 6:3	veshama'ta yisra'el veshamarta la'asot 'asher yitab lekha va'asher tirbun me'od ka'asher diber yhvh 'elohei 'abotekha lakh 'erez zabat khalab udebash. deuteronomy 6:4	shema' yisra'el yhvh 'eloheinu yhvh 'ekhad deuteronomy 6:5	ve'ahabta 'et yhvh 'elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha ubekhal me'odekha. deuteronomy 6:6	vehayu hadebarim ha'eleh 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom 'al lebabekha. deuteronomy 6:7	veshinantam lebanekha vedibarta bam beshibtekha bebeitekha ubelekhtekha baderekh ubeshakhebekha ubequmekha. deuteronomy 6:8	uqeshartam le'ot 'al yadekha vehayu letotafot ben 'einekha. deuteronomy 6:9	ukhetabtam 'al mezuzot beitekha ubish'arekha. deuteronomy 6:10	vehayah ki yebi'akha yhvh 'elohekha 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba' la'abotekha le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob latet lakh 'arim gedolot vetobot 'asher lo banita. deuteronomy 6:11	ubatim melei'im kal tub 'asher lo mileita uborot khazubim 'asher lo khazabta keramim vezeitim 'asher lo nata'eta ve'akhalta vesaba'eta. deuteronomy 6:12	hishamer lekha pen tishkakh 'et yhvh 'asher hozi'akha mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim. deuteronomy 6:13	'et yhvh 'elohekha tira ve'oto ta'abod ubishmo tishabeia'. deuteronomy 6:14	lo teilekhun 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim mei'elohei ha'amim 'asher sebiboteikhem. deuteronomy 6:15	ki 'el qana yhvh 'elohekha beqirbekha pen yekhereh 'af yhvh 'elohekha bakh vehishmidekha mei'al penei ha'adamah. deuteronomy 6:16	lo tenasu 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem ka'asher nisitem bamasah. deuteronomy 6:17	shamor tishmerun 'et mizvot yhvh 'eloheikhem ve'eidotav vekhuqav 'asher zivakh. deuteronomy 6:18	ve'asita hayashar vehatob be'einei yhvh lema'an yitab lakh ubata veyarashta 'et ha'arez hatobah 'asher nishba' yhvh la'abotekha. deuteronomy 6:19	lahadof 'et kal 'oyebekha mipanekha ka'asher diber yhvh. deuteronomy 6:20	ki yish'alekha binkha makhar leimor mah ha'eidot vehakhuqim vehamishpatim 'asher zivah yhvh 'eloheinu 'etkhem. deuteronomy 6:21	ve'amarta lebinkha 'abadim hayinu lefar'oh bemizrayim vayozi'einu yhvh mimizrayim beyad khazaqah. deuteronomy 6:22	vayiten yhvh 'otot umofetim gedolim vera'im bemizrayim befar'oh ubekhal beito le'eineinu. deuteronomy 6:23	ve'otanu hozi misham lema'an habi 'otanu latet lanu 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba' la'aboteinu. deuteronomy 6:24	vayzaveinu yhvh la'asot 'et kal hakhuqim ha'eleh leyir'ah 'et yhvh 'eloheinu letob lanu kal hayamim lekhayoteinu kehayom hazeh. deuteronomy 6:25	uzedaqah tihyeh lanu ki nishmor la'asot 'et kal hamizvah hazot lifnei yhvh 'eloheinu ka'asher zivanu. deuteronomy 7:1	ki yebi'akha yhvh 'elohekha 'el ha'arez 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah venashal goyim rabim mipanekha hakhiti vehagirgashi veha'emori vehakena'ani vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi shib'ah goyim rabim va'azumim mimeka. deuteronomy 7:2	unetanam yhvh 'elohekha lefanekha vehikitam hakharem takharim 'otam lo tikhrot lahem berit velo tekhanem. deuteronomy 7:3	velo titkhaten bam bitekha lo titen libno ubito lo tiqakh libnekha. deuteronomy 7:4	ki yasir 'et binkha mei'akharai ve'abedu 'elohim 'akheirim vekharah 'af yhvh bakhem vehishmidekha maher. deuteronomy 7:5	ki 'im koh ta'asu lahem mizbekhoteihem titozu umazeibotam teshabeiru va'asheireihem tegadei'un ufesileihem tisrefun ba'esh. deuteronomy 7:6	ki 'am qadosh 'atah yhvh 'elohekha bekha bakhar yhvh 'elohekha lihyot lo le'am segulah mikol ha'amim 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah. deuteronomy 7:7	lo meirubekhem mikal ha'amim khashaq yhvh bakhem vayibkhar bakhem ki 'atem ham'at mikal ha'amim. deuteronomy 7:8	ki mei'ahabat yhvh 'etkhem umishamero 'et hashebu'ah 'asher nishba' la'aboteikhem hozi yhvh 'etkhem beyad khazaqah vayifdekha mibet 'abadim miyad par'oh melekh mizrayim. deuteronomy 7:9	veyada'ta ki yhvh 'elohekha hu ha'elohim ha'el hane'eman shomer haberit vehakhesed le'ohabav uleshomerei mizvoto mizvotav le'elef dor. deuteronomy 7:10	umeshalem lesone'av 'el panav leha'abido lo ye'akher lesone'o 'el panav yeshalem lo. deuteronomy 7:11	veshamarta 'et hamizvah ve'et hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom la'asotam. deuteronomy 7:12	vehayah 'eiqeb tishme'un 'et hamishpatim ha'eleh ushemartem va'asitem 'otam veshamar yhvh 'elohekha lekha 'et haberit ve'et hakhesed 'asher nishba' la'abotekha. deuteronomy 7:13	va'aheibekha ubeirakhkha vehirbekha ubeirakh peri bitnekha uferi 'admatekha deganekha vetiroshekha veyizharekha shegar 'alafekha ve'ashterot zonekha 'al ha'adamah 'asher nishba' la'abotekha latet lakh. deuteronomy 7:14	barukh tihyeh mikal ha'amim lo yihyeh bekha 'aqar va'aqarah ubibhemtekha. deuteronomy 7:15	veheisir yhvh mimekha kal kholi vekhal madvei mizrayim hara'im 'asher yada'ta lo yesimam bakh unetanam bekhal sone'ekha. deuteronomy 7:16	ve'akhalta 'et kal ha'amim 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lakh lo takhos 'einekha 'aleihem velo ta'abod 'et 'eloheihem ki moqesh hu lakh. deuteronomy 7:17	ki tomar bilbabekha rabim hagoyim ha'eleh mimeni 'eikhah 'ukhal lehorisham. deuteronomy 7:18	lo tira meihem zakhor tizkor 'et 'asher 'asah yhvh 'elohekha lefar'oh ulekhal mizrayim. deuteronomy 7:19	hamasot hagedolot 'asher ra'u 'einekha veha'otot vehamofetim vehayad hakhazaqah vehazeroa' hanetuyah 'asher hozi'akha yhvh 'elohekha ken ya'aseh yhvh 'elohekha lekhal ha'amim 'asher 'atah yarei mipeneihem. deuteronomy 7:20	vegam 'et hazir'ah yeshalakh yhvh 'elohekha bam 'ad 'abod hanish'arim vehanistarim mipanekha. deuteronomy 7:21	lo ta'aroz mipeneihem ki yhvh 'elohekha beqirbekha 'el gadol venora. deuteronomy 7:22	venashal yhvh 'elohekha 'et hagoyim ha'el mipanekha me'at me'at lo tukhal kalotam maher pen tirbeh 'alekha khayat hasadeh. deuteronomy 7:23	unetanam yhvh 'elohekha lefanekha vehamam mehumah gedolah 'ad hishamedam. deuteronomy 7:24	venatan malkheihem beyadekha veha'abadta 'et shemam mitakhat hashamayim lo yityazeb 'ish befanekha 'ad hishmidkha 'otam. deuteronomy 7:25	pesilei 'eloheihem tisrefun ba'esh lo takhmod kesef vezahab 'aleihem velaqakhta lakh pen tivaqesh bo ki to'abat yhvh 'elohekha hu. deuteronomy 7:26	velo tabi to'eibah 'el beitekha vehayita kheirem kamohu shaqez teshaqezenu veta'eb teta'abenu ki kheirem hu. deuteronomy 8:1	kal hamizvah 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom tishmerun la'asot lema'an tikhyun urebitem ubatem virishtem 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba' yhvh la'aboteikhem. deuteronomy 8:2	vezakharta 'et kal haderekh 'asher holikhakha yhvh 'elohekha zeh 'arba'im shanah bamidbar lema'an 'anotekha lenasotekha lada'at 'et 'asher bilbabekha hatishmor mizvoto mizvotav 'im lo. deuteronomy 8:3	vai'anekha vayar'ibekha vaya'akhilkha 'et haman 'asher lo yada'ta velo yade'un 'abotekha lema'an hodi'akha ki lo 'al halekhem lebado yikhyeh ha'adam ki 'al kal moza fi yhvh yikhyeh ha'adam. deuteronomy 8:4	simlatekha lo baletah mei'alekha veraglekha lo bazeiqah zeh 'arba'im shanah. deuteronomy 8:5	veyada'ta 'im lebabekha ki ka'asher yeyaser 'ish 'et beno yhvh 'elohekha meyasereka. deuteronomy 8:6	veshamarta 'et mizvot yhvh 'elohekha lalekhet bidrakhav uleyir'ah 'oto. deuteronomy 8:7	ki yhvh 'elohekha mebi'akha 'el 'erez tobah 'erez nakhalei mayim 'ayanot utehomot yoze'im babiq'ah ubahar. deuteronomy 8:8	'erez khitah use'orah vegefen ute'einah verimon 'erez zet shemen udebash. deuteronomy 8:9	'erez 'asher lo bemiskeinut tokhal bah lekhem lo tekhsar kol bah 'erez 'asher 'abaneha barzel umeiharareha takhzob nekhoshet. deuteronomy 8:10	ve'akhalta vesaba'eta ubeirakhta 'et yhvh 'elohekha 'al ha'arez hatobah 'asher natan lakh. deuteronomy 8:11	hishamer lekha pen tishkakh 'et yhvh 'elohekha lebilti shemor mizvotav umishpatav vekhuqotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom. deuteronomy 8:12	pen tokhal vesaba'eta ubatim tobim tibneh veyashabeta. deuteronomy 8:13	ubeqarekha vezonekha yirbeyun vekhesef vezahab yirbeh lakh vekhol 'asher lekha yirbeh. deuteronomy 8:14	veram lebabekha veshakhakhta 'et yhvh 'elohekha hamozi'akha mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim. deuteronomy 8:15	hamolikhakha bamidbar hagadol vehanora nakhash saraf ve'aqrab vezima'on 'asher 'en mayim hamozi lekha mayim mizur hakhalamish. deuteronomy 8:16	hama'akhilkha man bamidbar 'asher lo yade'un 'abotekha lema'an 'anotekha ulema'an nasotekha leheitibkha be'akharitekha. deuteronomy 8:17	ve'amarta bilbabekha kokhi ve'ozem yadi 'asah li 'et hakhayil hazeh. deuteronomy 8:18	vezakharta 'et yhvh 'elohekha ki hu hanoten lekha koakh la'asot khayil lema'an haqim 'et berito 'asher nishba' la'abotekha kayom hazeh. deuteronomy 8:19	vehayah 'im shakhoakh tishkakh 'et yhvh 'elohekha vehalakhta 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim va'abadtam vehishtakhavita lahem ha'idoti bakhem hayom ki 'abod tobeidun. deuteronomy 8:20	kagoyim 'asher yhvh ma'abid mipeneikhem ken tobeidun 'eiqeb lo tishme'un beqol yhvh 'eloheikhem. deuteronomy 9:1	shema' yisra'el 'atah 'ober hayom 'et hayarden labo lareshet goyim gedolim va'azumim mimeka 'arim gedolot ubezurot bashamayim. deuteronomy 9:2	'am gadol varam benei 'anaqim 'asher 'atah yada'ta ve'atah shama'ta mi yityazeb lifnei benei 'anaq. deuteronomy 9:3	veyada'ta hayom ki yhvh 'elohekha hu ha'ober lefanekha 'esh 'okhelah hu yashmidem vehu yakhni'em lefanekha vehorashtam veha'abadtam maher ka'asher diber yhvh lakh. deuteronomy 9:4	'al tomar bilbabekha bahadof yhvh 'elohekha 'otam milefanekha leimor bezidqati hebi'ani yhvh lareshet 'et ha'arez hazot uberish'at hagoyim ha'eleh yhvh morisham mipanekha. deuteronomy 9:5	lo bezidqatekha ubeyosher lebabekha 'atah ba lareshet 'et 'arzam ki berish'at hagoyim ha'eleh yhvh 'elohekha morisham mipanekha ulema'an haqim 'et hadabar 'asher nishba' yhvh la'abotekha le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob. deuteronomy 9:6	veyada'ta ki lo bezidqatekha yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha 'et ha'arez hatobah hazot lerishtah ki 'am qesheh 'oref 'atah. deuteronomy 9:7	zekhor 'al tishkakh 'et 'asher hiqzafta 'et yhvh 'elohekha bamidbar lemin hayom 'asher yazata mei'erez mizrayim 'ad bo'akhem 'ad hamaqom hazeh mamrim heyitem 'im yhvh. deuteronomy 9:8	ubekhoreb hiqzaftem 'et yhvh vayit'anaf yhvh bakhem lehashmid 'etkhem. deuteronomy 9:9	ba'aloti haharah laqakhat lukhot ha'abanim lukhot haberit 'asher karat yhvh 'imakhem va'eisheb bahar 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im laylah lekhem lo 'akhalti umayim lo shatiti. deuteronomy 9:10	vayiten yhvh 'eilai 'et shenei lukhot ha'abanim ketubim be'ezba' 'elohim va'aleihem kekhal hadebarim 'asher diber yhvh 'imakhem bahar mitokh ha'esh beyom haqahal. deuteronomy 9:11	vayhi miqez 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im layelah natan yhvh 'eilai 'et shenei lukhot ha'abanim lukhot haberit. deuteronomy 9:12	vayomer yhvh 'eilai qum red maher mizeh ki shikhet 'amekha 'asher hozeita mimizrayim saru maher min haderekh 'asher zivitim 'asu lahem maseikhah. deuteronomy 9:13	vayomer yhvh 'eilai leimor ra'iti 'et ha'am hazeh vehineh 'am qesheh 'oref hu. deuteronomy 9:14	heref mimeni ve'ashmidem ve'emkheh 'et shemam mitakhat hashamayim ve'e'eseh 'otkha lego 'azum varab mimenu. deuteronomy 9:15	va'eifen va'eired min hahar vehahar bo'er ba'esh ushenei lukhot haberit 'al shetei yadai. deuteronomy 9:16	va'eire vehineh khatatem yhvh 'eloheikhem 'asitem lakhem 'eigel maseikhah sartem maher min haderekh 'asher zivah yhvh 'etkhem. deuteronomy 9:17	va'etpos bishnei halukhot va'ashlikhem mei'al shetei yadai va'ashaberem le'eineikhem. deuteronomy 9:18	va'etnapal lifnei yhvh karishonah 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im laylah lekhem lo 'akhalti umayim lo shatiti 'al kal khatatkhem 'asher khatatem la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh lehakh'iso. deuteronomy 9:19	ki yagoreti mipenei ha'af vehakheimah 'asher qazaf yhvh 'aleikhem lehashmid 'etkhem vayishma' yhvh 'eilai gam bapa'am hahiv. deuteronomy 9:20	ube'aharon hit'anaf yhvh me'od lehashmido va'etpalel gam be'ad 'aharon ba'et hahiv. deuteronomy 9:21	ve'et khatatkhem 'asher 'asitem 'et ha'eigel laqakhti va'esrof 'oto ba'esh va'ekot 'oto takhon heiteb 'ad 'asher daq le'afar va'ashlikh 'et 'afaro 'el hanakhal hayored min hahar. deuteronomy 9:22	ubetab'eirah ubemasah ubeqibrot hata'avah maqzifim heyitem 'et yhvh. deuteronomy 9:23	ubishloakh yhvh 'etkhem miqadesh barneia' leimor 'alu ureshu 'et ha'arez 'asher natati lakhem vatamru 'et pi yhvh 'eloheikhem velo he'emantem lo velo shema'tem beqolo. deuteronomy 9:24	mamrim heyitem 'im yhvh miyom da'ti 'etkhem. deuteronomy 9:25	va'etnapal lifnei yhvh 'et 'arba'im hayom ve'et 'arba'im halaylah 'asher hitnapaleti ki 'amar yhvh lehashmid 'etkhem. deuteronomy 9:26	va'etpalel 'el yhvh va'omar 'adonai yhvh 'al tashkhet 'amekha venakhalatekha 'asher padita begadelekha 'asher hozeita mimizrayim beyad khazaqah. deuteronomy 9:27	zekhor la'abadekha le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob 'al teifen 'el qeshi ha'am hazeh ve'el rish'o ve'el khatato. deuteronomy 9:28	pen yomeru ha'arez 'asher hozeitanu misham mibeli yekholet yhvh lahabi'am 'el ha'arez 'asher diber lahem umisin'ato 'otam hozi'am lahamitam bamidbar. deuteronomy 9:29	vehem 'amekha venakhalatekha 'asher hozeita bekhokhakha hagadol ubizro'akha hanetuyah. deuteronomy 10:1	ba'et hahiv 'amar yhvh 'eilai pesal lekha shenei lukhot 'abanim karishonim va'aleh 'eilai haharah ve'asita lekha 'aron 'ez. deuteronomy 10:2	ve'ekhtob 'al halukhot 'et hadebarim 'asher hayu 'al halukhot harishonim 'asher shibarta vesamtam ba'aron. deuteronomy 10:3	va'a'as 'aron 'azei shitim va'efsol shenei lukhot 'abanim karishonim va'a'al haharah ushenei halukhot beyadi. deuteronomy 10:4	vayikhtob 'al halukhot kamikhtab harishon 'et 'aseret hadebarim 'asher diber yhvh 'aleikhem bahar mitokh ha'esh beyom haqahal vayitenem yhvh 'eilai. deuteronomy 10:5	va'eifen va'eired min hahar va'asim 'et halukhot ba'aron 'asher 'asiti vayihyu sham ka'asher zivani yhvh. deuteronomy 10:6	ubenei yisra'el nase'u mibe'eirot benei ya'aqan moseirah sham met 'aharon vayiqaber sham vaykhahen 'el'azar beno takhtav. deuteronomy 10:7	misham nase'u hagudgodah umin hagudgodah yatebatah 'erez nakhalei mayim. deuteronomy 10:8	ba'et hahiv hibdil yhvh 'et sheibet haleivi laset 'et 'aron berit yhvh la'amod lifnei yhvh leshareto ulebarekh bishmo 'ad hayom hazeh. deuteronomy 10:9	'al ken lo hayah leleivi kheileq venakhalah 'im 'ekhav yhvh hu nakhalato ka'asher diber yhvh 'elohekha lo. deuteronomy 10:10	ve'anokhi 'amadti bahar kayamim harishonim 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im layelah vayishma' yhvh 'eilai gam bapa'am hahiv lo 'abah yhvh hashkhitekha. deuteronomy 10:11	vayomer yhvh 'eilai qum lekh lemasa' lifnei ha'am veyabo'u veyirshu 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti la'abotam latet lahem. deuteronomy 10:12	ve'atah yisra'el mah yhvh 'elohekha sho'el mei'imakh ki 'im leyir'ah 'et yhvh 'elohekha lalekhet bekhal derakhav ule'ahabah 'oto vela'abod 'et yhvh 'elohekha bekhal lebabekha ubekhal nafshekha. deuteronomy 10:13	lishmor 'et mizvot yhvh ve'et khuqotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom letob lakh. deuteronomy 10:14	hen yhvh 'elohekha hashamayim ushemei hashamayim ha'arez vekhal 'asher bah. deuteronomy 10:15	raq ba'abotekha khashaq yhvh le'ahabah 'otam vayibkhar bezar'am 'akhareihem bakhem mikal ha'amim kayom hazeh. deuteronomy 10:16	umaltem 'et 'arelat lebabkhem ve'arepekhem lo taqshu 'od. deuteronomy 10:17	ki yhvh 'eloheikhem hu 'elohei ha'elohim va'adonei ha'adonim ha'el hagadol hagibor vehanora 'asher lo yisa fanim velo yiqakh shokhad. deuteronomy 10:18	'oseh mishpat yatom ve'almanah ve'oheb ger latet lo lekhem vesimlah. deuteronomy 10:19	va'ahabtem 'et hager ki geirim heyitem be'erez mizrayim. deuteronomy 10:20	'et yhvh 'elohekha tira 'oto ta'abod ubo tidbaq ubishmo tishabeia'. deuteronomy 10:21	hu tehilatekha vehu 'elohekha 'asher 'asah 'itekha 'et hagedolot ve'et hanora'ot ha'eleh 'asher ra'u 'einekha. deuteronomy 10:22	beshib'im nefesh yaredu 'abotekha mizrayemah ve'atah samekha yhvh 'elohekha kekhokhbei hashamayim larob. deuteronomy 11:1	ve'ahabta 'et yhvh 'elohekha veshamarta mishmarto vekhuqotav umishpatav umizvotav kal hayamim. deuteronomy 11:2	vida'tem hayom ki lo 'et beneikhem 'asher lo yade'u va'asher lo ra'u 'et musar yhvh 'eloheikhem 'et gadelo 'et yado hakhazaqah uzero'o hanetuyah. deuteronomy 11:3	ve'et 'ototav ve'et ma'asav 'asher 'asah betokh mizrayim lefar'oh melekh mizrayim ulekhal 'arzo. deuteronomy 11:4	va'asher 'asah lekhel mizrayim lesusav ulerikhbo 'asher heizif 'et mei yam suf 'al peneihem beradefam 'akhareikhem vai'abedem yhvh 'ad hayom hazeh. deuteronomy 11:5	va'asher 'asah lakhem bamidbar 'ad bo'akhem 'ad hamaqom hazeh. deuteronomy 11:6	va'asher 'asah ledatan vela'abiram benei 'eli'ab ben re'uben 'asher pazetah ha'arez 'et piha vatibla'em ve'et bateihem ve'et 'aholeihem ve'et kal hayqum 'asher beragleihem beqereb kal yisra'el. deuteronomy 11:7	ki 'eineikhem haro'ot 'et kal ma'aseh yhvh hagadol 'asher 'asah. deuteronomy 11:8	ushemartem 'et kal hamizvah 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom lema'an tekhezqu ubatem virishtem 'et ha'arez 'asher 'atem 'oberim shamah lerishtah. deuteronomy 11:9	ulema'an ta'arikhu yamim 'al ha'adamah 'asher nishba' yhvh la'aboteikhem latet lahem ulezar'am 'erez zabat khalab udebash. deuteronomy 11:10	ki ha'arez 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah lo khe'erez mizrayim hi 'asher yezatem misham 'asher tizra' 'et zar'akha vehishqita beraglekha kegan hayaraq. deuteronomy 11:11	veha'arez 'asher 'atem 'oberim shamah lerishtah 'erez harim ubeqa'ot limtar hashamayim tishteh mayim. deuteronomy 11:12	'erez 'asher yhvh 'elohekha doresh 'otah tamid 'einei yhvh 'elohekha bah meireishit hashanah ve'ad 'akharit shanah. deuteronomy 11:13	vehayah 'im shamoa' tishme'u 'el mizvotai 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom le'ahabah 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem ule'abedo bekhal lebabkhem ubekhal nafshekhem. deuteronomy 11:14	venatati metar 'arzekhem be'ito yoreh umalqosh ve'asafta deganekha vetiroshekha veyizharekha. deuteronomy 11:15	venatati 'eiseb besadekha libhemtekha ve'akhalta vesaba'eta. deuteronomy 11:16	hishameru lakhem pen yifteh lebabkhem vesartem va'abadtem 'elohim 'akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem. deuteronomy 11:17	vekharah 'af yhvh bakhem ve'azar 'et hashamayim velo yihyeh matar veha'adamah lo titen 'et yebulah va'abadtem meheirah mei'al ha'arez hatobah 'asher yhvh noten lakhem. deuteronomy 11:18	vesamtem 'et debarai 'eleh 'al lebabkhem ve'al nafshekhem uqeshartem 'otam le'ot 'al yedkhem vehayu letotafot ben 'eineikhem. deuteronomy 11:19	velimadtem 'otam 'et beneikhem ledaber bam beshibtekha bebeitekha ubelekhtekha baderekh ubeshakhebekha ubequmekha. deuteronomy 11:20	ukhetabtam 'al mezuzot beitekha ubish'arekha. deuteronomy 11:21	lema'an yirbu yemeikhem vimei beneikhem 'al ha'adamah 'asher nishba' yhvh la'aboteikhem latet lahem kimei hashamayim 'al ha'arez. deuteronomy 11:22	ki 'im shamor tishmerun 'et kal hamizvah hazot 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem la'asotah le'ahabah 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem lalekhet bekhal derakhav uledabeqah bo. deuteronomy 11:23	vehorish yhvh 'et kal hagoyim ha'eleh milifneikhem virishtem goyim gedolim va'azumim mikem. deuteronomy 11:24	kal hamaqom 'asher tidrokh kaf raglekhem bo lakhem yihyeh min hamidbar vehalebanon min hanahar nehar perat ve'ad hayam ha'akharon yihyeh gebulkhem. deuteronomy 11:25	lo yityazeb 'ish bifneikhem pakhdekhem umora'akhem yiten yhvh 'eloheikhem 'al penei khal ha'arez 'asher tidrekhu bah ka'asher diber lakhem. deuteronomy 11:26	re'eh 'anokhi noten lifneikhem hayom berakhah uqelalah. deuteronomy 11:27	'et haberakhah 'asher tishme'u 'el mizvot yhvh 'eloheikhem 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom. deuteronomy 11:28	vehaqelalah 'im lo tishme'u 'el mizvot yhvh 'eloheikhem vesartem min haderekh 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom lalekhet 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'tem. deuteronomy 11:29	vehayah ki yebi'akha yhvh 'elohekha 'el ha'arez 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah venatatah 'et haberakhah 'al har gerizim ve'et haqelalah 'al har 'eibal. deuteronomy 11:30	halo hemah be'eiber hayarden 'akharei derekh mebo hashemesh be'erez hakena'ani hayosheb ba'arabah mul hagilgal 'eizel 'eilonei moreh. deuteronomy 11:31	ki 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden labo lareshet 'et ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'eloheikhem noten lakhem virishtem 'otah vishabtem bah. deuteronomy 11:32	ushemartem la'asot 'et kal hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim 'asher 'anokhi noten lifneikhem hayom. deuteronomy 12:1	'eleh hakhuqim vehamishpatim 'asher tishmerun la'asot ba'arez 'asher natan yhvh 'elohei 'abotekha lekha lerishtah kal hayamim 'asher 'atem khayim 'al ha'adamah. deuteronomy 12:2	'abed te'abedun 'et kal hameqomot 'asher 'abedu sham hagoyim 'asher 'atem yoreshim 'otam 'et 'eloheihem 'al heharim haramim ve'al hageba'ot vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan deuteronomy 12:3	venitaztem 'et mizbkhotam veshibartem 'et mazeibotam va'asheireihem tisrefun ba'esh ufesilei 'eloheihem tegadei'un ve'ibadtem 'et shemam min hamaqom hahu. deuteronomy 12:4	lo ta'asun ken yhvh 'eloheikhem. deuteronomy 12:5	ki 'im 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'eloheikhem mikal shibteikhem lasum 'et shemo sham leshikhno tidreshu ubata shamah. deuteronomy 12:6	vahabeitem shamah 'oloteikhem vezibkheikhem ve'et ma'seroteikhem ve'et terumat yedkhem venidreikhem venidboteikhem ubekhorot beqarkhem vezonekhem. deuteronomy 12:7	va'akhaltem sham lifnei yhvh 'eloheikhem usemakhtem bekhol mishlakh yedkhem 'atem ubateikhem 'asher beirakhkha yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 12:8	lo ta'asun kekhol 'asher 'anakhnu 'osim poh hayom 'ish kal hayashar be'einav. deuteronomy 12:9	ki lo batem 'ad 'atah 'el hamenukhah ve'el hanakhalah 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lakh. deuteronomy 12:10	va'abartem 'et hayarden vishabtem ba'arez 'asher yhvh 'eloheikhem mankhil 'etkhem veheiniakh lakhem mikal 'oyebeikhem misabib vishabtem betakh. deuteronomy 12:11	vehayah hamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'eloheikhem bo leshaken shemo sham shamah tabi'u 'et kal 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem 'oloteikhem vezibkheikhem ma'seroteikhem uterumat yedkhem vekhol mibkhar nidreikhem 'asher tideru yhvh. deuteronomy 12:12	usemakhtem lifnei yhvh 'eloheikhem 'atem ubeneikhem ubenoteikhem ve'abdeikhem ve'amhoteikhem vehaleivi 'asher besha'areikhem ki 'en lo kheileq venakhalah 'itekhem. deuteronomy 12:13	hishamer lekha pen ta'aleh 'olotekha bekhal maqom 'asher tir'eh. deuteronomy 12:14	ki 'im bamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh be'akhad shebatekha sham ta'aleh 'olotekha vesham ta'aseh kol 'asher 'anokhi mezaveka. deuteronomy 12:15	raq bekhal 'avat nafshekha tizbakh ve'akhalta basar kebirkat yhvh 'elohekha 'asher natan lekha bekhal she'arekha hatamei vehatahor yokhelenu kazebi vekha'ayal. deuteronomy 12:16	raq hadam lo tokheilu 'al ha'arez tishpekhenu kamayim. deuteronomy 12:17	lo tukhal le'ekhol bish'arekha ma'sar deganekha vetiroshekha veyizharekha ubekhorot beqarekha vezonekha vekhal nedarekha 'asher tidor venidbotekha uterumat yadekha. deuteronomy 12:18	ki 'im lifnei yhvh 'elohekha tokhelenu bamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'elohekha bo 'atah ubinkha ubitekha ve'abdekha va'amatekha vehaleivi 'asher bish'arekha vesamakhta lifnei yhvh 'elohekha bekhol mishlakh yadekha. deuteronomy 12:19	hishamer lekha pen ta'azob 'et haleivi kal yamekha 'al 'admatekha. deuteronomy 12:20	ki yarkhib yhvh 'elohekha 'et gebulekha ka'asher diber lakh ve'amarta 'okhelah basar ki te'aveh nafshekha le'ekhol basar bekhal 'avat nafshekha tokhal basar. deuteronomy 12:21	ki yirkhaq mimekha hamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'elohekha lasum shemo sham vezabakhta mibeqarekha umizonekha 'asher natan yhvh lekha ka'asher zivitikha ve'akhalta bish'arekha bekhol 'avat nafshekha. deuteronomy 12:22	'akh ka'asher yei'akhel 'et hazebi ve'et ha'ayal ken tokhelenu hatamei vehatahor yakhdav yokhelenu. deuteronomy 12:23	raq khazaq lebilti 'akhol hadam ki hadam hu hanafesh velo tokhal hanefesh 'im habasar. deuteronomy 12:24	lo tokhelenu 'al ha'arez tishpekhenu kamayim. deuteronomy 12:25	lo tokhelenu lema'an yitab lekha ulebanekha 'akharekha ki ta'aseh hayashar be'einei yhvh. deuteronomy 12:26	raq qadashekha 'asher yihyu lekha unedarekha tisa ubata 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh. deuteronomy 12:27	ve'asita 'olotekha habasar vehadam 'al mizbakh yhvh 'elohekha vedam zebakhekha yishafekh 'al mizbakh yhvh 'elohekha vehabasar tokhel. deuteronomy 12:28	shemor veshama'ta 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh 'asher 'anokhi mezaveka lema'an yitab lekha ulebanekha 'akharekha 'ad 'olam ki ta'aseh hatob vehayashar be'einei yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 12:29	ki yakhrit yhvh 'elohekha 'et hagoyim 'asher 'atah ba shamah lareshet 'otam mipanekha veyarashta 'otam veyashabta be'arzam. deuteronomy 12:30	hishamer lekha pen tinaqesh 'akhareihem 'akharei hishamedam mipanekha ufen tidrosh leiloheihem leimor 'eikhah ya'abdu hagoyim ha'eleh 'et 'eloheihem ve'e'eseh ken gam 'ani. deuteronomy 12:31	lo ta'aseh khen yhvh 'elohekha ki kal to'abat yhvh 'asher sanei 'asu leiloheihem ki gam 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem yisrefu ba'esh leiloheihem. deuteronomy 12:32	'et kal hadabar 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem 'oto tishmeru la'asot lo tosef 'alav velo tigra' mimenu. deuteronomy 13:1	ki yaqum beqirbekha nabi 'o kholem khalom venatan 'eilekha 'ot 'o mofet. deuteronomy 13:2	uba ha'ot vehamofet 'asher diber 'eilekha leimor neilekhah 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'tam vena'abedem. deuteronomy 13:3	lo tishma' 'el dibrei hanabi hahu 'o 'el kholem hakhalom hahu ki menaseh yhvh 'eloheikhem 'etkhem lada'at hayishkhem 'ohabim 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem bekhal lebabkhem ubekhal nafshekhem. deuteronomy 13:4	'akharei yhvh 'eloheikhem teileikhu ve'oto tira'u ve'et mizvotav tishmoru ubeqolo tishma'u ve'oto ta'abodu ubo tidbaqun. deuteronomy 13:5	vehanabi hahu 'o kholem hakhalom hahu yumat ki diber sarah 'al yhvh 'eloheikhem hamozi 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim vehapodekha mibet 'abadim lehadikhakha min haderekh 'asher zivekha yhvh 'elohekha lalekhet bah ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. deuteronomy 13:6	ki yesitekha 'akhikha ben 'imekha 'o binkha 'o bitekha 'o 'eishet kheiqekha 'o rei'akha 'asher kenafshekha baseiter leimor neilekhah vena'abdah 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yada'ta 'atah va'abotekha. deuteronomy 13:7	mei'elohei ha'amim 'asher sebiboteikhem haqerobim 'eilekha 'o harekhoqim mimeka miqzeh ha'arez ve'ad qezeh ha'arez. deuteronomy 13:8	lo tobeh lo velo tishma' 'eilav velo takhos 'einekha 'alav velo takhmol velo tekhaseh 'alav. deuteronomy 13:9	ki harog tahargenu yadekha tihyeh bo barishonah lahamito veyad kal ha'am ba'akharonah. deuteronomy 13:10	useqalto ba'abanim vamet ki biqesh lehadikhakha mei'al yhvh 'elohekha hamozi'akha mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim. deuteronomy 13:11	vekhal yisra'el yishme'u veyira'un velo yosifu la'asot kadabar hara' hazeh beqirbekha. deuteronomy 13:12	ki tishma' be'akhat 'arekha 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha lashebet sham leimor. deuteronomy 13:13	yaze'u 'anashim benei beliya'al miqirbekha vayadikhu 'et yoshebei 'iram leimor neilekhah vena'abdah 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'tem. deuteronomy 13:14	vedarashta vekhaqarta vesha'alta heiteb vehineh 'emet nakhon hadabar ne'estah hato'eibah hazot beqirbekha. deuteronomy 13:15	hakeh takeh 'et yoshebei ha'ir hahu hahi lefi khareb hakharem 'otah ve'et kal 'asher bah ve'et behemtah lefi khareb. deuteronomy 13:16	ve'et kal shelalah tiqboz 'el tokh rekhobah vesarafta ba'esh 'et ha'ir ve'et kal shelalah kalil yhvh 'elohekha vehayetah tel 'olam lo tibaneh 'od. deuteronomy 13:17	velo yidbaq beyadekha me'umah min hakheirem lema'an yashub yhvh meikharon 'apo venatan lekha rakhamim verikhamkha vehirbekha ka'asher nishba' la'abotekha. deuteronomy 13:18	ki tishma' beqol yhvh 'elohekha lishmor 'et kal mizvotav 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom la'asot hayashar be'einei yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 14:1	banim 'atem yhvh 'eloheikhem lo titgodedu velo tasimu qarekhah ben 'eineikhem lamet. deuteronomy 14:2	ki 'am qadosh 'atah yhvh 'elohekha ubekha bakhar yhvh lihyot lo le'am segulah mikol ha'amim 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah. deuteronomy 14:3	lo tokhal kal to'eibah. deuteronomy 14:4	zot habeheimah 'asher tokheilu shor seh khesabim veseh 'izim. deuteronomy 14:5	'ayal uzebi veyakhmur ve'aqo vedishon ute'o vazamer. deuteronomy 14:6	vekhal beheimah mafreset parsah veshosa'at shesa' shetei ferasot ma'alat geirah babeheimah 'otah tokheilu. deuteronomy 14:7	'akh 'et zeh lo tokhelu mima'alei hageirah umimafrisei haparsah hashesu'ah 'et hagamal ve'et ha'arnebet ve'et hashafan ki ma'aleh geirah hemah ufarsah lo hifrisu temei'im hem lakhem. deuteronomy 14:8	ve'et hakhazir ki mafris parsah hu velo geirah tamei hu lakhem mibesaram lo tokheilu ubeniblatam lo tiga'u. deuteronomy 14:9	'et zeh tokhelu mikol 'asher bamayim kol 'asher lo senapir veqasqeset tokheilu. deuteronomy 14:10	vekhol 'asher 'en lo senapir veqasqeset lo tokheilu tamei hu lakhem. deuteronomy 14:11	kal zipor tehorah tokheilu. deuteronomy 14:12	vezeh 'asher lo tokhelu meihem hanesher vehaperes veha'azeniyah. deuteronomy 14:13	vehara'ah ve'et ha'ayah vehadayah leminah. deuteronomy 14:14	ve'et kal 'oreb lemino. deuteronomy 14:15	ve'et bat haya'anah ve'et hatakhmas ve'et hashakhaf ve'et hanez lemineihu. deuteronomy 14:16	'et hakos ve'et hayanshuf vehatinshamet. deuteronomy 14:17	vehaqa'at ve'et harakhamah ve'et hashalakh. deuteronomy 14:18	vehakhasidah veha'anafah leminah vehadukhifat veha'atalef. deuteronomy 14:19	vekhol sherez ha'of tamei hu lakhem lo yei'akheilu. deuteronomy 14:20	kal 'of tahor tokheilu. deuteronomy 14:21	lo tokhelu khal nebeilah lager 'asher bish'arekha titenenah va'akhalah 'o makhor lenakheri ki 'am qadosh 'atah yhvh 'elohekha lo tebashel gedi bakhaleb 'imo. deuteronomy 14:22	'aser te'aser 'et kal tebu'at zar'ekha hayozei hasadeh shanah shanah. deuteronomy 14:23	ve'akhalta lifnei yhvh 'elohekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar leshaken shemo sham ma'sar deganekha tiroshekha veyizharekha ubekhorot beqarekha vezonekha lema'an tilmad leyir'ah 'et yhvh 'elohekha kal hayamim. deuteronomy 14:24	vekhi yirbeh mimekha haderekh ki lo tukhal se'eito ki yirkhaq mimekha hamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'elohekha lasum shemo sham ki yebarekhkha yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 14:25	venatatah bakasef vezarta hakesef beyadekha vehalakhta 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'elohekha bo. deuteronomy 14:26	venatatah hakesef bekhol 'asher te'aveh nafshekha babaqar ubazon ubayayin ubasheikhar ubekhol 'asher tish'alekha nafshekha ve'akhalta sham lifnei yhvh 'elohekha vesamakhta 'atah ubeitekha. deuteronomy 14:27	vehaleivi 'asher bish'arekha lo ta'azbenu ki 'en lo kheileq venakhalah 'imakh. deuteronomy 14:28	miqzeh shalosh shanim tozi 'et kal ma'sar tebu'atekha bashanah hahiv vehinakhta bish'arekha. deuteronomy 14:29	uba haleivi ki 'en lo kheileq venakhalah 'imakh vehager vehayatom veha'almanah 'asher bish'arekha ve'akhelu vesabei'u lema'an yebarekhkha yhvh 'elohekha bekhal ma'aseh yadekha 'asher ta'aseh. deuteronomy 15:1	miqez sheba' shanim ta'aseh shemitah. deuteronomy 15:2	vezeh debar hashemitah shamot kal ba'al masheh yado 'asher yasheh berei'eihu lo yigos 'et rei'eihu ve'et 'akhiv ki qara shemitah yhvh. deuteronomy 15:3	'et hanakheri tigos va'asher yihyeh lekha 'et 'akhikha tashmet yadekha. deuteronomy 15:4	'efes ki lo yihyeh bekha 'ebyon ki barekh yebarekhkha yhvh ba'arez 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah lerishtah. deuteronomy 15:5	raq 'im shamoa' tishma' beqol yhvh 'elohekha lishmor la'asot 'et kal hamizvah hazot 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom. deuteronomy 15:6	ki yhvh 'elohekha beirakhkha ka'asher diber lakh veha'abata goyim rabim ve'atah lo ta'abot umashalta begoyim rabim ubekha lo yimsholu. deuteronomy 15:7	ki yihyeh bekha 'ebyon mei'akhad 'akhekha be'akhad she'arekha be'arzekha 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lakh lo te'amez 'et lebabekha velo tiqpoz 'et yadekha mei'akhikha ha'ebyon. deuteronomy 15:8	ki fatoakh tiftakh 'et yadekha lo veha'abet ta'abitenu dei makhsoro 'asher yekhsar lo. deuteronomy 15:9	hishamer lekha pen yihyeh dabar 'im lebabekha beliya'al leimor qarebah shenat hasheba' shenat hashemitah vera'ah 'einekha be'akhikha ha'ebyon velo titen lo veqara 'alekha 'el yhvh vehayah bekha khet. deuteronomy 15:10	naton titen lo velo yeira' lebabekha betitekha lo ki biglal hadabar hazeh yebarekhkha yhvh 'elohekha bekhal ma'asekha ubekhol mishlakh yadekha. deuteronomy 15:11	ki lo yekhdal 'ebyon miqereb ha'arez 'al ken 'anokhi mezavekha leimor patoakh tiftakh 'et yadekha le'akhikha la'aniyekha ule'ebyonekha be'arzekha. deuteronomy 15:12	ki yimakher lekha 'akhikha ha'ibri 'o ha'ibriyah va'abadekha shesh shanim ubashanah hashebi'it teshalekhenu khafeshi mei'imakh. deuteronomy 15:13	vekhi teshalekhenu khafeshi mei'imakh lo teshalekhenu reiqam. deuteronomy 15:14	ha'aneq ta'aniq lo mizonekha umigarenekha umiyiqbekha 'asher beirakhkha yhvh 'elohekha titen lo. deuteronomy 15:15	vezakharta ki 'ebed hayita be'erez mizrayim vayifdekha yhvh 'elohekha 'al ken 'anokhi mezavekha 'et hadabar hazeh hayom. deuteronomy 15:16	vehayah ki yomar 'eilekha lo 'eizei mei'imakh ki 'aheibekha ve'et beitekha ki tob lo 'imakh. deuteronomy 15:17	velaqakhta 'et hamarzeia' venatatah be'azeno ubadelet vehayah lekha 'ebed 'olam ve'af la'amatekha ta'aseh ken. deuteronomy 15:18	lo yiqsheh be'einekha beshaleikhakha 'oto khafeshi mei'imakh ki mishneh sekhar sakhir 'abadekha shesh shanim ubeirakhkha yhvh 'elohekha bekhol 'asher ta'aseh. deuteronomy 15:19	kal habekhor 'asher yivaled bibqarekha ubezonekha hazakhar taqdish yhvh 'elohekha lo ta'abod bibkhor shorekha velo tagoz bekhor zonekha. deuteronomy 15:20	lifnei yhvh 'elohekha tokhalenu shanah beshanah bamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'atah ubeitekha. deuteronomy 15:21	vekhi yihyeh bo mum piseiakh 'o 'iver kol mum ra' lo tizbakhenu yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 15:22	bish'arekha tokhalenu hatamei vehatahor yakhdav kazebi vekha'ayal. deuteronomy 15:23	raq 'et damo lo tokhel 'al ha'arez tishpekhenu kamayim. deuteronomy 16:1	shamor 'et khodesh ha'abib ve'asita pesakh yhvh 'elohekha ki bekhodesh ha'abib hozi'akha yhvh 'elohekha mimizrayim layelah. deuteronomy 16:2	vezabakhta pesakh yhvh 'elohekha zon ubaqar bamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh leshaken shemo sham. deuteronomy 16:3	lo tokhal 'alav khamez shib'at yamim tokhal 'alav mazot lekhem 'oni ki bekhipazon yazata mei'erez mizrayim lema'an tizkor 'et yom zeitekha mei'erez mizrayim kol yemei khayekha. deuteronomy 16:4	velo yeira'eh lekha se'or bekhal gebulkha shib'at yamim velo yalin min habasar 'asher tizbakh ba'ereb bayom harishon laboqer. deuteronomy 16:5	lo tukhal lizboakh 'et hapasakh be'akhad she'arekha 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lakh. deuteronomy 16:6	ki 'im 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'elohekha leshaken shemo sham tizbakh 'et hapesakh ba'areb kebo hashemesh mo'ed zeitekha mimizrayim. deuteronomy 16:7	ubishalta ve'akhalta bamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'elohekha bo ufanita baboqer vehalakhta le'ohalekha. deuteronomy 16:8	sheishet yamim tokhal mazot ubayom hashebi'i 'azeret yhvh 'elohekha lo ta'aseh melakhah. deuteronomy 16:9	shib'ah shabu'ot tispar lakh meihakhel khermesh baqamah takhel lispor shib'ah shabu'ot. deuteronomy 16:10	ve'asita khag shabu'ot yhvh 'elohekha misat nidbat yadekha 'asher titen ka'asher yebarekhkha yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 16:11	vesamakhta lifnei yhvh 'elohekha 'atah ubinkha ubitekha ve'abdekha va'amatekha vehaleivi 'asher bish'arekha vehager vehayatom veha'almanah 'asher beqirbekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'elohekha leshaken shemo sham. deuteronomy 16:12	vezakharta ki 'ebed hayita bemizrayim veshamarta ve'asita 'et hakhuqim ha'eleh. deuteronomy 16:13	khag hasukot ta'aseh lekha shib'at yamim be'asepekha migarenekha umiyiqbekha. deuteronomy 16:14	vesamakhta bekhagekha 'atah ubinkha ubitekha ve'abdekha va'amatekha vehaleivi vehager vehayatom veha'almanah 'asher bish'arekha. deuteronomy 16:15	shib'at yamim takhog yhvh 'elohekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh ki yebarekhkha yhvh 'elohekha bekhol tebu'atekha ubekhol ma'aseh yadekha vehayita 'akh sameiakh. deuteronomy 16:16	shalosh pe'amim bashanah yeira'eh khal zekhurekha 'et penei yhvh 'elohekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar bekhag hamazot ubekhag hashabu'ot ubekhag hasukot velo yeira'eh 'et penei yhvh reiqam. deuteronomy 16:17	'ish kematenat yado kebirkat yhvh 'elohekha 'asher natan lakh. deuteronomy 16:18	shofetim veshoterim titen lekha bekhal she'arekha 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha lishbatekha veshafetu 'et ha'am mishpat zedeq. deuteronomy 16:19	lo tateh mishpat lo takir panim velo tiqakh shokhad ki hashokhad ye'aver 'einei khakhamim visalef dibrei zadiqim. deuteronomy 16:20	zedeq zedeq tirdof lema'an tikhyeh veyarashta 'et ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lakh. deuteronomy 16:21	lo tita' lekha 'asheirah kal 'ez 'eizel mizbakh yhvh 'elohekha 'asher ta'aseh lakh. deuteronomy 16:22	velo taqim lekha mazeibah 'asher sanei yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 17:1	lo tizbakh yhvh 'elohekha shor vaseh 'asher yihyeh bo mum kol dabar ra' ki to'abat yhvh 'elohekha hu. deuteronomy 17:2	ki yimazei beqirbekha be'akhad she'arekha 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lakh 'ish 'o 'ishah 'asher ya'aseh 'et hara' be'einei yhvh 'elohekha la'abor berito. deuteronomy 17:3	vayeilekh vaya'abod 'elohim 'akheirim vayishtakhu lahem velashemesh 'o layareiakh 'o lekhal zeba hashamayim 'asher lo ziviti. deuteronomy 17:4	vehugad lekha veshama'eta vedarashta heiteb vehineh 'emet nakhon hadabar ne'estah hato'eibah hazot beyisra'el. deuteronomy 17:5	vehozeita 'et ha'ish hahu 'o 'et ha'ishah hahiv 'asher 'asu 'et hadabar hara' hazeh 'el she'arekha 'et ha'ish 'o 'et ha'ishah useqaltam ba'abanim vameitu. deuteronomy 17:6	'al pi shenayim 'eidim 'o sheloshah 'eidim yumat hamet lo yumat 'al pi 'ed 'ekhad. deuteronomy 17:7	yad ha'eidim tihyeh bo barishonah lahamito veyad kal ha'am ba'akharonah ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. deuteronomy 17:8	ki yipalei mimekha dabar lamishpat ben dam ledam ben din ledin uben nega' lanega' dibrei ribot bish'arekha veqamta ve'alita 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'elohekha bo. deuteronomy 17:9	ubata 'el hakohanim halviyim ve'el hashofet 'asher yihyeh bayamim hahem vedarashta vehigidu lekha 'et debar hamishpat. deuteronomy 17:10	ve'asita 'al pi hadabar 'asher yagidu lekha min hamaqom hahu 'asher yibkhar yhvh veshamarta la'asot kekhol 'asher yorukha. deuteronomy 17:11	'al pi hatorah 'asher yorukha ve'al hamishpat 'asher yomeru lekha ta'aseh lo tasur min hadabar 'asher yagidu lekha yamin usemol. deuteronomy 17:12	veha'ish 'asher ya'aseh bezadon lebilti shemoa' 'el hakohen ha'omed lesharet sham 'et yhvh 'elohekha 'o 'el hashofet umet ha'ish hahu ubi'arta hara' miyisra'el. deuteronomy 17:13	vekhal ha'am yishme'u veyira'u velo yezidun 'od. deuteronomy 17:14	ki tabo 'el ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lakh virishtah veyashabtah bah ve'amarta 'asimah 'alai melekh kekhal hagoyim 'asher sebibotai. deuteronomy 17:15	som tasim 'alekha melekh 'asher yibkhar yhvh 'elohekha bo miqereb 'akhekha tasim 'alekha melekh lo tukhal latet 'alekha 'ish nakheri 'asher lo 'akhikha hu. deuteronomy 17:16	raq lo yarbeh lo susim velo yashib 'et ha'am mizraymah lema'an harbot sus yhvh 'amar lakhem lo tosifun lashub baderekh hazeh 'od. deuteronomy 17:17	velo yarbeh lo nashim velo yasur lebabo vekhesef vezahab lo yarbeh lo me'od. deuteronomy 17:18	vehayah kheshibto 'al kisei mamlakhto vekhatab lo 'et mishneh hatorah hazot 'al seifer milifnei hakohanim halviyim deuteronomy 17:19	vehayetah 'imo veqara bo kal yemei khayav lema'an yilmad leyir'ah 'et yhvh 'elohav lishmor 'et kal dibrei hatorah hazot ve'et hakhuqim ha'eleh la'asotam. deuteronomy 17:20	lebilti rum lebabo mei'ekhav ulebilti sur min hamizvah yamin usemol lema'an ya'arikh yamim 'al mamlakhto hu ubanav beqereb yisra'el. deuteronomy 18:1	lo yihyeh lakohanim halviyim kal sheibet leivi kheileq venakhalah 'im yisra'el 'ishei yhvh venakhalato yokheilun. deuteronomy 18:2	venakhalah lo yihyeh lo beqereb 'ekhav yhvh hu nakhalato ka'asher diber lo. deuteronomy 18:3	vezeh yihyeh mishpat hakohanim mei'et ha'am mei'et zobekhei hazebakh 'im shor 'im seh venatan lakohen hazeroa' vehalekhayayim vehaqeibah. deuteronomy 18:4	reishit deganekha tiroshekha veyizharekha vereishit gez zonekha titen lo deuteronomy 18:5	ki bo bakhar yhvh 'elohekha mikal shebatekha la'amod lesharet beshem yhvh hu ubanav kal hayamim. deuteronomy 18:6	vekhi yabo haleivi mei'akhad she'arekha mikal yisra'el 'asher hu gar sham uba bekhal 'avat nafsho 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar yhvh. deuteronomy 18:7	vesheiret beshem yhvh 'elohav kekhal 'ekhav halviyim ha'omedim sham lifnei yhvh. deuteronomy 18:8	kheileq kekheileq yokheilu lebad mimkarav 'al ha'abot. deuteronomy 18:9	ki 'atah ba 'el ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lakh lo tilmad la'asot keto'abot hagoyim hahem. deuteronomy 18:10	lo yimazei bekha ma'abir beno ubito ba'esh qosem qesamim me'onen umenakhesh umekhashef. deuteronomy 18:11	vekhober khaber vesho'el 'ob veyide'oni vedoresh 'el hameitim. deuteronomy 18:12	ki to'abat yhvh kal 'oseh 'eleh ubiglal hato'eibot ha'eleh yhvh 'elohekha morish 'otam mipanekha. deuteronomy 18:13	tamim tihyeh 'im yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 18:14	ki hagoyim ha'eleh 'asher 'atah yoresh 'otam 'el me'onenim ve'el qosemim yishma'u ve'atah lo khen natan lekha yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 18:15	nabi miqirbekha mei'akhekha kamoni yaqim lekha yhvh 'elohekha 'eilav tishma'un. deuteronomy 18:16	kekhol 'asher sha'alta mei'im yhvh 'elohekha bekhoreb beyom haqahal leimor lo 'osef lishmoa' 'et qol yhvh 'elohai ve'et ha'esh hagedolah hazot lo 'er'eh 'od velo 'amut. deuteronomy 18:17	vayomer yhvh 'eilai heitibu 'asher dibeiru. deuteronomy 18:18	nabi 'aqim lahem miqereb 'akheihem kamokha venatati debarai befiv vediber 'aleihem 'et kal 'asher 'azavenu. deuteronomy 18:19	vehayah ha'ish 'asher lo yishma' 'el debarai 'asher yedaber bishmi 'anokhi 'edrosh mei'imo. deuteronomy 18:20	'akh hanabi 'asher yazid ledaber dabar bishmi 'et 'asher lo zivitiv ledaber va'asher yedaber beshem 'elohim 'akheirim umet hanabi hahu. deuteronomy 18:21	vekhi tomar bilbabekha 'eikhah neida' 'et hadabar 'asher lo dibero yhvh. deuteronomy 18:22	'asher yedaber hanabi beshem yhvh velo yihyeh hadabar velo yabo hu hadabar 'asher lo dibero yhvh bezadon dibero hanabi lo tagur mimenu. deuteronomy 19:1	ki yakhrit yhvh 'elohekha 'et hagoyim 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha 'et 'arzam virishtam veyashabta be'areihem ubebateihem. deuteronomy 19:2	shalosh 'arim tabdil lakh betokh 'arzekha 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha lerishtah. deuteronomy 19:3	takhin lekha haderekh veshilashta 'et gebul 'arzekha 'asher yankhilekha yhvh 'elohekha vehayah lanus shamah kal rozeiakh. deuteronomy 19:4	vezeh debar harozeiakh 'asher yanus shamah vakhai 'asher yakeh 'et rei'eihu bibli da'at vehu lo sonei lo mitemol shilshom. deuteronomy 19:5	va'asher yabo 'et rei'eihu baya'ar lakhtob 'eizim venidekhah yado bagarzen likhrot ha'ez venashal habarzel min ha'ez umaza 'et rei'eihu vamet hu yanus 'el 'akhat he'arim ha'eleh vakhai. deuteronomy 19:6	pen yirdof go'el hadam 'akharei harozeiakh ki yeikham lebabo vehisigo ki yirbeh haderekh vehikahu nafesh velo 'en mishpat mavet ki lo sonei hu lo mitemol shilshom. deuteronomy 19:7	'al ken 'anokhi mezavekha leimor shalosh 'arim tabdil lakh. deuteronomy 19:8	ve'im yarkhib yhvh 'elohekha 'et gebulkha ka'asher nishba' la'abotekha venatan lekha 'et kal ha'arez 'asher diber latet la'abotekha. deuteronomy 19:9	ki tishmor 'et kal hamizvah hazot la'asotah 'asher 'anokhi mezavekha hayom le'ahabah 'et yhvh 'elohekha velalekhet bidrakhav kal hayamim veyasafta lekha 'od shalosh 'arim 'al hashalosh ha'eleh. deuteronomy 19:10	velo yishafekh dam naqi beqereb 'arzekha 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah vehayah 'alekha damim. deuteronomy 19:11	vekhi yihyeh 'ish sonei lerei'eihu ve'arab lo veqam 'alav vehikahu nefesh vamet venas 'el 'akhat he'arim ha'el. deuteronomy 19:12	veshalekhu ziqnei 'iro velaqekhu 'oto misham venatenu 'oto beyad go'el hadam vamet. deuteronomy 19:13	lo takhos 'einekha 'alav ubi'arta dam hanaqi miyisra'el vetob lakh. deuteronomy 19:14	lo tasig gebul rei'akha 'asher gabelu rishonim benakhalatekha 'asher tinkhal ba'arez 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha lerishtah. deuteronomy 19:15	lo yaqum 'ed 'ekhad be'ish lekhal 'avon ulekhal khatat bekhal khet 'asher yekheta 'al pi shenei 'eidim 'o 'al pi sheloshah 'eidim yaqum dabar. deuteronomy 19:16	ki yaqum 'ed khamas be'ish la'anot bo sarah. deuteronomy 19:17	ve'amedu shenei ha'anashim 'asher lahem harib lifnei yhvh lifnei hakohanim vehashofetim 'asher yihyu bayamim hahem. deuteronomy 19:18	vedareshu hashofetim heiteb vehineh 'ed sheqer ha'ed sheqer 'anah be'akhiv. deuteronomy 19:19	va'asitem lo ka'asher zamam la'asot le'akhiv ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. deuteronomy 19:20	vehanish'arim yishme'u veyira'u velo yosifu la'asot 'od kadabar hara' hazeh beqirbekha. deuteronomy 19:21	velo takhos 'einekha nefesh benefesh 'ayin be'ayin shen beshen yad beyad regel beragel. deuteronomy 20:1	ki teizei lamilkhamah 'al 'oyebekha vera'ita sus varekheb 'am rab mimekha lo tira meihem ki yhvh 'elohekha 'imakh hama'alkha mei'erez mizrayim. deuteronomy 20:2	vehayah keqarabekhem 'el hamilkhamah venigash hakohen vediber 'el ha'am. deuteronomy 20:3	ve'amar 'aleihem shema' yisra'el 'atem qereibim hayom lamilkhamah 'al 'oyebeikhem 'al yeirakh lebabkhem 'al tire'u ve'al takhpezu ve'al ta'arzu mipeneihem. deuteronomy 20:4	ki yhvh 'eloheikhem haholekh 'imakhem lehilakhem lakhem 'im 'oyebeikhem lehoshia' 'etkhem. deuteronomy 20:5	vediberu hashoterim 'el ha'am leimor mi ha'ish 'asher banah bayit khadash velo khanakho yeilekh veyashob lebeito pen yamut bamilkhamah ve'ish 'akher yakhnekhenu. deuteronomy 20:6	umi ha'ish 'asher nata' kerem velo khilelo yeilekh veyashob lebeito pen yamut bamilkhamah ve'ish 'akher yekhalelenu. deuteronomy 20:7	umi ha'ish 'asher 'eiras 'ishah velo leqakhah yeilekh veyashob lebeito pen yamut bamilkhamah ve'ish 'akher yiqakhenah. deuteronomy 20:8	veyasefu hashoterim ledaber 'el ha'am ve'ameru mi ha'ish hayarei verakh haleibab yeilekh veyashob lebeito velo yimas 'et lebab 'ekhav kilbabo. deuteronomy 20:9	vehayah kekhalot hashoterim ledaber 'el ha'am ufaqedu sarei zeba'ot berosh ha'am. deuteronomy 20:10	ki tiqrab 'el 'ir lehilakhem 'aleha veqarata 'eileha leshalom. deuteronomy 20:11	vehayah 'im shalom ta'ankha ufatekhah lakh vehayah kal ha'am hanimza bah yihyu lekha lamas va'abadukha. deuteronomy 20:12	ve'im lo tashlim 'imakh ve'asetah 'imekha milkhamah vezarta 'aleha. deuteronomy 20:13	unetanah yhvh 'elohekha beyadekha vehikita 'et kal zekhurah lefi khareb. deuteronomy 20:14	raq hanashim vehataf vehabeheimah vekhol 'asher yihyeh ba'ir kal shelalah taboz lakh ve'akhalta 'et shelal 'oyebekha 'asher natan yhvh 'elohekha lakh. deuteronomy 20:15	ken ta'aseh lekhal he'arim harekhoqot mimekha me'od 'asher lo mei'arei hagoyim ha'eleh henah. deuteronomy 20:16	raq mei'arei ha'amim ha'eleh 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah lo tekhayeh kal neshamah. deuteronomy 20:17	ki hakharem takharimem hakhiti veha'emori hakena'ani vehaperizi hakhivi vehaybusi ka'asher zivekha yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 20:18	lema'an 'asher lo yelamedu 'etkhem la'asot kekhol to'abotam 'asher 'asu leiloheihem vakhatatem yhvh 'eloheikhem. deuteronomy 20:19	ki tazur 'el 'ir yamim rabim lehilakhem 'aleha letafesah lo tashkhit 'et 'eizah lindoakh 'alav garzen ki mimenu tokhel ve'oto lo tikhrot ki ha'adam 'ez hasadeh labo mipanekha bamazor. deuteronomy 20:20	raq 'ez 'asher teida' ki lo 'ez ma'akhal hu 'oto tashkhit vekharata ubanita mazor 'al ha'ir 'asher hi 'osah 'imekha milkhamah 'ad ridtah. deuteronomy 21:1	ki yimazei khalal ba'adamah 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha lerishtah nofel basadeh lo noda' mi hikahu. deuteronomy 21:2	veyaze'u zeqeinekha veshofetekha umadedu 'el he'arim 'asher sebibot hekhalal. deuteronomy 21:3	vehayah ha'ir haqerobah 'el hekhalal velaqekhu ziqnei ha'ir hahiv 'eglat baqar 'asher lo 'ubad bah 'asher lo mashekhah be'ol. deuteronomy 21:4	vehoridu ziqnei ha'ir hahiv 'et ha'eglah 'el nakhal 'eitan 'asher lo yei'abed bo velo yizareia' ve'arefu sham 'et ha'eglah banakhal. deuteronomy 21:5	venigeshu hakohanim benei leivi ki bam bakhar yhvh 'elohekha leshareto ulebarekh beshem yhvh ve'al pihem yihyeh kal rib vekhal naga'. deuteronomy 21:6	vekhol ziqnei ha'ir hahiv haqerobim 'el hekhalal yirkhazu 'et yedeihem 'al ha'eglah ha'arufah banakhal. deuteronomy 21:7	ve'anu ve'ameru yadeinu lo shafekhah shafekhu 'et hadam hazeh ve'eineinu lo ra'u. deuteronomy 21:8	kaper le'amekha yisra'el 'asher padita yhvh ve'al titen dam naqi beqereb 'amekha yisra'el venikaper lahem hadam. deuteronomy 21:9	ve'atah teba'er hadam hanaqi miqirbekha ki ta'aseh hayashar be'einei yhvh. deuteronomy 21:10	ki teizei lamilkhamah 'al 'oyebekha unetano yhvh 'elohekha beyadekha veshabita shibyo. deuteronomy 21:11	vera'ita bashibyah 'eishet yefat to'ar vekhashaqta bah velaqakhta lekha le'ishah. deuteronomy 21:12	vahabeitah 'el tokh beitekha vegilekhah 'et roshah ve'asetah 'et zipareneha. deuteronomy 21:13	veheisirah 'et simlat shibyah mei'aleha veyashebah bebeitekha ubakhetah 'et 'abiha ve'et 'imah yerakh yamim ve'akhar ken tabo 'eileha ube'altah vehayetah lekha le'ishah. deuteronomy 21:14	vehayah 'im lo khafazta bah veshilakhtah lenafshah umakhor lo timkerenah bakasef lo tit'amer bah takhat 'asher 'initah. deuteronomy 21:15	ki tihyena le'ish shetei nashim ha'akhat 'ahubah veha'akhat senu'ah veyaledu lo banim ha'ahubah vehasenu'ah vehayah haben habekhor laseni'ah. deuteronomy 21:16	vehayah beyom hankhilo 'et banav 'et 'asher yihyeh lo lo yukhal lebaker 'et ben ha'ahubah 'al penei ben hasenu'ah habekhor. deuteronomy 21:17	ki 'et habekhor ben hasenu'ah yakir latet lo pi shenayim bekhol 'asher yimazei lo ki hu reishit 'ono lo mishpat habekhorah. deuteronomy 21:18	ki yihyeh le'ish ben sorer umoreh 'einenu shomeia' beqol 'abiv ubeqol 'imo veyiseru 'oto velo yishma' 'aleihem. deuteronomy 21:19	vetafesu bo 'abiv ve'imo vehozi'u 'oto 'el ziqnei 'iro ve'el sha'ar meqomo. deuteronomy 21:20	ve'ameru 'el ziqnei 'iro beneinu zeh sorer umoreh 'einenu shomeia' beqoleinu zolel vesobei. deuteronomy 21:21	uregamuhu kal 'anshei 'iro ba'abanim vamet ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha vekhal yisra'el yishme'u veyira'u. deuteronomy 21:22	vekhi yihyeh be'ish khet mishpat mavet vehumat vetalita 'oto 'al 'ez. deuteronomy 21:23	lo talin niblato 'al ha'ez ki qabor tiqberenu bayom hahu ki qilat 'elohim talui velo tetamei 'et 'admatekha 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah. deuteronomy 22:1	lo tir'eh 'et shor 'akhikha 'o 'et seiyo nidakhim vehit'alamta meihem hasheb teshibem le'akhikha. deuteronomy 22:2	ve'im lo qarob 'akhikha 'eilekha velo yeda'to va'asafto 'el tokh beitekha vehayah 'imekha 'ad derosh 'akhikha 'oto vahasheiboto lo. deuteronomy 22:3	vekhen ta'aseh lakhamoro vekhen ta'aseh lesimlato vekhen ta'aseh lekhal 'abeidat 'akhikha 'asher tobad mimenu umezatah lo tukhal lehit'alem. deuteronomy 22:4	lo tir'eh 'et khamor 'akhikha 'o shoro nofelim baderekh vehit'alamta meihem haqem taqim 'imo. deuteronomy 22:5	lo yihyeh kheli geber 'al 'ishah velo yilbash geber simlat 'ishah ki to'abat yhvh 'elohekha kal 'oseh 'eleh. deuteronomy 22:6	ki yiqarei qan zipor lefanekha baderekh bekhal 'ez 'o 'al ha'arez 'efrokhim 'o beizim veha'em robezet 'al ha'efrokhim 'o 'al habeizim lo tiqakh ha'em 'al habanim. deuteronomy 22:7	shaleiakh teshalakh 'et ha'em ve'et habanim tiqakh lakh lema'an yitab lakh veha'arakhta yamim. deuteronomy 22:8	ki tibneh bayit khadash ve'asita ma'aqeh legagekha velo tasim damim bebeitekha ki yipol hanofel mimenu. deuteronomy 22:9	lo tizra' karmekha kil'ayim pen tiqdash hamlei'ah hazera' 'asher tizra' utebu'at hakarem. deuteronomy 22:10	lo takharosh beshor ubakhamor yakhdav. deuteronomy 22:11	lo tilbash sha'atnez zemer ufishtim yakhdav. deuteronomy 22:12	gedilim ta'aseh lakh 'al 'arba' kanfot kesutekha 'asher tekhaseh bah. deuteronomy 22:13	ki yiqakh 'ish 'ishah uba 'eileha usenei'ah. deuteronomy 22:14	vesam lah 'alilot debarim vehozi 'aleha shem ra' ve'amar 'et ha'ishah hazot laqakhti va'eqrab 'eileha velo mazati lah betulim. deuteronomy 22:15	velaqakh 'abi hana'ar hana'arah ve'imah vehozi'u 'et betulei hana'ar hana'arah 'el ziqnei ha'ir hasha'erah. deuteronomy 22:16	ve'amar 'abi hana'ar hana'arah 'el hazeqeinim 'et biti natati la'ish hazeh le'ishah vayisna'eha. deuteronomy 22:17	vehineh hu sam 'alilot debarim leimor lo mazati lebitekha betulim ve'eleh betulei biti ufaresu hasimlah lifnei ziqnei ha'ir. deuteronomy 22:18	velaqekhu ziqnei ha'ir hahiv 'et ha'ish veyiseru 'oto. deuteronomy 22:19	ve'aneshu 'oto mei'ah khesef venatenu la'abi hana'arah ki hozi shem ra' 'al betulat yisra'el velo tihyeh le'ishah lo yukhal leshalekhah kal yamav. deuteronomy 22:20	ve'im 'emet hayah hadabar hazeh lo nimze'u betulim lana'ar lana'arah. deuteronomy 22:21	vehozi'u 'et hana'ar hana'arah 'el petakh bet 'abiha useqaluha 'anshei 'irah ba'abanim vameitah ki 'asetah nebalah beyisra'el liznot bet 'abiha ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. deuteronomy 22:22	ki yimazei 'ish shokheb 'im 'ishah be'ulat ba'al umeitu gam sheneihem ha'ish hashokheb 'im ha'ishah veha'ishah ubi'arta hara' miyisra'el. deuteronomy 22:23	ki yihyeh na'ar na'arah betulah me'orasah le'ish umeza'ah 'ish ba'ir veshakhab 'imah. deuteronomy 22:24	vehozeitem 'et sheneihem 'el sha'ar ha'ir hahiv useqaltem 'otam ba'abanim vameitu 'et hana'ar hana'arah 'al debar 'asher lo za'aqah ba'ir ve'et ha'ish 'al debar 'asher 'inah 'et 'eishet rei'eihu ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. deuteronomy 22:25	ve'im basadeh yimza ha'ish 'et hana'ar hana'arah ham'orasah vehekheziq bah ha'ish veshakhab 'imah umet ha'ish 'asher shakhab 'imah lebado. deuteronomy 22:26	velana'ar velana'arah lo ta'aseh dabar 'en lana'ar lana'arah khet mavet ki ka'asher yaqum 'ish 'al rei'eihu urezakho nefesh ken hadabar hazeh. deuteronomy 22:27	ki basadeh meza'ah za'aqah hana'ar hana'arah ham'orasah ve'en moshia' lah. deuteronomy 22:28	ki yimza 'ish na'ar na'arah betulah 'asher lo 'orasah utefasah veshakhab 'imah venimza'u. deuteronomy 22:29	venatan ha'ish hashokheb 'imah la'abi hana'ar hana'arah khamishim kasef velo tihyeh le'ishah takhat 'asher 'inah lo yukhal shalekhah kal yamav. deuteronomy 22:30	lo yiqakh 'ish 'et 'eishet 'abiv velo yegaleh kenaf 'abiv. deuteronomy 23:1	lo yabo fezua' daka ukherut shafekhah biqhal yhvh. deuteronomy 23:2	lo yabo mamzer biqhal yhvh gam dor 'asiri lo yabo lo biqhal yhvh. deuteronomy 23:3	lo yabo 'amoni umo'abi biqhal yhvh gam dor 'asiri lo yabo lahem biqhal yhvh 'ad 'olam. deuteronomy 23:4	'al debar 'asher lo qidemu 'etkhem balekhem ubamayim baderekh bezeitekhem mimizrayim va'asher sakhar 'alekha 'et bil'am ben be'or mipetor 'aram naharayim leqaleka. deuteronomy 23:5	velo 'abah yhvh 'elohekha lishmoa' 'el bil'am vayahafokh yhvh 'elohekha lekha 'et haqelalah librakhah ki 'aheibekha yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 23:6	lo tidrosh shelomam vetobatam kal yamekha le'olam. deuteronomy 23:7	lo teta'eb 'adomi ki 'akhikha hu lo teta'eb mizri ki ger hayita be'arzo. deuteronomy 23:8	banim 'asher yivaledu lahem dor shelishi yabo lahem biqhal yhvh. deuteronomy 23:9	ki teizei makhaneh 'al 'oyebekha venishmarta mikol dabar ra'. deuteronomy 23:10	ki yihyeh bekha 'ish 'asher lo yihyeh tahor miqereh layelah veyaza 'el mikhuz lamakhaneh lo yabo 'el tokh hamakhaneh. deuteronomy 23:11	vehayah lifnot 'ereb yirkhaz bamayim ukhebo hashemesh yabo 'el tokh hamakhaneh deuteronomy 23:12	veyad tihyeh lekha mikhuz lamakhaneh veyazata shamah khuz. deuteronomy 23:13	veyated tihyeh lekha 'al 'azeinekha vehayah beshibtekha khuz vekhafartah bah veshabta vekhisita 'et zei'atekha. deuteronomy 23:14	ki yhvh 'elohekha mithalekh beqereb makhanekha lehazilekha velatet 'oyebekha lefanekha vehayah makhanekha qadosh velo yir'eh bekha 'ervat dabar veshab mei'akharekha. deuteronomy 23:15	lo tasgir 'ebed 'el 'adonav 'asher yinazel 'eilekha mei'im 'adonav. deuteronomy 23:16	'imekha yeisheb beqirbekha bamaqom 'asher yibkhar be'akhad she'arekha batob lo lo tonenu. deuteronomy 23:17	lo tihyeh qedeishah mibenot yisra'el velo yihyeh qadesh mibenei yisra'el deuteronomy 23:18	lo tabi 'etnan zonah umekhir keleb bet yhvh 'elohekha lekhal neder ki to'abat yhvh 'elohekha gam sheneihem. deuteronomy 23:19	lo tashikh le'akhikha neshekh kesef neshekh 'okhel neshekh kal dabar 'asher yishakh. deuteronomy 23:20	lanakheri tashikh ule'akhikha lo tashikh lema'an yebarekhkha yhvh 'elohekha bekhol mishlakh yadekha 'al ha'arez 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah. deuteronomy 23:21	ki tidor neder yhvh 'elohekha lo te'akher leshalemo ki darosh yidreshenu yhvh 'elohekha mei'imakh vehayah bekha khet. deuteronomy 23:22	vekhi tekhdal lindor lo yihyeh bekha khet. deuteronomy 23:23	moza sefatekha tishmor ve'asita ka'asher nadarta yhvh 'elohekha nedabah 'asher dibarta befikha. deuteronomy 23:24	ki tabo bekherem rei'ekha ve'akhalta 'anabim kenafshekha sabe'ekha ve'el kelyekha lo titen. deuteronomy 23:25	ki tabo beqamat rei'ekha veqatafta melilot beyadekha vekhermesh lo tanif 'al qamat rei'ekha. deuteronomy 24:1	ki yiqakh 'ish 'ishah ube'alah vehayah 'im lo timza khen be'einav ki maza bah 'ervat dabar vekhatab lah seifer keritut venatan beyadah veshilekhah mibeito. deuteronomy 24:2	veyaze'ah mibeito vehalekhah vehayetah le'ish 'akher. deuteronomy 24:3	usenei'ah ha'ish ha'akharon vekhatab lah seifer keritut venatan beyadah veshilekhah mibeito 'o khi yamut ha'ish ha'akharon 'asher leqakhah lo le'ishah. deuteronomy 24:4	lo yukhal ba'lah harishon 'asheroshi lekhah lashub leqakhtah lihyot lo le'ishah 'akharei 'asher hutama'ah ki to'eibah hi lifnei yhvh velo takhati 'et ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah. deuteronomy 24:5	ki yiqakh 'ish 'ishah khadashah lo yeizei bazaba velo ya'abor 'alav lekhal dabar naqi yihyeh lebeito shanah 'ekhat vesimakh 'et 'ishto 'asher laqakh. deuteronomy 24:6	lo yakhabol reikhayim varakheb ki nefesh hu khobel. deuteronomy 24:7	ki yimazei 'ish goneb nefesh mei'ekhav mibenei yisra'el vehit'amer bo umekharo umet haganab hahu ubi'arta hara' miqirbekha. deuteronomy 24:8	hishamer benega' hazara'at lishmor me'od vela'asot kekhol 'asher yoru 'etkhem hakohanim halviyim ka'asher zivitim tishmeru la'asot. deuteronomy 24:9	zakhor 'et 'asher 'asah yhvh 'elohekha lemiryam baderekh bezeitekhem mimizrayim. deuteronomy 24:10	ki tasheh berei'akha mashat me'umah lo tabo 'el beito la'abot 'aboto. deuteronomy 24:11	bakhuz ta'amod veha'ish 'asher 'atah nosheh bo yozi 'eilekha 'et ha'abot hakhuzah. deuteronomy 24:12	ve'im 'ish 'ani hu lo tishkab ba'aboto. deuteronomy 24:13	hasheb tashib lo 'et ha'abot kebo hashemesh veshakhab besalmato ubeirakheka ulekha tihyeh zedaqah lifnei yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 24:14	lo ta'ashoq sakhir 'ani ve'ebyon mei'akhekha 'o migeirekha 'asher be'arzekha bish'arekha. deuteronomy 24:15	beyomo titen sekharo velo la'asot 'et hadabar hazeh. deuteronomy 24:19	ki tiqzor qezirekha besadekha veshakhakhta 'omer basadeh lo tashub leqakhto lager layatom vela'almanah yihyeh lema'an yebarekhkha yhvh 'elohekha bekhol ma'aseh yadekha. deuteronomy 24:20	ki takhbot zeitekha lo tefa'er 'akharekha lager layatom vela'almanah yihyeh. deuteronomy 24:21	ki tibzor karmekha lo te'olel 'akharekha lager layatom vela'almanah yihyeh. deuteronomy 24:22	vezakharta ki 'ebed hayita be'erez mizrayim 'al ken 'anokhi mezavekha la'asot 'et hadabar hazeh. deuteronomy 25:1	ki yihyeh rib ben 'anashim venigeshu 'el hamishpat ushefatum vehizdiqu 'et hazadiq vehirshi'u 'et harasha'. deuteronomy 25:2	vehayah 'im bin hakot harasha' vehipilo hashofet vehikahu lefanav kedei rish'ato bemispar. deuteronomy 25:3	'arba'im yakenu lo yosif pen 'eishet hamet hakhuzah le'ish zar yebamah yabo 'aleha uleqakhah lo le'ishah veyibemah. deuteronomy 25:6	vehayah habekhor 'asher teiled yaqum 'al shem 'akhiv hamet velo yimakheh shemo miyisra'el. deuteronomy 25:7	ve'im lo yakhpoz ha'ish laqakhat 'et yebimto ve'aletah yebimto hasha'rah 'el hazeqeinim ve'amerah mei'en yebami lehaqim le'akhiv shem beyisra'el lo 'abah yabemi. deuteronomy 25:8	veqare'u lo ziqnei 'iro vediberu 'eilav ve'amad ve'amar lo khafazti leqakhtah. deuteronomy 25:9	venigeshah yebimto 'eilav le'einei hazeqeinim vekhalezah na'alo mei'al raglo veyareqah befanav ve'anetah ve'amerah kakhah yei'aseh la'ish 'asher lo yibneh 'et bet 'akhiv. deuteronomy 25:10	veniqra shemo beyisra'el bet khaluz hana'al. deuteronomy 25:11	ki yinazu 'anashim yakhdav 'ish ve'akhiv veqarebah 'eishet ha'ekhad lehazil 'et 'ishah miyad makeihu veshalekhah yadah vehekheziqah bimbushav. deuteronomy 25:12	veqazotah 'et kapah lo takhos 'einekha. deuteronomy 25:13	lo yihyeh lekha 25:19	vehayah behaniakh yhvh 'elohekha lekha mikal 'oyebekha misabib ba'arez 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah lerishtah timkheh 'et zeikher 'amaleq mitakhat hashamayim lo tishkakh. deuteronomy 26:1	vehayah ki tabo 'el ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'elohekha noten lekha nakhalah virishtah veyashabta bah. deuteronomy 26:2	velaqakhta meireishit kal peri ha'adamah 'asher tabi mei'arzekha 'eilav higadti hayom yhvh 'elohekha ki bati 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba' yhvh la'aboteinu latet lanu. deuteronomy 26:4	velaqakh hakohen hatene miyadekha vehinikho lifnei mizbakh yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 26:5	ve'anita ve'amarta lifnei yhvh 'elohekha 'arami 'obed 'abi vayeired mizraymah vayagar sham bimtei me'at vayhi sham lego gadol 'azum varab. deuteronomy 26:6	vayarei'u 'otanu hamizrim 26:8	vayozi'einu yhvh mimizrayim beyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah ubemora gadol ube'otot ubemofetim. deuteronomy 26:9	vaybi'einu 'el hamaqom hazeh vayiten lanu 'et ha'arez hazot 'erez zabat khalab hama'aser venatatah laleivi lager layatom vela'almanah ve'akhelu bish'arekha vesabei'u. deuteronomy 26:13	ve'amarta lifnei yhvh 'elohekha bi'arti haqodesh min habayit vegam netativ laleivi velager layatom vela'almanah kekhal mizvatekha 'asher zivitani lo 'abarti mimizvotekha velo shakhakheti. deuteronomy 26:14	lo 'akhalti be'oni mimenu velo bi'arti mimenu betamei velo natati mimenu lemet 'elohekha ka'asher diber. deuteronomy 27:1	vayzav mosheh veziqnei yisra'el 'et ha'am leimor shamor 'et kal hamizvah 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom. deuteronomy 27:2	vehayah bayom 'asher ta'abru ha'eleh 'asher 'anokhi mezaveh 'etkhem hayom behar 'eibal vesadta 'otam basid. deuteronomy 27:5	ubanita sham mizbeiakh yhvh 'elohekha mizbakh 'abanim lo tanif 'aleihem barzel. deuteronomy 27:6	'abanim 27:12	'eleh ya'amdu lebarekh 'et ha'am 'al har gerizim be'aberekhem 'et hayarden shim'on veleivi vihudah veyisashkhar veyosef ubinyamin. deuteronomy 27:13	ve'eleh ya'amdu 'al haqelalah behar 'eibal 28:20	yeshalakh yhvh bekha 'et hame'eirah 'et hamehumah ve'et hamig'eret bekhal mishlakh yadekha 'asher ta'aseh 'ad hishamedkha ve'ad 'abadekha maher mipenei roa' ma'alalekha 'asher 'azabtani. ubakhereb ubashidafon ubayeiraqon uredafukha 'ad 'abedekha. deuteronomy 28:23	vehayu shamekha 'asher 'al roshekha nekhoshet veha'arez 'asher takhtekha barzel. deuteronomy 28:24	yiten yhvh 'et metar 'arzekha 'abaq ve'afar min hashamayim yeired 'alekha 'ad hishamedakh. deuteronomy 28:25	yitenkha yhvh nigaf lifnei 'oyebekha bederekh 'ekhad teizei 'eilav ubeshib'ah derakhim tanus lefanav vehayita leza'avah lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez. deuteronomy 28:26	vehayetah niblatekha lema'akhal lekhal 'of hashamayim ulebehemat ha'arez ve'en makharid. deuteronomy 28:27	yakekhah yhvh bishkhin mizrayim uba'ofalim ubatekhorim ubagarab ubekhares 'asher lo tukhal leheirafei. deuteronomy 28:28	yakekhah yhvh beshiga'on ube'ivaron ubetimhon leibab. deuteronomy 28:29	vehayita memashesh bazahorayim ka'asher yemashesh ha'iver ba'afeilah velo tazliakh 'et derakhekha vehayita 'akh 'ashuq vegazul kal hayamim ve'en moshia'. deuteronomy 28:30	'ishah te'ares ve'ish 'akher yishgalenah yishkabenah bayit tibneh velo teisheb bo kerem tita' velo tekhalelenu. deuteronomy 28:31	shorkha tabuakh le'einekha velo tokhal mimenu khamorekha gazul milefanekha velo yashub lakh zonekha netunot le'oyebekha ve'en lekha moshia'. deuteronomy 28:32	banekha ubenotekha netunim le'am 'akher ve'einekha ro'ot vekhalot 'aleihem kal hayom ve'en le'el yadekha. deuteronomy 28:33	peri 'admatekha vekhal yegi'akha yokhal 'am 'asher lo yada'eta vehayita raq 'ashuq verazuz kal hayamim. deuteronomy 28:34	vehayita meshuga' mimar'eh 'einekha 'asher tir'eh. deuteronomy 28:35	yakekhah yhvh bishkhin ra' 'al habirkayim ve'al hashoqayim 'asher lo tukhal leheirafei mikaf raglekha ve'ad qadeqodekha. deuteronomy 28:36	yolekh yhvh 'otekha ve'et malkekha 'asher taqim 'alekha 'el go 'asher lo yada'ta 'atah va'abotekha ve'abadta sham 'elohim 'akheirim 'ez va'aben. deuteronomy 28:37	vehayita leshamah lemashal velishninah bekhol ha'amim 'asher yenahegkha yhvh shamah. deuteronomy 28:38	zera' rab tozi hasadeh ume'at te'esof ki yakhselenu ha'arbeh. deuteronomy 28:39	keramim tita' ve'abadeta veyayin lo tishteh velo te'egor ki tokhelenu hatola'at. deuteronomy 28:40	zeitim yihyu lekha bekhal gebulekha veshemen lo tasukh ki yishal zeitekha. deuteronomy 28:41	banim ubanot tolid velo yihyu lakh ki yeilekhu bashebi. deuteronomy 28:42	kal 'eizekha uferi 'admatekha yeyaresh hazelazal. deuteronomy 28:43	hager 'asher beqirbekha ya'aleh 'alekha ma'lah ma'elah ve'atah teired matah matah. deuteronomy 28:44	hu yalvekha ve'atah lo talvenu hu yihyeh lerosh ve'atah tihyeh lezanab. deuteronomy 28:45	uba'u 'alekha kal haqelalot ha'eleh uredafukha vehisigukha 'ad hishamedakh ki lo shama'ta beqol yhvh 'elohekha lishmor mizvotav vekhuqotav 'asher zivakh. deuteronomy 28:46	vehayu bekha le'ot ulemofet ubezar'akha 'ad 'olam. deuteronomy 28:47	takhat 'asher lo 'abadta 'et yhvh 'elohekha besimkhah ubetub leibab meirob kol. deuteronomy 28:48	ve'abadta 'et 'oyebekha 'asher yeshalekhenu yhvh bakh bera'ab ubezama ube'eirom ubekhoser kol venatan 'ol barzel 'al zavarekha 'ad hishmido 'otakh. deuteronomy 28:49	yisa yhvh 'alekha go meirakhoq miqzeh ha'arez ka'asher yid'eh hanasher go 'asher lo tishma' leshono. deuteronomy 28:50	go 'az panim 'asher lo yisa fanim lezaqen vena'ar lo yakhon. deuteronomy 28:51	ve'akhal peri behemtekha uferi 'admatekha 'ad hishamedakh 'asher lo yash'ir lekha dagan tirosh veyizhar shegar 'alafekha ve'ashterot zonekha 'ad ha'abido 'otakh. deuteronomy 28:52	veheizar lekha bekhal she'arekha 'ad redet khomotekha hagebohot vehabezurot 'asher 'atah boteiakh bahen bekhal 'arzekha veheizar lekha bekhal she'arekha bekhal 'arzekha 'asher natan yhvh 'elohekha lakh. deuteronomy 28:53	ve'akhalta feri bitnekha besar banekha ubenotekha 'asher natan lekha yhvh 'elohekha bemazor ubemazoq 'asher yaziq lekha 'oyebekha. deuteronomy 28:54	ha'ish harakh bekha vehe'anog me'od teira' 'eino be'akhiv ube'eishet kheiqo ubeyeter banav 'asher yotir. deuteronomy 28:55	mitet le'akhad meihem mibesar banav 'asher yokhel mibeli hish'ir lo kol bemazor ubemazoq 'asher yaziq lekha 'oyibkha bekhal she'arekha. deuteronomy 28:56	harakah bekha veha'anugah 'asher lo nisetah khaf raglah hazeg 'al ha'arez meihit'aneg umeirokh teira' 'einah be'ish kheiqah ubibnah ubebitah. deuteronomy 28:57	ubeshilyatah hayozet miben ragleha ubebaneha 'asher teiled ki tokhelem bekhoser kol basater bemazor ubemazoq 'asher yaziq lekha 'oyibkha bish'arekha. deuteronomy 28:58	'im lo tishmor la'asot 'et kal dibrei hatorah hazot haketubim baseifer hazeh leyir'ah 'et hashem hanikhbad vehanora hazeh 'et yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 28:59	vehifla yhvh 'et makotekha ve'et makot zar'ekha makot gedolot vene'emanot vakholayim ra'im vene'emanim. deuteronomy 28:60	veheishib bekha 'et kal madveh mizrayim 'asher yagoreta mipeneihem vedabequ bakh. deuteronomy 28:61	gam kal kholi vekhal makah 'asher lo khatub beseifer hatorah hazot ya'lem yhvh 'alekha 'ad hishamedakh. deuteronomy 28:62	venish'artem bimtei me'at takhat 'asher heyitem kekhokhbei hashamayim larob ki lo shama'ta beqol yhvh 'elohekha. deuteronomy 28:63	vehayah ka'asher sas yhvh 'aleikhem leheitib 'etkhem uleharbot 'etkhem ken yasis yhvh 'aleikhem leha'abid 'etkhem ulehashmid 'etkhem venisakhtem mei'al ha'adamah 'asher 'atah ba shamah lerishtah. deuteronomy 28:64	vehefizekha yhvh bekhal ha'amim miqzeh ha'arez ve'ad qezeh ha'arez ve'abadta sham 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yada'ta 'atah va'abotekha 'ez va'aben. deuteronomy 28:65	ubagoyim hahem lo targia' velo yihyeh manoakh lekhaf raglekha venatan yhvh lekha sham leb ragaz vekhilyon 'einayim veda'abon nafesh. deuteronomy 28:66	vehayu khayekha telu'im lekha mineged ufakhadta laylah veyomam velo ta'amin bekhayekha. deuteronomy 28:67	baboqer tomar mi yiten 'ereb uba'ereb tomar mi yiten boqer le'oyebekha la'abadim velishfakhot ve'en qoneh. deuteronomy 29:1	'eleh dibrei haberit 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh likhrot 'et benei yisra'el be'erez mo'ab milebad haberit 'asher karat 'itam bekhoreb. deuteronomy 29:2	vayiqra mosheh 'el kal yisra'el vayomer 'aleihem 'atem re'item 'et kal 'asher 'asah yhvh le'eineikhem be'erez mizrayim lefar'oh ulekhal 'abadav ulekhal 'arzo. deuteronomy 29:3	hamasot hagedolot 'asher ra'u 'einekha ha'otot vehamofetim hagedolim hahem. deuteronomy 29:4	velo natan yhvh lakhem leb lada'at ve'einayim lir'ot ve'azenayim lishmoa' 'ad hayom hazeh. deuteronomy 29:5	va'olekh 'etkhem 'arba'im shanah bamidbar lo balu salmoteikhem mei'aleikhem vena'alkha lo baletah mei'al raglekha. deuteronomy 29:6	lekhem lo 'akhaltem veyayin vesheikhar lo shetitem lema'an 29:10	'atem nizabim hayom kulekhem lifnei yhvh 'eloheikhem rasheikhem shibteikhem ziqneikhem veshotereikhem kol 'ish yisra'el. deuteronomy 29:11	tapekhem nesheikhem vegeirekha 'asher beqereb 29:18	pen yesh bakhem 'ish 'o 'ishah 'o mishpakhah 'o sheibet 'asher lebabo foneh hayom mei'im yhvh 'eloheinu lalekhet la'abod 'et 'elohei hagoyim hahem pen yesh bakhem shoresh poreh rosh vela'anah. 31:21	vehayah ki timzena 'oto ra'ot rabot vezarot ve'anetah hashirah hazot lefanav le'ed ki lo tishakhakh mipi zar'o ki yada'ti 'et yizro 'asher hu 'oseh hayom beterem 'abi'enu 'el ha'arez 'asher khereb umeikhadarim 'eimah gam bakhur gam betulah yoneq 'im 'ish seibah. deuteronomy 32:26	'amarti 'af'eihem 'ashbitah mei'enosh zikhram. deuteronomy 32:27	lulei ka'as 'oyeb 'agur pen yenakeru zareimo pen yomeru yadeinu ramah velo yhvh pa'al kal zot. deuteronomy 32:28	ki go 'obad 'eizot hemah ve'en bahem tebunah. deuteronomy 32:29	lu khakhemu yaskilu zot yabinu le'akharitam. deuteronomy 32:30	'eikhah yirdof 'ekhad 'elef ushenayim yanisu rebabah 'im lo ki zuram mekharam yhvh hisgiram. deuteronomy 32:31	ki lo khezureinu zuram ve'oyebeinu pelilim. deuteronomy 32:32	ki migefen sedom gafnam umishadmot 'amorah 'anabeimo 'inebei rosh 'ashkelot merorot lamo. deuteronomy 32:33	khamat taninim yeinam verosh petanim 'akhzar. deuteronomy 32:34	halo hu kamus 'imadi khatum be'ozrotai. deuteronomy 32:35	li naqam veshilem le'et tamut raglam ki qarob yom 'eidam vekhash 'atidot lamo. deuteronomy 32:36	ki yadin yhvh 'amo ve'al 'abadav yitnekham ki yir'eh ki 'azelat yad ve'efes 'azur ve'azub. deuteronomy 32:37	ve'amar 'ei 'eloheimo zur khasayu bo. deuteronomy 32:38	'asher kheileb zebakheimo yokheilu yishtu yen nesikham yaqumu veya'zerukhem yehi 'aleikhem sitrah. deuteronomy 32:39	re'u 'atah ki 'ani 'ani hu ve'en 'elohim 'imadi 'ani 'amit va'akhayeh makhazti va'ani 'erpa ve'en miyadi mazil. deuteronomy 32:40	ki 'esa 'el shamayim yadi ve'amarti khai 'anokhi le'olam. deuteronomy 32:41	'im shanoti beraq kharbi vetokhez bemishpat yadi 'ashib naqam lezarai velimsan'ai 'ashalem. deuteronomy 32:42	'ashkir khizai midam vekharbi tokhal basar midam khalal veshibyah meirosh par'ot 'oyeb. deuteronomy 32:43	harninu goyim 'amo ki dam 'abadav yiqom venaqam yashib lezarav vekhiper 'admato 'amo. deuteronomy 32:44	vayabo mosheh vaydaber 'et kal dibrei hashirah hazot be'azenei ha'am hu vehosheia' bin nun. deuteronomy 32:45	vaykhal mosheh ledaber 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh 'el kal yisra'el. deuteronomy 32:46	vayomer 'aleihem simu lebabkhem lekhal hadebarim 'asher 'anokhi mei'id bakhem hayom 'asher tezavum 'et beneikhem lishmor la'asot 'et kal dibrei hatorah hazot. deuteronomy 32:47	ki lo dabar req hu mikem ki hu khayeikhem ubadabar hazeh ta'arikhu yamim 'al ha'adamah 'asher 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden shamah lerishtah. deuteronomy 32:48	vaydaber yhvh 'el mosheh be'ezem hayom hazeh leimor. deuteronomy 32:49	'aleh 'el har ha'abarim hazeh har nebo 'asher be'erez mo'ab 'asher 'al penei yereikho ure'eh 'et 'erez kena'an 'asher 'ani noten libnei yisra'el la'akhuzah. deuteronomy 32:50	umut bahar 'asher 'atah 'oleh shamah vehei'asef 'el 'amekha ka'asher met 'aharon 'akhikha behor hahar vayei'asef 'el 'amav. deuteronomy 32:51	'al 'asher me'altem bi betokh benei yisra'el bemei meribat qadesh midbar zin 'al 'asher lo qidashtem 'oti betokh benei yisra'el. deuteronomy 32:52	ki mineged tir'eh 'et ha'arez veshamah lo tabo 'el ha'arez 'asher 'ani noten libnei yisra'el. deuteronomy 33:1	vezot haberakhah 'asher beirakh mosheh 'ish ha'elohim 'et benei yisra'el lifnei moto. deuteronomy 33:2	vayomar yhvh misinai ba vezarakh misei'ir lamo hofia' meihar paran ve'atah meiribbot qodesh mimino 'eishedat 'esh dat lamo. deuteronomy 33:3	'af khobeb 'amim kal qedoshav beyadekha vehem tuku leraglekha yisa midaberotekha. deuteronomy 33:4	torah zivah lanu mosheh morashah qehilat ya'aqob. deuteronomy 33:5	vayhi bishurun melekh behit'asef rashei 'am yakhad shibtei yisra'el. deuteronomy 33:6	yekhi re'uben ve'al yamot vihi metav mispar. deuteronomy 33:7	vezot lihudah vayomar shema' yhvh qol yehudah ve'el 'amo tebi'enu yadav rab lo ve'eizer mizarav tihyeh. deuteronomy 33:8	uleleivi 'amar tumekha ve'urekha le'ish khasidekha 'asher nisito bemasah teribeihu 'al mei meribah. deuteronomy 33:9	ha'omer le'abiv ule'imo lo re'itiv ve'et 'ekhav lo hikir ve'et bano banav lo yada' ki shameru 'imratekha uberitekha yinzoru. deuteronomy 33:10	yoru mishpatekha leya'aqob vetoratekha leyisra'el yasimu qetorah be'apekha vekhalil 'al mizbekhekha. deuteronomy 33:11	barekh yhvh kheilo ufo'al yadav tirzeh mekhaz matenayim qamav umesan'av min yequmun. deuteronomy 33:12	lebinyamin 'amar yedid yhvh yishkon labetakh 'alav khofef 'alav kal hayom uben keteifav shakhen. deuteronomy 33:13	uleyosef 'amar meborekhet yhvh 'arzo mimeged shamayim mital umitehom robezet takhat. deuteronomy 33:14	umimeged tebu'ot shamesh umimeged geresh yerakhim. deuteronomy 33:15	umeirosh harrei qedem umimeged gib'ot 'olam. deuteronomy 33:16	umimeged 'erez umelo'ah urezon shokheni seneh tabotah lerosh yosef uleqadeqod nezir 'ekhav. deuteronomy 33:17	bekhor shoro hadar lo veqarnei re'em qarnav bahem 'amim yenagakh yakhdav 'afsei 'arez vehem ribbot 'efrayim vehem 'alfei menasheh. deuteronomy 33:18	velizbulun 'amar semakh zebulun bezeitekha veyisashkhar be'ohalekha. deuteronomy 33:19	'amim har yiqra'u sham yizbekhu zibkhei zedeq ki shefa' yamim yinaqu usefunei temunei khol. deuteronomy 33:20	ulegad 'amar barukh markhib gad kelabi shakhen vetaraf zeroa' 'af qadeqod. deuteronomy 33:21	vayar reishit lo ki sham khelqat mekhoqeq safun vayeitei rashei 'am zidqat yhvh 'asah umishpatav 'im yisra'el. deuteronomy 33:22	uledan 'amar dan gur 'aryeh yezaneq min habashan. deuteronomy 33:23	ulenaftali 'amar naftali seba' razon umalei birkat yhvh yam vedarom yerashah. deuteronomy 33:24	ule'asher 'amar barukh mibanim 'asher yehi rezui 'ekhav vetobel bashemen raglo. deuteronomy 33:25	barzel unekhoshet min'alekha ukheyamekha dabe'ekha. deuteronomy 33:26	'en ka'el yeshurun rokheb shamayim be'ezrekha ubega'avato shekhaqim. deuteronomy 33:27	me'onah 'elohei qedem umitakhat zero'ot 'olam vaygaresh mipanekha 'oyeb vayomer hashmed. deuteronomy 33:28	vayishkon yisra'el betakh badad 'en ya'aqob 'el 'erez dagan vetirosh 'af shamav ya'arfu tal. deuteronomy 33:29	'ashrekha yisra'el mi khamokha 'am nosha' yhvh magen 'ezrekha va'asher khereb ga'avatekha veyikakhashu 'oyebekha lakh ve'atah 'al bamoteimo tidrokh. deuteronomy 34:1	vaya'al mosheh mei'arbot mo'ab 'el har nebo rosh hapisgah 'asher 'al penei yereikho vayar'eihu yhvh 'et kal ha'arez 'et hagil'ad 'ad dan. deuteronomy 34:2	ve'et kal naftali ve'et 'erez 'efrayim umenasheh ve'et kal 'erez yehudah 'ad hayam ha'akharon. deuteronomy 34:3	ve'et hanegeb ve'et hakikar biq'at yereikho 'ir hatemarim 'ad zo'ar. deuteronomy 34:4	vayomer yhvh 'eilav zot ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti le'abraham leyizkhaq uleya'aqob leimor lezar'akha 'etenenah her'itikha be'einekha veshamah lo ta'abor. deuteronomy 34:5	vayamat sham mosheh 'ebed yhvh be'erez mo'ab 'al pi yhvh. deuteronomy 34:6	vayiqbor 'oto
