bagai be'erez mo'ab mul bet pe'or velo yada' 'ish 'et qeburato 'ad hayom hazeh. deuteronomy 34:7	umosheh ben mei'ah ve'esrim shanah bemoto lo khahatah 'eino velo nas leikhoh. deuteronomy 34:8	vayibku benei yisra'el 'et mosheh be'arbot mo'ab sheloshim yom vayitemu yemei bekhi 'eibel mosheh. deuteronomy 34:9	vihoshua' bin nun malei ruakh khakhmah ki samakh mosheh 'et yadav 'alav vayishme'u 'eilav benei yisra'el vaya'asu ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. deuteronomy 34:10	velo qam nabi 'od beyisra'el kemosheh 'asher yeda'o yhvh panim 'el panim. deuteronomy 34:11	lekhal ha'otot vehamoftim 'asher shelakho yhvh la'asot be'erez mizrayim lefar'oh ulekhal 'abadav ulekhal 'arzo. deuteronomy 34:12	ulekhol hayad hakhazaqah ulekhol hamora hagadol 'asher 'asah mosheh le'einei kal yisra'el. 

joshua 1:1	vayhi 'akharei mot mosheh 'ebed yhvh vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' bin nun mesharet mosheh leimor. joshua 1:2	mosheh 'abdi met ve'atah qum 'abor 'et hayarden hazeh 'atah vekhal ha'am hazeh 'el ha'arez 'asher 'anokhi noten lahem libnei yisra'el. joshua 1:3	kal maqom 'asher tidrokh kaf raglekhem bo lakhem netativ ka'asher dibarti 'el mosheh. joshua 1:4	meihamidbar vehalebanon hazeh ve'ad hanahar hagadol nehar perat kol 'erez hakhitim ve'ad hayam hagadol mebo hashamesh yihyeh gebulekhem. joshua 1:5	lo yityazeb 'ish lefanekha kol yemei khayekha ka'asher hayiti 'im mosheh 'ehyeh 'imakh lo 'arpekha velo 'e'ezbeka. joshua 1:6	khazaq ve'emaz ki 'atah tankhil 'et ha'am hazeh 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti la'abotam latet lahem. joshua 1:7	raq khazaq ve'emaz me'od lishmor la'asot kekhal hatorah 'asher zivekha mosheh 'abdi 'al tasur mimenu yamin usemol lema'an taskil bekhol 'asher teilekh. joshua 1:8	lo yamush seifer hatorah hazeh mipikha vehagita bo yomam valaylah lema'an tishmor la'asot kekhal hakatub bo ki 'az tazliakh 'et derakhekha ve'az taskil. joshua 1:9	halo zivitikha khazaq ve'emaz 'al ta'aroz ve'al teikhat ki 'imekha yhvh 'elohekha bekhol 'asher teilekh. joshua 1:10	vayzav yehoshua' 'et shoterei ha'am leimor. joshua 1:11	'ibru beqereb hamakhaneh vezavu 'et ha'am leimor hakhinu lakhem zeidah ki be'od sheloshet yamim 'atem 'oberim 'et hayarden hazeh labo lareshet 'et ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'eloheikhem noten lakhem lerishtah. joshua 1:12	velar'ubeini velagadi velakhazi sheibet hamnasheh 'amar yehoshua' leimor. joshua 1:13	zakhor 'et hadabar 'asher zivah 'etkhem mosheh 'ebed yhvh leimor yhvh 'eloheikhem meiniakh lakhem venatan lakhem 'et ha'arez hazot. joshua 1:14	nesheikhem tapekhem umiqneikhem yeishebu ba'arez 'asher natan lakhem mosheh be'eiber hayarden ve'atem ta'abru khamushim lifnei 'akheikhem kol giborei hakhayil va'azartem 'otam. joshua 1:15	'ad 'asher yaniakh yhvh la'akheikhem kakhem veyareshu gam hemah 'et ha'arez 'asher yhvh 'eloheikhem noten lahem veshabtem le'erez yerushatkhem virishtem 'otah 'asher natan lakhem mosheh 'ebed yhvh be'eiber hayarden mizrakh hashamesh. joshua 1:16	vaya'anu 'et yehoshua' leimor kol 'asher zivitanu na'aseh ve'el kal 'asher tishlakheinu neilekh. joshua 1:17	kekhol 'asher shama'nu 'el mosheh ken nishma' 'eilekha raq yihyeh yhvh 'elohekha 'imakh ka'asher hayah 'im mosheh. joshua 1:18	kal 'ish 'asher yamreh 'et pikha velo yishma' 'et debarekha lekhol 'asher tezavenu yumat raq khazaq ve'emaz. joshua 2:1	vayishlakh yehoshua' bin nun min hashitim shenayim 'anashim meragelim kheresh leimor lekhu re'u 'et ha'arez ve'et yerikho vayeilekhu vayabo'u bet 'ishah zonah ushemah rakhab vayishkebu shamah. joshua 2:2	vayei'amar lemelekh yerikho leimor hineh 'anashim ba'u henah halaylah mibenei yisra'el lakhpor 'et ha'arez. joshua 2:3	vayishlakh melekh yerikho 'el rakhab leimor hozi'i ha'anashim haba'im 'eilayikh 'asher ba'u lebeitekh ki lakhpor 'et kal ha'arez ba'u. joshua 2:4	vatiqakh ha'ishah 'et shenei ha'anashim vatizpeno vatomer ken ba'u 'eilai ha'anashim velo yada'ti mei'ayin hemah. joshua 2:5	vayhi hasha'ar lisgor bakhoshekh veha'anashim yaza'u lo yada'ti 'anah halekhu ha'anashim ridfu maher 'akhareihem ki tasigum. joshua 2:6	vehi he'elatam hagagah vatitmenem befishtei ha'ez ha'arukhot lah 'al hagag. joshua 2:7	veha'anashim radefu 'akhareihem derekh hayarden 'al hama'berot vehasha'ar sagaru 'akharei ka'asher yaze'u harodefim 'akhareihem. joshua 2:8	vehemah terem yishkabun vehi 'aletah 'aleihem 'al hagag. joshua 2:9	vatomer 'el ha'anashim yada'ti ki natan yhvh lakhem 'et ha'arez vekhi nafelah 'eimatkhem 'aleinu vekhi namogu kal yoshebei ha'arez mipeneikhem. joshua 2:10	ki shama'nu 'et 'asher hobish yhvh 'et mei yam suf mipeneikhem bezeitekhem mimizrayim va'asher 'asitem lishnei malkhei ha'emori 'asher be'eiber hayarden lesikhon ule'og 'asher hekheramtem 'otam. joshua 2:11	vanishma' vayimas lebabeinu velo qamah 'od ruakh be'ish mipeneikhem ki yhvh 'eloheikhem hu 'elohim bashamayim mima'al ve'al ha'arez mitakhat. joshua 2:12	ve'atah hishabe'u na li yhvh ki 'asiti 'imakhem khased va'asitem gam 'atem 'im bet 'abi khesed unetatem li 'ot 'emet. joshua 2:13	vehakhayitem 'et 'abi ve'et 'imi ve'et 'akhai ve'et 'akhotai 'akhyotai ve'et kal 'asher lahem vehizaltem 'et nafshoteinu mimavet. joshua 2:14	vayomeru lah ha'anashim nafsheinu takhteikhem lamut 'im lo tagidu 'et debareinu zeh vehayah betet yhvh lanu 'et ha'arez ve'asinu 'imakh khesed ve'emet. joshua 2:15	vatoridem bakhebel be'ad hakhalon ki beitah beqir hakhomah ubakhomah hi yoshabet. joshua 2:16	vatomer lahem haharah leikhu pen yifge'u bakhem harodefim venakhbeitem shamah sheloshet yamim 'ad shob harodefim ve'akhar teilekhu ledarkekhem. joshua 2:17	vayomeru 'eileha ha'anashim neqiyim 'anakhnu mishebu'atekh hazeh 'asher hishba'tanu. joshua 2:18	hineh 'anakhnu ba'im ba'arez 'et tiqvat khut hashani hazeh tiqsheri bakhalon 'asher horadteinu bo ve'et 'abikh ve'et 'imekh ve'et 'akhayikh ve'et kal bet 'abikh ta'asfi 'eilayikh habayetah. joshua 2:19	vehayah kol 'asher yeizei midaltei beitekh hakhuzah damo berosho va'anakhnu neqiyim vekhol 'asher yihyeh 'itakh babayit damo berosheinu 'im yad tihyeh bo. joshua 2:20	ve'im tagidi 'et debareinu zeh vehayinu neqiyim mishebu'atekh 'asher hishba'tanu. joshua 2:21	vatomer kedibreikhem ken hu vateshalekhem vayeileikhu vatiqshor 'et tiqvat hashani bakhalon. joshua 2:22	vayeilekhu vayabo'u haharah vayeishebu sham sheloshet yamim 'ad shabu harodefim vaybaqshu harodefim bekhal haderekh velo maza'u. joshua 2:23	vayashubu shenei ha'anashim vayeiredu meihahar vaya'abru vayabo'u 'el yehoshua' bin nun vaysaperu lo 'et kal hamoze'ot 'otam. joshua 2:24	vayomeru 'el yehoshua' ki natan yhvh beyadeinu 'et kal ha'arez vegam namogu kal yoshebei ha'arez mipaneinu. joshua 3:1	vayashkem yehoshua' baboqer vayis'u meihashitim vayabo'u 'ad hayarden hu vekhal benei yisra'el vayalinu sham terem ya'aboru. joshua 3:2	vayhi miqzeh sheloshet yamim vaya'abru hashoterim beqereb hamakhaneh. joshua 3:3	vayzavu 'et ha'am leimor kir'otkhem 'et 'aron berit yhvh 'eloheikhem vehakohanim halviyim nose'im 'oto ve'atem tis'u mimeqomkhem vahalakhtem 'akharav. joshua 3:4	'akh rakhoq yihyeh beineikhem ubeino ubeinav ke'alpayim 'amah bamidah 'al tiqrebu 'eilav lema'an 'asher teide'u 'et haderekh 'asher teilekhu bah ki lo 'abartem baderekh mitemol shilshom. joshua 3:5	vayomer yehoshua' 'el ha'am hitqadashu ki makhar ya'aseh yhvh beqirbekhem nifla'ot. joshua 3:6	vayomer yehoshua' 'el hakohanim leimor se'u 'et 'aron haberit ve'ibru lifnei ha'am vayis'u 'et 'aron haberit vayeilekhu lifnei ha'am. joshua 3:7	vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' hayom hazeh 'akhel gadelkha be'einei kal yisra'el 'asher yeide'un ki ka'asher hayiti 'im mosheh 'ehyeh 'imakh. joshua 3:8	ve'atah tezaveh 'et hakohanim nose'ei 'aron haberit leimor kebo'akhem 'ad qezeh mei hayarden bayarden ta'amodu. joshua 3:9	vayomer yehoshua' 'el benei yisra'el goshu henah veshim'u 'et dibrei yhvh 'eloheikhem. joshua 3:10	vayomer yehoshua' bezot teide'un ki 'el khai beqirbekhem vehoresh yorish mipeneikhem 'et hakena'ani ve'et hakhiti ve'et hakhivi ve'et haperizi ve'et hagirgashi veha'emori vehaybusi. joshua 3:11	hineh 'aron haberit 'adon kal ha'arez 'ober lifneikhem bayarden. joshua 3:12	ve'atah qekhu lakhem shenei 'asar 'ish mishibtei yisra'el 'ish 'ekhad 'ish 'ekhad lashabet. joshua 3:13	vehayah kenoakh kapot raglei hakohanim nose'ei 'aron yhvh 'adon kal ha'arez bemei hayarden mei hayarden yikareitun hamayim hayoredim milma'elah veya'amdu ned 'ekhad. joshua 3:14	vayhi binsoa' ha'am mei'aholeihem la'abor 'et hayarden vehakohanim nose'ei ha'aron haberit lifnei ha'am. joshua 3:15	ukhebo nose'ei ha'aron 'ad hayarden veraglei hakohanim nose'ei ha'aron nitbelu biqzeh hamayim vehayarden malei 'al kal gedotav kol yemei qazir. joshua 3:16	vaya'amdu hamayim hayoredim milma'lah qamu ned 'ekhad harkheq me'od ba'adam mei'adam ha'ir 'asher mizad zaretan vehayoredim 'al yam ha'arabah yam hamelakh tamu nikhratu veha'am 'aberu neged yerikho. joshua 3:17	vaya'amdu hakohanim nose'ei ha'aron berit yhvh bekharabah betokh hayarden hakhen vekhal yisra'el 'oberim bekharabah 'ad 'asher tamu kal hago la'abor 'et hayarden. joshua 4:1	vayhi ka'asher tamu khal hago la'abor 'et hayarden vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' leimor. joshua 4:2	qekhu lakhem min ha'am shenem 'asar 'anashim 'ish 'ekhad 'ish 'ekhad mishabet. joshua 4:3	vezavu 'otam leimor se'u lakhem mizeh mitokh hayarden mimazab raglei hakohanim hakhin shetem 'esreh 'abanim veha'abartem 'otam 'imakhem vehinakhtem 'otam bamalon 'asher talinu bo halayelah. joshua 4:4	vayiqra yehoshua' 'el shenem he'asar 'ish 'asher heikhin mibenei yisra'el 'ish 'ekhad 'ish 'ekhad mishabet. joshua 4:5	vayomer lahem yehoshua' 'ibru lifnei 'aron yhvh 'eloheikhem 'el tokh hayarden veharimu lakhem 'ish 'eben 'akhat 'al shikhmo lemispar shibtei benei yisra'el. joshua 4:6	lema'an tihyeh zot 'ot beqirbekhem ki yish'alun beneikhem makhar leimor mah ha'abanim ha'eleh lakhem. joshua 4:7	va'amartem lahem 'asher nikhretu meimei hayarden mipenei 'aron berit yhvh be'abero bayarden nikhretu mei hayarden vehayu ha'abanim ha'eleh lezikaron libnei yisra'el 'ad 'olam. joshua 4:8	vaya'asu khen benei yisra'el ka'asher zivah yehoshua' vayis'u shetei 'esreh 'abanim mitokh hayarden ka'asher diber yhvh 'el yehoshua' lemispar shibtei benei yisra'el vaya'abirum 'imam 'el hamalon vayanikhum sham. joshua 4:9	ushetem 'esreh 'abanim heiqim yehoshua' betokh hayarden takhat mazab raglei hakohanim nose'ei 'aron haberit vayihyu sham 'ad hayom hazeh. joshua 4:10	vehakohanim nose'ei ha'aron 'omedim betokh hayarden 'ad tom kal hadabar 'asher zivah yhvh 'et yehoshua' ledaber 'el ha'am kekhol 'asher zivah mosheh 'et yehoshua' vaymaharu ha'am vaya'aboru. joshua 4:11	vayhi ka'asher tam kal ha'am la'abor vaya'abor 'aron yhvh vehakohanim lifnei ha'am. joshua 4:12	vaya'abru benei re'uben ubenei gad vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh khamushim lifnei benei yisra'el ka'asher diber 'aleihem mosheh. joshua 4:13	ke'arba'im 'elef khaluzei hazaba 'aberu lifnei yhvh lamilkhamah 'el 'arbot yerikho. joshua 4:14	bayom hahu gidal yhvh 'et yehoshua' be'einei kal yisra'el vayir'u 'oto ka'asher yare'u 'et mosheh kal yemei khayav. joshua 4:15	vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' leimor. joshua 4:16	zaveh 'et hakohanim nose'ei 'aron ha'eidut veya'alu min hayarden. joshua 4:17	vayzav yehoshua' 'et hakohanim leimor 'alu min hayarden. joshua 4:18	vayhi ba'alot ka'alot hakohanim nose'ei 'aron berit yhvh mitokh hayarden nitequ kapot raglei hakohanim 'el hekharabah vayashubu mei hayarden limqomam vayeilekhu khitmol shilshom 'al kal gedotav. joshua 4:19	veha'am 'alu min hayarden be'asor lakhodesh harishon vayakhanu bagilgal biqzeh mizrakh yerikho. joshua 4:20	ve'et shetem 'esreh ha'abanim ha'eleh 'asher laqekhu min hayarden heiqim yehoshua' bagilgal. joshua 4:21	vayomer 'el benei yisra'el leimor 'asher yish'alun beneikhem makhar 'et 'abotam leimor mah ha'abanim ha'eleh. joshua 4:22	vehoda'tem 'et beneikhem leimor bayabashah 'abar yisra'el 'et hayarden hazeh. joshua 4:23	'asher hobish yhvh 'eloheikhem 'et mei hayarden mipeneikhem 'ad 'aberekhem ka'asher 'asah yhvh 'eloheikhem leyam suf 'asher hobish mipaneinu 'ad 'abereinu. joshua 4:24	lema'an da'at kal 'amei ha'arez 'et yad yhvh ki khazaqah hi lema'an yeratem 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem kal hayamim. joshua 5:1	vayhi khishmoa' kal malkhei ha'emori 'asher be'eiber hayarden yamah vekhal malkhei hakena'ani 'asher 'al hayam 'et 'asher hobish yhvh 'et mei hayarden mipenei benei yisra'el 'ad 'aberanu 'aberam vayimas lebabam velo hayah bam 'od ruakh mipenei benei yisra'el. joshua 5:2	ba'et hahi 'amar yhvh 'el yehoshua' 'aseh lekha kharbot zurim veshub mol 'et benei yisra'el sheinit. joshua 5:3	vaya'as lo yehoshua' kharbot zurim vayamal 'et benei yisra'el 'el gib'at ha'aralot. joshua 5:4	vezeh hadabar 'asher mal yehoshua' kal ha'am hayozei mimizrayim hazekharim kol 'anshei hamilkhamah meitu bamidbar baderekh bezeitam mimizrayim. joshua 5:5	ki mulim hayu kal ha'am hayoze'im vekhal ha'am hayilodim bamidbar baderekh bezeitam mimizrayim lo malu. joshua 5:6	ki 'arba'im shanah halekhu benei yisra'el bamidbar 'ad tom kal hago 'anshei hamilkhamah hayoze'im mimizrayim 'asher lo shame'u beqol yhvh 'asher nishba' yhvh lahem lebilti har'otam 'et ha'arez 'asher nishba' yhvh la'abotam latet lanu 'erez zabat khalab udebash. joshua 5:7	ve'et beneihem heiqim takhtam 'otam mal yehoshua' ki 'areilim hayu ki lo malu 'otam badarekh. joshua 5:8	vayhi ka'asher tamu khal hago lehimol vayeishebu takhtam bamakhaneh 'ad khayotam. joshua 5:9	vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' hayom galoti 'et kherpat mizrayim mei'aleikhem vayiqra shem hamaqom hahu gilgal 'ad hayom hazeh. joshua 5:10	vayakhanu benei yisra'el bagilgal vaya'asu 'et hapesakh be'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh ba'ereb be'arbot yerikho. joshua 5:11	vayokhelu mei'abur ha'arez mimakhorat hapesakh mazot veqalui be'ezem hayom hazeh. joshua 5:12	vayishbot haman mimakhorat be'akhelam mei'abur ha'arez velo hayah 'od libnei yisra'el man vayokhelu mitebu'at 'erez kena'an bashanah hahi. joshua 5:13	vayhi bihyot yehoshua' birikho vayisa 'einav vayar vehineh 'ish 'omed lenegdo vekharbo shelufah beyado vayeilekh yehoshua' 'eilav vayomer lo halanu 'atah 'im lezareinu. joshua 5:14	vayomer lo ki 'ani sar zeba yhvh 'atah bati vayipol yehoshua' 'el panav 'arzah vayishtakhu vayomer lo mah 'adoni medaber 'el 'abdo. joshua 5:15	vayomer sar zeba yhvh 'el yehoshua' shal na'alkha mei'al raglekha ki hamaqom 'asher 'atah 'omed 'alav qodesh hu vaya'as yehoshua' ken. joshua 6:1	virikho sogeret umesugeret mipenei benei yisra'el 'en yozei ve'en ba. joshua 6:2	vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' re'eh natati beyadekha 'et yerikho ve'et malkah giborei hekhayil. joshua 6:3	vesabotem 'et ha'ir kol 'anshei hamilkhamah haqef 'et ha'ir pa'am 'ekhat koh ta'aseh sheishet yamim. joshua 6:4	veshib'ah khohanim yis'u shib'ah shofrot hayoblim lifnei ha'aron ubayom hashebi'i tasobu 'et ha'ir sheba' pe'amim vehakohanim yitqe'u bashofarot. joshua 6:5	vehayah bimshokh beqeren hayobel beshame'akhem keshame'akhem 'et qol hashofar yari'u khal ha'am teru'ah gedolah venafelah khomat ha'ir takhteha ve'alu ha'am 'ish negdo. joshua 6:6	vayiqra yehoshua' bin nun 'el hakohanim vayomer 'aleihem se'u 'et 'aron haberit veshib'ah khohanim yis'u shib'ah shofrot yoblim lifnei 'aron yhvh. joshua 6:7	vayomeru vayomer 'el ha'am 'ibru vesobu 'et ha'ir vehekhaluz ya'abor lifnei 'aron yhvh. joshua 6:8	vayhi ke'emor yehoshua' 'el ha'am veshib'ah hakohanim nose'im shib'ah shofrot hayoblim lifnei yhvh 'aberu vetaqe'u bashofarot va'aron berit yhvh holekh 'akhareihem. joshua 6:9	vehekhaluz holekh lifnei hakohanim taqe'u toqe'ei hashofarot veham'asef holekh 'akharei ha'aron halokh vetaqoa' bashofarot. joshua 6:10	ve'et ha'am zivah yehoshua' leimor lo tari'u velo tashmi'u 'et qolkhem velo yeizei mipikhem dabar 'ad yom 'ameri 'aleikhem hari'u vahari'otem. joshua 6:11	vayaseb 'aron yhvh 'et ha'ir haqef pa'am 'ekhat vayabo'u hamakhaneh vayalinu bamakhaneh. joshua 6:12	vayashkem yehoshua' baboqer vayis'u hakohanim 'et 'aron yhvh. joshua 6:13	veshib'ah hakohanim nose'im shib'ah shofrot hayobelim lifnei 'aron yhvh holekhim halokh vetaqe'u bashofarot vehekhaluz holekh lifneihem veham'asef holekh 'akharei 'aron yhvh holekh halokh vetaqoa' bashofarot. joshua 6:14	vayasobu 'et ha'ir bayom hasheini pa'am 'akhat vayashubu hamakhaneh koh 'asu sheishet yamim. joshua 6:15	vayhi bayom hashebi'i vayashkimu ka'alot hashakhar vayasobu 'et ha'ir kamishpat hazeh sheba' pe'amim raq bayom hahu sabebu 'et ha'ir sheba' pe'amim. joshua 6:16	vayhi bapa'am hashebi'it taqe'u hakohanim bashofarot vayomer yehoshua' 'el ha'am hari'u ki natan yhvh lakhem 'et ha'ir. joshua 6:17	vehayetah ha'ir kheirem hi vekhal 'asher bah yhvh raq rakhab hazonah tikhyeh hi vekhal 'asher 'itah babayit ki hekhbe'atah 'et hamal'akhim 'asher shalakhenu. joshua 6:18	veraq 'atem shimru min hakheirem pen takharimu uleqakhtem min hakheirem vesamtem 'et makhaneh yisra'el lekheirem va'akhartem 'oto. joshua 6:19	vekhol kesef vezahab ukhelei nekhoshet ubarzel qodesh hu yhvh 'ozar yhvh yabo. joshua 6:20	vayara' ha'am vayitqe'u bashofarot vayhi khishmoa' ha'am 'et qol hashofar vayari'u ha'am teru'ah gedolah vatipol hakhomah takhteha vaya'al ha'am ha'irah 'ish negdo vayilkedu 'et ha'ir. joshua 6:21	vayakharimu 'et kal 'asher ba'ir mei'ish ve'ad 'ishah mina'ar ve'ad zaqen ve'ad shor vaseh vakhamor lefi khareb. joshua 6:22	velishnayim ha'anashim hamragelim 'et ha'arez 'amar yehoshua' bo'u bet ha'ishah hazonah vehozi'u misham 'et ha'ishah ve'et kal 'asher lah ka'asher nishba'tem lah. joshua 6:23	vayabo'u hane'arim hamragelim vayozi'u 'et rakhab ve'et 'abiha ve'et 'imah ve'et 'akheha ve'et kal 'asher lah ve'et kal mishpekhoteha hozi'u vayanikhum mikhuz lemakhaneh yisra'el. joshua 6:24	veha'ir sarefu ba'esh vekhal 'asher bah raq hakesef vehazahab ukhelei hanekhoshet vehabarzel natenu 'ozar bet yhvh. joshua 6:25	ve'et rakhab hazonah ve'et bet 'abiha ve'et kal 'asher lah hekheyah yehoshua' vateisheb beqereb yisra'el 'ad hayom hazeh ki hekhbi'ah 'et hamal'akhim 'asher shalakh yehoshua' leragel 'et yerikho. joshua 6:26	vayashba' yehoshua' ba'et hahi leimor 'arur ha'ish lifnei yhvh 'asher yaqum ubanah 'et ha'ir hazot 'et yerikho bibkhoro yeyasedenah ubiz'iro yazib delateha. joshua 6:27	vayhi yhvh 'et yehoshua' vayhi shame'o bekhal ha'arez. joshua 7:1	vayim'alu benei yisra'el ma'al bakheirem vayiqakh 'akhan ben karmi ben zabdi ben zerakh lemateh yehudah min hakheirem vayikhar 'af yhvh bibnei yisra'el. joshua 7:2	vayishlakh yehoshua' 'anashim mirikho ha'ai 'asher 'im bet 'aven miqedem lebet 'el vayomer 'aleihem leimor 'alu veragelu 'et ha'arez vaya'alu ha'anashim vayragelu 'et ha'ai. joshua 7:3	vayashubu 'el yehoshua' vayomeru 'eilav 'al ya'al kal ha'am ke'alpayim 'ish 'o kishloshet 'alafim 'ish ya'alu veyaku 'et ha'ai 'al teyaga' shamah 'et kal ha'am ki me'at hemah. joshua 7:4	vaya'alu min ha'am shamah kishloshet 'alafim 'ish vayanusu lifnei 'anshei ha'ai. joshua 7:5	vayaku meihem 'anshei ha'ai kishloshim veshishah 'ish vayirdefum lifnei hasha'ar 'ad hashebarim vayakum bamorad vayimas lebab ha'am vayhi lemayim. joshua 7:6	vayiqra' yehoshua' simlotav vayipol 'al panav 'arzah lifnei 'aron yhvh 'ad ha'ereb hu veziqnei yisra'el vaya'alu 'afar 'al rosham. joshua 7:7	vayomer yehoshua' 'ahah 'adonai yhvh lamah hei'abarta ha'abir 'et ha'am hazeh 'et hayarden latet 'otanu beyad ha'emori leha'abideinu velu ho'alnu vaneisheb be'eiber hayarden. joshua 7:8	bi 'adonai mah 'omar 'akharei 'asher hafakh yisra'el 'oref lifnei 'oyebav. joshua 7:9	veyishme'u hakena'ani vekhol yoshebei ha'arez venasabu 'aleinu vehikhritu 'et shemeinu min ha'arez umah ta'aseh leshimkha hagadol. joshua 7:10	vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' qum lakh lamah zeh 'atah nofel 'al panekha. joshua 7:11	khata yisra'el vegam 'aberu 'et beriti 'asher ziviti 'otam vegam laqekhu min hakheirem vegam ganebu vegam kikhashu vegam samu bikhleihem. joshua 7:12	velo yukhlu benei yisra'el laqum lifnei 'oyebeihem 'oref yifnu lifnei 'oyebeihem ki hayu lekheirem lo 'osif lihyot 'imakhem 'im lo tashmidu hakheirem miqirbekhem. joshua 7:13	qum qadesh 'et ha'am ve'amarta hitqadeshu lemakhar ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el kheirem beqirbekha yisra'el lo tukhal laqum lifnei 'oyebekha 'ad hasirekhem hakheirem miqirbekhem. joshua 7:14	veniqrabtem baboqer leshibteikhem vehayah hasheibet 'asher yilkedenu yhvh yiqrab lamishpakhot vehamishpakhah 'asher yilkedenah yhvh tiqrab labatim vehabayit 'asher yilkedenu yhvh yiqrab lagebarim. joshua 7:15	vehayah hanilkad bakheirem yisaref ba'esh 'oto ve'et kal 'asher lo ki 'abar 'et berit yhvh vekhi 'asah nebalah beyisra'el. joshua 7:16	vayashkem yehoshua' baboqer vayaqreb 'et yisra'el lishbatav vayilakhed sheibet yehudah. joshua 7:17	vayaqreb 'et mishpakhat yehudah vayilkod 'et mishpakhat hazarkhi vayaqreb 'et mishpakhat hazarkhi lagebarim vayilakhed zabdi. joshua 7:18	vayaqreb 'et beito lagebarim vayilakhed 'akhan ben karmi ben zabdi ben zerakh lemateh yehudah. joshua 7:19	vayomer yehoshua' 'el 'akhan beni sim na khabod yhvh 'elohei yisra'el veten lo todah vehaged na li meh 'asita 'al tekhakhed mimeni. joshua 7:20	vaya'an 'akhan 'et yehoshua' vayomar 'amenah 'anokhi khatati yhvh 'elohei yisra'el vekhazot vekhazot 'asiti. joshua 7:21	va'er'eh va'eire bashalal 'aderet shin'ar 'akhat tobah umatayim sheqalim kesef uleshon zahab 'ekhad khamishim sheqalim mishqalo va'ekhmedem va'eqakhem vehinam temunim ba'arez betokh ha'aholi vehakesef takhteha. joshua 7:22	vayishlakh yehoshua' mal'akhim vayaruzu ha'ohelah vehineh temunah be'aholo vehakesef takhteha. joshua 7:23	vayiqakhum mitokh ha'ohel vaybi'um 'el yehoshua' ve'el kal benei yisra'el vayaziqum lifnei yhvh. joshua 7:24	vayiqakh yehoshua' 'et 'akhan ben zerakh ve'et hakesef ve'et ha'aderet ve'et leshon hazahab ve'et banav ve'et benotav ve'et shoro ve'et khamoro ve'et zono ve'et 'aholo ve'et kal 'asher lo vekhal yisra'el 'imo vaya'alu 'otam 'eimeq 'akhor. joshua 7:25	vayomer yehoshua' meh 'akhartanu ya'korkha yhvh bayom hazeh vayirgemu 'oto khal yisra'el 'eben vayisrefu 'otam ba'esh vayisqelu 'otam ba'abanim. joshua 7:26	vayaqimu 'alav gal 'abanim gadol 'ad hayom hazeh vayashab yhvh meikharon 'apo 'al ken qara shem hamaqom hahu 'eimeq 'akhor 'ad hayom hazeh. joshua 8:1	vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' 'al tira ve'al teikhat qakh 'imekha 'et kal 'am hamilkhamah vequm 'aleh ha'ai re'eh natati beyadekha 'et melekh ha'ai ve'et 'amo ve'et 'iro ve'et 'arzo. joshua 8:2	ve'asita la'ai ulemalkah ka'asher 'asita lirikho ulemalkah raq shelalah ubehemtah tabozu lakhem sim lekha 'oreb la'ir mei'akhareha. joshua 8:3	vayaqam yehoshua' vekhal 'am hamilkhamah la'alot ha'ai vayibkhar yehoshua' sheloshim 'elef 'ish giborei hakhayil vayishlakhem layelah. joshua 8:4	vayzav 'otam leimor re'u 'atem 'orebim la'ir mei'akharei ha'ir 'al tarkhiqu min ha'ir me'od vihyitem kulekhem nekhonim. joshua 8:5	va'ani vekhal ha'am 'asher 'iti niqrab 'el ha'ir vehayah ki yeize'u liqrateinu ka'asher barishonah venasnu lifneihem. joshua 8:6	veyaze'u 'akhareinu 'ad hatiqeinu 'otam min ha'ir ki yomeru nasim lefaneinu ka'asher barishonah venasnu lifneihem. joshua 8:7	ve'atem taqumu meiha'oreb vehorashtem 'et ha'ir unetanah yhvh 'eloheikhem beyedkhem. joshua 8:8	vehayah ketafesekhem 'et ha'ir tazitu 'et ha'ir ba'esh kidbar yhvh ta'asu re'u ziviti 'etkhem. joshua 8:9	vayishlakhem yehoshua' vayeilekhu 'el hama'rab vayeishebu ben bet 'el uben ha'ai miyam la'ai vayalen yehoshua' balaylah hahu betokh ha'am. joshua 8:10	vayashkem yehoshua' baboqer vayifqod 'et ha'am vaya'al hu veziqnei yisra'el lifnei ha'am ha'ai. joshua 8:11	vekhal ha'am hamilkhamah 'asher 'ito 'alu vayigeshu vayabo'u neged ha'ir vayakhanu mizefon la'ai vehagai beino beinav uben ha'ai. joshua 8:12	vayiqakh kakhameishet 'alafim 'ish vayasem 'otam 'oreb ben bet 'el uben ha'ai miyam la'ir. joshua 8:13	vayasimu ha'am 'et kal hamakhaneh 'asher mizefon la'ir ve'et 'aqeibo miyam la'ir vayeilekh yehoshua' balaylah hahu betokh ha'eimeq. joshua 8:14	vayhi kir'ot melekh ha'ai vaymaharu vayashkimu vayeize'u 'anshei ha'ir liqrat yisra'el lamilkhamah hu vekhal 'amo lamo'ed lifnei ha'arabah vehu lo yada' ki 'oreb lo mei'akharei ha'ir. joshua 8:15	vayinage'u yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el lifneihem vayanusu derekh hamidbar. joshua 8:16	vayiza'aqu kal ha'am 'asher ba'ir ba'ai lirdof 'akhareihem vayirdefu 'akharei yehoshua' vayinatequ min ha'ir. joshua 8:17	velo nish'ar 'ish ba'ai ubet 'el 'asher lo yaze'u 'akharei yisra'el vaya'azbu 'et ha'ir petukhah vayirdefu 'akharei yisra'el. joshua 8:18	vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' neteh bakidon 'asher beyadekha 'el ha'ai ki beyadekha 'etenenah vayet yehoshua' bakidon 'asher beyado 'el ha'ir. joshua 8:19	veha'oreb qam meheirah mimeqomo vayaruzu kintot yado vayabo'u ha'ir vayilkeduha vaymaharu vayazitu 'et ha'ir ba'esh. joshua 8:20	vayifnu 'anshei ha'ai 'akhareihem vayir'u vehineh 'alah 'ashan ha'ir hashamaymah velo hayah bahem yadayim lanus henah vahenah veha'am hanas hamidbar nehpakh 'el harodef. joshua 8:21	vihoshua' vekhal yisra'el ra'u ki lakhad ha'oreb 'et ha'ir vekhi 'alah 'ashan ha'ir vayashubu vayaku 'et 'anshei ha'ai. joshua 8:22	ve'eleh yaze'u min ha'ir liqratam vayihyu leyisra'el batavekh 'eleh mizeh ve'eleh mizeh vayaku 'otam 'ad bilti hish'ir lo sarid ufalit. joshua 8:23	ve'et melekh ha'ai tafesu khai vayaqribu 'oto 'el yehoshua'. joshua 8:24	vayhi kekhalot yisra'el laharog 'et kal yoshebei ha'ai basadeh bamidbar 'asher redafum bo vayipelu khulam lefi khereb 'ad tumam vayashubu khal yisra'el ha'ai vayaku 'otah lefi khareb. joshua 8:25	vayhi khal hanofelim bayom hahu mei'ish ve'ad 'ishah shenem 'asar 'alef kol 'anshei ha'ai. joshua 8:26	vihoshua' lo heishib yado 'asher natah bakidon 'ad 'asher hekherim 'et kal yoshebei ha'ai. joshua 8:27	raq habeheimah ushelal ha'ir hahi bazezu lahem yisra'el kidbar yhvh 'asher zivah 'et yehoshua'. joshua 8:28	vayisrof yehoshua' 'et ha'ai vaysimeha tel 'olam shemamah 'ad hayom hazeh. joshua 8:29	ve'et melekh ha'ai talah 'al ha'ez 'ad 'et ha'areb ukhebo hashemesh zivah yehoshua' vayoridu 'et niblato min ha'ez vayashlikhu 'otah 'el petakh sha'ar ha'ir vayaqimu 'alav gal 'abanim gadol 'ad hayom hazeh. joshua 8:30	'az yibneh yehoshua' mizbeiakh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el behar 'eibal. joshua 8:31	ka'asher zivah mosheh 'ebed yhvh 'et benei yisra'el kakatub beseifer torat mosheh mizbakh 'abanim sheleimot 'asher lo heinif 'aleihen barzel vaya'alu 'alav 'olot yhvh vayizbekhu shelamim. joshua 8:32	vayikhtab sham 'al ha'abanim 'et mishneh torat mosheh 'asher katab lifnei benei yisra'el. joshua 8:33	vekhal yisra'el uzeqeinav veshoterim veshofetav 'omedim mizeh umizeh la'aron neged hakohanim halviyim nose'ei 'aron berit yhvh kager ka'ezrakh khezyo 'el mul har gerizim vehakhezyo 'el mul har 'eibal ka'asher zivah mosheh 'ebed yhvh lebarekh 'et ha'am yisra'el barishonah. joshua 8:34	ve'akharei khen qara 'et kal dibrei hatorah haberakhah vehaqelalah kekhal hakatub beseifer hatorah. joshua 8:35	lo hayah dabar mikol 'asher zivah mosheh 'asher lo qara yehoshua' neged kal qehal yisra'el vehanashim vehataf vehager haholekh beqirbam. joshua 9:1	vayhi khishmoa' kal hamelakhim 'asher be'eiber hayarden bahar ubashefeilah ubekhol khof hayam hagadol 'el mul halebanon hakhiti veha'emori hakena'ani haperizi hakhivi vehaybusi. joshua 9:2	vayitqabezu yakhdav lehilakhem 'im yehoshua' ve'im yisra'el peh 'ekhad. joshua 9:3	veyoshebei gib'on shame'u 'et 'asher 'asah yehoshua' lirikho vela'ai. joshua 9:4	vaya'asu gam hemah be'aremah vayeilekhu vayiztayaru vayiqkhu saqim balim lakhamoreihem venodot yayin balim umebuqa'im umezorarim. joshua 9:5	une'alot balot umetula'ot beragleihem uselamot balot 'aleihem vekhol lekhem zeidam yabesh hayah niqudim. joshua 9:6	vayeilekhu 'el yehoshua' 'el hamakhaneh hagilgal vayomeru 'eilav ve'el 'ish yisra'el mei'erez rekhoqah banu ve'atah kirtu lanu berit. joshua 9:7	vayomeru vayomer 'ish yisra'el 'el hakhivi 'ulai beqirbi 'atah yosheb ve'ekh 'ekhrot 'ekhrat lekha berit. joshua 9:8	vayomeru 'el yehoshua' 'abadekha 'anakhenu vayomer 'aleihem yehoshua' mi 'atem umei'ayin tabo'u. joshua 9:9	vayomeru 'eilav mei'erez rekhoqah me'od ba'u 'abadekha leshem yhvh 'elohekha ki shama'nu shame'o ve'et kal 'asher 'asah bemizrayim. joshua 9:10	ve'et kal 'asher 'asah lishnei malkhei ha'emori 'asher be'eiber hayarden lesikhon melekh kheshbon ule'og melekh habashan 'asher be'ashtarot. joshua 9:11	vayomeru 'eileinu zeqeineinu vekhal yoshebei 'arzeinu leimor qekhu beyedkhem zeidah laderekh ulekhu liqratam va'amartem 'aleihem 'abdeikhem 'anakhnu ve'atah kirtu lanu berit. joshua 9:12	zeh lakhmeinu kham hiztayadnu 'oto mibateinu beyom zeiteinu lalekhet 'aleikhem ve'atah hineh yabesh vehayah niqudim. joshua 9:13	ve'eleh nodot hayayin 'asher mileinu khadashim vehineh hitbaqa'u ve'eleh salmoteinu une'aleinu balu meirob haderekh me'od. joshua 9:14	vayiqkhu ha'anashim mizeidam ve'et pi yhvh lo sha'alu. joshua 9:15	vaya'as lahem yehoshua' shalom vayikhrot lahem berit lekhayotam vayishabe'u lahem nesi'ei ha'eidah. joshua 9:16	vayhi miqzeh sheloshet yamim 'akharei 'asher karetu lahem berit vayishme'u ki qerobim hem 'eilav ubeqirbo hem yoshebim. joshua 9:17	vayis'u benei yisra'el vayabo'u 'el 'areihem bayom hashelishi ve'areihem gib'on vehakefirah ube'eirot veqiryat ye'arim. joshua 9:18	velo hikum benei yisra'el ki nishbe'u lahem nesi'ei ha'eidah yhvh 'elohei yisra'el vayilonu khal ha'eidah 'al hanesi'im. joshua 9:19	vayomeru khal hanesi'im 'el kal ha'eidah 'anakhnu nishba'nu lahem yhvh 'elohei yisra'el ve'atah lo nukhal lingoa' bahem. joshua 9:20	zot na'aseh lahem vehakhayeh 'otam velo yihyeh 'aleinu qezef 'al hashebu'ah 'asher nishba'nu lahem. joshua 9:21	vayomeru 'aleihem hanesi'im yikhyu vayihyu khotebei 'eizim vesho'abei mayim lekhal ha'eidah ka'asher diberu lahem hanesi'im. joshua 9:22	vayiqra lahem yehoshua' vaydaber 'aleihem leimor lamah rimitem 'otanu leimor rekhoqim 'anakhnu mikem me'od ve'atem beqirbeinu yoshebim. joshua 9:23	ve'atah 'arurim 'atem velo yikaret mikem 'ebed vekhotebei 'eizim vesho'abei mayim lebet 'elohai. joshua 9:24	vaya'anu 'et yehoshua' vayomeru ki huged hugad la'abadekha 'et 'asher zivah yhvh 'elohekha 'et mosheh 'abdo latet lakhem 'et kal ha'arez ulehashmid 'et kal yoshebei ha'arez mipeneikhem vanira me'od lenafshoteinu mipeneikhem vana'aseh 'et hadabar hazeh. joshua 9:25	ve'atah hinu beyadekha katob vekhayashar be'einekha la'asot lanu 'aseh. joshua 9:26	vaya'as lahem ken vayazel 'otam miyad benei yisra'el velo haragum. joshua 9:27	vayitenem yehoshua' bayom hahu khotebei 'eizim vesho'abei mayim la'eidah ulemizbakh yhvh 'ad hayom hazeh 'el hamaqom 'asher yibkhar. joshua 10:1	vayhi khishmoa' 'adoni zedeq melekh yerushalim ki lakhad yehoshua' 'et ha'ai vayakharimah ka'asher 'asah lirikho ulemalkah ken 'asah la'ai ulemalkah vekhi hishlimu yoshebei gib'on 'et yisra'el vayihyu beqirbam. joshua 10:2	vayire'u me'od ki 'ir gedolah gib'on ke'akhat 'arei hamamlakhah vekhi hi gedolah min ha'ai vekhal 'anasheha giborim. joshua 10:3	vayishlakh 'adoni zedeq melekh yerushalim 'el hoham melekh khebron ve'el pir'am melekh yarmut ve'el yafia' melekh lakhish ve'el debir melekh 'eglon leimor. joshua 10:4	'alu 'eilai ve'izruni venakeh 'et gib'on ki hishlimah 'et yehoshua' ve'et benei yisra'el. joshua 10:5	vayei'asefu vaya'alu khameishet malkhei ha'emori melekh yerushalim melekh khebron melekh yarmut melekh lakhish melekh 'eglon hem vekhal makhaneihem vayakhanu 'al gib'on vayilakhamu 'aleha. joshua 10:6	vayishlekhu 'anshei gib'on 'el yehoshua' 'el hamakhaneh hagilgalah leimor 'al teref yadekha mei'abadekha 'aleh 'eileinu meheirah vehoshi'ah lanu ve'azereinu ki niqbezu 'eileinu kal malkhei ha'emori yoshebei hahar. joshua 10:7	vaya'al yehoshua' min hagilgal hu vekhal 'am hamilkhamah 'imo vekhol giborei hekhayil. joshua 10:8	vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' 'al tira meihem ki beyadekha netatim lo ya'amod 'ish meihem befanekha. joshua 10:9	vayabo 'aleihem yehoshua' pit'om kal halaylah 'alah min hagilgal. joshua 10:10	vayhumem yhvh lifnei yisra'el vayakem makah gedolah begib'on vayirdefem derekh ma'aleh bet khoron vayakem 'ad 'azeiqah ve'ad maqeidah. joshua 10:11	vayhi benusam mipenei yisra'el hem bemorad bet khoron yhvh hishlikh 'aleihem 'abanim gedolot min hashamayim 'ad 'azeiqah vayamutu rabim 'asher meitu be'abnei habarad mei'asher haregu benei yisra'el bekhareb. joshua 10:12	'az yedaber yehoshua' yhvh beyom tet yhvh 'et ha'emori lifnei benei yisra'el vayomer le'einei yisra'el mesh begib'on dom veyareiakh be'eimeq 'ayalon. joshua 10:13	vayidom hashemesh veyareiakh 'amad 'ad yiqom go 'oyebav halo hi khetubah 'al seifer hayashar vaya'amod hashemesh bakhazi hashamayim velo 'az labo keyom tamim. joshua 10:14	velo hayah kayom hahu lefanav ve'akharav lishmoa' yhvh beqol 'ish ki yhvh nilkham leyisra'el. joshua 10:15	vayashab yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo 'el hamakhaneh hagilgalah. joshua 10:16	vayanusu khameishet hamelakhim ha'eleh vayeikhabe'u bame'arah bemaqeidah. joshua 10:17	vayugad lihoshua' leimor nimze'u khameishet hamelakhim nekhbe'im bame'arah bemaqeidah. joshua 10:18	vayomer yehoshua' golu 'abanim gedolot 'el pi hame'arah vehafqidu 'aleha 'anashim leshameram. joshua 10:19	ve'atem 'al ta'amodu ridfu 'akharei 'oyebeikhem vezinabtem 'otam 'al titenum labo 'el 'areihem ki netanam yhvh 'eloheikhem beyedkhem. joshua 10:20	vayhi kekhalot yehoshua' ubenei yisra'el lehakotam makah gedolah me'od 'ad tumam vehaseridim saredu meihem vayabo'u 'el 'arei hamibzar. joshua 10:21	vayashubu khal ha'am 'el hamakhaneh 'el yehoshua' maqeidah beshalom lo kharaz libnei yisra'el le'ish 'et leshono. joshua 10:22	vayomer yehoshua' pitkhu 'et pi hame'arah vehozi'u 'eilai 'et khameishet hamelakhim ha'eleh min hame'arah. joshua 10:23	vaya'asu khen vayozi'u 'eilav 'et khameishet hamelakhim ha'eleh min hame'arah 'et melekh yerushalim 'et melekh khebron 'et melekh yarmut 'et melekh lakhish 'et melekh 'eglon. joshua 10:24	vayhi kehozi'am 'et hamelakhim ha'eleh 'el yehoshua' vayiqra yehoshua' 'el kal 'ish yisra'el vayomer 'el qezinei 'anshei hamilkhamah hehalekhu 'ito qirbu mu 'et ragleikhem 'al zaverei hamelakhim ha'eleh vayiqrebu vayasimu 'et ragleihem 'al zavereihem. joshua 10:25	vayomer 'aleihem yehoshua' 'al tire'u ve'al teikhatu khizqu ve'imzu ki khakhah ya'aseh yhvh lekhal 'oyebeikhem 'asher 'atem nilkhamim 'otam. joshua 10:26	vayakem yehoshua' 'akharei khen vaymitem vayitlem 'al khamishah 'eizim vayihyu teluyim 'al ha'eizim 'ad ha'areb. joshua 10:27	vayhi le'et bo hashemesh zivah yehoshua' vayoridum mei'al ha'eizim vayashlikhum 'el hame'arah 'asher nekhbe'u sham vayasimu 'abanim gedolot 'al pi hame'arah 'ad 'ezem hayom hazeh. joshua 10:28	ve'et maqeidah lakhad yehoshua' bayom hahu vayakeha lefi khereb ve'et malkah hekherim 'otam ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah lo hish'ir sarid vaya'as lemelekh maqeidah ka'asher 'asah lemelekh yerikho. joshua 10:29	vaya'abor yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo mimaqeidah libnah vayilakhem 'im libnah. joshua 10:30	vayiten yhvh gam 'otah beyad yisra'el ve'et malkah vayakeha lefi khereb ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah lo hish'ir bah sarid vaya'as lemalkah ka'asher 'asah lemelekh yerikho. joshua 10:31	vaya'abor yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo milibnah lakhishah vayikhan 'aleha vayilakhem bah. joshua 10:32	vayiten yhvh 'et lakhish beyad yisra'el vayilkedah bayom hasheini vayakeha lefi khereb ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah kekhol 'asher 'asah lelibnah. joshua 10:33	'az 'alah horam melekh gezer la'zor 'et lakhish vayakeihu yehoshua' ve'et 'amo 'ad bilti hish'ir lo sarid. joshua 10:34	vaya'abor yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo milakhish 'eglonah vayakhanu 'aleha vayilakhamu 'aleha. joshua 10:35	vayilkeduha bayom hahu vayakuha lefi khereb ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah bayom hahu hekherim kekhol 'asher 'asah lelakhish. joshua 10:36	vaya'al yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo mei'eglonah khebronah vayilakhamu 'aleha. joshua 10:37	vayilkeduha vayakuha lefi khereb ve'et malkah ve'et kal 'areha ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah lo hish'ir sarid kekhol 'asher 'asah le'eglon vayakharem 'otah ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah. joshua 10:38	vayashab yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo debirah vayilakhem 'aleha. joshua 10:39	vayilkedah ve'et malkah ve'et kal 'areha vayakum lefi khereb vayakharimu 'et kal nefesh 'asher bah lo hish'ir sarid ka'asher 'asah lekhebron ken 'asah lidbirah ulemalkah vekha'asher 'asah lelibnah ulemalkah. joshua 10:40	vayakeh yehoshua' 'et kal ha'arez hahar vehanegeb vehashefeilah veha'asheidot ve'et kal malkheihem lo hish'ir sarid ve'et kal haneshamah hekherim ka'asher zivah yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. joshua 10:41	vayakem yehoshua' miqadesh barneia' ve'ad 'azah ve'et kal 'erez goshen ve'ad gib'on. joshua 10:42	ve'et kal hamelakhim ha'eleh ve'et 'arzam lakhad yehoshua' pa'am 'ekhat ki yhvh 'elohei yisra'el nilkham leyisra'el. joshua 10:43	vayashab yehoshua' vekhal yisra'el 'imo 'el hamakhaneh hagilgalah. joshua 11:1	vayhi kishmoa' yabin melekh khazor vayishlakh 'el yobab melekh madon ve'el melekh shimron ve'el melekh 'akhshaf. joshua 11:2	ve'el hamelakhim 'asher mizefon bahar uba'arabah negeb kinarot ubashefeilah ubenafot dor miyam. joshua 11:3	hakena'ani mimizrakh umiyam veha'emori vehakhiti vehaperizi vehaybusi bahar vehakhivi takhat khermon be'erez hamizpah. joshua 11:4	vayeize'u hem vekhal makhaneihem 'imam 'am rab kakhol 'asher 'al sefat hayam larob vesus varekheb rab me'od. joshua 11:5	vayiva'adu kol hamelakhim ha'eleh vayabo'u vayakhanu yakhdav 'el mei meirom lehilakhem 'im yisra'el. joshua 11:6	vayomer yhvh 'el yehoshua' 'al tira mipeneihem ki makhar ka'et hazot 'anokhi noten 'et kulam khalalim lifnei yisra'el 'et suseihem te'aqer ve'et markeboteihem tisrof ba'esh. joshua 11:7	vayabo yehoshua' vekhal 'am hamilkhamah 'imo 'aleihem 'al mei meirom pit'om vayipelu bahem. joshua 11:8	vayitenem yhvh beyad yisra'el vayakum vayirdefum 'ad zidon rabah ve'ad misrefot mayim ve'ad biq'at mizpeh mizrakhah vayakum 'ad bilti hish'ir lahem sarid. joshua 11:9	vaya'as lahem yehoshua' ka'asher 'amar lo yhvh 'et suseihem 'iqer ve'et markeboteihem saraf ba'esh. joshua 11:10	vayashab yehoshua' ba'et hahi vayilkod 'et khazor ve'et malkah hikah bekhareb ki khazor lefanim hi rosh kal hamamlakhot ha'eleh. joshua 11:11	vayaku 'et kal hanefesh 'asher bah lefi khereb hakharem lo notar kal neshamah ve'et khazor saraf ba'esh. joshua 11:12	ve'et kal 'arei hamelakhim ha'eleh ve'et kal malkheihem lakhad yehoshua' vayakem lefi khereb hekherim 'otam ka'asher zivah mosheh 'ebed yhvh. joshua 11:13	raq kal he'arim ha'omedot 'al tilam lo serafam yisra'el zulati 'et khazor lebadah saraf yehoshua'. joshua 11:14	vekhol shelal he'arim ha'eleh vehabeheimah bazezu lahem benei yisra'el raq 'et kal ha'adam hiku lefi khereb 'ad hishmidam 'otam lo hish'iru kal neshamah. joshua 11:15	ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh 'abdo ken zivah mosheh 'et yehoshua' vekhen 'asah yehoshua' lo heisir dabar mikol 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. joshua 11:16	vayiqakh yehoshua' 'et kal ha'arez hazot hahar ve'et kal hanegeb ve'et kal 'erez hagoshen ve'et hashefeilah ve'et ha'arabah ve'et har yisra'el ushefeilatoh. joshua 11:17	min hahar hekhalaq ha'oleh sei'ir ve'ad ba'al gad bebiq'at halebanon takhat har khermon ve'et kal malkheihem lakhad vayakem vaymitem. joshua 11:18	yamim rabim 'asah yehoshua' 'et kal hamelakhim ha'eleh milkhamah. joshua 11:19	lo hayetah 'ir 'asher hishlimah 'el benei yisra'el bilti hakhivi yoshebei gib'on 'et hakol laqekhu bamilkhamah. joshua 11:20	ki mei'et yhvh hayetah lekhazeq 'et libam liqrat hamilkhamah 'et yisra'el lema'an hakharimam lebilti heyot lahem tekhinah ki lema'an hashmidam ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. joshua 11:21	vayabo yehoshua' ba'et hahi vayakhret 'et ha'anaqim min hahar min khebron min debir min 'anab umikol har yehudah umikol har yisra'el 'im 'areihem hekherimam yehoshua'. joshua 11:22	lo notar 'anaqim be'erez benei yisra'el raq be'azah begat ube'ashdod nish'aru. joshua 11:23	vayiqakh yehoshua' 'et kal ha'arez kekhol 'asher diber yhvh 'el mosheh vayitenah yehoshua' lenakhalah leyisra'el kemakhleqotam leshibteihem veha'arez shaqetah mimilkhamah. joshua 12:1	ve'eleh malkhei ha'arez 'asher hiku benei yisra'el vayirshu 'et 'arzam be'eiber hayarden mizrekhah hashamesh minakhal 'arnon 'ad har khermon vekhal ha'arabah mizrakhah. joshua 12:2	sikhon melekh ha'emori hayosheb bekheshbon moshel mei'aro'er 'asher 'al sefat nakhal 'arnon vetokh hanakhal vakhazi hagil'ad ve'ad yaboq hanakhal gebul benei 'amon. joshua 12:3	veha'arabah 'ad yam kinrot mizrakhah ve'ad yam ha'arabah yam hamelakh mizrakhah derekh bet hayshimot umiteiman takhat 'ashdot hapisgah. joshua 12:4	ugebul 'og melekh habashan miyeter harefa'im hayosheb be'ashtarot ube'edre'i. joshua 12:5	umoshel behar khermon ubesalkhah ubekhal habashan 'ad gebul hageshuri vehama'akhati vakhazi hagil'ad gebul sikhon melekh kheshbon. joshua 12:6	mosheh 'ebed yhvh ubenei yisra'el hikum vayitenah mosheh 'ebed yhvh yerushah laru'ubeini velagadi velakhazi sheibet hamnasheh. joshua 12:7	ve'eleh malkhei ha'arez 'asher hikah yehoshua' ubenei yisra'el be'eiber hayarden yamah miba'al gad bebiq'at halebanon ve'ad hahar hekhalaq ha'oleh sei'irah vayitenah yehoshua' leshibtei yisra'el yerushah kemakhleqotam. joshua 12:8	bahar ubashefeilah uba'arabah uba'asheidot ubamidbar ubanegeb hakhiti ha'emori vehakena'ani haperizi hakhivi vehaybusi. joshua 12:9	melekh yerikho 'ekhad melekh ha'ai 'asher mizad bet 'el 'ekhad. joshua 12:10	melekh yerushalim 'ekhad melekh khebron 'ekhad. joshua 12:11	melekh yarmut 'ekhad melekh lakhish 'ekhad. joshua 12:12	melekh 'eglon 'ekhad melekh gezer 'ekhad. joshua 12:13	melekh debir 'ekhad melekh geder 'ekhad. joshua 12:14	melekh kharemah 'ekhad melekh 'arad 'ekhad. joshua 12:15	melekh libnah 'ekhad melekh 'adulam 'ekhad. joshua 12:16	melekh maqeidah 'ekhad melekh bet 'el 'ekhad. joshua 12:17	melekh tapuakh 'ekhad melekh kheifer 'ekhad. joshua 12:18	melekh 'afeq 'ekhad melekh lasharon 'ekhad. joshua 12:19	melekh madon 'ekhad melekh khazor 'ekhad. joshua 12:20	melekh shimron mer'on 'ekhad melekh 'akhshaf 'ekhad. joshua 12:21	melekh ta'nakh 'ekhad melekh megido 'ekhad. joshua 12:22	melekh qedesh 'ekhad melekh yaqeno'am lakarmel 'ekhad. joshua 12:23	melekh dor lenafat dor 'ekhad melekh goyim legilgal 'ekhad. joshua 12:24	melekh tirzah 'ekhad kal melakhim sheloshim ve'ekhad. joshua 13:1	vihoshua' zaqen ba bayamim vayomer yhvh 'eilav 'atah zaqantah bata bayamim veha'arez nish'arah harbeh me'od lerishtah. joshua 13:2	zot ha'arez hanish'aret kal gelilot hapelishtim vekhal hageshuri. joshua 13:3	min hashikhor 'asher 'al penei mizrayim ve'ad gebul 'eqron zafonah lakena'ani teikhasheb khameishet sarnei felishtim ha'azati veha'ashdodi ha'eshqeloni hagiti veha'eqroni veha'avim. joshua 13:4	miteiman kal 'erez hakena'ani ume'arah 'asher lazidonim 'ad 'afeiqah 'ad gebul ha'emori. joshua 13:5	veha'arez hagibli vekhal halebanon mizrakh hashemesh miba'al gad takhat har khermon 'ad lebo khamat. joshua 13:6	kal yoshebei hahar min halebanon 'ad misrefot mayim kal zidonim 'anokhi 'orishem mipenei benei yisra'el raq hapileha leyisra'el benakhalah ka'asher zivitikha. joshua 13:7	ve'atah khaleq 'et ha'arez hazot benakhalah letish'at hashebatim vakhazi hasheibet hamnasheh. joshua 13:8	'imo har'ubeini vehagadi laqekhu nakhalatam 'asher natan lahem mosheh be'eiber hayarden mizrakhah ka'asher natan lahem mosheh 'ebed yhvh. joshua 13:9	mei'aro'er 'asher 'al sefat nakhal 'arnon veha'ir 'asher betokh hanakhal vekhal hamishor meideba 'ad dibon. joshua 13:10	vekhol 'arei sikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher malakh bekheshbon 'ad gebul benei 'amon. joshua 13:11	vehagil'ad ugebul hageshuri vehama'akhati vekhol har khermon vekhal habashan 'ad salkhah. joshua 13:12	kal mamlekhut 'og babashan 'asher malakh be'ashtarot ube'edre'i hu nish'ar miyeter harefa'im vayakem mosheh vayorishem. joshua 13:13	velo horishu benei yisra'el 'et hageshuri ve'et hama'akhati vayeisheb geshur uma'akhat beqereb yisra'el 'ad hayom hazeh. joshua 13:14	raq lesheibet haleivi lo natan nakhalah 'ishei yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hu nakhalato ka'asher diber lo. joshua 13:15	vayiten mosheh lemateh benei re'uben lemishpekhotam. joshua 13:16	vayhi lahem hagebul mei'aro'er 'asher 'al sefat nakhal 'arnon veha'ir 'asher betokh hanakhal vekhal hamishor 'al meideba. joshua 13:17	kheshbon vekhal 'areha 'asher bamishor dibon ubamot ba'al ubet ba'al me'on. joshua 13:18	veyahzah uqedeimot umeifa'at. joshua 13:19	veqiryatayim vesibmah vezeret hashakhar behar ha'eimeq. joshua 13:20	ubet pe'or ve'ashdot hapisgah ubet hayshimot. joshua 13:21	vekhol 'arei hamishor vekhal mamlekhut sikhon melekh ha'emori 'asher malakh bekheshbon 'asher hikah mosheh 'oto ve'et nesi'ei midyan 'et 'evi ve'et reqem ve'et zur ve'et khur ve'et reba' nesikhei sikhon yoshebei ha'arez. joshua 13:22	ve'et bil'am ben be'or haqosem haregu benei yisra'el bakhereb 'el khaleihem. joshua 13:23	vayhi gebul benei re'uben hayarden ugebul zot nakhalat benei re'uben lemishpekhotam he'arim vekhazreihen. joshua 13:24	vayiten mosheh lemateh gad libnei gad lemishpekhotam. joshua 13:25	vayhi lahem hagebul ya'zer vekhal 'arei hagil'ad vakhazi 'erez benei 'amon 'ad 'aro'er 'asher 'al penei rabah. joshua 13:26	umeikheshbon 'ad ramat hamizpeh ubetonim umimakhanayim 'ad gebul lidbir. joshua 13:27	uba'eimeq bet haram ubet nimrah vesukot vezafon yeter mamlekhut sikhon melekh kheshbon hayarden ugebul 'ad qezeh yam kineret 'eiber hayarden mizrakhah. joshua 13:28	zot nakhalat benei gad lemishpekhotam he'arim vekhazreihem. joshua 13:29	vayiten mosheh lakhazi sheibet menasheh vayhi lakhazi mateh benei menasheh lemishpekhotam. joshua 13:30	vayhi gebulam mimakhanayim kal habashan kal mamlekhut 'og melekh habashan vekhal khavot ya'ir 'asher babashan shishim 'ir. joshua 13:31	vakhazi hagil'ad ve'ashtarot ve'edre'i 'arei mamlekhut 'og babashan libnei makhir ben menasheh lakhazi benei makhir lemishpekhotam. joshua 13:32	'eleh 'asher nikhal mosheh be'arbot mo'ab mei'eiber leyarden yerikho mizrakhah. joshua 13:33	ulesheibet haleivi lo natan mosheh nakhalah yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hu nakhalatam ka'asher diber lahem. joshua 14:1	ve'eleh 'asher nakhalu benei yisra'el be'erez kena'an 'asher nikhalu 'otam 'el'azar hakohen vihoshua' bin nun verashei 'abot hamatot libnei yisra'el. joshua 14:2	begoral nakhalatam ka'asher zivah yhvh beyad mosheh letish'at hamatot vakhazi hamateh. joshua 14:3	ki natan mosheh nakhalat shenei hamatot vakhazi hamateh mei'eiber layarden velalviyim lo natan nakhalah betokham. joshua 14:4	ki hayu benei yosef shenei matot menasheh ve'efrayim velo natenu kheileq lalviyim ba'arez ki 'im 'arim lashebet umigresheihem lemiqneihem uleqinyanam. joshua 14:5	ka'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh ken 'asu benei yisra'el vayakhlequ 'et ha'arez. joshua 14:6	vayigeshu benei yehudah 'el yehoshua' bagilgal vayomer 'eilav kaleb ben yefuneh haqenizi 'atah yada'ta 'et hadabar 'asher diber yhvh 'el mosheh 'ish ha'elohim 'al 'odotai ve'al 'odotekha beqadesh barneia'. joshua 14:7	ben 'arba'im shanah 'anokhi bishloakh mosheh 'ebed yhvh 'oti miqadesh barneia' leragel 'et ha'arez va'asheb 'oto dabar ka'asher 'im lebabi. joshua 14:8	ve'akhai 'asher 'alu 'imi himsiv 'et leb ha'am ve'anokhi mileiti 'akharei yhvh 'elohai. joshua 14:9	vayishaba' mosheh bayom hahu leimor 'im lo ha'arez 'asher darekhah raglekha bah lekha tihyeh lenakhalah ulebanekha 'ad 'olam ki mileita 'akharei yhvh 'elohai. joshua 14:10	ve'atah hineh hekheyah yhvh 'oti ka'asher diber zeh 'arba'im vekhamesh shanah mei'az diber yhvh 'et hadabar hazeh 'el mosheh 'asher halakh yisra'el bamidbar ve'atah hineh 'anokhi hayom ben khamesh ushemonim shanah. joshua 14:11	'odeni hayom khazaq ka'asher beyom sheloakh 'oti mosheh kekhokhi 'az ukhekhokhi 'atah lamilkhamah velazet velabo. joshua 14:12	ve'atah tenah li 'et hahar hazeh 'asher diber yhvh bayom hahu ki 'atah shama'ta bayom hahu ki 'anaqim sham ve'arim gedolot bezurot 'ulai yhvh 'oti vehorashtim ka'asher diber yhvh. joshua 14:13	vaybarekheihu yehoshua' vayiten 'et khebron lekhaleb ben yefuneh lenakhalah. joshua 14:14	'al ken hayetah khebron lekhaleb ben yefuneh haqenizi lenakhalah 'ad hayom hazeh ya'an 'asher milei 'akharei yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. joshua 14:15	veshem khebron lefanim qiryat 'arba' ha'adam hagadol ba'anaqim hu veha'arez shaqetah mimilkhamah. joshua 15:1	vayhi hagoral lemateh benei yehudah lemishpekhotam 'el gebul 'edom midbar zin negbah miqzeh teiman. joshua 15:2	vayhi lahem gebul negeb miqzeh yam hamelakh min halashon haponeh negbah. joshua 15:3	veyaza 'el minegeb lema'aleh 'aqrabim ve'abar zinah ve'alah minegeb leqadesh barneia' ve'abar khezron ve'alah 'adarah venasab haqarqa'ah. joshua 15:4	ve'abar 'azmonah veyaza nakhal mizrayim vehayah vehayu toze'ot hagebul yamah zeh yihyeh lakhem gebul negeb. joshua 15:5	ugebul qeidemah yam hamelakh 'ad qezeh hayarden ugebul lif'at zafonah mileshon hayam miqzeh hayarden. joshua 15:6	ve'alah hagebul bet khagelah ve'abar mizefon lebet ha'arabah ve'alah hagebul 'eben bohan ben re'uben. joshua 15:7	ve'alah hagebul debirah mei'eimeq 'akhor vezafonah poneh 'el hagilgal 'asher nokhakh lema'aleh 'adumim 'asher minegeb lanakhal ve'abar hagebul 'el mei 'en shemesh vehayu toze'otav 'el 'en rogel. joshua 15:8	ve'alah hagebul gei ben hinom 'el ketef haybusi minegeb hi yerushalim ve'alah hagebul 'el rosh hahar 'asher 'al penei gei hinom yamah 'asher biqzeh 'eimeq refa'im zafonah. joshua 15:9	veta'ar hagebul meirosh hahar 'el ma'yan mei neftoakh veyaza 'el 'arei har 'efron veta'ar hagebul ba'alah hi qiryat ye'arim. joshua 15:10	venasab hagebul miba'alah yamah 'el har sei'ir ve'abar 'el ketef har ye'arim mizafonah hi khesalon veyarad bet shemesh ve'abar timnah. joshua 15:11	veyaza hagebul 'el ketef 'eqron zafonah veta'ar hagebul shikeronah ve'abar har haba'alah veyaza yabne'el vehayu toze'ot hagebul yamah. joshua 15:12	ugebul yam hayamah hagadol ugebul zeh gebul benei yehudah sabib lemishpekhotam. joshua 15:13	ulekhaleb ben yefuneh natan kheileq betokh benei yehudah 'el pi yhvh lihoshua' 'et qiryat 'arba' 'abi ha'anaq hi khebron. joshua 15:14	vayoresh misham kaleb 'et sheloshah benei ha'anaq 'et sheishai ve'et 'akhiman ve'et talmai yelidei ha'anaq. joshua 15:15	vaya'al misham 'el yoshebei debir veshem debir lefanim qiryat seifer. joshua 15:16	vayomer kaleb 'asher yakeh 'et qiryat seifer ulekhadah venatati lo 'et 'akhsah biti le'ishah. joshua 15:17	vayilkedah 'ateni'el ben qenaz 'akhi khaleb vayiten lo 'et 'akhsah bito le'ishah. joshua 15:18	vayhi bebo'ah vatesiteihu lish'ol mei'et 'abiha sadeh vatiznakh mei'al hakhamor vayomer lah kaleb mah lakh. joshua 15:19	vatomer tenah li berakhah ki 'erez hanegeb netatani venatatah li gulot mayim vayiten lah 'et gulot 'iliyot ve'et gulot takhtiyot. joshua 15:20	zot nakhalat mateh benei yehudah lemishpekhotam. joshua 15:21	vayihyu he'arim miqzeh lemateh benei yehudah 'el gebul 'edom banegbah qabze'el ve'eider veyagur. joshua 15:22	veqinah vedimonah ve'ad'adah. joshua 15:23	veqedesh vekhazor veyitnan. joshua 15:24	zif vatelem ube'alot. joshua 15:25	vekhazor khadatah uqeriyot khezron hi khazor. joshua 15:26	'amam ushema' umoladah. joshua 15:27	vakhazar gadah vekheshmon ubet palet. joshua 15:28	vakhazar shu'al ube'er sheba' ubizyotyah. joshua 15:29	ba'alah ve'iyim va'azem. joshua 15:30	ve'eltolad ukhesil vekharemah. joshua 15:31	veziqlag umadmanah vesansanah. joshua 15:32	uleba'ot veshilkhim ve'ayin verimon kal 'arim 'esrim vateisha' vekhazreihen. joshua 15:33	bashefeilah 'eshta'ol vezare'ah ve'ashnah. joshua 15:34	vezanoakh ve'en ganim tapuakh veha'einam. joshua 15:35	yarmut va'adulam sokhoh va'azeiqah. joshua 15:36	vesha'arayim va'aditayim vehagedeirah ugedeirotayim 'arim 'arba' 'esreh vekhazreihen. joshua 15:37	zenan vakhadashah umigdal gad. joshua 15:38	vedil'an vehamizpeh veyaqete'el. joshua 15:39	lakhish ubazeqat ve'eglon. joshua 15:40	vekhabon velakhmas vekhitlish. joshua 15:41	ugedeirot bet dagon vena'amah umaqeidah 'arim shesh 'esreh vekhazreihen. joshua 15:42	libnah va'eter ve'ashan. joshua 15:43	veyiftakh ve'ashnah unezib. joshua 15:44	uqe'ilah ve'akhzib umareishah 'arim teisha' vekhazreihen. joshua 15:45	'eqron ubenoteha vakhazeireha. joshua 15:46	mei'eqron vayamah kol 'asher 'al yad 'ashdod vekhazreihen. joshua 15:47	'ashdod benoteha vakhazeireha 'azah benoteha vakhazeireha 'ad nakhal mizrayim vehayam hagabol hagadol ugebul. joshua 15:48	ubahar shamir veyatir vesokhoh. joshua 15:49	vedanah veqiryat sanah hi debir. joshua 15:50	va'anab ve'eshtemoh ve'anim. joshua 15:51	vegoshen vekholon vegiloh 'arim 'akhat 'esreh vekhazreihen. joshua 15:52	'arab verumah ve'esh'an. joshua 15:53	veyanim veyanum ubet tapuakh va'afeiqah. joshua 15:54	vekhumtah veqiryat 'arba' hi khebron vezi'or 'arim teisha' vekhazreihen. joshua 15:55	ma'on karmel vazif veyutah. joshua 15:56	veyizre'el veyaqede'am vezanoakh. joshua 15:57	haqayin gib'ah vetimnah 'arim 'eser vekhazreihen. joshua 15:58	khalkhul bet zur ugedor. joshua 15:59	uma'arat ubet 'anot ve'elteqon 'arim shesh vekhazreihen. joshua 15:60	qiryat ba'al hi qiryat ye'arim veharabah 'arim shetayim vekhazreihen. joshua 15:61	bamidbar bet ha'arabah midin usekhakhah. joshua 15:62	vehanibshan ve'ir hamelakh ve'en gedi 'arim shesh vekhazreihen. joshua 15:63	ve'et haybusi yoshebei yerushalim lo yukhelu yakhelu benei yehudah lehorisham vayeisheb haybusi 'et benei yehudah birushalim 'ad hayom hazeh. joshua 16:1	vayeizei hagoral libnei yosef miyarden yerikho lemei yerikho mizrakhah hamidbar 'oleh mirikho bahar bet 'el. joshua 16:2	veyaza mibet 'el luzah ve'abar 'el gebul ha'arki 'atarot. joshua 16:3	veyarad yamah 'el gebul hayafleiti 'ad gebul bet khoron takhton ve'ad gazer vehayu toze'oto toze'otav yamah. joshua 16:4	vayinkhalu benei yosef menasheh ve'efrayim. joshua 16:5	vayhi gebul benei 'efrayim lemishpekhotam vayhi gebul nakhalatam mizrakhah 'atrot 'adar 'ad bet khoron 'elyon. joshua 16:6	veyaza hagebul hayamah hamikhmetat mizafon venasab hagebul mizrakhah ta'anat shiloh ve'abar 'oto mimizrakh yanokhah. joshua 16:7	veyarad miyanokhah 'atarot vena'aratah ufaga' birikho veyaza hayarden. joshua 16:8	mitapuakh yeilekh hagebul yamah nakhal qanah vehayu toze'otav hayamah zot nakhalat mateh benei 'efrayim lemishpekhotam. joshua 16:9	vehe'arim hamibdalot libnei 'efrayim betokh nakhalat benei menasheh kal he'arim vekhazreihen. joshua 16:10	velo horishu 'et hakena'ani hayosheb begazer vayeisheb hakena'ani beqereb 'efrayim 'ad hayom hazeh vayhi lemas 'obed. joshua 17:1	vayhi hagoral lemateh menasheh ki hu bekhor yosef lemakhir bekhor menasheh 'abi hagil'ad ki hu hayah 'ish milkhamah vayhi lo hagil'ad vehabashan. joshua 17:2	vayhi libnei menasheh hanotarim lemishpekhotam libnei 'abi'ezer velibnei kheileq velibnei 'asri'el velibnei shekhem velibnei kheifer velibnei shemida' 'eleh benei menasheh ben yosef hazekharim lemishpekhotam. joshua 17:3	velizlafekhad ben kheifer ben gil'ad ben makhir ben menasheh lo hayu lo banim ki 'im banot ve'eleh shemot benotav makhlah veno'ah khagelah milkah vetirzah. joshua 17:4	vatiqrabnah lifnei 'el'azar hakohen velifnei yehoshua' bin nun velifnei hanesi'im leimor yhvh zivah 'et mosheh latet lanu nakhalah betokh 'akheinu vayiten lahem 'el pi yhvh nakhalah betokh 'akhei 'abihen. joshua 17:5	vayipelu khablei menasheh 'asarah lebad mei'erez hagil'ad vehabashan 'asher mei'eiber layarden. joshua 17:6	ki benot menasheh nakhalu nakhalah betokh banav ve'erez hagil'ad hayetah libnei menasheh hanotarim. joshua 17:7	vayhi gebul menasheh mei'asher hamikhmetat 'asher 'al penei shekhem vehalakh hagebul 'el hayamin 'el yoshebei 'en tapuakh. joshua 17:8	limnasheh hayetah 'erez tapuakh vetapuakh 'el gebul menasheh libnei 'efrayim. joshua 17:9	veyarad hagebul nakhal qanah negbah lanakhal 'arim ha'eleh le'efrayim betokh 'arei menasheh ugebul menasheh mizefon lanakhal vayhi toze'otav hayamah. joshua 17:10	negbah le'efrayim vezafonah limnasheh vayhi hayam gebulo ube'asher yifge'un mizafon ubeyisashkhar mimizrakh. joshua 17:11	vayhi limnasheh beyisashkhar ube'asher bet she'an ubenoteha veyible'am ubenoteha ve'et yoshebei dor ubenoteha veyoshebei 'en dor ubenoteha veyoshebei ta'nakh ubenoteha veyoshebei megido ubenoteha sheloshet hanafet. joshua 17:12	velo yakhelu benei menasheh lehorish 'et he'arim ha'eleh vayo'el hakena'ani lashebet ba'arez hazot. joshua 17:13	vayhi ki khazequ benei yisra'el vayitenu 'et hakena'ani lamas vehoresh lo horisho. joshua 17:14	vaydaberu benei yosef 'et yehoshua' leimor madua' natatah li nakhalah goral 'ekhad vekhebel 'ekhad va'ani 'am rab 'ad 'asher 'ad koh beirekhani yhvh. joshua 17:15	vayomer 'aleihem yehoshua' 'im 'am rab 'atah 'aleh lekha haya'rah ubeireita lekha sham be'erez haperizi veharefa'im ki 'az lekha har 'efrayim. joshua 17:16	vayomeru benei yosef lo yimazei lanu hahar verekheb barzel bekhal hakena'ani hayosheb be'erez ha'eimeq la'asher bebet she'an ubenoteha vela'asher be'eimeq yizre'el. joshua 17:17	vayomer yehoshua' 'el bet yosef le'efrayim velimnasheh leimor 'am rab 'atah vekhoakh gadol lakh lo yihyeh lekha goral 'ekhad. joshua 17:18	ki har yihyeh lakh ki ya'ar hu ubeireito vehayah lekha toze'otav ki torish 'et hakena'ani ki rekheb barzel lo ki khazaq hu. joshua 18:1	vayiqahalu kal 'adat benei yisra'el shiloh vayashkinu sham 'et 'ohel mo'ed veha'arez nikhbeshah lifneihem. joshua 18:2	vayivateru bibnei yisra'el 'asher lo khalequ 'et nakhalatam shib'ah shebatim. joshua 18:3	vayomer yehoshua' 'el benei yisra'el 'ad 'anah 'atem mitrapim labo lareshet 'et ha'arez 'asher natan lakhem yhvh 'elohei 'aboteikhem. joshua 18:4	habu lakhem sheloshah 'anashim lashabet ve'eshlakhem veyaqumu veyithalekhu ba'arez veyikhtebu 'otah lefi nakhalatam veyabo'u 'eilai. joshua 18:5	vehitkhalequ 'otah leshib'ah khalaqim yehudah ya'amod 'al gebulo minegeb ubet yosef ya'amdu 'al gebulam mizafon. joshua 18:6	ve'atem tikhtebu 'et ha'arez shib'ah khalaqim vahabeitem 'eilai henah veyariti lakhem goral poh lifnei yhvh 'eloheinu. joshua 18:7	ki 'en kheileq lalviyim beqirbekhem ki khehunat yhvh nakhalato vegad ure'uben vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh laqekhu nakhalatam mei'eiber layarden mizrakhah 'asher natan lahem mosheh 'ebed yhvh. joshua 18:8	vayaqumu ha'anashim vayeileikhu vayzav yehoshua' 'et haholekhim likhtob 'et ha'arez leimor lekhu vehithalekhu ba'arez vekhitbu 'otah veshubu 'eilai ufoh 'ashlikh lakhem goral lifnei yhvh beshiloh. joshua 18:9	vayeilekhu ha'anashim vaya'abru ba'arez vayikhtebuha le'arim leshib'ah khalaqim 'al seifer vayabo'u 'el yehoshua' 'el hamakhaneh shiloh. joshua 18:10	vayashlekh lahem yehoshua' goral beshiloh lifnei yhvh vaykhaleq sham yehoshua' 'et ha'arez libnei yisra'el kemakhleqotam. joshua 18:11	vaya'al goral mateh benei binyamin lemishpekhotam vayeizei gebul goralam ben benei yehudah uben benei yosef. joshua 18:12	vayhi lahem hagebul lif'at zafonah min hayarden ve'alah hagebul 'el ketef yerikho mizafon ve'alah bahar yamah vehayah vehayu toze'otav midbarah bet 'aven. joshua 18:13	ve'abar misham hagebul luzah 'el ketef luzah negbah hi bet 'el veyarad hagebul 'atrot 'adar 'al hahar 'asher minegeb lebet khoron takhton. joshua 18:14	veta'ar hagebul venasab lif'at yam negbah min hahar 'asher 'al penei bet khoron negbah vehayah vehayu toze'otav 'el qiryat ba'al hi qiryat ye'arim 'ir benei yehudah zot pe'at yam. joshua 18:15	ufe'at negbah miqzeh qiryat ye'arim veyaza hagebul yamah veyaza 'el ma'yan mei neftoakh. joshua 18:16	veyarad hagebul 'el qezeh hahar 'asher 'al penei gei ben hinom 'asher be'eimeq refa'im zafonah veyarad gei hinom 'el ketef haybusi negbah veyarad 'en rogel. joshua 18:17	veta'ar mizafon veyaza 'en shemesh veyaza 'el gelilot 'asher nokhakh ma'aleh 'adumim veyarad 'eben bohan ben re'uben. joshua 18:18	ve'abar 'el ketef mul ha'arabah zafonah veyarad ha'arabatah. joshua 18:19	ve'abar hagebul 'el ketef bet khagelah zafonah vehayah vehayu toze'otav toze'ot hagebul 'el leshon yam hamelakh zafonah 'el qezeh hayarden negbah zeh gebul negeb. joshua 18:20	vehayarden yigbol 'oto lif'at qeidemah zot nakhalat benei binyamin ligbuloteha sabib lemishpekhotam. joshua 18:21	vehayu he'arim lemateh benei binyamin lemishpekhoteihem yerikho ubet khagelah ve'eimeq qeziz. joshua 18:22	ubet ha'arabah uzemarayim ubet 'el. joshua 18:23	veha'avim vehaparah ve'aferah. joshua 18:24	ukhefar ha'amoni ha'amonah veha'afeni vagaba' 'arim shetem 'esreh vekhazreihen. joshua 18:25	gib'on veharamah ube'eirot. joshua 18:26	vehamizpeh vehakefirah vehamozah. joshua 18:27	vereqem veyirpe'el vetar'alah. joshua 18:28	vezeila' ha'elef vehaybusi hi yerushalim gib'at qiryat 'arim 'arba' 'esreh vekhazreihen zot nakhalat benei binyamin lemishpekhotam. joshua 19:1	vayeizei hagoral hasheini leshim'on lemateh benei shim'on lemishpekhotam vayhi nakhalatam betokh nakhalat benei yehudah. joshua 19:2	vayhi lahem benakhalatam be'er sheba' vesheba' umoladah. joshua 19:3	vakhazar shu'al ubalah va'azem. joshua 19:4	ve'eltolad ubetul vekharemah. joshua 19:5	veziqlag ubet hamarkabot vakhazar susah. joshua 19:6	ubet leba'ot vesharukhen 'arim shelosh 'esreh vekhazreihen. joshua 19:7	'ayin rimon va'eter ve'ashan 'arim 'arba' vekhazreihen. joshua 19:8	vekhal hakhazeirim 'asher sebibot he'arim ha'eleh 'ad ba'alat be'er ramat negeb zot nakhalat mateh benei shim'on lemishpekhotam. joshua 19:9	meikhebel benei yehudah nakhalat benei shim'on ki hayah kheileq benei yehudah rab meihem vayinkhalu benei shim'on betokh nakhalatam. joshua 19:10	vaya'al hagoral hashelishi libnei zebulun lemishpekhotam vayhi gebul nakhalatam 'ad sarid. joshua 19:11	ve'alah gebulam layamah umar'alah ufaga' bedabashet ufaga' 'el hanakhal 'asher 'al penei yaqene'am. joshua 19:12	veshab misarid qeidemah mizrakh hashemesh 'al gebul kislot tabor veyaza 'el hadaberat ve'alah yafia'. joshua 19:13	umisham 'abar qeidemah mizrakhah gitah kheifer 'itah qazin veyaza rimon hameto'ar hanei'ah. joshua 19:14	venasab 'oto hagebul mizefon khanaton vehayu toze'otav gei yiftakh 'el. joshua 19:15	veqatat venahalal veshimron veyid'alah ubet lakhem 'arim shetem 'esreh vekhazreihen. joshua 19:16	zot nakhalat benei zebulun lemishpekhotam he'arim ha'eleh vekhazreihen. joshua 19:17	leyisashkhar yaza hagoral harebi'i libnei yisashkhar lemishpekhotam. joshua 19:18	vayhi gebulam yizre'elah vehakesulot veshunem. joshua 19:19	vakhafarayim veshi'on va'anakharat. joshua 19:20	veharabit veqishyon va'abez. joshua 19:21	veremet ve'en ganim ve'en khadah ubet pazez. joshua 19:22	ufaga' hagebul betabor veshakhazumah veshakhazimah ubet shemesh vehayu toze'ot gebulam hayarden 'arim shesh 'esreh vekhazreihen. joshua 19:23	zot nakhalat mateh benei yisashkhar lemishpekhotam he'arim vekhazreihen. joshua 19:24	vayeizei hagoral hakhamishi lemateh benei 'asher lemishpekhotam. joshua 19:25	vayhi gebulam khelqat vakhali vabeten ve'akhshaf. joshua 19:26	ve'alamelekh ve'am'ad umish'al ufaga' bekharmel hayamah ubeshikhor libnat. joshua 19:27	veshab mizrakh hashemesh bet dagon ufaga' bizbulun ubegei yiftakh 'el zafonah bet ha'eimeq une'i'el veyaza 'el kabul misemol. joshua 19:28	ve'ebron urekhob vekhamon veqanah 'ad zidon rabah. joshua 19:29	veshab hagebul haramah ve'ad 'ir mibzar zor veshab hagebul khosah veyihyu vehayu toze'otav hayamah meikhebel 'akhzibah. joshua 19:30	ve'umah va'afeq urekhob 'arim 'esrim ushetayim vekhazreihen. joshua 19:31	zot nakhalat mateh benei 'asher lemishpekhotam he'arim ha'eleh vekhazreihen. joshua 19:32	libnei naftali yaza hagoral hashishi libnei naftali lemishpekhotam. joshua 19:33	vayhi gebulam meikheilef mei'eilon beza'ananim va'adami haneqeb veyabne'el 'ad laqum vayhi toze'otav hayarden. joshua 19:34	veshab hagebul yamah 'aznot tabor veyaza misham khuqoqah ufaga' bizbulun minegeb ube'asher paga' miyam ubihudah hayarden mizrakh hashamesh. joshua 19:35	ve'arei mibzar hazidim zer vekhamat raqat vekhinaret. joshua 19:36	va'adamah veharamah vekhazor. joshua 19:37	veqedesh ve'edre'i ve'en khazor. joshua 19:38	veyir'on umigdal 'el khorem ubet 'anat ubet shamesh 'arim tesha' 'esreh vekhazreihen. joshua 19:39	zot nakhalat mateh benei naftali lemishpekhotam he'arim vekhazreihen. joshua 19:40	lemateh benei dan lemishpekhotam yaza hagoral hashebi'i. joshua 19:41	vayhi gebul nakhalatam zare'ah ve'eshta'ol ve'ir shamesh. joshua 19:42	vesha'alabin ve'ayalon veyitlah. joshua 19:43	ve'eilon vetimnatah ve'eqron. joshua 19:44	ve'elteqeh vegibeton uba'alat. joshua 19:45	vihud ubenei beraq vegat rimon. joshua 19:46	umei hayarqon veharaqon 'im hagebul mul yafo. joshua 19:47	vayeizei gebul benei dan meihem vaya'alu benei dan vayilakhamu 'im leshem vayilkedu 'otah vayaku 'otah lefi khereb vayirshu 'otah vayeishebu bah vayiqre'u leleshem dan keshem dan 'abihem. joshua 19:48	zot nakhalat mateh benei dan lemishpekhotam he'arim ha'eleh vekhazreihen. joshua 19:49	vaykhalu linkhol 'et ha'arez ligbuloteha vayitenu benei yisra'el nakhalah lihoshua' bin nun betokham. joshua 19:50	'al pi yhvh natenu lo 'et ha'ir 'asher sha'al 'et timnat serakh behar 'efrayim vayibneh 'et ha'ir vayeisheb bah. joshua 19:51	'eleh hanekhalot 'asher nikhalu 'el'azar hakohen vihoshua' bin nun verashei ha'abot lematot benei yisra'el begoral beshiloh lifnei yhvh petakh 'ohel mo'ed vaykhalu meikhaleq 'et ha'arez. joshua 20:1	vaydaber yhvh 'el yehoshua' leimor. joshua 20:2	daber 'el benei yisra'el leimor tenu lakhem 'et 'arei hamiqlat 'asher dibarti 'aleikhem beyad mosheh. joshua 20:3	lanus shamah rozeiakh makeh nefesh bishgagah bibli da'at vehayu lakhem lemiqlat migo'el hadam. joshua 20:4	venas 'el 'akhat meihe'arim ha'eleh ve'amad petakh sha'ar ha'ir vediber be'azenei ziqnei ha'ir hahi 'et debarav ve'asefu 'oto ha'irah 'aleihem venatenu lo maqom veyashab 'imam. joshua 20:5	vekhi yirdof go'el hadam 'akharav velo yasgiru 'et harozeiakh beyado ki bibli da'at hikah 'et rei'eihu velo sonei hu lo mitemol shilshom. joshua 20:6	veyashab ba'ir hahi 'ad 'amedo lifnei ha'eidah lamishpat 'ad mot hakohen hagadol 'asher yihyeh bayamim hahem 'az yashub harozeiakh uba 'el 'iro ve'el beito 'el ha'ir 'asher nas misham. joshua 20:7	vayaqdishu 'et qedesh bagalil behar naftali ve'et shekhem behar 'efrayim ve'et qiryat 'arba' hi khebron behar yehudah. joshua 20:8	umei'eiber leyarden yerikho mizrakhah natenu 'et bezer bamidbar bamishor mimateh re'uben ve'et ramot bagil'ad mimateh gad ve'et galon golan babashan mimateh menasheh. joshua 20:9	'eleh hayu 'arei hamu'adah lekhol benei yisra'el velager hagar betokham lanus shamah kal makeh nefesh bishgagah velo yamut beyad go'el hadam 'ad 'amedo lifnei ha'eidah. joshua 21:1	vayigeshu rashei 'abot halviyim 'el 'el'azar hakohen ve'el yehoshua' bin nun ve'el rashei 'abot hamatot libnei yisra'el. joshua 21:2	vaydaberu 'aleihem beshiloh be'erez kena'an leimor yhvh zivah beyad mosheh latet lanu 'arim lashabet umigresheihen libhemteinu. joshua 21:3	vayitenu benei yisra'el lalviyim minakhalatam 'el pi yhvh 'et he'arim ha'eleh ve'et migresheihen. joshua 21:4	vayeizei hagoral lemishpekhot haqehati vayhi libnei 'aharon hakohen min halviyim mimateh yehudah umimateh hashim'oni umimateh binyamin bagoral 'arim shelosh 'esreh. joshua 21:5	velibnei qehat hanotarim mimishpekhot mateh 'efrayim umimateh dan umeikhazi mateh menasheh bagoral 'arim 'aser. joshua 21:6	velibnei geireshon mimishpekhot mateh yisashkhar umimateh 'asher umimateh naftali umeikhazi mateh menasheh babashan bagoral 'arim shelosh 'esreh. joshua 21:7	libnei merari lemishpekhotam mimateh re'uben umimateh gad umimateh zebulun 'arim shetem 'esreh. joshua 21:8	vayitenu benei yisra'el lalviyim 'et he'arim ha'eleh ve'et migresheihen ka'asher zivah yhvh beyad mosheh bagoral. joshua 21:9	vayitenu mimateh benei yehudah umimateh benei shim'on 'et he'arim ha'eleh 'asher yiqra 'ethen beshem. joshua 21:10	vayhi libnei 'aharon mimishpekhot haqehati mibenei leivi ki lahem hayah hagoral rishonah. joshua 21:11	vayitenu lahem 'et qiryat 'arba' 'abi ha'anoq hi khebron behar yehudah ve'et migrasheha sebiboteha. joshua 21:12	ve'et sedeh ha'ir ve'et khazeireha natenu lekhaleb ben yefuneh ba'akhuzato. joshua 21:13	velibnei 'aharon hakohen natenu 'et 'ir miqlat harozeiakh 'et khebron ve'et migrasheha ve'et libnah ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:14	ve'et yatir ve'et migrasheha ve'et 'eshtemoa' ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:15	ve'et kholon ve'et migrasheha ve'et debir ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:16	ve'et 'ayin ve'et migrasheha ve'et yutah ve'et migrasheha 'et bet shemesh ve'et migrasheha 'arim teisha' mei'et shenei hashebatim ha'eleh. joshua 21:17	umimateh binyamin 'et gib'on ve'et migrasheha 'et geba' ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:18	'et 'anatot ve'et migrasheha ve'et 'almon ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. joshua 21:19	kal 'arei benei 'aharon hakohanim shelosh 'esreh 'arim umigresheihen. joshua 21:20	ulemishpekhot benei qehat halviyim hanotarim mibenei qehat vayhi 'arei goralam mimateh 'efrayim. joshua 21:21	vayitenu lahem 'et 'ir miqlat harozeiakh 'et shekhem ve'et migrasheha behar 'efrayim ve'et gezer ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:22	ve'et qibzayim ve'et migrasheha ve'et bet khoron ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. joshua 21:23	umimateh dan 'et 'elteqei ve'et migrasheha 'et gibeton ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:24	'et 'ayalon ve'et migrasheha 'et gat rimon ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. joshua 21:25	umimakhazit mateh menasheh 'et ta'nakh ve'et migrasheha ve'et gat rimon ve'et migrasheha 'arim shetayim. joshua 21:26	kal 'arim 'eser umigresheihen lemishpekhot benei qehat hanotarim. joshua 21:27	velibnei geireshon mimishpekhot halviyim meikhazi mateh menasheh 'et 'ir miqlat harozeiakh 'et galon golan babashan ve'et migrasheha ve'et be'eshterah ve'et migrasheha 'arim shetayim. joshua 21:28	umimateh yisashkhar 'et qishyon ve'et migrasheha 'et daberat ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:29	'et yarmut ve'et migrasheha 'et 'en ganim ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. joshua 21:30	umimateh 'asher 'et mish'al ve'et migrasheha 'et 'abdon ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:31	'et khelqat ve'et migrasheha ve'et rekhob ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. joshua 21:32	umimateh naftali 'et 'ir miqlat harozeiakh 'et qedesh bagalil ve'et migrasheha ve'et khamot dor ve'et migrasheha ve'et qartan ve'et migrasheha 'arim shalosh. joshua 21:33	kal 'arei hageireshuni lemishpekhotam shelosh 'esreh 'ir umigresheihen. joshua 21:34	ulemishpekhot benei merari halviyim hanotarim mei'et mateh zebulun 'et yaqene'am ve'et migrasheha 'et qartah ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:35	'et dimnah ve'et migrasheha 'et nahalal ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. joshua 21:36	umimateh re'uben 'et bezer ve'et migrasheha ve'et yahzah ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:37	'et qedeimot ve'et migrasheha ve'et meifa'at ve'et migrasheha 'arim 'arba'. joshua 21:38	umimateh gad 'et 'ir miqlat harozeiakh 'et ramot bagil'ad ve'et migrasheha ve'et makhanayim ve'et migrasheha. joshua 21:39	'et kheshbon ve'et migrasheha 'et ya'zer ve'et migrasheha kal 'arim 'arba'. joshua 21:40	kal he'arim libnei merari lemishpekhotam hanotarim mimishpekhot halviyim vayhi goralam 'arim shetem 'esreh. joshua 21:41	kol 'arei halviyim betokh 'akhuzat benei yisra'el 'arim 'arba'im ushemoneh umigresheihen. joshua 21:42	tihyenah he'arim ha'eleh 'ir 'ir umigrasheha sebiboteha ken lekhal he'arim ha'eleh. joshua 21:43	vayiten yhvh leyisra'el 'et kal ha'arez 'asher nishba' latet la'abotam vayirashuha vayeishebu bah. joshua 21:44	vayanakh yhvh lahem misabib kekhol 'asher nishba' la'abotam velo 'amad 'ish bifneihem mikal 'oyebeihem 'et kal 'oyebeihem natan yhvh beyadam. joshua 21:45	lo nafal dabar mikol hadabar hatob 'asher diber yhvh 'el bet yisra'el hakol ba. joshua 22:1	'az yiqra yehoshua' lar'ubeini velagadi velakhazi mateh menasheh. joshua 22:2	vayomer 'aleihem 'atem shemartem 'et kal 'asher zivah 'etkhem mosheh 'ebed yhvh vatishme'u beqoli lekhol 'asher ziviti 'etkhem. joshua 22:3	lo 'azabtem 'et 'akheikhem zeh yamim rabim 'ad hayom hazeh ushemartem 'et mishmeret mizvat yhvh 'eloheikhem. joshua 22:4	ve'atah heiniakh yhvh 'eloheikhem la'akheikhem ka'asher diber lahem ve'atah penu ulekhu lakhem le'aholeikhem 'el 'erez 'akhuzatkhem 'asher natan lakhem mosheh 'ebed yhvh be'eiber hayarden. joshua 22:5	raq shimru me'od la'asot 'et hamizvah ve'et hatorah 'asher zivah 'etkhem mosheh 'ebed yhvh le'ahabah 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem velalekhet bekhal derakhav velishmor mizvotav uledabeqah bo ule'abedo bekhal lebabkhem ubekhal nafshekhem. joshua 22:6	vaybarekhem yehoshua' vayshalekhem vayeilekhu 'el 'aholeihem. joshua 22:7	velakhazi sheibet hamnasheh natan mosheh babashan ulekhezyo natan yehoshua' 'im 'akheihem mei'eiber be'eiber hayarden yamah vegam ki shilekham yehoshua' 'el 'aholeihem vaybarakhem. joshua 22:8	vayomer 'aleihem leimor binkhasim rabim shubu 'el 'aholeikhem ubemiqneh rab me'od bekhesef ubezahab ubinkhoshet ubebarzel ubislamot harbeh me'od khilqu shelal 'oyebeikhem 'im 'akheikhem. joshua 22:9	vayashubu vayeilekhu benei re'uben ubenei gad vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh mei'et benei yisra'el mishiloh 'asher be'erez kena'an lalekhet 'el 'erez hagil'ad 'el 'erez 'akhuzatam 'asher nokhazu bah 'al pi yhvh beyad mosheh. joshua 22:10	vayabo'u 'el gelilot hayarden 'asher be'erez kena'an vayibnu benei re'uben ubenei gad vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh sham mizbeiakh 'al hayarden mizbeiakh gadol lemar'eh. joshua 22:11	vayishme'u benei yisra'el leimor hineh banu benei re'uben ubenei gad vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh 'et hamizbeiakh 'el mul 'erez kena'an 'el gelilot hayarden 'el 'eiber benei yisra'el. joshua 22:12	vayishme'u benei yisra'el vayiqahalu kal 'adat benei yisra'el shiloh la'alot 'aleihem lazaba. joshua 22:13	vayishlekhu benei yisra'el 'el benei re'uben ve'el benei gad ve'el khazi sheibet menasheh 'el 'erez hagil'ad 'et pinekhas ben 'el'azar hakohen. joshua 22:14	va'asarah nesi'im 'imo nasi 'ekhad nasi 'ekhad lebet 'ab lekhol matot yisra'el ve'ish rosh bet 'abotam hemah le'alfei yisra'el. joshua 22:15	vayabo'u 'el benei re'uben ve'el benei gad ve'el khazi sheibet menasheh 'el 'erez hagil'ad vaydaberu 'itam leimor. joshua 22:16	koh 'ameru kol 'adat yhvh mah hama'al hazeh 'asher me'altem beilohei yisra'el lashub hayom mei'akharei yhvh bibnotkhem lakhem mizbeiakh limradekhem hayom yhvh. joshua 22:17	ham'at lanu 'et 'avon pe'or 'asher lo hitaharnu mimenu 'ad hayom hazeh vayhi hanegef ba'adat yhvh. joshua 22:18	ve'atem tashubu hayom mei'akharei yhvh vehayah 'atem timredu hayom yhvh umakhar 'el kal 'adat yisra'el yiqzof. joshua 22:19	ve'akh 'im temei'ah 'erez 'akhuzatkhem 'ibru lakhem 'el 'erez 'akhuzat yhvh 'asher shakhan sham mishkan yhvh vehei'akhazu betokheinu yhvh 'al timrodu ve'otanu 'el timrodu bibnotekhem lakhem mizbeiakh mibal'adei mizbakh yhvh 'eloheinu. joshua 22:20	halo 'akhan ben zerakh ma'al ma'al bakheirem ve'al kal 'adat yisra'el hayah qazef vehu 'ish 'ekhad lo gava' ba'avono. joshua 22:21	vaya'anu benei re'uben ubenei gad vakhazi sheibet hamnasheh vaydaberu 'et rashei 'alfei yisra'el. joshua 22:22	'el 'elohim yhvh 'el 'elohim yhvh hu yodeia' veyisra'el hu yeida' 'im bemered ve'im bema'al yhvh 'al toshi'einu hayom hazeh. joshua 22:23	libnot lanu mizbeiakh lashub mei'akharei yhvh ve'im leha'alot 'alav 'olah uminkhah ve'im la'asot 'alav zibkhei shelamim yhvh hu yebaqesh. joshua 22:24	ve'im lo mide'agah midabar 'asinu 'et zot leimor makhar yomeru beneikhem lebaneinu leimor mah lakhem yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. joshua 22:25	ugebul natan yhvh beineinu ubeineikhem benei re'uben ubenei gad 'et hayarden 'en lakhem kheileq yhvh vehishbitu beneikhem 'et baneinu lebilti yero 'et yhvh. joshua 22:26	vanomer na'aseh na lanu libnot 'et hamizbeiakh lo le'olah velo lezabakh. joshua 22:27	ki 'ed hu beineinu ubeineikhem uben doroteinu 'akhareinu la'abod 'et 'abodat yhvh lefanav be'oloteinu ubizbakheinu ubishlameinu velo yomeru beneikhem makhar lebaneinu 'en lakhem kheileq yhvh. joshua 22:28	vanomer vehayah ki yomeru 'eileinu ve'el doroteinu makhar ve'amarnu re'u 'et tabnit mizbakh yhvh 'asher 'asu 'aboteinu lo le'olah velo lezebakh ki 'ed hu beineinu ubeineikhem. joshua 22:29	khalilah lanu mimenu limrod yhvh velashub hayom mei'akharei yhvh libnot mizbeiakh le'olah leminkhah ulezabakh milebad mizbakh yhvh 'eloheinu 'asher lifnei mishkano. joshua 22:30	vayishma' pinekhas hakohen unesi'ei ha'eidah verashei 'alfei yisra'el 'asher 'ito 'et hadebarim 'asher diberu benei re'uben ubenei gad ubenei menasheh vayitab be'eineihem. joshua 22:31	vayomer pinekhas ben 'el'azar hakohen 'el benei re'uben ve'el benei gad ve'el benei menasheh hayom yada'nu ki betokheinu yhvh 'asher lo me'altem yhvh hama'al hazeh 'az hizaltem 'et benei yisra'el miyad yhvh. joshua 22:32	vayashab pinekhas ben 'el'azar hakohen vehanesi'im mei'et benei re'uben umei'et benei gad mei'erez hagil'ad 'el 'erez kena'an 'el benei yisra'el vayashibu 'otam dabar. joshua 22:33	vayitab hadabar be'einei benei yisra'el vaybarakhu 'elohim benei yisra'el velo 'ameru la'alot 'aleihem lazaba leshakhet 'et ha'arez 'asher benei re'uben ubenei gad yoshebim bah. joshua 22:34	vayiqre'u benei re'uben ubenei gad lamizbeiakh ki 'ed hu beinoteinu ki yhvh ha'elohim. joshua 23:1	vayhi miyamim rabim 'akharei 'asher heiniakh yhvh leyisra'el mikal 'oyebeihem misabib vihoshua' zaqen ba bayamim. joshua 23:2	vayiqra yehoshua' lekhal yisra'el lizqeinav ulerashav uleshofetav uleshoterav vayomer 'aleihem 'ani zaqanti bati bayamim. joshua 23:3	ve'atem re'item 'et kal 'asher 'asah yhvh 'eloheikhem lekhal hagoyim ha'eleh mipeneikhem ki yhvh 'eloheikhem hu hanilkham lakhem. joshua 23:4	re'u hipalti lakhem 'et hagoyim hanish'arim ha'eleh benakhalah leshibteikhem min hayarden vekhal hagoyim 'asher hikhrati vehayam hagadol mebo hashamesh. joshua 23:5	yhvh 'eloheikhem hu yehdofem mipeneikhem vehorish 'otam milifneikhem virishtem 'et 'arzam ka'asher diber yhvh 'eloheikhem lakhem. joshua 23:6	vakhazaqtem me'od lishmor vela'asot 'et kal hakatub beseifer torat mosheh lebilti sur mimenu yamin usemol. joshua 23:7	lebilti bo bagoyim ha'eleh hanish'arim ha'eleh 'itekhem ubeshem 'eloheihem lo tazkiru velo tashbi'u velo ta'abdum velo tishtakhavu lahem. joshua 23:8	ki 'im yhvh 'eloheikhem tidbaqu ka'asher 'asitem 'ad hayom hazeh. joshua 23:9	vayoresh yhvh mipeneikhem goyim gedolim va'azumim ve'atem lo 'amad 'ish bifneikhem 'ad hayom hazeh. joshua 23:10	'ish 'ekhad mikem yirdaf 'alef ki yhvh 'eloheikhem hu hanilkham lakhem ka'asher diber lakhem. joshua 23:11	venishmartem me'od lenafshoteikhem le'ahabah 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem. joshua 23:12	ki 'im shob tashubu udebaqtem beyeter hagoyim ha'eleh hanish'arim ha'eleh 'itekhem vehitkhatantem bahem ubatem bahem vehem bakhem. joshua 23:13	yadoa' teide'u ki lo yosif yhvh 'eloheikhem lehorish 'et hagoyim ha'eleh milifneikhem vehayu lakhem lefakh ulemoqesh uleshotet bezideikhem velizninim be'eineikhem 'ad 'abadekhem mei'al ha'adamah hatobah hazot 'asher natan lakhem yhvh 'eloheikhem. joshua 23:14	vehineh 'anokhi holekh hayom bederekh kal ha'arez vida'tem bekhal lebabkhem ubekhal nafshekhem ki lo nafal dabar 'ekhad mikol hadebarim hatobim 'asher diber yhvh 'eloheikhem 'aleikhem hakol ba'u lakhem lo nafal mimenu dabar 'ekhad. joshua 23:15	vehayah ka'asher ba 'aleikhem kal hadabar hatob 'asher diber yhvh 'eloheikhem 'aleikhem ken yabi yhvh 'aleikhem 'et kal hadabar hara' 'ad hashmido 'otkhem mei'al ha'adamah hatobah hazot 'asher natan lakhem yhvh 'eloheikhem. joshua 23:16	be'aberekhem 'et berit yhvh 'eloheikhem 'asher zivah 'etkhem vahalakhtem va'abadtem 'elohim 'akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem vekharah 'af yhvh bakhem va'abadtem meheirah mei'al ha'arez hatobah 'asher natan lakhem. joshua 24:1	vaye'esof yehoshua' 'et kal shibtei yisra'el shekhemah vayiqra leziqnei yisra'el ulerashav uleshofetav uleshoterav vayityazebu lifnei ha'elohim. joshua 24:2	vayomer yehoshua' 'el kal ha'am koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el be'eiber hanahar yashebu 'aboteikhem mei'olam terakh 'abi 'abraham va'abi nakhor vaya'abdu 'elohim 'akheirim. joshua 24:3	va'eqakh 'et 'abikhem 'et 'abraham mei'eiber hanahar va'olekh 'oto bekhal 'erez kena'an va'ereb va'arbeh 'et zar'o va'eten lo 'et yizkhaq. joshua 24:4	va'eten leyizkhaq 'et ya'aqob ve'et 'eisav va'eten le'eisav 'et har sei'ir lareshet 'oto veya'aqob ubanav yaredu mizrayim. joshua 24:5	va'eshlakh 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon va'egof 'et mizrayim ka'asher 'asiti beqirbo ve'akhar hozeiti 'etkhem. joshua 24:6	va'ozi 'et 'aboteikhem mimizrayim vatabo'u hayamah vayirdefu mizrayim 'akharei 'aboteikhem berekheb ubefarashim yam suf. joshua 24:7	vayiz'aqu 'el yhvh vayasem ma'afel beineikhem uben hamizrim vayabei 'alav 'et hayam vaykhaseihu vatir'enah 'eineikhem 'et 'asher 'asiti bemizrayim vateishebu bamidbar yamim rabim.
