joshua 24:8	va'abi'ah va'abi 'etkhem 'el 'erez ha'emori hayosheb be'eiber hayarden vayilakhamu 'itekhem va'eten 'otam beyedkhem vatireshu 'et 'arzam va'ashmidem mipeneikhem. joshua 24:9	vayaqam balaq ben zipor melekh mo'ab vayilakhem beyisra'el vayishlakh vayiqra lebil'am ben be'or leqalel 'etkhem. joshua 24:10	velo 'abiti lishmoa' lebil'am vaybarekh barokh 'etkhem va'azil 'etkhem miyado. joshua 24:11	vata'abru 'et hayarden vatabo'u 'el yerikho vayilakhamu bakhem ba'alei yerikho ha'emori vehaperizi vehakena'ani vehakhiti vehagirgashi hakhivi vehaybusi va'eten 'otam beyedkhem. joshua 24:12	va'eshlakh lifneikhem 'et hazir'ah vategaresh 'otam mipeneikhem shenei malkhei ha'emori lo bekharbekha velo beqashtekha. joshua 24:13	va'eten lakhem 'erez 'asher lo yaga'ta bah ve'arim 'asher lo benitem vateishebu bahem keramim vezeitim 'asher lo neta'tem 'atem 'okhelim. joshua 24:14	ve'atah yer'u 'et yhvh ve'ibdu 'oto betamim ube'emet vehasiru 'et 'elohim 'asher 'abedu 'aboteikhem be'eiber hanahar ubemizrayim ve'ibdu 'et yhvh. joshua 24:15	ve'im ra' be'eineikhem la'abod 'et yhvh bakharu lakhem hayom 'et mi ta'abodun 'im 'et 'elohim 'asher 'abedu 'aboteikhem 'asher be'eiber mei'eiber hanahar ve'im 'et 'elohei ha'emori 'asher 'atem yoshebim be'arzam ve'anokhi ubeiti na'abod 'et yhvh. joshua 24:16	vaya'an ha'am vayomer khalilah lanu mei'azob 'et yhvh la'abod 'elohim 'akheirim. joshua 24:17	ki yhvh 'eloheinu hu hama'aleh 'otanu ve'et 'aboteinu mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim va'asher 'asah le'eineinu 'et ha'otot hagedolot ha'eleh vayishmereinu bekhal haderekh 'asher halakhnu bah ubekhol ha'amim 'asher 'abarnu beqirbam. joshua 24:18	vaygaresh yhvh 'et kal ha'amim ve'et ha'emori yosheb ha'arez mipaneinu gam 'anakhnu na'abod 'et yhvh ki hu 'eloheinu. joshua 24:19	vayomer yehoshua' 'el ha'am lo tukhelu la'abod 'et yhvh ki 'elohim qedoshim hu 'el qano hu lo yisa lefish'akhem ulekhatoteikhem. joshua 24:20	ki ta'azbu 'et yhvh va'abadtem 'elohei neikhar veshab veheira' lakhem vekhilah 'etkhem 'akharei 'asher heitib lakhem. joshua 24:21	vayomer ha'am 'el yehoshua' lo ki 'et yhvh na'abod. joshua 24:22	vayomer yehoshua' 'el ha'am 'eidim 'atem bakhem ki 'atem bekhartem lakhem 'et yhvh la'abod 'oto vayomeru 'eidim. joshua 24:23	ve'atah hasiru 'et 'elohei haneikhar 'asher beqirbekhem vehatu 'et lebabkhem 'el yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. joshua 24:24	vayomeru ha'am 'el yehoshua' 'et yhvh 'eloheinu na'abod ubeqolo nishma'. joshua 24:25	vayikhrot yehoshua' berit la'am bayom hahu vayasem lo khoq umishpat bishkhem. joshua 24:26	vayikhtob yehoshua' 'et hadebarim ha'eleh beseifer torat 'elohim vayiqakh 'eben gedolah vayqimeha sham takhat ha'alah 'asher bemiqdash yhvh. joshua 24:27	vayomer yehoshua' 'el kal ha'am hineh ha'eben hazot tihyeh banu le'eidah ki hi shame'ah 'et kal 'imrei yhvh 'asher diber 'imanu vehayetah bakhem le'eidah pen tekhakhashun beiloheikhem. joshua 24:28	vayshalakh yehoshua' 'et ha'am 'ish lenakhalato. joshua 24:29	vayhi 'akharei hadebarim ha'eleh vayamat yehoshua' bin nun 'ebed yhvh ben mei'ah va'eser shanim. joshua 24:30	vayiqberu 'oto bigbul nakhalato betimnat serakh 'asher behar 'efrayim mizefon lehar ga'ash joshua 24:31	vaya'abod yisra'el 'et yhvh kol yemei yehoshua' vekhol yemei hazeqeinim 'asher he'erikhu yamim 'akharei yehoshua' va'asher yade'u 'et kal ma'aseh yhvh 'asher 'asah leyisra'el. joshua 24:32	ve'et 'azmot yosef 'asher he'elu benei yisra'el mimizrayim qaberu bishkhem bekhelqat hasadeh 'asher qanah ya'aqob mei'et benei khamor 'abi shekhem bemei'ah qesitah vayihyu libnei yosef lenakhalah. joshua 24:33	ve'el'azar ben 'aharon met vayiqberu 'oto begib'at pinekhas beno 'asher nitan lo behar 'efrayim. 

judges 1:1	vayhi 'akharei mot yehoshua' vayish'alu benei yisra'el yhvh leimor mi ya'aleh lanu 'el hakena'ani batekhilah lehilakhem bo. judges 1:2	vayomer yhvh yehudah ya'aleh hineh natati 'et ha'arez beyado. judges 1:3	vayomer yehudah leshim'on 'akhiv 'aleh 'iti begorali venilakhamah bakena'ani vehalakhti gam 'ani 'itekha begoralekha vayeilekh 'ito shim'on. judges 1:4	vaya'al yehudah vayiten yhvh 'et hakena'ani vehaperizi beyadam vayakum bebezeq 'aseret 'alafim 'ish. judges 1:5	vayimze'u 'et 'adoni bezeq bebezeq vayilakhamu bo vayaku 'et hakena'ani ve'et haperizi. judges 1:6	vayanas 'adoni bezeq vayirdefu 'akharav vayokhazu 'oto vayqazezu 'et behonot yadav veraglav. judges 1:7	vayomer 'adoni bezeq shib'im melakhim behonot yedeihem veragleihem mequzazim hayu melaqetim takhat shulkhani ka'asher 'asiti ken shilam li 'elohim vaybi'uhu yerushalim vayamat sham. judges 1:8	vayilakhamu benei yehudah birushalim vayilkedu 'otah vayakuha lefi khareb ve'et ha'ir shilekhu ba'esh. judges 1:9	ve'akhar yaredu benei yehudah lehilakhem bakena'ani yosheb hahar vehanegeb vehashefeilah. judges 1:10	vayeilekh yehudah 'el hakena'ani hayosheb bekhebron veshem khebron lefanim qiryat 'arba' vayaku 'et sheishai ve'et 'akhiman ve'et talmai. judges 1:11	vayeilekh misham 'el yoshebei debir veshem debir lefanim qiryat seifer. judges 1:12	vayomer kaleb 'asher yakeh 'et qiryat seifer ulekhadah venatati lo 'et 'akhsah biti le'ishah. judges 1:13	vayilkedah 'ateni'el ben qenaz 'akhi khaleb haqaton mimenu vayiten lo 'et 'akhsah bito le'ishah. judges 1:14	vayhi bebo'ah vatesiteihu lish'ol mei'et 'abiha hasadeh vatiznakh mei'al hakhamor vayomer lah kaleb mah lakh. judges 1:15	vatomer lo habah li berakhah ki 'erez hanegeb netatani venatatah li gulot mayim vayiten lah kaleb 'et gulot 'ilit ve'et gulot takhtit. judges 1:16	ubenei qeini khoten mosheh 'alu mei'ir hatemarim 'et benei yehudah midbar yehudah 'asher benegeb 'arad vayeilekh vayeisheb 'et ha'am. judges 1:17	vayeilekh yehudah 'et shim'on 'akhiv vayaku 'et hakena'ani yosheb zefat vayakharimu 'otah vayiqra 'et shem ha'ir kharemah. judges 1:18	vayilkod yehudah 'et 'azah ve'et gebulah ve'et 'ashqelon ve'et gebulah ve'et 'eqron ve'et gebulah. judges 1:19	vayhi yhvh 'et yehudah vayoresh 'et hahar ki lo lehorish 'et yoshebei ha'eimeq ki rekheb barzel lahem. judges 1:20	vayitenu lekhaleb 'et khebron ka'asher diber mosheh vayoresh misham 'et sheloshah benei ha'anaq. judges 1:21	ve'et haybusi yosheb yerushalim lo horishu benei binyamin vayeisheb haybusi 'et benei binyamin birushalim 'ad hayom hazeh. judges 1:22	vaya'alu bet yosef gam hem bet 'el yhvh 'imam. judges 1:23	vayatiru bet yosef bebet 'el veshem ha'ir lefanim luz. judges 1:24	vayir'u hashomerim 'ish yozei min ha'ir vayomeru lo har'einu na 'et mebo ha'ir ve'asinu 'imekha khased. judges 1:25	vayar'em 'et mebo ha'ir vayaku 'et ha'ir lefi khareb ve'et ha'ish ve'et kal mishpakhto shileikhu. judges 1:26	vayeilekh ha'ish 'erez hakhitim vayiben 'ir vayiqra shemah luz hu shemah 'ad hayom hazeh. judges 1:27	velo horish menasheh 'et bet she'an ve'et benoteha ve'et ta'nakh ve'et benoteha ve'et yosheb yoshebei dor ve'et benoteha ve'et yoshebei yible'am ve'et benoteha ve'et yoshebei megido ve'et benoteha vayo'el hakena'ani lashebet ba'arez hazot. judges 1:28	vayhi ki khazaq yisra'el vayasem 'et hakena'ani lamas vehoresh lo horisho. judges 1:29	ve'efrayim lo horish 'et hakena'ani hayosheb begazer vayeisheb hakena'ani beqirbo begazer. judges 1:30	zebulun lo horish 'et yoshebei qitron ve'et yoshebei nahalol vayeisheb hakena'ani beqirbo vayihyu lamas. judges 1:31	'asher lo horish 'et yoshebei 'ako ve'et yoshebei zidon ve'et 'akhlab ve'et 'akhzib ve'et khelbah ve'et 'afiq ve'et rekhob. judges 1:32	vayeisheb ha'asheiri beqereb hakena'ani yoshebei ha'arez ki lo horisho. judges 1:33	naftali lo horish 'et yoshebei bet shemesh ve'et yoshebei bet 'anat vayeisheb beqereb hakena'ani yoshebei ha'arez veyoshebei bet shemesh ubet 'anat hayu lahem lamas. judges 1:34	vayilkhazu ha'emori 'et benei dan haharah ki lo netano laredet la'eimeq. judges 1:35	vayo'el ha'emori lashebet behar kheres be'ayalon ubesha'albim vatikhbad yad bet yosef vayihyu lamas. judges 1:36	ugebul ha'emori mima'aleh 'aqrabim meihasela' vama'elah. judges 2:1	vaya'al mal'akh yhvh min hagilgal 'el habokhim vayomer 'a'aleh 'etkhem mimizrayim va'abi 'etkhem 'el ha'arez 'asher nishba'ti la'aboteikhem va'omar lo 'afer beriti 'itekhem le'olam. judges 2:2	ve'atem lo tikhretu berit leyoshebei ha'arez hazot mizbekhoteihem titozun velo shema'tem beqoli mah zot 'asitem. judges 2:3	vegam 'amarti lo 'agaresh 'otam mipeneikhem vehayu lakhem lezidim veiloheihem yihyu lakhem lemoqesh. judges 2:4	vayhi kedaber mal'akh yhvh 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'el kal benei yisra'el vayis'u ha'am 'et qolam vayibku. judges 2:5	vayiqre'u shem hamaqom hahu bokhim vayizbekhu sham yhvh. judges 2:6	vayshalakh yehoshua' 'et ha'am vayeilekhu benei yisra'el 'ish lenakhalato lareshet 'et ha'arez. judges 2:7	vaya'abdu ha'am 'et yhvh kol yemei yehoshua' vekhol yemei hazeqeinim 'asher he'erikhu yamim 'akharei yehoshua' 'asher ra'u 'et kal ma'aseh yhvh hagadol 'asher 'asah leyisra'el. judges 2:8	vayamat yehoshua' bin nun 'ebed yhvh ben mei'ah va'eser shanim. judges 2:9	vayiqberu 'oto bigbul nakhalato betimnat kheres behar 'efrayim mizefon lehar ga'ash. judges 2:10	vegam kal hador hahu ne'esfu 'el 'abotav vayaqam dor 'akher 'akhareihem 'asher lo yade'u 'et yhvh vegam 'et hama'aseh 'asher 'asah leyisra'el. judges 2:11	vaya'asu benei yisra'el 'et hara' be'einei yhvh vaya'abdu 'et habe'alim. judges 2:12	vaya'azbu 'et yhvh 'elohei 'abotam hamozi 'otam mei'erez mizrayim vayeilekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim mei'elohei ha'amim 'asher sebiboteihem vayishtakhavu lahem vayakh'isu 'et yhvh. judges 2:13	vaya'azbu 'et yhvh vaya'abdu laba'al vela'ashtarot. judges 2:14	vayikhar 'af yhvh beyisra'el vayitenem beyad shosim vayashosu 'otam vayimkerem beyad 'oybeihem misabib velo yakhelu 'od la'amod lifnei 'oybeihem. judges 2:15	bekhol 'asher yaze'u yad yhvh hayetah bam lera'ah ka'asher diber yhvh vekha'asher nishba' yhvh lahem vayeizer lahem me'od. judges 2:16	vayaqem yhvh shofetim vayoshi'um miyad shoseihem. judges 2:17	vegam 'el shofeteihem lo shamei'u ki zanu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim vayishtakhavu lahem saru maher min haderekh 'asher halekhu 'abotam lishmoa' mizvot yhvh lo 'asu khen. judges 2:18	vekhi heiqim yhvh lahem shofetim vehayah yhvh 'im hashofet vehoshi'am miyad 'oyebeihem kol yemei hashofet ki yinakhem yhvh mina'aqatam mipenei lokhazeihem vedokhaqeihem. judges 2:19	vehayah bemot hashofet yashubu vehishkhitu mei'abotam lalekhet 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam ulehishtakhavot lahem lo hipilu mima'aleihem umidarkam haqashah. judges 2:20	vayikhar 'af yhvh beyisra'el vayomer ya'an 'asher 'aberu hago hazeh 'et beriti 'asher ziviti 'et 'abotam velo shame'u leqoli. judges 2:21	gam 'ani lo 'osif lehorish 'ish mipeneihem min hagoyim 'asher 'azab yehoshua' vayamot. judges 2:22	lema'an nasot bam 'et yisra'el hashomerim hem 'et derekh yhvh lalekhet bam ka'asher shameru 'abotam 'im lo. judges 2:23	vayanakh yhvh 'et hagoyim ha'eleh lebilti horisham maher velo netanam beyad yehoshua'. judges 3:1	ve'eleh hagoyim 'asher hiniakh yhvh lenasot bam 'et yisra'el 'et kal 'asher lo yade'u 'et kal milkhamot kena'an. judges 3:2	raq lema'an da'at dorot benei yisra'el lelamedam milkhamah raq 'asher lefanim lo yeda'um. judges 3:3	khameishet sarnei felishtim vekhal hakena'ani vehazidoni vehakhivi yosheb har halebanon meihar ba'al khermon 'ad lebo khamat. judges 3:4	vayihyu lenasot bam 'et yisra'el lada'at hayishme'u 'et mizvot yhvh 'asher zivah 'et 'abotam beyad mosheh. judges 3:5	ubenei yisra'el yashebu beqereb hakena'ani hakhiti veha'emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi. judges 3:6	vayiqkhu 'et benoteihem lahem lenashim ve'et benoteihem natenu libneihem vaya'abdu 'et 'eloheihem. judges 3:7	vaya'asu benei yisra'el 'et hara' be'einei yhvh vayishkekhu 'et yhvh 'eloheihem vaya'abdu 'et habe'alim ve'et ha'asheirot. judges 3:8	vayikhar 'af yhvh beyisra'el vayimkerem beyad kushan rish'atayim melekh 'aram naharayim vaya'abdu benei yisra'el 'et kushan rish'atayim shemoneh shanim. judges 3:9	vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el yhvh vayaqem yhvh moshia' libnei yisra'el vayoshi'em 'et 'ateni'el ben qenaz 'akhi khaleb haqaton mimenu. judges 3:10	vatehi 'alav ruakh yhvh vayishpot 'et yisra'el vayeizei lamilkhamah vayiten yhvh beyado 'et kushan rish'atayim melekh 'aram vata'az yado 'al kushan rish'atayim. judges 3:11	vatishqot ha'arez 'arba'im shanah vayamat 'ateni'el ben qenaz. judges 3:12	vayosifu benei yisra'el la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh vaykhazeq yhvh 'et 'eglon melekh mo'ab 'al yisra'el 'al ki 'asu 'et hara' be'einei yhvh. judges 3:13	vaye'esof 'eilav 'et benei 'amon va'amaleq vayeilekh vayakh 'et yisra'el vayireshu 'et 'ir hatemarim. judges 3:14	vaya'abdu benei yisra'el 'et 'eglon melekh mo'ab shemoneh 'esreh shanah. judges 3:15	vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el yhvh vayaqem yhvh lahem moshia' 'et 'eihud ben geira ben haymini 'ish 'iter yad yemino vayishlekhu benei yisra'el beyado minkhah le'eglon melekh mo'ab. judges 3:16	vaya'as lo 'eihud khereb velah shenei feiyot gomed 'arekah vayakhgor 'otah mitakhat lemadav 'al yerekh yemino. judges 3:17	vayaqreb 'et haminkhah le'eglon melekh mo'ab ve'eglon 'ish bari me'od. judges 3:18	vayhi ka'asher kilah lehaqrib 'et haminkhah vayshalakh 'et ha'am nose'ei haminkhah. judges 3:19	vehu shab min hapesilim 'asher 'et hagilgal vayomer debar seiter li 'eilekha hamelekh vayomer has vayeize'u mei'alav kal ha'omedim 'alav. judges 3:20	ve'eihud ba 'eilav vehu yosheb ba'aliyat hameqeirah 'asher lo lebado vayomer 'eihud debar 'elohim li 'eilekha vayaqam mei'al hakisei. judges 3:21	vayishlakh 'eihud 'et yad semolo vayiqakh 'et hakhereb mei'al yerekh yemino vayitqa'eha bebitno. judges 3:22	vayabo gam hanizab 'akhar halahab vayisgor hakheileb be'ad halahab ki lo shalaf hakhereb mibitno vayeizei haparshedonah. judges 3:23	vayeizei 'eihud hamisderonah vayisgor daltot ha'aliyah ba'ado vena'al. judges 3:24	vehu yaza va'abadav ba'u vayir'u vehineh daltot ha'aliyah ne'ulot vayomeru 'akh meisikh hu 'et raglav bakhadar hameqeirah. judges 3:25	vayakhilu 'ad bosh vehineh 'einenu foteiakh daltot ha'aliyah vayiqkhu 'et hamafteiakh vayiftakhu vehineh 'adoneihem nofel 'arzah met. judges 3:26	ve'eihud nimlat 'ad hitmahmeham vehu 'abar 'et hapesilim vayimalet hase'iratah. judges 3:27	vayhi bebo'o vayitqa' bashofar behar 'efrayim vayeiredu 'imo benei yisra'el min hahar vehu lifneihem. judges 3:28	vayomer 'aleihem ridfu 'akharai ki natan yhvh 'et 'oyebeikhem 'et mo'ab beyedkhem vayeiredu 'akharav vayilkedu 'et ma'berot hayarden lemo'ab velo natenu 'ish la'abor. judges 3:29	vayaku 'et mo'ab ba'et hahi ka'aseret 'alafim 'ish kal shamen vekhal 'ish khayil velo nimlat 'ish. judges 3:30	vatikana' mo'ab bayom hahu takhat yad yisra'el vatishqot ha'arez shemonim shanah. judges 3:31	ve'akharav hayah shamgar ben 'anat vayakh 'et pelishtim shesh mei'ot 'ish bemalmad habaqar vayosha' gam hu 'et yisra'el. judges 4:1	vayosifu benei yisra'el la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh ve'eihud met. judges 4:2	vayimkerem yhvh beyad yabin melekh kena'an 'asher malakh bekhazor vesar zeba'o sisera vehu yosheb bakharoshet hagoyim. judges 4:3	vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el yhvh ki tesha' mei'ot rekheb barzel lo vehu lakhaz 'et benei yisra'el bekhazeqah 'esrim shanah. judges 4:4	udeborah 'ishah nebi'ah 'eishet lapidot hi shofetah 'et yisra'el ba'et hahi. judges 4:5	vehi yoshebet takhat tomer deborah ben haramah uben bet 'el behar 'efrayim vaya'alu 'eileha benei yisra'el lamishpat. judges 4:6	vatishlakh vatiqra lebaraq ben 'abino'am miqedesh naftali vatomer 'eilav halo zivah yhvh 'elohei yisra'el lekh umashakhta behar tabor velaqakhta 'imekha 'aseret 'alafim 'ish mibenei naftali umibenei zebulun. judges 4:7	umashakhti 'eilekha 'el nakhal qishon 'et sisera sar zeba yabin ve'et rikhbo ve'et hamono unetatihu beyadekha. judges 4:8	vayomer 'eileha baraq 'im teilekhi 'imi vehalakheti ve'im lo teilekhi 'imi lo 'eilekh. judges 4:9	vatomer halokh 'eilekh 'imakh 'efes ki lo tihyeh tif'artekha 'al haderekh 'asher 'atah holekh ki beyad 'ishah yimkor yhvh 'et sisera vataqam deborah vateilekh 'im baraq qedshah. judges 4:10	vayaz'eq baraq 'et zebulun ve'et naftali qedshah vaya'al beraglav 'aseret 'alfei 'ish vata'al 'imo deborah. judges 4:11	vekheber haqeini nifrad miqayin mibenei khobab khoten mosheh vayet 'aholo 'ad 'eilon baz'anim beza'ananim 'asher 'et qedesh. judges 4:12	vayagidu lesisera ki 'alah baraq ben 'abino'am har tabor. judges 4:13	vayaz'eq sisera 'et kal rikhbo tesha' mei'ot rekheb barzel ve'et kal ha'am 'asher 'ito meikharoshet hagoyim 'el nakhal qishon. judges 4:14	vatomer deborah 'el baraq qum ki zeh hayom 'asher natan yhvh 'et sisera beyadekha halo yhvh yaza lefanekha vayeired baraq meihar tabor va'aseret 'alafim 'ish 'akharav. judges 4:15	vayaham yhvh 'et sisera ve'et kal harekheb ve'et kal hamakhaneh lefi khereb lifnei baraq vayeired sisera mei'al hamerkabah vayanas beraglav. judges 4:16	ubaraq radaf 'akharei harekheb ve'akharei hamakhaneh 'ad kharoshet hagoyim vayipol kal makhaneh sisera lefi khereb lo nish'ar 'ad 'ekhad. judges 4:17	vesisera nas beraglav 'el 'ohel ya'el 'eishet kheber haqeini ki shalom ben yabin melekh khazor uben bet kheber haqeini. judges 4:18	vateizei ya'el liqrat sisera vatomer 'eilav surah 'adoni surah 'eilai 'al tira vayasar 'eileha ha'ohelah vatekhaseihu basemikhah. judges 4:19	vayomer 'eileha hashqini na me'at mayim ki zameiti vatiftakh 'et nod hekhalab vatashqeihu vatekhaseihu. judges 4:20	vayomer 'eileha 'amod petakh ha'ohel vehayah 'im 'ish yabo ushe'eilekh ve'amar hayesh poh 'ish ve'amart 'ayin. judges 4:21	vatiqakh ya'el 'eishet kheber 'et yetad ha'ohel vatasem 'et hamaqebet beyadah vatabo 'eilav balat vatitqa' 'et hayated beraqato vatiznakh ba'arez vehu nirdam vaya'af vayamot. judges 4:22	vehineh baraq rodef 'et sisera vateizei ya'el liqrato vatomer lo lekh ve'ar'eka 'et ha'ish 'asher 'atah mebaqesh vayabo 'eileha vehineh sisera nofel met vehayated beraqato. judges 4:23	vayakhna' 'elohim bayom hahu 'et yabin melekh kena'an lifnei benei yisra'el. judges 4:24	vateilekh yad benei yisra'el halokh veqashah 'al yabin melekh kena'an 'ad 'asher hikhritu 'et yabin melekh kena'an. judges 5:1	vatashar deborah ubaraq ben 'abino'am bayom hahu leimor. judges 5:2	bifroa' pera'ot beyisra'el behitnadeb 'am barakhu yhvh. judges 5:3	shim'u melakhim ha'azinu rozenim 'anokhi yhvh 'anokhi 'ashirah 'azamer yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. judges 5:4	yhvh bezeitekha misei'ir beza'dekha misedeh 'edom 'erez ra'ashah gam shamayim natafu gam 'abim natefu mayim. judges 5:5	harim nazelu mipenei yhvh zeh sinai mipenei yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. judges 5:6	bimei shamgar ben 'anat bimei ya'el khadelu 'orakhot veholekhei netibot yeilekhu 'orakhot 'aqalqalot. judges 5:7	khadelu ferazon beyisra'el khadelu 'ad shaqamti deborah shaqamti 'em beyisra'el. judges 5:8	yibkhar 'elohim khadashim 'az lakhem she'arim magen 'im yeira'eh varomakh be'arba'im 'elef beyisra'el. judges 5:9	libi lekhoqei yisra'el hamitnadebim ba'am barakhu yhvh. judges 5:10	rokhebei 'atonot zekhorot yoshebei 'al midin veholekhei 'al derekh sikhu. judges 5:11	miqol mekhazim ben mash'abim sham yetanu zidqot yhvh zidqot pirzono beyisra'el 'az yaredu lashe'arim 'am yhvh. judges 5:12	'uri 'uri deborah 'uri 'uri daberi shir qum baraq ushabeh shebyekha ben 'abino'am. judges 5:13	'az yerad sarid le'adirim 'am yhvh yerad li bagiborim. judges 5:14	mini 'efrayim sharesham ba'amaleq 'akharekha binyamin ba'amamekha mini makhir yaredu mekhoqeqim umizebulun moshekhim besheibet sofer. judges 5:15	vesarai beyisashkhar 'im deborah veyisashkhar ken baraq ba'eimeq shulakh beraglav biflagot re'uben gedolim khiqei leb. judges 5:16	lamah yashabta ben hamishpetayim lishmoa' sheriqot 'adarim liflagot re'uben gedolim khiqrei leb. judges 5:17	gil'ad be'eiber hayarden shakhen vedan lamah yagur 'oniyot 'asher yashab lekhof yamim ve'al mifrazav yishkon. judges 5:18	zebulun 'am kheiref nafsho lamut venaftali 'al meromei sadeh. judges 5:19	ba'u melakhim nilkhamu 'az nilkhamu malkhei khena'an beta'nakh 'al mei megido beza' kesef lo laqakhu. judges 5:20	min shamayim nilkhamu hakokhabim mimesilotam nilkhamu 'im sisera. judges 5:21	nakhal qishon gerafam nakhal qedumim nakhal qishon tidrekhi nafshi 'oz. judges 5:22	'az halemu 'iqebei sus midaharot daharot 'abirav. judges 5:23	'oru meiroz 'amar mal'akh yhvh 'oru 'aror yoshebeha ki lo ba'u le'ezrat yhvh le'ezrat yhvh bagiborim. judges 5:24	teborakh minashim ya'el 'eishet kheber haqeini minashim ba'ohel teborakh. judges 5:25	mayim sha'al khalab natanah beseifel 'adirim hiqribah khem'ah. judges 5:26	yadah layated tishlakhnah viminah lehalmut 'ameilim vehalemah sisera makhaqah rosho umakhazah vekhalefah raqato. judges 5:27	ben ragleha kara' nafal shakhab ben ragleha kara' nafal ba'asher kara' sham nafal shadud. judges 5:28	be'ad hakhalon nishqefah vateyabeb 'em sisera be'ad ha'eshnab madua' boshesh rikhbo labo madua' 'ekheru pa'amei markebotav. judges 5:29	khakhmot saroteha ta'anenah 'af hi tashib 'amareha lah. judges 5:30	halo yimze'u yekhalequ shalal rakham rakhamatayim lerosh geber shelal zeba'im lesisera shelal zeba'im riqmah zeba' riqmatayim lezaverei shalal. judges 5:31	ken yobedu khal 'oybekha yhvh ve'ohabav kezet hashemesh bigburato vatishqot ha'arez 'arba'im shanah. judges 6:1	vaya'asu benei yisra'el hara' be'einei yhvh vayitenem yhvh beyad midyan sheba' shanim. judges 6:2	vata'az yad midyan 'al yisra'el mipenei midyan 'asu lahem benei yisra'el 'et haminharot 'asher beharim ve'et hame'arot ve'et hamezadot. judges 6:3	vehayah 'im zara' yisra'el ve'alah midyan va'amaleq ubenei qedem ve'alu 'alav. judges 6:4	vayakhanu 'aleihem vayashkhitu 'et yebul ha'arez 'ad bo'akha 'azah velo yash'iru mikhyah beyisra'el veseh vashor vakhamor. judges 6:5	ki hem umiqneihem ya'alu ve'aholeihem yabo'u uba'u khedei 'arbeh larob velahem veligmaleihem 'en mispar vayabo'u ba'arez leshakhatah. judges 6:6	vayidal yisra'el me'od mipenei midyan vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el yhvh. judges 6:7	vayhi ki za'aqu benei yisra'el 'el yhvh 'al 'odot midyan. judges 6:8	vayishlakh yhvh 'ish nabi 'el benei yisra'el vayomer lahem koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'anokhi he'eleiti 'etkhem mimizrayim va'ozi 'etkhem mibet 'abadim. judges 6:9	va'azil 'etkhem miyad mizrayim umiyad kal lokhazeikhem va'agaresh 'otam mipeneikhem va'etenah lakhem 'et 'arzam. judges 6:10	va'omerah lakhem 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem lo tire'u 'et 'elohei ha'emori 'asher 'atem yoshebim be'arzam velo shema'tem beqoli. judges 6:11	vayabo mal'akh yhvh vayeisheb takhat ha'eilah 'asher be'aferah 'asher leyo'ash 'abi ha'ezri vegid'on beno khobet khitim bagat lehanis mipenei midyan. judges 6:12	vayeira 'eilav mal'akh yhvh vayomer 'eilav yhvh 'imekha gibor hekhayil. judges 6:13	vayomer 'eilav gid'on bi 'adoni veyesh yhvh 'imanu velamah meza'atnu kal zot ve'ayeh khal nifle'otav 'asher siperu lanu 'aboteinu leimor halo mimizrayim he'elanu yhvh ve'atah netashanu yhvh vayiteneinu bekhaf midyan. judges 6:14	vayifen 'eilav yhvh vayomer lekh bekhokhakha zeh vehosha'ta 'et yisra'el mikaf midyan halo shelakhtikha. judges 6:15	vayomer 'eilav bi 'adonai bamah 'oshia' 'et yisra'el hineh 'alpi hadal bimnasheh ve'anokhi haza'ir bebet 'abi. judges 6:16	vayomer 'eilav yhvh ki 'ehyeh 'imakh vehikita 'et midyan ke'ish 'ekhad. judges 6:17	vayomer 'eilav 'im na mazati khen be'einekha ve'asita li 'ot sha'atah medaber 'imi. judges 6:18	'al na tamush mizeh 'ad bo'i 'eilekha vehozeiti 'et minkhati vehinakhti lefanekha vayomar 'anokhi 'eisheb 'ad shubekha. judges 6:19	vegid'on ba vaya'as gedi 'izim ve'eifat qemakh mazot habasar sam basal vehamaraq sam baparur vayozei 'eilav 'el takhat ha'eilah vayagash. judges 6:20	vayomer 'eilav mal'akh ha'elohim qakh 'et habasar ve'et hamazot vehanakh 'el hasela' halaz ve'et hamaraq shefokh vaya'as ken. judges 6:21	vayishlakh mal'akh yhvh 'et qezeh hamish'enet 'asher beyado vayiga' babasar ubamazot vata'al ha'esh min hazur vatokhal 'et habasar ve'et hamazot umal'akh yhvh halakh mei'einav. judges 6:22	vayar gid'on ki mal'akh yhvh hu vayomer gid'on 'ahah 'adonai yhvh ki 'al ken ra'iti mal'akh yhvh panim 'el panim. judges 6:23	vayomer lo yhvh shalom lekha 'al tira lo tamut. judges 6:24	vayiben sham gid'on mizbeiakh yhvh vayiqra lo yhvh shalom 'ad hayom hazeh 'odenu be'aferat 'abi ha'ezri. judges 6:25	vayhi balaylah hahu vayomer lo yhvh qakh 'et par hashor 'asher le'abikha ufar hasheini sheba' shanim veharasta 'et mizbakh haba'al 'asher le'abikha ve'et ha'asheirah 'asher 'alav tikhrot. judges 6:26	ubanita mizbeiakh yhvh 'elohekha 'al rosh hama'oz hazeh bama'arakhah velaqakhta 'et hapar hasheini veha'alita 'olah ba'azei ha'asheirah 'asher tikhrot. judges 6:27	vayiqakh gid'on 'asarah 'anashim mei'abadav vaya'as ka'asher diber 'eilav yhvh vayhi ka'asher yarei 'et bet 'abiv ve'et 'anshei ha'ir mei'asot yomam vaya'as layelah. judges 6:28	vayashkimu 'anshei ha'ir baboqer vehineh nutaz mizbakh haba'al veha'asheirah 'asher 'alav koratah ve'et hapar hasheini ho'alah 'al hamizbeiakh habanui. judges 6:29	vayomeru 'ish 'el rei'eihu mi 'asah hadabar hazeh vayidreshu vaybaqshu vayomeru gid'on ben yo'ash 'asah hadabar hazeh. judges 6:30	vayomeru 'anshei ha'ir 'el yo'ash hozei 'et binkha veyamot ki nataz 'et mizbakh haba'al vekhi kharat ha'asheirah 'asher 'alav. judges 6:31	vayomer yo'ash lekhol 'asher 'amedu 'alav ha'atem teribun laba'al 'im 'atem toshi'un 'oto 'asher yarib lo yumat 'ad haboqer 'im 'elohim hu yareb lo ki nataz 'et mizbekho. judges 6:32	vayiqra lo bayom hahu yeruba'al leimor yareb bo haba'al ki nataz 'et mizbekho. judges 6:33	vekhal midyan va'amaleq ubenei qedem ne'esfu yakhdav vaya'abru vayakhanu be'eimeq yizre'el. judges 6:34	veruakh yhvh labeshah 'et gid'on vayitqa' bashofar vayiza'eq 'abi'ezer 'akharav. judges 6:35	umal'akhim shalakh bekhal menasheh vayiza'eq gam hu 'akharav umal'akhim shalakh be'asher ubizbulun ubenaftali vaya'alu liqratam. judges 6:36	vayomer gid'on 'el ha'elohim 'im yeshkha moshia' beyadi 'et yisra'el ka'asher dibarta. judges 6:37	hineh 'anokhi mazig 'et gizat hazemer bagoren 'im tal yihyeh 'al hagizah lebadah ve'al kal ha'arez khoreb veyada'ti ki toshia' beyadi 'et yisra'el ka'asher dibarta. judges 6:38	vayhi khen vayashkem mimakhorat vayazar 'et hagizah vayimez tal min hagizah melo haseifel mayim. judges 6:39	vayomer gid'on 'el ha'elohim 'al yikhar 'apekha bi va'adaberah 'akh hapa'am 'anaseh na raq hapa'am bagizah yehi na khoreb 'el hagizah lebadah ve'al kal ha'arez yihyeh tal. judges 6:40	vaya'as 'elohim ken balaylah hahu vayhi khoreb 'el hagizah lebadah ve'al kal ha'arez hayah tal. judges 7:1	vayashkem yeruba'al hu gid'on vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito vayakhanu 'al 'en kharod umakhaneh midyan hayah lo mizafon migib'at hamoreh ba'eimeq. judges 7:2	vayomer yhvh 'el gid'on rab ha'am 'asher 'itakh mititi 'et midyan beyadam pen yitpa'er 'alai yisra'el leimor yadi hoshi'ah li. judges 7:3	ve'atah qera na be'azenei ha'am leimor mi yarei vekhared yashob veyizpor meihar hagil'ad vayashab min ha'am 'esrim ushenayim 'elef va'aseret 'alafim nish'aru. judges 7:4	vayomer yhvh 'el gid'on 'od ha'am rab hored 'otam 'el hamayim ve'ezrefenu lekha sham vehayah 'asher 'omar 'eilekha zeh yeilekh 'itakh hu yeilekh 'itakh vekhol 'asher 'omar 'eilekha zeh lo yeilekh 'imakh hu lo yeilekh. judges 7:5	vayored 'et ha'am 'el hamayim vayomer yhvh 'el gid'on kol 'asher yaloq bilshono min hamayim ka'asher yaloq hakeleb tazig 'oto lebad vekhol 'asher yikhra' 'al birkav lishtot. judges 7:6	vayhi mispar hamalaqim beyadam 'el pihem shelosh mei'ot 'ish vekhol yeter ha'am kare'u 'al birkheihem lishtot mayim. judges 7:7	vayomer yhvh 'el gid'on bishlosh mei'ot ha'ish hamalaqim 'oshia' 'etkhem venatati 'et midyan beyadekha vekhal ha'am yeilekhu 'ish limqomo. judges 7:8	vayiqkhu 'et zeidah ha'am beyadam ve'et shofroteihem ve'et kal 'ish yisra'el shilakh 'ish le'ohalav ubishlosh mei'ot ha'ish hekheziq umakhaneh midyan hayah lo mitakhat ba'eimeq. judges 7:9	vayhi balaylah hahu vayomer 'eilav yhvh qum red bamakhaneh ki netativ beyadekha. judges 7:10	ve'im yarei 'atah laredet red 'atah ufurah na'arkha 'el hamakhaneh. judges 7:11	veshama'ta mah yedabeiru ve'akhar tekhezaqnah yadekha veyaradta bamakhaneh vayeired hu ufurah na'aro 'el qezeh hakhamushim 'asher bamakhaneh. judges 7:12	umidyan va'amaleq vekhal benei qedem nofelim ba'eimeq ka'arbeh larob veligmaleihem 'en mispar kakhol she'al sefat hayam larob. judges 7:13	vayabo gid'on vehineh 'ish mesaper lerei'eihu khalom vayomer hineh khalom khalamti vehineh zelol zelil lekhem se'orim mithapekh bemakhaneh midyan vayabo 'ad ha'ohel vayakeihu vayipol vayahafkheihu lema'lah venafal ha'ohel. judges 7:14	vaya'an rei'eihu vayomer 'en zot bilti 'im khereb gid'on ben yo'ash 'ish yisra'el natan ha'elohim beyado 'et midyan ve'et kal hamakhaneh. judges 7:15	vayhi khishmoa' gid'on 'et mispar hakhalom ve'et shibro vayishtakhu vayashab 'el makhaneh yisra'el vayomer qumu ki natan yhvh beyedkhem 'et makhaneh midyan. judges 7:16	vayakhaz 'et shelosh mei'ot ha'ish sheloshah rashim vayiten shofarot beyad kulam vekhadim reiqim velapidim betokh hakadim. judges 7:17	vayomer 'aleihem mimeni tir'u vekhen ta'asu vehineh 'anokhi ba biqzeh hamakhaneh vehayah kha'asher 'e'eseh ken ta'asun. judges 7:18	vetaqa'ti bashofar 'anokhi vekhal 'asher 'iti uteqa'tem bashofarot gam 'atem sebibot kal hamakhaneh va'amartem yhvh ulegid'on. judges 7:19	vayabo gid'on umei'ah 'ish 'asher 'ito biqzeh hamakhaneh rosh ha'ashmoret hatikhonah 'akh haqem heiqimu 'et hashomerim vayitqe'u bashofarot venafoz hakadim 'asher beyadam. judges 7:20	vayitqe'u sheloshet harashim bashofarot vayishberu hakadim vayakhaziqu beyad sem'olam balapidim ubeyad yeminam hashofarot litqoa' vayiqre'u khereb yhvh ulegid'on. judges 7:21	vaya'amdu 'ish takhtav sabib lamakhaneh vayaraz kal hamakhaneh vayari'u vayanisu vayanusu. judges 7:22	vayitqe'u shelosh mei'ot hashofarot vayasem yhvh 'et khereb 'ish berei'eihu ubekhal hamakhaneh vayanas hamakhaneh 'ad bet hashitah zereiratah 'ad sefat 'abel mekholah 'al tabat. judges 7:23	vayiza'eq 'ish yisra'el minaftali umin 'asher umin kal menasheh vayirdefu 'akharei midyan. judges 7:24	umal'akhim shalakh gid'on bekhal har 'efrayim leimor redu liqrat midyan velikhdu lahem 'et hamayim 'ad bet barah ve'et hayarden vayiza'eq kal 'ish 'efrayim vayilkedu 'et hamayim 'ad bet barah ve'et hayarden. judges 7:25	vayilkedu shenei sarei midyan 'et 'oreb ve'et ze'eb vayahargu 'et 'oreb bezur 'oreb ve'et ze'eb haregu beyeqeb ze'eb vayirdefu 'el midyan verosh 'oreb uze'eb heibi'u 'el gid'on mei'eiber layarden. judges 8:1	vayomeru 'eilav 'ish 'efrayim mah hadabar hazeh 'asita lanu lebilti qerot lanu ki halakhta lehilakhem bemidyan vayribun 'ito bekhazeqah. judges 8:2	vayomer 'aleihem meh 'asiti 'atah kakhem halo tob 'olelot 'efrayim mibzir 'abi'ezer. judges 8:3	beyedkhem natan 'elohim 'et sarei midyan 'et 'oreb ve'et ze'eb umah yakholeti 'asot kakhem 'az rafetah rukham mei'alav bedabero hadabar hazeh. judges 8:4	vayabo gid'on hayardeinah 'ober hu ushelosh mei'ot ha'ish 'asher 'ito 'ayeifim verodefim. judges 8:5	vayomer le'anshei sukot tenu na kikerot lekhem la'am 'asher beraglai ki 'ayeifim hem ve'anokhi rodef 'akharei zebakh vezalmuna' malkhei midyan. judges 8:6	vayomer sarei sukot hakhaf zebakh vezalmuna' 'atah beyadekha ki niten lizba'akha lakhem. judges 8:7	vayomer gid'on lakhen betet yhvh 'et zebakh ve'et zalmuna' beyadi vedashti 'et besarkhem 'et qozei hamidbar ve'et habarqonim. judges 8:8	vaya'al misham penu'el vaydaber 'aleihem kazot vaya'anu 'oto 'anshei fenu'el ka'asher 'anu 'anshei sukot. judges 8:9	vayomer gam le'anshei fenu'el leimor beshubi beshalom 'etoz 'et hamigdal hazeh. judges 8:10	vezebakh vezalmuna' baqarqor umakhaneihem 'imam kakhameishet 'asar 'elef kol hanotarim mikol makhaneh benei qedem vehanofelim mei'ah ve'esrim 'elef 'ish sholef khareb. judges 8:11	vaya'al gid'on derekh hashekhunei ba'ohalim miqedem lenobakh veyagebohah vayakh 'et hamakhaneh vehamakhaneh hayah betakh. judges 8:12	vayanusu zebakh vezalmuna' vayirdof 'akhareihem vayilkod 'et shenei malkhei midyan 'et zebakh ve'et zalmuna' vekhal hamakhaneh hekherid. judges 8:13	vayashab gid'on ben yo'ash min hamilkhamah milma'aleh hekhares. judges 8:14	vayilkad na'ar mei'anshei sukot vayish'aleihu vayikhtob 'eilav 'et sarei sukot ve'et zeqeineha shib'im veshib'ah 'ish. judges 8:15	vayabo 'el 'anshei sukot vayomer hineh zebakh vezalmuna' 'asher kheiraftem 'oti leimor hakhaf zebakh vezalmuna' 'atah beyadekha ki niten la'anashekha haye'eifim lakhem. judges 8:16	vayiqakh 'et ziqnei ha'ir ve'et qozei hamidbar ve'et habarqonim vayoda' bahem 'et 'anshei sukot. judges 8:17	ve'et migdal penu'el nataz vayaharog 'et 'anshei ha'ir. judges 8:18	vayomer 'el zebakh ve'el zalmuna' 'eifoh ha'anashim 'asher haragtem betabor vayomeru kamokha khemohem 'ekhad keto'ar benei hamelekh. judges 8:19	vayomar 'akhai benei 'imi hem khai yhvh lu hakhayitem 'otam lo haragti 'etkhem. judges 8:20	vayomer leyeter bekhoro qum harog 'otam velo shalaf hana'ar kharbo ki yarei ki 'odenu na'ar. judges 8:21	vayomer zebakh vezalmuna' qum 'atah ufega' banu ki kha'ish geburato vayaqam gid'on vayaharog 'et zebakh ve'et zalmuna' vayiqakh 'et hasaharonim 'asher bezaverei gemaleihem. judges 8:22	vayomeru 'ish yisra'el 'el gid'on meshal banu gam 'atah gam binkha gam ben benekha ki hosha'tanu miyad midyan. judges 8:23	vayomer 'aleihem gid'on lo 'emshol 'ani bakhem velo yimshol beni bakhem yhvh yimshol bakhem. judges 8:24	vayomer 'aleihem gid'on 'esh'alah mikem she'eilah utenu li 'ish nezem shelalo ki nizmei zahab lahem ki yishme'eilim hem. judges 8:25	vayomeru naton niten vayifresu 'et hasimlah vayashlikhu shamah 'ish nezem shelalo. judges 8:26	vayhi mishqal nizmei hazahab 'asher sha'al 'elef usheba' mei'ot zahab lebad min hasaharonim vehanetifot ubigdei ha'argaman she'al malkhei midyan ulebad min ha'anaqot 'asher bezaverei gemaleihem. judges 8:27	vaya'as 'oto gid'on le'eifod vayazeg 'oto be'iro be'aferah vayiznu khal yisra'el 'akharav sham vayhi legid'on ulebeito lemoqesh. judges 8:28	vayikana' midyan lifnei benei yisra'el velo yasefu laset rosham vatishqot ha'arez 'arba'im shanah bimei gid'on. judges 8:29	vayeilekh yeruba'al ben yo'ash vayeisheb bebeito. judges 8:30	ulegid'on hayu shib'im banim yoze'ei yereikho ki nashim rabot hayu lo. judges 8:31	ufilagsho 'asher bishkhem yaledah lo gam hi ben vayasem 'et shemo 'abimelekh. judges 8:32	vayamat gid'on ben yo'ash beseibah tobah vayiqaber beqeber yo'ash 'abiv be'aferah 'abi ha'ezri. judges 8:33	vayhi ka'asher met gid'on vayashubu benei yisra'el vayiznu 'akharei habe'alim vayasimu lahem ba'al berit leilohim. judges 8:34	velo zakheru benei yisra'el 'et yhvh 'eloheihem hamazil 'otam miyad kal 'oyebeihem misabib. judges 8:35	velo 'asu khesed 'im bet yeruba'al gid'on kekhal hatobah 'asher 'asah 'im yisra'el. judges 9:1	vayeilekh 'abimelekh ben yeruba'al shekhemah 'el 'akhei 'imo vaydaber 'aleihem ve'el kal mishpakhat bet 'abi 'imo leimor. judges 9:2	daberu na be'azenei khal ba'alei shekhem mah tob lakhem hamshol bakhem shib'im 'ish kol benei yeruba'al 'im meshol bakhem 'ish 'ekhad uzekhartem ki 'azmeikhem ubesarkhem 'ani. judges 9:3	vaydaberu 'akhei 'imo 'alav be'azenei kal ba'alei shekhem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh vayet libam 'akharei 'abimelekh ki 'ameru 'akhinu hu. judges 9:4	vayitenu lo shib'im kesef mibet ba'al berit vayiskor bahem 'abimelekh 'anashim reiqim ufokhazim vayeilekhu 'akharav. judges 9:5	vayabo bet 'abiv 'aferatah vayaharog 'et 'ekhav benei yeruba'al shib'im 'ish 'al 'eben 'ekhat vayivater yotam ben yeruba'al haqaton ki nekhba. judges 9:6	vayei'asefu kal ba'alei shekhem vekhal bet milo vayeilekhu vayamlikhu 'et 'abimelekh lemelekh 'im 'eilon muzab 'asher bishkhem. judges 9:7	vayagidu leyotam vayeilekh vaya'amod berosh har gerizim vayisa qolo vayiqra vayomer lahem shim'u 'eilai ba'alei shekhem veyishma' 'aleikhem 'elohim. judges 9:8	halokh halekhu ha'eizim limshoakh 'aleihem melekh vayomeru lazayit melokhah malekhah 'aleinu. judges 9:9	vayomer lahem hazayit hekhodalti 'et dishni 'asher bi yekhabedu 'elohim va'anashim vehalakhti lanua' 'al ha'eizim. judges 9:10	vayomeru ha'eizim late'einah lekhi 'at malekhi 'aleinu. judges 9:11	vatomer lahem hate'einah hekhodalti 'et mateqi ve'et tenubati hatobah vehalakhti lanua' 'al ha'eizim. judges 9:12	vayomeru ha'eizim lagafen lekhi 'at malokhi malekhi 'aleinu. judges 9:13	vatomer lahem hagefen hekhodalti 'et tiroshi hamsameiakh 'elohim va'anashim vehalakhti lanua' 'al ha'eizim. judges 9:14	vayomeru khal ha'eizim 'el ha'atad lekh 'atah melakh 'aleinu. judges 9:15	vayomer ha'atad 'el ha'eizim 'im be'emet 'atem moshekhim 'oti lemelekh 'aleikhem bo'u khasu bezili ve'im 'ayin teizei 'esh min ha'atad vetokhal 'et 'arzei halebanon. judges 9:16	ve'atah 'im be'emet ubetamim 'asitem vatamlikhu 'et 'abimelekh ve'im tobah 'asitem 'im yeruba'al ve'im beito ve'im kigmul yadav 'asitem lo. judges 9:17	'asher nilkham 'abi 'aleikhem vayashlekh 'et nafsho mineged vayazel 'etkhem miyad midyan. judges 9:18	ve'atem qamtem 'al bet 'abi hayom vatahargu 'et banav shib'im 'ish 'al 'eben 'ekhat vatamlikhu 'et 'abimelekh ben 'amato 'al ba'alei shekhem ki 'akhikhem hu. judges 9:19	ve'im be'emet ubetamim 'asitem 'im yeruba'al ve'im beito hayom hazeh simkhu ba'abimelekh veyismakh gam hu bakhem. judges 9:20	ve'im 'ayin teizei 'esh mei'abimelekh vetokhal 'et ba'alei shekhem ve'et bet milo veteizei 'esh miba'alei shekhem umibet milo vetokhal 'et 'abimelekh. judges 9:21	vayanas yotam vayibrakh vayeilekh be'eirah vayeisheb sham mipenei 'abimelekh 'akhiv. judges 9:22	vayasar 'abimelekh 'al yisra'el shalosh shanim. judges 9:23	vayishlakh 'elohim ruakh ra'ah ben 'abimelekh uben ba'alei shekhem vayibgedu ba'alei shekhem ba'abimelekh. judges 9:24	labo khamas shib'im benei yeruba'al vedamam lasum 'al 'abimelekh 'akhihem 'asher harag 'otam ve'al ba'alei shekhem 'asher khizequ 'et yadav laharog 'et 'ekhav. judges 9:25	vayasimu lo ba'alei shekhem me'arebim 'al rashei heharim vayigzelu 'et kal 'asher ya'abor 'aleihem badarekh vayugad la'abimelekh. judges 9:26	vayabo ga'al ben 'ebed ve'ekhav vaya'abru bishkhem vayibtekhu bo ba'alei shekhem. judges 9:27	vayeize'u hasadeh vayibzeru 'et karmeihem vayidrekhu vaya'asu hilulim vayabo'u bet 'eloheihem vayokhelu vayishtu vayqalu 'et 'abimelekh. judges 9:28	vayomer ga'al ben 'ebed mi 'abimelekh umi shekhem ki na'abdenu halo ben yeruba'al uzebul peqido 'ibdu 'et 'anshei khamor 'abi shekhem umadua' na'abdenu 'anakhenu. judges 9:29	umi yiten 'et ha'am hazeh beyadi ve'asirah 'et 'abimelekh vayomer la'abimelekh rabeh zeba'akha vazei'ah. judges 9:30	vayishma' zebul sar ha'ir 'et dibrei ga'al ben 'abed vayikhar 'apo. judges 9:31	vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el 'abimelekh betaremah leimor hineh ga'al ben 'ebed ve'ekhav ba'im shekhemah vehinam zarim 'et ha'ir 'alekha. judges 9:32	ve'atah qum laylah 'atah veha'am 'asher 'itakh ve'erob basadeh. judges 9:33	vehayah baboqer kizroakh hashemesh tashkim ufashata 'al ha'ir vehineh hu veha'am 'asher 'ito yoze'im 'eilekha ve'asita lo ka'asher timza yadekha. judges 9:34	vayaqam 'abimelekh vekhal ha'am 'asher 'imo layelah vaye'erbu 'al shekhem 'arba'ah rashim. judges 9:35	vayeizei ga'al ben 'ebed vaya'amod petakh sha'ar ha'ir vayaqam 'abimelekh veha'am 'asher 'ito min hama'rab. judges 9:36	vayar ga'al 'et ha'am vayomer 'el zebul hineh 'am yored meirashei heharim vayomer 'eilav zebul 'et zel heharim 'atah ro'eh ka'anashim. judges 9:37	vayosef 'od ga'al ledaber vayomer hineh 'am yordim mei'im tabur ha'arez verosh 'ekhad ba miderekh 'eilon me'onim. judges 9:38	vayomer 'eilav zebul 'ayeh 'eifo fikha 'asher tomar mi 'abimelekh ki na'abdenu halo zeh ha'am 'asher ma'astah bo zei na 'atah vehilakhem bo. judges 9:39	vayeizei ga'al lifnei ba'alei shekhem vayilakhem ba'abimelekh. judges 9:40	vayirdefeihu 'abimelekh vayanas mipanav vayipelu khalalim rabim 'ad petakh hasha'ar. judges 9:41	vayeisheb 'abimelekh barumah vaygaresh zebul 'et ga'al ve'et 'ekhav mishebet bishkhem. judges 9:42	vayhi mimakhorat vayeizei ha'am hasadeh vayagidu la'abimelekh. judges 9:43	vayiqakh 'et ha'am vayekhezem lishloshah rashim vaye'erob basadeh vayar vehineh ha'am yozei min ha'ir vayaqam 'aleihem vayakem. judges 9:44	va'abimelekh veharashim 'asher 'imo pashetu vaya'amdu petakh sha'ar ha'ir ushenei harashim pashetu 'al kal 'asher basadeh vayakum. judges 9:45	va'abimelekh nilkham ba'ir kol hayom hahu vayilkod 'et ha'ir ve'et ha'am 'asher bah harag vayitoz 'et ha'ir vayizra'eha melakh. judges 9:46	vayishme'u kal ba'alei migdal shekhem vayabo'u 'el zeriakh bet 'el berit. judges 9:47	vayugad la'abimelekh ki hitqabezu kal ba'alei migdal shekhem. judges 9:48	vaya'al 'abimelekh har zalmon hu vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito vayiqakh 'abimelekh 'et haqardumot beyado vayikhrot sokhat 'eizim vayisa'eha vayasem 'al shikhmo vayomer 'el ha'am 'asher 'imo mah re'item 'asiti maharu 'asu khamoni. judges 9:49	vayikhretu gam kal ha'am 'ish sokhoh vayeilekhu 'akharei 'abimelekh vayasimu 'al hazeriakh vayazitu 'aleihem 'et hazeriakh ba'esh vayamutu gam kal 'anshei migdal shekhem ke'elef 'ish ve'ishah. judges 9:50	vayeilekh 'abimelekh 'el teibez vayikhan beteibez vayilkedah. judges 9:51	umigdal 'oz hayah betokh ha'ir vayanusu shamah kal ha'anashim vehanashim vekhol ba'alei ha'ir vayisgeru ba'adam vaya'alu 'al gag hamigdal. judges 9:52	vayabo 'abimelekh 'ad hamigdal vayilakhem bo vayigash 'ad petakh hamigdal lesarefo ba'esh. judges 9:53	vatashlekh 'ishah 'akhat pelakh rekheb 'al rosh 'abimelekh vatariz 'et gulgaleto. judges 9:54	vayiqra meheirah 'el hana'ar nosei kheilav vayomer lo shelof kharbekha umoteini pen yomeru li 'ishah haragatehu vayidqereihu na'aro vayamot. judges 9:55	vayir'u 'ish yisra'el ki met 'abimelekh vayeilekhu 'ish limqomo. judges 9:56	vayasheb 'elohim 'et ra'at 'abimelekh 'asher 'asah le'abiv laharog 'et shib'im 'ekhav. judges 9:57	ve'et kal ra'at 'anshei shekhem heishib 'elohim berosham vatabo 'aleihem qilalat yotam ben yeruba'al. judges 10:1	vayaqam 'akharei 'abimelekh lehoshia' 'et yisra'el tola' ben pu'ah ben dodo 'ish yisashkhar vehu yosheb beshamir behar 'efrayim. judges 10:2	vayishpot 'et yisra'el 'esrim veshalosh shanah vayamat vayiqaber beshamir. judges 10:3	vayaqam 'akharav ya'ir hagil'adi vayishpot 'et yisra'el 'esrim ushetayim shanah. judges 10:4	vayhi lo sheloshim banim rokhebim 'al sheloshim 'ayarim usheloshim 'ayarim lahem lahem yiqre'u khavot ya'ir 'ad hayom hazeh 'asher be'erez hagil'ad. judges 10:5	vayamat ya'ir vayiqaber beqamon. judges 10:6	vayosifu benei yisra'el la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh vaya'abdu 'et habe'alim ve'et ha'ashtarot ve'et 'elohei 'aram ve'et 'elohei zidon ve'et 'elohei mo'ab ve'et 'elohei benei 'amon ve'et 'elohei felishtim vaya'azbu 'et yhvh velo 'abaduhu. judges 10:7	vayikhar 'af yhvh beyisra'el vayimkerem beyad pelishtim ubeyad benei 'amon. judges 10:8	vayir'azu vayrozezu 'et benei yisra'el bashanah hahi shemoneh 'esreh shanah 'et kal benei yisra'el 'asher be'eiber hayarden be'erez ha'emori 'asher bagil'ad. judges 10:9	vaya'abru benei 'amon 'et hayarden lehilakhem gam bihudah ubebinyamin ubebet 'efrayim vateizer leyisra'el me'od. judges 10:10	vayiz'aqu benei yisra'el 'el yhvh leimor khatanu lakh vekhi 'azabnu 'et 'eloheinu vana'abod 'et habe'alim. judges 10:11	vayomer yhvh 'el benei yisra'el halo mimizrayim umin ha'emori umin benei 'amon umin pelishtim. judges 10:12	vezidonim va'amaleq uma'on lakhazu 'etkhem vatiz'aqu 'eilai va'oshi'ah 'etkhem miyadam. judges 10:13	ve'atem 'azabtem 'oti vata'abdu 'elohim 'akheirim lakhen lo 'osif lehoshia' 'etkhem. judges 10:14	lekhu veza'aqu 'el ha'elohim 'asher bekhartem bam hemah yoshi'u lakhem be'et zaratkhem. judges 10:15	vayomeru benei yisra'el 'el yhvh khatanu 'aseh 'atah lanu kekhal hatob be'einekha 'akh hazileinu na hayom hazeh. judges 10:16	vayasiru 'et 'elohei haneikhar miqirbam vaya'abdu 'et yhvh vatiqzar nafsho ba'amal yisra'el. judges 10:17	vayiza'aqu benei 'amon vayakhanu bagil'ad vayei'asefu benei yisra'el vayakhanu bamizpah. judges 10:18	vayomeru ha'am sarei gil'ad 'ish 'el rei'eihu mi ha'ish 'asher yakhel lehilakhem bibnei 'amon yihyeh lerosh lekhol yoshebei gil'ad. judges 11:1	veyiftakh hagil'adi hayah gibor khayil vehu ben 'ishah zonah vayoled gil'ad 'et yiftakh. judges 11:2	vateiled 'eishet gil'ad lo banim vayigdelu benei ha'ishah vaygareshu 'et yiftakh vayomeru lo lo tinkhal bebet 'abinu ki ben 'ishah 'akheret 'atah. judges 11:3	vayibrakh yiftakh mipenei 'ekhav vayeisheb be'erez tob vayitlaqetu 'el yiftakh 'anashim reiqim vayeize'u 'imo. judges 11:4	vayhi miyamim vayilakhamu benei 'amon 'im yisra'el. judges 11:5	vayhi ka'asher nilkhamu benei 'amon 'im yisra'el vayeilekhu ziqnei gil'ad laqakhat 'et yiftakh mei'erez tob. judges 11:6	vayomeru leyiftakh lekhah vehayitah lanu leqazin venilakhamah bibnei 'amon. judges 11:7	vayomer yiftakh leziqnei gil'ad halo 'atem seneitem 'oti vategareshuni mibet 'abi umadua' batem 'eilai 'atah ka'asher zar lakhem. judges 11:8	vayomeru ziqnei gil'ad 'el yiftakh lakhen 'atah shabnu 'eilekha vehalakhta 'imanu venilkhamta bibnei 'amon vehayita lanu lerosh lekhol yoshebei gil'ad. judges 11:9	vayomer yiftakh 'el ziqnei gil'ad 'im meshibim 'atem 'oti lehilakhem bibnei 'amon venatan yhvh 'otam lefanai 'anokhi 'ehyeh lakhem lerosh. judges 11:10	vayomeru ziqnei gil'ad 'el yiftakh yhvh yihyeh shomeia' beinoteinu 'im lo khidbarekha ken na'aseh. judges 11:11	vayeilekh yiftakh 'im ziqnei gil'ad vayasimu ha'am 'oto 'aleihem lerosh uleqazin vaydaber yiftakh 'et kal debarav lifnei yhvh bamizpah. judges 11:12	vayishlakh yiftakh mal'akhim 'el melekh benei 'amon leimor mah li valakh ki bata 'eilai lehilakhem be'arzi. judges 11:13	vayomer melekh benei 'amon 'el mal'akhei yiftakh ki laqakh yisra'el 'et 'arzi ba'aloto mimizrayim mei'arnon ve'ad hayaboq ve'ad hayarden ve'atah hashibah 'ethen beshalom. judges 11:14	vayosef 'od yiftakh vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el melekh benei 'amon. judges 11:15	vayomer lo koh 'amar yiftakh lo laqakh yisra'el 'et 'erez mo'ab ve'et 'erez benei 'amon. judges 11:16	ki ba'alotam mimizrayim vayeilekh yisra'el bamidbar 'ad yam suf vayabo qadeishah. judges 11:17	vayishlakh yisra'el mal'akhim 'el melekh 'edom leimor 'e'berah na be'arzekha velo shama' melekh 'edom vegam 'el melekh mo'ab shalakh velo 'abah vayeisheb yisra'el beqadesh. judges 11:18	vayeilekh bamidbar vayasab 'et 'erez 'edom ve'et 'erez mo'ab vayabo mimizrakh shemesh le'erez mo'ab vayakhanun be'eiber 'arnon velo ba'u bigbul mo'ab ki 'arnon gebul mo'ab. judges 11:19	vayishlakh yisra'el mal'akhim 'el sikhon melekh ha'emori melekh kheshbon vayomer lo yisra'el na'berah na be'arzekha 'ad meqomi. judges 11:20	velo he'emin sikhon 'et yisra'el 'abor bigbulo vaye'esof sikhon 'et kal 'amo vayakhanu beyahezah vayilakhem 'im yisra'el. judges 11:21	vayiten yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'et sikhon ve'et kal 'amo beyad yisra'el vayakum vayirash yisra'el 'et kal 'erez ha'emori yosheb ha'arez hahi. judges 11:22	vayireshu 'et kal gebul ha'emori mei'arnon ve'ad hayaboq umin hamidbar ve'ad hayarden. judges 11:23	ve'atah yhvh 'elohei yisra'el horish 'et ha'emori mipenei 'amo yisra'el ve'atah tirashenu. judges 11:24	halo 'et 'asher yorishekha kemosh 'elohekha 'oto tirash ve'et kal 'asher horish yhvh 'eloheinu mipaneinu 'oto nirash. judges 11:25	ve'atah hatob tob 'atah mibalaq ben zipor melekh mo'ab harob rab 'im yisra'el 'im nilkhom nilkham bam. judges 11:26	beshebet yisra'el bekheshbon ubibnoteha ube'ar'or ubibnoteha ubekhal he'arim 'asher 'al yedei 'arnon shelosh mei'ot shanah umadua' lo hizaltem ba'et hahi. judges 11:27	ve'anokhi lo khatati lakh ve'atah 'oseh 'iti ra'ah lehilakhem bi yishpot yhvh hashofet hayom ben benei yisra'el uben benei 'amon. judges 11:28	velo shama' melekh benei 'amon 'el dibrei yiftakh 'asher shalakh 'eilav. judges 11:29	vatehi 'al yiftakh ruakh yhvh vaya'abor 'et hagil'ad ve'et menasheh vaya'abor 'et mizpeh gil'ad umimizpeh gil'ad 'abar benei 'amon. judges 11:30	vayidar yiftakh neder yhvh vayomar 'im naton titen 'et benei 'amon beyadi. judges 11:31	vehayah hayozei 'asher yeizei midaltei beiti liqrati beshubi beshalom mibenei 'amon vehayah yhvh veha'alitihu 'olah. judges 11:32	vaya'abor yiftakh 'el benei 'amon lehilakhem bam vayitenem yhvh beyado. judges 11:33	vayakem mei'aro'er ve'ad bo'akha minit 'esrim 'ir ve'ad 'abel keramim makah gedolah me'od vayikane'u benei 'amon mipenei benei yisra'el. judges 11:34	vayabo yiftakh hamizpah 'el beito vehineh bito yozet liqrato betupim ubimkholot veraq hi yekhidah 'en lo mimenu ben 'o bat. judges 11:35	vayhi khir'oto 'otah vayiqra' 'et begadav vayomer 'ahah biti hakhreia' hikhra'tini ve'at hayit be'okherai ve'anokhi paziti fi 'el yhvh velo 'ukhal lashub. judges 11:36	vatomer 'eilav 'abi pazitah 'et pikha 'el yhvh 'aseh li ka'asher yaza mipikha 'akharei 'asher 'asah lekha yhvh neqamot mei'oyebekha mibenei 'amon. judges 11:37	vatomer 'el 'abiha yei'aseh li hadabar hazeh harpeh mimeni shenayim khodashim ve'eilekhah veyaradti 'al heharim ve'ebkeh 'al betulai 'anokhi vera'iti verei'otai. judges 11:38	vayomer leikhi vayishlakh 'otah shenei khodashim vateilekh hi verei'oteha vateibek 'al betuleha 'al heharim. judges 11:39	vayhi miqez shenayim khodashim vatashab 'el 'abiha vaya'as lah 'et nidro 'asher nadar vehi lo yade'ah 'ish vatehi khoq beyisra'el. judges 11:40	miyamim yamimah teilakhnah benot yisra'el letanot lebat yiftakh hagil'adi 'arba'at yamim bashanah. judges 12:1	vayiza'eq 'ish 'efrayim vaya'abor zafonah vayomeru leyiftakh madua' 'abarta lehilakhem bibnei 'amon velanu lo qarata lalekhet 'imakh beitekha nisrof 'alekha ba'esh. judges 12:2	vayomer yiftakh 'aleihem 'ish rib hayiti 'ani ve'ami ubenei 'amon me'od va'ez'aq 'etkhem velo hosha'tem 'oti miyadam. judges 12:3	va'er'eh ki 'einekha moshia' va'asimah nafshi bekhapi va'e'berah 'el benei 'amon vayitenem yhvh beyadi velamah 'alitem 'eilai hayom hazeh lehilakhem bi. judges 12:4	vayiqboz yiftakh 'et kal 'anshei gil'ad vayilakhem 'et 'efrayim vayaku 'anshei gil'ad 'et 'efrayim ki 'ameru pelitei 'efrayim 'atem gil'ad betokh 'efrayim betokh menasheh. judges 12:5	vayilkod gil'ad 'et ma'berot hayarden le'efrayim vehayah ki yomeru pelitei 'efrayim 'e'eborah vayomeru lo 'anshei gil'ad ha'efrati 'atah vayomer lo. judges 12:6	vayomeru lo 'emar na shibolet vayomer sibolet velo yakhin ledaber ken vayokhazu 'oto vayishkhatuhu 'el ma'berot hayarden vayipol ba'et hahi mei'efrayim 'arba'im ushenayim 'alef. judges 12:7	vayishpot yiftakh 'et yisra'el shesh shanim vayamat yiftakh hagil'adi vayiqaber be'arei gil'ad. judges 12:8	vayishpot 'akharav 'et yisra'el 'ibzan mibet lakhem. judges 12:9	vayhi lo sheloshim banim usheloshim banot shilakh hakhuzah usheloshim banot heibi lebanav min hakhuz vayishpot 'et yisra'el sheba' shanim. judges 12:10	vayamat 'ibzan vayiqaber bebet lakhem. judges 12:11	vayishpot 'akharav 'et yisra'el 'eilon hazebuloni vayishpot 'et yisra'el 'eser shanim. judges 12:12	vayamat 'eilon hazebuloni vayiqaber be'ayalon be'erez zebulun. judges 12:13	vayishpot 'akharav 'et yisra'el 'abdon ben hilel hapir'atoni. judges 12:14	vayhi lo 'arba'im banim usheloshim benei banim rokhebim 'al shib'im 'ayarim vayishpot 'et yisra'el shemoneh shanim. judges 12:15	vayamat 'abdon ben hilel hapir'atoni vayiqaber befir'aton be'erez 'efrayim behar ha'amaleiqi. judges 13:1	vayosifu benei yisra'el la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh vayitenem yhvh beyad pelishtim 'arba'im shanah. judges 13:2	vayhi 'ish 'ekhad mizare'ah mimishpakhat hadani ushemo manoakh ve'ishto 'aqarah velo yaladah. judges 13:3	vayeira mal'akh yhvh 'el ha'ishah vayomer 'eileha hineh na 'at 'aqarah velo yaladt veharit veyaladt ben. judges 13:4	ve'atah hishameri na ve'al tishti yayin vesheikhar ve'al tokheli kal tamei. judges 13:5	ki hinakh harah veyoladt ben umorah lo ya'aleh 'al rosho ki nezir 'elohim yihyeh hana'ar min habaten vehu yakhel lehoshia' 'et yisra'el miyad pelishtim. judges 13:6	vatabo ha'ishah vatomer le'ishah leimor 'ish ha'elohim ba 'eilai umar'eihu kemar'eh mal'akh ha'elohim nora me'od velo she'iltihu 'ei mizeh hu ve'et shemo lo higid li. judges 13:7	vayomer li hinakh harah veyoladt ben ve'atah 'al tishti yayin vesheikhar ve'al tokheli kal tum'ah ki nezir 'elohim yihyeh hana'ar min habeten 'ad yom moto. judges 13:8	vaye'tar manoakh 'el yhvh vayomar bi 'adonai 'ish ha'elohim 'asher shalakhta yabo na 'od 'eileinu veyoreinu mah na'aseh lana'ar hayulad. judges 13:9	vayishma' ha'elohim beqol manoakh vayabo mal'akh ha'elohim 'od 'el ha'ishah vehi yoshebet basadeh umanoakh 'ishah 'en 'imah. judges 13:10	vatemaher ha'ishah vataraz vataged le'ishah vatomer 'eilav hineh nir'ah 'eilai ha'ish 'asher ba bayom 'eilai. judges 13:11	vayaqam vayeilekh manoakh 'akharei 'ishto vayabo 'el ha'ish vayomer lo ha'atah ha'ish 'asher dibarta 'el ha'ishah vayomer 'ani. judges 13:12	vayomer manoakh 'atah yabo debarekha mah yihyeh mishpat hana'ar uma'aseihu. judges 13:13	vayomer mal'akh yhvh 'el manoakh mikol 'asher 'amarti 'el ha'ishah tishamer. judges 13:14	mikol 'asher yeizei migefen hayayin lo tokhal veyayin vesheikhar 'al teishet vekhal tum'ah 'al tokhal kol 'asher zivitiha tishmor. judges 13:15	vayomer manoakh 'el mal'akh yhvh na'zerah na 'otakh vena'aseh lefanekha gedi 'izim. judges 13:16	vayomer mal'akh yhvh 'el manoakh 'im ta'zereini lo 'okhal belakhmekha ve'im ta'aseh 'olah yhvh ta'alenah ki lo yada' manoakh ki mal'akh yhvh hu. judges 13:17	vayomer manoakh 'el mal'akh yhvh mi shemekha ki yabo dibreikha debarekha vekhibadnukha. judges 13:18	vayomer lo mal'akh yhvh lamah zeh tish'al lishmi vehu feli. judges 13:19	vayiqakh manoakh 'et gedi ha'izim ve'et haminkhah vaya'al 'al hazur yhvh umafli la'asot umanoakh ve'ishto ro'im. judges 13:20	vayhi ba'alot halahab mei'al hamizbeiakh hashamaymah vaya'al mal'akh yhvh belahab hamizbeiakh umanoakh ve'ishto ro'im vayipelu 'al peneihem 'arezah. judges 13:21	velo yasaf 'od mal'akh yhvh leheira'oh 'el manoakh ve'el 'ishto 'az yada' manoakh ki mal'akh yhvh hu. judges 13:22	vayomer manoakh 'el 'ishto mot namut ki 'elohim ra'inu. judges 13:23	vatomer lo 'ishto lu khafez yhvh lahamiteinu lo laqakh miyadeinu 'olah uminkhah velo her'anu 'et kal 'eleh vekha'et lo hishmi'anu kazot. judges 13:24	vateiled ha'ishah ben vatiqra 'et shemo shimshon vayigdal hana'ar vaybarekheihu yhvh. judges 13:25	vatakhel ruakh yhvh lefa'amo bemakhaneh dan ben zare'ah uben 'eshta'ol. judges 14:1	vayeired shimshon timnatah vayar 'ishah betimnatah mibenot pelishtim. judges 14:2	vaya'al vayaged le'abiv ule'imo vayomer 'ishah ra'iti betimnatah mibenot pelishtim ve'atah qekhu 'otah li le'ishah. judges 14:3	vayomer lo 'abiv ve'imo ha'en bibnot 'akhekha ubekhal 'ami 'ishah ki 'atah holekh laqakhat 'ishah mipelishtim ha'areilim vayomer shimshon 'el 'abiv 'otah qakh li ki hi yasherah be'einai. judges 14:4	ve'abiv ve'imo lo yade'u ki yhvh hi ki to'anah hu mebaqesh mipelishtim uba'et hahi pelishtim moshelim beyisra'el. judges 14:5	vayeired shimshon ve'abiv ve'imo timnatah vayabo'u 'ad karmei timnatah vehineh kefir 'arayot sho'eg liqrato. judges 14:6	vatizlakh 'alav ruakh yhvh vayshase'eihu keshasa' hagedi ume'umah 'en beyado velo higid le'abiv ule'imo 'et 'asher 'asah. judges 14:7	vayeired vaydaber la'ishah vatishar be'einei shimshon. judges 14:8	vayashab miyamim leqakhtah vayasar lir'ot 'et mapelet ha'aryeh vehineh 'adat deborim bigviyat ha'aryeh udebash. judges 14:9	vayirdeihu 'el kapav vayeilekh halokh ve'akhol vayeilekh 'el 'abiv ve'el 'imo vayiten lahem vayokheilu velo higid lahem ki migeviyat ha'aryeh radah hadebash. judges 14:10	vayeired 'abihu 'el ha'ishah vaya'as sham shimshon mishteh ki ken ya'asu habakhurim. judges 14:11	vayhi kir'otam 'oto vayiqkhu sheloshim meirei'im vayihyu 'ito. judges 14:12	vayomer lahem shimshon 'akhudah na lakhem khidah 'im haged tagidu 'otah li shib'at yemei hamishteh umezatem venatati lakhem sheloshim sedinim usheloshim khalifot begadim. judges 14:13	ve'im lo tukhelu lehagid li unetatem 'atem li sheloshim sedinim usheloshim khalifot begadim vayomeru lo khudah khidatekha venishma'enah. judges 14:14	vayomer lahem meiha'okhel yaza ma'akhal umei'az yaza matoq velo yakhelu lehagid hakhidah sheloshet yamim. judges 14:15	vayhi bayom hashebi'i vayomeru le'eishet shimshon pati 'et 'ishekh veyaged lanu 'et hakhidah pen nisrof 'otakh ve'et bet 'abikh ba'esh halyaresheinu qeratem lanu halo. judges 14:16	vateibek 'eishet shimshon 'alav vatomer raq seneitani velo 'ahabtani hakhidah khadta libnei 'ami veli lo higadtah vayomer lah hineh le'abi ule'imi lo higadti velakh 'agid. judges 14:17	vateibek 'alav shib'at hayamim 'asher hayah lahem hamishteh vayhi bayom hashebi'i vayaged lah ki heziqathu vataged hakhidah libnei 'amah. judges 14:18	vayomeru lo 'anshei ha'ir bayom hashebi'i beterem yabo hakharsah mah matoq midebash umeh 'az mei'ari vayomer lahem lulei kharashtem be'eglati lo mezatem khidati. judges 14:19	vatizlakh 'alav ruakh yhvh vayeired 'ashqelon vayakh meihem sheloshim 'ish vayiqakh 'et khalizotam vayiten hakhalifot lemagidei hakhidah vayikhar 'apo vaya'al bet 'abihu. judges 14:20	vatehi 'eishet shimshon lemeirei'eihu 'asher rei'ah lo. judges 15:1	vayhi miyamim bimei qezir khitim vayifqod shimshon 'et 'ishto bigdi 'izim vayomer 'abo'ah 'el 'ishti hekhaderah velo netano 'abiha labo. judges 15:2	vayomer 'abiha 'amor 'amarti ki sano seneitah va'etenenah lemeirei'ekha halo 'akhotah haqetanah tobah mimenah tehi na lekha takhteha. judges 15:3	vayomer lahem shimshon niqeiti hapa'am mipelishtim ki 'oseh 'ani 'imam ra'ah. judges 15:4	vayeilekh shimshon vayilkod shelosh mei'ot shu'alim vayiqakh lapidim vayefen zanab 'el zanab vayasem lapid 'ekhad ben shenei hazenabot batavekh. judges 15:5	vayab'er 'esh balapidim vayshalakh beqamot pelishtim vayab'er migadish ve'ad qamah ve'ad kerem zayit. judges 15:6	vayomeru felishtim mi 'asah zot vayomeru shimshon khatan hatimni ki laqakh 'et 'ishto vayitenah lemeirei'eihu vaya'alu felishtim vayisrefu 'otah ve'et 'abiha ba'esh. judges 15:7	vayomer lahem shimshon 'im ta'asun kazot ki 'im niqamti bakhem ve'akhar 'ekhdal. judges 15:8	vayakh 'otam shoq 'al yarekh makah gedolah vayeired vayeisheb bis'if sela' 'eitam. judges 15:9	vaya'alu felishtim vayakhanu bihudah vayinateshu balekhi. judges 15:10	vayomeru 'ish yehudah lamah 'alitem 'aleinu vayomeru le'esor 'et shimshon 'alinu la'asot lo ka'asher 'asah lanu. judges 15:11	vayeiredu sheloshet 'alafim 'ish mihudah 'el se'if sela' 'eitam vayomeru leshimshon halo yada'ta ki moshelim banu pelishtim umah zot 'asita lanu vayomer lahem ka'asher 'asu li ken 'asiti lahem. judges 15:12	vayomeru lo le'esarekha yaradnu letitekha beyad pelishtim vayomer lahem shimshon hishabe'u li pen tifge'un bi 'atem. judges 15:13	vayomeru lo leimor lo ki 'asor ne'esarekha unetanukha beyadam vehamet lo nemitekha vaya'asruhu bishnayim 'abotim khadashim vaya'aluhu min hasala'. judges 15:14	hu ba 'ad lekhi ufelishtim heiri'u liqrato vatizlakh 'alav ruakh yhvh vatihyenah ha'abotim 'asher 'al zero'otav kapishtim 'asher ba'aru ba'esh vayimasu 'esurav mei'al yadav. judges 15:15	vayimza lekhi khamor teriyah vayishlakh yado vayiqakheha vayakh bah 'elef 'ish. judges 15:16	vayomer shimshon bilkhi hakhamor khamor khamoratayim bilkhi hakhamor hikeiti 'elef 'ish. judges 15:17	vayhi kekhaloto ledaber vayashlekh halekhi miyado vayiqra lamaqom hahu ramat lekhi. judges 15:18	vayizma me'od vayiqra 'el yhvh vayomar 'atah natata beyad 'abdekha 'et hateshu'ah hagedolah hazot ve'atah 'amut bazama venafalti beyad ha'areilim. judges 15:19	vayibqa' 'elohim 'et hamakhtesh 'asher balekhi vayeize'u mimenu mayim vayeishet vatashab rukho vayekhi 'al ken qara shemah 'en haqorei 'asher balekhi 'ad hayom hazeh. judges 15:20	vayishpot 'et yisra'el bimei felishtim 'esrim shanah. judges 16:1	vayeilekh shimshon 'azatah vayar sham 'ishah zonah vayabo 'eileha. judges 16:2	la'azatim leimor ba shimshon henah vayasobu vaye'erbu lo khal halaylah besha'ar ha'ir vayitkhareshu khal halaylah leimor 'ad 'or haboqer vahargenuhu judges 16:3	vayishkab shimshon 'ad khazi halaylah vayaqam bakhazi halaylah vaye'ekhoz bedaltot sha'ar ha'ir ubishtei hamezuzot vayisa'em 'im haberiakh vayasem 'al keteifav vaya'alem 'el rosh hahar 'asher 'al penei khebron. judges 16:4	vayhi 'akharei khen vaye'ehab 'ishah benakhal soreq ushemah delilah. judges 16:5	vaya'alu 'eileha sarnei felishtim vayomeru lah pati 'oto ure'i bameh kokho gadol ubameh nukhal lo va'asarnuhu le'anoto va'anakhnu nitan lakh 'ish 'elef umei'ah kasef. judges 16:6	vatomer delilah 'el shimshon hagidah na li bameh kokhakha gadol ubameh tei'aser le'anotekha. judges 16:7	vayomer 'eileha shimshon 'im ya'asruni beshib'ah yetarim lakhim 'asher lo khorabu vekhaliti vehayiti ke'akhad ha'adam. judges 16:8	vaya'alu lah sarnei felishtim shib'ah yetarim lakhim 'asher lo khorabu vata'asreihu bahem. judges 16:9	veha'oreb yosheb lah bakheder vatomer 'eilav pelishtim 'alekha shimshon vaynateq 'et haytarim ka'asher yinateq petil hane'oret baharikho 'esh velo noda' kokho. judges 16:10	vatomer delilah 'el shimshon hineh heitalta bi vatedaber 'eilai kezabim 'atah hagidah na li bameh tei'aser. judges 16:11	vayomer 'eileha 'im 'asor ya'asruni ba'abotim khadashim 'asher lo na'asah bahem melakhah vekhaliti vehayiti ke'akhad ha'adam. judges 16:12	vatiqakh delilah 'abotim khadashim vata'asreihu bahem vatomer 'eilav pelishtim 'alekha shimshon veha'oreb yosheb bekhader vaynateqem mei'al zero'otav kakhut. judges 16:13	vatomer delilah 'el shimshon 'ad henah heitalta bi vatedaber 'eilai kezabim hagidah li bameh tei'aser vayomer 'eileha 'im ta'argi 'et sheba' makhlefot roshi 'im hamasakhet. judges 16:14	vatitqa' bayated vatomer 'eilav pelishtim 'alekha shimshon vayiqaz mishenato vayisa' 'et haytad ha'ereg ve'et hamasakhet. judges 16:15	vatomer 'eilav 'ekh tomar 'ahabtikh velibekha 'en 'iti zeh shalosh pe'amim heitalta bi velo higadta li bameh kokhakha gadol. judges 16:16	vayhi ki heiziqah lo bidbareha kal hayamim vate'alazeihu vatiqzar nafsho lamut. judges 16:17	vayaged lah 'et kal libo vayomer lah morah lo 'alah 'al roshi ki nezir 'elohim 'ani mibeten 'imi 'im gulakhti vesar mimeni khokhi vekhaliti vehayiti kekhal ha'adam. judges 16:18	vateire delilah ki higid lah 'et kal libo vatishlakh vatiqra lesarnei felishtim leimor 'alu hapa'am ki higid lah li 'et kal libo ve'alu 'eileha sarnei felishtim vaya'alu hakesef beyadam. judges 16:19	vateyasheneihu 'al birkeha vatiqra la'ish vategalakh 'et sheba' makhlefot rosho vatakhel le'anoto vayasar kokho mei'alav. judges 16:20	vatomer pelishtim 'alekha shimshon vayiqaz mishenato vayomer 'eizei kefa'am befa'am ve'ina'er vehu lo yada' ki yhvh sar mei'alav. judges 16:21	vayokhazuhu felishtim vaynaqeru 'et 'einav vayoridu 'oto 'azatah vaya'asruhu bankhushtayim vayhi tokhen bebet ha'asirim ha'asurim. judges 16:22	vayakhel se'ar rosho lezameiakh ka'asher gulakh. judges 16:23	vesarnei felishtim ne'esfu lizboakh zebakh gadol ledagon 'eloheihem ulesimkhah vayomeru natan 'eloheinu beyadeinu 'et shimshon 'oybeinu. judges 16:24	vayir'u 'oto ha'am vayhalu 'et 'eloheihem ki 'ameru natan 'eloheinu beyadeinu 'et 'oybeinu ve'et makharib 'arzeinu va'asher hirbah 'et khalaleinu. judges 16:25	vayhi ki tob ketob libam vayomeru qir'u leshimshon visakheq lanu vayiqre'u leshimshon mibet ha'asirim ha'asurim vayzakheq lifneihem vaya'amidu 'oto ben ha'amudim. judges 16:26	vayomer shimshon 'el hana'ar hamakhaziq beyado hanikhah 'oti vaheimisheini vahamisheini 'et ha'amudim 'asher habayit nakhon 'aleihem ve'esha'en 'aleihem. judges 16:27	vehabayit malei ha'anashim vehanashim veshamah kol sarnei felishtim ve'al hagag kishloshet 'alafim 'ish ve'ishah haro'im biskhoq shimshon. judges 16:28	vayiqra shimshon 'el yhvh vayomar 'adonai yhvh zakhereini na vekhazeqeini na 'akh hapa'am hazeh ha'elohim ve'inaqemah neqam 'akhat mishetei 'einai mipelishtim. judges 16:29	vayilpot shimshon 'et shenei 'amudei hatavekh 'asher habayit nakhon 'aleihem vayisamekh 'aleihem 'ekhad bimino ve'ekhad bismolo. judges 16:30	vayomer shimshon tamot nafshi 'im pelishtim vayet bekhoakh vayipol habayit 'al haseranim ve'al kal ha'am 'asher bo vayihyu hameitim 'asher heimit bemoto rabim mei'asher heimit bekhayav. judges 16:31	vayeiredu 'ekhav vekhal bet 'abihu vayis'u 'oto vaya'alu vayiqberu 'oto ben zare'ah uben 'eshta'ol beqeber manoakh 'abiv vehu shafat 'et yisra'el 'esrim shanah. judges 17:1	vayhi 'ish meihar 'efrayim ushemo mikhayehu. judges 17:2	vayomer le'imo 'elef umei'ah hakesef 'asher luqakh lakh ve'ati ve'at 'alit vegam 'amart be'azenai hineh hakesef 'iti 'ani leqakhtiv vatomer 'imo barukh beni yhvh. judges 17:3	vayasheb 'et 'elef umei'ah hakesef le'imo vatomer 'imo haqdesh hiqdashti 'et hakesef yhvh miyadi libni la'asot pesel umaseikhah ve'atah 'ashibenu lakh. judges 17:4	vayasheb 'et hakesef le'imo vatiqakh 'imo matayim kesef vatiteneihu lazoref vaya'aseihu pesel umaseikhah vayhi bebet mikhayehu. judges 17:5	veha'ish mikhah lo bet 'elohim vaya'as 'eifod uterafim vaymalei 'et yad 'akhad mibanav vayhi lo lekhohen. judges 17:6	bayamim hahem 'en melekh beyisra'el 'ish hayashar be'einav ya'aseh. judges 17:7	vayhi na'ar mibet lekhem yehudah mimishpakhat yehudah vehu leivi vehu gar sham. judges 17:8	vayeilekh ha'ish meiha'ir mibet lekhem yehudah lagur ba'asher yimza vayabo har 'efrayim 'ad bet mikhah la'asot darko. judges 17:9	vayomer lo mikhah mei'ayin tabo vayomer 'eilav leivi 'anokhi mibet lekhem yehudah ve'anokhi holekh lagur ba'asher 'emza. judges 17:10	vayomer lo mikhah shebah 'imadi vehyeh li le'ab ulekhohen ve'anokhi 'eten lekha 'aseret kesef layamim ve'eirekh begadim umikhyatekha vayeilekh haleivi. judges 17:11	vayo'el haleivi lashebet 'et ha'ish vayhi hana'ar lo ke'akhad mibanav. judges 17:12	vaymalei mikhah 'et yad haleivi vayhi lo hana'ar lekhohen vayhi bebet mikhah. judges 17:13	vayomer mikhah 'atah yada'ti ki yeitib yhvh li ki hayah li haleivi lekhohen. judges 18:1	bayamim hahem 'en melekh beyisra'el ubayamim hahem sheibet hadani mebaqesh lo nakhalah lashebet ki lo nafelah lo 'ad hayom hahu betokh shibtei yisra'el benakhalah. judges 18:2	vayishlekhu benei dan mimishpakhtam khamishah 'anashim miqzotam 'anashim benei khayil mizare'ah umei'eshta'ol leragel 'et ha'arez ulekhaqerah vayomeru 'aleihem lekhu khiqru 'et ha'arez vayabo'u har 'efrayim 'ad bet mikhah vayalinu sham. judges 18:3	hemah 'im bet mikhah vehemah hikiru 'et qol hana'ar haleivi vayasuru sham vayomeru lo mi hebi'akha halom umah 'atah 'oseh bazeh umah lekha foh. judges 18:4	vayomer 'aleihem kazoh vekhazeh 'asah li mikhah vayiskereini va'ehi lo lekhohen. judges 18:5	vayomeru lo she'al na beilohim veneide'ah hatazliakh darkeinu 'asher 'anakhnu holekhim 'aleha. judges 18:6	vayomer lahem hakohen lekhu leshalom nokhakh yhvh darkekhem 'asher teilekhu bah. judges 18:7	vayeilekhu khameishet ha'anashim vayabo'u layeshah vayir'u 'et ha'am 'asher beqirbah yoshebet labetakh kemishpat zidonim shoqet uboteiakh ve'en makhlim dabar ba'arez yoresh 'ezer urekhoqim hemah mizidonim vedabar 'en lahem 'im 'adam. judges 18:8	vayabo'u 'el 'akheihem zare'ah ve'eshta'ol vayomeru lahem 'akheihem mah 'atem. judges 18:9	vayomeru qumah vena'aleh 'aleihem ki ra'inu 'et ha'arez vehineh tobah me'od ve'atem makhshim 'al tei'azelu lalekhet labo lareshet 'et ha'arez. judges 18:10	kebo'akhem tabo'u 'el 'am boteiakh veha'arez rakhabat yadayim ki netanah 'elohim beyedkhem maqom 'asher 'en sham makhsor kal dabar 'asher ba'arez. judges 18:11	vayis'u misham mimishpakhat hadani mizare'ah umei'eshta'ol shesh mei'ot 'ish khagur kelei milkhamah. judges 18:12	vaya'alu vayakhanu beqiryat ye'arim bihudah 'al ken qare'u lamaqom hahu makhaneh dan 'ad hayom hazeh hineh 'akharei qiryat ye'arim. judges 18:13	vaya'abru misham har 'efrayim vayabo'u 'ad bet mikhah. judges 18:14	vaya'anu khameishet ha'anashim haholekhim leragel 'et ha'arez layish vayomeru 'el 'akheihem hayda'tem ki yesh babatim ha'eleh 'eifod uterafim ufesel umaseikhah ve'atah de'u mah ta'asu. judges 18:15	vayasuru shamah vayabo'u 'el bet hana'ar haleivi bet mikhah vayish'alu lo leshalom. judges 18:16	veshesh mei'ot 'ish khagurim kelei milkhamtam nizabim petakh hasha'ar 'asher mibenei dan. judges 18:17	vaya'alu khameishet ha'anashim haholekhim leragel 'et ha'arez ba'u shamah laqekhu 'et hapesel ve'et ha'eifod ve'et haterafim ve'et hamaseikhah vehakohen nizab petakh hasha'ar veshesh mei'ot ha'ish hekhagur kelei hamilkhamah. judges 18:18	ve'eleh ba'u bet mikhah vayiqkhu 'et pesel ha'eifod ve'et haterafim ve'et hamaseikhah vayomer 'aleihem hakohen mah 'atem 'osim. judges 18:19	vayomeru lo hakharesh sim yadekha 'al pikha velekh 'imanu vehyeh lanu le'ab ulekhohen hatob heyotkha khohen lebet 'ish 'ekhad 'o heyotkha khohen lesheibet ulemishpakhah beyisra'el. judges 18:20	vayitab leb hakohen vayiqakh 'et ha'eifod ve'et haterafim ve'et hapasel vayabo beqereb ha'am. judges 18:21	vayifnu vayeileikhu vayasimu 'et hataf ve'et hamiqneh ve'et hakebudah lifneihem. judges 18:22	hemah hirkhiqu mibet mikhah veha'anashim 'asher babatim 'asher 'im bet mikhah niz'aqu vayadbiqu 'et benei dan. judges 18:23	vayiqre'u 'el benei dan vayasebu peneihem vayomeru lemikhah mah lekha ki niz'aqeta. judges 18:24	vayomer 'et 'elohai 'asher 'asiti leqakhtem ve'et hakohen vateilekhu umah li 'od umah zeh tomeru 'eilai mah lakh. judges 18:25	vayomeru 'eilav benei dan 'al tashma' qolkha 'imanu pen yifge'u bakhem 'anashim marei nefesh ve'asaftah nafshekha venefesh beitekha. judges 18:26	vayeilekhu benei dan ledarkam vayar mikhah ki khazaqim hemah mimenu vayifen vayashab 'el beito. judges 18:27	vehemah laqekhu 'et 'asher 'asah mikhah ve'et hakohen 'asher hayah lo vayabo'u 'al layish 'al 'am shoqet uboteiakh vayaku 'otam lefi khareb ve'et ha'ir sarefu ba'esh. judges 18:28	ve'en mazil ki rekhoqah hi mizidon vedabar 'en lahem 'im 'adam vehi ba'eimeq 'asher lebet rekhob vayibnu 'et ha'ir vayeishebu bah. judges 18:29	vayiqre'u shem ha'ir dan beshem dan 'abihem 'asher yulad leyisra'el ve'ulam layish shem ha'ir larishonah. judges 18:30	vayaqimu lahem benei dan 'et hapasel vihonatan ben geireshom ben menasheh hu ubanav hayu khohanim lesheibet hadani 'ad yom gelot ha'arez. judges 18:31	vayasimu lahem 'et pesel mikhah 'asher 'asah kal yemei heyot bet ha'elohim beshiloh. judges 19:1	vayhi bayamim hahem umelekh 'en beyisra'el vayhi 'ish leivi gar beyarketei har 'efrayim vayiqakh lo 'ishah filegesh mibet lekhem yehudah. judges 19:2	vatizneh 'alav pilagsho vateilekh mei'ito 'el bet 'abiha 'el bet lekhem yehudah vatehi sham yamim 'arba'ah khodashim. judges 19:3	vayaqam 'ishah vayeilekh 'akhareha ledaber 'al libah lahashibo lahashibah vena'aro 'imo vezemed khamorim vatebi'eihu bet 'abiha vayir'eihu 'abi hana'arah vayismakh liqrato. judges 19:4	vayekhezaq bo khoteno 'abi hana'arah vayeisheb 'ito sheloshet yamim vayokhelu vayishtu vayalinu sham. judges 19:5	vayhi bayom harebi'i vayashkimu baboqer vayaqam lalekhet vayomer 'abi hana'arah 'el khatano se'ad libekha pat lekhem ve'akhar teileikhu. judges 19:6	vayeishebu vayokhelu sheneihem yakhdav vayishtu vayomer 'abi hana'arah 'el ha'ish ho'el na velin veyitab libekha. judges 19:7	vayaqam ha'ish lalekhet vayifzar bo khoteno vayashab vayalen sham. judges 19:8	vayashkem baboqer bayom hakhamishi lalekhet vayomer 'abi hana'arah se'ad na lebabekha vehitmahmehu 'ad netot hayom vayokhelu sheneihem. judges 19:9	vayaqam ha'ish lalekhet hu ufilagsho vena'aro vayomer lo khoteno 'abi hana'arah hineh na rafah hayom la'arob linu na hineh khanot hayom lin poh veyitab lebabekha vehishkamtem makhar ledarkekhem vehalakhta le'ohalekha. judges 19:10	velo 'abah ha'ish lalun vayaqam vayeilekh vayabo 'ad nokhakh yebus hi yerushalim ve'imo zemed khamorim khabushim ufilagsho 'imo. judges 19:11	hem 'im yebus vehayom rad me'od vayomer hana'ar 'el 'adonav lekhah na venasurah 'el 'ir haybusi hazot venalin bah. judges 19:12	vayomer 'eilav 'adonav lo nasur 'el 'ir nakheri 'asher lo mibenei yisra'el henah ve'abarnu 'ad gib'ah. judges 19:13	vayomer lena'aro lekha veniqrebah be'akhad hameqomot velanu bagib'ah 'o baramah. judges 19:14	vaya'abru vayeileikhu vatabo lahem hashemesh 'eizel hagib'ah 'asher lebinyamin. judges 19:15	vayasuru sham labo lalun bagib'ah vayabo vayeisheb birkhob ha'ir ve'en 'ish me'asef 'otam habaytah lalun. judges 19:16	vehineh 'ish zaqen ba min ma'aseihu min hasadeh ba'ereb veha'ish meihar 'efrayim vehu gar bagib'ah ve'anshei hamaqom benei yemini. judges 19:17	vayisa 'einav vayar 'et ha'ish ha'oreiakh birkhob ha'ir vayomer ha'ish hazaqen 'anah teilekh umei'ayin tabo. judges 19:18	vayomer 'eilav 'oberim 'anakhnu mibet lekhem yehudah 'ad yarketei har 'efrayim misham 'anokhi va'eilekh 'ad bet lekhem yehudah ve'et bet yhvh 'ani holekh ve'en 'ish me'asef 'oti habayetah. judges 19:19	vegam teben gam mispo yesh lakhamoreinu vegam lekhem vayayin yesh li vela'amatekha velana'ar 'im 'abadekha 'en makhsor kal dabar. judges 19:20	vayomer ha'ish hazaqen shalom lakh raq kal makhsorkha 'alai raq barekhob 'al talan. judges 19:21	vaybi'eihu lebeito vayibol lakhamorim vayirkhazu ragleihem vayokhelu vayishtu. judges 19:22	hemah meitibim 'et libam vehineh 'anshei ha'ir 'anshei benei beliya'al nasabu 'et habayit mitdapeqim 'al hadalet vayomeru 'el ha'ish ba'al habayit hazaqen leimor hozei 'et ha'ish 'asher ba 'el beitekha veneida'enu. judges 19:23	vayeizei 'aleihem ha'ish ba'al habayit vayomer 'aleihem 'al 'akhai 'al tarei'u na 'akharei 'asher ba ha'ish hazeh 'al beiti 'al ta'asu 'et hanebalah hazot. judges 19:24	hineh biti habetulah ufilagsheihu 'ozi'ah na 'otam ve'anu 'otam va'asu lahem hatob be'eineikhem vela'ish hazeh lo ta'asu debar hanebalah hazot. judges 19:25	velo 'abu ha'anashim lishmoa' lo vayakhazeq ha'ish befilagsho vayozei 'aleihem hakhuz vayeide'u 'otah vayit'alelu bah kal halaylah 'ad haboqer vayshalekhuha ba'alot ka'alot hashakhar. judges 19:26	vatabo ha'ishah lifnot haboqer vatipol petakh bet ha'ish 'asher 'adoneha sham 'ad ha'or. judges 19:27	vayaqam 'adoneha baboqer vayiftakh daltot habayit vayeizei lalekhet ledarko vehineh ha'ishah filagsho nofelet petakh habayit veyadeha 'al hasaf. judges 19:28	vayomer 'eileha qumi veneileikhah ve'en 'oneh vayiqakheha 'al hakhamor vayaqam ha'ish vayeilekh limqomo. judges 19:29	vayabo 'el beito vayiqakh 'et hama'akhelet vayakhazeq befilagsho vaynatekheha la'azameha lishnem 'asar netakhim vayshalekheha bekhol gebul yisra'el. judges 19:30	vehayah khal haro'eh ve'amar lo nihyetah velo nir'atah kazot lemiyom 'alot benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim 'ad hayom hazeh simu lakhem 'aleha 'uzu vedabeiru. judges 20:1	vayeize'u kal benei yisra'el vatiqahel ha'eidah ke'ish 'ekhad lemidan ve'ad be'er sheba' ve'erez hagil'ad 'el yhvh hamizpah. judges 20:2	vayityazebu pinot kal ha'am kol shibtei yisra'el biqhal 'am ha'elohim 'arba' mei'ot 'elef 'ish ragli sholef khareb. judges 20:3	vayishme'u benei binyamin ki 'alu benei yisra'el hamizpah vayomeru benei yisra'el daberu 'eikhah nihyetah hara'ah hazot. judges 20:4	vaya'an ha'ish haleivi 'ish ha'ishah hanirzakhah vayomar hagib'atah 'asher lebinyamin bati 'ani ufilagshi lalun. judges 20:5	vayaqumu 'alai ba'alei hagib'ah vayasobu 'alai 'et habayit layelah 'oti dimu laharog ve'et pilagshi 'inu vatamot. judges 20:6	va'okhez befilagshi va'anatekheha va'ashalekheha bekhal sedeh nakhalat yisra'el ki 'asu zimah unebalah beyisra'el. judges 20:7	hineh khulekhem benei yisra'el habu lakhem dabar ve'eizah halom. judges 20:8	vayaqam kal ha'am ke'ish 'ekhad leimor lo neilekh 'ish le'aholo velo nasur 'ish lebeito. judges 20:9	ve'atah zeh hadabar 'asher na'aseh lagib'ah 'aleha begoral. judges 20:10	velaqakhnu 'asarah 'anashim lamei'ah lekhol shibtei yisra'el umei'ah la'elef ve'elef larebabah laqakhat zeidah la'am la'asot lebo'am legeba' binyamin kekhal hanebalah 'asher 'asah beyisra'el. judges 20:11	vayei'asef kal 'ish yisra'el 'el ha'ir ke'ish 'ekhad khabeirim. judges 20:12	vayishlekhu shibtei yisra'el 'anashim bekhal shibtei binyamin leimor mah hara'ah hazot 'asher nihyetah bakhem. judges 20:13	ve'atah tenu 'et ha'anashim benei beliya'al 'asher bagib'ah unemitem uneba'arah ra'ah miyisra'el velo 'abu benei binyamin lishmoa' beqol 'akheihem benei yisra'el. judges 20:14	vayei'asefu benei binyamin min he'arim hagib'atah lazet lamilkhamah 'im benei yisra'el. judges 20:15	vayitpaqedu benei binyamin bayom hahu meihe'arim 'esrim veshishah 'elef 'ish sholef khareb lebad miyoshebei hagib'ah hitpaqedu sheba' mei'ot 'ish bakhur. judges 20:16	mikol ha'am hazeh sheba' mei'ot 'ish bakhur 'iter yad yemino kal zeh qoleia' ba'eben 'el hasa'arah velo yakhati. judges 20:17	ve'ish yisra'el hitpaqedu lebad mibinyamin 'arba' mei'ot 'elef 'ish sholef khareb kal zeh 'ish milkhamah. judges 20:18	vayaqumu vaya'alu bet 'el vayish'alu beilohim vayomeru benei yisra'el mi ya'aleh lanu batekhilah lamilkhamah 'im benei binyamin vayomer yhvh yehudah batekhilah. judges 20:19	vayaqumu benei yisra'el baboqer vayakhanu 'al hagib'ah. judges 20:20	vayeizei 'ish yisra'el lamilkhamah 'im binyamin vaya'arkhu 'itam 'ish yisra'el milkhamah 'el hagib'ah. judges 20:21	vayeize'u benei binyamin min hagib'ah vayashkhitu beyisra'el bayom hahu shenayim ve'esrim 'elef 'ish 'arezah. judges 20:22	vayitkhazeq ha'am 'ish yisra'el vayosifu la'arokh milkhamah bamaqom 'asher 'arekhu sham bayom harishon. judges 20:23	vaya'alu benei yisra'el vayibku lifnei yhvh 'ad ha'ereb vayish'alu yhvh leimor ha'osif lageshet lamilkhamah 'im benei binyamin 'akhi vayomer yhvh 'alu 'eilav. judges 20:24	vayiqrebu benei yisra'el 'el benei binyamin bayom hasheini. judges 20:25	vayeizei binyamin liqratam min hagib'ah bayom hasheini vayashkhitu bibnei yisra'el 'od shemonat 'asar 'elef 'ish 'arezah kal 'eleh sholefei khareb. judges 20:26	vaya'alu khal benei yisra'el vekhal ha'am vayabo'u bet 'el vayibku vayeishebu sham lifnei yhvh vayazumu bayom hahu 'ad ha'areb vaya'alu 'olot ushelamim lifnei yhvh. judges 20:27	vayish'alu benei yisra'el yhvh vesham 'aron berit ha'elohim bayamim hahem. judges 20:28	ufinekhas ben 'el'azar ben 'aharon 'omed lefanav bayamim hahem leimor ha'osif 'od lazet lamilkhamah 'im benei binyamin 'akhi 'im 'ekhdal vayomer yhvh 'alu ki makhar 'etenenu beyadekha. judges 20:29	vayasem yisra'el 'orebim 'el hagib'ah sabib. judges 20:30	vaya'alu benei yisra'el 'el benei binyamin bayom hashelishi vaya'arkhu 'el hagib'ah kefa'am befa'am. judges 20:31	vayeize'u benei binyamin liqrat ha'am hanetequ min ha'ir vayakhelu lehakot meiha'am khalalim kefa'am befa'am bamsilot 'asher 'akhat 'olah bet 'el ve'akhat gib'atah basadeh kishloshim 'ish beyisra'el. judges 20:32	vayomeru benei binyamin nigafim hem lefaneinu kebarishonah ubenei yisra'el 'ameru nanusah unetaqenuhu min ha'ir 'el hamsilot. judges 20:33	vekhol 'ish yisra'el qamu mimeqomo vaya'arkhu beba'al tamar ve'oreb yisra'el meigiakh mimeqomo mima'areh gaba'. judges 20:34	vayabo'u mineged lagib'ah 'aseret 'alafim 'ish bakhur mikal yisra'el vehamilkhamah kabeidah vehem lo yade'u ki noga'at 'aleihem hara'ah. judges 20:35	vayigof yhvh 'et binyamin lifnei yisra'el vayashkhitu benei yisra'el bebinyamin bayom hahu 'esrim vakhamishah 'elef umei'ah 'ish kal 'eleh sholef khareb. judges 20:36	vayir'u benei binyamin ki nigafu vayitenu 'ish yisra'el maqom lebinyamin ki batekhu 'el ha'oreb 'asher samu 'el hagib'ah. judges 20:37	veha'oreb heikhishu vayifshetu 'el hagib'ah vayimshokh ha'oreb vayakh 'et kal ha'ir lefi khareb. judges 20:38	vehamo'ed hayah le'ish yisra'el 'im ha'oreb hereb leha'alotam mas'at he'ashan min ha'ir. judges 20:39	vayahafokh 'ish yisra'el bamilkhamah ubinyamin heikhel lehakot khalalim be'ish yisra'el kishloshim 'ish ki 'ameru 'akh nigof nigaf hu lefaneinu kamilkhamah harishonah. judges 20:40	vehamas'et heikhelah la'alot min ha'ir 'amud 'ashan vayifen binyamin 'akharav vehineh 'alah khelil ha'ir hashamayemah. judges 20:41	ve'ish yisra'el hafakh vayibahel 'ish binyamin ki ra'ah ki nage'ah 'alav hara'ah. judges 20:42	vayifnu lifnei 'ish yisra'el 'el derekh hamidbar vehamilkhamah hidbiqatehu va'asher meihe'arim mashkhitim 'oto betokho. judges 20:43	kiteru 'et binyamin hirdifuhu menukhah hidrikhuhu 'ad nokhakh hagib'ah mimizrakh shamesh. judges 20:44	vayipelu mibinyamin shemonah 'asar 'elef 'ish 'et kal 'eleh 'anshei khayil. judges 20:45	vayifnu vayanusu hamidbarah 'el sela' harimon vai'oleluhu bamsilot khameishet 'alafim 'ish vayadbiqu 'akharav 'ad gid'om vayaku mimenu 'alpayim 'ish. judges 20:46	vayhi khal hanofelim mibinyamin 'esrim vakhamishah 'elef 'ish sholef khereb bayom hahu 'et kal 'eleh 'anshei khayil. judges 20:47	vayifnu vayanusu hamidbarah 'el sela' harimon shesh mei'ot 'ish vayeishebu
