besela' rimon 'arba'ah khodashim. judges 20:48	ve'ish yisra'el shabu 'el benei binyamin vayakum lefi khereb mei'ir metom 'ad beheimah 'ad kal hanimza gam kal he'arim hanimza'ot shilekhu ba'esh. judges 21:1	ve'ish yisra'el nishba' bamizpah leimor 'ish mimenu lo yiten bito lebinyamin le'ishah. judges 21:2	vayabo ha'am bet 'el vayeishebu sham 'ad ha'ereb lifnei ha'elohim vayis'u qolam vayibku bekhi gadol. judges 21:3	vayomeru lamah yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hayetah zot beyisra'el lehipaqed hayom miyisra'el sheibet 'ekhad. judges 21:4	vayhi mimakhorat vayashkimu ha'am vayibnu sham mizbeiakh vaya'alu 'olot ushelamim. judges 21:5	vayomeru benei yisra'el mi 'asher lo 'alah baqahal mikal shibtei yisra'el 'el yhvh ki hashebu'ah hagedolah hayetah la'asher lo 'alah 'el yhvh hamizpah leimor mot yumat. judges 21:6	vayinakhamu benei yisra'el 'el binyamin 'akhiv vayomeru nigda' hayom sheibet 'ekhad miyisra'el. judges 21:7	mah na'aseh lahem lanotarim lenashim va'anakhnu nishba'nu yhvh lebilti tet lahem mibenoteinu lenashim. judges 21:8	vayomeru mi 'ekhad mishibtei yisra'el 'asher lo 'alah 'el yhvh hamizpah vehineh lo ba 'ish 'el hamakhaneh miyabesh gil'ad 'el haqahal. judges 21:9	vayitpaqed ha'am vehineh 'en sham 'ish miyoshebei yabesh gil'ad. judges 21:10	vayishlekhu sham ha'eidah shenem 'asar 'elef 'ish mibenei hekhayil vayzavu 'otam leimor lekhu vehikitem 'et yoshebei yabesh gil'ad lefi khereb vehanashim vehataf. judges 21:11	vezeh hadabar 'asher ta'asu kal zakhar vekhal 'ishah yoda'at mishkab zakhar takharimu. judges 21:12	vayimze'u miyoshebei yabesh gil'ad 'arba' mei'ot na'arah betulah 'asher lo yade'ah 'ish lemishkab zakhar vayabi'u 'otam 'el hamakhaneh shiloh 'asher be'erez kena'an. judges 21:13	vayishlekhu kal ha'eidah vaydaberu 'el benei binyamin 'asher besela' rimon vayiqre'u lahem shalom. judges 21:14	vayashab binyamin ba'et hahi vayitenu lahem hanashim 'asher khiyu mineshei yabesh gil'ad velo maze'u lahem ken. judges 21:15	veha'am nikham lebinyamin ki 'asah yhvh perez beshibtei yisra'el. judges 21:16	vayomeru ziqnei ha'eidah mah na'aseh lanotarim lenashim ki nishmedah mibinyamin 'ishah. judges 21:17	vayomeru yerushat peleitah lebinyamin velo yimakheh sheibet miyisra'el. judges 21:18	va'anakhnu lo nukhal latet lahem nashim mibenoteinu ki nishbe'u benei yisra'el leimor 'arur noten 'ishah lebinyamin. judges 21:19	vayomeru hineh khag yhvh beshilo miyamim yamimah 'asher mizefonah lebet 'el mizrekhah hashemesh limsilah ha'olah mibet 'el shekhemah uminegeb lilbonah. judges 21:20	vayzav vayzavu 'et benei binyamin leimor lekhu va'arabtem bakeramim. judges 21:21	ure'item vehineh 'im yeize'u benot shilo lakhul bamekholot vizatem min hakeramim vakhataftem lakhem 'ish 'ishto mibenot shilo vahalakhtem 'erez binyamin. judges 21:22	vehayah ki yabo'u 'abotam 'o 'akheihem larob larib 'eileinu ve'amarnu 'aleihem khanunu 'otam ki lo laqakhnu 'ish 'ishto bamilkhamah ki lo 'atem netatem lahem ka'et te'shamu. judges 21:23	vaya'asu khen benei binyamin vayis'u nashim lemisparam min hamekholelot 'asher gazalu vayeilekhu vayashubu 'el nakhalatam vayibnu 'et he'arim vayeishebu bahem. judges 21:24	vayithalekhu misham benei yisra'el ba'et hahi 'ish leshibto ulemishpakhto vayeize'u misham 'ish lenakhalato. judges 21:25	bayamim hahem 'en melekh beyisra'el 'ish hayashar be'einav ya'aseh. 

1_samuel 1:1	vayhi 'ish 'ekhad min haramatayim zofim meihar 'efrayim ushemo 'elqanah ben yerokham ben 'elihu ben tokhu ben zuf 'efrati. 1_samuel 1:2	velo shetei nashim shem 'akhat khanah veshem hasheinit peninah vayhi lifninah yeladim ulekhanah 'en yeladim. 1_samuel 1:3	ve'alah ha'ish hahu mei'iro miyamim yamimah lehishtakhavot velizboakh yhvh zeba'ot beshiloh vesham shenei benei 'eili khafeni ufinkhas kohanim yhvh. 1_samuel 1:4	vayhi hayom vayizbakh 'elqanah venatan lifninah 'ishto ulekhal baneha ubenoteha manot. 1_samuel 1:5	ulekhanah yiten manah 'akhat 'apayim ki 'et khanah 'aheb yhvh sagar rakhmah. 1_samuel 1:6	vekhi'asatah zaratah gam ka'as ba'abur harre'imah ki sagar yhvh be'ad rakhmah. 1_samuel 1:7	vekhen ya'aseh shanah beshanah midei 'alotah bebet yhvh ken takh'isenah vatibkeh velo tokhal. 1_samuel 1:8	vayomer lah 'elqanah 'ishah khanah lameh tibki velameh lo tokheli velameh yeira' lebabekh halo 'anokhi tob lakh mei'asarah banim. 1_samuel 1:9	vataqam khanah 'akharei 'akhelah beshiloh ve'akharei shatoh ve'eili hakohen yosheb 'al hakisei 'al mezuzat heikhal yhvh. 1_samuel 1:10	vehi marat nafesh vatitpalel 'al yhvh ubakhoh tibkeh. 1_samuel 1:11	vatidor neder vatomar yhvh zeba'ot 'im ra'oh tir'eh ba'oni 'amatekha uzekhartani velo tishkakh 'et 'amatekha venatatah la'amatekha zera' 'anashim unetativ yhvh kal yemei khayav umorah lo ya'aleh 'al rosho. 1_samuel 1:12	vehayah ki hirbetah lehitpalel lifnei yhvh ve'eili shomer 'et piha. 1_samuel 1:13	vekhanah hi medaberet 'al libah raq sefateha na'ot veqolah lo yishameia' vayakhshebeha 'eili leshikorah. 1_samuel 1:14	vayomer 'eileha 'eili 'ad matai tishtakarin hasiri 'et yeinekh mei'alayikh. 1_samuel 1:15	vata'an khanah vatomer lo 'adoni 'ishah qeshat ruakh 'anokhi veyayin vesheikhar lo shatiti va'eshpokh 'et nafshi lifnei yhvh. 1_samuel 1:16	'al titen 'et 'amatekha lifnei bat beliya'al ki meirob sikhi vekha'si dibarti 'ad henah. 1_samuel 1:17	vaya'an 'eili vayomer lekhi leshalom veilohei yisra'el yiten 'et sheilatekh 'asher sha'alt mei'imo. 1_samuel 1:18	vatomer timza shifkhatekha khen be'einekha vateilekh ha'ishah ledarkah vatokhal ufaneha lo hayu lah 'od. 1_samuel 1:19	vayashkimu baboqer vayishtakhavu lifnei yhvh vayashubu vayabo'u 'el beitam haramatah vayeida' 'elqanah 'et khanah 'ishto vayizkereha yhvh. 1_samuel 1:20	vayhi litqufot hayamim vatahar khanah vateiled ben vatiqra 'et shemo shemu'el ki yhvh she'iltiv. 1_samuel 1:21	vaya'al ha'ish 'elqanah vekhal beito lizboakh yhvh 'et zebakh hayamim ve'et nidro. 1_samuel 1:22	vekhanah lo 'alatah ki 'amerah le'ishah 'ad yigamel hana'ar vahabi'otiv venir'ah 'et penei yhvh veyashab sham 'ad 'olam. 1_samuel 1:23	vayomer lah 'elqanah 'ishah 'asi hatob be'einayikh shebi 'ad gamelekh 'oto 'akh yaqem yhvh 'et debaro vateisheb ha'ishah vateineq 'et benah 'ad gamelah 'oto. 1_samuel 1:24	vata'aleihu 'imah ka'asher gemalatu befarim sheloshah ve'eifah 'akhat qemakh veneibel yayin vatebi'eihu bet yhvh shilo vehana'ar na'ar. 1_samuel 1:25	vayishkhatu 'et hapar vayabi'u 'et hana'ar 'el 'eili. 1_samuel 1:26	vatomer bi 'adoni khei nafshekha 'adoni 'ani ha'ishah hanizebet 'imekhah bazeh lehitpalel 'el yhvh. 1_samuel 1:27	'el hana'ar hazeh hitpalaleti vayiten yhvh li 'et she'eilati 'asher sha'alti mei'imo. 1_samuel 1:28	vegam 'anokhi hish'iltihu yhvh kal hayamim 'asher hayah hu sha'ul yhvh vayishtakhu sham yhvh. 1_samuel 2:1	vatitpalel khanah vatomar 'alaz libi yhvh ramah qarni yhvh rakhab pi 'al 'oybai ki samakhti bishu'atekha. 1_samuel 2:2	'en qadosh yhvh ki 'en biltekha ve'en zur keiloheinu. 1_samuel 2:3	'al tarbu tedaberu gebohah gebohah yeizei 'ataq mipikhem ki 'el dei'ot yhvh velo velo nitkenu 'alilot. 1_samuel 2:4	qeshet giborim khatim venikhshalim 'azeru khayil. 1_samuel 2:5	sebei'im balekhem niskaru ure'eibim khadelu 'ad 'aqarah yaledah shib'ah verabat banim 'umlalah. 1_samuel 2:6	yhvh meimit umekhayeh morid she'ol vaya'al. 1_samuel 2:7	yhvh morish uma'ashir mashpil 'af meromem. 1_samuel 2:8	meiqim mei'afar dal mei'ashpot yarim 'ebyon lehoshib 'im nedibim vekhisei khabod yankhilem ki yhvh mezuqei 'erez vayashet 'aleihem teibel. 1_samuel 2:9	raglei khasido khasidav yishmor uresha'im bakhoshekh yidamu ki lo bekhoakh yigbar 'ish. 1_samuel 2:10	yhvh yeikhatu meribo meribav 'alo 'alav bashamayim yar'em yhvh yadin 'afsei 'arez veyiten 'oz lemalko veyarem qeren meshikho. 1_samuel 2:11	vayeilekh 'elqanah haramatah 'al beito vehana'ar hayah mesharet 'et yhvh 'et penei 'eili hakohen. 1_samuel 2:12	ubenei 'eili benei beliya'al lo yade'u 'et yhvh. 1_samuel 2:13	umishpat hakohanim 'et ha'am kal 'ish zobeiakh zebakh uba na'ar hakohen kebashel habasar vehamazleg shelosh hashinayim beyado. 1_samuel 2:14	vehikah bakiyor 'o badud 'o baqalakhat 'o baparur kol 'asher ya'aleh hamazleg yiqakh hakohen bo kakhah ya'asu lekhal yisra'el haba'im sham beshiloh. 1_samuel 2:15	gam beterem yaqtirun 'et hakheileb uba na'ar hakohen ve'amar la'ish hazobeiakh tenah basar lizlot lakohen velo yiqakh mimekha basar mebushal ki 'im khai. 1_samuel 2:16	vayomer 'eilav ha'ish qater yaqtirun kayom hakheileb veqakh lekha ka'asher te'aveh nafshekha ve'amar lo lo ki 'atah titen ve'im lo laqakhti bekhazeqah. 1_samuel 2:17	vatehi khatat hane'arim gedolah me'od 'et penei yhvh ki ni'azu ha'anashim 'et minkhat yhvh. 1_samuel 2:18	ushemu'el mesharet 'et penei yhvh na'ar khagur 'eifod bad. 1_samuel 2:19	ume'il qaton ta'aseh lo 'imo veha'altah lo miyamim yamimah ba'alotah 'et 'ishah lizboakh 'et zebakh hayamim. 1_samuel 2:20	ubeirakh 'eili 'et 'elqanah ve'et 'ishto ve'amar yasem yhvh lekha zera' min ha'ishah hazot takhat hashe'eilah 'asher sha'al yhvh vehalekhu limqomo. 1_samuel 2:21	ki faqad yhvh 'et khanah vatahar vateiled sheloshah banim ushetei banot vayigdal hana'ar shemu'el 'im yhvh. 1_samuel 2:22	ve'eili zaqen me'od veshama' 'et kal 'asher ya'asun banav lekhal yisra'el ve'et 'asher yishkebun 'et hanashim hazobe'ot petakh 'ohel mo'ed. 1_samuel 2:23	vayomer lahem lamah ta'asun kadebarim ha'eleh 'asher 'anokhi shomeia' 'et dibreikhem ra'im mei'et kal ha'am 'eleh. 1_samuel 2:24	'al banai ki lo tobah hashemu'ah 'asher 'anokhi shomeia' ma'abirim 'am yhvh. 1_samuel 2:25	'im yekheta 'ish le'ish ufilo 'elohim ve'im yhvh yekheta 'ish mi yitpalel lo velo yishme'u leqol 'abihem ki khafez yhvh lahamitam. 1_samuel 2:26	vehana'ar shemu'el holekh vegadel vatob gam 'im yhvh vegam 'im 'anashim. 1_samuel 2:27	vayabo 'ish 'elohim 'el 'eili vayomer 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh hanigloh nigleiti 'el bet 'abikha bihyotam bemizrayim lebet par'oh. 1_samuel 2:28	ubakhor 'oto mikal shibtei yisra'el li lekhohen la'alot 'al mizbekhi lehaqtir qetoret laset 'eifod lefanai va'etenah lebet 'abikha 'et kal 'ishei benei yisra'el. 1_samuel 2:29	lamah tib'atu bezibkhi ubeminkhati 'asher ziviti ma'on vatekhabed 'et banekha mimeni lehabri'akhem meireishit kal minkhat yisra'el le'ami. 1_samuel 2:30	lakhen ne'um yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'amor 'amarti beitekha ubet 'abikha yithalekhu lefanai 'ad 'olam ve'atah ne'um yhvh khalilah li ki mekhabedai 'akhabed ubozai yeiqalu. 1_samuel 2:31	hineh yamim ba'im vegada'ti 'et zero'akha ve'et zeroa' bet 'abikha mihyot zaqen bebeitekha. 1_samuel 2:32	vehibata zar ma'on bekhol 'asher yeitib 'et yisra'el velo yihyeh zaqen bebeitekha kal hayamim. 1_samuel 2:33	ve'ish lo 'akhrit lekha mei'im mizbekhi lekhalot 'et 'einekha vela'adib 'et nafshekha vekhal marbit beitekha yamutu 'anashim. 1_samuel 2:34	vezeh lekha ha'ot 'asher yabo 'el shenei banekha 'el khafeni ufinekhas beyom 'ekhad yamutu sheneihem. 1_samuel 2:35	vahaqimoti li kohen ne'eman ka'asher bilbabi ubenafshi ya'aseh ubaniti lo bayit ne'eman vehthalekh lifnei meshikhi kal hayamim. 1_samuel 2:36	vehayah kal hanotar bebeitekha yabo lehishtakhavot lo la'agorat kesef vekhikar lakhem ve'amar sefakheini na 'el 'akhat hakehunot le'ekhol pat lakhem. 1_samuel 3:1	vehana'ar shemu'el mesharet 'et yhvh lifnei 'eili udebar yhvh hayah yaqar bayamim hahem 'en khazon nifraz. 1_samuel 3:2	vayhi bayom hahu ve'eili shokheb bimqomo ve'eino ve'einav heikhelu kheihot lo yukhal lir'ot. 1_samuel 3:3	vener 'elohim terem yikhbeh ushemu'el shokheb beheikhal yhvh 'asher sham 'aron 'elohim. 1_samuel 3:4	vayiqra yhvh 'el shemu'el vayomer hineini. 1_samuel 3:5	vayaraz 'el 'eili vayomer hini ki qarata li vayomer lo qarati shub shekhab vayeilekh vayishkab. 1_samuel 3:6	vayosef yhvh qero 'od shemu'el vayaqam shemu'el vayeilekh 'el 'eili vayomer hini ki qarata li vayomer lo qarati beni shub shekhab. 1_samuel 3:7	ushemu'el terem yada' 'et yhvh veterem yigaleh 'eilav debar yhvh. 1_samuel 3:8	vayosef yhvh qero shemu'el bashelishit vayaqam vayeilekh 'el 'eili vayomer hini ki qarata li vayaben 'eili ki yhvh qorei lana'ar. 1_samuel 3:9	vayomer 'eili lishmu'el lekh shekhab vehayah 'im yiqra 'eilekha ve'amarta daber yhvh ki shomeia' 'abdekha vayeilekh shemu'el vayishkab bimqomo. 1_samuel 3:10	vayabo yhvh vayityazab vayiqra khefa'am befa'am shemu'el shemu'el vayomer shemu'el daber ki shomeia' 'abdekha. 1_samuel 3:11	vayomer yhvh 'el shemu'el hineh 'anokhi 'oseh dabar beyisra'el 'asher kal shome'o tezilenah shetei 'azenav. 1_samuel 3:12	bayom hahu 'aqim 'el 'eili 'et kal 'asher dibarti 'el beito hakhel vekhaleh. 1_samuel 3:13	vehigadti lo ki shofet 'ani 'et beito 'ad 'olam ba'avon 'asher yada' ki meqalim lahem banav velo khihah bam. 1_samuel 3:14	velakhen nishba'ti lebet 'eili 'im yitkaper 'avon bet 'eili bezebakh ubeminkhah 'ad 'olam. 1_samuel 3:15	vayishkab shemu'el 'ad haboqer vayiftakh 'et daltot bet yhvh ushemu'el yarei meihagid 'et hamar'ah 'el 'eili. 1_samuel 3:16	vayiqra 'eili 'et shemu'el vayomer shemu'el beni vayomer hineini. 1_samuel 3:17	vayomer mah hadabar 'asher diber 'eilekha 'al na tekhakhed mimeni koh ya'aseh lekha 'elohim vekhoh yosif 'im tekhakhed mimeni dabar mikal hadabar 'asher diber 'eilekha. 1_samuel 3:18	vayaged lo shemu'el 'et kal hadebarim velo khikhed mimenu vayomar yhvh hu hatob be'einav ya'aseh. 1_samuel 3:19	vayigdal shemu'el yhvh hayah 'imo velo hipil mikal debarav 'arezah. 1_samuel 3:20	vayeida' kal yisra'el midan ve'ad be'er shaba' ki ne'eman shemu'el lenabi yhvh. 1_samuel 3:21	vayosef yhvh leheira'oh beshiloh ki niglah yhvh 'el shemu'el beshilo bidbar yhvh. 1_samuel 4:1	vayhi debar shemu'el lekhal yisra'el vayeizei yisra'el liqrat pelishtim lamilkhamah vayakhanu 'al ha'eben ha'eizer ufelishtim khanu ba'afeq. 1_samuel 4:2	vaya'arkhu felishtim liqrat yisra'el vatitosh hamilkhamah vayinagef yisra'el lifnei felishtim vayaku bama'arakhah basadeh ke'arba'at 'alafim 'ish. 1_samuel 4:3	vayabo ha'am 'el hamakhaneh vayomeru ziqnei yisra'el lamah negafanu yhvh hayom lifnei felishtim niqkhah 'eileinu mishiloh 'et 'aron berit yhvh veyabo beqirbeinu veyoshi'einu mikaf 'oyebeinu. 1_samuel 4:4	vayishlakh ha'am shiloh vayis'u misham 'et 'aron berit yhvh zeba'ot yosheb hakerubim vesham shenei benei 'eili 'im 'aron berit ha'elohim khafeni ufinekhas. 1_samuel 4:5	vayhi kebo 'aron berit yhvh 'el hamakhaneh vayari'u khal yisra'el teru'ah gedolah vateihom ha'arez. 1_samuel 4:6	vayishme'u felishtim 'et qol hateru'ah vayomeru meh qol hateru'ah hagedolah hazot bemakhaneh ha'ibrim vayeide'u ki 'aron yhvh ba 'el hamakhaneh. 1_samuel 4:7	vayir'u hapelishtim ki 'ameru ba 'elohim 'el hamakhaneh vayomeru 'o lanu ki lo hayetah kazot 'etmol shilshom. 1_samuel 4:8	'o lanu mi yazileinu miyad ha'elohim ha'adirim ha'eleh 'eleh hem ha'elohim hamakim 'et mizrayim bekhal makah bamidbar. 1_samuel 4:9	hitkhazequ vihyu la'anashim pelishtim pen ta'abdu la'ibrim ka'asher 'abedu lakhem vihyitem la'anashim venilkhamtem. 1_samuel 4:10	vayilakhamu felishtim vayinagef yisra'el vayanusu 'ish le'ohalav vatehi hamakah gedolah me'od vayipol miyisra'el sheloshim 'elef ragli. 1_samuel 4:11	va'aron 'elohim nilqakh ushenei benei 'eili meitu khafeni ufinekhas. 1_samuel 4:12	vayaraz 'ish binyamin meihama'arakhah vayabo shiloh bayom hahu umadav qeru'im va'adamah 'al rosho. 1_samuel 4:13	vayabo vehineh 'eili yosheb 'al hakisei yakh yad derekh mezapeh ki hayah libo khared 'al 'aron ha'elohim veha'ish ba lehagid ba'ir vatiz'aq kal ha'ir. 1_samuel 4:14	vayishma' 'eili 'et qol haze'aqah vayomer meh qol hehamon hazeh veha'ish mihar vayabo vayaged le'eili. 1_samuel 4:15	ve'eili ben tish'im ushemoneh shanah ve'einav qamah velo yakhol lir'ot. 1_samuel 4:16	vayomer ha'ish 'el 'eili 'anokhi haba min hama'arakhah va'ani min hama'arakhah nasti hayom vayomer meh hayah hadabar beni. 1_samuel 4:17	vaya'an hambaser vayomer nas yisra'el lifnei felishtim vegam mageifah gedolah hayetah ba'am vegam shenei banekha meitu khafeni ufinekhas va'aron ha'elohim nilqakhah. 1_samuel 4:18	vayhi kehazkiro 'et 'aron ha'elohim vayipol mei'al hakisei 'akhoranit be'ad yad hasha'ar vatishaber mafraqto vayamot ki zaqen ha'ish vekhabed vehu shafat 'et yisra'el 'arba'im shanah. 1_samuel 4:19	vekhalato 'eishet pinekhas harah lalat vatishma' 'et hashemu'ah 'el hilaqakh 'aron ha'elohim umet khamiha ve'ishah vatikhra' vateiled ki nehefkhu 'aleha zireha. 1_samuel 4:20	ukhe'et mutah vatedabeirenah hanizabot 'aleha 'al tire'i ki ben yaladet velo 'anetah velo shatah libah. 1_samuel 4:21	vatiqra lana'ar 'i khabod leimor galah khabod miyisra'el 'el hilaqakh 'aron ha'elohim ve'el khamiha ve'ishah. 1_samuel 4:22	vatomer galah khabod miyisra'el ki nilqakh 'aron ha'elohim. 1_samuel 5:1	ufelishtim laqekhu 'et 'aron ha'elohim vaybi'uhu mei'eben ha'eizer 'ashdodah. 1_samuel 5:2	vayiqkhu felishtim 'et 'aron ha'elohim vayabi'u 'oto bet dagon vayazigu 'oto 'eizel dagon. 1_samuel 5:3	vayashkimu 'ashdodim mimakhorat vehineh dagon nofel lefanav 'arzah lifnei 'aron yhvh vayiqkhu 'et dagon vayashibu 'oto limqomo. 1_samuel 5:4	vayashkimu baboqer mimakhorat vehineh dagon nofel lefanav 'arzah lifnei 'aron yhvh verosh dagon ushetei kapot yadav kerutot 'el hamiftan raq dagon nish'ar 'alav. 1_samuel 5:5	'al ken lo yidrekhu khohanei dagon vekhal haba'im bet dagon 'al miftan dagon be'ashdod 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_samuel 5:6	vatikhbad yad yhvh 'el ha'ashdodim vayshimem vayakh 'otam ba'ofalim batekhorim 'et 'ashdod ve'et gebuleha. 1_samuel 5:7	vayir'u 'anshei 'ashdod ki khen ve'ameru lo yeisheb 'aron 'elohei yisra'el 'imanu ki qashetah yado 'aleinu ve'al dagon 'eloheinu. 1_samuel 5:8	vayishlekhu vaya'asfu 'et kal sarnei felishtim 'aleihem vayomeru mah na'aseh la'aron 'elohei yisra'el vayomeru gat yisob 'aron 'elohei yisra'el vayasebu 'et 'aron 'elohei yisra'el. 1_samuel 5:9	vayhi 'akharei heisabu 'oto vatehi yad yhvh ba'ir mehumah gedolah me'od vayakh 'et 'anshei ha'ir miqaton ve'ad gadol vayisateru lahem 'ofalim tekhorim. 1_samuel 5:10	vayshalekhu 'et 'aron ha'elohim 'eqron vayhi kebo 'aron ha'elohim 'eqron vayiz'aqu ha'eqronim leimor heisabu 'eilai 'et 'aron 'elohei yisra'el lahamiteini ve'et 'ami. 1_samuel 5:11	vayishlekhu vaya'asfu 'et kal sarnei felishtim vayomeru shalekhu 'et 'aron 'elohei yisra'el veyashob limqomo velo yamit 'oti ve'et 'ami ki hayetah mehumat mavet bekhal ha'ir kabedah me'od yad ha'elohim sham. 1_samuel 5:12	veha'anashim 'asher lo meitu huku ba'ofalim batekhorim vata'al shav'at ha'ir hashamayim. 1_samuel 6:1	vayhi 'aron yhvh bisdeh felishtim shib'ah khodashim. 1_samuel 6:2	vayiqre'u felishtim lakohanim velaqosemim leimor mah na'aseh la'aron yhvh hodi'unu bameh neshalekhenu limqomo. 1_samuel 6:3	vayomeru 'im meshalekhim 'et 'aron 'elohei yisra'el 'al teshalekhu 'oto reiqam ki hasheb tashibu lo 'asham 'az teirafe'u venoda' lakhem lamah lo tasur yado mikem. 1_samuel 6:4	vayomeru mah ha'asham 'asher nashib lo vayomeru mispar sarnei felishtim khamishah 'afelei tekhorei zahab vakhamishah 'akhberei zahab ki mageifah 'akhat lekhulam ulesarneikhem. 1_samuel 6:5	va'asitem zalmei 'afeleikhem tekhoreikhem vezalmei 'akhbereikhem hamashkhitim 'et ha'arez unetatem leilohei yisra'el kabod 'ulai yaqel 'et yado mei'aleikhem umei'al 'eloheikhem umei'al 'arzekhem. 1_samuel 6:6	velamah tekhabedu 'et lebabkhem ka'asher kibedu mizrayim ufar'oh 'et libam halo ka'asher hit'alel bahem vayshalekhum vayeileikhu. 1_samuel 6:7	ve'atah qekhu va'asu 'agalah khadashah 'ekhat ushetei farot 'alot 'asher lo 'alah 'aleihem 'ol va'asartem 'et haparot ba'agalah vahasheibotem beneihem mei'akhareihem habayetah. 1_samuel 6:8	uleqakhtem 'et 'aron yhvh unetatem 'oto 'el ha'agalah ve'et kelei hazahab 'asher hasheibotem lo 'asham tasimu ba'argaz mizido veshilakhtem 'oto vehalakh. 1_samuel 6:9	ure'item 'im derekh gebulo ya'aleh bet shemesh hu 'asah lanu 'et hara'ah hagedolah hazot ve'im lo veyada'nu ki lo yado nage'ah banu miqreh hu hayah lanu. 1_samuel 6:10	vaya'asu ha'anashim ken vayiqkhu shetei farot 'alot vaya'asrum ba'agalah ve'et beneihem kalu babayit. 1_samuel 6:11	vayasimu 'et 'aron yhvh 'el ha'agalah ve'et ha'argaz ve'et 'akhberei hazahab ve'et zalmei tekhoreihem. 1_samuel 6:12	vayisharnah haparot baderekh 'al derekh bet shemesh bimsilah 'akhat halekhu halokh vega'o velo saru yamin usemol vesarnei felishtim holekhim 'akhareihem 'ad gebul bet shamesh. 1_samuel 6:13	ubet shemesh qozerim qezir khitim ba'eimeq vayis'u 'et 'eineihem vayir'u 'et ha'aron vayismekhu lir'ot. 1_samuel 6:14	veha'agalah ba'ah 'el sedeh yehoshua' bet hashimshi vata'amod sham vesham 'eben gedolah vaybaqe'u 'et 'azei ha'agalah ve'et haparot he'elu 'olah yhvh. 1_samuel 6:15	vehalviyim horidu 'et 'aron yhvh ve'et ha'argaz 'asher 'ito 'asher bo khelei zahab vayasimu 'el ha'eben hagedolah ve'anshei bet shemesh he'elu 'olot vayizbekhu zebakhim bayom hahu yhvh. 1_samuel 6:16	vakhamishah sarnei felishtim ra'u vayashubu 'eqron bayom hahu. 1_samuel 6:17	ve'eleh tekhorei hazahab 'asher heishibu felishtim 'asham yhvh le'ashdod 'ekhad le'azah 'ekhad le'ashqelon 'ekhad legat 'ekhad le'eqron 'ekhad. 1_samuel 6:18	ve'akhberei hazahab mispar kal 'arei felishtim lakhameishet haseranim mei'ir mibzar ve'ad kofer haperazi ve'ad 'abel hagedolah 'asher hinikhu 'aleha 'et 'aron yhvh 'ad hayom hazeh bisdeh yehoshua' bet hashimshi. 1_samuel 6:19	vayakh be'anshei bet shemesh ki ra'u ba'aron yhvh vayakh ba'am shib'im 'ish khamishim 'elef 'ish vayit'abelu ha'am ki hikah yhvh ba'am makah gedolah 1_samuel 6:20	vayomeru 'anshei bet shemesh mi yukhal la'amod lifnei yhvh ha'elohim haqadosh hazeh ve'el mi ya'aleh mei'aleinu. 1_samuel 6:21	vayishlekhu mal'akhim 'el yoshebei qiryat ye'arim leimor heishibu felishtim 'et 'aron yhvh redu ha'alu 'oto 'aleikhem. 1_samuel 7:1	vayabo'u 'anshei qiryat ye'arim vaya'alu 'et 'aron yhvh vayabi'u 'oto 'el bet 'abinadab bagib'ah ve'et 'el'azar beno qideshu lishmor 'et 'aron yhvh. 1_samuel 7:2	vayhi miyom shebet ha'aron beqiryat ye'arim vayirbu hayamim vayihyu 'esrim shanah vayinahu kal bet yisra'el 'akharei yhvh. 1_samuel 7:3	vayomer shemu'el 'el kal bet yisra'el leimor 'im bekhal lebabkhem 'atem shabim 'el yhvh hasiru 'et 'elohei haneikhar mitokhkhem veha'ashtarot vehakhinu lebabkhem 'el yhvh ve'ibduhu lebado veyazel 'etkhem miyad pelishtim. 1_samuel 7:4	vayasiru benei yisra'el 'et habe'alim ve'et ha'ashtarot vaya'abdu 'et yhvh lebado. 1_samuel 7:5	vayomer shemu'el qibzu 'et kal yisra'el hamizpatah ve'etpalel ba'adkhem 'el yhvh. 1_samuel 7:6	vayiqabezu hamizpatah vayish'abu mayim vayishpekhu lifnei yhvh vayazumu bayom hahu vayomeru sham khatanu yhvh vayishpot shemu'el 'et benei yisra'el bamizpah. 1_samuel 7:7	vayishme'u felishtim ki hitqabezu benei yisra'el hamizpatah vaya'alu sarnei felishtim 'el yisra'el vayishme'u benei yisra'el vayir'u mipenei felishtim. 1_samuel 7:8	vayomeru benei yisra'el 'el shemu'el 'al takharesh mimenu mize'oq 'el yhvh 'eloheinu veyoshi'einu miyad pelishtim. 1_samuel 7:9	vayiqakh shemu'el teleh khalab 'ekhad vaya'aleh vaya'aleihu 'olah kalil yhvh vayiz'aq shemu'el 'el yhvh be'ad yisra'el vaya'aneihu yhvh. 1_samuel 7:10	vayhi shemu'el ma'aleh ha'olah ufelishtim nigeshu lamilkhamah beyisra'el vayar'em yhvh beqol gadol bayom hahu 'al pelishtim vayhumem vayinagefu lifnei yisra'el. 1_samuel 7:11	vayeize'u 'anshei yisra'el min hamizpah vayirdefu 'et pelishtim vayakum 'ad mitakhat lebet kar. 1_samuel 7:12	vayiqakh shemu'el 'eben 'akhat vayasem ben hamizpah uben hashen vayiqra 'et shemah 'eben ha'azer vayomar 'ad henah 'azaranu yhvh. 1_samuel 7:13	vayikane'u hapelishtim velo yasefu 'od labo bigbul yisra'el vatehi yad yhvh bapelishtim kol yemei shemu'el. 1_samuel 7:14	vatashobenah he'arim 'asher laqekhu felishtim mei'et yisra'el leyisra'el mei'eqron ve'ad gat ve'et gebulan hizil yisra'el miyad pelishtim vayhi shalom ben yisra'el uben ha'emori. 1_samuel 7:15	vayishpot shemu'el 'et yisra'el kol yemei khayav. 1_samuel 7:16	vehalakh midei shanah beshanah vesabab bet 'el vehagilgal vehamizpah veshafat 'et yisra'el 'et kal hameqomot ha'eleh. 1_samuel 7:17	uteshubato haramatah ki sham beito vesham shafat 'et yisra'el vayiben sham mizbeiakh yhvh. 1_samuel 8:1	vayhi ka'asher zaqen shemu'el vayasem 'et banav shofetim leyisra'el. 1_samuel 8:2	vayhi shem beno habekhor yo'el veshem mishneihu 'abiyah shofetim bib'er shaba'. 1_samuel 8:3	velo halekhu banav bedarkho bidrakhav vayitu 'akharei habaza' vayiqkhu shokhad vayatu mishpat. 1_samuel 8:4	vayitqabezu kol ziqnei yisra'el vayabo'u 'el shemu'el haramatah. 1_samuel 8:5	vayomeru 'eilav hineh 'atah zaqanta ubanekha lo halekhu bidrakhekha 'atah simah lanu melekh leshafeteinu kekhal hagoyim. 1_samuel 8:6	vayeira' hadabar be'einei shemu'el ka'asher 'ameru tenah lanu melekh leshafeteinu vayitpalel shemu'el 'el yhvh. 1_samuel 8:7	vayomer yhvh 'el shemu'el shema' beqol ha'am lekhol 'asher yomeru 'eilekha ki lo 'otekha ma'asu ki 'oti ma'asu mimelokh 'aleihem. 1_samuel 8:8	kekhal hama'asim 'asher 'asu miyom ha'aloti 'otam mimizrayim ve'ad hayom hazeh vaya'azbuni vaya'abdu 'elohim 'akheirim ken hemah 'osim gam lakh. 1_samuel 8:9	ve'atah shema' beqolam 'akh ki ha'ed ta'id bahem vehigadta lahem mishpat hamelekh 'asher yimlokh 'aleihem. 1_samuel 8:10	vayomer shemu'el 'et kal dibrei yhvh 'el ha'am hasho'alim mei'ito melekh. 1_samuel 8:11	vayomer zeh yihyeh mishpat hamelekh 'asher yimlokh 'aleikhem 'et beneikhem yiqakh vesam lo bemerkabto ubefarashav verazu lifnei merkabto. 1_samuel 8:12	velasum lo sarei 'alafim vesarei khamishim velakharosh kharisho veliqzor qeziro vela'asot kelei milkhamto ukhelei rikhbo. 1_samuel 8:13	ve'et benoteikhem yiqakh leraqakhot uletabakhot ule'ofot. 1_samuel 8:14	ve'ets doteikhem ve'et karmeikhem vezeiteikhem hatobim yiqakh venatan la'abadav. 1_samuel 8:15	vezar'eikhem vekharmeikhem ya'sor venatan lesarisav vela'abadav. 1_samuel 8:16	ve'et 'abdeikhem ve'et shifkhoteikhem ve'et bakhureikhem hatobim ve'et khamoreikhem yiqakh ve'asah limlakhto. 1_samuel 8:17	zonekhem ya'sor ve'atem tihyu lo la'abadim. 1_samuel 8:18	uze'aqtem bayom hahu milifnei malkekhem 'asher bekhartem lakhem velo ya'aneh yhvh 'etkhem bayom hahu. 1_samuel 8:19	vayma'anu ha'am lishmoa' beqol shemu'el vayomeru lo ki 'im melekh yihyeh 'aleinu. 1_samuel 8:20	vehayinu gam 'anakhnu kekhal hagoyim ushefatanu malkeinu veyaza lefaneinu venilkham 'et milkhamoteinu. 1_samuel 8:21	vayishma' shemu'el 'et kal dibrei ha'am vaydaberem be'azenei yhvh. 1_samuel 8:22	vayomer yhvh 'el shemu'el shema' beqolam vehimlakhta lahem melekh vayomer shemu'el 'el 'anshei yisra'el lekhu 'ish le'iro. 1_samuel 9:1	vayhi 'ish mibin yamin mibinyamin ushemo qish ben 'abi'el ben zeror ben bekhorat ben 'afiakh ben 'ish yemini gibor khayil. 1_samuel 9:2	velo hayah ben ushemo sha'ul bakhur vatob ve'en 'ish mibenei yisra'el tob mimenu mishikhmo vama'lah gaboah mikal ha'am. 1_samuel 9:3	vatobadnah ha'atonot leqish 'abi sha'ul vayomer qish 'el sha'ul beno qakh na 'itekha 'et 'akhad meihane'arim vequm lekh baqesh 'et ha'atonot. 1_samuel 9:4	vaya'abor behar 'efrayim vaya'abor be'erez shalishah velo maza'u vaya'abru be'erez sha'alim va'ayin vaya'abor be'erez yemini velo maza'u. 1_samuel 9:5	hemah ba'u be'erez zuf vesha'ul 'amar lena'aro 'asher 'imo lekhah venashubah pen yekhdal 'abi min ha'atonot veda'ag lanu. 1_samuel 9:6	vayomer lo hineh na 'ish 'elohim ba'ir hazot veha'ish nikhbad kol 'asher yedaber bo yabo 'atah neilakhah sham 'ulai yagid lanu 'et darkeinu 'asher halakhnu 'aleha. 1_samuel 9:7	vayomer sha'ul lena'aro vehineh neilekh umah nabi la'ish ki halekhem 'azal mikeileinu uteshurah 'en lehabi le'ish ha'elohim mah 'itanu. 1_samuel 9:8	vayosef hana'ar la'anot 'et sha'ul vayomer hineh nimza beyadi reba' sheqel kasef venatati le'ish ha'elohim vehigid lanu 'et darkeinu. 1_samuel 9:9	lefanim beyisra'el koh 'amar ha'ish belekhto lidrosh 'elohim lekhu veneilekhah 'ad haro'eh ki lanabi hayom yiqarei lefanim haro'eh. 1_samuel 9:10	vayomer sha'ul lena'aro tob debarekha lekhah neileikhah vayeilekhu 'el ha'ir 'asher sham 'ish ha'elohim. 1_samuel 9:11	hemah 'olim bema'aleh ha'ir vehemah maze'u ne'arot yoze'ot lish'ob mayim vayomeru lahen hayesh bazeh haro'eh. 1_samuel 9:12	vata'anenah 'otam vatomarnah yesh hineh lefanekha maher 'atah ki hayom ba la'ir ki zebakh hayom la'am babamah. 1_samuel 9:13	kebo'akhem ha'ir ken timze'un 'oto beterem ya'aleh habamatah le'ekhol ki lo yokhal ha'am 'ad bo'o ki hu yebarekh hazebakh 'akharei khen yokhelu haqeru'im ve'atah 'alu ki 'oto khehayom timze'un 'oto. 1_samuel 9:14	vaya'alu ha'ir hemah ba'im betokh ha'ir vehineh shemu'el yozei liqratam la'alot habamah. 1_samuel 9:15	yhvh galah 'et 'ozen shemu'el yom 'ekhad lifnei bo sha'ul leimor. 1_samuel 9:16	ka'et makhar 'eshlakh 'eilekha 'ish mei'erez binyamin umeshakhto lenagid 'al 'ami yisra'el vehoshia' 'et 'ami miyad pelishtim ki ra'iti 'et 'ami ki ba'ah za'aqato 'eilai. 1_samuel 9:17	ushemu'el ra'ah 'et sha'ul yhvh 'anahu hineh ha'ish 'asher 'amarti 'eilekha zeh ya'zor be'ami. 1_samuel 9:18	vayigash sha'ul 'et shemu'el betokh hasha'ar vayomer hagidah na li 'ei zeh bet haro'eh. 1_samuel 9:19	vaya'an shemu'el 'et sha'ul vayomer 'anokhi haro'eh 'aleh lefanai habamah va'akhaltem 'imi hayom veshilakhtikha baboqer vekhol 'asher bilbabekha 'agid lakh. 1_samuel 9:20	vela'atonot ha'obedot lekha hayom sheloshet hayamim 'al tasem 'et libekha lahem ki nimza'u ulemi kal khemdat yisra'el halo lekha ulekhol bet 'abikha. 1_samuel 9:21	vaya'an sha'ul vayomer halo ben yemini 'anokhi miqatanei shibtei yisra'el umishpakhti haze'irah mikal mishpekhot shibtei binyamin velamah dibarta 'eilai kadabar hazeh. 1_samuel 9:22	vayiqakh shemu'el 'et sha'ul ve'et na'aro vaybi'em lishkatah vayiten lahem maqom berosh haqeru'im vehemah kishloshim 'ish. 1_samuel 9:23	vayomer shemu'el latabakh tenah 'et hamanah 'asher natati lakh 'asher 'amarti 'eilekha sim 'otah 'imakh. 1_samuel 9:24	vayarem hatabakh 'et hashoq vehe'aleha vayasem lifnei sha'ul vayomer hineh hanish'ar sim lefanekha 'ekhol ki lamo'ed shamur lekha leimor ha'am qarati vayokhal sha'ul 'im shemu'el bayom hahu. 1_samuel 9:25	vayeiredu meihabamah ha'ir vaydaber 'im sha'ul 'al hagag. 1_samuel 9:26	vayashkimu vayhi ka'alot hashakhar vayiqra shemu'el 'el sha'ul hagag hagagah leimor qumah va'ashalekheka vayaqam sha'ul vayeize'u sheneihem hu ushemu'el hakhuzah. 1_samuel 9:27	hemah yordim biqzeh ha'ir ushemu'el 'amar 'el sha'ul 'emor lana'ar veya'abor lefaneinu vaya'abor ve'atah 'amod kayom ve'ashmi'akha 'et debar 'elohim. 1_samuel 10:1	vayiqakh shemu'el 'et pakh hashemen vayizoq 'al rosho vayishaqeihu vayomer halo ki meshakhakha yhvh 'al nakhalato lenagid. 1_samuel 10:2	belekhtekha hayom mei'imadi umazata shenei 'anashim 'im qeburat rakhel bigbul binyamin bezelzakh ve'ameru 'eilekha nimze'u ha'atonot 'asher halakhta lebaqesh vehineh natash 'abikha 'et dibrei ha'atonot veda'ag lakhem leimor mah 'e'eseh libni. 1_samuel 10:3	vekhalafta misham vahale'ah ubata 'ad 'eilon tabor umeza'ukha sham sheloshah 'anashim 'olim 'el ha'elohim bet 'el 'ekhad nosei sheloshah gedayim ve'ekhad nosei sheloshet kikerot lekhem ve'ekhad nosei neibel yayin. 1_samuel 10:4	vesha'alu lekha leshalom venatenu lekha shetei lekhem velaqakhta miyadam. 1_samuel 10:5	'akhar ken tabo gib'at ha'elohim 'asher sham nezibei felishtim vihi khebo'akha sham ha'ir ufaga'ta khebel nebi'im yoredim meihabamah velifneihem neibel vetof vekhalil vekhinor vehemah mitnabe'im. 1_samuel 10:6	vezalekhah 'alekha ruakh yhvh vehitnabita 'imam venehpakhta le'ish 'akher. 1_samuel 10:7	vehayah ki tebo'enah tabonah ha'otot ha'eleh lakh 'aseh lekha 'asher timza yadekha ki ha'elohim 'imakh. 1_samuel 10:8	veyaradta lefanai hagilgal vehineh 'anokhi yored 'eilekha leha'alot 'olot lizboakh zibkhei shelamim shib'at yamim tokhel 'ad bo'i 'eilekha vehoda'ti lekha 'et 'asher ta'aseh. 1_samuel 10:9	vehayah kehafnoto shikhmo lalekhet mei'im shemu'el vayahafakh lo 'elohim leb 'akher vayabo'u kal ha'otot ha'eleh bayom hahu. 1_samuel 10:10	vayabo'u sham hagib'atah vehineh khebel nebi'im liqrato vatizlakh 'alav ruakh 'elohim vayitnabei betokham. 1_samuel 10:11	vayhi kal yod'o mei'itemol shilshom vayir'u vehineh 'im nebi'im niba vayomer ha'am 'ish 'el rei'eihu mah zeh hayah leben qish hagam sha'ul banebi'im. 1_samuel 10:12	vaya'an 'ish misham vayomer umi 'abihem 'al ken hayetah lemashal hagam sha'ul banebi'im. 1_samuel 10:13	vaykhal meihitnabot vayabo habamah. 1_samuel 10:14	vayomer dod sha'ul 'eilav ve'el na'aro 'an halakhtem vayomer lebaqesh 'et ha'atonot vanir'eh khi 'ayin vanabo 'el shemu'el. 1_samuel 10:15	vayomer dod sha'ul hagidah na li mah 'amar lakhem shemu'el. 1_samuel 10:16	vayomer sha'ul 'el dodo haged higid lanu ki nimze'u ha'atonot ve'et debar hamelukhah lo higid lo 'asher 'amar shemu'el. 1_samuel 10:17	vayaz'eq shemu'el 'et ha'am 'el yhvh hamizpah. 1_samuel 10:18	vayomer 'el benei yisra'el koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'anokhi he'eleiti 'et yisra'el mimizrayim va'azil 'etkhem miyad mizrayim umiyad kal hamamlakhot halokhazim 'etkhem. 1_samuel 10:19	ve'atem hayom me'astem 'et 'eloheikhem 'asher hu moshia' lakhem mikal ra'oteikhem vezaroteikhem vatomeru lo ki melekh tasim 'aleinu ve'atah hityazebu lifnei yhvh leshibteikhem ule'alfeikhem. 1_samuel 10:20	vayaqreb shemu'el 'et kal shibtei yisra'el vayilakhed sheibet binyamin. 1_samuel 10:21	vayaqreb 'et sheibet binyamin lemishpekhoto lemishpekhotav vatilakhed mishpakhat hamatri vayilakhed sha'ul ben qish vaybaqshuhu velo nimza. 1_samuel 10:22	vayish'alu 'od yhvh haba 'od halom 'ish vayomer yhvh hineh hu nekhba 'el hakeilim. 1_samuel 10:23	vayaruzu vayiqakhuhu misham vayityazeb betokh ha'am vayigbah mikal ha'am mishikhmo vama'elah. 1_samuel 10:24	vayomer shemu'el 'el kal ha'am harre'item 'asher bakhar bo yhvh ki 'en kamohu bekhal ha'am vayari'u khal ha'am vayomeru yekhi hamelekh. 1_samuel 10:25	vaydaber shemu'el 'el ha'am 'et mishpat hamelukhah vayikhtob baseifer vayanakh lifnei yhvh vayshalakh shemu'el 'et kal ha'am 'ish lebeito. 1_samuel 10:26	vegam sha'ul halakh lebeito gib'atah vayeilekhu 'imo hakhayil 'asher naga' 'elohim belibam. 1_samuel 10:27	ubenei beliya'al 'ameru mah yoshi'einu zeh vayibzuhu velo heibi'u lo minkhah vayhi kemakharish. 1_samuel 11:1	vaya'al nakhash ha'amoni vayikhan 'al yabesh gil'ad vayomeru kal 'anshei yabesh 'el nakhash kerat lanu berit vena'abdeka. 1_samuel 11:2	vayomer 'aleihem nakhash ha'amoni bezot 'ekhrot lakhem binqor lakhem kal 'en yamin vesamtiha kherpah 'al kal yisra'el. 1_samuel 11:3	vayomeru 'eilav ziqnei yabesh heref lanu shib'at yamim venishlekhah mal'akhim bekhol gebul yisra'el ve'im 'en moshia' 'otanu veyazanu 'eilekha. 1_samuel 11:4	vayabo'u hamal'akhim gib'at sha'ul vaydaberu hadebarim be'azenei ha'am vayis'u khal ha'am 'et qolam vayibku. 1_samuel 11:5	vehineh sha'ul ba 'akharei habaqar min hasadeh vayomer sha'ul mah la'am ki yibku vaysaperu lo 'et dibrei 'anshei yabesh. 1_samuel 11:6	vatizlakh ruakh 'elohim 'al sha'ul beshame'o keshame'o 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayikhar 'apo me'od. 1_samuel 11:7	vayiqakh zemed baqar vaynatekheihu vayshalakh bekhal gebul yisra'el beyad hamal'akhim leimor 'asher 'einenu yozei 'akharei sha'ul ve'akhar shemu'el koh yei'aseh libqaro vayipol pakhad yhvh 'al ha'am vayeize'u ke'ish 'ekhad. 1_samuel 11:8	vayifqedem bebazeq vayihyu benei yisra'el shelosh mei'ot 'elef ve'ish yehudah sheloshim 'alef. 1_samuel 11:9	vayomeru lamal'akhim haba'im koh tomerun le'ish yabesh gil'ad makhar tihyeh lakhem teshu'ah bekhom kekhom hashamesh vayabo'u hamal'akhim vayagidu le'anshei yabesh vayismakhu. 1_samuel 11:10	vayomeru 'anshei yabesh makhar neizei 'aleikhem va'asitem lanu kekhal hatob be'eineikhem. 1_samuel 11:11	vayhi mimakhorat vayasem sha'ul 'et ha'am sheloshah rashim vayabo'u betokh hamakhaneh be'ashmoret haboqer vayaku 'et 'amon 'ad khom hayom vayhi hanish'arim vayafuzu velo nish'aru bam shenayim yakhad. 1_samuel 11:12	vayomer ha'am 'el shemu'el mi ha'omer sha'ul yimlokh 'aleinu tenu ha'anashim unemitem. 1_samuel 11:13	vayomer sha'ul lo yumat 'ish bayom hazeh ki hayom 'asah yhvh teshu'ah beyisra'el. 1_samuel 11:14	vayomer shemu'el 'el ha'am lekhu veneilekhah hagilgal unekhadesh sham hamelukhah. 1_samuel 11:15	vayeilekhu khal ha'am hagilgal vayamlikhu sham 'et sha'ul lifnei yhvh bagilgal vayizbekhu sham zebakhim shelamim lifnei yhvh vayismakh sham sha'ul vekhal 'anshei yisra'el 'ad me'od. 1_samuel 12:1	vayomer shemu'el 'el kal yisra'el hineh shama'ti beqolekhem lekhol 'asher 'amartem li va'amlikh 'aleikhem melekh. 1_samuel 12:2	ve'atah hineh hamelekh mithalekh lifneikhem va'ani zaqanti vasabti ubanai hinam 'itekhem va'ani hithalakhti lifneikhem mine'urai 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_samuel 12:3	hini 'anu bi neged yhvh veneged meshikho 'et shor mi laqakhti vakhamor mi laqakhti ve'et mi 'ashaqti 'et mi razoti umiyad mi laqakhti khofer ve'a'lim 'einai bo ve'ashib lakhem. 1_samuel 12:4	vayomeru lo 'ashaqtanu velo razotanu velo laqakhta miyad 'ish me'umah. 1_samuel 12:5	vayomer 'aleihem 'ed yhvh bakhem ve'ed meshikho hayom hazeh ki lo mezatem beyadi me'umah vayomer 'ed. 1_samuel 12:6	vayomer shemu'el 'el ha'am yhvh 'asher 'asah 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon va'asher he'elah 'et 'aboteikhem mei'erez mizrayim. 1_samuel 12:7	ve'atah hityazebu ve'ishafetah 'itekhem lifnei yhvh 'et kal zidqot yhvh 'asher 'asah 'itekhem ve'et 'aboteikhem. 1_samuel 12:8	ka'asher ba ya'aqob mizrayim vayiz'aqu 'aboteikhem 'el yhvh vayishlakh yhvh 'et mosheh ve'et 'aharon vayozi'u 'et 'aboteikhem mimizrayim vayoshibum bamaqom hazeh. 1_samuel 12:9	vayishkekhu 'et yhvh 'eloheihem vayimkor 'otam beyad sisera sar zeba khazor ubeyad pelishtim ubeyad melekh mo'ab vayilakhamu bam. 1_samuel 12:10	vayiz'aqu 'el yhvh vayomer vayomeru khatanu ki 'azabnu 'et yhvh vana'abod 'et habe'alim ve'et ha'ashtarot ve'atah hazileinu miyad 'oyebeinu vena'abdeka. 1_samuel 12:11	vayishlakh yhvh 'et yeruba'al ve'et bedan ve'et yiftakh ve'et shemu'el vayazel 'etkhem miyad 'oyebeikhem misabib vateishebu betakh. 1_samuel 12:12	vatir'u ki nakhash melekh benei 'amon ba 'aleikhem vatomeru li lo ki melekh yimlokh 'aleinu yhvh 'eloheikhem malkekhem. 1_samuel 12:13	ve'atah hineh hamelekh 'asher bekhartem 'asher she'eltem vehineh natan yhvh 'aleikhem melekh. 1_samuel 12:14	'im tire'u 'et yhvh va'abadtem 'oto ushema'tem beqolo velo tamru 'et pi yhvh vihyitem gam 'atem vegam hamelekh 'asher malakh 'aleikhem 'akhar yhvh 'eloheikhem. 1_samuel 12:15	ve'im lo tishme'u beqol yhvh umeritem 'et pi yhvh vehayetah yad yhvh bakhem uba'aboteikhem. 1_samuel 12:16	gam 'atah hityazebu ure'u 'et hadabar hagadol hazeh 'asher yhvh 'oseh le'eineikhem. 1_samuel 12:17	halo qezir khitim hayom 'eqra 'el yhvh veyiten qolot umatar ude'u ure'u ki ra'atkhem rabah 'asher 'asitem be'einei yhvh lish'ol lakhem melekh. 1_samuel 12:18	vayiqra shemu'el 'el yhvh vayiten yhvh qolot umatar bayom hahu vayira khal ha'am me'od 'et yhvh ve'et shemu'el. 1_samuel 12:19	vayomeru khal ha'am 'el shemu'el hitpalel be'ad 'abadekha 'el yhvh 'elohekha ve'al namut ki yasafnu 'al kal khatoteinu ra'ah lish'ol lanu melekh. 1_samuel 12:20	vayomer shemu'el 'el ha'am 'al tira'u 'atem 'asitem 'et kal hara'ah hazot 'akh 'al tasuru mei'akharei yhvh va'abadtem 'et yhvh bekhal lebabkhem. 1_samuel 12:21	velo tasuru ki 'akharei hatohu 'asher lo yo'ilu velo yazilu ki tohu hemah. 1_samuel 12:22	ki lo yitosh yhvh 'et 'amo ba'abur shemo hagadol ki ho'il yhvh la'asot 'etkhem lo le'am. 1_samuel 12:23	gam 'anokhi khalilah li meikhato yhvh meikhadol lehitpalel ba'adkhem vehoreiti 'etkhem bederekh hatobah vehaysharah. 1_samuel 12:24	'akh yer'u 'et yhvh va'abadtem 'oto be'emet bekhal lebabkhem ki re'u 'et 'asher higdil 'imakhem. 1_samuel 12:25	ve'im hareia' tarei'u gam 'atem gam malkekhem tisafu. 1_samuel 13:1	ben shanah sha'ul bemalekho ushetei shanim malakh 'al yisra'el. 1_samuel 13:2	vayibkhar lo sha'ul sheloshet 'alafim miyisra'el vayihyu 'im sha'ul 'alpayim bemikhmas ubehar bet 'el ve'elef hayu 'im yonatan begib'at binyamin veyeter ha'am shilakh 'ish le'ohalav. 1_samuel 13:3	vayakh yonatan 'et nezib pelishtim 'asher begeba' vayishme'u pelishtim vesha'ul taqa' bashofar bekhal ha'arez leimor yishme'u ha'ibrim. 1_samuel 13:4	vekhal yisra'el shame'u leimor hikah sha'ul 'et nezib pelishtim vegam nib'ash yisra'el bapelishtim vayiza'aqu ha'am 'akharei sha'ul hagilgal. 1_samuel 13:5	ufelishtim ne'esfu lehilakhem 'im yisra'el sheloshim 'elef rekheb vesheishet 'alafim parashim ve'am kakhol 'asher 'al sefat hayam larob vaya'alu vayakhanu bemikhmas qidmat bet 'aven. 1_samuel 13:6	ve'ish yisra'el ra'u ki zar lo ki nigas ha'am vayitkhabe'u ha'am bame'arot ubakhavakhim ubasela'im ubazerikhim ubaborot. 1_samuel 13:7	ve'ibrim 'aberu 'et hayarden 'erez gad vegil'ad vesha'ul 'odenu bagilgal vekhal ha'am kharedu 'akharav. 1_samuel 13:8	vayikhel vayokhel shib'at yamim lamo'ed 'asher shemu'el velo ba shemu'el hagilgal vayafez ha'am mei'alav. 1_samuel 13:9	vayomer sha'ul hagishu 'eilai ha'olah vehashelamim vaya'al ha'olah. 1_samuel 13:10	vayhi kekhaloto leha'alot ha'olah vehineh shemu'el ba vayeizei sha'ul liqrato lebarakho. 1_samuel 13:11	vayomer shemu'el meh 'asita vayomer sha'ul ki ra'iti khi nafaz ha'am mei'alai ve'atah lo bata lemo'ed hayamim ufelishtim ne'esafim mikhmas. 1_samuel 13:12	va'omar 'atah yeiredu felishtim 'eilai hagilgal ufenei yhvh lo khiliti va'et'apaq va'a'aleh ha'olah. 1_samuel 13:13	vayomer shemu'el 'el sha'ul niskaleta lo shamarta 'et mizvat yhvh 'elohekha 'asher zivakh ki 'atah heikhin yhvh 'et mamlakhtekha 'el yisra'el 'ad 'olam. 1_samuel 13:14	ve'atah mamlakhtekha lo taqum biqesh yhvh lo 'ish kilbabo vayzaveihu yhvh lenagid 'al 'amo ki lo shamarta 'et 'asher zivekha yhvh. 1_samuel 13:15	vayaqam shemu'el vaya'al min hagilgal gib'at binyamin vayifqod sha'ul 'et ha'am hanimze'im 'imo keshesh mei'ot 'ish. 1_samuel 13:16	vesha'ul veyonatan beno veha'am hanimza 'imam yoshebim begeba' binyamin ufelishtim khanu bemikhmas. 1_samuel 13:17	vayeizei hamashkhit mimakhaneh felishtim sheloshah rashim harosh 'ekhad yifneh 'el derekh 'aferah 'el 'erez shu'al. 1_samuel 13:18	veharosh 'ekhad yifneh derekh bet khoron veharosh 'ekhad yifneh derekh hagebul hanishqaf 'al gei hazebo'im hamidbarah. 1_samuel 13:19	vekharash lo yimazei bekhol 'erez yisra'el ki 'amar 'ameru felishtim pen ya'asu ha'ibrim khereb 'o khanit. 1_samuel 13:20	vayeiredu khal yisra'el hapelishtim liltosh 'ish 'et makharashto ve'et 'eito ve'et qardumo ve'et makhareishato. 1_samuel 13:21	vehayetah hapezirah fim lamakhareishot vela'eitim velishlosh qileshon ulehaqardumim ulehazib hadareban. 1_samuel 13:22	vehayah beyom milkhemet velo nimza khereb vakhanit beyad kal ha'am 'asher 'et sha'ul ve'et yonatan vatimazei lesha'ul uleyonatan beno. 1_samuel 13:23	vayeizei mazab pelishtim 'el ma'abar mikhmas. 1_samuel 14:1	vayhi hayom vayomer yonatan ben sha'ul 'el hana'ar nosei kheilav lekhah vena'berah 'el mazab pelishtim 'asher mei'eiber halaz ule'abiv lo higid. 1_samuel 14:2	vesha'ul yosheb biqzeh hagib'ah takhat harimon 'asher bemigron veha'am 'asher 'imo keshesh mei'ot 'ish. 1_samuel 14:3	va'akhiyah ben 'akhitub 'akhi 'ikhabod ben pinekhas ben 'eili kohen yhvh beshilo nosei 'eifod veha'am lo yada' ki halakh yonatan. 1_samuel 14:4	uben hama'berot 'asher biqesh yonatan la'abor 'al mazab pelishtim shen hasela' meiha'eiber mizeh veshen hasela' meiha'eiber mizeh veshem ha'ekhad bozez veshem ha'ekhad seneh. 1_samuel 14:5	hashen ha'ekhad mazuq mizafon mul mikhmas veha'ekhad minegeb mul gaba'. 1_samuel 14:6	vayomer yehonatan 'el hana'ar nosei kheilav lekhah vena'berah 'el mazab ha'areilim ha'eleh 'ulai ya'aseh yhvh lanu ki 'en yhvh ma'zor lehoshia' berab 'o bim'at. 1_samuel 14:7	vayomer lo nosei kheilav 'aseh kal 'asher bilbabekha neteh lakh hini 'imekha kilbabekha. 1_samuel 14:8	vayomer yehonatan hineh 'anakhnu 'oberim 'el ha'anashim veniglinu 'aleihem. 1_samuel 14:9	'im koh yomeru 'eileinu domu 'ad hagi'einu 'aleikhem ve'amadnu takhteinu velo na'aleh 'aleihem. 1_samuel 14:10	ve'im koh yomeru 'alu 'aleinu ve'alinu ki netanam yhvh beyadeinu vezeh lanu ha'ot. 1_samuel 14:11	vayigalu sheneihem 'el mazab pelishtim vayomeru felishtim hineh 'ibrim yoze'im min hakhorim 'asher hitkhabe'u sham. 1_samuel 14:12	vaya'anu 'anshei hamazabah 'et yonatan ve'et nosei kheilav vayomeru 'alu 'eileinu venodi'ah 'etkhem dabar vayomer yonatan 'el nosei kheilav 'aleh 'akharai ki netanam yhvh beyad yisra'el. 1_samuel 14:13	vaya'al yonatan 'al yadav ve'al raglav venosei kheilav 'akharav vayipelu lifnei yonatan venosei kheilav memotet 'akharav. 1_samuel 14:14	vatehi hamakah harishonah 'asher hikah yonatan venosei kheilav ke'esrim 'ish kebakhazi ma'anah zemed sadeh. 1_samuel 14:15	vatehi kharadah bamakhaneh basadeh ubekhal ha'am hamazab vehamashkhit kharedu gam hemah vatirgaz ha'arez vatehi lekherdat 'elohim. 1_samuel 14:16	vayir'u hazofim lesha'ul begib'at binyamin vehineh hehamon namog vayeilekh vahalom. 1_samuel 14:17	vayomer sha'ul la'am 'asher 'ito piqdu na ure'u mi halakh mei'imanu vayifqedu vehineh 'en yonatan venosei kheilav. 1_samuel 14:18	vayomer sha'ul la'akhiyah hagishah 'aron ha'elohim ki hayah 'aron ha'elohim bayom hahu ubenei yisra'el. 1_samuel 14:19	vayhi 'ad diber sha'ul 'el hakohen vehehamon 'asher bemakhaneh felishtim vayeilekh halokh varab vayomer sha'ul 'el hakohen 'esof yadekha. 1_samuel 14:20	vayiza'eq sha'ul vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito vayabo'u 'ad hamilkhamah vehineh hayetah khereb 'ish berei'eihu mehumah gedolah me'od. 1_samuel 14:21	veha'ibrim hayu lapelishtim ke'etmol shilshom 'asher 'alu 'imam bamakhaneh sabib vegam hemah lihyot 'im yisra'el 'asher 'im sha'ul veyonatan. 1_samuel 14:22	vekhol 'ish yisra'el hamitkhabe'im behar 'efrayim shame'u ki nasu pelishtim vayadbequ gam hemah 'akhareihem bamilkhamah. 1_samuel 14:23	vayosha' yhvh bayom hahu 'et yisra'el vehamilkhamah 'aberah 'et bet 'aven. 1_samuel 14:24	ve'ish yisra'el nigas bayom hahu vayo'el sha'ul 'et ha'am leimor 'arur ha'ish 'asher yokhal lekhem 'ad ha'ereb veniqamti mei'oyebai velo ta'am kal ha'am lakhem. 1_samuel 14:25	vekhal ha'arez ba'u baya'ar vayhi debash 'al penei hasadeh. 1_samuel 14:26	vayabo ha'am 'el haya'ar vehineh heilekh debash ve'en masig yado 'el piv ki yarei ha'am 'et hashebu'ah. 1_samuel 14:27	veyonatan lo shama' behashbia' 'abiv 'et ha'am vayishlakh 'et qezeh hamateh 'asher beyado vayitbol 'otah beya'rat hadebash vayasheb yado 'el piv vataronah vata'orenah 'einav. 1_samuel 14:28	vaya'an 'ish meiha'am vayomer hashbeia' hishbia' 'abikha 'et ha'am leimor 'arur ha'ish 'asher yokhal lekhem hayom vaya'af ha'am. 1_samuel 14:29	vayomer yonatan 'akhar 'abi 'et ha'arez re'u na ki 'oru 'einai ki ta'amti me'at debash hazeh. 1_samuel 14:30	'af ki lu 'akhol 'akhal hayom ha'am mishelal 'oyebav 'asher maza ki 'atah lo rabetah makah bapelishtim. 1_samuel 14:31	vayaku bayom hahu bapelishtim mimikhmas 'ayalonah vaya'af ha'am me'od. 1_samuel 14:32	vaya'as vaya'at ha'am 'el shalal hashalal vayiqkhu zon ubaqar ubenei baqar vayishkhatu 'arezah vayokhal ha'am 'al hadam. 1_samuel 14:33	vayagidu lesha'ul leimor hineh ha'am khotim yhvh le'ekhol 'al hadam vayomer begadtem golu 'eilai hayom 'eben gedolah. 1_samuel 14:34	vayomer sha'ul puzu ba'am va'amartem lahem hagishu 'eilai 'ish shoro ve'ish seyeihu ushekhatem bazeh va'akhaltem velo tekhet'u yhvh le'ekhol 'el hadam vayagishu khal ha'am 'ish shoro beyado halaylah vayishkhatu sham. 1_samuel 14:35	vayiben sha'ul mizbeiakh yhvh 'oto heikhel libnot mizbeiakh yhvh. 1_samuel 14:36	vayomer sha'ul neiredah 'akharei felishtim laylah venabozah bahem 'ad 'or haboqer velo nash'er bahem 'ish vayomeru kal hatob be'einekha 'aseh vayomer hakohen niqrebah halom 'el ha'elohim. 1_samuel 14:37	vayish'al sha'ul beilohim ha'eired 'akharei felishtim hatitenem beyad yisra'el velo 'anahu bayom hahu. 1_samuel 14:38	vayomer sha'ul goshu halom kol pinot ha'am ude'u ure'u bamah hayetah hakhatat hazot hayom. 1_samuel 14:39	ki khai yhvh hamoshia' 'et yisra'el ki 'im yeshno beyonatan beni ki mot yamut ve'en 'oneihu mikal ha'am. 1_samuel 14:40	vayomer 'el kal yisra'el 'atem tihyu le'eiber 'ekhad va'ani veyonatan beni nihyeh le'eiber 'ekhad vayomeru ha'am 'el sha'ul hatob be'einekha 'aseh. 1_samuel 14:41	vayomer sha'ul 'el yhvh 'elohei yisra'el habah tamim vayilakhed yonatan vesha'ul veha'am yaza'u. 1_samuel 14:42	vayomer sha'ul hapilu beini uben yonatan beni vayilakhed yonatan. 1_samuel 14:43	vayomer sha'ul 'el yonatan hagidah li meh 'asitah vayaged lo yonatan vayomer ta'om ta'amti biqzeh hamateh 'asher beyadi me'at debash hini 'amut. 1_samuel 14:44	vayomer sha'ul koh ya'aseh 'elohim vekhoh yosif ki mot tamut yonatan. 1_samuel 14:45	vayomer ha'am 'el sha'ul hayonatan yamut 'asher 'asah hayshu'ah hagedolah hazot beyisra'el khalilah khai yhvh 'im yipol misa'arat rosho 'arzah ki 'im 'elohim 'asah hayom hazeh vayifdu ha'am 'et yonatan velo met. 1_samuel 14:46	vaya'al sha'ul mei'akharei pelishtim ufelishtim halekhu limqomam. 1_samuel 14:47	vesha'ul lakhad hamelukhah 'al yisra'el vayilakhem sabib bekhal 'oyebav bemo'ab ubibnei 'amon ube'edom ubemalkhei zobah ubapelishtim ubekhol 'asher yifneh yarshia'. 1_samuel 14:48	vaya'as khayil vayakh 'et 'amaleq vayazel 'et yisra'el miyad shoseihu. 1_samuel 14:49	vayihyu benei sha'ul yonatan veyishvi umalki shua' veshem shetei benotav shem habekhirah meirab veshem haqetanah mikhal. 1_samuel 14:50	veshem 'eishet sha'ul 'akhino'am bat 'akhima'az veshem sar zeba'o 'abiner ben ner dod sha'ul. 1_samuel 14:51	veqish 'abi sha'ul vener 'abi 'abner ben 'abi'el. 1_samuel 14:52	vatehi hamilkhamah khazaqah 'al pelishtim kol yemei sha'ul vera'ah sha'ul kal 'ish gibor vekhal ben khayil vaya'asfeihu 'eilav. 1_samuel 15:1	vayomer shemu'el 'el sha'ul 'oti shalakh yhvh limshakhokha lemelekh 'al 'amo 'al yisra'el ve'atah shema' leqol dibrei yhvh. 1_samuel 15:2	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot paqadti 'et 'asher 'asah 'amaleq leyisra'el 'asher sam lo baderekh ba'aloto mimizrayim. 1_samuel 15:3	'atah lekh vehikitah 'et 'amaleq vehakharamtem 'et kal 'asher lo velo takhmol 'alav veheimatah mei'ish 'ad 'ishah mei'olel ve'ad yoneq mishor ve'ad seh migamal ve'ad khamor. 1_samuel 15:4	vayshama' sha'ul 'et ha'am vayifqedem batela'im matayim 'elef ragli va'aseret 'alafim 'et 'ish yehudah. 1_samuel 15:5	vayabo sha'ul 'ad 'ir 'amaleq vayareb banakhal. 1_samuel 15:6	vayomer sha'ul 'el haqeini lekhu suru redu mitokh 'amaleiqi pen 'osifkha 'imo ve'atah 'asitah khesed 'im kal benei yisra'el ba'alotam mimizrayim vayasar qeini mitokh 'amaleq. 1_samuel 15:7	vayakh sha'ul 'et 'amaleq meikhavilah bo'akha shur 'asher 'al penei mizrayim. 1_samuel 15:8	vayitpos 'et 'agag melekh 'amaleq khai ve'et kal ha'am hekherim lefi khareb. 1_samuel 15:9	vayakhmol sha'ul veha'am 'al 'agag ve'al meitab hazon vehabaqar vehamishnim ve'al hakarim ve'al kal hatob velo 'abu hakharimam vekhal hamelakhah nemibzah venames 'otah hekherimu. 1_samuel 15:10	vayhi debar yhvh 'el shemu'el leimor. 1_samuel 15:11	nikhamti ki himlakhti 'et sha'ul lemelekh ki shab mei'akharai ve'et debarai lo heiqim vayikhar lishmu'el vayiz'aq 'el yhvh kal halayelah. 1_samuel 15:12	vayashkem shemu'el liqrat sha'ul baboqer vayugad lishmu'el leimor ba sha'ul hakarmelah vehineh mazib lo yad vayisob vaya'abor vayeired hagilgal. 1_samuel 15:13	vayabo shemu'el 'el sha'ul vayomer lo sha'ul barukh 'atah yhvh haqimoti 'et debar yhvh. 1_samuel 15:14	vayomer shemu'el umeh qol hazon hazeh be'azenai veqol habaqar 'asher 'anokhi shomeia'. 1_samuel 15:15	vayomer sha'ul mei'amaleiqi hebi'um 'asher khamal ha'am 'al meitab hazon vehabaqar lema'an zeboakh yhvh 'elohekha ve'et hayoter hekheramnu. 1_samuel 15:16	vayomer shemu'el 'el sha'ul heref ve'agidah lekha 'et 'asher diber yhvh 'eilai halayelah vayomeru vayomer lo daber. 1_samuel 15:17	vayomer shemu'el halo 'im qaton 'atah be'einekha rosh shibtei yisra'el 'atah vayimshakhakha yhvh lemelekh 'al yisra'el. 1_samuel 15:18	vayishlakhakha yhvh bedarekh vayomer lekh vehakharamtah 'et hakhata'im 'et 'amaleq venilkhamta bo 'ad kalotam 'otam. 1_samuel 15:19	velamah lo shama'ta beqol yhvh vata'at 'el hashalal vata'as hara' be'einei yhvh. 1_samuel 15:20	vayomer sha'ul 'el shemu'el 'asher shama'ti beqol yhvh va'eilekh baderekh 'asher shelakhani yhvh va'abi 'et 'agag melekh 'amaleq ve'et 'amaleq hekheramti. 1_samuel 15:21	vayiqakh ha'am meihashalal zon ubaqar reishit hakheirem lizboakh yhvh 'elohekha bagilgal. 1_samuel 15:22	vayomer shemu'el hakheifez yhvh be'olot uzebakhim kishmoa' beqol yhvh hineh shemoa' mizebakh tob lehaqshib meikheileb 'eilim. 1_samuel 15:23	ki khatat qesem meri ve'aven uterafim hafzar ya'an ma'asta 'et debar yhvh vayim'asekha mimelekh. 1_samuel 15:24	vayomer sha'ul 'el shemu'el khatati ki 'abarti 'et pi yhvh ve'et debarekha ki yareiti 'et ha'am va'eshma' beqolam. 1_samuel 15:25	ve'atah sa na 'et khatati veshub 'imi ve'eshtakhaveh yhvh. 1_samuel 15:26	vayomer shemu'el 'el sha'ul lo 'ashub 'imakh ki ma'astah 'et debar yhvh vayim'asekha yhvh mihyot melekh 'al yisra'el. 1_samuel 15:27	vayisob shemu'el lalekhet vayakhazeq bikhnaf me'ilo vayiqara'. 1_samuel 15:28	vayomer 'eilav shemu'el qara' yhvh 'et mamlekhut yisra'el mei'alekha hayom unetanah lerei'akha hatob mimeka. 1_samuel 15:29	vegam neizakh yisra'el lo yeshaqer velo yinakhem ki lo 'adam hu lehinakhem. 1_samuel 15:30	vayomer khatati 'atah kabedeini na neged ziqnei 'ami veneged yisra'el veshub 'imi vehishtakhaveiti yhvh 'elohekha. 1_samuel 15:31	vayashab shemu'el 'akharei sha'ul vayishtakhu sha'ul yhvh. 1_samuel 15:32	vayomer shemu'el hagishu 'eilai 'et 'agag melekh 'amaleq vayeilekh 'eilav 'agag ma'adanot vayomer 'agag 'akhen sar mar hamavet. 1_samuel 15:33	vayomer shemu'el ka'asher shikelah nashim kharbekha ken tishkal minashim 'imekha vayshasef shemu'el 'et 'agag lifnei yhvh bagilgal. 1_samuel 15:34	vayeilekh shemu'el haramatah vesha'ul 'alah 'el beito gib'at sha'ul. 1_samuel 15:35	velo yasaf shemu'el lir'ot 'et sha'ul 'ad yom moto ki hit'abel shemu'el 'el sha'ul yhvh nikham ki himlikh 'et sha'ul 'al yisra'el. 1_samuel 16:1	vayomer yhvh 'el shemu'el 'ad matai 'atah mit'abel 'el sha'ul va'ani me'astiv mimelokh 'al yisra'el malei qarnekha shemen velekh 'eshlakhakha 'el yishai bet halakhmi ki ra'iti bebanav li melekh. 1_samuel 16:2	vayomer shemu'el 'ekh 'eilekh veshama' sha'ul vaharagani vayomer yhvh 'eglat baqar tiqakh beyadekha ve'amarta lizboakh yhvh bati. 1_samuel 16:3	veqarata leyishai bazabakh ve'anokhi 'odi'akha 'et 'asher ta'aseh umashakhta li 'et 'asher 'omar 'eilekha. 1_samuel 16:4	vaya'as shemu'el 'et 'asher diber yhvh vayabo bet lakhem vayekherdu ziqnei ha'ir liqrato vayomer shalom bo'ekha. 1_samuel 16:5	vayomer shalom lizboakh yhvh bati hitqadeshu ubatem 'iti bazabakh vayqadesh 'et yishai ve'et banav vayiqra lahem lazabakh. 1_samuel 16:6	vayhi bebo'am vayar 'et 'eli'ab vayomer 'akh neged yhvh meshikho. 1_samuel 16:7	vayomer yhvh 'el shemu'el 'al tabet 'el mar'eihu ve'el geboah qomato ki me'astihu ki lo 'asher yir'eh ha'adam ki ha'adam yir'eh la'einayim yhvh yir'eh laleibab. 1_samuel 16:8	vayiqra yishai 'el 'abinadab vaya'abireihu lifnei shemu'el vayomer gam bazeh lo bakhar yhvh. 1_samuel 16:9	vaya'aber yishai shamah vayomer gam bazeh lo bakhar yhvh. 1_samuel 16:10	vaya'aber yishai shib'at banav lifnei shemu'el vayomer shemu'el 'el yishai lo bakhar yhvh ba'eleh. 1_samuel 16:11	vayomer shemu'el 'el yishai hatamu hane'arim vayomer 'od sha'ar haqatan vehineh ro'eh bazon vayomer shemu'el 'el yishai shilkhah veqakhenu ki lo nasob 'ad bo'o foh. 1_samuel 16:12	vayishlakh vaybi'eihu vehu 'admoni 'im yefeh 'einayim vetob ro'i vayomer yhvh qum meshakheihu ki zeh hu. 1_samuel 16:13	vayiqakh shemu'el 'et qeren hashemen vayimshakh 'oto beqereb 'ekhav vatizlakh ruakh yhvh 'el david meihayom hahu vama'elah vayaqam shemu'el vayeilekh haramatah. 1_samuel 16:14	veruakh yhvh sarah mei'im sha'ul ubi'atatu ruakh ra'ah mei'et yhvh. 1_samuel 16:15	vayomeru 'abdei sha'ul 'eilav hineh na ruakh 'elohim ra'ah meba'itekha. 1_samuel 16:16	yomar na 'adoneinu 'abadekha lefanekha yebaqshu 'ish yodeia' menagen bakinor vehayah bihyot 'alekha ruakh 'elohim ra'ah venigen beyado vetob lakh. 1_samuel 16:17	vayomer sha'ul 'el 'abadav re'u na li 'ish meitib lenagen vahabi'otem 'eilai. 1_samuel 16:18	vaya'an 'ekhad meihane'arim vayomer hineh ra'iti ben leyishai bet halakhmi yodeia' nagen vegibor khayil ve'ish milkhamah unebon dabar ve'ish to'ar yhvh 'imo. 1_samuel 16:19	vayishlakh sha'ul mal'akhim 'el yishai vayomer shilkhah 'eilai 'et david binkha 'asher bazon. 1_samuel 16:20	vayiqakh yishai khamor lekhem venod yayin ugedi 'izim 'ekhad vayishlakh beyad david beno 'el sha'ul. 1_samuel 16:21	vayabo david 'el sha'ul vaya'amod lefanav vaye'ehabeihu me'od vayhi lo nosei kheilim. 1_samuel 16:22	vayishlakh sha'ul 'el yishai leimor ya'amad na david lefanai ki maza khen be'einai. 1_samuel 16:23	vehayah bihyot ruakh 'elohim 'el sha'ul velaqakh david 'et hakinor venigen beyado veravakh lesha'ul vetob lo vesarah mei'alav ruakh hara'ah. 1_samuel 17:1	vaya'asfu felishtim 'et makhaneihem lamilkhamah vayei'asefu sokhoh 'asher lihudah vayakhanu ben sokhoh uben 'azeiqah be'efes damim. 1_samuel 17:2	vesha'ul ve'ish yisra'el ne'esfu vayakhanu be'eimeq ha'eilah vaya'arkhu milkhamah liqrat pelishtim. 1_samuel 17:3	ufelishtim 'omedim 'el hahar mizeh veyisra'el 'omedim 'el hahar mizeh vehagai beineihem. 1_samuel 17:4	vayeizei 'ish habeinayim mimakhanot pelishtim galeyat shemo migat gabeho shesh 'amot vazaret. 1_samuel 17:5	vekhoba' nekhoshet 'al rosho veshiryon qasqasim hu labush umishqal hashiryon khameishet 'alafim sheqalim nekhoshet. 1_samuel 17:6	umizkhat nekhoshet 'al raglav vekhidon nekhoshet ben keteifav. 1_samuel 17:7	vekhaz ve'ez khanito kimnor 'oregim velahebet khanito shesh mei'ot sheqalim barzel venosei hazinah holekh lefanav. 1_samuel 17:8	vaya'amod vayiqra 'el ma'arkhot yisra'el vayomer lahem lamah teize'u la'arokh milkhamah halo 'anokhi hapelishti ve'atem 'abadim lesha'ul beru lakhem 'ish veyeired 'eilai. 1_samuel 17:9	'im yukhal lehilakhem 'iti vehikani vehayinu lakhem la'abadim ve'im 'ani 'ukhal lo vehikitiv vihyitem lanu la'abadim va'abadtem 'otanu. 1_samuel 17:10	vayomer hapelishti 'ani kheirafti 'et ma'arkhot yisra'el hayom hazeh tenu li 'ish venilakhamah yakhad. 1_samuel 17:11	vayishma' sha'ul vekhal yisra'el 'et dibrei hapelishti ha'eleh vayeikhatu vayir'u me'od. 1_samuel 17:12	vedavid ben 'ish 'efrati hazeh mibet lekhem yehudah ushemo yishai velo shemonah banim veha'ish bimei sha'ul zaqen ba ba'anashim. 1_samuel 17:13	vayeilekhu sheloshet benei yishai hagedolim halekhu 'akharei sha'ul lamilkhamah veshem sheloshet banav 'asher halekhu bamilkhamah 'eli'ab habekhor umishneihu 'abinadab vehashelishi shamah. 1_samuel 17:14	vedavid hu haqatan usheloshah hagedolim halekhu 'akharei sha'ul. 1_samuel 17:15	vedavid holekh vashab mei'al sha'ul lir'ot 'et zon 'abiv bet lakhem. 1_samuel 17:16	vayigash hapelishti hashkem veha'areb vayityazeb 'arba'im yom. 1_samuel 17:17	vayomer yishai ledavid beno qakh na le'akhekha 'eifat haqali hazeh va'asarah lekhem hazeh veharez hamakhaneh le'akhekha. 1_samuel 17:18	ve'et 'aseret kharizei hekhalab ha'eleh tabi lesar ha'alef ve'et 'akhekha tifqod leshalom ve'et 'arubatam tiqakh. 1_samuel 17:19	vesha'ul vehemah vekhal 'ish yisra'el be'eimeq ha'eilah nilkhamim 'im pelishtim. 1_samuel 17:20	vayashkem david baboqer vayitosh 'et hazon 'al shomer vayisa vayeilekh ka'asher zivahu yishai vayabo hama'galah vehakhayil hayozei 'el hama'arakhah veheirei'u bamilkhamah. 1_samuel 17:21	vata'arokh yisra'el ufelishtim ma'arakhah liqrat ma'arakhah. 1_samuel 17:22	vayitosh david 'et hakeilim mei'alav 'al yad shomer hakeilim vayaraz hama'arakhah vayabo vayish'al le'ekhav leshalom. 1_samuel 17:23	vehu medaber 'imam vehineh 'ish habeinayim 'oleh galeyat hapelishti shemo migat mima'arot mima'arkhot pelishtim vaydaber kadebarim ha'eleh vayishma' david. 1_samuel 17:24	vekhol 'ish yisra'el bir'otam 'et ha'ish vayanusu mipanav vayire'u me'od. 1_samuel 17:25	vayomer 'ish yisra'el harre'item ha'ish ha'oleh hazeh ki lekharef 'et yisra'el 'oleh vehayah ha'ish 'asher yakenu ya'sherenu hamelekh 'osher gadol ve'et bito yiten lo ve'et bet 'abiv ya'aseh khafeshi beyisra'el. 1_samuel 17:26	vayomer david 'el ha'anashim ha'omedim 'imo leimor mah yei'aseh la'ish 'asher yakeh 'et hapelishti halaz veheisir kherpah mei'al yisra'el ki mi hapelishti he'arel hazeh ki kheiref ma'arkhot 'elohim khayim. 1_samuel 17:27	vayomer lo ha'am kadabar hazeh leimor koh yei'aseh la'ish 'asher yakenu. 1_samuel 17:28	vayishma' 'eli'ab 'akhiv hagadol bedabero 'el ha'anashim vayikhar 'af 'eli'ab bedavid vayomer lamah zeh yaradta ve'al mi natashta me'at hazon hahenah bamidbar 'ani yada'ti 'et zedonekha ve'et roa' lebabekha ki lema'an re'ot hamilkhamah yaradeta. 1_samuel 17:29	vayomer david meh 'asiti 'atah halo dabar hu. 1_samuel 17:30	vayisob mei'ezlo 'el mul 'akher vayomer kadabar hazeh vayshibuhu ha'am dabar kadabar harishon. 1_samuel 17:31	vayeshame'u hadebarim 'asher diber david vayagidu lifnei sha'ul vayiqakheihu. 1_samuel 17:32	vayomer david 'el sha'ul 'al yipol leb 'adam 'alav 'abdekha yeilekh venilkham 'im hapelishti hazeh. 1_samuel 17:33	vayomer sha'ul 'el david lo tukhal lalekhet 'el hapelishti hazeh lehilakhem 'imo ki na'ar 'atah vehu 'ish milkhamah mine'urav. 1_samuel 17:34	vayomer david 'el sha'ul ro'eh hayah 'abdekha le'abiv bazon uba ha'ari ve'et hadob venasa seh meiha'eider. 1_samuel 17:35	veyazati 'akharav vehikitiv vehizalti mipiv vayaqam 'alai vehekhezaqti bizqano vehikitiv vahamitiv. 1_samuel 17:36	gam 'et ha'ari gam hadob hikah 'abdekha vehayah hapelishti he'arel hazeh ke'akhad meihem ki kheiref ma'arkhot 'elohim khayim. 1_samuel 17:37	vayomer david yhvh 'asher hizilani miyad ha'ari umiyad hadob hu yazileini miyad hapelishti hazeh vayomer sha'ul 'el david lekh yhvh yihyeh 'imakh. 1_samuel 17:38	vayalbesh sha'ul 'et david madav venatan qoba' nekhoshet 'al rosho vayalbesh 'oto shiryon. 1_samuel 17:39	vayakhgor david 'et kharbo mei'al lemadav vayo'el lalekhet ki lo nisah vayomer david 'el sha'ul lo 'ukhal lalekhet ba'eleh ki lo nisiti vaysirem david mei'alav. 1_samuel 17:40	vayiqakh maqlo beyado vayibkhar lo khamishah khaluqei 'abanim min hanakhal vayasem 'otam bikhli haro'im 'asher lo ubayalqut veqale'o beyado vayigash 'el hapelishti. 1_samuel 17:41	vayeilekh hapelishti holekh veqareb 'el david veha'ish nosei hazinah lefanav. 1_samuel 17:42	vayabet hapelishti vayir'eh 'et david vayibzeihu ki hayah na'ar ve'admoni 'im yefeh mar'eh. 1_samuel 17:43	vayomer hapelishti 'el david hakheleb 'anokhi ki 'atah ba 'eilai bamaqlot vayqalel hapelishti 'et david beilohav. 1_samuel 17:44	vayomer hapelishti 'el david lekhah 'eilai ve'etenah 'et besarekha le'of hashamayim ulebehemat hasadeh. 1_samuel 17:45	vayomer david 'el hapelishti 'atah ba 'eilai bekhereb ubakhanit ubekhidon ve'anokhi ba 'eilekha beshem yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei ma'arkhot yisra'el 'asher kheirafta. 1_samuel 17:46	hayom hazeh yesagerkha yhvh beyadi vehikitikha vahasiroti 'et roshekha mei'alekha venatati peger makhaneh felishtim hayom hazeh le'of hashamayim ulekhayat ha'arez veyeide'u kal ha'arez ki yesh 'elohim leyisra'el. 1_samuel 17:47	veyeide'u kal haqahal hazeh ki lo bekhereb ubakhanit yehoshia' yhvh ki yhvh hamilkhamah venatan 'etkhem beyadeinu. 1_samuel 17:48	vehayah ki qam hapelishti vayeilekh vayiqrab liqrat david vaymaher david vayaraz hama'arakhah liqrat hapelishti. 1_samuel 17:49	vayishlakh david 'et yado 'el hakeli vayiqakh misham 'eben vayqala' vayakh 'et hapelishti 'el mizkho vatitba' ha'eben bemizkho vayipol 'al panav 'arezah. 1_samuel 17:50	vayekhezaq david min hapelishti baqela' uba'eben vayakh 'et hapelishti vaymiteihu vekhereb 'en beyad david. 1_samuel 17:51	vayaraz david vaya'amod 'el hapelishti vayiqakh 'et kharbo vayishlefah mita'rah vaymoteteihu vayikhrat bah 'et rosho vayir'u hapelishtim ki met giboram vayanusu. 1_samuel 17:52	vayaqumu 'anshei yisra'el vihudah vayari'u vayirdefu 'et hapelishtim 'ad bo'akha gai ve'ad sha'arei 'eqron vayipelu khalei felishtim bederekh sha'arayim ve'ad gat ve'ad 'eqron. 1_samuel 17:53	vayashubu benei yisra'el mideloq 'akharei felishtim vayashosu 'et makhaneihem. 1_samuel 17:54	vayiqakh david 'et rosh hapelishti vaybi'eihu yerushalim ve'et keilav sam be'aholo. 1_samuel 17:55	vekhir'ot sha'ul 'et david yozei liqrat hapelishti 'amar 'el 'abner sar hazaba ben mi zeh hana'ar 'abner vayomer 'abner khei nafshekha hamelekh 'im yada'eti. 1_samuel 17:56	vayomer hamelekh she'al 'atah ben mi zeh ha'alem. 1_samuel 17:57	ukheshub david meihakot 'et hapelishti vayiqakh 'oto 'abner vaybi'eihu lifnei sha'ul verosh hapelishti beyado. 1_samuel 17:58	vayomer 'eilav sha'ul ben mi 'atah hana'ar vayomer david ben 'abdekha yishai bet halakhmi. 1_samuel 18:1	vayhi kekhaloto ledaber 'el sha'ul venefesh yehonatan niqsherah benefesh david vaye'ehabo vaye'ehabeihu yehonatan kenafsho. 1_samuel 18:2	vayiqakheihu sha'ul bayom hahu velo netano lashub bet 'abiv. 1_samuel 18:3	vayikhrot yehonatan vedavid berit be'ahabato 'oto kenafsho. 1_samuel 18:4	vayitpashet yehonatan 'et hame'il 'asher 'alav vayiteneihu ledavid umadav ve'ad kharbo ve'ad qashto ve'ad khagoro. 1_samuel 18:5	vayeizei david bekhol 'asher yishlakhenu sha'ul yaskil vaysimeihu sha'ul 'al 'anshei hamilkhamah vayitab be'einei khal ha'am vegam be'einei 'abdei sha'ul. 1_samuel 18:6	vayhi bebo'am beshub david meihakot 'et hapelishti vateizenah hanashim mikal 'arei yisra'el lashor lashir vehamekholot liqrat sha'ul hamelekh betupim besimkhah ubeshalishim. 1_samuel 18:7	vata'anenah hanashim hamsakhaqot vatomarna hikah sha'ul ba'elfo ba'alafav vedavid beribbotav. 1_samuel 18:8	vayikhar lesha'ul me'od vayeira' be'einav hadabar hazeh vayomer natenu ledavid rebabot veli natenu ha'alafim ve'od lo 'akh hamelukhah. 1_samuel 18:9	vayhi sha'ul 'avon 'oyen 'et david meihayom hahu vahale'ah. 1_samuel 18:10	vayhi mimakhorat vatizlakh ruakh 'elohim ra'ah 'el sha'ul vayitnabei betokh habayit vedavid menagen beyado keyom beyom vehakhanit beyad sha'ul. 1_samuel 18:11	vayatel sha'ul 'et hakhanit vayomer 'akeh bedavid ubaqir vayisob david mipanav pa'amayim. 1_samuel 18:12	vayira sha'ul milifnei david ki hayah yhvh 'imo umei'im sha'ul sar. 1_samuel 18:13	vaysireihu sha'ul mei'imo vaysimeihu lo sar 'alef vayeizei vayabo lifnei ha'am. 1_samuel 18:14	vayhi david lekhal darekhav maskil yhvh 'imo. 1_samuel 18:15	vayar sha'ul 'asher hu maskil me'od vayagar mipanav. 1_samuel 18:16	vekhal yisra'el vihudah 'oheb 'et david ki hu yozei vaba lifneihem. 1_samuel 18:17	vayomer sha'ul 'el david hineh biti hagedolah meirab 'otah 'eten lekha le'ishah 'akh heyeh li leben khayil vehilakhem milkhamot yhvh vesha'ul 'amar 'al tehi yadi bo utehi bo yad pelishtim. 1_samuel 18:18	vayomer david 'el sha'ul mi 'anokhi umi khayai mishpakhat 'abi beyisra'el ki 'ehyeh khatan lamelekh. 1_samuel 18:19	vayhi be'et tet 'et meirab bat sha'ul ledavid vehi nitenah le'adri'el hamekholati le'ishah. 1_samuel 18:20	vate'ehab mikhal bat sha'ul 'et david vayagidu lesha'ul vayishar hadabar be'einav. 1_samuel 18:21	vayomer sha'ul 'etenenah lo utehi lo lemoqesh utehi bo yad pelishtim vayomer sha'ul 'el david bishtayim titkhaten bi hayom. 1_samuel 18:22	vayzav sha'ul 'et 'abadav daberu 'el david balat leimor hineh khafez bekha hamelekh vekhal 'abadav 'aheibukha ve'atah hitkhaten bamelekh. 1_samuel 18:23	vaydaberu 'abdei sha'ul be'azenei david 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayomer david hanqalah be'eineikhem hitkhaten bamelekh ve'anokhi 'ish rash veniqleh. 1_samuel 18:24	vayagidu 'abdei sha'ul lo leimor kadebarim ha'eleh diber david. 1_samuel 18:25	vayomer sha'ul koh tomeru ledavid 'en kheifez lamelekh bemohar ki bemei'ah 'arelot pelishtim lehinaqem be'oyebei hamelekh vesha'ul khashab lehapil 'et david beyad pelishtim. 1_samuel 18:26	vayagidu 'abadav ledavid 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayishar hadabar be'einei david lehitkhaten bamelekh velo male'u hayamim. 1_samuel 18:27	vayaqam david vayeilekh hu va'anashav vayakh bapelishtim matayim 'ish vayabei david 'et 'areloteihem vaymal'um lamelekh lehitkhaten bamelekh vayiten lo sha'ul 'et mikhal bito le'ishah. 1_samuel 18:28	vayar sha'ul vayeida' ki yhvh 'im david umikhal bat sha'ul 'aheibathu. 1_samuel 18:29	vayosef sha'ul leiro mipenei david 'od vayhi sha'ul 'oyeb 'et david kal hayamim. 1_samuel 18:30	vayeize'u sarei felishtim vayhi midei zeitam sakhal david mikol 'abdei sha'ul vayiqar shemo me'od. 1_samuel 19:1	vaydaber sha'ul 'el yonatan beno ve'el kal 'abadav lehamit 'et david vihonatan ben sha'ul khafez bedavid me'od. 1_samuel 19:2	vayaged yehonatan ledavid leimor mebaqesh sha'ul 'abi lahamitekha ve'atah hishamer na baboqer veyashabta baseiter venakhbeita. 1_samuel 19:3	va'ani 'eizei ve'amadti leyad 'abi basadeh 'asher 'atah sham va'ani 'adaber bekha 'el 'abi vera'iti mah vehigadti lakh. 1_samuel 19:4	vaydaber yehonatan bedavid tob 'el sha'ul 'abiv vayomer 'eilav 'al yekheta hamelekh be'abdo bedavid ki lo khata lakh vekhi ma'asav tob lekha me'od. 1_samuel 19:5	vayasem 'et nafsho bekhapo vayakh 'et hapelishti vaya'as yhvh teshu'ah gedolah lekhal yisra'el ra'ita vatismakh velamah tekheta bedam naqi lehamit 'et david khinam. 1_samuel 19:6	vayishma' sha'ul beqol yehonatan vayishaba' sha'ul khai yhvh 'im yumat. 1_samuel 19:7	vayiqra yehonatan ledavid vayaged lo yehonatan 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh vayabei yehonatan 'et david 'el sha'ul vayhi lefanav ke'etmol shilshom. 1_samuel 19:8	vatosef hamilkhamah lihyot vayeizei david vayilakhem bapelishtim vayakh bahem makah gedolah vayanusu mipanav. 1_samuel 19:9	vatehi ruakh yhvh ra'ah 'el sha'ul vehu bebeito yosheb vakhanito beyado vedavid menagen beyad. 1_samuel 19:10	vaybaqesh sha'ul lehakot bakhanit bedavid ubaqir vayiftar mipenei sha'ul vayakh 'et hakhanit baqir vedavid nas vayimalet balaylah hu. 1_samuel 19:11	vayishlakh sha'ul mal'akhim 'el bet david leshamero velahamito baboqer vataged ledavid mikhal 'ishto leimor 'im 'einekha memalet 'et nafshekha halaylah makhar 'atah mumat. 1_samuel 19:12	vatored mikhal 'et david be'ad hakhalon vayeilekh vayibrakh vayimalet. 1_samuel 19:13	vatiqakh mikhal 'et haterafim vatasem 'el hamitah ve'et kebir ha'izim samah mera'ashotav vatekhas babaged. 1_samuel 19:14	vayishlakh sha'ul mal'akhim laqakhat 'et david vatomer kholeh hu. 1_samuel 19:15	vayishlakh sha'ul 'et hamal'akhim lir'ot 'et david leimor ha'alu 'oto bamitah 'eilai lahamito. 1_samuel 19:16	vayabo'u hamal'akhim vehineh haterafim 'el hamitah ukhebir ha'izim mera'ashotav. 1_samuel 19:17	vayomer sha'ul 'el mikhal lamah kakhah rimitini vateshalekhi 'et 'oyebi vayimalet vatomer mikhal 'el sha'ul hu 'amar 'eilai shalekhini lamah 'amitekh. 1_samuel 19:18	vedavid barakh vayimalet vayabo 'el shemu'el haramatah vayaged lo 'et kal 'asher 'asah lo sha'ul vayeilekh hu ushemu'el vayeishebu benoit benayot. 1_samuel 19:19	vayugad lesha'ul leimor hineh david benoit benayot baramah. 1_samuel 19:20	vayishlakh sha'ul mal'akhim laqakhat 'et david vayar 'et lahaqat hanebi'im nibe'im ushemu'el 'omed nizab 'aleihem vatehi 'al mal'akhei sha'ul ruakh 'elohim vayitnabe'u gam hemah. 1_samuel 19:21	vayagidu lesha'ul vayishlakh mal'akhim 'akheirim vayitnabe'u gam hemah vayosef sha'ul vayishlakh mal'akhim shelishim vayitnabe'u gam hemah. 1_samuel 19:22	vayeilekh gam hu haramatah vayabo 'ad bor hagadol 'asher basekhu vayish'al vayomer 'eifoh shemu'el vedavid vayomer hineh benoit benayot baramah. 1_samuel 19:23	vayeilekh sham 'el noit nayot baramah vatehi 'alav gam hu ruakh 'elohim vayeilekh halokh vayitnabei 'ad bo'o benoit benayot baramah. 1_samuel 19:24	vayifshat gam hu begadav vayitnabei gam hu lifnei shemu'el vayipol 'arom kal hayom hahu vekhal halayelah 'al ken yomeru hagam sha'ul banebi'im. 1_samuel 20:1	vayibrakh david minoivt minayot baramah vayabo vayomer lifnei yehonatan meh 'asiti meh 'avoni umeh khatati lifnei 'abikha ki mebaqesh 'et nafshi. 1_samuel 20:2	vayomer lo khalilah lo tamut hineh lo 'asah lo ya'aseh 'abi dabar gadol 'o dabar qaton velo yigleh 'et 'azeni umadua' yastir 'abi mimeni 'et hadabar hazeh 'en zot. 1_samuel 20:3	vayishaba' 'od david vayomer yadoa' yada' 'abikha ki mazati khen be'einekha vayomer 'al yeida' zot yehonatan pen yei'azeb ve'ulam khai yhvh vekhei nafshekha ki khefesa' beini uben hamavet. 1_samuel 20:4	vayomer yehonatan 'el david mah tomar nafshekha ve'e'eseh lakh. 1_samuel 20:5	vayomer david 'el yehonatan hineh khodesh makhar ve'anokhi yashob 'eisheb 'im hamelekh le'ekhol veshilakhtani venistarti basadeh 'ad ha'ereb hashelishit. 1_samuel 20:6	'im paqod yifqedeini 'abikha ve'amarta nish'ol nish'al mimeni david laruz bet lekhem 'iro ki zebakh hayamim sham lekhal hamishpakhah. 1_samuel 20:7	'im koh yomar tob shalom le'abdekha ve'im kharoh yekhereh lo da' ki khaletah hara'ah mei'imo. 1_samuel 20:8	ve'asita khesed 'al 'abdekha ki bibrit yhvh heibeita 'et 'abdekha 'imakh ve'im yesh bi 'avon hamiteini 'atah ve'ad 'abikha lamah zeh tebi'eini. 1_samuel 20:9	vayomer yehonatan khalilah lakh ki 'im yadoa' 'eida' ki khaletah hara'ah mei'im 'abi labo 'alekha velo 'otah 'agid lakh. 1_samuel 20:10	vayomer david 'el yehonatan mi yagid li 'o mah ya'ankha 'abikha qashah. 1_samuel 20:11	vayomer yehonatan 'el david lekhah veneizei hasadeh vayeize'u sheneihem hasadeh. 1_samuel 20:12	vayomer yehonatan 'el david yhvh 'elohei yisra'el ki 'ekhqor 'et 'abi ka'et makhar hashelishit vehineh tob 'el david velo 'az 'eshlakh 'eilekha vegaliti 'et 'azenekha. 1_samuel 20:13	koh ya'aseh yhvh lihonatan vekhoh yosif ki yeitib 'el 'abi 'et hara'ah 'alekha vegaliti 'et 'azenekha veshilakhtikha vehalakhta leshalom vihi yhvh 'imakh ka'asher hayah 'im 'abi. 1_samuel 20:14	velo 'im 'odeni khai velo ta'aseh 'imadi khesed yhvh velo 'amut. 1_samuel 20:15	velo takhrit 'et khasdekha mei'im beiti 'ad 'olam velo behakhrit yhvh 'et 'oyebei david 'ish mei'al penei ha'adamah. 1_samuel 20:16	vayikhrot yehonatan 'im bet david ubiqesh yhvh miyad 'oyebei david. 1_samuel 20:17	vayosef yehonatan lehashbia' 'et david be'ahabato 'oto ki 'ahabat nafsho 'aheibo. 1_samuel 20:18	vayomer lo yehonatan makhar khodesh venifqadta ki yipaqed moshabekha. 1_samuel 20:19	veshilashta teired me'od ubata 'el hamaqom 'asher nistarta sham beyom hama'aseh veyashabta 'eizel ha'eben ha'azel. 1_samuel 20:20	va'ani sheloshet hakhizim zidah 'oreh leshalakh li lematarah. 1_samuel 20:21	vehineh 'eshlakh 'et hana'ar lekh meza 'et hakhizim 'im 'amor 'omar lana'ar hineh hakhizim mimekha vahenah qakhenu vabo'ah ki shalom lekha ve'en dabar khai yhvh. 1_samuel 20:22	ve'im koh 'omar la'elem hineh hakhizim mimekha vahale'ah lekh ki shilakhakha yhvh. 1_samuel 20:23	vehadabar 'asher dibarnu 'ani va'atah hineh yhvh beini ubeinekha 'ad 'olam. 1_samuel 20:24	vayisater david basadeh vayhi hakhodesh vayeisheb hamelekh 'al 'el halekhem le'ekhol. 1_samuel 20:25	vayeisheb hamelekh 'al moshabo kefa'am befa'am 'el moshab haqir vayaqam yehonatan vayeisheb 'abner mizad sha'ul vayipaqed meqom david. 1_samuel 20:26	velo diber sha'ul me'umah bayom hahu ki 'amar miqreh hu bilti tahor hu ki lo tahor. 1_samuel 20:27	vayhi mimakhorat hakhodesh hasheini vayipaqed meqom david vayomer sha'ul 'el yehonatan beno madua' lo ba ben yishai gam temol gam hayom 'el halakhem. 1_samuel 20:28	vaya'an yehonatan 'et sha'ul nish'ol nish'al david mei'imadi 'ad bet lakhem. 1_samuel 20:29	vayomer shalekheini na ki zebakh mishpakhah lanu ba'ir vehu zivah li 'akhi ve'atah 'im mazati khen be'einekha 'imaletah na ve'er'eh 'et 'ekhai 'al ken lo ba 'el shulkhan hamelekh. 1_samuel 20:30	vayikhar 'af sha'ul bihonatan vayomer lo ben na'avat hamardut halo yada'ti ki bokher 'atah leben yishai lebashetekha uleboshet 'ervat 'imekha. 1_samuel 20:31	ki khal hayamim 'asher ben yishai khai 'al ha'adamah lo tikon 'atah umalkhutekha ve'atah shelakh veqakh 'oto 'eilai ki ben mavet hu. 1_samuel 20:32	vaya'an yehonatan 'et sha'ul 'abiv vayomer 'eilav lamah yumat meh 'asah. 1_samuel 20:33	vayatel sha'ul 'et hakhanit 'alav lehakoto vayeida' yehonatan ki khalah hi mei'im 'abiv lehamit 'et david. 1_samuel 20:34	vayaqam yehonatan mei'im hashulkhan bakhori 'af velo 'akhal beyom hakhodesh hasheini lekhem ki ne'zab 'el david ki hikhlimo 'abiv. 1_samuel 20:35	vayhi baboqer vayeizei yehonatan hasadeh lemo'ed david vena'ar qaton 'imo. 1_samuel 20:36	vayomer lena'aro ruz meza na 'et hakhizim 'asher 'anokhi moreh hana'ar raz vehu yarah hakheizi leha'abiro. 1_samuel 20:37	vayabo hana'ar 'ad meqom hakheizi 'asher yarah yehonatan vayiqra yehonatan 'akharei hana'ar vayomer halo hakheizi mimekha vahale'ah. 1_samuel 20:38	vayiqra yehonatan 'akharei hana'ar meheirah khushah 'al ta'amod vaylaqet na'ar yehonatan 'et hakheizi hakhizim vayabo 'el 'adonav. 1_samuel 20:39	vehana'ar lo yada' me'umah 'akh yehonatan vedavid yade'u 'et hadabar. 1_samuel 20:40	vayiten yehonatan 'et keilav 'el hana'ar 'asher lo vayomer lo lekh habei ha'ir. 1_samuel 20:41	hana'ar ba vedavid qam mei'eizel hanegeb vayipol le'apav 'arzah vayishtakhu shalosh pe'amim vayishequ 'ish 'et rei'eihu vayibku 'ish 'et rei'eihu 'ad david higdil. 1_samuel 20:42	vayomer yehonatan ledavid lekh leshalom 'asher nishba'nu sheneinu 'anakhnu beshem yhvh leimor yhvh yihyeh beini ubeinekha uben zar'i uben zar'akha 'ad 'olam. 1_samuel 21:1	vayaqam vayeilakh vihonatan ba ha'ir. 1_samuel 21:2	vayabo david nobeh 'el 'akhimelekh hakohen vayekherad 'akhimelekh liqrat david vayomer lo madua' 'atah lebadekha ve'ish 'en 'itakh. 1_samuel 21:3	vayomer david la'akhimelekh hakohen hamelekh zivani dabar vayomer 'eilai 'ish 'al yeida' me'umah 'et hadabar 'asher 'anokhi sholeikhakha va'asher zivitikha ve'et hane'arim yoda'ti 'el meqom peloni 'almoni. 1_samuel 21:4	ve'atah mah yesh takhat yadekha khamishah lekhem tenah beyadi 'o hanimza. 1_samuel 21:5	vaya'an hakohen 'et david vayomer 'en lekhem khol 'el takhat yadi ki 'im lekhem qodesh yesh 'im nishmeru hane'arim 'akh mei'ishah. f 1_samuel 21:6	vaya'an david 'et hakohen vayomer lo ki 'im 'ishah 'azurah lanu kitmol shilshom bezeiti vayihyu khelei hane'arim qodesh vehu derekh khol ve'af ki hayom yiqdash bakeli. 1_samuel 21:7	vayiten lo hakohen qodesh ki lo hayah sham lekhem ki 'im lekhem hapanim hamusarim milifnei yhvh lasum lekhem khom beyom hilaqekho. 1_samuel 21:8	vesham 'ish mei'abdei sha'ul bayom hahu ne'zar lifnei yhvh ushemo do'eg ha'adomi 'abir haro'im 'asher lesha'ul. 1_samuel 21:9	vayomer david la'akhimelekh ve'in yesh poh takhat yadekha khanit 'o khareb ki gam kharbi vegam keilai lo laqakhti beyadi ki hayah debar hamelekh nakhuz. s 1_samuel 21:10	vayomer hakohen khereb galeyat hapelishti 'asher hikita be'eimeq ha'eilah hineh hi lutah basimlah 'akharei ha'eifod 'im 'otah tiqakh lekha qakh ki 'en 'akheret zulatah bazeh vayomer david 'en kamoha tenenah li. 1_samuel 21:11	vayaqam david vayibrakh bayom hahu mipenei sha'ul vayabo 'el 'akhish melekh gat. 1_samuel 21:12	vayomeru 'abdei 'akhish 'eilav halo zeh david melekh ha'arez halo lazeh ya'anu bamekholot leimor hikah sha'ul ba'alafo ba'alafav vedavid beribboto beribbotav. 1_samuel 21:13	vayasem david 'et hadebarim ha'eleh bilbabo vayira me'od mipenei 'akhish melekh gat. 1_samuel 21:14	vayshano 'et ta'mo be'eineihem vayitholel beyadam vaytav vaytav 'al daltot hasha'ar vayored riro 'el zeqano. 1_samuel 21:15	vayomer 'akhish 'el 'abadav hineh tir'u 'ish mishtageia' lamah tabi'u 'oto 'eilai.1_samuel 21:16	khasar meshuga'im 'ani ki habeitem 'et zeh lehishtageia' 'alai hazeh yabo 'el beiti. 1_samuel 22:1	vayeilekh david misham vayimalet 'el me'arat 'adulam vayishme'u 'ekhav vekhal bet 'abiv vayeiredu 'eilav shamah. 1_samuel 22:2	vayitqabezu 'eilav kal 'ish mazoq vekhal 'ish 'asher lo noshe vekhal 'ish mar nefesh vayhi 'aleihem lesar vayihyu 'imo ke'arba' mei'ot 'ish. 1_samuel 22:3	vayeilekh david misham mizpeh mo'ab vayomer 'el melekh mo'ab yeizei na 'abi ve'imi 'itekhem 'ad 'asher 'eida' mah ya'aseh li 'elohim. 1_samuel 22:4	vayankhem 'et penei melekh mo'ab vayeishebu 'imo kal yemei heyot david bamezudah. 1_samuel 22:5	vayomer gad hanabi 'el david lo teisheb bamezudah lekh ubata lekha 'erez yehudah vayeilekh david vayabo ya'ar kharet. 1_samuel 22:6	vayishma' sha'ul ki noda' david va'anashim 'asher 'ito vesha'ul yosheb bagib'ah takhat ha'eshel baramah vakhanito beyado vekhal 'abadav nizabim 'alav. 1_samuel 22:7	vayomer sha'ul la'abadav hanizabim 'alav shim'u na benei yemini gam lekhulekhem yiten ben yishai sadot ukheramim lekhulekhem yasim sarei 'alafim vesarei mei'ot. 1_samuel 22:8	ki qeshartem kulekhem 'alai ve'en goleh 'et 'azeni bikhrat beni 'im ben yishai ve'en kholeh mikem 'alai vegoleh 'et 'azeni ki heiqim beni 'et 'abdi 'alai le'oreb kayom hazeh. 1_samuel 22:9	vaya'an do'eg ha'adomi
