vehu nizab 'al 'abdei sha'ul vayomar ra'iti 'et ben yishai ba nobeh 'el 'akhimelekh ben 'akhitub. 1_samuel 22:10	vayish'al lo yhvh vezeidah natan lo ve'et khereb galeyat hapelishti natan lo. 1_samuel 22:11	vayishlakh hamelekh liqro 'et 'akhimelekh ben 'akhitub hakohen ve'et kal bet 'abiv hakohanim 'asher benob vayabo'u khulam 'el hamelekh. 1_samuel 22:12	vayomer sha'ul shema' na ben 'akhitub vayomer hini 'adoni. 1_samuel 22:13	vayomer 'eilo 'eilav sha'ul lamah qeshartem 'alai 'atah uben yishai betitekha lo lekhem vekhereb vesha'ol lo beilohim laqum 'eilai le'oreb kayom hazeh. 1_samuel 22:14	vaya'an 'akhimelekh 'et hamelekh vayomar umi bekhal 'abadekha kedavid ne'eman vakhatan hamelekh vesar 'el mishma'tekha venikhbad bebeitekha. 1_samuel 22:15	hayom hakhiloti lesha'ol lish'al lo beilohim khalilah li 'al yasem hamelekh be'abdo dabar bekhal bet 'abi ki lo yada' 'abdekha bekhal zot dabar qaton 'o gadol. 1_samuel 22:16	vayomer hamelekh mot tamut 'akhimelekh 'atah vekhal bet 'abikha. 1_samuel 22:17	vayomer hamelekh larazim hanizabim 'alav sobu vehamitu kohanei yhvh ki gam yadam 'im david vekhi yade'u ki boreiakh hu velo galu 'et 'azeno 'azeni velo 'abu 'abdei hamelekh lishloakh 'et yadam lifgoa' bekhohanei yhvh. 1_samuel 22:18	vayomer hamelekh ledoyeg ledo'eg sob 'atah ufega' bakohanim vayisob doyeg do'eg ha'adomi vayifga' hu bakohanim vayamet bayom hahu shemonim vakhamishah 'ish nosei 'eifod bad. 1_samuel 22:19	ve'et nob 'ir hakohanim hikah lefi khereb mei'ish ve'ad 'ishah mei'olel ve'ad yoneq veshor vakhamor vaseh lefi khareb. 1_samuel 22:20	vayimalet ben 'ekhad la'akhimelekh ben 'akhitub ushemo 'ebyatar vayibrakh 'akharei david. 1_samuel 22:21	vayaged 'ebyatar ledavid ki harag sha'ul 'et kohanei yhvh. 1_samuel 22:22	vayomer david le'ebyatar yada'ti bayom hahu ki sham doyeg do'eg ha'adomi ki haged yagid lesha'ul 'anokhi saboti bekhal nefesh bet 'abikha. 1_samuel 22:23	shebah 'iti 'al tira ki 'asher yebaqesh 'et nafshi yebaqesh 'et nafshekha ki mishmeret 'atah 'imadi. 1_samuel 23:1	vayagidu ledavid leimor hineh felishtim nilkhamim biq'ilah vehemah shosim 'et hagoranot. 1_samuel 23:2	vayish'al david yhvh leimor ha'eilekh vehikeiti bapelishtim ha'eleh vayomer yhvh 'el david lekh vehikita bapelishtim vehosha'ta 'et qe'ilah. 1_samuel 23:3	vayomeru 'anshei david 'eilav hineh 'anakhnu foh bihudah yerei'im ve'af ki neilekh qe'ilah 'el ma'arkhot pelishtim. 1_samuel 23:4	vayosef 'od david lish'ol yhvh vaya'aneihu yhvh vayomer qum red qe'ilah ki 'ani noten 'et pelishtim beyadekha. 1_samuel 23:5	vayeilekh david va'insho va'anashav qe'ilah vayilakhem bapelishtim vayinhag 'et miqneihem vayakh bahem makah gedolah vayosha' david 'et yoshebei qe'ilah. 1_samuel 23:6	vayhi bibroakh 'ebyatar ben 'akhimelekh 'el david qe'ilah 'eifod yarad beyado. 1_samuel 23:7	vayugad lesha'ul ki ba david qe'ilah vayomer sha'ul nikar 'oto 'elohim beyadi ki nisgar labo be'ir delatayim uberiakh. 1_samuel 23:8	vayshama' sha'ul 'et kal ha'am lamilkhamah yisra'el shamoa' shama' 'abdekha ki mebaqesh sha'ul labo 'el qe'ilah leshakhet la'ir ba'aburi. 1_samuel 23:11	hayasgiruni ba'alei qe'ilah beyado hayeired sha'ul ka'asher shama' 'abdekha yhvh 'elohei yisra'el haged na le'abdekha vayomer yhvh yeired. 1_samuel 23:12	vayomer david hayasgiru ba'alei qe'ilah 'oti ve'et 'anashai beyad sha'ul vayomer yhvh yasgiru. 1_samuel 23:13	vayaqam david va'anashav keshesh mei'ot 'ish vayeize'u miqe'ilah vayithalekhu ba'asher yithalakhu ulesha'ul hugad ki nimlat david miqe'ilah vayekhdal lazet. 1_samuel 23:14	vayeisheb david bamidbar bamezadot vayeisheb bahar bemidbar zif vaybaqsheihu sha'ul kal hayamim velo netano 'elohim beyado. 1_samuel 23:15	vayar david ki yaza sha'ul lebaqesh 'et nafsho vedavid bemidbar zif bakhoreshah. 1_samuel 23:16	vayaqam yehonatan ben sha'ul vayeilekh 'el david khoreshah vaykhazeq 'et yado beilohim. 1_samuel 23:17	vayomer 'eilav 'al tira ki lo timza'akha yad sha'ul 'abi ve'atah timlokh 'al yisra'el ve'anokhi 'ehyeh lekha lemishneh vegam sha'ul 'abi yodeia' ken. 1_samuel 23:18	vayikhretu sheneihem berit lifnei yhvh vayeisheb david bakhoreshah vihonatan halakh lebeito. 1_samuel 23:19	vaya'alu zifim 'el sha'ul ya'rim hu. 1_samuel 23:23	ure'u ude'u mikol hamakhabo'im 'asher yitkhabei sham veshabtem 'eilai 'el nakhon vehalakhti 'itekhem vehayah 'im yeshno ba'arez vekhipasti 'oto bekhol 'alfei yehudah. 1_samuel 23:24	vayaqumu vayeilekhu zifah lifnei sha'ul vedavid va'anashav bemidbar ma'on ba'arabah 'el yemin hayshimon. 1_samuel 23:25	vayeilekh sha'ul va'anashav lebaqesh vayagidu ledavid vayeired 23:28	vayashab sha'ul mirdof 'akharei david vayeilekh liqrat pelishtim 'al ken qare'u lamaqom hahu sela' hamakhleqot. 1_samuel 23:29	vaya'al david misham vayeisheb bimzadot 'en gedi. 1_samuel 24:1	vayhi ka'asher shab sha'ul mei'akharei pelishtim vayagidu lo leimor hineh david bemidbar 'en gedi. 1_samuel 24:2	vayiqakh sha'ul sheloshet 'alafim 'ish bakhur mikal yisra'el vayeilekh lebaqesh 'et david va'anashav 'al penei zurei haye'eilim. 1_samuel 24:3	vayabo 'el gidrot hazon 'al haderekh vesham me'arah vayabo sha'ul lehasekh 'et raglav vedavid va'anashav beyarketei hame'arah yoshebim. 1_samuel 24:4	vayomeru 'anshei david 'eilav hineh hayom 'asher 'amar yhvh 'eilekha hineh 'anokhi noten 'et 'oyebeikha 'oyibkha beyadekha ve'asita lo ka'asher yitab be'einekha vayaqam david vayikhrot 'et kenaf hame'il 'asher lesha'ul balat. 1_samuel 24:5	vayhi 'akharei khen vayakh leb david 'oto 'al 'asher karat 'et kanaf 'asher lesha'ul. 1_samuel 24:6	vayomer la'anashav khalilah li yhvh 'im 'e'eseh 'et hadabar hazeh ladoni limshiakh yhvh lishloakh yadi bo ki meshiakh yhvh hu. 1_samuel 24:7	vayshasa' david 'et 'anashav badebarim velo netanam laqum 'el sha'ul vesha'ul qam meihame'arah vayeilekh badarekh. 1_samuel 24:8	vayaqam david 'akharei khen vayeizei min hame'arah meihame'arah vayiqra 'akharei sha'ul leimor 'adoni hamelekh vayabet sha'ul 'akharav vayiqod david 'apayim 'arzah vayishtakhu. 1_samuel 24:9	vayomer david lesha'ul lamah tishma' 'et dibrei 'adam leimor hineh david mebaqesh ra'atekha. 1_samuel 24:10	hineh hayom hazeh ra'u 'einekha 'et 'asher netanekha yhvh hayom beyadi bame'arah ve'amar laharagakha vatakhas 'alekha va'omar lo 'eshlakh yadi badoni ki meshiakh yhvh hu. 1_samuel 24:11	ve'abi re'eh gam re'eh 'et kenaf me'ilekha beyadi ki bekhareti 'et kenaf me'ilekha velo haragtikha da' ure'eh ki 'en beyadi ra'ah vafesha' velo khatati lakh ve'atah zodeh 'et nafshi leqakhtah. 1_samuel 24:12	yishpot yhvh beini ubeinekha uneqamani yhvh mimeka veyadi lo 1_samuel 24:18	ve'at ve'atah higadta hayom 'et 'asher 'asitah 'iti tobah 'et 'asher sigerani yhvh beyadekha velo haragtani. 1_samuel 24:19	vekhi yimza 'ish 'et 'oyebo veshilekho bederekh tobah yhvh yeshalemkha tobah takhat hayom hazeh 'asher 'asitah li. 1_samuel 24:20	ve'atah hineh yada'ti ki malokh timlokh veqamah beyadekha mamlekhet yisra'el. 1_samuel 24:21	ve'atah hishabe'ah li yhvh 'im takhrit 'et zar'i 'akharai ve'im tashmid 'et shemi mibet 'abi. 1_samuel 24:22	vayishaba' david lesha'ul vayeilekh sha'ul 'el beito vedavid va'anashav 'alu 'al hamezudah. 1_samuel 25:1	vayamat shemu'el vayiqabezu khal yisra'el vayispedu lo vayiqberuhu bebeito baramah vayaqam david vayeired 'el midbar paran. 1_samuel 25:2	ve'ish bema'on uma'aseihu bakarmel veha'ish gadol me'od velo zon sheloshet 'alafim ve'elef 'izim vayhi bigzoz 'et zono bakarmel. 1_samuel 25:3	veshem ha'ish nabal veshem 'ishto 'abigayil veha'ishah tobat sekhel vifat to'ar veha'ish qasheh vera' ma'alalim vehu khalebo khalibi. 1_samuel 25:4	vayishma' david bamidbar ki gozez nabal 'et zono. 1_samuel 25:5	vayishlakh david 'asarah ne'arim vayomer david lane'arim 'alu kharmelah ubatem 'el nabal ushe'eltem lo bishmi leshalom. 1_samuel 25:6	va'amartem koh lekhai ve'atah shalom ubeitekha shalom vekhol 'asher lekha shalom. 1_samuel 25:7	ve'atah shama'ti ki gozezim lakh 'atah haro'im 'asher lekha hayu 'imanu lo hekhlamnum velo nifqad lahem me'umah kal yemei heyotam bakarmel. 1_samuel 25:8	she'al 'et ne'arekha veyagidu lakh veyimze'u hane'arim khen be'einekha ki 'al yom tob banu tenah na 'et 'asher timza yadekha la'abadekha ulebinkha ledavid. 1_samuel 25:9	vayabo'u na'arei david vaydaberu 'el nabal kekhal hadebarim ha'eleh beshem david vayanukhu. 1_samuel 25:10	vaya'an nabal 'et 'abdei david vayomer mi david umi ben yishai hayom rabu 'abadim hamitparezim 'ish mipenei 'adonav. 1_samuel 25:11	velaqakhti 'et lakhmi ve'et meimai ve'et tibkhati 'asher tabakhti legozezai venatati la'anashim 'asher lo yada'ti 'ei mizeh hemah. 1_samuel 25:12	vayahafkhu na'arei david ledarkam vayashubu vayabo'u vayagidu lo kekhol hadebarim ha'eleh. 1_samuel 25:13	vayomer david la'anashav khigru 'ish 'et kharbo vayakhgeru 'ish 'et kharbo vayakhgor gam david 'et kharbo vaya'alu 'akharei david ke'arba' mei'ot 'ish umatayim yashebu 'al hakeilim. 1_samuel 25:14	vela'abigayil 'eishet nabal higid na'ar 'ekhad meihane'arim leimor hineh shalakh david mal'akhim meihamidbar lebarekh 'et 'adoneinu vaya'at bahem. 1_samuel 25:15	veha'anashim tobim lanu me'od velo hakhelamnu velo faqadnu me'umah kal yemei hithalakhnu 'itam bihyoteinu basadeh. 1_samuel 25:16	khomah hayu 'aleinu gam laylah gam yomam kal yemei heyoteinu 'imam ro'im hazon. 1_samuel 25:17	ve'atah de'i ure'i mah ta'asi ki khaletah hara'ah 'el 'adoneinu ve'al kal beito vehu ben beliya'al midaber 'eilav. 1_samuel 25:18	vatemaher 'abogayil 'abigayil vatiqakh matayim lekhem ushenayim niblei yayin vekhamesh zon 'asavot 'asuyot vekhamesh se'im qali umei'ah zimuqim umatayim debeilim vatasem 'al hakhamorim. 1_samuel 25:19	vatomer lin'areha 'ibru lefanai hini 'akhareikhem ba'ah ule'ishah nabal lo higidah. 1_samuel 25:20	vehayah hi rokhebet 'al hakhamor veyoredet beseiter hahar vehineh david va'anashav yoredim liqratah vatifgosh 'otam. 1_samuel 25:21	vedavid 'amar 'akh lasheqer shamarti 'et kal 'asher lazeh bamidbar velo nifqad mikal 'asher lo me'umah vayasheb li ra'ah takhat tobah. 1_samuel 25:22	koh ya'aseh 'elohim le'oyebei david vekhoh yosif 'im 'ash'ir mikal 'asher lo 'ad haboqer mashtin beqir. 1_samuel 25:23	vateire 'abigayil 'et david vatemaher vateired mei'al hakhamor vatipol le'apei david 'al paneha vatishtakhu 'arez. 1_samuel 25:24	vatipol 'al raglav vatomer bi 'ani 'adoni he'avon utedaber na 'amatekha be'azenekha ushema' 'et dibrei 'amatekha. 1_samuel 25:25	'al na yasim 'adoni 'et libo 'el 'ish habeliya'al hazeh 'al nabal ki khishmo ken hu nabal shemo unebalah 'imo va'ani 'amatekha lo ra'iti 'et na'arei 'adoni 'asher shalakheta. 1_samuel 25:26	ve'atah 'adoni khai yhvh vekhei nafshekha 'asher mena'akha yhvh mibo bedamim vehosheia' yadekha lakh ve'atah yihyu khenabal 'oyebekha vehambaqshim 'el 'adoni ra'ah. 1_samuel 25:27	ve'atah haberakhah hazot 'asher heibi shifkhatekha ladoni venitenah lane'arim hamithalekhim beraglei 'adoni. 1_samuel 25:28	sa na lefesha' 'amatekha ki 'asoh ya'aseh yhvh ladoni bayit ne'eman ki milkhamot yhvh 'adoni nilkham vera'ah lo timazei bekha miyamekha. 1_samuel 25:29	vayaqam 'adam lirdafekha ulebaqesh 'et nafshekha vehayetah nefesh 'adoni zerurah bizror hakhayim 'et yhvh 'elohekha ve'et nefesh 'oyebekha yeqale'enah betokh kaf haqala'. 1_samuel 25:30	vehayah ki ya'aseh yhvh ladoni kekhol 'asher diber 'et hatobah 'alekha vezivekha lenagid 'al yisra'el. 1_samuel 25:31	velo tihyeh zot lekha lefuqah ulemikhshol leb ladoni velishpakh dam khinam ulehoshia' 'adoni lo veheitib yhvh ladoni vezakharta 'et 'amatekha. 1_samuel 25:32	vayomer david la'abigal barukh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher shelakhekh hayom hazeh liqrati. 1_samuel 25:33	ubarukh ta'mekh uberukhah 'at 'asher kelitini hayom hazeh mibo bedamim vehosheia' yadi li. 1_samuel 25:34	ve'ulam khai yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher mena'ani meihara' 'otakh ki lulei mihart vataboti vatabot liqrati ki 'im notar lenabal 'ad 'or haboqer mashtin beqir. 1_samuel 25:35	vayiqakh david miyadah 'et 'asher heibi'ah lo velah 'amar 'ali leshalom lebeitekh re'i shama'ti beqolekh va'esa panayikh. 1_samuel 25:36	vatabo 'abigayil 'el nabal vehineh lo mishteh bebeito kemishteh hamelekh veleb nabal tob 'alav vehu shikor 'ad me'od velo higidah lo dabar qaton vegadol 'ad 'or haboqer. 1_samuel 25:37	vayhi baboqer bezet hayayin minabal vataged lo 'ishto 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayamat libo beqirbo vehu hayah le'aben. 1_samuel 25:38	vayhi ka'aseret hayamim vayigof yhvh 'et nabal vayamot. 1_samuel 25:39	vayishma' david ki met nabal vayomer barukh yhvh 'asher rab 'et rib kherpati miyad nabal ve'et 'abdo khasakh meira'ah ve'et ra'at nabal heishib yhvh berosho vayishlakh david vaydaber ba'abigayil leqakhtah lo le'ishah. 1_samuel 25:40	vayabo'u 'abdei david 'el 'abigayil hakarmelah vaydaberu 'eileha leimor david shelakhanu 'eilayikh leqakhtekh lo le'ishah. 1_samuel 25:41	vataqam vatishtakhu 'apayim 'arezah vatomer hineh 'amatekha leshifkhah lirkhoz raglei 'abdei 'adoni. 1_samuel 25:42	vatemaher vataqam 'abigayil vatirkab 'al hakhamor vekhamesh na'aroteha haholekhot leraglah vateilekh 'akharei mal'akhei david vatehi lo le'ishah. 1_samuel 25:43	ve'et 'akhino'am laqakh david miyizre'el vatihyena gam sheteihen lo lenashim. 1_samuel 25:44	vesha'ul natan 'et mikhal bito 'eishet david lefalti ben layish 'asher migalim. 1_samuel 26:1	vayabo'u hazifim 'el sha'ul hagib'atah leimor halo david mistater begib'at hakhakhilah 'al penei hayshimon. 1_samuel 26:2	vayaqam sha'ul vayeired 'el midbar zif ve'ito sheloshet 'alafim 'ish bekhurei yisra'el lebaqesh 'et david bemidbar zif. 1_samuel 26:3	vayikhan sha'ul begib'at hakhakhilah 'asher 'al penei hayshimon 'al hadarekh vedavid yosheb bamidbar vayar ki ba sha'ul 'akharav hamidbarah. 1_samuel 26:4	vayishlakh david meragelim vayeida' ki ba sha'ul 'el nakhon. 1_samuel 26:5	vayaqam david vayabo 'el hamaqom 'asher khanah sham sha'ul vayar david 'et hamaqom 'asher shakhab sham sha'ul ve'abner ben ner sar zeba'o vesha'ul shokheb bama'gal veha'am khonim sebiboto sebibotav. 1_samuel 26:6	vaya'an david vayomer 'el 'akhimelekh hakhiti ve'el 'abishai ben zeruyah 'akhi yo'ab leimor mi yeired 'iti 'el sha'ul 'el hamakhaneh vayomer 'abishai 'ani 'eired 'imakh. 1_samuel 26:7	vayabo david va'abishai 'el ha'am laylah vehineh sha'ul shokheb yashen bama'gal vakhanito me'ukhah ba'arez mera'ashoto mera'ashotav ve'abner veha'am shokhebim sebiboto sebibotav. 1_samuel 26:8	vayomer 'abishai 'el david sigar 'elohim hayom 'et 'oyibkha beyadekha ve'atah 'akenu na bakhanit uba'arez pa'am 'akhat velo 'eshneh lo. 1_samuel 26:9	vayomer david 'el 'abishai 'al tashkhiteihu ki mi shalakh yado bimshiakh yhvh veniqah. 1_samuel 26:10	vayomer david khai yhvh ki 'im yhvh yigafenu 'o yomo yabo vamet 'o bamilkhamah yeired venispah. 1_samuel 26:11	khalilah li yhvh misheloakh yadi bimshiakh yhvh ve'atah qakh na 'et hakhanit 'asher mera'ashoto mera'ashotav ve'et zapakhat hamayim veneilakhah lanu. 1_samuel 26:12	vayiqakh david 'et hakhanit ve'et zapakhat hamayim meira'ashotei sha'ul vayeilekhu lahem ve'en ro'eh ve'en yodeia' ve'en meiqiz ki khulam yesheinim ki tardeimat yhvh nafelah 'aleihem. 1_samuel 26:13	vaya'abor david ha'eiber vaya'amod 'al rosh hahar meirakhoq rab hamaqom beineihem. 1_samuel 26:14	vayiqra david 'el ha'am ve'el 'abner ben ner leimor halo ta'aneh 'abner vaya'an 'abner vayomer mi 'atah qarata 'el hamelekh. 1_samuel 26:15	vayomer david 'el 'abner halo 'ish 'atah umi khamokha beyisra'el velamah lo shamarta 'el 'adonekha hamelekh ki ba 'akhad ha'am lehashkhit 'et hamelekh 'adonekha. 1_samuel 26:16	lo tob hadabar hazeh 'asher 'asita khai yhvh ki benei mavet 'atem 'asher lo shemartem 'al 'adoneikhem 'al meshiakh yhvh ve'atah re'eh 'ei khanit hamelekh ve'et zapakhat hamayim 'asher mera'ashoto mera'ashotav. 1_samuel 26:17	vayaker sha'ul 'et qol david vayomer haqolkha zeh beni david vayomer david qoli 'adoni hamelekh. 1_samuel 26:18	vayomer lamah zeh 'adoni rodef 'akharei 'abdo ki meh 'asiti umah beyadi ra'ah. 1_samuel 26:19	ve'atah yishma' na 'adoni hamelekh 'et dibrei 'abdo 'im yhvh hesitekha bi yarakh minkhah ve'im benei ha'adam 'arurim hem lifnei yhvh ki geireshuni hayom meihistapeiakh benakhalat yhvh leimor lekh 'abod 'elohim 'akheirim. 1_samuel 26:20	ve'atah 'al yipol dami 'arzah mineged penei yhvh ki yaza melekh yisra'el lebaqesh 'et par'osh 'ekhad ka'asher yirdof haqorei beharim. 1_samuel 26:21	vayomer sha'ul khatati shub beni david ki lo 'ara' lekha 'od takhat 'asher yaqerah nafshi be'einekha hayom hazeh hineh hiskalti va'eshgeh harbeh me'od. 1_samuel 26:22	vaya'an david vayomer hineh hakhanit khanit hamelekh veya'abor 'ekhad meihane'arim veyiqakheha. 1_samuel 26:23	yhvh yashib la'ish 'et zidqato ve'et 'emunato 'asher netanekha yhvh hayom beyad velo 'abiti lishloakh yadi bimshiakh yhvh. 1_samuel 26:24	vehineh ka'asher gadelah nafshekha hayom hazeh be'einai ken tigdal nafshi be'einei yhvh veyazileini mikal zarah. 1_samuel 26:25	vayomer sha'ul 'el david barukh 'atah beni david gam 'asoh ta'aseh vegam yakhol tukhal vayeilekh david ledarko vesha'ul shab limqomo. 1_samuel 27:1	vayomer david 'el libo 'atah 'esafeh yom 'ekhad beyad sha'ul 'en li tob ki himalet 'imalet 'el 'erez pelishtim veno'ash mimeni sha'ul lebaqsheini 'od bekhal gebul yisra'el venimlati miyado. 1_samuel 27:2	vayaqam david vaya'abor hu veshesh mei'ot 'ish 'asher 'imo 'el 'akhish ben ma'okh melekh gat. 1_samuel 27:3	vayeisheb david 'im 'akhish begat hu va'anashav 'ish ubeito david ushetei nashav 'akhino'am hayizre'eilit va'abigayil 'eishet nabal hakarmelit. 1_samuel 27:4	vayugad lesha'ul ki barakh david gat velo yosaf yasaf 'od lebaqsho. 1_samuel 27:5	vayomer david 'el 'akhish 'im na mazati khen be'einekha yitenu li maqom be'akhat 'arei hasadeh ve'eishebah sham velamah yeisheb 'abdekha be'ir hamamlakhah 'imakh. 1_samuel 27:6	vayiten lo 'akhish bayom hahu 'et ziqlag lakhen hayetah ziqlag lemalkhei yehudah 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_samuel 27:7	vayhi mispar hayamim 'asher yashab david bisdeh felishtim yamim ve'arba'ah khodashim. 1_samuel 27:8	vaya'al david va'anashav vayifshetu 'el hageshuri vehagirzi vehagizri veha'amaleiqi ki henah yoshebot ha'arez 'asher mei'olam bo'akha shurah ve'ad 'erez mizrayim. 1_samuel 27:9	vehikah david 'et ha'arez velo yekhayeh 'ish ve'ishah velaqakh zon ubaqar vakhamorim ugemalim ubegadim vayashab vayabo 'el 'akhish. 1_samuel 27:10	vayomer 'akhish 'al peshatem hayom vayomer david 'al negeb yehudah ve'al negeb hayarkheme'eili ve'el negeb haqeini. 1_samuel 27:11	ve'ish ve'ishah lo yekhayeh david lehabi gat leimor pen yagidu 'aleinu leimor koh 'asah david vekhoh mishpato kal hayamim 'asher yashab bisdeh felishtim. 1_samuel 27:12	vaya'amen 'akhish bedavid leimor hab'esh hib'ish be'amo beyisra'el vehayah li le'ebed 'olam. 1_samuel 28:1	vayhi bayamim hahem vayiqbezu felishtim 'et makhaneihem lazaba lehilakhem beyisra'el vayomer 'akhish 'el david yadoa' teida' ki 'iti teizei bamakhaneh 'atah va'anashekha. 1_samuel 28:2	vayomer david 'el 'akhish lakhen 'atah teida' 'et 'asher ya'aseh 'abdekha vayomer 'akhish 'el david lakhen shomer leroshi 'asimekha kal hayamim. 1_samuel 28:3	ushemu'el met vayispedu lo kal yisra'el vayiqberuhu baramah ube'iro vesha'ul heisir ha'obot ve'et hayide'onim meiha'arez. 1_samuel 28:4	vayiqabezu felishtim vayabo'u vayakhanu beshunem vayiqboz sha'ul 'et kal yisra'el vayakhanu bagilboa'. 1_samuel 28:5	vayar sha'ul 'et makhaneh felishtim vayira vayekherad libo me'od. 1_samuel 28:6	vayish'al sha'ul yhvh velo 'anahu yhvh gam bakhalomot gam ba'urim gam banebi'im. 1_samuel 28:7	vayomer sha'ul la'abadav baqeshu li 'eishet ba'alat 'ob ve'eilekhah 'eileha ve'edreshah bah vayomeru 'abadav 'eilav hineh 'eishet ba'alat 'ob be'en dor. 1_samuel 28:8	vayitkhapes sha'ul vayilbash begadim 'akheirim vayeilekh hu ushenei 'anashim 'imo vayabo'u 'el ha'ishah layelah vayomer qasomi qasomi na li ba'ob veha'ali li 'et 'asher 'omar 'eilayikh. 1_samuel 28:9	vatomer ha'ishah 'eilav hineh 'atah yada'ta 'et 'asher 'asah sha'ul 'asher hikhrit 'et ha'obot ve'et hayide'oni min ha'arez velamah 'atah mitnaqesh benafshi lahamiteini. 1_samuel 28:10	vayishaba' lah sha'ul yhvh leimor khai yhvh 'im yiqerekh 'avon badabar hazeh. 1_samuel 28:11	vatomer ha'ishah 'et mi 'a'aleh lakh vayomer 'et shemu'el ha'ali li. 1_samuel 28:12	vateire ha'ishah 'et shemu'el vatiz'aq beqol gadol vatomer ha'ishah 'el sha'ul leimor lamah rimitani ve'atah sha'ul. 1_samuel 28:13	vayomer lah hamelekh 'al tire'i ki mah ra'it vatomer ha'ishah 'el sha'ul 'elohim ra'iti 'olim min ha'arez. 1_samuel 28:14	vayomer lah mah ta'oro vatomer 'ish zaqen 'oleh vehu 'oteh me'il vayeida' sha'ul ki shemu'el hu vayiqod 'apayim 'arzah vayishtakhu. 1_samuel 28:15	vayomer shemu'el 'el sha'ul lamah hirgaztani leha'alot 'oti vayomer 'ul zar li me'od ufelishtim nilkhamim bi veilohim sar mei'alai velo 'anani 'od gam beyad hanebi'im gam bakhalomot va'eqra'eh lekha lehodi'eini mah 'e'eseh. 1_samuel 28:16	vayomer shemu'el velamah tish'aleini yhvh sar mei'alekha vayhi 'arekha. 1_samuel 28:17	vaya'as yhvh lo ka'asher diber beyadi vayiqra' yhvh 'et hamamlakhah miyadekha vayitenah lerei'akha ledavid. 1_samuel 28:18	ka'asher lo shama'ta beqol yhvh velo 'asita kharon 'apo ba'amaleq 'al ken hadabar hazeh 'asah lekha yhvh hayom hazeh. 1_samuel 28:19	veyiten yhvh gam 'et yisra'el 'imekha beyad pelishtim umakhar 'atah ubanekha 'imi gam 'et makhaneh yisra'el yiten yhvh beyad pelishtim. 1_samuel 28:20	vaymaher sha'ul vayipol melo qomato 'arzah vayira me'od midibrei shemu'el gam koakh lo hayah bo ki lo 'akhal lekhem kal hayom vekhal halayelah. 1_samuel 28:21	vatabo ha'ishah 'el sha'ul vateire ki nibhal me'od vatomer 'eilav hineh shame'ah shifkhatekha beqolekha va'asim nafshi bekhapi va'eshma' 'et debarekha 'asher dibarta 'eilai. 1_samuel 28:22	ve'atah shema' na gam 'atah beqol shifkhatekha ve'asimah lefanekha pat lekhem ve'ekhol vihi bekha koakh ki teilekh badarekh. 1_samuel 28:23	vayma'en vayomer lo 'okhal vayifrezu bo 'abadav vegam ha'ishah vayishma' leqolam vayaqam meiha'arez vayeisheb 'el hamitah. 1_samuel 28:24	vela'ishah 'eigel marbeq babayit vatemaher vatizbakheihu vatiqakh qemakh vatalash vatofeihu mazot. 1_samuel 28:25	vatagesh lifnei sha'ul velifnei 'abadav vayokheilu vayaqumu vayeilekhu balaylah hahu. 1_samuel 29:1	vayiqbezu felishtim 'et kal makhaneihem 'afeiqah veyisra'el khonim ba'ayin 'asher beyizre'el. 1_samuel 29:2	vesarnei felishtim 'oberim lemei'ot vela'alafim vedavid va'anashav 'oberim ba'akharonah 'im 'akhish. 1_samuel 29:3	vayomeru sarei felishtim mah ha'ibrim ha'eleh vayomer 'akhish 'el sarei felishtim halo zeh david 'ebed sha'ul melekh yisra'el 'asher hayah 'iti zeh yamim 'o zeh shanim velo mazati bo me'umah miyom nafelo 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_samuel 29:4	vayiqzefu 'alav sarei felishtim vayomeru lo sarei felishtim hasheb 'et ha'ish veyashob 'el meqomo 'asher hifqadto sham velo yeired 'imanu bamilkhamah velo yihyeh lanu lesatan bamilkhamah ubameh yitrazeh zeh 'el 'adonav halo berashei ha'anashim hahem. 1_samuel 29:5	halo zeh david 'asher ya'anu lo bamekholot leimor hikah sha'ul ba'alafav vedavid beribboto beribbotav. 1_samuel 29:6	vayiqra 'akhish 'el david vayomer 'eilav khai yhvh ki yashar 'atah vetob be'einai zeitekha ubo'akha 'iti bamakhaneh ki lo mazati bekha ra'ah miyom bo'akha 'eilai 'ad hayom hazeh ube'einei haseranim lo tob 'atah. 1_samuel 29:7	ve'atah shub velekh beshalom velo ta'aseh ra' be'einei sarnei felishtim. 1_samuel 29:8	vayomer david 'el 'akhish ki meh 'asiti umah mazata be'abdekha miyom 'asher hayiti lefanekha 'ad hayom hazeh ki lo 'abo venilkhamti be'oyebei 'adoni hamelekh. 1_samuel 29:9	vaya'an 'akhish vayomer 'el david yada'ti ki tob 'atah be'einai kemal'akh 'elohim 'akh sarei felishtim 'ameru lo ya'aleh 'imanu bamilkhamah. 1_samuel 29:10	ve'atah hashkem baboqer ve'abdei 'adonekha 'asher ba'u 'itakh vehishkamtem baboqer ve'or lakhem valeikhu. 1_samuel 29:11	vayashkem david hu va'anashav lalekhet baboqer lashub 'el 'erez pelishtim ufelishtim 'alu yizre'el. 1_samuel 30:1	vayhi bebo david va'anashav ziqlag bayom hashelishi va'amaleiqi fashetu 'el negeb ve'el ziqlag vayaku 'et ziqlag vayisrefu 'otah ba'esh. 1_samuel 30:2	vayishbu 'et hanashim 'asher bah miqaton ve'ad gadol lo heimitu 'ish vayinhagu vayeilekhu ledarkam. 1_samuel 30:3	vayabo david va'anashav 'el ha'ir vehineh serufah ba'esh unesheihem ubeneihem ubenoteihem nishbu. 1_samuel 30:4	vayisa david veha'am 'asher 'ito 'et qolam vayibku 'ad 'asher 'en bahem koakh libkot. 1_samuel 30:5	ushetei neshei david nishbu 'akhino'am hayizre'eilit va'abigayil 'eishet nabal hakarmeli. 1_samuel 30:6	vateizer ledavid me'od ki 'ameru ha'am lesaqelo ki marah nefesh kal ha'am 'ish 'al beno banav ve'al benotav vayitkhazeq david yhvh 'elohav. 1_samuel 30:7	vayomer david 'el 'ebyatar hakohen ben 'akhimelekh hagishah na li ha'eifod vayagesh 'ebyatar 'et ha'eifod 'el david. 1_samuel 30:8	vayish'al david yhvh leimor 'erdof 'akharei hagedud hazeh ha'asigenu vayomer lo redof ki haseg tasig vehazel tazil. 1_samuel 30:9	vayeilekh david hu veshesh mei'ot 'ish 'asher 'ito vayabo'u 'ad nakhal habesor vehanotarim 'amadu. 1_samuel 30:10	vayirdof david hu ve'arba' mei'ot 'ish vaya'amdu matayim 'ish 'asher pigeru mei'abor 'et nakhal habesor. 1_samuel 30:11	vayimze'u 'ish mizri basadeh vayiqkhu 'oto 'el david vayitenu lo lekhem vayokhal vayashquhu mayim. 1_samuel 30:12	vayitenu lo felakh debeilah ushenei zimuqim vayokhal vatashab rukho 'eilav ki lo 'akhal lekhem velo shatah mayim sheloshah yamim usheloshah leilot. 1_samuel 30:13	vayomer lo david lemi 'atah ve'ei mizeh 'atah vayomer na'ar mizri 'anokhi 'ebed le'ish 'amaleiqi vaya'azbeini 'adoni ki khaliti hayom sheloshah. 1_samuel 30:14	'anakhnu pashatnu negeb hakereiti ve'al 'asher lihudah ve'al negeb kaleb ve'et ziqlag sarafnu ba'esh. 1_samuel 30:15	vayomer 'eilav david hatorideini 'el hagedud hazeh vayomer hishabe'ah li beilohim 'im temiteini ve'im tasgireini beyad 'adoni ve'oridkha 'el hagedud hazeh. 1_samuel 30:16	vayorideihu vehineh netushim 'al penei khal ha'arez 'okhelim veshotim vekhogegim bekhol hashalal hagadol 'asher laqekhu mei'erez pelishtim umei'erez yehudah. 1_samuel 30:17	vayakem david meihaneshef ve'ad ha'ereb lemakhoratam velo nimlat meihem 'ish ki 'im 'arba' mei'ot 'ish na'ar 'asher rakhebu 'al hagemalim vayanusu. 1_samuel 30:18	vayazel david 'et kal 'asher laqekhu 'amaleq ve'et shetei nashav hizil david. 1_samuel 30:19	velo ne'dar lahem min haqaton ve'ad hagadol ve'ad banim ubanot umishalal ve'ad kal 'asher laqekhu lahem hakol heishib david. 1_samuel 30:20	vayiqakh david 'et kal hazon vehabaqar nahagu lifnei hamiqneh hahu vayomeru zeh shelal david. 1_samuel 30:21	vayabo david 'el matayim ha'anashim 'asher pigeru milekhet 'akharei david vayoshibum benakhal habesor vayeize'u liqrat david veliqrat ha'am 'asher 'ito vayigash david 'et ha'am vayish'al lahem leshalom. 1_samuel 30:22	vaya'an kal 'ish ra' ubeliya'al meiha'anashim 'asher halekhu 'im david vayomeru ya'an 'asher lo halekhu 'imi lo niten lahem meihashalal 'asher hizalnu ki 'im 'ish 'et 'ishto ve'et banav veyinhagu veyeileikhu. 1_samuel 30:23	vayomer david lo ta'asu khen 'ekhai 'et 'asher natan yhvh lanu vayishmor 'otanu vayiten 'et hagedud haba 'aleinu beyadeinu. 1_samuel 30:24	umi yishma' lakhem ladabar hazeh ki kekheileq hayored bamilkhamah ukhekheileq hayosheb 'al hakeilim yakhdav yakhaloqu. 1_samuel 30:25	vayhi meihayom hahu vama'elah vaysimeha lekhoq ulemishpat leyisra'el 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_samuel 30:26	vayabo david 'el ziqlag vayshalakh meihashalal leziqnei yehudah lerei'eihu leimor hineh lakhem berakhah mishelal 'oyebei yhvh. 1_samuel 30:27	la'asher bebet 'el vela'asher beramot negeb vela'asher beyatir. 1_samuel 30:28	vela'asher ba'aro'er vela'asher besifmot vela'asher be'eshtemoa'. 1_samuel 30:29	vela'asher berakhal vela'asher be'arei hayerakhme'eili vela'asher be'arei haqeini. 1_samuel 30:30	vela'asher bekharemah vela'asher bebor 'ashan vela'asher ba'atakh. 1_samuel 30:31	vela'asher bekhebron ulekhal hameqomot 'asher hithalekh sham david hu va'anashav. 1_samuel 31:1	ufelishtim nilkhamim beyisra'el vayanusu 'anshei yisra'el mipenei felishtim vayipelu khalalim behar hagilboa'. 1_samuel 31:2	vayadbequ felishtim 'et sha'ul ve'et banav vayaku felishtim 'et yehonatan ve'et 'abinadab ve'et malki shua' benei sha'ul. 1_samuel 31:3	vatikhbad hamilkhamah 'el sha'ul vayimza'uhu hamorim 'anashim baqashet vayakhel me'od meihamorim. 1_samuel 31:4	vayomer sha'ul lenosei kheilav shelof kharbekha vedaqereini bah pen yabo'u ha'areilim ha'eleh udeqaruni vehit'alelu bi velo 'abah nosei kheilav ki yarei me'od vayiqakh sha'ul 'et hakhereb vayipol 'aleha. 1_samuel 31:5	vayar nosei kheilav ki met sha'ul vayipol gam hu 'al kharbo vayamat 'imo. 1_samuel 31:6	vayamat sha'ul usheloshet banav venosei kheilav gam kal 'anashav bayom hahu yakhdav. 1_samuel 31:7	vayir'u 'anshei yisra'el 'asher be'eiber ha'eimeq va'asher be'eiber hayarden ki nasu 'anshei yisra'el vekhi meitu sha'ul ubanav vaya'azbu 'et he'arim vayanusu vayabo'u felishtim vayeishebu bahen. 1_samuel 31:8	vayhi mimakhorat vayabo'u felishtim lefashet 'et hakhalalim vayimze'u 'et sha'ul ve'et sheloshet banav nofelim behar hagilboa'. 1_samuel 31:9	vayikhretu 'et rosho vayafshitu 'et keilav vayshalekhu be'erez pelishtim sabib lebaser bet 'azabeihem ve'et ha'am. 1_samuel 31:10	vayasimu 'et keilav bet 'ashtarot ve'et geviyato taqe'u bekhomat bet shan. 1_samuel 31:11	vayishme'u 'eilav yoshebei yabesh gil'ad 'et 'asher 'asu felishtim lesha'ul. 1_samuel 31:12	vayaqumu kal 'ish khayil vayeilekhu khal halaylah vayiqkhu 'et geviyat sha'ul ve'et geviyot banav meikhomat bet shan vayabo'u yabeishah vayisrefu 'otam sham. 1_samuel 31:13	vayiqkhu 'et 'azmoteihem vayiqberu takhat ha'eshel beyabeishah vayazumu shib'at yamim. 

2_samuel 1:1	vayhi 'akharei mot sha'ul vedavid shab meihakot 'et ha'amaleq vayeisheb david beziqlag yamim shenayim. 2_samuel 1:2	vayhi bayom hashelishi vehineh 'ish ba min hamakhaneh mei'im sha'ul ubegadav qeru'im va'adamah 'al rosho vayhi bebo'o 'el david vayipol 'arzah vayishtakhu. 2_samuel 1:3	vayomer lo david 'ei mizeh tabo vayomer 'eilav mimakhaneh yisra'el nimlateti. 2_samuel 1:4	vayomer 'eilav david meh hayah hadabar haged na li vayomer 'asher nas ha'am min hamilkhamah vegam harbeh nafal min ha'am vayamutu vegam sha'ul vihonatan beno meitu. 2_samuel 1:5	vayomer david 'el hana'ar hamagid lo 'ekh yada'ta ki met sha'ul vihonatan beno. 2_samuel 1:6	vayomer hana'ar hamagid lo niqro niqreiti behar hagilboa' vehineh sha'ul nish'an 'al khanito vehineh harekheb uba'alei haparashim hidbiquhu. 2_samuel 1:7	vayifen 'akharav vayir'eini vayiqra 'eilai va'omar hineini. 2_samuel 1:8	vayomer li mi 'atah vayomer va'omar 'eilav 'amaleiqi 'anokhi. 2_samuel 1:9	vayomer 'eilai 'amad na 'alai umoteteini ki 'akhazani hashabaz ki khal 'od nafshi bi. 2_samuel 1:10	va'e'emod 'alav va'amoteteihu ki yada'ti ki lo yikhyeh 'akharei niflo va'eqakh haneizer 'asher 'al rosho ve'ez'adah 'asher 'al zero'o va'abi'em 'el 'adoni henah. 2_samuel 1:11	vayakhazeq david bibgado bibgadav vayiqra'em vegam kal ha'anashim 'asher 'ito. 2_samuel 1:12	vayispedu vayibku vayazumu 'ad ha'areb 'al sha'ul ve'al yehonatan beno ve'al 'am yhvh ve'al bet yisra'el ki nafelu bekhareb. 2_samuel 1:13	vayomer david 'el hana'ar hamagid lo 'ei mizeh 'atah vayomer ben 'ish ger 'amaleiqi 'anokhi. 2_samuel 1:14	vayomer 'eilav david 'ekh lo yareita lishloakh yadekha leshakhet 'et meshiakh yhvh. 2_samuel 1:15	vayiqra david le'akhad meihane'arim vayomer gash pega' bo vayakeihu vayamot. 2_samuel 1:16	vayomer 'eilav david dameikha damekha 'al roshekha ki fikha 'anah bekha leimor 'anokhi motati 'et meshiakh yhvh. 2_samuel 1:17	vayqonen david 'et haqinah hazot 'al sha'ul ve'al yehonatan beno. 2_samuel 1:18	vayomer lelamed benei yehudah qashet hineh khetubah 'al seifer hayashar. 2_samuel 1:19	hazebi yisra'el 'al bamotekha khalal 'ekh nafelu giborim. 2_samuel 1:20	'al tagidu begat 'al tebaseru bekhuzot 'ashqelon pen tismakhnah benot pelishtim pen ta'alozenah benot ha'areilim. 2_samuel 1:21	harei bagilboa' 'al tal ve'al matar 'aleikhem usedei terumot ki sham nig'al magen giborim magen sha'ul beli mashiakh bashamen. 2_samuel 1:22	midam khalalim meikheileb giborim qeshet yehonatan lo nasog 'akhor vekhereb sha'ul lo tashub reiqam. 2_samuel 1:23	sha'ul vihonatan hane'ehabim vehane'imim bekhayeihem ubemotam lo nifradu minesharim qalu mei'arayot gabeiru. 2_samuel 1:24	benot yisra'el 'el sha'ul bekhenah hamalbishkhem shani 'im 'adanim hama'aleh 'adi zahab 'al lebushekhen. 2_samuel 1:25	'ekh nafelu giborim betokh hamilkhamah yehonatan 'al bamotekha khalal. 2_samuel 1:26	zar li 'alekha 'akhi yehonatan na'amta li me'od nifle'atah 'ahabatekha li mei'ahabat nashim. 2_samuel 1:27	'ekh nafelu giborim vayobedu kelei milkhamah. 2_samuel 2:1	vayhi 'akharei khen vayish'al david yhvh leimor ha'e'eleh be'akhat 'arei yehudah vayomer yhvh 'eilav 'aleh vayomer david 'anah 'e'eleh vayomer khebronah. 2_samuel 2:2	vaya'al sham david vegam shetei nashav 'akhino'am hayizre'eilit va'abigayil 'eishet nabal hakarmeli. 2_samuel 2:3	va'anashav 'asher 'imo he'elah david 'ish ubeito vayeishebu be'arei khebron. 2_samuel 2:4	vayabo'u 'anshei yehudah vayimshekhu sham 'et david lemelekh 'al bet yehudah vayagidu ledavid leimor 'anshei yabesh gil'ad 'asher qaberu 'et sha'ul. 2_samuel 2:5	vayishlakh david mal'akhim 'el 'anshei yabesh gil'ad vayomer 'aleihem berukhim 'atem yhvh 'asher 'asitem hakhesed hazeh 'im 'adoneikhem 'im sha'ul vatiqberu 'oto. 2_samuel 2:6	ve'atah ya'as yhvh 'imakhem khesed ve'emet vegam 'anokhi 'e'eseh 'itekhem hatobah hazot 'asher 'asitem hadabar hazeh. 2_samuel 2:7	ve'atah tekhezaqnah yedeikhem vihyu libnei khayil ki met 'adoneikhem sha'ul vegam 'oti mashekhu bet yehudah lemelekh 'aleihem. 2_samuel 2:8	ve'abner ben ner sar zaba 'asher lesha'ul laqakh 'et 'ish boshet ben sha'ul vaya'abireihu makhanayim. 2_samuel 2:9	vayamlikheihu 'el hagil'ad ve'el ha'ashuri ve'el yizre'el ve'al 'efrayim ve'al binyamin ve'al yisra'el kuloh. 2_samuel 2:10	ben 'arba'im shanah 'ish boshet ben sha'ul bemalekho 'al yisra'el ushetayim shanim malakh 'akh bet yehudah hayu 'akharei david. 2_samuel 2:11	vayhi mispar hayamim 'asher hayah david melekh bekhebron 'al bet yehudah sheba' shanim veshishah khodashim. 2_samuel 2:12	vayeizei 'abner ben ner ve'abdei 'ish boshet ben sha'ul mimakhanayim gib'onah. 2_samuel 2:13	veyo'ab ben zeruyah ve'abdei david yaze'u vayifgeshum 'al bereikhat gib'on yakhdav vayeishebu 'eleh 'al habereikhah mizeh ve'eleh 'al habereikhah mizeh. 2_samuel 2:14	vayomer 'abner 'el yo'ab yaqumu na hane'arim visakhaqu lefaneinu vayomer yo'ab yaqumu. 2_samuel 2:15	vayaqumu vaya'abru bemispar shenem 'asar lebinyamin ule'ish boshet ben sha'ul ushenem 'asar mei'abdei david. 2_samuel 2:16	vayakhaziqu 'ish berosh rei'eihu vekharbo bezad rei'eihu vayipelu yakhdav vayiqra lamaqom hahu khelqat hazurim 'asher begib'on. 2_samuel 2:17	vatehi hamilkhamah qashah 'ad me'od bayom hahu vayinagef 'abner ve'anshei yisra'el lifnei 'abdei david. 2_samuel 2:18	vayihyu sham sheloshah benei zeruyah yo'ab va'abishai va'asah'el va'asah'el qal beraglav ke'akhad hazebayim 'asher basadeh. 2_samuel 2:19	vayirdof 'asah'el 'akharei 'abner velo natah lalekhet 'al hayamin ve'al hasemol mei'akharei 'abner. 2_samuel 2:20	vayifen 'abner 'akharav vayomer ha'atah zeh 'asah'el vayomer 'anokhi. 2_samuel 2:21	vayomer lo 'abner neteh lekha 'al yeminekha 'o 'al semolekha ve'ekhoz lekha 'ekhad meihane'arim veqakh lekha 'et khalizato velo 'abah 'asah'el lasur mei'akharav. 2_samuel 2:22	vayosef 'od 'abner leimor 'el 'asah'el sur lekha mei'akharai lamah 'akekah 'arzah ve'ekh 'esa fanai 'el yo'ab 'akhikha. 2_samuel 2:23	vayma'en lasur vayakeihu 'abner be'akharei hakhanit 'el hakhomesh vateizei hakhanit mei'akharav vayipal sham vayamat takhato takhtav vayhi kal haba 'el hamaqom 'asher nafal sham 'asah'el vayamot vaya'amodu. 2_samuel 2:24	vayirdefu yo'ab va'abishai 'akharei 'abner vehashemesh ba'ah vehemah ba'u 'ad gib'at 'amah 'asher 'al penei giakh derekh midbar gib'on. 2_samuel 2:25	vayitqabezu benei binyamin 'akharei 'abner vayihyu la'agudah 'ekhat vaya'amdu 'al rosh gib'ah 'ekhat. 2_samuel 2:26	vayiqra 'abner 'el yo'ab vayomer halanezakh tokhal khereb halo yada'tah ki marah tihyeh ba'akharonah ve'ad matai lo tomar la'am lashub mei'akharei 'akheihem. 2_samuel 2:27	vayomer yo'ab khai ha'elohim ki lulei dibarta ki 'az meihaboqer na'alah ha'am 'ish mei'akharei 'akhiv. 2_samuel 2:28	vayitqa' yo'ab bashofar vaya'amdu kal ha'am velo yirdefu 'od 'akharei yisra'el velo yasefu 'od lehilakhem. 2_samuel 2:29	ve'abner va'anashav halekhu ba'arabah kol halaylah hahu vaya'abru 'et hayarden vayeilekhu kal habitron vayabo'u makhanayim. 2_samuel 2:30	veyo'ab b mei'akharei 'abner vayiqboz 'et kal ha'am vayipaqedu mei'abdei david tish'ah 'asar 'ish va'asah 'el 2_samuel 2:31	ve'abdei david hiku mibinyamin ube'anshei 'abner shelosh mei'ot veshishim 'ish meitu. 2_samuel 2:32	vayis'u 'et 'asah'el vayiqberuhu beqeber 'abiv 'asher bet lakhem vayeilekhu khal halaylah yo'ab va'anashav vayei'or lahem bekhebron. 2_samuel 3:1	vatehi hamilkhamah 'arukah ben bet sha'ul uben bet david vedavid holekh vekhazeq ubet sha'ul holekhim vedalim. 2_samuel 3:2	vayeiledu vayivaledu ledavid banim bekhebron vayhi bekhoro 'amnon la'akhino'am hayizre'eilit. 2_samuel 3:3	umishneihu khil'ab la'abigel la'abigayil 'eishet nabal hakarmeli vehashelishi 'abshalom ben ma'akhah bat talmai melekh geshur. 2_samuel 3:4	veharebi'i 'adoniyah ben khagit vehakhamishi shefatyah ben 'abital. 2_samuel 3:5	vehashishi yitre'am le'eglah 'eishet david 'eleh yuledu ledavid bekhebron. 2_samuel 3:6	vayhi bihyot hamilkhamah ben bet sha'ul uben bet david ve'abner hayah mitkhazeq bebet sha'ul. 2_samuel 3:7	ulesha'ul pilegesh ushemah rizpah bat 'ayah vayomer 'el 'abner madua' batah 'el pilegesh 'abi. 2_samuel 3:8	vayikhar le'abner me'od 'al dibrei 'ish boshet vayomer harosh keleb 'anokhi 'asher lihudah hayom 'e'eseh khesed 'im bet sha'ul 'abikha 'el 'ekhav ve'el meirei'eihu velo himzitikha beyad david vatifqod 'alai 'avon ha'ishah hayom. 2_samuel 3:9	koh ya'aseh 'elohim le'abner vekhoh yosif lo ki ka'asher nishba' yhvh ledavid ki khen 'e'eseh lo. 2_samuel 3:10	leha'abir hamamlakhah mibet sha'ul ulehaqim 'et kisei david 'al yisra'el ve'al yehudah midan ve'ad be'er shaba'. 2_samuel 3:11	velo yakhol 'od lehashib 'et 'abner dabar miyir'ato 'oto. 2_samuel 3:12	vayishlakh 'abner mal'akhim 'el david takhato takhtav leimor lemi 'arez leimor karetah beritekha 'iti vehineh yadi 'imakh lehaseb 'eilekha 'et kal yisra'el. 2_samuel 3:13	vayomer tob 'ani 'ekhrot 'itekha berit 'akh dabar 'ekhad 'anokhi sho'el mei'itekha leimor lo tir'eh 'et panai ki 'im lifnei hebi'akha 'et mikhal bat sha'ul bebo'akha lir'ot 'et panai. 2_samuel 3:14	vayishlakh david mal'akhim 'el 'ish boshet ben sha'ul leimor tenah 'et 'ishti 'et mikhal 'asher 'eirasti li bemei'ah 'arelot pelishtim. 2_samuel 3:15	vayishlakh 'ish boshet vayiqakheha mei'im 'ish mei'im palti'el ben lush layish. 2_samuel 3:16	vayeilekh 'itah 'ishah halokh ubakhoh 'akhareha 'ad bakhurim vayomer 'eilav 'abner lekh shub vayashob. 2_samuel 3:17	udebar 'abner hayah 'im ziqnei yisra'el leimor gam temol gam shilshom heyitem mebaqshim 'et david lemelekh 'aleikhem. 2_samuel 3:18	ve'atah 'asu ki yhvh 'amar 'el david leimor beyad david 'abdi hoshia' 'et 'ami yisra'el miyad pelishtim umiyad kal 'oyebeihem. 2_samuel 3:19	vaydaber gam 'abner be'azenei binyamin vayeilekh gam 'abner ledaber be'azenei david bekhebron 'et kal 'asher tob be'einei yisra'el ube'einei kal bet binyamin. 2_samuel 3:20	vayabo 'abner 'el david khebron ve'ito 'esrim 'anashim vaya'as david le'abner vela'anashim 'asher 'ito mishteh. 2_samuel 3:21	vayomer 'abner 'el david 'aqumah ve'eileikhah ve'eqbezah 'el 'adoni hamelekh 'et kal yisra'el veyikhretu 'itekha berit umalakhta bekhol 'asher te'aveh nafshekha vayeshalakh david 'et 'abner vayeilekh beshalom. 2_samuel 3:22	vehineh 'abdei david veyo'ab ba meihagedud veshalal rab 'imam heibi'u ve'abner 'einenu 'im david bekhebron ki shilekho vayeilekh beshalom. 2_samuel 3:23	veyo'ab vekhal hazaba 'asher 'ito ba'u vayagidu leyo'ab leimor ba 'abner ben ner 'el hamelekh vayshalekheihu vayeilekh beshalom. 2_samuel 3:24	vayabo yo'ab 'el hamelekh vayomer meh 'asitah hineh ba 'abner 'eilekha lamah zeh shilakhto vayeilekh halokh. 2_samuel 3:25	yada'ta 'et 'abner ben ner ki lefatotekha ba velada'at 'et moza'akha ve'et mibo'ekha moba'ekha velada'at 'et kal 'asher 'atah 'oseh. 2_samuel 3:26	vayeizei yo'ab mei'im david vayishlakh mal'akhim 'akharei 'abner vayashibu 'oto mibor hasirah vedavid lo yada'. 2_samuel 3:27	vayashab 'abner khebron vayateihu yo'ab 'el tokh hasha'ar ledaber 'ito basheli vayakeihu sham hakhomesh vayamat bedam 'asah 'el 'akhiv. 2_samuel 3:28	vayishma' david mei'akharei khen vayomer naqi 'anokhi umamlakhti mei'im yhvh 'ad 'olam midemei 'abner ben ner. 2_samuel 3:29	yakhulu 'al rosh yo'ab ve'el kal bet 'abiv ve'al yikaret mibet yo'ab zab umezora' umakhaziq bapelekh venofel bakhereb vakhasar lakhem. 2_samuel 3:30	veyo'ab va'abishai 'akhiv haregu le'abner 'al 'asher heimit 'et 'asah'el 'akhihem begib'on bamilkhamah. 2_samuel 3:31	vayomer david 'el yo'ab ve'el kal ha'am 'asher 'ito qir'u bigdeikhem vekhigru saqim vesifdu lifnei 'abner vehamelekh david holekh 'akharei hamitah. 2_samuel 3:32	vayiqberu 'et 'abner bekhebron vayisa hamelekh 'et qolo vayeibek 'el qeber 'abner vayibku kal ha'am. 2_samuel 3:33	vayqonen hamelekh 'el 'abner vayomar hakemot nabal yamut 'abner. 2_samuel 3:34	yadekha lo 'asurot veraglekha lo linkhushtayim hugashu kinfol lifnei benei 'avlah nafaleta vayosifu khal ha'am libkot 'alav. 2_samuel 3:35	vayabo khal ha'am lehabrot 'et david lekhem be'od hayom vayishaba' david leimor koh ya'aseh li 'elohim vekhoh yosif ki 'im lifnei bo hashemesh 'et'am lekhem 'o khal me'umah. 2_samuel 3:36	vekhal ha'am hikiru vayitab be'eineihem kekhol 'asher 'asah hamelekh be'einei khal ha'am tob. 2_samuel 3:37	vayeide'u khal ha'am vekhal yisra'el bayom hahu ki lo hayetah meihamelekh lehamit 'et 'abner ben ner. 2_samuel 3:38	vayomer hamelekh 'el 'abadav halo teide'u ki sar vegadol nafal hayom hazeh beyisra'el. 2_samuel 3:39	ve'anokhi hayom rakh umashuakh melekh veha'anashim ha'eleh benei zeruyah qashim mimeni yeshalem yhvh le'oseh hara'ah kera'ato. 2_samuel 4:1	vayishma' ben sha'ul ki met 'abner bekhebron vayirpu yadav vekhal yisra'el nibhalu. 2_samuel 4:2	ushenei 'anashim sarei gedudim hayu ben sha'ul shem ha'ekhad ba'anah veshem hasheini reikhab benei rimon habe'eroti mibenei binyamin ki gam be'eirot teikhasheb 'al binyamin. 2_samuel 4:3	vayibrekhu habe'eirotim gitayemah vayihyu sham garim 'ad hayom hazeh. 2_samuel 4:4	velihonatan ben sha'ul ben nekheh raglayim ben khamesh shanim hayah bebo shemu'at sha'ul vihonatan miyizre'el vatisa'eihu 'omanto vatanos vayhi bekhafezah lanus vayipol vayipaseiakh ushemo mefiboshet. 2_samuel 4:5	vayeilekhu benei rimon habe'eiroti reikhab uba'anah vayabo'u kekhom hayom 'el bet 'ish boshet vehu shokheb 'et mishkab hazahorayim. 2_samuel 4:6	vehenah ba'u 'ad tokh habayit loqekhei khitim vayakuhu 'el hakhomesh vereikhab uba'anah 'akhiv nimlatu. 2_samuel 4:7	vayabo'u habayit vehu shokheb 'al mitato bakhadar mishkabo vayakuhu vaymituhu vayasiru 'et rosho vayiqkhu 'et rosho vayeilekhu derekh ha'arabah kal halayelah. 2_samuel 4:8	vayabi'u 'et rosh 'ish boshet 'el david khebron vayomeru 'el hamelekh hineh rosh 'ish boshet ben sha'ul 'oyibkha 'asher biqesh 'et nafshekha vayiten yhvh ladoni hamelekh neqamot hayom hazeh misha'ul umizar'o. 2_samuel 4:9	vaya'an david 'et reikhab ve'et ba'anah 'akhiv benei rimon habe'eiroti vayomer lahem khai yhvh 'asher padah 'et nafshi mikal zarah. 2_samuel 4:10	ki hamagid li leimor hineh met sha'ul vehu hayah khimbaser be'einav va'okhazah bo va'ehregeihu beziqlag 'asher letiti lo besorah. 2_samuel 4:11	'af ki 'anashim resha'im haregu 'et 'ish zadiq bebeito 'al mishkabo ve'atah halo 'abaqesh 'et damo miyedkhem ubi'arti 'etkhem min ha'arez. 2_samuel 4:12	vayzav david 'et hane'arim vayahargum vayqazezu 'et yedeihem ve'et ragleihem vayitlu 'al habereikhah bekhebron ve'et rosh 'ish boshet laqakhu vayiqberu beqeber 'abner bekhebron. 2_samuel 5:1	vayabo'u kal shibtei yisra'el 'el david khebronah vayomeru leimor hinu 'azmekha ubesarekha 'anakhenu. 2_samuel 5:2	gam 'etmol gam shilshom bihyot sha'ul melekh 'aleinu 'atah hayitah hayita mozi hamozi vehameibi vehameibi 'et yisra'el vayomer yhvh lekha 'atah tir'eh 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el ve'atah tihyeh lenagid 'al yisra'el. 2_samuel 5:3	vayabo'u kal ziqnei yisra'el 'el hamelekh khebronah vayikhrot lahem hamelekh david berit bekhebron lifnei yhvh vayimshekhu 'et david lemelekh 'al yisra'el. 2_samuel 5:4	ben sheloshim shanah david bemalekho 'arba'im shanah malakh. 2_samuel 5:5	bekhebron malakh 'al yehudah sheba' shanim veshishah khodashim ubirushalim malakh sheloshim veshalosh shanah 'al kal yisra'el vihudah. 2_samuel 5:6	vayeilekh hamelekh va'anashav yerushalim 'el haybusi yosheb ha'arez vayomer ledavid leimor lo tabo henah ki 'im hesirekha ha'ivrim vehapiskhim leimor lo yabo david henah. 2_samuel 5:7	vayilkod david 'et mezudat ziyon hi 'ir david. 2_samuel 5:8	vayomer david bayom hahu kal makeh yebusi veyiga' bazinor ve'et hapiskhim ve'et ha'ivrim seno senu'ei nefesh david 'al ken yomeru 'iver ufiseiakh lo yabo 'el habayit. 2_samuel 5:9	vayeisheb david bamezudah vayiqra lah 'ir david vayiben david sabib min hamilo vabayetah. 2_samuel 5:10	vayeilekh david halokh vegadol yhvh 'elohei zeba'ot 'imo. 2_samuel 5:11	vayishlakh khiram melekh zor mal'akhim 'el david va'azei 'arazim vekharashei 'ez vekharashei 'eben qir vayibnu bayit ledavid. 2_samuel 5:12	vayeida' david ki hekhino yhvh lemelekh 'al yisra'el vekhi nisei mamlakhto ba'abur 'amo yisra'el. 2_samuel 5:13	vayiqakh david 'od pilagshim venashim mirushalim 'akharei bo'o meikhebron vayivaledu 'od ledavid banim ubanot. 2_samuel 5:14	ve'eleh shemot hayilodim lo birushalim shamua' veshobab venatan ushelomoh. 2_samuel 5:15	veyibkhar ve'elishua' venefeg veyafia'. 2_samuel 5:16	ve'elishama' ve'elyada' ve'elifalet. 2_samuel 5:17	vayishme'u felishtim ki mashekhu 'et david lemelekh 'al yisra'el vaya'alu khal pelishtim lebaqesh 'et david vayishma' david vayeired 'el hamezudah. 2_samuel 5:18	ufelishtim ba'u vayinateshu be'eimeq refa'im. 2_samuel 5:19	vayish'al david yhvh leimor ha'e'eleh 'el pelishtim hatitenem beyadi vayomer yhvh 'el david 'aleh ki naton 'eten 'et hapelishtim beyadekha. 2_samuel 5:20	vayabo david beba'al perazim vayakem sham david vayomer paraz yhvh 'et 'oyebai lefanai keferez mayim 'al ken qara shem hamaqom hahu ba'al perazim. 2_samuel 5:21	vaya'azbu sham 'et 'azabeihem vayisa'em david va'anashav. 2_samuel 5:22	vayosifu 'od pelishtim la'alot vayinateshu be'eimeq refa'im. 2_samuel 5:23	vayish'al david yhvh vayomer lo ta'aleh haseb 'el 'akhareihem ubata lahem mimul bekha'im. 2_samuel 5:24	vihi beshame'akha keshame'akha 'et qol ze'adah berashei habekha'im 'az tekheraz ki 'az yaza yhvh lefanekha lehakot bemakhaneh felishtim. 2_samuel 5:25	vaya'as david ken ka'asher zivahu yhvh vayakh 'et pelishtim migeba' 'ad bo'akha gazer. 2_samuel 6:1	vayosef 'od david 'et kal bakhur beyisra'el sheloshim 'alef. 2_samuel 6:2	vayaqam vayeilekh david vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito miba'alei yehudah leha'alot misham 'et 'aron ha'elohim 'asher niqra shem shem yhvh zeba'ot yosheb hakerubim 'alav. 2_samuel 6:3	vayarkibu 'et 'aron ha'elohim 'el 'agalah khadashah vayisa'uhu mibet 'abinadab 'asher bagib'ah ve'uza ve'akhyo benei 'abinadab nohagim 'et ha'agalah khadashah. 2_samuel 6:4	vayisa'uhu mibet 'abinadab 'asher bagib'ah 'im 'aron ha'elohim ve'akhyo holekh lifnei ha'aron. 2_samuel 6:5	vedavid vekhal bet yisra'el mesakhaqim lifnei yhvh bekhol 'azei beroshim ubekhinorot ubinbalim ubetupim ubimna'an'im ubezelzelim. 2_samuel 6:6	vayabo'u 'ad goren nakhon vayishlakh 'uza 'el 'aron ha'elohim vayokhez bo ki shametu habaqar. 2_samuel 6:7	vayikhar 'af yhvh be'uzah vayakeihu sham ha'elohim 'al hashal vayamat sham 'im 'aron ha'elohim. 2_samuel 6:8	vayikhar ledavid 'al 'asher paraz yhvh perez be'uzah vayiqra lamaqom hahu perez 'uzah 'ad hayom hazeh. 2_samuel 6:9	vayira david 'et yhvh bayom hahu vayomer 'ekh yabo 'eilai 'aron yhvh. 2_samuel 6:10	velo 'abah david lehasir 'eilav 'et 'aron yhvh 'al 'ir david vayateihu david bet 'obed 'edom hagiti. 2_samuel 6:11	vayeisheb 'aron yhvh bet 'obed 'edom hagiti sheloshah khodashim vaybarekh yhvh 'et 'obed 'edom ve'et kal beito. 2_samuel 6:12	vayugad lamelekh david leimor beirakh yhvh 'et bet 'obed 'edom ve'et kal 'asher lo ba'abur 'aron ha'elohim vayeilekh david vaya'al 'et 'aron ha'elohim mibet 'obed 'edom 'ir david besimkhah. 2_samuel 6:13	vayhi ki za'adu nose'ei 'aron yhvh shishah ze'adim vayizbakh shor umeri. 2_samuel 6:14	vedavid mekharker bekhal 'oz lifnei yhvh vedavid khagur 'eifod bad. 2_samuel 6:15	vedavid vekhal bet yisra'el ma'alim 'et 'aron yhvh bitru'ah ubeqol shofar. 2_samuel 6:16	vehayah 'aron yhvh ba 'ir david umikhal bat sha'ul nishqefah be'ad hakhalon vateire 'et hamelekh david mefazez umekharker lifnei yhvh vatibez lo belibah. 2_samuel 6:17	vayabi'u 'et 'aron yhvh vayazigu 'oto bimqomo betokh ha'ohel 'asher natah lo david vaya'al david 'olot lifnei yhvh ushelamim. 2_samuel 6:18	vaykhal david meiha'alot ha'olah vehashelamim vaybarekh 'et ha'am beshem yhvh zeba'ot. 2_samuel 6:19	vaykhaleq lekhal ha'am lekhal hamon yisra'el lemei'ish ve'ad 'ishah le'ish khalat lekhem 'akhat ve'eshpar 'ekhad va'ashishah 'ekhat vayeilekh kal ha'am 'ish lebeito. 2_samuel 6:20	vayashab david lebarekh 'et beito vateizei mikhal bat sha'ul liqrat david vatomer mah nikhbad hayom melekh yisra'el 'asher niglah hayom le'einei 'amhot 'abadav kehigalot niglot 'akhad hareiqim. 2_samuel 6:21	vayomer david 'el mikhal lifnei yhvh 'asher bakhar bi mei'abikh umikal beito lezavot 'oti nagid 'al 'am yhvh 'al yisra'el vesikhaqti lifnei yhvh. 2_samuel 6:22	uneqaloti 'od mizot vehayiti shafal be'einai ve'im ha'amahot 'asher 'amart 'imam 'ikabeidah. 2_samuel 6:23	ulemikhal bat sha'ul lo hayah lah yaled 'ad yom motah. 2_samuel 7:1	vayhi ki yashab hamelekh bebeito yhvh heiniakh lo misabib mikal 'oyebav. 2_samuel 7:2	vayomer hamelekh 'el natan hanabi re'eh na 'anokhi yosheb bebet 'arazim va'aron ha'elohim yosheb betokh hayri'ah. 2_samuel 7:3	vayomer natan 'el hamelekh kol 'asher bilbabekha lekh 'aseh ki yhvh 'imakh. 2_samuel 7:4	vayhi balaylah hahu vayhi debar yhvh 'el natan leimor. 2_samuel 7:5	lekh ve'amarta 'el 'abdi 'el david koh 'amar yhvh ha'atah tibneh li bayit leshibti. 2_samuel 7:6	ki lo yashabti bebayit lemiyom ha'aloti 'et benei yisra'el mimizrayim ve'ad hayom hazeh va'ehyeh mithalekh be'ohel ubemishkan. 2_samuel 7:7	bekhol 'asher hithalakhti bekhal benei yisra'el hadabar dibarti 'et 'akhad shibtei yisra'el 'asher ziviti lir'ot 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el leimor lamah lo benitem li bet 'arazim. 2_samuel 7:8	ve'atah koh tomar le'abdi ledavid koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'ani leqakhtikha min hanaveh mei'akhar hazon lihyot nagid 'al 'ami 'al yisra'el. 2_samuel 7:9	va'ehyeh 'imekha bekhol 'asher halakhta va'akhritah 'et kal 'oyebekha mipanekha ve'asiti lekha shem gadol keshem hagedolim 'asher ba'arez. 2_samuel 7:10	vesamti maqom le'ami leyisra'el uneta'tiv veshakhan takhtav velo yirgaz 'od velo yosifu benei 'avlah le'anoto ka'asher barishonah. 2_samuel 7:11	ulemin hayom 'asher ziviti shofetim 'al 'ami yisra'el vahanikhoti lekha mikal 'oyebekha vehigid lekha yhvh ki bayit ya'aseh lekha yhvh. 2_samuel 7:12	ki yimle'u yamekha veshakhabta 'et 'abotekha vahaqimoti 'et zar'akha 'akharekha 'asher yeizei mimei'ekha vahakhinoti 'et mamlakhto. 2_samuel 7:13	hu yibneh bayit lishmi vekhonanti 'et kisei mamlakhto 'ad 'olam. 2_samuel 7:14	'ani 'ehyeh lo le'ab vehu yihyeh li leben 'asher beha'avoto vehokhakhtiv besheibet 'anashim ubenig'ei benei 'adam. 2_samuel 7:15	vekhasdi lo yasur mimenu ka'asher hasiroti mei'im sha'ul 'asher hasiroti milefanekha. 2_samuel 7:16	vene'man beitekha umamlakhtekha 'ad 'olam lefanekha kis'akha yihyeh nakhon 'ad 'olam. 2_samuel 7:17	kekhol hadebarim ha'eleh ukhekhol hakhizayon hazeh ken diber natan 'el david. 2_samuel 7:18	vayabo hamelekh david vayeisheb lifnei yhvh vayomer mi 'anokhi 'adonai yhvh umi beiti ki habi'otani 'ad halom. 2_samuel 7:19	vatiqtan 'od zot be'einekha 'adonai yhvh vatedaber gam 'el bet 'abdekha lemeirakhoq vezot torat ha'adam 'adonai yhvh. 2_samuel 7:20	umah yosif david 'od ledaber 'eilekha ve'atah yada'ta 'et 'abdekha 'adonai yhvh. 2_samuel 7:21	ba'abur debarekha ukhelibekha 'asita 'et kal hagedulah hazot lehodia' 'et 'abdekha. 2_samuel 7:22	'al ken gadalta 'adonai yhvh ki 'en kamokha ve'en 'elohim zulatekha bekhol 'asher shama'nu be'azeneinu. 2_samuel 7:23	umi khe'amekha keyisra'el go 'ekhad ba'arez 'asher halekhu 'elohim lifdot lo le'am velasum lo shem vela'asot lakhem hagedulah venora'ot le'arzekha mipenei 'amekha 'asher padita lekha mimizrayim goyim veilohav. 2_samuel 7:24	vatekhonen lekha 'et 'amekha yisra'el lekha le'am 'ad 'olam ve'atah yhvh hayita lahem leilohim. 2_samuel 7:25	ve'atah yhvh 'elohim hadabar 'asher dibarta 'al 'abdekha ve'al beito haqem 'ad 'olam va'aseh ka'asher dibarta. 2_samuel 7:26	veyigdal shimkha 'ad 'olam leimor yhvh zeba'ot 'elohim 'al yisra'el ubet 'abdekha david yihyeh nakhon lefanekha. 2_samuel 7:27	ki 'atah yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el galitah 'et 'ozen 'abdekha leimor bayit 'ebneh lakh 'al ken maza 'abdekha 'et libo lehitpalel 'eilekha 'et hatefilah hazot. 2_samuel 7:28	ve'atah 'adonai yhvh 'atah hu ha'elohim udebarekha yihyu 'emet vatedaber 'el 'abdekha 'et hatobah hazot. 2_samuel 7:29	ve'atah ho'el ubarekh 'et bet 'abdekha lihyot le'olam lefanekha ki 'atah 'adonai yhvh dibarta umibirkhatekha yeborakh bet 'abdekha le'olam. 2_samuel 8:1	vayhi 'akharei khen vayakh david 'et pelishtim vayakhni'em vayiqakh david 'et meteg ha'amah miyad pelishtim. 2_samuel 8:2	vayakh 'et mo'ab vaymadedem bakhebel hashkeb 'otam 'arzah vaymaded shenei khabalim lehamit umelo hakhebel lehakhayot vatehi mo'ab ledavid la'abadim nose'ei minkhah. 2_samuel 8:3	vayakh david 'et hadad'ezer ben rekhob melekh zobah belekhto lehashib yado binhar perat 2_samuel 8:4	vayilkod david mimenu 'elef usheba' mei'ot parashim ve'esrim 'elef 'ish ragli vai'aqer david 'et kal harekheb vayoter mimenu mei'ah rakheb. 2_samuel 8:5	vatabo 'aram dameseq la'zor lahadad'ezer melekh zobah vayakh david ba'aram 'esrim ushenayim 'elef 'ish. 2_samuel 8:6	vayasem david nezibim ba'aram dameseq vatehi 'aram ledavid la'abadim nos'ei minkhah vayosha' yhvh 'et david bekhol 'asher halakh. 2_samuel 8:7	vayiqakh david 'et shiltei hazahab 'asher hayu 'el 'abdei hadad'azer vaybi'em yerushalim. 2_samuel 8:8	umibetakh umibeirotai 'arei hadad'azer laqakh hamelekh david nekhoshet harbeh me'od. 2_samuel 8:9	vayishma' to'i melekh khamat ki hikah david 'et kal khel hadad'azer. 2_samuel 8:10	vayishlakh to'i 'et yoram beno 'el hamelekh david lish'al lo leshalom ulebarakho 'al 'asher nilkham bahadad'ezer vayakeihu ki 'ish milkhamot to'i hayah hadad'azer ubeyado hayu kelei khesef ukhelei zahab ukhelei nekhoshet. 2_samuel 8:11	gam 'otam hiqdish hamelekh david yhvh 'im hakesef vehazahab 'asher hiqdish mikal hagoyim 'asher kibesh. 2_samuel 8:12	mei'aram umimo'ab umibenei 'amon umipelishtim umei'amaleq umishelal hadad'ezer ben rekhob melekh zobah. 2_samuel 8:13	vaya'as david shem beshubo meihakoto 'et 'aram begei melakh shemonah 'asar 'alef. 2_samuel 8:14	vayasem be'edom nezibim bekhal 'edom sam nezibim vayhi khal 'edom 'abadim ledavid vayosha' yhvh 'et david bekhol 'asher halakh. 2_samuel 8:15	vayimlokh david 'al kal yisra'el vayhi david 'oseh mishpat uzedaqah lekhal 'amo. 2_samuel 8:16	veyo'ab ben zeruyah 'al hazaba vihoshafat ben 'akhilud mazkir. 2_samuel 8:17	vezadoq ben 'akhitub va'akhimelekh ben 'ebyatar kohanim userayah sofer. 2_samuel 8:18	ubenayahu ben yehoyada' vehakereiti vehapeleiti ubenei david kohanim hayu. 2_samuel 9:1	vayomer david hakhi yesh 'od 'asher notar lebet sha'ul ve'e'eseh 'imo khesed ba'abur yehonatan. 2_samuel 9:2	ulebet sha'ul 'ebed ushemo ziba vayiqre'u lo 'el david vayomer hamelekh 'eilav ha'atah ziba vayomer 'abdekha. 2_samuel 9:3	vayomer hamelekh ha'efes 'od 'ish lebet sha'ul ve'e'eseh 'imo khesed 'elohim vayomer ziba 'el hamelekh 'od ben lihonatan nekheh raglayim. 2_samuel 9:4	vayomer lo hamelekh 'eifoh hu vayomer ziba 'el hamelekh hineh hu bet makhir ben 'ami'el belo debar. 2_samuel 9:5	vayishlakh hamelekh david vayiqakheihu mibet makhir ben 'ami'el milo debar. 2_samuel 9:6	vayabo mefiboshet ben yehonatan ben sha'ul 'el david vayipol 'al panav vayishtakhu vayomer david mefiboshet vayomer hineh 'abdekha. 2_samuel 9:7	vayomer lo david 'al tira ki 'asoh 'e'eseh 'imekha khesed ba'abur yehonatan 'abikha vahashiboti lekha 'et kal sedeh sha'ul 'abikha ve'atah tokhal lekhem 'al shulkhani tamid. 2_samuel 9:8	vayishtakhu vayomer meh 'abdekha ki fanita 'el hakeleb hamet 'asher kamoni. 2_samuel 9:9	vayiqra hamelekh 'el ziba na'ar sha'ul vayomer 'eilav kol 'asher hayah lesha'ul ulekhal beito natati leben 'adonekha. 2_samuel 9:10	ve'abadta lo 'et ha'adamah 'atah ubanekha va'abadekha veheibeita vehayah leben 'adonekha lekhem va'akhalo umefiboshet ben 'adonekha yokhal tamid lekhem 'al shulkhani uleziba khamishah 'asar banim ve'esrim 'abadim. 2_samuel 9:11	vayomer ziba 'el hamelekh kekhol 'asher yezaveh 'adoni hamelekh 'et 'abdo ken ya'aseh 'abdekha umefiboshet 'okhel 'al shulkhani ke'akhad mibenei hamelekh. 2_samuel 9:12	velimfiboshet ben qatan ushemo mikha vekhol moshab bet ziba 'abadim limfiboshet. 2_samuel 9:13	umefiboshet yosheb birushalim ki 'al shulkhan hamelekh tamid hu 'okhel vehu piseiakh shetei raglav. 2_samuel 10:1	vayhi 'akharei khen vayamat melekh benei 'amon vayimlokh khanun beno takhtav. 2_samuel 10:2	vayomer david 'e'eseh khesed 'im khanun ben nakhash ka'asher 'asah 'abiv 'imadi khesed vayishlakh david lenakhamo beyad 'abadav 'el 'abiv vayabo'u 'abdei david 'erez benei 'amon. 2_samuel 10:3	vayomeru sarei benei 'amon 'el khanun 'adoneihem hamkhabed david 'et 'abikha be'einekha ki shalakh lekha menakhamim halo ba'abur khaqor 'et ha'ir uleragelah ulehafekhah shalakh david 'et 'abadav 'eilekha. 2_samuel 10:4	vayiqakh khanun 'et 'abdei david vaygalakh 'et khazi zeqanam vayikhrot 'et madveihem bakheizi 'ad shetoteihem vayshalekhem. 2_samuel 10:5	vayagidu ledavid vayishlakh liqratam ki hayu ha'anashim nikhlamim me'od vayomer hamelekh shebu bireikho 'ad yezamakh zeqankhem veshabtem. 2_samuel 10:6	vayir'u benei 'amon ki nib'ashu bedavid vayishlekhu benei 'amon vayiskeru 'et 'aram bet rekhob ve'et 'aram zoba 'esrim 'elef ragli ve'et melekh ma'akhah 'elef 'ish ve'ish tob shenem 'asar 'elef 'ish. 2_samuel 10:7	vayishma' david vayishlakh 'et yo'ab ve'et kal hazaba hagiborim. 2_samuel 10:8	vayeize'u benei 'amon vaya'arkhu milkhamah petakh hasha'ar va'aram zoba urekhob ve'ish tob uma'akhah lebadam basadeh. 2_samuel 10:9	vayar yo'ab ki hayetah 'eilav penei hamilkhamah mipanim umei'akhor vayibkhar mikol bekhurei beyisra'el yisra'el vaya'arokh liqrat 'aram. 2_samuel 10:10	ve'et yeter ha'am natan beyad 'abshai 'akhiv vaya'arokh liqrat benei 'amon. 2_samuel 10:11	vayomer 'im tekhezaq 'aram mimeni vehayitah li lishu'ah ve'im benei 'amon yekhezqu mimekha vehalakhti lehoshia' lakh. 2_samuel 10:12	khazaq venitkhazaq be'ad 'ameinu ube'ad 'arei 'eloheinu yhvh ya'aseh hatob be'einav. 2_samuel 10:13	vayigash yo'ab veha'am 'asher 'imo lamilkhamah ba'aram vayanusu mipanav. 2_samuel 10:14	ubenei 'amon ra'u ki nas 'aram vayanusu mipenei 'abishai vayabo'u ha'ir vayashab yo'ab mei'al benei 'amon vayabo yerushalim. 2_samuel 10:15	vayar 'aram ki nigaf lifnei yisra'el vayei'asefu yakhad. 2_samuel 10:16	vayishlakh hadad'ezer vayozei 'et 'aram 'asher mei'eiber hanahar vayabo'u kheilam veshobakh sar zeba hadad'ezer lifneihem. 2_samuel 10:17	vayugad ledavid vaye'esof 'et kal yisra'el vaya'abor 'et hayarden vayabo kheilamah vaya'arkhu 'aram liqrat david vayilakhamu 'imo. 2_samuel 10:18	vayanas 'aram mipenei yisra'el vayaharog david mei'aram sheba' mei'ot rekheb ve'arba'im 'elef parashim ve'et shobakh sar zeba'o hikah vayamat sham. 2_samuel 10:19	vayir'u khal hamelakhim 'abdei hadad'ezer ki nigefu lifnei yisra'el vayashlimu 'et yisra'el vaya'abdum vayir'u 'aram lehoshia' 'od 'et benei 'amon. 2_samuel 11:1	vayhi litshubat hashanah le'et zet hamalkhim vayishlakh david 'et yo'ab ve'et 'abadav 'imo ve'et kal yisra'el vayashkhitu 'et benei 'amon vayazuru 'al rabah vedavid yosheb birushalim. 2_samuel 11:2	vayhi le'et ha'ereb vayaqam david mei'al mishkabo vayithalekh 'al gag bet hamelekh vayar 'ishah rokhezet mei'al hagag veha'ishah tobat mar'eh me'od. 2_samuel 11:3	vayishlakh david vayidrosh la'ishah vayomer halo zot bat sheba' bat 'eli'am 'eishet 'uriyah hakhiti. 2_samuel 11:4	vayishlakh david mal'akhim vayiqakheha vatabo 'eilav vayishkab 'imah vehi mitqadeshet mitum'atah vatashab 'el beitah. 2_samuel 11:5	vatahar ha'ishah vatishlakh vataged ledavid vatomer harah 'anokhi. 2_samuel 11:6	vayishlakh david 'el yo'ab shelakh 'eilai 'et 'uriyah hakhiti vayishlakh yo'ab 'et 'uriyah 'el david. 2_samuel 11:7	vayabo 'uriyah 'eilav vayish'al david lishlom yo'ab velishlom ha'am velishlom hamilkhamah. 2_samuel 11:8	vayomer david le'uriyah red lebeitekha urekhaz raglekha vayeizei 'uriyah mibet hamelekh vateizei 'akharav mas'at hamelekh. 2_samuel 11:9	vayishkab 'uriyah petakh bet hamelekh 'et kal 'abdei 'adonav velo yarad 'el beito. 2_samuel 11:10	vayagidu ledavid leimor lo yarad 'uriyah 'el beito vayomer david 'el 'uriyah halo miderekh 'atah ba madua' lo yaradta 'el beitekha. 2_samuel 11:11	vayomer 'uriyah 'el david ha'aron veyisra'el vihudah yoshebim basukot vadoni yo'ab ve'abdei 'adoni 'al penei hasadeh khonim va'ani 'abo 'el beiti le'ekhol velishtot velishkab 'im 'ishti khayekha vekhei nafshekha 'im 'e'eseh 'et hadabar hazeh. 2_samuel 11:12	vayomer david 'el 'uriyah sheb bazeh gam hayom umakhar 'ashalekheka vayeisheb 'uriyah birushalim bayom hahu umimakhorat. 2_samuel 11:13	vayiqra lo david vayokhal lefanav vayeishet vayshakereihu vayeizei ba'ereb lishkab bemishkabo 'im 'abdei 'adonav ve'el beito lo yarad. 2_samuel 11:14	vayhi baboqer vayikhtob david seifer 'el yo'ab vayishlakh beyad 'uriyah. 2_samuel 11:15	vayikhtob baseifer leimor habu 'et 'uriyah 'el mul penei hamilkhamah hakhazaqah veshabtem mei'akharav venikah vamet. 2_samuel 11:16	vayhi bishmor yo'ab 'el ha'ir vayiten 'et 'uriyah 'el hamaqom 'asher yada' ki 'anshei khayil sham. 2_samuel 11:17	vayeize'u 'anshei ha'ir vayilakhamu 'et yo'ab vayipol min ha'am mei'abdei david vayamat gam 'uriyah hakhiti. 2_samuel 11:18	vayishlakh yo'ab vayaged ledavid 'et kal dibrei hamilkhamah. 2_samuel 11:19	vayzav 'et hamal'akh leimor kekhalotkha 'et kal dibrei hamilkhamah ledaber 'el hamelekh. 2_samuel 11:20	vehayah 'im ta'aleh khamat hamelekh ve'amar lekha madua' nigashtem 'el ha'ir lehilakhem halo yeda'tem 'et 'asher yoru mei'al hakhomah. 2_samuel 11:21	mi hikah 'et 'abimelekh ben yerubeshet halo 'ishah hishlikhah 'alav pelakh rekheb mei'al hakhomah vayamat beteibez lamah nigashtem 'el hakhomah ve'amarta gam 'abdekha 'uriyah hakhiti met. 2_samuel 11:22	vayeilekh hamal'akh vayabo vayaged ledavid 'et kal 'asher shelakho yo'ab. 2_samuel 11:23	vayomer hamal'akh 'el david ki gaberu 'aleinu ha'anashim vayeize'u 'eileinu hasadeh vanihyeh 'aleihem 'ad petakh hasha'ar. 2_samuel 11:24	vayore'u vayoru hamor'im hamorim 'el 'abadekha mei'al hakhomah vayamutu mei'abdei hamelekh vegam 'abdekha 'uriyah hakhiti met. 2_samuel 11:25	vayomer david 'el hamal'akh koh tomar 'el yo'ab 'al yeira' be'einekha 'et hadabar hazeh ki khazoh vekhazeh tokhal hekhareb hakhazeq milkhamtekha 'el ha'ir veharesah vekhazeqeihu. 2_samuel 11:26	vatishma' 'eishet 'uriyah ki met 'uriyah 'ishah vatispod 'al ba'lah. 2_samuel 11:27	vaya'abor ha'eibel vayishlakh david vaya'asfah 'el beito vatehi lo le'ishah vateiled lo ben vayeira' hadabar 'asher 'asah david be'einei yhvh. 2_samuel 12:1	vayishlakh yhvh 'et natan 'el david vayabo 'eilav vayomer lo shenei 'anashim hayu be'ir 'ekhat 'ekhad 'ashir ve'ekhad rash. 2_samuel 12:2	le'ashir hayah zon ubaqar harbeh me'od. 2_samuel 12:3	velarash 'en kol ki 'im kibsah 'akhat qetanah 'asher qanah vaykhayeha vatigdal 'imo ve'im banav yakhdav mipito tokhal umikoso tishteh ubekheiqo tishkab vatehi lo kebat. 2_samuel 12:4	vayabo heilekh le'ish he'ashir vayakhmol laqakhat mizono umibeqaro la'asot la'oreiakh haba lo vayiqakh 'et kibsat ha'ish harash vaya'aseha la'ish haba 'eilav. 2_samuel 12:5	vayikhar 'af david ba'ish me'od vayomer 'el natan khai yhvh ki ben mavet ha'ish ha'oseh zot. 2_samuel 12:6	ve'et hakibsah yeshalem 'arba'tayim 'eiqeb 'asher 'asah 'et hadabar hazeh ve'al 'asher lo khamal. 2_samuel 12:7	vayomer natan 'el david 'atah ha'ish koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'anokhi meshakhtikha lemelekh 'al yisra'el ve'anokhi hizaltikha miyad sha'ul. 2_samuel 12:8	va'etenah lekha 'et bet 'adonekha ve'et neshei 'adonekha bekheiqekha va'etenah lekha 'et bet yisra'el vihudah ve'im me'at ve'osifah lekha kahenah vekhahenah. 2_samuel 12:9	madua' bazita 'et debar yhvh la'asot hara' be'eino be'einai 'et 'uriyah hakhiti hikita bakhereb ve'et 'ishto laqakhta lekha le'ishah ve'oto haragta bekhereb benei 'amon. 2_samuel 12:10	ve'atah lo tasur khereb mibeitekha 'ad 'olam 'eiqeb ki bezitani vatiqakh 'et 'eishet 'uriyah hakhiti lihyot lekha le'ishah. 2_samuel 12:11	koh 'amar yhvh hini meiqim 'alekha ra'ah mibeitekha velaqakhti 'et nashekha le'einekha venatati lerei'ekha veshakhab 'im nashekha le'einei hashemesh hazot. 2_samuel 12:12	ki 'atah 'asita basater va'ani 'e'eseh 'et hadabar hazeh neged kal yisra'el veneged hashamesh. 2_samuel 12:13	vayomer david 'el natan khatati yhvh vayomer natan 'el david gam yhvh he'ebir khatatekha lo tamut. 2_samuel 12:14	'efes ki ni'ez ni'azta 'et 'oyebei yhvh badabar hazeh gam haben hayilod lekha mot yamut. 2_samuel 12:15	vayeilekh natan 'el beito vayigof yhvh 'et hayeled 'asher yaledah 'eishet 'uriyah ledavid vayei'anash. 2_samuel 12:16	vaybaqesh david 'et ha'elohim be'ad hana'ar vayazam david zom uba velan veshakhab 'arezah. 2_samuel 12:17	vayaqumu ziqnei beito 'alav lahaqimo min ha'arez velo 'abah velo bara 'itam lakhem. 2_samuel 12:18	vayhi bayom hashebi'i vayamat hayaled vayir'u 'abdei david lehagid lo ki met hayeled ki 'ameru hineh bihyot hayeled khai dibarnu 'eilav velo shama' beqoleinu ve'ekh nomar 'eilav met hayeled ve'asah ra'ah. 2_samuel 12:19	vayar david ki 'abadav mitlakhashim vayaben david ki met hayaled vayomer david 'el 'abadav hamet hayeled vayomeru met. 2_samuel 12:20	vayaqam david meiha'arez vayirkhaz vayasekh vaykhalef simloto simlotav vayabo bet yhvh vayishtakhu vayabo 'el beito vayish'al vayasimu lo lekhem vayokhal. 2_samuel 12:21	vayomeru 'abadav 'eilav mah hadabar hazeh 'asher 'asitah ba'abur hayeled khai zamta vateibek vekha'asher met hayeled qamta vatokhal lakhem. 2_samuel 12:22	vayomer be'od hayeled khai zamti va'ebkeh ki 'amarti mi yodeia' yekhanani vekhanani yhvh vekhai hayaled. 2_samuel 12:23	ve'atah met lamah zeh 'ani zam ha'ukhal lahashibo 'od 'ani holekh 'eilav vehu lo yashub 'eilai. 2_samuel 12:24	vaynakhem david 'et bat sheba' 'ishto vayabo 'eileha vayishkab 'imah vateiled ben vayiqra vatiqra 'et shemo shelomoh yhvh 'aheibo. 2_samuel 12:25	vayishlakh beyad natan hanabi vayiqra 'et shemo yedideyah ba'abur yhvh. 2_samuel 12:26	vayilakhem yo'ab berabat benei 'amon vayilkod 'et 'ir hamelukhah. 2_samuel 12:27	vayishlakh yo'ab mal'akhim 'el david vayomer nilkhamti berabah gam lakhadti 'et 'ir hamayim. 2_samuel 12:28	ve'atah 'esof 'et yeter ha'am vakhaneh 'al ha'ir velakhedah pen 'elkod 'ani 'et ha'ir veniqra shemi 'aleha. 2_samuel 12:29	vaye'esof david 'et kal ha'am vayeilekh rabatah vayilakhem bah vayilkedah. 2_samuel 12:30	vayiqakh 'et 'ateret malkam mei'al rosho umishqalah kikar zahab ve'eben yeqarah vatehi 'al rosh david ushelal ha'ir hozi harbeh me'od. 2_samuel 12:31	ve'et ha'am 'asher bah hozi vayasem bamegeirah ubakharizei habarzel ubemagzerot habarzel vehe'ebir 'otam bamalken bamalben vekhen ya'aseh lekhol 'arei benei 'amon vayashab david vekhal ha'am yerushalim. 2_samuel 13:1	vayhi 'akharei khen ule'abshalom ben david 'akhot yafah ushemah tamar vaye'ehabeha 'amnon ben david. 2_samuel 13:2	vayeizer le'amnon lehitkhalot ba'abur tamar 'akhoto ki betulah hi vayipalei be'einei 'amnon la'asot lah me'umah. 2_samuel 13:3	ule'amnon reia' ushemo yonadab ben shim'ah 'akhi david veyonadab 'ish khakham me'od. 2_samuel 13:4	vayomer lo madua' 'atah kakhah dal ben hamelekh baboqer baboqer halo tagid li vayomer lo 'amnon 'et tamar 'akhot 'abshalom 'akhi 'ani 'oheb. 2_samuel 13:5	vayomer lo yehonadab shekhab 'al mishkabekha vehitkhal uba 'abikha lir'otekha ve'amarta 'eilav tabo na tamar 'akhoti vetabreini lekhem ve'asetah le'einai 'et habiryah lema'an 'asher 'er'eh ve'akhalti miyadah. 2_samuel 13:6	vayishkab 'amnon vayitkhal vayabo hamelekh lir'oto vayomer 'amnon 'el hamelekh tabo na tamar 'akhoti utelabeb le'einai shetei lebibot ve'ebreh miyadah. 2_samuel 13:7	vayishlakh david 'el tamar habaytah leimor lekhi na bet 'amnon 'akhikh va'asi lo habiryah. 2_samuel 13:8	vateilekh tamar bet 'amnon 'akhiha vehu shokheb vatiqakh 'et habazeq vatalosh vatalash vatelabeb le'einav vatebashel 'et halebibot. 2_samuel 13:9	vatiqakh 'et hamasret vatizoq lefanav vayma'en le'ekhol vayomer 'amnon hozi'u khal 'ish mei'alai vayeize'u khal 'ish mei'alav. 2_samuel 13:10	vayomer 'amnon 'el tamar habi'i habiryah hakheder ve'ebreh miyadekh vatiqakh tamar 'et halebibot 'asher 'asatah vatabei le'amnon 'akhiha hekhaderah. 2_samuel 13:11	vatagesh 'eilav le'ekhol vayakhazeq bah vayomer lah bo'i shikhbi 'imi 'akhoti. 2_samuel 13:12	vatomer lo 'al 'akhi 'al te'aneini ki lo yei'aseh khen beyisra'el 'al ta'aseh 'et hanebalah hazot. 2_samuel 13:13	va'ani 'anah 'olikh 'et kherpati ve'atah tihyeh ke'akhad hanebalim beyisra'el ve'atah daber na 'el hamelekh ki lo yimna'eini mimeka. 2_samuel 13:14	velo 'abah lishmoa' beqolah vayekhezaq mimenah vai'aneha vayishkab 'otah. 2_samuel 13:15	vayisna'eha 'amnon sin'ah gedolah me'od ki gedolah hasin'ah 'asher senei'ah mei'ahabah 'asher 'aheibah vayomer lah 'amnon qumi leikhi. 2_samuel 13:16	vatomer lo 'al 'odot hara'ah hagedolah hazot mei'akheret 'asher 'asita 'imi leshalekheini velo 'abah lishmoa' lah. 2_samuel 13:17	vayiqra 'et na'aro meshareto vayomer shilkhu na 'et zot mei'alai hakhuzah une'ol hadelet 'akhareha. 2_samuel 13:18	ve'aleha ketonet pasim ki khen tilbashna benot hamelekh habetulot me'ilim vayozei 'otah meshareto hakhuz vena'al hadelet 'akhareha. 2_samuel 13:19	vatiqakh tamar 'eifer 'al roshah ukhetonet hapasim 'asher 'aleha qara'ah vatasem yadah 'al roshah vateilekh halokh veza'aqah. 2_samuel 13:20	vayomer 'eileha 'abshalom 'akhiha ha'aminon 'akhikh hayah 'imakh ve'atah 'akhoti hakharishi 'akhikh hu 'al tashiti 'et libekh ladabar hazeh vateisheb tamar veshomeimah bet 'abshalom 'akhiha. 2_samuel 13:21	vehamelekh david shama' 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh vayikhar lo me'od. 2_samuel 13:22	velo diber 'abshalom 'im 'amnon lemeira' ve'ad tob ki sanei 'abshalom 'et 'amnon 'al debar 'asher 'inah 'et tamar 'akhoto. 2_samuel 13:23	vayhi lishnatayim yamim vayihyu gozezim le'abshalom beba'al khazor 'asher 'im 'efrayim vayiqra 'abshalom lekhal benei hamelekh. 2_samuel 13:24	vayabo 'abshalom 'el hamelekh vayomer hineh na gozezim le'abdekha yeilekh na hamelekh va'abadav 'im 'abdekha. 2_samuel 13:25	vayomer hamelekh 'el 'abshalom 'al beni 'al na neilekh kulanu velo nikhbad 'alekha vayifraz bo velo 'abah lalekhet vaybarakheihu. 2_samuel 13:26	vayomer 'abshalom valo yeilekh na 'itanu 'amnon 'akhi vayomer lo hamelekh lamah yeilekh 'imakh. 2_samuel 13:27	vayifraz bo 'abshalom vayishlakh 'ito 'et 'amnon ve'et kal benei hamelekh. 2_samuel 13:28	vayzav 'abshalom 'et ne'arav leimor re'u na ketob leb 'amnon bayayin ve'amarti 'aleikhem haku 'et 'amnon vahamitem 'oto 'al tira'u halo ki 'anokhi ziviti 'etkhem khizqu vihyu libnei khayil. 2_samuel 13:29	vaya'asu na'arei 'abshalom le'amnon ka'asher zivah 'abshalom vayaqumu kal benei hamelekh vayirkebu 'ish 'al pirdo vayanusu. 2_samuel 13:30	vayhi hemah baderekh vehashemu'ah ba'ah 'el david leimor hikah 'abshalom 'et kal benei hamelekh velo notar meihem 'ekhad. 2_samuel 13:31	vayaqam hamelekh vayiqra' 'et begadav vayishkab 'arezah vekhal 'abadav nizabim qeru'ei begadim. 2_samuel 13:32	vaya'an yonadab ben shim'ah 'akhi david vayomer 'al yomar 'adoni 'et kal hane'arim benei hamelekh heimitu ki 'amnon lebado met ki 'al pi 'abshalom hayetah sumah miyom 'anoto 'et tamar 'akhoto. 2_samuel 13:33	ve'atah 'al yasem 'adoni hamelekh 'el libo dabar leimor kal benei hamelekh meitu ki 'im 'amnon lebado met. 2_samuel 13:34	vayibrakh 'abshalom vayisa hana'ar hazofeh 'et 'eino 'einav vayar vehineh 'am rab holekhim miderekh 'akharav mizad hahar. 2_samuel 13:35	vayomer yonadab 'el hamelekh hineh benei hamelekh ba'u kidbar 'abdekha ken hayah. 2_samuel 13:36	vayhi kekhaloto ledaber vehineh benei hamelekh ba'u vayis'u qolam vayibku vegam hamelekh vekhal 'abadav bakhu bekhi gadol me'od. 2_samuel 13:37	ve'abshalom barakh vayeilekh 'el talmai ben 'amikhur 'amihud melekh geshur vayit'abel 'al beno kal hayamim. 2_samuel 13:38	ve'abshalom barakh vayeilekh geshur vayhi sham shalosh shanim. 2_samuel 13:39	vatekhal david hamelekh lazet 'el 'abshalom ki nikham 'al 'amnon ki met. 2_samuel 14:1	vayeida' yo'ab ben zeruyah ki leb hamelekh 'al 'abshalom. 2_samuel 14:2	vayishlakh yo'ab teqo'ah vayiqakh misham 'ishah khakhamah vayomer 'eileha hit'abeli na velibshi na bigdei 'eibel ve'al tasukhi shemen vehayit ke'ishah zeh yamim rabim mit'abelet 'al met. 2_samuel 14:3	ubat 'el hamelekh vedibart 'eilav kadabar hazeh vayasem yo'ab 'et hadebarim befiha. 2_samuel 14:4	vatomer ha'ishah hateqo'it 'el hamelekh vatipol 'al 'apeha 'arzah vatishtakhu vatomer hoshi'ah hamelekh. 2_samuel 14:5	vayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh vatomer 'abal 'ishah 'almanah 'ani vayamat 'ishi. 2_samuel 14:6	uleshifkhatekha shenei banim vayinazu sheneihem basadeh ve'en mazil beineihem vayako ha'ekhad 'et ha'ekhad vayamet 'oto. 2_samuel 14:7	vehineh qamah khal hamishpakhah 'al shifkhatekha vayomeru teni 'et makeh 'akhiv unemiteihu benefesh 'akhiv 'asher harag venashmidah gam 'et hayoresh vekhibu 'et gakhalti 'asher nish'arah lebilti som sim le'ishi shem ushe'eirit 'al penei ha'adamah. 2_samuel 14:8	vayomer hamelekh 'el ha'ishah lekhi lebeitekh va'ani 'azaveh 'alayikh. 2_samuel 14:9	vatomer ha'ishah hateqo'it 'el hamelekh 'alai 'adoni hamelekh he'avon ve'al bet 'abi vehamelekh vekhis'o naqi. 2_samuel 14:10	vayomer hamelekh hamdaber 'eilayikh vahabeito 'eilai velo yosif 'od laga'at bakh. 2_samuel 14:11	vatomer yizkar na hamelekh 'et yhvh 'elohekha meiharbit meiharbat go'el hadam leshakhet velo yashmidu 'et beni vayomer khai yhvh 'im yipol misa'arat benekh 'arezah. 2_samuel 14:12	vatomer ha'ishah tedaber na shifkhatekha 'el 'adoni hamelekh dabar vayomer dabeiri. 2_samuel 14:13	vatomer ha'ishah velamah khashabtah kazot 'al 'am 'elohim umidaber hamelekh hadabar hazeh ke'ashem lebilti hashib hamelekh 'et nidekho. 2_samuel 14:14	ki mot namut vekhamayim hanigarim 'arzah 'asher lo yei'aseifu velo yisa 'elohim nefesh vekhashab makhashabot lebilti yidakh mimenu nidakh. 2_samuel 14:15	ve'atah 'asher bati ledaber 'el hamelekh 'adoni 'et hadabar hazeh ki yeire'uni ha'am vatomer shifkhatekha 'adaberah na 'el hamelekh 'ulai ya'aseh hamelekh 'et debar 'amato. 2_samuel 14:16	ki yishma' hamelekh lehazil 'et 'amato mikaf ha'ish lehashmid 'oti ve'et beni yakhad minakhalat 'elohim. 2_samuel 14:17	vatomer shifkhatekha yihyeh na debar 'adoni hamelekh limnukhah ki kemal'akh ha'elohim ken 'adoni hamelekh lishmoa' hatob vehara' yhvh 'elohekha yehi 'imakh. 2_samuel 14:18	vaya'an hamelekh vayomer 'el ha'ishah 'al na tekhakhadi mimeni dabar 'asher 'anokhi sho'el 'otakh vatomer ha'ishah yedaber na 'adoni hamelekh. 2_samuel 14:19	vayomer hamelekh hayad yo'ab 'itakh bekhal zot vata'an ha'ishah vatomer khei nafshekha 'adoni hamelekh 'im 'ish leheimin ulehasmil mikol 'asher diber 'adoni hamelekh ki 'abdekha yo'ab hu zivani vehu m befi shifkhatekha 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. 2_samuel 14:20	leba'abur sabeb 'et penei hadabar 'asah 'abdekha yo'ab 'et hadabar hazeh vadoni khakham kekhakhemat mal'akh ha'elohim lada'at 'et kal 'asher ba'arez. 2_samuel 14:21	vayomer hamelekh 'el yo'ab hineh na 'asiti 'et hadabar hazeh velekh hasheb 'et hana'ar 'et 'abshalom. 2_samuel 14:22	vayipol yo'ab 'el panav 'arzah vayishtakhu vaybarekh 'et hamelekh vayomer yo'ab hayom yada' 'abdekha ki mazati khen be'einekha 'adoni hamelekh 'asher 'asah hamelekh 'et debar 'abdo 'abdekha. 2_samuel 14:23	vayaqam yo'ab vayeilekh geshurah vayabei 'et 'abshalom yerushalim. 2_samuel 14:24	vayomer hamelekh yisob 'el beito ufanai lo yir'eh vayisob 'abshalom 'el beito ufenei hamelekh lo ra'ah. 2_samuel 14:25	ukhe'abshalom lo hayah 'ish yafeh bekhal yisra'el lehalel me'od mikaf raglo ve'ad qadeqodo lo hayah bo mum. 2_samuel 14:26	ubegalekho 'et rosho vehayah miqez yamim layamim 'asher yegaleiakh ki khabed 'alav vegilekho veshaqal 'et se'ar rosho matayim sheqalim be'eben hamelekh. 2_samuel 14:27	vayivaledu le'abshalom sheloshah banim ubat 'akhat ushemah tamar hi hayetah 'ishah yefat mar'eh. 2_samuel 14:28	vayeisheb 'abshalom birushalim shenatayim yamim ufenei hamelekh lo ra'ah. 2_samuel 14:29	vayishlakh 'abshalom 'el yo'ab lishloakh 'oto 'el hamelekh velo 'abah labo 'eilav vayishlakh 'od sheinit velo 'abah labo. 2_samuel 14:30	vayomer 'el 'abadav re'u khelqat yo'ab 'el yadi velo sham se'orim lekhu vehoziteiha vehazituha ba'esh vayazitu 'abdei 'abshalom 'et hakhelqah ba'esh. 2_samuel 14:31	vayaqam yo'ab vayabo 'el 'abshalom habayetah vayomer 'eilav lamah hizitu 'abadekha 'et hakhelqah 'asher li ba'esh. 2_samuel 14:32	vayomer 'abshalom 'el yo'ab hineh shalakhti 'eilekha leimor bo henah ve'eshlekhah 'otekha 'el hamelekh leimor lamah bati migeshur tob li 'od 'ani sham ve'atah 'er'eh penei hamelekh ve'im yesh bi 'avon vehemitani. 2_samuel 14:33	vayabo yo'ab 'el hamelekh vayaged lo vayiqra 'el 'abshalom vayabo 'el hamelekh vayishtakhu lo 'al 'apav 'arzah lifnei hamelekh vayishaq hamelekh le'abshalom. 2_samuel 15:1	vayhi mei'akharei khen vaya'as lo 'abshalom merkabah vesusim vakhamishim 'ish razim lefanav. 2_samuel 15:2	vehishkim 'abshalom ve'amad 'al yad derekh hasha'ar vayhi kal ha'ish 'asher yihyeh lo rib labo 'el hamelekh lamishpat vayiqra 'abshalom 'eilav vayomer 'ei mizeh 'ir 'atah vayomer mei'akhad shibtei yisra'el 'abdekha. 2_samuel 15:3	vayomer 'eilav 'abshalom re'eh debarekha tobim unekhokhim veshomeia' 'en lekha mei'et hamelekh. 2_samuel 15:4	vayomer 'abshalom mi yesimeini shofet ba'arez ve'alai yabo kal 'ish 'asher yihyeh lo rib umishpat vehizdaqtiv. 2_samuel 15:5	vehayah biqrab 'ish lehishtakhavot lo veshalakh 'et yado vehekheziq lo venashaq lo. 2_samuel 15:6	vaya'as 'abshalom kadabar hazeh lekhal yisra'el 'asher yabo'u lamishpat 'el hamelekh vayganeb 'abshalom 'et leb 'anshei yisra'el. 2_samuel 15:7	vayhi miqez 'arba'im shanah vayomer 'abshalom 'el hamelekh 'eilakhah na va'ashalem 'et nidri 'asher nadarti yhvh bekhebron. 2_samuel 15:8	ki neider nadar 'abdekha beshibti bigshur ba'aram leimor 'im yeshib yashob yeshibeini yhvh yerushalim ve'abadti 'et yhvh. 2_samuel 15:9	vayomer lo hamelekh lekh beshalom vayaqam vayeilekh khebronah. 2_samuel 15:10	vayishlakh 'abshalom meragelim bekhal shibtei yisra'el leimor keshame'akhem 'et qol hashofar va'amartem malakh 'abshalom bekhebron. 2_samuel 15:11	ve'et 'abshalom halekhu matayim 'ish mirushalim qeru'im veholekhim letumam velo yade'u kal dabar. 2_samuel 15:12	vayishlakh 'abshalom 'et 'akhitofel hagiloni yo'ez david mei'iro migiloh bezabekho 'et hazebakhim vayhi haqesher 'amiz veha'am holekh varab 'et 'abshalom. 2_samuel 15:13	vayabo hamagid 'el david leimor hayah leb 'ish yisra'el 'akharei 'abshalom. 2_samuel 15:14	vayomer david lekhal 'abadav 'asher 'ito birushalim qumu venibrakhah ki lo tihyeh lanu feleitah mipenei 'abshalom maharu lalekhet pen yemaher vehisiganu vehidiakh 'aleinu 'et hara'ah vehikah ha'ir lefi khareb. 2_samuel 15:15	vayomeru 'abdei hamelekh 'el hamelekh kekhol 'asher yibkhar 'adoni hamelekh hineh 'abadekha. 2_samuel 15:16	vayeizei hamelekh vekhal beito beraglav vaya'azob hamelekh 'et 'eser nashim pilagshim lishmor habayit. 2_samuel 15:17	vayeizei hamelekh vekhal ha'am beraglav vaya'amdu bet hamerkhaq. 2_samuel 15:18	vekhal 'abadav 'oberim 'al yado vekhal hakereiti vekhal hapeleiti vekhal hagitim shesh mei'ot 'ish 'asher ba'u beraglo migat 'oberim 'al penei
