hamelekh. 2_samuel 15:19	vayomer hamelekh 'el 'itai hagiti lamah teilekh gam 'atah 'itanu shub vesheb 'im hamelekh ki nakheri 'atah vegam goleh 'atah limqomekha. 2_samuel 15:20	temol bo'ekha vehayom 'ano'akha 'ani'akha 'imanu lalekhet va'ani holekh 'al 'asher 'ani holekh shub vehasheb 'et 'akhekha 'imakh khesed ve'emet. 2_samuel 15:21	vaya'an 'itai 'et hamelekh vayomar khai yhvh vekhei 'adoni hamelekh ki 'im bimqom 'asher yihyeh sham 'adoni hamelekh 'im lemavet 'im lekhayim ki sham yihyeh 'abdekha. 2_samuel 15:22	vayomer david 'el 'itai lekh va'abor vaya'abor 'itai hagiti vekhal 'anashav vekhal hataf 'asher 'ito. 2_samuel 15:23	vekhal ha'arez bokhim qol gadol vekhal ha'am 'oberim vehamelekh 'ober benakhal qidron vekhal ha'am 'oberim 'al penei derekh 'et hamidbar. 2_samuel 15:24	vehineh gam zadoq vekhal halviyim 'ito nose'im 'et 'aron berit ha'elohim vayaziqu 'et 'aron ha'elohim vaya'al 'ebyatar 'ad tom kal ha'am la'abor min ha'ir. 2_samuel 15:25	vayomer hamelekh lezadoq hasheb 'et 'aron ha'elohim ha'ir 'im 'emza khen be'einei yhvh veheshibani vehir'ani 'oto ve'et naveihu. 2_samuel 15:26	ve'im koh yomar lo khafazti bakh hini ya'aseh li ka'asher tob be'einav. 2_samuel 15:27	vayomer hamelekh 'el zadoq hakohen haro'eh 'atah shubah ha'ir beshalom va'akhima'az binkha vihonatan ben 'ebyatar shenei beneikhem 'itekhem. 2_samuel 15:28	re'u 'anokhi mitmahmeiah be'abrot be'arbot hamidbar 'ad bo dabar mei'imakhem lehagid li. 2_samuel 15:29	vayasheb zadoq ve'ebyatar 'et 'aron ha'elohim yerushalim vayeishebu sham. 2_samuel 15:30	vedavid 'oleh bema'aleh hazeitim 'oleh ubokheh verosh lo khafui vehu holekh yakhef vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito khafu 'ish rosho ve'alu 'aloh ubakhoh. 2_samuel 15:31	vedavid higid leimor 'akhitofel baqosherim 'im 'abshalom vayomer david sakel na 'et 'azat 'akhitofel yhvh. 2_samuel 15:32	vayhi david ba 'ad harosh 'asher yishtakhaveh sham leilohim vehineh liqrato khushai ha'arki qarua' kutaneto va'adamah 'al rosho. 2_samuel 15:33	vayomer lo david 'im 'abarta 'iti vehayita 'alai lemasa. 2_samuel 15:34	ve'im ha'ir tashub ve'amarta le'abshalom 'abdekha 'ani hamelekh 'ehyeh 'ebed 'abikha va'ani mei'az ve'atah va'ani 'abdekha veheifartah li 'et 'azat 'akhitofel. 2_samuel 15:35	vahalo 'imekha sham zadoq ve'ebyatar hakohanim vehayah kal hadabar 'asher tishma' mibet hamelekh tagid lezadoq ule'ebyatar hakohanim. 2_samuel 15:36	hineh sham 'imam shenei beneihem 'akhima'az lezadoq vihonatan le'ebyatar ushelakhtem beyadam 'eilai kal dabar 'asher tishma'u. 2_samuel 15:37	vayabo khushai rei'eh david ha'ir ve'abshalom yabo yerushalim. 2_samuel 16:1	vedavid 'abar me'at meiharosh vehineh ziba na'ar mefi boshet liqrato vezemed khamorim khabushim va'aleihem matayim lekhem umei'ah zimuqim umei'ah qayiz veneibel yayin. 2_samuel 16:2	vayomer hamelekh 'el ziba mah 'eleh lakh vayomer ziba hakhamorim lebet hamelekh lirkob ulehalekhem vehalekhem vehaqayiz le'ekhol hane'arim vehayayin lishtot haya'ef bamidbar. 2_samuel 16:3	vayomer hamelekh ve'ayeh ben 'adonekha vayomer ziba 'el hamelekh hineh yosheb birushalim ki 'amar hayom yashibu li bet yisra'el 'et mamlekhut 'abi. 2_samuel 16:4	vayomer hamelekh leziba hineh lekha kol 'asher limfi boshet vayomer ziba hishtakhaveiti 'emza khen be'einekha 'adoni hamelekh. 2_samuel 16:5	uba hamelekh david 'ad bakhurim vehineh misham 'ish yozei mimishpakhat bet sha'ul ushemo shim'i ben geira yozei yazo umeqalel. 2_samuel 16:6	vaysaqel ba'abanim 'et david ve'et kal 'abdei hamelekh david vekhal ha'am vekhal hagiborim mimino umisemolo. 2_samuel 16:7	vekhoh 'amar shim'i beqalo zei zei 'ish hadamim ve'ish habeliya'al. 2_samuel 16:8	heishib 'alekha yhvh kol demei bet sha'ul 'asher malakhta takhto takhtav vayiten yhvh 'et hamelukhah beyad 'abshalom benekha vehinekha bera'atekha ki 'ish damim 'atah. 2_samuel 16:9	vayomer 'abishai ben zeruyah 'el hamelekh lamah yeqalel hakeleb hamet hazeh 'et 'adoni hamelekh 'e'berah na ve'asirah 'et rosho. 2_samuel 16:10	vayomer hamelekh mah li velakhem benei zeruyah ki koh yeqalel vekhi ki yhvh 'amar lo qalel 'et david umi yomar madua' 'asitah ken. 2_samuel 16:11	vayomer david 'el 'abishai ve'el kal 'abadav hineh beni 'asher yaza mimei'ai mebaqesh 'et nafshi ve'af ki 'atah ben haymini hanikhu lo viqalel ki 'amar lo yhvh. 2_samuel 16:12	'ulai yir'eh yhvh be'ovoni be'eini veheishib yhvh li tobah takhat qilato hayom hazeh. 2_samuel 16:13	vayeilekh david va'anashav badarekh veshim'i holekh bezeila' hahar le'umato halokh vayqalel vaysaqel ba'abanim le'umato ve'ipar be'afar. 2_samuel 16:14	vayabo hamelekh vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito 'ayeifim vayinafesh sham. 2_samuel 16:15	ve'abshalom vekhal ha'am 'ish yisra'el ba'u yerushalim va'akhitofel 'ito. 2_samuel 16:16	vayhi ka'asher ba khushai ha'arki rei'eh david 'el 'abshalom vayomer khushai 'el 'abshalom yekhi hamelekh yekhi hamelekh. 2_samuel 16:17	vayomer 'abshalom 'el khushai zeh khasdekha 'et rei'ekha lamah lo halakhta 'et rei'ekha. 2_samuel 16:18	vayomer khushai 'el 'abshalom lo ki 'asher bakhar yhvh veha'am hazeh vekhal 'ish yisra'el lo lo 'ehyeh ve'ito 'eisheb. 2_samuel 16:19	vehasheinit lemi 'ani 'e'ebod halo lifnei beno ka'asher 'abadti lifnei 'abikha ken 'ehyeh lifanekha. 2_samuel 16:20	vayomer 'abshalom 'el 'akhitofel habu lakhem 'eizah mah na'aseh. 2_samuel 16:21	vayomer 'akhitofel 'el 'abshalom bo 'el pilagshei 'abikha 'asher hiniakh lishmor habayit veshama' kal yisra'el ki nib'ashta 'et 'abikha vekhazequ yedei kal 'asher 'itakh. 2_samuel 16:22	vayatu le'abshalom ha'ohel 'al hagag vayabo 'abshalom 'el pilagshei 'abiv le'einei kal yisra'el. 2_samuel 16:23	va'azat 'akhitofel 'asher ya'az bayamim hahem ka'asher yish'al 'ish bidbar ha'elohim ken kal 'azat 'akhitofel gam ledavid gam le'abshalom. 2_samuel 17:1	vayomer 'akhitofel 'el 'abshalom 'ebkharah na shenem 'asar 'elef 'ish ve'aqumah ve'erdefah 'akharei david halayelah. 2_samuel 17:2	ve'abo 'alav vehu yageia' urefeh yadayim vehakharadti 'oto venas kal ha'am 'asher 'ito vehikeiti 'et hamelekh lebado. 2_samuel 17:3	ve'ashibah khal ha'am 'eilekha keshub hakol ha'ish 'asher 'atah mebaqesh kal ha'am yihyeh shalom. 2_samuel 17:4	vayishar hadabar be'einei 'abshalom ube'einei kal ziqnei yisra'el. 2_samuel 17:5	vayomer 'abshalom qera na gam lekhushai ha'arki venishme'ah mah befiv gam hu. 2_samuel 17:6	vayabo khushai 'el 'abshalom vayomer 'abshalom 'eilav leimor kadabar hazeh diber 'akhitofel hana'aseh 'et debaro 'im 'ayin 'atah daber. 2_samuel 17:7	vayomer khushai 'el 'abshalom lo tobah ha'eizah 'asher ya'az 'akhitofel bapa'am hazot. 2_samuel 17:8	vayomer khushai 'atah yada'ta 'et 'abikha ve'et 'anashav ki giborim hemah umarei nefesh hemah kedob shakul basadeh ve'abikha 'ish milkhamah velo yalin 'et ha'am. 2_samuel 17:9	hineh 'atah hu nekhba be'akhat hapekhatim 'o be'akhad hameqomot vehayah kinfol bahem batekhilah veshama' hashomeia' ve'amar hayetah mageifah ba'am 'asher 'akharei 'abshalom. 2_samuel 17:10	vehu gam ben khayil 'asher libo keleb ha'aryeh himes yimas ki yodeia' kal yisra'el ki gibor 'abikha ubenei khayil 'asher 'ito. 2_samuel 17:11	ki ya'azti hei'asof yei'asef 'alekha khal yisra'el midan ve'ad be'er sheba' kakhol 'asher 'al hayam larob ufanekha holekhim baqrab. 2_samuel 17:12	ubanu 'eilav be'akhat be'akhad hameqomot 'asher nimza sham venakhnu 'alav ka'asher yipol hatal 'al ha'adamah velo notar bo ubekhal ha'anashim 'asher 'ito gam 'ekhad. 2_samuel 17:13	ve'im 'el 'ir yei'asef vehisi'u khal yisra'el 'el ha'ir hahi khabalim vesakhabnu 'oto 'ad hanakhal 'ad 'asher lo nimza sham gam zeror. 2_samuel 17:14	vayomer 'abshalom vekhal 'ish yisra'el tobah 'azat khushai ha'arki mei'azat 'akhitofel yhvh zivah lehafer 'et 'azat 'akhitofel hatobah leba'abur habi yhvh 'el 'abshalom 'et hara'ah. 2_samuel 17:15	vayomer khushai 'el zadoq ve'el 'ebyatar hakohanim kazot vekhazot ya'az 'akhitofel 'et 'abshalom ve'et ziqnei yisra'el vekhazot vekhazot ya'azti 'ani. 2_samuel 17:16	ve'atah shilkhu meheirah vehagidu ledavid leimor 'al talen halaylah be'arbot hamidbar vegam 'abor ta'abor pen yebula' lamelekh ulekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito. 2_samuel 17:17	vihonatan va'akhima'az 'omedim be'en rogel vehalekhah hashifkhah vehigidah lahem vehem yeilekhu vehigidu lamelekh david ki lo yukhelu leheira'ot labo ha'irah. 2_samuel 17:18	vayar 'otam na'ar vayaged le'abshalom vayeilekhu sheneihem meheirah vayabo'u 'el bet 'ish bebakhurim velo be'er bakhazeiro vayeiredu sham. 2_samuel 17:19	vatiqakh ha'ishah vatifros 'et hamasakh 'al penei habe'er vatishtakh 'alav harifot velo noda' dabar. 2_samuel 17:20	vayabo'u 'abdei 'abshalom 'el ha'ishah habaytah vayomeru 'ayeh 'akhima'az vihonatan vatomer lahem ha'ishah 'aberu mikhal hamayim vaybaqshu velo maza'u vayashubu yerushalim. 2_samuel 17:21	vayhi 'akharei lekhtam vaya'alu meihabe'er vayeilekhu vayagidu lamelekh david vayomeru 'el david qumu ve'ibru meheirah 'et hamayim ki khakhah ya'az 'aleikhem 'akhitofel. 2_samuel 17:22	vayaqam david vekhal ha'am 'asher 'ito vaya'abru 'et hayarden 'ad 'or haboqer 'ad 'akhad lo ne'dar 'asher lo 'abar 'et hayarden. 2_samuel 17:23	va'akhitofel ra'ah ki lo ne'estah 'azato vayakhabosh 'et hakhamor vayaqam vayeilekh 'el beito 'el 'iro vayzav 'el beito vayeikhanaq vayamat vayiqaber beqeber 'abiv. 2_samuel 17:24	vedavid ba makhanayemah ve'abshalom 'abar 'et hayarden hu vekhal 'ish yisra'el 'imo. 2_samuel 17:25	ve'et 'amasa sam 'abshalom takhat yo'ab 'al hazaba va'amasa ben 'ish ushemo yitra hayisre'eili 'asher ba 'el 'abigal bat nakhash 'akhot zeruyah 'em yo'ab. 2_samuel 17:26	vayikhan yisra'el ve'abshalom 'erez hagil'ad. 2_samuel 17:27	vayhi kebo david makhanayemah veshobi ben nakhash meirabat benei 'amon umakhir ben 'ami'el milo debar ubarzilai hagil'adi meirogelim. 2_samuel 17:28	mishkab vesapot ukheli yozer vekhitim use'orim veqemakh veqali ufol va'adashim veqali. 2_samuel 17:29	udebash vekhem'ah vezon ushefot baqar higishu ledavid vela'am 'asher 'ito le'ekhol ki 'ameru ha'am ra'eb ve'ayef vezamei bamidbar. 2_samuel 18:1	vayifqod david 'et ha'am 'asher 'ito vayasem 'aleihem sarei 'alafim vesarei mei'ot. 2_samuel 18:2	vayshalakh david 'et ha'am hashelishit beyad yo'ab vehashelishit beyad 'abishai ben zeruyah 'akhi yo'ab vehashelishit beyad 'itai hagiti vayomer hamelekh 'el ha'am yazo 'eizei gam 'ani 'imakhem. 2_samuel 18:3	vayomer ha'am lo teizei ki 'im nos nanus lo yasimu 'eileinu leb ve'im yamutu khezyeinu lo yasimu 'eileinu leb ki 'atah khamonu 'asarah 'alafim ve'atah tob ki tihyeh lanu mei'ir la'zir la'zor. 2_samuel 18:4	vayomer 'aleihem hamelekh 'asher yitab be'eineikhem 'e'eseh vaya'amod hamelekh 'el yad hasha'ar vekhal ha'am yaze'u lemei'ot vela'alafim. 2_samuel 18:5	vayzav hamelekh 'et yo'ab ve'et 'abishai ve'et 'itai leimor le'at li lana'ar le'abshalom vekhal ha'am shame'u bezavot hamelekh 'et kal hasarim 'al debar 'abshalom. 2_samuel 18:6	vayeizei ha'am hasadeh liqrat yisra'el vatehi hamilkhamah beya'ar 'efrayim. 2_samuel 18:7	vayinagefu sham 'am yisra'el lifnei 'abdei david vatehi sham hamageifah gedolah bayom hahu 'esrim 'alef. 2_samuel 18:8	vatehi sham hamilkhamah nafozet nafozet 'al penei khal ha'arez vayereb haya'ar le'ekhol ba'am mei'asher 'akhelah hakhereb bayom hahu. 2_samuel 18:9	vayiqarei 'abshalom lifnei 'abdei david ve'abshalom rokheb 'al hapered vayabo hapered takhat sobekh ha'eilah hagedolah vayekhezaq rosho ba'eilah vayutan ben hashamayim uben ha'arez vehapered 'asher takhtav 'abar. 2_samuel 18:10	vayar 'ish 'ekhad vayaged leyo'ab vayomer hineh ra'iti 'et 'abshalom talui ba'eilah. 2_samuel 18:11	vayomer yo'ab la'ish hamagid lo vehineh ra'ita umadua' lo hikito sham 'arezah ve'alai latet lekha 'asarah khesef vakhagorah 'ekhat. 2_samuel 18:12	vayomer ha'ish 'el yo'ab velo velu 'anokhi shoqel 'al kapai 'elef kesef lo 'eshlakh yadi 'el ben hamelekh ki be'azeneinu zivah hamelekh 'otekha ve'et 'abishai ve'et 'itai leimor shimru mi bana'ar be'abshalom. 2_samuel 18:13	'o 'asiti benafsho benafshi sheqer vekhal dabar lo yikakhed min hamelekh ve'atah tityazeb mineged. 2_samuel 18:14	vayomer yo'ab lo khen 'okhilah lefanekha vayiqakh sheloshah shebatim bekhapo vayitqa'em beleb 'abshalom 'odenu khai beleb ha'eilah. 2_samuel 18:15	vayasobu 'asarah ne'arim nose'ei kelei yo'ab vayaku 'et 'abshalom vaymituhu. 2_samuel 18:16	vayitqa' yo'ab bashofar vayashab ha'am mirdof 'akharei yisra'el ki khasakh yo'ab 'et ha'am. 2_samuel 18:17	vayiqkhu 'et 'abshalom vayashlikhu 'oto baya'ar 'el hapakhat hagadol vayazibu 'alav gal 'abanim gadol me'od vekhal yisra'el nasu 'ish le'oheilo le'ohalav. 2_samuel 18:18	ve'abshalom laqakh vayazeb lo bekhayav bekhayav 'et mazebet 'asher be'eimeq hamelekh ki 'amar 'en li ben ba'abur hazkir shemi vayiqra lamazebet 'al shemo vayiqarei lah yad 'abshalom 'ad hayom hazeh. 2_samuel 18:19	va'akhima'az ben zadoq 'amar 'aruzah na va'abaserah 'et hamelekh ki shefato yhvh miyad 'oyebav. 2_samuel 18:20	vayomer lo yo'ab lo 'ish besorah 'atah hayom hazeh ubisarta beyom 'akher vehayom hazeh lo tebaser ki 'al 'al ken ben hamelekh met. 2_samuel 18:21	vayomer yo'ab lakushi lekh haged lamelekh 'asher ra'itah vayishtakhu khushi leyo'ab vayaroz. 2_samuel 18:22	vayosef 'od 'akhima'az ben zadoq vayomer 'el yo'ab vihi mah 'aruzah na gam 'ani 'akharei hakushi vayomer yo'ab lamah zeh 'atah raz beni ulekhah 'en besorah mozet. 2_samuel 18:23	vihi mah 'aruz vayomer lo ruz vayaraz 'akhima'az derekh hakikar vaya'abor 'et hakushi. 2_samuel 18:24	vedavid yosheb ben shenei hashe'arim vayeilekh hazofeh 'el gag hasha'ar 'el hakhomah vayisa 'et 'einav vayar vehineh 'ish raz lebado. 2_samuel 18:25	vayiqra hazofeh vayaged lamelekh vayomer hamelekh 'im lebado besorah befiv vayeilekh halokh veqareb. 2_samuel 18:26	vayar hazofeh 'ish 'akher raz vayiqra hazofeh 'el hasho'er vayomer hineh 'ish raz lebado vayomer hamelekh gam zeh mebaser. 2_samuel 18:27	vayomer hazofeh 'ani ro'eh 'et meruzat harishon kimruzat 'akhima'az ben zadoq vayomer hamelekh 'ish tob zeh ve'el besorah tobah yabo. 2_samuel 18:28	vayiqra 'akhima'az vayomer 'el hamelekh shalom vayishtakhu lamelekh le'apav 'arezah vayomer barukh yhvh 'elohekha 'asher sigar 'et ha'anashim 'asher nase'u 'et yadam badoni hamelekh. 2_samuel 18:29	vayomer hamelekh shalom lana'ar le'abshalom vayomer 'akhima'az ra'iti hehamon hagadol lishloakh 'et 'ebed hamelekh yo'ab ve'et 'abdekha velo yada'ti mah. 2_samuel 18:30	vayomer hamelekh sob hityazeb koh vayisob vaya'amod. 2_samuel 18:31	vehineh hakushi ba vayomer hakushi yitbaser 'adoni hamelekh ki shefatekha yhvh hayom miyad kal haqamim 'alekha. 2_samuel 18:32	vayomer hamelekh 'el hakushi hashalom lana'ar le'abshalom vayomer hakushi yihyu khana'ar 'oyebei 'adoni hamelekh vekhol 'asher qamu 'alekha lera'ah. 2_samuel 18:33	vayirgaz hamelekh vaya'al 'al 'aliyat hasha'ar vayeibek vekhoh 'amar belekhto beni 'abshalom beni beni 'abshalom mi yiten muti 'ani takhtekha 'abshalom beni beni. 2_samuel 19:1	vayugad leyo'ab hineh hamelekh bokheh vayit'abel 'al 'abshalom. 2_samuel 19:2	vatehi hateshu'ah bayom hahu le'eibel lekhal ha'am ki shama' ha'am bayom hahu leimor ne'ezab hamelekh 'al beno. 2_samuel 19:3	vayitganeb ha'am bayom hahu labo ha'ir ka'asher yitganeb ha'am hanikhlamim benusam bamilkhamah. 2_samuel 19:4	vehamelekh la'at 'et panav vayiz'aq hamelekh qol gadol beni 'abshalom 'abshalom beni beni. 2_samuel 19:5	vayabo yo'ab 'el hamelekh habayit vayomer hobashta hayom 'et penei khal 'abadekha hamaletim 'et nafshekha hayom ve'et nefesh banekha ubenotekha venefesh nashekha venefesh pilagshekha. 2_samuel 19:6	le'ahabah 'et sone'ekha velisno 'et 'ohabekha ki higadta hayom ki 'en lekha sarim va'abadim ki yada'ti hayom ki lo lu 'abshalom khai vekhulanu hayom meitim ki 'az yashar be'einekha. 2_samuel 19:7	ve'atah qum zei vedaber 'al leb 'abadekha ki yhvh nishba'ti ki 'einekha yozei 'im yalin 'ish 'itekha halaylah vera'ah lekha zot mikal hara'ah 'asher ba'ah 'alekha mine'urekha 'ad 'atah. 2_samuel 19:8	vayaqam hamelekh vayeisheb basha'ar ulekhal ha'am higidu leimor hineh hamelekh yosheb basha'ar vayabo khal ha'am lifnei hamelekh veyisra'el nas 'ish le'ohalav. 2_samuel 19:9	vayhi khal ha'am nadon bekhal shibtei yisra'el leimor hamelekh hizilanu mikaf 'oyebeinu vehu miletanu mikaf pelishtim ve'atah barakh min ha'arez mei'al 'abshalom. 2_samuel 19:10	ve'abshalom 'asher mashakhnu 'aleinu met bamilkhamah ve'atah lamah 'atem makharishim lehashib 'et hamelekh. 2_samuel 19:11	vehamelekh david lakh 'el zadoq ve'el 'ebyatar hakohanim leimor daberu 'el ziqnei yehudah leimor lamah tihyu 'akharonim lehashib 'et hamelekh 'el beito udebar kal yisra'el ba 'el hamelekh 'el beito. 2_samuel 19:12	'akhai 'atem 'azmi ubesari 'atem velamah tihyu 'akharonim lehashib 'et hamelekh. 2_samuel 19:13	vela'amasa tomeru halo 'azmi ubesari 'atah koh ya'aseh li 'elohim vekhoh yosif 'im lo sar zaba tihyeh lefanai kal hayamim takhat yo'ab. 2_samuel 19:14	vayat 'et lebab kal 'ish yehudah ke'ish 'ekhad vayishlekhu 'el hamelekh shub 'atah vekhal 'abadekha. 2_samuel 19:15	vayashab hamelekh vayabo 'ad hayarden vihudah ba hagilgalah lalekhet liqrat hamelekh leha'abir 'et hamelekh 'et hayarden. 2_samuel 19:16	vaymaher shim'i ben geira ben haymini 'asher mibakhurim vayeired 'im 'ish yehudah liqrat hamelekh david. 2_samuel 19:17	ve'elef 'ish 'imo mibinyamin veziba na'ar bet sha'ul vakhameishet 'asar banav ve'esrim 'abadav 'ito vezalekhu hayarden lifnei hamelekh. 2_samuel 19:18	ve'aberah ha'abarah la'abir 'et bet hamelekh vela'asot hatob be'ayno be'einav veshim'i ben geira nafal lifnei hamelekh be'abero bayarden. 2_samuel 19:19	vayomer 'el hamelekh 'al yakhashab li 'adoni 'avon ve'al tizkor 'et 'asher he'evah 'abdekha bayom 'asher yaza 'adoni hamelekh mirushalim lasum hamelekh 'el libo. 2_samuel 19:20	ki yada' 'abdekha ki 'ani khatati vehineh bati hayom rishon lekhal bet yosef laredet liqrat 'adoni hamelekh. 2_samuel 19:21	vaya'an 'abishai ben zeruyah vayomer hatakhat zot lo yumat shim'i ki qilel 'et meshiakh yhvh. 2_samuel 19:22	vayomer david mah li velakhem benei zeruyah ki tihyu li hayom lesatan hayom yumat 'ish beyisra'el ki halo yada'ti ki hayom 'ani melekh 'al yisra'el. 2_samuel 19:23	vayomer hamelekh 'el shim'i lo tamut vayishaba' lo hamelekh. 2_samuel 19:24	umefiboshet ben sha'ul yarad liqrat hamelekh velo 'asah raglav velo 'asah sefamo ve'et begadav lo khibes lemin hayom lekhet hamelekh 'ad hayom 'asher ba beshalom. 2_samuel 19:25	vayhi ki ba yerushalim liqrat hamelekh vayomer lo hamelekh lamah lo halakhta 'imi mefiboshet. 2_samuel 19:26	vayomar 'adoni hamelekh 'abdi rimani ki 'amar 'abdekha 'ekhbeshah li hakhamor ve'erkab 'aleha ve'eilekh 'et hamelekh ki fiseiakh 'abdekha. 2_samuel 19:27	vayragel be'abdekha 'el 'adoni hamelekh vadoni hamelekh kemal'akh ha'elohim va'aseh hatob be'einekha. 2_samuel 19:28	ki lo hayah kal bet 'abi ki 'im 'anshei mavet ladoni hamelekh vatashet 'et 'abdekha be'okhelei shulkhanekha umah yesh li 'od zedaqah veliz'oq 'od 'el hamelekh. 2_samuel 19:29	vayomer lo hamelekh lamah tedaber 'od debarekha 'amarti 'atah veziba takhlequ 'et hasadeh. 2_samuel 19:30	vayomer mefiboshet 'el hamelekh gam 'et hakol yiqakh 'akharei 'asher ba 'adoni hamelekh beshalom 'el beito. 2_samuel 19:31	ubarzilai hagil'adi yarad meirogelim vaya'abor 'et hamelekh hayarden leshalekho 'et bayarden hayarden. 2_samuel 19:32	ubarzilai zaqen me'od ben shemonim shanah vehu khilkal 'et hamelekh beshibato bemakhanayim ki 'ish gadol hu me'od. 2_samuel 19:33	vayomer hamelekh 'el barzilai 'atah 'abor 'iti vekhilkalti 'otekha 'imadi birushalim. 2_samuel 19:34	vayomer barzilai 'el hamelekh kamah yemei shenei khayai ki 'e'eleh 'et hamelekh yerushalim. 2_samuel 19:35	ben shemonim shanah 'anokhi hayom ha'eida' ben tob lera' 'im yit'am 'abdekha 'et 'asher 'okhal ve'et 'asher 'eshteh 'im 'eshma' 'od beqol sharim vesharot velamah yihyeh 'abdekha 'od lemasa 'el 'adoni hamelekh. 2_samuel 19:36	kim'at ya'abor 'abdekha 'et hayarden 'et hamelekh velamah yigmeleini hamelekh hagemulah hazot. 2_samuel 19:37	yashab na 'abdekha ve'amut be'iri 'im qeber 'abi ve'imi vehineh 'abdekha khimham ya'abor 'im 'adoni hamelekh va'aseh lo 'et 'asher tob be'einekha. 2_samuel 19:38	vayomer hamelekh 'iti ya'abor kimham va'ani 'e'eseh lo 'et hatob be'einekha vekhol 'asher tibkhar 'alai 'e'eseh lakh. 2_samuel 19:39	vaya'abor kal ha'am 'et hayarden vehamelekh 'abar vayishaq hamelekh lebarzilai vaybarakheihu vayashab limqomo. 2_samuel 19:40	vaya'abor hamelekh hagilgalah vekhimhan 'abar 'imo vekhal 'am yehudah vai'ebiru he'ebiru 'et hamelekh vegam khazi 'am yisra'el. 2_samuel 19:41	vehineh kal 'ish yisra'el ba'im 'el hamelekh vayomeru 'el hamelekh madua' genabukha 'akheinu 'ish yehudah vaya'abiru 'et hamelekh ve'et beito 'et hayarden vekhal 'anshei david 'imo. 2_samuel 19:42	vaya'an kal 'ish yehudah 'al 'ish yisra'el ki qarob hamelekh 'eilai velamah zeh kharah lekha 'al hadabar hazeh he'akhol 'akhalnu min hamelekh 'im niset nisa lanu. 2_samuel 19:43	vaya'an 'ish yisra'el 'et 'ish yehudah vayomer 'eser yadot li bamelekh vegam bedavid 'ani mimekha umadua' heqilotani velo hayah debari rishon li lehashib 'et malki vayiqesh debar 'ish yehudah midebar 'ish yisra'el. 2_samuel 20:1	vesham niqra 'ish beliya'al ushemo sheba' ben bikhri 'ish yemini vayitqa' bashofar vayomer 'en lanu kheileq bedavid velo nakhalah lanu beben yishai 'ish le'ohalav yisra'el. 2_samuel 20:2	vaya'al kal 'ish yisra'el mei'akharei david 'akharei sheba' ben bikhri ve'ish yehudah dabequ bemalkam min hayarden ve'ad yerushalim. 2_samuel 20:3	vayabo david 'el beito yerushalim vayiqakh hamelekh 'et 'eser nashim pilagshim 'asher hiniakh lishmor habayit vayitenem bet mishmeret vaykhalkelem va'aleihem lo ba vatihyenah zerurot 'ad yom mutan 'almenut khayut. 2_samuel 20:4	vayomer hamelekh 'el 'amasa haz'eq li 'et 'ish yehudah sheloshet yamim ve'atah poh 'amod. 2_samuel 20:5	vayeilekh 'amasa lehaz'iq 'et yehudah vayikher vayokher min hamo'ed 'asher ye'ado. 2_samuel 20:6	vayomer david 'el 'abishai 'atah yeira' lanu sheba' ben bikhri min 'abshalom 'atah qakh 'et 'abdei 'adonekha uredof 'akharav pen maza lo 'arim bezurot vehizil 'eineinu. 2_samuel 20:7	vayeize'u 'akharav 'anshei yo'ab vehakereiti vehapeleiti vekhal hagiborim vayeize'u mirushalim lirdof 'akharei sheba' ben bikhri. 2_samuel 20:8	hem 'im ha'eben hagedolah 'asher begib'on va'amasa ba lifneihem veyo'ab khagur mido lebushu ve'alo ve'alav khagor khereb mezumedet 'al matenav beta'rah vehu yaza vatipol. 2_samuel 20:9	vayomer yo'ab la'amasa hashalom 'atah 'akhi vatokhez yad yemin yo'ab bizqan 'amasa linshaq lo. 2_samuel 20:10	va'amasa lo nishmar bakhereb 'asher beyad yo'ab vayakeihu bah 'el hakhomesh vayishpokh mei'av 'arzah velo shanah lo vayamot veyo'ab va'abishai 'akhiv radaf 'akharei sheba' ben bikhri. 2_samuel 20:11	ve'ish 'amad 'alav mina'arei yo'ab vayomer mi 'asher khafez beyo'ab umi 'asher ledavid 'akharei yo'ab. 2_samuel 20:12	va'amasa mitgolel badam betokh hamesilah vayar ha'ish ki 'amad kal ha'am vayaseb 'et 'amasa min hamsilah hasadeh vayashlekh 'alav beged ka'asher ra'ah kal haba 'alav ve'amad. 2_samuel 20:13	ka'asher hogah min hamsilah 'abar kal 'ish 'akharei yo'ab lirdof 'akharei sheba' ben bikhri. 2_samuel 20:14	vaya'abor bekhal shibtei yisra'el 'abeilah ubet ma'akhah vekhal habeirim vayiqleihu vayiqahalu vayabo'u 'af 'akharav. 2_samuel 20:15	vayabo'u vayazuru 'alav be'abeilah bet hama'akhah vayishpekhu solelah 'el ha'ir vata'amod bakhel vekhal ha'am 'asher 'et yo'ab mashkhitim lehapil hakhomah. 2_samuel 20:16	vatiqra 'ishah khakhamah min ha'ir shim'u shim'u 'imru na 'el yo'ab qerab 'ad henah va'adaberah 'eilekha. 2_samuel 20:17	vayiqrab 'eileha vatomer ha'ishah ha'atah yo'ab vayomer 'ani vatomer lo shema' dibrei 'amatekha vayomer shomeia' 'anokhi. 2_samuel 20:18	vatomer leimor daber yedaberu barishonah leimor sha'ol yesha'alu be'abel vekhen heitamu. 2_samuel 20:19	'anokhi shelumei 'emunei yisra'el 'atah mebaqesh lehamit 'ir ve'em beyisra'el lamah tebala' nakhalat yhvh. 2_samuel 20:20	vaya'an yo'ab vayomar khalilah khalilah li 'im 'abala' ve'im 'ashkhit. 2_samuel 20:21	lo khen hadabar ki 'ish meihar 'efrayim sheba' ben bikhri shemo nasa yado bamelekh bedavid tenu 'oto lebado ve'eilekhah mei'al ha'ir vatomer ha'ishah 'el yo'ab hineh rosho mushlakh 'eilekha be'ad hakhomah. 2_samuel 20:22	vatabo ha'ishah 'el kal ha'am bekhakhematah vayikhretu 'et rosh sheba' ben bikhri vayashlikhu 'el yo'ab vayitqa' bashofar vayafuzu mei'al ha'ir 'ish le'ohalav veyo'ab shab yerushalim 'el hamelekh. 2_samuel 20:23	veyo'ab 'el kal hazaba yisra'el ubenayah ben yehoyada' 'al hakeri hakereiti ve'al hapeleiti. 2_samuel 20:24	va'adoram 'al hamas vihoshafat ben 'akhilud hamazkir. 2_samuel 20:25	usheiya usheva sofer vezadoq ve'ebyatar kohanim. 2_samuel 20:26	vegam 'ira haya'iri hayah khohen ledavid. 2_samuel 21:1	vayhi ra'ab bimei david shalosh shanim shanah 'akharei shanah vaybaqesh david 'et penei yhvh vayomer yhvh 'el sha'ul ve'el bet hadamim 'al 'asher heimit 'et hagib'onim. 2_samuel 21:2	vayiqra hamelekh lagib'onim vayomer 'aleihem vehagib'onim lo mibenei yisra'el hemah ki 'im miyeter ha'emori ubenei yisra'el nishbe'u lahem vaybaqesh sha'ul lehakotam beqanoto libnei yisra'el vihudah. 2_samuel 21:3	vayomer david 'el hagib'onim mah 'e'eseh lakhem ubamah 'akhaper ubarekhu 'et nakhalat yhvh. 2_samuel 21:4	vayomeru lo hagib'onim 'en li lanu kesef vezahab 'im sha'ul ve'im beito ve'en lanu 'ish lehamit beyisra'el vayomer mah 'atem 'omerim 'e'eseh lakhem. 2_samuel 21:5	vayomeru 'el hamelekh ha'ish 'asher kilanu va'asher dimah lanu nishmadnu meihityazeb bekhal gebul yisra'el. 2_samuel 21:6	yenatan yutan lanu shib'ah 'anashim mibanav vehoqa'anum yhvh begib'at sha'ul bekhir yhvh vayomer hamelekh 'ani 'eten. 2_samuel 21:7	vayakhmol hamelekh 'al mefi boshet ben yehonatan ben sha'ul 'al shebu'at yhvh 'asher beinotam ben david uben yehonatan ben sha'ul. 2_samuel 21:8	vayiqakh hamelekh 'etosh nei benei rizpah bat 'ayah 'asher yaledah lesha'ul 'et 'armoni ve'et mefiboshet ve'et khameishet benei mikhal bat sha'ul 'asher yaledah le'adri'el ben barzilai hamekholati. 2_samuel 21:9	vayitenem beyad hagib'onim vayoqi'um bahar lifnei yhvh vayipelu shiba'tayim sheba'tam yakhad vehem vehemah humtu bimei qazir barishonim tekhilat bitkhilat qezir se'orim. 2_samuel 21:10	vatiqakh rizpah bat 'ayah 'et hasaq vatateihu lah 'el hazur mitekhilat qazir 'ad nitakh mayim 'aleihem min hashamayim velo natenah 'of hashamayim lanuakh 'aleihem yomam ve'et khayat hasadeh layelah. 2_samuel 21:11	vayugad ledavid 'et 'asher 'asetah rizpah bat 'ayah pilegesh sha'ul. 2_samuel 21:12	vayeilekh david vayiqakh 'et 'azmot sha'ul ve'et 'azmot yehonatan beno mei'et ba'alei yabesh gil'ad 'asher ganebu 'otam meirekhob bet shan 'asher telum tela'um sham hapelishtim shamah pelishtim beyom hakot pelishtim 'et sha'ul bagilboa'. 2_samuel 21:13	vaya'al misham 'et 'azmot sha'ul ve'et 'azmot yehonatan beno vaya'asfu 'et 'azmot hamuqa'im. 2_samuel 21:14	vayiqberu 'et 'azmot sha'ul vihonatan beno be'erez binyamin bezeila' beqeber qish 'abiv vaya'asu kol 'asher zivah hamelekh vayei'ater 'elohim la'arez 'akharei khen. 2_samuel 21:15	vatehi 'od milkhamah lapelishtim 'et yisra'el vayeired david va'abadav 'imo vayilakhamu 'et pelishtim vaya'af david. 2_samuel 21:16	veyishbo veyishbi benob 'asher bilidei harafah umishqal qeino shelosh mei'ot mishqal nekhoshet vehu khagur khadashah vayomer lehakot 'et david. 2_samuel 21:17	vaya'azar lo 'abishai ben zeruyah vayakh 'et hapelishti vaymiteihu 'az nishbe'u 'anshei david lo leimor lo teizei 'od 'itanu lamilkhamah velo tekhabeh 'et ner yisra'el. 2_samuel 21:18	vayhi 'akharei khen vatehi 'od hamilkhamah begob 'im pelishtim 'az hikah sibekhai hakhushati 'et saf 'asher bilidei harafah. 2_samuel 21:19	vatehi 'od hamilkhamah begob 'im pelishtim vayakh 'elkhanan ben ya'rei 'oregim bet halakhmi 'et galeyat hagiti ve'ez khanito kimnor 'oregim. 2_samuel 21:20	vatehi 'od milkhamah begat vayhi 'ish madin madon ve'ezbe'ot yadav ve'ezbe'ot raglav shesh vashesh 'esrim ve'arba' mispar vegam hu yulad leharafah. 2_samuel 21:21	vaykharef 'et yisra'el vayakeihu yehonatan ben shim'i shim'ah 'akhi david. 2_samuel 21:22	'et 'arba'at 'eleh yuledu leharafah begat vayipelu beyad david ubeyad 'abadav. 2_samuel 22:1	vaydaber david yhvh 'et dibrei hashirah hazot beyom hizil yhvh 'oto mikaf kal 'oyebav umikaf sha'ul. 2_samuel 22:2	vayomar yhvh sal'i umezudati umefalti li. 2_samuel 22:3	'elohei zuri 'ekheseh bo magini veqeren yish'i misgabi umenusi moshi'i meikhamas toshi'eini. 2_samuel 22:4	mehulal 'eqra yhvh umei'oyebai 'ivasheia'. 2_samuel 22:5	ki 'afafuni mishberei mavet nakhalei beliya'al yeba'atuni. 2_samuel 22:6	kheblei she'ol sabuni qidemuni moqeshei mavet. 2_samuel 22:7	bazar li 'eqra yhvh ve'el 'elohai 'eqra vayishma' meiheikhalo qoli veshav'ati be'azenav. 2_samuel 22:8	vatga'ash vayitga'ash vatir'ash ha'arez mosdot hashamayim yirgazu vayitga'ashu ki kharah lo. 2_samuel 22:9	'alah 'ashan be'apo ve'esh mipiv tokhel gekhalim ba'aru mimenu. 2_samuel 22:10	vayet shamayim vayeirad va'arafel takhat raglav. 2_samuel 22:11	vayirkab 'al kerub vaya'of vayeira 'al kanfei ruakh. 2_samuel 22:12	vayashet khoshekh sebibotav sukot khashrat mayim 'abei shekhaqim. 2_samuel 22:13	minogah negdo ba'aru gakhalei 'esh. 2_samuel 22:14	yar'em min shamayim yhvh ve'elyon yiten qolo. 2_samuel 22:15	vayishlakh khizim vayfizem baraq vayehumem vayahom. 2_samuel 22:16	vayeira'u 'afiqei yam yigalu mosedot teibel bega'arat yhvh minishmat ruakh 'apo. 2_samuel 22:17	yishlakh mimarom yiqakheini yamsheini mimayim rabim. 2_samuel 22:18	yazileini mei'oyebi 'az misone'ai ki 'amezu mimeni. 2_samuel 22:19	yeqademuni beyom 'eidi vayhi yhvh mish'an li. 2_samuel 22:20	vayozei lamerkhab 'oti yekhalezeini ki khafez bi. 2_samuel 22:21	yigmeleini yhvh kezidqati kebor yadai yashib li. 2_samuel 22:22	ki shamarti darkhei yhvh velo rasha'ti mei'elohai. 2_samuel 22:23	ki khal mishpoto mishpatav lenegdi vekhuqotav lo 'asur mimenah. 2_samuel 22:24	va'ehyeh tamim lo va'eshtamerah mei'avoni. 2_samuel 22:25	vayasheb yhvh li kezidqati kebori leneged 'einav. 2_samuel 22:26	'im khasid titkhasad 'im gibor tamim titamam. 2_samuel 22:27	'im nabar titabar ve'im 'iqesh titapal. 2_samuel 22:28	ve'et 'am 'ani toshia' ve'einekha 'al ramim tashpil. 2_samuel 22:29	ki 'atah neiri yhvh yhvh yagiah khasheki. 2_samuel 22:30	ki bekhah 'aruz gedud beilohai 'adaleg shur. 2_samuel 22:31	ha'el tamim darko 'imrat yhvh zerufah magen hu lekhol hakhosim bo. 2_samuel 22:32	ki mi 'el mibal'adei yhvh umi zur mibal'adei 'eloheinu. 2_samuel 22:33	ha'el ma'uzi khayil vayater tamim darko darki. 2_samuel 22:34	meshaveh raglav raglai ka'ayalot ve'al bamotai ya'amideini. 2_samuel 22:35	melamed yadai lamilkhamah venikhat qeshet nekhushah zero'otai. 2_samuel 22:36	vatiten li magen yish'ekha va'anotekha tarbeini. 2_samuel 22:37	tarkhib za'adi takhteini velo ma'adu qarsulai. 2_samuel 22:38	'erdefah 'oyebai va'ashmidem velo 'ashub 'ad kalotam. 2_samuel 22:39	va'akhalem va'emkhazem velo yequmun vayipelu takhat raglai. 2_samuel 22:40	vatazreini khayil lamilkhamah takhria' qamai takhteini. 2_samuel 22:41	ve'oyebai tatah li 'oref mesan'ai va'azmitem. 2_samuel 22:42	yish'u ve'en moshia' 'el yhvh velo 'anam. 2_samuel 22:43	ve'eshkhaqem ka'afar 'arez ketit khuzot 'adiqem 'erqa'em. 2_samuel 22:44	vatefaleteini meiribei 'ami tishmereini lerosh goyim 'am lo yada'ti ya'abduni. 2_samuel 22:45	benei neikhar yitkakhashu li lishmoa' 'ozen yishame'u li. 2_samuel 22:46	benei neikhar yibolu veyakhgeru mimisgerotam. 2_samuel 22:47	khai yhvh ubarukh zuri veyarum 'elohei zur yish'i. 2_samuel 22:48	ha'el hanoten neqamot li umorid 'amim takhteini. 2_samuel 22:49	umozi'i mei'oyebai umiqamai teromeini mei'ish khamasim tazileini. 2_samuel 22:50	'al ken 'odkha yhvh bagoyim uleshimkha 'azamer. 2_samuel 22:51	migdil migdol yeshu'ot malko ve'oseh khesed limshikho ledavid ulezar'o 'ad 'olam. 2_samuel 23:1	ve'eleh dibrei david ha'akharonim ne'um david ben yishai une'um hageber huqam 'al meshiakh 'elohei ya'aqob une'im zemirot yisra'el. 2_samuel 23:2	ruakh yhvh diber bi umilato 'al leshoni. 2_samuel 23:3	'amar 'elohei yisra'el li diber zur yisra'el moshel ba'adam zadiq moshel yir'at 'elohim. 2_samuel 23:4	ukhe'or boqer yizrakh shamesh boqer lo 'abot minogah mimatar deshe mei'arez. 2_samuel 23:5	ki lo khen beiti 'im 'el ki berit 'olam sam li 'arukhah bakol ushemurah ki khal yish'i vekhal kheifez ki lo yazmiakh. 2_samuel 23:6	ubeliya'al keqoz munad kulaham ki lo beyad yiqakhu. 2_samuel 23:7	ve'ish yiga' bahem yimalei barzel ve'ez khanit uba'esh sarof yisarefu bashabet. 2_samuel 23:8	'eleh shemot hagiborim 'asher ledavid yosheb bashebet takhkemoni rosh hashalishi hu 'adino ha'ezno ha'ezni 'al shemoneh mei'ot khalal befa'am 'ekhad 'ekhat. 2_samuel 23:9	ve'akharo ve'akharav 'el'azar ben dodi dodo ben 'akhokhi bishloshah giborim hagiborim 'im david bekharefam bapelishtim ne'esfu sham lamilkhamah vaya'alu 'ish yisra'el. 2_samuel 23:10	hu qam vayakh bapelishtim 'ad ki yage'ah yado vatidbaq yado 'el hakhereb vaya'as yhvh teshu'ah gedolah bayom hahu veha'am yashubu 'akharav 'akh lefashet. 2_samuel 23:11	ve'akharav shama ben 'agei harari vayei'asefu felishtim lakhayah vatehi sham khelqat hasadeh melei'ah 'adashim veha'am nas mipenei felishtim. 2_samuel 23:12	vayityazeb betokh hakhelqah vayazileha vayakh 'et pelishtim vaya'as yhvh teshu'ah gedolah. 2_samuel 23:13	vayeiredu sheloshim sheloshah meihasheloshim rosh vayabo'u 'el qazir 'el david 'el me'arat 'adulam vekhayat pelishtim khonah be'eimeq refa'im. 2_samuel 23:14	vedavid 'az bamezudah umazab pelishtim 'az bet lakhem. 2_samuel 23:15	vayit'aveh david vayomar mi yashqeini mayim mibor bet lekhem 'asher basha'ar. 2_samuel 23:16	vayibqe'u sheloshet hagiborim bemakhaneh felishtim vayish'abu mayim mibor bet lekhem 'asher basha'ar vayis'u vayabi'u 'el david velo 'abah lishtotam vayasekh 'otam yhvh. 2_samuel 23:17	vayomer khalilah li yhvh mei'asoti zot hadam ha'anashim haholekhim benafshotam velo 'abah lishtotam 'eleh 'asu sheloshet hagiborim. 2_samuel 23:18	va'abishai 'akhi yo'ab ben zeruyah hu rosh hasheloshi hasheloshah vehu 'orer 'et khanito 'al shelosh mei'ot khalal velo shem basheloshah. 2_samuel 23:19	min hasheloshah hakhi nikhbad vayhi lahem lesar ve'ad hasheloshah lo ba. 2_samuel 23:20	ubenayahu ben yehoyada' ben 'ish khai khayil rab pe'alim miqabze'el hu hikah 'et shenei 'ari'el mo'ab vehu yarad vehikah 'et ha'ariyah ha'ari betokh habor beyom hashaleg. 2_samuel 23:21	vehu hikah 'et 'ish mizri 'asher 'ish mar'eh ubeyad hamizri khanit vayeired 'eilav bashabet vayigzol 'et hakhanit miyad hamizri vayahargeihu bakhanito. 2_samuel 23:22	'eleh 'asah benayahu ben yehoyada' velo shem bishloshah hagiborim. 2_samuel 23:23	min hasheloshim nikhbad ve'el hasheloshah lo ba vaysimeihu david 'el mishma'to. 2_samuel 23:24	'asah 'el 'akhi yo'ab basheloshim 'elkhanan ben dodo bet lakhem. 2_samuel 23:25	shamah hakharodi 'eliqa hakharodi. 2_samuel 23:26	khelez hapalti 'ira ben 'iqesh hateqo'i. 2_samuel 23:27	'abi'ezer ha'anetoti mebunai hakhushati. 2_samuel 23:28	zalmon ha'akhokhi mahrai hanetofati. 2_samuel 23:29	kheileb ben ba'anah hanetofati 'itai ben ribai migib'at benei binyamin. 2_samuel 23:30	benayahu pir'atoni hidai minakhalei ga'ash. 2_samuel 23:31	'abi 'albon ha'arbati 'azmavet habarkhumi. 2_samuel 23:32	'elyakhba hasha'alboni benei yashen yehonatan. 2_samuel 23:33	shamah haharari 'akhi'am ben sharar harari. 2_samuel 23:34	'elifelet ben 'akhasbai ben hama'akhati 'eli'am ben 'akhitofel hagiloni. 2_samuel 23:35	khezro khezrai hakarmeli pa'arai ha'arbi. 2_samuel 23:36	yig'al ben natan mizobah bani hagadi. 2_samuel 23:37	zeleq ha'amoni nakhrai habe'eiroti nose'ei nosei kelei yo'ab ben zeruyah. 2_samuel 23:38	'ira hayitri gareb hayitri. 2_samuel 23:39	'uriyah hakhiti kol sheloshim veshib'ah. 2_samuel 24:1	vayosef 'af yhvh lakharot beyisra'el vayaset 'et david bahem leimor lekh meneh 'et yisra'el ve'et yehudah. 2_samuel 24:2	vayomer hamelekh 'el yo'ab sar hakhayil 'asher 'ito shut na bekhal shibtei yisra'el midan ve'ad be'er sheba' ufiqdu 'et ha'am veyada'ti 'et mispar ha'am. 2_samuel 24:3	vayomer yo'ab 'el hamelekh veyosef yhvh 'elohekha 'el ha'am kahem vekhahem mei'ah fe'amim ve'einei 'adoni hamelekh ro'ot vadoni hamelekh lamah khafez badabar hazeh. 2_samuel 24:4	vayekhezaq debar hamelekh 'el yo'ab ve'al sarei hekhayil vayeizei yo'ab vesarei hakhayil lifnei hamelekh lifqod 'et ha'am 'et yisra'el. 2_samuel 24:5	vaya'abru 'et hayarden vayakhanu ba'aro'er yemin ha'ir 'asher betokh hanakhal hagad ve'el ya'zer. 2_samuel 24:6	vayabo'u hagil'adah ve'el 'erez takhtim khadeshi vayabo'u danah ya'an vesabib 'el zidon. 2_samuel 24:7	vayabo'u mibzar zor vekhal 'arei hakhivi vehakena'ani vayeize'u 'el negeb yehudah be'er shaba'. 2_samuel 24:8	vayashutu bekhal ha'arez vayabo'u miqzeh tish'ah khodashim ve'esrim yom yerushalim. 2_samuel 24:9	vayiten yo'ab 'et mispar mifqad ha'am 'el hamelekh vatehi yisra'el shemoneh mei'ot 'elef 'ish khayil sholef khereb ve'ish yehudah khamesh mei'ot 'elef 'ish. 2_samuel 24:10	vayakh leb david 'oto 'akharei khen safar 'et ha'am vayomer david 'el yhvh khatati me'od 'asher 'asiti ve'atah yhvh ha'aber na 'et 'avon 'abdekha ki niskalti me'od. 2_samuel 24:11	vayaqam david baboqer udebar yhvh hayah 'el gad hanabi khozeh david leimor. 2_samuel 24:12	halokh vedibarta 'el david koh 'amar yhvh shalosh 'anokhi notel 'alekha bekhar lekha 'akhat meihem ve'e'eseh lakh. 2_samuel 24:13	vayabo gad 'el david vayaged lo vayomer lo hatabo lekha sheba' shanim ra'ab be'arzekha 'im sheloshah khodashim nuskha lifnei zarekha vehu rodefekha ve'im heyot sheloshet yamim deber be'arzekha 'atah da' ure'eh mah 'ashib sholekhi dabar. 2_samuel 24:14	vayomer david 'el gad zar li me'od nipelah na beyad yhvh ki rabim rakhamo rakhamav ubeyad 'adam 'al 'epolah. 2_samuel 24:15	vayiten yhvh deber beyisra'el meihaboqer ve'ad 'et mo'ed vayamat min ha'am midan ve'ad be'er sheba' shib'im 'elef 'ish. 2_samuel 24:16	vayishlakh yado hamal'akh yerushalim leshakhatah vayinakhem yhvh 'el hara'ah vayomer lamal'akh hamashkhit ba'am rab 'atah heref yadekha umal'akh yhvh hayah 'im goren ha'ornah ha'aravnah haybusi. 2_samuel 24:17	vayomer david 'el yhvh bir'oto 'et hamal'akh hamakeh ba'am vayomer hineh 'anokhi khatati ve'anokhi he'eveiti ve'eleh hazon meh 'asu tehi na yadekha bi ubebet 'abi. 2_samuel 24:18	vayabo gad 'el david bayom hahu vayomer lo 'aleh haqem yhvh mizbeiakh begoren 'araneyah 'aravnah haybusi. 2_samuel 24:19	vaya'al david kidbar gad ka'asher zivah yhvh. 2_samuel 24:20	vayashqef 'aravnah vayar 'et hamelekh ve'et 'abadav 'oberim 'alav vayeizei 'aravnah vayishtakhu lamelekh 'apav 'arezah. 2_samuel 24:21	vayomer 'aravnah madua' ba 'adoni hamelekh 'el 'abdo vayomer david liqnot mei'imekha 'et hagoren libnot mizbeiakh yhvh vetei'azar hamageifah mei'al ha'am. 2_samuel 24:22	vayomer 'aravnah 'el david yiqakh veya'al 'adoni hamelekh hatob be'ayno be'einav re'eh habaqar la'olah vehamorigim ukhelei habaqar la'eizim. 2_samuel 24:23	hakol natan 'aravnah hamelekh lamelekh vayomer 'aravnah 'el hamelekh yhvh 'elohekha yirzekha. 2_samuel 24:24	vayomer hamelekh 'el 'aravnah lo ki qano 'eqneh mei'otkha bimkhir velo 'a'aleh yhvh 'elohai 'olot khinam vayiqen david 'et hagoren ve'et habaqar bekhesef sheqalim khamishim. 2_samuel 24:25	vayiben sham david mizbeiakh yhvh vaya'al 'olot ushelamim vayei'ater yhvh la'arez vatei'azar hamageifah mei'al yisra'el. 

1_kings 1:1	vehamelekh david zaqen ba bayamim vaykhasuhu babegadim velo yikham lo. 1_kings 1:2	vayomeru lo 'abadav yebaqshu ladoni hamelekh na'arah betulah ve'amedah lifnei hamelekh utehi lo sokhenet veshakhebah bekheiqekha vekham ladoni hamelekh. 1_kings 1:3	vaybaqshu na'arah yafah bekhol gebul yisra'el vayimze'u 'et 'abishag hashunamit vayabi'u 'otah lamelekh. 1_kings 1:4	vehana'arah yafah 'ad me'od vatehi lamelekh sokhenet vateshareteihu vehamelekh lo yeda'ah. 1_kings 1:5	va'adoniyah ben khagit mitnasei leimor 'ani 'emlokh vaya'as lo rekheb ufarashim vakhamishim 'ish razim lefanav. 1_kings 1:6	velo 'azabo 'abiv miyamav leimor madua' kakhah 'asita vegam hu tob to'ar me'od ve'oto yaledah 'akharei 'abshalom. 1_kings 1:7	vayihyu debarav 'im yo'ab ben zeruyah ve'im 'ebyatar hakohen vaya'zeru 'akharei 'adoniyah. 1_kings 1:8	vezadoq hakohen ubenayahu ben yehoyada' venatan hanabi veshim'i verei'i vehagiborim 'asher ledavid lo hayu 'im 'adoniyahu. 1_kings 1:9	vayizbakh 'adoniyahu zon ubaqar umeri 'im 'eben hazokhelet 'asher 'eizel 'en rogel vayiqra 'et kal 'ekhav benei hamelekh ulekhal 'anshei yehudah 'abdei hamelekh. 1_kings 1:10	ve'et natan hanabi ubenayahu ve'et hagiborim ve'et shelomoh 'akhiv lo qara. 1_kings 1:11	vayomer natan 'el bat sheba' 'em shelomoh leimor halo shama'at ki malakh 'adoniyahu ben khagit va'adoneinu david lo yada'. 1_kings 1:12	ve'atah lekhi 'i'azekh na 'eizah umaleti 'et nafshekh ve'et nefesh benekh shelomoh. 1_kings 1:13	lekhi ubo'i 'el hamelekh david ve'amart 'eilav halo 'atah 'adoni hamelekh nishba'ta la'amatekha leimor ki shelomoh benekh yimlokh 'akharai vehu yeisheb 'al kis'i umadua' malakh 'adoniyahu 1_kings 1:14	hineh 'odakh medaberet sham 'im hamelekh va'ani 'abo 'akharayikh umileiti 'et debarayikh. 1_kings 1:15	vatabo bat shebe' 'el hamelekh hakhadrah vehamelekh zaqen me'od va'abishag hashunamit mesharat 'et hamelekh. 1_kings 1:16	vatiqod bat sheba' vatishtakhu lamelekh vayomer hamelekh mah lakh. 1_kings 1:17	vatomer lo 'adoni 'atah nishba'ta yhvh 'elohekha la'amatekha ki shelomoh benekh yimlokh 'akharai vehu yeisheb 'al kis'i. 1_kings 1:18	ve'atah hineh 'adoniyah malakh ve'atah 'adoni hamelekh lo yada'eta. 1_kings 1:19	vayizbakh shor umeri vezon larob vayiqra lekhal benei hamelekh ule'ebyatar hakohen uleyo'ab sar hazaba velishlomoh 'abdekha lo qara. 1_kings 1:20	ve'atah 'adoni hamelekh 'einei khal yisra'el 'alekha lehagid lahem mi yeisheb 'al kisei 'adoni hamelekh 'akharav. 1_kings 1:21	vehayah kishkhab 'adoni hamelekh 'im 'abotav vehayiti 'ani ubeni shelomoh khata'im. 1_kings 1:22	vehineh 'odenah medaberet 'im hamelekh venatan hanabi ba. 1_kings 1:23	vayagidu lamelekh leimor hineh natan hanabi vayabo lifnei hamelekh vayishtakhu lamelekh 'al 'apav 'arezah. 1_kings 1:24	vayomer natan 'adoni hamelekh 'atah 'amarta 'adoniyahu yimlokh 'akharai vehu yeisheb 'al kis'i. 1_kings 1:25	ki yarad hayom vayizbakh shor umeri vezon larob vayiqra lekhal benei hamelekh ulesarei hazaba ule'ebyatar hakohen vehinam 'okhelim veshotim lefanav vayomeru yekhi hamelekh 'adoniyahu. 1_kings 1:26	veli 'ani 'abdekha ulezadoq hakohen velibnayahu ben yehoyada' velishlomoh 'abdekha lo qara. 1_kings 1:27	'im mei'et 'adoni hamelekh nihyah hadabar hazeh velo hoda'ta 'et 'abdekha 'abdekha mi yeisheb 'al kisei 'adoni hamelekh 'akharav. 1_kings 1:28	vaya'an hamelekh david vayomer qir'u li lebat shaba' vatabo lifnei hamelekh vata'amod lifnei hamelekh. 1_kings 1:29	vayishaba' hamelekh vayomar khai yhvh 'asher padah 'et nafshi mikal zarah. 1_kings 1:30	ki ka'asher nishba'ti lakh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el leimor ki shelomoh benekh yimlokh 'akharai vehu yeisheb 'al kis'i takhtai ki ken 'e'eseh hayom hazeh. 1_kings 1:31	vatiqod bat sheba' 'apayim 'erez vatishtakhu lamelekh vatomer yekhi 'adoni hamelekh david le'olam. 1_kings 1:32	vayomer hamelekh david qir'u li lezadoq hakohen ulenatan hanabi velibnayahu ben yehoyada' vayabo'u lifnei hamelekh. 1_kings 1:33	vayomer hamelekh lahem qekhu 'imakhem 'et 'abdei 'adoneikhem vehirkabtem 'et shelomoh beni 'al hapirdah 'asher li vehoradtem 'oto 'el gikhon. 1_kings 1:34	umashakh 'oto m zadoq hakohen venatan hanabi lemelekh 'al yisra'el uteqa'tem bashofar va'amartem yekhi hamelekh shelomoh. 1_kings 1:35	va'alitem 'akharav uba veyashab 'al kis'i vehu yimlokh takhtai ve'oto ziviti lihyot nagid 'al yisra'el ve'al yehudah. 1_kings 1:36	vaya'an benayahu ben yehoyada' 'et hamelekh vayomer 'amen ken yomar yhvh 'elohei 'adoni hamelekh. 1_kings 1:37	ka'asher hayah yhvh 'im 'adoni hamelekh ken yehi yihyeh 'im shelomoh vigadel 'et kis'o mikisei 'adoni hamelekh david. 1_kings 1:38	vayeired zadoq hakohen venatan hanabi ubenayahu ben yehoyada' vehakereiti vehapeleiti vayarkibu 'et shelomoh 'al pirdat hamelekh david vayolikhu 'oto 'al gikhon. 1_kings 1:39	vayiqakh zadoq hakohen 'et qeren hashemen min ha'ohel vayimshakh 'et shelomoh vayitqe'u bashofar vayomeru kal ha'am yekhi hamelekh shelomoh. 1_kings 1:40	vaya'alu khal ha'am 'akharav veha'am mekhalelim bakhalilim usemeikhim simkhah gedolah vatibaqa' ha'arez beqolam. 1_kings 1:41	vayishma' 'adoniyahu vekhal haqeru'im 'asher 'ito vehem kilu le'ekhol vayishma' yo'ab 'et qol hashofar vayomer madua' qol haqiryah homah. 1_kings 1:42	'odenu medaber vehineh yonatan ben 'ebyatar hakohen ba vayomer 'adoniyahu bo ki 'ish khayil 'atah vetob tebaser. 1_kings 1:43	vaya'an yonatan vayomer la'adoniyahu 'abal 'adoneinu hamelekh david himlikh 'et shelomoh. 1_kings 1:44	vayishlakh 'ito hamelekh 'et zadoq hakohen ve'et natan hanabi ubenayahu ben yehoyada' vehakereiti vehapeleiti vayarkibu 'oto 'al pirdat hamelekh. 1_kings 1:45	vayimshekhu 'oto zadoq hakohen venatan hanabi lemelekh begikhon vaya'alu misham semeikhim vateihom haqiryah hu haqol 'asher shema'tem. 1_kings 1:46	vegam yashab shelomoh 'al kisei hamelukhah. 1_kings 1:47	vegam ba'u 'abdei hamelekh lebarekh 'et 'adoneinu hamelekh david leimor yeiteb 'elohekha 'elohim 'et shem shelomoh mishemekha vigadel 'et kis'o mikis'ekha vayishtakhu hamelekh 'al hamishkab. 1_kings 1:48	vegam kakhah 'amar hamelekh barukh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher natan hayom yosheb 'al kis'i ve'einai ro'ot. 1_kings 1:49	vayekherdu vayaqumu kal haqeru'im 'asher la'adoniyahu vayeilekhu 'ish ledarko. 1_kings 1:50	va'adoniyahu yarei mipenei shelomoh vayaqam vayeilekh vayakhazeq beqarnot hamizbeiakh. 1_kings 1:51	vayugad lishlomoh leimor hineh 'adoniyahu yarei 'et hamelekh shelomoh vehineh 'akhaz beqarnot hamizbeiakh leimor yishaba' li khayom hamelekh shelomoh 'im yamit 'et 'abdo bekhareb. 1_kings 1:52	vayomer shelomoh 'im yihyeh leben khayil lo yipol misa'arato 'arezah ve'im ra'ah timazei bo vamet. 1_kings 1:53	vayishlakh hamelekh shelomoh vayoriduhu mei'al hamizbeiakh vayabo vayishtakhu lamelekh shelomoh vayomer lo shelomoh lekh lebeitekha. 1_kings 2:1	vayiqrebu yemei david lamut vayzav 'et shelomoh beno leimor. 1_kings 2:2	'anokhi holekh bederekh kal ha'arez vekhazaqta vehayita le'ish. 1_kings 2:3	veshamarta 'et mishmeret yhvh 'elohekha lalekhet bidrakhav lishmor khuqotav mizvotav umishpatav ve'eidevotav kakatub betorat mosheh lema'an taskil 'et kal 'asher ta'aseh ve'et kal 'asher tifneh sham. 1_kings 2:4	lema'an yaqim yhvh 'et debaro 'asher diber 'alai leimor 'im yishmeru banekha 'et darkam lalekhet lefanai be'emet bekhal lebabam ubekhal nafsham leimor lo yikaret lekha 'ish mei'al kisei yisra'el. 1_kings 2:5	vegam 'atah yada'ta 'et 'asher 'asah li yo'ab ben zeruyah 'asher 'asah lishnei sarei zib'ot yisra'el le'abner ben ner vela'amasa ben yeter vayahargem vayasem demei milkhamah beshalom vayiten demei milkhamah bakhagorato 'asher bematenav ubena'alo 'asher beraglav. 1_kings 2:6	ve'asita kekhakhematekha velo tored seibato beshalom she'ol. 1_kings 2:7	velibnei barzilai hagil'adi ta'aseh khesed vehayu be'okhelei shulkhanekha ki khen qarebu 'eilai bebarekhi mipenei 'abshalom 'akhikha. 1_kings 2:8	vehineh 'imekha shim'i ben geira ben haymini mibakhurim vehu qilani qelalah nimrezet beyom lekhti makhanayim vehu yarad liqrati hayarden va'eshaba' lo yhvh leimor 'im 'amitekha bekhareb. 1_kings 2:9	ve'atah 'al tenaqeihu ki 'ish khakham 'atah veyada'ta 'et 'asher ta'aseh lo vehoradta 'et seibato bedam she'ol. 1_kings 2:10	vayishkab david 'im 'abotav vayiqaber be'ir david. 1_kings 2:11	vehayamim 'asher malakh david 'al yisra'el 'arba'im shanah bekhebron malakh sheba' shanim ubirushalim malakh sheloshim veshalosh shanim. 1_kings 2:12	ushelomoh yashab 'al kisei david 'abiv vatikon malkhuto me'od. 1_kings 2:13	vayabo 'adoniyahu ben khaget 'el bat sheba' 'em shelomoh vatomer hashalom bo'ekha vayomer shalom. 1_kings 2:14	vayomer dabar li 'eilayikh vatomer daber. 1_kings 2:15	vayomer 'at yada'at ki li hayetah hamelukhah ve'alai samu khal yisra'el peneihem limlokh vatisob hamelukhah vatehi le'akhi ki yhvh hayetah lo. 1_kings 2:16	ve'atah she'eilah 'akhat 'anokhi sho'el mei'itakh 'al tashibi 'et panai vatomer 'eilav daber. 1_kings 2:17	vayomer 'imri na lishlomoh hamelekh ki lo yashib 'et panayikh veyiten li 'et 'abishag hashunamit le'ishah. 1_kings 2:18	vatomer bat sheba' tob 'anokhi 'adaber 'alekha 'el hamelekh. 1_kings 2:19	vatabo bat sheba' 'el hamelekh shelomoh ledaber lo 'al 'adoniyahu vayaqam hamelekh liqratah vayishtakhu lah vayeisheb 'al kis'o vayasem kisei le'em hamelekh vateisheb limino. 1_kings 2:20	vatomer she'eilah 'akhat qetanah 'anokhi sho'elet mei'itakh 'al tasheb 'et panai vayomer lah hamelekh sha'ali 'imi ki lo 'ashib 'et panayikh. 1_kings 2:21	vatomer yutan 'et 'abishag hashunamit la'adoniyahu 'akhikha le'ishah. 1_kings 2:22	vaya'an hamelekh shelomoh vayomer le'imo velamah 'at sho'elet 'et 'abishag hashunamit la'adoniyahu vesha'ali lo 'et hamelukhah ki hu 'akhi hagadol mimeni velo ule'ebyatar hakohen uleyo'ab ben zeruyah. 1_kings 2:23	vayishaba' hamelekh shelomoh yhvh leimor koh ya'aseh li 'elohim vekhoh yosif ki benafsho diber 'adoniyahu 'et hadabar hazeh. 1_kings 2:24	ve'atah khai yhvh 'asher hekhinani vayoshibini vayoshibani 'al kisei david 'abi va'asher 'asah li bayit ka'asher diber ki hayom yumat 'adoniyahu. 1_kings 2:25	vayishlakh hamelekh shelomoh beyad benayahu ben yehoyada' vayifga' bo vayamot. 1_kings 2:26	ule'ebyatar hakohen 'amar hamelekh 'anatot lekh 'al sadekha ki 'ish mavet 'atah ubayom hazeh lo 'amitekha ki nasata 'et 'aron 'adonai yhvh lifnei david 'abi vekhi hit'anita bekhol 'asher hit'anah 'abi. 1_kings 2:27	vaygaresh shelomoh 'et 'ebyatar mihyot kohen yhvh lemalei 'et debar yhvh 'asher diber 'al bet 'eili beshiloh. 1_kings 2:28	vehashemu'ah ba'ah 'ad yo'ab ki yo'ab natah 'akharei 'adoniyah ve'akharei 'abshalom lo natah vayanas yo'ab 'el 'ohel yhvh vayakhazeq beqarnot hamizbeiakh. 1_kings 2:29	vayugad lamelekh shelomoh ki nas yo'ab 'el 'ohel yhvh vehineh 'eizel hamizbeiakh vayishlakh shelomoh 'et benayahu ben yehoyada' leimor lekh pega' bo. 1_kings 2:30	vayabo benayahu 'el 'ohel yhvh vayomer 'eilav koh 'amar hamelekh zei vayomer lo ki foh 'amut vayasheb benayahu 'et hamelekh dabar leimor koh diber yo'ab vekhoh 'anani. 1_kings 2:31	vayomer lo hamelekh 'aseh ka'asher diber ufega' bo uqebarto vahasirota demei khinam 'asher shafakh yo'ab mei'alai umei'al bet 'abi. 1_kings 2:32	veheishib yhvh 'et damo 'al rosho 'asher paga' bishnei 'anashim zadiqim vetobim mimenu vayahargem bakhereb ve'abi david lo yada' 'et 'abner ben ner sar zeba yisra'el ve'et 'amasa ben yeter sar zeba yehudah. 1_kings 2:33	veshabu demeihem berosh yo'ab uberosh zar'o le'olam uledavid ulezar'o ulebeito ulekhis'o yihyeh shalom 'ad 'olam mei'im yhvh. 1_kings 2:34	vaya'al benayahu ben yehoyada' vayifga' bo vaymiteihu vayiqaber bebeito bamidbar. 1_kings 2:35	vayiten hamelekh 'et benayahu ben yehoyada' takhtav 'al hazaba ve'et zadoq hakohen natan hamelekh takhat 'ebyatar. 1_kings 2:36	vayishlakh hamelekh vayiqra leshim'i vayomer lo beneh lekha bayit birushalim veyashabta sham velo teizei misham 'aneh va'anah. 1_kings 2:37	vehayah beyom zeitekha ve'abarta 'et nakhal qidron yadoa' teida' ki mot tamut damekha yihyeh beroshekha. 1_kings 2:38	vayomer shim'i lamelekh tob hadabar ka'asher diber 'adoni hamelekh ken ya'aseh 'abdekha vayeisheb shim'i birushalim yamim rabim. 1_kings 2:39	vayhi miqez shalosh shanim vayibrekhu shenei 'abadim leshim'i 'el 'akhish ben ma'akhah melekh gat vayagidu leshim'i leimor hineh 'abadekha begat. 1_kings 2:40	vayaqam shim'i vayakhabosh 'et khamoro vayeilekh gatah 'el 'akhish lebaqesh 'et 'abadav vayeilekh shim'i vayabei 'et 'abadav migat. 1_kings 2:41	vayugad lishlomoh ki halakh shim'i mirushalim gat vayashob. 1_kings 2:42	vayishlakh hamelekh vayiqra leshim'i vayomer 'eilav halo hishba'tikha yhvh va'a'id bekha leimor beyom zeitekha vehalakhta 'aneh va'anah yadoa' teida' ki mot tamut vatomer 'eilai tob hadabar shama'eti. 1_kings 2:43	umadua' lo shamarta 'et shebu'at yhvh ve'et hamizvah 'asher ziviti 'alekha. 1_kings 2:44	vayomer hamelekh 'el shim'i 'atah yada'ta 'et kal hara'ah 'asher yada' lebabekha 'asher 'asita ledavid 'abi veheishib yhvh 'et ra'atekha beroshekha. 1_kings 2:45	vehamelekh shelomoh barukh vekhisei david yihyeh nakhon lifnei yhvh 'ad 'olam. 1_kings 2:46	vayzav hamelekh 'et benayahu ben yehoyada' vayeizei vayifga' bo vayamot vehamamlakhah nakhonah beyad shelomoh. 1_kings 3:1	vayitkhaten shelomoh 'et par'oh melekh mizrayim vayiqakh 'et bat par'oh vaybi'eha 'el 'ir david 'ad kaloto libnot 'et beito ve'et bet yhvh ve'et khomat yerushalim sabib. 1_kings 3:2	raq ha'am mezabekhim babamot ki lo nibnah bayit leshem yhvh 'ad hayamim hahem. 1_kings 3:3	vaye'ehab shelomoh 'et yhvh lalekhet bekhuqot david 'abiv raq babamot hu mezabeiakh umaqtir. 1_kings 3:4	vayeilekh hamelekh gib'onah lizboakh sham ki hi habamah hagedolah 'elef 'olot ya'aleh shelomoh 'al hamizbeiakh hahu. 1_kings 3:5	begib'on nir'ah yhvh 'el shelomoh bakhalom halayelah vayomer 'elohim she'al mah 'eten lakh. 1_kings 3:6	vayomer shelomoh 'atah 'asita 'im 'abdekha david 'abi khesed gadol ka'asher halakh lefanekha be'emet ubizdaqah ubeyishrat leibab 'imakh vatishmar lo 'et hakhesed hagadol hazeh vatiten lo ben yosheb 'al kis'o kayom hazeh. 1_kings 3:7	ve'atah yhvh 'elohai 'atah himlakhta 'et 'abdekha takhat david 'abi ve'anokhi na'ar qaton lo 'eida' zet vabo. 1_kings 3:8	ve'abdekha betokh 'amekha 'asher bakhareta 'am rab 'asher lo yimaneh velo yisafer meirob. 1_kings 3:9	venatata le'abdekha leb shomeia' lishpot 'et 'amekha lehabin ben tob lera' ki mi yukhal lishpot 'et 'amekha hakabed hazeh. 1_kings 3:10	vayitab hadabar be'einei 'adonai ki sha'al shelomoh 'et hadabar hazeh. 1_kings 3:11	vayomer 'elohim 'eilav ya'an 'asher sha'alta 'et hadabar hazeh velo sha'alta lekha yamim rabim velo sha'alta lekha 'osher velo sha'alta nefesh 'oyebekha vesha'alta lekha habin lishmoa' mishpat. 1_kings 3:12	hineh 'asiti kidbarekha hineh natati lekha leb khakham venabon 'asher kamokha lo hayah lefanekha ve'akharekha lo yaqum kamokha. 1_kings 3:13	vegam 'asher lo sha'alta natati lakh gam 'osher gam kabod 'asher lo hayah khamokha 'ish bamelakhim kal yamekha. 1_kings 3:14	ve'im teilekh bidrakhai lishmor khuqai umizvotai ka'asher halakh david 'abikha veha'arakhti 'et yamekha. 1_kings 3:15	vayiqaz shelomoh vehineh khalom vayabo yerushalim vaya'amod lifnei 'aron berit 'adonai vaya'al 'olot vaya'as shelamim vaya'as mishteh lekhal 'abadav. 1_kings 3:16	'az tabonah shetayim nashim zonot 'el hamelekh vata'amodenah lefanav. 1_kings 3:17	vatomer ha'ishah ha'akhat bi 'adoni 'ani veha'ishah hazot yoshebot bebayit 'ekhad va'eiled 'imah babayit. 1_kings 3:18	vayhi bayom hashelishi lelidti vateiled gam ha'ishah hazot va'anakhnu yakhdav 'en zar 'itanu babayit zulati shetayim 'anakhnu babayit. 1_kings 3:19	vayamat ben ha'ishah hazot layelah 'asher shakhebah 'alav. 1_kings 3:20	vataqam betokh halaylah vatiqakh 'et beni mei'ezli va'amatekha yesheinah vatashkibeihu bekheiqah ve'et benah hamet hishkibah bekheiqi. 1_kings 3:21	va'aqum baboqer leheiniq 'et beni vehineh met va'etbonen 'eilav baboqer vehineh lo hayah beni 'asher yaladeti. 1_kings 3:22	vatomer ha'ishah ha'akheret lo khi beni hakhai ubenekh hamet vezot 'omeret lo khi benekh hamet ubeni hekhai vatedabeirenah lifnei hamelekh. 1_kings 3:23	vayomer hamelekh zot 'omeret zeh beni hakhai ubenekh hamet vezot 'omeret lo khi benekh hamet ubeni hekhai. 1_kings 3:24	vayomer hamelekh qekhu li khareb vayabi'u hakhereb lifnei hamelekh. 1_kings 3:25	vayomer hamelekh gizru 'et hayeled hakhai lishnayim utenu 'et hakhazi le'akhat ve'et hakhazi le'ekhat. 1_kings 3:26	vatomer ha'ishah 'asher benah hakhai 'el hamelekh ki nikhmeru rakhameha 'al benah vatomer bi 'adoni tenu lah 'et hayalud hakhai vehamet 'al temituhu vezot 'omeret gam li gam lakh lo yihyeh gezoru. 1_kings 3:27	vaya'an hamelekh vayomer tenu lah 'et hayalud hakhai vehamet lo temituhu hi 'imo. 1_kings 3:28	vayishme'u khal yisra'el 'et hamishpat 'asher shafat hamelekh vayir'u mipenei hamelekh ki ra'u ki khakhemat 'elohim beqirbo la'asot mishpat. 1_kings 4:1	vayhi hamelekh shelomoh melekh 'al kal yisra'el. 1_kings 4:2	ve'eleh hasarim 'asher lo 'azaryahu ben zadoq hakohen. 1_kings 4:3	'elikhoref va'akhiyah benei shisha soferim yehoshafat ben 'akhilud hamazkir. 1_kings 4:4	ubenayahu ben yehoyada' 'al hazaba vezadoq ve'ebyatar kohanim. 1_kings 4:5	va'azaryahu ben natan 'al hanizabim vezabud ben natan kohen rei'eh hamelekh. 1_kings 4:6	va'akhishar 'al habayit va'adoniram ben 'abda 'al hamas. 1_kings 4:7	velishlomoh shenem 'asar nizabim 'al kal yisra'el vekhilkelu 'et hamelekh ve'et beito khodesh bashanah yihyeh 'al 'ekhad ha'ekhad lekhalkel. 1_kings 4:8	ve'eleh shemotam ben khur behar 'efrayim. 1_kings 4:9	ben deqer bemaqaz ubesha'albim ubet shamesh ve'eilon bet khanan. 1_kings 4:10	ben khesed ba'arubot lo sokhoh vekhal 'erez kheifer. 1_kings 4:11	ben 'abinadab kal nafat dor tafat bat shelomoh hayetah lo le'ishah. 1_kings 4:12	ba'ana ben 'akhilud ta'nakh umegido vekhal bet she'an 'asher 'eizel zaretanah mitakhat leyizre'el mibet she'an 'ad 'abel mekholah 'ad mei'eiber leyaqemo'am. 1_kings 4:13	ben geber beramot gil'ad lo khavot ya'ir ben menasheh 'asher bagil'ad lo khebel 'argob 'asher babashan shishim 'arim gedolot khomah uberiakh nekhoshet. 1_kings 4:14	'akhinadab ben 'ido makhanayemah. 1_kings 4:15	'akhima'az benaftali gam hu laqakh 'et basemat bat shelomoh le'ishah. 1_kings 4:16	ba'ana ben khushai be'asher ube'alot. 1_kings 4:17	yehoshafat ben paruakh beyisashkhar. 1_kings 4:18	shim'i ben 'eila bebinyamin. 1_kings 4:19	geber ben 'uri be'erez gil'ad 'erez sikhon melekh ha'emori ve'og melekh habashan unezib 'ekhad 'asher ba'arez. 1_kings 4:20	yehudah veyisra'el rabim kakhol 'asher 'al hayam larob 'okhelim veshotim usemeikhim. 1_kings 4:21	ushelomoh hayah moshel bekhal hamamlakhot min hanahar 'erez pelishtim ve'ad gebul mizrayim magishim minkhah ve'obedim 'et shelomoh kal yemei khayav. 1_kings 4:22	vayhi lekhem shelomoh leyom 'ekhad sheloshim kor solet veshishim kor qamakh. 1_kings 4:23	'asarah baqar beri'im ve'esrim baqar re'i umei'ah zon lebad mei'ayal uzebi veyakhmur ubarburim 'abusim. 1_kings 4:24	ki hu rodeh bekhal 'eiber hanahar mitifsakh ve'ad 'azah bekhal malkhei 'eiber hanahar veshalom hayah lo mikal 'abarav misabib. 1_kings 4:25	vayeisheb yehudah veyisra'el labetakh 'ish takhat gafno vetakhat te'einato midan ve'ad be'er shaba' kol yemei shelomoh. 1_kings 4:26	vayhi lishlomoh 'arba'im 'elef 'urvot susim lemerkabo ushenem 'asar 'elef parashim. 1_kings 4:27	vekhilkelu hanizabim ha'eleh 'et hamelekh shelomoh ve'et kal haqareb 'el shulkhan hamelekh shelomoh 'ish khadesho lo ye'aderu dabar. 1_kings 4:28	vehase'orim vehateben lasusim velarakhesh yabi'u 'el hamaqom 'asher yihyeh sham 'ish kemishpato. 1_kings 4:29	vayiten 'elohim khakhmah lishlomoh utebunah harbeh me'od verokhab leb kakhol 'asher 'al sefat hayam. 1_kings 4:30	vateireb khakhemat shelomoh meikhakhemat kal benei qedem umikol khakhemat mizrayim. 1_kings 4:31	vayekhkam mikal ha'adam mei'eitan ha'ezrakhi veheiman vekhalkol vedarda' benei makhol vayhi shemo bekhal hagoyim sabib. 1_kings 4:32	vaydaber sheloshet 'alafim mashal vayhi shiro khamishah va'alef. 1_kings 4:33	vaydaber 'al ha'eizim min ha'erez 'asher balebanon ve'ad ha'eizob 'asher yozei baqir vaydaber 'al habeheimah ve'al ha'of ve'al haremes ve'al hadagim. 1_kings 4:34	vayabo'u mikal ha'amim lishmoa' 'et khakhemat shelomoh mei'et kal malkhei ha'arez 'asher shame'u 'et khakhemato. 1_kings 5:1	vayishlakh khiram melekh zor 'et 'abadav 'el shelomoh ki shama' ki 'oto mashekhu lemelekh takhat 'abihu ki 'oheb hayah khiram ledavid kal hayamim. 1_kings 5:2	vayishlakh shelomoh 'el khiram leimor. 1_kings 5:3	'atah yada'ta 'et david 'abi ki lo yakhol libnot bayit leshem yhvh 'elohav mipenei hamilkhamah 'asher sebabuhu 'ad tet yhvh 'otam takhat kapot raglo raglai. 1_kings 5:4	ve'atah heiniakh yhvh 'elohai li misabib 'en satan ve'en pega' ra'. 1_kings 5:5	vehini 'omer libnot bayit leshem yhvh 'elohai ka'asher diber yhvh 'el david 'abi leimor binkha 'asher 'eten takhtekha 'al kis'ekha hu yibneh habayit lishmi. 1_kings 5:6	ve'atah zaveh veyikhretu li 'arazim min halebanon va'abadai yihyu 'im 'abadekha usekhar 'abadekha 'eten lekha kekhol 'asher tomer ki 'atah yada'ta ki 'en banu 'ish yodeia' likhrat 'eizim kazidonim. 1_kings 5:7	vayhi kishmoa' khiram 'et dibrei shelomoh vayismakh me'od vayomer barukh yhvh hayom 'asher natan ledavid ben khakham 'al ha'am harab hazeh. 1_kings 5:8	vayishlakh khiram 'el shelomoh leimor shama'ti 'et 'asher shalakhta 'eilai 'ani 'e'eseh 'et kal khefzekha ba'azei 'arazim uba'azei beroshim. 1_kings 5:9	'abadai yoridu min halebanon yamah va'ani 'asimem doberot bayam 'ad hamaqom 'asher tishlakh 'eilai venipaztim sham ve'atah tisa ve'atah ta'aseh 'et khefzi latet lekhem beiti. 1_kings 5:10	vayhi khirom noten lishlomoh 'azei 'arazim va'azei beroshim kal khefzo. 1_kings 5:11	ushelomoh natan lekhiram 'esrim 'elef kor khitim makolet lebeito ve'esrim kor shemen katit koh yiten shelomoh lekhiram shanah beshanah. 1_kings 5:12	yhvh natan khakhmah lishlomoh ka'asher diber lo vayhi shalom ben khiram uben shelomoh vayikhretu berit sheneihem. 1_kings 5:13	vaya'al hamelekh shelomoh mas mikal yisra'el vayhi hamas sheloshim 'elef 'ish. 1_kings 5:14	vayishlakhem lebanonah 'aseret 'alafim bakhodesh khalifot khodesh yihyu balebanon shenayim khodashim bebeito va'adoniram 'al hamas. 1_kings 5:15	vayhi lishlomoh shib'im 'elef nosei sabal ushemonim 'elef khozeb bahar. 1_kings 5:16	lebad misarei hanizabim lishlomoh 'asher 'al hamelakhah sheloshet 'alafim ushelosh mei'ot harodim ba'am ha'osim bamelakhah. 1_kings 5:17	vayzav hamelekh vayasi'u 'abanim gedolot 'abanim yeqarot leyased habayit 'abnei gazit. 1_kings 5:18	vayifselu bonei shelomoh ubonei khirom vehagiblim vayakhinu ha'eizim veha'abanim libnot habayit. 1_kings 6:1	vayhi bishmonim shanah ve'arba' mei'ot shanah lezet benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim bashanah harebi'it bekhodesh ziv hu hakhodesh hasheini limlokh shelomoh 'al yisra'el vayiben habayit yhvh. 1_kings 6:2	vehabayit 'asher banah hamelekh shelomoh yhvh shishim 'amah 'areko ve'esrim rakhebo usheloshim 'amah qomato. 1_kings 6:3	veha'ulam 'al penei heikhal habayit 'esrim 'amah 'areko 'al penei rokhab habayit 'eser ba'amah rakhebo 'al penei habayit. 1_kings 6:4	vaya'as labayit khalonei shequfim 'atumim. 1_kings 6:5	vayiben 'al qir habayit yazoa' yazia' sabib 'et qirot habayit sabib laheikhal veladebir vaya'as zela'ot sabib. 1_kings 6:6	hayazoa' hayazia' hatakhtonah khamesh ba'amah rakhebah vehatikhonah shesh ba'amah rakhebah vehashelishit sheba' ba'amah rakhebah ki migra'ot natan labayit sabib khuzah lebilti 'akhoz beqirot habayit. 1_kings 6:7	vehabayit behibanoto 'eben sheleimah masa' nibnah umaqabot vehagarzen kal keli barzel lo nishma' babayit behibanoto. 1_kings 6:8	petakh hazeila' hatikhonah 'el ketef habayit haymanit ubelulim ya'alu 'al hatikhonah umin hatikhonah 'el hashelishim. 1_kings 6:9	vayiben 'et habayit vaykhaleihu vayispon 'et habayit geibim usedeirot ba'arazim. 1_kings 6:10	vayiben 'et hayazoa' hayazia' 'al kal habayit khamesh 'amot qomato vaye'ekhoz 'et habayit ba'azei 'arazim. 1_kings 6:11	vayhi debar yhvh 'el shelomoh leimor. 1_kings 6:12	habayit hazeh 'asher 'atah boneh 'im teilekh bekhuqotai ve'et mishpatai ta'aseh veshamarta 'et kal mizvotai lalekhet bahem vahaqimoti 'et debari 'itakh 'asher dibarti 'el david 'abikha. 1_kings 6:13	veshakhanti betokh benei yisra'el velo 'e'ezob 'et 'ami yisra'el. 1_kings 6:14	vayiben shelomoh 'et habayit vaykhaleihu. 1_kings 6:15	vayiben 'et qirot habayit mibaytah bezal'ot 'arazim miqarqa' habayit 'ad qirot hasipun zipah 'ez mibayit vayzaf 'et qarqa' habayit bezal'ot beroshim. 1_kings 6:16	vayiben 'et 'esrim 'amah miyarkotei miyarketei habayit bezal'ot 'arazim min haqarqa' 'ad haqirot vayiben lo mibayit lidbir leqodesh haqodashim. 1_kings 6:17	ve'arba'im ba'amah hayah habayit hu haheikhal lifnai. 1_kings 6:18	ve'erez 'el habayit penimah miqla'at peqa'im ufeturei zizim hakol 'erez 'en 'eben nir'ah. 1_kings 6:19	udebir betokh habayit mipenimah heikhin letiten sham 'et 'aron berit yhvh. 1_kings 6:20	velifnei hadebir 'esrim 'amah 'orekh ve'esrim 'amah rokhab ve'esrim 'amah qomato vayzapeihu zahab sagur vayzaf mizbeiakh 'arez. 1_kings 6:21	vayzaf shelomoh 'et habayit mipenimah zahab sagur vai'aber beratiqot beratuqot zahab lifnei hadebir vayzapeihu zahab. 1_kings 6:22	ve'et kal habayit zipah zahab 'ad tom kal habayit vekhal hamizbeiakh 'asher ladebir zipah zahab. 1_kings 6:23	vaya'as badebir shenei kherubim 'azei shamen 'eser 'amot qomato. 1_kings 6:24	vekhamesh 'amot kenaf hakerub ha'ekhat vekhamesh 'amot kenaf hakerub hasheinit 'eser 'amot miqzot kenafav ve'ad qezot kenafav. 1_kings 6:25	ve'eser ba'amah hakerub hasheini midah 'akhat veqezeb 'ekhad lishnei hakerubim. 1_kings 6:26	qomat hakerub ha'ekhad 'eser ba'amah vekhen hakerub hasheini. 1_kings 6:27	vayiten 'et hakerubim betokh habayit hapenimi vayifresu 'et kanfei hakerubim vatiga' kenaf ha'ekhad baqir ukhenaf hakerub hasheini noga'at baqir hasheini vekhanfeihem 'el tokh habayit noge'ot kanaf 'el kanaf. 1_kings 6:28	vayzaf 'et hakerubim zahab. 1_kings 6:29	ve'et kal qirot habayit meisab qala' pitukhei miqle'ot kerubim vetimorot ufeturei zizim milifnim velakhizon. 1_kings 6:30	ve'et qarqa' habayit zipah zahab lifnimah velakhizon. 1_kings 6:31	ve'et petakh hadebir 'asah daltot 'azei shamen ha'ayil mezuzot khamishit. 1_kings 6:32	ushetei daltot 'azei shemen veqala' 'aleihem miqle'ot kerubim vetimorot ufeturei zizim vezipah zahab vayared 'al hakerubim ve'al hatimorot 'et hazahab. 1_kings 6:33	vekhen 'asah lefetakh haheikhal mezuzot 'azei shamen mei'et rebi'it. 1_kings 6:34	ushetei daltot 'azei beroshim shenei zela'im hadelet ha'akhat gelilim ushenei qela'im hadelet hasheinit gelilim. 1_kings 6:35	veqala' kerubim vetimorot ufeturei zizim vezipah zahab meyushar 'al hamekhuqeh. 1_kings 6:36	vayiben 'et hekhazer hapenimit sheloshah turei gazit vetur kerutot 'arazim. 1_kings 6:37	bashanah harebi'it yusad bet yhvh beyerakh ziv. 1_kings 6:38	ubashanah ha'akhat 'esreh beyerakh bul hu hakhodesh hashemini kalah habayit lekhal debarav ulekhal mishpato mishpatav vayibneihu sheba' shanim. 1_kings 7:1	ve'et beito banah shelomoh shelosh 'esreh shanah vaykhal 'et kal beito. 1_kings 7:2	vayiben 'et bet ya'ar halebanon mei'ah 'amah 'areko vakhamishim 'amah rakhebo usheloshim 'amah qomato 'al 'arba'ah turei 'amudei 'arazim ukherutot 'arazim 'al ha'amudim. 1_kings 7:3	vesafun ba'erez mima'al 'al hazela'ot 'asher 'al ha'amudim 'arba'im vakhamishah khamishah 'asar hatur. 1_kings 7:4	ushequfim sheloshah turim umekhezah 'el mekhezah shalosh pe'amim. 1_kings 7:5	vekhal hapetakhim vehamezuzot rebu'im shaqef umul mekhezah 'el mekhezah shalosh pe'amim. 1_kings 7:6	ve'et 'ulam ha'amudim 'asah khamishim 'amah 'areko usheloshim 'amah rakhebo ve'ulam 'al peneihem ve'amudim ve'ab 'al peneihem. 1_kings 7:7	ve'ulam hakisei 'asher yishpat sham 'ulam hamishpat 'asah vesafun ba'erez meihaqarqa' 'ad haqarqa'. 1_kings 7:8	ubeito 'asher yeisheb sham khazer ha'akheret mibet la'ulam kama'aseh hazeh hayah ubayit ya'aseh lebat par'oh 'asher laqakh shelomoh ka'ulam hazeh. 1_kings 7:9	kal 'eleh 'abanim yeqarot kemidot gazit megorarot bamegeirah mibayit umikhuz umimasad 'ad hatefakhot umikhuz 'ad hekhazer hagedolah. 1_kings 7:10	umeyusad 'abanim yeqarot 'abanim gedolot 'abnei 'eser 'amot ve'abnei shemoneh 'amot. 1_kings 7:11	umilma'lah 'abanim yeqarot kemidot gazit va'arez. 1_kings 7:12	vekhazer hagedolah sabib sheloshah turim gazit vetur kerutot 'arazim velakhazar bet yhvh hapenimit ule'ulam habayit. 1_kings 7:13	vayishlakh hamelekh shelomoh vayiqakh 'et khiram mizor. 1_kings 7:14	ben 'ishah 'almanah hu mimateh naftali ve'abiv 'ish zori khoresh nekhoshet vayimalei 'et hakhakhemah ve'et hatebunah ve'et hada'at la'asot kal melakhah banekhoshet vayabo 'el hamelekh shelomoh vaya'as 'et kal melakhto. 1_kings 7:15	vayazar 'et shenei ha'amudim nekhoshet shemoneh 'esreh 'amah qomat ha'amud ha'ekhad vekhut shetem 'esreh 'amah yasob 'et ha'amud hasheini. 1_kings 7:16	ushetei khotarot 'asah latet 'al rashei ha'amudim muzaq nekhoshet khamesh 'amot qomat hakoteret ha'ekhat vekhamesh 'amot qomat hakoteret hasheinit. 1_kings 7:17	sebakhim ma'aseh sebakhah gedilim ma'aseh sharsherot lakotarot 'asher 'al rosh ha'amudim shib'ah lakoteret ha'ekhat veshib'ah lakoteret hasheinit. 1_kings 7:18	vaya'as 'et ha'amudim ushenei turim sabib 'al hasebakhah ha'ekhat lekhasot 'et hakotarot 'asher 'al rosh harimonim vekhen 'asah lakoteret hasheinit. 1_kings 7:19	vekhotarot 'asher 'al rosh ha'amudim ma'aseh shushan ba'ulam 'arba' 'amot. 1_kings 7:20	vekhotarot 'al shenei ha'amudim gam mima'al mile'umat habeten 'asher le'eiber sebakhah hasebakhah veharimonim matayim turim sabib 'al hakoteret hasheinit. 1_kings 7:21	vayaqem 'et ha'amudim le'ulam haheikhal vayaqem 'et ha'amud haymani vayiqra 'et shemo yakhin vayaqem 'et ha'amud hasemali vayiqra 'et shemo bo'az. 1_kings 7:22	ve'al rosh ha'amudim ma'aseh shoshan vatitom melekhet ha'amudim. 1_kings 7:23	vaya'as 'et hayam muzaq 'eser ba'amah misefato 'ad sefato 'agol sabib vekhamesh ba'amah qomato uqeveh veqav sheloshim ba'amah yasob 'oto sabib. 1_kings 7:24	ufeqa'im mitakhat lisfato sabib sobebim 'oto 'eser ba'amah maqifim 'et hayam sabib shenei turim hapeqa'im yezuqim bizuqato. 1_kings 7:25	'omed 'al shenei 'asar baqar sheloshah fonim zafonah usheloshah fonim yamah usheloshah ponim negbah usheloshah ponim mizrakhah vehayam 'aleihem milma'elah vekhal 'akhoreihem bayetah. 1_kings 7:26	ve'abeyo tefakh usefato kema'aseh sefat kos perakh shoshan 'alpayim bat yakhil. 1_kings 7:27	vaya'as 'et hamekhonot 'eser nekhoshet 'arba' ba'amah 'orekh hamekhonah ha'ekhat ve'arba' ba'amah rakhebah veshalosh ba'amah qomatah. 1_kings 7:28	vezeh ma'aseh hamekhonah misgerot lahem umisgerot ben hashlabim. 1_kings 7:29	ve'al hamisgerot 'asher ben hashlabim 'arayot baqar ukherubim ve'al hashlabim ken mima'al umitakhat la'arayot velabaqar loyot ma'aseh morad. 1_kings 7:30	ve'arba'ah 'ofanei nekhoshet lamekhonah ha'akhat vesarnei nekhoshet ve'arba'ah fa'amotav keteifot lahem mitakhat lakiyor haketeifot yezuqot mei'eiber 'ish loyot. 1_kings 7:31	ufihu mibet lakoteret vama'lah ba'amah ufiha 'agol ma'aseh khen 'amah vakhazi ha'amah vegam 'al piha miqla'ot umisgeroteihem meruba'ot lo 'agulot. 1_kings 7:32	ve'arba'at ha'ofanim lemitakhat lamisgerot vidot ha'ofanim bamekhonah veqomat ha'ofan ha'ekhad 'amah vakhazi ha'amah. 1_kings 7:33	uma'aseh ha'ofanim kema'aseh 'ofan hamerkabah yedotam vegabeihem vekhishuqeihem vekhishureihem hakol muzaq. 1_kings 7:34	ve'arba' keteifot 'el 'arba' pinot hamekhonah ha'ekhat min hamekhonah keteifeha. 1_kings 7:35	uberosh hamekhonah khazi ha'amah qomah 'agol sabib ve'al rosh hamekhonah yedoteha umisgeroteha mimenah. 1_kings 7:36	vayfatakh 'al halukhot yedoteha ve'al vamisgeroteha misgeroteha kerubim 'arayot vetimorot kema'ar 'ish veloyot sabib. 1_kings 7:37	kazot 'asah 'et 'eser hamekhonot muzaq 'ekhad midah 'akhat qezeb 'ekhad lekhulahenah. 1_kings 7:38	vaya'as 'asarah khiyorot nekhoshet 'arba'im bat yakhil hakiyor ha'ekhad 'arba' ba'amah hakiyor ha'ekhad kiyor 'ekhad 'al hamekhonah ha'akhat le'eser hamekhonot. 1_kings 7:39	vayiten 'et hamekhonot khamesh 'al ketef habayit miyamin vekhamesh 'al ketef habayit misemolo ve'et hayam natan miketef habayit haymanit qeidemah mimul negeb. 1_kings 7:40	vaya'as khirom 'et hakiyorot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizraqot vaykhal khiram la'asot 'et kal hamelakhah 'asher 'asah lamelekh shelomoh bet yhvh. 1_kings 7:41	'amudim shenayim vegulot hakotarot 'asher 'al rosh ha'amudim shetayim vehasebakhot shetayim lekhasot 'et shetei gulot hakotarot 'asher 'al rosh ha'amudim. 1_kings 7:42	ve'et harimonim 'arba' mei'ot lishtei hasebakhot shenei turim rimonim lasebakhah ha'ekhat lekhasot 'et shetei gulot hakotarot 'asher 'al penei ha'amudim. 1_kings 7:43	ve'et hamekhonot 'aser ve'et hakiyorot 'asarah 'al hamekhonot. 1_kings 7:44	ve'et hayam ha'ekhad ve'et habaqar shenem 'asar takhat hayam. 1_kings 7:45	ve'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizraqot ve'et kal hakeilim ha'ohel ha'eleh 'asher 'asah khiram lamelekh shelomoh bet yhvh nekhoshet memorat. 1_kings 7:46	bekhikar hayarden yezaqam hamelekh bema'abeh ha'adamah ben sukot uben zaretan. 1_kings 7:47	vayanakh shelomoh 'et kal hakeilim meirob me'od me'od lo nekhqar mishqal hanekhoshet. 1_kings 7:48	vaya'as shelomoh 'et kal hakeilim 'asher bet yhvh 'et mizbakh hazahab ve'et hashulkhan 'asher 'alav lekhem hapanim zahab. 1_kings 7:49	ve'et hamenorot khamesh miyamin vekhamesh misemol lifnei hadebir zahab sagur vehaperakh vehaneirot vehamelqakhayim zahab. 1_kings 7:50	vehasipot vehamzamerot vehamizraqot vehakapot vehamakhtot zahab sagur vehapotot ledaltot habayit hapenimi leqodesh haqodashim ledaltei habayit laheikhal zahab. 1_kings 7:51	vatishlam kal hamelakhah 'asher 'asah hamelekh shelomoh bet yhvh vayabei shelomoh 'et qadeshei david 'abiv 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab ve'et hakeilim natan be'ozerot bet yhvh. 1_kings 8:1	'az yaqhel shelomoh 'et ziqnei yisra'el 'et kal rashei hamatot nesi'ei ha'abot libnei yisra'el 'el hamelekh shelomoh yerushalim leha'alot 'et 'aron berit yhvh mei'ir david hi ziyon. 1_kings 8:2	vayiqahalu 'el hamelekh shelomoh kal 'ish yisra'el beyerakh ha'eitanim bekhag hu hakhodesh hashebi'i. 1_kings 8:3	vayabo'u kol ziqnei yisra'el vayis'u hakohanim 'et ha'aron. 1_kings 8:4	vaya'alu 'et 'aron yhvh ve'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et kal kelei haqodesh 'asher ba'ohel vaya'alu 'otam hakohanim vehalviyim. 1_kings 8:5	vehamelekh shelomoh vekhal 'adat yisra'el hano'adim 'alav 'ito lifnei ha'aron mezabekhim zon ubaqar 'asher lo yisaferu velo yimanu meirob. 1_kings 8:6	vayabi'u hakohanim 'et 'aron berit yhvh 'el meqomo 'el debir habayit 'el qodesh haqodashim 'el takhat kanfei hakerubim. 1_kings 8:7	ki hakerubim poresim kenafayim 'el meqom ha'aron vayasoku hakerubim 'al ha'aron ve'al badav milma'elah. 1_kings 8:8	vaya'arikhu habadim vayeira'u rashei habadim min haqodesh 'al penei hadebir velo yeira'u hakhuzah vayihyu sham 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_kings 8:9	'en ba'aron raq shenei lukhot ha'abanim 'asher hiniakh sham mosheh bekhoreb 'asher karat yhvh 'im benei yisra'el bezeitam mei'erez mizrayim. 1_kings 8:10	vayhi bezet hakohanim min haqodesh vehe'anan malei 'et bet yhvh. 1_kings 8:11	velo yakhelu hakohanim la'amod lesharet mipenei he'anan ki malei khebod yhvh 'et bet yhvh. 1_kings 8:12	'az 'amar shelomoh yhvh 'amar lishkon ba'arafel. 1_kings 8:13	banoh baniti bet zebul lakh makhon leshibtekha 'olamim. 1_kings 8:14	vayaseb hamelekh 'et panav vaybarekh 'et kal qehal yisra'el vekhal qehal yisra'el 'omed. 1_kings 8:15	vayomer barukh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher diber befiv 'et david 'abi ubeyado milei leimor. 1_kings 8:16	min hayom 'asher hozeiti 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el mimizrayim lo bakharti be'ir mikol shibtei yisra'el libnot bayit lihyot shemi sham va'ebkhar bedavid lihyot 'al 'ami yisra'el. 1_kings 8:17	vayhi 'im lebab david 'abi libnot bayit leshem yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. 1_kings 8:18	vayomer yhvh 'el david 'abi ya'an 'asher hayah 'im lebabekha libnot bayit lishmi hetibota ki hayah 'im lebabekha. 1_kings 8:19	raq 'atah lo tibneh habayit ki 'im binkha hayozei meikhalazekha hu yibneh habayit lishmi. 1_kings 8:20	vayaqem yhvh 'et debaro 'asher diber va'aqum takhat david 'abi va'eisheb 'al kisei yisra'el ka'asher diber yhvh va'ebneh habayit leshem yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. 1_kings 8:21	va'asim sham maqom la'aron 'asher sham berit yhvh 'asher karat 'im 'aboteinu behozi'o 'otam mei'erez mizrayim. 1_kings 8:22	vaya'amod shelomoh lifnei mizbakh yhvh neged kal qehal yisra'el vayifros kapav hashamayim. 1_kings 8:23	vayomar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'en kamokha 'elohim bashamayim mima'al ve'al ha'arez mitakhat shomer haberit vehakhesed la'abadekha haholekhim lefanekha bekhal libam. 1_kings 8:24	'asher shamarta le'abdekha david 'abi 'et 'asher dibarta lo vatedaber befikha ubeyadekha mileita kayom hazeh. 1_kings 8:25	ve'atah yhvh 'elohei yisra'el mor le'abdekha david 'abi 'et 'asher dibarta lo leimor lo yikaret lekha 'ish milefanai yosheb 'al kisei yisra'el raq 'im yishmeru banekha 'et darkam lalekhet lefanai ka'asher halakhta lefanai. 1_kings 8:26	ve'atah 'elohei yisra'el yei'amen na debarekha debarekha 'asher dibarta le'abdekha david 'abi. 1_kings 8:27	ki ha'umnam yeisheb 'elohim 'al ha'arez hineh hashamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkelukha 'af ki habayit hazeh 'asher baniti. 1_kings 8:28	ufanita 'el tefilat 'abdekha ve'el tekhinato yhvh 'elohai lishmoa' 'el harinah ve'el hatefilah 'asher 'abdekha mitpalel lefanekha hayom. 1_kings 8:29	lihyot 'einekha fetukhot 'el habayit hazeh laylah vayom 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amarta yihyeh shemi sham lishmoa' 'el hatefilah 'asher yitpalel 'abdekha 'el hamaqom hazeh. 1_kings 8:30	veshama'ta 'el tekhinat 'abdekha ve'amekha yisra'el 'asher yitpalu 'el hamaqom hazeh ve'atah tishma' 'el meqom shibtekha 'el hashamayim veshama'ta vesalakheta. 1_kings 8:31	'et 'asher yekheta 'ish lerei'eihu venasha bo 'alah leha'aloto uba 'alah lifnei mizbakhakha babayit hazeh. 1_kings 8:32	ve'atah tishma' hashamayim ve'asita veshafata 'et 'abadekha leharshia' rasha' latet darko berosho ulehazdiq zadiq latet lo kezidqato. 1_kings 8:33	behinagef 'amekha yisra'el lifnei 'oyeb 'asher yekhet'u lakh veshabu 'eilekha vehodu 'et shemekha vehitpalu vehitkhanenu 'eilekha babayit hazeh. 1_kings 8:34	ve'atah tishma' hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat 'amekha yisra'el vahasheibotam 'el ha'adamah 'asher natata la'abotam. 1_kings 8:35	behei'azer shamayim velo yihyeh matar ki yekhet'u lakh vehitpalu 'el hamaqom hazeh vehodu 'et shemekha umeikhatatam yeshubun ki ta'anem. 1_kings 8:36	ve'atah tishma' hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat 'abadekha ve'amekha yisra'el ki torem 'et haderekh hatobah 'asher yeilekhu bah venatatah matar 'al 'arzekha 'asher natatah le'amekha lenakhalah. 1_kings 8:37	ra'ab ki yihyeh ba'arez deber ki yihyeh shidafon yeiraqon 'arbeh khasil ki yihyeh ki yazar lo 'oyebo be'erez she'arav kal nega' kal makhalah. 1_kings 8:38	kal tefilah khal tekhinah 'asher tihyeh lekhal ha'adam lekhol 'amekha yisra'el 'asher yeide'un 'ish nega' lebabo ufaras kapav 'el habayit hazeh. 1_kings 8:39	ve'atah tishma' hashamayim mekhon shibtekha vesalakhta ve'asita venatata la'ish kekhal derakhav 'asher teida' 'et lebabo ki 'atah yada'ta lebadekha 'et lebab kal benei ha'adam. 1_kings 8:40	lema'an yira'ukha kal hayamim 'asher hem khayim 'al penei ha'adamah 'asher natatah la'aboteinu. 1_kings 8:41	vegam 'el hanakheri 'asher lo mei'amekha yisra'el hu uba mei'erez rekhoqah lema'an shemekha. 1_kings 8:42	ki yishme'un 'et shimkha hagadol ve'et yadekha hakhazaqah uzero'akha hanetuyah uba vehitpalel 'el habayit hazeh. 1_kings 8:43	'atah tishma' hashamayim mekhon shibtekha ve'asita kekhol 'asher yiqra 'eilekha hanakheri lema'an yeide'un kal 'amei ha'arez 'et shemekha leyir'ah 'otekha ke'amekha yisra'el velada'at ki shimkha niqra 'al habayit hazeh 'asher baniti. 1_kings 8:44	ki yeizei 'amekha lamilkhamah 'al 'oyebo baderekh 'asher tishlakhem vehitpalu 'el yhvh derekh ha'ir 'asher bakharta bah vehabayit 'asher baniti lishmekha. 1_kings 8:45	veshama'ta hashamayim 'et tefilatam ve'et tekhinatam ve'asita mishpatam. 1_kings 8:46	ki yekhet'u lakh ki 'en 'adam 'asher lo yekheta ve'anafta bam unetatam lifnei 'oyeb veshabum shobeihem 'el 'erez ha'oyeb rekhoqah 'o qerobah. 1_kings 8:47	veheishibu 'el libam ba'arez 'asher nishbu sham veshabu vehitkhanenu 'eilekha be'erez shobeihem leimor khatanu vehe'evinu rasha'enu. 1_kings 8:48	veshabu 'eilekha bekhal lebabam ubekhal nafsham be'erez 'oyebeihem 'asher shabu 'otam vehitpalu 'eilekha derekh 'arzam 'asher natatah la'abotam ha'ir 'asher bakharta vehabayit 'asher banita baniti lishmekha. 1_kings 8:49	veshama'ta hashamayim mekhon shibtekha 'et tefilatam ve'et tekhinatam ve'asita mishpatam. 1_kings 8:50	vesalakhta le'amekha 'asher khate'u lakh ulekhal pish'eihem 'asher pashe'u bakh unetatam lerakhamim lifnei shobeihem verikhamum. 1_kings 8:51	ki 'amekha venakhalatekha hem 'asher hozeita mimizrayim mitokh kur habarzel. 1_kings 8:52	lihyot 'einekha fetukhot 'el tekhinat 'abdekha ve'el tekhinat 'amekha yisra'el
