lishmoa' 'aleihem bekhol qare'am 'eilekha. 1_kings 8:53	ki 'atah hibdaltam lekha lenakhalah mikol 'amei ha'arez ka'asher dibarta beyad mosheh 'abdekha behozi'akha 'et 'aboteinu mimizrayim 'adonai yhvh. 1_kings 8:54	vayhi kekhalot shelomoh lehitpalel 'el yhvh 'et kal hatefilah vehatekhinah hazot qam milifnei mizbakh yhvh mikeroa' 'al birkav vekhapav perusot hashamayim. 1_kings 8:55	vaya'mod vaybarekh 'et kal qehal yisra'el qol gadol leimor. 1_kings 8:56	barukh yhvh 'asher natan menukhah le'amo yisra'el kekhol 'asher diber lo nafal dabar 'ekhad mikol debaro hatob 'asher diber beyad mosheh 'abdo. 1_kings 8:57	yehi yhvh 'eloheinu 'imanu ka'asher hayah 'im 'aboteinu 'al ya'azbeinu ve'al yitesheinu. 1_kings 8:58	lehatot lebabeinu 'eilav lalekhet bekhal derakhav velishmor mizvotav vekhuqav umishpatav 'asher zivah 'et 'aboteinu. 1_kings 8:59	veyihyu debarai 'eleh 'asher hitkhananti lifnei yhvh qerobim 'el yhvh 'eloheinu yomam valayelah la'asot mishpat 'abdo umishpat 'amo yisra'el debar yom beyomo. 1_kings 8:60	lema'an da'at kal 'amei ha'arez ki yhvh hu ha'elohim 'en 'od. 1_kings 8:61	vehayah lebabkhem shalem 'im yhvh 'eloheinu lalekhet bekhuqav velishmor mizvotav kayom hazeh. 1_kings 8:62	vehamelekh vekhal yisra'el 'imo zobekhim zebakh lifnei yhvh. 1_kings 8:63	vayizbakh shelomoh 'et zebakh hashelamim 'asher zabakh yhvh baqar 'esrim ushenayim 'elef vezon mei'ah ve'esrim 'alef vayakhnekhu 'et bet yhvh hamelekh vekhal benei yisra'el. 1_kings 8:64	bayom hahu qidash hamelekh 'et tokh hekhazer 'asher lifnei bet yhvh ki 'asah sham 'et ha'olah ve'et haminkhah ve'et khelbei hashelamim ki mizbakh hanekhoshet 'asher lifnei yhvh qaton meihakhil 'et ha'olah ve'et haminkhah ve'et khelbei hashelamim. 1_kings 8:65	vaya'as shelomoh ba'et hahi 'et hekhag vekhal yisra'el 'imo qahal gadol milebo khamat 'ad nakhal mizrayim lifnei yhvh 'eloheinu shib'at yamim veshib'at yamim 'arba'ah 'asar yom. 1_kings 8:66	bayom hashemini shilakh 'et ha'am vaybarakhu 'et hamelekh vayeilekhu le'aholeihem semeikhim vetobei leb 'al kal hatobah 'asher 'asah yhvh ledavid 'abdo uleyisra'el 'amo. 1_kings 9:1	vayhi kekhalot shelomoh libnot 'et bet yhvh ve'et bet hamelekh ve'et kal kheisheq shelomoh 'asher khafez la'asot. 1_kings 9:2	vayeira yhvh 'el shelomoh sheinit ka'asher nir'ah 'eilav begib'on. 1_kings 9:3	vayomer yhvh 'eilav ma'ti 'et tefilatekha ve'et tekhinatekha 'asher hitkhanantah lefanai hiqdashti 'et habayit hazeh 'asher banitah lasum shemi sham 'ad 'olam vehayu 'einai velibi sham kal hayamim. 1_kings 9:4	ve'atah 'im teilekh lefanai ka'asher halakh david 'abikha betam leibab ubeyosher la'asot kekhol 'asher zivitikha khuqai umishpatai tishmor. 1_kings 9:5	vahaqimoti 'et kisei mamlakhtekha 'al yisra'el le'olam ka'asher dibarti 'al david 'abikha leimor lo yikaret lekha 'ish mei'al kisei yisra'el. 1_kings 9:6	'im shob teshubun 'atem ubeneikhem mei'akharai velo tishmeru mizvotai khuqotai 'asher natati lifneikhem vahalakhtem va'abadtem 'elohim 'akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem. 1_kings 9:7	vehikhrati 'et yisra'el mei'al penei ha'adamah 'asher natati lahem ve'et habayit 'asher hiqdashti lishmi 'ashalakh mei'al panai vehayah yisra'el lemashal velishninah bekhal ha'amim. 1_kings 9:8	vehabayit hazeh yihyeh 'elyon kal 'ober 'alav yishom vesharaq ve'ameru 'al meh 'asah yhvh kakhah la'arez hazot velabayit hazeh. 1_kings 9:9	ve'ameru 'al 'asher 'azebu 'et yhvh 'eloheihem 'asher hozi 'et 'abotam mei'erez mizrayim vayakhaziqu beilohim 'akheirim vayishtakhu vayishtakhavu lahem vaya'abdum 'al ken heibi yhvh 'aleihem 'et kal hara'ah hazot. 1_kings 9:10	vayhi miqzeh 'esrim shanah 'asher banah shelomoh 'et shenei habatim 'et bet yhvh ve'et bet hamelekh. 1_kings 9:11	khiram melekh zor nisa 'et shelomoh ba'azei 'arazim uba'azei beroshim ubazahab lekhal khefzo 'az yiten hamelekh shelomoh lekhiram 'esrim 'ir be'erez hagalil. 1_kings 9:12	vayeizei khiram mizor lir'ot 'et he'arim 'asher natan lo shelomoh velo yasheru be'einav. 1_kings 9:13	vayomer mah he'arim ha'eleh 'asher natatah li 'akhi vayiqra lahem 'erez kabul 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_kings 9:14	vayishlakh khiram lamelekh mei'ah ve'esrim kikar zahab. 1_kings 9:15	vezeh debar hamas 'asher he'elah hamelekh shelomoh libnot 'et bet yhvh ve'et beito ve'et hamilo ve'et khomat yerushalim ve'et khazor ve'et megido ve'et gazer. 1_kings 9:16	par'oh melekh mizrayim 'alah vayilkod 'et gezer vayisrefah ba'esh ve'et hakena'ani hayosheb ba'ir harag vayitenah shilukhim lebito 'eishet shelomoh. 1_kings 9:17	vayiben shelomoh 'et gazer ve'et bet khoron takhton. 1_kings 9:18	ve'et ba'alat ve'et tamar tadmor bamidbar ba'arez. 1_kings 9:19	ve'et kal 'arei hamiskenot 'asher hayu lishlomoh ve'et 'arei harekheb ve'et 'arei haparashim ve'et kheisheq shelomoh 'asher khashaq libnot birushalim ubalebanon ubekhol 'erez memshalto. 1_kings 9:20	kal ha'am hanotar min ha'emori hakhiti haperizi hakhivi vehaybusi 'asher lo mibenei yisra'el hemah. 1_kings 9:21	beneihem 'asher noteru 'akhareihem ba'arez 'asher lo yakhelu benei yisra'el lehakharimam vaya'alem shelomoh lemas 'obed 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_kings 9:22	umibenei yisra'el lo natan shelomoh 'abed ki hem 'anshei hamilkhamah va'abadav vesarav veshalishav vesarei rikhbo ufarashav. 1_kings 9:23	'eleh sarei hanizabim 'asher 'al hamelakhah lishlomoh khamishim vakhamesh mei'ot harodim ba'am ha'osim bamelakhah. 1_kings 9:24	'akh bat par'oh 'aletah mei'ir david 'el beitah 'asher banah lah 'az banah 'et hamilo. 1_kings 9:25	vehe'elah shelomoh shalosh pe'amim bashanah 'olot ushelamim 'al hamizbeiakh 'asher banah yhvh vehaqter 'ito 'asher lifnei yhvh veshilam 'et habayit. 1_kings 9:26	va'oni 'asah hamelekh shelomoh be'ezyon geber 'asher 'et 'eilot 'al sefat yam suf be'erez 'edom. 1_kings 9:27	vayishlakh khiram ba'oni 'et 'abadav 'anshei 'oniyot yode'ei hayam 'im 'abdei shelomoh. 1_kings 9:28	vayabo'u 'ofirah vayiqkhu misham zahab 'arba' mei'ot ve'esrim kikar vayabi'u 'el hamelekh shelomoh. 1_kings 10:1	umalkat sheba shoma'at 'et sheima' shelomoh leshem yhvh vatabo lenasoto bekhidot. 1_kings 10:2	vatabo yerushalemah bekhayil kabed me'od gemalim nose'im besamim vezahab rab me'od ve'eben yeqarah vatabo 'el shelomoh vatedaber 'eilav 'et kal 'asher hayah 'im lebabah. 1_kings 10:3	vayaged lah shelomoh 'et kal debareha lo hayah dabar ne'lam min hamelekh 'asher lo higid lah. 1_kings 10:4	vateire malkat sheba 'et kal khakhemat shelomoh vehabayit 'asher banah. 1_kings 10:5	uma'akhal shulkhano umoshab 'abadav uma'amad meshareto mesharetav umalbusheihem umashqav ve'olato 'asher ya'aleh bet yhvh velo hayah bah 'od ruakh. 1_kings 10:6	vatomer 'el hamelekh 'emet hayah hadabar 'asher shama'ti be'arzi 'al debarekha ve'al khakhematekha. 1_kings 10:7	velo he'emanti ladebarim 'ad 'asher bati vatir'enah 'einai vehineh lo hugad li hakheizi hosafta khakhmah vatob 'el hashemu'ah 'asher shama'eti. 1_kings 10:8	'ashrei 'anashekha 'ashrei 'abadekha 'eleh ha'omedim lefanekha tamid hashome'im 'et khakhematekha. 1_kings 10:9	yehi yhvh 'elohekha barukh 'asher khafez bekha letitekha 'al kisei yisra'el be'ahabat yhvh 'et yisra'el le'olam vaysimekha lemelekh la'asot mishpat uzedaqah. 1_kings 10:10	vatiten lamelekh mei'ah ve'esrim kikar zahab ubesamim harbeh me'od ve'eben yeqarah lo ba khabosem hahu 'od larob 'asher natenah malkat sheba lamelekh shelomoh. 1_kings 10:11	vegam 'oni khiram 'asher nasa zahab mei'ofir heibi mei'ofir 'azei 'almugim harbeh me'od ve'eben yeqarah. 1_kings 10:12	vaya'as hamelekh 'et 'azei ha'almugim mis'ad lebet yhvh ulebet hamelekh vekhinorot unebalim lasharim lo ba khen 'azei 'almugim velo nir'ah 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_kings 10:13	vehamelekh shelomoh natan lemalkat sheba 'et kal khefzah 'asher sha'alah milebad 'asher natan lah keyad hamelekh shelomoh vateifen vateilekh le'arzah hi va'abadeha. 1_kings 10:14	vayhi mishqal hazahab 'asher ba lishlomoh beshanah 'ekhat shesh mei'ot shishim vashesh kikar zahab. 1_kings 10:15	lebad mei'anshei hatarim umiskhar harokhelim vekhal malkhei ha'ereb ufakhot ha'arez. 1_kings 10:16	vaya'as hamelekh shelomoh matayim zinah zahab shakhut shesh mei'ot zahab ya'aleh 'al hazinah ha'ekhat. 1_kings 10:17	ushelosh mei'ot maginim zahab shakhut sheloshet manim zahab ya'aleh 'al hamagen ha'ekhat vayitenem hamelekh bet ya'ar halebanon. 1_kings 10:18	vaya'as hamelekh kisei shen gadol vayzapeihu zahab mufaz. 1_kings 10:19	shesh ma'alot lakiseh verosh 'agol lakiseh mei'akharav veyadot mizeh umizeh 'el meqom hashabet ushenayim 'arayot 'omedim 'eizel hayadot. 1_kings 10:20	ushenem 'asar 'arayim 'omedim sham 'al shesh hama'alot mizeh umizeh lo na'asah khen lekhal mamlakhot. 1_kings 10:21	vekhol kelei mashqeh hamelekh shelomoh zahab vekhol kelei bet ya'ar halebanon zahab sagur 'en kesef lo nekhshab bimei shelomoh lim'umah. 1_kings 10:22	ki 'oni tarshish lamelekh bayam 'im 'oni khiram 'akhat leshalosh shanim tabo 'oni tarshish nose'et zahab vakhesef shenhabim veqofim vetukiyim. 1_kings 10:23	vayigdal hamelekh shelomoh mikol malkhei ha'arez le'osher ulekhakhemah. 1_kings 10:24	vekhal ha'arez mebaqshim 'et penei shelomoh lishmoa' 'et khakhemato 'asher natan 'elohim belibo. 1_kings 10:25	vehemah mebi'im 'ish minkhato kelei khesef ukhelei zahab uselamot veneisheq ubesamim susim uferadim debar shanah beshanah. 1_kings 10:26	vaye'esof shelomoh rekheb ufarashim vayhi lo 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot rekheb ushenem 'asar 'elef parashim vayankhem be'arei harekheb ve'im hamelekh birushalim. 1_kings 10:27	vayiten hamelekh 'et hakesef birushalim ka'abanim ve'et ha'arazim natan kashiqmim 'asher bashefeilah larob. 1_kings 10:28	umoza hasusim 'asher lishlomoh mimizrayim umiqveh sokharei hamelekh yiqkhu miqveh bimkhir. 1_kings 10:29	vata'aleh vateizei merkabah mimizrayim beshesh mei'ot kesef vesus bakhamishim umei'ah vekhen lekhal malkhei hakhitim ulemalkhei 'aram beyadam yozi'u. 1_kings 11:1	vehamelekh shelomoh 'ahab nashim nakheriyot rabot ve'et bat par'oh mo'abiyot 'amoniyot 'adomiyot zeideniyot khitiyot. 1_kings 11:2	min hagoyim 'asher 'amar yhvh 'el benei yisra'el lo tabo'u bahem vehem lo yabo'u bakhem 'akhen yatu 'et lebabkhem 'akharei 'eloheihem bahem dabaq shelomoh le'ahabah. 1_kings 11:3	vayhi lo nashim sarot sheba' mei'ot ufilagshim shelosh mei'ot vayatu nashav 'et libo. 1_kings 11:4	vayhi le'et ziqnat shelomoh nashav hitu 'et lebabo 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim velo hayah lebabo shalem 'im yhvh 'elohav kilbab david 'abiv. 1_kings 11:5	vayeilekh shelomoh 'akharei 'ashtoret 'elohei zidonim ve'akharei milkom shiquz 'amonim. 1_kings 11:6	vaya'as shelomoh hara' be'einei yhvh velo milei 'akharei yhvh kedavid 'abiv. 1_kings 11:7	'az yibneh shelomoh bamah likhmosh shiquz mo'ab bahar 'asher 'al penei yerushalim ulemolekh shiquz benei 'amon. 1_kings 11:8	vekhen 'asah lekhal nashav hanakheriyot maqtirot umezabekhot leiloheihen. 1_kings 11:9	vayit'anaf yhvh bishlomoh ki natah lebabo mei'im yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hanir'ah 'eilav pa'amayim. 1_kings 11:10	vezivah 'eilav 'al hadabar hazeh lebilti lekhet 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim velo shamar 'et 'asher zivah yhvh. 1_kings 11:11	vayomer yhvh lishlomoh ya'an 'asher hayetah zot 'imakh velo shamarta beriti vekhuqotai 'asher ziviti 'alekha qaroa' 'eqra' 'et hamamlakhah mei'alekha unetatiha le'abdekha. 1_kings 11:12	'akh beyamekha lo 'e'esenah lema'an david 'abikha miyad binkha 'eqra'enah. 1_kings 11:13	raq 'et kal hamamlakhah lo 'eqra' sheibet 'ekhad 'eten libnekha lema'an david 'abdi ulema'an yerushalim 'asher bakhareti. 1_kings 11:14	vayaqem yhvh satan lishlomoh 'et hadad ha'adomi mizera' hamelekh hu be'edom. 1_kings 11:15	vayhi bihyot david 'et 'edom ba'alot yo'ab sar hazaba leqaber 'et hakhalalim vayakh kal zakhar be'edom. 1_kings 11:16	ki sheishet khodashim yashab sham yo'ab vekhal yisra'el 'ad hikhrit kal zakhar be'edom. 1_kings 11:17	vayibrakh 'adad hu va'anashim 'adomiyim mei'abdei 'abiv 'ito labo mizrayim vahadad na'ar qatan. 1_kings 11:18	vayaqumu mimidyan vayabo'u paran vayiqkhu 'anashim 'imam miparan vayabo'u mizrayim 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim vayiten lo bayit velekhem 'amar lo ve'erez natan lo. 1_kings 11:19	vayimza hadad khen be'einei far'oh me'od vayiten lo 'ishah 'et 'akhot 'ishto 'akhot takhpenes hagebirah. 1_kings 11:20	vateiled lo 'akhot takhpenes 'et genubat beno vatigmeleihu takhpenes betokh bet par'oh vayhi genubat bet par'oh betokh benei far'oh. 1_kings 11:21	vahadad shama' bemizrayim ki shakhab david 'im 'abotav vekhi met yo'ab sar hazaba vayomer hadad 'el par'oh shalekheini ve'eilekh 'el 'arzi. 1_kings 11:22	vayomer lo far'oh ki mah 'atah khaser 'imi vehinekha mebaqesh lalekhet 'el 'arzekha vayomer lo ki shaleiakh teshalekheini. 1_kings 11:23	vayaqem 'elohim lo satan 'et rezon ben 'elyada' 'asher barakh mei'et hadad'ezer melekh zobah 'adonav. 1_kings 11:24	vayiqboz 'alav 'anashim vayhi sar gedud baharog david 'otam vayeilekhu dameseq vayeishebu bah vayimlekhu bedamaseq. 1_kings 11:25	vayhi satan leyisra'el kal yemei shelomoh ve'et hara'ah 'asher hadad vayaqaz beyisra'el vayimlokh 'al 'aram. 1_kings 11:26	veyarabe'am ben nebat 'efrati min hazereidah veshem 'imo zeru'ah 'ishah 'almanah 'ebed lishlomoh vayarem yad bamelekh. 1_kings 11:27	vezeh hadabar 'asher heirim yad bamelekh shelomoh banah 'et hamilo sagar 'et perez 'ir david 'abiv. 1_kings 11:28	veha'ish yarabe'am gibor khayil vayar shelomoh 'et hana'ar ki 'oseh melakhah hu vayafqed 'oto lekhal seibel bet yosef. 1_kings 11:29	vayhi ba'et hahi veyarabe'am yaza mirushalim vayimza 'oto 'akhiyah hashiloni hanabi baderekh vehu mitkaseh besalmah khadashah usheneihem lebadam basadeh. 1_kings 11:30	vayitpos 'akhiyah basalmah hakhadashah 'asher 'alav vayiqra'eha shenem 'asar qera'im. 1_kings 11:31	vayomer leyarabe'am qakh lekha 'asarah qera'im ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hini qoreia' 'et hamamlakhah miyad shelomoh venatati lekha 'et 'asarah hashebatim. 1_kings 11:32	vehasheibet ha'ekhad yihyeh lo lema'an 'abdi david ulema'an yerushalim ha'ir 'asher bakharti bah mikol shibtei yisra'el. 1_kings 11:33	ya'an 'asher 'azabuni vayishtakhavu le'ashtoret 'elohei zidonin likhmosh 'elohei mo'ab ulemilkom 'elohei benei 'amon velo halekhu bidrakhai la'asot hayashar be'einai vekhuqotai umishpatai kedavid 'abiv. 1_kings 11:34	velo 'eqakh 'et kal hamamlakhah miyado ki nasi 'ashitenu kol yemei khayav lema'an david 'abdi 'asher bakharti 'oto 'asher shamar mizvotai vekhuqotai. 1_kings 11:35	velaqakhti hamelukhah miyad beno unetatiha lekha 'et 'aseret hashebatim. 1_kings 11:36	velibno 'eten sheibet 'ekhad lema'an heyot nir ledavid 'abdi kal hayamim lefanai birushalim ha'ir 'asher bakharti li lasum shemi sham. 1_kings 11:37	ve'otekha 'eqakh umalakhta bekhol 'asher te'aveh nafshekha vehayita melekh 'al yisra'el. 1_kings 11:38	vehayah 'im tishma' 'et kal 'asher 'azavekha vehalakhta bidrakhai ve'asita hayashar be'einai lishmor khuqotai umizvotai ka'asher 'asah david 'abdi vehayiti 'imakh ubaniti lekha bayit ne'eman ka'asher baniti ledavid venatati lekha 'et yisra'el. 1_kings 11:39	va'aneh 'et zera' david lema'an zot 'akh lo khal hayamim. 1_kings 11:40	vaybaqesh shelomoh lehamit 'et yarabe'am vayaqam yarabe'am vayibrakh mizrayim 'el shishaq melekh mizrayim vayhi bemizrayim 'ad mot shelomoh. 1_kings 11:41	veyeter dibrei shelomoh vekhal 'asher 'asah vekhakhemato halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei shelomoh. 1_kings 11:42	vehayamim 'asher malakh shelomoh birushalim 'al kal yisra'el 'arba'im shanah. 1_kings 11:43	vayishkab shelomoh 'im 'abotav vayiqaber be'ir david 'abiv vayimlokh rekhab'am beno takhtav. 1_kings 12:1	vayeilekh rekhab'am shekhem ki shekhem ba khal yisra'el lehamlikh 'oto. 1_kings 12:2	vayhi kishmoa' yarabe'am ben nebat vehu 'odenu bemizrayim 'asher barakh mipenei hamelekh shelomoh vayeisheb yarabe'am bemizrayim. 1_kings 12:3	vayishlekhu vayiqre'u lo vayabo'u vayabo yarabe'am vekhal qehal yisra'el vaydaberu 'el rekhab'am leimor. 1_kings 12:4	'abikha hiqshah 'et 'uleinu ve'atah 'atah haqel mei'abodat 'abikha haqashah umei'ulo hakabed 'asher natan 'aleinu vena'abdeka. 1_kings 12:5	vayomer 'aleihem lekhu 'od sheloshah yamim veshubu 'eilai vayeilekhu ha'am. 1_kings 12:6	vayiva'az hamelekh rekhab'am 'et hazeqeinim 'asher hayu 'omedim 'et penei shelomoh 'abiv bihyoto khai leimor 'ekh 'atem no'azim lehashib 'et ha'am hazeh dabar. 1_kings 12:7	vaydaber vaydaberu 'eilav leimor 'im hayom tihyeh 'ebed la'am hazeh va'abadtam va'anitam vedibarta 'aleihem debarim tobim vehayu lekha 'abadim kal hayamim. 1_kings 12:8	vaya'azob 'et 'azat hazeqeinim 'asher ye'azuhu vayiva'az 'et hayladim 'asher gadelu 'ito 'asher ha'omedim lefanav. 1_kings 12:9	vayomer 'aleihem mah 'atem no'azim venashib dabar 'et ha'am hazeh 'asher diberu 'eilai leimor haqel min ha'ol 'asher natan 'abikha 'aleinu. 1_kings 12:10	vaydaberu 'eilav hayladim 'asher gadelu 'ito leimor koh tomar la'am hazeh 'asher diberu 'eilekha leimor 'abikha hikhbid 'et 'uleinu ve'atah haqel mei'aleinu koh tedaber 'aleihem qatani 'abah mimatenei 'abi. 1_kings 12:11	ve'atah 'abi he'mis 'aleikhem 'ol kabed va'ani 'osif 'al 'ulekhem 'abi yisar 'etkhem bashotim va'ani 'ayaser 'etkhem ba'aqrabim. 1_kings 12:12	vayabo vayabo yarabe'am vekhal ha'am 'el rekhab'am bayom hashelishi ka'asher diber hamelekh leimor shubu 'eilai bayom hashelishi. 1_kings 12:13	vaya'an hamelekh 'et ha'am qashah vaya'azob 'et 'azat hazeqeinim 'asher ye'azuhu. 1_kings 12:14	vaydaber 'aleihem ka'azat hayladim leimor 'abi hikhbid 'et 'ulekhem va'ani 'osif 'al 'ulekhem 'abi yisar 'etkhem bashotim va'ani 'ayaser 'etkhem ba'aqrabim. 1_kings 12:15	velo shama' hamelekh 'el ha'am ki hayetah sibah mei'im yhvh lema'an haqim 'et debaro 'asher diber yhvh beyad 'akhiyah hashiloni 'el yarabe'am ben nebat. 1_kings 12:16	vayar kal yisra'el ki lo shama' hamelekh 'aleihem vayashibu ha'am 'et hamelekh dabar leimor mah lanu kheileq bedavid velo nakhalah beben yishai le'ohalekha yisra'el 'atah re'eh beitekha david vayeilekh yisra'el le'ohalav. 1_kings 12:17	ubenei yisra'el hayoshebim be'arei yehudah vayimlokh 'aleihem rekhab'am. 1_kings 12:18	vayishlakh hamelekh rekhab'am 'et 'adoram 'asher 'al hamas vayirgemu khal yisra'el bo 'eben vayamot vehamelekh rekhab'am hit'amez la'alot bamerkabah lanus yerushalim. 1_kings 12:19	vayifshe'u yisra'el bebet david 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_kings 12:20	vayhi kishmoa' kal yisra'el ki shab yarabe'am vayishlekhu vayiqre'u 'oto 'el ha'eidah vayamlikhu 'oto 'al kal yisra'el lo hayah 'akharei bet david zulati sheibet yehudah lebado. 1_kings 12:21	vayabo'u vayabo rekhab'am yerushalim vayaqhel 'et kal bet yehudah ve'et sheibet binyamin mei'ah ushemonim 'elef bakhur 'oseh milkhamah lehilakhem 'im bet yisra'el lehashib 'et hamelukhah lirkhab'am ben shelomoh. 1_kings 12:22	vayhi debar ha'elohim 'el shema'yah 'ish ha'elohim leimor. 1_kings 12:23	'emor 'el rekhab'am ben shelomoh melekh yehudah ve'el kal bet yehudah ubinyamin veyeter ha'am leimor. 1_kings 12:24	koh 'amar yhvh lo ta'alu velo tilakhamun 'im 'akheikhem benei yisra'el ubu 'ish lebeito ki mei'iti nihyah hadabar hazeh vayishme'u 'et debar yhvh vayashubu lalekhet kidbar yhvh. 1_kings 12:25	vayiben yarabe'am 'et shekhem behar 'efrayim vayeisheb bah vayeizei misham vayiben 'et penu'el. 1_kings 12:26	vayomer yarabe'am belibo 'atah tashub hamamlakhah lebet david. 1_kings 12:27	'im ya'aleh ha'am hazeh la'asot zebakhim bebet yhvh birushalim veshab leb ha'am hazeh 'el 'adoneihem 'el rekhab'am melekh yehudah vaharaguni veshabu 'el rekhab'am melekh yehudah. 1_kings 12:28	vayiva'az hamelekh vaya'as shenei 'eglei zahab vayomer 'aleihem rab lakhem mei'alot yerushalim hineh 'elohekha yisra'el 'asher he'elukha mei'erez mizrayim. 1_kings 12:29	vayasem 'et ha'ekhad bebet 'el ve'et ha'ekhad natan bedan. 1_kings 12:30	vayhi hadabar hazeh lekhatat vayeilekhu ha'am lifnei ha'ekhad 'ad dan. 1_kings 12:31	vaya'as 'et bet bamot vaya'as kohanim miqzot ha'am 'asher lo hayu mibenei leivi. 1_kings 12:32	vaya'as yarabe'am khag bakhodesh hashemini bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh kekhag 'asher bihudah vaya'al 'al hamizbeiakh ken 'asah bebet 'el lezabeiakh la'agalim 'asher 'asah vehe'emid bebet 'el 'et kohanei habamot 'asher 'asah. 1_kings 12:33	vaya'al 'al hamizbeiakh 'asher 'asah bebet 'el bakhamishah 'asar yom bakhodesh hashemini bakhodesh 'asher bada milibad milibo vaya'as khag libnei yisra'el vaya'al 'al hamizbeiakh lehaqtir. 1_kings 13:1	vehineh 'ish 'elohim ba mihudah bidbar yhvh 'el bet 'el veyarabe'am 'omed 'al hamizbeiakh lehaqtir. 1_kings 13:2	vayiqra 'al hamizbeiakh bidbar yhvh vayomer mizbeiakh mizbeiakh koh 'amar yhvh hineh ben nolad lebet david yoshiyahu shemo vezabakh 'alekha 'et kohanei habamot hamaqtirim 'alekha ve'azmot 'adam yisrefu 'alekha. 1_kings 13:3	venatan bayom hahu mofet leimor zeh hamofet 'asher diber yhvh hineh hamizbeiakh niqra' venishpakh hadeshen 'asher 'alav. 1_kings 13:4	vayhi khishmoa' hamelekh 'et debar 'ish ha'elohim 'asher qara 'al hamizbeiakh bebet 'el vayishlakh yarabe'am 'et yado mei'al hamizbeiakh leimor tifsuhu vatibash yado 'asher shalakh 'alav velo yakhol lahashibah 'eilav. 1_kings 13:5	vehamizbeiakh niqra' vayishafekh hadeshen min hamizbeiakh kamofet 'asher natan 'ish ha'elohim bidbar yhvh. 1_kings 13:6	vaya'an hamelekh vayomer 'el 'ish ha'elohim khal na 'et penei yhvh 'elohekha vehitpalel ba'adi vetashob yadi 'eilai vaykhal 'ish ha'elohim 'et penei yhvh vatashab yad hamelekh 'eilav vatehi kebarishonah. 1_kings 13:7	vaydaber hamelekh 'el 'ish ha'elohim bo'ah 'iti habaytah use'adah ve'etenah lekha matat. 1_kings 13:8	vayomer 'ish ha'elohim 'el hamelekh 'im titen li 'et khazi beitekha lo 'abo 'imakh velo 'okhal lekhem velo 'eshteh mayim bamaqom hazeh. 1_kings 13:9	ki khen zivah 'oti bidbar yhvh leimor lo tokhal lekhem velo tishteh mayim velo tashub baderekh 'asher halakheta. 1_kings 13:10	vayeilekh bederekh 'akher velo shab baderekh 'asher ba bah 'el bet 'el. 1_kings 13:11	venabi 'ekhad zaqen yosheb bebet 'el vayabo beno vaysaper lo 'et kal hama'aseh 'asher 'asah 'ish ha'elohim hayom bebet 'el 'et hadebarim 'asher diber 'el hamelekh vaysaperum la'abihem. 1_kings 13:12	vaydaber 'aleihem 'abihem 'ei zeh haderekh halakh vayir'u banav 'et haderekh 'asher halakh 'ish ha'elohim 'asher ba mihudah. 1_kings 13:13	vayomer 'el banav khibshu li hakhamor vayakhbeshu lo hakhamor vayirkab 'alav. 1_kings 13:14	vayeilekh 'akharei 'ish ha'elohim vayimza'eihu yosheb takhat ha'eilah vayomer 'eilav ha'atah 'ish ha'elohim 'asher bata mihudah vayomer 'ani. 1_kings 13:15	vayomer 'eilav lekh 'iti habayetah ve'ekhol lakhem. 1_kings 13:16	vayomer lo 'ukhal lashub 'itakh velabo 'itakh velo 'okhal lekhem velo 'eshteh 'itekha mayim bamaqom hazeh. 1_kings 13:17	ki dabar 'eilai bidbar yhvh lo tokhal lekhem velo tishteh sham mayim lo tashub lalekhet baderekh 'asher halakhta bah. 1_kings 13:18	vayomer lo gam 'ani nabi kamokha umal'akh diber 'eilai bidbar yhvh leimor hashibeihu 'itekha 'el beitekha veyokhal lekhem veyeishet mayim kikhesh lo. 1_kings 13:19	vayashab 'ito vayokhal lekhem bebeito vayeishet mayim. 1_kings 13:20	vayhi hem yoshebim 'el hashulkhan vayhi debar yhvh 'el hanabi 'asher heshibo. 1_kings 13:21	vayiqra 'el 'ish ha'elohim 'asher ba mihudah leimor koh 'amar yhvh ya'an ki marita pi yhvh velo shamarta 'et hamizvah 'asher zivekha yhvh 'elohekha. 1_kings 13:22	vatashab vatokhal lekhem vateishet mayim bamaqom 'asher diber 'eilekha 'al tokhal lekhem ve'al teishet mayim lo tabo niblatekha 'el qeber 'abotekha. 1_kings 13:23	vayhi 'akharei 'akhelo lekhem ve'akharei shetoto vayakhabash lo hakhamor lanabi 'asher heshibo. 1_kings 13:24	vayeilekh vayimza'eihu 'aryeh baderekh vaymiteihu vatehi niblato mushlekhet baderekh vehakhamor 'omed 'ezlah veha'aryeh 'omed 'eizel hanebeilah. 1_kings 13:25	vehineh 'anashim 'oberim vayir'u 'et hanebeilah mushlekhet baderekh ve'et ha'aryeh 'omed 'eizel hanebeilah vayabo'u vaydaberu ba'ir 'asher hanabi hazaqen yosheb bah. 1_kings 13:26	vayishma' hanabi 'asher heshibo min haderekh vayomer 'ish ha'elohim hu 'asher marah 'et pi yhvh vayiteneihu yhvh la'aryeh vayishbereihu vaymiteihu kidbar yhvh 'asher diber lo. 1_kings 13:27	vaydaber 'el banav leimor khibshu li 'et hakhamor vayakhaboshu. 1_kings 13:28	vayeilekh vayimza 'et niblato mushlekhet baderekh vakhamor veha'aryeh 'omedim 'eizel hanebeilah lo 'akhal ha'aryeh 'et hanebeilah velo shabar 'et hakhamor. 1_kings 13:29	vayisa hanabi 'et niblat 'ish ha'elohim vayanikheihu 'el hakhamor vayshibeihu vayabo 'el 'ir hanabi hazaqen lispod uleqabero. 1_kings 13:30	vayanakh 'et niblato beqibro vayispedu 'alav ho 'akhi. 1_kings 13:31	vayhi 'akharei qabero 'oto vayomer 'el banav leimor bemoti uqebartem 'oti baqeber 'asher 'ish ha'elohim qabur bo 'eizel 'azmotav hanikhu 'et 'azmotai. 1_kings 13:32	ki hayoh yihyeh hadabar 'asher qara bidbar yhvh 'al hamizbeiakh 'asher bebet 'el ve'al kal batei habamot 'asher be'arei shomeron. 1_kings 13:33	'akhar hadabar hazeh lo shab yarabe'am midarko hara'ah vayashab vaya'as miqzot ha'am kohanei bamot hekhafez yemalei 'et yado vihi kohanei bamot. 1_kings 13:34	vayhi badabar hazeh lekhatat bet yarabe'am ulehakhkhid ulehashmid mei'al penei ha'adamah. 1_kings 14:1	ba'et hahi khalah 'abiyah ben yarabe'am. 1_kings 14:2	vayomer yarabe'am le'ishto qumi na vehishtanit velo yeide'u ki 'ati 'at 'eishet yarabe'am vehalakht shiloh hineh sham 'akhiyah hanabi hu diber 'alai lemelekh 'al ha'am hazeh. 1_kings 14:3	velaqakhat beyadekh 'asarah lekhem veniqudim ubaqbuq debash ubat 'eilav hu yagid lakh mah yihyeh lana'ar. 1_kings 14:4	vata'as ken 'eishet yarabe'am vataqam vateilekh shiloh vatabo bet 'akhiyah va'akhiyahu lo yakhol lir'ot ki qamu 'einav miseibo. 1_kings 14:5	yhvh 'amar 'el 'akhiyahu hineh 'eishet yarabe'am ba'ah lidrosh dabar mei'imekha 'el benah ki kholeh hu kazoh vekhazeh tedaber 'eileha vihi khebo'ah vehi mitnakeirah. 1_kings 14:6	vayhi khishmoa' 'akhiyahu 'et qol ragleha ba'ah bapetakh vayomer bo'i 'eishet yarabe'am lamah zeh 'at mitnakeirah ve'anokhi shaluakh 'eilayikh qashah. 1_kings 14:7	lekhi 'imri leyarabe'am koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el ya'an 'asher harimotikha mitokh ha'am va'etenkha nagid 'al 'ami yisra'el. 1_kings 14:8	va'eqra' 'et hamamlakhah mibet david va'eteneha lakh velo hayita ke'abdi david 'asher shamar mizvotai va'asher halakh 'akharai bekhal lebabo la'asot raq hayashar be'einai. 1_kings 14:9	vatara' la'asot mikol 'asher hayu lefanekha vateilekh vata'aseh lekha 'elohim 'akheirim umaseikhot lehakh'iseini ve'oti hishlakhta 'akharei gavekha. 1_kings 14:10	lakhen hini meibi ra'ah 'el bet yarabe'am vehikhrati leyarabe'am mashtin beqir 'azur ve'azub beyisra'el ubi'arti 'akharei bet yarabe'am ka'asher yeba'er hagalal 'ad tumo. 1_kings 14:11	hamet leyarabe'am ba'ir yokhelu hakelabim vehamet basadeh yokhelu 'of hashamayim ki yhvh diber. 1_kings 14:12	ve'at qumi lekhi lebeitekh bebo'ah raglayikh ha'irah umet hayaled. 1_kings 14:13	vesafedu lo khal yisra'el veqaberu 'oto ki zeh lebado yabo leyarabe'am 'el qaber ya'an nimza bo dabar tob 'el yhvh 'elohei yisra'el bebet yarabe'am. 1_kings 14:14	veheiqim yhvh lo melekh 'al yisra'el 'asher yakhrit 'et bet yarabe'am zeh hayom umeh gam 'atah. 1_kings 14:15	vehikah yhvh 'et yisra'el ka'asher yanud haqaneh bamayim venatash 'et yisra'el mei'al ha'adamah hatobah hazot 'asher natan la'aboteihem vezeiram mei'eiber lanahar ya'an 'asher 'asu 'et 'asheireihem makh'isim 'et yhvh. 1_kings 14:16	veyiten 'et yisra'el biglal khatot yarabe'am 'asher khata va'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. 1_kings 14:17	vataqam 'eishet yarabe'am vateilekh vatabo tirzatah hi ba'ah besaf habayit vehana'ar met. 1_kings 14:18	vayiqberu 'oto vayispedu lo kal yisra'el kidbar yhvh 'asher diber beyad 'abdo 'akhiyahu hanabi. 1_kings 14:19	veyeter dibrei yarabe'am 'asher nilkham va'asher malakh hinam ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 1_kings 14:20	vehayamim 'asher malakh yarabe'am 'esrim ushetayim shanah vayishkab 'im 'abotav vayimlokh nadab beno takhtav. 1_kings 14:21	urekhab'am ben shelomoh malakh bihudah ben 'arba'im ve'akhat shanah rekhab'am bemalekho ushaba' 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim ha'ir 'asher bakhar yhvh lasum 'et shemo sham mikol shibtei yisra'el veshem 'imo na'amah ha'amonit. 1_kings 14:22	vaya'as yehudah hara' be'einei yhvh vayqan'u 'oto mikol 'asher 'asu 'abotam bekhatotam 'asher khata'u. 1_kings 14:23	vayibnu gam hemah lahem bamot umazeibot va'asheirim 'al kal gib'ah gebohah vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan. 1_kings 14:24	vegam qadesh hayah ba'arez 'asu kekhol hato'abot hagoyim 'asher horish yhvh mipenei benei yisra'el. 1_kings 14:25	vayhi bashanah hakhamishit lamelekh rekhab'am 'alah shushaq shishaq melekh mizrayim 'al yerushalim. 1_kings 14:26	vayiqakh 'et 'ozerot bet yhvh ve'et 'ozrot bet hamelekh ve'et hakol laqakh vayiqakh 'et kal maginei hazahab 'asher 'asah shelomoh. 1_kings 14:27	vaya'as hamelekh rekhab'am takhtam maginei nekhoshet vehifqid 'al yad sarei harazim hashomerim petakh bet hamelekh. 1_kings 14:28	vayhi midei bo hamelekh bet yhvh yisa'um harazim veheshibum 'el ta harazim. 1_kings 14:29	veyeter dibrei rekhab'am vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hemah khetubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 1_kings 14:30	umilkhamah hayetah ben rekhab'am uben yarabe'am kal hayamim. 1_kings 14:31	vayishkab rekhab'am 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david veshem 'imo na'amah ha'amonit vayimlokh 'abiyam beno takhtav. 1_kings 15:1	ubishnat shemoneh 'esreh lamelekh yarabe'am ben nebat malakh 'abiyam 'al yehudah. 1_kings 15:2	shalosh shanim malakh birushalim veshem 'imo ma'akhah bat 'abishalom. 1_kings 15:3	vayeilekh bekhal khatot 'abiv 'asher 'asah lefanav velo hayah lebabo shalem 'im yhvh 'elohav kilbab david 'abiv. 1_kings 15:4	ki lema'an david natan yhvh 'elohav lo nir birushalim lehaqim 'et beno 'akharav uleha'amid 'et yerushalim. 1_kings 15:5	'asher 'asah david 'et hayashar be'einei yhvh velo sar mikol 'asher zivahu kol yemei khayav raq bidbar 'uriyah hakhiti. 1_kings 15:6	umilkhamah hayetah ben rekhab'am uben yarabe'am kal yemei khayav. 1_kings 15:7	veyeter dibrei 'abiyam vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah umilkhamah hayetah ben 'abiyam uben yarabe'am. 1_kings 15:8	vayishkab 'abiyam 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto be'ir david vayimlokh 'asa beno takhtav. 1_kings 15:9	ubishnat 'esrim leyarabe'am melekh yisra'el malakh 'asa melekh yehudah. 1_kings 15:10	ve'arba'im ve'akhat shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo ma'akhah bat 'abishalom. 1_kings 15:11	vaya'as 'asa hayashar be'einei yhvh kedavid 'abiv. 1_kings 15:12	vaya'aber haqedeishim min ha'arez vayasar 'et kal hagilulim 'asher 'asu 'abotav. 1_kings 15:13	vegam 'et ma'akhah 'imo vaysireha migebirah 'asher 'asetah miflezet la'asheirah vayikhrot 'asa 'et miflaztah vayisrof benakhal qidron. 1_kings 15:14	vehabamot lo saru raq lebab 'asa hayah shalem 'im yhvh kal yamav. 1_kings 15:15	vayabei 'et qadeshei 'abiv veqadesho veqadeshei bet yhvh kesef vezahab vekheilim. 1_kings 15:16	umilkhamah hayetah ben 'asa uben ba'sha melekh yisra'el kal yemeihem. 1_kings 15:17	vaya'al ba'sha melekh yisra'el 'al yehudah vayiben 'et haramah lebilti tet yozei vaba le'asa melekh yehudah. 1_kings 15:18	vayiqakh 'asa 'et kal hakesef vehazahab hanotarim be'ozrot bet yhvh ve'et 'ozrot bet melekh hamelekh vayitenem beyad 'abadav vayishlakhem hamelekh 'asa 'el ben hadad ben tabrimon ben khezyon melekh 'aram hayosheb bedameseq leimor. 1_kings 15:19	berit beini ubeinekha ben 'abi uben 'abikha hineh shalakhti lekha shokhad kesef vezahab lekh hafeirah 'et beritekha 'et ba'sha melekh yisra'el veya'aleh mei'alai. 1_kings 15:20	vayishma' ben hadad 'el hamelekh 'asa vayishlakh 'et sarei hakhayalim 'asher lo 'al 'arei yisra'el vayakh 'et 'iyon ve'et dan ve'et 'abel bet ma'akhah ve'et kal kinrot 'al kal 'erez naftali. 1_kings 15:21	vayhi kishmoa' ba'sha vayekhdal mibenot 'et haramah vayeisheb betirzah. 1_kings 15:22	vehamelekh 'asa hishmia' 'et kal yehudah 'en naqi vayis'u 'et 'abnei haramah ve'et 'eizeha 'asher banah ba'sha vayiben bam hamelekh 'asa 'et geba' binyamin ve'et hamizpah. 1_kings 15:23	veyeter kal dibrei 'asa vekhal geburato vekhal 'asher 'asah vehe'arim 'asher banah halo hemah khetubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah raq le'et ziqnato khalah 'et raglav. 1_kings 15:24	vayishkab 'asa 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david 'abiv vayimlokh yehoshafat beno takhtav. 1_kings 15:25	venadab ben yarabe'am malakh 'al yisra'el bishnat shetayim le'asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh 'al yisra'el shenatayim. 1_kings 15:26	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh vayeilekh bederekh 'abiv ubekhatato 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. 1_kings 15:27	vayiqshor 'alav ba'sha ben 'akhiyah lebet yisashkhar vayakeihu ba'sha begibeton 'asher lapelishtim venadab vekhal yisra'el zarim 'al gibeton. 1_kings 15:28	vaymiteihu ba'sha bishnat shalosh le'asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh takhtav. 1_kings 15:29	vayhi khemalekho hikah 'et kal bet yarabe'am lo hish'ir kal neshamah leyarabe'am 'ad hishmido kidbar yhvh 'asher diber beyad 'abdo 'akhiyah hashiloni. 1_kings 15:30	'al khatot yarabe'am 'asher khata va'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el bekha'so 'asher hikh'is 'et yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. 1_kings 15:31	veyeter dibrei nadab vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 1_kings 15:32	umilkhamah hayetah ben 'asa uben ba'sha melekh yisra'el kal yemeihem. 1_kings 15:33	bishnat shalosh le'asa melekh yehudah malakh ba'sha ben 'akhiyah 'al kal yisra'el betirzah 'esrim ve'arba' shanah. 1_kings 15:34	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh vayeilekh bederekh yarabe'am ubekhatato 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. 1_kings 16:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yeihu ben khanani 'al ba'sha leimor. 1_kings 16:2	ya'an 'asher harimotikha min he'afar va'etenkha nagid 'al 'ami yisra'el vateilekh bederekh yarabe'am vatakhati 'et 'ami yisra'el lehakh'iseini bekhatotam. 1_kings 16:3	hini mab'ir 'akharei ba'sha ve'akharei beito venatati 'et beitekha kebet yarabe'am ben nebat. 1_kings 16:4	hamet leba'sha ba'ir yokhelu hakelabim vehamet lo basadeh yokhelu 'of hashamayim. 1_kings 16:5	veyeter dibrei ba'sha va'asher 'asah ugeburato halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 1_kings 16:6	vayishkab ba'sha 'im 'abotav vayiqaber betirzah vayimlokh 'eilah beno takhtav. 1_kings 16:7	vegam beyad yeihu ben khanani hanabi debar yhvh hayah 'el ba'sha ve'el beito ve'al kal hara'ah 'asher 'asah be'einei yhvh lehakh'iso bema'aseh yadav lihyot kebet yarabe'am ve'al 'asher hikah 'oto. 1_kings 16:8	bishnat 'esrim vashesh shanah le'asa melekh yehudah malakh 'eilah ben ba'sha 'al yisra'el betirzah shenatayim. 1_kings 16:9	vayiqshor 'alav 'abdo zimri sar makhazit harakheb vehu betirzah shoteh shikor bet 'arza 'asher 'al habayit betirzah. 1_kings 16:10	vayabo zimri vayakeihu vaymiteihu bishnat 'esrim vasheba' le'asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh takhtav. 1_kings 16:11	vayhi bemalekho keshibto 'al kis'o hikah 'et kal bet ba'sha lo hish'ir lo mashtin beqir vego'alav verei'eihu. 1_kings 16:12	vayashmed zimri 'et kal bet ba'sha kidbar yhvh 'asher diber 'el ba'sha beyad yeihu hanabi. 1_kings 16:13	'el kal khatot ba'sha vekhatot 'eilah beno 'asher khate'u va'asher hekheti'u 'et yisra'el lehakh'is 'et yhvh 'elohei yisra'el behableihem. 1_kings 16:14	veyeter dibrei 'eilah vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 1_kings 16:15	bishnat 'esrim vasheba' shanah le'asa melekh yehudah malakh zimri shib'at yamim betirzah veha'am khonim 'al gibeton 'asher lapelishtim. 1_kings 16:16	vayishma' ha'am hakhonim leimor qashar zimri vegam hikah 'et hamelekh vayamlikhu khal yisra'el 'et 'ameri sar zaba 'al yisra'el bayom hahu bamakhaneh. 1_kings 16:17	vaya'aleh 'ameri vekhal yisra'el 'imo migibeton vayazuru 'al tirzah. 1_kings 16:18	vayhi kir'ot zimri ki nilkedah ha'ir vayabo 'el 'armon bet hamelekh vayisrof 'alav 'et bet melekh ba'esh vayamot. 1_kings 16:19	'al khatato khatotav 'asher khata la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh lalekhet bederekh yarabe'am ubekhatato 'asher 'asah lehakhati 'et yisra'el. 1_kings 16:20	veyeter dibrei zimri veqishro 'asher qashar halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 1_kings 16:21	'az yeikhaleq ha'am yisra'el lakheizi khazi ha'am hayah 'akharei tibni ben ginat lehamlikho vehakhazi 'akharei 'ameri. 1_kings 16:22	vayekhezaq ha'am 'asher 'akharei 'ameri 'et ha'am 'asher 'akharei tibni ben ginat vayamat tibni vayimlokh 'ameri. 1_kings 16:23	bishnat sheloshim ve'akhat shanah le'asa melekh yehudah malakh 'ameri 'al yisra'el shetem 'esreh shanah betirzah malakh shesh shanim. 1_kings 16:24	vayiqen 'et hahar shomeron mei'et shemer bekhikerayim kasef vayiben 'et hahar vayiqra 'et shem ha'ir 'asher banah 'al shem shemer 'adonei hahar shomeron. 1_kings 16:25	vaya'aseh 'ameri hara' be'einei yhvh vayara' mikol 'asher lefanav. 1_kings 16:26	vayeilekh bekhal derekh yarabe'am ben nebat ubekhatotav ubekhatato 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el lehakh'is 'et yhvh 'elohei yisra'el behableihem 1_kings 16:27	veyeter dibrei 'ameri 'asher 'asah ugeburato 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 1_kings 16:28	vayishkab 'ameri 'im 'abotav vayiqaber beshomeron vayimlokh 'akh'ab beno takhtav. 1_kings 16:29	ve'akh'ab ben 'ameri malakh 'al yisra'el bishnat sheloshim ushemoneh shanah le'asa melekh yehudah vayimlokh 'akh'ab ben 'ameri 'al yisra'el beshomeron 'esrim ushetayim shanah. 1_kings 16:30	vaya'as 'akh'ab ben 'ameri hara' be'einei yhvh mikol 'asher lefanav. 1_kings 16:31	vayhi hanaqel lekhto bekhatot yarabe'am ben nebat vayiqakh 'ishah 'et 'izebel bat 'etba'al melekh zidonim vayeilekh vaya'abod 'et haba'al vayishtakhu lo. 1_kings 16:32	vayaqem mizbeiakh laba'al bet haba'al 'asher banah beshomeron. 1_kings 16:33	vaya'as 'akh'ab 'et ha'asheirah vayosef 'akh'ab la'asot lehakh'is 'et yhvh 'elohei yisra'el mikol malkhei yisra'el 'asher hayu lefanav. 1_kings 16:34	beyamav banah khi'el bet ha'eli 'et yerikhoh ba'abiram bekhoro yisedah ubisgib ubisgub ze'iro hizib delateha kidbar yhvh 'asher diber beyad yehoshua' bin nun. 1_kings 17:1	vayomer 'eiliyahu hatishbi mitoshabei gil'ad 'el 'akh'ab khai yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher 'amadti lefanav 'im yihyeh hashanim ha'eleh tal umatar ki 'im lefi debari. 1_kings 17:2	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilav leimor. 1_kings 17:3	lekh mizeh ufanita lekha qeidemah venistarta benakhal kerit 'asher 'al penei hayarden. 1_kings 17:4	vehayah meihanakhal tishteh ve'et ha'orebim ziviti lekhalkelkha sham. 1_kings 17:5	vayeilekh vaya'as kidbar yhvh vayeilekh vayeisheb benakhal kerit 'asher 'al penei hayarden. 1_kings 17:6	veha'orebim mebi'im lo lekhem ubasar baboqer velekhem ubasar ba'areb umin hanakhal yishteh. 1_kings 17:7	vayhi miqez yamim vayibash hanakhal ki lo hayah geshem ba'arez. 1_kings 17:8	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilav leimor. 1_kings 17:9	qum lekh zarefatah 'asher lezidon veyashabta sham hineh ziviti sham 'ishah 'almanah lekhalkelekha. 1_kings 17:10	vayaqam vayeilekh zarefatah vayabo 'el petakh ha'ir vehineh sham 'ishah 'almanah meqosheshet 'eizim vayiqra 'eileha vayomar qekhi na li me'at mayim bakeli ve'eshteh. 1_kings 17:11	vateilekh laqakhat vayiqra 'eileha vayomar liqkhi na li pat lekhem beyadekh. 1_kings 17:12	vatomer khai yhvh 'elohekha 'im yesh li ma'og ki 'im melo khaf qemakh bakad ume'at shemen bazapakhat vehini meqosheshet shenayim 'eizim ubati va'asitihu li velibni va'akhalnuhu vamatenu. 1_kings 17:13	vayomer 'eileha 'eiliyahu 'al tire'i bo'i 'asi khidbarekh 'akh 'asi li misham 'ugah qetanah barishonah vehozet li velakh velibnekh ta'asi ba'akharonah. 1_kings 17:14	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el kad haqemakh lo tikhlah vezapakhat hashemen lo tekhsar 'ad yom titen tet hashem geshem 'al penei ha'adamah. 1_kings 17:15	vateilekh vata'aseh kidbar 'eiliyahu vatokhal hu vahi hi vahu ubeitah yamim. 1_kings 17:16	kad haqemakh lo khalatah vezapakhat hashemen lo khaser kidbar yhvh 'asher diber beyad 'eiliyahu. 1_kings 17:17	vayhi 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh khalah ben ha'ishah ba'alat habayit vayhi khaleyo khazaq me'od 'ad 'asher lo notrah bo neshamah. 1_kings 17:18	vatomer 'el 'eiliyahu mah li valakh 'ish ha'elohim bata 'eilai lehazkir 'et 'avoni ulehamit 'et beni. 1_kings 17:19	vayomer 'eileha teni li 'et benekh vayiqakheihu meikheiqah vaya'aleihu 'el ha'aliyah 'asher hu yosheb sham vayashkibeihu 'al mitato. 1_kings 17:20	vayiqra 'el yhvh vayomar yhvh 'elohai hagam 'al ha'almanah 'asher 'ani mitgorer 'imah harei'ota lehamit 'et benah. 1_kings 17:21	vayitmoded 'al hayeled shalosh pe'amim vayiqra 'el yhvh vayomar yhvh 'elohai tashab na nefesh hayeled hazeh 'al qirbo. 1_kings 17:22	vayishma' yhvh beqol 'eiliyahu vatashab nefesh hayeled 'al qirbo vayekhi. 1_kings 17:23	vayiqakh 'eiliyahu 'et hayeled vayorideihu min ha'aliyah habaytah vayiteneihu le'imo vayomer 'eiliyahu re'i khai benekh. 1_kings 17:24	vatomer ha'ishah 'el 'eiliyahu 'atah zeh yada'ti ki 'ish 'elohim 'atah udebar yhvh befikha 'emet. 1_kings 18:1	vayhi yamim rabim udebar yhvh hayah 'el 'eiliyahu bashanah hashelishit leimor lekh heira'eh 'el 'akh'ab ve'etenah matar 'al penei ha'adamah. 1_kings 18:2	vayeilekh 'eiliyahu leheira'ot 'el 'akh'ab vehara'ab khazaq beshomeron. 1_kings 18:3	vayiqra 'akh'ab 'el 'obadyahu 'asher 'al habayit ve'obadyahu hayah yarei 'et yhvh me'od. 1_kings 18:4	vayhi behakhrit 'izebel 'et nebi'ei yhvh vayiqakh 'obadyahu mei'ah nebi'im vayakhbi'em khamishim 'ish bame'arah vekhilkelam lekhem vamayim. 1_kings 18:5	vayomer 'akh'ab 'el 'obadyahu lekh ba'arez 'el kal ma'yenei hamayim ve'el kal hanekhalim 'ulai nimza khazir unekhayeh sus vafered velo nakhrit meihabeheimah. 1_kings 18:6	vaykhalequ lahem 'et ha'arez la'abar bah 'akh'ab halakh bederekh 'ekhad lebado ve'obadyahu halakh bederekh 'ekhad lebado. 1_kings 18:7	vayhi 'obadyahu baderekh vehineh 'eiliyahu liqrato vayakireihu vayipol 'al panav vayomer ha'atah zeh 'adoni 'eiliyahu. 1_kings 18:8	vayomer lo 'ani lekh 'emor ladonekha hineh 'eiliyahu. 1_kings 18:9	vayomer meh khatati ki 'atah noten 'et 'abdekha beyad 'akh'ab lahamiteini. 1_kings 18:10	khai yhvh 'elohekha 'im yesh go umamlakhah 'asher lo shalakh 'adoni sham lebaqeshkha ve'ameru 'ayin vehishbia' 'et hamamlakhah ve'et hago ki lo yimza'ekah. 1_kings 18:11	ve'atah 'atah 'omer lekh 'emor ladonekha hineh 'eiliyahu. 1_kings 18:12	vehayah 'ani 'eilekh mei'itakh veruakh yhvh yisa'akha 'al 'asher lo 'eida' ubati lehagid le'akh'ab velo yimza'akha vaharagani ve'abdekha yarei 'et yhvh mine'urai. 1_kings 18:13	halo hugad ladoni 'et 'asher 'asiti baharog 'izebel 'et nebi'ei yhvh va'akhbi minebi'ei yhvh mei'ah 'ish khamishim khamishim 'ish bame'arah va'akhalkelem lekhem vamayim. 1_kings 18:14	ve'atah 'atah 'omer lekh 'emor ladonekha hineh 'eiliyahu vaharagani. 1_kings 18:15	vayomer 'eiliyahu khai yhvh zeba'ot 'asher 'amadti lefanav ki hayom 'eira'eh 'eilav. 1_kings 18:16	vayeilekh 'obadyahu liqrat 'akh'ab vayaged lo vayeilekh 'akh'ab liqrat 'eiliyahu. 1_kings 18:17	vayhi kir'ot 'akh'ab 'et 'eiliyahu vayomer 'akh'ab 'eilav ha'atah zeh 'okher yisra'el. 1_kings 18:18	vayomer lo 'akharti 'et yisra'el ki 'im 'atah ubet 'abikha ba'azabekhem 'et mizvot yhvh vateilekh 'akharei habe'alim. 1_kings 18:19	ve'atah shelakh qeboz 'eilai 'et kal yisra'el 'el har hakarmel ve'et nebi'ei haba'al 'arba' mei'ot vakhamishim unebi'ei ha'asheirah 'arba' mei'ot 'okhelei shulkhan 'izabel. 1_kings 18:20	vayishlakh 'akh'ab bekhal benei yisra'el vayiqboz 'et hanebi'im 'el har hakarmel. 1_kings 18:21	vayigash 'eiliyahu 'el kal ha'am vayomer 'ad matai 'atem posekhim 'al shetei hase'ipim 'im yhvh ha'elohim lekhu 'akharav ve'im haba'al lekhu 'akharav velo 'anu ha'am 'oto dabar. 1_kings 18:22	vayomer 'eiliyahu 'el ha'am 'ani notarti nabi yhvh lebadi unebi'ei haba'al 'arba' mei'ot vakhamishim 'ish. 1_kings 18:23	veyitenu lanu shenayim parim veyibkharu lahem hapar ha'ekhad vinatekhuhu veyasimu 'al ha'eizim ve'esh lo yasimu va'ani 'e'eseh 'et hapar ha'ekhad venatati 'al ha'eizim ve'esh lo 'asim. 1_kings 18:24	uqeratem beshem 'eloheikhem va'ani 'eqra beshem yhvh vehayah ha'elohim 'asher ya'aneh ba'esh hu ha'elohim vaya'an kal ha'am vayomeru tob hadabar. 1_kings 18:25	vayomer 'eiliyahu linbi'ei haba'al bakharu lakhem hapar ha'ekhad va'asu rishonah ki 'atem harabim veqir'u beshem 'eloheikhem ve'esh lo tasimu. 1_kings 18:26	vayiqkhu 'et hapar 'asher natan lahem vaya'asu vayiqre'u beshem haba'al meihaboqer ve'ad hazahorayim leimor haba'al 'aneinu ve'en qol ve'en 'oneh vayfasekhu 'al hamizbeiakh 'asher 'asah. 1_kings 18:27	vayhi bazahorayim vayhatel bahem 'eiliyahu vayomer qir'u beqol gadol ki 'elohim hu ki siakh vekhi sig lo vekhi derekh lo 'ulai yashen hu veyiqaz. 1_kings 18:28	vayiqre'u beqol gadol vayitgodedu kemishpatam bakharabot ubaremakhim 'ad shefakh dam 'aleihem. 1_kings 18:29	vayhi ka'abor hazahorayim vayitnabe'u 'ad la'alot haminkhah ve'en qol ve'en 'oneh ve'en qasheb. 1_kings 18:30	vayomer 'eiliyahu lekhal ha'am geshu 'eilai vayigeshu khal ha'am 'eilav vayrapei 'et mizbakh yhvh heharus. 1_kings 18:31	vayiqakh 'eiliyahu shetem 'esreh 'abanim kemispar shibtei benei ya'aqob 'asher hayah debar yhvh 'eilav leimor yisra'el yihyeh shemekha. 1_kings 18:32	vayibneh 'et ha'abanim mizbeiakh beshem yhvh vaya'as te'alah kebet satayim zera' sabib lamizbeiakh. 1_kings 18:33	vaya'arokh 'et ha'eizim vaynatakh 'et hapar vayasem 'al ha'eizim. 1_kings 18:34	vayomer mil'u 'arba'ah khadim mayim veyizqu 'al ha'olah ve'al ha'eizim vayomer shenu vayishnu vayomer shaleishu vayshaleishu. 1_kings 18:35	vayeilekhu hamayim sabib lamizbeiakh vegam 'et hate'alah milei mayim. 1_kings 18:36	vayhi ba'alot haminkhah vayigash 'eiliyahu hanabi vayomar yhvh 'elohei 'abraham yizkhaq veyisra'el hayom yivada' ki 'atah 'elohim beyisra'el va'ani 'abdekha ubedibreikha ubidbarekha 'asiti 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. 1_kings 18:37	'aneini yhvh 'aneini veyeide'u ha'am hazeh ki 'atah yhvh ha'elohim ve'atah hasibota 'et libam 'akhoranit. 1_kings 18:38	vatipol 'esh yhvh vatokhal 'et ha'olah ve'et ha'eizim ve'et ha'abanim ve'et he'afar ve'et hamayim 'asher bate'alah likheikhah. 1_kings 18:39	vayar kal ha'am vayipelu 'al peneihem vayomeru yhvh hu ha'elohim yhvh hu ha'elohim. 1_kings 18:40	vayomer 'eiliyahu lahem tifsu 'et nebi'ei haba'al 'ish 'al yimalet meihem vayitpesum vayoridem 'eiliyahu 'el nakhal qishon vayishkhatem sham. 1_kings 18:41	vayomer 'eiliyahu le'akh'ab 'aleh 'ekhol usheteh ki qol hamon hagashem. 1_kings 18:42	vaya'aleh 'akh'ab le'ekhol velishtot ve'eiliyahu 'alah 'el rosh hakarmel vayighar 'arzah vayasem panav ben berakho birkav. 1_kings 18:43	vayomer 'el na'aro 'aleh na habet derekh yam vaya'al vayabet vayomer 'en me'umah vayomer shub sheba' pe'amim. 1_kings 18:44	vayhi bashebi'it vayomer hineh 'ab qetanah kekhaf 'ish 'olah miyam vayomer 'aleh 'emor 'el 'akh'ab 'esor vared velo ya'azarekhah hagashem. 1_kings 18:45	vayhi 'ad koh ve'ad koh vehashamayim hitqaderu 'abim veruakh vayhi geshem gadol vayirkab 'akh'ab vayeilekh yizre'elah. 1_kings 18:46	veyad yhvh hayetah 'el 'eiliyahu vayshanes matenav vayaraz lifnei 'akh'ab 'ad bo'akhah yizre'elah. 1_kings 19:1	vayaged 'akh'ab le'izebel 'et kal 'asher 'asah 'eiliyahu ve'et kal 'asher harag 'et kal hanebi'im bekhareb. 1_kings 19:2	vatishlakh 'izebel mal'akh 'el 'eiliyahu leimor koh ya'asun 'elohim vekhoh yosifun ki kha'et makhar 'asim 'et nafshekha kenefesh 'akhad meihem. 1_kings 19:3	vayar vayaqam vayeilekh 'el nafsho vayabo be'er sheba' 'asher lihudah vayanakh 'et na'aro sham. 1_kings 19:4	vehu halakh bamidbar derekh yom vayabo vayeisheb takhat rotem 'ekhat 'ekhad vayish'al 'et nafsho lamut vayomer rab 'atah yhvh qakh nafshi ki lo tob 'anokhi mei'abotai. 1_kings 19:5	vayishkab vayishan takhat rotem 'ekhad vehineh zeh mal'akh nogeia' bo vayomer lo qum 'ekhol. 1_kings 19:6	vayabet vehineh mera'ashotav 'ugat rezafim vezapakhat mayim vayokhal vayeishet vayashab vayishkab. 1_kings 19:7	vayashab mal'akh yhvh sheinit vayiga' bo vayomer qum 'ekhol ki rab mimekha hadarekh. 1_kings 19:8	vayaqam vayokhal vayishteh vayeilekh bekhoakh ha'akhilah hahi 'arba'im yom ve'arba'im laylah 'ad har ha'elohim khoreb. 1_kings 19:9	vayabo sham 'el hame'arah vayalen sham vehineh debar yhvh 'eilav vayomer lo mah lekha foh 'eiliyahu. 1_kings 19:10	vayomer qano qineiti yhvh 'elohei zeba'ot ki 'azebu beritekha benei yisra'el 'et mizbekhotekha harasu ve'et nebi'ekha haregu bekhareb va'ivater 'ani lebadi vaybaqshu 'et nafshi leqakhtah. 1_kings 19:11	vayomer zei ve'amadta bahar lifnei yhvh vehineh yhvh 'ober veruakh gedolah vekhazaq mefareq harim umeshaber sela'im lifnei yhvh lo baruakh yhvh ve'akhar haruakh ra'ash lo bara'ash yhvh. 1_kings 19:12	ve'akhar hara'ash 'esh lo ba'esh yhvh ve'akhar ha'esh qol demamah daqah. 1_kings 19:13	vayhi kishmoa' 'eiliyahu vayalet panav be'adarto vayeizei vaya'amod petakh hame'arah vehineh 'eilav qol vayomer mah lekha foh 'eiliyahu. 1_kings 19:14	vayomer qano qineiti yhvh 'elohei zeba'ot ki 'azebu beritekha benei yisra'el 'et mizbekhotekha harasu ve'et nebi'ekha haregu bekhareb va'ivater 'ani lebadi vaybaqshu 'et nafshi leqakhtah. 1_kings 19:15	vayomer yhvh 'eilav lekh shub ledarkekha midbarah damaseq ubata umashakhta 'et khaza'el lemelekh 'al 'aram. 1_kings 19:16	ve'et yeihu ben nimshi timshakh lemelekh 'al yisra'el ve'et 'elisha' ben shafat mei'abel mekholah timshakh lenabi takhtekha. 1_kings 19:17	vehayah hanimlat meikhereb khaza'el yamit yeihu vehanimlat meikhereb yeihu yamit 'elisha'. 1_kings 19:18	vehish'arti beyisra'el shib'at 'alafim kal habirkayim 'asher lo khare'u laba'al vekhal hapeh 'asher lo nashaq lo. 1_kings 19:19	vayeilekh misham vayimza 'et 'elisha' ben shafat vehu khoresh shenem 'asar zemadim lefanav vehu bishnem he'asar vaya'abor 'eiliyahu 'eilav vayashlekh 'adarto 'eilav. 1_kings 19:20	vaya'azob 'et habaqar vayaraz 'akharei 'eiliyahu vayomer 'esheqah na le'abi ule'imi ve'eilekhah 'akharekha vayomer lo lekh shub ki meh 'asiti lakh. 1_kings 19:21	vayashab mei'akharav vayiqakh 'et zemed habaqar vayizbakheihu ubikhli habaqar bishelam habasar vayiten la'am vayokheilu vayaqam vayeilekh 'akharei 'eiliyahu vayshareteihu. 1_kings 20:1	uben hadad melekh 'aram qabaz 'et kal kheilo usheloshim ushenayim melekh 'ito vesus varakheb vaya'al vayazar 'al shomeron vayilakhem bah. 1_kings 20:2	vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el ha'irah. 1_kings 20:3	vayomer lo koh 'amar ben hadad kaspekha uzehabekha li hu venashekha ubanekha hatobim li hem. 1_kings 20:4	vaya'an melekh yisra'el vayomer kidbarekha 'adoni hamelekh lekha 'ani vekhal 'asher li. 1_kings 20:5	vayashubu hamal'akhim vayomeru koh 'amar ben hadad leimor ki shalakhti 'eilekha leimor kaspekha uzehabekha venashekha ubanekha li titen. 1_kings 20:6	ki 'im ka'et makhar 'eshlakh 'et 'abadai 'eilekha vekhipesu 'et beitekha ve'et batei 'abadekha vehayah kal makhmad 'einekha yasimu beyadam velaqakhu. 1_kings 20:7	vayiqra melekh yisra'el lekhal ziqnei ha'arez vayomer de'u na ure'u ki ra'ah zeh mebaqesh ki shalakh 'eilai lenashai ulebanai ulekhaspi velizhabi velo mana'ti mimenu. 1_kings 20:8	vayomeru 'eilav kal hazeqeinim vekhal ha'am 'al tishma' velo tobeh. 1_kings 20:9	vayomer lemal'akhei ben hadad 'imru ladoni hamelekh kol 'asher shalakhta 'el 'abdekha barishonah 'e'eseh vehadabar hazeh lo 'ukhal la'asot vayeilekhu hamal'akhim vayshibuhu dabar. 1_kings 20:10	vayishlakh 'eilav ben hadad vayomer koh ya'asun li 'elohim vekhoh yosifu 'im yispoq 'afar shomeron lish'alim lekhal ha'am 'asher beraglai. 1_kings 20:11	vaya'an melekh yisra'el vayomer daberu 'al yithalel khoger kimfateiakh. 1_kings 20:12	vayhi kishmoa' 'et hadabar hazeh vehu shoteh hu vehamelakhim basukot vayomer 'el 'abadav simu vayasimu 'al ha'ir. 1_kings 20:13	vehineh nabi 'ekhad nigash 'el 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el vayomer koh 'amar yhvh hera'ita 'et kal hehamon hagadol hazeh hini noteno beyadekha hayom veyada'ta ki 'ani yhvh. 1_kings 20:14	vayomer 'akh'ab bemi vayomer koh 'amar yhvh bena'arei sarei hamedinot vayomer mi ye'sor hamilkhamah vayomer 'atah. 1_kings 20:15	vayifqod 'et na'arei sarei hamedinot vayihyu matayim shenayim usheloshim ve'akhareihem paqad 'et kal ha'am kal benei yisra'el shib'at 'alafim. 1_kings 20:16	vayeize'u bazahorayim uben hadad shoteh shikor basukot hu vehamelakhim sheloshim ushenayim melekh 'ozer 'oto. 1_kings 20:17	vayeize'u na'arei sarei hamedinot barishonah vayishlakh ben hadad vayagidu lo leimor 'anashim yaze'u mishomeron. 1_kings 20:18	vayomer 'im leshalom yaza'u tifsum khayim ve'im lemilkhamah yaza'u khayim tifsum. 1_kings 20:19	ve'eleh yaze'u min ha'ir na'arei sarei hamedinot vehakhayil 'asher 'akhareihem. 1_kings 20:20	vayaku 'ish 'isho vayanusu 'aram vayirdefem yisra'el vayimalet ben hadad melekh 'aram 'al sus ufarashim. 1_kings 20:21	vayeizei melekh yisra'el vayakh 'et hasus ve'et harakheb vehikah ba'aram makah gedolah. 1_kings 20:22	vayigash hanabi 'el melekh yisra'el vayomer lo lekh hitkhazaq veda' ure'eh 'et 'asher ta'aseh ki litshubat hashanah melekh 'aram 'oleh 'alekha. 1_kings 20:23	ve'abdei melekh 'aram 'ameru 'eilav 'elohei harim 'eloheihem 'al ken khazequ mimenu ve'ulam nilakhem 'itam bamishor 'im lo nekhezaq meihem. 1_kings 20:24	ve'et hadabar hazeh 'aseh haser hamelakhim 'ish mimeqomo vesim pakhot takhteihem. 1_kings 20:25	ve'atah timneh lekha khayil kakhayil hanofel mei'otakh vesus kasus verekheb karekheb venilakhamah 'otam bamishor 'im lo nekhezaq meihem vayishma' leqolam vaya'as ken. 1_kings 20:26	vayhi litshubat hashanah vayifqod ben hadad 'et 'aram vaya'al 'afeiqah lamilkhamah 'im yisra'el. 1_kings 20:27	ubenei yisra'el hatepaqedu vekhalekelu vayeilekhu liqratam vayakhanu benei yisra'el negdam kishnei khasifei 'izim va'aram mil'u 'et ha'arez. 1_kings 20:28	vayigash 'ish ha'elohim vayomer 'el melekh yisra'el vayomer koh 'amar yhvh ya'an 'asher 'ameru 'aram 'elohei harim yhvh velo 'elohei 'amaqim hu venatati 'et kal hehamon hagadol hazeh beyadekha vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. 1_kings 20:29	vayakhanu 'eleh nokhakh 'eleh shib'at yamim vayhi bayom hashebi'i vatiqrab hamilkhamah vayaku benei yisra'el 'et 'aram mei'ah 'elef ragli beyom 'ekhad. 1_kings 20:30	vayanusu hanotarim 'afeiqah 'el ha'ir vatipol hakhomah 'al 'esrim veshib'ah 'elef 'ish hanotarim uben hadad nas vayabo 'el ha'ir kheder bekhader. 1_kings 20:31	vayomeru 'eilav 'abadav hineh na shama'nu ki malkhei bet yisra'el ki malkhei khesed hem nasimah na saqim bemateneinu vakhabalim berosheinu veneizei 'el melekh yisra'el 'ulai yekhayeh 'et nafshekha. 1_kings 20:32	vayakhgeru saqim bemateneihem vakhabalim berasheihem vayabo'u 'el melekh yisra'el vayomeru 'abdekha ben hadad 'amar tekhi na nafshi vayomer ha'odenu khai 'akhi hu. 1_kings 20:33	veha'anashim yenakhashu vaymaharu vayakhletu hamimenu vayomeru 'akhikha ben hadad vayomer bo'u qakhuhu vayeizei 'eilav ben hadad vaya'aleihu 'al hamerkabah. 1_kings 20:34	vayomer 'eilav he'arim 'asher laqakh 'abi mei'et 'abikha 'ashib vekhuzot tasim lekha bedameseq ka'asher sam 'abi beshomeron va'ani baberit 'ashalekheka vayikhrat lo berit vayshalekheihu. 1_kings 20:35	ve'ish 'ekhad mibenei hanebi'im 'amar 'el rei'eihu bidbar yhvh hakeini na vayma'en ha'ish lehakoto. 1_kings 20:36	vayomer lo ya'an 'asher lo shama'ta beqol yhvh hinekha holekh mei'iti vehikekha ha'aryeh vayeilekh mei'ezlo vayimza'eihu ha'aryeh vayakeihu. 1_kings 20:37	vayimza 'ish 'akher vayomer hakeini na vayakeihu ha'ish hakeh ufazoa'. 1_kings 20:38	vayeilekh hanabi vaya'amod lamelekh 'al hadarekh vayitkhapes ba'afer 'al 'einav. 1_kings 20:39	vayhi hamelekh 'ober vehu za'aq 'el hamelekh vayomer 'abdekha yaza beqereb hamilkhamah vehineh 'ish sar vayabei 'eilai 'ish vayomer shemor 'et ha'ish hazeh 'im hipaqed yipaqed vehayetah nafshekha takhat nafsho 'o khikar kesef tishqol. 1_kings 20:40	vayhi 'abdekha 'oseh henah vahenah vehu 'einenu vayomer 'eilav melekh yisra'el ken mishpatekha 'atah kharazeta. 1_kings 20:41	vaymaher vayasar 'et ha'afer mei'al mei'alei 'einav vayaker 'oto melekh yisra'el ki meihanebi'im hu. 1_kings 20:42	vayomer 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh ya'an shilakhta 'et 'ish khermi miyad vehayetah nafshekha takhat nafsho ve'amekha takhat 'amo. 1_kings 20:43	vayeilekh melekh yisra'el 'al beito sar veza'ef vayabo shomeronah. 1_kings 21:1	vayhi 'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh kerem hayah lenabot hayizre'eili 'asher beyizre'el 'eizel heikhal 'akh'ab melekh shomeron. 1_kings 21:2	vaydaber 'akh'ab 'el nabot leimor tenah li 'et karmekha vihi li legan yaraq ki hu qarob 'eizel beiti ve'etenah lekha takhtav kerem tob mimenu 'im tob be'einekha 'etenah lekha khesef mekhir zeh. 1_kings 21:3	vayomer nabot 'el 'akh'ab khalilah li yhvh mititi 'et nakhalat 'abotai lakh. 1_kings 21:4	vayabo 'akh'ab 'el beito sar veza'ef 'al hadabar 'asher diber 'eilav nabot hayizre'eili vayomer lo 'eten lekha 'et nakhalat 'abotai vayishkab 'al mitato vayaseb 'et panav velo 'akhal lakhem. 1_kings 21:5	vatabo 'eilav 'izebel 'ishto vatedaber 'eilav mah zeh rukhakha sarah ve'einekha 'okhel lakhem. 1_kings 21:6	vaydaber 'eileha ki 'adaber 'el nabot hayizre'eili va'omar lo tenah li 'et karmekha bekhesef 'o 'im khafez 'atah 'etenah lekha kherem takhtav vayomer lo 'eten lekha 'et karmi. 1_kings 21:7	vatomer 'eilav 'izebel 'ishto 'atah 'atah ta'aseh melukhah 'al yisra'el qum 'ekhal lekhem veyitab libekha 'ani 'eten lekha 'et kerem nabot hayizre'eili. 1_kings 21:8	vatikhtob sefarim beshem 'akh'ab vatakhtom bekhotamo vatishlakh hasfarim sefarim 'el hazqeinim ve'el hakhorim 'asher be'iro hayoshebim 'et nabot. 1_kings 21:9	vatikhtob basefarim leimor qir'u zom vehoshibu 'et nabot berosh ha'am. 1_kings 21:10	vehoshibu shenayim 'anashim benei beliya'al negdo vi'iduhu leimor beirakhta 'elohim vamelekh vehozi'uhu vesiqluhu veyamot. 1_kings 21:11	vaya'asu 'anshei 'iro hazeqeinim vehakhorim 'asher hayoshebim be'iro ka'asher shalekhah 'aleihem 'izabel ka'asher katub basefarim 'asher shalekhah 'aleihem. 1_kings 21:12	qare'u zom vehoshibu 'et nabot berosh ha'am. 1_kings 21:13	vayabo'u shenei ha'anashim benei beliya'al vayeishebu negdo vai'iduhu 'anshei habeliya'al 'et nabot neged ha'am leimor beirakh nabot 'elohim vamelekh vayozi'uhu mikhuz la'ir vayisqeluhu ba'abanim vayamot. 1_kings 21:14	vayishlekhu 'el 'izebel leimor suqal nabot vayamot. 1_kings 21:15	vayhi kishmoa' 'izebel ki suqal nabot vayamot vatomer 'izebel 'el 'akh'ab qum resh 'et kerem nabot hayizre'eili 'asher mei'en latet lekha bekhesef ki 'en nabot khai ki met. 1_kings 21:16	vayhi kishmoa' 'akh'ab ki met nabot vayaqam 'akh'ab laredet 'el kerem nabot hayizre'eili lerishto. 1_kings 21:17	vayhi debar yhvh 'el 'eiliyahu hatishbi leimor. 1_kings 21:18	qum red liqrat 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el 'asher beshomeron hineh bekherem nabot 'asher yarad sham lerishto. 1_kings 21:19	vedibarta 'eilav leimor koh 'amar yhvh harazakhta vegam yarasheta vedibarta 'eilav leimor koh 'amar yhvh bimqom 'asher laqequ hakelabim 'et dam nabot yaloqu hakelabim 'et damekha gam 'atah. 1_kings 21:20	vayomer 'akh'ab 'el 'eiliyahu hamzatani 'oyebi vayomer mazati ya'an hitmakerkha la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh. 1_kings 21:21	hini meibi meibi 'eilekha ra'ah ubi'arti 'akharekha vehikhrati le'akh'ab mashtin beqir ve'azur ve'azub beyisra'el. 1_kings 21:22	venatati 'et beitekha kebet yarabe'am ben nebat ukhebet ba'sha ben 'akhiyah 'el haka'as 'asher hikh'asta vatakhati 'et yisra'el. 1_kings 21:23	vegam le'izebel diber yhvh leimor hakelabim yokhelu 'et 'izebel bekhel yizre'el. 1_kings 21:24	hamet le'akh'ab ba'ir yokhelu hakelabim vehamet basadeh yokhelu 'of hashamayim. 1_kings 21:25	raq lo hayah khe'akh'ab 'asher hitmaker la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh 'asher heisatah 'oto 'izebel 'ishto. 1_kings 21:26	vayat'eb me'od lalekhet 'akharei hagilulim kekhol 'asher 'asu ha'emori 'asher horish yhvh mipenei benei yisra'el. 1_kings 21:27	vayhi khishmoa' 'akh'ab 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayiqra' begadav vayasem saq 'al besaro vayazom vayishkab basaq vayhalekh 'at. 1_kings 21:28	vayhi debar yhvh 'el 'eiliyahu hatishbi leimor. 1_kings 21:29	hara'ita ki nikhna' 'akh'ab milefanai ya'an ki nikhna' mipanai lo 'abi 'abi hara'ah beyamav bimei beno 'abi hara'ah 'al beito. 1_kings 22:1	vayeishebu shalosh shanim 'en milkhamah ben 'aram uben yisra'el. 1_kings 22:2	vayhi bashanah hashelishit vayeired yehoshafat melekh yehudah 'el melekh yisra'el. 1_kings 22:3	vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el 'abadav hayda'tem ki lanu ramot gil'ad va'anakhnu makhshim miqakhat 'otah miyad melekh 'aram. 1_kings 22:4	vayomer 'el yehoshafat hateilekh 'iti lamilkhamah ramot gil'ad vayomer yehoshafat 'el melekh yisra'el kamoni khamokha ke'ami khe'amekha kesusai kesusekha. 1_kings 22:5	vayomer yehoshafat 'el melekh yisra'el derash na khayom 'et debar yhvh. 1_kings 22:6	vayiqboz melekh yisra'el 'et hanebi'im ke'arba' mei'ot 'ish vayomer 'aleihem ha'eilekh 'al ramot gil'ad lamilkhamah 'im 'ekhdal vayomeru 'aleh veyiten 'adonai beyad hamelekh. 1_kings 22:7	vayomer yehoshafat ha'en poh nabi yhvh 'od venidreshah mei'oto. 1_kings 22:8	vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat 'od 'ish 'ekhad lidrosh 'et yhvh mei'oto va'ani seneitiv ki lo yitnabei 'alai tob ki 'im ra' mikhayehu ben yimlah vayomer yehoshafat 'al yomar hamelekh ken. 1_kings 22:9	vayiqra melekh yisra'el 'el saris 'ekhad vayomer maharah mikhayehu ben yimlah. 1_kings 22:10	umelekh yisra'el vihoshafat melekh yehudah yoshebim 'ish 'al kis'o melubashim begadim begoren petakh sha'ar shomeron vekhal hanebi'im mitnabe'im lifneihem. 1_kings 22:11	vaya'as lo zidqiyah ben kena'anah qarnei barzel vayomer koh 'amar yhvh be'eleh tenagakh 'et 'aram 'ad kalotam. 1_kings 22:12	vekhal hanebi'im nibe'im ken leimor 'aleh ramot gil'ad vehazlakh venatan yhvh beyad hamelekh. 1_kings 22:13	vehamal'akh 'asher halakh liqro mikhayehu diber 'eilav leimor hineh na dibrei hanebi'im peh 'ekhad tob 'el hamelekh yehi na dibreikha debarekha kidbar 'akhad meihem vedibarta tob. 1_kings 22:14	vayomer mikhayehu khai yhvh ki 'et 'asher yomar yhvh 'eilai 'oto 'adaber. 1_kings 22:15	vayabo 'el hamelekh vayomer hamelekh 'eilav mikhayehu haneilekh 'el ramot gil'ad lamilkhamah 'im nekhdal vayomer 'eilav 'aleh vehazlakh venatan yhvh beyad hamelekh. 1_kings 22:16	vayomer 'eilav hamelekh 'ad kameh fe'amim 'ani mashbi'ekha 'asher lo tedaber 'eilai raq 'emet beshem yhvh. 1_kings 22:17	vayomer ra'iti 'et kal yisra'el nefozim 'el heharim kazon 'asher 'en lahem ro'eh vayomer yhvh lo 'adonim la'eleh yashubu 'ish lebeito beshalom. 1_kings 22:18	vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat halo 'amarti 'eilekha lo yitnabei 'alai tob ki 'im ra'. 1_kings 22:19	vayomer lakhen shema' debar yhvh ra'iti 'et yhvh yosheb 'al kis'o vekhal zeba hashamayim 'omed 'alav mimino umisemolo. 1_kings 22:20	vayomer yhvh mi yefateh 'et 'akh'ab veya'al veyipol beramot gil'ad vayomer zeh bekhoh vezeh 'omer bekhoh. 1_kings 22:21	vayeizei haruakh vaya'amod lifnei yhvh vayomer 'ani 'afatenu vayomer yhvh 'eilav bamah. 1_kings 22:22	vayomer 'eizei vehayiti ruakh sheqer befi kal nebi'av vayomer tefateh vegam tukhal zei va'aseh khen. 1_kings 22:23	ve'atah hineh natan yhvh ruakh sheqer befi kal nebi'ekha 'eleh yhvh diber 'alekha ra'ah. 1_kings 22:24	vayigash zidqiyahu ben kena'anah vayakeh 'et mikhayehu 'al halekhi vayomer 'ei zeh 'abar ruakh yhvh mei'iti ledaber 'otakh. 1_kings 22:25	vayomer mikhayehu hinekha ro'eh bayom hahu 'asher tabo kheder bekheder leheikhabeh. 1_kings 22:26	vayomer melekh yisra'el qakh 'et mikhayehu vahashibeihu 'el 'amon sar ha'ir ve'el yo'ash ben hamelekh. 1_kings 22:27	ve'amarta koh 'amar hamelekh simu 'et zeh bet hakele veha'akhiluhu lekhem lakhaz umayim lakhaz 'ad bo'i beshalom. 1_kings 22:28	vayomer mikhayehu 'im shob tashub beshalom lo diber yhvh bi vayomer shim'u 'amim kulam. 1_kings 22:29	vaya'al melekh yisra'el vhoshafat melekh yehudah ramot gil'ad. 1_kings 22:30	vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat hitkhapes vabo bamilkhamah ve'atah lebash begadekha vayitkhapes melekh yisra'el vayabo bamilkhamah. 1_kings 22:31	umelekh 'aram zivah 'et sarei harekheb 'asher lo sheloshim ushenayim leimor lo tilakhamu 'et qaton ve'et gadol ki 'im 'et melekh yisra'el lebado. 1_kings 22:32	vayhi kir'ot sarei harekheb 'et yehoshafat vehemah 'ameru 'akh melekh yisra'el hu vayasuru 'alav lehilakhem vayiz'aq yehoshafat. 1_kings 22:33	vayhi kir'ot sarei harekheb ki lo melekh yisra'el hu vayashubu mei'akharav. 1_kings 22:34	ve'ish mashakh baqeshet letumo vayakeh 'et melekh yisra'el ben hadebaqim uben hashiryan vayomer lerakabo hafokh yadekha vehozi'eini min hamakhaneh ki hakholeiti. 1_kings 22:35	vata'aleh hamilkhamah bayom hahu vehamelekh hayah ma'omad bamerkabah nokhakh 'aram vayamat ba'ereb vayizeq dam hamakah 'el kheq harakheb. 1_kings 22:36	vaya'abor harinah bamakhaneh kebo hashemesh leimor 'ish 'el 'iro ve'ish 'el 'arzo. 1_kings 22:37	vayamat hamelekh vayabo shomeron vayiqberu 'et hamelekh beshomeron. 1_kings 22:38	vayishtof 'et harekheb 'al bereikhat shomeron vayaloqu hakelabim 'et damo vehazonot rakhazu kidbar yhvh 'asher diber. 1_kings 22:39	veyeter dibrei 'akh'ab vekhal 'asher 'asah ubet hashen 'asher banah vekhal he'arim 'asher banah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 1_kings 22:40	vayishkab 'akh'ab 'im 'abotav vayimlokh 'akhazyahu beno takhtav. 1_kings 22:41	vihoshafat ben 'asa malakh 'al yehudah bishnat 'arba' le'akh'ab melekh yisra'el. 1_kings 22:42	yehoshafat ben sheloshim vekhamesh shanah bemalekho ve'esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'azubah bat shilkhi. 1_kings 22:43	vayeilekh bekhal derekh 'asa 'abiv lo sar mimenu la'asot hayashar be'einei yhvh. 'akh habamot lo saru 'od ha'am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. 1_kings 22:44	vayashlem yehoshafat 'im melekh yisra'el. 1_kings 22:45	veyeter dibrei yehoshafat ugeburato 'asher 'asah va'asher nilkham halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 1_kings 22:46	veyeter haqadesh 'asher nish'ar bimei 'asa 'abiv bi'er min ha'arez. 1_kings 22:47	umelekh 'en be'edom nizab melekh. 1_kings 22:48	yehoshafat 'asar 'asah 'oniyot tarshish lalekhet 'ofirah lazahab velo halakh ki nishberah nishberu 'oniyot be'ezyon gaber. 1_kings 22:49	'az 'amar 'akhazyahu ben 'akh'ab 'el yehoshafat yeilekhu 'abadai 'im 'abadekha ba'oniyot velo 'abah yehoshafat. 1_kings 22:50	vayishkab yehoshafat 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david 'abiv vayimlokh yehoram beno takhtav. 1_kings 22:51	'akhazyahu ben 'akh'ab malakh 'al yisra'el beshomeron bishnat sheba' 'esreh lihoshafat melekh yehudah vayimlokh 'al yisra'el shenatayim. 1_kings 22:52	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh vayeilekh bederekh 'abiv ubederekh 'imo ubederekh yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. 1_kings 22:53	vaya'abod 'et haba'al vayishtakhaveh lo vayakh'es 'et yhvh 'elohei yisra'el kekhol 'asher 'asah 'abiv. 

2_kings 1:1	vayifsha' mo'ab beyisra'el 'akharei mot 'akh'ab. 2_kings 1:2	vayipol 'akhazyah be'ad hasebakhah ba'aliyato 'asher beshomeron vayakhal vayishlakh mal'akhim vayomer 'aleihem lekhu dirshu beba'al zebub 'elohei 'eqron 'im 'ekhyeh meikholi zeh. 2_kings 1:3	umal'akh yhvh diber 'el 'eiliyah hatishbi qum 'aleh liqrat mal'akhei melekh shomeron vedaber 'aleihem hamibeli 'en 'elohim beyisra'el 'atem holekhim lidrosh beba'al zebub 'elohei 'eqron. 2_kings 1:4	velakhen koh 'amar yhvh hamitah 'asher 'alita sham lo teired mimenah ki mot tamut vayeilekh 'eiliyah. 2_kings 1:5	vayashubu hamal'akhim 'eilav vayomer 'aleihem mah zeh shabtem. 2_kings 1:6	vayomeru 'eilav 'ish 'alah liqrateinu vayomer 'eileinu lekhu shubu 'el hamelekh 'asher shalakh 'etkhem vedibartem 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh hamibeli 'en 'elohim beyisra'el 'atah sholeiakh lidrosh beba'al zebub 'elohei 'eqron lakhen hamitah 'asher 'alita sham lo teired mimenah ki mot tamut. 2_kings 1:7	vaydaber 'aleihem meh mishpat ha'ish 'asher 'alah liqratkhem vaydaber 'aleikhem 'et hadebarim ha'eleh. 2_kings 1:8	vayomeru 'eilav 'ish ba'al sei'ar ve'eizor 'or 'azur bematenav vayomar 'eiliyah hatishbi hu. 2_kings 1:9	vayishlakh 'eilav sar khamishim vakhamishav vaya'al 'eilav vehineh yosheb 'al rosh hahar vaydaber 'eilav 'ish ha'elohim hamelekh diber reidah. 2_kings 1:10	vaya'aneh 'eiliyahu vaydaber 'el sar hakhamishim ve'im 'ish 'elohim 'ani teired 'esh min hashamayim vetokhal 'otekha ve'et khamishekha vateired 'esh min hashamayim vatokhal 'oto ve'et khamishav. 2_kings 1:11	vayashab vayishlakh 'eilav sar khamishim 'akher vakhamishav vaya'an vaydaber 'eilav 'ish ha'elohim koh 'amar hamelekh meheirah reidah. 2_kings 1:12	vaya'an 'eiliyah vaydaber 'aleihem 'im 'ish ha'elohim 'ani teired 'esh min hashamayim vetokhal 'otekha ve'et khamishekha vateired 'esh 'elohim min hashamayim vatokhal 'oto ve'et khamishav. 2_kings 1:13	vayashab vayishlakh sar khamishim shelishim vakhamishav vaya'al vayabo sar hakhamishim hashelishi vayikhra' 'al birkav leneged 'eiliyahu vayitkhanen 'eilav vaydaber 'eilav 'ish ha'elohim tiqar na nafshi venefesh 'abadekha 'eleh khamishim be'einekha. 2_kings 1:14	hineh yaredah 'esh min hashamayim vatokhal 'et shenei sarei hakhamishim harishonim ve'et khamisheihem ve'atah tiqar nafshi be'einekha. 2_kings 1:15	vaydaber mal'akh yhvh 'el 'eiliyahu red 'oto 'al tira mipanav vayaqam vayeired 'oto 'el hamelekh. 2_kings 1:16	vaydaber 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh ya'an 'asher shalakhta mal'akhim lidrosh beba'al zebub 'elohei 'eqron hamibeli 'en 'elohim beyisra'el lidrosh bidbaro lakhen hamitah 'asher 'alita sham lo teired mimenah ki mot tamut. 2_kings 1:17	vayamat kidbar yhvh 'asher diber 'eiliyahu vayimlokh yehoram takhtav bishnat shetayim lihoram ben yehoshafat melekh yehudah ki lo hayah lo ben. 2_kings 1:18	veyeter dibrei 'akhazyahu 'asher 'asah halo hemah khetubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 2:1	vayhi beha'alot yhvh 'et 'eiliyahu bas'arah hashamayim vayeilekh 'eiliyahu ve'elisha' min hagilgal. 2_kings 2:2	vayomer 'eiliyahu 'el 'elisha' sheb na foh ki yhvh shelakhani 'ad bet 'el vayomer 'elisha' khai yhvh vekhei nafshekha 'im 'e'ezbeka vayeiredu bet 'el. 2_kings 2:3	vayeize'u benei hanebi'im 'asher bet 'el 'el 'elisha' vayomeru 'eilav hayada'ta ki hayom yhvh loqeiakh 'et 'adonekha mei'al roshekha vayomer gam 'ani yada'ti hekheshu. 2_kings 2:4	vayomer lo 'eiliyahu 'elisha' sheb na foh ki yhvh shelakhani yerikho vayomer khai yhvh vekhei nafshekha 'im 'e'ezbeka vayabo'u yerikho. 2_kings 2:5	vayigeshu benei hanebi'im 'asher birikho 'el 'elisha' vayomeru 'eilav hayada'ta ki hayom yhvh loqeiakh 'et 'adonekha mei'al roshekha vayomer gam 'ani yada'ti hekheshu. 2_kings 2:6	vayomer lo 'eiliyahu sheb na foh ki yhvh shelakhani hayardeinah vayomer khai yhvh vekhei nafshekha 'im 'e'ezbeka vayeilekhu sheneihem. 2_kings 2:7	vakhamishim 'ish mibenei hanebi'im halekhu vaya'amdu mineged meirakhoq usheneihem 'amedu 'al hayarden. 2_kings 2:8	vayiqakh 'eiliyahu 'et 'adarto vayiglom vayakeh 'et hamayim vayeikhazu henah vahenah vaya'abru sheneihem bekharabah. 2_kings 2:9	vayhi khe'aberam ve'eiliyahu 'amar 'el 'elisha' she'al mah 'e'eseh lakh beterem 'elaqakh mei'imakh vayomer 'elisha' vihi na pi shenayim berukhakha 'eilai. 2_kings 2:10	vayomer hiqshita lish'ol 'im tir'eh 'oti luqakh mei'itakh yehi lekha khen ve'im 'ayin lo yihyeh. 2_kings 2:11	vayhi hemah holekhim halokh vedaber vehineh rekheb 'esh vesusei 'esh vayafridu ben sheneihem vaya'al 'eiliyahu base'arah hashamayim. 2_kings 2:12	ve'elisha' ro'eh vehu meza'eq 'abi 'abi rekheb yisra'el ufarashav velo ra'ahu 'od vayakhazeq bibgadav vayiqra'em lishnayim qera'im. 2_kings 2:13	vayarem 'et 'aderet 'eiliyahu 'asher nafelah mei'alav vayashab vaya'amod 'al sefat hayarden. 2_kings 2:14	vayiqakh 'et 'aderet 'eiliyahu 'asher nafelah mei'alav vayakeh 'et hamayim vayomar 'ayeh yhvh 'elohei 'eiliyahu 'af hu vayakeh 'et hamayim vayeikhazu henah vahenah vaya'abor 'elisha'. 2_kings 2:15	vayir'uhu benei hanebi'im 'asher birikho mineged vayomeru nakhah ruakh 'eiliyahu 'al 'elisha' vayabo'u liqrato vayishtakhavu lo 'arezah. 2_kings 2:16	vayomeru 'eilav hineh na yesh 'et 'abadekha khamishim 'anashim benei khayil yeilekhu na vibaqshu 'et 'adonekha pen nesa'o ruakh yhvh vayashlikheihu be'akhad heharim 'o be'akhat hageya'ot hagei'ayot vayomer lo tishlakhu. 2_kings 2:17	vayifzeru bo 'ad bosh vayomer shelakhu vayishlekhu khamishim 'ish vaybaqshu sheloshah yamim velo meza'uhu. 2_kings 2:18	vayashubu 'eilav vehu yosheb birikho vayomer 'aleihem halo 'amarti 'aleikhem 'al teileikhu. 2_kings 2:19	vayomeru 'anshei ha'ir 'el 'elisha' hineh na moshab ha'ir tob ka'asher 'adoni ro'eh vehamayim ra'im veha'arez meshakalet. 2_kings 2:20	vayomer qekhu li zelokhit khadashah vesimu sham melakh vayiqkhu 'eilav. 2_kings 2:21	vayeizei 'el moza hamayim vayashlekh sham melakh vayomer koh 'amar yhvh ripiti lamayim ha'eleh lo yihyeh misham 'od mavet umeshakalet. 2_kings 2:22	vayeirafu hamayim 'ad hayom hazeh kidbar 'elisha' 'asher diber. 2_kings 2:23	vaya'al misham bet 'el vehu 'oleh baderekh une'arim qetanim yaze'u min ha'ir vayitqalesu bo vayomeru lo 'aleh qeireiakh 'aleh qeireiakh. 2_kings 2:24	vayifen 'akharav vayir'em vayqalem beshem yhvh vateizenah shetayim dubim min haya'ar vatebaqa'nah meihem 'arba'im ushenei yeladim. 2_kings 2:25	vayeilekh misham 'el har hakarmel umisham shab shomeron. 2_kings 3:1	vihoram ben 'akh'ab malakh 'al yisra'el beshomeron bishnat shemoneh 'esreh lihoshafat melekh yehudah vayimlokh shetem 'esreh shanah. 2_kings 3:2	vaya'aseh hara' be'einei yhvh raq lo khe'abiv ukhe'imo vayasar 'et mazebat haba'al 'asher 'asah 'abiv. 2_kings 3:3	raq bekhatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el dabeq lo sar mimenah. 2_kings 3:4	umeisha' melekh mo'ab hayah noqed veheishib lemelekh yisra'el mei'ah 'elef karim umei'ah 'elef 'eilim zamer. 2_kings 3:5	vayhi kemot 'akh'ab vayifsha' melekh mo'ab bemelekh yisra'el. 2_kings 3:6	vayeizei hamelekh yehoram bayom hahu mishomeron vayifqod 'et kal yisra'el. 2_kings 3:7	vayeilekh vayishlakh 'el yehoshafat melekh yehudah leimor melekh mo'ab pasha' bi hateilekh 'iti 'el mo'ab lamilkhamah vayomer 'e'eleh kamoni khamokha ke'ami khe'amekha kesusai kesusekha. 2_kings 3:8	vayomer 'ei zeh haderekh na'aleh vayomer derekh midbar 'edom. 2_kings 3:9	vayeilekh melekh yisra'el umelekh yehudah umelekh 'edom vayasobu derekh shib'at yamim velo hayah mayim lamakhaneh velabeheimah 'asher beragleihem. 2_kings 3:10	vayomer melekh yisra'el 'ahah ki qara yhvh lishloshet hamelakhim ha'eleh latet 'otam beyad mo'ab. 2_kings 3:11	vayomer yehoshafat ha'en poh nabi yhvh venidreshah 'et yhvh mei'oto vaya'an 'ekhad mei'abdei melekh yisra'el vayomer poh 'elisha' ben shafat 'asher yazaq mayim 'al yedei 'eiliyahu. 2_kings 3:12	vayomer yehoshafat yesh 'oto debar yhvh vayeiredu 'eilav melekh yisra'el vihoshafat umelekh 'edom. 2_kings 3:13	vayomer 'elisha' 'el melekh yisra'el mah li valakh lekh 'el nebi'ei 'abikha ve'el nebi'ei 'imekha vayomer lo melekh yisra'el 'al ki qara yhvh lishloshet hamelakhim ha'eleh latet 'otam beyad mo'ab. 2_kings 3:14	vayomer 'elisha' khai yhvh zeba'ot 'asher 'amadti lefanav ki lulei penei yehoshafat melekh yehudah 'ani nosei 'im 'abit 'eilekha ve'im 'er'eka. 2_kings 3:15	ve'atah qekhu li menagen vehayah kenagen hamnagen vatehi 'alav yad yhvh. 2_kings 3:16	vayomer koh 'amar yhvh 'asoh hanakhal hazeh geibim geibim. 2_kings 3:17	ki khoh 'amar yhvh lo tir'u ruakh velo tir'u geshem vehanakhal hahu yimalei mayim ushetitem 'atem umiqneikhem ubehemtekhem. 2_kings 3:18	venaqal zot be'einei yhvh venatan 'et mo'ab beyedkhem. 2_kings 3:19	vehikitem kal 'ir mibzar vekhal 'ir mibkhor vekhal 'ez tob tapilu vekhal ma'yenei mayim tistomu vekhol hakhelqah hatobah takh'ibu ba'abanim. 2_kings 3:20	vayhi baboqer ka'alot haminkhah vehineh mayim ba'im miderekh 'edom vatimalei ha'arez 'et hamayim. 2_kings 3:21	vekhal mo'ab shame'u ki 'alu hamelakhim lehilakhem bam vayiza'aqu mikol khoger khagorah vama'lah vaya'amdu 'al hagebul. 2_kings 3:22	vayashkimu baboqer vehashemesh zarekhah 'al hamayim vayir'u mo'ab mineged 'et hamayim 'adumim kadam. 2_kings 3:23	vayomeru dam zeh hakhoreb nekherbu hamelakhim vayaku 'ish 'et rei'eihu ve'atah lashalal mo'ab. 2_kings 3:24	vayabo'u 'el makhaneh yisra'el vayaqumu yisra'el vayaku 'et mo'ab vayanusu mipeneihem vayabo vayaku bah vehakot 'et mo'ab. 2_kings 3:25	vehe'arim yaharosu vekhal khelqah tobah yashlikhu 'ish 'abno umil'uha vekhal ma'yan mayim yistomu vekhal 'ez tob yapilu 'ad hish'ir 'abaneha baqir kharaset vayasobu haqala'im vayakuha. 2_kings 3:26	vayar melekh mo'ab ki khazaq mimenu hamilkhamah vayiqakh 'oto sheba' mei'ot 'ish sholef khereb lehabqia' 'el melekh 'edom velo yakholu. 2_kings 3:27	vayiqakh 'et beno habekhor 'asher yimlokh takhtav vaya'aleihu 'olah 'al hakhomah vayhi qezef gadol 'al yisra'el vayis'u mei'alav vayashubu la'arez. 2_kings 4:1	ve'ishah 'akhat mineshei benei hanebi'im za'aqah 'el 'elisha' leimor 'abdekha 'ishi met ve'atah yada'ta ki 'abdekha hayah yarei 'et yhvh vehanosheh ba laqakhat 'et shenei yeladai lo la'abadim. 2_kings 4:2	vayomer 'eileha 'elisha' mah 'e'eseh lakh hagidi li mah yesh lekhi lakh babayit vatomer 'en leshifkhatekha khol babayit ki 'im 'asukh shamen. 2_kings 4:3	vayomer lekhi sha'ali lakh keilim min hakhuz mei'et kal shikhnakhei shekheinayikh keilim reiqim 'al tam'iti. 2_kings 4:4	ubat vesagart hadelet ba'adekh ube'ad banayikh veyazaqt 'al kal hakeilim ha'eleh vehamalei tasi'i. 2_kings 4:5	vateilekh mei'ito vatisgor hadelet ba'adah ube'ad baneha hem magishim 'eileha vehi meizaqet mozaqet. 2_kings 4:6	vayhi kimlot hakeilim vatomer 'el benah hagishah 'eilai 'od keli vayomer 'eileha 'en 'od keli vaya'amod hashamen. 2_kings 4:7	vatabo vataged le'ish ha'elohim vayomer lekhi mikhri 'et hashemen veshalemi 'et nishyeikhi nishyekh ve'at beneikhi ubanayikh tikhyi banotar. 2_kings 4:8	vayhi hayom vaya'abor 'elisha' 'el shunem vesham 'ishah gedolah vatakhazeq bo le'ekhal lakhem vayhi midei 'abero yasur shamah le'ekhal lakhem. 2_kings 4:9	vatomer 'el 'ishah hineh na yada'ti ki 'ish 'elohim qadosh hu 'ober 'aleinu tamid. 2_kings 4:10	na'aseh na 'aliyat qir qetanah venasim lo sham mitah veshulkhan vekhisei umenorah vehayah bebo'o 'eileinu yasur shamah. 2_kings 4:11	vayhi hayom vayabo shamah vayasar 'el ha'aliyah vayishkab shamah. 2_kings 4:12	vayomer 'el geikhazi na'aro qera lashunamit hazot vayiqra lah vata'amod lefanav. 2_kings 4:13	vayomer lo 'emar na 'eileha hineh kharadt 'eileinu 'et kal hakharadah hazot meh la'asot lakh hayesh ledaber lakh 'el hamelekh 'o 'el sar hazaba vatomer betokh 'ami 'anokhi yoshabet. 2_kings 4:14	vayomer umeh la'asot lah vayomer geikhazi 'abal ben 'en lah ve'ishah zaqen. 2_kings 4:15	vayomer qera lah vayiqra lah vata'amod bapatakh. 2_kings 4:16	vayomer lamo'ed hazeh ka'et khayah 'ati 'at khobeqet ben vatomer 'al 'adoni 'ish ha'elohim 'al tekhazeb beshifkhatekha. 2_kings 4:17	vatahar ha'ishah vateiled ben lamo'ed hazeh ka'et khayah 'asher diber 'eileha 'elisha'. 2_kings 4:18	vayigdal hayaled vayhi hayom vayeizei 'el 'abiv 'el haqozerim. 2_kings 4:19	vayomer 'el 'abiv roshi roshi vayomer 'el hana'ar sa'eihu 'el 'imo. 2_kings 4:20	vayisa'eihu vaybi'eihu 'el 'imo vayeisheb 'al birkeha 'ad hazahorayim vayamot. 2_kings 4:21	vata'al vatashkibeihu 'al mitat 'ish ha'elohim vatisgor ba'ado vateizei. 2_kings 4:22	vatiqra 'el 'ishah vatomer shilkhah na li 'ekhad min hane'arim ve'akhat ha'atonot ve'aruzah 'ad 'ish ha'elohim ve'ashubah. 2_kings 4:23	vayomer madua' 'ati 'at holakhti holekhet 'eilav hayom lo khodesh velo shabat vatomer shalom. 2_kings 4:24	vatakhabosh ha'aton vatomer 'el na'arah nehag valekh 'al ta'azar li lirkob ki 'im 'amarti lakh. 2_kings 4:25	vateilekh vatabo 'el 'ish ha'elohim 'el har hakarmel vayhi kir'ot 'ish ha'elohim 'otah mineged vayomer 'el geikhazi na'aro hineh hashunamit halaz. 2_kings 4:26	'atah ruz na liqratah ve'emar lah hashalom lakh hashalom le'ishekh hashalom layaled vatomer shalom. 2_kings 4:27	vatabo 'el 'ish ha'elohim 'el hahar vatakhazeq beraglav vayigash geikhazi lehadefah vayomer 'ish ha'elohim harpeh lah ki nafshah marah lah yhvh he'lim mimeni velo higid li. 2_kings 4:28	vatomer hasha'alti ben mei'et 'adoni halo 'amarti lo tashleh 'oti. 2_kings 4:29	vayomer legeikhazi khagor matenekha veqakh mish'anti beyadekha valekh ki timza 'ish lo tebarekhenu vekhi yebarekhkha 'ish lo ta'anenu vesamta mish'anti 'al penei hana'ar. 2_kings 4:30	vatomer 'em hana'ar khai yhvh vekhei nafshekha 'im 'e'ezbeka vayaqam vayeilekh 'akhareha. 2_kings 4:31	vegeikhazi 'abar lifneihem vayasem 'et hamish'enet 'al penei hana'ar ve'en qol ve'en qasheb vayashab liqrato vayaged lo leimor lo heiqiz hana'ar. 2_kings 4:32	vayabo 'elisha' habayetah vehineh hana'ar met mushkab 'al mitato. 2_kings 4:33	vayabo vayisgor hadelet be'ad sheneihem vayitpalel 'el yhvh. 2_kings 4:34	vaya'al vayishkab
