'al hayeled vayasem piv 'al piv ve'einav 'al 'einav vekhapav 'al kapo kapav vayighar 'alav vayakham besar hayaled. 2_kings 4:35	vayashab vayeilekh babayit 'akhat henah ve'akhat henah vaya'al vayighar 'alav vayzorer hana'ar 'ad sheba' pe'amim vayifqakh hana'ar 'et 'einav. 2_kings 4:36	vayiqra 'el geikhazi vayomer qera 'el hashunamit hazot vayiqra'eha vatabo 'eilav vayomer se'i benekh. 2_kings 4:37	vatabo vatipol 'al raglav vatishtakhu 'arezah vatisa 'et benah vateizei. 2_kings 4:38	ve'elisha' shab hagilgalah vehara'ab ba'arez ubenei hanebi'im yoshebim lefanav vayomer lena'aro shefot hasir hagedolah ubashel nazid libnei hanebi'im. 2_kings 4:39	vayeizei 'ekhad 'el hasadeh lelaqet 'orot vayimza gefen sadeh vaylaqet mimenu paqu'ot sadeh melo bigdo vayabo vayfalakh 'el sir hanazid ki lo yada'u. 2_kings 4:40	vayizqu la'anashim le'ekhol vayhi ke'akhelam meihanazid vehemah za'aqu vayomeru mavet basir 'ish ha'elohim velo yakhelu le'ekhol. 2_kings 4:41	vayomer uqekhu qemakh vayashlekh 'el hasir vayomer zaq la'am veyokheilu velo hayah dabar ra' basir. 2_kings 4:42	ve'ish ba miba'al shalishah vayabei le'ish ha'elohim lekhem bikurim 'esrim lekhem se'orim vekharmel beziqlono vayomer ten la'am veyokheilu. 2_kings 4:43	vayomer meshareto mah 'eten zeh lifnei mei'ah 'ish vayomer ten la'am veyokheilu ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'akhol vehoter. 2_kings 4:44	vayiten lifneihem vayokhelu vayotiru kidbar yhvh. 2_kings 5:1	vena'aman sar zeba melekh 'aram hayah 'ish gadol lifnei 'adonav unesu fanim ki bo natan yhvh teshu'ah la'aram veha'ish hayah gibor khayil mezora'. 2_kings 5:2	va'aram yaze'u gedudim vayishbu mei'erez yisra'el na'arah qetanah vatehi lifnei 'eishet na'aman. 2_kings 5:3	vatomer 'el gebirtah 'akhalei 'adoni lifnei hanabi 'asher beshomeron 'az ye'esof 'oto mizara'to. 2_kings 5:4	vayabo vayaged ladonav leimor kazot vekhazot diberah hana'arah 'asher mei'erez yisra'el. 2_kings 5:5	vayomer melekh 'aram lekh bo ve'eshlekhah seifer 'el melekh yisra'el vayeilekh vayiqakh beyado 'eser kikerei khesef vesheishet 'alafim zahab ve'eser khalifot begadim. 2_kings 5:6	vayabei haseifer 'el melekh yisra'el leimor ve'atah kebo haseifer hazeh 'eilekha hineh shalakhti 'eilekha 'et na'aman 'abdi va'asafto mizara'to. 2_kings 5:7	vayhi kiqro melekh yisra'el 'et haseifer vayiqra' begadav vayomer ha'elohim 'ani lehamit ulehakhayot ki zeh sholeiakh 'eilai le'esof 'ish mizara'to ki 'akh de'u na ure'u ki mit'aneh hu li. 2_kings 5:8	vayhi kishmoa' 'elisha' 'ish ha'elohim ki qara' melekh yisra'el 'et begadav vayishlakh 'el hamelekh leimor lamah qara'ta begadekha yabo na 'eilai veyeida' ki yesh nabi beyisra'el. 2_kings 5:9	vayabo na'aman besuso besusav uberikhbo vaya'amod petakh habayit le'elisha'. 2_kings 5:10	vayishlakh 'eilav 'elisha' mal'akh leimor halokh verakhazta sheba' pe'amim bayarden veyashob besarekha lekha utehar. 2_kings 5:11	vayiqzof na'aman vayeilakh vayomer hineh 'amarti 'eilai yeizei yazo ve'amad veqara beshem yhvh 'elohav veheinif yado 'el hamaqom ve'asaf hamezora'. 2_kings 5:12	halo tob 'abanah 'amanah ufarpar naharot dameseq mikol meimei yisra'el halo 'erkhaz bahem vetahareti vayifen vayeilekh bekheimah. 2_kings 5:13	vayigeshu 'abadav vaydaberu 'eilav vayomeru 'abi dabar gadol hanabi diber 'eilekha halo ta'aseh ve'af ki 'amar 'eilekha rekhaz utehar. 2_kings 5:14	vayeired vayitbol bayarden sheba' pe'amim kidbar 'ish ha'elohim vayashab besaro kibsar na'ar qaton vayithar. 2_kings 5:15	vayashab 'el 'ish ha'elohim hu vekhal makhaneihu vayabo vaya'amod lefanav vayomer hineh na yada'ti ki 'en 'elohim bekhal ha'arez ki 'im beyisra'el ve'atah qakh na berakhah mei'et 'abdekha. 2_kings 5:16	vayomer khai yhvh 'asher 'amadti lefanav 'im 'eqakh vayifzar bo laqakhat vayma'en. 2_kings 5:17	vayomer na'aman valo yutan na le'abdekha masa zemed peradim 'adamah ki lo ya'aseh 'od 'abdekha 'olah vazebakh leilohim 'akheirim ki 'im yhvh. 2_kings 5:18	ladabar hazeh yislakh yhvh le'abdekha bebo 'adoni bet rimon lehishtakhavot shamah vehu nish'an 'al yadi vehishtakhaveiti bet rimon behishtakhavayati bet rimon yislakh na yhvh le'abdekha badabar hazeh. 2_kings 5:19	vayomer lo lekh leshalom vayeilekh mei'ito kibrat 'arez. 2_kings 5:20	vayomer geikhazi na'ar 'elisha' 'ish ha'elohim hineh khasakh 'adoni 'et na'aman ha'arami hazeh miqakhat miyado 'et 'asher heibi khai yhvh ki 'im razti 'akharav velaqakhti mei'ito me'umah. 2_kings 5:21	vayirdof geikhazi 'akharei na'aman vayir'eh na'aman raz 'akharav vayipol mei'al hamerkabah liqrato vayomer hashalom. 2_kings 5:22	vayomer shalom 'adoni shelakhani leimor hineh 'atah zeh ba'u 'eilai shenei ne'arim meihar 'efrayim mibenei hanebi'im tenah na lahem kikar kesef ushetei khalifot begadim. 2_kings 5:23	vayomer na'aman ho'el qakh kikarayim vayifraz bo vayazar kikerayim kesef bishnei kharitim ushetei khalifot begadim vayiten 'el shenei ne'arav vayis'u lefanav. 2_kings 5:24	vayabo 'el ha'ofel vayiqakh miyadam vayifqod babayit vayshalakh 'et ha'anashim vayeileikhu. 2_kings 5:25	vehu ba vaya'amod 'el 'adonav vayomer 'eilav 'elisha' mei'an mei'ayin geikhazi vayomer lo halakh 'abdekha 'aneh va'anah. 2_kings 5:26	vayomer 'eilav lo libi halakh ka'asher hafakh 'ish mei'al merkabto liqratekha ha'et laqakhat 'et hakesef velaqakhat begadim vezeitim ukheramim vezon ubaqar va'abadim ushefakhot. 2_kings 5:27	vezara'at na'aman tidbaq bekha ubezar'akha le'olam vayeizei milefanav mezora' kashaleg. 2_kings 6:1	vayomeru benei hanebi'im 'el 'elisha' hineh na hamaqom 'asher 'anakhnu yoshebim sham lefanekha zar mimenu. 2_kings 6:2	neilekhah na 'ad hayarden veniqkhah misham 'ish qorah 'ekhat vena'aseh lanu sham maqom lashebet sham vayomer leikhu. 2_kings 6:3	vayomer ha'ekhad ho'el na velekh 'et 'abadekha vayomer 'ani 'eilekh. 2_kings 6:4	vayeilekh 'itam vayabo'u hayardeinah vayigzeru ha'eizim. 2_kings 6:5	vayhi ha'ekhad mapil haqorah ve'et habarzel nafal 'el hamayim vayiz'aq vayomer 'ahah 'adoni vehu sha'ul. 2_kings 6:6	vayomer 'ish ha'elohim 'anah nafal vayar'eihu 'et hamaqom vayiqzab 'ez vayashlekh shamah vayazef habarzel. 2_kings 6:7	vayomer harem lakh vayishlakh yado vayiqakheihu. 2_kings 6:8	umelekh 'aram hayah nilkham beyisra'el vayiva'az 'el 'abadav leimor 'el meqom peloni 'almoni takhanoti. 2_kings 6:9	vayishlakh 'ish ha'elohim 'el melekh yisra'el leimor hishamer mei'abor hamaqom hazeh ki sham 'aram nekhitim. 2_kings 6:10	vayishlakh melekh yisra'el 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amar lo 'ish ha'elohim vehizhirah vehizhiro venishmar sham lo 'akhat velo shetayim. 2_kings 6:11	vayisa'er leb melekh 'aram 'al hadabar hazeh vayiqra 'el 'abadav vayomer 'aleihem halo tagidu li mi mishelanu 'el melekh yisra'el. 2_kings 6:12	vayomer 'akhad mei'abadav lo 'adoni hamelekh ki 'elisha' hanabi 'asher beyisra'el yagid lemelekh yisra'el 'et hadebarim 'asher tedaber bakhadar mishkabekha. 2_kings 6:13	vayomer lekhu ure'u 'eikhoh hu ve'eshlakh ve'eqakheihu vayugad lo leimor hineh bedotan. 2_kings 6:14	vayishlakh shamah susim verekheb vekhayil kabed vayabo'u laylah vayaqifu 'al ha'ir. 2_kings 6:15	vayashkem mesharet 'ish ha'elohim laqum vayeizei vehineh khayil sobeb 'et ha'ir vesus varakheb vayomer na'aro 'eilav 'ahah 'adoni 'eikhah na'aseh. 2_kings 6:16	vayomer 'al tira ki rabim 'asher 'itanu mei'asher 'otam. 2_kings 6:17	vayitpalel 'elisha' vayomar yhvh peqakh na 'et 'einav veyir'eh vayifqakh yhvh 'et 'einei hana'ar vayar vehineh hahar malei susim verekheb 'esh sebibot 'elisha'. 2_kings 6:18	vayeiredu 'eilav vayitpalel 'elisha' 'el yhvh vayomar hakh na 'et hago hazeh basanveirim vayakem basanveirim kidbar 'elisha'. 2_kings 6:19	vayomer 'aleihem 'elisha' lo zeh haderekh velo zoh ha'ir lekhu 'akharai ve'olikhah 'etkhem 'el ha'ish 'asher tebaqeishun vayolekh 'otam shomeronah. 2_kings 6:20	vayhi kebo'am shomeron vayomer 'elisha' yhvh peqakh 'et 'einei 'eleh veyir'u vayifqakh yhvh 'et 'eineihem vayir'u vehineh betokh shomeron. 2_kings 6:21	vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el 'elisha' kir'oto 'otam ha'akeh 'akeh 'abi. 2_kings 6:22	vayomer lo takeh ha'asher shabita bekharbekha ubeqashtekha 'atah makeh sim lekhem vamayim lifneihem veyokhelu veyishtu veyeilekhu 'el 'adoneihem. 2_kings 6:23	vayikhreh lahem keirah gedolah vayokhelu vayishtu vayshalekhem vayeilekhu 'el 'adoneihem velo yasefu 'od gedudei 'aram labo be'erez yisra'el. 2_kings 6:24	vayhi 'akharei khen vayiqboz ben hadad melekh 'aram 'et kal makhaneihu vaya'al vayazar 'al shomeron. 2_kings 6:25	vayhi ra'ab gadol beshomeron vehineh zarim 'aleha 'ad heyot rosh khamor bishmonim kesef veroba' haqab khareiyonim dibyonim bakhamishah khasef. 2_kings 6:26	vayhi melekh yisra'el 'ober 'al hakhomah ve'ishah za'aqah 'eilav leimor hoshi'ah 'adoni hamelekh. 2_kings 6:27	vayomer 'al yoshi'ekh yhvh mei'ayin 'oshi'ekh hamin hagoren 'o min hayaqeb. 2_kings 6:28	vayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh vatomer ha'ishah hazot 'amerah 'eilai teni 'et benekh venokhelenu hayom ve'et beni nokhal makhar. 2_kings 6:29	vanebashel 'et beni vanokheleihu va'omar 'eileha bayom ha'akher teni 'et benekh venokhelenu vatakhbi 'et benah. 2_kings 6:30	vayhi khishmoa' hamelekh 'et dibrei ha'ishah vayiqra' 'et begadav vehu 'ober 'al hakhomah vayar ha'am vehineh hasaq 'al besaro mibayit. 2_kings 6:31	vayomer koh ya'aseh li 'elohim vekhoh yosif 'im ya'amod rosh 'elisha' ben shafat 'alav hayom. 2_kings 6:32	ve'elisha' yosheb bebeito vehazeqeinim yoshebim 'ito vayishlakh 'ish milefanav beterem yabo hamal'akh 'eilav vehu 'amar 'el hazeqeinim harre'item ki shalakh ben hamrazeiakh hazeh lehasir 'et roshi re'u kebo hamal'akh sigru hadelet ulekhaztem 'oto badelet halo qol raglei 'adonav 'akharav. 2_kings 6:33	'odenu medaber 'imam vehineh hamal'akh yored 'eilav vayomer hineh zot hara'ah mei'et yhvh mah 'okhil yhvh 'od. 2_kings 7:1	vayomer 'elisha' shim'u debar yhvh koh 'amar yhvh ka'et makhar se'ah solet besheqel vesatayim se'orim besheqel besha'ar shomeron. 2_kings 7:2	vaya'an hashalish 'asher lamelekh nish'an 'al yado 'et 'ish ha'elohim vayomar hineh yhvh 'oseh 'arubot bashamayim hayihyeh hadabar hazeh vayomer hinekhah ro'eh be'einekha umisham lo tokhel. 2_kings 7:3	ve'arba'ah 'anashim hayu mezora'im petakh hasha'ar vayomeru 'ish 'el rei'eihu mah 'anakhnu yoshebim poh 'ad matenu. 2_kings 7:4	'im 'amarnu nabo ha'ir vehara'ab ba'ir vamatnu sham ve'im yashabnu foh vamatenu ve'atah lekhu venipelah 'el makhaneh 'aram 'im yekhayunu nikhyeh ve'im yemitunu vamatenu. 2_kings 7:5	vayaqumu baneshef labo 'el makhaneh 'aram vayabo'u 'ad qezeh makhaneh 'aram vehineh 'en sham 'ish. 2_kings 7:6	vadonai hishmia' 'et makhaneh 'aram qol rekheb qol sus qol khayil gadol vayomeru 'ish 'el 'akhiv hineh sakhar 'aleinu melekh yisra'el 'et malkhei hakhitim ve'et malkhei mizrayim labo 'aleinu. 2_kings 7:7	vayaqumu vayanusu baneshef vaya'azbu 'et 'aholeihem ve'et suseihem ve'et khamoreihem hamakhaneh ka'asher hi vayanusu 'el nafsham. 2_kings 7:8	vayabo'u hamzora'im ha'eleh 'ad qezeh hamakhaneh vayabo'u 'el 'ohel 'ekhad vayokhelu vayishtu vayis'u misham kesef vezahab ubegadim vayeilekhu vayatminu vayashubu vayabo'u 'el 'ohel 'akher vayis'u misham vayeilekhu vayatminu. 2_kings 7:9	vayomeru 'ish 'el rei'eihu lo khen 'anakhnu 'osim hayom hazeh yom besorah hu va'anakhnu makhshim vekhikinu 'ad 'or haboqer umeza'anu 'avon ve'atah lekhu venabo'ah venagidah bet hamelekh. 2_kings 7:10	vayabo'u vayiqre'u 'el sho'er ha'ir vayagidu lahem leimor banu 'el makhaneh 'aram vehineh 'en sham 'ish veqol 'adam ki 'im hasus 'asur vehakhamor 'asur ve'ohalim ka'asher hemah. 2_kings 7:11	vayiqra hasho'arim vayagidu bet hamelekh penimah. 2_kings 7:12	vayaqam hamelekh laylah vayomer 'el 'abadav 'agidah na lakhem 'et 'asher 'asu lanu 'aram yade'u ki re'eibim 'anakhnu vayeize'u min hamakhaneh leheikhabeh behasadeh basadeh leimor ki yeize'u min ha'ir venitpesem khayim ve'el ha'ir nabo. 2_kings 7:13	vaya'an 'ekhad mei'abadav vayomer veyiqkhu na khamishah min hasusim hanish'arim 'asher nish'aru bah hinam kekhal hehamon hamon yisra'el 'asher nish'aru bah hinam kekhal hamon yisra'el 'asher tamu venishlekhah venir'eh. 2_kings 7:14	vayiqkhu shenei rekheb susim vayishlakh hamelekh 'akharei makhaneh 'aram leimor lekhu ure'u. 2_kings 7:15	vayeilekhu 'akhareihem 'ad hayarden vehineh khal haderekh melei'ah begadim vekheilim 'asher hishlikhu 'aram beheikhafezam bekhafezam vayashubu hamal'akhim vayagidu lamelekh. 2_kings 7:16	vayeizei ha'am vayabozu 'et makhaneh 'aram vayhi se'ah solet besheqel vesatayim se'orim besheqel kidbar yhvh. 2_kings 7:17	vehamelekh hifqid 'et hashalish 'asher nish'an 'al yado 'al hasha'ar vayirmesuhu ha'am basha'ar vayamot ka'asher diber 'ish ha'elohim 'asher diber beredet hamelekh 'eilav. 2_kings 7:18	vayhi kedaber 'ish ha'elohim 'el hamelekh leimor satayim se'orim besheqel use'ah solet besheqel yihyeh ka'et makhar besha'ar shomeron. 2_kings 7:19	vaya'an hashalish 'et 'ish ha'elohim vayomar vehineh yhvh 'oseh 'arubot bashamayim hayihyeh kadabar hazeh vayomer hinekha ro'eh be'einekha umisham lo tokhel. 2_kings 7:20	vayhi lo ken vayirmesu 'oto ha'am basha'ar vayamot. 2_kings 8:1	ve'elisha' diber 'el ha'ishah 'asher hekheyah 'et benah leimor qumi ulekhi 'ati 'at ubeitekh veguri ba'asher taguri ki qara yhvh lara'ab vegam ba 'el ha'arez sheba' shanim. 2_kings 8:2	vataqam ha'ishah vata'as kidbar 'ish ha'elohim vateilekh hi ubeitah vatagar be'erez pelishtim sheba' shanim. 2_kings 8:3	vayhi miqzeh sheba' shanim vatashab ha'ishah mei'erez pelishtim vateizei liz'oq 'el hamelekh 'el beitah ve'el sadah. 2_kings 8:4	vehamelekh medaber 'el geikhazi na'ar 'ish ha'elohim leimor saperah na li 'et kal hagedolot 'asher 'asah 'elisha'. 2_kings 8:5	vayhi hu mesaper lamelekh 'et 'asher hekheyah 'et hamet vehineh ha'ishah 'asher hekheyah 'et benah zo'eqet 'el hamelekh 'al beitah ve'al sadah vayomer geikhazi 'adoni hamelekh zot ha'ishah vezeh benah 'asher hekheyah 'elisha'. 2_kings 8:6	vayish'al hamelekh la'ishah vatesaper lo vayiten lah hamelekh saris 'ekhad leimor hasheb 'et kal 'asher lah ve'et kal tebu'ot hasadeh miyom 'azebah 'et ha'arez ve'ad 'atah. 2_kings 8:7	vayabo 'elisha' dameseq uben hadad melekh 'aram kholeh vayugad lo leimor ba 'ish ha'elohim 'ad henah. 2_kings 8:8	vayomer hamelekh 'el khazah'el qakh beyadekha minkhah velekh liqrat 'ish ha'elohim vedarashta 'et yhvh mei'oto leimor ha'ekhyeh meikholi zeh. 2_kings 8:9	vayeilekh khaza'el liqrato vayiqakh minkhah beyado vekhal tub dameseq masa 'arba'im gamal vayabo vaya'amod lefanav vayomer binkha ben hadad melekh 'aram shelakhani 'eilekha leimor ha'ekhyeh meikholi zeh. 2_kings 8:10	vayomer 'eilav 'elisha' lekh 'emar lo lo khayoh tikhyeh vehir'ani yhvh ki mot yamut. 2_kings 8:11	vaya'amed 'et panav vayasem 'ad bosh vayeibek 'ish ha'elohim. 2_kings 8:12	vayomer khaza'el madua' 'adoni bokheh vayomer ki yada'ti 'et 'asher ta'aseh libnei yisra'el ra'ah mibzereihem teshalakh ba'esh ubakhureihem bakhereb taharog ve'oleleihem teratesh veharoteihem tebaqeia'. 2_kings 8:13	vayomer khazah'el ki mah 'abdekha hakeleb ki ya'aseh hadabar hagadol hazeh vayomer 'elisha' hir'ani yhvh 'otekha melekh 'al 'aram. 2_kings 8:14	vayeilekh mei'et 'elisha' vayabo 'el 'adonav vayomer lo mah 'amar lekha 'elisha' vayomer 'amar li khayoh tikhyeh. 2_kings 8:15	vayhi mimakhorat vayiqakh hamakhber vayitbol bamayim vayifros 'al panav vayamot vayimlokh khazah'el takhtav. 2_kings 8:16	ubishnat khamesh leyoram ben 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el vihoshafat melekh yehudah malakh yehoram ben yehoshafat melekh yehudah. 2_kings 8:17	ben sheloshim ushetayim shanah hayah bemalekho ushemoneh shanah shanim malakh birushalim. 2_kings 8:18	vayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra'el ka'asher 'asu bet 'akh'ab ki bat 'akh'ab hayetah lo le'ishah vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh. 2_kings 8:19	velo 'abah yhvh lehashkhit 'et yehudah lema'an david 'abdo ka'asher 'amar lo latet lo nir lebanav kal hayamim. 2_kings 8:20	beyamav pasha' 'edom mitakhat yad yehudah vayamlikhu 'aleihem melekh. 2_kings 8:21	vaya'abor yoram za'irah vekhal harekheb 'imo vayhi hu qam laylah vayakeh 'et 'edom hasobeb 'eilav ve'et sarei harekheb vayanas ha'am le'ohalav. 2_kings 8:22	vayifsha' 'edom mitakhat yad yehudah 'ad hayom hazeh 'az tifsha' libnah ba'et hahi. 2_kings 8:23	veyeter dibrei yoram vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 8:24	vayishkab yoram 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david vayimlokh 'akhazyahu beno takhtav. 2_kings 8:25	bishnat shetem 'esreh shanah leyoram ben 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el malakh 'akhazyahu ben yehoram melekh yehudah. 2_kings 8:26	ben 'esrim ushetayim shanah 'akhazyahu bemalekho veshanah 'akhat malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'atalyahu bat 'ameri melekh yisra'el. 2_kings 8:27	vayeilekh bederekh bet 'akh'ab vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh kebet 'akh'ab ki khatan bet 'akh'ab hu. 2_kings 8:28	vayeilekh 'et yoram ben 'akh'ab lamilkhamah 'im khazah'el melekh 'aram beramot gil'ad vayaku 'aramim 'et yoram. 2_kings 8:29	vayashab yoram hamelekh lehitrapei beyizre'el min hamakim 'asher yakuhu 'aramim baramah behilakhamo 'et khazah'el melekh 'aram va'akhazyahu ben yehoram melekh yehudah yarad lir'ot 'et yoram ben 'akh'ab beyizre'el ki kholeh hu. 2_kings 9:1	ve'elisha' hanabi qara le'akhad mibenei hanebi'im vayomer lo khagor matenekha veqakh pakh hashemen hazeh beyadekha velekh ramot gil'ad. 2_kings 9:2	ubata shamah ure'eihosha m yeihu ben yehoshafat ben nimshi ubata vahaqeimoto mitokh 'ekhav veheibeita 'oto kheder bekhader. 2_kings 9:3	velaqakhta fakh hashemen veyazaqta 'al rosho ve'amarta koh 'amar yhvh meshakhtikha lemelekh 'el yisra'el ufatakhta hadelet venastah velo tekhakeh. 2_kings 9:4	vayeilekh hana'ar hana'ar hanabi ramot gil'ad. 2_kings 9:5	vayabo vehineh sarei hakhayil yoshebim vayomer dabar li 'eilekha hasar vayomer yeihu 'el mi mikulanu vayomer 'eilekha hasar. 2_kings 9:6	vayaqam vayabo habaytah vayizoq hashemen 'el rosho vayomer lo koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el meshakhtikha lemelekh 'el 'am yhvh 'el yisra'el. 2_kings 9:7	vehikitah 'et bet 'akh'ab 'adonekha veniqamti demei 'abadai hanebi'im udemei kal 'abdei yhvh miyad 'izabel. 2_kings 9:8	ve'abad kal bet 'akh'ab vehikhrati le'akh'ab mashtin beqir ve'azur ve'azub beyisra'el. 2_kings 9:9	venatati 'et bet 'akh'ab kebet yarabe'am ben nebat ukhebet ba'sha ben 'akhiyah. 2_kings 9:10	ve'et 'izebel yokhelu hakelabim bekheileq yizre'el ve'en qober vayiftakh hadelet vayanos. 2_kings 9:11	veyeihu yaza 'el 'abdei 'adonav vayomer lo hashalom madua' ba hamshuga' hazeh 'eilekha vayomer 'aleihem 'atem yeda'tem 'et ha'ish ve'et sikho. 2_kings 9:12	vayomeru sheqer haged na lanu vayomer kazot vekhazot 'amar 'eilai leimor koh 'amar yhvh meshakhtikha lemelekh 'el yisra'el. 2_kings 9:13	vaymaharu vayiqkhu 'ish bigdo vayasimu takhtav 'el gerem hama'alot vayitqe'u bashofar vayomeru malakh yeihu. 2_kings 9:14	vayitqasher yeihu ben yehoshafat ben nimshi 'el yoram veyoram hayah shomer beramot gil'ad hu vekhal yisra'el mipenei khaza'el melekh 'aram. 2_kings 9:15	vayashab yehoram hamelekh lehitrapei biyzere'el min hamakim 'asher yakuhu 'aramim behilakhamo 'et khaza'el melekh 'aram vayomer yeihu 'im yesh nafshekhem 'al yeizei falit min ha'ir lalekhet legid lehagid beyizre'el. 2_kings 9:16	vayirkab yeihu vayeilekh yizre'elah ki yoram shokheb shamah va'akhazyah melekh yehudah yarad lir'ot 'et yoram. 2_kings 9:17	vehazofeh 'omed 'al hamigdal beyizre'el vayar 'et shif'at yeihu bebo'o vayomer shif'at 'ani ro'eh vayomer yehoram qakh rakab ushelakh liqratam veyomar hashalom. 2_kings 9:18	vayeilekh rokheb hasus liqrato vayomer koh 'amar hamelekh hashalom vayomer yeihu mah lekha uleshalom sob 'el 'akharai vayaged hazofeh leimor ba hamal'akh 'ad hem velo shab. 2_kings 9:19	vayishlakh rokheb sus sheini vayabo 'aleihem vayomer koh 'amar hamelekh shalom vayomer yeihu mah lekha uleshalom sob 'el 'akharai. 2_kings 9:20	vayaged hazofeh leimor ba 'ad 'aleihem velo shab vehaminhag keminhag yeihu ben nimshi ki beshiga'on yinhag. 2_kings 9:21	vayomer yehoram 'esor vaye'sor rikhbo vayeizei yehoram melekh yisra'el va'akhazyahu melekh yehudah 'ish berikhbo vayeize'u liqrat yeihu vayimza'uhu bekhelqat nabot hayizre'eili. 2_kings 9:22	vayhi kir'ot yehoram 'et yeihu vayomer hashalom yeihu vayomer mah hashalom 'ad zenunei 'izebel 'imekha ukheshafeha harabim. 2_kings 9:23	vayahafokh yehoram yadav vayanos vayomer 'el 'akhazyahu mirmah 'akhazyah. 2_kings 9:24	veyeihu milei yado baqeshet vayakh 'et yehoram ben zero'av vayeizei hakheizi milibo vayikhra' berikhbo. 2_kings 9:25	vayomer 'el bidqar sheloshah shalisho sa hashlikheihu bekhelqat sedeh nabot hayizre'eili ki zekhor 'ani va'atah 'et rokhebim zemadim 'akharei 'akh'ab 'abiv yhvh nasa 'alav 'et hamasa hazeh. 2_kings 9:26	'im lo 'et demei nabot ve'et demei banav ra'iti 'emesh ne'um yhvh veshilamti lekha bakhelqah hazot ne'um yhvh ve'atah sa hashlikheihu bakhelqah kidbar yhvh. 2_kings 9:27	va'akhazyah melekh yehudah ra'ah vayanas derekh bet hagan vayirdof 'akharav yeihu vayomer gam 'oto hakuhu 'el hamerkabah bema'aleh gur 'asher 'et yible'am vayanas megido vayamat sham. 2_kings 9:28	vayarkibu 'oto 'abadav yerushalemah vayiqberu 'oto biqburato 'im 'abotav be'ir david. 2_kings 9:29	ubishnat 'akhat 'esreh shanah leyoram ben 'akh'ab malakh 'akhazyah 'al yehudah. 2_kings 9:30	vayabo yeihu yizre'elah ve'izebel shame'ah vatasem bapukh 'eineha vateiteb 'et roshah vatashqef be'ad hakhalon. 2_kings 9:31	veyeihu ba basha'ar vatomer hashalom zimri horeg 'adonav. 2_kings 9:32	vayisa fanav 'el hakhalon vayomer mi 'iti mi vayashqifu 'eilav shenayim sheloshah sarisim. 2_kings 9:33	vayomer shimtuhu shimtuha vayishmetuha vayiz midamah 'el haqir ve'el hasusim vayirmesenah. 2_kings 9:34	vayabo vayokhal vayeishet vayomer piqdu na 'et ha'arurah hazot veqibruha ki bat melekh hi. 2_kings 9:35	vayeilekhu leqaberah velo maze'u bah ki 'im hagulgolet veharaglayim vekhapot hayadayim. 2_kings 9:36	vayashubu vayagidu lo vayomer debar yhvh hu 'asher diber beyad 'abdo 'eiliyahu hatishbi leimor bekheileq yizre'el yokhelu hakelabim 'et besar 'izabel. 2_kings 9:37	vehayat vehayetah niblat 'izebel kedomen 'al penei hasadeh bekheileq yizre'el 'asher lo yomeru zot 'izabel. 2_kings 10:1	ule'akh'ab shib'im banim beshomeron vayikhtob yeihu sefarim vayishlakh shomeron 'el sarei yizre'el hazeqeinim ve'el ha'omenim 'akh'ab leimor. 2_kings 10:2	ve'atah kebo haseifer hazeh 'aleikhem ve'itekhem benei 'adoneikhem ve'itekhem harekheb vehasusim ve'ir mibzar vehanasheq. 2_kings 10:3	ure'item hatob vehayashar mibenei 'adoneikhem vesamtem 'al kisei 'abiv vehilakhamu 'al bet 'adoneikhem. 2_kings 10:4	vayir'u me'od me'od vayomeru hineh shenei hamelakhim lo 'amedu lefanav ve'ekh na'amod 'anakhenu. 2_kings 10:5	vayishlakh 'asher 'al habayit va'asher 'al ha'ir vehazeqeinim veha'omenim 'el yeihu leimor 'abadekha 'anakhnu vekhol 'asher tomar 'eileinu na'aseh lo namlikh 'ish hatob be'einekha 'aseh. 2_kings 10:6	vayikhtob 'aleihem seifer sheinit leimor 'im li 'atem uleqoli 'atem shome'im qekhu 'et rashei 'anshei benei 'adoneikhem ubo'u 'eilai ka'et makhar yizre'elah ubenei hamelekh shib'im 'ish 'et gedolei ha'ir megadelim 'otam. 2_kings 10:7	vayhi kebo haseifer 'aleihem vayiqkhu 'et benei hamelekh vayishkhatu shib'im 'ish vayasimu 'et rasheihem badudim vayishlekhu 'eilav yizre'elah. 2_kings 10:8	vayabo hamal'akh vayaged lo leimor heibi'u rashei benei hamelekh vayomer simu 'otam shenei ziburim petakh hasha'ar 'ad haboqer. 2_kings 10:9	vayhi baboqer vayeizei vaya'amod vayomer 'el kal ha'am zadiqim 'atem hineh 'ani qasharti 'al 'adoni va'ehregeihu umi hikah 'et kal 'eleh. 2_kings 10:10	de'u 'eifo ki lo yipol midebar yhvh 'arzah 'asher diber yhvh 'al bet 'akh'ab yhvh 'asah 'et 'asher diber beyad 'abdo 'eiliyahu. 2_kings 10:11	vayakh yeihu 'et kal hanish'arim lebet 'akh'ab beyizre'el vekhal gedolav umeyuda'av vekhohanav 'ad bilti hish'ir lo sarid. 2_kings 10:12	vayaqam vayabo vayeilekh shomeron hu bet 'eiqed haro'im badarekh. 2_kings 10:13	veyeihu maza 'et 'akhei 'akhazyahu melekh yehudah vayomer mi 'atem vayomeru 'akhei 'akhazyahu 'anakhnu vaneired lishlom benei hamelekh ubenei hagebirah. 2_kings 10:14	vayomer tifsum khayim vayitpesum khayim vayishkhatum 'el bor bet 'eiqed 'arba'im ushenayim 'ish velo hish'ir 'ish meihem. 2_kings 10:15	vayeilekh misham vayimza 'et yehonadab ben reikhab liqrato vaybarekheihu vayomer 'eilav hayesh 'et lebabekha yashar ka'asher lebabi 'im lebabekha vayomer yehonadab yesh vayesh tenah 'et yadekha vayiten yado vaya'aleihu 'eilav 'el hamerkabah. 2_kings 10:16	vayomer lekhah 'iti ure'eh beqin'ati yhvh vayarkibu 'oto berikhbo. 2_kings 10:17	vayabo shomeron vayakh 'et kal hanish'arim le'akh'ab beshomeron 'ad hishmido kidbar yhvh 'asher diber 'el 'eiliyahu. 2_kings 10:18	vayiqboz yeihu 'et kal ha'am vayomer 'aleihem 'akh'ab 'abad 'et haba'al me'at yeihu ya'abdenu harbeh. 2_kings 10:19	ve'atah khal nebi'ei haba'al kal 'obedav vekhal kohanav qir'u 'eilai 'ish 'al yipaqed ki zebakh gadol li laba'al kol 'asher yipaqed lo yikhyeh veyeihu 'asah be'aqebah lema'an ha'abid 'et 'obedei haba'al. 2_kings 10:20	vayomer yeihu qadeshu 'azarah laba'al vayiqra'u. 2_kings 10:21	vayishlakh yeihu bekhal yisra'el vayabo'u kal 'obedei haba'al velo nish'ar 'ish 'asher lo ba vayabo'u bet haba'al vayimalei bet haba'al peh lafeh. 2_kings 10:22	vayomer la'asher 'al hameltakhah hozei lebush lekhol 'obedei haba'al vayozei lahem hamalbush. 2_kings 10:23	vayabo yeihu vihonadab ben reikhab bet haba'al vayomer le'obedei haba'al khapesu ure'u pen yesh poh 'imakhem mei'abdei yhvh ki 'im 'obedei haba'al lebadam. 2_kings 10:24	vayabo'u la'asot zebakhim ve'olot veyeihu sam lo bakhuz shemonim 'ish vayomer ha'ish 'asher yimalet min ha'anashim 'asher 'ani meibi 'al yedeikhem nafsho takhat nafsho. 2_kings 10:25	vayhi kekhaloto la'asot ha'olah vayomer yeihu larazim velashalishim bo'u hakum 'ish 'al yeizei vayakum lefi khareb vayashlikhu harazim vehashalishim vayeilekhu 'ad 'ir bet haba'al. 2_kings 10:26	vayozi'u 'et mazebot bet haba'al vayisrefuha. 2_kings 10:27	vayitezu 'et mazebat haba'al vayitezu 'et bet haba'al vaysimuhu lemakhara'ot lemoza'ot 'ad hayom. 2_kings 10:28	vayashmed yeihu 'et haba'al miyisra'el. 2_kings 10:29	raq khata'ei yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el lo sar yeihu mei'akhareihem 'eglei hazahab 'asher bet 'el va'asher bedan. 2_kings 10:30	vayomer yhvh 'el yeihu ya'an 'asher hetibota la'asot hayashar be'einai kekhol 'asher bilbabi 'asita lebet 'akh'ab benei rebi'im yeishebu lekha 'al kisei yisra'el. 2_kings 10:31	veyeihu lo shamar lalekhet betorat yhvh 'elohei yisra'el bekhal lebabo lo sar mei'al khatot yarabe'am 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. 2_kings 10:32	bayamim hahem heikhel yhvh leqazot beyisra'el vayakem khaza'el bekhal gebul yisra'el. 2_kings 10:33	min hayarden mizrakh hashemesh 'et kal 'erez hagil'ad hagadi veharuvbeini vehamnashi mei'aro'er 'asher 'al nakhal 'arnon vehagil'ad vehabashan. 2_kings 10:34	veyeter dibrei yeihu vekhal 'asher 'asah vekhal geburato halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 10:35	vayishkab yeihu 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto beshomeron vayimlokh yeho'akhaz beno takhtav. 2_kings 10:36	vehayamim 'asher malakh yeihu 'al yisra'el 'esrim ushemoneh shanah beshomeron. 2_kings 11:1	va'atalyah 'em 'akhazyahu ura'atah ra'atah ki met benah vataqam vate'abed 'et kal zera' hamamlakhah. 2_kings 11:2	vatiqakh yehosheba' bat hamelekh yoram 'akhot 'akhazyahu 'et yo'ash ben 'akhazyah vatignob 'oto mitokh benei hamelekh hamamotim hamumatim 'oto ve'et meiniqto bakhadar hamitot vayastiru 'oto mipenei 'atalyahu velo humat. 2_kings 11:3	vayhi 'itah bet yhvh mitkhabei shesh shanim va'atalyah molekhet 'al ha'arez. 2_kings 11:4	ubashanah hashebi'it shalakh yehoyada' vayiqakh 'et sarei hameiyot hamei'ot lakari velarazim vayabei 'otam 'eilav bet yhvh vayikhrot lahem berit vayashba' 'otam bebet yhvh vayar 'otam 'et ben hamelekh. 2_kings 11:5	vayzavem leimor zeh hadabar 'asher ta'asun hashelishit mikem ba'ei hashabat veshomerei mishmeret bet hamelekh. 2_kings 11:6	vehashelishit besha'ar sur vehashelishit basha'ar 'akhar harazim ushemartem 'et mishmeret habayit masakh. 2_kings 11:7	ushetei hayadot bakhem kol yoze'ei hashabat veshameru 'et mishmeret bet yhvh 'el hamelekh. 2_kings 11:8	vehiqaftem 'al hamelekh sabib 'ish vekheilav beyado vehaba 'el hasedeirot yumat vihyu 'et hamelekh bezeito ubebo'o. 2_kings 11:9	vaya'asu sarei hameiyot hamei'ot kekhol 'asher zivah yehoyada' hakohen vayiqkhu 'ish 'et 'anashav ba'ei hashabat 'im yoze'ei hashabat vayabo'u 'el yehoyada' hakohen. 2_kings 11:10	vayiten hakohen lesarei hameiyot hamei'ot 'et hakhanit ve'et hashelatim 'asher lamelekh david 'asher bebet yhvh. 2_kings 11:11	vaya'amdu harazim 'ish vekheilav beyado miketef habayit haymanit 'ad ketef habayit hasemalit lamizbeiakh velabayit 'al hamelekh sabib. 2_kings 11:12	vayozi 'et ben hamelekh vayiten 'alav 'et haneizer ve'et ha'eidut vayamlikhu 'oto vayimshakhuhu vayaku khaf vayomeru yekhi hamelekh. 2_kings 11:13	vatishma' 'atalyah 'et qol harazin ha'am vatabo 'el ha'am bet yhvh. 2_kings 11:14	vateire vehineh hamelekh 'omed 'al ha'amud kamishpat vehasarim vehakhazozerot 'el hamelekh vekhal 'am ha'arez sameiakh vetoqeia' bakhazozerot vatiqra' 'atalyah 'et begadeha vatiqra qesher qasher. 2_kings 11:15	vayzav yehoyada' hakohen 'et sarei hamei'ot hamei'ot pequdei hakhayil vayomer 'aleihem hozi'u 'otah 'el mibet lasedeirot vehaba 'akhareha hamet bekhareb ki 'amar hakohen 'al tumat bet yhvh. 2_kings 11:16	vayasimu lah yadayim vatabo derekh mebo hasusim bet hamelekh vatumat sham. 2_kings 11:17	vayikhrot yehoyada' 'et haberit ben yhvh uben hamelekh uben ha'am lihyot le'am yhvh uben hamelekh uben ha'am. 2_kings 11:18	vayabo'u khal 'am ha'arez bet haba'al vayitezuhu 'et mizbekhoto mizbekhotav ve'et zelamav shiberu heiteb ve'et matan kohen haba'al haregu lifnei hamizbekhot vayasem hakohen pequdot 'al bet yhvh. 2_kings 11:19	vayiqakh 'et sarei hamei'ot ve'et hakari ve'et harazim ve'et kal 'am ha'arez vayoridu 'et hamelekh mibet yhvh vayabo'u derekh sha'ar harazim bet hamelekh vayeisheb 'al kisei hamelakhim. 2_kings 11:20	vayismakh kal 'am ha'arez veha'ir shaqatah ve'et 'atalyahu heimitu bakhereb bet melekh hamelekh. 2_kings 11:21	ben sheba' shanim yeho'ash bemalekho. 2_kings 12:1	bishnat sheba' leyeihu malakh yeho'ash ve'arba'im shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo zibyah mibe'er shaba'. 2_kings 12:2	vaya'as yeho'ash hayashar be'einei yhvh kal yamav 'asher horahu yehoyada' hakohen. 2_kings 12:3	raq habamot lo saru 'od ha'am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. 2_kings 12:4	vayomer yeho'ash 'el hakohanim kol kesef haqodashim 'asher yuba bet yhvh kesef 'ober 'ish kesef nafshot 'erko kal kesef 'asher ya'aleh 'al leb 'ish lehabi bet yhvh. 2_kings 12:5	yiqkhu lahem hakohanim 'ish mei'et makaro vehem yekhazequ 'et bedeq habayit lekhol 'asher yimazei sham badeq. 2_kings 12:6	vayhi bishnat 'esrim veshalosh shanah lamelekh yeho'ash lo khizequ hakohanim 'et bedeq habayit. 2_kings 12:7	vayiqra hamelekh yeho'ash lihoyada' hakohen velakohanim vayomer 'aleihem madua' 'einekhem mekhazeqim 'et bedeq habayit ve'atah 'al tiqkhu khesef mei'et makareikhem ki lebedeq habayit titenuhu. 2_kings 12:8	vayei'otu hakohanim lebilti qekhat kesef mei'et ha'am ulebilti khazeq 'et bedeq habayit. 2_kings 12:9	vayiqakh yehoyada' hakohen 'aron 'ekhad vayiqob khor bedalto vayiten 'oto 'eizel hamizbeiakh bayamin miyamin bebo 'ish bet yhvh venatenu shamah hakohanim shomerei hasaf 'et kal hakesef hamuba bet yhvh. 2_kings 12:10	vayhi kir'otam ki rab hakesef ba'aron vaya'al sofer hamelekh vehakohen hagadol vayazuru vayimnu 'et hakesef hanimza bet yhvh. 2_kings 12:11	venatenu 'et hakesef hamtukan 'al yad yedei 'osei hamelakhah hapequdim hamufqadim bet yhvh vayozi'uhu lekharashei ha'ez velabonim ha'osim bet yhvh. 2_kings 12:12	velagoderim ulekhozebei ha'eben veliqnot 'eizim ve'abnei makhzeb lekhazeq 'et bedeq bet yhvh ulekhol 'asher yeizei 'al habayit lekhazeqah. 2_kings 12:13	'akh lo yei'aseh bet yhvh sipot kesef mezamerot mizraqot khazozerot kal keli zahab ukheli khasef min hakesef hamuba bet yhvh. 2_kings 12:14	ki le'osei hamelakhah yitenuhu vekhizequ bo 'et bet yhvh. 2_kings 12:15	velo yekhashebu 'et ha'anashim 'asher yitenu 'et hakesef 'al yadam latet le'osei hamelakhah ki be'emunah hem 'osim. 2_kings 12:16	kesef 'asham vekhesef khata'ot lo yuba bet yhvh lakohanim yihyu. 2_kings 12:17	'az ya'aleh khaza'el melekh 'aram vayilakhem 'al gat vayilkedah vayasem khaza'el panav la'alot 'al yerushalim. 2_kings 12:18	vayiqakh yeho'ash melekh yehudah 'et kal haqodashim 'asher hiqdishu yehoshafat vihoram va'akhazyahu 'abotav malkhei yehudah ve'et qodashav ve'et kal hazahab hanimza be'ozerot bet yhvh ubet hamelekh vayishlakh lakhaza'el melekh 'aram vaya'al mei'al yerushalim. 2_kings 12:19	veyeter dibrei yo'ash vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 12:20	vayaqumu 'abadav vayiqsheru qasher vayaku 'et yo'ash bet milo hayored sila. 2_kings 12:21	veyozabad benoshi me'at vihozabad ben shomer 'abadav hikuhu vayamot vayiqberu 'oto 'im 'abotav be'ir david vayimlokh 'amazyah beno takhtav. 2_kings 13:1	bishnat 'esrim veshalosh shanah leyo'ash ben 'akhazyahu melekh yehudah malakh yeho'akhaz ben yeihu 'al yisra'el beshomeron sheba' 'esreh shanah. 2_kings 13:2	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh vayeilekh 'akhar khatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el lo sar mimenah. 2_kings 13:3	vayikhar 'af yhvh beyisra'el vayitenem beyad khaza'el melekh 'aram ubeyad ben hadad ben khaza'el kal hayamim. 2_kings 13:4	vaykhal yeho'akhaz 'et penei yhvh vayishma' 'eilav yhvh ki ra'ah 'et lakhaz yisra'el ki lakhaz 'otam melekh 'aram. 2_kings 13:5	vayiten yhvh leyisra'el moshia' vayeize'u mitakhat yad 'aram vayeishebu benei yisra'el be'aholeihem kitmol shilshom. 2_kings 13:6	'akh lo saru meikhatot bet yarabe'am 'asher hekheti hekheti 'et yisra'el bah halakh vegam ha'asheirah 'amedah beshomeron. 2_kings 13:7	ki lo hish'ir liho'akhaz 'am ki 'im khamishim parashim va'asarah rekheb va'aseret 'alafim ragli ki 'ibedam melekh 'aram vaysimem ke'afar ladush. 2_kings 13:8	veyeter dibrei yeho'akhaz vekhal 'asher 'asah ugeburato halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 13:9	vayishkab yeho'akhaz 'im 'abotav vayiqberuhu beshomeron vayimlokh yo'ash beno takhtav. 2_kings 13:10	bishnat sheloshim vasheba' shanah leyo'ash melekh yehudah malakh yeho'ash ben yeho'akhaz 'al yisra'el beshomeron shesh 'esreh shanah. 2_kings 13:11	vaya'aseh hara' be'einei yhvh lo sar mikal khatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el bah halakh. 2_kings 13:12	veyeter dibrei yo'ash vekhal 'asher 'asah ugeburato 'asher nilkham 'im 'amazyah melekh yehudah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 13:13	vayishkab yo'ash 'im 'abotav veyarabe'am yashab 'al kis'o vayiqaber yo'ash beshomeron 'im malkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 13:14	ve'elisha' khalah 'et khaleyo 'asher yamut bo vayeired 'eilav yo'ash melekh yisra'el vayeibek 'al panav vayomar 'abi 'abi rekheb yisra'el ufarashav. 2_kings 13:15	vayomer lo 'elisha' qakh qeshet vekhizim vayiqakh 'eilav qeshet vekhizim. 2_kings 13:16	vayomer lemelekh yisra'el harkeb yadekha 'al haqeshet vayarkeb yado vayasem 'elisha' yadav 'al yedei hamelekh. 2_kings 13:17	vayomer petakh hakhalon qeidemah vayiftakh vayomer 'elisha' yereh vayor vayomer khez teshu'ah yhvh vekhez teshu'ah ba'aram vehikita 'et 'aram ba'afeq 'ad kaleh. 2_kings 13:18	vayomer qakh hakhizim vayiqakh vayomer lemelekh yisra'el hakh 'arzah vayakh shalosh pe'amim vaya'amod. 2_kings 13:19	vayiqzof 'alav 'ish ha'elohim vayomer lehakot khamesh 'o shesh pe'amim 'az hikita 'et 'aram 'ad kaleh ve'atah shalosh pe'amim takeh 'et 'aram. 2_kings 13:20	vayamat 'elisha' vayiqberuhu ugedudei mo'ab yabo'u ba'arez ba shanah. 2_kings 13:21	vayhi hem qoberim 'ish vehineh ra'u 'et hagedud vayashlikhu 'et ha'ish beqeber 'elisha' vayeilekh vayiga' ha'ish be'azmot 'elisha' vaykhi vayaqam 'al raglav. 2_kings 13:22	vakhaza'el melekh 'aram lakhaz 'et yisra'el kol yemei yeho'akhaz. 2_kings 13:23	vayakhan yhvh 'otam vayrakhamem vayifen 'aleihem lema'an berito 'et 'abraham yizkhaq veya'aqob velo 'abah hashkhitam velo hishlikham mei'al panav 'ad 'atah. 2_kings 13:24	vayamat khaza'el melekh 'aram vayimlokh ben hadad beno takhtav. 2_kings 13:25	vayashab yeho'ash ben yeho'akhaz vayiqakh 'et he'arim miyad ben hadad ben khaza'el 'asher laqakh miyad yeho'akhaz 'abiv bamilkhamah shalosh pe'amim hikahu yo'ash vayasheb 'et 'arei yisra'el. 2_kings 14:1	bishnat shetayim leyo'ash ben yo'akhaz melekh yisra'el malakh 'amazyahu ben yo'ash melekh yehudah. 2_kings 14:2	ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah bemalekho ve'esrim vateisha' shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yeho'adin yeho'adan min yerushalim. 2_kings 14:3	vaya'as hayashar be'einei yhvh raq lo kedavid 'abiv kekhol 'asher 'asah yo'ash 'abiv 'asah. 2_kings 14:4	raq habamot lo saru 'od ha'am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. 2_kings 14:5	vayhi ka'asher khazeqah hamamlakhah beyado vayakh 'et 'abadav hamakim 'et hamelekh 'abiv. 2_kings 14:6	ve'et benei hamakim lo heimit kakatub beseifer torat mosheh 'asher zivah yhvh leimor lo yumetu 'abot 'al banim ubanim lo yumetu 'al 'abot ki 'im 'ish bekhet'o yamut yumat. 2_kings 14:7	hu hikah 'et 'edom begei hamelakh melakh 'aseret 'alafim vetafas 'et hasela' bamilkhamah vayiqra 'et shemah yaqete'el 'ad hayom hazeh. 2_kings 14:8	'az shalakh 'amazyah mal'akhim 'el yeho'ash ben yeho'akhaz ben yeihu melekh yisra'el leimor lekhah nitra'eh fanim. 2_kings 14:9	vayishlakh yeho'ash melekh yisra'el 'el 'amazyahu melekh yehudah leimor hakhoakh 'asher balebanon lakh 'el ha'erez 'asher balebanon leimor tenah 'et bitekha libni le'ishah vata'abor khayat hasadeh 'asher balebanon vatirmos 'et hakhoakh. 2_kings 14:10	hakeh hikita 'et 'edom unesa'akha libekha hikabed vesheb bebeitekha velamah titgareh bera'ah venafaltah 'atah vihudah 'imakh. 2_kings 14:11	velo shama' 'amazyahu vaya'al yeho'ash melekh yisra'el vayitra'u fanim hu va'amazyahu melekh yehudah bebet shemesh 'asher lihudah. 2_kings 14:12	vayinagef yehudah lifnei yisra'el vayanusu 'ish le'aholo le'ohalav. 2_kings 14:13	ve'et 'amazyahu melekh yehudah ben yeho'ash ben 'akhazyahu tafas yeho'ash melekh yisra'el bebet shamesh vayabo'u vayabo yerushalim vayifroz bekhomat yerushalim besha'ar 'efrayim 'ad sha'ar hapinah 'arba' mei'ot 'amah. 2_kings 14:14	velaqakh 'et kal hazahab vehakesef ve'et kal hakeilim hanimze'im bet yhvh ube'ozerot bet hamelekh ve'et benei hata'arubot vayashab shomeronah. 2_kings 14:15	veyeter dibrei yeho'ash 'asher 'asah ugeburato va'asher nilkham 'im 'amazyahu melekh yehudah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 14:16	vayishkab yeho'ash 'im 'abotav vayiqaber beshomeron 'im malkhei yisra'el vayimlokh yarabe'am beno takhtav. 2_kings 14:17	vaykhi 'amazyahu ben yo'ash melekh yehudah 'akharei mot yeho'ash ben yeho'akhaz melekh yisra'el khamesh 'esreh shanah. 2_kings 14:18	veyeter dibrei 'amazyahu halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 14:19	vayiqsheru 'alav qesher birushalim vayanas lakhishah vayishlekhu 'akharav lakhishah vaymituhu sham. 2_kings 14:20	vayis'u 'oto 'al hasusim vayiqaber birushalim 'im 'abotav be'ir david. 2_kings 14:21	vayiqkhu kal 'am yehudah 'et 'azaryah vehu ben shesh 'esreh shanah vayamlikhu 'oto takhat 'abiv 'amazyahu. 2_kings 14:22	hu banah 'et 'eilat vayshibeha lihudah 'akharei shekhab hamelekh 'im 'abotav. 2_kings 14:23	bishnat khamesh 'esreh shanah la'amazyahu ben yo'ash melekh yehudah malakh yarabe'am ben yo'ash melekh yisra'el beshomeron 'arba'im ve'akhat shanah. 2_kings 14:24	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh lo sar mikal khatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. 2_kings 14:25	hu heishib 'et gebul yisra'el milebo khamat 'ad yam ha'arabah kidbar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher diber beyad 'abdo yonah ben 'amitai hanabi 'asher migat hakheifer. 2_kings 14:26	ki ra'ah yhvh 'et 'oni yisra'el moreh me'od ve'efes 'azur ve'efes 'azub ve'en 'ozer leyisra'el. 2_kings 14:27	velo diber yhvh limkhot 'et shem yisra'el mitakhat hashamayim vayoshi'em beyad yarabe'am ben yo'ash. 2_kings 14:28	veyeter dibrei yarabe'am vekhal 'asher 'asah ugeburato 'asher nilkham va'asher heishib 'et dameseq ve'et khamat lihudah beyisra'el halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 14:29	vayishkab yarabe'am 'im 'abotav 'im malkhei yisra'el vayimlokh zekharyah beno takhtav. 2_kings 15:1	bishnat 'esrim vasheba' shanah leyarabe'am melekh yisra'el malakh 'azaryah ben 'amazyah melekh yehudah. 2_kings 15:2	ben shesh 'esreh shanah hayah bemalekho vakhamishim ushetayim shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yekhaleyahu mirushalim. 2_kings 15:3	vaya'as hayashar be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asah 'amazyahu 'abiv. 2_kings 15:4	raq habamot lo saru 'od ha'am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot. 2_kings 15:5	vaynaga' yhvh 'et hamelekh vayhi mezora' 'ad yom moto vayeisheb bebet hakhafeshit veyotam ben hamelekh 'al habayit shofet 'et 'am ha'arez. 2_kings 15:6	veyeter dibrei 'azaryahu vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 15:7	vayishkab 'azaryah 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto 'im 'abotav be'ir david vayimlokh yotam beno takhtav. 2_kings 15:8	bishnat sheloshim ushemoneh shanah la'azaryahu melekh yehudah malakh zekharyahu ben yarabe'am 'al yisra'el beshomeron shishah khodashim. 2_kings 15:9	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh ka'asher 'asu 'abotav lo sar meikhatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. 2_kings 15:10	vayiqshor 'alav shalum ben yabesh vayakeihu qabale'am 'am vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav. 2_kings 15:11	veyeter dibrei zekharyah hinam ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 15:12	hu debar yhvh 'asher diber 'el yeihu leimor benei rebi'im yeishebu lekha 'al kisei yisra'el vayhi khen. 2_kings 15:13	shalum ben yabesh malakh bishnat sheloshim vateisha' shanah le'uziyah melekh yehudah vayimlokh yerakh yamim beshomeron. 2_kings 15:14	vaya'al menakhem ben gadi mitirzah vayabo shomeron vayakh 'et shalum ben yabesh beshomeron vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav. 2_kings 15:15	veyeter dibrei shalum veqishro 'asher qashar hinam ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 15:16	'az yakeh menakhem 'et tifsakh ve'et kal 'asher bah ve'et gebuleha mitirzah ki lo fatakh vayakh 'et kal heharoteha biqeia'. 2_kings 15:17	bishnat sheloshim vateisha' shanah la'azaryah melekh yehudah malakh menakhem ben gadi 'al yisra'el 'eser shanim beshomeron. 2_kings 15:18	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh lo sar mei'al khatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el kal yamav. 2_kings 15:19	ba ful melekh 'ashur 'al ha'arez vayiten menakhem leful 'elef kikar kasef lihyot yadav 'ito lehakhaziq hamamlakhah beyado. 2_kings 15:20	vayozei menakhem 'et hakesef 'al yisra'el 'al kal giborei hakhayil latet lemelekh 'ashur khamishim sheqalim kesef le'ish 'ekhad vayashab melekh 'ashur velo 'amad sham ba'arez. 2_kings 15:21	veyeter dibrei menakhem vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 15:22	vayishkab menakhem 'im 'abotav vayimlokh peqakhyah beno takhtav. 2_kings 15:23	bishnat khamishim shanah la'azaryah melekh yehudah malakh peqakhyah ben menakhem 'al yisra'el beshomeron shenatayim. 2_kings 15:24	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh lo sar meikhatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. 2_kings 15:25	vayiqshor 'alav peqakh ben remalyahu shalisho vayakeihu beshomeron be'armon bet melekh hamelekh 'et 'argob ve'et ha'aryeh ve'imo khamishim 'ish mibenei gil'adim vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav. 2_kings 15:26	veyeter dibrei feqakhyah vekhal 'asher 'asah hinam ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 15:27	bishnat khamishim ushetayim shanah la'azaryah melekh yehudah malakh peqakh ben remalyahu 'al yisra'el beshomeron 'esrim shanah. 2_kings 15:28	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh lo sar min khatot yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el. 2_kings 15:29	bimei peqakh melekh yisra'el ba tiglat pil'eser melekh 'ashur vayiqakh 'et 'iyon ve'et 'abel bet ma'akhah ve'et yanoakh ve'et qedesh ve'et khazor ve'et hagil'ad ve'et hagalilah kol 'erez naftali vayaglem 'ashurah. 2_kings 15:30	vayiqshar qesher hosheia' ben 'eilah 'al peqakh ben remalyahu vayakeihu vaymiteihu vayimlokh takhtav bishnat 'esrim leyotam ben 'uziyah. 2_kings 15:31	veyeter dibrei feqakh vekhal 'asher 'asah hinam ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra'el. 2_kings 15:32	bishnat shetayim lefeqakh ben remalyahu melekh yisra'el malakh yotam ben 'uziyahu melekh yehudah. 2_kings 15:33	ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah bemalekho veshesh 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yerusha bat zadoq. 2_kings 15:34	vaya'as hayashar be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asah 'uziyahu 'abiv 'asah. 2_kings 15:35	raq habamot lo saru 'od ha'am mezabekhim umeqaterim babamot hu banah 'et sha'ar bet yhvh ha'elyon. 2_kings 15:36	veyeter dibrei yotam 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 15:37	bayamim hahem heikhel yhvh lehashliakh bihudah rezin melekh 'aram ve'et peqakh ben remalyahu. 2_kings 15:38	vayishkab yotam 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david 'abiv vayimlokh 'akhaz beno takhtav. 2_kings 16:1	bishnat sheba' 'esreh shanah lefeqakh ben remalyahu malakh 'akhaz ben yotam melekh yehudah. 2_kings 16:2	ben 'esrim shanah 'akhaz bemalekho veshesh 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim velo 'asah hayashar be'einei yhvh 'elohav kedavid 'abiv. 2_kings 16:3	vayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra'el vegam 'et beno he'ebir ba'esh keto'abot hagoyim 'asher horish yhvh 'otam mipenei benei yisra'el. 2_kings 16:4	vayzabeiakh vayqater babamot ve'al hageba'ot vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan. 2_kings 16:5	'az ya'aleh rezin melekh 'aram ufeqakh ben remalyahu melekh yisra'el yerushalim lamilkhamah vayazuru 'al 'akhaz velo yakhelu lehilakhem. 2_kings 16:6	ba'et hahi heishib rezin melekh 'aram 'et 'eilat la'aram vaynashel 'et hayhudim mei'eilot va'aramim va'adomim ba'u 'eilat vayeishebu sham 'ad hayom hazeh. 2_kings 16:7	vayishlakh 'akhaz mal'akhim 'el tiglat peleser melekh 'ashur leimor 'abdekha ubinkha 'ani 'aleh vehoshi'eini mikaf melekh 'aram umikaf melekh yisra'el haqomim 'alai. 2_kings 16:8	vayiqakh 'akhaz 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab hanimza bet yhvh ube'ozerot bet hamelekh vayishlakh lemelekh 'ashur shokhad. 2_kings 16:9	vayishma' 'eilav melekh 'ashur vaya'al melekh 'ashur 'el dameseq vayitpeseha vayagleha qirah ve'et rezin heimit. 2_kings 16:10	vayeilekh hamelekh 'akhaz liqrat tiglat pil'eser melekh 'ashur dumeseq vayar 'et hamizbeiakh 'asher bedamaseq vayishlakh hamelekh 'akhaz 'el 'uriyah hakohen 'et demut hamizbeiakh ve'et tabnito lekhal ma'aseihu. 2_kings 16:11	vayiben 'uriyah hakohen 'et hamizbeiakh kekhol 'asher shalakh hamelekh 'akhaz midameseq ken 'asah 'uriyah hakohen 'ad bo hamelekh 'akhaz midamaseq. 2_kings 16:12	vayabo hamelekh midameseq vayar hamelekh 'et hamizbeiakh vayiqrab hamelekh 'al hamizbeiakh vaya'al 'alav. 2_kings 16:13	vayaqter 'et 'olato ve'et minkhato vayasekh 'et nisko vayizroq 'et dam hashelamim 'asher lo 'al hamizbeiakh. 2_kings 16:14	ve'et hamizbakh hanekhoshet 'asher lifnei yhvh vayaqreb mei'et penei habayit miben hamizbeiakh umiben bet yhvh vayiten 'oto 'al yerekh hamizbeiakh zafonah. 2_kings 16:15	vayzaveihu vayzaveh hamelekh 'akhaz 'et 'uriyah hakohen leimor 'al hamizbeiakh hagadol haqter 'et 'olat haboqer ve'et minkhat ha'ereb ve'et 'olat hamelekh ve'et minkhato ve'et 'olat kal 'am ha'arez uminkhatam veniskeihem vekhal dam 'olah vekhal dam zebakh 'alav tizroq umizbakh hanekhoshet yihyeh li lebaqer. 2_kings 16:16	vaya'as 'uriyah hakohen kekhol 'asher zivah hamelekh 'akhaz. 2_kings 16:17	vayqazez hamelekh 'akhaz 'et hamisgerot hamekhonot vayasar mei'aleihem ve'et 'et hakiyor ve'et hayam horid mei'al habaqar hanekhoshet 'asher takhteha vayiten 'oto 'al marzefet 'abanim. 2_kings 16:18	ve'et misakh musakh hashabat 'asher banu babayit ve'et mebo hamelekh hakhizonah heiseb bet yhvh mipenei melekh 'ashur. 2_kings 16:19	veyeter dibrei 'akhaz 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 16:20	vayishkab 'akhaz 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david vayimlokh khizqiyahu beno takhtav. 2_kings 17:1	bishnat shetem 'esreh le'akhaz melekh yehudah malakh hosheia' ben 'eilah beshomeron 'al yisra'el teisha' shanim. 2_kings 17:2	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh raq lo kemalkhei yisra'el 'asher hayu lefanav. 2_kings 17:3	'alav 'alah shalman'eser melekh 'ashur vayhi lo hosheia' 'ebed vayasheb lo minkhah. 2_kings 17:4	vayimza melekh 'ashur behosheia' qesher 'asher shalakh mal'akhim 'el so melekh mizrayim velo he'elah minkhah lemelekh 'ashur keshanah beshanah vaya'azreihu melekh 'ashur vaya'asreihu bet kele. 2_kings 17:5	vaya'al melekh 'ashur bekhal ha'arez vaya'al shomeron vayazar 'aleha shalosh shanim. 2_kings 17:6	bishnat hateshi'it lehosheia' lakhad melekh 'ashur 'et shomeron vayegel 'et yisra'el 'ashurah vayosheb 'otam bakhlakh ubekhabor nehar gozan ve'arei madai. 2_kings 17:7	vayhi ki khate'u benei yisra'el yhvh 'eloheihem hama'aleh 'otam mei'erez mizrayim mitakhat yad par'oh melekh mizrayim vayire'u 'elohim 'akheirim. 2_kings 17:8	vayeilekhu bekhuqot hagoyim 'asher horish yhvh mipenei benei yisra'el umalkhei yisra'el 'asher 'asu. 2_kings 17:9	vaykhape'u benei yisra'el debarim 'asher lo khen 'al yhvh 'eloheihem vayibnu lahem bamot bekhal 'areihem mimigdal nozrim 'ad 'ir mibzar. 2_kings 17:10	vayazibu lahem mazeibot va'asheirim 'al kal gib'ah gebohah vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan. 2_kings 17:11	vayqateru sham bekhal bamot kagoyim 'asher heglah yhvh mipeneihem vaya'asu debarim ra'im lehakh'is 'et yhvh. 2_kings 17:12	vaya'abdu hagilulim 'asher 'amar yhvh lahem lo ta'asu 'et hadabar hazeh. 2_kings 17:13	vaya'ad yhvh beyisra'el ubihudah beyad kal nebi'o nebi'ei khal khozeh leimor bu midarkheikhem hara'im veshimru mizvotai khuqotai kekhal hatorah 'asher ziviti 'et 'aboteikhem va'asher shalakhti 'aleikhem beyad 'abadai hanebi'im. 2_kings 17:14	velo shamei'u vayaqshu 'et 'arepam ke'oref 'abotam 'asher lo he'eminu yhvh 'eloheihem. 2_kings 17:15	vayim'asu 'et khuqav ve'et berito 'asher karat 'et 'abotam ve'et 'eidevotav 'asher hei'id bam vayeilekhu 'akharei hahebel vayehbalu ve'akharei hagoyim 'asher sebibotam 'asher zivah yhvh 'otam lebilti 'asot kahem. 2_kings 17:16	vaya'azbu 'et kal mizvot yhvh 'eloheihem vaya'asu lahem maseikhah shenem shenei 'agalim vaya'asu 'asheirah vayishtakhavu lekhal zeba hashamayim vaya'abdu 'et haba'al. 2_kings 17:17	vaya'abiru 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem ba'esh vayiqsemu qesamim vaynakheishu vayitmakeru la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh lehakh'iso. 2_kings 17:18	vayit'anaf yhvh me'od beyisra'el vaysirem mei'al panav lo nish'ar raq sheibet yehudah lebado. 2_kings 17:19	gam yehudah lo shamar 'et mizvot yhvh 'eloheihem vayeilekhu bekhuqot yisra'el 'asher 'asu. 2_kings 17:20	vayim'as yhvh bekhal zera' yisra'el vai'anem vayitenem beyad shosim 'ad 'asher hishlikham mipanav. 2_kings 17:21	ki qara' yisra'el mei'al bet david vayamlikhu 'et yarabe'am ben nebat vayadei vayadakh yarabe'am 'et yisra'el mei'akharei yhvh vehekhetei'am khata'ah gedolah. 2_kings 17:22	vayeilekhu benei yisra'el bekhal khatot yarabe'am 'asher 'asah lo saru mimenah. 2_kings 17:23	'ad 'asher heisir yhvh 'et yisra'el mei'al panav ka'asher diber beyad kal 'abadav hanebi'im vayigel yisra'el mei'al 'admato 'ashurah 'ad hayom hazeh. 2_kings 17:24	vayabei melekh 'ashur mibabel umikutah umei'ava umeikhamat usefarvayim vayosheb be'arei shomeron takhat benei yisra'el vayirshu 'et shomeron vayeishebu be'areha. 2_kings 17:25	vayhi bitkhilat shibtam sham lo yare'u 'et yhvh vayshalakh yhvh bahem 'et ha'arayot vayihyu horegim bahem. 2_kings 17:26	vayomeru lemelekh 'ashur leimor hagoyim 'asher higlita vatosheb be'arei shomeron lo yade'u 'et mishpat 'elohei ha'arez vayshalakh bam 'et ha'arayot vehinam memitim 'otam ka'asher 'einam yode'im 'et mishpat 'elohei ha'arez. 2_kings 17:27	vayzav melekh 'ashur leimor holikhu shamah 'ekhad meihakohanim 'asher higlitem misham veyeilekhu veyeishebu sham veyorem 'et mishpat 'elohei ha'arez. 2_kings 17:28	vayabo 'ekhad meihakohanim 'asher higlu mishomeron vayeisheb bebet 'el vayhi moreh 'otam 'ekh yire'u 'et yhvh. 2_kings 17:29	vayihyu 'osim go go 'elohav vayanikhu bebet habamot 'asher 'asu hashomeronim go go be'areihem 'asher hem yoshebim sham. 2_kings 17:30	ve'anshei babel 'asu 'et sukot benot ve'anshei khut 'asu 'et neiregal ve'anshei khamat 'asu 'et 'ashima. 2_kings 17:31	veha'avim 'asu nibkhaz ve'et tartaq vehasfarvim sorefim 'et beneihem ba'esh le'adramelekh va'anamelekh 'eloah 'elohei sefarim sefarvayim. 2_kings 17:32	vayihyu yerei'im 'et yhvh vaya'asu lahem miqzotam kohanei bamot vayihyu 'osim lahem bebet habamot. 2_kings 17:33	'et yhvh hayu yerei'im ve'et 'eloheihem hayu 'obedim kemishpat hagoyim 'asher higlu 'otam misham. 2_kings 17:34	'ad hayom hazeh hem 'osim kamishpatim harishonim 'einam yerei'im 'et yhvh ve'einam 'osim kekhuqotam ukhemishpatam vekhatorah vekhamizvah 'asher zivah yhvh 'et benei ya'aqob 'asher sam shemo yisra'el. 2_kings 17:35	vayikhrot yhvh 'itam berit vayzavem leimor lo tire'u 'elohim 'akheirim velo tishtakhavu lahem velo ta'abdum velo tizbekhu lahem. 2_kings 17:36	ki 'im 'et yhvh 'asher he'elah 'etkhem mei'erez mizrayim bekhoakh gadol ubizroa' netuyah 'oto tira'u velo tishtakhavu velo tizbakhu. 2_kings 17:37	ve'et hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim vehatorah vehamizvah 'asher katab lakhem tishmerun la'asot kal hayamim velo tire'u 'elohim 'akheirim. 2_kings 17:38	vehaberit 'asher karati 'itekhem lo tishkakhu velo tire'u 'elohim 'akheirim. 2_kings 17:39	ki 'im 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem tira'u vehu yazil 'etkhem miyad kal 'oyebeikhem. 2_kings 17:40	velo shamei'u ki 'im kemishpatam harishon hem 'osim. 2_kings 17:41	vayihyu hagoyim ha'eleh yerei'im 'et yhvh ve'et pesileihem hayu 'obedim gam beneihem ubenei beneihem ka'asher 'asu 'abotam hem 'osim 'ad hayom hazeh. 2_kings 18:1	vayhi bishnat shalosh lehosheia' ben 'eilah melekh yisra'el malakh khizqiyah ben 'akhaz melekh yehudah. 2_kings 18:2	ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah bemalekho ve'esrim vateisha' shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'abi bat zekharyah. 2_kings 18:3	vaya'as hayashar be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asah david 'abiv. 2_kings 18:4	hu heisir 'et habamot veshibar 'et hamazeibot vekharat 'et ha'asheirah vekhitat nekhash hanekhoshet 'asher 'asah mosheh ki 'ad hayamim hahemah hayu benei yisra'el meqaterim lo vayiqra lo nekhushtan. 2_kings 18:5	yhvh 'elohei yisra'el batakh ve'akharav lo hayah khamohu bekhol malkhei yehudah va'asher hayu lefanav. 2_kings 18:6	vayidbaq yhvh lo sar mei'akharav vayishmor mizvotav 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh. 2_kings 18:7	vehayah yhvh 'imo bekhol 'asher yeizei yaskil vayimrod bemelekh 'ashur velo 'abado. 2_kings 18:8	hu hikah 'et pelishtim 'ad 'azah ve'et gebuleha mimigdal nozrim 'ad 'ir mibzar. 2_kings 18:9	vayhi bashanah harebi'it lamelekh khizqiyahu hi hashanah hashebi'it lehosheia' ben 'eilah melekh yisra'el 'alah shalman'eser melekh 'ashur 'al shomeron vayazar 'aleha. 2_kings 18:10	vayilkeduha miqzeh shalosh shanim bishnat shesh lekhizqiyah hi shenat teisha' lehosheia' melekh yisra'el nilkedah shomeron. 2_kings 18:11	vayegel melekh 'ashur 'et yisra'el 'ashurah vayankhem bakhlakh ubekhabor nehar gozan ve'arei madai. 2_kings 18:12	'al 'asher lo shame'u beqol yhvh 'eloheihem vaya'abru 'et berito 'et kal 'asher zivah mosheh 'ebed yhvh velo shame'u velo 'asu. 2_kings 18:13	ube'arba' 'esreh shanah lamelekh khizqiyah 'alah sankheirib melekh 'ashur 'al kal 'arei yehudah habezurot vayitpesem. 2_kings 18:14	vayishlakh khizqiyah melekh yehudah 'el melekh 'ashur lakhishah leimor khatati shub mei'alai 'et 'asher titen 'alai 'esa vayasem melekh 'ashur 'al khizqiyah melekh yehudah shelosh mei'ot kikar kesef usheloshim kikar zahab. 2_kings 18:15	vayiten khizqiyah 'et kal hakesef hanimza bet yhvh ube'ozerot bet hamelekh. 2_kings 18:16	ba'et hahi qizaz khizqiyah 'et daltot heikhal yhvh ve'et ha'omenot 'asher zipah khizqiyah melekh yehudah vayitenem lemelekh 'ashur. 2_kings 18:17	vayishlakh melekh 'ashur 'et tartan ve'et rab saris ve'et rab shaqeh min lakhish 'el hamelekh khizqiyahu bekhel kabed yerushalim vaya'alu vayabo'u yerushalim vaya'alu vayabo'u vaya'amdu bit'alat habereikhah ha'elyonah 'asher bimsilat sedeh khobes. 2_kings 18:18	vayiqre'u 'el hamelekh vayeizei 'aleihem 'elyaqim ben khilqiyahu 'asher 'al habayit veshebnah hasofer veyo'akh ben 'asaf hamazkir. 2_kings 18:19	vayomer 'aleihem rab shaqeh 'imru na 'el khizqiyahu koh 'amar hamelekh hagadol melekh 'ashur mah habitakhon hazeh 'asher batakheta. 2_kings 18:20	'amarta 'akh debar sefatayim 'eizah ugeburah lamilkhamah 'atah 'al mi batakhta ki maradta bi. 2_kings 18:21	'atah hineh batakhta lekha 'al mish'enet haqaneh harazuz hazeh 'al mizrayim 'asher yisamekh 'ish 'alav uba bekhapo uneqabah ken par'oh melekh mizrayim lekhal habotekhim 'alav. 2_kings 18:22	vekhi tomerun 'eilai 'el yhvh 'eloheinu batakhenu halo hu 'asher heisir khizqiyahu 'et bamotav ve'et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim lifnei hamizbeiakh hazeh tishtakhavu birushalim. 2_kings 18:23	ve'atah hit'areb na 'et 'adoni 'et melekh 'ashur ve'etenah lekha 'alpayim susim 'im tukhal latet lekha rokhebim 'aleihem. 2_kings 18:24	ve'ekh tashib 'et penei fakhat 'akhad 'abdei 'adoni haqetanim vatibtakh lekha 'al mizrayim lerekheb ulefarashim. 2_kings 18:25	'atah hamibal'adei yhvh 'aliti 'al hamaqom hazeh lehashkhito yhvh 'amar 'eilai 'aleh 'al ha'arez hazot vehashkhitah. 2_kings 18:26	vayomer 'elyaqim ben khilqiyahu veshebnah veyo'akh 'el rab shaqeh daber na 'el 'abadekha 'aramit ki shome'im 'anakhenu ve'al tedaber 'imanu yehudit be'azenei ha'am 'asher 'al hakhomah. 2_kings 18:27	vayomer 'aleihem rab shaqeh ha'al 'adonekha ve'eilekha shelakhani 'adoni ledaber 'et hadebarim ha'eleh halo 'al ha'anashim hayoshebim 'al hakhomah le'ekhol 'et khareihem zo'atam velishtot 'et sheineihem meimei ragleihem 'imakhem. 2_kings 18:28	vaya'amod rab shaqeh vayiqra beqol gadol yehudit vaydaber vayomer shim'u debar hamelekh hagadol melekh 'ashur. 2_kings 18:29	koh 'amar hamelekh 'al yashi lakhem khizqiyahu ki lo yukhal lehazil 'etkhem miyado. 2_kings 18:30	ve'al yabtakh 'etkhem khizqiyahu 'el yhvh leimor hazel yazileinu yhvh velo tinaten 'et ha'ir hazot beyad melekh 'ashur. 2_kings 18:31	'al tishme'u 'el khizqiyahu ki khoh 'amar melekh 'ashur 'asu 'iti berakhah uze'u 'eilai ve'ikhlu 'ish gafno ve'ish te'einato ushetu 'ish mei boro. 2_kings 18:32	'ad bo'i velaqakhti 'etkhem 'el 'erez ke'arzekhem 'erez dagan vetirosh 'erez lekhem ukheramim 'erez zet yizhar udebash vikhyu velo tamutu ve'al tishme'u 'el khizqiyahu ki yasit 'etkhem leimor yhvh yazileinu. 2_kings 18:33	hahazel hizilu 'elohei hagoyim 'ish 'et 'arzo miyad melekh 'ashur. 2_kings 18:34	'ayeh 'elohei khamat ve'arpad 'ayeh 'elohei sefarvayim heina' ve'ivah ki hizilu 'et shomeron miyadi. 2_kings 18:35	mi bekhal 'elohei ha'arazot 'asher hizilu 'et 'arzam miyadi ki yazil yhvh 'et yerushalim miyadi. 2_kings 18:36	vehekherishu ha'am velo 'anu 'oto dabar ki mizvat hamelekh hi leimor lo ta'anuhu. 2_kings 18:37	vayabo 'elyaqim ben khilqiyah 'asher 'al habayit veshebna hasofer veyo'akh ben 'asaf hamazkir 'el khizqiyahu qeru'ei begadim vayagidu lo dibrei rab shaqeh. 2_kings 19:1	vayhi kishmoa' hamelekh khizqiyahu vayiqra' 'et begadav vayitkas basaq vayabo bet yhvh. 2_kings 19:2	vayishlakh 'et 'elyaqim 'asher 'al habayit veshebna hasofer ve'et ziqnei hakohanim mitkasim basaqim 'el yesha'yahu hanabi ben 'amoz. 2_kings 19:3	vayomeru 'eilav koh 'amar khizqiyahu yom zarah vetokheikhah une'azah hayom hazeh ki ba'u banim 'ad mashber vekhoakh 'ayin leleidah. 2_kings 19:4	'ulai yishma' yhvh 'elohekha 'et kal dibrei rab shaqeh 'asher shelakho melekh 'ashur 'adonav lekharef 'elohim khai vehokhiakh badebarim 'asher shama' yhvh 'elohekha venasata tefilah be'ad hashe'eirit hanimza'ah. 2_kings 19:5	vayabo'u 'abdei hamelekh khizqiyahu 'el yesha'ayahu. 2_kings 19:6	vayomer lahem yesha'yahu koh tomerun 'el 'adoneikhem koh 'amar yhvh 'al tira mipenei hadebarim 'asher shama'ta 'asher gidefu na'arei melekh 'ashur 'oti. 2_kings 19:7	hini noten bo ruakh veshama' shemu'ah veshab le'arzo vehipaltiv bakhereb be'arzo. 2_kings 19:8	vayashab rab shaqeh vayimza 'et melekh 'ashur nilkham 'al libnah ki shama' ki nasa' milakhish. 2_kings 19:9	vayishma' 'el tirhaqah melekh kush leimor hineh yaza lehilakhem 'itakh vayashab vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el khizqiyahu leimor. 2_kings 19:10	koh tomerun 'el khizqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor 'al yashi'akha 'elohekha 'asher 'atah boteiakh bo leimor lo tinaten yerushalim beyad melekh 'ashur. 2_kings 19:11	hineh 'atah shama'ta 'et 'asher 'asu malkhei 'ashur lekhal ha'arazot lehakharimam ve'atah tinazel. 2_kings 19:12	hahizilu 'otam 'elohei hagoyim 'asher shikhatu 'abotai 'et gozan ve'et kharan verezef ubenei 'eden 'asher bitlasar. 2_kings 19:13	'ayo melekh khamat umelekh 'arpad umelekh la'ir sefarvayim heina' ve'ivah. 2_kings 19:14	vayiqakh khizqiyahu 'et hasefarim miyad hamal'akhim vayiqra'em vaya'al bet yhvh vayifreseihu khizqiyahu lifnei yhvh. 2_kings 19:15	vayitpalel khizqiyahu lifnei yhvh vayomar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el yosheb hakerubim 'atah hu ha'elohim lebadekha lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez 'atah 'asita 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez. 2_kings 19:16	hateh yhvh 'azenekha ushama' peqakh yhvh 'einekha ure'eh ushema' 'et dibrei sankheirib 'asher shelakho lekharef 'elohim khai. 2_kings 19:17	'amenam yhvh hekheribu malkhei 'ashur 'et hagoyim ve'et 'arzam. 2_kings 19:18	venatenu 'et 'eloheihem ba'esh ki lo 'elohim hemah ki 'im ma'aseh yedei 'adam 'ez va'eben vai'abedum. 2_kings 19:19	ve'atah yhvh 'eloheinu hoshi'einu na miyado veyeide'u kal mamlekhot ha'arez ki 'atah yhvh 'elohim lebadekha. 2_kings 19:20	vayishlakh yesha'yahu ben 'amoz 'el khizqiyahu leimor koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher hitpalalta 'eilai 'el sankheirib melekh 'ashur shama'eti. 2_kings 19:21	zeh hadabar 'asher diber yhvh 'alav bazah lekha la'agah lekha betulat bat ziyon 'akharekha rosh heini'ah bat yerushalim. 2_kings 19:22	'et mi kheirafta vegidafta ve'al mi harimota qol vatisa marom 'einekha 'al qedosh yisra'el. 2_kings 19:23	beyad mal'akhekha kheirafta 'adonai vatomer berekheb berob rikhbi 'ani 'aliti merom harim yarketei lebanon ve'ekhrot qomat 'arazav mibkhor beroshav ve'abo'ah melon qizoh ya'ar karmilo. 2_kings 19:24	'ani qarti veshatiti mayim zarim ve'akhrib bekhaf pe'amai kol ye'orei mazor. 2_kings 19:25	halo shama'ta lemeirakhoq 'otah 'asiti lemimei qedem vizartiha 'atah habeitiha utehi lahshot galim nizim 'arim bezurot. 2_kings 19:26	veyoshebeihen qizrei yad khatu vayeiboshu hayu 'eiseb sadeh viraq deshe khazir gagot ushedeifah lifnei qamah. 2_kings 19:27	veshibtekha vezeitekha ubo'akha yada'eti ve'et hitragezkha 'eilai. 2_kings 19:28	ya'an hitragezkha 'eilai vesha'anankha 'alah be'azenai vesamti khakhi be'apekha umitgi bisfatekha vahashibotikha baderekh 'asher bata bah. 2_kings 19:29	vezeh lekha ha'ot 'akhol hashanah safiakh ubashanah hasheinit sakhish ubashanah hashelishit zir'u veqizru venit'u kheramim ve'ikhlu firyam. 2_kings 19:30	veyasefah peleitat bet yehudah hanish'arah shoresh lematah ve'asah feri lema'elah. 2_kings 19:31	ki mirushalim teizei she'eirit ufeleitah meihar ziyon qin'at yhvh zeba'ot ta'aseh zot. 2_kings 19:32	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'el melekh 'ashur lo yabo 'el ha'ir hazot velo yoreh sham khez velo yeqademenah magen velo yishpokh 'aleha solelah. 2_kings 19:33	baderekh 'asher yabo bah yashub ve'el ha'ir hazot lo yabo ne'um yhvh. 2_kings 19:34	veganoti 'el ha'ir hazot lehoshi'ah lema'ani ulema'an david 'abdi. 2_kings 19:35	vayhi balaylah hahu vayeizei mal'akh yhvh vayakh bemakhaneh 'ashur mei'ah shemonim vakhamishah 'alef vayashkimu baboqer vehineh khulam pegarim meitim. 2_kings 19:36	vayisa' vayeilekh vayashab sankheirib melekh 'ashur vayeisheb benineveh. 2_kings 19:37	vayhi hu mishtakhaveh bet nisrokh 'elohav ve'adramelekh vesar'ezer banav hikuhu bakhereb vehemah nimletu 'erez 'ararat vayimlokh 'eisar khadon beno takhtav. 2_kings 20:1	bayamim hahem khalah khizqiyahu lamut vayabo 'eilav yesha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi vayomer 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh zav lebeitekha ki met 'atah velo tikhyeh. 2_kings 20:2	vayaseb 'et panav 'el haqir vayitpalel 'el yhvh leimor. 2_kings 20:3	'anah yhvh zekhar na 'et 'asher hithalakhti lefanekha be'emet ubeleibab shalem vehatob be'einekha 'asiti vayeibek khizqiyahu bekhi gadol. 2_kings 20:4	vayhi yesha'yahu lo yaza ha'ir khazer hatikhonah udebar yhvh hayah 'eilav leimor. 2_kings 20:5	shub ve'amarta 'el khizqiyahu negid 'ami koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei david 'abikha shama'ti 'et tefilatekha ra'iti 'et dim'atekha hini rofe lakh bayom hashelishi ta'aleh bet yhvh. 2_kings 20:6	vehosafti 'al yamekha khamesh 'esreh shanah umikaf melekh 'ashur 'azilekha ve'et ha'ir hazot veganoti 'al ha'ir hazot lema'ani ulema'an david 'abdi. 2_kings 20:7	vayomer yesha'yahu qekhu debelet te'einim vayiqkhu vayasimu 'al hashekhin vayekhi. 2_kings 20:8	vayomer khizqiyahu 'el yesha'yahu mah 'ot ki yirpa yhvh li ve'aliti bayom hashelishi bet yhvh. 2_kings 20:9	vayomer yesha'yahu zeh lekha ha'ot mei'et yhvh ki ya'aseh yhvh 'et hadabar 'asher diber halakh hazel 'eser ma'alot 'im yashub 'eser ma'alot. 2_kings 20:10	vayomer yekhizqiyahu naqel lazel lintot 'eser ma'alot lo khi yashub hazel 'akhoranit 'eser ma'alot. 2_kings 20:11	vayiqra yesha'yahu hanabi 'el yhvh vayasheb 'et hazel bama'alot 'asher yaredah bema'alot 'akhaz 'akhoranit 'eser ma'alot. 2_kings 20:12	ba'et hahi shalakh berodakh bal'adan ben bal'adan melekh babel sefarim uminkhah 'el khizqiyahu ki shama' ki khalah khizqiyahu. 2_kings 20:13	vayishma' 'aleihem khizqiyahu vayar'em 'et kal bet nekhotoh 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab ve'et habesamim ve'et shemen hatob ve'et bet keilav ve'et kal 'asher nimza be'ozrotav lo hayah dabar 'asher lo her'am khizqiyahu bebeito ubekhal memshalto. 2_kings 20:14	vayabo yesha'yahu hanabi 'el hamelekh khizqiyahu vayomer 'eilav mah 'ameru ha'anashim ha'eleh umei'ayin yabo'u 'eilekha vayomer khizqiyahu mei'erez rekhoqah ba'u mibabel. 2_kings 20:15	vayomer mah ra'u bebeitekha vayomer khizqiyahu 'et kal 'asher bebeiti ra'u lo hayah dabar 'asher lo hir'itim be'ozerotai. 2_kings 20:16	vayomer yesha'yahu 'el khizqiyahu shema' debar yhvh. 2_kings 20:17	hineh yamim ba'im venisa kal 'asher bebeitekha va'asher 'azeru 'abotekha 'ad hayom hazeh babelah lo yivater dabar 'amar yhvh. 2_kings 20:18	umibanekha 'asher yeize'u mimekha 'asher tolid yiqakh yiqakhu vehayu sarisim beheikhal melekh babel. 2_kings 20:19	vayomer khizqiyahu 'el yesha'yahu tob debar yhvh 'asher dibarta vayomer halo 'im shalom ve'emet yihyeh beyamai. 2_kings 20:20	veyeter dibrei khizqiyahu vekhal geburato va'asher 'asah 'et habereikhah ve'et hate'alah vayabei 'et hamayim ha'irah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 20:21	vayishkab khizqiyahu 'im 'abotav vayimlokh menasheh beno takhtav. 2_kings 21:1	ben shetem 'esreh shanah menasheh bemalekho vakhamishim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo khefzi bah. 2_kings 21:2	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh keto'abot hagoyim 'asher horish yhvh mipenei benei yisra'el. 2_kings 21:3	vayashab vayiben 'et habamot 'asher 'ibad khizqiyahu 'abiv vayaqem mizbekhot laba'al vaya'as 'asheirah ka'asher 'asah 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el vayishtakhu lekhal zeba hashamayim vaya'abod 'otam. 2_kings 21:4	ubanah mizbekhot bebet yhvh 'asher 'amar yhvh birushalim 'asim 'et shemi. 2_kings 21:5	vayiben mizbekhot lekhal zeba hashamayim bishtei khazrot bet yhvh. 2_kings 21:6	vehe'ebir 'et beno ba'esh ve'onen venikhesh ve'asah 'ob veyide'onim hirbah la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh lehakh'is. 2_kings 21:7	vayasem 'et pesel ha'asheirah 'asher 'asah babayit 'asher 'amar yhvh 'el david ve'el shelomoh beno babayit hazeh ubirushalim 'asher bakharti mikol shibtei yisra'el 'asim 'et shemi le'olam. 2_kings 21:8	velo 'osif lehanid regel yisra'el min ha'adamah 'asher natati la'abotam raq 'im yishmeru la'asot kekhol 'asher zivitim ulekhal hatorah 'asher zivah 'otam 'abdi mosheh. 2_kings 21:9	velo shamei'u vayat'em menasheh la'asot 'et hara' min hagoyim 'asher hishmid yhvh mipenei benei yisra'el. 2_kings 21:10	vaydaber yhvh beyad 'abadav hanebi'im leimor. 2_kings 21:11	ya'an 'asher 'asah menasheh melekh yehudah hato'eibot ha'eleh heira' mikol 'asher 'asu ha'emori 'asher lefanav vayakhati gam 'et yehudah begilulav. 2_kings 21:12	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hini meibi ra'ah 'al yerushalim vihudah 'asher kal shome'av shome'ah tizalnah shetei 'azenav. 2_kings 21:13	venatiti 'al yerushalim 'et qav shomeron ve'et mishqolet bet 'akh'ab umakhiti 'et yerushalim ka'asher yimkheh 'et hazalakhat makhah vehafakh 'al paneha. 2_kings 21:14	venatashti 'et she'eirit nakhalati unetatim beyad 'oyebeihem vehayu lebaz velimshisah lekhal 'oyebeihem. 2_kings 21:15	ya'an 'asher 'asu 'et hara' be'einai vayihyu makh'isim 'oti min hayom 'asher yaze'u 'abotam mimizrayim ve'ad hayom hazeh. 2_kings 21:16	vegam dam naqi shafakh menasheh harbeh me'od 'ad 'asher milei 'et yerushalim peh lafeh lebad meikhatato 'asher hekheti 'et yehudah la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh. 2_kings 21:17	veyeter dibrei menasheh vekhal 'asher 'asah vekhatato 'asher khata halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 21:18	vayishkab menasheh 'im 'abotav vayiqaber began beito began 'uza vayimlokh 'amon beno takhtav. 2_kings 21:19	ben 'esrim ushetayim shanah 'amon bemalekho ushetayim shanim malakh birushalim veshem 'imo meshulemet bat kharuz min yatebah. 2_kings 21:20	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh ka'asher 'asah menasheh 'abiv. 2_kings 21:21	vayeilekh bekhal haderekh 'asher halakh 'abiv vaya'abod 'et hagilulim 'asher 'abad 'abiv vayishtakhu lahem. 2_kings 21:22	vaya'azob 'et yhvh 'elohei 'abotav velo halakh bederekh yhvh. 2_kings 21:23	vayiqsheru 'abdei 'amon 'alav vayamitu 'et hamelekh bebeito. 2_kings 21:24	vayakh 'am ha'arez 'et kal haqosherim 'al hamelekh 'amon vayamlikhu 'am ha'arez 'et yoshiyahu beno takhtav. 2_kings 21:25	veyeter dibrei 'amon 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 21:26	vayiqber 'oto biqburato began 'uza vayimlokh yoshiyahu beno takhtav. 2_kings 22:1	ben shemoneh shanah yoshiyahu bemalekho usheloshim ve'akhat shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yedidah bat 'adayah mibazeqat. 2_kings 22:2	vaya'as hayashar be'einei yhvh vayeilekh bekhal derekh david 'abiv velo sar yamin usemol. 2_kings 22:3	vayhi bishmoneh 'esreh shanah lamelekh yoshiyahu shalakh hamelekh 'et shafan ben 'azalyahu ben meshulam hasofer bet yhvh leimor. 2_kings 22:4	'aleh 'el khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol veyatem 'et hakesef hamuba bet yhvh 'asher 'asefu shomerei hasaf mei'et ha'am. 2_kings 22:5	veyitenoh veyitenuhu 'al yad 'osei hamelakhah hamufqadim bebet bet yhvh veyitenu 'oto le'osei hamelakhah 'asher bebet yhvh lekhazeq bedeq habayit. 2_kings 22:6	lekharashim velabonim velagoderim veliqnot 'eizim ve'abnei makhzeb lekhazeq 'et habayit. 2_kings 22:7	'akh lo yeikhasheb 'itam hakesef hanitan 'al yadam ki be'emunah hem 'osim. 2_kings 22:8	vayomer khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol 'al shafan hasofer seifer hatorah mazati bebet yhvh vayiten khilqiyah 'et haseifer 'el shafan vayiqra'eihu. 2_kings 22:9	vayabo shafan hasofer 'el hamelekh vayasheb 'et hamelekh dabar vayomer hitikhu 'abadekha 'et hakesef hanimza babayit vayitenuhu 'al yad 'osei hamelakhah hamufqadim bet yhvh. 2_kings 22:10	vayaged shafan hasofer lamelekh leimor seifer natan li khilqiyah hakohen vayiqra'eihu shafan lifnei hamelekh. 2_kings 22:11	vayhi kishmoa' hamelekh 'et dibrei seifer hatorah vayiqra' 'et begadav. 2_kings 22:12	vayzav hamelekh 'et khilqiyah hakohen ve'et 'akhiqam benosha fan ve'et 'akhbor ben mikhayah ve'et shafan hasofer ve'et 'asayah 'ebed hamelekh leimor. 2_kings 22:13	lekhu dirshu 'et yhvh ba'adi ube'ad ha'am ube'ad kal yehudah 'al dibrei haseifer hanimza hazeh ki gedolah khamat yhvh 'asher hi nizetah banu 'al 'asher lo shame'u 'aboteinu 'al dibrei haseifer hazeh la'asot kekhal hakatub 'aleinu. 2_kings 22:14	vayeilekh khilqiyahu hakohen va'akhiqam ve'akhbor veshafan va'asayah 'el khuldah hanebi'ah 'eishet shalum ben tiqvah ben kharkhas shomer habegadim vehi yoshebet birushalim bamishneh vaydaberu 'eileha. 2_kings 22:15	vatomer 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'imru la'ish 'asher shalakh 'etkhem 'eilai. 2_kings 22:16	koh 'amar yhvh hini meibi ra'ah 'el hamaqom hazeh ve'al yoshebav 'et kal dibrei haseifer 'asher qara melekh yehudah. 2_kings 22:17	takhat 'asher 'azabuni vayqateru leilohim 'akheirim lema'an hakh'iseini bekhol ma'aseh yedeihem venizetah khamati bamaqom hazeh velo tikhbeh. 2_kings 22:18	ve'el melekh yehudah hasholeiakh 'etkhem lidrosh 'et yhvh koh tomeru 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hadebarim 'asher shama'eta. 2_kings 22:19	ya'an rakh lebabekha vatikana' mipenei yhvh beshame'akha 'asher dibarti 'al hamaqom hazeh ve'al yoshebav lihyot leshamah veliqlalah vatiqra' 'et begadekha vatibkeh lefanai vegam 'anokhi shama'ti ne'um yhvh. 2_kings 22:20	lakhen hini 'osifkha 'al 'abotekha vene'esafta 'el qibrotekha beshalom velo tir'enah 'einekha bekhol hara'ah 'asher 'ani meibi 'al hamaqom hazeh vayashibu 'et hamelekh dabar. 2_kings 23:1	vayishlakh hamelekh vaya'asfu 'eilav kal ziqnei yehudah virushalim. 2_kings 23:2	vaya'al hamelekh bet yhvh vekhal 'ish yehudah vekhal yoshebei yerushalim 'ito vehakohanim vehanebi'im vekhal ha'am lemiqaton ve'ad gadol vayiqra be'azeneihem 'et kal dibrei seifer haberit hanimza bebet yhvh. 2_kings 23:3	vaya'amod hamelekh 'al ha'amud vayikhrot 'et haberit lifnei yhvh lalekhet 'akhar yhvh velishmor mizvotav ve'et 'eidevotav ve'et khuqotav bekhal leb ubekhal nefesh lehaqim 'et dibrei haberit hazot haketubim 'al haseifer hazeh vaya'amod kal ha'am baberit. 2_kings 23:4	vayzav hamelekh 'et khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol ve'et kohanei hamishneh ve'et shomerei hasaf lehozi meiheikhal yhvh 'et kal hakeilim ha'asuyim laba'al vela'asheirah ulekhol zeba hashamayim vayisrefem mikhuz lirushalim beshadmot qidron venasa 'et 'afaram bet 'el. 2_kings 23:5	vehishbit 'et hakemarim 'asher natenu malkhei yehudah vayqater babamot be'arei yehudah umesibei yerushalim ve'et hamqaterim laba'al lashemesh velayareiakh velamazalot ulekhol zeba hashamayim. 2_kings 23:6	vayozei 'et ha'asheirah mibet yhvh mikhuz lirushalim 'el nakhal qidron vayisrof 'otah benakhal qidron vayadeq le'afar vayashlekh 'et 'afarah 'al qeber benei ha'am. 2_kings 23:7	vayitoz 'et batei haqedeishim 'asher bebet yhvh 'asher hanashim 'oregot sham batim la'asheirah. 2_kings 23:8	vayabei 'et kal hakohanim mei'arei yehudah vaytamei 'et habamot 'asher qiteru shamah hakohanim migeba' 'ad be'er shaba' venataz 'et bamot hashe'arim 'asher petakh sha'ar yehoshua' sar ha'ir 'asher 'al semol 'ish besha'ar ha'ir. 2_kings 23:9	'akh lo ya'alu kohanei habamot 'el mizbakh yhvh birushalim ki 'im 'akhelu mazot betokh 'akheihem. 2_kings 23:10	vetimei 'et hatofet 'asher begei benei ben hinom lebilti leha'abir 'ish 'et beno ve'et bito ba'esh lamolekh. 2_kings 23:11	vayashbet 'et hasusim 'asher natenu malkhei yehudah lashemesh mibo bet yhvh 'el lishkat netan melekh hasaris 'asher baparvarim ve'et markebot hashemesh saraf ba'esh. 2_kings 23:12	ve'et hamizbekhot 'asher 'al hagag 'aliyat 'akhaz 'asher 'asu malkhei yehudah ve'et hamizbekhot 'asher 'asah menasheh bishtei khazrot bet yhvh nataz hamelekh vayaraz misham vehishlikh 'et 'afaram 'el nakhal qidron. 2_kings 23:13	ve'et habamot 'asher 'al penei yerushalim 'asher mimin lehar hamashkhit 'asher banah shelomoh melekh yisra'el le'ashtoret shiquz zidonim velikhmosh shiquz mo'ab ulemilkom to'abat benei 'amon timei hamelekh. 2_kings 23:14	veshibar 'et hamazeibot vayikhrot 'et ha'asheirim vaymalei 'et meqomam 'azmot 'adam. 2_kings 23:15	vegam 'et hamizbeiakh 'asher bebet 'el habamah 'asher 'asah yarabe'am ben nebat 'asher hekheti 'et yisra'el gam 'et hamizbeiakh hahu ve'et habamah nataz vayisrof 'et habamah heidaq le'afar vesaraf 'asheirah. 2_kings 23:16	vayifen yoshiyahu vayar 'et haqebarim 'asher sham bahar vayishlakh vayiqakh 'et ha'azamot min haqebarim vayisrof 'al hamizbeiakh vaytame'eihu kidbar yhvh 'asher qara 'ish ha'elohim 'asher qara 'et hadebarim ha'eleh. 2_kings 23:17	vayomer mah haziyun halaz 'asher 'ani ro'eh vayomeru 'eilav 'anshei ha'ir haqeber 'ish ha'elohim 'asher ba mihudah vayiqra 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'asher 'asita 'al hamizbakh bet 'el. 2_kings 23:18	vayomer hanikhu lo 'ish 'al yana' 'azmotav vaymaletu 'azmotav 'et 'azmot hanabi 'asher ba mishomeron. 2_kings 23:19	vegam 'et kal batei habamot 'asher be'arei shomeron 'asher 'asu malkhei yisra'el lehakh'is heisir yoshiyahu vaya'as lahem kekhal hama'asim 'asher 'asah bebet 'el. 2_kings 23:20	vayizbakh 'et kal kohanei habamot 'asher sham 'al hamizbekhot vayisrof 'et 'azmot 'adam 'aleihem vayashab yerushalim. 2_kings 23:21	vayzav hamelekh 'et kal ha'am leimor 'asu fesakh yhvh 'eloheikhem kakatub 'al seifer haberit hazeh. 2_kings 23:22	ki lo na'asah kapesakh hazeh mimei hashofetim 'asher shafetu 'et yisra'el vekhol yemei malkhei yisra'el umalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 23:23	ki 'im bishmoneh 'esreh shanah lamelekh yoshiyahu na'asah hapesakh hazeh yhvh birushalim. 2_kings 23:24	vegam 'et ha'obot ve'et hayide'onim ve'et haterafim ve'et hagilulim ve'et kal hashiquzim 'asher nir'u be'erez yehudah ubirushalim bi'er yoshiyahu lema'an haqim 'et dibrei hatorah haketubim 'al haseifer 'asher maza khilqiyahu hakohen bet yhvh. 2_kings 23:25	vekhamohu lo hayah lefanav melekh 'asher shab 'el yhvh bekhal lebabo ubekhal nafsho ubekhal me'odo kekhol torat mosheh ve'akharav lo qam kamohu. 2_kings 23:26	'akh lo shab yhvh meikharon 'apo hagadol 'asher kharah 'apo bihudah 'al kal hake'asim 'asher hikh'iso menasheh. 2_kings 23:27	vayomer yhvh gam 'et yehudah 'asir mei'al panai ka'asher hasiroti 'et yisra'el uma'asti 'et ha'ir hazot 'asher bakharti 'et yerushalim ve'et habayit 'asher 'amarti yihyeh shemi sham. 2_kings 23:28	veyeter dibrei yoshiyahu vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 23:29	beyamav 'alah far'oh nekhoh melekh mizrayim 'al melekh 'ashur 'al nehar perat vayeilekh hamelekh yoshiyahu liqrato vaymiteihu bimgido kir'oto 'oto. 2_kings 23:30	vayarkibuhu 'abadav met mimegido vaybi'uhu yerushalim vayiqberuhu biqburato vayiqakh 'am ha'arez 'et yeho'akhaz ben yoshiyahu vayimshekhu 'oto vayamlikhu 'oto takhat 'abiv. 2_kings 23:31	ben 'esrim veshalosh shanah yeho'akhaz bemalekho usheloshah khodashim malakh birushalim veshem 'imo khamutal bat yirmeyahu milibnah. 2_kings 23:32	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asu 'abotav. 2_kings 23:33	vaya'asreihu far'oh nekhoh beriblah be'erez khamat bimlokh mimelokh birushalim vayiten 'onesh 'al ha'arez mei'ah khikar kesef vekhikar zahab. 2_kings 23:34	vayamlekh par'oh nekhoh 'et 'elyaqim ben yoshiyahu takhat yoshiyahu 'abiv vayaseb 'et shemo yehoyaqim ve'et yeho'akhaz laqakh vayabo mizrayim vayamat sham. 2_kings 23:35	vehakesef vehazahab natan yehoyaqim lefar'oh 'akh he'erikh 'et ha'arez latet 'et hakesef 'al pi far'oh 'ish ke'erko nagas 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab 'et 'am ha'arez latet lefar'oh nekhoh. 2_kings 23:36	ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah yehoyaqim bemalekho ve'akhat 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo zebidah zebudah bat pedayah min rumah. 2_kings 23:37	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asu 'abotav. 2_kings 24:1	beyamav 'alah nebukhadnezar melekh babel vayhi lo yehoyaqim 'ebed shalosh shanim vayashab vayimrad bo. 2_kings 24:2	vayshalakh yhvh bo 'et gedudei khasdim ve'et gedudei 'aram ve'et gedudei mo'ab ve'et gedudei benei 'amon vayshalekhem bihudah leha'abido kidbar yhvh 'asher diber beyad 'abadav hanebi'im. 2_kings 24:3	'akh 'al pi yhvh hayetah bihudah lehasir mei'al panav bekhatot menasheh kekhol 'asher 'asah. 2_kings 24:4	vegam dam hanaqi 'asher shafakh vaymalei 'et yerushalim dam naqi velo 'abah yhvh lisloakh. 2_kings 24:5	veyeter dibrei yehoyaqim vekhal 'asher 'asah halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 2_kings 24:6	vayishkab yehoyaqim 'im 'abotav vayimlokh yehoyakhin beno takhtav. 2_kings 24:7	velo hosif 'od melekh mizrayim lazet mei'arzo ki laqakh melekh babel minakhal mizrayim 'ad nehar perat kol 'asher hayetah lemelekh mizrayim. 2_kings 24:8	ben shemoneh 'esreh shanah yehoyakhin bemalekho usheloshah khodashim malakh birushalim veshem 'imo nekhushta bat 'elnatan
