mirushalim. 2_kings 24:9	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asah 'abiv. 2_kings 24:10	ba'et hahi 'alah 'alu 'abdei nebukhadnezar melekh babel yerushalim vatabo ha'ir bamazor. 2_kings 24:11	vayabo nebukhadnezar melekh babel 'al ha'ir va'abadav zarim 'aleha. 2_kings 24:12	vayeizei yehoyakhin melekh yehudah 'al melekh babel hu ve'imo va'abadav vesarav vesarisav vayiqakh 'oto melekh babel bishnat shemoneh lemalekho. 2_kings 24:13	vayozei misham 'et kal 'ozrot bet yhvh ve'ozrot bet hamelekh vayqazez 'et kal kelei hazahab 'asher 'asah shelomoh melekh yisra'el beheikhal yhvh ka'asher diber yhvh. 2_kings 24:14	vehiglah 'et kal yerushalim ve'et kal hasarim ve'et kal giborei hakhayil 'asarah 'aseret 'alafim goleh vekhal hekharash vehamasger lo nish'ar zulat dalat 'am ha'arez. 2_kings 24:15	vayegel 'et yehoyakhin babelah ve'et 'em hamelekh ve'et neshei hamelekh ve'et sarisav ve'et 'evilei 'eilei ha'arez holikh golah mirushalim babelah. 2_kings 24:16	ve'et kal 'anshei hakhayil shib'at 'alafim vehekharash vehamasger 'elef hakol giborim 'osei milkhamah vaybi'em melekh babel golah babelah. 2_kings 24:17	vayamlekh melekh babel 'et matanyah dodo takhtav vayaseb 'et shemo zidqiyahu. 2_kings 24:18	ben 'esrim ve'akhat shanah zidqiyahu bemalekho ve'akhat 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo khamital khamutal bat yirmeyahu milibnah. 2_kings 24:19	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asah yehoyaqim. 2_kings 24:20	ki 'al 'af yhvh hayetah birushalim ubihudah 'ad hishlikho 'otam mei'al panav vayimrod zidqiyahu bemelekh babel. 2_kings 25:1	vayhi bishnat hateshi'it lemalekho bakhodesh ha'asiri be'asor lakhodesh ba nebukhadnezar melekh babel hu vekhal kheilo 'al yerushalim vayikhan 'aleha vayibnu 'aleha dayeq sabib. 2_kings 25:2	vatabo ha'ir bamazor 'ad 'ashtei 'esreh shanah lamelekh zidqiyahu. 2_kings 25:3	betish'ah lakhodesh vayekhezaq hara'ab ba'ir velo hayah lekhem le'am ha'arez. 2_kings 25:4	vatibaqa' ha'ir vekhal 'anshei hamilkhamah halaylah derekh sha'ar ben hakhomotayim 'asher 'al gan hamelekh vekhasdim 'al ha'ir sabib vayeilekh derekh ha'arabah. 2_kings 25:5	vayirdefu khel kasdim 'akhar hamelekh vayasigu 'oto be'arbot yereikho vekhal kheilo nafozu mei'alav. 2_kings 25:6	vayitpesu 'et hamelekh vaya'alu 'oto 'el melekh babel riblatah vaydaberu 'ito mishpat. 2_kings 25:7	ve'et benei zidqiyahu shakhatu le'einav ve'et 'einei zidqiyahu 'iver vaya'asreihu bankhushtayim vaybi'eihu babel. 2_kings 25:8	ubakhodesh hakhamishi beshib'ah lakhodesh hi shenat tesha' 'esreh shanah lamelekh nebukhadnezar melekh babel ba nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim 'ebed melekh babel yerushalim. 2_kings 25:9	vayisrof 'et bet yhvh ve'et bet hamelekh ve'et kal batei yerushalim ve'et kal bet gadol saraf ba'esh. 2_kings 25:10	ve'et khomot yerushalim sabib natezu kal khel kasdim 'asher rab tabakhim. 2_kings 25:11	ve'et yeter ha'am hanish'arim ba'ir ve'et hanofelim 'asher nafelu 'al hamelekh babel ve'et yeter hehamon heglah nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim. 2_kings 25:12	umidalat ha'arez hish'ir rab tabakhim lekhoremim uleyogebim. 2_kings 25:13	ve'et 'amudei hanekhoshet 'asher bet yhvh ve'et hamekhonot ve'et yam hanekhoshet 'asher bebet yhvh shiberu khasdim vayis'u 'et nekhushtam babelah. 2_kings 25:14	ve'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamzamerot ve'et hakapot ve'et kal kelei hanekhoshet 'asher yesharetu bam laqakhu. 2_kings 25:15	ve'et hamakhtot ve'et hamizraqot 'asher zahab zahab va'asher kesef kasef laqakh rab tabakhim. 2_kings 25:16	ha'amudim shenayim hayam ha'ekhad vehamekhonot 'asher 'asah shelomoh lebet yhvh lo hayah mishqal linkhoshet kal hakeilim ha'eleh. 2_kings 25:17	shemoneh 'esreh 'amah qomat ha'amud ha'ekhad vekhoteret 'alav nekhoshet veqomat hakoteret shalosh 'amah 'amot usebakhah verimonim 'al hakoteret sabib hakol nekhoshet vekha'eleh la'amud hasheini 'al hasebakhah. 2_kings 25:18	vayiqakh rab tabakhim 'et serayah kohen harosh ve'et zefanyahu kohen mishneh ve'et sheloshet shomerei hasaf. 2_kings 25:19	umin ha'ir laqakh saris 'ekhad 'asher hu faqid 'al 'anshei hamilkhamah vakhamishah 'anashim meiro'ei fenei hamelekh 'asher nimze'u ba'ir ve'et hasofer sar hazaba hamazbi 'et 'am ha'arez veshishim 'ish mei'am ha'arez hanimze'im ba'ir. 2_kings 25:20	vayiqakh 'otam nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim vayolekh 'otam 'al melekh babel riblatah. 2_kings 25:21	vayakh 'otam melekh babel vaymitem beriblah be'erez khamat vayigel yehudah mei'al 'admato. 2_kings 25:22	veha'am hanish'ar be'erez yehudah 'asher hish'ir nebukhadnezar melekh babel vayafqed 'aleihem 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan. 2_kings 25:23	vayishme'u khal sarei hakhayalim hemah veha'anashim ki hifqid melekh babel 'et gedalyahu vayabo'u 'el gedalyahu hamizpah veyishma'el ben netanyah veyokhanan ben qareiakh userayah ben tankhumet hanetofati veya'azanyahu ben hama'akhati hemah ve'ansheihem. 2_kings 25:24	vayishaba' lahem gedalyahu ule'ansheihem vayomer lahem 'al tire'u mei'abdei hakasdim shebu ba'arez ve'ibdu 'et melekh babel veyitab lakhem. 2_kings 25:25	vayhi bakhodesh hashebi'i ba yishma'el ben netanyah ben 'elishama' mizera' hamelukhah va'asarah 'anashim 'ito vayaku 'et gedalyahu vayamot ve'et hayehudim ve'et hakasdim 'asher hayu 'ito bamizpah. 2_kings 25:26	vayaqumu khal ha'am miqaton ve'ad gadol vesarei hakhayalim vayabo'u mizrayim ki yare'u mipenei khasdim. 2_kings 25:27	vayhi bishloshim vasheba' shanah legalut yehoyakhin melekh yehudah bishnem 'asar khodesh be'esrim veshib'ah lakhodesh nasa 'evil merodakh melekh babel bishnat malekho 'et rosh yehoyakhin melekh yehudah mibet kele. 2_kings 25:28	vaydaber 'ito tobot vayiten 'et kis'o mei'al kisei hamelakhim 'asher 'ito bebabel. 2_kings 25:29	veshina 'et bigdei khil'o ve'akhal lekhem tamid lefanav kal yemei khayav. 2_kings 25:30	va'arukhato 'arukhat tamid nitenah lo mei'et hamelekh debar yom beyomo kol yemei khayav. 

isaiah 1:1	khazon yesha'yahu ben 'amoz 'asher khazah 'al yehudah virushalim bimei 'uziyahu yotam 'akhaz yekhizqiyahu malkhei yehudah. isaiah 1:2	shim'u shamayim veha'azini 'erez ki yhvh diber banim gidalti veromamti vehem pashe'u bi. isaiah 1:3	yada' shor qoneihu vakhamor 'eibus be'alav yisra'el lo yada' 'ami lo hitbonan. isaiah 1:4	ho go khotei 'am kebed 'avon zera' merei'im banim mashkhitim 'azebu 'et yhvh ni'azu 'et qedosh yisra'el nazoru 'akhor. isaiah 1:5	'al meh tuku 'od tosifu sarah kal rosh lakholi vekhal leibab davai. isaiah 1:6	mikaf regel ve'ad rosh 'en bo metom peza' vekhaburah umakah teriyah lo zoru velo khubashu velo rukekhah bashamen. isaiah 1:7	'arzekhem shemamah 'areikhem serufot 'esh 'admatkhem lenegdekhem zarim 'okhelim 'otah ushemamah kemahpeikhat zarim. isaiah 1:8	venotrah bat ziyon kesukah bekharem kimlunah bemiqshah ke'ir nezurah. isaiah 1:9	lulei yhvh zeba'ot hotir lanu sarid kim'at kisdom hayinu la'amorah daminu. isaiah 1:10	shim'u debar yhvh qezinei sedom ha'azinu torat 'eloheinu 'am 'amorah. isaiah 1:11	lamah li rob zibkheikhem yomar yhvh saba'ti 'olot 'eilim vekheileb meri'im vedam parim ukhebasim ve'atudim lo khafazeti. isaiah 1:12	ki tabo'u leira'ot panai mi biqesh zot miyedkhem remos khazeirai. isaiah 1:13	lo tosifu habi minkhat shav qetoret to'eibah hi li khodesh veshabat qero miqra lo 'ukhal 'aven va'azarah. isaiah 1:14	khadesheikhem umo'adeikhem sane'ah nafshi hayu 'alai latorakh nil'eiti neso. isaiah 1:15	ubefariskhem kapeikhem 'a'lim 'einai mikem gam ki tarbu tefilah 'eineni shomeia' yedeikhem damim malei'u. isaiah 1:16	rakhazu hizaku hasiru roa' ma'aleikhem mineged 'einai khidlu hareia'. isaiah 1:17	limdu heiteb dirshu mishpat 'asheru khamoz shiftu yatom ribu 'almanah. isaiah 1:18	lekhu na venivakhekhah yomar yhvh 'im yihyu khata'eikhem kashanim kasheleg yalbinu 'im ya'dimu khatola' kazemer yihyu. isaiah 1:19	'im tobu ushema'tem tub ha'arez tokheilu. isaiah 1:20	ve'im tema'anu umeritem khereb te'ukelu ki pi yhvh diber. isaiah 1:21	'eikhah hayetah lezonah qiryah ne'emanah melei'ati mishpat zedeq yalin bah ve'atah merazekhim. isaiah 1:22	kaspekh hayah lesigim sabe'ekh mahul bamayim. isaiah 1:23	sarayikh sorrim vekhabrei ganabim kulo 'oheb shokhad verodef shalmonim yatom lo yishpotu verib 'almanah lo yabo 'aleihem. isaiah 1:24	lakhen ne'um ha'adon yhvh zeba'ot 'abir yisra'el ho 'enakhem mizarai ve'inaqemah mei'oybai. isaiah 1:25	ve'ashibah yadi 'alayikh ve'ezrof kabor sigayikh ve'asirah kal bedilayikh. isaiah 1:26	ve'ashibah shofetayikh kebarishonah veyo'azayikh kebatekhilah 'akharei khen yiqarei lakh 'ir hazedeq qiryah ne'emanah. isaiah 1:27	ziyon bemishpat tipadeh veshabeha bizdaqah. isaiah 1:28	vesheber poshe'im vekhata'im yakhdav ve'ozebei yhvh yikhlu. isaiah 1:29	ki yeiboshu mei'eilim 'asher khamadtem vetakhperu meihaganot 'asher bekhartem. isaiah 1:30	ki tihyu ke'eilah nobelet 'aleha ukheganah 'asher mayim 'en lah. isaiah 1:31	vehayah hekhason lin'oret ufo'alo lenizoz uba'aru sheneihem yakhdav ve'en mekhabeh. isaiah 2:1	hadabar 'asher khazah yesha'yahu ben 'amoz 'al yehudah virushalim. isaiah 2:2	vehayah be'akharit hayamim nakhon yihyeh har bet yhvh berosh heharim venisa migeba'ot venaharu 'eilav kal hagoyim. isaiah 2:3	vehalekhu 'amim rabim ve'ameru lekhu vena'aleh 'el har yhvh 'el bet 'elohei ya'aqob veyoreinu miderakhav veneilekhah be'orekhotav ki miziyon teizei torah udebar yhvh mirushalim. isaiah 2:4	veshafat ben hagoyim vehokhiakh le'amim rabim vekhitetu kharbotam le'itim vakhanitoteihem lemazmeirot lo yisa go 'el go khereb velo yilmedu 'od milkhamah. isaiah 2:5	bet ya'aqob lekhu veneilekhah be'or yhvh. isaiah 2:6	ki natashtah 'amekha bet ya'aqob ki male'u miqedem ve'onenim kapelishtim ubeyaldei nakherim yaspiqu. isaiah 2:7	vatimalei 'arzo kesef vezahab ve'en qeizeh le'ozerotav vatimalei 'arzo susim ve'en qeizeh lemarkebotav. isaiah 2:8	vatimalei 'arzo 'elilim lema'aseh yadav yishtakhavu la'asher 'asu 'ezbe'otav. isaiah 2:9	vayishakh 'adam vayishpal 'ish ve'al tisa lahem. isaiah 2:10	bo bazur vehitamen be'afar mipenei pakhad yhvh umeihadar ge'ono. isaiah 2:11	'einei gabhut 'adam shafel veshakh rum 'anashim venisgab yhvh lebado bayom hahu. isaiah 2:12	ki yom yhvh zeba'ot 'al kal gei'eh varam ve'al kal nisa veshafel. isaiah 2:13	ve'al kal 'arzei halebanon haramim vehanisa'im ve'al kal 'alonei habashan. isaiah 2:14	ve'al kal heharim haramim ve'al kal hageba'ot hanisa'ot. isaiah 2:15	ve'al kal migdal gaboha ve'al kal khomah bezurah. isaiah 2:16	ve'al kal 'oniyot tarshish ve'al kal sekhiyot hakhemdah. isaiah 2:17	veshakh gabhut ha'adam veshafel rum 'anashim venisgab yhvh lebado bayom hahu. isaiah 2:18	veha'elilim kalil yakhalof. isaiah 2:19	uba'u bim'arot zurim ubimkhilot 'afar mipenei pakhad yhvh umeihadar ge'ono bequmo la'aroz ha'arez. isaiah 2:20	bayom hahu yashlikh ha'adam 'et 'elilei khaspo ve'et 'elilei zehabo 'asher 'asu lo lehishtakhavot lakhpor peirot vela'ataleifim. isaiah 2:21	labo beniqrot hazurim ubis'ifei hasela'im mipenei pakhad yhvh umeihadar ge'ono bequmo la'aroz ha'arez. isaiah 2:22	khidlu lakhem min ha'adam 'asher neshamah be'apo ki bameh nekhshab hu. isaiah 3:1	ki hineh ha'adon yhvh zeba'ot meisir mirushalim umihudah mash'en umash'einah kol mish'an lekhem vekhol mish'an mayim. isaiah 3:2	gibor ve'ish milkhamah shofet venabi veqosem vezaqen. isaiah 3:3	sar khamishim unesu fanim veyo'ez vakhakham kharashim unebon lakhash. isaiah 3:4	venatati ne'arim sareihem veta'alulim yimshelu bam. isaiah 3:5	venigas ha'am 'ish be'ish ve'ish berei'eihu yirhabu hana'ar bazaqen vehaniqleh banikhbad. isaiah 3:6	ki yitpos 'ish be'akhiv bet 'abiv simlah lekhah qazin tihyeh lanu vehamakhsheilah hazot takhat yadekha. isaiah 3:7	yisa bayom hahu leimor lo 'ehyeh khobesh ubebeiti 'en lekhem ve'en simlah lo tesimuni qezin 'am. isaiah 3:8	ki khashelah yerushalim vihudah nafal ki leshonam uma'aleihem 'el yhvh lamrot 'einei khebodo. isaiah 3:9	hakarat peneihem 'anetah bam vekhatatam kisdom higidu lo khikheidu 'o lenafsham ki gamelu lahem ra'ah. isaiah 3:10	'imru zadiq ki tob ki feri ma'aleihem yokheilu. isaiah 3:11	'o lerasha' ra' ki gemul yadav yei'aseh lo. isaiah 3:12	'ami nogesav me'olel venashim mashelu bo 'ami me'asherekha mat'im vederekh 'orekhotekha bilei'u. isaiah 3:13	nizab larib yhvh ve'omed ladin 'amim. isaiah 3:14	yhvh bemishpat yabo 'im ziqnei 'amo vesarav ve'atem bi'artem hakerem gezeilat he'ani bebateikhem. isaiah 3:15	malakhem mah lakhem tedake'u 'ami ufenei 'aniyim titkhanu ne'um 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot. isaiah 3:16	vayomer yhvh ya'an ki gabehu benot ziyon vateilakhnah netvot netuyot garon umesaqerot 'einayim halokh vetafof teilakhnah uberagleihem te'akasnah. isaiah 3:17	vesipakh 'adonai qadeqod benot ziyon yhvh patehen ye'areh. isaiah 3:18	bayom hahu yasir 'adonai 'et tif'eret ha'akhasim vehashebisim vehasaharonim. isaiah 3:19	hanetifot vehasheirot vehare'alot. isaiah 3:20	hape'eirim vehaze'adot vehaqishurim ubatei hanefesh vehalekhashim. isaiah 3:21	hataba'ot venizmei ha'af. isaiah 3:22	hamakhalazot vehama'atafot vehamitpakhot vehakharitim. isaiah 3:23	vehagilyonim vehasedinim vehazenifot veharedidim. isaiah 3:24	vehayah takhat bosem maq yihyeh vetakhat khagorah niqpah vetakhat ma'aseh miqsheh qarekhah vetakhat petigil makhagoret saq ki takhat yofi. isaiah 3:25	metayikh bakhereb yipolu ugeburatekh bamilkhamah. isaiah 3:26	ve'anu ve'abelu petakheha veniqatah la'arez teisheb. isaiah 4:1	vehekheziqu sheba' nashim be'ish 'ekhad bayom hahu leimor lakhmeinu nokhel vesimlateinu nilbash raq yiqarei shimkha 'aleinu 'esof kherpateinu. isaiah 4:2	bayom hahu yihyeh zemakh yhvh lizbi ulekhabod uferi ha'arez lega'on uletif'eret lifleitat yisra'el. isaiah 4:3	vehayah hanish'ar beziyon vehanotar birushalim qadosh yei'amer lo kal hakatub lakhayim birushalim. isaiah 4:4	'im rakhaz 'adonai 'et zo'at benot ziyon ve'et demei yerushalim yadiakh miqirbah beruakh mishpat uberuakh ba'er. isaiah 4:5	ubara yhvh 'al kal mekhon har ziyon ve'al miqra'eha 'anan yomam ve'ashan venogah 'esh lehabah layelah ki 'al kal kabod khupah. isaiah 4:6	vesukah tihyeh lezel yomam meikhoreb ulemakhseh ulemistor mizerem umimatar. isaiah 5:1	'ashirah na lididi shirat dodi lekharmo kerem hayah lididi beqeren ben shamen. isaiah 5:2	vai'azeqeihu vaysaqeleihu vayita'eihu soreq vayiben migdal betokho vegam yeqeb khazeb bo vayqav la'asot 'anabim vaya'as be'ushim. isaiah 5:3	ve'atah yosheb yerushalim ve'ish yehudah shiftu na beini uben karmi. isaiah 5:4	mah la'asot 'od lekharmi velo 'asiti bo madua' qiveiti la'asot 'anabim vaya'as be'ushim. isaiah 5:5	ve'atah 'odi'ah na 'etkhem 'et 'asher 'ani 'oseh lekharmi haser mesukato vehayah leba'er paroz gedeiro vehayah lemirmas. isaiah 5:6	va'ashiteihu batah lo yizamer velo yei'ader ve'alah shamir vashayit ve'al he'abim 'azaveh meihamtir 'alav matar. isaiah 5:7	ki kherem yhvh zeba'ot bet yisra'el ve'ish yehudah neta' sha'ashu'av vayqav lemishpat vehineh mispakh lizdaqah vehineh ze'aqah. isaiah 5:8	ho magi'ei bayit bebayit sadeh besadeh yaqribu 'ad 'efes maqom vehushabtem lebadekhem beqereb ha'arez. isaiah 5:9	be'azenai yhvh zeba'ot 'im lo batim rabim leshamah yihyu gedolim vetobim mei'en yosheb. isaiah 5:10	ki 'aseret zimdei kherem ya'asu bat 'ekhat vezera' khomer ya'aseh 'eifah. isaiah 5:11	ho mashkimei baboqer sheikhar yirdofu me'akharei baneshef yayin yadliqem. isaiah 5:12	vehayah khinor vanebel tof vekhalil vayayin mishteihem ve'et po'al yhvh lo yabitu uma'aseh yadav lo ra'u. isaiah 5:13	lakhen galah 'ami mibeli da'at ukhebodo metei ra'ab vahamono zikheh zama. isaiah 5:14	lakhen hirkhibah she'ol nafshah ufa'arah fiha libli khoq veyarad hadarah vahamonah ushe'onah ve'alez bah. isaiah 5:15	vayishakh 'adam vayishpal 'ish ve'einei gebohim tishpalnah. isaiah 5:16	vayigbah yhvh zeba'ot bamishpat veha'el haqadosh niqdash bizdaqah. isaiah 5:17	vera'u khebasim kedaberam vekharebot meikhim garim yokheilu. isaiah 5:18	ho moshekhei he'avon bekhablei hashav vekha'abot ha'agalah khata'ah. isaiah 5:19	ha'omerim yemaher yakhishah ma'aseihu lema'an nir'eh vetiqrab vetabo'ah 'azat qedosh yisra'el veneida'ah. isaiah 5:20	ho ha'omerim lara' tob velatob ra' samim khoshekh le'or ve'or lekhoshekh samim mar lematoq umatoq lemar. isaiah 5:21	ho khakhamim be'eineihem veneged peneihem nebonim. isaiah 5:22	ho giborim lishtot yayin ve'anshei khayil limsokh sheikhar. isaiah 5:23	mazdiqei rasha' 'eiqeb shokhad vezidqat zadiqim yasiru mimenu. isaiah 5:24	lakhen ke'ekhol qash leshon 'esh vakhashash lehabah yirpeh sharesham kamaq yihyeh ufirkham ka'abaq ya'aleh ki ma'asu 'et torat yhvh zeba'ot ve'et 'imrat qedosh yisra'el ni'eizu. isaiah 5:25	'al ken kharah 'af yhvh be'amo vayet yado 'alav vayakeihu vayirgezu heharim vatehi niblatam kasukhah beqereb khuzot bekhal zot lo shab 'apo ve'od yado netuyah. isaiah 5:26	venasa nes lagoyim meirakhoq vesharaq lo miqzeh ha'arez vehineh meheirah qal yabo. isaiah 5:27	'en 'ayef ve'en koshel bo lo yanum velo yishan velo niftakh 'eizor khalazav velo nitaq serokh ne'alav. isaiah 5:28	'asher khizav shenunim vekhal qashetotav derukhot parsot susav kazar nekhshabu vegalgilav kasufah. isaiah 5:29	she'agah lo kalabi vesha'ag yish'ag kakefirim veyinhom veyokhez teref veyaflit ve'en mazil. isaiah 5:30	veyinhom 'alav bayom hahu kenahamat yam venibat la'arez vehineh khoshekh zar va'or khashakh ba'arifeha. isaiah 6:1	bishnat mot hamelekh 'uziyahu va'er'eh 'et 'adonai yosheb 'al kisei ram venisa veshulav melei'im 'et haheikhal. isaiah 6:2	serafim 'omedim mima'al lo shesh kenafayim shesh kenafayim le'ekhad bishtayim yekhaseh fanav ubishtayim yekhaseh raglav ubishtayim ye'ofef. isaiah 6:3	veqara zeh 'el zeh ve'amar qadosh qadosh qadosh yhvh zeba'ot melo khal ha'arez kebodo. isaiah 6:4	vayanu'u 'amot hasipim miqol haqorei vehabayit yimalei 'ashan. isaiah 6:5	va'omar 'o li khi nidmeiti ki 'ish temei sefatayim 'anokhi ubetokh 'am temei sefatayim 'anokhi yosheb ki 'et hamelekh yhvh zeba'ot ra'u 'einai. isaiah 6:6	vaya'af 'eilai 'ekhad min haserafim ubeyado rizpah bemelqakhayim laqakh mei'al hamizbeiakh. isaiah 6:7	vayaga' 'al pi vayomer hineh naga' zeh 'al sefatekha vesar 'avonekha vekhatatekha tekhupar. isaiah 6:8	va'eshma' 'et qol 'adonai 'omer 'et mi 'eshlakh umi yeilekh lanu va'omar hini shelakheini. isaiah 6:9	vayomer lekh ve'amarta la'am hazeh shim'u shamoa' ve'al tabinu ure'u ra'o ve'al teida'u. isaiah 6:10	hashmen leb ha'am hazeh ve'azenav hakhbed ve'einav hasha' pen yir'eh be'einav ube'azenav yishma' ulebabo yabin vashab verafa lo. isaiah 6:11	va'omar 'ad matai 'adonai vayomer 'ad 'asher 'im sha'u 'arim mei'en yosheb ubatim mei'en 'adam veha'adamah tisha'eh shemamah. isaiah 6:12	verikhaq yhvh 'et ha'adam verabah ha'azubah beqereb ha'arez. isaiah 6:13	ve'od bah 'asiriyah veshabah vehayetah leba'er ka'eilah vekha'alon 'asher beshalekhet mazebet bam zera' qodesh mazabtah. isaiah 7:1	vayhi bimei 'akhaz ben yotam ben 'uziyahu melekh yehudah 'alah rezin melekh 'aram ufeqakh ben remalyahu melekh yisra'el yerushalim lamilkhamah 'aleha velo yakhol lehilakhem 'aleha. isaiah 7:2	vayugad lebet david leimor nakhah 'aram 'al 'efrayim vayana' lebabo ulebab 'amo kenoa' 'azei ya'ar mipenei ruakh. isaiah 7:3	vayomer yhvh 'el yesha'yahu zei na liqrat 'akhaz 'atah ushe'ar yashub benekha 'el qezeh te'alat habereikhah ha'elyonah 'el mesilat sedeh khobes. isaiah 7:4	ve'amarta 'eilav hishamer vehashqet 'al tira ulebabekha 'al yeirakh mishenei zanbot ha'udim ha'asheinim ha'eleh bakhori 'af rezin va'aram uben remalyahu. isaiah 7:5	ya'an ki ya'az 'alekha 'aram ra'ah 'efrayim uben remalyahu leimor. isaiah 7:6	na'aleh bihudah uneqizenah venabqi'enah 'eileinu venamlikh melekh betokhah 'et ben tabe'al. isaiah 7:7	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh lo taqum velo tihyeh. isaiah 7:8	ki rosh 'aram dameseq verosh dameseq rezin ube'od shishim vekhamesh shanah yeikhat 'efrayim mei'am. isaiah 7:9	verosh 'efrayim shomeron verosh shomeron ben remalyahu 'im lo ta'aminu ki lo tei'ameinu. isaiah 7:10	vayosef yhvh daber 'el 'akhaz leimor. isaiah 7:11	she'al lekha 'ot mei'im yhvh 'elohekha ha'meq she'alah 'o hagbeiah lema'elah. isaiah 7:12	vayomer 'akhaz lo 'esh'al velo 'anaseh 'et yhvh. isaiah 7:13	vayomer shim'u na bet david ham'at mikem hal'ot 'anashim ki tal'u gam 'et 'elohai. isaiah 7:14	lakhen yiten 'adonai hu lakhem 'ot hineh ha'almah harah veyoledet ben veqarat shemo 'imanu 'el. isaiah 7:15	khem'ah udebash yokhel leda'to ma'os bara' ubakhor batob. isaiah 7:16	ki beterem yeida' hana'ar ma'os bara' ubakhor batob tei'azeb ha'adamah 'asher 'atah qaz mipenei shenei melakheha. isaiah 7:17	yabi yhvh 'alekha ve'al 'amekha ve'al bet 'abikha yamim 'asher lo ba'u lemiyom sur 'efrayim mei'al yehudah 'et melekh 'ashur. isaiah 7:18	vehayah bayom hahu yishroq yhvh lazebub 'asher biqzeh ye'orei mizrayim veladeborah 'asher be'erez 'ashur. isaiah 7:19	uba'u venakhu khulam benakhalei habatot ubinqiqei hasela'im ubekhol hana'azuzim ubekhol hanahalolim. isaiah 7:20	bayom hahu yegalakh 'adonai beta'ar hasekhirah be'ebrei nahar bemelekh 'ashur 'et harosh vesa'ar haraglayim vegam 'et hazaqan tispeh. isaiah 7:21	vehayah bayom hahu yekhayeh 'ish 'eglat baqar ushetei zon. isaiah 7:22	vehayah meirob 'asot khalab yokhal khem'ah ki khem'ah udebash yokhel kal hanotar beqereb ha'arez. isaiah 7:23	vehayah bayom hahu yihyeh khal maqom 'asher yihyeh sham 'elef gefen be'elef kasef lashamir velashayit yihyeh. isaiah 7:24	bakhizim ubaqeshet yabo shamah ki shamir vashayit tihyeh khal ha'arez. isaiah 7:25	vekhol heharim 'asher bama'der yei'adeirun lo tabo shamah yir'at shamir vashayit vehayah lemishlakh shor ulemirmas seh. isaiah 8:1	vayomer yhvh 'eilai qakh lekha gilayon gadol ukhetob 'alav bekheret 'enosh lemaher shalal khash baz. isaiah 8:2	ve'a'idah li 'eidim ne'emanim 'et 'uriyah hakohen ve'et zekharyahu ben yeberekhyahu. isaiah 8:3	va'eqrab 'el hanebi'ah vatahar vateiled ben vayomer yhvh 'eilai qera shemo maher shalal khash baz. isaiah 8:4	ki beterem yeida' hana'ar qero 'abi ve'imi yisa 'et khel dameseq ve'et shelal shomeron lifnei melekh 'ashur. isaiah 8:5	vayosef yhvh daber 'eilai 'od leimor. isaiah 8:6	ya'an ki ma'as ha'am hazeh 'et mei hashiloakh haholekhim le'at umesos 'et rezin uben remalyahu. isaiah 8:7	velakhen hineh 'adonai ma'aleh 'aleihem 'et mei hanahar ha'azumim veharabim 'et melekh 'ashur ve'et kal kebodo ve'alah 'al kal 'afiqav vehalakh 'al kal gedotav. isaiah 8:8	vekhalaf bihudah shataf ve'abar 'ad zavar yagia' vehayah mutot kenafav melo rokhab 'arzekha 'imanu 'el. isaiah 8:9	ro'u 'amim vakhotu veha'azinu kol merkhaqei 'arez hit'azeru vakhotu hit'azeru vakhotu. isaiah 8:10	'uzu 'eizah vetufar daberu dabar velo yaqum ki 'imanu 'el. isaiah 8:11	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'eilai kekhezqat hayad veyisereini milekhet bederekh ha'am hazeh leimor. isaiah 8:12	lo tomerun qesher lekhol 'asher yomar ha'am hazeh qasher ve'et mora'o lo tire'u velo ta'arizu. isaiah 8:13	'et yhvh zeba'ot 'oto taqdishu vehu mora'akhem vehu ma'arizkhem. isaiah 8:14	vehayah lemiqdash ule'eben negef ulezur mikhshol lishnei batei yisra'el lefakh ulemoqesh leyosheb yerushalim. isaiah 8:15	vekhashelu bam rabim venafelu venishbaru venoqshu venilkadu. isaiah 8:16	zor te'udah khatom torah belimudai. isaiah 8:17	vekhikiti yhvh hamastir panav mibet ya'aqob veqiveiti lo. isaiah 8:18	hineh 'anokhi vehayladim 'asher natan li yhvh le'otot ulemoftim beyisra'el mei'im yhvh zeba'ot hashokhen behar ziyon. isaiah 8:19	vekhi yomeru 'aleikhem dirshu 'el ha'obot ve'el hayide'onim hamzafzefim vehamahgim halo 'am 'el 'elohav yidrosh be'ad hakhayim 'el hameitim. isaiah 8:20	letorah velit'udah 'im lo yomeru kadabar hazeh 'asher 'en lo shakhar. isaiah 8:21	ve'abar bah niqsheh vera'eb vehayah khi yir'ab vehitqazaf veqilel bemalko ubeilohav ufanah lema'elah. isaiah 8:22	ve'el 'erez yabit vehineh zarah vakhasheikhah me'uf zuqah va'afeilah menudakh. isaiah 9:1	ki lo mu'af la'asher muzaq lah ka'et harishon heiqal 'arzah zebulun ve'arzah naftali veha'akharon samekhu lefanekha kesimkhat baqazir ka'asher yagilu bekhaleqam shalal. isaiah 9:4	ki 'et 'ol subolo ve'et mateh shikhmo sheibet hanoges bo hakhitota keyom midyan. isaiah 9:5	ki khal se'on so'en bera'ash vesimlah megolalah bedamim vehayetah lisreifah ma'akholet 'esh. isaiah 9:6	ki yeled yulad lanu ben nitan lanu vatehi hamisrah 'al shikhmo vayiqra shemo pele yo'ez 'el gibor 'abi'ad sar shalom. isaiah 9:7	lemarbeh lemarbeh hamisrah uleshalom 'en qez 'al kisei david ve'al mamlakhto lehakhin 'otah ulesa'adah bemishpat ubizdaqah mei'atah ve'ad 'olam qin'at yhvh zeba'ot ta'aseh zot. isaiah 9:8	dabar shalakh 'adonai beya'aqob venafal beyisra'el. isaiah 9:9	veyade'u ha'am kulo 'efrayim veyosheb shomeron bega'avah ubegodel leibab leimor. isaiah 9:10	lebeinim nafalu vegazit nibneh shiqmim guda'u va'arazim nakhalif. isaiah 9:11	vaysageb yhvh 'et zarei rezin 'alav ve'et 'oyebav yesakhsekh. isaiah 9:12	'aram miqedem ufelishtim mei'akhor vayokhelu 'et yisra'el bekhal peh bekhal zot 9:15	zaqen unesu fanim hu harosh venabi moreh sheqer hu hazanab. isaiah 9:16	vayihyu me'asherei ha'am hazeh mat'im ume'usharav mebula'im. isaiah 9:17	'al ken 'al bakhurav lo yismakh 'adonai ve'et besibkhei haya'ar vayit'abekhu gei'ut 'ashan. isaiah 9:19	be'ebrat yhvh zeba'ot ne'tam 'arez vayhi ha'am kema'akholet 'esh 'ish 'el 'akhiv lo yakhmolu. isaiah 9:20	vayigzor 'al yamin vera'eb vayokhal 'al semol velo sabei'u 'ish besar zero'o yokheilu. isaiah 9:21	menasheh 'et 'efrayim ve'efrayim 'et menasheh yakhdav hemah 'al yehudah bekhal zot lo shab 'apo ve'od yado netuyah. isaiah 10:1	ho khedameseq shomeron. isaiah 10:10	ka'asher maze'ah yadi lemamlekhot ha'elil ufesileihem mirushalim umishomeron. isaiah 10:11	halo ka'asher 'asiti leshomeron vele'elileha ken 'e'eseh lirushalim vela'azabeha. isaiah 10:12	vehayah ki yebaza' 'adonai 'et kal ma'aseihu behar ziyon ubirushalim 'efqod 'al peri godel lebab melekh 'ashur ve'al tif'eret rum 'einav. isaiah 10:13	ki 'amar bekhoakh yadi ha'arez 'ani 'asafeti velo hayah noded kanaf ufozeh feh umezafzef. isaiah 10:15	hayitpa'er hagarzen 'al hakhozeb bo 'im yitgadel hamasor 'al menifo kehanif sheibet ve'et merimav keharim mateh lo 'ez. isaiah 10:16	lakhen yeshalakh ha'adon yhvh zeba'ot bemishmanav razon vetakhat kebodo yeiqad yeqod kiqod 'esh. isaiah 10:17	vehayah 'or yisra'el le'esh uqedosho lelehabah uba'arah ve'akhelah shito 10:22	ki 'im yihyeh 'amekha yisra'el kekhol hayam she'ar yashub bo kilayon kharuz shotef zedaqah. isaiah 10:23	ki khalah venekherazah 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot 'oseh beqereb kal ha'arez. isaiah 10:24	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot 'al tira 'ami yosheb ziyon mei'ashur basheibet yakekah umateihu yisa 'alekha bederekh mizrayim. isaiah 10:25	ki 'od me'at miz'ar vekhalah za'am ve'api 'al mei'al zavarekha vekhubal 'ol mipenei shamen. isaiah 10:28	ba 'al 'ayat 'abar bemigron lemikhmas yafqid keilav. isaiah 10:29	'aberu ma'barah geba' malon lanu kharedah haramah gib'at sha'ul nasah. isaiah 10:30	zahali qolekh bat galim haqshibi layshah 'aniyah 'anatot. isaiah 10:31	nadedah madmeinah yoshebei hageibim hei'izu. isaiah 10:32	'od hayom benob la'amod yenofef yado har bet bat ziyon yipol. isaiah 11:1	veyaza khoter migeiza' yishai veneizer misharashav yifreh. isaiah 11:2	venakhah 'alav ruakh yhvh ruakh khakhmah ubinah ruakh 'eizah ugeburah ruakh da'at veyir'at yhvh. isaiah 11:3	vaharikho beyir'at yhvh velo lemar'eh 'einav yishpot velo lemishma' 'azenav yokhiakh. isaiah 11:4	veshafat bezedeq dalim vehokhiakh bemishor le'anvei 'arez vehikah 'erez besheibet piv uberuakh umei'iyei hayam. isaiah 11:12	venasa nes lagoyim ve'asaf nidkhei yisra'el unefuzot yehudah yeqabez mei'arba' kanfot ha'arez. isaiah 11:13	vesarah qin'at 'efrayim vezorerei yehudah yikareitu 'efrayim 11:15	vehekherim yhvh 'et leshon yam mizrayim veheinif yado 'al hanahar ba'yam rukho vehikahu leshib'ah nekhalim vehidrikh bane'alim. isaiah 11:16	vehayetah mesilah lish'ar 'amo 'asher yisha'er mimenah. isaiah 13:10	ki khokhbei hashamayim ukhesileihem lo yahelu 'oram khashakh hashemesh bezeito veyareiakh lo yagiha 'oro. isaiah 13:11	ufaqadti 'al teibel ra'ah ve'al resha'im 'avonam vehishbati 'apo. isaiah 13:14	vehayah kizbi mudakh ukhezon ve'en meqabez 'ish 'el 'amo yifnu ve'ish 'el 'arzo yanusu. isaiah 13:15	kal hanimza yidaqer vekhal hanispeh yipol bekhareb. isaiah 13:16	ve'oleleihem teratashnah uferi beten lo yerakheimu 'al banim lo takhus 'einam. isaiah 13:19	vehayetah babel zebi mamlakhot tif'eret ge'on kasdim kemahpeikhat 'elohim 'et sedom ve'et 'amorah. isaiah 13:20	lo teisheb lanezakh velo tishkon 'ad dor vador velo yahel sham 'arabi vero'im lo yarbizu sham. isaiah 13:21	verabezu sham ziyim umale'u bateihem 'okhim veshakhenu sham benot ya'anah use'irim yeraqedu sham. isaiah 13:22	ve'anah 'iyim be'almnotav vetanim beheikhelei 'oneg veqarob labo 'itah veyameha lo yimasheikhu. isaiah 14:1	ki yerakhem yhvh 'et ya'aqob ubakhar 'od beyisra'el vehinikham 'al 'admatam venilvah hager 'aleihem venispekhu 'al bet ya'aqob. isaiah 14:2	uleqakhum 'amim vehebi'um 'el meqomam vehitnakhalum bet yisra'el 'al 'admat yhvh la'abadim velishfakhot vehayu shobim leshobeihem veradu benogeseihem. isaiah 14:3	vehayah beyom haniakh yhvh lekha mei'azebekha umeiragezekha umin ha'abodah haqashah 'asher 'ubad bakh. isaiah 14:4	venasata hamashal hazeh 'al melekh babel ve'amareta 'ekh shabat noges shabetah madheibah. isaiah 14:5	shabar yhvh mateh resha'im sheibet moshelim. isaiah 14:6	makeh 'amim be'ebrah makat bilti sarah rodeh ba'af goyim murdaf beli khasakh. isaiah 14:7	nakhah shaqetah kal ha'arez pazekhu rinah. isaiah 14:8	gam beroshim samekhu lekha 'arzei lebanon mei'az shakhabta lo ya'aleh hakoret 'aleinu. isaiah 14:9	she'ol mitakhat ragezah lekha liqrat bo'ekha 'orer lekha refa'im kal 'atudei 'arez heiqim mikis'otam kol malkhei goyim. isaiah 14:10	kulam ya'anu veyomeru 'eilekha gam 'atah khuleita khamonu 'eileinu nimshaleta. isaiah 14:11	hurad she'ol ge'onekha hemyat nebalekha takhtekha yuza' rimah umekhasekha tolei'ah. isaiah 14:12	'ekh nafalta mishamayim heilel ben shakhar nigda'ta la'arez kholesh 'al goyim. isaiah 14:13	ve'atah 'amarta bilbabekha hashamayim 'e'eleh mima'al lekhokhbei 'el 'arim kis'i ve'eisheb behar mo'ed beyarketei zafon. isaiah 14:14	'e'eleh 'al bamotei 'ab 'edameh le'elyon. isaiah 14:15	'akh 'el she'ol turad 'el yarketei bor. isaiah 14:16	ro'ekha 'eilekha yashgikhu 'eilekha yitbonanu hazeh ha'ish margiz ha'arez mar'ish mamlakhot. isaiah 14:17	sam teibel kamidbar ve'arav haras 'asirav lo fatakh bayetah. isaiah 14:18	kal malkhei goyim kulam shakhebu bekhabod 'ish bebeito. isaiah 14:19	ve'atah hashelakhta miqibrekha keneizer nit'ab lebush harugim meto'anei khareb yordei 'el 'abnei bor kefeger mubas. isaiah 14:20	lo teikhad 'itam biqburah ki 'arzekha shikhata 'amekha harageta lo yiqarei le'olam zera' merei'im. isaiah 14:21	hakhinu lebanav matbeiakh ba'avon 'abotam bal yaqumu veyareshu 'arez umale'u fenei teibel 'arim. isaiah 14:22	veqamti 'aleihem ne'um yhvh zeba'ot vehikhrati lebabel shem ushe'ar venin vanekhed ne'um yhvh. isaiah 14:23	vesamtiha lemorash qipod ve'agmei mayim veteiteitiha bemat'atei hashmed ne'um yhvh zeba'ot. isaiah 14:24	nishba' yhvh zeba'ot leimor 'im lo ka'asher dimiti ken hayatah vekha'asher ya'azti hi taqum. isaiah 14:25	lishbor 'ashur be'arzi ve'al harai 'abusenu vesar mei'aleihem 'ulo vesubolo mei'al shikhmo yasur. isaiah 14:26	zot ha'eizah haye'uzah 'al kal ha'arez vezot hayad hanetuyah 'al kal hagoyim. isaiah 14:27	ki yhvh zeba'ot ya'az umi yafer veyado hanetuyah umi yeshibenah. isaiah 14:28	bishnat mot hamelekh 'akhaz hayah hamasa hazeh. isaiah 14:29	'al tismekhi feleshet kulekh ki nishbar sheibet makekh ki mishoresh nakhash yeizei zefa' ufiryo saraf me'ofef. isaiah 14:30	vera'u bekhorei dalim ve'ebyonim labetakh yirbazu veheimati bara'ab shareshekh ushe'eiritekh yaharog. isaiah 14:31	heilili sha'ar za'aqi 'ir namog peleshet kulekh ki mizafon 'ashan ba ve'en boded bemo'adav. isaiah 14:32	umah ya'aneh mal'akhei go ki yhvh yisad ziyon ubah yekhesu 'aniyei 'amo. isaiah 15:1	masa mo'ab ki belel shudad 'ar mo'ab nidmah ki belel shudad qir mo'ab nidmah. isaiah 15:2	'alah habayit vedibon habamot lebekhi 'al nebo ve'al meideba mo'ab yeyeilil bekhal roshav qarekhah kal zaqan geru'ah. isaiah 15:3	bekhuzotav khageru saq 'al gagoteha ubirkhoboteha kuloh yeyeilil yored babekhi. isaiah 15:4	vatiz'aq kheshbon ve'el'aleh 'ad yahaz nishma' qolam 'al ken khaluzei mo'ab yari'u nafsho yare'ah lo. isaiah 15:5	libi lemo'ab yiz'aq berikheha 'ad zo'ar 'eglat shelishiyah ki ma'aleh halukhit bibkhi ya'aleh bo ki derekh khoronayim za'aqat sheber ye'o'eiru. isaiah 15:6	ki mei nimrim meshamot yihyu ki yabesh khazir kalah deshe yereq lo hayah. isaiah 15:7	'al ken yitrah 'asah ufequdatam 'al nakhal ha'arabim yisa'um. isaiah 15:8	ki hiqifah haze'aqah 'et gebul mo'ab 'ad 'eglayim yilatah ube'er 'eilim yilatah. isaiah 15:9	ki mei dimon male'u dam ki 'ashit 'al dimon nosafot lifleitat mo'ab 'aryeh velish'eirit 'adamah. isaiah 16:1	shilkhu khar moshel 'erez misela' midbarah 'el har bat ziyon. isaiah 16:2	vehayah khe'of noded qen meshulakh tihyenah benot mo'ab ma'barot le'arnon. isaiah 16:3	habi'u habi'i 'eizah 'asu felilah shiti khalayil zilekh betokh zahorayim sateri nidakhim noded 'al tegali. isaiah 16:4	yaguru bakh nidakhai mo'ab hevi seiter lamo mipenei shoded ki 'afes hamez kalah shod tamu romes min ha'arez. isaiah 16:5	vehukhan bakhesed kisei veyashab 'alav be'emet be'ohel david shofet vedoresh mishpat umehir zedeq. isaiah 16:6	shama'nu ge'on mo'ab gei me'od ga'avato uge'ono ve'ebrato lo khen badav. isaiah 16:7	lakhen yeyeilil mo'ab lemo'ab kuloh yeyeilil la'ashishei qir khareset tehgu 'akh nekha'im. isaiah 16:8	ki shadmot kheshbon 'umlal gefen sibmah ba'alei goyim halemu seruqeha 'ad ya'zer naga'u ta'u midbar shelukhoteha niteshu 'aberu yam. isaiah 16:9	'al ken 'ebkeh bibkhi ya'zer gefen sibmah 'arayavekh dim'ati kheshbon ve'el'aleh ki 'al qeizekh ve'al qezirekh heidad nafal. isaiah 16:10	vene'esaf simkhah vagil min hakarmel ubakeramim lo yerunan lo yero'a' yayin bayqabim lo yidrokh hadorekh heidad hishbati. isaiah 16:11	'al ken mei'ai lemo'ab kakinor yehemu veqirbi leqir khares. isaiah 16:12	vehayah khi nir'ah ki nil'ah mo'ab 'al habamah uba 'el miqdasho lehitpalel velo yukhal. isaiah 16:13	zeh hadabar 'asher diber yhvh 'el mo'ab mei'az. isaiah 16:14	ve'atah diber yhvh leimor beshalosh shanim kishnei sakhir veniqlah kebod mo'ab bekhol hehamon harab ushe'ar me'at miz'ar lo khabir. isaiah 17:1	masa damaseq hineh dameseq musar mei'ir vehayetah me'i mapalah. isaiah 17:2	'azubot 'arei 'aro'er la'adarim tihyenah verabezu ve'en makharid. isaiah 17:3	venishbat mibzar mei'efrayim umamlakhah midameseq ushe'ar 'aram kikhbod benei yisra'el yihyu ne'um yhvh zeba'ot. isaiah 17:4	vehayah bayom hahu yidal kebod ya'aqob umishman besaro yeirazeh. isaiah 17:5	vehayah ke'esof qazir qamah uzero'o shibolim yiqzor vehayah kimlaqet shibolim be'eimeq refa'im. isaiah 17:6	venish'ar bo 'oleilot kenoqef zayit shenayim sheloshah gargerim berosh 'amir 'arba'ah khamishah bis'ifeha poriyah ne'um yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. isaiah 17:7	bayom hahu yish'eh ha'adam 'al 'oseihu ve'einav 'el qedosh yisra'el tir'enah. isaiah 17:8	velo yish'eh 'el hamizbekhot ma'aseh yadav va'asher 'asu 'ezbe'otav lo yir'eh veha'asheirim vehakhamanim. isaiah 17:9	bayom hahu yihyu 'arei ma'uzo ka'azubat hakhoresh veha'amir 'asher 'azebu mipenei benei yisra'el vehayetah shemamah. isaiah 17:10	ki shakhakhat 'elohei yish'ekh vezur ma'uzekh lo zakharet 'al ken tite'i nit'ei na'amanim uzemorat zar tizra'enu. isaiah 17:11	beyom nit'ekh tesagseigi ubaboqer zar'ekh tafrikhi ned qazir beyom nakhalah ukhe'eb 'anush. isaiah 17:12	ho hamon 'amim rabim kahamot yamim yehemayun ushe'on le'umim kish'on mayim kabirim yisha'un. isaiah 17:13	le'umim kish'on mayim rabim yisha'un vega'ar bo venas mimerkhaq verudaf kemoz harim lifnei ruakh ukhegalgal lifnei sufah. isaiah 17:14	le'et 'ereb vehineh balahah beterem boqer 'einenu zeh kheileq shoseinu vegoral lebozezeinu. isaiah 18:1	ho 'erez zilzal kenafayim 'asher mei'eiber lenaharei khush. isaiah 18:2	hasholeiakh bayam zirim ubikhlei gome 'al penei mayim lekhu mal'akhim qalim 'el go memushakh umorat 'el 'am nora min hu vahale'ah go qav qav umebusah 'asher baze'u neharim 'arzo. isaiah 18:3	kal yoshebei teibel veshokhenei 'arez kinso nes harim tir'u vekhitqoa' shofar tishma'u. isaiah 18:4	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'eilai 'eshqotah 'eshqotah ve'abitah bimkhoni kekhom zakh 'alei 'or ke'ab tal bekhom qazir. isaiah 18:5	ki lifnei qazir ketam perakh uboser gomel yihyeh nizah vekharat hazalzalim bamazmeirot ve'et hanetishot heisir heitaz. isaiah 18:6	yei'azebu yakhdav le'et harim ulebehemat ha'arez veqaz 'alav ha'ayit vekhal behemat ha'arez 'alav tekheraf. isaiah 18:7	ba'et hahi yubal shai yhvh zeba'ot 'am memushakh umorat umei'am nora min hu vahale'ah go qav qav umebusah 'asher baze'u neharim 'arzo 'el meqom shem yhvh zeba'ot har ziyon. isaiah 19:1	masa mizrayim hineh yhvh rokheb 'al 'ab qal uba mizrayim vena'u 'elilei mizrayim mipanav ulebab mizrayim yimas beqirbo. isaiah 19:2	vesikhsakhti mizrayim bemizrayim venilkhamu 'ish be'akhiv ve'ish berei'eihu 'ir be'ir mamlakhah bemamlakhah. isaiah 19:3	venabeqah ruakh mizrayim beqirbo va'azato 'abaleia' vedareshu 'el ha'elilim ve'el ha'itim ve'el ha'obot ve'el hayide'onim. isaiah 19:4	vesikarti 'et mizrayim beyad 'adonim qasheh umelekh 'az yimshal bam ne'um ha'adon yhvh zeba'ot. isaiah 19:5	venishetu mayim meihayam venahar yekherab veyabesh. isaiah 19:6	vehe'eznikhu neharot dalalu vekharebu ye'orei mazor qaneh vasuf qameilu. isaiah 19:7	'arot 'al ye'or 'al pi ye'or vekhol mizra' ye'or yibash nidaf ve'einenu. isaiah 19:8	ve'anu hadayagim ve'abelu kal mashlikhei bai'or khakah uforesei mikhmoret 'al penei mayim 'umlalu. isaiah 19:9	uboshu 'obedei fishtim seriqot ve'oregim khorai. isaiah 19:10	vehayu shatoteha meduka'im kal 'osei sekher 'agmei nafesh. isaiah 19:11	'akh 'evilim sarei zo'an khakhmei yo'azei far'oh 'eizah nib'arah 'ekh tomeru 'el par'oh ben khakhamim 'ani ben malkhei qedem. isaiah 19:12	'ayam 'eifo khakhamekha veyagidu na lakh veyeide'u mah ya'az yhvh zeba'ot 'al mizrayim. isaiah 19:13	no'alu sarei zo'an nishe'u sarei nof hit'u 'et mizrayim pinat shebateha. isaiah 19:14	yhvh masakh beqirbah ruakh 'iv'im vehit'u 'et mizrayim bekhal ma'aseihu kehita'ot shikor beqi'o. isaiah 19:15	velo yihyeh lemizrayim ma'aseh 'asher ya'aseh rosh vezanab kipah ve'agmon. isaiah 19:16	bayom hahu yihyeh mizrayim kanashim vekharad ufakhad mipenei tenufat yad yhvh zeba'ot 'asher hu meinif 'alav. isaiah 19:17	vehayetah 'admat yehudah lemizrayim lekhaga kol 'asher yazkir 'otah 'eilav yifkhad mipenei 'azat yhvh zeba'ot 'asher hu yo'ez 'alav. isaiah 19:18	bayom hahu yihyu khamesh 'arim be'erez mizrayim medaberot sefat kena'an venishba'ot yhvh zeba'ot 'ir haheres yei'amer le'ekhat. isaiah 19:19	bayom hahu yihyeh mizbeiakh yhvh betokh 'erez mizrayim umazeibah 'eizel gebulah yhvh. isaiah 19:20	vehayah le'ot ule'ed yhvh zeba'ot be'erez mizrayim ki yiz'aqu 'el yhvh mipenei lokhazim veyishlakh lahem moshia' varab vehizilam. isaiah 19:21	venoda' yhvh lemizrayim veyade'u mizrayim 'et yhvh bayom hahu ve'abedu zebakh uminkhah venaderu neider yhvh veshileimu. isaiah 19:22	venagaf yhvh 'et mizrayim nagof verafo veshabu 'ad yhvh vene'tar lahem urefa'am. isaiah 19:23	bayom hahu tihyeh mesilah mimizrayim 'ashurah uba 'ashur bemizrayim umizrayim be'ashur ve'abedu mizrayim 'et 'ashur. isaiah 19:24	bayom hahu yihyeh yisra'el shelishiyah lemizrayim ule'ashur berakhah beqereb ha'arez. isaiah 19:25	'asher beirakho yhvh zeba'ot leimor barukh 'ami mizrayim uma'aseh yadai 'ashur venakhalati yisra'el. isaiah 20:1	bishnat bo tartan 'ashdodah bishlokh 'oto sargon melekh 'ashur vayilakhem be'ashdod vayilkedah. isaiah 20:2	ba'et hahi diber yhvh beyad yesha'yahu ben 'amoz leimor lekh ufitakhta hasaq mei'al matenekha vena'alkha takhaloz mei'al raglekha vaya'as ken halokh 'arom veyakhef. isaiah 20:3	vayomer yhvh ka'asher halakh 'abdi yesha'yahu 'arom veyakhef shalosh shanim 'ot umofet 'al mizrayim ve'al kush. isaiah 20:4	ken yinhag melekh 'ashur 'et shebi mizrayim ve'et galut kush ne'arim uzeqeinim 'arom veyakhef vakhasufai shet 'ervat mizrayim. isaiah 20:5	vekhatu vaboshu mikush mabatam umin mizrayim tif'artam. isaiah 20:6	ve'amar yosheb ha'i hazeh bayom hahu hineh khoh mabateinu 'asher nasnu sham le'ezrah lehinazel mipenei melekh 'ashur ve'ekh nimalet 'anakhenu. isaiah 21:1	masa midbar yam kesufot banegeb lakhalof mimidbar ba mei'erez nora'ah. isaiah 21:2	khazut qashah hugad li haboged boged vehashoded shoded 'ali 'eilam zuri madai kal 'ankhatah hishbati. isaiah 21:3	'al ken male'u matenai khalkhalah zirim 'akhazuni kezirei yoleidah na'aveiti mishemoa' nibhalti meire'ot. isaiah 21:4	ta'ah lebabi palazut bi'atateni 'et neshef khishqi sam li lakharadah. isaiah 21:5	'arokh hashulkhan zafoh hazafit 'akhol shatoh qumu hasarim mishkhu magen. isaiah 21:6	ki khoh 'amar 'eilai 'adonai lekh ha'amed hamzapeh 'asher yir'eh yagid. isaiah 21:7	vera'ah rekheb zemed parashim rekheb khamor rekheb gamal vehiqshib qesheb rab qasheb. isaiah 21:8	vayiqra 'aryeh 'al mizpeh 'adonai 'anokhi 'omed tamid yomam ve'al mishmarti 'anokhi nizab kal haleilot. isaiah 21:9	vehineh zeh ba rekheb 'ish zemed parashim vaya'an vayomer nafelah nafelah babel vekhal pesilei 'eloheha shibar la'arez. isaiah 21:10	medushati uben gareni 'asher shama'ti mei'et yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el higadti lakhem. isaiah 21:11	masa dumah 'eilai qorei misei'ir shomer mah milaylah shomer mah milel. isaiah 21:12	'amar shomer 'atah boqer vegam layelah 'im tib'ayun be'ayu shubu 'eitayu. isaiah 21:13	masa ba'rab baya'ar ba'rab talinu 'orekhot dedanim. isaiah 21:14	liqrat zamei heitayu mayim yoshebei 'erez teima belakhmo qidemu noded. isaiah 21:15	ki mipenei kharabot nadadu mipenei khereb netushah umipenei qeshet derukhah umipenei kobed milkhamah. isaiah 21:16	ki khoh 'amar 'adonai 'eilai be'od shanah kishnei sakhir vekhalah kal kebod qeidar. isaiah 21:17	ushe'ar mispar qeshet giborei benei qeidar yim'atu ki yhvh 'elohei yisra'el diber. isaiah 22:1	masa gei khizayon mah lakh 'eifo ki 'alit kulakh lagagot. isaiah 22:2	teshu'ot melei'ah 'ir homiyah qiryah 'alizah khalalayikh lo khalei khereb velo meitei milkhamah. isaiah 22:3	kal qezinayikh nadedu yakhad miqeshet 'usaru kal nimza'ayikh 'useru yakhdav meirakhoq barakhu. isaiah 22:4	'al ken 'amarti she'u mini 'amarer babekhi 'al ta'izu lenakhameini 'al shod bat 'ami. isaiah 22:5	ki yom mehumah umebusah umebukhah ladonai yhvh zeba'ot begei khizayon meqarqar qir veshoa' 'el hahar. isaiah 22:6	ve'eilam nasa 'ashpah berekheb 'adam parashim veqir 'eirah magen. isaiah 22:7	vayhi mibkhar 'amaqayikh male'u rakheb vehaparashim shot shatu hasha'erah. isaiah 22:8	vaygal 'et masakh yehudah vatabet bayom hahu 'el nesheq bet haya'ar. isaiah 22:9	ve'et beqi'ei 'ir david re'item ki rabu vateqabezu 'et mei habereikhah hatakhtonah. isaiah 22:10	ve'et batei yerushalim sefartem vatitzev habatim lebazer hakhomah. isaiah 22:11	umiqvah 'asitem ben hakhomotayim lemei habereikhah hayshanah velo hibatem 'el 'oseha veyozerah meirakhoq lo re'item. isaiah 22:12	vayiqra 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot bayom hahu libkhi ulemisped uleqarekhah velakhagor saq. isaiah 22:13	vehineh sason vesimkhah harog baqar veshakhot zon 'akhol basar veshatot yayin 'akhol veshato ki makhar namut. isaiah 22:14	veniglah be'azenai yhvh zeba'ot 'im yekhupar he'avon hazeh lakhem 'ad temutun 'amar 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot. isaiah 22:15	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot lekh bo 'el hasokhen hazeh 'al shebna 'asher 'al habayit. isaiah 22:16	mah lekha foh umi lekha foh ki khazabta lekha poh qaber khozebi marom qibro khoqeqi basela' mishkan lo. isaiah 22:17	hineh yhvh metaltelkha talteilah gaber ve'otekha 'atoh. isaiah 22:18	zanof yiznafekha zeneifah kadur 'el 'erez rakhabat yadayim shamah tamut veshamah markebot kebodekha qelon bet 'adonekha. isaiah 22:19	vahadaftikha mimazabekha umima'amadekha yehersekha. isaiah 22:20	vehayah bayom hahu veqarati le'abdi le'elyaqim ben khilqiyahu. isaiah 22:21	vehilbashtiv kutanetekha ve'abneitekha 'akhazeqenu umemsheltekha 'eten beyado vehayah le'ab leyosheb yerushalim ulebet yehudah. isaiah 22:22	venatati mafteiakh bet david 'al shikhmo ufatakh ve'en soger vesagar ve'en poteiakh. isaiah 22:23	uteqa'tiv yated bemaqom ne'eman vehayah lekhisei khabod lebet 'abiv. isaiah 22:24	vetalu 'alav kol kebod bet 'abiv haze'eza'im vehazefi'ot kol kelei haqatan mikelei ha'aganot ve'ad kal kelei hanebalim. isaiah 22:25	bayom hahu ne'um yhvh zeba'ot tamush hayated hatequ'ah bemaqom ne'eman venigde'ah venafelah venikhrat hamasa 'asher 'aleha ki yhvh diber. isaiah 23:1	masa zor heililu 'oniyot tarshish ki shudad mibayit mibo mei'erez kitim niglah lamo. isaiah 23:2	domu yoshebei 'i sokher zidon 'ober yam mil'ukh. isaiah 23:3	ubemayim rabim zera' shikhor qezir ye'or tebu'atah vatehi sekhar goyim. isaiah 23:4	boshi zidon ki 'amar yam ma'oz hayam leimor lo khalti velo yaladti velo gidalti bakhurim romamti betulot. isaiah 23:5	ka'asher sheima' lemizrayim yakhilu kesheima' zor. isaiah 23:6	'ibru tarshishah heililu yoshebei 'i. isaiah 23:7	hazot lakhem 'alizah mimei qedem qadmatah yobiluha ragleha meirakhoq lagur. isaiah 23:8	mi ya'az zot 'al zor hama'atirah 'asher sokhareh sarim kin'aneha nikhbadei 'arez. isaiah 23:9	yhvh zeba'ot ye'azah lekhalel ge'on kal zebi lehaqel kal nikhbadei 'arez. isaiah 23:10	'ibri 'arzekh kai'or bat tarshish 'en meizakh 'od. isaiah 23:11	yado natah 'al hayam hirgiz mamlakhot yhvh zivah 'el kena'an lashmid ma'uzneha. isaiah 23:12	vayomer lo tosifi 'od la'loz ham'ushaqah betulat bat zidon kitiyim kitim qumi 'abori gam sham lo yanuakh lakh. isaiah 23:13	hen 'erez kasdim zeh ha'am lo hayah 'ashur yesadah leziyim heiqimu bekhinav bakhunav 'oreru 'armenoteha samah lemapeilah. isaiah 23:14	heililu 'oniyot tarshish ki shudad ma'uzekhen. isaiah 23:15	vehayah bayom hahu venishkakhat zor shib'im shanah kimei melekh 'ekhad miqez shib'im shanah yihyeh lezor keshirat hazonah. isaiah 23:16	qekhi khinor sobi 'ir zonah nishkakhah heitibi nagen harbi shir lema'an tizakheiri. isaiah 23:17	vehayah miqez shib'im shanah yifqod yhvh 'et zor veshabah le'etnanah vezanetah 'et kal mamlekhot ha'arez 'al penei ha'adamah. isaiah 23:18	vehayah sakhrah ve'etnanah qodesh yhvh lo yei'azer velo yeikhasen ki layoshebim lifnei yhvh yihyeh sakhrah le'ekhol lesabe'ah velimkhaseh 'atiq. isaiah 24:1	hineh yhvh boqeq ha'arez ubolqah ve'ivah faneha veheifiz yoshebeha. isaiah 24:2	vehayah kha'am kakohen ka'ebed kadonav kashifkhah kagebirtah kaqoneh kamokher kamalveh kaloeh kanosheh ka'asher noshe bo. isaiah 24:3	hiboq tiboq ha'arez vehiboz tiboz ki yhvh diber 'et hadabar hazeh. isaiah 24:4	'abelah nabelah ha'arez 'umlelah nabelah teibel 'umlalu merom 'am ha'arez. isaiah 24:5	veha'arez khanefah takhat yoshebeha ki 'aberu torot khalefu khoq heifeiru berit 'olam. isaiah 24:6	'al ken 'alah 'akhelah 'erez vaye'shemu yoshebei bah 'al ken kharu yoshebei 'erez venish'ar 'enosh miz'ar. isaiah 24:7	'abal tirosh 'umlelah gafen ne'enkhu kal simkhei leb. isaiah 24:8	shabat mesos tupim khadal she'on 'alizim shabat mesos kinor. isaiah 24:9	bashir lo yishtu yayin yeimar sheikhar leshotav. isaiah 24:10	nishberah qiryat tohu sugar kal bayit mibo. isaiah 24:11	zevakhah 'al hayayin bakhuzot 'arebah kal simkhah galah mesos ha'arez. isaiah 24:12	nish'ar ba'ir shamah ushe'iyah yukat sha'ar. isaiah 24:13	ki khoh yihyeh beqereb ha'arez betokh ha'amim kenoqef zayit ke'oleilot 'im kalah bazir. isaiah 24:14	hemah yis'u qolam yaronu big'on yhvh zahalu miyam. isaiah 24:15	'al ken ba'urim kabedu yhvh be'iyei hayam shem yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. isaiah 24:16	mikenaf ha'arez zemirot shama'nu zebi lazadiq va'omar razi li razi li 'o li bogedim bagadu ubeged bogdim bagadu. isaiah 24:17	pakhad vafakhat vafakh 'alekha yosheb ha'arez. isaiah 24:18	vehayah hanas miqol hapakhad yipol 'el hapakhat veha'oleh mitokh hapakhat yilakhed bapakh ki 'arubot mimarom niftakhu vayir'ashu mosdei 'arez. isaiah 24:19	ro'ah hitro'a'ah ha'arez por hitporrah 'erez mot hitmotah 'arez. isaiah 24:20	noa' tanua' 'erez kashikor vehitnoddah kamelunah vekhabad 'aleha pish'ah venafelah velo tosif qum. isaiah 24:21	vehayah bayom hahu yifqod yhvh 'al zeba hamarom bamarom ve'al malkhei ha'adamah 'al ha'adamah. isaiah 24:22	ve'usefu 'aseifah 'asir 'al bor vesugeru 'al masger umeirob yamim yipaqeidu. isaiah 24:23	vekhaferah halebanah uboshah hakhamah ki malakh yhvh zeba'ot behar ziyon ubirushalim veneged zeqeinav kabod. isaiah 25:1	yhvh 'elohai 'atah 'aromimkha 'odeh shimkha ki 'asita pele 'eizot meirakhoq 'emunah 'omen. isaiah 25:2	ki samta mei'ir lagal qiryah bezurah lemapeilah 'armon zarim mei'ir le'olam lo yibaneh. isaiah 25:3	'al ken yekhabedukha 'am 'az qiryat goyim 'arizim yira'ukha. isaiah 25:4	ki hayita ma'oz ladal ma'oz la'ebyon bazar lo makhseh mizerem zel meikhoreb ki ruakh 'arizim kezerem qir. isaiah 25:5	kekhoreb bezayon she'on zarim takhnia' khoreb bezel 'ab zemir 'arizim ya'aneh. isaiah 25:6	ve'asah yhvh zeba'ot lekhal ha'amim bahar hazeh mishteh shemanim mishteh shemarim shemanim memukhayim shemarim mezuqaqim. isaiah 25:7	ubila' bahar hazeh penei halot halot 'al kal ha'amim vehamaseikhah hanesukhah 'al kal hagoyim. isaiah 25:8	bila' hamavet lanezakh umakhah 'adonai yhvh dim'ah mei'al kal panim vekherpat 'amo yasir mei'al kal ha'arez ki yhvh diber. isaiah 25:9	ve'amar bayom hahu hineh 'eloheinu zeh qivinu lo veyoshi'einu zeh yhvh qivinu lo nagilah venismekhah bishu'ato. isaiah 25:10	ki tanuakh yad yhvh bahar hazeh venadosh mo'ab takhtav kehidush matben bemei bemo madmeinah. isaiah 25:11	ufeiras yadav beqirbo ka'asher yefares hasokheh liskhot vehishpil ga'avato 'im 'arebot yadav. isaiah 25:12	umibzar misgab khomotekha heishakh hishpil higia' la'arez 'ad 'afar. isaiah 26:1	bayom hahu yushar hashir hazeh be'erez yehudah 'ir 'az lanu yeshu'ah yashit khomot vakhel. isaiah 26:2	pitkhu she'arim veyabo go zadiq shomer 'emunim. isaiah 26:3	yeizer samukh tizor shalom shalom ki bekha batuakh. isaiah 26:4	bitkhu yhvh 'adei 'ad ki beyah yhvh zur 'olamim. isaiah 26:5	ki heishakh yoshebei marom qiryah nisgabah yashpilenah yashpilah 'ad 'erez yagi'enah 'ad 'afar. isaiah 26:6	tirmesenah ragel raglei 'ani pa'amei dalim. isaiah 26:7	'orakh lazadiq meisharim yashar ma'gal zadiq tefales. isaiah 26:8	'af 'orakh mishpatekha yhvh qivinukha leshimkha ulezikhrekha ta'avat nafesh. isaiah 26:9	nafshi 'ivitikha balaylah 'af rukhi beqirbi 'ashakhareka ki ka'asher mishpatekha la'arez zedeq lamedu yoshebei teibel. isaiah 26:10	yukhan rasha' bal lamad zedeq be'erez nekhokhot ye'avel ubal yir'eh gei'ut yhvh. isaiah 26:11	yhvh ramah yadekha bal yekhezayun yekhezu veyeiboshu qin'at 'am 'af 'esh zarekha tokhelem. isaiah 26:12	yhvh tishpot shalom lanu ki gam kal ma'aseinu pa'alta lanu. isaiah 26:13	yhvh 'eloheinu be'alunu 'adonim zulatekha lebad bekha nazkir shemekha. isaiah 26:14	meitim bal yikhyu refa'im bal yaqumu lakhen paqadta vatashmidem vate'abed kal zeikher lamo. isaiah 26:15	yasafta lago yhvh yasafta lago nikhbadeta rikhaqta kal qazvei 'arez. isaiah 26:16	yhvh bazar peqadukha zaqun lakhash musarekha lamo. isaiah 26:17	kemo harah taqrib laledet takhil tiz'aq bakhabaleha ken hayinu mipanekha yhvh. isaiah 26:18	harinu khalnu kemo yaladnu ruakh yeshu'ot bal na'aseh 'erez ubal yipelu yoshebei teibel. isaiah 26:19	yikhyu meitekha nebeilati yequmun haqizu veranenu shokhenei 'afar ki tal 'orot talekha va'arez refa'im tapil. isaiah 26:20	lekh 'ami bo bakhadarekha usegor delatekha delatekha ba'adekha khabi khim'at rega' 'ad ya'abor ya'abar za'am. isaiah 26:21	ki hineh yhvh yozei mimeqomo lifqod 'avon yosheb ha'arez 'alav vegiletah ha'arez 'et dameha velo tekhaseh 'od 'al harugeha. isaiah 27:1	bayom hahu yifqod yhvh bekharbo haqashah vehagedolah vehakhazaqah 'al livyatan nakhash bariakh ve'al livyatan nakhash 'aqalaton veharag 'et hatanin 'asher bayam. isaiah 27:2	bayom hahu kerem khemed 'anu lah. isaiah 27:3	'ani yhvh nozerah lirga'im 'ashqenah pen yifqod 'aleha laylah vayom 'ezorenah. isaiah 27:4	kheimah 'en li mi yiteneini shamir shayit bamilkhamah 'efse'ah bah 'azitenah yakhad. isaiah 27:5	'o yakhazeq bema'uzi ya'aseh shalom li shalom ya'aseh li. isaiah 27:6	haba'im yashresh ya'aqob yaziz ufarakh yisra'el umale'u fenei teibel tenubah. isaiah 27:7	hakemakat makeihu hikahu 'im kehereg harugav horag. isaiah 27:8	besase'ah beshalkhah teribenah hagah berukho haqashah beyom qadim. isaiah 27:9	lakhen bezot yekhupar 'avon ya'aqob vezeh kal peri hasir khatato besumo kal 'abnei mizbeiakh ke'abnei gir menupazot lo yaqumu 'asheirim vekhamanim. isaiah 27:10	ki 'ir bezurah badad naveh meshulakh vene'ezab kamidbar sham yir'eh 'eigel vesham yirbaz vekhilah se'ifeha. isaiah 27:11	bibosh qezirah tishabarnah nashim ba'ot me'irot 'otah ki lo 'am binot hu 'al ken lo yerakhamenu 'oseihu veyozero lo yekhunenu. isaiah 27:12	vehayah bayom hahu yakhbot yhvh mishibolet hanahar 'ad behar haqodesh birushalim. isaiah 28:1	ho 'ateret gei'ut shikorei 'efrayim veziz nobel zebi tif'arto 'asher 'al rosh gei shemanim halumei yayin. isaiah 28:2	hineh khazaq ve'amiz ladonai kezerem barad gei shemanim kebikurah beterem qayiz 'asher yir'eh haro'eh 'otah be'odah bekhapo yibla'enah. isaiah 28:5	bayom hahu yihyeh yhvh zeba'ot la'ateret zebi velizfirat tif'arah lish'ar 'amo. isaiah 28:6	uleruakh mishpat layosheb 'al hamishpat veligburah meshibei milkhamah sha'erah. isaiah 28:7	vegam 'eleh bayayin shagu ubasheikhar ta'u kohen venabi shagu basheikhar nible'u min hayayin ta'u min hasheikhar shagu baro'eh paqu peliliyah. isaiah 28:8	ki kal shulkhanot male'u qi zo'ah beli maqom. isaiah 28:9	'et mi yoreh dei'ah ve'et mi yabin shemu'ah gemulei meikhalab 'atiqei mishadayim. isaiah 28:10	ki zav lazav zav lazav qav laqav qav laqav ze'er sham ze'er sham. isaiah 28:11	ki bela'agei safah ubelashon 'akheret yedaber 'el ha'am hazeh. isaiah 28:12	'asher 'amar 'aleihem zot hamenukhah hanikhu le'ayef vezot hamargei'ah velo 'abu shemoa'. isaiah 28:13	vehayah lahem debar yhvh zav lazav zav lazav qav laqav qav laqav ze'er sham ze'er sham lema'an yeilekhu vekhashelu 'akhor venishbaru venoqshu venilkadu. isaiah 28:14	lakhen shim'u debar yhvh 'anshei lazon moshelei ha'am hazeh 'asher birushalim. isaiah 28:15	ki 'amartem karatnu berit 'et mavet ve'im she'ol 'asinu khozeh shit shot shotef ki 'abar ya'abor lo yebo'einu ki samnu khazab makhseinu ubasheqer nistarenu. isaiah 28:16	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini yisad beziyon 'aben 'eben bokhan pinat yiqrat musad musad hama'amin lo yakhish. isaiah 28:17	vesamti mishpat leqav uzedaqah lemishqalet veya'ah barad makhseh khazab veseiter mayim yishtofu. isaiah 28:18	vekhupar beritekhem 'et mavet vekhazutekhem 'et she'ol lo taqum shot shotef ki ya'abor vihyitem lo lemirmas. isaiah 28:19	midei 'abero yiqakh 'etkhem ki baboqer baboqer ya'abor bayom ubalayelah vehayah raq zeva'ah habin shemu'ah. isaiah 28:20	ki qazar hamaza' meihistareia' vehamaseikhah zarah kehitkanes. isaiah 28:21	ki khehar perazim yaqum yhvh ke'eimeq begib'on yirgaz la'asot ma'aseihu zar ma'aseihu vela'abod 'abodato nakheriyah 'abodato. isaiah 28:22	ve'atah 'al titlozazu pen yekhzequ mosreikhem ki khalah venekherazah shama'ti mei'et 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot 'al kal ha'arez. isaiah 28:23	ha'azinu veshim'u qoli haqshibu veshim'u 'imrati. isaiah 28:24	hakhol hayom yakharosh hakhoresh lizroa' yefatakh visaded 'admato. isaiah 28:25	halo 'im shivah faneha veheifiz qezakh vekhamon yizroq vesam khitah sorah use'orah nisman vekhusemet gebulato. isaiah 28:26	veyisero lamishpat 'elohav yorenu. isaiah 28:27	ki lo bekharuz yudash qezakh ve'ofan 'agalah 'al kamon yusab ki bamateh yeikhabet qezakh vekhamon bashabet. isaiah 28:28	lekhem yudaq ki lo zarayikh ukhemoz 'ober hamon 'arizim vehayah lefeta' pit'om. isaiah 29:6	mei'im yhvh zeba'ot tipaqed bera'am ubera'ash veqol gadol sufah use'arah velahab 'esh 'okheilah. isaiah 29:7	vehayah kakhalom yakhalom hazamei vehineh shoteh veheiqiz vehineh 'ayef venafsho shoqeiqah ken yihyeh hamon kal hagoyim hazobe'im 'al har ziyon. isaiah 29:9	hitmahmehu utemahu hishta'ash'u vasho'u shakheru velo yayin na'u velo sheikhar. isaiah 29:10	ki nasakh 'aleikhem yhvh ruakh tardeimah vai'azem 'et 'eineikhem 'et hanebi'im ve'et rasheikhem hakhozim kisah. isaiah 29:11	vatehi lakhem khazut hakol kedibrei haseifer hekhatum 'asher yitenu 'oto 'el yodeia' haseifer seifer leimor qera na zeh ve'amar lo 'ukhal ki khatum hu. isaiah 29:12	venitan haseifer 'al 'asher lo yada' seifer leimor qera na zeh ve'amar lo yada'ti seifer. isaiah 29:13	vayomer 'adonai ya'an ki nigash ha'am hazeh befiv ubisfatav kibeduni velibo rikhaq mimeni vatehi yir'atam 'oti mizvat 'anashim melumadah. isaiah 29:14	lakhen hini yosif yod'einu. isaiah 29:16	hafkekhem 'im kekhomer hayozer yeikhasheb ki yomar ma'aseh le'oseihu lo 'asani veyeizer 'amar leyozro lo heibin. isaiah 29:17	halo 'od me'at miz'ar veshab lebanon lakarmel 29:22	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'el bet ya'aqob 'asher padah 'et 'abraham lo 'atah yeibosh ya'aqob velo 'atah panav yekhevaru. isaiah 29:23	ki bir'oto yeladav ma'aseh yadai beqirbo yaqdishu shemi velinsokh maseikhah velo rukhi lema'an sefot khatat 'al khatat. isaiah 30:2	haholekhim laredet mizrayim ufi lo sha'alu la'oz bema'oz par'oh velakhsot bezel mizrayim. isaiah 30:3	vehayah lakhem ma'oz par'oh leboshet vehekhasut bezel mizrayim likhlimah. isaiah 30:4	ki hayu bezo'an sarav umal'akhav khanes yagi'u. isaiah 30:5	kol hib'ish hobish 'al 'am lo yo'ilu lamo lo le'eizer velo leho'il ki leboshet vegam lekherpah. isaiah 30:6	masa bahamot negeb be'erez zarah vezuqah labi valayish meihem 'ef'eh vesaraf me'ofef yis'u 'al ketef 'ayarim kheileihem ve'al dabeshet gemalim 'ozrotam 'al 'am lo yo'ilu. isaiah 30:7	umizrayim hebel variq ya'zoru lakhen qarati lazot rahab hem shabet. isaiah 30:8	'atah bo khatebah 'al luakh 'itam ve'al seifer khuqah utehi leyom 'akharon la'ad 'ad 'olam. isaiah 30:9	ki 'am meri hu banim kekhashim banim lo 'abu shemoa' torat yhvh. isaiah 30:10	'asher 'ameru laro'im lo tir'u velakhozim lo tekhezu lanu nekhokhot daberu lanu khalaqot khazu mahatalot. isaiah 30:11	suru minei derekh hatu minei 'orakh hashbitu mipaneinu 'et qedosh yisra'el. isaiah 30:12	lakhen koh 'amar qedosh yisra'el ya'an ma'asekhem badabar hazeh vatibtekhu be'osheq venaloz vatisha'anu 'alav. isaiah 30:13	lakhen yihyeh lakhem he'avon hazeh keferez nofel nib'eh bekhomah nisgabah 'asher pit'om lefeta' yabo shibrah. isaiah 30:14	ushebarah kesheiber neibel yozrim katut lo yakhmol velo yimazei bimkhitato kheres lakhtot 'esh miyaqud velakhsof mayim migebe. isaiah 30:15	ki khoh 'amar 'adonai yhvh qedosh yisra'el beshubah vanakhat tivashei'un behashqet ubebitkhah tihyeh geburatkhem velo 'abitem. isaiah 30:16	vatomeru lo khi 'al sus nanus 'al ken tenusun ve'al qal nirkab 'al ken yiqalu rodefeikhem. isaiah 30:17	'elef 'ekhad mipenei ga'arat 'ekhad mipenei ga'arat khamishah tanusu 'ad 'im notartem katoren 'al rosh hahar vekhanes 'al hagib'ah. isaiah 30:18	velakhen yekhakeh yhvh lakhanankhem velakhen yarum lerakhemkhem ki 'elohei mishpat yhvh 'ashrei kal khokhei lo. isaiah 30:19	ki 'am beziyon yeisheb birushalim bakho lo tibkeh khanon yakhenekha leqol za'aqekha keshame'ato 'anakh. isaiah 30:20	venatan lakhem 'adonai lekhem zar umayim lakhaz velo yikanef 'od morekha vehayu 'einekha ro'ot 'et morekha. isaiah 30:21	ve'azenekha tishma'nah dabar mei'akharekha leimor zeh haderekh lekhu bo ki ta'aminu vekhi tasme'ilu. isaiah 30:22	vetimeitem 'et zipui pesilei khaspekha ve'et 'afudat maseikhat zehabekha tizrem kemo davah zei tomar lo. isaiah 30:23	venatan metar zar'akha 'asher tizra' 'et ha'adamah velekhem tebu'at ha'adamah vehayah dashen veshamen yir'eh miqnekha bayom hahu kar nirkhab. isaiah 30:24	veha'alafim veha'ayarim 'obedei ha'adamah belil khamiz yokheilu 'asher zoreh barakhat ubamizreh. isaiah 30:25	vehayah 'al kal har gaboha ve'al kal gib'ah nisa'ah pelagim yiblei mayim beyom hereg rab binfol migdalim. isaiah 30:26	vehayah 'or halebanah ke'or hakhamah ve'or hakhamah yihyeh shib'atayim ke'or shib'at hayamim beyom khabosh yhvh 'et sheber 'amo umakhaz makato yirpa. isaiah 30:27	hineh shem yhvh ba mimerkhaq bo'er 'apo vekhobed masa'ah sefatav male'u za'am uleshono ke'esh 'okhalet. isaiah 30:28	verukho kenakhal shotef 'ad zavar yekhezeh lahanafah goyim benafat shav veresen mat'eh 'al lekhayei 'amim. isaiah 30:29	hashir yihyeh lakhem kelel hitqadesh khag vesimkhat leibab kaholekh bekhalil labo behar yhvh 'el zur yisra'el. isaiah 30:30	vehishmia' yhvh 'et hod qolo venakhat zero'o yar'eh beza'af 'af velahab 'esh 'okheilah nefez vazerem ve'eben barad. isaiah 30:31	ki miqol yhvh yeikhat 'ashur basheibet yakeh. isaiah 30:32	vehayah kol ma'abar mateh musadah 'asher yaniakh yhvh 'alav betupim ubekhinorot ubemilkhamot tenufah nilkham bah bam. isaiah 30:33	ki 'arukh mei'etmul tafeteh gam hu hi lamelekh hukhan he'miq hirkhib meduratah 'esh ve'eizim harbeh nishmat yhvh kenakhal gaferit bo'arah bah. isaiah 31:1	ho hayoredim mizrayim le'ezrah 'al susim yisha'einu vayibtekhu 'al rekheb ki rab ve'al parashim ki 'azemu me'od velo sha'u 'al qedosh yisra'el ve'et yhvh lo darashu. isaiah 31:2	vegam hu khakham vayabei ra' ve'et debarav lo heisir veqam 'al bet merei'im ve'al 'ezrat po'alei 'aven. isaiah 31:3	umizrayim 'adam velo 'el vesuseihem basar velo ruakh yhvh yateh yado vekhashal 'ozer venafal 'azur veyakhdav kulam yikhlayun. isaiah 31:4	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'eilai ka'asher yehgeh ha'aryeh vehakefir 'al tarpo 'asher yiqarei 'alav melo ro'im miqolam lo yeikhat umeihamonam lo ya'aneh ken yeired yhvh zeba'ot lizbo 'al har ziyon ve'al gib'atah. isaiah 31:5	keziporim 'afot ken yagen yhvh zeba'ot 'al yerushalim ganon vehizil pasoakh vehimlit. isaiah 31:6	shubu la'asher he'miqu sarah benei yisra'el. isaiah 31:7	ki bayom hahu yim'asun 'ish 'elilei khaspo ve'elilei zehabo 'asher 'asu lakhem yedeikhem khet. isaiah 31:8	venafal 'ashur bekhereb lo 'ish vekhereb lo 'adam tokhalenu venas lo mipenei khereb ubakhurav lamas yihyu. isaiah 31:9	vesal'o mimagor ya'abor vekhatu mines sarav ne'um yhvh 'asher 'ur lo beziyon vetanur lo birushalim. isaiah 32:1	hen lezedeq yimlakh melekh ulesarim lemishpat yasoru. isaiah 32:2	vehayah 'ish kemakhabei ruakh veseiter zarem kefalgei mayim bezayon kezel sela' kabed be'erez 'ayeifah. isaiah 32:3	velo tish'enah 'einei ro'im ve'azenei shome'im tiqshabnah. isaiah 32:4	ulebab nimharim yabin lada'at uleshon 'ilegim temaher ledaber zakhot. isaiah 32:5	lo yiqarei 'od lenabal nadib ulekhilai lo yei'amer shoa'. isaiah 32:6	ki nabal nebalah yedaber velibo ya'aseh 'aven la'asot khonef uledaber 'el yhvh to'ah lehariq nefesh ra'eb umashqeh zamei yakhsir. isaiah 32:7	vekheilai keilav ra'im hu zimot ya'az lekhabel 'anavim 'aniyim be'imrei sheqer ubedaber 'ebyon mishpat. isaiah 32:8	venadib nedibot ya'az vehu 'al nedibot yaqum. isaiah 32:9	nashim sha'ananot qomenah shema'nah qoli banot botkhot ha'zenah 'imrati. isaiah 32:10	yamim 'al shanah tirgaznah botekhot ki kalah bazir 'osef beli yabo. isaiah 32:11	khirdu sha'ananot regazah botekhot peshotah ve'orah vakhagorah 'al khalazayim. isaiah 32:12	'al shadayim sofedim 'al sedei khemed 'al gefen poriyah. isaiah 32:13	'al 'admat 'ami qoz shamir ta'aleh ki 'al kal batei masos qiryah 'alizah. isaiah 32:14	ki 'armon nutash hamon 'ir 'uzab 'ofel vabakhan hayah be'ad me'arot 'ad 'olam mesos pera'im mir'eh 'adarim. isaiah 32:15	'ad yei'areh 'aleinu ruakh mimarom vehayah midbar lakarmel vekharmel vehakarmel laya'ar yeikhasheb. isaiah 32:16	veshakhan bamidbar mishpat uzedaqah bakarmel teisheb. isaiah 32:17	vehayah ma'aseh hazedaqah shalom va'abodat hazedaqah hashqet vabetakh 'ad 'olam. isaiah 32:18	veyashab 'ami binveh shalom ubemishkenot mibtakhim ubimnukhot sha'ananot. isaiah 32:19	ubarad beredet haya'ar ubashiflah tishpal ha'ir. isaiah 32:20	'ashreikhem zore'ei 'al kal mayim meshalekhei regel hashor vehakhamor. isaiah 33:1	ho shoded ve'atah lo shadud uboged velo bagedu bo kahatimkha shoded tushad kanelotekha libgod yibgedu bakh. isaiah 33:2	yhvh khaneinu lekha qivinu heyeh zero'am labeqarim 'af yeshu'ateinu be'et zarah. isaiah 33:3	miqol hamon nadedu 'amim meiromutekha nafezu goyim. isaiah 33:4	ve'usaf shelalkhem 'osef hekhasil kemashaq geibim shoqeq bo. isaiah 33:5	nisgab yhvh ki shokhen marom milei ziyon mishpat uzedaqah. isaiah 33:6	vehayah 'emunat 'itekha khosen yeshu'ot khakhemat vada'at yir'at yhvh hi 'ozaro. isaiah 33:7	hen 'er'elam za'aqu khuzah mal'akhei shalom mar yibkayun. isaiah 33:8	nashamu mesilot shabat 'ober 'orakh heifer berit ma'as 'arim lo khashab 'enosh. isaiah 33:9	'abal 'umlelah 'arez hekhpir lebanon qamal hayah hasharon ka'arabah veno'er bashan vekharmel. isaiah 33:10	'atah 'aqum yomar yhvh 'atah 'eiromam 'atah 'enasei. isaiah 33:11	taharu khashash teiledu qash rukhakhem 'esh tokhalkhem. isaiah 33:12	vehayu 'amim misrefot sid qozim kesukhim ba'esh yizatu. isaiah 33:13	shim'u rekhoqim 'asher 'asiti ude'u qerobim geburati. isaiah 33:14	pakhadu beziyon khata'im 'akhazah re'adah khaneifim mi yagur lanu 'esh 'okheilah mi yagur lanu moqdei 'olam. isaiah 33:15	holekh zedaqot vedober meisharim mo'es bebeza' ma'ashaqot no'er kapav mitemokh bashokhad 'otem 'azeno mishemoa' damim ve'ozem 'einav meire'ot bera'. isaiah 33:16	hu meromim yishkon mezadot sela'im misgabo lakhmo nitan meimav ne'emanim. isaiah 33:17	melekh beyafeyo tekhezenah 'einekha tir'enah 'erez markhaqim. isaiah 33:18	libekha yehgeh 'eimah 'ayeh sofer 'ayeh shoqel 'ayeh sofer 'et hamigdalim. isaiah 33:19	'et 'am no'az lo tir'eh 'am 'imqei safah mishemoa' nil'ag lashon 'en binah. isaiah 33:20	khazeh ziyon qiryat mo'adeinu 'einekha tir'enah yerushalim naveh sha'anan 'ohel bal yiz'an bal yisa' yeteidotav lanezakh vekhal khabalav bal yinateiqu. isaiah 33:21	ki 'im sham 'adir yhvh lanu meqom neharim ye'orim rakhabei yadayim bal teilekh bo 'oni shayit vezi 'adir lo ya'abrenu. isaiah 33:22	ki yhvh shofeteinu yhvh mekhoqeqeinu yhvh malkeinu hu yoshi'einu. isaiah 33:23	niteshu khabalayikh bal yekhazequ khen tarenam bal paresu nes 'az khulaq 'ad shalal marbeh piskhim bazezu baz. isaiah 33:24	ubal yomar shakhen khaliti ha'am hayosheb bah nesu 'avon. isaiah 34:1	qirbu goyim lishmoa' ule'umim haqshibu tishma' ha'arez umelo'ah teibel vekhal ze'eza'eha. isaiah 34:2	ki qezef yhvh 'al kal hagoyim vekheimah 'al kal zeba'am hekherimam netanam latabakh. isaiah 34:3	vekhaleihem yushlakhu ufigreihem ya'aleh ba'esham venamasu harim midamam. isaiah 34:4	venamaqu kal zeba hashamayim venagolu khaseifer hashamayim vekhal zeba'am yibol kinbol 'aleh migefen ukhenobelet mite'einah. isaiah 34:5	ki rivetah bashamayim kharbi hineh 'al 'edom teired ve'al 'am khermi lemishpat. isaiah 34:6	khereb yhvh male'ah dam hudashnah meikheileb midam karim ve'atudim meikheileb kilyot 'eilim ki zebakh yhvh bebazerah vetebakh gadol be'erez 'edom. isaiah 34:7	veyaredu re'eimim 'imam ufarim 'im 'abirim verivetah 'arzam midam va'afaram meikheileb yedushan. isaiah 34:8	ki yom naqam yhvh shenat shilumim lerib ziyon. isaiah 34:9	venehefkhu nekhaleha lezefet va'afarah legaferit vehayetah 'arzah lezefet bo'eirah. isaiah 34:10	laylah veyomam lo tikhbeh le'olam ya'aleh 'ashanah midor lador tekherab leneizakh nezakhim 'en 'ober bah. isaiah 34:11	vireishuha qa'at veqipod veyanshof ve'oreb yishkenu bah venatah 'aleha qav tohu ve'abnei bohu. isaiah 34:12	khoreha ve'en sham melukhah yiqra'u vekhal sareha yihyu 'afes. isaiah 34:13	ve'aletah 'armenoteha sirim qimos vakhoakh bemibzareha vehayetah neveh tanim khazir libnot ya'anah. isaiah 34:14	ufageshu ziyim 'et 'iyim vesa'ir 'al rei'eihu yiqra 'akh sham hirgi'ah lilit umaze'ah lah manoakh. isaiah 34:15	shamah qinenah qipoz vatemalet ubaqe'ah vedagerah bezilah 'akh sham niqbezu dayot 'ishah re'utah. isaiah 34:16	dirshu mei'al seifer yhvh uqera'u 'akhat meihenah lo ne'darah 'ishah re'utah lo faqadu ki fi hu zivah verukho hu qibezan. isaiah 34:17	vehu hipil lahen goral veyado khileqatah lahem baqav 'ad 'olam yirashuha ledor vador yishkenu bah. isaiah 35:1	yesusum midbar veziyah vetagel 'arabah vetifrakh kakhabazalet. isaiah 35:2	paroakh tifrakh vetagel 'af gilat veranen kebod halebanon nitan lah hadar hakarmel vehasharon hemah yir'u khebod yhvh hadar 'eloheinu. isaiah 35:3	khazequ yadayim rafot ubirkayim koshelot 'ameizu. isaiah 35:4	'imru lenimharei leb khizqu 'al tira'u hineh 'eloheikhem naqam yabo gemul 'elohim hu yabo veyosha'akhem. isaiah 35:5	'az tipaqakhnah 'einei 'ivrim ve'azenei kheireshim tipatakhnah. isaiah 35:6	'az yedaleg ka'ayal piseiakh vetaron leshon 'ilem ki nibqe'u bamidbar mayim unekhalim ba'arabah. isaiah 35:7	vehayah hasharab la'agam vezima'on lemabu'ei mayim binveh tanim ribzah khazir leqaneh vagome. isaiah 35:8	vehayah sham maslul vaderekh vederekh haqodesh yiqarei lah lo ya'abrenu tamei vehu lamo holekh derekh ve'evilim lo yit'u. isaiah 35:9	lo yihyeh sham 'aryeh uferiz khayot bal ya'alenah lo timazei sham vehalekhu ge'ulim. isaiah 35:10	ufeduyei yhvh yeshubun uba'u ziyon berinah vesimkhat 'olam 'al rosham sason vesimkhah yasigu venasu yagon va'anakhah. isaiah 36:1	vayhi be'arba' 'esreh shanah lamelekh khizqiyahu 'alah sankheirib melekh 'ashur 'al kal 'arei yehudah habezurot vayitpesem. isaiah 36:2	vayishlakh melekh 'ashur 'et rab shaqeh milakhish yerushalemah 'el hamelekh khizqiyahu bekhel kabed vaya'amod bit'alat habereikhah ha'elyonah bimsilat sedeh khobes. isaiah 36:3	vayeizei 'eilav 'elyaqim ben khilqiyahu 'asher 'al habayit veshebna hasofer veyo'akh ben 'asaf hamazkir. isaiah 36:4	vayomer 'aleihem rab shaqeh 'imru na 'el khizqiyahu koh 'amar hamelekh hagadol melekh 'ashur mah habitakhon hazeh 'asher batakheta. isaiah 36:5	'amarti 'akh debar sefatayim 'eizah ugeburah lamilkhamah 'atah 'al mi batakhta ki maradta bi. isaiah 36:6	hineh batakhta 'al mish'enet haqaneh harazuz hazeh 'al mizrayim 'asher yisamekh 'ish 'alav uba bekhapo uneqabah ken par'oh melekh mizrayim lekhal habotekhim 'alav. isaiah 36:7	vekhi tomar 'eilai 'el yhvh 'eloheinu batakhenu halo hu 'asher heisir khizqiyahu 'et bamotav ve'et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim lifnei hamizbeiakh hazeh tishtakhavu. isaiah 36:8	ve'atah hit'areb na 'et 'adoni hamelekh 'ashur ve'etenah lekha 'alpayim susim 'im tukhal latet lekha rokhebim 'aleihem. isaiah 36:9	ve'ekh tashib 'et penei fakhat 'akhad 'abdei 'adoni haqtanim vatibtakh lekha 'al mizrayim lerekheb ulefarashim. isaiah 36:10	ve'atah hamibal'adei yhvh 'aliti 'al ha'arez hazot lehashkhitah yhvh 'amar 'eilai 'aleh 'el ha'arez hazot vehashkhitah. isaiah 36:11	vayomer 'elyaqim veshebna veyo'akh 'el rab shaqeh daber na 'el 'abadekha 'aramit ki shome'im 'anakhenu ve'al tedaber 'eileinu yehudit be'azenei ha'am 'asher 'al hakhomah. isaiah 36:12	vayomer rab shaqeh ha'el 'adonekha ve'eilekha shelakhani 'adoni ledaber 'et hadebarim ha'eleh halo 'al ha'anashim hayoshebim 'al hakhomah le'ekhol 'et khar'eihem zo'atam velishtot 'et sheineihem meimei ragleihem 'imakhem. isaiah 36:13	vaya'amod rab shaqeh vayiqra beqol gadol yehudit vayomer shim'u 'et dibrei hamelekh hagadol melekh 'ashur. isaiah 36:14	koh 'amar hamelekh 'al yashi lakhem khizqiyahu ki lo yukhal lehazil 'etkhem. isaiah 36:15	ve'al yabtakh 'etkhem khizqiyahu 'el yhvh leimor hazel yazileinu yhvh lo tinaten ha'ir hazot beyad melekh 'ashur. isaiah 36:16	'al tishme'u 'el khizqiyahu ki khoh 'amar hamelekh 'ashur 'asu 'iti berakhah uze'u 'eilai ve'ikhlu 'ish gafno ve'ish te'einato ushetu 'ish mei boro. isaiah 36:17	'ad bo'i velaqakhti 'etkhem 'el 'erez ke'arzekhem 'erez dagan vetirosh 'erez lekhem ukheramim. isaiah 36:18	pen yasit 'etkhem khizqiyahu leimor yhvh yazileinu hahizilu 'elohei hagoyim 'ish 'et 'arzo miyad melekh 'ashur. isaiah 36:19	'ayeh 'elohei khamat ve'arpad 'ayeh 'elohei sefarvayim vekhi hizilu 'et shomeron miyadi. isaiah 36:20	mi bekhal 'elohei ha'arazot ha'eleh 'asher hizilu 'et 'arzam miyadi ki yazil yhvh 'et yerushalim miyadi. isaiah 36:21	vayakharishu velo 'anu 'oto dabar ki mizvat hamelekh hi leimor lo ta'anuhu. isaiah 36:22	vayabo 'elyaqim ben khilqiyahu 'asher 'al habayit veshebna hasofer veyo'akh ben 'asaf hamazkir 'el khizqiyahu qeru'ei begadim vayagidu lo 'et dibrei rab shaqeh. isaiah 37:1	vayhi kishmoa' hamelekh khizqiyahu vayiqra' 'et begadav vayitkas basaq vayabo bet yhvh. isaiah 37:2	vayishlakh 'et 'elyaqim 'asher 'al habayit ve'et shebna hasofer ve'et ziqnei hakohanim mitkasim basaqim 'el yesha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi. isaiah 37:3	vayomeru 'eilav koh 'amar khizqiyahu yom zarah vetokheikhah une'azah hayom hazeh ki ba'u banim 'ad mashber vekhoakh 'ayin leleidah. isaiah 37:4	'ulai yishma' yhvh 'elohekha 'et dibrei rab shaqeh 'asher shelakho melekh 'ashur 'adonav lekharef 'elohim khai vehokhiakh badebarim 'asher shama' yhvh 'elohekha venasata tefilah be'ad hashe'eirit hanimza'ah. isaiah 37:5	vayabo'u 'abdei hamelekh khizqiyahu 'el yesha'yahu. isaiah 37:6	vayomer 'aleihem yesha'yahu koh tomerun 'el 'adoneikhem koh 'amar yhvh 'al tira mipenei hadebarim 'asher shama'ta 'asher gidefu na'arei melekh 'ashur 'oti. isaiah 37:7	hini noten bo ruakh veshama' shemu'ah veshab 'el 'arzo vehipaltiv bakhereb be'arzo. isaiah 37:8	vayashab rab shaqeh vayimza 'et melekh 'ashur nilkham 'al libnah ki shama' ki nasa' milakhish. isaiah 37:9	vayishma' 'al tirhaqah melekh kush leimor yaza lehilakhem 'itakh vayishma' vayishlakh mal'akhim 'el khizqiyahu leimor. isaiah 37:10	koh tomerun 'el khizqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor 'al yashi'akha 'elohekha 'asher 'atah boteiakh bo leimor lo tinaten yerushalim beyad melekh 'ashur. isaiah 37:11	hineh 'atah shama'ta 'asher 'asu malkhei 'ashur lekhal ha'arazot lehakharimam ve'atah tinazel. isaiah 37:12	hahizilu 'otam 'elohei hagoyim 'asher hishkhitu 'abotai 'et gozan ve'et kharan verezef ubenei 'eden 'asher bitlasar. isaiah 37:13	'ayeh melekh khamat umelekh 'arpad umelekh la'ir sefarvayim heina' ve'ivah. isaiah 37:14	vayiqakh khizqiyahu 'et hasefarim miyad hamal'akhim vayiqra'eihu vaya'al bet yhvh vayifreseihu khizqiyahu lifnei yhvh. isaiah 37:15	vayitpalel khizqiyahu 'el yhvh leimor. isaiah 37:16	yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el yosheb hakerubim 'atah hu ha'elohim lebadekha lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez 'atah 'asita 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez. isaiah 37:17	hateh yhvh 'azenekha ushema' peqakh yhvh 'einekha ure'eh ushema' 'et kal dibrei sankheirib 'asher shalakh lekharef 'elohim khai. isaiah 37:18	'amenam yhvh hekheribu malkhei 'ashur 'et kal ha'arazot ve'et 'arzam. isaiah 37:19	venaton 'et 'eloheihem ba'esh ki lo 'elohim hemah ki 'im ma'aseh yedei 'adam 'ez va'eben vai'abedum. isaiah 37:20	ve'atah yhvh 'eloheinu hoshi'einu miyado veyeide'u kal mamlekhot ha'arez ki 'atah yhvh lebadekha. isaiah 37:21	vayishlakh yesha'yahu ben 'amoz 'el khizqiyahu leimor koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher hitpalalta 'eilai 'el sankheirib melekh 'ashur. isaiah 37:22	zeh hadabar 'asher diber yhvh 'alav bazah lekha la'agah lekha betulat bat ziyon 'akharekha rosh heini'ah bat yerushalim. isaiah 37:23	'et mi kheirafta vegidafta ve'al mi harimotah qol vatisa marom 'einekha 'el qedosh yisra'el. isaiah 37:24	beyad 'abadekha kheirafta 'adonai vatomer berob rikhbi 'ani 'aliti merom harim yarketei lebanon ve'ekhrot qomat 'arazav mibkhar beroshav ve'abo merom qizo ya'ar karmilo. isaiah 37:25	'ani qarti veshatiti mayim ve'akhrib bekhaf pe'amai kol ye'orei mazor. isaiah 37:26	halo shama'ta lemeirakhoq 'otah 'asiti mimei qedem vizartiha 'atah habeitiha utehi lehash'ot galim nizim 'arim bezurot. isaiah 37:27	veyoshebeihen qizrei yad khatu vaboshu hayu 'eiseb sadeh viraq deshe khazir gagot ushedeimah lifnei qamah. isaiah 37:28	veshibtekha vezeitekha ubo'akha yada'eti ve'et hitragezkha 'eilai. isaiah 37:29	ya'an hitragezkha 'eilai vesha'anankha 'alah be'azenai vesamti khakhi be'apekha umitgi bisfatekha vahashibotikha baderekh 'asher bata bah. isaiah 37:30	vezeh lekha ha'ot 'akhol hashanah safiakh ubashanah hasheinit shakhis ubashanah hashelishit zir'u veqizru venit'u kheramim ve'akhol ve'ikhlu firyam. isaiah 37:31	veyasefah peleitat bet yehudah hanish'arah shoresh lematah ve'asah feri lema'elah. isaiah 37:32	ki mirushalim teizei she'eirit ufeleitah meihar ziyon qin'at yhvh zeba'ot ta'aseh zot. isaiah 37:33	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'el melekh 'ashur lo yabo 'el ha'ir hazot velo yoreh sham khez velo yeqademenah magen velo yishpokh 'oleha solelah. isaiah 37:34	baderekh 'asher ba bah yashub ve'el ha'ir hazot lo yabo ne'um yhvh. isaiah 37:35	veganoti 'al ha'ir hazot lehoshi'ah lema'ani ulema'an david 'abdi. isaiah 37:36	vayeizei mal'akh yhvh vayakeh bemakhaneh 'ashur mei'ah ushemonim vakhamishah 'alef vayashkimu baboqer vehineh khulam pegarim meitim. isaiah 37:37	vayisa' vayeilekh vayashab sankheirib melekh 'ashur vayeisheb benineveh. isaiah 37:38	vayhi hu mishtakhaveh bet nisrokh 'elohav ve'adramelekh vesar'ezer banav hikuhu bakhereb vehemah nimletu 'erez 'ararat vayimlokh 'eisar khadon beno takhtav. isaiah 38:1	bayamim hahem khalah khizqiyahu lamut vayabo 'eilav yesha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi vayomer 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh zav lebeitekha ki met 'atah velo tikhyeh. isaiah 38:2	vayaseb khizqiyahu panav 'el haqir vayitpalel 'el yhvh. isaiah 38:3	vayomar 'anah yhvh zekhar na 'et 'asher hithalakhti lefanekha be'emet ubeleb shalem vehatob be'einekha 'asiti vayeibek khizqiyahu bekhi gadol. isaiah 38:4	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yesha'yahu leimor. isaiah 38:5	halokh ve'amarta 'el khizqiyahu koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei david 'abikha shama'ti 'et tefilatekha ra'iti 'et dim'atekha hini yosif 'al yamekha khamesh 'esreh shanah. isaiah 38:6	umikaf melekh 'ashur 'azilekha ve'et ha'ir hazot veganoti 'al ha'ir hazot. isaiah 38:7	vezeh lekha ha'ot mei'et yhvh 'asher ya'aseh yhvh 'et hadabar hazeh 'asher diber. isaiah 38:8	hini meishib 'et zel hama'alot 'asher yaredah bema'alot 'akhaz bashemesh 'akhoranit 'eser ma'alot vatashab hashemesh 'eser ma'alot bama'alot 'asher yaradah. isaiah 38:9	mikhtab lekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah bakhaloto vaykhi meikhaleyo. isaiah 38:10	'ani 'amarti bidmi yamai 'eileikhah besha'arei she'ol puqadti yeter shenotai. isaiah 38:11	'amarti lo 'er'eh yah yah be'erez hakhayim lo 'abit 'adam 'od 'im yoshebei khadel. isaiah 38:12	dori nisa' veniglah mini ke'ohel ro'i qipadti kha'oreg khayai midalah yebaze'eini miyom 'ad laylah tashlimeini. isaiah 38:13	shiviti 'ad boqer ka'ari ken yeshaber kal 'azmotai miyom 'ad laylah tashlimeini. isaiah 38:14	kesus 'agur ken 'azafzef 'ehgeh kayonah dalu 'einai lamarom 'adonai 'asheqah li 'arebeini. isaiah 38:15	mah 'adaber ve'amar li vehu 'asah 'edadeh khal shenotai 'al mar nafshi. isaiah 38:16	'adonai 'aleihem yikhyu ulekhal bahen khayei rukhi vetakhalimeini vehakhayeini. isaiah 38:17	hineh leshalom mar li mar ve'atah khashaqta nafshi mishakhat beli ki hishlakhta 'akharei geivekha kal khata'ai. isaiah 38:18	ki lo she'ol todeka mavet yehaleka lo yesaberu yordei bor 'el 'amitekha. isaiah 38:19	khai khai hu yodekha kamoni hayom 'ab lebanim yodia' 'el 'amitekha. isaiah 38:20	yhvh lehoshi'eini uneginotai nenagen kal yemei khayeinu 'al bet yhvh. isaiah 38:21	vayomer yesha'yahu yis'u debelet te'einim veyimrekhu 'al hashekhin veyekhi. isaiah 38:22	vayomer khizqiyahu mah 'ot ki 'e'eleh bet yhvh. isaiah 39:1	ba'et hahiv shalakh merodakh bal'adan ben bal'adan melekh babel sefarim uminkhah 'el khizqiyahu vayishma' ki khalah vayekhezaq. isaiah 39:2	vayismakh 'aleihem khizqiyahu vayar'em 'et bet nekhotah nekhoto 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab ve'et habesamim ve'et hashemen hatob ve'et kal bet keilav ve'et kal 'asher nimza be'ozerotav lo hayah dabar 'asher lo her'am khizqiyahu bebeito ubekhal memshalto. isaiah 39:3	vayabo yesha'yahu hanabi 'el hamelekh khizqiyahu vayomer 'eilav mah 'ameru ha'anashim ha'eleh umei'ayin yabo'u 'eilekha vayomer khizqiyahu mei'erez rekhoqah ba'u 'eilai mibabel. isaiah 39:4	vayomer mah ra'u bebeitekha vayomer khizqiyahu 'et kal 'asher bebeiti ra'u lo hayah dabar 'asher lo hir'itim be'ozrotai. isaiah 39:5	vayomer yesha'yahu 'el khizqiyahu shema' debar yhvh zeba'ot. isaiah 39:6	hineh yamim ba'im venisa kal 'asher bebeitekha va'asher 'azeru 'abotekha 'ad hayom hazeh babel lo yivater dabar 'amar yhvh. isaiah 39:7	umibanekha 'asher yeize'u mimekha 'asher tolid yiqakhu vehayu sarisim beheikhal melekh babel. isaiah 39:8	vayomer khizqiyahu 'el yesha'yahu tob debar yhvh 'asher dibarta vayomer ki yihyeh shalom ve'emet beyamai. isaiah 40:1	nakhamu nakhamu 'ami yomar 'eloheikhem. isaiah 40:2	daberu 'al leb yerushalim veqir'u 'eileha ki male'ah zeba'ah ki nirzah 'avonah ki laqekhah miyad yhvh kiflayim bekhal khatoteha. isaiah 40:3	qol qorei bamidbar panu derekh yhvh yasheru ba'arabah mesilah leiloheinu.
