isaiah 40:4	kal ge yinasei vekhal har vegib'ah yishpalu vehayah he'aqob lemishor veharekhasim lebiq'ah. isaiah 40:5	veniglah kebod yhvh vera'u khal basar yakhdav ki pi yhvh diber. isaiah 40:6	qol 'omer qera ve'amar mah 'eqra kal habasar khazir vekhal khasdo keziz hasadeh. isaiah 40:7	yabesh khazir nabel ziz ki ruakh yhvh nashebah bo 'akhen khazir ha'am. isaiah 40:8	yabesh khazir nabel ziz udebar 'eloheinu yaqum le'olam. isaiah 40:9	'al har gaboha 'ali lakh mebaseret ziyon harimi bakoakh qolekh mebaseret yerushalim harimi 'al tira'i 'imri le'arei yehudah hineh 'eloheikhem. isaiah 40:10	hineh 'adonai yhvh bekhazaq yabo uzero'o moshelah lo hineh sekharo 'ito ufe'ulato lefanav. isaiah 40:11	kero'eh 'edro yir'eh bizro'o yeqabez tela'im ubekheiqo yisa 'alot yenahel. isaiah 40:12	mi madad besha'olo mayim veshamayim bazeret tiken vekhal bashalish 'afar ha'arez veshaqal bapeles harim ugeba'ot bemozenayim. isaiah 40:13	mi tiken 'et ruakh yhvh ve'ish 'azato yodi'enu. isaiah 40:14	'et mi no'az vaybineihu vaylamedeihu be'orakh mishpat vaylamedeihu da'at vederekh tebunot yodi'enu. isaiah 40:15	hen goyim kemar mideli ukheshakhaq mozenayim nekhshabu hen 'iyim kadaq yitol. isaiah 40:16	ulebanon 'en dei ba'er vekhayato 'en dei 'olah. isaiah 40:17	kal hagoyim ke'ayin negdo mei'efes vatohu nekhshebu lo. isaiah 40:18	ve'el mi tedameyun 'el umah demut ta'arkhu lo. isaiah 40:19	hapesel nasakh kharash vezoref bazahab yeraqe'enu uretuqot kesef zoref. isaiah 40:20	hamsukan terumah 'ez lo yirqab yibkhar kharash khakham yebaqesh lo lehakhin pesel lo yimot. isaiah 40:21	halo teide'u halo tishma'u halo hugad meirosh lakhem halo habinotem mosdot ha'arez. isaiah 40:22	hayosheb 'al khug ha'arez veyoshebeha kakhagabim hanoteh khadoq shamayim vayimtakhem ka'ohel lashabet. isaiah 40:23	hanoten roznim le'ayin shofetei 'erez katohu 'asah. isaiah 40:24	'af bal nita'u 'af bal zora'u 'af bal shoresh ba'arez giz'am vegam nashaf bahem vayibashu use'arah kaqash tisa'em. isaiah 40:25	ve'el mi tedameyuni ve'eshveh yomar qadosh. isaiah 40:26	se'u marom 'eineikhem ure'u mi bara 'eleh hamozi bemispar zeba'am lekhulam beshem yiqra meirob 'onim ve'amiz koakh 'ish lo ne'dar. isaiah 40:27	lamah tomar ya'aqob utedaber yisra'el nisterah darki yhvh umei'elohai mishpati ya'abor. isaiah 40:28	halo yada'ta 'im lo shama'ta 'elohei 'olam yhvh borei qezot ha'arez lo yi'af velo yiga' 'en kheiqer litbunato. isaiah 40:29	noten laya'ef koakh ule'en 'onim 'azemah yarbeh. isaiah 40:30	veyi'afu ne'arim veyiga'u ubakhurim kashol yikasheilu. isaiah 40:31	veqoyei yhvh yakhalifu khoakh ya'alu 'eiber kanesharim yaruzu velo yiga'u yeilekhu velo yi'afu. isaiah 41:1	hakharishu 'eilai 'iyim ule'umim yakhalifu khoakh yigeshu 'az yedabeiru yakhdav lamishpat niqrabah. isaiah 41:2	mi hei'ir mimizrakh zedeq yiqra'eihu leraglo yiten lefanav goyim umelakhim yard yiten ke'afar kharbo keqash nidaf qashto. isaiah 41:3	yirdefem ya'abor shalom 'orakh beraglav lo yabo. isaiah 41:4	mi fa'al ve'asah qorei hadorot meirosh 'ani yhvh rishon ve'et 'akharonim 'ani hu. isaiah 41:5	ra'u 'iyim veyira'u qezot ha'arez yekheradu qarebu vaye'etayun. isaiah 41:6	'ish 'et rei'eihu ya'zoru ule'akhiv yomar khazaq. isaiah 41:7	vaykhazeq kharash 'et zoref makhaliq patish 'et holem pa'am 'omer ladebeq tob hu vaykhazeqeihu bemasmerim lo yimot. isaiah 41:8	ve'atah yisra'el 'abdi ya'aqob 'asher bekhartikha zera' 'abraham 'ohabi. isaiah 41:9	'asher hekhezaqtikha miqzot ha'arez umei'azileha qeratikha va'omar lekha 'abdi 'atah bekhartikha velo me'astikha. isaiah 41:10	'al tira ki 'imekha 'ani 'al tishta' ki 'ani 'elohekha 'imaztikha 'af 'azartikha 'af temakhtikha bimin zidqi. isaiah 41:11	hen yeiboshu veyikalemu kol hanekherim bakh yihyu khe'ayin veyobedu 'anshei ribekha. isaiah 41:12	tebaqshem velo timza'em 'anshei mazutekha yihyu khe'ayin ukhe'efes 'anshei milkhamtekha. isaiah 41:13	ki 'ani yhvh 'elohekha makhaziq yeminekha ha'omer lekha 'al tira 'ani 'azartikha. isaiah 41:14	'al tire'i tola'at ya'aqob metei yisra'el 'ani 'azartikh ne'um yhvh vego'alekh qedosh yisra'el. isaiah 41:15	hineh samtikh lemorag kharuz khadash ba'al pifiyot tadush harim vetadoq ugeba'ot kamoz tasim. isaiah 41:16	tizrem veruakh tisa'em use'arah tafiz 'otam ve'atah tagil yhvh biqdosh yisra'el tithalal. isaiah 41:17	ha'aniyim veha'ebyonim mebaqshim mayim va'ayin leshonam bazama nashatah 'ani yhvh 'e'enem 'elohei yisra'el lo 'e'ezbem. isaiah 41:18	'eftakh 'al shefayim neharot ubetokh beqa'ot ma'yanot 'asim midbar la'agam mayim ve'erez ziyah lemoza'ei mayim. isaiah 41:19	'eten bamidbar 'erez shitah vahadas ve'ez shamen 'asim ba'arabah berosh tidhar ute'ashur yakhdav. isaiah 41:20	lema'an yir'u veyeide'u veyasimu veyaskilu yakhdav ki yad yhvh 'asetah zot uqedosh yisra'el bera'ah. isaiah 41:21	qarebu ribekhem yomar yhvh hagishu 'azumoteikhem yomar melekh ya'aqob. isaiah 41:22	yagishu veyagidu lanu 'et 'asher tiqrenah harishonot mah henah hagidu venasimah libeinu veneide'ah 'akharitan 'o haba'ot hashmi'unu. isaiah 41:23	hagidu ha'otiyot le'akhor veneide'ah ki 'elohim 'atem 'af teitibu vetarei'u venishta'ah veneire venir'eh yakhdav. isaiah 41:24	hen 'atem mei'ayin ufa'alekhem mei'afa' to'eibah yibkhar bakhem. isaiah 41:25	ha'iroti mizafon vayat mimizrakh shemesh yiqra bishmi veyabo seganim kemo khomer ukhemo yozer yirmas tit. isaiah 41:26	mi higid meirosh veneida'ah umilefanim venomar zadiq 'af 'en magid 'af 'en mashmia' 'af 'en shomeia' 'imreikhem. isaiah 41:27	rishon leziyon hineh hinam velirushalim mebaser 'eten. isaiah 41:28	ve'eire ve'en 'ish umei'eleh ve'en yo'ez ve'esh'alem veyashibu dabar. isaiah 41:29	hen kulam 'aven 'efes ma'aseihem ruakh vatohu niskeihem. isaiah 42:1	hen 'abdi 'etmakh bo bekhiri razetah nafshi natati rukhi 'alav mishpat lagoyim yozi. isaiah 42:2	lo yiz'aq velo yisa velo yashmia' bakhuz qolo. isaiah 42:3	qaneh razuz lo yishbor ufishtah kheihah lo yekhabenah le'emet yozi mishpat. isaiah 42:4	lo yikhheh velo yaruz 'ad yasim ba'arez mishpat uletorato 'iyim yeyakheilu. isaiah 42:5	koh 'amar ha'el yhvh borei hashamayim venoteihem roqa' ha'arez veze'eza'eha noten neshamah la'am 'aleha veruakh laholekhim bah. isaiah 42:6	'ani yhvh qeratikha bezedeq ve'akhzeq beyadekha ve'ezarekha ve'etenkha librit 'am le'or goyim. isaiah 42:7	lifqoakh 'einayim 'ivrot lehozi mimasger 'asir mibet kele yoshebei khoshekh. isaiah 42:8	'ani yhvh hu shemi ukhebodi le'akher lo 'eten utehilati lapesilim. isaiah 42:9	harishonot hineh ba'u vakhadashot 'ani magid beterem tizmakhnah 'ashmi' 'etkhem. isaiah 42:10	shiru yhvh shir khadash tehilato miqzeh ha'arez yordei hayam umelo'o 'iyim veyoshebeihem. isaiah 42:11	yis'u midbar ve'arav khazeirim teisheb qeidar yaronu yoshebei sela' meirosh harim yizvakhu. isaiah 42:12	yasimu yhvh kabod utehilato ba'iyim yagidu. isaiah 42:13	yhvh kagibor yeizei ke'ish milkhamot ya'ir qin'ah yaria' 'af yazriakh 'al 'oyebav yitgabar. isaiah 42:14	hekhesheiti mei'olam 'akharish 'et'apaq kayoleidah 'ef'eh 'eshom ve'esh'af yakhad. isaiah 42:15	'akharib harim ugeba'ot vekhal 'esbam 'obish vesamti neharot la'iyim va'agamim 'obish. isaiah 42:16	veholakhti 'ivrim bederekh lo yada'u bintibot lo yade'u 'adrikhem 'asim makhshakh lifneihem la'or uma'aqashim lemishor 'eleh hadebarim 'asitim velo 'azabtim. isaiah 42:17	nasogu 'akhor yeiboshu boshet habotekhim bapasel ha'omerim lemaseikhah 'atem 'eloheinu. isaiah 42:18	hakheireshim shema'u veha'ivrim habitu lir'ot. isaiah 42:19	mi 'iver ki 'im 'abdi vekheiresh kemal'akhi 'eshlakh mi 'iver kimshulam ve'iver ke'ebed yhvh. isaiah 42:20	ra'ita ra'ot rabot velo tishmor paqoakh 'azenayim velo yishma'. isaiah 42:21	yhvh khafez lema'an zidqo yagdil torah veya'dir. isaiah 42:22	vehu 'am bazuz veshasui hafeiakh bakhurim kulam ubebatei khela'im hakheba'u hayu labaz ve'en mazil meshisah ve'en 'omer hashab. isaiah 42:23	mi bakhem ya'azin zot yaqshib veyishma' le'akhor. isaiah 42:24	mi natan limshoseh limshisah ya'aqob veyisra'el lebozezim halo yhvh zu khatanu lo velo 'abu bidrakhav halokh velo shame'u betorato. isaiah 42:25	vayishpokh 'alav kheimah 'apo ve'ezuz milkhamah vatelahateihu misabib velo yada' vatib'ar bo velo yasim 'al leb. isaiah 43:1	ve'atah koh 'amar yhvh bora'akha ya'aqob veyozerkha yisra'el 'al tira ki ge'altikha qarati beshimkha li 'atah. isaiah 43:2	ki ta'abor bamayim 'itekha 'ani ubaneharot lo yishtefukha ki teilekh bemo 'esh lo tikaveh velehabah lo tib'ar bakh. isaiah 43:3	ki 'ani yhvh 'elohekha qedosh yisra'el moshi'ekha natati khaferekha mizrayim kush useba takhtekha. isaiah 43:4	mei'asher yaqarta be'einai nikhbadta va'ani 'ahabtikha ve'eten 'adam takhtekha ule'umim takhat nafshekha. isaiah 43:5	'al tira ki 'itekha 'ani mimizrakh 'abi zar'ekha umima'arab 'aqabezeka. isaiah 43:6	'omar lazafon teini uleteiman 'al tikhla'i habi'i banai meirakhoq ubenotai miqzeh ha'arez. isaiah 43:7	kol haniqra bishmi velikhbodi berativ yezartiv 'af 'asitiv. isaiah 43:8	hozi 'am 'iver ve'einayim yesh vekheireshim ve'azenayim lamo. isaiah 43:9	kal hagoyim niqbezu yakhdav veyei'asefu le'umim mi bahem yagid zot verishonot yashmi'unu yitenu 'eideihem veyizdaqu veyishme'u veyomeru 'emet. isaiah 43:10	'atem 'eidai ne'um yhvh ve'abdi 'asher bakhareti lema'an teide'u veta'aminu li vetabinu ki 'ani hu lefanai lo nozar 'el ve'akharai lo yihyeh. isaiah 43:11	'anokhi 'anokhi yhvh ve'en mibal'adai moshia'. isaiah 43:12	'anokhi higadti vehosha'ti vehishma'ti ve'en bakhem zar ve'atem 'eidai ne'um yhvh va'ani 'el. isaiah 43:13	gam miyom 'ani hu ve'en miyadi mazil 'ef'al umi yeshibenah. isaiah 43:14	koh 'amar yhvh go'alkhem qedosh yisra'el lema'ankhem shilakhti babelah vehoradti barikhim kulam vekhasdim ba'oniyot rinatam. isaiah 43:15	'ani yhvh qedoshekhem borei yisra'el malkekhem. isaiah 43:16	koh 'amar yhvh hanoten bayam darekh ubemayim 'azim netibah. isaiah 43:17	hamozi rekheb vasus khayil ve'izuz yakhdav yishkebu bal yaqumu da'akhu kapishtah khabu. isaiah 43:18	'al tizkeru rishonot veqadmoniyot 'al titbonanu. isaiah 43:19	hini 'oseh khadashah 'atah tizmakh halo teida'uha 'af 'asim bamidbar derekh bishimon neharot. isaiah 43:20	tekhabedeini khayat hasadeh tanim ubenot ya'anah ki natati bamidbar mayim neharot bishimon lehashqot 'ami bekhiri. isaiah 43:21	'am zu yazarti li tehilati yesapeiru. isaiah 43:22	velo 'oti qarata ya'aqob ki yaga'ta bi yisra'el. isaiah 43:23	lo heibeita li seh 'olotekha uzebakhekha lo khibadtani lo he'ebadtikha beminkhah velo hoga'tikha bilbonah. isaiah 43:24	lo qanita li bakesef qaneh vekheileb zebakhekha lo hirvitani 'akh he'ebadtani bekhatotekha hoga'tani ba'avonotekha. isaiah 43:25	'anokhi 'anokhi hu mokheh fesha'ekha lema'ani vekhatotekha lo 'ezkor. isaiah 43:26	hazkireini nishafetah yakhad saper 'atah lema'an tizdaq. isaiah 43:27	'abikha harishon khata umelizekha pashe'u bi. isaiah 43:28	va'akhalel sarei qodesh ve'etenah lakheirem ya'aqob veyisra'el legidufim. isaiah 44:1	ve'atah shema' ya'aqob 'abdi veyisra'el bakharti bo. isaiah 44:2	koh 'amar yhvh 'osekha veyozerkha mibeten ya'zereka 'al tira 'abdi ya'aqob vishurun bakharti bo. isaiah 44:3	ki 'ezaq mayim 'al zamei venozelim 'al yabashah 'ezoq rukhi 'al zar'ekha ubirkhati 'al ze'eza'ekha. isaiah 44:4	vezamekhu beben khazir ka'arabim 'al yiblei mayim. isaiah 44:5	zeh yomar yhvh 'ani vezeh yiqra beshem ya'aqob vezeh yikhtob yado yhvh ubeshem yisra'el yekhaneh. isaiah 44:6	koh 'amar yhvh melekh yisra'el vego'alo yhvh zeba'ot 'ani rishon va'ani 'akharon umibal'adai 'en 'elohim. isaiah 44:7	umi khamoni yiqra veyagideha veya'rekheha li misumi 'am 'olam ve'otiyot va'asher tabonah yagidu lamo. isaiah 44:8	'al tifkhadu ve'al tirhu halo mei'az hishma'tikha vehigadti ve'atem 'eidai hayesh 'eloah mibal'adai ve'en zur bal yada'eti. isaiah 44:9	yozerei fesel kulam tohu vakhamudeihem bal yo'ilu ve'eideihem hemah bal yir'u ubal yeide'u lema'an yeiboshu. isaiah 44:10	mi yazar 'el ufesel nasakh lebilti ho'il. isaiah 44:11	hen kal khabeirav yeiboshu vekharashim hemah mei'adam yitqabezu khulam ya'amodu yifkhadu yeiboshu yakhad. isaiah 44:12	kharash barzel ma'azad ufa'al bapekham ubamaqabot yizereihu vayif'aleihu bizroa' kokho gam ra'eb ve'en koakh lo shatah mayim vayi'af. isaiah 44:13	kharash 'eizim natah qav yeta'areihu basered ya'aseihu bamaqzu'ot ubamekhugah yeta'oreihu vaya'aseihu ketabnit 'ish ketif'eret 'adam lashebet bayit. isaiah 44:14	likhrat lo 'arazim vayiqakh tirzah ve'alon vai'amez lo ba'azei ya'ar nata' 'oren vegeshem yegadel. isaiah 44:15	vehayah le'adam leba'er vayiqakh meihem vayakham 'af yasiq ve'afah lakhem 'af yif'al 'el vayishtakhu 'asahu fesel vayisgad lamo. isaiah 44:16	khezyo saraf bemo 'esh 'al khezyo basar yokhel yizleh zali veyisba' 'af yakhom veyomar he'akh khamoti ra'iti 'ur. isaiah 44:17	ushe'eirito le'el 'asah lefislo yisgod yisgad lo veyishtakhu veyitpalel 'eilav veyomar hazileini ki 'eili 'atah. isaiah 44:18	lo yade'u velo yabinu ki takh meire'ot 'eineihem meihaskil libotam. isaiah 44:19	velo yashib 'el libo velo da'at velo tebunah leimor khezyo sarafti bemo 'esh ve'af 'afiti 'al gekhalav lekhem 'ezleh basar ve'okhel veyitro leto'eibah 'e'eseh lebul 'ez 'esgod. isaiah 44:20	ro'eh 'eifer leb hutal hitahu velo yazil 'et nafsho velo yomar halo sheqer bimini. isaiah 44:21	zekhar 'eleh ya'aqob veyisra'el ki 'abdi 'atah yezartikha 'ebed li 'atah yisra'el lo tinasheini. isaiah 44:22	makhiti kha'ab pesha'ekha vekhe'anan khatotekha shubah 'eilai ki ge'altikha. isaiah 44:23	ranu shamayim ki 'asah yhvh hari'u takhtiyot 'arez pizkhu harim rinah ya'ar vekhal 'ez bo ki ga'al yhvh ya'aqob ubeyisra'el yitpa'ar. isaiah 44:24	koh 'amar yhvh go'alekha veyozerkha mibaten 'anokhi yhvh 'oseh kol noteh shamayim lebadi roqa' ha'arez mi 'iti mei'iti. isaiah 44:25	meifer 'otot badim veqosemim yeholel meishib khakhamim 'akhor veda'tam yesakel. isaiah 44:26	meiqim debar 'abdo va'azat mal'akhav yashlim ha'omer lirushalim tushab ule'arei yehudah tibanenah vekhareboteha 'aqomem. isaiah 44:27	ha'omer lazulah khorabi venaharotayikh 'obish. isaiah 44:28	ha'omer lekhoresh ro'i vekhal khefzi yashlim veleimor lirushalim tibaneh veheikhal tivased. isaiah 45:1	koh 'amar yhvh limshikho lekhoresh 'asher hekhezaqti bimino lerad lefanav goyim umatenei melakhim 'afateiakh liftoakh lefanav delatayim ushe'arim lo yisageiru. isaiah 45:2	'ani lefanekha 'eilekh vahadurim 'oshir 'ayasher daltot nekhushah 'ashaber uberikhei barzel 'agadeia'. isaiah 45:3	venatati lekha 'ozrot khoshekh umatmunei mistarim lema'an teida' ki 'ani yhvh haqorei beshimkha 'elohei yisra'el. isaiah 45:4	lema'an 'abdi ya'aqob veyisra'el bekhiri va'eqra lekha bishmekha 'akhanekha velo yeda'tani. isaiah 45:5	'ani yhvh ve'en 'od zulati 'en 'elohim 'a'azerkha velo yeda'tani. isaiah 45:6	lema'an yeide'u mimizrakh shemesh umima'arabah ki 'efes bil'adai 'ani yhvh ve'en 'od. isaiah 45:7	yozer 'or uborei khoshekh 'oseh shalom uborei ra' 'ani yhvh 'oseh khal 'eleh. isaiah 45:8	har'ifu shamayim mima'al ushekhaqim yizelu zedeq tiftakh 'erez veyifru yesha' uzedaqah tazmiakh yakhad 'ani yhvh berativ. isaiah 45:9	ho rab 'et yozero kheres 'et kharsei 'adamah hayomar khomer leyozero mah ta'aseh ufa'alekha 'en yadayim lo. isaiah 45:10	ho 'omer le'ab mah tolid ule'ishah mah tekhilin. isaiah 45:11	koh 'amar yhvh qedosh yisra'el veyozero ha'otiyot she'aluni 'al banai ve'al po'al yadai tezavuni. isaiah 45:12	'anokhi 'asiti 'erez ve'adam 'aleha barati 'ani yadai natu shamayim vekhal zeba'am ziveiti. isaiah 45:13	'anokhi ha'irotihu bezedeq vekhal derakhav 'ayasher hu yibneh 'iri vegaluti yeshaleiakh lo bimkhir velo beshokhad 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. isaiah 45:14	koh 'amar yhvh yegia' mizrayim usekhar kush useba'im 'anshei midah 'alayikh ya'aboru velakh yihyu 'akharayikh yeileikhu baziqim ya'aboru ve'eilayikh yishtakhavu 'eilayikh yitpalalu 'akh bakh 'el ve'en 'od 'efes 'elohim. isaiah 45:15	'akhen 'atah 'el mistater 'elohei yisra'el moshia'. isaiah 45:16	boshu vegam nikhlemu kulam yakhdav halekhu bakelimah kharashei zirim. isaiah 45:17	yisra'el nosha' yhvh teshu'at 'olamim lo teiboshu velo tikalemu 'ad 'olmei 'ad. isaiah 45:18	ki khoh 'amar yhvh borei hashamayim hu ha'elohim yozer ha'arez ve'osah hu khonah lo tohu bera'ah lashebet yezarah 'ani yhvh ve'en 'od. isaiah 45:19	lo baseiter dibarti bimqom 'erez khoshekh lo 'amarti lezera' ya'aqob tohu baqeshuni 'ani yhvh dober zedeq magid meisharim. isaiah 45:20	hiqabezu vabo'u hitnageshu yakhdav pelitei hagoyim lo yade'u hanose'im 'et 'ez pislam umitpalim 'el 'el lo yoshia'. isaiah 45:21	hagidu vehagishu 'af yiva'azu yakhdav mi hishmia' zot miqedem mei'az higidah halo 'ani yhvh ve'en 'od 'elohim mibal'adai 'el zadiq umoshia' 'ayin zulati. isaiah 45:22	penu 'eilai vehivashe'u kal 'afsei 'arez ki 'ani 'el ve'en 'od. isaiah 45:23	bi nishba'ti yaza mipi zedaqah dabar velo yashub ki li tikhra' kal berekh tishaba' kal lashon. isaiah 45:24	'akh yhvh li 'amar zedaqot va'oz 'adav yabo veyeiboshu kol hanekherim bo. isaiah 45:25	yhvh yizdequ veyithalu kal zera' yisra'el. isaiah 46:1	kara' bel qores nebo hayu 'azabeihem lakhayah velabeheimah nesu'oteikhem 'amusot masa la'ayeifah. isaiah 46:2	qaresu khare'u yakhdav lo yakhelu malet masa venafsham bashebi halakhah. isaiah 46:3	shim'u 'eilai bet ya'aqob vekhal she'eirit bet yisra'el ha'amusim mini beten hanesu'im mini rakham. isaiah 46:4	ve'ad ziqnah 'ani hu ve'ad sheibah 'ani 'esbol 'ani 'asiti va'ani 'esa va'ani 'esbol va'amalet. isaiah 46:5	lemi tedamyuni vetashvu vetamshiluni venidmeh. isaiah 46:6	hazalim zahab mikis vekhesef baqaneh yishqolu yiskeru zoref veya'aseihu 'el yisgedu 'af yishtakhavu isaiah 46:7	yisa'uhu 'al katef yisbeluhu veyanikhuhu takhtav veya'amod mimeqomo lo yamish 'af yiz'aq 'eilav velo ya'aneh mizarato lo yoshi'enu. isaiah 46:8	zikhru zot vehit'oshashu hashibu foshe'im 'al leb. isaiah 46:9	zikhru rishonot mei'olam ki 'anokhi 'el ve'en 'od 'elohim ve'efes kamoni. isaiah 46:10	magid meireishit 'akharit umiqedem 'asher lo na'asu 'omer 'azati taqum vekhal khefzi 'e'eseh. isaiah 46:11	qorei mimizrakh 'ayit mei'erez merkhaq 'ish 'azato 'azati 'af dibarti 'af 'abi'enah yazarti 'af 'e'esenah. isaiah 46:12	shim'u 'eilai 'abirei leb harekhoqim mizedaqah. isaiah 46:13	qeirabti zidqati lo tirkhaq uteshu'ati lo te'akher venatati beziyon teshu'ah leyisra'el tif'arti. isaiah 47:1	redi ushebi 'al 'afar betulat bat babel shebi la'arez 'en kisei bat kasdim ki lo tosifi yiqre'u lakh rakah va'anugah. isaiah 47:2	qekhi reikhayim vetakhani qamakh gali zamatekh khespi shobel gali shoq 'ibri neharot. isaiah 47:3	tigal 'ervatekh gam teira'eh kherpatekh naqam 'eqakh velo 'efga' 'adam. isaiah 47:4	go'aleinu yhvh zeba'ot shemo qedosh yisra'el. isaiah 47:5	shebi dumam ubo'i bakhoshekh bat kasdim ki lo tosifi yiqre'u lakh geberet mamlakhot. isaiah 47:6	qazafti 'al 'ami khilalti nakhalati va'etenem beyadekh lo samt lahem rakhamim 'al zaqen hikhbadt 'ulekh me'od. isaiah 47:7	vatomeri le'olam 'ehyeh gebaret 'ad lo samt 'eleh 'al libekh lo zakhart 'akharitah. isaiah 47:8	ve'atah shim'i zot 'adinah hayoshebet labetakh ha'omerah bilbabah 'ani ve'afsi 'od lo 'eisheb 'almanah velo 'eida' shekhol. isaiah 47:9	vetabonah lakh shetei 'eleh rega' beyom 'ekhad shekhol ve'almon ketumam ba'u 'alayikh berob keshafayikh be'azemat khabarayikh me'od. isaiah 47:10	vatibtekhi bera'atekh 'amart 'en ro'ani khakhematekh veda'tekh hi shobbatekh vatomeri belibekh 'ani ve'afsi 'od. isaiah 47:11	uba 'alayikh ra'ah lo teide'i shakhrah vetipol 'alayikh hoah lo tukheli kaperah vetabo 'alayikh pit'om sho'ah lo teida'i. isaiah 47:12	'imdi na bakhabarayikh uberob keshafayikh ba'asher yaga'at mine'urayikh 'ulai tukheli ho'il 'ulai ta'arozi. isaiah 47:13	nil'et berob 'azatayikh ya'amdu na veyoshi'ukh haberu hoberei shamayim hakhozim bakokhabim modi'im lekhodashim mei'asher yabo'u 'alayikh. isaiah 47:14	hineh hayu kheqash 'esh serafatam lo yazilu 'et nafsham miyad lehabah 'en gakhelet lakhmam 'ur lashebet negdo. isaiah 47:15	ken hayu lakh 'asher yaga'at sokharayikh mine'urayikh 'ish le'ebro ta'u 'en moshi'ekh. isaiah 48:1	shim'u zot bet ya'aqob haniqra'im beshem yisra'el umimei yehudah yaza'u hanishba'im beshem yhvh ubeilohei yisra'el yazkiru lo be'emet velo bizdaqah. isaiah 48:2	ki mei'ir haqodesh niqra'u ve'al 'elohei yisra'el nismakhu yhvh zeba'ot shemo. isaiah 48:3	harishonot mei'az higadti umipi yaze'u ve'ashmi'em pit'om 'asiti vatabonah. isaiah 48:4	mida'ti ki qasheh 'atah vegid barzel 'arepekha umizkhakha nekhushah. isaiah 48:5	va'agid lekha mei'az beterem tabo hishma'tikha pen tomar 'azebi 'asam ufisli veniski zivam. isaiah 48:6	shama'ta khazeh kulah ve'atem halo tagidu hishma'tikha khadashot mei'atah unezurot velo yeda'tam. isaiah 48:7	'atah nibre'u velo mei'az velifnei yom velo shema'tam pen tomar hineh yeda'tin. isaiah 48:8	gam lo shama'ta gam lo yada'ta gam mei'az lo fitekhah 'azenekha ki yada'ti bagod tibgod ufosheia' mibeten qora lakh. isaiah 48:9	lema'an shemi 'a'arikh 'api utehilati 'ekhetam lakh lebilti hakhritekha. isaiah 48:10	hineh zeraftikha velo bekhasef bekhartikha bekhur 'oni. isaiah 48:11	lema'ani lema'ani 'e'eseh ki 'ekh yeikhal ukhebodi le'akher lo 'eten. isaiah 48:12	shema' 'eilai ya'aqob veyisra'el meqora'i 'ani hu 'ani rishon 'af 'ani 'akharon. isaiah 48:13	'af yadi yasedah 'erez vimini tipekhah shamayim qorei 'ani 'aleihem ya'amdu yakhdav. isaiah 48:14	hiqabezu khulekhem ushama'u mi bahem higid 'et 'eleh yhvh 'aheibo ya'aseh khefzo bebabel uzero'o kasdim. isaiah 48:15	'ani 'ani dibarti 'af qerativ habi'otiv vehizliakh darko. isaiah 48:16	qirbu 'eilai shim'u zot lo meirosh baseiter dibarti mei'et heyotah sham 'ani ve'atah 'adonai yhvh shelakhani verukho. isaiah 48:17	koh 'amar yhvh go'alkha qedosh yisra'el 'ani yhvh 'elohekha melamedkha leho'il madrikhakha bederekh teilekh. isaiah 48:18	lu hiqshabta lemizvotai vayhi khanahar shelomekha vezidqatekha kegalei hayam. isaiah 48:19	vayhi khakhol zar'ekha veze'eza'ei mei'ekha kim'otav lo yikaret velo yishamed shemo milefanai. isaiah 48:20	ze'u mibabel birkhu mikasdim beqol rinah hagidu hashmi'u zot hozi'uha 'ad qezeh ha'arez 'imru ga'al yhvh 'abdo ya'aqob. isaiah 48:21	velo zame'u bakhorabot holikham mayim mizur hizil lamo vayibqa' zur vayazubu mayim. isaiah 48:22	'en shalom 'amar yhvh laresha'im. isaiah 49:1	shim'u 'iyim 'eilai vehaqshibu le'umim meirakhoq yhvh mibeten qera'ani mime'ei 'imi hizkir shemi. isaiah 49:2	vayasem pi kekhereb khadah bezel yado hekhbi'ani vaysimeini lekhez barur be'ashpato histirani. isaiah 49:3	vayomer li 'abdi 'atah yisra'el 'asher bekha 'etpa'ar. isaiah 49:4	va'ani 'amarti leriq yaga'ti letohu vehebel kokhi khileiti 'akhen mishpati 'et yhvh ufe'ulati 'et 'elohai. isaiah 49:5	ve'atah 'amar yhvh yozeri mibeten le'ebed lo leshobeb ya'aqob 'eilav veyisra'el lo lo yei'asef ve'ekabed be'einei yhvh veilohai hayah 'uzi. isaiah 49:6	vayomer naqel mihyotkha li 'ebed lehaqim 'et shibtei ya'aqob unezirei unezurei yisra'el lehashib unetatikha le'or goyim lihyot yeshu'ati 'ad qezeh ha'arez. isaiah 49:7	koh 'amar yhvh go'el yisra'el qedosho libzoh nefesh limta'eb go le'ebed moshelim melakhim yir'u vaqamu sarim veyishtakhavu lema'an yhvh 'asher ne'eman qedosh yisra'el vayibkhareka. isaiah 49:8	koh 'amar yhvh be'et razon 'anitikha ubeyom yeshu'ah 'azartikha ve'ezarekha ve'etenkha librit 'am lehaqim 'erez lehankhil nekhalot shomeimot. isaiah 49:9	leimor la'asurim zei'u la'asher bakhoshekh higalu 'al derakhim yir'u ubekhal shefayim mar'itam. isaiah 49:10	lo yir'abu velo yizma'u velo yakem sharab vashamesh ki merakhamam yenahagem ve'al mabu'ei mayim yenahalem. isaiah 49:11	vesamti khal harai ladarekh umesilotai yerumun. isaiah 49:12	hineh 'eleh meirakhoq yabo'u vehineh 'eleh mizafon umiyam ve'eleh mei'erez sinim. isaiah 49:13	ranu shamayim vegili 'arez yifzekhu ufizkhu harim rinah ki nikham yhvh 'amo va'aniyav yerakhem. isaiah 49:14	vatomer ziyon 'azabani yhvh vadonai shekheikhani. isaiah 49:15	hatishkakh 'ishah 'ulah meirakhem ben bitnah gam 'eleh tishkakhnah ve'anokhi lo 'eshkakhekh. isaiah 49:16	hen 'al kapayim khaqotikh khomotayikh negdi tamid. isaiah 49:17	miharu banayikh meharesayikh umakharibayikh mimekh yeizei'u. isaiah 49:18	se'i sabib 'einayikh ure'i kulam niqbezu ba'u lakh khai 'ani ne'um yhvh ki khulam ka'adi tilbashi uteqasherim kakalah. isaiah 49:19	ki kharebotayikh veshomemotayikh ve'erez harisutekh ki 'atah teizeri miyosheb verakhaqu mebale'ayikh. isaiah 49:20	'od yomeru be'azenayikh benei shikulayikh zar li hamaqom geshah li ve'eisheibah. isaiah 49:21	ve'amart bilbabekh mi yalad li 'et 'eleh va'ani shekhulah vegalmudah golah vesurah ve'eleh mi gidel hen 'ani nish'arti lebadi 'eleh 'eifoh hem. isaiah 49:22	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hineh 'esa 'el goyim yadi ve'el 'amim 'arim nisi veheibi'u banayikh bekhozen ubenotayikh 'al katef tinasenah. isaiah 49:23	vehayu melakhim 'omenayikh vesaroteihem meiniqotayikh 'apayim 'erez yishtakhavu lakh va'afar raglayikh yelakheikhu veyada'at ki 'ani yhvh 'asher lo yeiboshu qoai. isaiah 49:24	hayuqakh migibor malqoakh ve'im shebi zadiq yimalet. isaiah 49:25	ki khoh 'amar yhvh gam shebi gibor yuqakh umalqoakh 'ariz yimalet ve'et yeribekh 'anokhi 'arib ve'et banayikh 'anokhi 'oshia'. isaiah 49:26	veha'akhalti 'et monayikh 'et besaram vekhe'asis damam yishkarun veyade'u khal basar ki 'ani yhvh moshi'ekh vego'alekh 'abir ya'aqob. isaiah 50:1	koh 'amar yhvh 'ei zeh seifer keritut 'imekhem 'asher shilakhtiha 'o mi minoshai 'asher makharti 'etkhem lo hen ba'avonoteikhem nimkartem ubefish'eikhem shulekhah 'imekhem. isaiah 50:2	madua' bati ve'en 'ish qarati ve'en 'oneh haqazor qazerah yadi mipedut ve'im 'en bi khoakh lehazil hen bega'arati 'akharib yam 'asim neharot midbar tib'ash degatam mei'en mayim vetamot bazama. isaiah 50:3	'albish shamayim qadrut vesaq 'asim kesutam. isaiah 50:4	'adonai yhvh natan li leshon limudim lada'at la'ut 'et ya'ef dabar ya'ir baboqer baboqer ya'ir li 'ozen lishmoa' kalimudim. isaiah 50:5	'adonai yhvh patakh li 'ozen ve'anokhi lo mariti 'akhor lo nesugoti. isaiah 50:6	geivi natati lemakim ulekhayai lemoretim panai lo histarti mikelimot varoq. isaiah 50:7	vadonai yhvh ya'azar li 'al ken lo nikhlameti 'al ken samti fanai kakhalamish va'eida' ki lo 'eibosh. isaiah 50:8	qarob mazdiqi mi yarib 'iti na'amdah yakhad mi ba'al mishpati yigash 'eilai. isaiah 50:9	hen 'adonai yhvh ya'azar li mi hu yarshi'eini hen kulam kabeged yiblu 'ash yokhelem. isaiah 50:10	mi bakhem yerei yhvh shomeia' beqol 'abdo 'asher halakh khasheikhim ve'en nogah lo yibtakh beshem yhvh veyisha'en beilohav. isaiah 50:11	hen kulekhem qodekhei 'esh me'azerei ziqot lekhu be'ur 'eshkhem ubeziqot bi'artem miyadi hayetah zot lakhem lema'azeibah tishkabun. isaiah 51:1	shim'u 'eilai rodefei zedeq mebaqshei yhvh habitu 'el zur khuzabtem ve'el maqebet bor nuqartem. isaiah 51:2	habitu 'el 'abraham 'abikhem ve'el sarah tekholelkhem ki 'ekhad qerativ va'abarekheihu ve'arbeihu. isaiah 51:3	ki nikham yhvh ziyon nikham kal khareboteha vayasem midbarah ke'eiden ve'arbatah kegan yhvh sason vesimkhah yimazei bah todah veqol zimrah. isaiah 51:4	haqshibu 'eilai 'ami ule'umi 'eilai ha'azinu ki torah mei'iti teizei umishpati le'or 'amim 'argia'. isaiah 51:5	qarob zidqi yaza yish'i uzero'ai 'amim yishpotu 'eilai 'iyim yeqavu ve'el zero'i yeyakheilun. isaiah 51:6	se'u lashamayim 'eineikhem vehabitu 'el ha'arez mitakhat ki shamayim ke'ashan nimlakhu veha'arez kabeged tibleh veyoshebeha kemo khen yemutun vishu'ati le'olam tihyeh vezidqati lo teikhat. isaiah 51:7	shim'u 'eilai yode'ei zedeq 'am torati belibam 'al tire'u kherpat 'enosh umigidufotam 'al teikhatu. isaiah 51:8	ki khabeged yokhelem 'ash vekhazemer yokhelem sas vezidqati le'olam tihyeh vishu'ati ledor dorim. isaiah 51:9	'uri 'uri libshi 'oz zeroa' yhvh 'uri kimei qedem dorot 'olamim halo 'at hi hamakhzebet rahab mekholelet tanin. isaiah 51:10	halo 'at hi hamakharebet yam mei tehom rabah hasamah ma'amaqei yam derekh la'abor ge'ulim. isaiah 51:11	ufeduyei yhvh yeshubun uba'u ziyon berinah vesimkhat 'olam 'al rosham sason vesimkhah yasigun nasu yagon va'anakhah. isaiah 51:12	'anokhi 'anokhi hu menakhemkhem mi 'at vatire'i mei'enosh yamut umiben 'adam khazir yinaten. isaiah 51:13	vatishkakh yhvh 'osekha noteh shamayim veyosed 'arez vatefakhed tamid kal hayom mipenei khamat hameiziq ka'asher konen lehashkhit ve'ayeh khamat hameiziq. isaiah 51:14	mihar zo'eh lehipateiakh velo yamut lashakhat velo yekhsar lakhmo. isaiah 51:15	ve'anokhi yhvh 'elohekha roga' hayam vayehemu galav yhvh zeba'ot shemo. isaiah 51:16	va'asim debarai befikha ubezel yadi kisitikha lintoa' shamayim velisod 'arez veleimor leziyon 'ami 'atah. isaiah 51:17	hit'orri hit'orri qumi yerushalim 'asher shatit miyad yhvh 'et kos khamato 'et quba'at kos hatar'eilah shatit mazit. isaiah 51:18	'en menahel lah mikal banim yaladah ve'en makhaziq beyadah mikal banim gideilah. isaiah 51:19	shetayim henah qore'otayikh mi yanud lakh hashod vehasheber vehara'ab vehakhereb mi 'anakhamekh. isaiah 51:20	banayikh 'ulefu shakhebu berosh kal khuzot keto mikhmar hamlei'im khamat yhvh ga'arat 'elohayikh. isaiah 51:21	lakhen shim'i na zot 'aniyah ushekhurat velo miyayin. isaiah 51:22	koh 'amar 'adonayikh yhvh veilohayikh yarib 'amo hineh laqakhti miyadekh 'et kos hatar'eilah 'et quba'at kos khamati lo tosifi lishtotah 'od. isaiah 51:23	vesamtiha beyad mogayikh 'asher 'ameru lenafshekh shekhi vena'aborah vatasimi kha'arez geivekh vekhakhuz la'oberim. isaiah 52:1	'uri 'uri libshi 'uzekh ziyon libshi bigdei tif'artekh yerushalim 'ir haqodesh ki lo yosif yabo bakh 'od 'arel vetamei. isaiah 52:2	hitna'ari mei'afar qumi shebi yerushalim hitpatekhu hitpatekhi mosrei zavarekh shebiyah bat ziyon. isaiah 52:3	ki khoh 'amar yhvh khinam nimkartem velo bekhesef tiga'eilu. isaiah 52:4	ki khoh 'amar 'adonai yhvh mizrayim yarad 'ami barishonah lagur sham ve'ashur be'efes 'ashaqo. isaiah 52:5	ve'atah mi li mah li foh ne'um yhvh ki luqakh 'ami khinam moshelo moshelav yeheililu ne'um yhvh vetamid kal hayom shemi mino'az. isaiah 52:6	lakhen yeida' 'ami shemi lakhen bayom hahu ki 'ani hu hamdaber hineini. isaiah 52:7	mah navu 'al heharim raglei mebaser mashmia' shalom mebaser tob mashmia' yeshu'ah 'omer leziyon malakh 'elohayikh. isaiah 52:8	qol zofayikh nase'u qol yakhdav yeraneinu ki 'ayin be'ayin yir'u beshub yhvh ziyon. isaiah 52:9	pizkhu ranenu yakhdav kharebot yerushalim ki nikham yhvh 'amo ga'al yerushalim. isaiah 52:10	khasaf yhvh 'et zeroa' qadesho le'einei kal hagoyim vera'u kal 'afsei 'arez 'et yeshu'at 'eloheinu. isaiah 52:11	suru suru ze'u misham tamei 'al tiga'u ze'u mitokhah hibaru nose'ei kelei yhvh. isaiah 52:12	ki lo bekhipazon teizei'u ubimnusah lo teileikhun ki holekh lifneikhem yhvh ume'asifkhem 'elohei yisra'el. isaiah 52:13	hineh yaskil 'abdi yarum venisa vegabah me'od. isaiah 52:14	ka'asher shamemu 'alekha rabim ken mishkhat mei'ish mar'eihu veto'aro mibenei 'adam. isaiah 52:15	ken yazeh goyim rabim 'alav yiqpezu melakhim pihem ki 'asher lo supar lahem ra'u va'asher lo shame'u hitbonanu. isaiah 53:1	mi he'emin lishmu'ateinu uzeroa' yhvh 'al mi niglatah. isaiah 53:2	vaya'al kayoneq lefanav vekhashoresh mei'erez ziyah lo to'ar lo velo hadar venir'eihu velo mar'eh venekhmedeihu. isaiah 53:3	nibzeh vakhadal 'ishim 'ish makh'obot vidua' kholi ukhemaster panim mimenu nibzeh velo khashabnuhu. isaiah 53:4	'akhen kholayeinu hu nasa umakh'obeinu sebalam va'anakhnu khashabnuhu nagua' mukeh 'elohim ume'uneh. isaiah 53:5	vehu mekholal mipesha'einu meduka mei'avonoteinu musar shelomeinu 'alav ubakhaburato nirpa lanu. isaiah 53:6	kulanu kazon ta'inu 'ish ledarko paninu yhvh hifgia' bo 'et 'avon kulanu. isaiah 53:7	nigas vehu na'aneh velo yiftakh piv kaseh latebakh yubal ukherakhel lifnei gozezeha ne'elamah velo yiftakh piv. isaiah 53:8	mei'ozer umimishpat luqakh ve'et doro mi yesokheiakh ki nigzar mei'erez khayim mipesha' 'ami nega' lamo. isaiah 53:9	vayiten 'et resha'im qibro ve'et 'ashir bemotav 'al lo khamas 'asah velo mirmah befiv. isaiah 53:10	yhvh khafez dake'o hekheli 'im tasim 'asham nafsho yir'eh zera' ya'arikh yamim vekheifez yhvh beyado yizlakh. isaiah 53:11	mei'amal nafsho yir'eh yisba' beda'to yazdiq zadiq 'abdi larabim va'avonotam hu yisbol. isaiah 53:12	lakhen 'akhaleq lo barabim ve'et 'azumim yekhaleq shalal takhat 'asher he'erah lamavet nafsho ve'et poshe'im nimnah vehu khet rabim nasa velaposhe'im yafgia'. isaiah 54:1	rani 'aqarah lo yaladah pizkhi rinah vezahali lo khalah ki rabim benei shomeimah mibenei be'ulah 'amar yhvh. isaiah 54:2	harkhibi meqom 'aholekh viri'ot mishkenotayikh yatu 'al takhsokhi ha'arikhi meitarayikh viteidotayikh khazeiqi. isaiah 54:3	ki yamin usemol tifrozi vezar'ekh goyim yirash ve'arim neshamot yoshibu. isaiah 54:4	'al tire'i ki lo teiboshi ve'al tikalemi ki lo takhpiri ki boshet 'alumayikh tishkakhi vekherpat 'almenutayikh lo tizkeri 'od. isaiah 54:5	ki bo'alayikh 'osayikh yhvh zeba'ot shemo vego'alekh qedosh yisra'el 'elohei khal ha'arez yiqarei. isaiah 54:6	ki khe'ishah 'azubah va'azubat ruakh qera'akh yhvh ve'eishet ne'urim ki tima'es 'amar 'elohayikh. isaiah 54:7	berega' qaton 'azabtikh uberakhamim gedolim 'aqabezekh. isaiah 54:8	beshezef qezef histarti fanai rega' mimekh ubekhesed 'olam rikhamtikh 'amar go'alekh yhvh. isaiah 54:9	ki mei noakh zot li 'asher nishba'ti mei'abor mei noakh 'od 'al ha'arez ken nishba'ti miqezof 'alayikh umige'ar bakh. isaiah 54:10	ki heharim yamushu vehageba'ot temutenah vekhasdi mei'itekh lo yamush uberit shelomi lo tamut 'amar merakhamekh yhvh. isaiah 54:11	'aniyah so'arah lo nukhamah hineh 'anokhi marbiz bapukh 'abanayikh visadtikh basapirim. isaiah 54:12	vesamti kadkhod shimshotayikh ushe'arayikh le'abnei 'eqdakh vekhal gebulekh le'abnei kheifez. isaiah 54:13	vekhal banayikh limudei yhvh verab shelom banayikh. isaiah 54:14	bizdaqah tikonani rakhaqi mei'osheq ki lo tira'i umimekhitah ki lo tiqrab 'eilayikh. isaiah 54:15	hen gor yagur 'efes mei'oti mi gar 'itakh 'alayikh yipol. isaiah 54:16	hen hineh 'anokhi barati kharash nofeiakh be'esh pekham umozi kheli lema'aseihu ve'anokhi barati mashkhit lekhabel. isaiah 54:17	kal keli yuzar 'alayikh lo yizlakh vekhal lashon taqum 'itakh lamishpat tarshi'i zot nakhalat 'abdei yhvh vezidqatam mei'iti ne'um yhvh. isaiah 55:1	ho kal zamei lekhu lamayim va'asher 'en lo kasef lekhu shibru ve'ekholu ulekhu shibru belo khesef ubelo mekhir yayin vekhalab. isaiah 55:2	lamah tishqelu khesef belo lekhem vigi'akhem belo lesabe'ah shim'u shamoa' 'eilai ve'ikhlu tob vetit'anag badeshen nafshekhem. isaiah 55:3	hatu 'azenekhem ulekhu 'eilai shim'u utekhi nafshekhem ve'ekhretah lakhem berit 'olam khasdei david hane'emanim. isaiah 55:4	hen 'ed le'umim netativ nagid umezaveh le'umim. isaiah 55:5	hen go lo teida' tiqra vego lo yeda'ukha 'eilekha yaruzu lema'an yhvh 'elohekha veliqdosh yisra'el ki fei'arakh. isaiah 55:6	dirshu yhvh behimaze'o qera'uhu bihyoto qarob. isaiah 55:7	ya'azob rasha' darko ve'ish 'aven makhshebotav veyashob 'el yhvh virakhameihu ve'el 'eloheinu ki yarbeh lisloakh. isaiah 55:8	ki lo makhshebotai makhsheboteikhem velo darkheikhem derakhai ne'um yhvh. isaiah 55:9	ki gabehu shamayim mei'arez ken gabehu derakhai midarkheikhem umakhshebotai mimakhsheboteikhem. isaiah 55:10	ki ka'asher yeired hageshem vehasheleg min hashamayim veshamah lo yashub ki 'im hirvah 'et ha'arez veholidah vehizmikhah venatan zera' lazoreia' velekhem la'okhel. isaiah 55:11	ken yihyeh debari 'asher yeizei mipi lo yashub 'eilai reiqam ki 'im 'asah 'et 'asher khafazti vehizliakh 'asher shelakhtiv. isaiah 55:12	ki besimkhah teizei'u ubeshalom tubalun heharim vehageba'ot yifzekhu lifneikhem rinah vekhal 'azei hasadeh yimkha'u khaf. isaiah 55:13	takhat hana'azuz ya'aleh berosh takhat vetakhat hasirpad ya'aleh hadas vehayah yhvh leshem le'ot 'olam lo yikaret. isaiah 56:1	koh 'amar yhvh shimru mishpat va'asu zedaqah ki qerobah yeshu'ati labo vezidqati lehigalot. isaiah 56:2	'ashrei 'enosh ya'aseh zot uben 'adam yakhaziq bah shomer shabat meikhalelo veshomer yado mei'asot kal ra'. isaiah 56:3	ve'al yomar ben haneikhar hanilvah 'el yhvh leimor habdel yabdilani yhvh mei'al 'amo ve'al yomar hasaris hen 'ani 'ez yabesh. isaiah 56:4	ki khoh 'amar yhvh lasarisim 'asher yishmeru 'et shabetotai ubakharu ba'asher khafazeti umakhaziqim bibriti. isaiah 56:5	venatati lahem bebeiti ubekhomotai yad vashem tob mibanim umibanot shem 'olam 'eten lo 'asher lo yikaret. isaiah 56:6	ubenei haneikhar hanilvim 'al yhvh leshareto ule'ahabah 'et shem yhvh lihyot lo la'abadim kal shomer shabat meikhalelo umakhaziqim bibriti. isaiah 56:7	vahabi'otim 'el har qadshi vesimakhtim bebet tefilati 'oloteihem vezibkheihem lerazon 'al mizbekhi ki beiti bet tefilah yiqarei lekhal ha'amim. isaiah 56:8	ne'um 'adonai yhvh meqabez nidkhei yisra'el 'od 'aqabez 'alav leniqbazav. isaiah 56:9	kol khayto sadai 'eitayu le'ekhol kal khayto baya'ar. isaiah 56:10	zafu zofav 'ivrim kulam lo yada'u kulam kelabim 'ilemim lo yukhelu linboakh hozim shokhebim 'ohabei lanum. isaiah 56:11	vehakelabim 'azei nefesh lo yade'u sabe'ah vehemah ro'im lo yade'u habin kulam ledarkam panu 'ish lebiz'o miqazeihu. isaiah 56:12	'eitayu 'eqkhah yayin venisbe'ah sheikhar vehayah khazeh yom makhar gadol yeter me'od. isaiah 57:1	hazadiq 'abad ve'en 'ish sam 'al leb ve'anshei khesed ne'esafim be'en meibin ki mipenei hara'ah ne'esaf hazadiq. isaiah 57:2	yabo shalom yanukhu 'al mishkebotam holekh nekhokho. isaiah 57:3	ve'atem qirbu henah benei 'onenah zera' mena'ef vatizneh. isaiah 57:4	'al mi tit'anagu 'al mi tarkhibu feh ta'arikhu lashon halo 'atem yildei fesha' zera' shaqer. isaiah 57:5	haneikhamim ba'eilim takhat kal 'ez ra'anan shokhatei hayladim banekhalim takhat se'ifei hasela'im. isaiah 57:6	bekhaleqei nakhal khelqekh hem hem goralekh gam lahem shafakht nesekh he'elit minkhah ha'al 'eleh 'enakhem. isaiah 57:7	'al har gaboah venisa samt mishkabekh gam sham 'alit lizboakh zabakh. isaiah 57:8	ve'akhar hadelet vehamezuzah samt zikhronekh ki mei'iti gilit vata'ali hirkhabt mishkabekh vatikhrat lakh meihem 'ahabt mishkabam yad khazit. isaiah 57:9	vatashuri lamelekh bashemen vatarbi riqukhayikh vateshalekhi ziraykh 'ad meirakhoq vatashpili 'ad she'ol. isaiah 57:10	berob darkekh yaga'at lo 'amart no'ash khayat yadekh mazat 'al ken lo khalit. isaiah 57:11	ve'et mi da'agt vatire'i ki tekhazeibi ve'oti lo zakhart lo samt 'al libekh halo 'ani makhsheh umei'olam ve'oti lo tira'i. isaiah 57:12	'ani 'agid zidqatekh ve'et ma'asayikh velo yo'ilukh. isaiah 57:13	beza'aqekh yazilukh qibuzayikh ve'et kulam yisa ruakh yiqakh habel vehakhoseh bi yinkhal 'erez veyirash har qadshi isaiah 57:14	ve'amar solu solu panu darekh harimu mikhshol miderekh 'ami. isaiah 57:15	ki khoh 'amar ram venisa shokhen 'ad veqadosh shemo marom veqadosh 'eshkon ve'et daka ushefal ruakh lehakhayot ruakh shefalim ulehakhayot leb nidka'im. isaiah 57:16	ki lo le'olam 'arib velo lanezakh 'eqezof ki ruakh milefanai ya'atof uneshamot 'ani 'asiti. isaiah 57:17	ba'avon biz'o qazafti ve'akeihu haster ve'eqzof vayeilekh shobab bederekh libo. isaiah 57:18	derakhav ra'iti ve'erpa'eihu ve'ankheihu va'ashalem nikhumim lo vela'abeilav. isaiah 57:19	borei nub nib sefatayim shalom shalom larakhoq velaqarob 'amar yhvh urefativ. isaiah 57:20	veharesha'im kayam nigrash ki hashqet lo yukhal vayigreshu meimav refesh vatit. isaiah 57:21	'en shalom 'amar 'elohai laresha'im. isaiah 58:1	qera begaron 'al takhsokh kashofar harem qolekha vehaged le'ami pish'am ulebet ya'aqob khatotam. isaiah 58:2	ve'oti yom yom yidroshun veda'at derakhai yekhpazun kego 'asher zedaqah 'asah umishpat 'elohav lo 'azab yish'aluni mishpetei zedeq qirbat 'elohim yekhpazun. isaiah 58:3	lamah zamnu velo ra'ita 'ininu nafsheinu velo teida' hen beyom zomekhem timze'u kheifez vekhal 'azebeikhem tingosu. isaiah 58:4	hen lerib umazah tazumu ulehakot be'egrof resha' lo tazumu khayom lehashmia' bamarom qolkhem. isaiah 58:5	hakhazeh yihyeh zom 'ebkhareihu yom 'anot 'adam nafsho halakhof ke'agmon rosho vesaq va'eifer yazia' halazeh tiqra zom veyom razon yhvh. isaiah 58:6	halo zeh zom 'ebkhareihu pateiakh kharzubot resha' hater 'agudot motah veshalakh rezuzim khafeshim vekhal motah tenateiqu. isaiah 58:7	halo faros lara'eb lakhmekha va'aniyim merudim tabi bayit ki tir'eh 'arom vekhisito umibesarekha lo tit'alam. isaiah 58:8	'az yibaqa' kashakhar 'orekha va'arukhatekha meheirah tizmakh vehalakh lefanekha zidqekha kebod yhvh ya'asfekha. isaiah 58:9	'az tiqra yhvh ya'aneh teshava' veyomar hineini 'im tasir mitokhkha motah shelakh 'ezba' vedaber 'aven. isaiah 58:10	vetafeq lara'eb nafshekha venefesh na'anah tasbia' vezarakh bakhoshekh 'orekha va'afeilatekha kazahorayim. isaiah 58:11	venakhakha yhvh tamid vehisbia' bezakhzakhot nafshekha ve'azmotekha yakhaliz vehayita kegan raveh ukhemoza mayim 'asher lo yekhazebu meimav. isaiah 58:12	ubanu mimekha kharebot 'olam mosdei dor vador teqomem veqora lekha goder perez meshobeb netibot lashabet. isaiah 58:13	'im tashib mishabat raglekha 'asot khafazekha beyom qadshi veqarata lashabat 'oneg liqdosh yhvh mekhubad vekhibadto mei'asot derakhekha mimezo khefzekha vedaber dabar. isaiah 58:14	'az tit'anag 'al yhvh vehirkabtikha 'al bamotei 'arez veha'akhaltikha nakhalat ya'aqob 'abikha ki pi yhvh diber. isaiah 59:1	hen lo qazerah yad yhvh meihoshia' velo khabedah 'azeno mishemoa'. isaiah 59:2	ki 'im 'avonoteikhem hayu mabdilim beineikhem leben 'eloheikhem vekhatoteikhem histiru fanim mikem mishemoa'. isaiah 59:3	ki khapeikhem nego'alu badam ve'ezbe'oteikhem be'avon siftoteikhem diberu sheqer leshonkhem 'avlah tehgeh. isaiah 59:4	'en qorei bezedeq ve'en nishpat be'emunah batoakh 'al tohu vedaber shav haro 'amal veholed 'aven. isaiah 59:5	beizei zif'oni biqei'u vequrei 'akabish ye'erogu ha'okhel mibeizeihem yamut vehazureh tibaqa' 'ef'eh. isaiah 59:6	qureihem lo yihyu lebeged velo yitkasu bema'aseihem ma'aseihem ma'asei 'aven ufo'al khamas bekhapeihem. isaiah 59:7	ragleihem lara' yaruzu vimaharu lishpokh dam naqi makhsheboteihem makhshebot 'aven shod vasheber bimsilotam. isaiah 59:8	derekh shalom lo yada'u ve'en mishpat bema'gelotam netiboteihem 'iqeshu lahem kol dorekh bah lo yada' shalom. isaiah 59:9	'al ken rakhaq mishpat mimenu velo tasigeinu zedaqah neqaveh la'or vehineh khoshekh lingohot ba'afeilot nehalekh. isaiah 59:10	negashah kha'ivrim qir ukhe'en 'einayim negasheishah kashalnu bazahorayim kaneshef ba'ashmanim kameitim. isaiah 59:11	nehemeh khadubim kulanu vekhayonim hagoh nehgeh neqaveh lamishpat va'ayin lishu'ah rakhaqah mimenu. isaiah 59:12	ki rabu fesha'einu negdekha vekhatoteinu 'anetah banu ki fesha'einu 'itanu va'avonoteinu yeda'anum. isaiah 59:13	pashoa' vekhakhesh yhvh venasog mei'akhar 'eloheinu daber 'osheq vesarah horo vehogo mileb dibrei shaqer. isaiah 59:14	vehusag 'akhor mishpat uzedaqah meirakhoq ta'amod ki khashelah barekhob 'emet unekhokhah lo tukhal labo. isaiah 59:15	vatehi ha'emet ne'deret vesar meira' mishtolel vayar yhvh vayeira' be'einav ki 'en mishpat. isaiah 59:16	vayar ki 'en 'ish vayishtomem ki 'en mafgia' vatosha' lo zero'o vezidqato hi semakhatehu. isaiah 59:17	vayilbash zedaqah kashiryan vekhoba' yeshu'ah berosho vayilbash bigdei naqam tilboshet vaya'at kam'il qin'ah. isaiah 59:18	ke'al gemulot ke'al yeshalem kheimah lezarav gemul le'oyebav la'iyim gemul yeshalem. isaiah 59:19	veyire'u mima'arab 'et shem yhvh umimizrakh shemesh 'et kebodo ki yabo khanahar zar ruakh yhvh nosesah bo. isaiah 59:20	uba leziyon go'el uleshabei fesha' beya'aqob ne'um yhvh. isaiah 59:21	va'ani zot beriti 'otam 'amar yhvh rukhi 'asher 'alekha udebarai 'asher samti befikha lo yamushu mipikha umipi zar'akha umipi zera' zar'akha 'amar yhvh mei'atah ve'ad 'olam. isaiah 60:1	qumi 'ori ki ba 'orekh ukhebod yhvh 'alayikh zarakh. isaiah 60:2	ki hineh hakhoshekh yekhaseh 'erez va'arafel le'umim ve'alayikh yizrakh yhvh ukhebodo 'alayikh yeira'eh. isaiah 60:3	vehalekhu goyim le'orekh umelakhim lenogah zarkhekh. isaiah 60:4	se'i sabib 'einayikh ure'i kulam niqbezu ba'u lakh banayikh meirakhoq yabo'u ubenotayikh 'al zad tei'amanah. isaiah 60:5	'az tir'i venahart ufakhad verakhab lebabekh ki yeihafekh 'alayikh hamon yam khel goyim yabo'u lakh. isaiah 60:6	shif'at gemalim tekhasekh bikhrei midyan ve'eifah kulam misheba yabo'u zahab ulebonah yisa'u utehilot yhvh yebaseiru. isaiah 60:7	kal zon qeidar yiqabezu lakh 'eilei nebayot yesharetunekh ya'alu 'al razon mizbekhi ubet tif'arti 'afa'er. isaiah 60:8	mi 'eleh ka'ab te'ufenah vekhayonim 'el 'aruboteihem. isaiah 60:9	ki li 'iyim yeqavu va'oniyot tarshish barishonah lehabi banayikh meirakhoq kaspam uzehabam 'itam leshem yhvh 'elohayikh veliqdosh yisra'el ki fei'arakh. isaiah 60:10	ubanu benei neikhar khomotayikh umalkheihem yesharetunekh ki beqizpi hikitikh ubirzoni rikhamtikh. isaiah 60:11	ufitekhu she'arayikh tamid yomam valaylah lo yisageiru lehabi 'eilayikh khel goyim umalkheihem nehugim. isaiah 60:12	ki hago vehamamlakhah 'asher lo ya'abdukh yobeidu vehagoyim kharob yekherabu. isaiah 60:13	kebod halebanon 'eilayikh yabo berosh tidhar ute'ashur yakhdav lefa'er meqom miqdashi umeqom raglai 'akhabed. isaiah 60:14	vehalekhu 'eilayikh shekhoakh benei me'anayikh vehishtakhavu 'al kapot raglayikh kal mena'azayikh veqare'u lakh 'ir yhvh ziyon qedosh yisra'el. isaiah 60:15	takhat heyotekh 'azubah usenu'ah ve'en 'ober vesamtikh lig'on 'olam mesos dor vador. isaiah 60:16	veyanaqt khaleb goyim veshod melakhim tinaqi veyada'at ki 'ani yhvh moshi'ekh vego'alekh 'abir ya'aqob. isaiah 60:17	takhat hanekhoshet 'abi zahab vetakhat habarzel 'abi khesef vetakhat ha'eizim nekhoshet vetakhat ha'abanim barzel vesamti fequdatekh shalom venogesayikh zedaqah. isaiah 60:18	lo yishama' 'od khamas be'arzekh shod vasheber bigbulayikh veqarat yeshu'ah khomotayikh ushe'arayikh tehilah. isaiah 60:19	lo yihyeh lakh 'od hashemesh le'or yomam ulenogah hayareiakh lo ya'ir lakh vehayah lakh yhvh le'or 'olam veilohayikh letif'artekh. isaiah 60:20	lo yabo 'od shimshekh vireikhekh lo yei'asef ki yhvh yihyeh lakh le'or 'olam veshalemu yemei 'eblekh. isaiah 60:21	ve'amekh kulam zadiqim le'olam yireshu 'arez neizer mata'o mata'ai ma'aseh yadai lehitpa'er. isaiah 60:22	haqaton yihyeh la'elef vehaza'ir lego 'azum 'ani yhvh be'itah 'akhishenah. isaiah 61:1	ruakh 'adonai yhvh 'alai ya'an mashakh yhvh 'oti lebaser 'anavim shelakhani lakhabosh lenishberei leb liqro lishbuyim deror vela'asurim peqakh qoakh. isaiah 61:2	liqro shenat razon yhvh veyom naqam leiloheinu lenakhem kal 'abeilim. isaiah 61:3	lasum la'abeilei ziyon latet lahem pe'er takhat 'eifer shemen sason takhat 'eibel ma'ateh tehilah takhat ruakh keihah veqora lahem 'eilei hazedeq mata' yhvh lehitpa'er. isaiah 61:4	ubanu kharebot 'olam shomemot rishonim yeqomeimu vekhideshu 'arei khoreb shomemot dor vador. isaiah 61:5	ve'amedu zarim vera'u zonekhem ubenei neikhar 'ikareikhem vekhoremeikhem. isaiah 61:6	ve'atem kohanei yhvh tiqarei'u mesharetei 'eloheinu yei'amer lakhem khel goyim tokheilu ubikhbodam tityamaru. isaiah 61:7	takhat bashetekhem mishneh ukhelimah yaronu khelqam lakhen be'arzam mishneh yirashu simkhat 'olam tihyeh lahem. isaiah 61:8	ki 'ani yhvh 'oheb mishpat sonei gazel be'olah venatati fe'ulatam be'emet uberit 'olam 'ekhrot lahem. isaiah 61:9	venoda' bagoyim zar'am veze'eza'eihem betokh ha'amim kal ro'eihem yakirum ki hem zera' beirakh yhvh. isaiah 61:10	sos 'asis yhvh tagel nafshi beilohai ki hilbishani bigdei yesha' me'il zedaqah ye'atani kekhatan yekhahen pe'er vekhakalah ta'deh kheileha. isaiah 61:11	ki kha'arez tozi zimkhah ukheganah zeiru'eha tazmiakh ken 'adonai yhvh yazmiakh zedaqah utehilah neged kal hagoyim. isaiah 62:1	lema'an ziyon lo 'ekhesheh ulema'an yerushalim lo 'eshqot 'ad yeizei khanogah zidqah vishu'atah kelapid yib'ar. isaiah 62:2	vera'u goyim zidqekh vekhal melakhim kebodekh veqora lakh shem khadash 'asher pi yhvh yiqobenu. isaiah 62:3	vehayit 'ateret tif'eret beyad yhvh uzenof uzenif melukhah bekhaf 'elohayikh. isaiah 62:4	lo yei'amer lakh 'od 'azubah ule'arzekh lo yei'amer 'od shemamah ki lakh yiqarei khefzi bah ule'arzekh be'ulah ki khafez yhvh bakh ve'arzekh tiba'el. isaiah 62:5	ki yib'al bakhur betulah yib'alukh banayikh umesos khatan 'al kalah yasis 'alayikh 'elohayikh. isaiah 62:6	'al khomotayikh yerushalim hifqadti shomerim kal hayom vekhal halaylah tamid lo yekheshu hamazkirim 'et yhvh 'al domi lakhem. isaiah 62:7	ve'al titenu domi lo 'ad yekhonen ve'ad yasim 'et yerushalim tehilah ba'arez. isaiah 62:8	nishba' yhvh bimino ubizroa' 'uzo 'im 'eten 'et deganekh 'od ma'akhal le'oyebayikh ve'im yishtu benei neikhar tiroshekh 'asher yaga'at bo. isaiah 62:9	ki me'asfav yokheluhu vehilu 'et yhvh umeqabezav yishtuhu bekhazrot qadshi isaiah 62:10	'ibru 'ibru bashe'arim panu derekh ha'am solu solu hamsilah saqelu mei'eben harimu nes 'al ha'amim. isaiah 62:11	hineh yhvh hishmia' 'el qezeh ha'arez 'imru lebat ziyon hineh yish'ekh ba hineh sekharo 'ito ufe'ulato lefanav. isaiah 62:12	veqare'u lahem 'am haqodesh ge'ulei yhvh velakh yiqarei derushah 'ir lo ne'ezabah. isaiah 63:1	mi zeh ba mei'edom khamuz begadim mibazerah zeh hadur bilbusho zo'eh berob kokho 'ani medaber bizdaqah rab lehoshia'. isaiah 63:2	madua' 'adom lilbushekha ubegadekha kedorekh begat. isaiah 63:3	purah darakhti lebadi umei'amim 'en 'ish 'iti ve'edrekhem be'api ve'ermesem bakhamati veyez nizkham 'al begadai vekhal malbushai 'eg'aleti. isaiah 63:4	ki yom naqam belibi ushenat ge'ulai ba'ah. isaiah 63:5	ve'abit ve'en 'ozer ve'eshtomem ve'en somekh vatosha' li zero'i vakhamati hi semakhateni. isaiah 63:6	ve'abus 'amim be'api va'ashakerem bakhamati ve'orid la'arez nizkham. isaiah 63:7	khasdei yhvh 'azkir tehilot yhvh ke'al kol 'asher gemalanu yhvh verab tub lebet yisra'el 'asher gemalam kerakhamav ukherob khasadav. isaiah 63:8	vayomer 'akh 'ami hemah banim lo yeshaqeiru vayhi lahem lemoshia'. isaiah 63:9	bekhal zaratam lo lo zar umal'akh panav hoshi'am be'ahabato ubekhemlato hu ge'alam vaynatelem vaynase'em kal yemei 'olam. isaiah 63:10	vehemah maru ve'izebu 'et ruakh qadesho vayeihafekh lahem le'oyeb hu nilkham bam. isaiah 63:11	vayizkor yemei 'olam mosheh 'amo 'ayeh hama'alem miyam 'et ro'ei zono 'ayeh hasam beqirbo 'et ruakh qadesho. isaiah 63:12	molikh limin mosheh zeroa' tif'arto boqeia' mayim mipeneihem la'asot lo shem 'olam. isaiah 63:13	molikham batehomot kasus bamidbar lo yikasheilu. isaiah 63:14	kabeheimah babiq'ah teired ruakh yhvh tenikhenu ken nihagta 'amekha la'asot lekha shem tif'aret. isaiah 63:15	habet mishamayim ure'eh mizebul qadshekha vetif'artekha 'ayeh qin'atekha ugeburotekha hamon mei'ekha verakhamekha 'eilai hit'apaqu. isaiah 63:16	ki 'atah 'abinu ki 'abraham lo yeda'anu veyisra'el lo yakiranu 'atah yhvh 'abinu go'aleinu mei'olam shemekha. isaiah 63:17	lamah tat'einu yhvh miderakhekha taqshiakh libeinu miyir'atekha ub lema'an 'abadekha shibtei nakhalatekha. isaiah 63:18	lamiz'ar yareshu 'am qadshekha zareinu bosu miqdashekha. isaiah 63:19	hayinu mei'olam lo mashalta bam lo niqra shimkha 'aleihem isaiah 64:1	lu qara'ta shamayim yaradta mipanekha harim nazolu. isaiah 64:2	kiqdoakh 'esh hamasim mayim tib'eh 'esh lehodia' shimkha lezarekha mipanekha goyim yirgazu. isaiah 64:3	ba'asotkha nora'ot lo neqaveh yaradta mipanekha harim nazolu. isaiah 64:4	umei'olam lo shame'u lo he'ezinu 'ayin lo ra'atah 'elohim zulatekha ya'aseh limkhakeh lo. isaiah 64:5	paga'ta 'et sas ve'oseh zedeq bidrakhekha yizkerukha hen 'atah qazafta vanekheta bahem 'olam venivasheia'. isaiah 64:6	vanehi khatamei kulanu ukhebeged 'idim kal zidqoteinu vanabel ke'aleh kulanu va'avoneinu karuakh yisa'unu. isaiah 64:7	ve'en qorei beshimkha mit'orer lehakhaziq bakh ki histarta fanekha mimenu vatemugeinu beyad 'avoneinu. isaiah 64:8	ve'atah yhvh 'abinu 'atah 'anakhnu hakhomer ve'atah yozereinu uma'aseh yadekha kulanu. isaiah 64:9	'al tiqzof yhvh 'ad me'od ve'al la'ad tizkor 'avon hen habet na 'amekha khulanu. isaiah 64:10	'arei qadshekha hayu midbar ziyon midbar hayatah yerushalim shemamah. isaiah 64:11	bet qadesheinu vetif'arteinu 'asher hilukha 'aboteinu hayah lisreifat 'esh vekhal makhamadeinu hayah lekharebah. isaiah 64:12	ha'al 'eleh tit'apaq yhvh tekhesheh ute'aneinu 'ad me'od. isaiah 65:1	nidrashti lelo sha'alu nimzeiti lelo biqshuni 'amarti hineini hineini 'el go lo qora bishmi. isaiah 65:2	peirasti yadai kal hayom 'el 'am sorer haholekhim haderekh lo tob 'akhar makhsheboteihem. isaiah 65:3	ha'am hamakh'isim 'oti 'al panai tamid zobekhim baganot umeqaterim 'al halebeinim. isaiah 65:4	hayoshebim baqebarim ubanezurim yalinu ha'okhelim besar hakhazir uferaq umeraq pigulim keleihem. isaiah 65:5	ha'omerim qerab 'eilekha 'al tigash bi ki qedashtikha 'eleh 'ashan be'api 'esh yoqedet kal hayom. isaiah 65:6	hineh khetubah lefanai lo 'ekheseh ki 'im shilamti veshilamti 'al kheiqam. isaiah 65:7	'avonoteikhem va'avonot 'aboteikhem yakhdav 'amar yhvh 'asher qiteru 'al heharim ve'al hageba'ot kheirefuni umadoti fe'ulatam rishonah 'al 'el kheiqam. isaiah 65:8	koh 'amar yhvh ka'asher yimazei hatirosh ba'eshkol ve'amar 'al tashkhiteihu ki berakhah bo ken 'e'eseh lema'an 'abadai lebilti hashkhit hakol. isaiah 65:9	vehozeiti miya'aqob zera' umihudah yoresh harai vireishuha bekhirai va'abadai yishkenu shamah. isaiah 65:10	vehayah hasharon linveh zon ve'eimeq 'akhor lereibez baqar le'ami 'asher derashuni. isaiah 65:11	ve'atem 'ozebei yhvh hashekheikhim 'et har qadshi ha'orekhim lagad shulkhan vehamal'im lamni mimsakh. isaiah 65:12	umaniti 'etkhem lakhereb vekhulekhem latebakh tikhra'u ya'an qarati velo 'anitem dibarti velo shema'tem vata'asu hara' be'einai uba'asher lo khafazti bekhartem. isaiah 65:13	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hineh 'abadai yokheilu ve'atem tir'abu hineh 'abadai yishtu ve'atem tizma'u hineh 'abadai yismakhu ve'atem teiboshu. isaiah 65:14	hineh 'abadai yaronu mitub leb ve'atem tiz'aqu mike'eb leb umisheiber ruakh teyeililu. isaiah 65:15	vehinakhtem shimkhem lishbu'ah libkhirai vehemitekha 'adonai yhvh vela'abadav yiqra shem 'akher. isaiah 65:16	'asher hamitbarekh ba'arez yitbarekh beilohei 'amen vehanishba' ba'arez yishaba' beilohei 'amen ki nishkekhu hazarot harishonot vekhi nisteru mei'einai. isaiah 65:17	ki hini borei shamayim khadashim va'arez khadashah velo tizakharnah harishonot velo ta'alenah 'al leb. isaiah 65:18	ki 'im sisu vegilu 'adei 'ad 'asher 'ani borei ki hini borei 'et yerushalim gilah ve'amah masos. isaiah 65:19	vegalti birushalim vesasti be'ami velo yishama' bah 'od qol bekhi veqol ze'aqah. isaiah 65:20	lo yihyeh misham 'od 'ul yamim vezaqen 'asher lo yemalei 'et yamav ki hana'ar ben mei'ah shanah yamut vehakhote ben mei'ah shanah yequlal. isaiah 65:21	ubanu batim veyashabu venate'u kheramim ve'akhelu piryam. isaiah 65:22	lo yibnu ve'akher yeisheb lo yite'u ve'akher yokhel ki khimei ha'ez yemei 'ami uma'aseh yedeihem yebalu bekhirai. isaiah 65:23	lo yige'u lariq velo yeiledu labehalah ki zera' berukhei yhvh hemah veze'eza'eihem 'itam. isaiah 65:24	vehayah terem yiqra'u va'ani 'e'eneh 'od hem medaberim va'ani 'eshma'. isaiah 65:25	ze'eb vetaleh yir'u khe'ekhad ve'aryeh kabaqar yokhal teben venakhash 'afar lakhmo lo yarei'u velo yashkhitu bekhal har qadshi 'amar yhvh. isaiah 66:1	koh 'amar yhvh hashamayim kis'i veha'arez hadom raglai 'ei zeh bayit 'asher tibnu li ve'ei zeh maqom menukhati. isaiah 66:2	ve'et kal 'eleh yadi 'asatah vayihyu khal 'eleh ne'um yhvh ve'el zeh 'abit 'el 'ani unekheh ruakh vekhared 'al debari. isaiah 66:3	shokhet hashor makeh 'ish zobeiakh haseh 'oref keleb ma'aleh minkhah dam khazir mazkir lebonah mebarekh 'aven gam hemah bakharu bedarkheihem ubeshiquzeihem nafsham khafeizah. isaiah 66:4	gam 'ani 'ebkhar beta'aluleihem umegurotam 'abi lahem ya'an qarati ve'en 'oneh dibarti velo shamei'u vaya'asu hara' be'einai uba'asher lo khafazti bakharu. isaiah 66:5	shim'u debar yhvh hakhareidim 'el debaro 'ameru 'akheikhem sone'eikhem menadeikhem lema'an shemi yikhbad yhvh venir'eh besimkhatkhem vehem yeiboshu. isaiah 66:6	qol sha'on mei'ir qol meiheikhal qol yhvh meshalem gemul le'oyebav. isaiah 66:7	beterem takhil yaladah beterem yabo kheibel lah vehimlitah zakhar. isaiah 66:8	mi shama' kazot mi ra'ah ka'eleh hayukhal 'erez beyom 'ekhad 'im yivaled go pa'am 'ekhat ki khalah gam yaledah ziyon 'et baneha. isaiah 66:9	ha'ani 'ashbir velo 'olid yomar yhvh 'im 'ani hamolid ve'azarti 'amar 'elohayikh. isaiah 66:10	simkhu 'et yerushalim vegilu bah kal 'ohabeha sisu 'itah masos kal hamit'abelim 'aleha. isaiah 66:11	lema'an tinequ useba'tem mishod tankhumeha lema'an tamozu vehit'anagtem miziz kebodah. isaiah 66:12	ki khoh 'amar yhvh hini noteh 'eileha kenahar shalom ukhenakhal shotef kebod goyim vinaqtem 'al zad tinasei'u ve'al birkayim tesha'osha'u. isaiah 66:13	ke'ish 'asher 'imo tenakhamenu ken 'anokhi 'anakhemkhem ubirushalim tenukhamu. isaiah 66:14	ure'item vesas libekhem ve'azmoteikhem kadeshe tifrakhnah venod'ah yad yhvh 'et 'abadav veza'am 'et 'oyebav. isaiah 66:15	ki hineh yhvh ba'esh yabo vekhasufah markebotav lehashib bekheimah 'apo vega'arato belahabei 'esh. isaiah 66:16	ki ba'esh yhvh nishpat ubekharbo 'et kal basar verabu khalei yhvh. isaiah 66:17	hamitqadeshim vehamitaharim 'el haganot 'akhar 'ekhad 'akhat batavekh 'okhelei besar hakhazir vehasheqez veha'akhbar yakhdav yasufu ne'um yhvh. isaiah 66:18	ve'anokhi ma'aseihem umakhsheboteihem ba'ah leqabez 'et kal hagoyim vehaleshonot uba'u vera'u 'et kebodi. isaiah 66:19	vesamti bahem 'ot veshilakhti meihem peleitim 'el hagoyim tarshish pul velud moshekhei qeshet tubal veyavan ha'iyim harekhoqim 'asher lo shame'u 'et shim'i velo ra'u 'et kebodi vehigidu 'et kebodi bagoyim. isaiah 66:20	veheibi'u 'et kal 'akheikhem mikal hagoyim minkhah yhvh basusim ubarekheb ubazabim ubaperadim ubakirkarot 'al har qadshi yerushalim 'amar yhvh ka'asher yabi'u benei yisra'el 'et haminkhah bikhli tahor bet yhvh. isaiah 66:21	vegam meihem 'eqakh lakohanim lalviyim 'amar yhvh. isaiah 66:22	ki kha'asher hashamayim hakhodashim veha'arez hakhadashah 'asher 'ani 'oseh 'omedim lefanai ne'um yhvh ken ya'amod zar'akhem veshimkhem. isaiah 66:23	vehayah midei khodesh bekhadesho umidei shabat beshabato yabo khal basar lehishtakhavot lefanai 'amar yhvh. isaiah 66:24	veyaze'u vera'u befigrei ha'anashim haposhe'im bi ki tola'tam lo tamut ve'isham lo tikhbeh vehayu deira'on lekhal basar. 

jeremiah 1:1	dibrei yirmeyahu ben khilqiyahu min hakohanim 'asher ba'anatot be'erez binyamin. jeremiah 1:2	'asher hayah debar yhvh 'eilav bimei yoshiyahu ben 'amon melekh yehudah bishlosh 'esreh shanah lemalekho. jeremiah 1:3	vayhi bimei yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah 'ad tom 'ashtei 'esreh shanah lezidqiyahu ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah 'ad gelot yerushalim bakhodesh hakhamishi. jeremiah 1:4	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. jeremiah 1:5	beterem 'ezorkha 'ezarekha babeten yeda'tikha ubeterem teizei meirekhem hiqdashtikha nabi lagoyim netatikha. jeremiah 1:6	va'omar 'ahah 'adonai yhvh hineh lo yada'ti daber ki na'ar 'anokhi. jeremiah 1:7	vayomer yhvh 'eilai 'al tomar na'ar 'anokhi ki 'al kal 'asher 'eshlakhakha teilekh ve'et kal 'asher 'azavekha tedaber. jeremiah 1:8	'al tira mipeneihem ki 'itekha 'ani lehazilekha ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 1:9	vayishlakh yhvh 'et yado vayaga' 'al pi vayomer yhvh 'eilai hineh natati debarai befikha. jeremiah 1:10	re'eh hifqadtikha hayom hazeh 'al hagoyim ve'al hamamlakhot lintosh velintoz uleha'abid velaharos libnot velintoa'. jeremiah 1:11	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor mah 'atah ro'eh yirmeyahu va'omar maqel shaqed 'ani ro'eh. jeremiah 1:12	vayomer yhvh 'eilai heitabta lir'ot ki shoqed 'ani 'al debari la'asoto. jeremiah 1:13	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai sheinit leimor mah 'atah ro'eh va'omar sir nafuakh 'ani ro'eh ufanav mipenei zafonah. jeremiah 1:14	vayomer yhvh 'eilai mizafon tipatakh hara'ah 'al kal yoshebei ha'arez. jeremiah 1:15	ki hini qorei lekhal mishpekhot mamlekhot zafonah ne'um yhvh uba'u venatenu 'ish kis'o petakh sha'arei yerushalim ve'al kal khomoteha sabib ve'al kal 'arei yehudah. jeremiah 1:16	vedibarti mishpatai 'otam 'al kal ra'atam 'asher 'azabuni vayqateru leilohim 'akheirim vayishtakhavu lema'asei yedeihem. jeremiah 1:17	ve'atah te'zor matenekha veqamta vedibarta 'aleihem 'et kal 'asher 'anokhi 'azaveka 'al teikhat mipeneihem pen 'akhitekha lifneihem. jeremiah 1:18	va'ani hineh netatikha hayom le'ir mibzar ule'amud barzel ulekhomot nekhoshet 'al kal ha'arez lemalkhei yehudah lesareha lekhohaneha ule'am ha'arez. jeremiah 1:19	venilkhamu 'eilekha velo yukhelu lakh ki 'itekha 'ani ne'um yhvh lehazilekha. jeremiah 2:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. jeremiah 2:2	halokh veqarata be'azenei yerushalim leimor koh 'amar yhvh zakharti lakh khesed ne'urayikh 'ahabat kelulotayikh lekhtekh 'akharai bamidbar be'erez lo zeru'ah. jeremiah 2:3	qodesh yisra'el yhvh reishit tebu'atoh kal 'okhelav ye'shamu ra'ah tabo 'aleihem ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 2:4	shim'u debar yhvh bet ya'aqob vekhal mishpekhot bet yisra'el. jeremiah 2:5	koh 'amar yhvh mah maze'u 'aboteikhem bi 'avel ki rakhaqu mei'alai vayeilekhu 'akharei hahebel vayehbalu. jeremiah 2:6	velo 'ameru 'ayeh yhvh hama'aleh 'otanu mei'erez mizrayim hamolikh 'otanu bamidbar be'erez 'arabah veshukhah be'erez ziyah vezalmavet be'erez lo 'abar bah 'ish velo yashab 'adam sham. jeremiah 2:7	va'abi 'etkhem 'el 'erez hakarmel le'ekhol piryah vetubah vatabo'u vatetame'u 'et 'arzi venakhalati samtem leto'eibah. jeremiah 2:8	hakohanim lo 'ameru 'ayeh yhvh vetofesei hatorah lo yeda'uni veharo'im pashe'u bi vehanebi'im nibe'u baba'al ve'akharei lo yo'ilu halakhu. jeremiah 2:9	lakhen 'od 'arib 'itekhem ne'um yhvh ve'et benei beneikhem 'arib. jeremiah 2:10	ki 'ibru 'iyei khitiyim ure'u veqeidar shilkhu vehitbonu me'od ure'u hen hayetah kazot. jeremiah 2:11	haheimir go 'elohim vehemah lo 'elohim ve'ami heimir kebodo belo yo'il. jeremiah 2:12	shomu shamayim 'al zot vesa'aru kharebu me'od ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 2:13	ki shetayim ra'ot 'asah 'ami 'oti 'azebu meqor mayim khayim lakhzob lahem borot borot nishbarim 'asher lo yakhilu hamayim. jeremiah 2:14	ha'ebed yisra'el 'im yelid bayit hu madua' hayah labaz. jeremiah 2:15	'alav yish'agu khefirim natenu qolam vayashitu 'arzo leshamah 'arav nizetah nizetu mibeli yosheb. jeremiah 2:16	gam benei nof vetakhpenes vetakhpankhes yir'ukh qadeqod. jeremiah 2:17	halo zot ta'aseh lakh 'azebekh 'et yhvh 'elohayikh be'et molikhekh badarekh. jeremiah 2:18	ve'atah mah lakh lederekh mizrayim lishtot mei shikhor umah lakh lederekh 'ashur lishtot mei nahar. jeremiah 2:19	teyaserekh ra'atekh umeshubotayikh tokhikhukh ude'i ure'i ki ra' vamar 'azebekh 'et yhvh 'elohayikh velo fakhdati 'eilayikh ne'um 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot. jeremiah 2:20	ki mei'olam shabarti 'ulekh nitaqti mosrotayikh vatomeri lo 'e'ebod 'e'ebor ki 'al kal gib'ah gebohah vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan 'at zo'ah zonah. jeremiah 2:21	ve'anokhi neta'tikh soreq kuloh zera' 'emet ve'ekh nehpakht li surei hagefen nakheriyah. jeremiah 2:22	ki 'im tekhabesi baneter vetarbi lakh borit nikhtam 'avonekh lefanai ne'um 'adonai yhvh. jeremiah 2:23	'ekh tomeri lo nitmeiti 'akharei habe'alim lo halakhti re'i darkekh bagai de'i meh 'asit bikhrah qalah mesarekhet derakheha. jeremiah 2:24	pereh limud midbar be'avat nafosho nafshah sha'afah ruakh ta'anatah mi yeshibenah kal mebaqsheha lo yi'afu bekhadeshah yimza'uneha. jeremiah 2:25	min'i raglekh miyakhef ugoronekh ugeronekh mizim'ah vatomeri no'ash lo ki 'ahabti zarim ve'akhareihem 'eilekh. jeremiah 2:26	keboshet ganab ki yimazei ken hobishu bet yisra'el hemah malkheihem sareihem vekhohaneihem unebi'eihem. jeremiah 2:27	'omerim la'ez 'abi 'atah vela'eben 'at yelidtin yelidtanu ki fanu 'eilai 'oref velo fanim ube'et ra'atam yomeru qumah vehoshi'einu. jeremiah 2:28	ve'ayeh 'elohekha 'asher 'asita lakh yaqumu 'im yoshi'ukha be'et ra'atekha ki mispar 'arekha hayu 'elohekha yehudah. jeremiah 2:29	lamah taribu 'eilai kulekhem pesha'tem bi ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 2:30	lashav hikeiti 'et beneikhem musar lo laqakhu 'akhelah kharbekhem nebi'eikhem ke'aryeh mashkhit. jeremiah 2:31	hador 'atem re'u debar yhvh hamidbar hayiti leyisra'el 'im 'erez ma'peileyah madua' 'ameru 'ami radnu lo nabo 'od 'eilekha. jeremiah 2:32	hatishkakh betulah 'edyah kalah qishureha ve'ami shekheikhuni yamim 'en mispar. jeremiah 2:33	mah teitibi darkekh lebaqesh 'ahabah lakhen gam 'et hara'ot limadti limadt 'et derakhayikh. jeremiah 2:34	gam bikhnafayikh nimze'u dam nafshot 'ebyonim neqiyim lo bamakhteret mezatim ki 'al kal 'eleh. jeremiah 2:35	vatomeri ki niqeiti 'akh shab 'apo mimeni hini nishpat 'otakh 'al 'amerekh lo khatati. jeremiah 2:36	mah teizeli me'od leshanot 'et darkekh gam mimizrayim teiboshi ka'asher boshet mei'ashur. jeremiah 2:37	gam mei'et zeh teize'i veyadayikh 'al roshekh ki ma'as yhvh bemibtakhayikh velo tazlikhi lahem. jeremiah 3:1	leimor hen yeshalakh 'ish 'et 'ishto vehalekhah mei'ito vehayetah le'ish 'akher hayashub 'eileha 'od halo khanof tekhenaf ha'arez hahi ve'at zanit rei'im rabim veshob 'eilai ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 3:2	se'i 'einayikh 'al shefayim ure'i 'eifoh lo shugalt shukabet 'al derakhim yashabt lahem ka'arabi bamidbar vatakhanifi 'erez biznutayikh ubera'atekh. jeremiah 3:3	vayimane'u rebibim umalqosh lo hayah umeizakh 'ishah zonah hayah lakh mei'ant hikalem. jeremiah 3:4	halo mei'atah qarati qarat li 'abi 'aluf ne'urai 'atah. jeremiah 3:5	hayintor le'olam 'im yishmor lanezakh hineh dibarti dibart vata'asi hara'ot vatukhal. jeremiah 3:6	vayomer yhvh 'eilai bimei yoshiyahu hamelekh hara'ita 'asher 'asetah meshubah yisra'el holekhah hi 'al kal har gaboah ve'el takhat kal 'ez ra'anan vatizni sham. jeremiah 3:7	va'omar 'akharei 'asotah 'et kal 'eleh 'eilai tashub velo shabah vateireh vateire bagodah 'akhotah yehudah. jeremiah 3:8	va'eire ki 'al kal 'odot 'asher ni'afah meshubah yisra'el shilakhtiha va'eten 'et seifer kerituteha 'eileha velo yare'ah bogeidah yehudah 'akhotah vateilekh vatizen gam hi. jeremiah 3:9	vehayah miqol zenutah vatekhenaf 'et ha'arez vatin'af 'et ha'eben ve'et ha'ez. jeremiah 3:10	vegam bekhal zot lo shabah 'eilai bagodah 'akhotah yehudah bekhal libah ki 'im besheqer ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 3:11	vayomer yhvh 'eilai zideqah nafshah meshubah yisra'el mibogeidah yehudah. jeremiah 3:12	halokh veqarata 'et hadebarim ha'eleh zafonah ve'amarta shubah meshubah yisra'el ne'um yhvh lo 'apil panai bakhem ki khasid 'ani ne'um yhvh lo 'etor le'olam. jeremiah 3:13	'akh de'i 'avonekh ki yhvh 'elohayikh pasha'at vatefazeri 'et derakhayikh lazarim takhat kal 'ez ra'anan ubeqoli lo shema'tem ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 3:14	shubu banim shobabim ne'um yhvh ki 'anokhi ba'alti bakhem velaqakhti 'etkhem 'ekhad mei'ir ushenayim mimishpakhah veheibeiti 'etkhem ziyon. jeremiah 3:15	venatati lakhem ro'im kelibi vera'u 'etkhem dei'ah vehaskel. jeremiah 3:16	vehayah ki tirbu uferitem ba'arez bayamim hahemah ne'um yhvh lo yomeru 'od 'aron berit yhvh velo ya'aleh 'al leb velo yizkeru bo velo yifqodu velo yei'aseh 'od. jeremiah 3:17	ba'et hahi yiqre'u lirushalim kisei yhvh veniqvu 'eileha khal hagoyim leshem yhvh lirushalim velo yeilekhu 'od 'akharei sherirut libam hara'. jeremiah 3:18	bayamim hahemah yeilekhu bet yehudah 'al bet yisra'el veyabo'u yakhdav mei'erez zafon 'al ha'arez 'asher hinkhalti 'et 'aboteikhem. jeremiah 3:19	ve'anokhi 'amarti 'ekh 'ashitekh babanim ve'eten lakh 'erez khemdah nakhalat zebi zib'ot goyim va'omar 'abi tiqre'u tiqre'i li umei'akharai lo tashubu tashubi. jeremiah 3:20	'akhen bagedah 'ishah meirei'ah ken begadtem bi bet yisra'el ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 3:21	qol 'al shefayim nishma' bekhi takhanunei benei yisra'el ki he'evu 'et darkam shakhekhu 'et yhvh 'eloheihem. jeremiah 3:22	ubu banim shobabim 'erpah meshuboteikhem hinu 'atanu lakh ki 'atah yhvh 'eloheinu. jeremiah 3:23	'akhen lasheqer migeba'ot hamon harim 'akhen yhvh 'eloheinu teshu'at yisra'el. jeremiah 3:24	vehaboshet 'akhelah 'et yegia' 'aboteinu mine'ureinu 'et zonam ve'et beqaram 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem. jeremiah 3:25	nishkebah bebasheteinu utekhaseinu kelimateinu ki yhvh 'eloheinu khatanu 'anakhnu va'aboteinu mine'ureinu ve'ad hayom hazeh velo shama'nu beqol yhvh 'eloheinu. jeremiah 4:1	'im tashub yisra'el ne'um yhvh 'eilai tashub ve'im tasir shiquzekha mipanai velo tanud. jeremiah 4:2	venishba'ta khai yhvh be'emet bemishpat ubizdaqah vehitbarekhu bo goyim ubo yithalalu. jeremiah 4:3	ki khoh 'amar yhvh le'ish yehudah velirushalim niru lakhem nir ve'al tizre'u 'el qozim. jeremiah 4:4	himolu yhvh vehasiru 'arelot lebabkhem 'ish yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim pen teizei kha'esh khamati uba'arah ve'en mekhabeh mipenei roa' ma'aleikhem. jeremiah 4:5	hagidu bihudah ubirushalim hashmi'u ve'imru vtiq'u tiq'u shofar ba'arez qir'u mal'u ve'imru hei'asefu venabo'ah 'el 'arei hamibzar. jeremiah 4:6	se'u nes ziyonah ha'izu 'al ta'amodu ki ra'ah 'anokhi meibi mizafon vesheber gadol. jeremiah 4:7	'alah 'aryeh misubekho umashkhit goyim nasa' yaza mimeqomo lasum 'arzekh leshamah 'arayikh tizenah mei'en yosheb. jeremiah 4:8	'al zot khigru saqim sifdu veheililu ki lo shab kharon 'af yhvh mimenu. jeremiah 4:9	vehayah bayom hahu ne'um yhvh yobad leb hamelekh veleb hasarim venashamu hakohanim vehanebi'im yitmahu. jeremiah 4:10	va'omar 'ahah 'adonai yhvh 'akhen hashei hisheita la'am hazeh velirushalim leimor shalom yihyeh lakhem venage'ah khereb 'ad hanafesh. jeremiah 4:11	ba'et hahi yei'amer la'am hazeh velirushalim ruakh zakh shefayim bamidbar derekh bat 'ami lo lizrot velo lehabar. jeremiah 4:12	ruakh malei mei'eleh yabo li 'atah gam 'ani 'adaber mishpatim 'otam. jeremiah 4:13	hineh ka'ananim ya'aleh vekhasufah markebotav qalu minesharim susav 'o lanu ki shudadenu. jeremiah 4:14	kabesi meira'ah libekh yerushalim lema'an tivashei'i 'ad matai talin beqirbekh makhshebot 'onekh. jeremiah 4:15	ki qol magid midan umashmia' 'aven meihar 'efrayim. jeremiah 4:16	hazkiru lagoyim hineh hashmi'u 'al yerushalim nozerim ba'im mei'erez hamerkhaq vayitenu 'al 'arei yehudah qolam. jeremiah 4:17	keshomerei sadai hayu 'aleha misabib ki 'oti maratah ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 4:18	darkekh uma'alalayikh 'aso 'eleh lakh zot ra'atekh ki mar ki naga' 'ad libekh. jeremiah 4:19	mei'ai mei'ai 'akhulah 'okhilah qirot libi homeh li libi lo 'akharish ki qol shofar shama'ti shama'at nafshi teru'at milkhamah. jeremiah 4:20	sheber 'al sheber niqra ki shudedah kal ha'arez pit'om shudedu 'ohalai rega' yeri'otai. jeremiah 4:21	'ad matai 'er'eh nes 'eshme'ah qol shofar. jeremiah 4:22	ki 'evil 'ami 'oti lo yada'u banim sekhalim hemah velo nebonim hemah khakhamim hemah lehara' uleheitib lo yada'u. jeremiah 4:23	ra'iti 'et ha'arez vehineh tohu vabohu ve'el hashamayim ve'en 'oram. jeremiah 4:24	ra'iti heharim vehineh ro'ashim vekhal hageba'ot hitqalqalu. jeremiah 4:25	ra'iti vehineh 'en ha'adam vekhal 'of hashamayim nadadu. jeremiah 4:26	ra'iti vehineh hakarmel hamidbar vekhal 'arav nitezu mipenei yhvh mipenei kharon 'apo. jeremiah 4:27	ki khoh 'amar yhvh shemamah tihyeh kal ha'arez vekhalah lo 'e'eseh. jeremiah 4:28	'al zot te'ebal ha'arez veqaderu hashamayim mima'al 'al ki dibarti zamoti velo nikhamti velo 'ashub mimenah. jeremiah 4:29	miqol parash veromeh qeshet borakhat kal ha'ir ba'u be'abim ubakeifim 'alu kal ha'ir 'azubah ve'en yosheb bahen 'ish. jeremiah 4:30	ve'ati ve'at shadud mah ta'asi ki tilbeshi shani ki ta'di 'adi zahab ki tiqre'i bapukh 'einayikh lashav tityapi ma'asu bakh 'ogebim nafshekh yebaqeishu. jeremiah 4:31	ki qol kekholah shama'ti zarah kemabkirah qol bat ziyon tityapeiakh tefares kapeha 'o na li ki 'ayefah nafshi lehoregim. jeremiah 5:1	shotu bekhuzot yerushalim ure'u na ude'u ubaqshu birkhoboteha 'im timze'u 'ish 'im yesh 'oseh mishpat mebaqesh 'emunah ve'eslakh lah. jeremiah 5:2	ve'im khai yhvh yomeiru lakhen lasheqer yishabei'u. jeremiah 5:3	yhvh 'einekha halo le'emunah hikitah 'otam velo khalu kilitam mei'anu qakhat musar khizequ feneihem misela' mei'anu lashub. jeremiah 5:4	va'ani 'amarti 'akh dalim hem no'alu ki lo yade'u derekh yhvh mishpat 'eloheihem. jeremiah 5:5	'eilakhah li 'el hagedolim va'adaberah 'otam ki hemah yade'u derekh yhvh mishpat 'eloheihem 'akh hemah yakhdav shaberu 'ol nitequ moseirot. jeremiah 5:6	'al ken hikam 'aryeh miya'ar ze'eb 'arabot yeshadedem namer shoqed 'al 'areihem kal hayozei meihenah yitaref ki rabu pish'eihem 'azemu meshuboteihem meshuboteihem jeremiah 5:7	'ei lazot 'esloakh 'eslakh lakh banayikh 'azabuni vayishabe'u belo 'elohim va'asbia' 'otam vayin'afu ubet zonah yitgodadu. jeremiah 5:8	susim meyuzanim mashkim hayu 'ish 'el 'eishet rei'eihu yizhalu. jeremiah 5:9	ha'al 'eleh lo 'efqod ne'um yhvh ve'im bego 'asher kazeh lo titnaqem nafshi. jeremiah 5:10	'alu besharoteha veshakheitu vekhalah 'al ta'asu hasiru netishoteha ki lo yhvh hemah. jeremiah 5:11	ki bagod bagedu bi bet yisra'el ubet yehudah ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 5:12	kikhashu yhvh vayomeru lo hu velo tabo 'aleinu ra'ah vekhereb vera'ab lo nir'eh. jeremiah 5:13	vehanebi'im yihyu leruakh vehadiber 'en bahem koh yei'aseh lahem. jeremiah 5:14	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei zeba'ot ya'an daberkhem 'et hadabar hazeh hini noten debarai befikha le'esh veha'am hazeh 'eizim va'akhalatam. jeremiah 5:15	hini meibi 'aleikhem go mimerkhaq bet yisra'el ne'um yhvh go 'eitan hu go mei'olam hu go lo teida' leshono velo tishma' mah yedaber. jeremiah 5:16	'ashpato keqeber patuakh kulam giborim. jeremiah 5:17	ve'akhal qezirekha velakhmekha yokhelu banekha ubenotekha yokhal zonekha ubeqarekha yokhal gafnekha ute'einatekha yeroshesh 'arei mibzarekha 'asher 'atah boteiakh bahenah bekhareb. jeremiah 5:18	vegam bayamim hahemah ne'um yhvh lo 'e'eseh 'itekhem kalah. jeremiah 5:19	vehayah ki tomeru takhat meh 'asah yhvh 'eloheinu lanu 'et kal 'eleh ve'amarta 'aleihem ka'asher 'azabtem 'oti vata'abdu 'elohei neikhar be'arzekhem ken ta'abdu zarim be'erez lo lakhem. jeremiah 5:20	hagidu zot bebet ya'aqob vehashmi'uha bihudah leimor. jeremiah 5:21	shim'u na zot 'am sakhal ve'en leb 'einayim lahem velo yir'u 'azenayim lahem velo yishma'u. jeremiah 5:22	ha'oti lo tira'u ne'um yhvh 'im mipanai lo takhilu 'asher samti khol gebul layam khaq 'olam velo ya'abrenhu vayitga'ashu velo yukhalu vehamu galav velo ya'abrunhu. jeremiah 5:23	vela'am hazeh hayah leb sorer umoreh saru vayeileikhu. jeremiah 5:24	velo 'ameru bilbabam nira na 'et yhvh 'eloheinu hanoten geshem veyoreh yoreh umalqosh be'ito shebu'ot khuqot qazir yishmar lanu. jeremiah 5:25	'avonoteikhem hitu 'eleh vekhatoteikhem mane'u hatob mikem. jeremiah 5:26	ki nimze'u be'ami resha'im yashur keshakh yequshim hizibu mashkhit 'anashim yilkodu. jeremiah 5:27	kikhlub malei 'of ken bateihem melei'im mirmah 'al ken gadelu vaya'ashiru. jeremiah 5:28	shamenu 'ashetu gam 'aberu dibrei ra' din lo danu din yatom veyazlikhu umishpat 'ebyonim lo shafatu. jeremiah 5:29	ha'al 'eleh lo 'efqod ne'um yhvh 'im bego 'asher kazeh lo titnaqem nafshi. jeremiah 5:30	shamah vesha'arurah nihyetah ba'arez. jeremiah 5:31	hanebi'im nibe'u basheqer vehakohanim yirdu 'al yedeihem ve'ami 'ahabu khen umah ta'asu le'akharitah. jeremiah 6:1	ha'izu benei binyamin miqereb yerushalim ubitqoa' tiq'u shofar ve'al bet hakerem se'u mas'et ki ra'ah nishqefah mizafon vesheber gadol. jeremiah 6:2	hanavah vehame'unagah damiti bat ziyon. jeremiah 6:3	'eileha yabo'u ro'im ve'edreihem taqe'u 'aleha 'ohalim sabib ra'u 'ish 'et yado. jeremiah 6:4	qadeshu 'aleha milkhamah qumu vena'aleh bazahorayim 'o lanu ki fanah hayom ki yinatu zilei 'areb. jeremiah 6:5	qumu vena'aleh balayelah venashkhitah 'armenoteha. jeremiah 6:6	ki khoh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot kirtu 'eizah veshifkhu 'al yerushalim solelah hi ha'ir hafeqad kulah 'osheq beqirbah. jeremiah 6:7	kehaqir bever bayir meimeha ken heiqeirah ra'atah khamas vashod yishama' bah 'al panai tamid kholi umakah. jeremiah 6:8	hivaseri yerushalim pen teiqa' nafshi mimekh pen 'asimekh shemamah 'erez lo noshabah. jeremiah 6:9	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'olel ye'olu khagefen she'eirit yisra'el hasheb yadekha kebozer 'al salsilot. jeremiah 6:10	'al mi 'adaberah ve'a'idah veyishma'u hineh 'areilah 'azenam velo yukhelu lehaqshib hineh debar yhvh hayah lahem lekherpah lo yakhpezu bo. jeremiah 6:11	ve'et khamat yhvh maleiti nil'eiti hakhil shefokh 'al 'olal bakhuz ve'al sod bakhurim yakhdav ki gam 'ish 'im 'ishah yilakheidu zaqen 'im melei yamim. jeremiah 6:12	venasabu bateihem la'akheirim sadot venashim yakhdav ki 'ateh 'et yadi 'al yoshebei ha'arez ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 6:13	ki miqetanam ve'ad gedolam kulo bozeia' baza' uminabi ve'ad kohen kulo 'oseh shaqer. jeremiah 6:14	vayrape'u 'et sheber 'ami 'al neqalah leimor shalom shalom ve'en shalom. jeremiah 6:15	hobishu ki to'eibah 'asu gam bosh lo yeiboshu gam hakhlim lo yada'u lakhen yipelu banofelim be'et peqadtim yikashelu 'amar yhvh. jeremiah 6:16	koh 'amar yhvh 'imdu 'al derakhim ure'u vesha'alu lintibot 'olam 'ei zeh derekh hatob ulekhu bah umiz'u margoa' lenafshekhem vayomeru lo neilekh. jeremiah 6:17	vahaqimoti 'aleikhem zofim haqshibu leqol shofar vayomeru lo naqshib. jeremiah 6:18	lakhen shim'u hagoyim ude'i 'eidah 'et 'asher bam. jeremiah 6:19	shim'i ha'arez hineh 'anokhi meibi ra'ah 'el ha'am hazeh peri makhshebotam ki 'al debarai lo hiqshibu vetorati vayim'asu bah. jeremiah 6:20	lamah zeh li lebonah misheba tabo veqaneh hatob mei'erez merkhaq 'oloteikhem lo lerazon vezibkheikhem lo 'arebu li. jeremiah 6:21	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh hini noten 'el ha'am hazeh mikhsholim vekhashelu bam 'abot ubanim yakhdav shakhen verei'o yobeidu ve'abadu. jeremiah 6:22	koh 'amar yhvh hineh 'am ba mei'erez zafon vego gadol yei'or miyarketei 'arez. jeremiah 6:23	qeshet vekhidon yakhaziqu 'akhzari hu velo yerakheimu qolam kayam yehemeh ve'al susim yirkabu 'arukh ke'ish lamilkhamah 'alayikh bat ziyon. jeremiah 6:24	shama'nu 'et shame'o rafu yadeinu zarah hekheziqatnu khil kayoleidah. jeremiah 6:25	'al teize'i teize'u hasadeh ubaderekh 'al teileikhi teileikhu ki khereb le'oyeb magor misabib. jeremiah 6:26	bat 'ami khigri saq vehitpaleshi ba'eifer 'eibel yakhid 'asi lakh mispad tamrurim ki fit'om yabo hashoded 'aleinu. jeremiah 6:27	bakhon netatikha be'ami mibzar veteida' ubakhanta 'et darkam. jeremiah 6:28	kulam sarei sorrim holekhei rakhil nekhoshet ubarzel kulam mashkhitim hemah. jeremiah 6:29	nakhar mapuakh mei'ishtam mei'esh tam 'ofaret lashav zaraf zarof vera'im lo nitaqu. jeremiah 6:30	kesef nim'as qare'u lahem ki ma'as yhvh bahem. jeremiah 7:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh leimor. jeremiah 7:2	'amod besha'ar bet yhvh veqarata sham 'et hadabar hazeh ve'amarta shim'u debar yhvh kal yehudah haba'im bashe'arim ha'eleh lehishtakhavot yhvh. jeremiah 7:3	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el heitibu darkheikhem uma'aleikhem va'ashakenah 'etkhem bamaqom hazeh. jeremiah 7:4	'al tibtekhu lakhem 'el dibrei hasheqer leimor heikhal yhvh heikhal yhvh heikhal yhvh hemah. jeremiah 7:5	ki 'im heiteb teitibu 'et darkheikhem ve'et ma'aleikhem 'im 'aso ta'asu mishpat ben 'ish uben rei'eihu. jeremiah 7:6	ger yatom ve'almanah lo ta'ashoqu vedam naqi 'al tishpekhu bamaqom hazeh ve'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim lo teilekhu lera' lakhem. jeremiah 7:7	veshikanti 'etkhem bamaqom hazeh ba'arez 'asher natati la'aboteikhem lemin 'olam ve'ad 'olam. jeremiah 7:8	hineh 'atem botekhim lakhem 'al dibrei hashaqer lebilti ho'il. jeremiah 7:9	haganob razoakh vena'of vehishabeia' lasheqer veqater laba'al vehalokh 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'tem. jeremiah 7:10	ubatem va'amadtem lefanai babayit hazeh 'asher niqra shemi 'alav va'amartem nizalnu lema'an 'asot 'et kal hato'eibot ha'eleh. jeremiah 7:11	ham'arat parizim hayah habayit hazeh 'asher niqra shemi 'alav be'eineikhem gam 'anokhi hineh ra'iti ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 7:12	ki lekhu na 'el meqomi 'asher beshilo 'asher shikanti shemi sham barishonah ure'u 'et 'asher 'asiti lo mipenei ra'at 'ami yisra'el. jeremiah 7:13	ve'atah ya'an 'asotkhem 'et kal hama'asim ha'eleh ne'um yhvh va'adaber 'aleikhem hashkem vedaber velo shema'tem va'eqra 'etkhem velo 'anitem. jeremiah 7:14	ve'asiti labayit 'asher niqra shemi 'alav 'asher 'atem botekhim bo velamaqom 'asher natati lakhem vela'aboteikhem ka'asher 'asiti leshilo. jeremiah 7:15	vehishlakhti 'etkhem mei'al panai ka'asher hishlakhti 'et kal 'akheikhem 'et kal zera' 'efrayim. jeremiah 7:16	ve'atah 'al titpalel be'ad ha'am hazeh ve'al tisa ba'adam rinah utefilah ve'al tifga' bi ki 'eineni shomeia' 'otakh. jeremiah 7:17	ha'einekha ro'eh mah hemah 'osim be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim. jeremiah 7:18	habanim melaqetim 'eizim veha'abot meba'arim 'et ha'esh vehanashim lashot bazeq la'asot kavanim limlekhet hashamayim vehasekh nesakhim leilohim 'akheirim lema'an
