hakh'iseini. jeremiah 7:19	ha'oti hem makh'isim ne'um yhvh halo 'otam lema'an boshet peneihem. jeremiah 7:20	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hineh 'api vakhamati nitekhet 'el hamaqom hazeh 'al ha'adam ve'al habeheimah ve'al 'ez hasadeh ve'al peri ha'adamah uba'arah velo tikhbeh. jeremiah 7:21	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'oloteikhem sefu 'al zibkheikhem ve'ikhlu basar. jeremiah 7:22	ki lo dibarti 'et 'aboteikhem velo zivitim beyom hozi hozi'i 'otam mei'erez mizrayim 'al dibrei 'olah vazabakh. jeremiah 7:23	ki 'im 'et hadabar hazeh ziviti 'otam leimor shim'u beqoli vehayiti lakhem leilohim ve'atem tihyu li le'am vahalakhtem bekhal haderekh 'asher 'azaveh 'etkhem lema'an yitab lakhem. jeremiah 7:24	velo shame'u velo hitu 'et 'azenam vayeilekhu bemo'eizot bishrirut libam hara' vayihyu le'akhor velo lefanim. jeremiah 7:25	lemin hayom 'asher yaze'u 'aboteikhem mei'erez mizrayim 'ad hayom hazeh va'eshlakh 'aleikhem 'et kal 'abadai hanebi'im yom hashkem veshaloakh. jeremiah 7:26	velo shame'u 'eilai velo hitu 'et 'azenam vayaqshu 'et 'arepam heirei'u mei'abotam. jeremiah 7:27	vedibarta 'aleihem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh velo yishme'u 'eilekha veqarata 'aleihem velo ya'anukhah. jeremiah 7:28	ve'amarta 'aleihem zeh hago 'asher lo shame'u beqol yhvh 'elohav velo laqekhu musar 'abedah ha'emunah venikhretah mipihem. jeremiah 7:29	gazi nizrekh vehashlikhi use'i 'al shefayim qinah ki ma'as yhvh vayitosh 'et dor 'ebrato. jeremiah 7:30	ki 'asu benei yehudah hara' be'einai ne'uvm yhvh samu shiquzeihem babayit 'asher niqra shemi 'alav letame'o. jeremiah 7:31	ubanu bamot hatofet 'asher begei ben hinom lisrof 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem ba'esh 'asher lo ziviti velo 'aletah 'al libi. jeremiah 7:32	lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh velo yei'amer 'od hatofet vegei ben hinom ki 'im gei hahareigah veqaberu betofet mei'en maqom. jeremiah 7:33	vehayetah niblat ha'am hazeh lema'akhal le'of hashamayim ulebehemat ha'arez ve'en makharid. jeremiah 7:34	vehishbati mei'arei yehudah umeikhuzot yerushalim qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah ki lekharebah tihyeh ha'arez. jeremiah 8:1	ba'et hahi ne'um yhvh veyozi'u yozi'u 'et 'azmot malkhei yehudah ve'et 'azmot sarav ve'et 'azmot hakohanim ve'et 'azmot hanebi'im ve'et 'azmot yoshebei yerushalim miqibreihem. jeremiah 8:2	ushetakhum lashemesh velayareiakh ulekhol zeba hashamayim 'asher 'aheibum va'asher 'abadum va'asher halekhu 'akhareihem va'asher derashum va'asher hishtakhavu lahem lo yei'asefu velo yiqabeiru ledomen 'al penei ha'adamah yihyu. jeremiah 8:3	venibkhar mavet meikhayim lekhol hashe'eirit hanish'arim min hamishpakhah hara'ah hazot bekhal hameqomot hanish'arim 'asher hidakhtim sham ne'um yhvh zeba'ot. jeremiah 8:4	ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh hayipelu velo yaqumu 'im yashub velo yashub. jeremiah 8:5	madua' shobbah ha'am hazeh yerushalim meshubah nizakhat hekheziqu batarmit mei'anu lashub. jeremiah 8:6	hiqshabti va'eshma' lo khen yedabeiru 'en 'ish nikham 'al ra'ato leimor meh 'asiti kuloh b bimruzotam bimruzatam kesus shotef bamilkhamah. jeremiah 8:7	gam khasidah bashamayim yade'ah mo'adeha vetor vesus vesis ve'agur shameru 'et 'et bo'anah ve'ami lo yade'u 'et mishpat yhvh. jeremiah 8:8	'eikhah tomeru khakhamim 'anakhnu vetorat yhvh 'itanu 'akhen hineh lasheqer 'asah 'et sheqer soferim. jeremiah 8:9	hobishu khakhamim khatu vayilakheidu hineh bidbar yhvh ma'asu vekhakhemat meh lahem. jeremiah 8:10	lakhen 'eten 'et nesheihem la'akheirim sedoteihem leyorshim ki miqaton ve'ad gadol kuloh bozeia' baza' minabi ve'ad kohen kuloh 'oseh shaqer. jeremiah 8:11	vayrapu 'et sheber bat 'ami 'al neqalah leimor shalom shalom ve'en shalom. jeremiah 8:12	hobishu ki to'eibah 'asu gam bosh lo yeiboshu vehikalem lo yada'u lakhen yipelu banofelim be'et pequdatam yikashelu 'amar yhvh. jeremiah 8:13	'asof 'asifem ne'um yhvh 'en 'anabim bagefen ve'en te'einim bate'einah vehe'aleh nabel va'eten lahem ya'abrum. jeremiah 8:14	'al mah 'anakhnu yoshebim hei'asefu venabo 'el 'arei hamibzar venidemah sham ki yhvh 'eloheinu hadimanu vayashqeinu mei rosh ki khatanu yhvh. jeremiah 8:15	qaveh leshalom ve'en tob le'et marpeh vehineh be'atah. jeremiah 8:16	midan nishma' nakhrat susav miqol mizhalot 'abirav ra'ashah kal ha'arez vayabo'u vayokhelu 'erez umelo'ah 'ir veyoshebei bah. jeremiah 8:17	ki hini meshaleiakh bakhem nekhashim zif'onim 'asher 'en lahem lakhash venishekhu 'etkhem ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 8:18	mabligiti 'alei yagon 'alai libi davai. jeremiah 8:19	hineh qol shav'at bat 'ami mei'erez markhaqim yhvh 'en beziyon 'im malkah 'en bah madua' hikh'isuni bifsileihem behablei neikhar. jeremiah 8:20	'abar qazir kalah qayiz va'anakhnu lo nosha'enu. jeremiah 8:21	'al sheber bat 'ami hashebareti qadarti shamah hekheziqateni. jeremiah 8:22	hazori 'en begil'ad 'im rofei 'en sham ki madua' lo 'aletah 'arukhat bat 'ami. jeremiah 9:1	mi yiten roshi mayim ve'eini meqor dim'ah ve'ebkeh yomam valaylah 'et khalei bat 'ami. jeremiah 9:2	mi yiteneini bamidbar melon 'orekhim ve'e'ezbah 'et 'ami ve'eilekhah mei'itam ki khulam mena'afim 'azeret bogedim. jeremiah 9:3	vayadrekhu 'et leshonam qashtam sheqer velo le'emunah gaberu ba'arez ki meira'ah 'el ra'ah yaza'u ve'oti lo yada'u ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 9:4	'ish meirei'eihu hishameiru ve'al kal 'akh 'al tibtakhu ki khal 'akh 'aqob ya'qob vekhal reia' rakhil yahalokh. jeremiah 9:5	ve'ish berei'eihu yehatelu ve'emet lo yedabeiru limedu leshonam daber sheqer ha'aveh nil'u. jeremiah 9:6	shibtekha betokh mirmah bemirmah mei'anu da'at 'oti ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 9:7	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot hini zorfam ubekhantim ki 'ekh 'e'eseh mipenei bat 'ami. jeremiah 9:8	khez shokhet shakhut leshonam mirmah diber befiv shalom 'et rei'eihu yedaber ubeqirbo yasim 'arebo. jeremiah 9:9	ha'al 'eleh lo 'efqad bam ne'um yhvh 'im bego 'asher kazeh lo titnaqem nafshi. jeremiah 9:10	'al heharim 'esa bekhi vanehi ve'al ne'ot midbar qinah ki nizetu mibeli 'ish 'ober velo shame'u qol miqneh mei'of hashamayim ve'ad beheimah nadedu halakhu. jeremiah 9:11	venatati 'et yerushalim legalim me'on tanim ve'et 'arei yehudah 'eten shemamah mibeli yosheb. jeremiah 9:12	mi ha'ish hekhakham veyaben 'et zot va'asher diber pi yhvh 'eilav veyagidah 'al mah 'abedah ha'arez nizetah khamidbar mibeli 'ober. jeremiah 9:13	vayomer yhvh 'al 'azebam 'et torati 'asher natati lifneihem velo shame'u beqoli velo halekhu bah. jeremiah 9:14	vayeilekhu 'akharei sherirut libam ve'akharei habe'alim 'asher limedum 'abotam. jeremiah 9:15	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini ma'akhilam 'et ha'am hazeh la'anah vehishqitim mei rosh. jeremiah 9:16	vahafizotim bagoyim 'asher lo yade'u hemah va'abotam veshilakhti 'akhareihem 'et hakhereb 'ad kaloti 'otam. jeremiah 9:17	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot hitbonu veqir'u lamqonot utebo'enah ve'el hakhakhamot shilkhu vetabonah. jeremiah 9:18	utemaheirenah vetisenah 'aleinu nehi veteiradnah 'eineinu dim'ah ve'af'apeinu yizelu mayim. jeremiah 9:19	ki qol nehi nishma' miziyon 'ekh shudadenu boshenu me'od ki 'azabnu 'arez ki hishlikhu mishkenoteinu. jeremiah 9:20	ki shema'nah nashim debar yhvh vetiqakh 'azenekhem debar piv velameidenah benoteikhem nehi ve'ishah re'utah qinah. jeremiah 9:21	ki 'alah mavet bekhaloneinu ba be'armenoteinu lehakhrit 'olal mikhuz bakhurim meirekhobot. jeremiah 9:22	daber koh ne'um yhvh venafelah niblat ha'adam kedomen 'al penei hasadeh ukhe'amir mei'akharei haqozer ve'en me'asef. jeremiah 9:23	koh 'amar yhvh 'al yithalel khakham bekhakhemato ve'al yithalel hagibor bigburato 'al yithalel 'ashir be'ashero. jeremiah 9:24	ki 'im bezot yithalel hamithalel haskel veyadoa' 'oti ki 'ani yhvh 'oseh khesed mishpat uzedaqah ba'arez ki be'eleh khafazti ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 9:25	hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh ufaqadti 'al kal mul be'arelah. jeremiah 9:26	'al mizrayim ve'al yehudah ve'al 'edom ve'al benei 'amon ve'al mo'ab ve'al kal qezuzei fei'ah hayoshebim bamidbar ki khal hagoyim 'areilim vekhal bet yisra'el 'arlei leb. jeremiah 10:1	shim'u 'et hadabar 'asher diber yhvh 'aleikhem bet yisra'el. jeremiah 10:2	koh 'amar yhvh 'el derekh hagoyim 'al tilmadu umei'otot hashamayim 'al teikhatu ki yeikhatu hagoyim meihemah. jeremiah 10:3	ki khuqot ha'amim hebel hu ki 'ez miya'ar kerato ma'aseh yedei kharash bama'azad. jeremiah 10:4	bekhesef ubezahab yeyapeihu bemasmerot ubemaqabot yekhazequm velo yafiq. jeremiah 10:5	ketomer miqshah hemah velo yedabeiru naso yinasu ki lo yiz'adu 'al tire'u meihem ki lo yarei'u vegam heiteb 'en 'otam. jeremiah 10:6	mei'en kamokha yhvh gadol 'atah vegadol shimkha bigburah. jeremiah 10:7	mi lo yira'akha melekh hagoyim ki lekha ya'atah ki bekhal khakhmei hagoyim ubekhal malkhutam mei'en kamokha. jeremiah 10:8	ube'akhat yib'aru veyikhsalu musar habalim 'ez hu. jeremiah 10:9	kesef meruqa' mitarshish yuba vezahab mei'ufaz ma'aseh kharash videi zoref tekheilet ve'argaman lebusham ma'aseh khakhamim kulam. jeremiah 10:10	yhvh 'elohim 'emet hu 'elohim khayim umelekh 'olam miqizpo tir'ash ha'arez velo yakhilu goyim za'mo. jeremiah 10:11	kidnah teimerun lehom 'elahaya di shemaya ve'arqa la 'abadu yeibadu mei'ar'a umin tekhot shemaya 'eleh. jeremiah 10:12	'oseh 'erez bekhokho meikhin teibel bekhakhemato ubitbunato natah shamayim. jeremiah 10:13	leqol tito hamon mayim bashamayim vaya'aleh nesi'im miqzeh 'erez ha'arez beraqim lamatar 'asah vayozei ruakh mei'ozerotav. jeremiah 10:14	nib'ar kal 'adam mida'at hobish kal zoref mipasel ki sheqer nisko velo ruakh bam. jeremiah 10:15	hebel hemah ma'aseh ta'tu'im be'et pequdatam yobeidu. jeremiah 10:16	lo khe'eleh kheileq ya'aqob ki yozer hakol hu veyisra'el sheibet nakhalato yhvh zeba'ot shemo. jeremiah 10:17	'ispi mei'erez kin'atekh yoshabti yoshebet bamazor. jeremiah 10:18	ki khoh 'amar yhvh hini qoleia' 'et yoshebei ha'arez bapa'am hazot vahazeiroti lahem lema'an yimza'u. jeremiah 10:19	'o li 'al shibri nakhlah makati va'ani 'amarti 'akh zeh kholi ve'esa'enu. jeremiah 10:20	'aholi shudad vekhal meitarai nitaqu banai yeza'uni ve'einam 'en noteh 'od 'aholi umeiqim yeri'otai. jeremiah 10:21	ki nib'aru haro'im ve'et yhvh lo darashu 'al ken lo hiskilu vekhal mar'itam nafozah. jeremiah 10:22	qol shemu'ah hineh ba'ah vera'ash gadol mei'erez zafon lasum 'et 'arei yehudah shemamah me'on tanim. jeremiah 10:23	yada'ti yhvh ki lo la'adam darko lo le'ish holekh vehakhin 'et za'ado. jeremiah 10:24	yasereini yhvh 'akh bemishpat 'al be'apekha pen tam'iteini. jeremiah 10:25	shefokh khamatekha 'al hagoyim 'asher lo yeda'ukha ve'al mishpakhot 'asher beshimkha lo qara'u ki 'akhelu 'et ya'aqob va'akhaluhu vaykhaluhu ve'et naveihu heishamu. jeremiah 11:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh leimor. jeremiah 11:2	shim'u 'et dibrei haberit hazot vedibartam 'el 'ish yehudah ve'al yoshebei yerushalim. jeremiah 11:3	ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'arur ha'ish 'asher lo yishma' 'et dibrei haberit hazot. jeremiah 11:4	'asher ziviti 'et 'aboteikhem beyom hozi'i 'otam mei'erez mizrayim mikur habarzel leimor shim'u beqoli va'asitem 'otam kekhol 'asher 'azaveh 'etkhem vihyitem li le'am ve'anokhi 'ehyeh lakhem leilohim. jeremiah 11:5	lema'an haqim 'et hashebu'ah 'asher nishba'ti la'aboteikhem latet lahem 'erez zabat khalab udebash kayom hazeh va'a'an va'omar 'amen yhvh. jeremiah 11:6	vayomer yhvh 'eilai qera 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim leimor shim'u 'et dibrei haberit hazot va'asitem 'otam. jeremiah 11:7	ki ha'ed ha'idoti ba'aboteikhem beyom ha'aloti 'otam mei'erez mizrayim ve'ad hayom hazeh hashkem veha'ed leimor shim'u beqoli. jeremiah 11:8	velo shame'u velo hitu 'et 'azenam vayeilekhu 'ish bishrirut libam hara' va'abi 'aleihem 'et kal dibrei haberit hazot 'asher ziviti la'asot velo 'asu. jeremiah 11:9	vayomer yhvh 'eilai nimza qesher be'ish yehudah ubeyoshebei yerushalim. jeremiah 11:10	shabu 'al 'avonot 'abotam harishonim 'asher mei'anu lishmoa' 'et debarai vehemah halekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam heifeiru bet yisra'el ubet yehudah 'et beriti 'asher karati 'et 'abotam. jeremiah 11:11	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh hini meibi 'aleihem ra'ah 'asher lo yukhelu lazet mimenah veza'aqu 'eilai velo 'eshma' 'aleihem. jeremiah 11:12	vehalekhu 'arei yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim veza'aqu 'el ha'elohim 'asher hem meqaterim lahem vehosheia' lo yoshi'u lahem be'et ra'atam. jeremiah 11:13	ki mispar 'arekha hayu 'elohekha yehudah umispar khuzot yerushalim samtem mizbekhot laboshet mizbekhot leqater laba'al. jeremiah 11:14	ve'atah 'al titpalel be'ad ha'am hazeh ve'al tisa ba'adam rinah utefilah ki 'eineni shomeia' be'et qare'am 'eilai be'ad ra'atam. jeremiah 11:15	meh lididi bebeiti 'asotah hamzimatah harabim ubesar qodesh ya'abru mei'alayikh ki ra'ateikhi 'az ta'alozi. jeremiah 11:16	zayit ra'anan yefeh feri to'ar qara yhvh shemekh leqol hamulah gedolah hizit 'esh 'aleha vera'u daliyotav. jeremiah 11:17	yhvh zeba'ot hanoteia' 'otakh diber 'alayikh ra'ah biglal ra'at bet yisra'el ubet yehudah 'asher 'asu lahem lehakh'iseini leqater laba'al. jeremiah 11:18	yhvh hodi'ani va'eida'ah 'az hir'itani ma'aleihem. jeremiah 11:19	va'ani kekhebes 'aluf yubal litboakh velo yada'ti ki 'alai khashebu makhashabot nashkhitah 'ez belakhmo venikhretenu mei'erez khayim ushemo lo yizakher 'od. jeremiah 11:20	yhvh zeba'ot shofet zedeq bokhen kelayot valeb 'er'eh niqmatekha meihem ki 'eilekha giliti 'et ribi. jeremiah 11:21	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'al 'anshei 'anatot hambaqshim 'et nafshekha leimor lo tinabei beshem yhvh velo tamut beyadeinu. jeremiah 11:22	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot hini foqed 'aleihem habakhurim yamutu bakhereb beneihem ubenoteihem yamutu bara'ab. jeremiah 11:23	ushe'eirit lo tihyeh lahem ki 'abi ra'ah 'el 'anshei 'anatot shenat pequdatam. jeremiah 12:1	zadiq 'atah yhvh ki 'arib 'eilekha 'akh mishpatim 'adaber 'otakh madua' derekh resha'im zaleikhah shalu kal bogedei baged. jeremiah 12:2	neta'tam gam shorashu yeilekhu gam 'asu feri qarob 'atah befihem verakhoq mikilyoteihem. jeremiah 12:3	ve'atah yhvh yeda'tani tir'eini ubakhanta libi 'itakh hatiqem kezon letibkhah vehaqdishem leyom hareigah. jeremiah 12:4	'ad matai te'ebal ha'arez ve'eiseb kal hasadeh yibash meira'at yoshebei bah safetah beheimot va'of ki 'ameru lo yir'eh 'et 'akhariteinu. jeremiah 12:5	ki 'et raglim raztah vayal'ukha ve'ekh tetakhareh 'et hasusim ube'erez shalom 'atah boteiakh ve'ekh ta'aseh big'on hayarden. jeremiah 12:6	ki gam 'akhekha ubet 'abikha gam hemah bagedu bakh gam hemah qare'u 'akharekha malei 'al ta'amen bam ki yedaberu 'eilekha tobot. jeremiah 12:7	'azabti 'et beiti natashti 'et nakhalati natati 'et yedidut nafshi bekhaf 'oyebeha. jeremiah 12:8	hayetah li nakhalati ke'aryeh baya'ar natenah 'alai beqolah 'al ken seneitiha. jeremiah 12:9	ha'ayit zabua' nakhalati li ha'ayit sabib 'aleha lekhu 'isfu kal khayat hasadeh heitayu le'akhlah jeremiah 12:10	ro'im rabim shikhatu kharmi bosesu 'et khelqati natenu 'et khelqat khemdati lemidbar shemamah. jeremiah 12:11	samah lishmamah 'abelah 'alai shemeimah nashamah kal ha'arez ki 'en 'ish sam 'al leb. jeremiah 12:12	'al kal shefayim bamidbar ba'u shodedim ki khereb yhvh 'okhelah miqzeh 'erez ve'ad qezeh ha'arez 'en shalom lekhal basar. jeremiah 12:13	zare'u khitim veqozim qazaru nekhlu lo yo'ilu uboshu mitebu'oteikhem meikharon 'af yhvh. jeremiah 12:14	koh 'amar yhvh 'al kal shekheinai hara'im hanoge'im banakhalah 'asher hinkhalti 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el hini notesham mei'al 'admatam ve'et bet yehudah 'etosh mitokham. jeremiah 12:15	vehayah 'akharei nateshi 'otam 'ashub verikhamtim vahashibotim 'ish lenakhalato ve'ish le'arzo. jeremiah 12:16	vehayah 'im lamod yilmedu 'et darkhei 'ami lehishabeia' bishmi khai yhvh ka'asher limedu 'et 'ami lehishabeia' baba'al venibnu betokh 'ami. jeremiah 12:17	ve'im lo yishma'u venatashti 'et hago hahu natosh ve'abed ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 13:1	koh 'amar yhvh 'eilai halokh veqanita lekha 'eizor pishtim vesamto 'al matenekha ubamayim lo tebi'eihu. jeremiah 13:2	va'eqneh 'et ha'eizor kidbar yhvh va'asim 'al matenai. jeremiah 13:3	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai sheinit leimor. jeremiah 13:4	qakh 'et ha'eizor 'asher qanita 'asher 'al matenekha vequm lekh peratah vetameneihu sham binqiq hasala'. jeremiah 13:5	va'eilekh va'etmeneihu bifrat ka'asher zivah yhvh 'oti. jeremiah 13:6	vayhi miqez yamim rabim vayomer yhvh 'eilai qum lekh peratah veqakh misham 'et ha'eizor 'asher zivitikha letameno sham. jeremiah 13:7	va'eilekh peratah va'ekhpor va'eqakh 'et ha'eizor min hamaqom 'asher temantiv shamah vehineh nishkhat ha'eizor lo yizlakh lakol. jeremiah 13:8	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. jeremiah 13:9	koh 'amar yhvh kakhah 'ashkhit 'et ge'on yehudah ve'et ge'on yerushalim harab. jeremiah 13:10	ha'am hazeh hara' hamei'anim lishmoa' 'et debarai haholekhim bishrirut libam vayeilekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam ulehishtakhavot lahem vihi ka'eizor hazeh 'asher lo yizlakh lakol. jeremiah 13:11	ki ka'asher yidbaq ha'eizor 'el matenei 'ish ken hidbaqti 'eilai 'et kal bet yisra'el ve'et kal bet yehudah ne'um yhvh lihyot li le'am uleshem velithilah uletif'aret velo shamei'u. jeremiah 13:12	ve'amarta 'aleihem 'et hadabar hazeh koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el kal neibel yimalei yayin ve'ameru 'eilekha hayadoa' lo neida' ki khal neibel yimalei yayin. jeremiah 13:13	ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh hini memalei 'et kal yoshebei ha'arez hazot ve'et hamelakhim hayoshebim ledavid 'al kis'o ve'et hakohanim ve'et hanebi'im ve'et kal yoshebei yerushalim shikaron. jeremiah 13:14	venipaztim 'ish 'el 'akhiv veha'abot vehabanim yakhdav ne'um yhvh lo 'ekhmol velo 'akhus velo 'arakhem meihashkhitam. jeremiah 13:15	shim'u veha'azinu 'al tigbahu ki yhvh diber. jeremiah 13:16	tenu yhvh 'eloheikhem kabod beterem yakhshikh ubeterem yitnagefu ragleikhem 'al harei nashef veqivitem le'or vesamah lezalmavet yashit veshit la'arafel. jeremiah 13:17	ve'im lo tishma'uha bemistarim tibkeh nafshi mipenei geivah vedamoa' tidma' veteirad 'eini dim'ah ki nishbah 'eider yhvh. jeremiah 13:18	'emor lamelekh velagebirah hashpilu sheibu ki yarad mar'ashoteikhem 'ateret tif'artekhem. jeremiah 13:19	'arei hanegeb sugeru ve'en poteiakh hagelat yehudah kulah hagelat shelomim. jeremiah 13:20	se'i se'u 'eineikhem ure'i ure'u haba'im mizafon 'ayeh ha'eider nitan lakh zon tif'artekh. jeremiah 13:21	mah tomeri ki yifqod 'alayikh ve'at limadt 'otam 'alayikh 'alufim lerosh halo khabalim yokhezukh kemo 'eishet leidah. jeremiah 13:22	vekhi tomeri bilbabekh madua' qera'uni 'eleh berob 'avonekh niglu shulayikh nekhmesu 'aqeibayikh. jeremiah 13:23	hayahafokh kushi 'oro venamer khabarburotav gam 'atem tukhelu leheitib limudei hareia'. jeremiah 13:24	va'afizem keqash 'ober leruakh midbar. jeremiah 13:25	zeh goralekh menat midayikh mei'iti ne'um yhvh 'asher shakhakhat 'oti vatibtekhi bashaqer. jeremiah 13:26	vegam 'ani khasafti shulayikh 'al panayikh venir'ah qelonekh. jeremiah 13:27	ni'ufayikh umizhalotayikh zimat zenutekh 'al geba'ot basadeh ra'iti shiquzayikh 'o lakh yerushalim lo tithari 'akharei matai 'od. jeremiah 14:1	'asher hayah debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu 'al dibrei habazarot. jeremiah 14:2	'abelah yehudah ushe'areha 'umlelu qaderu la'arez vezivkhat yerushalim 'alatah. jeremiah 14:3	ve'adireihem shalekhu ze'oreihem ze'ireihem lamayim ba'u 'al geibim lo maze'u mayim shabu kheleihem reiqam boshu vehakhelemu vekhafu rosham. jeremiah 14:4	ba'abur ha'adamah khatah ki lo hayah geshem ba'arez boshu 'ikarim khafu rosham. jeremiah 14:5	ki gam 'ayelet basadeh yaledah ve'azob ki lo hayah deshe. jeremiah 14:6	ufera'im 'amedu 'al shefayim sha'afu ruakh katanim kalu 'eineihem ki 'en 'eiseb. jeremiah 14:7	'im 'avoneinu 'anu banu yhvh 'aseh lema'an shemekha ki rabu meshuboteinu lekha khatanu. jeremiah 14:8	miqveh yisra'el moshi'o be'et zarah lamah tihyeh keger ba'arez ukhe'oreiakh natah lalun. jeremiah 14:9	lamah tihyeh ke'ish nidham kegibor lo yukhal lehoshia' ve'atah beqirbeinu yhvh veshimkha 'aleinu niqra 'al tanikheinu. jeremiah 14:10	koh 'amar yhvh la'am hazeh ken 'ahabu lanua' ragleihem lo khasakhu yhvh lo razam 'atah yizkor 'avonam veyifqod khatotam. jeremiah 14:11	vayomer yhvh 'eilai 'al titpalel be'ad ha'am hazeh letobah. jeremiah 14:12	ki yazumu 'eineni shomeia' 'el rinatam vekhi ya'alu 'olah uminkhah 'eineni rozam ki bakhereb ubara'ab ubadeber 'anokhi mekhaleh 'otam. jeremiah 14:13	va'omar 'ahah 'adonai yhvh hineh hanebi'im 'omerim lahem lo tir'u khereb vera'ab lo yihyeh lakhem ki shelom 'emet 'eten lakhem bamaqom hazeh. jeremiah 14:14	vayomer yhvh 'eilai qer hanebi'im nibe'im bishmi lo shelakhtim velo zivitim velo dibarti 'aleihem khazon sheqer veqesem ve'elul ve'elil vetarmut vetarmit libam hemah mitnabe'im lakhem. jeremiah 14:15	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'al hanebi'im hanibe'im bishmi va'ani lo shelakhtim vehemah 'omerim khereb vera'ab lo yihyeh ba'arez hazot bakhereb ubara'ab yitamu hanebi'im hahemah. jeremiah 14:16	veha'am 'asher hemah nibe'im lahem yihyu mushlakhim bekhuzot yerushalim mipenei hara'ab vehakhereb ve'en meqaber lahemah hemah nesheihem ubeneihem ubenoteihem veshafakhti 'aleihem 'et ra'atam. jeremiah 14:17	ve'amarta 'aleihem 'et hadabar hazeh teiradnah 'einai dim'ah laylah veyomam ve'al tidmenah ki sheber gadol nishberah betulat bat 'ami makah nakhlah me'od. jeremiah 14:18	'im yazati hasadeh vehineh khalei khereb ve'im bati ha'ir vehineh takhalu'ei ra'ab ki gam nabi gam kohen sakharu 'el 'erez velo yada'u. jeremiah 14:19	hama'os ma'asta 'et yehudah 'im beziyon ga'alah nafshekha madua' hikitanu ve'en lanu marpei qaveh leshalom ve'en tob ule'et marpei vehineh be'atah. jeremiah 14:20	yada'nu yhvh rish'einu 'avon 'aboteinu ki khatanu lakh. jeremiah 14:21	'al tin'az lema'an shimkha 'al tenabel kisei khebodekha zekhor 'al tafer beritekha 'itanu. jeremiah 14:22	hayesh behablei hagoyim magshimim ve'im hashamayim yitenu rebibim halo 'atah hu yhvh 'eloheinu uneqaveh lakh ki 'atah 'asita 'et kal 'eleh. jeremiah 15:1	vayomer yhvh 'eilai 'im ya'amod mosheh ushemu'el lefanai 'en nafshi 'el ha'am hazeh shalakh mei'al panai veyeizei'u. jeremiah 15:2	vehayah ki yomeru 'eilekha 'anah neizei ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh 'asher lamavet lamavet va'asher lakhereb lakhereb va'asher lara'ab lara'ab va'asher lashebi lashebi. jeremiah 15:3	ufaqadti 'aleihem 'arba' mishpakhot ne'um yhvh 'et hakhereb laharog ve'et hakelabim liskhob ve'et 'of hashamayim ve'et behemat ha'arez le'ekhol ulehashkhit. jeremiah 15:4	unetatim lizva'ah leza'avah lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez biglal menasheh ben yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah 'al 'asher 'asah birushalim. jeremiah 15:5	ki mi yakhmol 'alayikh yerushalim umi yanud lakh umi yasur lish'ol leshalom lakh. jeremiah 15:6	'at natasht 'oti ne'um yhvh 'akhor teileikhi va'at 'et yadi 'alayikh va'ashkhitekh nil'eiti hinakhem. jeremiah 15:7	va'ezrem bemizreh besha'arei ha'arez shikalti 'ibadti 'et 'ami midarkheihem lo shabu. jeremiah 15:8	'azemu li 'almenotav meikhol yamim heibeiti lahem 'al 'em bakhur shoded bazahorayim hipalti 'aleha pit'om 'ir ubehalot. jeremiah 15:9	'umlelah yoledet hashib'ah nafekhah nafshah ba'ah ba shimshah be'od yomam boshah vekhafeirah ushe'eiritam lakhereb 'eten lifnei 'oyebeihem ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 15:10	'o li 'imi ki yelidtini 'ish rib ve'ish madon lekhal ha'arez lo nashiti velo nashu bi kuloh meqalavni. jeremiah 15:11	'amar yhvh 'im lo sharotikha sheiritikha letob 'im lo hifga'ti bekha be'et ra'ah ube'et zarah 'et ha'oyeb. jeremiah 15:12	hayaroa' barzel barzel mizafon unekhoshet. jeremiah 15:13	kheilekha ve'ozrotekha labaz 'eten lo bimkhir ubekhal khatotekha ubekhal gebulekha. jeremiah 15:14	veha'abarti 'et 'oyebekha be'erez lo yada'eta ki 'esh qadekhah be'api 'aleikhem tuqad. jeremiah 15:15	'atah yada'ta yhvh zakhereini ufaqedeini vehinaqem li meirodefai 'al le'erekh 'apekha tiqakheini da' se'eiti 'alekha kherpah. jeremiah 15:16	nimze'u debarekha va'okhelem vayhi debarekha debarekha li lesason ulesimkhat lebabi ki niqra shimkha 'alai yhvh 'elohei zeba'ot. jeremiah 15:17	lo yashabti besod mesakhaqim va'e'loz mipenei yadekha badad yashabti ki za'am mileitani. jeremiah 15:18	lamah hayah khe'eibi nezakh umakati 'anushah mei'anah heirafei hayo tihyeh li kemo 'akhzab mayim lo ne'emanu. jeremiah 15:19	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'im tashub va'ashibekha lefanai ta'amod ve'im tozi yaqar mizolel kefi tihyeh yashubu hemah 'eilekha ve'atah lo tashub 'aleihem. jeremiah 15:20	unetatikha la'am hazeh lekhomat nekhoshet bezurah venilkhamu 'eilekha velo yukhelu lakh ki 'itekha 'ani lehoshi'akha ulehazilekha ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 15:21	vehizaltikha miyad ra'im ufeditikha mikaf 'arizim. jeremiah 16:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. jeremiah 16:2	lo tiqakh lekha 'ishah velo yihyu lekha banim ubanot bamaqom hazeh. jeremiah 16:3	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'al habanim ve'al habanot hayilodim bamaqom hazeh ve'al 'imotam hayoledot 'otam ve'al 'abotam hamolidim 'otam ba'arez hazot. jeremiah 16:4	memotei takhalu'im yamutu lo yisafedu velo yiqabeiru ledomen 'al penei ha'adamah yihyu ubakhereb ubara'ab yikhlu vehayetah niblatam lema'akhal le'of hashamayim ulebehemat ha'arez. jeremiah 16:5	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'al tabo bet marzeiakh ve'al teilekh lispod ve'al tanod lahem ki 'asafti 'et shelomi mei'et ha'am hazeh ne'um yhvh 'et hakhesed ve'et harakhamim. jeremiah 16:6	umeitu gedolim uqetanim ba'arez hazot lo yiqabeiru velo yispedu lahem velo yitgodad velo yiqareiakh lahem. jeremiah 16:7	velo yifresu lahem 'al 'eibel lenakhamo 'al met velo yashqu 'otam kos tankhumim 'al 'abiv ve'al 'imo. jeremiah 16:8	ubet mishteh lo tabo lashebet 'otam le'ekhol velishtot. jeremiah 16:9	ki khoh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini mashbit min hamaqom hazeh le'eineikhem ubimeikhem qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah. jeremiah 16:10	vehayah ki tagid la'am hazeh 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh ve'ameru 'eilekha 'al meh diber yhvh 'aleinu 'et kal hara'ah hagedolah hazot umeh 'avoneinu umeh khatateinu 'asher khatanu yhvh 'eloheinu. jeremiah 16:11	ve'amarta 'aleihem 'al 'asher 'azebu 'aboteikhem 'oti ne'um yhvh vayeilekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim vaya'abdum vayishtakhavu lahem ve'oti 'azabu ve'et torati lo shamaru. jeremiah 16:12	ve'atem harei'otem la'asot mei'aboteikhem vehinekhem holekhim 'ish 'akharei sherirut libo hara' lebilti shemoa' 'eilai. jeremiah 16:13	veheitalti 'etkhem mei'al ha'arez hazot 'al ha'arez 'asher lo yeda'tem 'atem va'aboteikhem va'abadtem sham 'et 'elohim 'akheirim yomam valaylah 'asher lo 'eten lakhem khaninah. jeremiah 16:14	lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh velo yei'amer 'od khai yhvh 'asher he'elah 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim. jeremiah 16:15	ki 'im khai yhvh 'asher he'elah 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez zafon umikol ha'arazot 'asher hidikham shamah vahashibotim 'al 'admatam 'asher natati la'abotam. jeremiah 16:16	hini sholeiakh ledavagim ledayagim rabim ne'um yhvh vedigum ve'akharei khen 'eshlakh lerabim zayadim vezadum mei'al kal har umei'al kal gib'ah umineqiqei hasela'im. jeremiah 16:17	ki 'einai 'al kal darkheihem lo nisteru milefanai velo nizpan 'avonam mineged 'einai. jeremiah 16:18	veshilamti rishonah mishneh 'avonam vekhatatam 'al khalelam 'et 'arzi beniblat shiquzeihem veto'aboteihem male'u 'et nakhalati. jeremiah 16:19	yhvh 'uzi uma'uzi umenusi beyom zarah 'eilekha goyim yabo'u mei'afsei 'arez veyomeru 'akh sheqer nakhalu 'aboteinu hebel ve'en bam mo'il. jeremiah 16:20	haya'aseh lo 'adam 'elohim vehemah lo 'elohim. jeremiah 16:21	lakhen hini modi'am bapa'am hazot 'odi'em 'et yadi ve'et geburati veyade'u ki shemi yhvh. jeremiah 17:1	khatat yehudah ketubah be'et barzel beziporen shamir kharushah 'al luakh libam uleqarnot mizbekhoteikhem. jeremiah 17:2	kizkor beneihem mizbekhotam va'asheireihem 'al 'ez ra'anan 'al geba'ot hagebohot. jeremiah 17:3	harari basadeh kheilekha khal 'ozrotekha labaz 'eten bamotekha bekhatat bekhal gebulekha. jeremiah 17:4	veshamatah ubekha minakhalatekha 'asher natati lakh veha'abadtikha 'et 'oyebekha ba'arez 'asher lo yada'eta ki 'esh qedakhtem be'api 'ad 'olam tuqad. jeremiah 17:5	koh 'amar yhvh 'arur hageber 'asher yibtakh ba'adam vesam basar zero'o umin yhvh yasur libo. jeremiah 17:6	vehayah ke'ar'ar ba'arabah velo yir'eh ki yabo tob veshakhan khareirim bamidbar 'erez meleikhah velo teisheb. jeremiah 17:7	barukh hageber 'asher yibtakh yhvh vehayah yhvh mibtakho. jeremiah 17:8	vehayah ke'ez shatul 'al mayim ve'al yubal yeshalakh sharashav velo yira yir'eh ki yabo khom vehayah 'aleihu ra'anan ubishnat bazoret lo yid'ag velo yamish mei'asot peri. jeremiah 17:9	'aqob haleb mikol ve'anush hu mi yeida'enu. jeremiah 17:10	'ani yhvh khoqer leb bokhen kelayot velatet le'ish kedarko kidrakhav kifri ma'alalav. jeremiah 17:11	qorei dagar velo yalad 'oseh 'osher velo bemishpat bakhazi yomo yamav ya'azbenu ube'akharito yihyeh nabal. jeremiah 17:12	kisei khabod marom meirishon meqom miqdasheinu. jeremiah 17:13	miqveh yisra'el yhvh kal 'ozebekha yeiboshu yisorai vesurai ba'arez yikateibu ki 'azebu meqor mayim khayim 'et yhvh. jeremiah 17:14	refa'eini yhvh ve'eirafei hoshi'eini ve'ivashei'ah ki tehilati 'atah. jeremiah 17:15	hineh hemah 'omerim 'eilai 'ayeh debar yhvh yabo na. jeremiah 17:16	va'ani lo 'azti meiro'eh 'akharekha veyom 'anush lo hit'aveiti 'atah yada'eta moza sefatai nokhakh panekha hayah. jeremiah 17:17	'al tihyeh li limkhitah makhasi 'atah beyom ra'ah. jeremiah 17:18	yeiboshu rodefai ve'al 'eiboshah 'ani yeikhatu hemah ve'al 'eikhatah 'ani habi 'aleihem yom ra'ah umishneh shibaron shaberem. jeremiah 17:19	koh 'amar yhvh 'eilai halokh ve'amadta besha'ar benei 'am ha'am 'asher yabo'u bo malkhei yehudah va'asher yeize'u bo ubekhol sha'arei yerushalim. jeremiah 17:20	ve'amarta 'aleihem shim'u debar yhvh malkhei yehudah vekhal yehudah vekhol yoshebei yerushalim haba'im bashe'arim ha'eleh. jeremiah 17:21	koh 'amar yhvh hishameru benafshoteikhem ve'al tis'u masa beyom hashabat vahabeitem besha'arei yerushalim. jeremiah 17:22	velo tozi'u masa mibateikhem beyom hashabat vekhal melakhah lo ta'asu veqidashtem 'et yom hashabat ka'asher ziviti 'et 'aboteikhem. jeremiah 17:23	velo shame'u velo hitu 'et 'azenam vayaqshu 'et 'arepam lebilti shomeia' shemoa' ulebilti qakhat musar. jeremiah 17:24	vehayah 'im shamoa' tishme'un 'eilai ne'um yhvh lebilti habi masa besha'arei ha'ir hazot beyom hashabat uleqadesh 'et yom hashabat lebilti 'asot boh bo kal melakhah. jeremiah 17:25	uba'u besha'arei ha'ir hazot melakhim vesarim yoshebim 'al kisei david rokhebim barekheb ubasusim hemah vesareihem 'ish yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim veyashebah ha'ir hazot le'olam. jeremiah 17:26	uba'u mei'arei yehudah umisebibot yerushalim umei'erez binyamin umin hashefeilah umin hahar umin hanegeb mebi'im 'olah vezebakh uminkhah ulebonah umebi'ei todah bet yhvh. jeremiah 17:27	ve'im lo tishme'u 'eilai leqadesh 'et yom hashabat ulebilti se'et masa ubo besha'arei yerushalim beyom hashabat vehizati 'esh bish'areha ve'akhelah 'armenot yerushalim velo tikhbeh. jeremiah 18:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh leimor. jeremiah 18:2	qum veyaradta bet hayozer veshamah 'ashmi'akha 'et debarai. jeremiah 18:3	va'eired bet hayozer vehineihu vehineh hu 'oseh melakhah 'al ha'abenayim. jeremiah 18:4	venishkhat hakeli 'asher hu 'oseh bakhomer beyad hayozer veshab vaya'aseihu keli 'akher ka'asher yashar be'einei hayozer la'asot. jeremiah 18:5	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. jeremiah 18:6	hakhayozer hazeh lo 'ukhal la'asot lakhem bet yisra'el ne'um yhvh hineh khakhomer beyad hayozer ken 'atem beyadi bet yisra'el. jeremiah 18:7	rega' 'adaber 'al go ve'al mamlakhah lintosh velintoz uleha'abid. jeremiah 18:8	veshab hago hahu meira'ato 'asher dibarti 'alav venikhamti 'al hara'ah 'asher khashabti la'asot lo. jeremiah 18:9	verega' 'adaber 'al go ve'al mamlakhah libnot velintoa'. jeremiah 18:10	ve'asah hara'ah hara' be'einai lebilti shemoa' beqoli venikhamti 'al hatobah 'asher 'amarti leheitib 'oto. jeremiah 18:11	ve'atah 'emar na 'el 'ish yehudah ve'al yoshebei yerushalim leimor koh 'amar yhvh hineh 'anokhi yozer 'aleikhem ra'ah vekhosheb 'aleikhem makhashabah shubu na 'ish midarko hara'ah veheitibu darkheikhem uma'aleikhem. jeremiah 18:12	ve'ameru no'ash ki 'akharei makhsheboteinu neilekh ve'ish sherirut libo hara' na'aseh. jeremiah 18:13	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh sha'alu na bagoyim mi shama' ka'eleh sha'arurit 'asetah me'od betulat yisra'el. jeremiah 18:14	haya'azob mizur sadai sheleg lebanon 'im yinateshu mayim zarim qarim nozlim. jeremiah 18:15	ki shekheikhuni 'ami lashav yeqateiru vayakhshilum bedarkheihem shebilei 'olam lalekhet netibot derekh lo selulah. jeremiah 18:16	lasum 'arzam leshamah sheruqat sheriqot 'olam kol 'ober 'aleha yishom veyanid berosho. jeremiah 18:17	keruakh qadim 'afizem lifnei 'oyeb 'oref velo fanim 'er'em beyom 'eidam. jeremiah 18:18	vayomeru lekhu venakhshebah 'al yirmeyahu makhashabot ki lo tobad torah mikohen ve'eizah meikhakham vedabar minabi lekhu venakeihu balashon ve'al naqshibah 'el kal debarav. jeremiah 18:19	haqshibah yhvh 'eilai ushema' leqol yeribai. jeremiah 18:20	hayshulam takhat tobah ra'ah ki kharu shukhah lenafshi zekhor 'amedi lefanekha ledaber 'aleihem tobah lehashib 'et khamatekha meihem. jeremiah 18:21	lakhen ten 'et beneihem lara'ab vehagirem 'al yedei khereb vetihyenah nesheihem shakulot ve'almanot ve'ansheihem yihyu harugei mavet bakhureihem mukei khereb bamilkhamah. jeremiah 18:22	tishama' ze'aqah mibateihem ki tabi 'aleihem gedud pit'om ki kharu shikhah shukhah lelakhedeini ufakhim tamenu leraglai. jeremiah 18:23	ve'atah yhvh yada'ta 'et kal 'azatam 'alai lamavet 'al tekhaper 'al 'avonam vekhatatam milefanekha 'al temkhi vehayu veyihyu mukhshalim lefanekha be'et 'apekha 'aseh bahem. jeremiah 19:1	koh 'amar yhvh halokh veqanita baqbuq yozer khares umiziqnei ha'am umiziqnei hakohanim. jeremiah 19:2	veyazata 'el gei ben hinom 'asher petakh sha'ar hakharasut hakharsit veqarata sham 'et hadebarim 'asher 'adaber 'eilekha. jeremiah 19:3	ve'amarta shim'u debar yhvh malkhei yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini meibi ra'ah 'al hamaqom hazeh 'asher kal shome'ah tizalnah 'azenav. jeremiah 19:4	ya'an 'asher 'azabuni vaynakeru 'et hamaqom hazeh vayqateru bo leilohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'um hemah va'aboteihem umalkhei yehudah umale'u 'et hamaqom hazeh dam neqiyim. jeremiah 19:5	ubanu 'et bamot haba'al lisrof 'et beneihem ba'esh 'olot laba'al 'asher lo ziviti velo dibarti velo 'aletah 'al libi. jeremiah 19:6	lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh velo yiqarei lamaqom hazeh 'od hatofet vegei ben hinom ki 'im gei hahareigah. jeremiah 19:7	ubaqoti 'et 'azat yehudah virushalim bamaqom hazeh vehipaltim bakhereb lifnei 'oyebeihem ubeyad mebaqshei nafsham venatati 'et niblatam lema'akhal le'of hashamayim ulebehemat ha'arez. jeremiah 19:8	vesamti 'et ha'ir hazot leshamah velishreiqah kol 'ober 'aleha yishom veyishroq 'al kal makoteha. jeremiah 19:9	veha'akhaltim 'et besar beneihem ve'et besar benoteihem ve'ish besar rei'eihu yokheilu bemazor ubemazoq 'asher yaziqu lahem 'oyebeihem umebaqshei nafsham. jeremiah 19:10	veshabarta habaqbuq le'einei ha'anashim haholekhim 'otakh. jeremiah 19:11	ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot kakhah 'eshbor 'et ha'am hazeh ve'et ha'ir hazot ka'asher yishbor 'et keli hayozer 'asher lo yukhal leheirafeh 'od ubetofet yiqberu mei'en maqom liqbor. jeremiah 19:12	ken 'e'eseh lamaqom hazeh ne'um yhvh uleyoshebav velatet 'et ha'ir hazot ketofet. jeremiah 19:13	vehayu batei yerushalim ubatei malkhei yehudah kimqom hatofet hatemei'im lekhol habatim 'asher qiteru 'al gagoteihem lekhol zeba hashamayim vehasekh nesakhim leilohim 'akheirim. jeremiah 19:14	vayabo yirmeyahu meihatofet 'asher shelakho yhvh sham lehinabei vaya'amod bakhazar bet yhvh vayomer 'el kal ha'am. jeremiah 19:15	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini meibi meibi 'el ha'ir hazot ve'al kal 'areha 'et kal hara'ah 'asher dibarti 'aleha ki hiqshu 'et 'arepam lebilti shemoa' 'et debarai. jeremiah 20:1	vayishma' pashkhur ben 'imer hakohen vehu faqid nagid bebet yhvh 'et yirmeyahu niba 'et hadebarim ha'eleh. jeremiah 20:2	vayakeh fashkhur 'et yirmeyahu hanabi vayiten 'oto 'al hamahpekhet 'asher besha'ar binyamin ha'elyon 'asher bebet yhvh. jeremiah 20:3	vayhi mimakhorat vayozei fashkhur 'et yirmeyahu min hamahpakhet vayomer 'eilav yirmeyahu lo fashkhur qara yhvh shemekha ki 'im magor misabib. jeremiah 20:4	ki khoh 'amar yhvh hini notenkha lemagor lekha ulekhal 'ohabekha venafelu bekhereb 'oyebeihem ve'einekha ro'ot ve'et kal yehudah 'eten beyad melekh babel vehiglam babelah vehikam bekhareb. jeremiah 20:5	venatati 'et kal khosen ha'ir hazot ve'et kal yegi'ah ve'et kal yeqarah ve'et kal 'ozrot malkhei yehudah 'eten beyad 'oyebeihem ubezazum uleqakhum vehebi'um babelah. jeremiah 20:6	ve'atah fashkhur vekhol yoshebei beitekha teilekhu bashebi ubabel tabo vesham tamut vesham tiqaber 'atah vekhal 'ohabekha 'asher nibeita lahem bashaqer. jeremiah 20:7	pititani yhvh va'epat khazaqtani vatukhal hayiti liskhoq kal hayom kuloh lo'eg li. jeremiah 20:8	ki midei 'adaber 'ez'aq khamas vashod 'eqra ki hayah debar yhvh li lekherpah uleqeles kal hayom. jeremiah 20:9	ve'amarti lo 'ezkerenu velo 'adaber 'od bishmo vehayah belibi ke'esh bo'eret 'azur be'azmotai venil'eiti kalkhel velo 'ukhal. jeremiah 20:10	ki shama'ti dibat rabim magor misabib hagidu venagidenu kol 'enosh shelomi shomerei zal'i 'ulai yefuteh venukhelah lo veniqkhah niqmateinu mimenu. jeremiah 20:11	yhvh 'oti kegibor 'ariz 'al ken rodefai yikashelu velo yukhalu boshu me'od ki lo hiskilu kelimat 'olam lo tishakheiakh. jeremiah 20:12	yhvh zeba'ot bokhen zadiq ro'eh khelayot valeb 'er'eh niqmatekha meihem ki 'eilekha giliti 'et ribi. jeremiah 20:13	ru yhvh halu 'et yhvh ki hizil 'et nefesh 'ebyon miyad merei'im. jeremiah 20:14	'arur hayom 'asher yuladti bo yom 'asher yeladatni 'imi 'al yehi barukh. jeremiah 20:15	'arur ha'ish 'asher bisar 'et 'abi leimor yulad lekha ben zakhar sameiakh simokhahu. jeremiah 20:16	vehayah ha'ish hahu ke'arim 'asher hafakh yhvh velo nikham veshama' ze'aqah baboqer uteru'ah be'et zahorayim. jeremiah 20:17	'asher lo motani meirakhem vatehi li 'imi qibri verakhmah harat 'olam. jeremiah 20:18	lamah zeh meirekhem yazati lir'ot 'amal veyagon vayikhlu beboshet yamai. jeremiah 21:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh bishloakh 'eilav hamelekh zidqiyahu 'et pashkhur ben malkiyah ve'et zefanyah ben ma'aseiyah hakohen leimor. jeremiah 21:2	derash na ba'adeinu 'et yhvh ki nebukhadrezar melekh babel nilkham 'aleinu 'ulai ya'aseh yhvh 'otanu kekhal nifle'otav veya'aleh mei'aleinu. jeremiah 21:3	vayomer yirmeyahu 'aleihem koh tomerun 'el zidqiyahu. jeremiah 21:4	koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hini meiseb 'et kelei hamilkhamah 'asher beyedkhem 'asher 'atem nilkhamim bam 'et melekh babel ve'et hakasdim hazarim 'aleikhem mikhuz lakhomah ve'asafti 'otam 'el tokh ha'ir hazot. jeremiah 21:5	venilkhamti 'ani 'itekhem beyad netuyah ubizroa' khazaqah ube'af ubekheimah ubeqezef gadol. jeremiah 21:6	vehikeiti 'et yoshebei ha'ir hazot ve'et ha'adam ve'et habeheimah bedeber gadol yamutu. jeremiah 21:7	ve'akharei khen ne'um yhvh 'eten 'et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve'et 'abadav ve'et ha'am ve'et hanish'arim ba'ir hazot min hadeber min hakhereb umin hara'ab beyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel ubeyad 'oyebeihem ubeyad mebaqshei nafsham vehikam lefi khereb lo yakhus 'aleihem velo yakhmol velo yerakhem. jeremiah 21:8	ve'el ha'am hazeh tomar koh 'amar yhvh hini noten lifneikhem 'et derekh hakhayim ve'et derekh hamavet. jeremiah 21:9	hayosheb ba'ir hazot yamut bakhereb ubara'ab ubadaber vehayozei venafal 'al hakasdim hazarim 'aleikhem yikhyeh vekhayah vehayetah lo nafsho leshalal. jeremiah 21:10	ki samti fanai ba'ir hazot lera'ah velo letobah ne'um yhvh beyad melekh babel tinaten userafah ba'esh. jeremiah 21:11	ulebet melekh yehudah shim'u debar yhvh. jeremiah 21:12	bet david koh 'amar yhvh dinu laboqer mishpat vehazilu gazul miyad 'osheq pen teizei kha'esh khamati uba'arah ve'en mekhabeh mipenei roa' ma'aleihem ma'aleikhem. jeremiah 21:13	hini 'eilayikh yoshebet ha'eimeq zur hamishor ne'um yhvh ha'omerim mi yeikhat 'aleinu umi yabo bim'onoteinu. jeremiah 21:14	ufaqadti 'aleikhem kifri ma'aleikhem ne'um yhvh vehizati 'esh beya'rah ve'akhelah kal sebibeha. jeremiah 22:1	koh 'amar yhvh red bet melekh yehudah vedibarta sham 'et hadabar hazeh. jeremiah 22:2	ve'amarta shema' debar yhvh melekh yehudah hayosheb 'al kisei david 'atah va'abadekha ve'amekha haba'im bashe'arim ha'eleh. jeremiah 22:3	koh 'amar yhvh 'asu mishpat uzedaqah vehazilu gazul miyad 'ashoq veger yatom ve'almanah 'al tonu 'al takhmosu vedam naqi 'al tishpekhu bamaqom hazeh. jeremiah 22:4	ki 'im 'aso ta'asu 'et hadabar hazeh uba'u besha'arei habayit hazeh melakhim yoshebim ledavid 'al kis'o rokhebim barekheb ubasusim hu ve'abdav va'abadav ve'amo. jeremiah 22:5	ve'im lo tishme'u 'et hadebarim ha'eleh bi nishba'ti ne'um yhvh ki lekharebah yihyeh habayit hazeh. jeremiah 22:6	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'al bet melekh yehudah gil'ad 'atah li rosh halebanon 'im lo 'ashitekha midbar 'arim lo noshabah noshabu. jeremiah 22:7	veqidashti 'alekha mashkhitim 'ish vekheilav vekharetu mibkhar 'arazekha vehipilu 'al ha'esh. jeremiah 22:8	ve'aberu goyim rabim 'al ha'ir hazot ve'ameru 'ish 'el rei'eihu 'al meh 'asah yhvh kakhah la'ir hagedolah hazot. jeremiah 22:9	ve'ameru 'al 'asher 'azebu 'et berit yhvh 'eloheihem vayishtakhavu leilohim 'akheirim vaya'abdum. jeremiah 22:10	'al tibku lemet ve'al tanudu lo bekhu bakho laholekh ki lo yashub 'od vera'ah 'et 'erez moladto. jeremiah 22:11	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'el shalum ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hamolekh takhat yoshiyahu 'abiv 'asher yaza min hamaqom hazeh lo yashub sham 'od. jeremiah 22:12	ki bimqom 'asher higlu 'oto sham yamut ve'et ha'arez hazot lo yir'eh 'od. jeremiah 22:13	ho boneh beito belo zedeq va'aliyotav belo mishpat berei'eihu ya'abod khinam ufo'alo lo yiten lo. jeremiah 22:14	ha'omer 'ebneh li bet midot va'aliyot meruvakhim veqara' lo khalonai vesafun ba'arez umashoakh bashashar. jeremiah 22:15	hatimlokh ki 'atah metakhareh ba'arez 'abikha halo 'akhal veshatah ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah 'az tob lo. jeremiah 22:16	dan din 'ani ve'ebyon 'az tob halo hi hada'at 'oti ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 22:17	ki 'en 'einekha velibekha ki 'im 'al biz'ekha ve'al dam hanaqi lishpokh ve'al ha'osheq ve'al hameruzah la'asot. jeremiah 22:18	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'el yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah lo yispedu lo ho 'akhi veho 'akhot lo yispedu lo ho 'adon veho hodoh jeremiah 22:19	qeburat khamor yiqaber sakhob vehashlekh meihale'ah lesha'arei yerushalim. jeremiah 22:20	'ali halebanon uze'aqi ubabashan teni qolekh veza'aqi mei'abarim ki nishberu kal me'ahabayikh. jeremiah 22:21	dibarti 'eilayikh beshalvotayikh 'amart lo 'eshma' zeh darkekh mine'urayikh ki lo shama'at beqoli. jeremiah 22:22	kal ro'ayikh tir'eh ruakh ume'ahabayikh bashebi yeileikhu ki 'az teiboshi venikhlamt mikol ra'atekh. jeremiah 22:23	yoshabti yoshabt balebanon mequnanti mequnant ba'arazim mah neikhant bebo lakh khabalim khil kayoleidah jeremiah 22:24	khai 'ani ne'um yhvh ki 'im yihyeh kaneyahu ben yehoyaqim melekh yehudah khotam 'al yad yemini ki misham 'eteqenka. jeremiah 22:25	unetatikha beyad mebaqshei nafshekha ubeyad 'asher 'atah yagor mipeneihem ubeyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel ubeyad hakasdim. jeremiah 22:26	veheitalti 'otekha ve'et 'imekha 'asher yeladatkha 'al ha'arez 'akheret 'asher lo yuladtem sham vesham tamutu. jeremiah 22:27	ve'al ha'arez 'asher hem menase'im 'et nafsham lashub sham shamah lo yashubu. jeremiah 22:28	ha'ezeb nibzeh nafuz ha'ish hazeh kaneyahu 'im keli 'en kheifez bo madua' hutalu hu vezar'o vehushlekhu 'al ha'arez 'asher lo yada'u. jeremiah 22:29	'erez 'erez 'arez shim'i debar yhvh. jeremiah 22:30	koh 'amar yhvh kitbu 'et ha'ish hazeh 'ariri geber lo yizlakh beyamav ki lo yizlakh mizar'o 'ish yosheb 'al kisei david umoshel 'od bihudah. jeremiah 23:1	ho ro'im me'abedim umefizim 'et zon mar'iti ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 23:2	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'al haro'im haro'im 'et 'ami 'atem hafizotem 'et zoni vatadikhum velo feqadtem 'otam hini foqed 'aleikhem 'et roa' ma'aleikhem ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 23:3	va'ani 'aqabez 'et she'eirit zoni mikol ha'arazot 'asher hidakhti 'otam sham vahashiboti 'ethen 'al neveihen ufaru verabu. jeremiah 23:4	vahaqimoti 'aleihem ro'im vera'um velo yire'u 'od velo yeikhatu velo yipaqeidu ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 23:5	hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh vahaqimoti ledavid zemakh zadiq umalakh melekh vehiskil ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah ba'arez. jeremiah 23:6	beyamav tivasha' yehudah veyisra'el yishkon labetakh vezeh shemo 'asher yiqre'o yhvh zidqeinu. jeremiah 23:7	lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh velo yomeru 'od khai yhvh 'asher he'elah 'et benei yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim. jeremiah 23:8	ki 'im khai yhvh 'asher he'elah va'asher heibi 'et zera' bet yisra'el mei'erez zafonah umikol ha'arazot 'asher hidakhtim sham veyashebu 'al 'admatam. jeremiah 23:9	lanebi'im nishbar libi beqirbi rakhafu kal 'azmotai hayiti ke'ish shikor ukhegeber 'abaro yayin mipenei yhvh umipenei dibrei qadesho. jeremiah 23:10	ki mena'afim male'ah ha'arez ki mipenei 'alah 'abelah ha'arez yabeshu ne'ot midbar vatehi meruzatam ra'ah ugeburatam lo khen. jeremiah 23:11	ki gam nabi gam kohen khaneifu gam bebeiti mazati ra'atam ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 23:12	lakhen yihyeh darkam lahem kakhalaqlaqot ba'afeilah yidakhu venafelu bah ki 'abi 'aleihem ra'ah shenat pequdatam ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 23:13	ubinbi'ei shomeron ra'iti tiflah hinabe'u baba'al vayat'u 'et 'ami 'et yisra'el. jeremiah 23:14	ubinbi'ei yerushalim ra'iti sha'arurah na'of vehalokh basheqer vekhizequ yedei merei'im lebilti shabu 'ish meira'ato hayu li khulam kisdom veyoshebeha ka'amorah. jeremiah 23:15	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'al hanebi'im hini ma'akhil 'otam la'anah vehishqitim mei rosh ki mei'et nebi'ei yerushalim yaze'ah khanupah lekhal ha'arez. jeremiah 23:16	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'al tishme'u 'al dibrei hanebi'im hanibe'im lakhem mahbilim hemah 'etkhem khazon libam yedabeiru lo mipi yhvh. jeremiah 23:17	'omerim 'amor limna'azai diber yhvh shalom yihyeh lakhem vekhol holekh bishrirut libo 'ameru lo tabo 'aleikhem ra'ah. jeremiah 23:18	ki mi 'amad besod yhvh veyeire veyishma' 'et debaro mi hiqshib debari debaro vayishma'. jeremiah 23:19	hineh sa'arat yhvh kheimah yaze'ah vesa'ar mitkholel 'al rosh resha'im yakhul. jeremiah 23:20	lo yashub 'af yhvh 'ad 'asoto ve'ad haqimo mezimot libo be'akharit hayamim titbonu bah binah. jeremiah 23:21	lo shalakhti 'et hanebi'im vehem razu lo dibarti 'aleihem vehem niba'u. jeremiah 23:22	ve'im 'amedu besodi veyashmi'u debarai 'et 'ami vishibum midarkam hara' umeiroa' ma'aleihem. jeremiah 23:23	ha'elohei miqarob 'ani ne'um yhvh velo 'elohei meirakhoq. jeremiah 23:24	'im yisater 'ish bamistarim va'ani lo 'er'enu ne'um yhvh halo 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez 'ani malei ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 23:25	shama'ti 'et 'asher 'ameru hanebi'im hanibe'im bishmi sheqer leimor khalamti khalameti. jeremiah 23:26	'ad matai hayesh beleb hanebi'im nibe'ei hashaqer unebi'ei tarmit libam. jeremiah 23:27	hakhoshebim lehashkiakh 'et 'ami shemi bakhalomotam 'asher yesaperu 'ish lerei'eihu ka'asher shakhekhu 'abotam 'et shemi baba'al. jeremiah 23:28	hanabi 'asher 'ito khalom yesaper khalom va'asher debari 'ito yedaber debari 'emet mah lateben 'et habar ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 23:29	halo khoh debari ka'esh ne'um yhvh ukhefatish yefozez sala'. jeremiah 23:30	lakhen hini 'al hanebi'im ne'um yhvh meganebei debarai 'ish mei'et rei'eihu. jeremiah 23:31	hini 'al hanebi'im ne'um yhvh haloqekhim leshonam vayin'amu ne'um. jeremiah 23:32	hini 'al nibe'ei khalomot sheqer ne'um yhvh vaysaperum vayat'u 'et 'ami beshiqreihem ubefakhazutam ve'anokhi lo shelakhtim velo zivitim veho'el lo yo'ilu la'am hazeh ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 23:33	vekhi yish'alekha ha'am hazeh 'o hanabi 'o khohen leimor mah masa yhvh ve'amarta 'aleihem 'et mah masa venatashti 'etkhem ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 23:34	vehanabi vehakohen veha'am 'asher yomar masa yhvh ufaqadti 'al ha'ish hahu ve'al beito. jeremiah 23:35	koh tomeru 'ish 'al rei'eihu ve'ish 'el 'akhiv meh 'anah yhvh umah diber yhvh. jeremiah 23:36	umasa yhvh lo tizkeru 'od ki hamasa yihyeh le'ish debaro vahafakhtem 'et dibrei 'elohim khayim yhvh zeba'ot 'eloheinu. jeremiah 23:37	koh tomar 'el hanabi meh 'anakh yhvh umah diber yhvh. jeremiah 23:38	ve'im masa yhvh tomeiru lakhen koh 'amar yhvh ya'an 'amarekhem 'et hadabar hazeh masa yhvh va'eshlakh 'aleikhem leimor lo tomeru masa yhvh. jeremiah 23:39	lakhen hini venashiti 'etkhem nasho venatashti 'etkhem ve'et ha'ir 'asher natati lakhem vela'aboteikhem mei'al panai. jeremiah 23:40	venatati 'aleikhem kherpat 'olam ukhelimut 'olam 'asher lo tishakheiakh. jeremiah 24:1	hir'ani yhvh vehineh shenei duda'ei te'einim mu'adim lifnei heikhal yhvh 'akharei haglot nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'et yekhaneyahu ben yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ve'et sarei yehudah ve'et hekharash ve'et hamasger mirushalim vaybi'em babel. jeremiah 24:2	hadud 'ekhad te'einim tobot me'od kit'einei habakurot vehadud 'ekhad te'einim ra'ot me'od 'asher lo tei'akhalnah meiroa'. jeremiah 24:3	vayomer yhvh 'eilai mah 'atah ro'eh yirmeyahu va'omar te'einim hate'einim hatobot tobot me'od vehara'ot ra'ot me'od 'asher lo tei'akhalnah meiroa'. jeremiah 24:4	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. jeremiah 24:5	koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el kate'einim hatobot ha'eleh ken 'akir 'et galut yehudah 'asher shilakhti min hamaqom hazeh 'erez kasdim letobah. jeremiah 24:6	vesamti 'eini 'aleihem letobah vahashibotim 'al ha'arez hazot ubenitim velo 'eheros uneta'tim velo 'etosh. jeremiah 24:7	venatati lahem leb lada'at 'oti ki 'ani yhvh vehayu li le'am ve'anokhi 'ehyeh lahem leilohim ki yashubu 'eilai bekhal libam. jeremiah 24:8	vekhate'einim hara'ot 'asher lo tei'akhalnah meiroa' ki khoh 'amar yhvh ken 'eten 'et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve'et sarav ve'et she'eirit yerushalim hanish'arim ba'arez hazot vehayoshebim be'erez mizrayim. jeremiah 24:9	unetatim lizva'ah leza'avah lera'ah lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez lekherpah ulemashal lishninah veliqlalah bekhal hameqomot 'asher 'adikhem sham. jeremiah 24:10	veshilakhti bam 'et hakhereb 'et hara'ab ve'et hadaber 'ad tumam mei'al ha'adamah 'asher natati lahem vela'aboteihem. jeremiah 25:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'al yirmeyahu 'al kal 'am yehudah bashanah harebi'it lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hi hashanah harishonit linbukhadrezar melekh babel. jeremiah 25:2	'asher diber yirmeyahu hanabi 'al kal 'am yehudah ve'el kal yoshebei yerushalim leimor. jeremiah 25:3	min shelosh 'esreh shanah leyoshiyahu ben 'amon melekh yehudah ve'ad hayom hazeh zeh shalosh ve'esrim shanah hayah debar yhvh 'eilai va'adaber 'aleikhem 'ashkem vedaber velo shema'tem. jeremiah 25:4	veshalakh yhvh 'aleikhem 'et kal 'abadav hanebi'im hashkem veshaloakh velo shema'tem velo hititem 'et 'azenekhem lishmoa'. jeremiah 25:5	leimor shubu na 'ish midarko hara'ah umeiroa' ma'aleikhem ushebu 'al ha'adamah 'asher natan yhvh lakhem vela'aboteikhem lemin 'olam ve'ad 'olam. jeremiah 25:6	ve'al teilekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam ulehishtakhavot lahem velo takh'isu 'oti bema'aseh yedeikhem velo 'ara' lakhem. jeremiah 25:7	velo shema'tem 'eilai ne'um yhvh lema'an hikh'isuni hakh'iseini bema'aseh yedeikhem lera' lakhem. jeremiah 25:8	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot ya'an 'asher lo shema'tem 'et debarai. jeremiah 25:9	hini sholeiakh velaqakhti 'et kal mishpekhot zafon ne'um yhvh ve'el nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'abdi vahabi'otim 'al ha'arez hazot ve'al yoshebeha ve'al kal hagoyim ha'eleh sabib vehakharamtim vesamtim leshamah velishreiqah ulekharebot 'olam. jeremiah 25:10	veha'abadti meihem qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah qol reikhayim ve'or ner. jeremiah 25:11	vehayetah kal ha'arez hazot lekharebah leshamah ve'abedu hagoyim ha'eleh 'et melekh babel shib'im shanah. jeremiah 25:12	vehayah khimlot shib'im shanah 'efqod 'al melekh babel ve'al hago hahu ne'um yhvh 'et 'avonam ve'al 'erez kasdim vesamti 'oto leshimot 'olam. jeremiah 25:13	veheibeiti veheibeiti 'al ha'arez hahi 'et kal debarai 'asher dibarti 'aleha 'et kal hakatub baseifer hazeh 'asher niba yirmeyahu 'al kal hagoyim. jeremiah 25:14	ki 'abedu bam gam hemah goyim rabim umelakhim gedolim veshilamti lahem kefa'olam ukhema'aseh yedeihem. jeremiah 25:15	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'eilai qakh 'et kos hayayin hakheimah hazot miyadi vehishqitah 'oto 'et kal hagoyim 'asher 'anokhi sholeiakh 'otkha 'aleihem. jeremiah 25:16	veshatu vehitgo'ashu vehitholalu mipenei hakhereb 'asher 'anokhi sholeiakh beinotam. jeremiah 25:17	va'eqakh 'et hakos miyad yhvh va'ashqeh 'et kal hagoyim 'asher shelakhani yhvh 'aleihem. jeremiah 25:18	'et yerushalim ve'et 'arei yehudah ve'et melakheha 'et sareha latet 'otam lekharebah leshamah lishreiqah veliqlalah kayom hazeh. jeremiah 25:19	'et par'oh melekh mizrayim ve'et 'abadav ve'et sarav ve'et kal 'amo. jeremiah 25:20	ve'et kal ha'ereb ve'et kal malkhei 'erez ha'uz ve'et kal malkhei 'erez pelishtim ve'et 'ashqelon ve'et 'azah ve'et 'eqron ve'et she'eirit 'ashdod. jeremiah 25:21	'et 'edom ve'et mo'ab ve'et benei 'amon. jeremiah 25:22	ve'et kal malkhei zor ve'et kal malkhei zidon ve'et malkhei ha'i 'asher be'eiber hayam. jeremiah 25:23	ve'et dedan ve'et teima ve'et buz ve'et kal qezuzei fei'ah. jeremiah 25:24	ve'et kal malkhei 'arab ve'et kal malkhei ha'ereb hashokhenim bamidbar. jeremiah 25:25	ve'et kal malkhei zimri ve'et kal malkhei 'eilam ve'et kal malkhei madai. jeremiah 25:26	ve'et kal malkhei hazafon haqerobim veharekhoqim 'ish 'el 'akhiv ve'et kal hamamlekhot ha'arez 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah umelekh sheishakh yishteh 'akhareihem. jeremiah 25:27	ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el shetu veshikhru uqeyu veniflu velo taqumu mipenei hakhereb 'asher 'anokhi sholeiakh beineikhem. jeremiah 25:28	vehayah ki yema'anu laqakhat hakos miyadekha lishtot ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot shato tishtu. jeremiah 25:29	ki hineh ba'ir 'asher niqra shemi 'aleha 'anokhi meikhel lehara' ve'atem hinaqeh tinaqu lo tinaqu ki khereb 'ani qorei 'al kal yoshebei ha'arez ne'um yhvh zeba'ot. jeremiah 25:30	ve'atah tinabei 'aleihem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh ve'amarta 'aleihem yhvh mimarom yish'ag umime'on qadesho yiten qolo sha'og yish'ag 'al naveihu heidad kedorekhim ya'aneh 'el kal yoshebei ha'arez. jeremiah 25:31	ba sha'on 'ad qezeh ha'arez ki rib yhvh bagoyim nishpat hu lekhal basar haresha'im netanam lakhereb ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 25:32	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot hineh ra'ah yozet migo 'el go vesa'ar gadol yei'or miyarketei 'arez. jeremiah 25:33	vehayu khalei yhvh bayom hahu miqzeh ha'arez ve'ad qezeh ha'arez lo yisafedu velo yei'asefu velo yiqabeiru ledomen 'al penei ha'adamah yihyu. jeremiah 25:34	heililu haro'im veza'aqu vehitpaleshu 'adirei hazon ki male'u yemeikhem litboakh utefozotikhem unefaltem kikhli khemdah. jeremiah 25:35	ve'abad manos min haro'im ufeleitah mei'adirei hazon. jeremiah 25:36	qol za'aqat haro'im vilelat 'adirei hazon ki shoded yhvh 'et mar'itam. jeremiah 25:37	venadamu ne'ot hashalom mipenei kharon 'af yhvh. jeremiah 25:38	'azab kakefir suko ki hayetah 'arzam leshamah mipenei kharon hayonah umipenei kharon 'apo. jeremiah 26:1	bereishit mamlekhut yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hayah hadabar hazeh mei'et yhvh leimor. jeremiah 26:2	koh 'amar yhvh 'amod bakhazar bet yhvh vedibarta 'al kal 'arei yehudah haba'im lehishtakhavot bet yhvh 'et kal hadebarim 'asher zivitikha ledaber 'aleihem 'al tigra' dabar. jeremiah 26:3	'ulai yishme'u veyashubu 'ish midarko hara'ah venikhamti 'el hara'ah 'asher 'anokhi khosheb la'asot lahem mipenei roa' ma'aleihem. jeremiah 26:4	ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh 'im lo tishme'u 'eilai lalekhet betorati 'asher natati lifneikhem. jeremiah 26:5	lishmoa' 'al dibrei 'abadai hanebi'im 'asher 'anokhi sholeiakh 'aleikhem vehashkem veshaloakh velo shema'tem. jeremiah 26:6	venatati 'et habayit hazeh keshiloh ve'et ha'ir hazotah hazot 'eten liqlalah lekhol goyei ha'arez. jeremiah 26:7	vayishme'u hakohanim vehanebi'im vekhal ha'am 'et yirmeyahu medaber 'et hadebarim ha'eleh bebet yhvh. jeremiah 26:8	vayhi kekhalot yirmeyahu ledaber 'et kal 'asher zivah yhvh ledaber 'el kal ha'am vayitpesu 'oto hakohanim vehanebi'im vekhal ha'am leimor mot tamut. jeremiah 26:9	madua' nibeita beshem yhvh leimor keshilo yihyeh habayit hazeh veha'ir hazot tekherab mei'en yosheb vayiqahel kal ha'am 'el yirmeyahu bebet yhvh. jeremiah 26:10	vayishme'u sarei yehudah 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vaya'alu mibet hamelekh bet yhvh vayeishebu befetakh sha'ar yhvh hekhadash. jeremiah 26:11	vayomeru hakohanim vehanebi'im 'el hasarim ve'el kal ha'am leimor mishpat mavet la'ish hazeh ki niba 'el ha'ir hazot ka'asher shema'tem be'azeneikhem. jeremiah 26:12	vayomer yirmeyahu 'el kal hasarim ve'el kal ha'am leimor yhvh shelakhani lehinabei 'el habayit hazeh ve'el ha'ir hazot 'et kal hadebarim 'asher shema'tem. jeremiah 26:13	ve'atah heitibu darkheikhem uma'aleikhem veshim'u beqol yhvh 'eloheikhem veyinakhem yhvh 'el hara'ah 'asher diber 'aleikhem. jeremiah 26:14	va'ani hini beyedkhem 'asu li katob vekhayashar be'eineikhem. jeremiah 26:15	'akh yadoa' teide'u ki 'im memitim 'atem 'oti ki dam naqi 'atem notenim 'aleikhem ve'el ha'ir hazot ve'el yoshebeha ki be'emet shelakhani yhvh 'aleikhem ledaber be'azeneikhem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. jeremiah 26:16	vayomeru hasarim vekhal ha'am 'el hakohanim ve'el hanebi'im 'en la'ish hazeh mishpat mavet ki beshem yhvh 'eloheinu diber 'eileinu. jeremiah 26:17	vayaqumu 'anashim miziqnei ha'arez vayomeru 'el kal qehal ha'am leimor. jeremiah 26:18	mikhayah mikhah hamorashti hayah niba bimei khizqiyahu melekh yehudah vayomer 'el kal 'am yehudah leimor koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot ziyon sadeh teikharesh virushalayim 'iyim tihyeh vehar habayit lebamot ya'ar. jeremiah 26:19	hehamet hemituhu khizqiyahu melekh yehudah vekhal yehudah halo yarei 'et yhvh vaykhal 'et penei yhvh vayinakhem yhvh 'el hara'ah 'asher diber 'aleihem va'anakhnu 'osim ra'ah gedolah 'al nafshoteinu. jeremiah 26:20	vegam 'ish hayah mitnabei beshem yhvh 'uriyahu ben shema'yahu miqiryat haye'arim vayinabei 'al ha'ir hazot ve'al ha'arez hazot kekhol dibrei yirmeyahu. jeremiah 26:21	vayishma' hamelekh yehoyaqim vekhal giborav vekhal hasarim 'et debarav vaybaqesh hamelekh hamito vayishma' 'uriyahu vayira vayibrakh vayabo mizrayim. jeremiah 26:22	vayishlakh hamelekh yehoyaqim 'anashim mizrayim 'et 'elnatan ben 'akhbor va'anashim 'ito 'el mizrayim. jeremiah 26:23	vayozi'u 'et 'uriyahu mimizrayim vaybi'uhu 'el hamelekh yehoyaqim vayakeihu bekhareb vayashlekh 'et niblato 'el qibrei benei ha'am. jeremiah 26:24	'akh yad 'akhiqam ben shafan hayetah 'et yirmeyahu lebilti tet 'oto beyad ha'am lahamito. jeremiah 27:1	bereishit mamlekhet yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hayah hadabar hazeh 'el yirmeyah mei'et yhvh leimor. jeremiah 27:2	koh 'amar yhvh 'eilai 'aseh lekha moseirot umotot unetatam 'al zavarekha. jeremiah 27:3	veshilakhtam 'el melekh 'edom ve'el melekh mo'ab ve'el melekh benei 'amon ve'el melekh zor ve'el melekh zidon beyad mal'akhim haba'im yerushalim 'el zidqiyahu melekh yehudah. jeremiah 27:4	vezivita 'otam 'el 'adoneihem leimor koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el koh tomeru 'el 'adoneikhem. jeremiah 27:5	'anokhi 'asiti 'et ha'arez 'et ha'adam ve'et habeheimah 'asher 'al penei ha'arez bekhokhi hagadol ubizro'i hanetuyah unetatiha la'asher yashar be'einai. jeremiah 27:6	ve'atah 'anokhi natati 'et kal ha'arazot ha'eleh beyad nebukhadnezar melekh babel 'abdi vegam 'et khayat hasadeh natati lo le'abedo. jeremiah 27:7	ve'abedu 'oto kal hagoyim ve'et beno ve'et ben beno 'ad bo 'et 'arzo gam hu ve'abedu bo goyim rabim umelakhim gedolim. jeremiah 27:8	vehayah hago vehamamlakhah 'asher lo ya'abdu 'oto 'et nebukhadnezar melekh babel ve'et 'asher lo yiten 'et zavaro be'ol melekh babel bakhereb ubara'ab ubadeber 'efqod 'al hago hahu ne'um yhvh 'ad tumi 'otam beyado. jeremiah 27:9	ve'atem 'al tishme'u 'el nebi'eikhem ve'el qosemeikhem ve'el khalomoteikhem ve'el 'oneneikhem ve'el kashafeikhem 'asher hem 'omerim 'aleikhem leimor lo ta'abdu 'et melekh babel. jeremiah 27:10	ki sheqer hem nibe'im lakhem lema'an harkhiq 'etkhem mei'al 'admatkhem vehidakhti 'etkhem va'abadtem. jeremiah 27:11	vehago 'asher yabi 'et zavaro be'ol melekh babel va'abado vehinakhtiv 'al 'admato ne'um yhvh va'abadah veyashab bah. jeremiah 27:12	ve'el zidqiyah melekh yehudah dibarti kekhal hadebarim ha'eleh leimor habi'u 'et zavereikhem be'ol melekh babel ve'ibdu 'oto ve'amo vikhyu. jeremiah 27:13	lamah tamutu 'atah ve'amekha bakhereb bara'ab ubadaber ka'asher diber yhvh 'el hago 'asher lo ya'abod 'et melekh babel. jeremiah 27:14	ve'al tishme'u 'el dibrei hanebi'im ha'omerim 'aleikhem leimor lo ta'abdu 'et melekh babel ki sheqer hem nibe'im lakhem. jeremiah 27:15	ki lo shelakhtim ne'um yhvh vehem nibe'im bishmi lashaqer lema'an hadikhi 'etkhem va'abadtem 'atem vehanebi'im hanibe'im lakhem. jeremiah 27:16	ve'el hakohanim ve'el kal ha'am hazeh dibarti leimor koh 'amar yhvh 'al tishme'u 'el dibrei nebi'eikhem hanibe'im lakhem leimor hineh khelei bet yhvh mushabim mibabelah 'atah meheirah ki sheqer hemah nibe'im lakhem. jeremiah 27:17	'al tishme'u 'aleihem 'ibdu 'et melekh babel vikhyu lamah tihyeh ha'ir hazot kharebah. jeremiah 27:18	ve'im nebi'im hem ve'im yesh debar yhvh 'itam yifge'u na yhvh zeba'ot lebilti bo'u hakeilim hanotarim bebet yhvh ubet melekh yehudah ubirushalim babelah. jeremiah 27:19	ki khoh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'el ha'amudim ve'al hayam ve'al hamekhonot ve'al yeter hakeilim hanotarim ba'ir hazot. jeremiah 27:20	'asher lo leqakham nebukhadnezar melekh babel bagloto 'et yekhonyah ben yehoyaqim melekh yehudah mirushalim babelah ve'et kal khorei yehudah virushalim. jeremiah 27:21	ki khoh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'al hakeilim hanotarim bet yhvh ubet melekh yehudah virushalim. jeremiah 27:22	babelah yuba'u veshamah yihyu 'ad yom paqedi 'otam ne'um yhvh veha'alitim vahashibotim 'el hamaqom hazeh. jeremiah 28:1	vayhi bashanah hahi bereishit mamlekhet zidqiyah melekh yehudah bishnat bashanah harebi'it bakhodesh hakhamishi 'amar 'eilai khananyah ben 'azur hanabi 'asher migib'on bebet yhvh le'einei hakohanim vekhal ha'am leimor. jeremiah 28:2	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el leimor shabarti 'et 'ol melekh babel. jeremiah 28:3	be'od shenatayim yamim 'ani meishib 'el hamaqom hazeh 'et kal kelei bet yhvh 'asher laqakh nebukhadnezar melekh babel min hamaqom hazeh vaybi'em babel. jeremiah 28:4	ve'et yekhaneyah ben yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ve'et kal galut yehudah haba'im babelah 'ani meishib 'el hamaqom hazeh ne'um yhvh ki 'eshbor 'et 'ol melekh babel. jeremiah 28:5	vayomer yirmeyah hanabi 'el khananyah hanabi le'einei hakohanim ule'einei khal ha'am ha'omedim bebet yhvh. jeremiah 28:6	vayomer yirmeyah hanabi 'amen ken ya'aseh yhvh yaqem yhvh 'et debarekha 'asher nibeita lehashib kelei bet yhvh vekhal hagolah mibabel 'el hamaqom hazeh. jeremiah 28:7	'akh shema' na hadabar hazeh 'asher 'anokhi dober be'azenekha ube'azenei kal ha'am. jeremiah 28:8	hanebi'im 'asher hayu lefanai ulefanekha min ha'olam vayinabe'u 'el 'arazot rabot ve'al mamlakhot gedolot lemilkhamah ulera'ah uledaber. jeremiah 28:9	hanabi 'asher yinabei leshalom bebo debar hanabi yivada' hanabi 'asher shelakho yhvh be'emet. jeremiah 28:10	vayiqakh khananyah hanabi 'et hamotah mei'al zavar yirmeyah hanabi vayishbereihu. jeremiah 28:11	vayomer khananyah le'einei khal ha'am leimor koh 'amar yhvh kakhah 'eshbor 'et 'ol nebukhadnezar melekh babel be'od shenatayim yamim mei'al zavar kal hagoyim vayeilekh yirmeyah hanabi ledarko. jeremiah 28:12	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyah 'akharei shebor khananyah hanabi 'et hamotah mei'al zavar yirmeyah hanabi leimor. jeremiah 28:13	halokh ve'amarta 'el khananyah leimor koh 'amar yhvh motot 'ez shabareta ve'asita takhteihen motot barzel. jeremiah 28:14	ki khoh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'ol barzel natati 'al zavar kal hagoyim ha'eleh la'abod 'et nebukhadnezar melekh babel va'abaduhu vegam 'et khayat hasadeh natati lo. jeremiah 28:15	vayomer yirmeyah hanabi 'el khananyah hanabi shema' na khananyah lo shelakhakha yhvh ve'atah hibtakhta 'et ha'am hazeh 'al shaqer. jeremiah 28:16	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh hini meshaleikhakha mei'al penei ha'adamah hashanah 'atah met ki sarah dibarta 'el yhvh. jeremiah 28:17	vayamat khananyah hanabi bashanah hahi bakhodesh hashebi'i. jeremiah 29:1	ve'eleh dibrei haseifer 'asher shalakh yirmeyah hanabi mirushalim 'el yeter ziqnei hagolah ve'el hakohanim ve'el hanebi'im ve'el kal ha'am 'asher heglah nebukhadnezar mirushalim babelah. jeremiah 29:2	'akharei zet yekhaneyah hamelekh vehagebirah vehasarisim sarei yehudah virushalim vehekharash vehamasger mirushalim. jeremiah 29:3	beyad 'el'asah ben shafan ugemaryah ben khilqiyah 'asher shalakh zidqiyah melekh yehudah 'el nebukhadnezar melekh babel babelah leimor. jeremiah 29:4	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el lekhal hagolah 'asher higleiti mirushalim babelah. jeremiah 29:5	benu batim vesheibu venit'u ganot ve'ikhlu 'et piryan. jeremiah 29:6	qekhu nashim veholidu banim ubanot uqekhu libneikhem nashim ve'et benoteikhem tenu la'anashim veteiladnah banim ubanot urebu sham ve'al tim'atu. jeremiah 29:7	vedirshu 'et shelom ha'ir 'asher higleiti 'etkhem shamah vehitpalu ba'adah 'el yhvh ki bishlomah yihyeh lakhem shalom. jeremiah 29:8	ki khoh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'al yashi'u lakhem nebi'eikhem 'asher beqirbekhem veqosemeikhem ve'al tishme'u 'el khalomoteikhem 'asher 'atem makhlemim. jeremiah 29:9	ki besheqer hem nibe'im lakhem bishmi lo shelakhtim ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 29:10	ki khoh 'amar yhvh ki lefi melot lebabel shib'im shanah 'efqod 'etkhem vahaqimoti 'aleikhem 'et debari hatob lehashib 'etkhem 'el hamaqom hazeh. jeremiah 29:11	ki 'anokhi yada'ti 'et hamakhashabot 'asher 'anokhi khosheb 'aleikhem ne'um yhvh makhshebot shalom velo lera'ah latet lakhem 'akharit vetiqvah. jeremiah 29:12	uqeratem 'oti vahalakhtem vehitpalaltem 'eilai veshama'ti 'aleikhem. jeremiah 29:13	ubiqashtem 'oti umezatem ki tidreshuni bekhal lebabkhem. jeremiah 29:14	venimzeiti lakhem ne'um yhvh veshabti 'et shebitekhem shebutekhem veqibazti 'etkhem mikal hagoyim umikal hameqomot 'asher hidakhti 'etkhem sham ne'um yhvh vahashiboti 'etkhem 'el hamaqom 'asher higleiti 'etkhem misham. jeremiah 29:15	ki 'amartem heiqim lanu yhvh nebi'im babelah. jeremiah 29:16	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'el hamelekh hayosheb 'el kisei david ve'el kal ha'am hayosheb ba'ir hazot 'akheikhem 'asher lo yaze'u 'itekhem bagolah. jeremiah 29:17	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot hini meshaleiakh bam 'et hakhereb 'et hara'ab ve'et hadaber venatati 'otam kate'einim hasho'arim 'asher lo tei'akhalnah meiroa'. jeremiah 29:18	veradafti 'akhareihem bakhereb bara'ab ubadaber unetatim lizva'ah leza'avah lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez le'alah uleshamah velishreiqah ulekherpah bekhal hagoyim 'asher hidakhtim sham. jeremiah 29:19	takhat 'asher lo shame'u 'el debarai ne'um yhvh 'asher shalakhti 'aleihem 'et 'abadai hanebi'im hashkem veshaloakh velo shema'tem ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 29:20	ve'atem shim'u debar yhvh kal hagolah 'asher shilakhti mirushalim babelah. jeremiah 29:21	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'el 'akh'ab ben qolayah ve'el zidqiyahu ben ma'aseiyah hanibe'im lakhem bishmi shaqer hini noten 'otam beyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel vehikam le'eineikhem. jeremiah 29:22	veluqakh meihem qelalah lekhol galut yehudah 'asher bebabel leimor yesimkha yhvh kezidqiyahu ukhe'ekhab 'asher qalam melekh babel ba'esh. jeremiah 29:23	ya'an 'asher 'asu nebalah beyisra'el vayna'afu 'et neshei rei'eihem vaydaberu dabar bishmi sheqer 'asher lo zivitim ve'anokhi huyodeia' hayodeia' va'ed ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 29:24	ve'el shema'yahu hanekhelami tomar leimor. jeremiah 29:25	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el leimor ya'an 'asher 'atah shalakhta beshimkhah sefarim 'el kal ha'am 'asher birushalim ve'el zefanyah ben ma'aseiyah hakohen ve'el kal hakohanim leimor. jeremiah 29:26	yhvh netanekha khohen takhat yehoyada' hakohen lihyot peqidim bet yhvh lekhal 'ish meshuga' umitnabei venatatah 'oto 'el hamahpekhet ve'el hazinoq. jeremiah 29:27	ve'atah lamah lo ga'arta beyirmeyahu ha'anetoti hamitnabei lakhem. jeremiah 29:28	ki 'al ken shalakh 'eileinu babel leimor 'arukah hi benu batim vesheibu venit'u ganot ve'ikhlu 'et perihen. jeremiah 29:29	vayiqra zefanyah hakohen 'et haseifer hazeh be'azenei yirmeyahu hanabi. jeremiah 29:30	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu leimor. jeremiah 29:31	shelakh 'al kal hagolah leimor koh 'amar yhvh 'el shema'yah hanekhelami ya'an 'asher niba lakhem shema'yah va'ani lo shelakhtiv vayabtakh 'etkhem 'al shaqer. jeremiah 29:32	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh hini foqed 'al shema'yah hanekhelami ve'al zar'o lo yihyeh lo 'ish yosheb betokh ha'am hazeh velo yir'eh batob 'asher 'ani 'oseh le'ami ne'um yhvh ki sarah diber 'al yhvh. jeremiah 30:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh leimor. jeremiah 30:2	koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el leimor ketab lekha 'et kal hadebarim 'asher dibarti 'eilekha 'el seifer. jeremiah 30:3	ki hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh veshabti 'et shebut 'ami yisra'el vihudah 'amar yhvh vahashibotim 'el ha'arez 'asher natati la'abotam vireishuha. jeremiah 30:4	ve'eleh hadebarim 'asher diber yhvh 'el yisra'el ve'el yehudah. jeremiah 30:5	ki khoh 'amar yhvh qol kharadah shama'enu pakhad ve'en shalom. jeremiah 30:6	sha'alu na ure'u 'im yoled zakhar madua' ra'iti khal geber yadav 'al khalazav kayoleidah venehefkhu khal panim leyeiraqon. jeremiah 30:7	ho ki gadol hayom hahu mei'ayin kamohu ve'et zarah hi leya'aqob umimenah yivasheia'. jeremiah 30:8	vehayah bayom hahu ne'um yhvh zeba'ot 'eshbor 'ulo mei'al zavarekha umosrotekha 'anateq velo ya'abdu bo 'od zarim. jeremiah 30:9	ve'abedu 'et yhvh 'eloheihem ve'et david malkam 'asher 'aqim lahem. jeremiah 30:10	ve'atah 'al tira 'abdi ya'aqob ne'um yhvh ve'al teikhat yisra'el ki hini moshi'akha meirakhoq ve'et zar'akha mei'erez shibyam veshab ya'aqob veshaqat vesha'anan ve'en makharid. jeremiah 30:11	ki 'itekha 'ani ne'um yhvh lehoshi'ekha ki 'e'eseh khalah bekhal hagoyim 'asher hafizotikha sham 'akh 'otekha lo 'e'eseh khalah veyisartikha lamishpat venaqeh lo 'anaqeka. jeremiah 30:12	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'anush leshibrekh nakhlah makatekh. jeremiah 30:13	'en dan dinekh lemazor refu'ot te'alah 'en lakh. jeremiah 30:14	kal me'ahabayikh shekheikhukh 'otakh lo yidroshu ki makat 'oyeb hikitikh musar 'akhzari 'al rob 'avonekh 'azemu khatotayikh. jeremiah 30:15	mah tiz'aq 'al shibrekh 'anush makh'obekh 'al rob 'avonekh 'azemu khatotayikh 'asiti 'eleh lakh. jeremiah 30:16	lakhen kal 'okhelayikh yei'akheilu vekhal zarayikh kulam bashebi yeileikhu vehayu shosayikh limshisah vekhal bozezayikh 'eten labaz. jeremiah 30:17	ki 'a'aleh 'arukhah lakh umimakotayikh 'erpa'ekh ne'um yhvh ki nidakhah qare'u lakh ziyon hi doresh 'en lah. jeremiah 30:18	koh 'amar yhvh hini shab shebut 'aholei ya'aqob umishkenotav 'arakhem venibnetah 'ir 'al tilah ve'armon 'al mishpato yeisheb. jeremiah 30:19	veyaza meihem todah veqol mesakhaqim vehirbitim velo yim'atu vehikhbadtim velo yiz'aru. jeremiah 30:20	vehayu banav keqedem va'adato lefanai tikon ufaqadti 'al kal lokhazav. jeremiah 30:21	vehayah 'adiro mimenu umoshelo miqirbo yeizei vehiqrabtiv venigash 'eilai ki mi hu zeh 'arab 'et libo lageshet 'eilai ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 30:22	vihyitem li le'am ve'anokhi 'ehyeh lakhem leilohim. jeremiah 30:23	hineh sa'arat yhvh kheimah yaze'ah sa'ar mitgorer 'al rosh resha'im yakhul. jeremiah 30:24	lo yashub kharon 'af yhvh 'ad 'asoto ve'ad haqimo mezimot libo be'akharit hayamim titbonu bah. jeremiah 31:1	ba'et hahi ne'um yhvh 'ehyeh leilohim lekhol mishpekhot yisra'el vehemah yihyu li le'am. jeremiah 31:2	koh 'amar yhvh maza khen bamidbar 'am seridei khareb halokh lehargi'o yisra'el. jeremiah 31:3	meirakhoq yhvh nir'ah li ve'ahabat 'olam 'ahabtikh 'al ken meshakhtikh khased. jeremiah 31:4	'od 'ebnekh venibnet betulat yisra'el 'od ta'di tupayikh veyazat bimkhol mesakhaqim. jeremiah 31:5	'od tite'i kheramim beharei shomeron nate'u note'im vekhileilu. jeremiah 31:6	ki yesh yom qare'u nozerim behar 'efrayim qumu vena'aleh ziyon 'el yhvh 'eloheinu. jeremiah 31:7	ki khoh 'amar yhvh ranu leya'aqob simkhah vezahalu berosh hagoyim hashmi'u halu ve'imru hosha' yhvh 'et 'amekha 'et she'eirit yisra'el. jeremiah 31:8	hini meibi 'otam mei'erez zafon veqibaztim miyarketei 'arez bam 'iver ufiseiakh harah veyoledet yakhdav qahal gadol yashubu henah. jeremiah 31:9	bibkhi yabo'u ubetakhanunim 'obilem 'olikhem 'el nakhalei mayim bederekh yashar lo yikashelu bah ki hayiti leyisra'el le'ab ve'efrayim bekhori hu. jeremiah 31:10	shim'u debar yhvh goyim vehagidu ba'iyim mimerkhaq ve'imru mezareh yisra'el yeqabezenu ushemaro kero'eh 'edro. jeremiah 31:11	ki fadah yhvh 'et ya'aqob uge'alo miyad khazaq mimenu. jeremiah 31:12	uba'u verinenu bimrom ziyon venaharu 'el tub yhvh 'al dagan ve'al tirosh ve'al yizhar ve'al benei zon ubaqar vehayetah nafsham kegan raveh velo yosifu leda'abah 'od. jeremiah 31:13	'az tismakh betulah bemakhol ubakhurim uzeqeinim yakhdav vehafakhti 'eblam lesason venikhamtim vesimakhtim migonam. jeremiah 31:14	veriveiti nefesh hakohanim dashen ve'ami 'et tubi yisba'u ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 31:15	koh 'amar yhvh qol beramah nishma' nehi bekhi tamrurim rakhel mebakah 'al baneha mei'anah lehinakhem 'al baneha ki 'einenu. jeremiah 31:16	koh 'amar yhvh min'i qolekh mibekhi ve'einayikh midim'ah ki yesh sakhar lif'ulatekh ne'um yhvh veshabu mei'erez 'oyeb. jeremiah 31:17	veyesh tiqvah le'akharitekh ne'um yhvh veshabu banim ligbulam. jeremiah 31:18	shamoa' shama'ti 'efrayim mitnoded yisartani va'ivaser ke'eigel lo lumad hashibeini ve'ashubah ki 'atah yhvh 'elohai. jeremiah 31:19	ki 'akharei shubi nikhamti ve'akharei hivade'i safaqti 'al yarekh bosheti vegam nikhlamti ki nasati kherpat ne'urai. jeremiah 31:20	haben yaqir li 'efrayim 'im yeled sha'ashu'im ki midei daberi bo zakhor 'ezkerenu 'od 'al ken hamu mei'ai lo rakhem 'arakhamenu ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 31:21	hazibi lakh ziyunim simi lakh tamrurim shiti libekh lamsilah derekh halakheti halakhet ubi betulat yisra'el shubi 'el 'arayikh 'eleh. jeremiah 31:22	'ad matai titkhamaqin habat hashobeibah ki bara yhvh khadashah ba'arez neqeibah tesobeb gaber. jeremiah 31:23	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'od yomeru 'et hadabar hazeh be'erez yehudah ube'arav beshubi 'et shebutam yebarekhkha yhvh neveh zedeq har haqodesh. jeremiah 31:24	veyashebu bah yehudah vekhal 'arav yakhdav 'ikarim venase'u ba'eider. jeremiah 31:25	ki hirveiti nefesh 'ayeifah vekhal nefesh da'abah mileiti. jeremiah 31:26	'al zot heqizoti va'er'eh ushenati 'arebah li. jeremiah 31:27	hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh vezara'ti 'et bet yisra'el ve'et bet yehudah zera' 'adam vezera' beheimah. jeremiah 31:28	vehayah ka'asher shaqadti 'aleihem lintosh velintoz velaharos uleha'abid ulehareia' ken 'eshqod 'aleihem libnot velintoa' ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 31:29	bayamim hahem lo yomeru 'od 'abot 'akhelu boser veshinei banim tiqhenah. jeremiah 31:30	ki 'im 'ish ba'avono yamut kal ha'adam ha'okhel haboser tiqhenah shinav. jeremiah 31:31	hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh vekharati 'et bet yisra'el ve'et bet yehudah berit khadashah. jeremiah 31:32	lo khaberit 'asher karati 'et 'abotam beyom hekheziqi beyadam lehozi'am mei'erez mizrayim 'asher hemah heifeiru 'et beriti ve'anokhi ba'alti bam ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 31:33	ki zot haberit 'asher 'ekhrot 'et bet yisra'el 'akharei hayamim hahem ne'um yhvh natati 'et torati beqirbam ve'al libam 'ekhtabenah vehayiti lahem leilohim vehemah yihyu li le'am. jeremiah 31:34	velo yelamedu 'od 'ish 'et rei'eihu ve'ish 'et 'akhiv leimor de'u 'et yhvh ki khulam yeide'u 'oti lemiqtanam ve'ad gedolam ne'um yhvh ki 'eslakh la'avonam ulekhatatam lo 'ezkar 'od. jeremiah 31:35	koh 'amar yhvh noten shemesh le'or yomam khuqot yareiakh vekhokhabim le'or layelah roga' hayam vayehemu galav yhvh zeba'ot shemo. jeremiah 31:36	'im yamushu hakhuqim ha'eleh milefanai ne'um yhvh gam zera' yisra'el yishbetu mihyot go lefanai kal hayamim. jeremiah 31:37	koh 'amar yhvh 'im yimadu shamayim milma'lah veyeikhaqeru mosdei 'erez lematah gam 'ani 'em'as bekhal zera' yisra'el 'al kal 'asher 'asu ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 31:38	hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh venibnetah ha'ir yhvh mimigdal khanan'el sha'ar hapinah. jeremiah 31:39	veyaza 'od qeveh qav hamidah negdo 'al gib'at gareb venasab go'atah. jeremiah 31:40	vekhal ha'eimeq hapegarim vehadeshen vekhal hashereimot hashedeimot 'ad nakhal qidron 'ad pinat sha'ar hasusim mizrakhah qodesh yhvh lo yinatesh velo yeihares 'od le'olam. jeremiah 32:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh bishnat bashanah ha'asirit lezidqiyahu melekh yehudah hi hashanah shemoneh 'esreh shanah linbukhadrezar. jeremiah 32:2	ve'az khel melekh babel zarim 'al yerushalim veyirmeyahu hanabi hayah khalu bakhazar hamatarah 'asher bet melekh yehudah. jeremiah 32:3	'asher kela'o zidqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor madua' 'atah niba leimor koh 'amar yhvh hini noten 'et ha'ir hazot beyad melekh babel ulekhadah. jeremiah 32:4	vezidqiyahu melekh yehudah lo yimalet miyad hakasdim ki hinaton yinaten beyad melekh babel vediber piv 'im piv ve'einav 'et 'eino 'einav tir'enah. jeremiah 32:5	ubabel yolikh 'et zidqiyahu vesham yihyeh 'ad paqedi 'oto ne'um yhvh ki tilakhamu 'et hakasdim lo tazlikhu. jeremiah 32:6	vayomer yirmeyahu hayah debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. jeremiah 32:7	hineh khanam'el ben shalum dodekha ba 'eilekha leimor qeneh lekha 'et sadi 'asher ba'anatot ki lekha mishpat hage'ulah liqnot. jeremiah 32:8	vayabo 'eilai khanam'el ben dodi kidbar yhvh 'el khazar hamatarah vayomer 'eilai qeneh na 'et sadi 'asher ba'anatot 'asher be'erez binyamin ki lekha mishpat hayrushah ulekha hage'ulah qeneh lakh va'eida' ki debar yhvh hu. jeremiah 32:9	va'eqneh 'et hasadeh mei'et khanam'el ben dodi 'asher ba'anatot va'eshqalah lo 'et hakesef shib'ah sheqalim va'asarah hakasef. jeremiah 32:10	va'ekhtob baseifer va'ekhtom va'a'ed 'eidim va'eshqol hakesef bemozenayim. jeremiah 32:11	va'eqakh 'et seifer hamiqnah 'et hekhatum hamizvah vehakhuqim ve'et hagalui. jeremiah 32:12	va'eten 'et haseifer hamiqnah 'el barukh ben neiriyah ben makhseiyah le'einei khanam'el dodi ule'einei ha'eidim hakotebim beseifer hamiqnah le'einei kal hayehudim hayoshebim bakhazar hamatarah. jeremiah 32:13	va'azaveh 'et barukh le'eineihem leimor. jeremiah 32:14	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el laqoakh 'et hasefarim ha'eleh 'et seifer hamiqnah hazeh ve'et hekhatum ve'et seifer hagalui hazeh unetatam bikhli khares lema'an ya'amdu yamim rabim. jeremiah 32:15	ki khoh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'od yiqanu batim vesadot ukheramim ba'arez hazot. jeremiah 32:16	va'etpalel 'el yhvh 'akharei titi 'et seifer hamiqnah 'el barukh ben neiriyah leimor. jeremiah 32:17	'ahah 'adonai yhvh hineh 'atah 'asita 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez bekhokhakha hagadol ubizro'akha hanetuyah lo yipalei mimekha kal dabar. jeremiah 32:18	'oseh khesed la'alafim umeshalem 'avon 'abot 'el kheq beneihem 'akhareihem ha'el hagadol hagibor yhvh zeba'ot shemo. jeremiah 32:19	gedol ha'eizah verab ha'aliliyah 'asher 'einekha fequkhot 'al kal darkhei benei 'adam latet le'ish kidrakhav vekhifri ma'alalav. jeremiah 32:20	'ashersa meta 'otot umofetim be'erez mizrayim 'ad hayom hazeh ubeyisra'el uba'adam vata'aseh lekha shem kayom hazeh. jeremiah 32:21	vatozei 'et 'amekha 'et yisra'el mei'erez mizrayim be'otot ubemoftim ubeyad khazaqah ube'ezroa' netuyah ubemora gadol. jeremiah 32:22	vatiten lahem 'et ha'arez hazot 'asher nishba'ta la'abotam latet lahem 'erez zabat khalab udebash. jeremiah 32:23	vayabo'u vayirshu 'otah velo shame'u beqolekha ubetorotekha ubetoratekha lo halakhu 'et kal 'asher zivitah lahem la'asot lo 'asu vataqrei 'otam 'et kal hara'ah hazot. jeremiah 32:24	hineh hasolelot ba'u ha'ir lelakhedah veha'ir nitenah beyad hakasdim hanilkhamim 'aleha mipenei hakhereb vehara'ab vehadaber va'asher dibarta hayah vehinekha ro'eh. jeremiah 32:25	ve'atah 'amarta 'eilai 'adonai yhvh qeneh lekha hasadeh bakesef veha'ed 'eidim veha'ir nitenah beyad hakasdim. jeremiah 32:26	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu leimor. jeremiah 32:27	hineh 'ani yhvh 'elohei kal basar hamimeni yipalei kal dabar. jeremiah 32:28	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh hini noten 'et ha'ir hazot beyad hakasdim ubeyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel ulekhadah.
