jeremiah 32:29	uba'u hakasdim hanilkhamim 'al ha'ir hazot vehizitu 'et ha'ir hazot ba'esh userafuha ve'et habatim 'asher qiteru 'al gagoteihem laba'al vehisikhu nesakhim leilohim 'akheirim lema'an hakh'iseini. jeremiah 32:30	ki hayu benei yisra'el ubenei yehudah 'akh 'osim hara' be'einai mine'uroteihem ki benei yisra'el 'akh makh'isim 'oti bema'aseh yedeihem ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 32:31	ki 'al 'api ve'al khamati hayetah li ha'ir hazot lemin hayom 'asher banu 'otah ve'ad hayom hazeh lahasirah mei'al panai. jeremiah 32:32	'al kal ra'at benei yisra'el ubenei yehudah 'asher 'asu lehakh'iseini hemah malkheihem sareihem kohaneihem unebi'eihem ve'ish yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim. jeremiah 32:33	vayifnu 'eilai 'oref velo fanim velamed 'otam hashkem velamed ve'einam shome'im laqakhat musar. jeremiah 32:34	vayasimu shiquzeihem babayit 'asher niqra shemi 'alav letame'o. jeremiah 32:35	vayibnu 'et bamot haba'al 'asher begei ben hinom leha'abir 'et beneihem ve'et benoteihem lamolekh 'asher lo zivitim velo 'aletah 'al libi la'asot hato'eibah hazot lema'an hakhati hakhati 'et yehudah. jeremiah 32:36	ve'atah lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'el ha'ir hazot 'asher 'atem 'omerim nitenah beyad melekh babel bakhereb ubara'ab ubadaber. jeremiah 32:37	hini meqabezam mikal ha'arazot 'asher hidakhtim sham be'api ubakhamati ubeqezef gadol vahashibotim 'el hamaqom hazeh vehoshabtim labetakh. jeremiah 32:38	vehayu li le'am va'ani 'ehyeh lahem leilohim. jeremiah 32:39	venatati lahem leb 'ekhad vederekh 'ekhad leyir'ah 'oti kal hayamim letob lahem velibneihem 'akhareihem. jeremiah 32:40	vekharati lahem berit 'olam 'asher lo 'ashub mei'akhareihem leheitibi 'otam ve'et yir'ati 'eten bilbabam lebilti sur mei'alai. jeremiah 32:41	vesasti 'aleihem leheitib 'otam uneta'tim ba'arez hazot be'emet bekhal libi ubekhal nafshi. jeremiah 32:42	ki khoh 'amar yhvh ka'asher heibeiti 'el ha'am hazeh 'et kal hara'ah hagedolah hazot ken 'anokhi meibi 'aleihem 'et kal hatobah 'asher 'anokhi dober 'aleihem. jeremiah 32:43	veniqnah hasadeh ba'arez hazot 'asher 'atem 'omerim shemamah hi mei'en 'adam ubeheimah nitenah beyad hakasdim. jeremiah 32:44	sadot bakesef yiqnu vekhatob baseifer vekhatom veha'ed 'eidim be'erez binyamin ubisbibei yerushalim ube'arei yehudah ube'arei hahar ube'arei hashefeilah ube'arei hanegeb ki 'ashib 'et shebutam ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 33:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu sheinit vehu 'odenu 'azur bakhazar hamatarah leimor. jeremiah 33:2	koh 'amar yhvh 'osah yhvh yozer 'otah lahakhinah yhvh shemo. jeremiah 33:3	qera 'eilai ve'e'eneka ve'agidah lekha gedolot ubezurot lo yeda'tam. jeremiah 33:4	ki khoh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'al batei ha'ir hazot ve'al batei malkhei yehudah hanetuzim 'el hasolelot ve'el hekhareb. jeremiah 33:5	ba'im lehilakhem 'et hakasdim ulemal'am 'et pigrei ha'adam 'asher hikeiti be'api ubakhamati va'asher histarti fanai meiha'ir hazot 'al kal ra'atam. jeremiah 33:6	hini ma'aleh lah 'arukhah umarpei urefatim vegileiti lahem 'ateret shalom ve'emet. jeremiah 33:7	vahashiboti 'et shebut yehudah ve'et shebut yisra'el ubenitim kebarishonah. jeremiah 33:8	vetihartim mikal 'avonam 'asher khate'u li vesalakhti lekhol lekhal 'avonoteihem 'asher khate'u li va'asher pashe'u bi. jeremiah 33:9	vehayetah li leshem sason lithilah uletif'eret lekhol goyei ha'arez 'asher yishme'u 'et kal hatobah 'asher 'anokhi 'oseh 'otam ufakhadu veragezu 'al kal hatobah ve'al kal hashalom 'asher 'anokhi 'oseh lah. jeremiah 33:10	koh 'amar yhvh 'od yishama' bamaqom hazeh 'asher 'atem 'omerim khareb hu mei'en 'adam umei'en beheimah be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim hanshamot mei'en 'adam umei'en yosheb umei'en beheimah. jeremiah 33:11	qol sason veqol simkhah qol khatan veqol kalah qol 'omerim hodu 'et yhvh zeba'ot ki tob yhvh ki le'olam khasdo mebi'im todah bet yhvh ki 'ashib 'et shebut ha'arez kebarishonah 'amar yhvh. jeremiah 33:12	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'od yihyeh bamaqom hazeh hekhareb mei'en 'adam ve'ad beheimah ubekhal 'arav neveh ro'im marbizim zon. jeremiah 33:13	be'arei hahar be'arei hashefeilah ube'arei hanegeb ube'erez binyamin ubisbibei yerushalim ube'arei yehudah 'od ta'aborenah hazon 'al yedei moneh 'amar yhvh. jeremiah 33:14	hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh vahaqimoti 'et hadabar hatob 'asher dibarti 'el bet yisra'el ve'al bet yehudah. jeremiah 33:15	bayamim hahem uba'et hahi 'azmiakh ledavid zemakh zedaqah ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah ba'arez. jeremiah 33:16	bayamim hahem tivasha' yehudah virushalim tishkon labetakh vezeh 'asher yiqra lah yhvh zidqeinu. jeremiah 33:17	ki khoh 'amar yhvh lo yikaret ledavid 'ish yosheb 'al kisei bet yisra'el. jeremiah 33:18	velakohanim halviyim lo yikaret 'ish milefanai ma'aleh 'olah umaqtir minkhah ve'oseh zebakh kal hayamim. jeremiah 33:19	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu leimor. jeremiah 33:20	koh 'amar yhvh 'im tafeiru 'et beriti hayom ve'et beriti halayelah ulebilti heyot yomam valaylah be'itam. jeremiah 33:21	gam beriti tufar 'et david 'abdi mihyot lo ben molekh 'al kis'o ve'et halviyim hakohanim mesharetai. jeremiah 33:22	'asher lo yisafer zeba hashamayim velo yimad khol hayam ken 'arbeh 'et zera' david 'abdi ve'et halviyim mesharetei 'oti. jeremiah 33:23	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu leimor. jeremiah 33:24	halo ra'ita mah ha'am hazeh diberu leimor shetei hamishpakhot 'asher bakhar yhvh bahem vayim'asem ve'et 'ami yin'azun mihyot 'od go lifneihem. jeremiah 33:25	koh 'amar yhvh 'im lo beriti yomam valayelah khuqot shamayim va'arez lo sameti. jeremiah 33:26	gam zera' ya'aqob vedavid 'abdi 'em'as miqakhat mizar'o moshelim 'el zera' 'abraham yiskhaq veya'aqob ki 'ashub 'ashib 'et shebutam verikhamtim. jeremiah 34:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh unebukhadrezar melekh babel vekhal kheilo vekhal mamlekhot 'erez memshelet yado vekhal ha'amim nilkhamim 'al yerushalim ve'al kal 'areha leimor. jeremiah 34:2	koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el halokh ve'amarta 'el zidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve'amarta 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh hini noten 'et ha'ir hazot beyad melekh babel userafah ba'esh. jeremiah 34:3	ve'atah lo timalet miyado ki tafos titafes ubeyado tinaten ve'einekha 'et 'einei melekh babel tir'enah ufihu 'et pikha yedaber ubabel tabo. jeremiah 34:4	'akh shema' debar yhvh zidqiyahu melekh yehudah koh 'amar yhvh 'alekha lo tamut bekhareb. jeremiah 34:5	beshalom tamut ukhemisrefot 'abotekha hamelakhim harishonim 'asher hayu lefanekha ken yisrefu lakh veho 'adon yispedu lakh ki dabar 'ani dibarti ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 34:6	vaydaber yirmeyahu hanabi 'el zidqiyahu melekh yehudah 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh birushalim. jeremiah 34:7	vekhel melekh babel nilkhamim 'al yerushalim ve'al kal 'arei yehudah hanotarot 'el lakhish ve'el 'azeiqah ki henah nish'aru be'arei yehudah 'arei mibzar. jeremiah 34:8	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh 'akharei kerot hamelekh zidqiyahu berit 'et kal ha'am 'asher birushalim liqro lahem deror. jeremiah 34:9	leshalakh 'ish 'et 'abdo ve'ish 'et shifkhato ha'ibri veha'ibriyah khafeshim lebilti 'abad bam bihudi 'akhihu 'ish. jeremiah 34:10	vayishme'u khal hasarim vekhal ha'am 'asher ba'u baberit leshalakh 'ish 'et 'abdo ve'ish 'et shifkhato khafeshim lebilti 'abad bam 'od vayishme'u vayshaleikhu. jeremiah 34:11	vayashubu 'akharei khen vayashibu 'et ha'abadim ve'et hashefakhot 'asher shilekhu khafeshim vayakhbishum vayikhbeshum la'abadim velishfakhot. jeremiah 34:12	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh leimor. jeremiah 34:13	koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'anokhi karati berit 'et 'aboteikhem beyom hozi'i 'otam mei'erez mizrayim mibet 'abadim leimor. jeremiah 34:14	miqez sheba' shanim teshalekhu 'ish 'et 'akhiv ha'ibri 'asher yimakher lekha va'abadekha shesh shanim veshilakhto khafeshi mei'imakh velo shame'u 'aboteikhem 'eilai velo hitu 'et 'azenam. jeremiah 34:15	vatashubu 'atem hayom vata'asu 'et hayashar be'einai liqro deror 'ish lerei'eihu vatikhretu berit lefanai babayit 'asher niqra shemi 'alav. jeremiah 34:16	vatashubu vatekhalelu 'et shemi vatashibu 'ish 'et 'abdo ve'ish 'et shifkhato 'asher shilakhtem khafeshim lenafsham vatikhbeshu 'otam lihyot lakhem la'abadim velishfakhot. jeremiah 34:17	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'atem lo shema'tem 'eilai liqro deror 'ish le'akhiv ve'ish lerei'eihu hini qorei lakhem deror ne'um yhvh 'el hakhereb 'el hadeber ve'el hara'ab venatati 'etkhem lizva'ah leza'avah lekhol mamlekhot ha'arez. jeremiah 34:18	venatati 'et ha'anashim ha'oberim 'et beriti 'asher lo heiqimu 'et dibrei haberit 'asher karetu lefanai ha'eigel 'asher karetu lishnayim vaya'abru ben betarav. jeremiah 34:19	sarei yehudah vesarei yerushalim hasarisim vehakohanim vekhol 'am ha'arez ha'oberim ben bitrei ha'eigel. jeremiah 34:20	venatati 'otam beyad 'oyebeihem ubeyad mebaqshei nafsham vehayetah niblatam lema'akhal le'of hashamayim ulebehemat ha'arez. jeremiah 34:21	ve'et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah ve'et sarav 'eten beyad 'oyebeihem ubeyad mebaqshei nafsham ubeyad khel melekh babel ha'olim mei'aleikhem. jeremiah 34:22	hini mezaveh ne'um yhvh vahashibotim 'el ha'ir hazot venilkhamu 'aleha ulekhaduha userafuha ba'esh ve'et 'arei yehudah 'eten shemamah mei'en yosheb. jeremiah 35:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh bimei yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah leimor. jeremiah 35:2	halokh 'el bet hareikhabim vedibarta 'otam vahabi'otam bet yhvh 'el 'akhat haleshakhot vehishqita 'otam yayin. jeremiah 35:3	va'eqakh 'et ya'azanyah ben yirmeyahu ben khabazinyah ve'et 'ekhav ve'et kal banav ve'et kal bet hareikhabim. jeremiah 35:4	va'abi 'otam bet yhvh 'el lishkat benei khanan ben yigdalyahu 'ish ha'elohim 'asher 'eizel lishkat hasarim 'asher mima'al lelishkat ma'aseiyahu ben shalum shomer hasaf. jeremiah 35:5	va'eten lifnei benei bet hareikhabim gebi'im melei'im yayin vekhosot va'omar 'aleihem shetu yayin. jeremiah 35:6	vayomeru lo nishteh yayin ki yonadab ben reikhab 'abinu zivah 'aleinu leimor lo tishtu yayin 'atem ubeneikhem 'ad 'olam. jeremiah 35:7	ubayit lo tibnu vezera' lo tizra'u vekherem lo tita'u velo yihyeh lakhem ki ba'ohalim teishebu kal yemeikhem lema'an tikhyu yamim rabim 'al penei ha'adamah 'asher 'atem garim sham. jeremiah 35:8	vanishma' beqol yehonadab ben reikhab 'abinu lekhol 'asher zivanu lebilti shetot yayin kal yameinu 'anakhnu nasheinu baneinu ubenoteinu. jeremiah 35:9	ulebilti benot batim leshibteinu vekherem vesadeh vazera' lo yihyeh lanu. jeremiah 35:10	vaneisheb ba'ohalim vanishma' vana'as kekhol 'asher zivanu yonadab 'abinu. jeremiah 35:11	vayhi ba'alot nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'el ha'arez vanomer bo'u venabo yerushalim mipenei khel hakasdim umipenei khel 'aram vaneisheb birushalim. jeremiah 35:12	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu leimor. jeremiah 35:13	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el halokh ve'amarta le'ish yehudah uleyoshebei yerushalim halo tiqkhu musar lishmoa' 'el debarai ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 35:14	huqam 'et dibrei yehonadab ben reikhab 'asher zivah 'et banav lebilti shetot yayin velo shatu 'ad hayom hazeh ki shame'u 'et mizvat 'abihem ve'anokhi dibarti 'aleikhem hashkem vedaber velo shema'tem 'eilai. jeremiah 35:15	va'eshlakh 'aleikhem 'et kal 'abadai hanebi'im hashkem veshaloakh leimor shubu na 'ish midarko hara'ah veheitibu ma'aleikhem ve'al teilekhu 'akharei 'elohim 'akheirim le'abedam ushebu 'el ha'adamah 'asher natati lakhem vela'aboteikhem velo hititem 'et 'azenekhem velo shema'tem 'eilai. jeremiah 35:16	ki heiqimu benei yehonadab ben reikhab 'et mizvat 'abihem 'asher zivam veha'am hazeh lo shame'u 'eilai. jeremiah 35:17	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini meibi 'el yehudah ve'el kal yoshebei yerushalim 'et kal hara'ah 'asher dibarti 'aleihem ya'an dibarti 'aleihem velo shamei'u va'eqra lahem velo 'anu. jeremiah 35:18	ulebet hareikhabim 'amar yirmeyahu koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el ya'an 'asher shema'tem 'al mizvat yehonadab 'abikhem vatishmeru 'et kal mizvotav vata'asu kekhol 'asher zivah 'etkhem. jeremiah 35:19	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el lo yikaret 'ish leyonadab ben reikhab 'omed lefanai kal hayamim. jeremiah 36:1	vayhi bashanah harebi'it lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah hayah hadabar hazeh 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh leimor. jeremiah 36:2	qakh lekha megilat seifer vekhatabta 'eileha 'et kal hadebarim 'asher dibarti 'eilekha 'al yisra'el ve'al yehudah ve'al kal hagoyim miyom dibarti 'eilekha mimei yoshiyahu ve'ad hayom hazeh. jeremiah 36:3	'ulai yishme'u bet yehudah 'et kal hara'ah 'asher 'anokhi khosheb la'asot lahem lema'an yashubu 'ish midarko hara'ah vesalakhti la'avonam ulekhatatam. jeremiah 36:4	vayiqra yirmeyahu 'et barukh ben neiriyah vayikhtob barukh mipi yirmeyahu 'et kal dibrei yhvh 'asher diber 'eilav 'al megilat seifer. jeremiah 36:5	vayzaveh yirmeyahu 'et barukh leimor 'ani 'azur lo 'ukhal labo bet yhvh. jeremiah 36:6	ubata 'atah veqarata bamegilah 'asher katabta mipi 'et dibrei yhvh be'azenei ha'am bet yhvh beyom zom vegam be'azenei khal yehudah haba'im mei'areihem tiqra'em. jeremiah 36:7	'ulai tipol tekhinatam lifnei yhvh veyashubu 'ish midarko hara'ah ki gadol ha'af vehakheimah 'asher diber yhvh 'el ha'am hazeh. jeremiah 36:8	vaya'as barukh ben neiriyah kekhol 'asher zivahu yirmeyahu hanabi liqro baseifer dibrei yhvh bet yhvh. jeremiah 36:9	vayhi bashanah hakhamishit lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah bakhodesh hateshi'i qare'u zom lifnei yhvh kal ha'am birushalim vekhal ha'am haba'im mei'arei yehudah birushalim. jeremiah 36:10	vayiqra barukh baseifer 'et dibrei yirmeyahu bet yhvh belishkat gemaryahu ben shafan hasofer bekhazer ha'elyon petakh sha'ar bet yhvh hekhadash be'azenei kal ha'am. jeremiah 36:11	vayishma' mikhayehu ben gemaryahu ben shafan 'et kal dibrei yhvh mei'al haseifer. jeremiah 36:12	vayeired bet hamelekh 'al lishkat hasofer vehineh sham kal hasarim yoshebim 'elishama' hasofer udelayahu benosh ma'yahu ve'elnatan ben 'akhbor ugemaryahu ben shafan vezidqiyahu ben khananyahu vekhal hasarim. jeremiah 36:13	vayaged lahem mikhayehu 'et kal hadebarim 'asher shameia' biqro barukh baseifer be'azenei ha'am. jeremiah 36:14	vayishlekhu khal hasarim 'el barukh 'et yehudi ben netanyahu ben shelemyahu ben kushi leimor hamegilah 'asher qarata bah be'azenei ha'am qakhenah beyadekha valekh vayiqakh barukh ben neiriyahu 'et hamegilah beyado vayabo 'aleihem. jeremiah 36:15	vayomeru 'eilav sheb na uqera'enah be'azeneinu vayiqra barukh be'azeneihem. jeremiah 36:16	vayhi keshame'am 'et kal hadebarim pakhadu 'ish 'el rei'eihu vayomeru 'el barukh haged nagid lamelekh 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. jeremiah 36:17	ve'et barukh sha'alu leimor haged na lanu 'ekh katabta 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh mipiv. jeremiah 36:18	vayomer lahem barukh mipiv yiqra 'eilai 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh va'ani koteb 'al haseifer badeyo. jeremiah 36:19	vayomeru hasarim 'el barukh lekh hisater 'atah veyirmeyahu ve'ish 'al yeida' 'eifoh 'atem. jeremiah 36:20	vayabo'u 'el hamelekh khazeirah ve'et hamegilah hifqidu belishkat 'elishama' hasofer vayagidu be'azenei hamelekh 'et kal hadebarim. jeremiah 36:21	vayishlakh hamelekh 'et yehudi laqakhat 'et hamegilah vayiqakheha milishkat 'elishama' hasofer vayiqra'eha yehudi be'azenei hamelekh ube'azenei kal hasarim ha'omedim mei'al hamelekh. jeremiah 36:22	vehamelekh yosheb bet hakhoref bakhodesh hateshi'i ve'et ha'akh lefanav mebo'aret. jeremiah 36:23	vayhi kiqro yehudi shalosh delatot ve'arba'ah yiqra'eha beta'ar hasofer vehashlekh 'el ha'esh 'asher 'el ha'akh 'ad tom kal hamegilah 'al ha'esh 'asher 'al ha'akh. jeremiah 36:24	velo fakhadu velo qare'u 'et bigdeihem hamelekh vekhal 'abadav hashome'im 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. jeremiah 36:25	vegam 'elnatan udelayahu ugemaryahu hifgi'u bamelekh lebilti serof 'et hamegilah velo shama' 'aleihem. jeremiah 36:26	vayzaveh hamelekh 'et yerakhme'el ben hamelekh ve'et serayahu ben 'azri'el ve'et shelemyahu ben 'abde'el laqakhat 'et barukh hasofer ve'et yirmeyahu hanabi vayastirem yhvh. jeremiah 36:27	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu 'akharei serof hamelekh 'et hamegilah ve'et hadebarim 'asher katab barukh mipi yirmeyahu leimor. jeremiah 36:28	shub qakh lekha megilah 'akheret ukhetob 'aleha 'et kal hadebarim harishonim 'asher hayu 'al hamegilah harishonah 'asher saraf yehoyaqim melekh yehudah. jeremiah 36:29	ve'al yehoyaqim melekh yehudah tomar koh 'amar yhvh 'atah sarafta 'et hamegilah hazot leimor madua' katabta 'aleha leimor bo yabo melekh babel vehishkhit 'et ha'arez hazot vehishbit mimenah 'adam ubeheimah. jeremiah 36:30	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh 'al yehoyaqim melekh yehudah lo yihyeh lo yosheb 'al kisei david veniblato tihyeh mushlekhet lakhoreb bayom velaqerakh balayelah. jeremiah 36:31	ufaqadti 'alav ve'al zar'o ve'al 'abadav 'et 'avonam veheibeiti 'aleihem ve'al yoshebei yerushalim ve'el 'ish yehudah 'et kal hara'ah 'asher dibarti 'aleihem velo shamei'u. jeremiah 36:32	veyirmeyahu laqakh megilah 'akheret vayitenah 'el barukh ben neiriyahu hasofer vayikhtob 'aleha mipi yirmeyahu 'et kal dibrei haseifer 'asher saraf yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ba'esh ve'od nosaf 'aleihem debarim rabim kahemah. jeremiah 37:1	vayimlakh melekh zidqiyahu ben yoshiyahu takhat kaneyahu ben yehoyaqim 'asher himlikh nebukhadrezar melekh babel be'erez yehudah. jeremiah 37:2	velo shama' hu va'abadav ve'am ha'arez 'el dibrei yhvh 'asher diber beyad yirmeyahu hanabi. jeremiah 37:3	vayishlakh hamelekh zidqiyahu 'et yehukhal ben shelemyah ve'et zefanyahu ben ma'aseiyah hakohen 'el yirmeyahu hanabi leimor hitpalel na ba'adeinu 'el yhvh 'eloheinu. jeremiah 37:4	veyirmeyahu ba veyozei betokh ha'am velo natenu 'oto bet hakeli hakelu. jeremiah 37:5	vekhel par'oh yaza mimizrayim vayishme'u hakasdim hazarim 'al yerushalim 'et shim'am vayei'alu mei'al yerushalim. jeremiah 37:6	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu hanabi leimor. jeremiah 37:7	koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el koh tomeru 'el melekh yehudah hasholeiakh 'etkhem 'eilai ledaresheini hineh khel par'oh hayozei lakhem le'ezrah shab le'arzo mizrayim. jeremiah 37:8	veshabu hakasdim venilkhamu 'al ha'ir hazot ulekhaduha userafuha ba'esh. jeremiah 37:9	koh 'amar yhvh 'al tashi'u nafshoteikhem leimor halokh yeilekhu mei'aleinu hakasdim ki lo yeileikhu. jeremiah 37:10	ki 'im hikitem kal khel kasdim hanilkhamim 'itekhem venish'aru bam 'anashim meduqarim 'ish be'aholo yaqumu vesarefu 'et ha'ir hazot ba'esh. jeremiah 37:11	vehayah behei'alot khel hakasdim mei'al yerushalim mipenei khel par'oh. jeremiah 37:12	vayeizei yirmeyahu mirushalim lalekhet 'erez binyamin lakhaliq misham betokh ha'am. jeremiah 37:13	vayhi hu besha'ar binyamin vesham ba'al peqidut ushemo yir'iyayh ben shelemyah ben khananyah vayitpos 'et yirmeyahu hanabi leimor 'el hakasdim 'atah nofel. jeremiah 37:14	vayomer yirmeyahu sheqer 'eineni nofel 'al hakasdim velo shama' 'eilav vayitpos yir'iyayh beyirmeyahu vaybi'eihu 'el hasarim. jeremiah 37:15	vayiqzefu hasarim 'al yirmeyahu vehiku 'oto venatenu 'oto bet ha'eisur bet yehonatan hasofer ki 'oto 'asu lebet hakele. jeremiah 37:16	ki ba yirmeyahu 'el bet habor ve'el hakhanuyot vayeisheb sham yirmeyahu yamim rabim. jeremiah 37:17	vayishlakh hamelekh zidqiyahu vayiqakheihu vayish'aleihu hamelekh bebeito baseiter vayomer hayesh dabar mei'et yhvh vayomer yirmeyahu yesh vayomer beyad melekh babel tinaten. jeremiah 37:18	vayomer yirmeyahu 'el hamelekh zidqiyahu meh khatati lekha vela'abadekha vela'am hazeh ki netatem 'oti 'el bet hakele. jeremiah 37:19	ve'ayo ve'ayeh nebi'eikhem 'asher nibe'u lakhem leimor lo yabo melekh babel 'aleikhem ve'al ha'arez hazot. jeremiah 37:20	ve'atah shema' na 'adoni hamelekh tipal na tekhinati lefanekha ve'al teshibeini bet yehonatan hasofer velo 'amut sham. jeremiah 37:21	vayzaveh hamelekh zidqiyahu vayafqidu 'et yirmeyahu bakhazar hamatarah venaton lo khikar lekhem layom mikhuz ha'ofim 'ad tom kal halekhem min ha'ir vayeisheb yirmeyahu bakhazar hamatarah. jeremiah 38:1	vayishma' shefatyah ben matan ugedalyahu ben pashkhur veyukhal ben shelemyahu ufashkhur ben malkiyah 'et hadebarim 'asher yirmeyahu medaber 'el kal ha'am leimor. jeremiah 38:2	koh 'amar yhvh hayosheb ba'ir hazot yamut bakhereb bara'ab ubadaber vehayozei 'el hakasdim yikhyeh vekhayah vehayetah lo nafsho leshalal vakhai. jeremiah 38:3	koh 'amar yhvh hinaton tinaten ha'ir hazot beyad khel melekh babel ulekhadah. jeremiah 38:4	vayomeru hasarim 'el hamelekh yumat na 'et ha'ish hazeh ki 'al ken hu merapei 'et yedei 'anshei hamilkhamah hanish'arim ba'ir hazot ve'et yedei khal ha'am ledaber 'aleihem kadebarim ha'eleh ki ha'ish hazeh 'einenu doresh leshalom la'am hazeh ki 'im lera'ah. jeremiah 38:5	vayomer hamelekh zidqiyahu hineh hu beyedkhem ki 'en hamelekh yukhal 'etkhem dabar. jeremiah 38:6	vayiqkhu 'et yirmeyahu vayashlikhu 'oto 'el habor malkiyahu ben hamelekh 'asher bakhazar hamatarah vayshalekhu 'et yirmeyahu bakhabalim ubabor 'en mayim ki 'im tit vayitba' yirmeyahu batit. jeremiah 38:7	vayishma' 'ebed melekh hakushi 'ish saris vehu bebet hamelekh ki natenu 'et yirmeyahu 'el habor vehamelekh yosheb besha'ar binyamin. jeremiah 38:8	vayeizei 'ebed melekh mibet hamelekh vaydaber 'el hamelekh leimor. jeremiah 38:9	'adoni hamelekh heirei'u ha'anashim ha'eleh 'et kal 'asher 'asu leyirmeyahu hanabi 'et 'asher hishlikhu 'el habor vayamat takhtav mipenei hara'ab ki 'en halekhem 'od ba'ir. jeremiah 38:10	vayzaveh hamelekh 'et 'ebed melekh hakushi leimor qakh beyadekha mizeh sheloshim 'anashim veha'alita 'et yirmeyahu hanabi min habor beterem yamut. jeremiah 38:11	vayiqakh 'ebed melekh 'et ha'anashim beyado vayabo bet hamelekh 'el takhat ha'ozar vayiqakh misham beloyei hasekhabot sekhabot ubeloyei melakhim vayshalekhem 'el yirmeyahu 'el habor bakhabalim. jeremiah 38:12	vayomer 'ebed melekh hakushi 'el yirmeyahu sim na belo'ei hasekhabot vehamelakhim takhat 'azilot yadekha mitakhat lakhabalim vaya'as yirmeyahu ken. jeremiah 38:13	vayimshekhu 'et yirmeyahu bakhabalim vaya'alu 'oto min habor vayeisheb yirmeyahu bakhazar hamatarah. jeremiah 38:14	vayishlakh hamelekh zidqiyahu vayiqakh 'et yirmeyahu hanabi 'eilav 'el mabo hashelishi 'asher bebet yhvh vayomer hamelekh 'el yirmeyahu sho'el 'ani 'otekha dabar 'al tekhakhed mimeni dabar. jeremiah 38:15	vayomer yirmeyahu 'el zidqiyahu ki 'agid lekha halo hamet temiteini vekhi 'i'azekha lo tishma' 'eilai. jeremiah 38:16	vayishaba' hamelekh zidqiyahu 'el yirmeyahu baseiter leimor khai yhvh 'et 'asher 'asah lanu 'et hanefesh hazot 'im 'amitekha ve'im 'etenkha beyad ha'anashim ha'eleh 'asher mebaqshim 'et nafshekha. jeremiah 38:17	vayomer yirmeyahu 'el zidqiyahu koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'im yazo teizei 'el sarei melekh babel vekhayetah nafshekha veha'ir hazot lo tisaref ba'esh vekhayitah 'atah ubeitekha. jeremiah 38:18	ve'im lo teizei 'el sarei melekh babel venitenah ha'ir hazot beyad hakasdim userafuha ba'esh ve'atah lo timalet miyadam. jeremiah 38:19	vayomer hamelekh zidqiyahu 'el yirmeyahu 'ani do'eg 'et hayehudim 'asher nafelu 'el hakasdim pen yitenu 'oti beyadam vehit'alelu bi. jeremiah 38:20	vayomer yirmeyahu lo yiteinu shema' na beqol yhvh la'asher 'ani dober 'eilekha veyitab lekha utekhi nafshekha. jeremiah 38:21	ve'im ma'en 'atah lazet zeh hadabar 'asher hir'ani yhvh. jeremiah 38:22	vehineh khal hanashim 'asher nish'aru bebet melekh yehudah muza'ot 'el sarei melekh babel vehenah 'omerot hisitukha veyakhelu lekha 'anshei shelomekha hatebe'u baboz raglekha nasogu 'akhor. jeremiah 38:23	ve'et kal nashekha ve'et banekha mozi'im 'el hakasdim ve'atah lo timalet miyadam ki beyad melekh babel titafes ve'et ha'ir hazot tisrof ba'esh. jeremiah 38:24	vayomer zidqiyahu 'el yirmeyahu 'ish 'al yeida' badebarim ha'eleh velo tamut. jeremiah 38:25	vekhi yishme'u hasarim ki dibarti 'itakh uba'u 'eilekha ve'ameru 'eilekha hagidah na lanu mah dibarta 'el hamelekh 'al tekhakhed mimenu velo nemitekha umah diber 'eilekha hamelekh. jeremiah 38:26	ve'amarta 'aleihem mapil 'ani tekhinati lifnei hamelekh lebilti hashibeini bet yehonatan lamut sham. jeremiah 38:27	vayabo'u khal hasarim 'el yirmeyahu vayish'alu 'oto vayaged lahem kekhal hadebarim ha'eleh 'asher zivah hamelekh vayakharishu mimenu ki lo nishma' hadabar. jeremiah 38:28	vayeisheb yirmeyahu bakhazar hamatarah 'ad yom 'asher nilkedah yerushalim vehayah ka'asher nilkedah yerushalim. jeremiah 39:1	bashanah hateshi'it lezidqiyahu melekh yehudah bakhodesh ha'asiri ba nebukhadrezar melekh babel vekhal kheilo 'el yerushalim vayazuru 'aleha. jeremiah 39:2	be'ashtei 'esreh shanah lezidqiyahu bakhodesh harebi'i betish'ah lakhodesh habeqe'ah ha'ir. jeremiah 39:3	vayabo'u kol sarei melekh babel vayeishebu besha'ar hatavekh neiregal sar 'ezer samgar nebu sar sekhim rab saris neiregal sar 'ezer rab mag vekhal she'eirit sarei melekh babel. jeremiah 39:4	vayhi ka'asher ra'am zidqiyahu melekh yehudah vekhol 'anshei hamilkhamah vayibrekhu vayeize'u laylah min ha'ir derekh gan hamelekh besha'ar ben hakhomotayim vayeizei derekh ha'arabah. jeremiah 39:5	vayirdefu khel kasdim 'akhareihem vayasigu 'et zidqiyahu be'arbot yereikho vayiqkhu 'oto vaya'aluhu 'el nebukhadrezar melekh babel riblatah be'erez khamat vaydaber 'ito mishpatim. jeremiah 39:6	vayishkhat melekh babel 'et benei zidqiyahu beriblah le'einav ve'et kal khorei yehudah shakhat melekh babel. jeremiah 39:7	ve'et 'einei zidqiyahu 'iver vaya'asreihu bankhushtayim labi 'oto babelah. jeremiah 39:8	ve'et bet hamelekh ve'et bet ha'am sarefu hakasdim ba'esh ve'et khomot yerushalim natazu. jeremiah 39:9	ve'et yeter ha'am hanish'arim ba'ir ve'et hanofelim 'asher nafelu 'alav ve'et yeter ha'am hanish'arim heglah nebuzar 'adan rab tabakhim babel. jeremiah 39:10	umin ha'am hadalim 'asher 'en lahem me'umah hish'ir nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim be'erez yehudah vayiten lahem keramim vigeibim bayom hahu. jeremiah 39:11	vayzav nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'al yirmeyahu beyad nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim leimor. jeremiah 39:12	qakhenu ve'einekha sim 'alav ve'al ta'as lo me'umah ra' ki 'im ka'asher yedaber 'eilekha ken 'aseh 'imo. jeremiah 39:13	vayishlakh nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim unebushazban rab saris veneiregal sar 'ezer rab mag vekhol rabei melekh babel. jeremiah 39:14	vayishlekhu vayiqkhu 'et yirmeyahu meikhazar hamatarah vayitenu 'oto 'el gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan lehozi'eihu 'el habayit vayeisheb betokh ha'am. jeremiah 39:15	ve'el yirmeyahu hayah debar yhvh bihyoto 'azur bakhazar hamatarah leimor. jeremiah 39:16	halokh ve'amarta le'ebed melekh hakushi leimor koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini meibi meibi 'et debarai 'el ha'ir hazot lera'ah velo letobah vehayu lefanekha bayom hahu. jeremiah 39:17	vehizaltikha bayom hahu ne'um yhvh velo tinaten beyad ha'anashim 'asher 'atah yagor mipeneihem. jeremiah 39:18	ki malet 'amaletkha ubakhereb lo tipol vehayetah lekha nafshekha leshalal ki batakhta bi ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 40:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu mei'et yhvh 'akhar shalakh 'oto nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim min haramah beqakhto 'oto vehu 'asur baziqim betokh kal galut yerushalim vihudah hamuglim babelah. jeremiah 40:2	vayiqakh rab tabakhim leyirmeyahu vayomer 'eilav yhvh 'elohekha diber 'et hara'ah hazot 'el hamaqom hazeh. jeremiah 40:3	vayabei vaya'as yhvh ka'asher diber ki khatatem yhvh velo shema'tem beqolo vehayah lakhem dabar hadabar hazeh. jeremiah 40:4	ve'atah hineh fitakhtikha hayom min haziqim 'asher 'al yadekha 'im tob be'einekha labo 'iti babel bo ve'asim 'et 'eini 'alekha ve'im ra' be'einekha labo 'iti babel khadal re'eh kal ha'arez lefanekha 'el tob ve'el hayashar be'einekha lalekhet shamah lekh. jeremiah 40:5	ve'odenu lo yashub veshubah 'el gedalyah ben 'akhiqam ben shafan 'asher hifqid melekh babel be'arei yehudah vesheb 'ito betokh ha'am 'o 'el kal hayashar be'einekha lalekhet lekh vayiten lo rab tabakhim 'arukhah umas'et vayshalekheihu. jeremiah 40:6	vayabo yirmeyahu 'el gedalyah ben 'akhiqam hamizpatah vayeisheb 'ito betokh ha'am hanish'arim ba'arez. jeremiah 40:7	vayishme'u khal sarei hakhayalim 'asher basadeh hemah ve'ansheihem ki hifqid melekh babel 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ba'arez vekhi hifqid 'ito 'anashim venashim vataf umidalat ha'arez mei'asher lo hagelu babelah. jeremiah 40:8	vayabo'u 'el gedalyah hamizpatah veyishma'el ben netanyahu veyokhanan veyonatan benei qareiakh userayah ben tankhumet ubenei 'ofai 'eifai hanetofati vizanyahu ben hama'akhati hemah ve'ansheihem. jeremiah 40:9	vayishaba' lahem gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan ule'ansheihem leimor 'al tire'u mei'abod hakasdim shebu ba'arez ve'ibdu 'et melekh babel veyitab lakhem. jeremiah 40:10	va'ani hini yosheb bamizpah la'amod lifnei hakasdim 'asher yabo'u 'eileinu ve'atem 'isfu yayin veqayiz veshemen vesimu bikhleikhem ushebu be'areikhem 'asher tefastem. jeremiah 40:11	vegam kal hayehudim 'asher bemo'ab ubibnei 'amon ube'edom va'asher bekhal ha'arazot shame'u ki natan melekh babel she'eirit lihudah vekhi hifqid 'aleihem 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan. jeremiah 40:12	vayashubu khal hayehudim mikal hameqomot 'asher nidekhu sham vayabo'u 'erez yehudah 'el gedalyahu hamizpatah vaya'asfu yayin vaqayiz harbeh me'od. jeremiah 40:13	veyokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim 'asher basadeh ba'u 'el gedalyahu hamizpatah. jeremiah 40:14	vayomeru 'eilav hayadoa' teida' ki ba'alis melekh benei 'amon shalakh 'et yishma'el ben netanyah lehakotekha nafesh velo he'emin lahem gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam. jeremiah 40:15	veyokhanan ben qareiakh 'amar 'el gedalyahu baseiter bamizpah leimor 'eilekhah na ve'akeh 'et yishma'el ben netanyah ve'ish lo yeida' lamah yakekah nefesh venafozu kal yehudah haniqbazim 'eilekha ve'abedah she'eirit yehudah. jeremiah 40:16	vayomer gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam 'el yokhanan ben qareiakh 'al ta'as ta'aseh 'et hadabar hazeh ki sheqer 'atah dober 'el yishma'el. jeremiah 41:1	vayhi bakhodesh hashebi'i ba yishma'el ben netanyah ben 'elishama' mizera' hamelukhah verabei hamelekh va'asarah 'anashim 'ito 'el gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam hamizpatah vayokhelu sham lekhem yakhdav bamizpah. jeremiah 41:2	vayaqam yishma'el ben netanyah va'aseret ha'anashim 'asher hayu 'ito vayaku 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan bakhereb vayamet 'oto 'asher hifqid melekh babel ba'arez. jeremiah 41:3	ve'et kal hayehudim 'asher hayu 'ito 'et gedalyahu bamizpah ve'et hakasdim 'asher nimze'u sham 'et 'anshei hamilkhamah hikah yishma'el. jeremiah 41:4	vayhi bayom hasheini lehamit 'et gedalyahu ve'ish lo yada'. jeremiah 41:5	vayabo'u 'anashim mishekhem mishilo umishomeron shemonim 'ish megulekhei zaqan uqeru'ei begadim umitgodedim uminkhah ulebonah beyadam lehabi bet yhvh. jeremiah 41:6	vayeizei yishma'el ben netanyah liqratam min hamizpah holekh halokh ubokheh vayhi kifgosh 'otam vayomer 'aleihem bo'u 'el gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam. jeremiah 41:7	vayhi kebo'am 'el tokh ha'ir vayishkhatem yishma'el ben netanyah 'el tokh habor hu veha'anashim 'asher 'ito. jeremiah 41:8	va'asarah 'anashim nimze'u bam vayomeru 'el yishma'el 'al temiteinu ki yesh lanu matmonim basadeh khitim use'orim veshemen udebash vayekhdal velo hemitam betokh 'akheihem. jeremiah 41:9	vehabor 'asher hishlikh sham yishma'el 'et kal pigrei ha'anashim 'asher hikah beyad gedalyahu hu 'asher 'asah hamelekh 'asa mipenei ba'sha melekh yisra'el 'oto milei yishma'el ben netanyahu khalalim. jeremiah 41:10	vayishb yishma'el 'et kal she'eirit ha'am 'asher bamizpah 'et benot hamelekh ve'et kal ha'am hanish'arim bamizpah 'asher hifqid nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam vayishbem yishma'el ben netanyah vayeilekh la'abor 'el benei 'amon. jeremiah 41:11	vayishma' yokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim 'asher 'ito 'et kal hara'ah 'asher 'asah yishma'el ben netanyah. jeremiah 41:12	vayiqkhu 'et kal ha'anashim vayeilekhu lehilakhem 'im yishma'el ben netanyah vayimze'u 'oto 'el mayim rabim 'asher begib'on. jeremiah 41:13	vayhi kir'ot kal ha'am 'asher 'et yishma'el 'et yokhanan ben qareiakh ve'et kal sarei hakhayalim 'asher 'ito vayismakhu. jeremiah 41:14	vayasobu kal ha'am 'asher shabah yishma'el min hamizpah vayashubu vayeilekhu 'el yokhanan ben qareiakh. jeremiah 41:15	veyishma'el ben netanyah nimlat bishmonah 'anashim mipenei yokhanan vayeilekh 'el benei 'amon. jeremiah 41:16	vayiqakh yokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim 'asher 'ito 'et kal she'eirit ha'am 'asher heishib mei'et yishma'el ben netanyah min hamizpah 'akhar hikah 'et gedalyah ben 'akhiqam gebarim 'anshei hamilkhamah venashim vetaf vesarisim 'asher heishib migib'on. jeremiah 41:17	vayeilekhu vayeishebu begeirut khemohem kimham 'asher 'eizel bet lakhem lalekhet labo mizrayim. jeremiah 41:18	mipenei hakasdim ki yare'u mipeneihem ki hikah yishma'el ben netanyah 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam 'asher hifqid melekh babel ba'arez. jeremiah 42:1	vayigeshu kal sarei hakhayalim veyokhanan ben qareiakh vizanyah ben hosha'yah vekhal ha'am miqaton ve'ad gadol. jeremiah 42:2	vayomeru 'el yirmeyahu hanabi tipal na tekhinateinu lefanekha vehitpalel ba'adeinu 'el yhvh 'elohekha be'ad kal hashe'eirit hazot ki nish'arnu me'at meiharbeh ka'asher 'einekha ro'ot 'otanu. jeremiah 42:3	veyaged lanu yhvh 'elohekha 'et haderekh 'asher neilekh bah ve'et hadabar 'asher na'aseh. jeremiah 42:4	vayomer 'aleihem yirmeyahu hanabi shama'ti hini mitpalel 'el yhvh 'eloheikhem kedibreikhem vehayah kal hadabar 'asher ya'aneh yhvh 'etkhem 'agid lakhem lo 'emna' mikem dabar. jeremiah 42:5	vehemah 'ameru 'el yirmeyahu yehi yhvh banu le'ed 'emet vene'eman 'im lo kekhal hadabar 'asher yishlakhakha yhvh 'elohekha 'eileinu ken na'aseh. jeremiah 42:6	'im tob ve'im ra' beqol yhvh 'eloheinu 'asher 'anu 'anakhnu sholekhim 'otekha 'eilav nishma' lema'an 'asher yitab lanu ki nishma' beqol yhvh 'eloheinu. jeremiah 42:7	vayhi miqez 'aseret yamim vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu. jeremiah 42:8	vayiqra 'el yokhanan ben qareiakh ve'el kal sarei hakhayalim 'asher 'ito ulekhal ha'am lemiqaton ve'ad gadol. jeremiah 42:9	vayomer 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher shelakhtem 'oti 'eilav lehapil tekhinatkhem lefanav. jeremiah 42:10	'im shob teishebu ba'arez hazot ubaniti 'etkhem velo 'eheros venata'ti 'etkhem velo 'etosh ki nikhamti 'el hara'ah 'asher 'asiti lakhem. jeremiah 42:11	'al tire'u mipenei melekh babel 'asher 'atem yerei'im mipanav 'al tire'u mimenu ne'um yhvh ki 'itekhem 'ani lehoshia' 'etkhem ulehazil 'etkhem miyado. jeremiah 42:12	ve'eten lakhem rakhamim verikham 'etkhem veheishib 'etkhem 'el 'admatkhem. jeremiah 42:13	ve'im 'omerim 'atem lo neisheb ba'arez hazot lebilti shemoa' beqol yhvh 'eloheikhem. jeremiah 42:14	leimor lo ki 'erez mizrayim nabo 'asher lo nir'eh milkhamah veqol shofar lo nishma' velalekhem lo nir'ab vesham neisheb. jeremiah 42:15	ve'atah lakhen shim'u debar yhvh she'eirit yehudah koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'im 'atem som tesimun peneikhem labo mizrayim ubatem lagur sham. jeremiah 42:16	vehayetah hakhereb 'asher 'atem yerei'im mimenah sham tasig 'etkhem be'erez mizrayim vehara'ab 'asher 'atem do'agim mimenu sham yidbaq 'akhareikhem mizrayim vesham tamutu. jeremiah 42:17	veyihyu khal ha'anashim 'asher samu 'et peneihem labo mizrayim lagur sham yamutu bakhereb bara'ab ubadaber velo yihyeh lahem sarid ufalit mipenei hara'ah 'asher 'ani meibi 'aleihem. jeremiah 42:18	ki khoh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el ka'asher nitakh 'api vakhamati 'al yoshebei yerushalim ken titakh khamati 'aleikhem bebo'akhem mizrayim vihyitem le'alah uleshamah veliqlalah ulekherpah velo tir'u 'od 'et hamaqom hazeh. jeremiah 42:19	diber yhvh 'aleikhem she'eirit yehudah 'al tabo'u mizrayim yadoa' teide'u ki ha'idoti bakhem hayom. jeremiah 42:20	ki hit'eitem hit'eitem benafshoteikhem ki 'atem shelakhtem 'oti 'el yhvh 'eloheikhem leimor hitpalel ba'adeinu 'el yhvh 'eloheinu ukhekhol 'asher yomar yhvh 'eloheinu ken haged lanu ve'asinu. jeremiah 42:21	va'agid lakhem hayom velo shema'tem beqol yhvh 'eloheikhem ulekhol 'asher shelakhani 'aleikhem. jeremiah 42:22	ve'atah yadoa' teide'u ki bakhereb bara'ab ubadeber tamutu bamaqom 'asher khafaztem labo lagur sham. jeremiah 43:1	vayhi kekhalot yirmeyahu ledaber 'el kal ha'am 'et kal dibrei yhvh 'eloheihem 'asher shelakho yhvh 'eloheihem 'aleihem 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. jeremiah 43:2	vayomer 'azaryah ben hosha'yah veyokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal ha'anashim hazeidim 'omerim 'el yirmeyahu qer 'atah medaber lo shelakhakha yhvh 'eloheinu leimor lo tabo'u mizrayim lagur sham. jeremiah 43:3	ki barukh ben neiriyah masit 'otekha banu lema'an tet 'otanu beyad hakasdim lehamit 'otanu ulehaglot 'otanu babel. jeremiah 43:4	velo shama' yokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim vekhal ha'am beqol yhvh lashebet be'erez yehudah. jeremiah 43:5	vayiqakh yokhanan ben qareiakh vekhal sarei hakhayalim 'et kal she'eirit yehudah 'asher shabu mikal hagoyim 'asher nidekhu sham lagur be'erez yehudah. jeremiah 43:6	'et hagebarim ve'et hanashim ve'et hataf ve'et benot hamelekh ve'et kal hanefesh 'asher hiniakh nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim 'et gedalyahu ben 'akhiqam ben shafan ve'et yirmeyahu hanabi ve'et barukh ben neiriyahu. jeremiah 43:7	vayabo'u 'erez mizrayim ki lo shame'u beqol yhvh vayabo'u 'ad takhpankhes. jeremiah 43:8	vayhi debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu betakhpankhes leimor. jeremiah 43:9	qakh beyadekha 'abanim gedolot utemantam bamelet bamalben 'asher befetakh bet par'oh betakhpankhes le'einei 'anashim yehudim. jeremiah 43:10	ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini sholeiakh velaqakhti 'et nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'abdi vesamti khis'o mima'al la'abanim ha'eleh 'asher tamaneti venatah 'et shafruro shafriro 'aleihem. jeremiah 43:11	uba'ah uba vehikah 'et 'erez mizrayim 'asher lamavet lamavet va'asher lashebi lashebi va'asher lakhereb lekhareb. jeremiah 43:12	vehizati 'esh bebatei 'elohei mizrayim userafam veshabam ve'atah 'et 'erez mizrayim ka'asher ya'teh haro'eh 'et bigdo veyaza misham beshalom. jeremiah 43:13	veshibar 'et mazebot bet shemesh 'asher be'erez mizrayim ve'et batei 'elohei mizrayim yisrof ba'esh. jeremiah 44:1	hadabar 'asher hayah 'el yirmeyahu 'el kal hayehudim hayoshebim be'erez mizrayim hayoshebim bemigdol ubetakhpankhes ubenof ube'erez patros leimor. jeremiah 44:2	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'atem re'item 'et kal hara'ah 'asher heibeiti 'al yerushalim ve'al kal 'arei yehudah vehinam kharebah hayom hazeh ve'en bahem yosheb. jeremiah 44:3	mipenei ra'atam 'asher 'asu lehakh'iseini lalekhet leqater la'abod leilohim 'akheirim 'asher lo yeda'um hemah 'atem va'aboteikhem. jeremiah 44:4	va'eshlakh 'aleikhem 'et kal 'abadai hanebi'im hashkem veshaloakh leimor 'al na ta'asu 'et debar hato'eibah hazot 'asher saneiti. jeremiah 44:5	velo shame'u velo hitu 'et 'azenam lashub meira'atam lebilti qater leilohim 'akheirim. jeremiah 44:6	vatitakh khamati ve'api vatib'ar be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim vatihyenah lekharebah lishmamah kayom hazeh. jeremiah 44:7	ve'atah koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el lamah 'atem 'osim ra'ah gedolah 'el nafshoteikhem lehakhrit lakhem 'ish ve'ishah 'olel veyoneq mitokh yehudah lebilti hotir lakhem she'eirit. jeremiah 44:8	lehakh'iseini bema'asei yedeikhem leqater leilohim 'akheirim be'erez mizrayim 'asher 'atem ba'im lagur sham lema'an hakhrit lakhem ulema'an heyotkhem liqlalah ulekherpah bekhol goyei ha'arez. jeremiah 44:9	hashkhakhtem 'et ra'ot 'aboteikhem ve'et ra'ot malkhei yehudah ve'et ra'ot nashav ve'et ra'oteikhem ve'et ra'ot nesheikhem 'asher 'asu be'erez yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim. jeremiah 44:10	lo duke'u 'ad hayom hazeh velo yare'u velo halekhu betorati ubekhuqotai 'asher natati lifneikhem velifnei 'aboteikhem. jeremiah 44:11	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini sam panai bakhem lera'ah ulehakhrit 'et kal yehudah. jeremiah 44:12	velaqakhti 'et she'eirit yehudah 'asher samu feneihem labo 'erez mizrayim lagur sham vetamu khol be'erez mizrayim yipolu bakhereb bara'ab yitamu miqaton ve'ad gadol bakhereb ubara'ab yamutu vehayu le'alah leshamah veliqlalah ulekherpah. jeremiah 44:13	ufaqadti 'al hayoshebim be'erez mizrayim ka'asher paqadti 'al yerushalim bakhereb bara'ab ubadaber. jeremiah 44:14	velo yihyeh palit vesarid lish'eirit yehudah haba'im lagur sham be'erez mizrayim velashub 'erez yehudah 'asher hemah menase'im 'et nafsham lashub lashebet sham ki lo yashubu ki 'im peleitim. jeremiah 44:15	vaya'anu 'et yirmeyahu kal ha'anashim hayode'im ki meqaterot nesheihem leilohim 'akheirim vekhal hanashim ha'omedot qahal gadol vekhal ha'am hayoshebim be'erez mizrayim befatros leimor. jeremiah 44:16	hadabar 'asher dibarta 'eileinu beshem yhvh 'einenu shome'im 'eilekha. jeremiah 44:17	ki 'asoh na'aseh 'et kal hadabar 'asher yaza mipinu leqater limlekhet hashamayim vehasekh lah nesakhim ka'asher 'asinu 'anakhnu va'aboteinu melakheinu vesareinu be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim vanisba' lekhem vanihyeh tobim vera'ah lo ra'inu. jeremiah 44:18	umin 'az khadalnu leqater limlekhet hashamayim vehasekh lah nesakhim khasarnu khol ubakhereb ubara'ab tamenu. jeremiah 44:19	vekhi 'anakhnu meqaterim limlekhet hashamayim ulehasekh lah nesakhim hamibal'adei 'anasheinu 'asinu lah kavanim leha'azibah vehasekh lah nesakhim. jeremiah 44:20	vayomer yirmeyahu 'el kal ha'am 'al hagebarim ve'al hanashim ve'al kal ha'am ha'onim 'oto dabar leimor. jeremiah 44:21	halo 'et haqiter 'asher qitartem be'arei yehudah ubekhuzot yerushalim 'atem va'aboteikhem malkheikhem vesareikhem ve'am ha'arez 'otam zakhar yhvh vata'aleh 'al libo. jeremiah 44:22	velo yukhal yhvh 'od laset mipenei roa' ma'aleikhem mipenei hato'eibot 'asher 'asitem vatehi 'arzekhem lekharebah uleshamah veliqlalah mei'en yosheb kehayom hazeh. jeremiah 44:23	mipenei 'asher qitartem va'asher khatatem yhvh velo shema'tem beqol yhvh ubetorato ubekhuqotav ube'eidevotav lo halakhtem 'al ken qarat 'etkhem hara'ah hazot kayom hazeh. jeremiah 44:24	vayomer yirmeyahu 'el kal ha'am ve'el kal hanashim shim'u debar yhvh kal yehudah 'asher be'erez mizrayim. jeremiah 44:25	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el leimor 'atem unesheikhem vatedabeirenah befikhem ubideikhem mileitem leimor 'asoh na'aseh 'et nedareinu 'asher nadarnu leqater limlekhet hashamayim ulehasekh lah nesakhim haqem taqimenah 'et nidreikhem ve'asoh ta'asenah 'et nidreikhem. jeremiah 44:26	lakhen shim'u debar yhvh kal yehudah hayoshebim be'erez mizrayim hini nishba'ti bishmi hagadol 'amar yhvh 'im yihyeh 'od shemi niqra befi kal 'ish yehudah 'omer khai 'adonai yhvh bekhal 'erez mizrayim. jeremiah 44:27	hini shoqed 'aleihem lera'ah velo letobah vetamu khal 'ish yehudah 'asher be'erez mizrayim bakhereb ubara'ab 'ad kelotam. jeremiah 44:28	ufelitei khereb yeshubun min 'erez mizrayim 'erez yehudah metei mispar veyade'u kal she'eirit yehudah haba'im le'erez mizrayim lagur sham debar mi yaqum mimeni umeihem. jeremiah 44:29	vezot lakhem ha'ot ne'um yhvh ki foqed 'ani 'aleikhem bamaqom hazeh lema'an teide'u ki qom yaqumu debarai 'aleikhem lera'ah. jeremiah 44:30	koh 'amar yhvh hini noten 'et par'oh khafera' melekh mizrayim beyad 'oyebav ubeyad mebaqshei nafsho ka'asher natati 'et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah beyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'oyebo umebaqesh nafsho. jeremiah 45:1	hadabar 'asher diber yirmeyahu hanabi 'el barukh ben neiriyah bekhatebo 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'al seifer mipi yirmeyahu bashanah harebi'it lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah leimor. jeremiah 45:2	koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'alekha barukh. jeremiah 45:3	'amarta 'o na li ki yasaf yhvh yagon 'al makh'obi yaga'ti be'ankhati umenukhah lo mazati. jeremiah 45:4	koh tomar 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh hineh 'asher baniti 'ani hores ve'et 'asher nata'ti 'ani notesh ve'et kal ha'arez hi. jeremiah 45:5	ve'atah tebaqesh lekha gedolot 'al tebaqesh ki hini meibi ra'ah 'al kal basar ne'um yhvh venatati lekha 'et nafshekha leshalal 'al kal hameqomot 'asher teilekh sham. jeremiah 46:1	'asher hayah debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu hanabi 'al hagoyim. jeremiah 46:2	lemizrayim 'al khel par'oh nekho melekh mizrayim 'asher hayah 'al nehar perat bekharkemish 'asher hikah nebukhadrezar melekh babel bishnat harebi'it lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah. jeremiah 46:3	'irkhu magen vezinah ugeshu lamilkhamah. jeremiah 46:4	'isru hasusim va'alu haparashim vehityazebu bekhoba'im mirqu haremakhim libshu hasiryonot. jeremiah 46:5	madua' ra'iti hemah khatim nesogim 'akhor vegiboreihem yukatu umanos nasu velo hifnu magor misabib ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 46:6	'al yanus haqal ve'al yimalet hagibor zafonah 'al yad nehar perat kashelu venafalu. jeremiah 46:7	mi zeh kai'or ya'aleh kaneharot yitga'ashu meimav. jeremiah 46:8	mizrayim kai'or ya'aleh vekhaneharot yitgo'ashu mayim vayomer 'a'aleh 'akhaseh 'erez 'obidah 'ir veyoshebei bah. jeremiah 46:9	'alu hasusim vehitholelu harekheb veyeize'u hagiborim kush ufut tofesei magen veludim tofesei dorekhei qashet. jeremiah 46:10	vehayom hahu ladonai yhvh zeba'ot yom neqamah lehinaqem mizarav ve'akhelah khereb vesabe'ah veravetah midamam ki zebakh ladonai yhvh zeba'ot be'erez zafon 'el nehar perat. jeremiah 46:11	'ali gil'ad uqekhi zori betulat bat mizrayim lashav hirbeiti hirbet refu'ot te'alah 'en lakh. jeremiah 46:12	shame'u goyim qelonekh vezivkhatekh male'ah ha'arez ki gibor begibor kashalu yakhdav nafelu sheneihem. jeremiah 46:13	hadabar 'asher diber yhvh 'el yirmeyahu hanabi labo nebukhadrezar melekh babel lehakot 'et 'erez mizrayim. jeremiah 46:14	hagidu bemizrayim vehashmi'u bemigdol vehashmi'u benof ubetakhpankhes 'imru hityazeb vehakhen lakh ki 'akhelah khereb sebibekha. jeremiah 46:15	madua' niskhaf 'abirekha lo 'amad ki yhvh hadafo. jeremiah 46:16	hirbah koshel gam nafal 'ish 'el rei'eihu vayomeru qumah venashubah 'el 'ameinu ve'el 'erez moladteinu mipenei khereb hayonah. jeremiah 46:17	qare'u sham par'oh melekh mizrayim sha'on he'ebir hamo'ed. jeremiah 46:18	khai 'ani ne'um hamelekh yhvh zeba'ot shemo ki ketabor beharim ukhekharmel bayam yabo. jeremiah 46:19	kelei golah 'asi lakh yoshebet bat mizrayim ki nof leshamah tihyeh venizetah mei'en yosheb. jeremiah 46:20	'eglah yefeh fiyah mizrayim qerez mizafon ba ba. jeremiah 46:21	gam sekhireha beqirbah ke'eglei marbeq ki gam hemah hifnu nasu yakhdav lo 'amadu ki yom 'eidam ba 'aleihem 'et pequdatam. jeremiah 46:22	qolah kanakhash yeilekh ki bekhayil yeileikhu ubeqardumot ba'u lah kekhotebei 'eizim. jeremiah 46:23	karetu ya'rah ne'um yhvh ki lo yeikhaqer ki rabu mei'arbeh ve'en lahem mispar. jeremiah 46:24	hobishah bat mizrayim nitenah beyad 'am zafon. jeremiah 46:25	'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini foqed 'el 'amon mino ve'al par'oh ve'al mizrayim ve'al 'eloheha ve'al melakheha ve'al par'oh ve'al habotekhim bo. jeremiah 46:26	unetatim beyad mebaqshei nafsham ubeyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel ubeyad 'abadav ve'akharei khen tishkon kimei qedem ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 46:27	ve'atah 'al tira 'abdi ya'aqob ve'al teikhat yisra'el ki hini moshi'akha meirakhoq ve'et zar'akha mei'erez shibyam veshab ya'aqob veshaqat vesha'anan ve'en makharid. jeremiah 46:28	'atah 'al tira 'abdi ya'aqob ne'um yhvh ki 'itekha 'ani ki 'e'eseh khalah bekhal hagoyim 'asher hidakhtikha shamah ve'otekha lo 'e'eseh khalah veyisartikha lamishpat venaqeh lo 'anaqeka. jeremiah 47:1	'asher hayah debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu hanabi 'el pelishtim beterem yakeh far'oh 'et 'azah. jeremiah 47:2	koh 'amar yhvh hineh mayim 'olim mizafon vehayu lenakhal shotef veyishtefu 'erez umelo'ah 'ir veyoshebei bah veza'aqu ha'adam veheilil kol yosheb ha'arez. jeremiah 47:3	miqol sha'atat parsot 'abirav meira'ash lerikhbo hamon galgilav lo hifnu 'abot 'el banim meirifyon yadayim. jeremiah 47:4	'al hayom haba lishdod 'et kal pelishtim lehakhrit lezor ulezidon kol sarid 'ozer ki shoded yhvh 'et pelishtim she'eirit 'i khaftor. jeremiah 47:5	ba'ah qarekhah 'el 'azah nidmetah 'ashqelon she'eirit 'imqam 'ad matai titgodadi. jeremiah 47:6	ho khereb yhvh 'ad 'anah lo tishqoti hei'asefi 'al ta'rekh heirage'i vadomi. jeremiah 47:7	'ekh tishqoti yhvh zivah lah 'el 'ashqelon ve'el khof hayam sham ye'adah. jeremiah 48:1	lemo'ab koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el ho 'el nebo ki shudadah hobishah nilkedah qiryatayim hobishah hamisgab vakhatah. jeremiah 48:2	'en 'od tehilat mo'ab bekheshbon khashebu 'aleha ra'ah lekhu venakhritenah migo gam madmen tidomi 'akharayikh teilekh khareb. jeremiah 48:3	qol ze'aqah meikhoronayim shod vasheber gadol. jeremiah 48:4	nishberah mo'ab hishmi'u ze'aqah ze'oreha ze'ireha. jeremiah 48:5	ki ma'aleh halukhot halukhit bibkhi ya'aleh bekhi ki bemorad khoronayim zarei za'aqat sheber shamei'u. jeremiah 48:6	nusu maletu nafshekhem vetihyenah ka'aro'er bamidbar. jeremiah 48:7	ki ya'an bitkhekh bema'asayikh ube'ozrotayikh gam 'at tilakheidi veyaza khemish khemosh bagolah kohanav vesarav yakhad yakhdav. jeremiah 48:8	veyabo shoded 'el kal 'ir ve'ir lo timalet ve'abad ha'eimeq venishmad hamishor 'asher 'amar yhvh. jeremiah 48:9	tenu ziz lemo'ab ki nazo teizei ve'areha leshamah tihyenah mei'en yosheb bahen. jeremiah 48:10	'arur 'oseh melekhet yhvh remiyah ve'arur moneia' kharbo midam. jeremiah 48:11	sha'anan mo'ab mine'urav veshoqet hu 'el shemarav velo huraq mikeli 'el keli ubagolah lo halakh 'al ken 'amad ta'mo bo vereikho lo namar. jeremiah 48:12	lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh veshilakhti lo zo'im vezei'uhu vekheilav yariqu venibleihem yenapeizu. jeremiah 48:13	ubosh mo'ab mikemosh ka'asher boshu bet yisra'el mibet 'el mibtekham. jeremiah 48:14	'ekh tomeru giborim 'anakhenu ve'anshei khayil lamilkhamah. jeremiah 48:15	shudad mo'ab ve'areha 'alah umibkhar bakhurav yaredu latabakh ne'um hamelekh yhvh zeba'ot shemo. jeremiah 48:16	qarob 'ed mo'ab labo vera'ato miharah me'od. jeremiah 48:17	nudu lo kal sebibav vekhol yode'ei shemo 'imru 'eikhah nishbar mateh 'oz maqel tif'arah. jeremiah 48:18	redi mikabod yoshebe ushebi bazama yoshebet bat dibon ki shoded mo'ab 'alah bakh shikhet mibzarayikh. jeremiah 48:19	'el derekh 'imdi vezapi yoshebet 'aro'er sha'ali nas venimlatah 'imri mah nihyatah. jeremiah 48:20	hobish mo'ab ki khatah heilili heililu uze'aqi uze'aqu hagidu be'arnon ki shudad mo'ab. jeremiah 48:21	umishpat ba 'el 'erez hamishor 'el kholon ve'el yahzah ve'al mofa'at meifa'at. jeremiah 48:22	ve'al dibon ve'al nebo ve'al bet diblatayim. jeremiah 48:23	ve'al qiryatayim ve'al bet gamul ve'al bet me'on. jeremiah 48:24	ve'al qeriyot ve'al bazrah ve'al kal 'arei 'erez mo'ab harekhoqot vehaqerobot. jeremiah 48:25	nigde'ah qeren mo'ab uzero'o nishbarah ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 48:26	hashkiruhu ki 'al yhvh higdil vesafaq mo'ab beqi'o vehayah liskhoq gam hu. jeremiah 48:27	ve'im lo hasekhoq hayah lekha yisra'el 'im beganabim nimza'ah nimza ki midei debarekha bo titnodad. jeremiah 48:28	'izbu 'arim veshikhnu basela' yoshebei mo'ab vihyu kheyonah teqanen be'ebrei fi fakhat. jeremiah 48:29	shama'nu ge'on mo'ab gei'eh me'od gabeho uge'ono vega'avato verum libo. jeremiah 48:30	'ani yada'ti ne'um yhvh 'ebrato velo khen badav lo khen 'asu. jeremiah 48:31	'al ken 'al mo'ab 'ayeilil ulemo'ab kuloh 'ez'aq 'el 'anshei qir kheres yehgeh. jeremiah 48:32	mibekhi ya'zer 'ebkeh lakh hagefen sibmah netishotayikh 'aberu yam 'ad yam ya'zer naga'u 'al qeizekh ve'al bezirekh shoded nafal. jeremiah 48:33	vene'esfah simkhah vagil mikarmel umei'erez mo'ab veyayin miqabim hishbati lo yidrokh heidad heidad lo heidad. jeremiah 48:34	miza'aqat kheshbon 'ad 'el'aleh 'ad yahaz natenu qolam mizo'ar 'ad khoronayim 'eglat shelishiyah ki gam mei nimrim limshamot yihyu. jeremiah 48:35	vehishbati lemo'ab ne'um yhvh ma'aleh bamah umaqtir leilohav. jeremiah 48:36	'al ken libi lemo'ab kakhalilim yehemeh velibi 'el 'anshei qir kheres kakhalilim yehemeh 'al ken yitrat 'asah 'abadu. jeremiah 48:37	ki khal rosh qarekhah vekhal zaqan geru'ah 'al kal yadayim gedudot ve'al matenayim saq. jeremiah 48:38	'al kal gagot mo'ab ubirkhoboteha kuloh misped ki shabarti 'et mo'ab kikhli 'en kheifez bo ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 48:39	'ekh khatah heililu 'ekh hifnah 'oref mo'ab bosh vehayah mo'ab liskhoq velimkhitah lekhal sebibav. jeremiah 48:40	ki khoh 'amar yhvh hineh khanesher yid'eh ufaras kenafav 'el mo'ab. jeremiah 48:41	nilkedah haqeriyot vehamezadot nitpasah vehayah leb giborei mo'ab bayom hahu keleb 'ishah mezeirah. jeremiah 48:42	venishmad mo'ab mei'am ki 'al yhvh higdil. jeremiah 48:43	pakhad vafakhat vafakh 'alekha yosheb mo'ab ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 48:44	hanis hanas mipenei hapakhad yipol 'el hapakhat veha'oleh min hapakhat yilakhed bapakh ki 'abi 'eileha 'el mo'ab shenat pequdatam ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 48:45	bezel kheshbon 'amedu mikoakh nasim ki 'esh yaza meikheshbon velehabah miben sikhon vatokhal pe'at mo'ab veqadeqod benei sha'on. jeremiah 48:46	'o lekha mo'ab 'abad 'am kemosh ki luqekhu banekha bashebi ubenotekha bashibyah. jeremiah 48:47	veshabti shebut mo'ab be'akharit hayamim ne'um yhvh 'ad henah mishpat mo'ab. jeremiah 49:1	libnei 'amon koh 'amar yhvh habanim 'en leyisra'el 'im yoresh 'en lo madua' yarash malkam 'et gad ve'amo be'arav yashab. jeremiah 49:2	lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh vehishma'ti 'el rabat benei 'amon teru'at milkhamah vehayetah letel shemamah ubenoteha ba'esh tizatnah veyarash yisra'el 'et yoreshav 'amar yhvh. jeremiah 49:3	heilili kheshbon ki shudedah 'ai ze'aqnah benot rabah khagorenah saqim sefodenah vehitshotatnah bagedeirot ki malkam bagolah yeilekh kohanav vesarav yakhdav. jeremiah 49:4	mah tithali ba'amaqim zab 'imqekh habat hashobeibah habotekhah be'ozeroteha mi yabo 'eilai. jeremiah 49:5	hini meibi 'alayikh pakhad ne'um 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot mikal sebibayikh venidakhtem 'ish lefanav ve'en meqabez lanoded. jeremiah 49:6	ve'akharei khen 'ashib 'et shebut benei 'amon ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 49:7	le'edom koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot ha'en 'od khakhmah beteiman 'abedah 'eizah mibanim nisrekhah khakhematam. jeremiah 49:8	nusu hafenu he'miqu lashebet yoshebei dedan ki 'ed 'eisav heibeiti 'alav 'et peqadtiv. jeremiah 49:9	'im bozerim ba'u lakh lo yash'iru 'oleilot 'im ganabim balaylah hishkhitu dayam. jeremiah 49:10	ki 'ani khasafti 'et 'eisav gileiti 'et mistarav venekhbah lo yukhal shudad zar'o ve'ekhav ushekheinav ve'einenu. jeremiah 49:11	'azebah yetomekha 'ani 'akhayeh ve'almenotekha 'alai tibtakhu. jeremiah 49:12	ki khoh 'amar yhvh hineh 'asher 'en mishpatam lishtot hakos shato yishtu ve'atah hu naqoh tinaqeh lo tinaqeh ki shatoh tishteh. jeremiah 49:13	ki bi nishba'ti ne'um yhvh ki leshamah lekherpah lekhoreb veliqlalah tihyeh bazerah vekhal 'areha tihyenah lekharebot 'olam. jeremiah 49:14	shemu'ah shama'ti mei'et yhvh vezir bagoyim shaluakh hitqabezu ubo'u 'aleha vequmu lamilkhamah. jeremiah 49:15	ki hineh qaton netatikha bagoyim bazui ba'adam. jeremiah 49:16	tiflaztekha hishi 'otakh zedon libekha shokheni bekhagvei hasela' tofesi merom gib'ah ki tagbiha kanesher qinekha misham 'oridekha ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 49:17	vehayetah 'edom leshamah kol 'ober 'aleha yishom veyishroq 'al kal makoteha. jeremiah 49:18	kemahpeikhat sedom va'amorah ushekheineha 'amar yhvh lo yeisheb sham 'ish velo yagur bah ben 'adam. jeremiah 49:19	hineh ke'aryeh ya'aleh mige'on hayarden 'el neveh 'eitan ki 'argi'ah 'arizenu mei'aleha umi bakhur 'eileha 'efqod ki mi khamoni umi yo'ideni umi zeh ro'eh 'asher ya'amod lefanai. jeremiah 49:20	lakhen shim'u 'azat yhvh 'asher ya'az 'el 'edom umakhshebotav 'asher khashab 'el yoshebei teiman 'im lo yiskhabum ze'irei hazon 'im lo yashim 'aleihem neveihem. jeremiah 49:21	miqol niflam ra'ashah ha'arez ze'aqah beyam suf nishma' qolah. jeremiah 49:22	hineh khanesher ya'aleh veyid'eh veyifros kenafav 'al bazrah vehayah leb giborei 'edom bayom hahu keleb 'ishah mezeirah. jeremiah 49:23	ledameseq boshah khamat ve'arpad ki shemu'ah ra'ah shame'u namogu bayam de'agah hashqet lo yukhal. jeremiah 49:24	rafetah dameseq hifnetah lanus veretet hekheziqah zarah vakhabalim 'akhazatah kayoleidah. jeremiah 49:25	'ekh lo 'uzebah 'ir tehilah tehilat qiryat mesosi. jeremiah 49:26	lakhen yipelu bakhureha birkhoboteha vekhal 'anshei hamilkhamah yidamu bayom hahu ne'um yhvh zeba'ot. jeremiah 49:27	vehizati 'esh bekhomat damaseq ve'akhelah 'armenot ben hadad. jeremiah 49:28	leqeidar ulemamlekhot khazor 'asher hikah nebukhadrezor nebukhadrezar melekh babel koh 'amar yhvh qumu 'alu 'el qeidar veshadedu 'et benei qedem. jeremiah 49:29	'aholeihem vezonam yiqakhu yeri'oteihem vekhal keleihem ugemaleihem yis'u lahem veqare'u 'aleihem magor misabib. jeremiah 49:30	nusu nudu me'od he'miqu lashebet yoshebei khazor ne'um yhvh ki ya'az 'aleikhem nebukhadrezar melekh babel 'eizah vekhashab 'aleihem 'aleikhem makhashabah. jeremiah 49:31	qumu 'alu 'el go shelev yosheb labetakh ne'um yhvh lo delatayim velo beriakh lo badad yishkonu. jeremiah 49:32	vehayu gemaleihem labaz vahamon miqneihem leshalal vezeiritim lekhal ruakh qezuzei fei'ah umikal 'abarav 'abi 'et 'eidam ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 49:33	vehayetah khazor lim'on tanim shemamah 'ad 'olam lo yeisheb sham 'ish velo yagur bah ben 'adam. jeremiah 49:34	'asher hayah debar yhvh 'el yirmeyahu hanabi 'el 'eilam bereishit malkhut zidqiyah melekh yehudah leimor. jeremiah 49:35	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot hini shober 'et qeshet 'eilam reishit geburatam. jeremiah 49:36	veheibeiti 'el 'eilam 'arba' rukhot mei'arba' qezot hashamayim vezeiritim lekhol harukhot ha'eleh velo yihyeh hago 'asher lo yabo sham nidekhei 'olam 'eilam. jeremiah 49:37	vehakhtati 'et 'eilam lifnei 'oyebeihem velifnei mebaqshei nafsham veheibeiti 'aleihem ra'ah 'et kharon 'api ne'um yhvh veshilakhti 'akhareihem 'et hakhereb 'ad kaloti 'otam. jeremiah 49:38	vesamti khis'i be'eilam veha'abadti misham melekh vesarim ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 49:39	vehayah be'akharit hayamim 'ashub 'ashib 'et shebit shebut 'eilam ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 50:1	hadabar 'asher diber yhvh 'el babel 'el 'erez kasdim beyad yirmeyahu hanabi. jeremiah 50:2	hagidu bagoyim vehashmi'u use'u nes hashmi'u 'al tekhakheidu 'imru nilkedah babel hobish bel khat merodakh hobishu 'azabeha khatu giluleha. jeremiah 50:3	ki 'alah 'aleha go mizafon hu yashit 'et 'arzah leshamah velo yihyeh yosheb bah mei'adam ve'ad beheimah nadu halakhu. jeremiah 50:4	bayamim hahemah uba'et hahi ne'um yhvh yabo'u benei yisra'el hemah ubenei yehudah yakhdav halokh ubakho yeileikhu ve'et yhvh 'eloheihem yebaqeishu. jeremiah 50:5	ziyon yish'alu derekh henah feneihem bo'u venilvu 'el yhvh berit 'olam lo tishakheiakh. jeremiah 50:6	zon 'obedot hayah hayu 'ami ro'eihem hit'um harim shobeibim shobbum meihar 'el gib'ah halakhu shakhekhu ribzam. jeremiah 50:7	kal moz'eihem 'akhalum vezareihem 'ameru lo ne'sham takhat 'asher khate'u yhvh neveh zedeq umiqveh 'aboteihem yhvh. jeremiah 50:8	nudu mitokh babel umei'erez kasdim yaze'u zei'u vihyu ke'atudim lifnei zon. jeremiah 50:9	ki hineh 'anokhi mei'ir uma'aleh 'al babel qehal goyim gedolim mei'erez zafon ve'arekhu lah misham tilakhed khizav kegibor mashkil lo yashub reiqam. jeremiah 50:10	vehayetah khasdim leshalal kal sholeleha yisba'u ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 50:11	ki tismekhi tismekhu ki ta'alzi ta'alzu shosei nakhalati ki tafushi tafushu ke'eglah dashah vetizhali vetizhalu ka'abirim. jeremiah 50:12	boshah 'imekhem me'od khaferah yoladtekhem hineh 'akharit goyim midbar ziyah va'arabah. jeremiah 50:13	miqezef yhvh lo teisheb vehayetah shemamah kulah kol 'ober 'al babel yishom veyishroq 'al kal makoteha. jeremiah 50:14	'irkhu 'al babel sabib kal dorekhei qeshet yedu 'eileha 'al takhmelu 'el khez ki yhvh khata'ah. jeremiah 50:15	hari'u 'aleha sabib natenah yadah nafelu 'ashviyoteha 'asheyoteha nehersu khomoteha ki niqmat yhvh hi hinaqemu bah ka'asher 'asetah 'asu lah. jeremiah 50:16	kirtu zoreia' mibabel vetofes magal be'et qazir mipenei khereb hayonah 'ish 'el 'amo yifnu ve'ish le'arzo yanusu. jeremiah 50:17	seh fezurah yisra'el 'arayot hidikhu harishon 'akhalo melekh 'ashur vezeh ha'akharon 'izemo nebukhadrezar melekh babel. jeremiah 50:18	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el hini foqed 'el melekh babel ve'el 'arzo ka'asher paqadti 'el melekh 'ashur. jeremiah 50:19	veshobabti 'et yisra'el 'el naveihu vera'ah hakarmel vehabashan ubehar 'efrayim vehagil'ad tisba' nafsho. jeremiah 50:20	bayamim hahem uba'et hahi ne'um yhvh yebuqash 'et 'avon yisra'el ve'einenu ve'et khatot yehudah velo timazenah ki 'eslakh la'asher 'ash'ir. jeremiah 50:21	'al ha'arez meratayim 'aleh 'aleha ve'el yoshebei peqod kharob vehakharem 'akhareihem ne'um yhvh va'aseh kekhol 'asher zivitikha. jeremiah 50:22	qol milkhamah ba'arez vesheber gadol. jeremiah 50:23	'ekh nigda' vayishaber patish kal ha'arez 'ekh hayetah leshamah babel bagoyim. jeremiah 50:24	yaqosheti lakh vegam nilkadt babel ve'at lo yada'at nimzet vegam nitpast ki yhvh hitgarit. jeremiah 50:25	patakh yhvh 'et 'ozaro vayozei 'et kelei za'mo ki melakhah hi ladonai yhvh zeba'ot be'erez kasdim. jeremiah 50:26	bo'u lah miqez pitkhu ma'abuseha saluha khemo 'areimim vehakharimuha 'al tehi lah she'eirit. jeremiah 50:27	khirbu kal pareha yeiredu latabakh ho 'aleihem ki ba yomam 'et pequdatam. jeremiah 50:28	qol nasim ufeleitim mei'erez babel lehagid beziyon 'et niqmat yhvh 'eloheinu niqmat heikhalo. jeremiah 50:29	hashmi'u 'el babel rabim kal dorekhei qeshet khanu 'aleha sabib 'al yehi lah peleitah shalemu lah kefa'olah kekhol 'asher 'asetah 'asu lah ki 'el yhvh zadah 'el qedosh yisra'el. jeremiah 50:30	lakhen yipelu bakhureha birkhoboteha vekhal 'anshei milkhamtah yidamu bayom hahu ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 50:31	hini 'eilekha zadon ne'um 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot ki ba yomkha 'et peqadtikha. jeremiah 50:32	vekhashal zadon venafal ve'en lo meiqim vehizati 'esh be'arav ve'akhelah kal sebibotav. jeremiah 50:33	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'ashuqim benei yisra'el ubenei yehudah yakhdav vekhal shobeihem hekheziqu bam mei'anu shalekham. jeremiah 50:34	go'alam khazaq yhvh zeba'ot shemo rib yarib 'et ribam lema'an hirgia' 'et ha'arez vehirgiz leyoshebei babel. jeremiah 50:35	khereb 'al kasdim ne'um yhvh ve'el yoshebei babel ve'el sareha ve'el khakhameha. jeremiah 50:36	khereb 'el habadim veno'alu khereb 'el giboreha vakhatu. jeremiah 50:37	khereb 'el susav ve'el rikhbo ve'el kal ha'ereb 'asher betokhah vehayu lenashim khereb 'el 'ozroteha ubuzazu. jeremiah 50:38	khoreb 'el meimeha veyabeishu ki 'erez pesilim hi uba'eimim yitholalu. jeremiah 50:39	lakhen yeishebu ziyim 'et 'iyim veyashebu bah benot ya'anah velo teisheb 'od lanezakh velo tishkon 'ad dor vador. jeremiah 50:40	kemahpeikhat 'elohim 'et sedom ve'et 'amorah ve'et shekheineha ne'um yhvh lo yeisheb sham 'ish velo yagur bah ben 'adam. jeremiah 50:41	hineh 'am ba mizafon vego gadol umelakhim rabim yei'oru miyarketei 'arez. jeremiah 50:42	qeshet vekhidon yakhaziqu 'akhzari hemah velo yerakheimu qolam kayam yehemeh ve'al susim yirkabu 'arukh ke'ish lamilkhamah 'alayikh bat babel. jeremiah 50:43	shama' melekh babel 'et shim'am verafu yadav zarah hekheziqathu khil kayoleidah. jeremiah 50:44	hineh ke'aryeh ya'aleh mige'on hayarden 'el neveh 'eitan ki 'argi'ah 'aruzem 'arizem mei'aleha umi bakhur 'eileha 'efqod ki mi khamoni umi yo'ideni umi zeh ro'eh 'asher ya'amod lefanai. jeremiah 50:45	lakhen shim'u 'azat yhvh 'asher ya'az 'el babel umakhshebotav 'asher khashab 'el 'erez kasdim 'im lo yiskhabum ze'irei hazon 'im lo yashim 'aleihem naveh. jeremiah 50:46	miqol nitpesah babel nir'ashah ha'arez uze'aqah bagoyim nishma'. jeremiah 51:1	koh 'amar yhvh hini mei'ir 'al babel ve'el yoshebei leb qamai ruakh mashkhit. jeremiah 51:2	veshilakhti lebabel zarim vezeiruha viboqequ 'et 'arzah ki hayu 'aleha misabib beyom ra'ah. jeremiah 51:3	'el yidrokh yidrokh hadorekh qashto ve'el yit'al besiryono ve'al takhmelu 'el bakhureha hakharimu kal zeba'ah. jeremiah 51:4	venafelu khalalim be'erez kasdim umeduqarim bekhuzoteha. jeremiah 51:5	ki lo 'alman yisra'el vihudah mei'elohav yhvh zeba'ot ki 'arzam male'ah 'asham miqedosh yisra'el. jeremiah 51:6	nusu mitokh babel umaletu 'ish nafsho 'al tidamu ba'avonah ki 'et neqamah hi yhvh gemul hu meshalem lah. jeremiah 51:7	kos zahab babel beyad yhvh meshakeret kal ha'arez miyeinah shatu goyim 'al ken yitholelu goyim. jeremiah 51:8	pit'om nafelah babel vatishaber heililu 'aleha qekhu zori lemakh'obah 'ulai teirafei. jeremiah 51:9	ripinu ripinu 'et babel velo nirpatah 'izbuha veneilekh 'ish le'arzo ki naga' 'el hashamayim mishpatah venisa 'ad shekhaqim. jeremiah 51:10	hozi yhvh 'et zidqoteinu bo'u unesaperah beziyon 'et ma'aseh yhvh 'eloheinu. jeremiah 51:11	habeiru hakhizim mil'u hashelatim hei'ir yhvh 'et ruakh malkhei madai ki 'al babel mezimato lehashkhitah ki niqmat yhvh hi niqmat heikhalo. jeremiah 51:12	'el khomot babel se'u nes hakhaziqu hamishmar haqimu shomerim hakhinu ha'orebim ki gam zamam yhvh gam 'asah 'et 'asher diber 'el yoshebei babel. jeremiah 51:13	shokhanti shokhant 'al mayim rabim rabat 'ozarot ba qizekh 'amat biz'ekh. jeremiah 51:14	nishba' yhvh zeba'ot benafsho ki 'im mileitikh 'adam kayeleq ve'anu 'alayikh heidad. jeremiah 51:15	'oseh 'erez bekhokho meikhin teibel bekhakhemato ubitbunato natah shamayim. jeremiah 51:16	leqol tito hamon mayim bashamayim vaya'al nesi'im miqzeh 'arez beraqim lamatar 'asah vayozei ruakh mei'ozerotav. jeremiah 51:17	nib'ar kal 'adam mida'at hobish kal zoref mipasel ki sheqer nisko velo ruakh bam. jeremiah 51:18	hebel hemah ma'aseh ta'tu'im be'et pequdatam yobeidu. jeremiah 51:19	lo khe'eleh kheileq ya'aqob ki yozer hakol hu vesheibet nakhalato yhvh zeba'ot shemo. jeremiah 51:20	mapez 'atah li kelei milkhamah venipazti bekha goyim vehishkhati bekha mamlakhot. jeremiah 51:21	venipazti bekha sus verokhebo venipazti bekha rekheb verokhebo. jeremiah 51:22	venipazti bekha 'ish ve'ishah venipazti bekha zaqen vana'ar venipazti bekha bakhur ubetulah. jeremiah 51:23	venipazti bekha ro'eh ve'edro venipazti bekha 'ikar vezimdo venipazti bekha pakhot useganim. jeremiah 51:24	veshilamti lebabel ulekhol yoshebei khasdim 'et kal ra'atam 'asher 'asu beziyon le'eineikhem ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 51:25	hini 'eilekha har hamashkhit ne'um yhvh hamashkhit 'et kal ha'arez venatiti 'et yadi 'alekha vegilgaltikha min hasela'im unetatikha lehar sereifah. jeremiah 51:26	velo yiqkhu mimekha 'eben lefinah ve'eben lemosadot ki shimot 'olam tihyeh ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 51:27	se'u nes ba'arez tiq'u shofar bagoyim qadeshu 'aleha goyim hashmi'u 'aleha mamlekhot 'ararat mini ve'ashkenaz piqdu 'aleha tifsar ha'alu sus keyeleq samar. jeremiah 51:28	qadeshu 'aleha goyim 'et malkhei madai 'et pakhoteha ve'et kal seganeha ve'et kal 'erez memshalto. jeremiah 51:29	vatir'ash ha'arez vatakhol ki qamah 'al babel makhshebot yhvh lasum 'et 'erez babel leshamah mei'en yosheb. jeremiah 51:30	khadelu giborei babel lehilakhem yashebu bamezadot nashetah geburatam hayu lenashim hizitu mishkenoteha nishberu berikheha. jeremiah 51:31	raz liqrat raz yaruz umagid liqrat magid lehagid lemelekh babel ki nilkedah 'iro miqazeh. jeremiah 51:32	vehama'barot nitpasu ve'et ha'agamim sarefu ba'esh ve'anshei hamilkhamah nibhalu. jeremiah 51:33	ki khoh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el bat babel kegoren 'et hidrikhah 'od me'at uba'ah 'et haqazir lah. jeremiah 51:34	'akhalanu 'akhalani hamamanu hamamani nebukhadrezar melekh babel hiziganu hizigani keli riq bela'anu bela'ani katanin mila khereiso mei'adanai hedikhanu hedikhani. jeremiah 51:35	khamasi ushe'eiri 'al babel tomar yoshebet ziyon vedami 'el yoshebei khasdim tomar yerushalim. jeremiah 51:36	lakhen koh 'amar yhvh hini rab 'et ribekh veniqamti 'et niqmatekh vehakharabti 'et yamah vehobashti 'et meqorah. jeremiah 51:37	vehayetah babel legalim me'on tanim shamah ushereiqah mei'en yosheb. jeremiah 51:38	yakhdav kakefirim yish'agu na'aru kegorei 'arayot. jeremiah 51:39	bekhumam 'ashit 'et mishteihem vehishkartim lema'an ya'alozu veyashenu shenat 'olam velo yaqizu ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 51:40	'oridem kekharim litboakh ke'eilim 'im 'atudim. jeremiah 51:41	'ekh nilkedah sheishakh vatitafes tehilat kal ha'arez 'ekh hayetah leshamah babel bagoyim. jeremiah 51:42	'alah 'al babel hayam bahamon galav nikhsatah. jeremiah 51:43	hayu 'areha leshamah 'erez ziyah va'arabah 'erez lo yeisheb bahen kal 'ish velo ya'abor bahen ben 'adam. jeremiah 51:44	ufaqadti 'al bel bebabel vehozeiti 'et bil'o mipiv velo yinharu 'eilav 'od goyim gam khomat babel nafalah. jeremiah 51:45	ze'u mitokhah 'ami umaletu 'ish 'et nafsho meikharon 'af yhvh. jeremiah 51:46	ufen yeirakh lebabkhem vetire'u bashemu'ah hanishma'at ba'arez uba bashanah hashemu'ah ve'akharav bashanah hashemu'ah vekhamas ba'arez umoshel 'al moshel. jeremiah 51:47	lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ufaqadti 'al pesilei babel vekhal 'arzah teibosh vekhal khalaleha yipelu betokhah. jeremiah 51:48	verinenu 'al babel shamayim va'arez vekhol 'asher bahem ki mizafon yabo lah hashoddim ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 51:49	gam babel linpol khalei yisra'el gam lebabel nafelu khalei khal ha'arez. jeremiah 51:50	peleitim meikhereb hilkhu 'al ta'amodu zikhru meirakhoq 'et yhvh virushalim ta'aleh 'al lebabkhem. jeremiah 51:51	boshenu ki shama'nu kherpah kisetah khelimah paneinu ki ba'u zarim 'al miqdeshei bet yhvh. jeremiah 51:52	lakhen hineh yamim ba'im ne'um yhvh ufaqadti 'al pesileha ubekhal 'arzah ye'enoq khalal. jeremiah 51:53	ki ta'aleh babel hashamayim vekhi tebazer merom 'uzah mei'iti yabo'u shodedim lah ne'um yhvh. jeremiah 51:54	qol ze'aqah mibabel vesheber gadol mei'erez kasdim. jeremiah 51:55	ki shoded yhvh 'et babel ve'ibad mimenah qol gadol vehamu galeihem kemayim rabim nitan she'on qolam. jeremiah 51:56	ki ba 'aleha 'al babel shoded venilkedu giboreha khitetah qashetotam ki 'el gemulot yhvh shalem yeshalem. jeremiah 51:57	vehishkarti sareha vakhakhameha pakhoteha useganeha vegiboreha veyashenu shenat 'olam velo yaqizu ne'um hamelekh yhvh zeba'ot shemo. jeremiah 51:58	koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot khomot babel harekhabah 'ar'er tit'ar'ar ushe'areha hagebohim ba'esh yizatu veyig'u 'amim bedei riq ule'umim bedei 'esh veya'eifu. jeremiah 51:59	hadabar 'asher zivah yirmeyahu hanabi 'et serayah ben neiriyah ben makhseiyah belekhto 'et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah babel bishnat harebi'it lemalekho userayah sar menukhah. jeremiah 51:60	vayikhtob yirmeyahu 'et kal hara'ah 'asher tabo 'el babel 'el seifer 'ekhad 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh haketubim 'el babel. jeremiah 51:61	vayomer yirmeyahu 'el serayah kebo'akha babel vera'ita veqarata 'et kal hadebarim ha'eleh. jeremiah 51:62	ve'amarta yhvh 'atah dibarta 'el hamaqom hazeh lehakhrito lebilti heyot bo yosheb lemei'adam ve'ad beheimah ki shimot 'olam tihyeh. jeremiah 51:63	vehayah kekhalotekha liqro 'et haseifer hazeh tiqshor 'alav 'eben vehishlakhto 'el tokh perat. jeremiah 51:64	ve'amarta kakhah tishqa' babel velo taqum mipenei hara'ah 'asher 'anokhi meibi 'aleha veya'eifu 'ad henah dibrei yirmeyahu. jeremiah 52:1	ben 'esrim ve'akhat shanah zidqiyahu bemalekho ve'akhat 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo khamital khamutal bat yirmeyahu milibnah. jeremiah 52:2	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asah yehoyaqim. jeremiah 52:3	ki 'al 'af yhvh hayetah birushalim vihudah 'ad hishlikho 'otam mei'al panav vayimrod zidqiyahu bemelekh babel. jeremiah 52:4	vayhi bashanah hateshi'it lemalekho bakhodesh ha'asiri be'asor lakhodesh ba nebukhadrezar melekh babel hu vekhal kheilo 'al yerushalim vayakhanu 'aleha vayibnu 'aleha dayeq sabib. jeremiah 52:5	vatabo ha'ir bamazor 'ad 'ashtei 'esreh shanah lamelekh zidqiyahu. jeremiah 52:6	bakhodesh harebi'i betish'ah lakhodesh vayekhezaq hara'ab ba'ir velo hayah lekhem le'am ha'arez. jeremiah 52:7	vatibaqa' ha'ir vekhal 'anshei hamilkhamah yibrekhu vayeize'u meiha'ir laylah derekh sha'ar ben hakhomotayim 'asher 'al gan hamelekh vekhasdim 'al ha'ir sabib vayeilekhu derekh ha'arabah. jeremiah 52:8	vayirdefu khel kasdim 'akharei hamelekh vayasigu 'et zidqiyahu be'arbot yereikho vekhal kheilo nafozu mei'alav. jeremiah 52:9	vayitpesu 'et hamelekh vaya'alu 'oto 'el melekh babel riblatah be'erez khamat vaydaber 'ito mishpatim. jeremiah 52:10	vayishkhat melekh babel 'et benei zidqiyahu le'einav vegam 'et kal sarei yehudah shakhat beriblatah. jeremiah 52:11	ve'et 'einei zidqiyahu 'iver vaya'asreihu bankhushtayim vaybi'eihu melekh babel babelah vayiteneihu bebet bet hapequdot 'ad yom moto. jeremiah 52:12	ubakhodesh hakhamishi be'asor lakhodesh hi shenat tesha' 'esreh shanah lamelekh nebukhadrezar melekh babel ba nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim 'amad lifnei melekh babel birushalim. jeremiah 52:13	vayisrof 'et bet yhvh ve'et bet hamelekh ve'et kal batei yerushalim ve'et kal bet hagadol saraf ba'esh. jeremiah 52:14	ve'et kal khomot yerushalim sabib natezu kal khel kasdim 'asher 'et rab tabakhim. jeremiah 52:15	umidalot ha'am ve'et yeter ha'am hanish'arim ba'ir ve'et hanofelim 'asher nafelu 'el melekh babel ve'et yeter ha'amon heglah nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim. jeremiah 52:16	umidalot ha'arez hish'ir nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim lekhoremim uleyogebim. jeremiah 52:17	ve'et 'amudei hanekhoshet 'asher lebet yhvh ve'et hamekhonot ve'et yam hanekhoshet 'asher bebet yhvh shiberu khasdim vayis'u 'et kal nekhushtam babelah. jeremiah 52:18	ve'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamzamerot ve'et hamizraqot ve'et hakapot ve'et kal kelei hanekhoshet 'asher yesharetu bahem laqakhu. jeremiah 52:19	ve'et hasipim ve'et hamakhtot ve'et hamizraqot ve'et hasirot ve'et hamenorot ve'et hakapot ve'et hamenaqiyot 'asher zahab zahab va'asher kesef kasef laqakh rab tabakhim. jeremiah 52:20	ha'amudim shenayim hayam 'ekhad vehabaqar shenem 'asar nekhoshet 'asher takhat hamekhonot 'asher 'asah hamelekh shelomoh lebet yhvh lo hayah mishqal linkhushtam kal hakeilim ha'eleh. jeremiah 52:21	veha'amudim shemoneh 'esreh 'amah qomah qomat ha'amud ha'ekhad vekhut shetem 'esreh 'amah yesubenu ve'abeyo 'arba' 'azba'ot nabub. jeremiah 52:22	vekhoteret 'alav nekhoshet veqomat hakoteret ha'akhat khamesh 'amot usebakhah verimonim 'al hakoteret sabib hakol nekhoshet vekha'eleh la'amud hasheini verimonim. jeremiah 52:23	vayihyu harimonim tish'im veshishah rukhah kal harimonim mei'ah 'al hasebakhah sabib. jeremiah 52:24	vayiqakh rab tabakhim 'et serayah kohen harosh ve'et zefanyah kohen hamishneh ve'et sheloshet shomerei hasaf. jeremiah 52:25	umin ha'ir laqakh saris 'ekhad 'asher hayah faqid 'al 'anshei hamilkhamah veshib'ah 'anashim meiro'ei fenei hamelekh 'asher nimze'u ba'ir ve'et sofer sar hazaba hamazbi 'et 'am ha'arez veshishim 'ish mei'am ha'arez hanimze'im betokh ha'ir. jeremiah 52:26	vayiqakh 'otam nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim vayolekh 'otam 'el melekh babel riblatah. jeremiah 52:27	vayakeh 'otam melekh babel vaymitem beriblah be'erez khamat vayigel yehudah mei'al 'admato. jeremiah 52:28	zeh ha'am 'asher heglah nebukhadrezar bishnat sheba' yehudim sheloshet 'alafim ve'esrim usheloshah. jeremiah 52:29	bishnat shemoneh 'esreh linbukhadrezar mirushalim nefesh shemoneh mei'ot sheloshim ushenayim. jeremiah 52:30	bishnat shalosh ve'esrim linbukhadrezar heglah nebuzar'adan rab tabakhim yehudim nefesh sheba' mei'ot 'arba'im vakhamishah kal nefesh 'arba'at 'alafim veshesh mei'ot. jeremiah 52:31	vayhi bishloshim vasheba' shanah legalut yehoyakhin melekh yehudah bishnem 'asar khodesh be'esrim vakhamishah lakhodesh nasa 'evil merodakh melekh babel bishnat malkhuto 'et rosh yehoyakhin melekh yehudah vayozei 'oto mibet hakeli hakelu. jeremiah 52:32	vaydaber 'ito tobot vayiten 'et kis'o mima'al lekhisei melakhim hamelakhim 'asher 'ito bebabel. jeremiah 52:33	veshinah 'et bigdei khil'o ve'akhal lekhem lefanav tamid kal yemei khayav. jeremiah 52:34	va'arukhato 'arukhat tamid nitenah lo mei'et melekh babel debar yom beyomo 'ad yom moto kol yemei khayav. 

ezekiel 1:1	vayhi bishloshim shanah barebi'i bakhamishah lakhodesh va'ani betokh hagolah 'al nehar kebar niftekhu hashamayim va'er'eh mar'ot 'elohim. ezekiel 1:2	bakhamishah lakhodesh hi hashanah hakhamishit legalut hamelekh yoyakhin. ezekiel 1:3	hayoh hayah debar yhvh 'el yekhezqel ben buzi hakohen be'erez kasdim 'al nehar kebar vatehi 'alav sham yad yhvh. ezekiel 1:4	va'eire vehineh ruakh se'arah ba'ah min hazafon 'anan gadol ve'esh mitlaqakhat venogah lo sabib umitokhah ke'en hakhashmal mitokh ha'esh. ezekiel 1:5	umitokhah demut 'arba' khayot vezeh mar'eihen demut 'adam lahenah. ezekiel 1:6	ve'arba'ah fanim le'ekhat ve'arba' kenafayim le'akhat lahem. ezekiel 1:7	veragleihem regel yesharah vekhaf ragleihem kekhaf regel 'eigel venozezim ke'en nekhoshet qalal. ezekiel 1:8	veyado videi 'adam mitakhat kanfeihem 'al 'arba'at rib'eihem ufeneihem vekhanfeihem le'arba'tam. ezekiel 1:9	khoberot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah kanfeihem lo yisabu belekhtan 'ish 'el 'eiber panav yeileikhu. ezekiel 1:10	udemut peneihem penei 'adam ufenei 'aryeh 'el hayamin le'arba'tam ufenei shor meihasemol le'arba'tan ufenei nesher le'arba'tan. ezekiel 1:11	ufeneihem vekhanfeihem perudot milma'elah le'ish tayim khoberot 'ish ushetayim mekhasot 'et geviyoteihenah ezekiel 1:12	ve'ish 'el 'eiber panav yeileikhu 'el 'asher yihyeh shamah haruakh lalekhet yeileikhu lo yisabu belekhtan. ezekiel 1:13	udemut hakhayot mar'eihem kegakhalei 'esh bo'arot kemar'eh halapidim hi mithalekhet ben hakhayot venogah la'esh umin ha'esh yozei baraq. ezekiel 1:14	vehakhayot razo vashob kemar'eh habazaq. ezekiel 1:15	va'eire hakhayot vehineh 'ofan 'ekhad ba'arez 'eizel hakhayot le'arba'at panav. ezekiel 1:16	mar'eh ha'ofanim uma'aseihem ke'en tarshish udemut 'ekhad le'arba'tan umar'eihem uma'aseihem ka'asher yihyeh ha'ofan betokh ha'ofan. ezekiel 1:17	'al 'arba'at rib'eihen belekhtam yeileikhu lo yisabu belekhtan. ezekiel 1:18	vegabeihen vegobah lahem veyir'ah lahem vegabotam melei'ot 'einayim sabib le'arba'tan. ezekiel 1:19	ubelekhet hakhayot yeilekhu ha'ofanim 'ezlam ubehinasei hakhayot mei'al ha'arez yinase'u ha'ofanim. ezekiel 1:20	'al 'asher yihyeh sham haruakh lalekhet yeileikhu shamah haruakh lalekhet veha'ofanim yinase'u le'umatam ki ruakh hakhayah ba'ofanim. ezekiel 1:21	belekhtam yeileikhu ube'amedam ya'amodu ubehinase'am mei'al ha'arez yinase'u ha'ofanim le'umatam ki ruakh hakhayah ba'ofanim. ezekiel 1:22	udemut 'al rashei hakhayah raqia' ke'en haqerakh hanora natui 'al rasheihem milma'elah. ezekiel 1:23	vetakhat haraqia' kanfeihem yesharot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah le'ish shetayim mekhasot lahenah ule'ish shetayim mekhasot lahenah 'et geviyoteihem. ezekiel 1:24	va'eshma' 'et qol kanfeihem keqol mayim rabim keqol shadai belekhtam qol hamulah keqol makhaneh be'amedam terapenah khanfeihen. ezekiel 1:25	vayhi qol mei'al laraqia' 'asher 'al rosham be'amedam terapenah khanfeihen. ezekiel 1:26	umima'al laraqia' 'asher 'al rosham kemar'eh 'eben sapir demut kisei ve'al demut hakisei demut kemar'eh 'adam 'alav milma'elah. ezekiel 1:27	va'eire ke'en khashmal kemar'eh 'esh bet lah sabib mimar'eh matenav ulema'elah umimar'eh matenav ulematah ra'iti kemar'eh 'esh venogah lo sabib. ezekiel 1:28	kemar'eh haqeshet 'asher yihyeh be'anan beyom hageshem ken mar'eh hanogah sabib hu mar'eh demut kebod yhvh va'er'eh va'epol 'al panai va'eshma' qol medaber. ezekiel 2:1	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam 'amod 'al raglekha va'adaber 'otakh. ezekiel 2:2	vatabo bi ruakh ka'asher diber 'eilai vata'amideini 'al raglai va'eshma' 'et midaber 'eilai. ezekiel 2:3	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam sholeiakh 'ani 'otkha 'el benei yisra'el 'el goyim hamordim 'asher maredu bi hemah va'abotam pashe'u bi 'ad 'ezem hayom hazeh. ezekiel 2:4	vehabanim qeshei fanim vekhizqei leb 'ani sholeiakh 'otkha 'aleihem ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 2:5	vehemah 'im yishme'u ve'im yekhdalu ki bet meri hemah veyade'u ki nabi hayah betokham. ezekiel 2:6	ve'atah ben 'adam 'al tira meihem umidibreihem 'al tira ki sarabim vesalonim 'otakh ve'el 'aqrabim 'atah yosheb midibreihem 'al tira umipeneihem 'al teikhat ki bet meri hemah. ezekiel 2:7	vedibarta 'et debarai 'aleihem 'im yishme'u ve'im yekhdalu ki meri hemah. ezekiel 2:8	ve'atah ben 'adam shema' 'et 'asher 'ani medaber 'eilekha 'al tehi meri kebet hameri pezeh fikha ve'ekhol 'et 'asher 'ani noten 'eilekha. ezekiel 2:9	va'er'eh vehineh yad shelukhah 'eilai vehineh bo megilat seifer. ezekiel 2:10	vayifros 'otah lefanai vehi khetubah panim ve'akhor vekhatub 'eileha qinim vahegeh vahi. ezekiel 3:1	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam 'et 'asher timza 'ekhol 'ekhol 'et hamegilah hazot velekh daber 'el bet yisra'el. ezekiel 3:2	va'eftakh 'et pi vaya'akhileini 'et hamegilah hazot. ezekiel 3:3	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam bitnekha ta'akhel umei'ekha temalei 'et hamegilah hazot 'asher 'ani noten 'eilekha va'okhelah vatehi befi kidbash lematoq. ezekiel 3:4	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam lekh bo 'el bet yisra'el vedibarta bidbarai 'aleihem. ezekiel 3:5	ki lo 'el 'am 'imqei safah vekhibdei lashon 'atah shaluakh 'el bet yisra'el. ezekiel 3:6	lo 'el 'amim rabim 'imqei safah vekhibdei lashon 'asher lo tishma' dibreihem 'im
