lo 'aleihem shelakhtikha hemah yishme'u 'eilekha. ezekiel 3:7	ubet yisra'el lo yobu lishmoa' 'eilekha ki 'einam 'obim lishmoa' 'eilai ki kal bet yisra'el khizqei meizakh uqeshei leb hemah. ezekiel 3:8	hineh natati 'et panekha khazaqim le'umat peneihem ve'et mizkhakha khazaq le'umat mizkham. ezekiel 3:9	keshamir khazaq mizor natati mizkhekha lo tira 'otam velo teikhat mipeneihem ki bet meri hemah. ezekiel 3:10	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam 'et kal debarai 'asher 'adaber 'eilekha qakh bilbabekha ube'azenekha shema'. ezekiel 3:11	velekh bo 'el hagolah 'el benei 'amekha vedibarta 'aleihem ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'im yishme'u ve'im yekhdalu. ezekiel 3:12	vatisa'eini ruakh va'eshma' 'akharai qol ra'ash gadol barukh kebod yhvh mimeqomo. ezekiel 3:13	veqol kanfei hakhayot mashiqot 'ishah 'el 'akhotah veqol ha'ofanim le'umatam veqol ra'ash gadol. ezekiel 3:14	veruakh nesa'atni vatiqakheini va'eilekh mar bakhamat rukhi veyad yhvh 'alai khazaqah. ezekiel 3:15	va'abo 'el hagolah tel 'abib hayoshebim 'el nehar kebar va'asher va'eisheb hemah yoshebim sham va'eisheb sham shib'at yamim mashmim betokham. ezekiel 3:16	vayhi miqzeh shib'at yamim vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 3:17	ben 'adam zofeh netatikha lebet yisra'el veshama'ta mipi dabar vehizharta 'otam mimeni. ezekiel 3:18	be'ameri larasha' mot tamut velo hizharto velo dibarta lehazhir rasha' midarko haresha'ah lekhayoto hu rasha' ba'avono yamut vedamo miyadekha 'abaqesh. ezekiel 3:19	ve'atah ki hizharta rasha' velo shab meirish'o umidarko haresha'ah hu ba'avono yamut ve'atah 'et nafshekha hizalta. ezekiel 3:20	ubeshub zadiq mizidqo ve'asah 'avel venatati mikhshol lefanav hu yamut ki lo hizharto bekhatato yamut velo tizakharna zidqotav 'asher 'asah vedamo miyadekha 'abaqesh. ezekiel 3:21	ve'atah ki hizharto zadiq lebilti khato zadiq vehu lo khata khayo yikhyeh ki nizhar ve'atah 'et nafshekha hizalta. ezekiel 3:22	vatehi 'alai sham yad yhvh vayomer 'eilai qum zei 'el habiq'ah vesham 'adaber 'otakh. ezekiel 3:23	va'aqum va'eizei 'el habiq'ah vehineh sham kebod yhvh 'omed kakabod 'asher ra'iti 'al nehar kebar va'epol 'al panai. ezekiel 3:24	vatabo bi ruakh vata'amideini 'al raglai vaydaber 'oti vayomer 'eilai bo hisager betokh beitekha. ezekiel 3:25	ve'atah ben 'adam hineh natenu 'alekha 'abotim va'asarukha bahem velo teizei betokham. ezekiel 3:26	uleshonkha 'adbiq 'el khikekha vene'elamta velo tihyeh lahem le'ish mokhiakh ki bet meri hemah. ezekiel 3:27	ubedaberi 'otkha 'eftakh 'et pikha ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hashomeia' yishma' vehekhadel yekhdal ki bet meri hemah. ezekiel 4:1	ve'atah ben 'adam qakh lekha lebeinah venatatah 'otah lefanekha vekhaqota 'aleha 'ir 'et yerushalim. ezekiel 4:2	venatatah 'aleha mazor ubanita 'aleha dayeq veshafakhta 'aleha solelah venatatah 'aleha makhanot vesim 'aleha karim sabib. ezekiel 4:3	ve'atah qakh lekha makhabat barzel venatatah 'otah qir barzel beinekha uben ha'ir vahakhinotah 'et panekha 'eileha vehayetah bamazor vezarta 'aleha 'ot hi lebet yisra'el. ezekiel 4:4	ve'atah shekhab 'al zidekha hasemali vesamta 'et 'avon bet yisra'el 'alav mispar hayamim 'asher tishkab 'alav tisa 'et 'avonam. ezekiel 4:5	va'ani natati lekha 'et shenei 'avonam lemispar yamim shelosh mei'ot vetish'im yom venasata 'avon bet yisra'el. ezekiel 4:6	vekhilita 'et 'eleh veshakhabta 'al zidekha haymoni haymani sheinit venasata 'et 'avon bet yehudah 'arba'im yom yom lashanah yom lashanah netativ lakh. ezekiel 4:7	ve'el mezor yerushalim takhin panekha uzero'akha khasufah venibeita 'aleha. ezekiel 4:8	vehineh natati 'alekha 'abotim velo teihafekh mizidekha 'el zidekha 'ad kalotkha yemei mezurekha. ezekiel 4:9	ve'atah qakh lekha khitin use'orim ufol va'adashim vedokhan vekhusemim venatatah 'otam bikhli 'ekhad ve'asita 'otam lekha lelakhem mispar hayamim 'asher 'atah shokheb 'al zidekha shelosh mei'ot vetish'im yom tokhalenu. ezekiel 4:10	uma'akhalekha 'asher tokhalenu bemishqol 'esrim sheqel layom mei'et 'ad 'et tokhalenu. ezekiel 4:11	umayim bimsurah tishteh shishit hahin mei'et 'ad 'et tishteh. ezekiel 4:12	ve'ugat se'orim tokhalenah vehi begelei zei'at ha'adam te'ugenah le'eineihem. ezekiel 4:13	vayomer yhvh kakhah yokhelu benei yisra'el 'et lakhmam tamei bagoyim 'asher 'adikhem sham. ezekiel 4:14	va'omar 'ahah 'adonai yhvh hineh nafshi lo metuma'ah unebeilah utereifah lo 'akhalti mine'urai ve'ad 'atah velo ba befi besar pigul. ezekiel 4:15	vayomer 'eilai re'eh natati lekha 'et zefu'ei zefi'ei habaqar takhat gelei ha'adam ve'asita 'et lakhmekha 'aleihem. ezekiel 4:16	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam hini shober mateh lekhem birushalim ve'akhelu lekhem bemishqal ubid'agah umayim bimsurah ubeshimamon yishtu. ezekiel 4:17	lema'an yakhseru lekhem vamayim venashamu 'ish ve'akhiv venamaqu ba'avonam. ezekiel 5:1	ve'atah ben 'adam qakh lekha khereb khadah ta'ar hagalabim tiqakhenah lakh veha'abarta 'al roshekha ve'al zeqanekha velaqakhta lekha mozenei mishqal vekhilaqtam. ezekiel 5:2	shelishit ba'ur tab'ir betokh ha'ir kimlot yemei hamazor velaqakhta 'et hashelishit takeh bakhereb sebiboteha vehashelishit tizreh laruakh vekhereb 'ariq 'akhareihem. ezekiel 5:3	velaqakhta misham me'at bemispar vezarta 'otam bikhnafekha. ezekiel 5:4	umeihem 'od tiqakh vehishlakhta 'otam 'el tokh ha'esh vesarafta 'otam ba'esh mimenu teizei 'esh 'el kal bet yisra'el. ezekiel 5:5	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh zot yerushalim betokh hagoyim samtiha usebiboteha 'arazot. ezekiel 5:6	vatemer 'et mishpatai lerish'ah min hagoyim ve'et khuqotai min ha'arazot 'asher sebiboteha ki bemishpatai ma'asu vekhuqotai lo halekhu bahem. ezekiel 5:7	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an hamanekhem min hagoyim 'asher sebiboteikhem bekhuqotai lo halakhtem ve'et mishpatai lo 'asitem ukhemishpetei hagoyim 'asher sebiboteikhem lo 'asitem. ezekiel 5:8	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'alayikh gam 'ani ve'asiti betokhekh mishpatim le'einei hagoyim. ezekiel 5:9	ve'asiti bakh 'et 'asher lo 'asiti ve'et 'asher lo 'e'eseh khamohu 'od ya'an kal to'abotayikh. ezekiel 5:10	lakhen 'abot yokhelu banim betokhekh ubanim yokhelu 'abotam ve'asiti bakh shefatim vezeiriti 'et kal she'eiritekh lekhal ruakh. ezekiel 5:11	lakhen khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh 'im lo ya'an 'et miqdashi timet bekhal shiquzayikh ubekhal to'abotayikh vegam 'ani 'egra' velo takhos 'eini vegam 'ani lo 'ekhmol. ezekiel 5:12	shelishitekh badeber yamutu ubara'ab yikhlu betokhekh vehashelishit bakhereb yipelu sebibotayikh vehashelishit lekhal ruakh 'ezareh vekhereb 'ariq 'akhareihem. ezekiel 5:13	vekhalah 'api vahanikhoti khamati bam vehinekhameti veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh dibarti beqin'ati bekhaloti khamati bam. ezekiel 5:14	ve'etenekh lekharebah ulekherpah bagoyim 'asher sebibotayikh 5:16	beshalekhi 'et khizei hara'ab hara'im bahem 'asher hayu lemashkhit 'asher 'ashalakh 'otam leshakhetkhem vera'ab 'osef 'aleikhem veshabarti lakhem mateh lakhem. ezekiel 5:17	veshilakhti 'aleikhem ve'ibadti bamoteikhem. ezekiel 6:4	venashamu mizbekhoteikhem venishberu khamaneikhem vehipalti khaleikhem lifnei giluleikhem. ezekiel 6:5	venatati 'et pigrei benei yisra'el lifnei giluleihem vezeiriti 'et 'azmoteikhem sebibot mizbekhoteikhem. ezekiel 6:6	bekhol mosheboteikhem he'arim tekherabnah vehabamot tishamenah lema'an yekherbu veye'shemu mizbekhoteikhem venishberu venishbetu giluleikhem 6:9	vezakheru feliteikhem 'oti bagoyim 'asher nishbu sham 'asher nishbarti 'et libam hazoneh 'asher sar mei'alai ve'et 'eineihem hazonot 'akharei giluleihem venaqotu bifneihem 'el hara'ot 'asher 'asu 6:13	vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh bihyot khaleihem betokh giluleihem sebibot mizbekhoteihem 'el kal gib'ah ramah bekhol rashei heharim vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan vetakhat kal 'eilah 'abutah meqom 'asher natenu yhvh. ezekiel 7:5	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ra'ah 'akhat ra'ah hineh ba'ah. ezekiel 7:6	qez ba ba haqez heiqiz 'eilayikh hineh ba'ah. ezekiel 7:7	ba'ah hazefirah 'eilekha yosheb ha'arez ba ha'et qarob 7:11	hekhamas qam lemateh resha' lo meihem velo meihamonam velo mehemeihem velo noah bahem. ezekiel 7:12	ba ha'et higia' hayom haqoneh 'al yismakh vehamokher 'al yit'abal ki kharon 'el kal hamonah. ezekiel 7:13	ki hamokher 'el hamimkar lo yashub ve'od bakhayim khayatam ki khazon 'el kal hamonah lo yashub ve'ish ba'avono khayato lo yitkhazaqu. ezekiel 7:14	taqe'u bataqoa' vehakhin hakol ve'en lo yemalei'u ki mikhshol 'avonam hayah. ezekiel 7:20	uzebi 'edyo lega'on samahu vezalmei to'abotam shiquzeihem 'asu bo 'al ken netativ lahem lenidah. ezekiel 7:21	unetativ beyad hazarim labaz 7:26	hoah 'al hoah tabo ushemu'ah 'el shemu'ah tihyeh ubiqshu khazon minabi vetorah tobad mikohen ve'eizah mizeqeinim. ezekiel 7:27	hamelekh yit'abal venasi yilbash shemamah videi 'am ha'arez 8:3	vayishlakh tabnit yad vayiqakheini bezizit roshi vatisa 'oti ruakh ben ha'arez uben hashamayim vatabei 'oti yerushalemah bemar'ot 'elohim 'el petakh sha'ar hapenimit haponeh zafonah 'asher sham ezekiel 8:13	vayomer 'eilai 'od tashub tir'eh to'eibot gedolot 'asher hemah 'osim. ezekiel 8:14	vayabei 'oti 'el petakh sha'ar bet yhvh 'asher 'el hazafonah vehineh sham hanashim yoshebot mebakot 'et 'eini velo 'ekhmol veqare'u be'azenai qol gadol velo 'eshma' 'otam. ezekiel 9:1	vayiqra be'azenai qol gadol leimor qarebu pequdot ha'ir ve'ish keli mashkheito beyado. ezekiel 9:2	vehineh shishah ezekiel 9:3	ukhebod 'elohei yisra'el na'alah mei'al hakerub 'asher hayah 'alav 'el miftan habayit vayiqra 'el ha'ish halabush habadim 'asher qeset hasofer bematenav. ezekiel 9:4	vayomer yhvh 'eilo 'eilav 'abor betokh ha'ir betokh yerushalim vehitvita tav 'al mizkhot ha'anashim hane'enakhim vehane'enaqim 'al kal hato'eibot hana'asot betokhah. ezekiel 9:5	ule'eleh 'amar be'azenai 'ibru ba'ir 'akharav vehaku 'al 'al takhos 'eineikhem 'einekhem ve'al takhmolu. ezekiel 9:6	zaqen bakhur ubetulah vetaf venashim tahargu lemashkhit ve'al kal 'ish 'asher 'alav hatav 'al tigashu umimiqdashi takhelu vayakhelu ba'anashim hazeqeinim 'asher lifnei habayit. ezekiel 9:7	vayomer 'aleihem tame'u 'et habayit umal'u 'et hakhazeirot khalalim zei'u veyaze'u vehiku ba'ir. ezekiel 9:8	vayhi kehakotam berosham natati. ezekiel 9:11	vehineh ha'ish lebush habadim 'asher haqeset bematenav meishib dabar leimor 'asiti kha'asher kekhol 'asher zivitani. ezekiel 10:1	va'er'eh vehineh 'el haraqia' 'asher 'al rosh hakerubim ke'eben sapir kemar'eh demut kisei nir'ah 'aleihem. ezekiel 10:2	vayomer 'el ha'ish lebush habadim vayomer bo 'el beinot lagalgal 'el takhat lakerub umalei khafenekha gakhalei 'esh mibeinot lakerubim uzeroq 'al ha'ir vayabo le'einai. ezekiel 10:3	vehakerubim 'omedim mimin labayit bebo'o ha'ish vehe'anan malei 'et hekhazer hapenimit. ezekiel 10:4	vayaram kebod yhvh mei'al hakerub 'al miftan habayit vayimalei habayit 'et he'anan vehekhazer male'ah 'et nogah kebod yhvh. ezekiel 10:5	veqol kanfei hakerubim nishma' 'ad hekhazer hakhizonah keqol 'el shadai bedabero. ezekiel 10:6	vayhi bezavoto 'et ha'ish lebush habadim leimor qakh 'esh mibeinot lagalgal mibeinot lakerubim vayabo vaya'amod 'eizel ha'ofan. ezekiel 10:7	vayishlakh hakerub 'et yado mibeinot lakerubim 'el ha'esh 'asher beinot hakerubim vayisa vayiten 'el khafenei lebush habadim vayiqakh vayeizei. ezekiel 10:8	vayeira lakerubim tabnit yad 'adam takhat kanfeihem. ezekiel 10:9	va'er'eh vehineh 'arba'ah 'ofanim 'eizel hakerubim 'ofan 'ekhad 'eizel hakerub 'ekhad ve'ofan 'ekhad 'eizel hakerub 'ekhad umar'eh ha'ofanim ke'en 'eben tarshish. ezekiel 10:10	umar'eihem demut 'ekhad le'arba'tam ka'asher yihyeh ha'ofan betokh ha'ofan. ezekiel 10:11	belekhtam 'el 'arba'at rib'eihem yeileikhu lo yisabu belekhtam ki hamaqom 'asher yifneh harosh 'akharav yeileikhu lo yisabu belekhtam. ezekiel 10:12	vekhal besaram vegabeihem videihem vekhanfeihem veha'ofanim melei'im 'einayim sabib le'arba'tam 'ofaneihem. ezekiel 10:13	la'ofanim lahem qora hagalgal be'azenai. ezekiel 10:14	ve'arba'ah fanim le'ekhad penei ha'ekhad penei hakerub ufenei hasheini penei 'adam vehashelishi penei 'aryeh veharebi'i penei nasher. ezekiel 10:15	vayeiromu hakerubim hi hakhayah 'asher ra'iti binhar kebar. ezekiel 10:16	ubelekhet hakerubim yeilekhu ha'ofanim 'ezlam ubis'et hakerubim 'et kanfeihem larum mei'al ha'arez lo yisabu ha'ofanim gam hem mei'ezlam. ezekiel 10:17	be'amedam ya'amodu uberomam yeiromu 'otam ki ruakh hakhayah bahem. ezekiel 10:18	vayeizei kebod yhvh mei'al miftan habayit vaya'amod 'al hakerubim. ezekiel 10:19	vayis'u hakerubim 'et kanfeihem vayeiromu min ha'arez le'einai bezeitam veha'ofanim le'umatam vaya'amod petakh sha'ar bet yhvh haqadmoni ukhebod 'elohei yisra'el 'aleihem milma'elah. ezekiel 10:20	hi hakhayah 'asher ra'iti takhat 'elohei yisra'el binhar kebar va'eida' ki kherubim hemah. ezekiel 10:21	'arba'ah 'arba'ah fanim le'ekhad ve'arba' kenafayim le'ekhad udemut yedei 'adam takhat kanfeihem. ezekiel 10:22	udemut peneihem hemah hapanim 'asher ra'iti 'al nehar kebar mar'eihem ve'otam 'ish 'el 'eiber panav yeileikhu. ezekiel 11:1	vatisa 'oti ruakh vatabei 'oti 'el sha'ar bet yhvh haqadmoni haponeh qadimah vehineh befetakh hasha'ar 'esrim vakhamishah 'ish va'er'eh betokham 'et ya'azanyah ben 'azur ve'et pelatyahu ben benayahu sarei ha'am. ezekiel 11:2	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam 'eleh ha'anashim hakhoshebim 'aven vehayo'azim 'azat ra' ba'ir hazot. ezekiel 11:3	ha'omerim lo beqarob benot batim hi hasir va'anakhnu habasar. ezekiel 11:4	lakhen hinabei 'aleihem hinabei ben 'adam. ezekiel 11:5	vatipol 'alai ruakh yhvh vayomer 'eilai 'emor koh 'amar yhvh ken 'amartem bet yisra'el uma'alot rukhakhem 'ani yeda'tiha. ezekiel 11:6	hirbeitem khaleikhem ba'ir hazot umileitem khuzoteha khalal. ezekiel 11:7	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh khaleikhem 'asher samtem betokhah hemah habasar vehi hasir ve'etkhem hozi mitokhah. ezekiel 11:8	khereb yereitem vekhereb 'abi 'aleikhem ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 11:9	vehozeiti 'etkhem mitokhah venatati 'etkhem beyad zarim ve'asiti bakhem shefatim. ezekiel 11:10	bakhereb tipolu 'al gebul yisra'el 'eshpot 'etkhem vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 11:11	hi lo tihyeh lakhem lesir ve'atem tihyu betokhah lebasar 'el gebul yisra'el 'eshpot 'etkhem. ezekiel 11:12	vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh 'asher bekhuqai lo halakhtem umishpatai lo 'asitem ukhemishpetei hagoyim 'asher sebiboteikhem 'asitem. ezekiel 11:13	vayhi kehinabe'i ufelatyahu ben benayah met va'epol 'al panai va'ez'aq qol gadol va'omar 'ahah 'adonai yhvh kalah 'atah 'oseh 'et she'eirit yisra'el. ezekiel 11:14	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 11:15	ben 'adam 'akhekha 'akhekha 'anshei ge'ulatekha vekhal bet yisra'el kuloh 'asher 'ameru lahem yoshebei yerushalim rakhaqu mei'al yhvh lanu hi nitenah ha'arez lemorashah. ezekiel 11:16	lakhen 'emor koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ki hirkhaqtim bagoyim vekhi hafizotim ba'arazot va'ehi lahem lemiqdash me'at ba'arazot 'asher ba'u sham. ezekiel 11:17	lakhen 'emor koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh veqibazti 'etkhem min ha'amim ve'asafti 'etkhem min ha'arazot 'asher nefozotem bahem venatati lakhem 'et 'admat yisra'el. ezekiel 11:18	uba'u shamah veheisiru 'et kal shiquzeha ve'et kal to'aboteha mimenah. ezekiel 11:19	venatati lahem leb 'ekhad veruakh khadashah 'eten beqirbekhem vahasiroti leb ha'eben mibesaram venatati lahem leb basar. ezekiel 11:20	lema'an bekhuqotai yeileikhu ve'et mishpatai yishmeru ve'asu 'otam vehayu li le'am va'ani 'ehyeh lahem leilohim. ezekiel 11:21	ve'el leb shiquzeihem veto'aboteihem libam holekh darkam berosham natati ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 11:22	vayis'u hakerubim 'et kanfeihem veha'ofanim le'umatam ukhebod 'elohei yisra'el 'aleihem milma'elah. ezekiel 11:23	vaya'al kebod yhvh mei'al tokh ha'ir vaya'amod 'al hahar 'asher miqedem la'ir. ezekiel 11:24	veruakh nesa'atni vatebi'eini khasdimah 'el hagolah bamar'eh beruakh 'elohim vaya'al mei'alai hamar'eh 'asher ra'iti. ezekiel 11:25	va'adaber 'el hagolah 'et kal dibrei yhvh 'asher her'ani. ezekiel 12:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 12:2	ben 'adam betokh bet hameri 'atah yosheb 'asher 'einayim lahem lir'ot velo ra'u 'azenayim lahem lishmoa' velo shamei'u ki bet meri hem. ezekiel 12:3	ve'atah ben 'adam 'aseh lekha kelei golah ugeleh yomam le'eineihem vegalita mimeqomkha 'el maqom 'akher le'eineihem 'ulai yir'u ki bet meri hemah. ezekiel 12:4	vehozeita kheilekha kikhlei golah yomam le'eineihem ve'atah teizei ba'ereb le'eineihem kemoza'ei golah. ezekiel 12:5	le'eineihem khatar lekha baqir vehozeita bo. ezekiel 12:6	le'eineihem 'al katef tisa ba'alatah tozi panekha tekhaseh velo tir'eh 'et ha'arez ki mofet netatikha lebet yisra'el. ezekiel 12:7	va'a'as ken ka'asher zuveiti keilai hozeiti kikhlei golah yomam uba'ereb khatarti li baqir beyad ba'alatah hozeiti 'al katef nasati le'eineihem. ezekiel 12:8	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai baboqer leimor. ezekiel 12:9	ben 'adam halo 'ameru 'eilekha bet yisra'el bet hameri mah 'atah 'oseh. ezekiel 12:10	'emor 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hanasi hamasa hazeh birushalam vekhal bet yisra'el 'asher hemah betokham. ezekiel 12:11	'emor 'ani mofetkhem ka'asher 'asiti ken yei'aseh lahem bagolah bashebi yeileikhu. ezekiel 12:12	vehanasi 'asher betokham 'el katef yisa ba'alatah veyeizei baqir yakhteru lehozi bo panav yekhaseh ya'an 'asher lo yir'eh la'ayin hu 'et ha'arez. ezekiel 12:13	ufarasti 'et rishti 'alav venitpas bimzudati veheibeiti 'oto babelah 'erez kasdim ve'otah lo yir'eh vesham yamut. ezekiel 12:14	vekhol 'asher sebibotav 'ezroh 'ezro vekhal 'agapav 'ezareh lekhal ruakh vekhereb 'ariq 'akhareihem. ezekiel 12:15	veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh bahafizi 'otam bagoyim vezeiriti 'otam ba'arazot. ezekiel 12:16	vehotarti meihem 'anshei mispar meikhereb meira'ab umidaber lema'an yesaperu 'et kal to'aboteihem bagoyim 'asher ba'u sham veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 12:17	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 12:18	ben 'adam lakhmekha bera'ash tokhel umeimekha beragezah ubid'agah tishteh. ezekiel 12:19	ve'amarta 'el 'am ha'arez koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh leyoshebei yerushalim 'el 'admat yisra'el lakhmam bid'agah yokheilu umeimeihem beshimamon yishtu lema'an teisham 'arzah mimelo'ah meikhamas kal hayoshebim bah. ezekiel 12:20	vehe'arim hanoshabot tekherabnah veha'arez shemamah tihyeh vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 12:21	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 12:22	ben 'adam mah hamashal hazeh lakhem 'al 'admat yisra'el leimor ya'arkhu hayamim ve'abad kal khazon. ezekiel 12:23	lakhen 'emor 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hishbati 'et hamashal hazeh velo yimshelu 'oto 'od beyisra'el ki 'im daber 'aleihem qarebu hayamim udebar kal khazon. ezekiel 12:24	ki lo yihyeh 'od kal khazon shav umiqsam khalaq betokh bet yisra'el. ezekiel 12:25	ki 'ani yhvh 'adaber 'et 'asher 'adaber dabar veyei'aseh lo timashekh 'od ki bimeikhem bet hameri 'adaber dabar va'asitiv ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 12:26	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 12:27	ben 'adam hineh bet yisra'el 'omerim hekhazon 'asher hu khozeh leyamim rabim ule'itim rekhoqot hu niba. ezekiel 12:28	lakhen 'emor 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh lo timashekh 'od kal debarai 'asher 'adaber dabar veyei'aseh ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 13:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 13:2	ben 'adam hinabei 'el nebi'ei yisra'el haniba'im ve'amarta linbi'ei milibam shim'u debar yhvh. ezekiel 13:3	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ho 'al hanebi'im hanebalim 'asher holekhim 'akhar rukham ulebilti ra'u. ezekiel 13:4	keshu'alim bakhorabot nebi'ekha yisra'el hayu. ezekiel 13:5	lo 'alitem baperazot vatigderu gader 'al bet yisra'el la'amod bamilkhamah beyom yhvh. ezekiel 13:6	khazu shav veqesem kazab ha'omerim ne'um yhvh yhvh lo shelakham veyikhalu leqayem dabar. ezekiel 13:7	halo makhazeh shav khazitem umiqsam kazab 'amartem ve'omerim ne'um yhvh va'ani lo dibarti. ezekiel 13:8	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an daberkhem shav vakhazitem kazab lakhen hini 'aleikhem ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 13:9	vehayetah yadi 'el hanebi'im hakhozim shav vehaqosemim kazab besod 'ami lo yihyu ubikhtab bet yisra'el lo yikateibu ve'el 'admat yisra'el lo yabo'u vida'tem ki 'ani 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 13:10	ya'an ubeya'an hit'u 'et 'ami leimor shalom ve'en shalom vehu boneh khayiz vehinam takhim 'oto tafel. ezekiel 13:11	'emor 'el takhei tafel veyipol hayah geshem shotef ve'ateinah 'abnei 'elgabish tipolenah veruakh se'arot tebaqeia'. ezekiel 13:12	vehineh nafal haqir halo yei'amer 'aleikhem 'ayeh hatiakh 'asher takhtem. ezekiel 13:13	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ubiqa'ti ruakh se'arot bakhamati vegeshem shotef be'api yihyeh ve'abnei 'elgabish bekheimah lekhalah. ezekiel 13:14	veharasti 'et haqir 'asher takhtem tafel vehiga'tihu 'el ha'arez veniglah yesodo venafelah ukhelitem betokhah vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 13:15	vekhileiti 'et khamati baqir ubatakhim 'oto tafel ve'omar lakhem 'en haqir ve'en hatakhim 'oto. ezekiel 13:16	nebi'ei yisra'el hanibe'im 'el yerushalim vehakhozim lah khazon shalom ve'en shalom ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 13:17	ve'atah ben 'adam sim panekha 'el benot 'amekha hamitnabe'ot milibehen vehinabei 'aleihen. ezekiel 13:18	ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ho limtaperot kesatot 'al kal 'azilei yadai ve'osot hamispakhot 'al rosh kal qomah lezoded nefashot hanefashot tezodeidenah le'ami unefashot lakhenah tekhayenah. ezekiel 13:19	vatekhalelnah 'oti 'el 'ami besha'alei se'orim ubiftotei lekhem lehamit nefashot 'asher lo temutenah ulekhayot nefashot 'asher lo tikhyenah bekhazebkhem le'ami shome'ei khazab. ezekiel 13:20	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'el kisetoteikhenah 'asher 'ateinah mezodedot sham 'et hanefashot leforekhot veqara'ti 'otam mei'al zero'oteikhem veshilakhti 'et hanefashot 'asher 'atem mezodedot 'et nefashim leforekhot. ezekiel 13:21	veqara'ti 'et mispekhoteikhem vehizalti 'et 'ami miyedkhen velo yihyu 'od beyedkhen limzudah vida'ten ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 13:22	ya'an hakh'ot leb zadiq sheqer va'ani lo hikh'abtiv ulekhazeq yedei rasha' lebilti shub midarko hara' lehakhayoto. ezekiel 13:23	lakhen v lo tekhezenah veqesem lo tiqsamnah 'od vehizalti 'et 'ami miyedkhen vida'ten ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 14:1	vayabo 'eilai 'anashim miziqnei yisra'el vayeishebu lefanai. ezekiel 14:2	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 14:3	ben 'adam ha'anashim ha'eleh he'elu giluleihem 'al libam umikhshol 'avonam natenu nokhakh peneihem ha'idarosh 'idaresh lahem. ezekiel 14:4	lakhen daber 'otam ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el 'asher ya'aleh 'et gilulav 'el libo umikhshol 'avono yasim nokhakh panav uba 'el hanabi 'ani yhvh na'aneiti lo bah ba berob gilulav. ezekiel 14:5	lema'an tefos 'et bet yisra'el belibam 'asher nazoru mei'alai begiluleihem kulam. ezekiel 14:6	lakhen 'emor 'el bet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh shubu vehashibu mei'al giluleikhem umei'al kal to'aboteikhem hashibu feneikhem. ezekiel 14:7	ki 'ish 'ish mibet yisra'el umeihager 'asher yagur beyisra'el veyinazer mei'akharai veya'al gilulav 'el libo umikhshol 'avono yasim nokhakh panav uba 'el hanabi lidrash lo bi 'ani yhvh na'aneh lo bi. ezekiel 14:8	venatati fanai ba'ish hahu vahasimotihu le'ot velimshalim vehikhrativ mitokh 'ami vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 14:9	vehanabi khi yefuteh vediber dabar 'ani yhvh piteiti 'et hanabi hahu venatiti 'et yadi 'alav vehishmadtiv mitokh 'ami yisra'el. ezekiel 14:10	venase'u 'avonam ka'avon hadoresh ka'avon hanabi yihyeh. ezekiel 14:11	lema'an lo yit'u 'od bet yisra'el mei'akharai velo yitame'u 'od bekhal pish'eihem vehayu li le'am va'ani 'ehyeh lahem leilohim ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 14:12	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 14:13	ben 'adam 'erez ki tekheta li lim'al ma'al venatiti yadi 'aleha veshabarti lah mateh lakhem vehishlakhti bah ra'ab vehikhrati mimenah 'adam ubeheimah. ezekiel 14:14	vehayu sheloshet ha'anashim ha'eleh betokhah noakh dani'el dani'el ve'iyob hemah bezidqatam yenazelu nafsham ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 14:15	lu khayah ra'ah 'a'abir ba'arez veshikelatah vehayetah shemamah mibeli 'ober mipenei hakhayah. ezekiel 14:16	sheloshet ha'anashim ha'eleh betokhah khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh 'im banim ve'im banot yazilu hemah lebadam yinazeilu veha'arez tihyeh shemamah. ezekiel 14:17	'o khereb 'abi 'al ha'arez hahi ve'amarti khereb ta'abor ba'arez vehikhrati mimenah 'adam ubeheimah. ezekiel 14:18	usheloshet ha'anashim ha'eleh betokhah khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh lo yazilu banim ubanot ki hem lebadam yinazeilu. ezekiel 14:19	'o deber 'ashalakh 'el ha'arez hahi veshafakhti khamati 'aleha bedam lehakhrit mimenah 'adam ubeheimah. ezekiel 14:20	venoakh dani'el dani'el ve'iyob betokhah khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh 'im ben 'im bat yazilu hemah bezidqatam yazilu nafsham. ezekiel 14:21	ki khoh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'af ki 'arba'at shefatai hara'im khereb vera'ab vekhayah ra'ah vadeber shilakhti 'el yerushalim lehakhrit mimenah 'adam ubeheimah. ezekiel 14:22	vehineh notrah bah peleitah hamuza'im banim ubanot hinam yoz'im 'aleikhem ure'item 'et darkam ve'et 'alilotam venikhamtem 'al hara'ah 'asher heibeiti 'al yerushalim 'et kal 'asher heibeiti 'aleha. ezekiel 14:23	venikhamu 'etkhem ki tir'u 'et darkam ve'et 'alilotam vida'tem ki lo khinam 'asiti 'et kal 'asher 'asiti bah ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 15:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 15:2	ben 'adam mah yihyeh 'ez hagefen mikal 'ez hazemorah 'asher hayah ba'azei haya'ar. ezekiel 15:3	hayuqakh mimenu 'ez la'asot limlakhah 'im yiqkhu mimenu yated litlot 'alav kal keli. ezekiel 15:4	hineh la'esh nitan le'akhlah 'et shenei qezotav 'akhelah ha'esh vetokho nakhar hayizlakh limlakhah. ezekiel 15:5	hineh bihyoto tamim lo yei'aseh limlakhah 'af ki 'esh 'akhalathu vayeikhar vena'asah 'od limlakhah. ezekiel 15:6	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ka'asher 'ez hagefen be'ez haya'ar 'asher netativ la'esh le'akhlah ken natati 'et yoshebei yerushalim. ezekiel 15:7	venatati 'et panai bahem meiha'esh yaza'u veha'esh tokhelem vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh besumi 'et panai bahem. ezekiel 15:8	venatati 'et ha'arez shemamah ya'an ma'alu ma'al ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 16:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 16:2	ben 'adam hoda' 'et yerushalim 'et to'aboteha. ezekiel 16:3	ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh lirushalim mekhorotayikh umoledotayikh mei'erez hakena'ani 'abikh ha'emori ve'imekh khitit. ezekiel 16:4	umoldotayikh beyom huledet 'otakh lo kharrat sharrekh ubemayim lo rukhazt lemish'i vehameleiakh lo humlakhat vehakhetel lo khutalet. ezekiel 16:5	lo khasah 'alayikh 'ayin la'asot lakh 'akhat mei'eleh lekhumlah 'alayikh vatushlekhi 'el penei hasadeh bego'al nafshekh beyom huledet 'otakh. ezekiel 16:6	va'e'ebor 'alayikh va'er'ekh mitboseset bedamayikh va'omar lakh bedamayikh khayi va'omar lakh bedamayikh khayi. ezekiel 16:7	rebabah kezemakh hasadeh netatikh vatirbi vatigdeli vatabo'i ba'adi 'adayim shadayim nakhonu use'arekh zimeiakh ve'at 'eirom ve'eryah. ezekiel 16:8	va'e'ebor 'alayikh va'er'ekh vehineh 'itekh 'et dodim va'efros kenafi 'alayikh va'akhaseh 'ervatekh va'eshaba' lakh va'abo bibrit 'otakh ne'um 'adonai yhvh vatihyi li. ezekiel 16:9	va'erkhazekh bamayim va'eshtof damayikh mei'alayikh va'asukhekh bashamen. ezekiel 16:10	va'albishekh riqmah va'en'alekh takhash va'ekhbeshekh bashesh va'akhasekh meshi. ezekiel 16:11	va'e'dekh 'edi va'etenah zemidim 'al yadayikh verabid 'al geronekh. ezekiel 16:12	va'eten nezem 'al 'apekh va'agilim 'al 'azenayikh va'ateret tif'eret beroshekh. ezekiel 16:13	vata'di zahab vakhesef umalbushekh sheishi shesh vameshi veriqmah solet udebash vashemen 'akhaleti 'akhalet vatifi bim'od me'od vatizlekhi limlukhah. ezekiel 16:14	vayeizei lakh shem bagoyim beyafeyekh ki kalil hu bahadari 'asher samti 'alayikh ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 16:15	vatibtekhi beyafeyekh vatizni 'al shemekh vatishpekhi 'et taznutayikh 'al kal 'ober lo yehi. ezekiel 16:16	vatiqkhi mibegadayikh vata'asi lakh bamot telu'ot vatizni 'aleihem lo ba'ot velo yihyeh. ezekiel 16:17	vatiqkhi kelei tif'artekh mizehabi umikaspi 'asher natati lakh vata'asi lakh zalmei zakhar vatizni bam. ezekiel 16:18	vatiqkhi 'et bigdei riqmatekh vatekhasim veshamni uqetareti natati natat lifneihem. ezekiel 16:19	velakhmi 'asher natati lakh solet vashemen udebash he'ekhaltikh unetatihu lifneihem lereiakh nikhoakh vayehi ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 16:20	vatiqkhi 'et banayikh ve'et benotayikh 'asher yaladt li vatizbakhim lahem le'ekhol ham'at mitaznutekh mitaznutayikh. ezekiel 16:21	vatishkhati 'et banai vatitenim beha'abir 'otam lahem. ezekiel 16:22	ve'et kal to'abotayikh vetaznutayikh lo zakharti zakhart 'et yemei ne'urayikh bihyotekh 'eirom ve'eryah mitboseset bedamekh hayit. ezekiel 16:23	vayhi 'akharei kal ra'atekh 'o 'o lakh ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 16:24	vatibni lakh geb vata'asi lakh ramah bekhal rekhob. ezekiel 16:25	'el kal rosh derekh banit ramatekh vateta'abi 'et yafeyekh vatefaseqi 'et raglayikh lekhal 'ober vatarbi 'et taznutekh taznutayikh. ezekiel 16:26	vatizni 'el benei mizrayim shekheinayikh gidlei basar vatarbi 'et taznutekh lehakh'iseini. ezekiel 16:27	vehineh natiti yadi 'alayikh va'egra' khuqekh va'etenekh benefesh sone'otayikh benot pelishtim hanikhlamot midarkekh zimah. ezekiel 16:28	vatizni 'el benei 'ashur mibilti sabe'atekh vatiznim vegam lo saba'at. ezekiel 16:29	vatarbi 'et taznutekh 'el 'erez kena'an kasdimah vegam bezot lo saba'at. ezekiel 16:30	mah 'amulah libatekh ne'um 'adonai yhvh ba'asotekh 'et kal 'eleh ma'aseh 'ishah zonah shalatet. ezekiel 16:31	bibnotayikh gabekh berosh kal derekh veramatekh 'asiti 'asit bekhal rekhob velo hayit hayit kazonah leqales 'etnan. ezekiel 16:32	ha'ishah hamena'afet takhat 'ishah tiqakh 'et zarim. ezekiel 16:33	lekhal zonot yitenu neideh ve'at natat 'et nedanayikh lekhal me'ahabayikh vatishkhodi 'otam labo 'eilayikh misabib betaznutayikh. ezekiel 16:34	vayhi bakh heifekh min hanashim betaznutayikh ve'akharayikh lo zunah ubetitekh 'etnan ve'etnan lo nitan lakh vatehi lehefekh. ezekiel 16:35	lakhen zonah shim'i debar yhvh. ezekiel 16:36	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an hishafekh nekhushtekh vatigaleh 'ervatekh betaznutayikh 'al me'ahabayikh ve'al kal gilulei to'abotayikh vekhidmei banayikh 'asher natat lahem. ezekiel 16:37	lakhen hini meqabez 'et kal me'ahabayikh 'asher 'arabt 'aleihem ve'et kal 'asher 'ahabt 'al kal 'asher sanet veqibazti 'otam 'alayikh misabib vegileiti 'ervatekh 'aleihem vera'u 'et kal 'ervatekh. ezekiel 16:38	ushefatikh mishpetei no'afot veshofekhot dam unetatikh dam kheimah veqin'ah. ezekiel 16:39	venatati 'otakh beyadam veharesu gabekh venitezu ramotayikh vehifshitu 'otakh begadayikh velaqekhu kelei tif'artekh vehinikhukh 'eirom ve'eryah. ezekiel 16:40	vehe'elu 'alayikh qahal veragemu 'otakh ba'aben ubitequkh bekharbotam. ezekiel 16:41	vesarefu batayikh ba'esh ve'asu bakh shefatim le'einei nashim rabot vehishbatikh mizonah vegam 'etnan lo titeni 'od. ezekiel 16:42	vahanikhoti khamati bakh vesarah qin'ati mimekh veshaqati velo 'ekh'as 'od. ezekiel 16:43	ya'an 'asher lo zakharti zakhart 'et yemei ne'urayikh vatirgezi li bekhal 'eleh vegam 'ani hei darkekh berosh natati ne'um 'adonai yhvh velo 'asiti 'asit 'et hazimah 'al kal to'abotayikh. ezekiel 16:44	hineh kal hamoshel 'alayikh yimshol leimor ke'imah bitah. ezekiel 16:45	bat 'imekh 'at go'elet 'ishah ubaneha va'akhot 'akhotekh 'at 'asher ga'alu 'ansheihen ubeneihen 'imekhen khitit va'abikhen 'emori. ezekiel 16:46	va'akhotekh hagedolah shomeron hi ubenoteha hayoshebet 'al semolekh va'akhotekh haqetanah mimekh hayoshebet miminekh sedom ubenoteha. ezekiel 16:47	velo bedarkheihen halakht ubeto'aboteihen 'asiti 'asit kim'at qat vatashkhiti meihen bekhal derakhayikh. ezekiel 16:48	khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh 'im 'asetah sedom 'akhotekh hi ubenoteha ka'asher 'asit 'at ubenotayikh. ezekiel 16:49	hineh zeh hayah 'avon sedom 'akhotekh ga'on sib'at lekhem veshalvat hashqet hayah lah velibnoteha veyad 'ani ve'ebyon lo hekheziqah. ezekiel 16:50	vatigbehenah vata'asenah to'eibah lefanai va'asir 'ethen ka'asher ra'iti. ezekiel 16:51	veshomeron kakhazi khatotayikh lo khata'ah vatarbi 'et to'abotayikh meihenah vatezadeqi 'et 'akhotekh 'akhotayikh bekhal to'abotayikh 'asher 'asit 'asit. ezekiel 16:52	gam 'at se'i khelimatekh 'asher pilalt la'akhotekh bekhatotayikh 'asher hit'abt meihen tizdaqnah mimekh vegam 'at boshi use'i khelimatekh bezadeqtekh 'akhyotekh. ezekiel 16:53	veshabti 'et shebitehen 'et shebit shebut sedom ubenoteha ve'et shebit shebut shomeron ubenoteha ushebit ushebut shebitayikh betokhahenah. ezekiel 16:54	lema'an tis'i khelimatekh venikhlamt mikol 'asher 'asit benakhamekh 'otan. ezekiel 16:55	va'akhotayikh sedom ubenoteha tashobena leqadmatan veshomeron ubenoteha tashobena leqadmatan ve'at ubenotayikh teshubenah leqadmatkhen. ezekiel 16:56	velo hayetah sedom 'akhotekh lishmu'ah befikh beyom ge'onayikh. ezekiel 16:57	beterem tigaleh ra'atekh kemo 'et kherpat benot 'aram vekhal sebiboteha benot pelishtim hashatot 'otakh misabib. ezekiel 16:58	'et zimatekh ve'et to'abotayikh 'at nesatim ne'um yhvh. ezekiel 16:59	ki khoh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ve'asit ve'asiti 'otakh ka'asher 'asit 'asher bazit 'alah lehafer berit. ezekiel 16:60	vezakharti 'ani 'et beriti 'otakh bimei ne'urayikh vahaqimoti lakh berit 'olam. ezekiel 16:61	vezakhart 'et derakhayikh venikhlamt beqakhtekh 'et 'akhotayikh hagedolot mimekh 'el haqetanot mimekh venatati 'ethen lakh lebanot velo miberitekh. ezekiel 16:62	vahaqimoti 'ani 'et beriti 'itakh veyada'at ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 16:63	lema'an tizkeri vaboshet velo yihyeh lakh 'od pitkhon peh mipenei kelimatekh bekhaperi lakh lekhal 'asher 'asit ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 17:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 17:2	ben 'adam khud khidah umeshol mashal 'el bet yisra'el. ezekiel 17:3	ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hanesher hagadol gedol hakenafayim 'erekh ha'eiber malei hanozah 'asher lo hariqmah ba 'el halebanon vayiqakh 'et zameret ha'arez. ezekiel 17:4	'et rosh yeniqotav qataf vaybi'eihu 'el 'erez kena'an be'ir rokhelim samo. ezekiel 17:5	vayiqakh mizera' ha'arez vayiteneihu bisdeh zara' qakh 'al mayim rabim zafzafah samo. ezekiel 17:6	vayizmakh vayhi legefen sorakhat shiflat qomah lifnot daliyotav 'eilav vesharashav takhtav yihyu vatehi legefen vata'as badim vateshalakh porot. ezekiel 17:7	vayhi nesher 'ekhad gadol gedol kenafayim verab nozah vehineh hagefen hazot kafenah sharosheha 'alav vedaliyotav shilkhah lo lehashqot 'otah mei'arugot mata'ah. ezekiel 17:8	'el sadeh tob 'el mayim rabim hi shetulah la'asot 'anaf velaset peri lihyot legefen 'adaret. ezekiel 17:9	'emor koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh tizlakh halo 'et sharasheha yenateq ve'et piryah yeqoses veyabesh kal tarpei zimkhah tibash velo bizroa' gedolah ube'am rab lemas'ot 'otah misharasheha. ezekiel 17:10	vehineh shetulah hatizlakh halo khega'at bah ruakh haqadim tibash yabosh 'al 'arugot zimkhah tibash. ezekiel 17:11	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 17:12	'emar na lebet hameri halo yeda'tem mah 'eleh 'emor hineh ba melekh babel yerushalim vayiqakh 'et malkah ve'et sareha vayabei 'otam 'eilav babelah. ezekiel 17:13	vayiqakh mizera' hamelukhah vayikhrot 'ito berit vayabei 'oto be'alah ve'et 'eilei ha'arez laqakh. ezekiel 17:14	lihyot mamlakhah shefalah lebilti hitnasei lishmor 'et berito le'amedah. ezekiel 17:15	vayimrad bo lishloakh mal'akhav mizrayim latet lo susim ve'am rab hayizlakh hayimalet ha'oseh 'eleh veheifer berit venimlat. ezekiel 17:16	khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh 'im lo bimqom hamelekh hamamlikh 'oto 'asher bazah 'et 'alato va'asher heifer 'et berito 'ito betokh babel yamut. ezekiel 17:17	velo bekhayil gadol ubeqahal rab ya'aseh 'oto far'oh bamilkhamah bishpokh solelah ubibnot dayeq lehakhrit nefashot rabot. ezekiel 17:18	ubazah 'alah lehafer berit vehineh natan yado vekhal 'eleh 'asah lo yimalet. ezekiel 17:19	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh khai 'ani 'im lo 'alati 'asher bazah uberiti 'asher heifir unetativ berosho. ezekiel 17:20	ufarasti 'alav rishti venitpas bimzudati vahabi'otihu babelah venishpati 'ito sham ma'alo 'asher ma'al bi. ezekiel 17:21	ve'et kal mibrakho mibrakhav bekhal 'agapav bakhereb yipolu vehanish'arim lekhal ruakh yipareisu vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh dibarti. ezekiel 17:22	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh velaqakhti 'ani mizameret ha'erez haramah venatati meirosh yoneqotav rakh 'eqtof veshatalti 'ani 'al har gaboha vetalul. ezekiel 17:23	behar merom yisra'el 'eshtolenu venasa 'anaf ve'asah feri vehayah le'erez 'adir veshakhenu takhtav kol zipor kal kanaf bezel daliyotav tishkonah. ezekiel 17:24	veyade'u kal 'azei hasadeh ki 'ani yhvh hishpalti 'ez gaboha higbahti 'ez shafal hobashti 'ez lakh vehifrakhti 'ez yabesh 'ani yhvh dibarti ve'asiti. ezekiel 18:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 18:2	mah lakhem 'atem moshelim 'et hamashal hazeh 'al 'admat yisra'el leimor 'abot yokhelu boser veshinei habanim tiqhenah. ezekiel 18:3	khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh 'im yihyeh lakhem 'od meshol hamashal hazeh beyisra'el. ezekiel 18:4	hen kal hanefashot li henah kenefesh ha'ab ukhenefesh haben li henah hanefesh hakhotet hi tamut. ezekiel 18:5	ve'ish ki yihyeh zadiq ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah. ezekiel 18:6	'el heharim lo 'akhal ve'einav lo nasa 'el gilulei bet yisra'el ve'et 'eishet rei'eihu lo timei ve'el 'ishah nidah lo yiqrab. ezekiel 18:7	ve'ish lo yoneh khabolato khob yashib gezeilah lo yigzol lakhmo lera'eb yiten ve'eirom yekhaseh baged. ezekiel 18:8	baneshekh lo yiten vetarbit lo yiqakh mei'avel yashib yado mishpat 'emet ya'aseh ben 'ish le'ish. ezekiel 18:9	bekhuqotai yehalekh umishpatai shamar la'asot 'emet zadiq hu khayoh yikhyeh ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 18:10	veholid ben pariz shofekh dam ve'asah 'akh mei'akhad mei'eleh. ezekiel 18:11	vehu 'et kal 'eleh lo 'asah ki gam 'el heharim 'akhal ve'et 'eishet rei'eihu timei. ezekiel 18:12	'ani ve'ebyon honah gezeilot gazal khabol lo yashib ve'el hagilulim nasa 'einav to'eibah 'asah. ezekiel 18:13	baneshekh natan vetarbit laqakh vakhai lo yikhyeh 'et kal hato'eibot ha'eleh 'asah mot yumat damav bo yihyeh. ezekiel 18:14	vehineh holid ben vayar 'et kal khatot 'abiv 'asher 'asah vayir'eh velo ya'aseh kahen. ezekiel 18:15	'al heharim lo 'akhal ve'einav lo nasa 'el gilulei bet yisra'el 'et 'eishet rei'eihu lo timei. ezekiel 18:16	ve'ish lo honah khabol lo khabal ugezeilah lo gazal lakhmo lera'eb natan ve'eirom kisah baged. ezekiel 18:17	mei'ani heishib yado neshekh vetarbit lo laqakh mishpatai 'asah bekhuqotai halakh hu lo yamut ba'avon 'abiv khayoh yikhyeh. ezekiel 18:18	'abiv ki 'ashaq 'osheq gazal geizel 'akh va'asher lo tob 'asah betokh 'amav vehineh met ba'avono. ezekiel 18:19	va'amartem madua' lo nasa haben ba'avon ha'ab vehaben mishpat uzedaqah 'asah 'et kal khuqotai shamar vaya'aseh 'otam khayoh yikhyeh. ezekiel 18:20	hanefesh hakhotet hi tamut ben lo yisa ba'avon ha'ab ve'ab lo yisa ba'avon haben zidqat hazadiq 'alav tihyeh verish'at rasha' harasha' 'alav tihyeh. ezekiel 18:21	veharasha' ki yashub mikal khatato khatotav 'asher 'asah veshamar 'et kal khuqotai ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah khayoh yikhyeh lo yamut. ezekiel 18:22	kal pesha'av 'asher 'asah lo yizakheru lo bezidqato 'asher 'asah yikhyeh. ezekiel 18:23	hekhafoz 'ekhpoz mot rasha' ne'um 'adonai yhvh halo beshubo miderakhav vekhayah. ezekiel 18:24	ubeshub zadiq mizidqato ve'asah 'avel kekhol hato'eibot 'asher 'asah harasha' ya'aseh vakhai kal zidqato zidqotav 'asher 'asah lo tizakharnah bema'alo 'asher ma'al ubekhatato 'asher khata bam yamut. ezekiel 18:25	va'amartem lo yitakhen derekh 'adonai shim'u na bet yisra'el hadarki lo yitakhen halo darkheikhem lo yitakheinu. ezekiel 18:26	beshub zadiq mizidqato ve'asah 'avel umet 'aleihem be'avlo 'asher 'asah yamut. ezekiel 18:27	ubeshub rasha' meirish'ato 'asher 'asah vaya'as mishpat uzedaqah hu 'et nafsho yekhayeh. ezekiel 18:28	vayir'eh vayashob vayashab mikal pesha'av 'asher 'asah khayo yikhyeh lo yamut. ezekiel 18:29	ve'ameru bet yisra'el lo yitakhen derekh 'adonai haderakhai lo yitakhenu bet yisra'el halo darkheikhem lo yitakhen. ezekiel 18:30	lakhen 'ish kidrakhav 'eshpot 'etkhem bet yisra'el ne'um 'adonai yhvh shubu vehashibu mikal pish'eikhem velo yihyeh lakhem lemikhshol 'avon. ezekiel 18:31	hashlikhu mei'aleikhem 'et kal pish'eikhem 'asher pesha'tem bam va'asu lakhem leb khadash veruakh khadashah velamah tamutu bet yisra'el. ezekiel 18:32	ki lo 'ekhpoz bemot hamet ne'um 'adonai yhvh vehashibu vikhyu. ezekiel 19:1	ve'atah sa qinah 'el nesi'ei yisra'el. ezekiel 19:2	ve'amarta mah 'imekha lebiya ben 'arayot rabazah betokh kefirim ribetah gureha. ezekiel 19:3	vata'al 'ekhad migureha kefir hayah vayilmad litraf teref 'adam 'akhal. ezekiel 19:4	vayishme'u 'eilav goyim beshakhtam nitpas vaybi'uhu bakhakhim 'el 'erez mizrayim. ezekiel 19:5	vateire ki nokhalah 'abedah tiqvatah vatiqakh 'ekhad migureha kefir samatehu. ezekiel 19:6	vayithalekh betokh 'arayot kefir hayah vayilmad litraf teref 'adam 'akhal. ezekiel 19:7	vayeida' 'almenotav ve'areihem hekherib vateisham 'erez umelo'ah miqol sha'agato. ezekiel 19:8	vayitenu 'alav goyim sabib mimedinot vayifresu 'alav rishtam beshakhtam nitpas. ezekiel 19:9	vayitenuhu basugar bakhakhim vaybi'uhu 'el melekh babel yebi'uhu bamezodot lema'an lo yishama' qolo 'od 'el harei yisra'el. ezekiel 19:10	'imekha khagefen bedamekha 'al mayim shetulah poriyah va'aneifah hayetah mimayim rabim. ezekiel 19:11	vayihyu lah matot 'oz 'el shibtei moshelim vatigbah qomato 'al ben 'abotim vayeira begabeho berob daliyotav. ezekiel 19:12	vatutash bekheimah la'arez hushlakhah veruakh haqadim hobish piryah hitparequ veyabeishu mateh 'uzah 'esh 'akhalatehu. ezekiel 19:13	ve'atah shetulah bamidbar be'erez ziyah vezama. ezekiel 19:14	vateizei 'esh mimateh badeha piryah 'akhalah velo hayah bah mateh 'oz sheibet limshol qinah hi vatehi leqinah. ezekiel 20:1	vayhi bashanah hashebi'it bakhamishi be'asor lakhodesh ba'u 'anashim miziqnei yisra'el lidrosh 'et yhvh vayeishebu lefanai. ezekiel 20:2	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 20:3	ben 'adam daber 'et ziqnei yisra'el ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh halidrosh 'oti 'atem ba'im khai 'ani 'im 'idaresh lakhem ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 20:4	hatishpot 'otam hatishpot ben 'adam 'et to'abot 'abotam hodi'em. ezekiel 20:5	ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh beyom bakhori beyisra'el va'esa yadi lezera' bet ya'aqob va'ivada' lahem be'erez mizrayim va'esa yadi lahem leimor 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. ezekiel 20:6	bayom hahu nasati yadi lahem lehozi'am mei'erez mizrayim 'el 'erez 'asher tarti lahem zabat khalab udebash zebi hi lekhal ha'arazot. ezekiel 20:7	va'omar 'aleihem 'ish shiquzei 'einav hashlikhu ubegilulei mizrayim 'al titama'u 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. ezekiel 20:8	vayamru bi velo 'abu lishmoa' 'eilai 'ish 'et shiquzei 'eineihem lo hishlikhu ve'et gilulei mizrayim lo 'azabu va'omar lishpokh khamati 'aleihem lekhalot 'api bahem betokh 'erez mizrayim. ezekiel 20:9	va'a'as lema'an shemi lebilti heikhel le'einei hagoyim 'asher hemah betokham 'asher noda'ti 'aleihem le'eineihem lehozi'am mei'erez mizrayim. ezekiel 20:10	va'ozi'em mei'erez mizrayim va'abi'em 'el hamidbar. ezekiel 20:11	va'eten lahem 'et khuqotai ve'et mishpatai hoda'ti 'otam 'asher ya'aseh 'otam ha'adam vakhai bahem. ezekiel 20:12	vegam 'et shabetotai natati lahem lihyot le'ot beini ubeineihem lada'at ki 'ani yhvh meqadesham. ezekiel 20:13	vayamru bi bet yisra'el bamidbar bekhuqotai lo halakhu ve'et mishpatai ma'asu 'asher ya'aseh 'otam ha'adam vakhai bahem ve'et shabetotai khilelu me'od va'omar lishpokh khamati 'aleihem bamidbar lekhalotam. ezekiel 20:14	va'e'eseh lema'an shemi lebilti heikhel le'einei hagoyim 'asher hozeitim le'eineihem. ezekiel 20:15	vegam 'ani nasati yadi lahem bamidbar lebilti habi 'otam 'el ha'arez 'asher natati zabat khalab udebash zebi hi lekhal ha'arazot. ezekiel 20:16	ya'an bemishpatai ma'asu ve'et khuqotai lo halekhu bahem ve'et shabetotai khileilu ki 'akharei giluleihem libam holekh. ezekiel 20:17	vatakhas 'eini 'aleihem mishakhatam velo 'asiti 'otam kalah bamidbar. ezekiel 20:18	va'omar 'el beneihem bamidbar bekhuqei 'aboteikhem 'al teileikhu ve'et mishpeteihem 'al tishmoru ubegiluleihem 'al titama'u. ezekiel 20:19	'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem bekhuqotai leikhu ve'et mishpatai shimru va'asu 'otam. ezekiel 20:20	ve'et shabetotai qadeishu vehayu le'ot beini ubeineikhem lada'at ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheikhem. ezekiel 20:21	vayamru bi habanim bekhuqotai lo halakhu ve'et mishpatai lo shameru la'asot 'otam 'asher ya'aseh 'otam ha'adam vakhai bahem 'et shabetotai khileilu va'omar lishpokh khamati 'aleihem lekhalot 'api bam bamidbar. ezekiel 20:22	vahashiboti 'et yadi va'a'as lema'an shemi lebilti heikhel le'einei hagoyim 'asher hozeiti 'otam le'eineihem. ezekiel 20:23	gam 'ani nasati 'et yadi lahem bamidbar lehafiz 'otam bagoyim ulezarot 'otam ba'arazot. ezekiel 20:24	ya'an mishpatai lo 'asu vekhuqotai ma'asu ve'et shabetotai khileilu ve'akharei gilulei 'abotam hayu 'eineihem. ezekiel 20:25	vegam 'ani natati lahem khuqim lo tobim umishpatim lo yikhyu bahem. ezekiel 20:26	va'atamei 'otam bematenotam beha'abir kal peter rakham lema'an 'ashimem lema'an 'asher yeide'u 'asher 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 20:27	lakhen daber 'el bet yisra'el ben 'adam ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'od zot gidefu 'oti 'aboteikhem bema'alam bi ma'al. ezekiel 20:28	va'abi'em 'el ha'arez 'asher nasati 'et yadi latet 'otah lahem vayir'u khal gib'ah ramah vekhal 'ez 'abot vayizbekhu sham 'et zibkheihem vayitenu sham ka'as qarebanam vayasimu sham reiakh nikhokheihem vayasikhu sham 'et niskeihem. ezekiel 20:29	va'omar 'aleihem mah habamah 'asher 'atem haba'im sham vayiqarei shemah bamah 'ad hayom hazeh. ezekiel 20:30	lakhen 'emor 'el bet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh habederekh 'aboteikhem 'atem nitme'im ve'akharei shiquzeihem 'atem zonim. ezekiel 20:31	ubis'et matenoteikhem beha'abir beneikhem ba'esh 'atem nitme'im lekhal giluleikhem 'ad hayom va'ani 'idaresh lakhem bet yisra'el khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh 'im 'idaresh lakhem. ezekiel 20:32	veha'olah 'al rukhakhem hayo lo tihyeh 'asher 'atem 'omerim nihyeh khagoyim kemishpekhot ha'arazot lesharet 'ez va'aben. ezekiel 20:33	khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh 'im lo beyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah ubekheimah shefukhah 'emlokh 'aleikhem. ezekiel 20:34	vehozeiti 'etkhem min ha'amim veqibazti 'etkhem min ha'arazot 'asher nefozotem bam beyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah ubekheimah shefukhah. ezekiel 20:35	veheibeiti 'etkhem 'el midbar ha'amim venishpati 'itekhem sham panim 'el panim. ezekiel 20:36	ka'asher nishpati 'et 'aboteikhem bemidbar 'erez mizrayim ken 'ishafet 'itekhem ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 20:37	veha'abarti 'etkhem takhat hashabet veheibeiti 'etkhem bemasoret haberit. ezekiel 20:38	ubaroti mikem hamoredim vehaposhe'im bi mei'erez megureihem 'ozi 'otam ve'el 'admat yisra'el lo yabo vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 20:39	ve'atem bet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'ish gilulav lekhu 'abodu ve'akhar 'im 'einekhem shome'im 'eilai ve'et shem qadshi lo tekhalelu 'od bematenoteikhem ubegiluleikhem. ezekiel 20:40	ki behar qadshi behar merom yisra'el ne'um 'adonai yhvh sham ya'abduni kal bet yisra'el kuloh ba'arez sham 'erzem vesham 'edrosh 'et terumoteikhem ve'et reishit mas'oteikhem bekhal qadesheikhem. ezekiel 20:41	bereiakh nikhoakh 'erzeh 'etkhem behozi'i 'etkhem min ha'amim veqibazti 'etkhem min ha'arazot 'asher nefozotem bam veniqdashti bakhem le'einei hagoyim. ezekiel 20:42	vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh bahabi'i 'etkhem 'el 'admat yisra'el 'el ha'arez 'asher nasati 'et yadi latet 'otah la'aboteikhem. ezekiel 20:43	uzekhartem sham 'et darkheikhem ve'et kal 'aliloteikhem 'asher nitmeitem bam uneqototem bifneikhem bekhal ra'oteikhem 'asher 'asitem. ezekiel 20:44	vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh ba'asoti 'itekhem lema'an shemi lo khedarkheikhem hara'im vekha'aliloteikhem hanishkhatot bet yisra'el ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 20:45	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 20:46	ben 'adam sim panekha derekh teimanah vehatef 'el darom vehinabei 'el ya'ar hasadeh negeb. ezekiel 20:47	ve'amarta leya'ar hanegeb shema' debar yhvh koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini mazit bekha 'esh ve'akhelah bekha khal 'ez lakh vekhal 'ez yabesh lo tikhbeh lahebet shalhebet venizrebu bah kal panim minegeb zafonah. ezekiel 20:48	vera'u kal basar ki 'ani yhvh bi'artiha lo tikhbeh. ezekiel 20:49	va'omar 'ahah 'adonai yhvh hemah 'omerim li halo memashel meshalim hu. ezekiel 21:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 21:2	ben 'adam sim panekha 'el yerushalim vehatef 'el miqdashim vehinabei 'el 'admat yisra'el. ezekiel 21:3	ve'amarta le'admat yisra'el koh 'amar yhvh hini 'eilayikh vehozeiti kharbi mita'rah vehikhrati mimekh zadiq verasha'. ezekiel 21:4	ya'an 'asher hikhrati mimekh zadiq verasha' lakhen teizei kharbi mita'rah 'el kal basar minegeb zafon. ezekiel 21:5	veyade'u kal basar ki 'ani yhvh hozeiti kharbi mita'rah lo tashub 'od. ezekiel 21:6	ve'atah ben 'adam hei'anakh beshibron matenayim ubimrirut tei'anakh le'eineihem. ezekiel 21:7	vehayah ki yomeru 'eilekha 'al mah 'atah ne'enakh ve'amarta 'el shemu'ah khi ba'ah venames kal leb verafu khal yadayim vekhihatah khal ruakh vekhal birkayim teilakhnah mayim hineh ba'ah venihyatah ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 21:8	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 21:9	ben 'adam hinabei ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai 'emor khereb khereb hukhadah vegam merutah. ezekiel 21:10	lema'an teboakh tebakh hukhadah lema'an heyeh lah baraq moratah 'o nasis sheibet beni mo'eset kal 'ez. ezekiel 21:11	vayiten 'otah lemaretah litpos bakaf hi hukhadah khereb vehi moratah latet 'otah beyad horeg. ezekiel 21:12	ze'aq veheilel ben 'adam ki hi haytah be'ami hi bekhal nesi'ei yisra'el megurei 'el khereb hayu 'et 'ami lakhen sefoq 'el yarekh. ezekiel 21:13	ki bokhan umah 'im gam sheibet mo'eset lo yihyeh ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 21:14	ve'atah ben 'adam hinabei vehakh kaf 'el kaf vetikafel khereb shelishitah khereb khalalim hi khereb khalal hagadol hakhoderet lahem. ezekiel 21:15	lema'an lamug leb veharbeh hamikhsholim 'al kal sha'areihem natati 'ibkhat khareb 'akh 'asuyah lebaraq me'utah letabakh. ezekiel 21:16	hit'akhadi heimini hasimi hasmili 'anah panayikh mu'adot. ezekiel 21:17	vegam 'ani 'akeh khapi 'el kapi vahanikhoti khamati 'ani yhvh dibarti. ezekiel 21:18	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 21:19	ve'atah ben 'adam sim lekha shenayim derakhim labo khereb melekh babel mei'erez 'ekhad yeize'u sheneihem veyad barei berosh derekh 'ir barei. ezekiel 21:20	derekh tasim labo khereb 'et rabat benei 'amon ve'et yehudah birushalim bezurah. ezekiel 21:21	ki 'amad melekh babel 'el 'em haderekh berosh shenei haderakhim liqsam qasem qilqal bakhizim sha'al baterafim ra'ah bakabed. ezekiel 21:22	bimino hayah haqesem yerushalim lasum karim liftoakh peh berezakh leharim qol bitru'ah lasum karim 'al she'arim lishpokh solelah libnot dayeq. ezekiel 21:23	vehayah lahem kiqsom kiqsam shav be'eineihem shebu'ei shebu'ot lahem vehu mazkir 'avon lehitafes. ezekiel 21:24	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an hazkarkhem 'avonekhem behigalot pish'eikhem leheira'ot khatoteikhem bekhol 'aliloteikhem ya'an hizakherkhem bakaf titafeisu. ezekiel 21:25	ve'atah khalal rasha' nesi yisra'el 'asher ba yomo be'et 'avon qez. ezekiel 21:26	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hasir hamiznefet veharim ha'atarah zot lo zot hashafalah hagbeiha vehagaboha hashpil. ezekiel 21:27	'avah 'avah 'avah 'asimenah gam zot lo hayah 'ad bo 'asher lo hamishpat unetativ. 21:29	bakhazot lakh shav biqsam lakh kazab latet 'otakh 'el zaverei khalei resha'im 'asher ba yomam be'et 'avon qez. ezekiel 21:30	hashab 'el ta'rah bimqom 'asher nibret be'erez mekhurotayikh 'eshpot 'otakh. ezekiel 21:31	veshafakhti 'alayikh za'mi be'esh 'ebrati 'afiakh 'alayikh unetatikh beyad 'anashim bo'arim kharashei mashkhit. ezekiel 21:32	la'esh tihyeh le'akhlah damekh yihyeh betokh ha'arez lo tizakheiri ki 'ani yhvh dibarti. ezekiel 22:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 22:2	ve'atah ben 'adam hatishpot hatishpot 'et 'ir hadamim vehoda'tah 'et kal to'aboteha. ezekiel 22:3	ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'ir shofekhet dam betokhah labo 'itah ve'asetah gilulim 'aleha letame'ah. ezekiel 22:4	bedamekh 'asher shafakht 'ashamt ubegilulayikh 'asher 'asit tamet vataqribi 22:6	hineh nesi'ei yisra'el 'ish lizro'o hayu bakh lema'an shefakh dam. ezekiel 22:7	'ab va'em heiqalu bakh lager 'asu ba'osheq betokhekh yatom ve'almanah honu bakh. ezekiel 22:8	qadashai bazit ve'et shabetotai khilalet. ezekiel 22:9	'anshei rakhil hayu bakh lema'an shefakh dam ve'el heharim 'akhelu bakh zimah 'asu betokhekh. ezekiel 22:10	'ervat 'ab gilah bakh temei'at hanidah 'inu bakh. ezekiel 22:11	ve'ish 'et 'eishet rei'eihu 'asah to'eibah ve'ish 'et kalato timei bezimah ve'ish 'et 'akhoto bat 'abiv 'inah bakh. ezekiel 22:12	shokhad laqekhu bakh lema'an shefakh dam neshekh vetarbit laqakhat vatebaze'i rei'ayikh ba'osheq ve'oti shakhakhat ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 22:13	vehineh hikeiti khapi 'el biz'ekh 'asher 'asit ve'al damekh 'asher hayu betokhekh. ezekiel 22:14	haya'amod 22:16	venikhalt bakh le'einei goyim veyada'at ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 22:17	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 22:18	ben 'adam hayu li bet yisra'el lesug lesig kulam nekhoshet ubedil ubarzel ubarzel ve'oferet ubedil 'el tokh kur lafakhat 'alav 'esh lehantikh ken 'eqboz be'api ubakhamati vehinakhti vehitakhti 'etkhem. ezekiel 22:21	vekhinasti 'etkhem venafakhti 'aleikhem be'esh 'ebrati 'adam 'emar lah 'at 'erez lo metoharah hi lo gushmah beyom za'am. ezekiel 22:25	qesher nebi'eha betokhah ka'ari sho'eg toref taref nefesh 'akhalu khosen viqar yiqakhu 'almenoteha hirbu betokhah. ezekiel 22:26	kohaneha khamesu torati vaykhalelu qadashai ben qodesh lekhol lo hibdilu uben hatamei letahor lo hodi'u umishabetotai he'limu 'eineihem va'eikhal betokham. ezekiel 22:27	sareha beqirbah ve'aholibah 'akhotah vatihyenah li vateiladnah banim ubanot ushemotan shomeron 'aholah virushalim 'aholibah. ezekiel 23:5	vatizen 'aholah takhtai vata'gab 'al me'ahabeha 'el 'ashur qerobim. ezekiel 23:6	lebushei tekheilet pakhot useganim bakhurei khemed kulam parashim rokhebei susim. ezekiel 23:7	vatiten taznuteha 'aleihem mibkhar benei 'ashur kulam ubekhol 'asher 'agebah bekhal giluleihem nitma'ah. ezekiel 23:8	ve'et taznuteha mimizrayim lo 'azabah ki 'otah shakhebu bin'ureha vehemah 'isu dadei betuleha vayishpekhu taznutam 'aleha. ezekiel 23:9	lakhen netatiha beyad me'ahabeha beyad benei 'ashur 'asher 'agebah 'aleihem. ezekiel 23:10	hemah gilu 'ervatah baneha ubenoteha laqakhu ve'otah bakhereb haragu vatehi shem lanashim ushefutim 'asu bah. ezekiel 23:11	vateire 'akhotah 'aholibah vatashkhet 'agbatah mimenah ve'et taznuteha mizenunei 'akhotah. ezekiel 23:12	'el benei 'ashur 'agabah pakhot useganim qerobim lebushei mikhlol parashim rokhebei susim bakhurei khemed kulam. ezekiel 23:13	va'eire ki nitma'ah derekh 'ekhad lishteihen. ezekiel 23:14	vatosef 'el taznuteha vateire 'anshei mekhuqeh 'al haqir zalmei khasdiyim khasdim khaquqim bashashar. ezekiel 23:15	khagorei 'eizor bemateneihem serukhei tebulim berasheihem mar'eh shalishim kulam demut benei babel kasdim 'erez moladtam. ezekiel 23:16	vata'gab vata'gebah 'aleihem lemar'eh 'eineha vatishlakh mal'akhim 'aleihem kasdimah. ezekiel 23:17	vayabo'u 'eileha benei babel lemishkab dodim vaytame'u 'otah betaznutam vatitma bam vateiqa' nafshah meihem. ezekiel 23:18	vategal taznuteha vategal 'et 'ervatah vateiqa' nafshi mei'aleha ka'asher naqe'ah nafshi mei'al 'akhotah. ezekiel 23:19	vatarbeh 'et taznuteha lizkor 'et yemei ne'ureha 'asher zanetah be'erez mizrayim. ezekiel 23:20	vata'gebah 'al pilagsheihem 'asher besar khamorim besaram vezirmat susim zirmatam. ezekiel 23:21	vatifqedi 'et zimat ne'urayikh ba'sot mimizrayim dadayikh lema'an shedei ne'urayikh. ezekiel 23:22	lakhen 'aholibah venatati lifneihem mishpat ushefatukh bemishpeteihem. ezekiel 23:25	venatati qin'ati bakh ve'asu 'otakh bekheimah 'apekh ve'azenayikh yasiru ve'akharitekh bakhereb tipol hemah banayikh ubenotayikh yiqakhu ve'akharitekh tei'akhel ba'esh. ezekiel 23:26	vehifshitukh 'et begadayikh velaqekhu kelei tif'artekh. ezekiel 23:27	vehishbati zimatekh mimekh ve'et zenutekh mei'erez mizrayim velo tis'i 'einayikh 'aleihem umizrayim lo tizkeri 'od. ezekiel 23:28	ki khoh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini notenakh beyad 'asher sanet beyad 'asher naqe'ah nafshekh meihem. ezekiel 23:29	ve'asu 'otakh besin'ah 23:31	bederekh 'akhotekh halakhet venatati khosah beyadekh. ezekiel 23:32	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh kos 'akhotekh tishti ha'amuqah veharekhabah tihyeh lizkhoq ulela'ag mirbah lehakhil. ezekiel 23:33	shikaron veyagon timalei'i kos shamah ushemamah kos 'akhotekh shomeron. ezekiel 23:34	veshatit 'otah umazit ve'et kharaseha tegareimi veshadayikh tenateiqi ki 'ani dibarti ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 23:35	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an shakhakhat 'oti vatashlikhi 'oti 'akharei gavekh vegam 'at se'i zimatekh ve'et taznutayikh. ezekiel 23:36	vayomer yhvh 'eilai ben 'adam hatishpot 'et 'aholah ve'et 'aholibah vehaged lahen 'et to'aboteihen. ezekiel 23:37	ki ni'eifu vedam bideihen ve'et giluleihen ni'eifu vegam 'et beneihen 'asher yaledu li he'ebiru lahem le'akhlah ezekiel 23:38	'od ezekiel 23:40	ve'af ki tishlakhnah la'anashim ba'im mimerkhaq 'asher mal'akh shaluakh 'aleihem vehineh ba'u la'asher rakhazt kakhalt 'einayikh ve'adit 'edi. ezekiel 23:41	veyashabt 'al mitah khebudah veshulkhan 'arukh lefaneha uqetareti veshamni samt 'aleha. ezekiel 23:42	veqol hamon shalev bah ve'el 'anashim meirob 'adam muba'im soba'im saba'im mimidbar vayitenu zemidim 'el yedeihen va'ateret hazimah. ezekiel 23:45	va'anashim zadiqim hemah yishpetu 'othem mishpat no'afot umishpat shofekhot dam ki no'afot henah vedam bideihen. ezekiel 23:46	ki koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ha'aleh 'aleihem qahal venaton 'ethen leza'avah velabaz. ezekiel 23:47	veragemu 'aleihen 'eben qahal ubarei 'othen bekharbotam beneihem ubenoteihem yaharogu ubateihen ba'esh yisrofu. ezekiel 23:48	vehishbati zimah min vekhatef mibkhar 'azamim malei. ezekiel 24:5	mibkhar hazon laqoakh vegam dur ha'azamim takhteha ratakh retakheha gam bashelu 'azameha betokhah. ezekiel 24:6	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'o 'ir hamedurah. ezekiel 24:10	harbeh ha'eizim hadleq ha'esh hatem habasar veharqakh hamerqakhah veha'azamot yeikharu. ezekiel 24:11	veha'amideha 'al gekhaleha reiqah lema'an teikham vekharah nekhushtah venitekhah betokhah tum'atah titum khel'atah. ezekiel 24:12	te'unim hel'at velo teizei mimenah rabat khel'atah be'esh khel'atah. ezekiel 24:13	betum'atekh zimah ya'an tihartikh velo tahart mitum'atekh 24:15	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 24:16	ben 'adam hini loqeiakh mimekha 'et makhmad 'einekha bemageifah velo tispod velo tibkeh velo tabo dim'atekha. ezekiel 24:17	hei'aneq dom meitim baboqer ka'asher zuveiti. ezekiel 24:19	vayomeru 'eilai ha'am halo tagid lanu mah 'eleh lanu ki 'atah 'oseh. ezekiel 24:20	va'omar 'aleihem debar yhvh hayah 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 24:21	'emor lebet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini mekhalel 'et miqdashi ge'on 'uzekhem makhmad 'eineikhem umakhmal nafshekhem ubeneikhem ubenoteikhem 'asher 'azabtem bakhereb yipolu. ezekiel 24:22	va'asitem ka'asher 'asiti 'al safam lo ta'tu velekhem 'anashim lo tokheilu. ezekiel 24:23	ufe'eireikhem 'al rasheikhem vena'aleikhem beragleikhem lo tispedu velo tibku unemaqotem ba'avonoteikhem unehamtem 'ish 'el 'akhiv. ezekiel 24:24	vehayah yekhezqel lakhem lemofet kekhol 'asher 'asah ta'asu bebo'ah vida'tem ki 'ani 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 24:25	ve'atah ben 'adam halo beyom qakhti meihem 'et ma'uzam mesos tif'artam 'et makhmad 'eineihem ve'et masa nafsham beneihem ubenoteihem. ezekiel 24:26	bayom hahu yabo hapalit 'eilekha lehashma'ut 'azenayim. ezekiel 24:27	bayom hahu yipatakh pikha 'et hapalit utedaber velo tei'alem 'od vehayita lahem lemofet veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 25:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 25:2	ben 'adam sim panekha 'el benei 'amon vehinabei 'aleihem. ezekiel 25:3	ve'amarta libnei 'amon shim'u debar 'adonai yhvh koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an 'amerekh he'akh 'el miqdashi khi nikhal ve'el 'admat yisra'el ki nashamah ve'el bet yehudah ki halekhu bagolah. ezekiel 25:4	lakhen hini notenakh libnei qedem lemorashah veyishebu tiroteihem bakh venatenu bakh mishkeneihem hemah yokhelu firyekh vehemah yishtu khalabekh. ezekiel 25:5	venatati 'et rabah linveh gemalim ve'et benei 'amon lemirbaz zon vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 25:6	ki khoh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an makh'akha yad veraq'akha beragel vatismakh bekhal shatekha benefesh 'el 'admat yisra'el. ezekiel 25:7	lakhen hini natiti 'et yadi 'alekha unetatikha lebag lebaz lagoyim vehikhratikha min ha'amim veha'abadtikha min ha'arazot 'ashmidekha veyada'ta ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 25:8	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an 'amor mo'ab vesei'ir hineh kekhal hagoyim bet yehudah. ezekiel 25:9	lakhen hini foteiakh 'et ketef mo'ab meihe'arim mei'arav miqazeihu zebi 'erez bet hayshimot ba'al me'on veqiryatemah veqiryatayemah. ezekiel 25:10	libnei qedem 'al benei 'amon unetatiha lemorashah lema'an lo tizakher benei 'amon bagoyim. ezekiel 25:11	ubemo'ab 'e'eseh shefatim veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 25:12	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an 'asot 'edom binqom naqam lebet yehudah vaye'shemu 'ashom veniqemu bahem. ezekiel 25:13	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh venatiti yadi 'al 'edom vehikhrati mimenah 'adam ubeheimah unetatiha kharebah miteiman udedaneh bakhereb yipolu. ezekiel 25:14	venatati 'et niqmati be'edom beyad 'ami yisra'el ve'asu be'edom ke'api vekhakhamati veyade'u 'et niqmati ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 25:15	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an 'asot pelishtim binqamah vayinaqemu naqam bish'at benefesh lemashkhit 'eibat 'olam. ezekiel 25:16	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini noteh yadi 'al pelishtim vehikhrati 'et kereitim veha'abadti 'et she'eirit khof hayam. ezekiel 25:17	ve'asiti bam neqamot gedolot betokhkhot kheimah veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh betiti 'et niqmati bam. ezekiel 26:1	vayhi be'ashtei 'esreh shanah be'ekhad lakhodesh hayah debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 26:2	ben 'adam ya'an 'asher 'amerah zor 'al yerushalim he'akh nishberah daltot ha'amim nasebah 'eilai 'imale'ah hakhorabah. ezekiel 26:3	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'alayikh zor veha'aleiti 'alayikh goyim rabim keha'alot hayam legalav. ezekiel 26:4	veshikhatu khomot zor veharesu migdaleha vesikheiti 'afarah mimenah venatati 'otah lizkhiakh sala'. ezekiel 26:5	mishtakh kharamim tihyeh betokh hayam ki 'ani dibarti ne'um 'adonai yhvh vehayetah lebaz lagoyim. ezekiel 26:6	ubenoteha 'asher basadeh bakhereb teiharagnah veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 26:7	ki khoh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini meibi 'el zor nebukhadrezar melekh babel mizafon melekh melakhim besus uberekheb ubefarashim veqahal ve'am rab. ezekiel 26:8	benotayikh basadeh bakhereb yaharog venatan 'alayikh dayeq veshafakh 'alayikh solelah veheiqim 'alayikh zinah. ezekiel 26:9	umekhi qabalo yiten bekhomotayikh umigdelotayikh yitoz bekharbotav. ezekiel 26:10	mishif'at susav yekhasekh 'abaqam miqol parash vegalgal varekheb tir'ashnah khomotayikh bebo'o bish'arayikh kimbo'ei 'ir mebuqa'ah. ezekiel 26:11	befarsot susav yirmos 'et kal khuzotayikh 'amekh bakhereb yaharog umazebot 'uzekh la'arez teired. ezekiel 26:12	veshalelu kheilekh ubazezu rekhulatekh veharesu khomotayikh ubatei khemdatekh yitozu va'abanayikh ve'eizayikh va'afarekh betokh mayim yasimu. ezekiel 26:13	vehishbati hamon shirayikh veqol kinorayikh lo yishama' 'od. ezekiel 26:14	unetatikh lizkhiakh sela' mishtakh kharamim tihyeh lo tibaneh 'od ki 'ani yhvh dibarti ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 26:15	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh lezor halo miqol mapaltekh be'enoq khalal beihareg hereg betokhekh yir'ashu ha'iyim. ezekiel 26:16	veyaredu mei'al kis'otam kol nesi'ei hayam veheisiru 'et me'ileihem ve'et bigdei riqmatam yifshotu kharadot yilbashu 'al ha'arez yeisheibu vekharedu lirga'im veshamemu 'alayikh. ezekiel 26:17	venase'u 'alayikh qinah ve'ameru lakh 'ekh 'abadt noshebet miyamim ha'ir hahulalah 'asher hayetah khazaqah bayam hi veyoshebeha 'asher natenu khititam lekhal yoshebeha. ezekiel 26:18	'atah yekhredu ha'iyin yom mapaltekh venibhalu ha'iyim 'asher bayam mizeitekh. ezekiel 26:19	ki khoh 'amar 'adonai yhvh betiti 'otakh 'ir nekherebet ke'arim 'asher lo noshabu beha'alot 'alayikh 'et tehom vekhisukh hamayim harabim. ezekiel 26:20	vehoradtikh 'et yordei bor 'el 'am 'olam vehoshabtikh be'erez takhtiyot kakhorabot mei'olam 'et yordei bor lema'an lo teisheibi venatati zebi be'erez khayim. ezekiel 26:21	balahot 'etenekh ve'einekh utebuqshi velo timaze'i 'od le'olam ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 27:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 27:2	ve'atah ben 'adam sa 'al zor qinah. ezekiel 27:3	ve'amarta lezor hayoshebotei hayoshebet 'al mebo'ot yam rokhelet ha'amim 'el 'iyim rabim koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh zor 'at 'amart 'ani kelilat yofi. ezekiel 27:4	beleb yamim gebulayikh bonayikh kalelu yafeyekh. ezekiel 27:5	beroshim misenir banu lakh 'et kal lukhotayim 'erez milebanon laqakhu la'asot toren 'alayikh. ezekiel 27:6	'alonim mibashan 'asu mishotayikh qarshekh 'asu shen bat 'ashurim mei'iyei kitiyim kitiyim. ezekiel 27:7	shesh beriqmah mimizrayim hayah mifrasekh lihyot lakh lenes tekheilet ve'argaman mei'iyei 'elishah hayah mekhasekh. ezekiel 27:8	yoshebei zidon ve'arvad hayu shatim lakh khakhamayikh zor hayu bakh hemah khobelayikh. ezekiel 27:9	ziqnei gebal vakhakhameha hayu bakh makhaziqei bidqekh kal 'oniyot hayam umalakheihem hayu bakh la'arob ma'arabekh. ezekiel 27:10	paras velud ufut hayu bekheilekh 'anshei milkhamtekh magen vekhoba' tilu bakh hemah natenu hadarekh. ezekiel 27:11	benei 'arvad vekheilekh 'al khomotayikh sabib vegamadim bemigdelotayikh hayu shilteihem tilu 'al khomotayikh sabib hemah kalelu yafeyekh. ezekiel 27:12	tarshish sokhartekh meirob kal hon bekhesef barzel bedil ve'oferet natenu 'izbonayikh. ezekiel 27:13	yavan tubal vameshekh hemah rokhelayikh benefesh 'adam ukhelei nekhoshet natenu ma'arabekh. ezekiel 27:14	mibet togarmah susim ufarashim uferadim natenu 'izbonayikh. ezekiel 27:15	benei dedan rokhelayikh 'iyim rabim sekhorat yadekh qarnot shen vehobnim vehabenim heishibu 'eshkarekh. ezekiel 27:16	'aram sokhartekh meirob ma'asayikh benofekh 'argaman veriqmah ubuz veramot vekhadkod natenu be'izbonayikh. ezekiel 27:17	yehudah ve'erez yisra'el hemah rokhelayikh bekhitei minit ufanag udebash vashemen vazori natenu ma'arabekh. ezekiel 27:18	dameseq sokhartekh berob ma'asayikh meirob kal hon beyen khelbon vezemer zakhar. ezekiel 27:19	vedan veyavan me'uzal be'izbonayikh natanu barzel 'ashot qidah veqaneh bema'arabekh hayah. ezekiel 27:20	dedan rokhaltekh bebigdei khofesh lerikhbah. ezekiel 27:21	'arab vekhal nesi'ei qeidar hemah sokharei yadekh bekharim ve'eilim ve'atudim bam sokharayikh. ezekiel 27:22	rokhelei sheba vera'mah hemah rokhelayikh berosh kal bosem ubekhal 'eben yeqarah vezahab natenu 'izbonayikh. ezekiel 27:23	kharan vekhaneh va'eden rokhelei sheba 'ashur kilmad rokhaltekh. ezekiel 27:24	hemah rokhelayikh bemakhlulim biglomei tekheilet veriqmah ubeginzei beromim bakhabalim khabushim va'aruzim bemarkhultekh. ezekiel 27:25	'oniyot tarshish sharotayikh ma'arabekh vatimale'i vatikhbedi me'od beleb yamim. ezekiel 27:26	bemayim rabim hebi'ukh hashatim 'otakh ruakh haqadim shebarekh beleb yamim. ezekiel 27:27	honekh ve'izbonayikh ma'arabekh malakhayikh vekhobelayikh makhaziqei bidqekh ve'orebei ma'arabekh vekhal 'anshei milkhamtekh 'asher bakh ubekhal qehalekh 'asher betokhekh yipelu beleb yamim beyom mapaltekh. ezekiel 27:28	leqol za'aqat khobelayikh yir'ashu migroshot. ezekiel 27:29	veyaredu mei'aniyoteihem kol tofesei mashot malakhim kol khobelei hayam 'el ha'arez ya'amodu. ezekiel 27:30	vehishmi'u 'alayikh beqolam veyiz'aqu marah veya'alu 'afar 'al rasheihem ba'eifer yitpalashu. ezekiel 27:31	vehiqrikhu 'eilayikh qarekhah vekhageru saqim ubakhu 'eilayikh bemar nefesh misped mar. ezekiel 27:32	venase'u 'eilayikh benihem qinah veqonu 'alayikh mi khezor kedumah betokh hayam. ezekiel 27:33	bezet 'izbonayikh miyamim hisba'at 'amim rabim berob honayikh uma'arabayikh he'eshart malkhei 'arez. ezekiel 27:34	'et nishberet miyamim bema'amaqei mayim ma'arabekh vekhal qehalekh betokhekh nafalu. ezekiel 27:35	kol yoshebei ha'iyim shamemu 'alayikh umalkheihem sa'aru sa'ar ra'amu panim. ezekiel 27:36	sokharim ba'amim sharequ 'alayikh balahot hayit ve'einekh 'ad 'olam. ezekiel 28:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 28:2	ben 'adam 'emor lingid zor koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an gabah libekha vatomer 'el 'ani moshab 'elohim yashabti beleb yamim ve'atah 'adam velo 'el vatiten libekha keleb 'elohim. ezekiel 28:3	hineh khakham 'atah midani'el midani'el kal satum lo 'amamukha. ezekiel 28:4	bekhakhematekha ubitbunatekha 'asita lekha khayil vata'as zahab vakhesef be'ozrotekha. ezekiel 28:5	berob khakhematekha birkhulatekha hirbita kheilekha vayigbah lebabekha bekheilekha. ezekiel 28:6	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an titekha 'et lebabekha keleb 'elohim. ezekiel 28:7	lakhen hini meibi 'alekha zarim 'arizei goyim veheiriqu kharbotam 'al yefi khakhematekha vekhilelu yif'atekha. ezekiel 28:8	lashakhat yoridukha vamatah memotei khalal beleb yamim. ezekiel 28:9	he'amor tomar 'elohim 'ani lifnei horegekha ve'atah 'adam velo 'el beyad mekhalekha. ezekiel 28:10	motei 'areilim tamut beyad zarim ki 'ani dibarti ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 28:11	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 28:12	ben 'adam sa qinah 'al melekh zor ve'amarta lo koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'atah khotem takhenit malei khakhmah ukhelil yofi. ezekiel 28:13	be'eiden gan 'elohim hayita kal 'eben yeqarah mesukhatekha 'odem pitdah veyahalom tarshish shoham veyashefeh sapir nofekh ubareqat vezahab melekhet tupekha uneqabekha bakh beyom hibara'akha konanu. ezekiel 28:14	'at kerub mimshakh hasokhekh unetatikha behar qodesh 'elohim hayita betokh 'abnei 'esh hithalakheta. ezekiel 28:15	tamim 'atah bidrakhekha miyom hibare'akh 'ad nimza 'avlatah bakh. ezekiel 28:16	berob rekhulatekha malu tokhkha khamas vatekheta va'ekhalelkha meihar 'elohim va'abedkha kerub hasokhekh mitokh 'abnei 'esh. ezekiel 28:17	gabah libekha beyafeyekha shikhata khakhematekha 'al yif'atekha 'al 'erez hishlakhtikha lifnei melakhim netatikha lera'avah bakh. ezekiel 28:18	meirob 'avonekha be'evel rekhulatekha khilalta miqdashekha va'ozi 'esh mitokhkha hi 'akhalatkha va'etenkha le'eifer 'al ha'arez le'einei kal ro'ekha. ezekiel 28:19	kal yod'ekha ba'amim shamemu 'alekha balahot hayita ve'einekha 'ad 'olam. ezekiel 28:20	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 28:21	ben 'adam sim panekha 'el zidon vehinabei 'aleha. ezekiel 28:22	ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'alayikh zidon venikhbadti betokhekh veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh ba'asoti bah shefatim veniqdashti bah. ezekiel 28:23	veshilakhti bah deber vadam bekhuzoteha veniflal khalal betokhah bekhereb 'aleha misabib veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 28:24	velo yihyeh 'od lebet yisra'el silon mam'ir veqoz makh'ib mikol sebibotam hashatim 'otam veyade'u ki 'ani 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 28:25	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh beqabezi 'et bet yisra'el min ha'amim 'asher nafozu bam veniqdashti bam le'einei hagoyim veyashebu 'al 'admatam 'asher natati le'abdi leya'aqob. ezekiel 28:26	veyashebu 'aleha labetakh ubanu batim venate'u kheramim veyashebu labetakh ba'asoti shefatim bekhol hashatim 'otam misebibotam veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheihem. ezekiel 29:1	bashanah ha'asirit ba'asiri bishnem 'asar lakhodesh hayah debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 29:2	ben 'adam sim panekha 'al par'oh melekh mizrayim vehinabei 'alav ve'al mizrayim kulah. ezekiel 29:3	daber ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'alekha par'oh melekh mizrayim hatanim hagadol harobez betokh ye'orav 'asher 'amar li ye'ori va'ani 'asitini. ezekiel 29:4	venatati khakhiyim khakhim bilkhayekha vehidbaqti degat ye'orekha beqasqesotekha veha'alitikha mitokh ye'orekha ve'et kal degat ye'orekha beqasqesotekha tidbaq. ezekiel 29:5	unetashtikha hamidbarah 'otkha ve'et kal degat ye'orekha 'al penei hasadeh tipol lo tei'asef velo tiqabez lekhayat ha'arez ule'of hashamayim netatikha le'akhlah ezekiel 29:6	veyade'u kal yoshebei mizrayim ki 'ani yhvh ya'an heyotam mish'enet qaneh lebet yisra'el. ezekiel 29:7	betafesam bekha bakafkha bakaf teiroz ubaqa'ta lahem kal katef ubehisha'anam 'alekha tishaber veha'amadta lahem kal matenayim. ezekiel 29:8	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini meibi 'alayikh khareb vehikhrati mimekh 'adam ubeheimah. ezekiel 29:9	vehayetah 'erez mizrayim lishmamah vekharebah veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh ya'an 'amar ye'or li va'ani 'asiti. ezekiel 29:10	lakhen hini 'eilekha ve'el ye'orekha venatati 'et 'erez mizrayim lekharebot khoreb shemamah mimigdol seveineh ve'ad gebul kush. ezekiel 29:11	lo ta'abar bah regel 'adam veregel beheimah lo ta'abar bah velo teisheb 'arba'im shanah. ezekiel 29:12	venatati 'et 'erez mizrayim shemamah betokh 'arazot neshamot ve'areha betokh 'arim makhorabot tihyena shemamah 'arba'im shanah vahafizoti 'et mizrayim bagoyim vezeiritim ba'arazot. ezekiel 29:13	ki koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh miqez 'arba'im shanah 'aqabez 'et mizrayim min ha'amim 'asher nafozu shamah. ezekiel 29:14	veshabti 'et shebut mizrayim vahashiboti 'otam 'erez patros 'al 'erez mekhuratam vehayu sham mamlakhah shefalah. ezekiel 29:15	min hamamlakhot tihyeh shefalah velo titnasei 'od 'al hagoyim vehim'atim lebilti redot bagoyim. ezekiel 29:16	velo yihyeh 'od lebet yisra'el lemibtakh mazkir 'avon bifnotam 'akhareihem veyade'u ki 'ani 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 29:17	vayhi be'esrim vasheba' shanah barishon be'ekhad lakhodesh hayah debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 29:18	ben 'adam nebukhadrezar melekh babel he'ebid 'et kheilo 'abodah gedolah 'el zor kal rosh muqrakh vekhal katef merutah vesakhar lo hayah lo ulekheilo mizor 'al ha'abodah 'asher 'abad 'aleha. ezekiel 29:19	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini noten linbukhadrezar melekh babel 'et 'erez mizrayim venasa hamonah veshalal shelalah ubazaz bizah vehayetah sakhar lekheilo. ezekiel 29:20	pe'ulato 'asher 'abad bah natati lo 'et 'erez mizrayim 'asher 'asu li ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 29:21	bayom hahu 'azmiakh qeren lebet yisra'el ulekha 'eten pitkhon peh betokham veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 30:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 30:2	ben 'adam hinabei ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh heililu hah layom. ezekiel 30:3	ki qarob yom veqarob yom yhvh yom 'anan 'et goyim yihyeh. ezekiel 30:4	uba'ah khereb bemizrayim vehayetah khalkhalah bekhush binfol khalal bemizrayim velaqekhu hamonah venehersu yesodoteha. ezekiel 30:5	kush ufut velud vekhal ha'ereb vekhub ubenei 'erez haberit 'itam bakhereb yipolu. ezekiel 30:6	koh 'amar yhvh venafelu somekhei mizrayim veyarad ge'on 'uzah mimigdol seveineh bakhereb yipelu bah ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 30:7	venashamu betokh 'arazot neshamot ve'arav betokh 'arim nakharabot tihyenah. ezekiel 30:8	veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh betiti 'esh bemizrayim venishberu kal 'ozereha. ezekiel 30:9	bayom hahu yeize'u mal'akhim milefanai bazim lehakharid 'et kush betakh vehayetah khalkhalah bahem beyom mizrayim ki hineh ba'ah. ezekiel 30:10	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh vehishbati 'et hamon mizrayim beyad nebukhadrezar melekh babel. ezekiel 30:11	hu ve'amo 'ito 'arizei goyim muba'im leshakhet ha'arez veheiriqu kharbotam 'al mizrayim umale'u 'et ha'arez khalal. ezekiel 30:12	venatati ye'orim kharabah umakharti 'et ha'arez beyad ra'im vahashimoti 'erez umelo'ah beyad zarim 'ani yhvh dibarti. ezekiel 30:13	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh veha'abadti gilulim vehishbati 'elilim minof venasi mei'erez mizrayim lo yihyeh 'od venatati yir'ah be'erez mizrayim. ezekiel 30:14	vahashimoti 'et patros venatati 'esh bezo'an ve'asiti shefatim beno. ezekiel 30:15	veshafakhti khamati 'al sin ma'oz mizrayim vehikhrati 'et hamon no. ezekiel 30:16	venatati 'esh bemizrayim khul takhil takhul sin veno tihyeh lehibaqeia' venof zarei yomam. ezekiel 30:17	bakhurei 'aven ufi beset bakhereb yipolu vehenah bashebi teilakhnah. ezekiel 30:18	ubitkhafnekhes khasakh hayom beshibri sham 'et motot mizrayim venishbat bah ge'on 'uzah hi 'anan yekhasenah ubenoteha bashebi teilakhnah. ezekiel 30:19	ve'asiti shefatim bemizrayim veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 30:20	vayhi be'akhat 'esreh shanah barishon beshib'ah lakhodesh hayah debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 30:21	ben 'adam 'et zeroa' par'oh melekh mizrayim shabareti vehineh lo khubeshah latet refu'ot lasum khitul lekhabeshah lekhazeqah litpos bekhareb. ezekiel 30:22	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim veshabarti 'et zero'otav 'et hakhazaqah ve'et hanishbaret vehipalti 'et hakhereb miyado. ezekiel 30:23	vahafizoti 'et mizrayim bagoyim vezeiritim ba'arazot. ezekiel 30:24	vekhizaqti 'et zero'ot melekh babel venatati 'et kharbi beyado veshabarti 'et zero'ot par'oh vena'aq na'aqot khalal lefanav. ezekiel 30:25	vehakhazaqti 'et zero'ot melekh babel uzero'ot par'oh tipolenah veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh betiti kharbi beyad melekh babel venatah 'otah 'el 'erez mizrayim. ezekiel 30:26	vahafizoti 'et mizrayim bagoyim vezeiriti 'otam ba'arazot veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 31:1	vayhi be'akhat 'esreh shanah bashelishi be'ekhad lakhodesh hayah debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 31:2	ben 'adam 'emor 'el par'oh melekh mizrayim ve'el hamono 'el mi damita begadelekha. ezekiel 31:3	hineh 'ashur 'erez balebanon yefeh 'anaf vekhoresh meizal ugebah qomah uben 'abotim hayetah zamarto. ezekiel 31:4	mayim gideluhu tehom romematehu 'et naharoteha holekh sebibot mata'ah ve'et te'aloteha shilkhah 'el kal 'azei hasadeh. ezekiel 31:5	'al ken gabeha qomato mikol 'azei hasadeh vatirbenah sar'apotav vate'erakhnah foroto forotav mimayim rabim beshalekho. ezekiel 31:6	bis'apotav qinu kal 'of hashamayim vetakhat porotav yaledu kol khayat hasadeh ubezilo yeishebu kol goyim rabim. ezekiel 31:7	vayeyif begadelo be'orekh daliyotav ki hayah sharesho 'el mayim rabim. ezekiel 31:8	'arazim lo 'amamuhu began 'elohim beroshim lo damu 'el se'apotav ve'armonim lo hayu keforotav kal 'ez began 'elohim lo damah 'eilav beyafeyo. ezekiel 31:9	yafeh 'asitiv berob daliyotav vayqan'uhu kal 'azei 'eiden 'asher began ha'elohim. ezekiel 31:10	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an 'asher gabahta beqomah vayiten zamarto 'el ben 'abotim veram lebabo begabeho. ezekiel 31:11	ve'eteneihu beyad 'el goyim 'aso ya'aseh lo kerish'o geirashtihu. ezekiel 31:12	vayikhretuhu zarim 'arizei goyim vayiteshuhu 'el heharim ubekhal gei'ayot nafelu daliyotav vatishabarnah forotav bekhol 'afiqei ha'arez vayeiredu mizilo kal 'amei ha'arez vayiteshuhu. ezekiel 31:13	'al mapalto yishkenu kal 'of hashamayim ve'el porotav hayu kol khayat hasadeh. ezekiel 31:14	lema'an 'asher lo yigbehu beqomatam kal 'azei mayim velo yitenu 'et zamartam 'el ben 'abotim velo ya'amdu 'eileihem begabeham kal shotei mayim ki khulam nitenu lamavet 'el 'erez takhtit betokh benei 'adam 'el yordei bor. ezekiel 31:15	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh beyom ridto she'olah he'ebalti kiseiti 'alav 'et tehom va'emna' naharoteha vayikale'u mayim rabim va'aqdir 'alav lebanon vekhal 'azei hasadeh 'alav 'ulpeh. ezekiel 31:16	miqol mapalto hir'ashti goyim behoridi 'oto she'olah 'et yordei bor vayinakhamu be'erez takhtit kal 'azei 'eiden mibkhar vetob lebanon kal shotei mayim. ezekiel 31:17	gam hem 'ito yaredu she'olah 'el khalei khareb uzero'o yashebu bezilo betokh goyim. ezekiel 31:18	'el mi damita kakhah bekhabod ubegodel ba'azei 'eiden vehuradta 'et 'azei 'eiden 'el 'erez takhtit betokh 'areilim tishkab 'et khalei khereb hu far'oh vekhal hamonoh ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 32:1	vayhi bishtei 'esreh shanah bishnei 'asar khodesh be'ekhad lakhodesh hayah debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 32:2	ben 'adam sa qinah 'al par'oh melekh mizrayim ve'amarta 'eilav kefir goyim nidmeita ve'atah katanim bayamim vatagakh benaharotekha vatidlakh mayim beraglekha vatirpos naharotam. ezekiel 32:3	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ufarasti 'alekha 'et rishti biqhal 'amim rabim vehe'elukha bekhermi. ezekiel 32:4	unetashtikha ba'arez 'al penei hasadeh 'atilekha vehishkanti 'alekha kal 'of hashamayim vehisba'ti mimekha khayat kal ha'arez. ezekiel 32:5	venatati 'et besarekha 'al heharim umileiti hagei'ayot ramutekha. ezekiel 32:6	vehishqeiti 'erez zafatekha midamekha 'el heharim va'afiqim yimale'un mimeka. ezekiel 32:7	vekhiseiti bekhabotkha shamayim vehiqdarti 'et kokhebeihem mesh be'anan 'akhasenu veyareiakh lo ya'ir 'oro. ezekiel 32:8	kal me'orei 'or bashamayim 'aqdirem 'alekha venatati khoshekh 'al 'arzekha ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 32:9	vehikh'asti leb 'amim rabim bahabi'i shibrekha bagoyim 'al 'arazot 'asher lo yeda'tam. ezekiel 32:10	vahashimoti 'alekha 'amim rabim umalkheihem yis'aru 'alekha sa'ar be'offi kharbi 'al peneihem vekharedu lirga'im 'ish lenafsho beyom mapaltekha. ezekiel 32:11	ki koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh khereb
