melekh babel tebo'ekha. ezekiel 32:12	bekharbot giborim 'apil hamonekha 'arizei goyim kulam veshadedu 'et ge'on mizrayim venishmad kal hamonah. ezekiel 32:13	veha'abadti 'et kal behemtah mei'al mayim rabim velo tidlakhem regel 'adam 'od ufarsot beheimah lo tidlakhem. ezekiel 32:14	'az 'ashqia' meimeihem venaharotam kashemen 'olikh ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 32:15	betiti 'et 'erez mizrayim shemamah uneshamah 'erez mimelo'ah behakoti 'et kal yoshebei bah veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 32:16	qinah hi veqonuha benot hagoyim teqonenah 'otah 'al mizrayim ve'al kal hamonah teqonenah 'otah ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 32:17	vayhi bishtei 'esreh shanah bakhamishah 'asar lakhodesh hayah debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 32:18	ben 'adam neheh 'al hamon mizrayim vehorideihu 'otah ubenot goyim 'adirim 'el 'erez takhtiyot 'et yordei bor. ezekiel 32:19	mimi na'ameta redah vehashekebah 'et 'areilim. ezekiel 32:20	betokh khalei khereb yipolu khereb nitanah mashekhu 'otah vekhal hamoneha. ezekiel 32:21	yedaberu lo 'eilei giborim mitokh she'ol 'et 'ozerav yaredu shakhebu ha'areilim khalei khareb. ezekiel 32:22	sham 'ashur vekhal qehalah sebibotav qibrotav kulam khalalim hanofelim bekhareb. ezekiel 32:23	'asher nitenu qibroteha beyarketei bor vayhi qehalah sebibot qeburatah kulam khalalim nofelim bakhereb 'asher natenu khitit be'erez khayim. ezekiel 32:24	sham 'eilam vekhal hamonah sebibot qeburatah kulam khalalim hanofelim bakhereb 'asher yaredu 'areilim 'el 'erez takhtiyot 'asher natenu khititam be'erez khayim vayis'u khelimatam 'et yordei bor. ezekiel 32:25	betokh khalalim natenu mishkab lah bekhal hamonah sebibotav qibroteha kulam 'areilim khalei khereb ki nitan khititam be'erez khayim vayis'u khelimatam 'et yordei bor betokh khalalim nitan. ezekiel 32:26	sham meshekh tubal vekhal hamonah sebibotav qibroteha kulam 'areilim mekhulei khereb ki natenu khititam be'erez khayim. ezekiel 32:27	velo yishkebu 'et giborim nofelim mei'areilim 'asher yaredu she'ol bikhlei milkhamtam vayitenu 'et kharbotam takhat rasheihem vatehi 'avonotam 'al 'azmotam ki khitit giborim be'erez khayim. ezekiel 32:28	ve'atah betokh 'areilim tishabar vetishkab 'et khalei khareb. ezekiel 32:29	shamah 'edom melakheha vekhal nesi'eha 'asher nitenu bigburatam 'et khalei khareb hemah 'et 'areilim yishkabu ve'et yoredei bor. ezekiel 32:30	shamah nesikhei zafon kulam vekhal zidoni 'asher yaredu 'et khalalim bekhititam migburatam boshim vayishkebu 'areilim 'et khalei khereb vayis'u khelimatam 'et yordei bor. ezekiel 32:31	'otam yir'eh far'oh venikham 'al kal hamonoh hamono khalei khereb par'oh vekhal kheilo ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 32:32	ki natati 'et khitito khititi be'erez khayim vehushkab betokh 'areilim 'et khalei khereb par'oh vekhal hamonoh ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 33:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 33:2	ben 'adam daber 'el benei 'amekha ve'amarta 'aleihem 'erez ki 'abi 'aleha khareb velaqekhu 'am ha'arez 'ish 'ekhad miqzeihem venatenu 'oto lahem lezofeh. ezekiel 33:3	vera'ah 'et hakhereb ba'ah 'al ha'arez vetaqa' bashofar vehizhir 'et ha'am. ezekiel 33:4	veshama' hashomeia' 'et qol hashofar velo nizhar vatabo khereb vatiqakheihu damo berosho yihyeh. ezekiel 33:5	'et qol hashofar shama' velo nizhar damo bo yihyeh vehu nizhar nafsho milet. ezekiel 33:6	vehazofeh ki yir'eh 'et hakhereb ba'ah velo taqa' bashofar veha'am lo nizhar vatabo khereb vatiqakh meihem nafesh hu ba'avono nilqakh vedamo miyad hazofeh 'edrosh. ezekiel 33:7	ve'atah ben 'adam zofeh netatikha lebet yisra'el veshama'ta mipi dabar vehizharta 'otam mimeni. ezekiel 33:8	be'ameri larasha' rasha' mot tamut velo dibarta lehazhir rasha' midarko hu rasha' ba'avono yamut vedamo miyadekha 'abaqesh. ezekiel 33:9	ve'atah ki hizharta rasha' midarko lashub mimenah velo shab midarko hu ba'avono yamut ve'atah nafshekha hizalta. ezekiel 33:10	ve'atah ben 'adam 'emor 'el bet yisra'el ken 'amartem leimor ki fesha'einu vekhatoteinu 'aleinu ubam 'anakhnu nemaqim ve'ekh nikhyeh. ezekiel 33:11	'emor 'aleihem khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh 'im 'ekhpoz bemot harasha' ki 'im beshub rasha' midarko vekhayah shubu shubu midarkheikhem hara'im velamah tamutu bet yisra'el. ezekiel 33:12	ve'atah ben 'adam 'emor 'el benei 'amekha zidqat hazadiq lo tazilenu beyom pish'o verish'at harasha' lo yikashel bah beyom shubo meirish'o vezadiq lo yukhal likhyot bah beyom khatoto. ezekiel 33:13	be'ameri lazadiq khayoh yikhyeh vehu batakh 'al zidqato ve'asah 'avel kal zidqato zidqotav lo tizakharnah ube'avlo 'asher 'asah bo yamut. ezekiel 33:14	ube'ameri larasha' mot tamut veshab meikhatato ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah. ezekiel 33:15	khabol yashib rasha' gezeilah yeshalem bekhuqot hakhayim halakh lebilti 'asot 'avel khayo yikhyeh lo yamut. ezekiel 33:16	kal khatato khatotav 'asher khata lo tizakharnah lo mishpat uzedaqah 'asah khayo yikhyeh. ezekiel 33:17	ve'ameru benei 'amekha lo yitakhen derekh 'adonai vehemah darkam lo yitakhen. ezekiel 33:18	beshub zadiq mizidqato ve'asah 'avel umet bahem. ezekiel 33:19	ubeshub rasha' meirish'ato ve'asah mishpat uzedaqah 'aleihem hu yikhyeh. ezekiel 33:20	va'amartem lo yitakhen derekh 'adonai 'ish kidrakhav 'eshpot 'etkhem bet yisra'el. ezekiel 33:21	vayhi bishtei 'esreh shanah ba'asiri bakhamishah lakhodesh legaluteinu ba 'eilai hapalit mirushalim leimor huketah ha'ir. ezekiel 33:22	veyad yhvh hayetah 'eilai ba'ereb lifnei bo hapalit vayiftakh 'et pi 'ad bo 'eilai baboqer vayipatakh pi velo ne'elamti 'od. ezekiel 33:23	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 33:24	ben 'adam yoshebei hekhorabot ha'eleh 'al 'admat yisra'el 'omerim leimor 'ekhad hayah 'abraham vayirash 'et ha'arez va'anakhnu rabim lanu nitenah ha'arez lemorashah. ezekiel 33:25	lakhen 'emor 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'al hadam tokheilu ve'eineikhem tis'u 'el giluleikhem vedam tishpokhu veha'arez tirashu. ezekiel 33:26	'amadtem 'al kharbekhem 'asiten to'eibah ve'ish 'et 'eishet rei'eihu timeitem veha'arez tirashu. ezekiel 33:27	koh tomar 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh khai 'ani 'im lo 'asher bekhorabot bakhereb yipolu va'asher 'al penei hasadeh lakhayah netativ le'akhelo va'asher bamezadot ubame'arot badeber yamutu. ezekiel 33:28	venatati 'et ha'arez shemamah umeshamah venishbat ge'on 'uzah veshamemu harei yisra'el mei'en 'ober. ezekiel 33:29	veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh betiti 'et ha'arez shemamah umeshamah 'al kal to'abotam 'asher 'asu. ezekiel 33:30	ve'atah ben 'adam benei 'amekha hanidbarim bekha 'eizel haqirot ubefitkhei habatim vediber khad 'et 'akhad 'ish 'et 'akhiv leimor bo'u na veshim'u mah hadabar hayozei mei'et yhvh. ezekiel 33:31	veyabo'u 'eilekha kimbo 'am veyeishebu lefanekha 'ami veshame'u 'et debarekha ve'otam lo ya'asu ki 'agabim befihem hemah 'osim 'akharei biz'am libam holekh. ezekiel 33:32	vehinekha lahem keshir 'agabim yefeh qol umeitib nagen veshame'u 'et debarekha ve'osim 'einam 'otam. ezekiel 33:33	ubebo'ah hineh ba'ah veyade'u ki nabi hayah betokham. ezekiel 34:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 34:2	ben 'adam hinabei 'al ro'ei yisra'el hinabei ve'amarta 'aleihem laro'im koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ho ro'ei yisra'el 'asher hayu ro'im 'otam halo hazon yir'u haro'im. ezekiel 34:3	'et hakheileb tokheilu ve'et hazemer tilbashu haberi'ah tizbakhu hazon lo tir'u. ezekiel 34:4	'et hanakhlot lo khizaqtem ve'et hakholah lo ripeitem velanishberet lo khabashtem ve'et hanidakhat lo hasheibotem ve'et ha'obedet lo biqashtem ubekhazeqah reditem 'otam ubefarekh. ezekiel 34:5	vatefuzenah mibeli ro'eh vatihyenah le'akhlah lekhal khayat hasadeh vatefuzenah. ezekiel 34:6	yishgu zoni bekhal heharim ve'al kal gib'ah ramah ve'al kal penei ha'arez nafozu zoni ve'en doresh ve'en mebaqesh. ezekiel 34:7	lakhen ro'im shim'u 'et debar yhvh. ezekiel 34:8	khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh 'im lo ya'an heyot zoni labaz vatihyenah zoni le'akhlah lekhal khayat hasadeh mei'en ro'eh velo dareshu ro'ai 'et zoni vayir'u haro'im 'otam ve'et zoni lo ra'u. ezekiel 34:9	lakhen haro'im shim'u debar yhvh. ezekiel 34:10	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'el haro'im vedarashti 'et zoni miyadam vehishbatim meire'ot zon velo yir'u 'od haro'im 'otam vehizalti zoni mipihem velo tihyena lahem le'akhlah ezekiel 34:11	ki koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'ani vedarashti 'et zoni ubiqartim. ezekiel 34:12	kebaqarat ro'eh 'edro beyom heyoto betokh zono nifrashot ken 'abaqer 'et zoni vehizalti 'ethem mikal hameqomot 'asher nafozu sham beyom 'anan va'arafel. ezekiel 34:13	vehozeitim min ha'amim veqibaztim min ha'arazot vahabi'otim 'el 'admatam ure'itim 'el harei yisra'el ba'afiqim ubekhol moshebei ha'arez. ezekiel 34:14	bemir'eh tob 'er'eh 'otam ubeharei merom yisra'el yihyeh neveihem sham tirbaznah benaveh tob umir'eh shamen tir'enah 'el harei yisra'el. ezekiel 34:15	'ani 'er'eh zoni va'ani 'arbizem ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 34:16	'et ha'obedet 'abaqesh ve'et hanidakhat 'ashib velanishberet 'ekhebosh ve'et hakholah 'akhazeq ve'et hashemeinah ve'et hakhazaqah 'ashmid 'er'enah bemishpat. ezekiel 34:17	ve'ateinah zoni koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini shofet ben seh laseh la'eilim vela'atudim. ezekiel 34:18	ham'at mikem hamir'eh hatob tir'u veyeter mir'eikhem tirmesu beragleikhem umishqa' mayim tishtu ve'et hanotarim beragleikhem tirposun. ezekiel 34:19	vezoni mirmas ragleikhem tir'enah umirpas ragleikhem tishtenah. ezekiel 34:20	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'aleihem hini 'ani veshafati ben seh biryah uben seh razah. ezekiel 34:21	ya'an bezad ubekhatef tehdofu ubeqarneikhem tenagekhu kal hanakhlot 'ad 'asher hafizotem 'otanah 'el hakhuzah. ezekiel 34:22	vehosha'ti lezoni velo tihyenah 'od labaz veshafati ben seh laseh. ezekiel 34:23	vahaqimoti 'aleihem ro'eh 'ekhad vera'ah 'ethen 'et 'abdi david hu yir'eh 'otam vehu yihyeh lahen lero'eh. ezekiel 34:24	va'ani yhvh 'ehyeh lahem leilohim ve'abdi david nasi betokham 'ani yhvh dibarti. ezekiel 34:25	vekharati lahem berit shalom vehishbati khayah ra'ah min ha'arez veyashebu bamidbar labetakh veyashenu baye'arim. ezekiel 34:26	venatati 'otam usebibot gib'ati berakhah vehoradti hageshem be'ito gishmei berakhah yihyu. ezekiel 34:27	venatan 'ez hasadeh 'et piryo veha'arez titen yebulah vehayu 'al 'admatam labetakh veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh beshibri 'et motot 'ulam vehizaltim miyad ha'obedim bahem. ezekiel 34:28	velo yihyu 'od baz lagoyim vekhayat ha'arez lo tokhelem veyashebu labetakh ve'en makharid. ezekiel 34:29	vahaqimoti lahem mata' leshem velo yihyu 'od 'asufei ra'ab ba'arez velo yis'u 'od kelimat hagoyim. ezekiel 34:30	veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheihem 'itam vehemah 'ami bet yisra'el ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 34:31	ve'aten zoni zon mar'iti 'adam 'atem 'ani 'eloheikhem ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 35:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 35:2	ben 'adam sim panekha 'al har sei'ir vehinabei 'alav. ezekiel 35:3	ve'amarta lo koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'eilekha har sei'ir venatiti yadi 'alekha unetatikha shemamah umeshamah. ezekiel 35:4	'arekha kharebah 'asim ve'atah shemamah tihyeh veyada'ta ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 35:5	ya'an heyot lekha 'eibat 'olam vatager 'et benei yisra'el 'al yedei khareb be'et 'eidam be'et 'avon qez. ezekiel 35:6	lakhen khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh ki ledam 'e'eskha vedam yirdafekha 'im lo dam saneita vedam yirdafekha. ezekiel 35:7	venatati 'et har sei'ir leshimah ushemamah vehikhrati mimenu 'ober vashab. ezekiel 35:8	umileiti 'et harav khalalav gib'otekha vegei'otekha vekhal 'afiqekha khalei khereb yipelu bahem. ezekiel 35:9	shimot 'olam 'etenkha ve'arekha lo teishabnah tashobenah vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 35:10	ya'an 'amarekha 'et shenei hagoyim ve'et shetei ha'arazot li tihyenah virashnuha yhvh sham hayah. ezekiel 35:11	lakhen khai 'ani ne'um 'adonai yhvh ve'asiti ke'apekha ukheqin'atekha 'asher 'asitah misin'atekha bam venoda'ti bam ka'asher 'eshpetekha. ezekiel 35:12	veyada'ta ki 'ani yhvh shama'ti 'et kal na'azotekha 'asher 'amarta 'al harei yisra'el leimor shameimah shameimu lanu nitenu le'akhlah ezekiel 35:13	vatagdilu 'alai befikhem veha'tartem 'alai dibreikhem 'ani shama'eti. ezekiel 35:14	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh kismoakh kal ha'arez shemamah 'e'eseh lakh. ezekiel 35:15	kesimkhatekha lenakhlat bet yisra'el 'al 'asher shameimah ken 'e'eseh lakh shemamah tihyeh har sei'ir vekhal 'edom kulah veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 36:1	ve'atah ben 'adam hinabei 'el harei yisra'el ve'amarta harei yisra'el shim'u debar yhvh. ezekiel 36:2	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an 'amar ha'oyeb 'aleikhem he'akh ubamot 'olam lemorashah hayetah lanu. ezekiel 36:3	lakhen hinabei ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an beya'an shamot vesha'of 'etkhem misabib lihyotkhem morashah lish'eirit hagoyim vatei'alu 'al sefat lashon vedibat 'am. ezekiel 36:4	lakhen harei yisra'el shim'u debar 'adonai yhvh koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh leharim velageba'ot la'afiqim velagei'ayot velekhorabot hashomemot vele'arim hane'ezabot 'asher hayu lebaz ulela'ag lish'eirit hagoyim 'asher misabib. ezekiel 36:5	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'im lo be'esh qin'ati dibarti 'al she'eirit hagoyim ve'al 'edom kula 'asher natenu 'et 'arzi lahem lemorashah besimkhat kal leibab bish'at nefesh lema'an migrashah labaz. ezekiel 36:6	lakhen hinabei 'al 'admat yisra'el ve'amarta leharim velageba'ot la'afiqim velagei'ayot koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini beqin'ati ubakhamati dibarti ya'an kelimat goyim nesatem. ezekiel 36:7	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'ani nasati 'et yadi 'im lo hagoyim 'asher lakhem misabib hemah kelimatam yisa'u. ezekiel 36:8	ve'atem harei yisra'el 'anpekhem titeinu uferyekhem tis'u le'ami yisra'el ki qeirebu labo. ezekiel 36:9	ki hini 'aleikhem ufaniti 'aleikhem vene'ebadtem venizra'tem. ezekiel 36:10	vehirbeiti 'aleikhem 'adam kal bet yisra'el kuloh venoshebu he'arim vehekhorabot tibanenah. ezekiel 36:11	vehirbeiti 'aleikhem 'adam ubeheimah verabu ufaru vehoshabti 'etkhem keqadmoteikhem veheitiboti meirishoteikhem vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 36:12	veholakhti 'aleikhem 'adam 'et 'ami yisra'el vireishukha vehayita lahem lenakhalah velo tosif 'od leshakelam. ezekiel 36:13	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ya'an 'omerim lakhem 'okhelet 'adam 'ati 'at umeshakelet goyekh goyayikh hayit. ezekiel 36:14	lakhen 'adam lo tokheli 'od vegoyekh vegoyayikh lo tekhasheli teshakeli 'od ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 36:15	velo 'ashmia' 'eilayikh 'od kelimat hagoyim vekherpat 'amim lo tis'i 'od vegoyekh vegoyayikh lo takhshili 'od ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 36:16	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 36:17	ben 'adam bet yisra'el yoshebim 'al 'admatam vaytame'u 'otah bedarkam uba'alilotam ketum'at hanidah hayetah darkam lefanai. ezekiel 36:18	va'eshpokh khamati 'aleihem 'al hadam 'asher shafekhu 'al ha'arez ubegiluleihem time'uha. ezekiel 36:19	va'afiz 'otam bagoyim vayizaru ba'arazot kedarkam vekha'alilotam shefatim. ezekiel 36:20	vayabo 'el hagoyim 'asher ba'u sham vaykhalelu 'et shem qadshi be'emor lahem 'am yhvh 'eleh umei'arzo yaza'u. ezekiel 36:21	va'ekhmol 'al shem qadshi 'asher khileluhu bet yisra'el bagoyim 'asher ba'u shamah. ezekiel 36:22	lakhen 'emor lebet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh lo lema'ankhem 'ani 'oseh bet yisra'el ki 'im leshem qadshi 'asher khilaltem bagoyim 'asher batem sham. ezekiel 36:23	veqidashti 'et shemi hagadol hamkhulal bagoyim 'asher khilaltem betokham veyade'u hagoyim ki 'ani yhvh ne'um 'adonai yhvh behiqadeshi bakhem le'eineihem. ezekiel 36:24	velaqakhti 'etkhem min hagoyim veqibazti 'etkhem mikal ha'arazot veheibeiti 'etkhem 'el 'admatkhem. ezekiel 36:25	vezaraqti 'aleikhem mayim tehorim utehartem mikol tum'oteikhem umikal giluleikhem 'ataher 'etkhem. ezekiel 36:26	venatati lakhem leb khadash veruakh khadashah 'eten beqirbekhem vahasiroti 'et leb ha'eben mibesarkhem venatati lakhem leb basar. ezekiel 36:27	ve'et rukhi 'eten beqirbekhem ve'asiti 'et 'asher bekhuqai teileikhu umishpatai tishmeru va'asitem. ezekiel 36:28	vishabtem ba'arez 'asher natati la'aboteikhem vihyitem li le'am ve'anokhi 'ehyeh lakhem leilohim. ezekiel 36:29	vehosha'ti 'etkhem mikol tum'oteikhem veqarati 'el hadagan vehirbeiti 'oto velo 'eten 'aleikhem ra'ab. ezekiel 36:30	vehirbeiti 'et peri ha'ez utenubat hasadeh lema'an 'asher lo tiqkhu 'od kherpat ra'ab bagoyim. ezekiel 36:31	uzekhartem 'et darkheikhem hara'im uma'aleikhem 'asher lo tobim uneqototem bifneikhem 'al 'avonoteikhem ve'al to'aboteikhem. ezekiel 36:32	lo lema'ankhem 'ani 'oseh ne'um 'adonai yhvh yivada' lakhem boshu vehikalemu midarkheikhem bet yisra'el. ezekiel 36:33	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh beyom tahari 'etkhem mikol 'avonoteikhem vehoshabti 'et he'arim venibnu hekhorabot. ezekiel 36:34	veha'arez haneshamah tei'abed takhat 'asher hayetah shemamah le'einei kal 'ober. ezekiel 36:35	ve'ameru ha'arez haleizu haneshamah hayetah kegan 'eiden vehe'arim hekhoreibot vehanshamot vehaneherasot bezurot yashabu. ezekiel 36:36	veyade'u hagoyim 'asher yisha'aru sebiboteikhem ki 'ani yhvh baniti haneherasot nata'ti haneshamah 'ani yhvh dibarti ve'asiti. ezekiel 36:37	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'od zot 'idaresh lebet yisra'el la'asot lahem 'arbeh 'otam kazon 'adam. ezekiel 36:38	kezon qadashim kezon yerushalim bemo'adeha ken tihyenah he'arim hekhoreibot melei'ot zon 'adam veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 37:1	hayetah 'alai yad yhvh vayozi'eini beruakh yhvh vaynikheini betokh habiq'ah vehi melei'ah 'azamot. ezekiel 37:2	vehe'ebirani 'aleihem sabib sabib vehineh rabot me'od 'al penei habiq'ah vehineh yebeishot me'od. ezekiel 37:3	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam hatikhyenah ha'azamot ha'eleh va'omar 'adonai yhvh 'atah yada'eta. ezekiel 37:4	vayomer 'eilai hinabei 'al ha'azamot ha'eleh ve'amarta 'aleihem ha'azamot haybeishot shim'u debar yhvh. ezekiel 37:5	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh la'azamot ha'eleh hineh 'ani meibi bakhem ruakh vikhyitem. ezekiel 37:6	venatati 'aleikhem gidim veha'aleiti 'aleikhem basar veqaramti 'aleikhem 'or venatati bakhem ruakh vikhyitem vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 37:7	venibeiti ka'asher zuveiti vayhi qol kehinabe'i vehineh ra'ash vatiqrebu 'azamot 'ezem 'el 'azmo. ezekiel 37:8	vera'iti vehineh 'aleihem gidim ubasar 'alah vayiqram 'aleihem 'or milma'elah veruakh 'en bahem. ezekiel 37:9	vayomer 'eilai hinabei 'el haruakh hinabei ben 'adam ve'amarta 'el haruakh koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh mei'arba' rukhot bo'i haruakh ufekhi baharugim ha'eleh veyikhyu. ezekiel 37:10	vehinabeiti ka'asher zivani vatabo bahem haruakh vayikhyu vaya'amdu 'al ragleihem khayil gadol me'od me'od. ezekiel 37:11	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam ha'azamot ha'eleh kal bet yisra'el hemah hineh 'omerim yabeshu 'azmoteinu ve'abedah tiqvateinu nigzarnu lanu. ezekiel 37:12	lakhen hinabei ve'amarta 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hineh 'ani foteiakh 'et qibroteikhem veha'aleiti 'etkhem miqibroteikhem 'ami veheibeiti 'etkhem 'el 'admat yisra'el. ezekiel 37:13	vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh befitkhi 'et qibroteikhem ubeha'aloti 'etkhem miqibroteikhem 'ami. ezekiel 37:14	venatati rukhi bakhem vikhyitem vehinakhti 'etkhem 'al 'admatkhem vida'tem ki 'ani yhvh dibarti ve'asiti ne'um yhvh. ezekiel 37:15	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 37:16	ve'atah ben 'adam qakh lekha 'ez 'ekhad ukhetob 'alav lihudah velibnei yisra'el khabeiro khabeirav uleqakh 'ez 'ekhad ukhetob 'alav leyosef 'ez 'efrayim vekhal bet yisra'el khabeiro khabeirav. ezekiel 37:17	veqarab 'otam 'ekhad 'el 'ekhad lekha le'ez 'ekhad vehayu la'akhadim beyadekha. ezekiel 37:18	vekha'asher yomeru 'eilekha benei 'amekha leimor halo tagid lanu mah 'eleh lakh ezekiel 37:19	daber 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hineh 'ani loqeiakh 'et 'ez yosef 'asher beyad 'efrayim veshibtei yisra'el khebro khabeirav venatati 'otam 'alav 'et 'ez yehudah va'asitim le'ez 'ekhad vehayu 'ekhad beyadi. ezekiel 37:20	vehayu ha'eizim 'asher tikhtob 'aleihem beyadekha le'eineihem. ezekiel 37:21	vedaber 'aleihem koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hineh 'ani loqeiakh 'et benei yisra'el miben hagoyim 'asher halekhu sham veqibazti 'otam misabib veheibeiti 'otam 'el 'admatam. ezekiel 37:22	ve'asiti 'otam lego 'ekhad ba'arez beharei yisra'el umelekh 'ekhad yihyeh lekhulam lemelekh velo yihyeh yihyu 'od lishnei goyim velo yeikhazu 'od lishtei mamlakhot 'od. ezekiel 37:23	velo yitame'u 'od begiluleihem ubeshiquzeihem ubekhol pish'eihem vehosha'ti 'otam mikol mosheboteihem 'asher khate'u bahem vetiharti 'otam vehayu li le'am va'ani 'ehyeh lahem leilohim. ezekiel 37:24	ve'abdi david melekh 'aleihem vero'eh 'ekhad yihyeh lekhulam ubemishpatai yeileikhu vekhuqotai yishmeru ve'asu 'otam. ezekiel 37:25	veyashebu 'al ha'arez 'asher natati le'abdi leya'aqob 'asher yashebu bah 'aboteikhem veyashebu 'aleha hemah ubeneihem ubenei beneihem 'ad 'olam vedavid 'abdi nasi lahem le'olam. ezekiel 37:26	vekharati lahem berit shalom berit 'olam yihyeh 'otam unetatim vehirbeiti 'otam venatati 'et miqdashi betokham le'olam. ezekiel 37:27	vehayah mishkani 'aleihem vehayiti lahem leilohim vehemah yihyu li le'am. ezekiel 37:28	veyade'u hagoyim ki 'ani yhvh meqadesh 'et yisra'el bihyot miqdashi betokham le'olam. ezekiel 38:1	vayhi debar yhvh 'eilai leimor. ezekiel 38:2	ben 'adam sim panekha 'el gog 'erez hamagog nesi rosh meshekh vetubal vehinabei 'alav. ezekiel 38:3	ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'eilekha gog nesi rosh meshekh vetubal. ezekiel 38:4	veshobabtikha venatati khakhim bilkhayekha vehozeiti 'otkha ve'et kal kheilekha susim ufarashim lebushei mikhlol kulam qahal rab zinah umagen tofesei kharabot kulam. ezekiel 38:5	paras kush ufut 'itam kulam magen vekhoba'. ezekiel 38:6	gomer vekhal 'agapeha bet togarmah yarketei zafon ve'et kal 'agapav 'amim rabim 'itakh. ezekiel 38:7	hikon vehakhen lekha 'atah vekhal qehalekha haniqhalim 'alekha vehayita lahem lemishmar. ezekiel 38:8	miyamim rabim tipaqed be'akharit hashanim tabo 'el 'erez meshobebet meikhereb mequbezet mei'amim rabim 'al harei yisra'el 'asher hayu lekharebah tamid vehi mei'amim huza'ah veyashebu labetakh kulam. ezekiel 38:9	ve'alita kasho'ah tabo ke'anan lekhasot ha'arez tihyeh 'atah vekhal 'agapekha ve'amim rabim 'otakh. ezekiel 38:10	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh vehayah bayom hahu ya'alu debarim 'al lebabekha vekhashabta makhashebet ra'ah. ezekiel 38:11	ve'amarta 'e'eleh 'al 'erez perazot 'abo hashoqetim yoshebei labetakh kulam yoshebim be'en khomah uberiakh udelatayim 'en lahem. ezekiel 38:12	lishlol shalal velaboz baz lehashib yadekha 'al khorabot noshabot ve'el 'am me'usaf migoyim 'oseh miqneh veqinyan yoshebei 'al tabur ha'arez. ezekiel 38:13	sheba udedan vesokharei tarshish vekhal kefireha yomeru lekha halishlol shalal 'atah ba halaboz baz hiqhalta qehalekha laset kesef vezahab laqakhat miqneh veqinyan lishlol shalal gadol. ezekiel 38:14	lakhen hinabei ben 'adam ve'amarta legog koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh halo bayom hahu beshebet 'ami yisra'el labetakh teida'. ezekiel 38:15	ubata mimeqomkha miyarketei zafon 'atah ve'amim rabim 'itakh rokhebei susim kulam qahal gadol vekhayil rab. ezekiel 38:16	ve'alita 'al 'ami yisra'el ke'anan lekhasot ha'arez be'akharit hayamim tihyeh vahabi'otikha 'al 'arzi lema'an da'at hagoyim 'oti behiqadeshi bekha le'eineihem gog. ezekiel 38:17	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ha'atah hu 'asher dibarti beyamim qadmonim beyad 'abadai nebi'ei yisra'el hanibe'im bayamim hahem shanim lehabi 'otekha 'aleihem. ezekiel 38:18	vehayah bayom hahu beyom bo gog 'al 'admat yisra'el ne'um 'adonai yhvh ta'aleh khamati be'api. ezekiel 38:19	ubeqin'ati be'esh 'ebrati dibarti 'im lo bayom hahu yihyeh ra'ash gadol 'al 'admat yisra'el. ezekiel 38:20	vera'ashu mipanai degei hayam ve'of hashamayim vekhayat hasadeh vekhal haremes haromes 'al ha'adamah vekhol ha'adam 'asher 'al penei ha'adamah venehersu heharim venafelu hamadreigot vekhal khomah la'arez tipol. ezekiel 38:21	veqarati 'alav lekhal harai khereb ne'um 'adonai yhvh khereb 'ish be'akhiv tihyeh. ezekiel 38:22	venishpati 'ito bedeber ubedam vegeshem shotef ve'abnei 'elgabish 'esh vegaferit 'amtir 'alav ve'al 'agapav ve'al 'amim rabim 'asher 'ito. ezekiel 38:23	vehitgadilti vehitqadishti venoda'ti le'einei goyim rabim veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 39:1	ve'atah ben 'adam hinabei 'al gog ve'amarta koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh hini 'eilekha gog nesi rosh meshekh vetubal. ezekiel 39:2	veshobabtikha veshisheitikha veha'alitikha miyarketei zafon vahabi'otikha 'al harei yisra'el. ezekiel 39:3	vehikeiti qashtekha miyad semolekha vekhizekha miyad yeminekha 'apil. ezekiel 39:4	'al harei yisra'el tipol 'atah vekhal 'agapekha ve'amim 'asher 'itakh le'et zipor kal kanaf vekhayat hasadeh netatikha le'akhlah ezekiel 39:5	'al penei hasadeh tipol ki 'ani dibarti ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 39:6	veshilakhti 'esh bemagog ubeyoshebei ha'iyim labetakh veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh. ezekiel 39:7	ve'et shem qadshi 'odia' betokh 'ami yisra'el velo 'akhel 'et shem qadshi 'od veyade'u hagoyim ki 'ani yhvh qadosh beyisra'el. ezekiel 39:8	hineh ba'ah venihyatah ne'um 'adonai yhvh hu hayom 'asher dibarti. ezekiel 39:9	veyaze'u yoshebei 'arei yisra'el ubi'aru vehisiqu benesheq umagen vezinah beqeshet ubekhizim ubemaqel yad uberomakh ubi'aru bahem 'esh sheba' shanim. ezekiel 39:10	velo yis'u 'eizim min hasadeh velo yakhtebu min haye'arim ki banesheq yeba'aru 'esh veshalelu 'et sholeleihem ubazezu 'et bozezeihem ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 39:11	vehayah bayom hahu 'eten legog meqom sham qeber beyisra'el gei ha'oberim qidmat hayam vekhosemet hi 'et ha'oberim veqaberu sham 'et gog ve'et kal hamonoh veqare'u gei hamon gog. ezekiel 39:12	uqebarum bet yisra'el lema'an taher 'et ha'arez shib'ah khodashim. ezekiel 39:13	veqaberu kal 'am ha'arez vehayah lahem leshem yom hikabedi ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 39:14	ve'anshei tamid yabdilu 'oberim ba'arez meqaberim 'et ha'oberim 'et hanotarim 'al penei ha'arez letaharah miqzeh shib'ah khodashim yakhqoru. ezekiel 39:15	ve'aberu ha'oberim ba'arez vera'ah 'ezem 'adam ubanah 'ezlo ziyun 'ad qaberu 'oto hamqaberim 'el gei hamon gog. ezekiel 39:16	vegam shem 'ir hamonah vetiharu ha'arez. ezekiel 39:17	ve'atah ben 'adam koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'emor lezipor kal kanaf ulekhol khayat hasadeh hiqabezu vabo'u hei'asefu misabib 'al zibkhi 'asher 'ani zobeiakh lakhem zebakh gadol 'al harei yisra'el va'akhaltem basar ushetitem dam. ezekiel 39:18	besar giborim tokheilu vedam nesi'ei ha'arez tishtu 'eilim karim ve'atudim parim meri'ei bashan kulam. ezekiel 39:19	va'akhaltem kheileb lesabe'ah ushetitem dam leshikaron mizibkhi 'asher zabakhti lakhem. ezekiel 39:20	useba'tem 'al shulkhani sus varekheb gibor vekhal 'ish milkhamah ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 39:21	venatati 'et kebodi bagoyim vera'u khal hagoyim 'et mishpati 'asher 'asiti ve'et yadi 'asher samti bahem. ezekiel 39:22	veyade'u bet yisra'el ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheihem min hayom hahu vahale'ah. ezekiel 39:23	veyade'u hagoyim ki ba'avonam galu bet yisra'el 'al 'asher ma'alu bi va'astir panai meihem va'etenem beyad zareihem vayipelu bakhereb kulam. ezekiel 39:24	ketum'atam ukhefish'eihem 'asiti 'otam va'astir panai meihem. ezekiel 39:25	lakhen koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'atah 'ashib 'et shebit shebut ya'aqob verikhamti kal bet yisra'el veqineiti leshem qadshi ezekiel 39:26	venasu 'et kelimatam ve'et kal ma'alam 'asher ma'alu bi beshibtam 'al 'admatam labetakh ve'en makharid. ezekiel 39:27	beshobbi 'otam min ha'amim veqibazti 'otam mei'arzot 'oyebeihem veniqdashti bam le'einei hagoyim rabim. ezekiel 39:28	veyade'u ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheihem behagloti 'otam 'el hagoyim vekhinastim 'al 'admatam velo 'otir 'od meihem sham. ezekiel 39:29	velo 'astir 'od panai meihem 'asher shafakhti 'et rukhi 'al bet yisra'el ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 40:1	be'esrim vekhamesh shanah legaluteinu berosh hashanah be'asor lakhodesh be'arba' 'esreh shanah 'akhar 'asher huketah ha'ir be'ezem hayom hazeh hayetah 'alai yad yhvh vayabei 'oti shamah. ezekiel 40:2	bemar'ot 'elohim hebi'ani 'el 'erez yisra'el vaynikheini 'el har gaboah me'od ve'alav kemibneh 'ir minegeb. ezekiel 40:3	vayabei 'oti shamah vehineh 'ish mar'eihu kemar'eh nekhoshet ufetil pishtim beyado uqeneh hamidah vehu 'omed basha'ar. ezekiel 40:4	vaydaber 'eilai ha'ish ben 'adam re'eh be'einekha ube'azenekha shema' vesim libekha lekhol 'asher 'ani mar'eh 'otakh ki lema'an har'otkhah hubatah henah haged 'et kal 'asher 'atah ro'eh lebet yisra'el. ezekiel 40:5	vehineh khomah mikhuz labayit sabib sabib ubeyad ha'ish qeneh hamidah shesh 'amot ba'amah vatofakh vayamad 'et rokhab habinyan qaneh 'ekhad veqomah qaneh 'ekhad. ezekiel 40:6	vayabo 'el sha'ar 'asher panav derekh haqadimah vaya'al bema'aloto bema'alotav vayamad 'et saf hasha'ar qaneh 'ekhad rokhab ve'et saf 'ekhad qaneh 'ekhad rokhab. ezekiel 40:7	vehata qaneh 'ekhad 'orekh veqaneh 'ekhad rokhab uben hata'im khamesh 'amot vesaf hasha'ar mei'eizel 'ulam hasha'ar meihabayit qaneh 'ekhad. ezekiel 40:8	vayamad 'et 'ulam hasha'ar meihabayit qaneh 'ekhad. ezekiel 40:9	vayamad 'et 'ulam hasha'ar shemoneh 'amot ve'eilo ve'eilav shetayim 'amot ve'ulam hasha'ar meihabayit. ezekiel 40:10	veta'ei hasha'ar derekh haqadim sheloshah mipoh usheloshah mipoh midah 'akhat lishlashetam umidah 'akhat la'eilim mipoh umipo. ezekiel 40:11	vayamad 'et rokhab petakh hasha'ar 'eser 'amot 'orekh hasha'ar shelosh 'esreh 'amot. ezekiel 40:12	ugebul lifnei hata'ot 'amah 'ekhat ve'amah 'akhat gebul mipoh vehata shesh 'amot mipo veshesh 'amot mipo. ezekiel 40:13	vayamad 'et hasha'ar migag hata legago rokhab 'esrim vekhamesh 'amot petakh neged patakh. ezekiel 40:14	vaya'as 'et 'eilim shishim 'amah ve'el 'el hekhazer hasha'ar sabib sabib. ezekiel 40:15	ve'al penei hasha'ar hayoton ha'iton 'al lifnei 'ulam hasha'ar hapenimi khamishim 'amah. ezekiel 40:16	vekhalonot 'atumot 'el hata'im ve'el 'eileiheimah lifnimah lasha'ar sabib sabib vekhen la'eilamot vekhalonot sabib sabib lifnimah ve'el 'ayil timorim. ezekiel 40:17	vaybi'eini 'el hekhazer hakhizonah vehineh leshakhot verizfah 'asui lekhazer sabib sabib sheloshim leshakhot 'el harizfah. ezekiel 40:18	veharizfah 'el ketef hashe'arim le'umat 'orekh hashe'arim harizfah hatakhtonah. ezekiel 40:19	vayamad rokhab milifnei hasha'ar hatakhtonah lifnei hekhazer hapenimi mikhuz mei'ah 'amah haqadim vehazafon. ezekiel 40:20	vehasha'ar 'asher panav derekh hazafon lekhazer hakhizonah madad 'areko verakhebo. ezekiel 40:21	veta'o veta'av sheloshah mipo usheloshah mipo ve'eilo ve'eilav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav hayah kemidat hasha'ar harishon khamishim 'amah 'areko verokhab khamesh ve'esrim ba'amah. ezekiel 40:22	vekhalono vekhalonav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav vetimoro vetimorav kemidat hasha'ar 'asher panav derekh haqadim ubema'alot sheba' ya'alu bo ve'eilamo ve'eilamav lifneihem. ezekiel 40:23	vesha'ar lekhazer hapenimi neged hasha'ar lazafon velaqadim vayamad misha'ar 'el sha'ar mei'ah 'amah. ezekiel 40:24	vayolikheini derekh hadarom vehineh sha'ar derekh hadarom umadad 'eilo 'eilav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav kamidot ha'eleh. ezekiel 40:25	vekhalonim lo ule'eilamo ule'eilamav sabib sabib kehakhalonot ha'eleh khamishim 'amah 'orekh verokhab khamesh ve'esrim 'amah. ezekiel 40:26	uma'alot shib'ah 'oloto 'olotav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav lifneihem vetimorim lo 'ekhad mipo ve'ekhad mipo 'el 'eilo 'eilav. ezekiel 40:27	vesha'ar lekhazer hapenimi derekh hadarom vayamad misha'ar 'el hasha'ar derekh hadarom mei'ah 'amot. ezekiel 40:28	vaybi'eini 'el khazer hapenimi besha'ar hadarom vayamad 'et hasha'ar hadarom kamidot ha'eleh. ezekiel 40:29	veta'o veta'av ve'eilo ve'eilav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav kamidot ha'eleh vekhalonot lo ule'eilamo ule'eilamav sabib sabib khamishim 'amah 'orekh verokhab 'esrim vekhamesh 'amot. ezekiel 40:30	ve'eilamot sabib sabib 'orekh khamesh ve'esrim 'amah verokhab khamesh 'amot. ezekiel 40:31	ve'eilamav 'el khazer hakhizonah vetimorim 'el 'eilo 'eilav uma'alot shemoneh ma'alo ma'alav. ezekiel 40:32	vaybi'eini 'el hekhazer hapenimi derekh haqadim vayamad 'et hasha'ar kamidot ha'eleh. ezekiel 40:33	veta'o veta'av ve'eilo ve'eilav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav kamidot ha'eleh vekhalonot lo ule'eilamo ule'eilamav sabib sabib 'orekh khamishim 'amah verokhab khamesh ve'esrim 'amah. ezekiel 40:34	ve'eilamo ve'eilamav lekhazer hakhizonah vetimorim 'el 'eilo 'eilav mipo umipo ushemoneh ma'alot ma'alo ma'alav. ezekiel 40:35	vaybi'eini 'el sha'ar hazafon umadad kamidot ha'eleh. ezekiel 40:36	ta'o ta'av 'eilo 'eilav ve'eilamo ve'eilamav vekhalonot lo sabib sabib 'orekh khamishim 'amah verokhab khamesh ve'esrim 'amah. ezekiel 40:37	ve'eilo ve'eilav lekhazer hakhizonah vetimorim 'el 'eilo 'eilav mipo umipo ushemoneh ma'alot ma'alo ma'alav. ezekiel 40:38	velishkah ufitkhah be'eilim hashe'arim sham yadikhu 'et ha'olah. ezekiel 40:39	ube'ulam hasha'ar shenayim shulkhanot mipo ushenayim shulkhanot mipoh lishkhot 'aleihem ha'olah vehakhatat veha'asham. ezekiel 40:40	ve'el hakatef mikhuzah la'oleh lefetakh hasha'ar hazafonah shenayim shulkhanot ve'el hakatef ha'akheret 'asher le'ulam hasha'ar shenayim shulkhanot. ezekiel 40:41	'arba'ah shulkhanot mipoh ve'arba'ah shulkhanot mipoh lekhetef hasha'ar shemonah shulkhanot 'aleihem yishkhatu. ezekiel 40:42	ve'arba'ah shulkhanot la'olah 'abnei gazit 'orekh 'amah 'akhat vakheizi verokhab 'amah 'akhat vakheizi vegobah 'amah 'ekhat 'aleihem veyanikhu 'et hakeilim 'asher yishkhatu 'et ha'olah bam vehazabakh. ezekiel 40:43	vehashfatayim tofakh 'ekhad mukhanim babayit sabib sabib ve'el hashulkhanot besar haqareban. ezekiel 40:44	umikhuzah lasha'ar hapenimi lishkhot sharim bekhazer hapenimi 'asher 'el ketef sha'ar hazafon ufeneihem derekh hadarom 'ekhad 'el ketef sha'ar haqadim penei derekh hazafon. ezekiel 40:45	vaydaber 'eilai zoh halishkah 'asher paneha derekh hadarom lakohanim shomerei mishmeret habayit. ezekiel 40:46	vehalishkah 'asher paneha derekh hazafon lakohanim shomerei mishmeret hamizbeiakh hemah benei zadoq haqereibim mibenei leivi 'el yhvh leshareto. ezekiel 40:47	vayamad 'et hekhazer 'orekh mei'ah 'amah verokhab mei'ah 'amah meruba'at vehamizbeiakh lifnei habayit. ezekiel 40:48	vaybi'eini 'el 'ulam habayit vayamad 'el 'ulam khamesh 'amot mipoh vekhamesh 'amot mipoh verokhab hasha'ar shalosh 'amot mipo veshalosh 'amot mipo. ezekiel 40:49	'orekh ha'ulam 'esrim 'amah verokhab 'ashtei 'esreh 'amah ubama'alot 'asher ya'alu 'eilav ve'amudim 'el ha'eilim 'ekhad mipoh ve'ekhad mipoh. ezekiel 41:1	vaybi'eini 'el haheikhal vayamad 'et ha'eilim shesh 'amot rokhab mipo veshesh 'amot rokhab mipo rokhab ha'ohel. ezekiel 41:2	verokhab hapetakh 'eser 'amot vekhitfot hapetakh khamesh 'amot mipo vekhamesh 'amot mipo vayamad 'areko 'arba'im 'amah verokhab 'esrim 'amah. ezekiel 41:3	uba lifnimah vayamad 'el hapetakh shetayim 'amot vehapetakh shesh 'amot verokhab hapetakh sheba' 'amot. ezekiel 41:4	vayamad 'et 'areko 'esrim 'amah verokhab 'esrim 'amah 'el penei haheikhal vayomer 'eilai zeh qodesh haqodashim. ezekiel 41:5	vayamad qir habayit shesh 'amot verokhab hazeila' 'arba' 'amot sabib sabib labayit sabib. ezekiel 41:6	vehazela'ot zeila' 'el zeila' shalosh usheloshim pe'amim uba'ot baqir 'asher labayit lazela'ot sabib sabib lihyot 'akhuzim velo yihyu 'akhuzim beqir habayit. ezekiel 41:7	verakhabah venasebah lema'lah lema'lah lazela'ot ki musab habayit lema'lah lema'lah sabib sabib labayit 'al ken rokhab labayit lema'elah vekhen hatakhtonah ya'aleh 'al ha'elyonah latikhonah. ezekiel 41:8	vera'iti labayit gobah sabib sabib meyusedot musedot hazela'ot melo haqaneh shesh 'amot 'azilah. ezekiel 41:9	rokhab haqir 'asher lazeila' 'el hakhuz khamesh 'amot va'asher munakh bet zela'ot 'asher labayit. ezekiel 41:10	uben haleshakhot rokhab 'esrim 'amah sabib labayit sabib sabib. ezekiel 41:11	ufetakh hazeila' lamunakh petakh 'ekhad derekh hazafon ufetakh 'ekhad ladarom verokhab meqom hamunakh khamesh 'amot sabib sabib. ezekiel 41:12	vehabinyan 'asher 'el penei hagizrah pe'at derekh hayam rokhab shib'im 'amah veqir habinyan khamesh 'amot rokhab sabib sabib ve'areko tish'im 'amah. ezekiel 41:13	umadad 'et habayit 'orekh mei'ah 'amah vehagizrah vehabinyah veqiroteha 'orekh mei'ah 'amah. ezekiel 41:14	verokhab penei habayit vehagizrah laqadim mei'ah 'amah. ezekiel 41:15	umadad 'orekh habinyan 'el penei hagizrah 'asher 'al 'akhareha ve'atuqeiha ve'atiqeha mipo umipo mei'ah 'amah vehaheikhal hapenimi ve'ulamei hekhazer. ezekiel 41:16	hasipim vehakhalonim ha'atumot veha'atiqim sabib lishlashetam neged hasaf sekhif 'ez sabib sabib veha'arez 'ad hakhalonot vehakhalonot mekhusot. ezekiel 41:17	'al mei'al hapetakh ve'ad habayit hapenimi velakhuz ve'el kal haqir sabib sabib bapenimi ubakhizon midot. ezekiel 41:18	ve'asui kerubim vetimorim vetimorah ben kerub likhrub ushenayim panim lakerub. ezekiel 41:19	ufenei 'adam 'el hatimorah mipo ufenei khefir 'el hatimorah mipo 'asui 'el kal habayit sabib sabib. ezekiel 41:20	meiha'arez 'ad mei'al hapetakh hakerubim vehatimorim 'asuyim veqir haheikhal ezekiel 41:21	haheikhal mezuzat rebu'ah ufenei haqodesh hamar'eh kamar'eh. ezekiel 41:22	hamizbeiakh 'ez shalosh 'amot gaboah ve'areko shetayim 'amot umiqzo'otav lo ve'areko veqirotav 'ez vaydaber 'eilai zeh hashulkhan 'asher lifnei yhvh. ezekiel 41:23	ushetayim delatot laheikhal velaqodesh. ezekiel 41:24	ushetayim delatot ladelatot tayim musabot delatot tayim ledelet 'ekhat ushetei delatot la'akheret. ezekiel 41:25	va'asuyah 'aleihen 'el daltot haheikhal kerubim vetimorim ka'asher 'asuyim laqirot ve'ab 'ez 'el penei ha'ulam meihakhuz. ezekiel 41:26	vekhalonim 'atumot vetimorim mipo umipo 'el kitfot ha'ulam vezal'ot habayit veha'ubim. ezekiel 42:1	vayozi'eini 'el hekhazer hakhizonah haderekh derekh hazafon vaybi'eini 'el halishkah 'asher neged hagizrah va'asher neged habinyan 'el hazafon. ezekiel 42:2	'el penei 'orekh 'amot hamei'ah petakh hazafon veharokhab khamishim 'amot. ezekiel 42:3	neged ha'esrim 'asher lekhazer hapenimi veneged rizfah 'asher lekhazer hakhizonah 'atiq 'el penei 'atiq bashelishim. ezekiel 42:4	velifnei haleshakhot mahalakh 'eser 'amot rokhab 'el hapenimit derekh 'amah 'ekhat ufitkheihem lazafon. ezekiel 42:5	vehaleshakhot ha'elyonot qezurot ki yokhlu 'atiqim meiheinah meihatakhtonot umeihatikhonot binyan. ezekiel 42:6	ki meshulashot henah ve'en lahen 'amudim ke'amudei hakhazeirot 'al ken ne'ezal meihatakhtonot umeihatikhonot meiha'arez. ezekiel 42:7	vegader 'asher lakhuz le'umat haleshakhot derekh hekhazer hakhizonah 'el penei haleshakhot 'areko khamishim 'amah. ezekiel 42:8	ki 'orekh haleshakhot 'asher lekhazer hakhizonah khamishim 'amah vehineh 'al penei haheikhal mei'ah 'amah. ezekiel 42:9	umitakhatah leshakhot umitakhat haleshakhot ha'eleh hamabo hameibi meihaqadim bebo'o lahenah meihekhazer hakhizonah. ezekiel 42:10	berokhab geder hekhazer derekh haqadim 'el penei hagizrah ve'el penei habinyan leshakhot. ezekiel 42:11	vederekh lifneihem kemar'eh haleshakhot 'asher derekh hazafon ke'arekan ken rakheban vekhol moza'eihen ukhemishpeteihen ukhefitkheihen. ezekiel 42:12	ukhefitkhei haleshakhot 'asher derekh hadarom petakh berosh darekh derekh bifnei hagederet haginah derekh haqadim bebo'an. ezekiel 42:13	vayomer 'eilai lishkhot hazafon lishkhot hadarom 'asher 'el penei hagizrah henah lishkhot haqodesh 'asher yokhelu sham hakohanim 'asher qerobim yhvh qadeshei haqodashim sham yanikhu qadeshei haqodashim vehaminkhah vehakhatat veha'asham ki hamaqom qadosh. ezekiel 42:14	bebo'am hakohanim velo yeize'u meihaqodesh 'el hekhazer hakhizonah vesham yanikhu bigdeihem 'asher yesharetu bahen ki qodesh henah yilbeshu velabeshu begadim 'akheirim veqarebu 'el 'asher la'am. ezekiel 42:15	vekhilah 'et midot habayit hapenimi vehozi'ani derekh hasha'ar 'asher panav derekh haqadim umedado sabib sabib. ezekiel 42:16	madad ruakh haqadim biqneh hamidah khamesh 'eimot mei'ot qanim biqneh hamidah sabib. ezekiel 42:17	madad ruakh hazafon khamesh mei'ot qanim biqneh hamidah sabib. ezekiel 42:18	'et ruakh hadarom madad khamesh mei'ot qanim biqneh hamidah. ezekiel 42:19	sabab 'el ruakh hayam madad khamesh mei'ot qanim biqneh hamidah. ezekiel 42:20	le'arba' rukhot medado khomah lo sabib sabib 'orekh khamesh mei'ot verokhab khamesh mei'ot lehabdil ben haqodesh lekhol. ezekiel 43:1	vayolikheini 'el hasha'ar sha'ar 'asher poneh derekh haqadim. ezekiel 43:2	vehineh kebod 'elohei yisra'el ba miderekh haqadim veqolo keqol mayim rabim veha'arez hei'irah mikebodo. ezekiel 43:3	ukhemar'eh hamar'eh 'asher ra'iti kamar'eh 'asher ra'iti bebo'i leshakhet 'et ha'ir umar'ot kamar'eh 'asher ra'iti 'el nehar kebar va'epol 'el panai. ezekiel 43:4	ukhebod yhvh ba 'el habayit derekh sha'ar 'asher panav derekh haqadim. ezekiel 43:5	vatisa'eini ruakh vatebi'eini 'el hekhazer hapenimi vehineh malei khebod yhvh habayit. ezekiel 43:6	va'eshma' midaber 'eilai meihabayit ve'ish hayah 'omed 'ezli. ezekiel 43:7	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam 'et meqom kis'i ve'et meqom kapot raglai 'asher 'eshkan sham betokh benei yisra'el le'olam velo yetame'u 'od bet yisra'el shem qadshi hemah umalkheihem biznutam ubefigrei malkheihem bamotam. ezekiel 43:8	betitam sipam 'et sipi umezuzatam 'eizel mezuzati vehaqir beini ubeineihem vetime'u 'et shem qadshi beto'abotam 'asher 'asu va'akhal 'otam be'api. ezekiel 43:9	'atah yerakhaqu 'et zenutam ufigrei malkheihem mimeni veshakhanti betokham le'olam. ezekiel 43:10	'atah ben 'adam haged 'et bet yisra'el 'et habayit veyikalemu mei'avonoteihem umadedu 'et takhenit. ezekiel 43:11	ve'im nikhlemu mikol 'asher 'asu zurat habayit utekhunato umoza'av umoba'av vekhal zurotav ve'et kal khuqotav vekhal zurotai zurotav vekhal toroto torotav hoda' 'otam ukhetob le'eineihem veyishmeru 'et kal zurato ve'et kal khuqotav ve'asu 'otam. ezekiel 43:12	zot torat habayit 'al rosh hahar kal gebulo sabib sabib qodesh qadashim hineh zot torat habayit. ezekiel 43:13	ve'eleh midot hamizbeiakh ba'amot 'amah 'amah vatofakh vekheq ha'amah ve'amah rokhab ugebulah 'el sefatah sabib zeret ha'ekhad vezeh gab hamizbeiakh. ezekiel 43:14	umeikheq ha'arez 'ad ha'azarah hatakhtonah shetayim 'amot verokhab 'amah 'ekhat umeiho'azarah haqetanah 'ad ha'azarah hagedolah 'arba' 'amot verokhab ha'amah. ezekiel 43:15	vehahar'el 'arba' 'amot umeiha'ari'el ulema'lah haqeranot 'arba'. ezekiel 43:16	veha'ari'el veha'ari'el shetem 'esreh 'orekh bishtem 'esreh rokhab rabua' 'el 'arba'at reba'av. ezekiel 43:17	veha'azarah 'arba' 'esreh 'orekh be'arba' 'esreh rokhab 'el 'arba'at reba'eha vehagebul sabib 'otah khazi ha'amah vehakheq lah 'amah sabib uma'aloteihu penot qadim. ezekiel 43:18	vayomer 'eilai ben 'adam koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh 'eleh khuqot hamizbeiakh beyom hei'asoto leha'alot 'alav 'olah velizroq 'alav dam. ezekiel 43:19	venatatah 'el hakohanim halviyim 'asher hem mizera' zadoq haqerobim 'eilai ne'um 'adonai yhvh leshareteini par ben baqar lekhatat. ezekiel 43:20	velaqakhta midamo venatatah 'al 'arba' qarnotav ve'el 'arba' pinot ha'azarah ve'el hagebul sabib vekhiteita 'oto vekhipartahu. ezekiel 43:21	velaqakhta 'et hapar hakhatat userafo bemifqad habayit mikhuz lamiqdash. ezekiel 43:22	ubayom hasheini taqrib se'ir 'izim tamim lekhatat vekhite'u 'et hamizbeiakh ka'asher khite'u bapar. ezekiel 43:23	bekhalotkha meikhatei taqrib par ben baqar tamim ve'ayil min hazon tamim. ezekiel 43:24	vehiqrabtam lifnei yhvh vehishlikhu hakohanim 'aleihem melakh vehe'elu 'otam 'olah yhvh. ezekiel 43:25	shib'at yamim ta'aseh se'ir khatat layom ufar ben baqar ve'ayil min hazon temimim ya'asu. ezekiel 43:26	shib'at yamim yekhaperu 'et hamizbeiakh vetiharu 'oto umil'u yado yadav. ezekiel 43:27	vikhalu 'et hayamim vehayah bayom hashemini vahale'ah ya'asu hakohanim 'al hamizbeiakh 'et 'oloteikhem ve'et shalmeikhem veraziti 'etkhem ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 44:1	vayasheb 'oti derekh sha'ar hamiqdash hakhizon haponeh qadim vehu sagur. ezekiel 44:2	vayomer 'eilai yhvh hasha'ar hazeh sagur yihyeh lo yipateiakh ve'ish lo yabo bo ki yhvh 'elohei yisra'el ba bo vehayah sagur. ezekiel 44:3	'et hanasi nasi hu yeisheb bo le'ekhol lekhem lifnei yhvh miderekh 'ulam hasha'ar yabo umidarko yeizei. ezekiel 44:4	vaybi'eini derekh sha'ar hazafon 'el penei habayit va'eire vehineh malei khebod yhvh 'et bet yhvh va'epol 'el panai. ezekiel 44:5	vayomer 'eilai yhvh ben 'adam sim libekha ure'eh be'einekha ube'azenekha shema' 'et kal 'asher 'ani medaber 'otakh lekhal khuqot bet yhvh ulekhal toroto torotav vesamta libekha limbo habayit bekhol moza'ei hamiqdash. ezekiel 44:6	ve'amarta 'el meri 'el bet yisra'el koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh rab lakhem mikal to'aboteikhem bet yisra'el. ezekiel 44:7	bahabi'akhem benei neikhar 'arlei leb ve'arlei basar lihyot bemiqdashi lekhalelo 'et beiti behaqribekhem 'et lakhmi kheileb vadam vayafeiru 'et beriti 'el kal to'aboteikhem. ezekiel 44:8	velo shemartem mishmeret qadashai vatesimun leshomerei mishmarti bemiqdashi lakhem. ezekiel 44:9	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh kal ben neikhar 'erel leb ve'erel basar lo yabo 'el miqdashi lekhal ben neikhar 'asher betokh benei yisra'el. ezekiel 44:10	ki 'im halviyim 'asher rakhaqu mei'alai bit'ot yisra'el 'asher ta'u mei'alai 'akharei giluleihem venase'u 'avonam. ezekiel 44:11	vehayu bemiqdashi mesharetim pequdot 'el sha'arei habayit umesharetim 'et habayit hemah yishkhatu 'et ha'olah ve'et hazebakh la'am vehemah ya'amdu lifneihem lesharetam. ezekiel 44:12	ya'an 'asher yesharetu 'otam lifnei giluleihem vehayu lebet yisra'el lemikhshol 'avon 'al ken nasati yadi 'aleihem ne'um 'adonai yhvh venase'u 'avonam. ezekiel 44:13	velo yigeshu 'eilai lekhahen li velageshet 'al kal qadashai 'el qadeshei haqedashim venase'u kelimatam veto'abotam 'asher 'asu. ezekiel 44:14	venatati 'otam shomerei mishmeret habayit lekhol 'abodato ulekhol 'asher yei'aseh bo. ezekiel 44:15	vehakohanim halviyim benei zadoq 'asher shameru 'et mishmeret miqdashi bit'ot benei yisra'el mei'alai hemah yiqrebu 'eilai leshareteini ve'amedu lefanai lehaqrib li kheileb vadam ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 44:16	hemah yabo'u 'el miqdashi vehemah yiqrebu 'el shulkhani leshareteini veshameru 'et mishmarti. ezekiel 44:17	vehayah bebo'am 'el sha'arei hekhazer hapenimit bigdei fishtim yilbashu velo ya'aleh 'aleihem zemer besharetam besha'arei hekhazer hapenimit vabayetah. ezekiel 44:18	pa'arei fishtim yihyu 'al rosham umikhnesei fishtim yihyu 'al mateneihem lo yakhgeru bayaza'. ezekiel 44:19	ubezeitam 'el hekhazer hakhizonah 'el hekhazer hakhizonah 'el ha'am yifshetu 'et bigdeihem 'asher hemah mesharetim bam vehinikhu 'otam belishkhot haqodesh velabeshu begadim 'akheirim velo yeqadeshu 'et ha'am bebigdeihem. ezekiel 44:20	verosham lo yegaleikhu ufera' lo yeshaleikhu kasom yikhsemu 'et rasheihem. ezekiel 44:21	veyayin lo yishtu kal kohen bebo'am 'el hekhazer hapenimit. ezekiel 44:22	ve'almanah ugerushah lo yiqkhu lahem lenashim ki 'im betulot mizera' bet yisra'el veha'almanah 'asher tihyeh 'almanah mikohen yiqakhu. ezekiel 44:23	ve'et 'ami yoru ben qodesh lekhol uben tamei letahor yodi'um. ezekiel 44:24	ve'al rib hemah ya'amdu lishpot lemishpat bemishpatai ushafetuhu yishpetuhu ve'et torotai ve'et khuqotai bekhal mo'adai yishmoru ve'et shabetotai yeqadeishu. ezekiel 44:25	ve'el met 'adam lo yabo letame'ah ki 'im le'ab ule'em uleben ulebat le'akh ule'akhot 'asher lo hayetah le'ish yitama'u. ezekiel 44:26	ve'akharei tahorato shib'at yamim yisperu lo. ezekiel 44:27	ubeyom bo'o 'el haqodesh 'el hekhazer hapenimit lesharet baqodesh yaqrib khatato ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 44:28	vehayetah lahem lenakhalah 'ani nakhalatam va'akhuzah lo titenu lahem beyisra'el 'ani 'akhuzatam. ezekiel 44:29	haminkhah vehakhatat veha'asham hemah yokhelum vekhal kheirem beyisra'el lahem yihyeh. ezekiel 44:30	vereishit kal bikurei khol vekhal terumat kol mikol terumoteikhem lakohanim yihyeh vereishit 'arisoteikhem titenu lakohen lehaniakh berakhah 'el beitekha. ezekiel 44:31	kal nebeilah utereifah min ha'of umin habeheimah lo yokhelu hakohanim. ezekiel 45:1	ubehapilekhem 'et ha'arez benakhalah tarimu terumah yhvh qodesh min ha'arez 'orekh khamishah ve'esrim 'elef 'orekh verokhab 'asarah 'alef qodesh hu bekhal gebulah sabib. ezekiel 45:2	yihyeh mizeh 'el haqodesh khamesh mei'ot bakhamesh mei'ot meruba' sabib vakhamishim 'amah migrash lo sabib. ezekiel 45:3	umin hamidah hazot tamod 'orekh khamesh khamishah ve'esrim 'elef verokhab 'aseret 'alafim ubo yihyeh hamiqdash qodesh qadashim. ezekiel 45:4	qodesh min ha'arez hu lakohanim mesharetei hamiqdash yihyeh haqereibim lesharet 'et yhvh vehayah lahem maqom lebatim umiqdash lamiqdash. ezekiel 45:5	vakhamishah ve'esrim 'elef 'orekh va'aseret 'alafim rokhab yihyeh vehayah lalviyim mesharetei habayit lahem la'akhuzah 'esrim leshakhot. ezekiel 45:6	va'akhuzat ha'ir titenu khameishet 'alafim rokhab ve'orekh khamishah ve'esrim 'elef le'umat terumat haqodesh lekhal bet yisra'el yihyeh. ezekiel 45:7	velanasi mizeh umizeh litrumat haqodesh vela'akhuzat ha'ir 'el penei terumat haqodesh ve'el penei 'akhuzat ha'ir mipe'at yam yamah umipe'at qeidemah qadimah ve'orekh le'umot 'akhad hakhalaqim migebul yam 'el gebul qadimah. ezekiel 45:8	la'arez yihyeh lo la'akhuzah beyisra'el velo yonu 'od nesi'ai 'et 'ami veha'arez yitenu lebet yisra'el leshibteihem. ezekiel 45:9	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh rab lakhem nesi'ei yisra'el khamas vashod hasiru umishpat uzedaqah 'asu harimu gerushoteikhem mei'al 'ami ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 45:10	mozenei zedeq ve'eifat zedeq ubat zedeq yehi lakhem. ezekiel 45:11	ha'eifah vehabat tokhen 'ekhad yihyeh laset ma'sar hakhomer habat va'asirit hakhomer ha'eifah 'el hakhomer yihyeh matkunto. ezekiel 45:12	vehasheqel 'esrim geirah 'esrim sheqalim khamishah ve'esrim sheqalim 'asarah vakhamishah sheqel hamaneh yihyeh lakhem. ezekiel 45:13	zot haterumah 'asher tarimu shishit ha'eifah meikhomer hakhitim veshishitem ha'eifah meikhomer hase'orim. ezekiel 45:14	vekhoq hashemen habat hashemen ma'sar habat min hakor 'aseret habatim khomer ki 'aseret habatim khomer. ezekiel 45:15	veseh 'akhat min hazon min hamatayim mimashqeh yisra'el leminkhah ule'olah velishlamim lekhaper 'aleihem ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 45:16	kol ha'am ha'arez yihyu 'el haterumah hazot lanasi beyisra'el. ezekiel 45:17	ve'al hanasi yihyeh ha'olot vehaminkhah vehaneisekh bakhagim ubekhodashim ubashabatot bekhal mo'adei bet yisra'el hu ya'aseh 'et hakhatat ve'et haminkhah ve'et ha'olah ve'et hashelamim lekhaper be'ad bet yisra'el. ezekiel 45:18	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh barishon be'ekhad lakhodesh tiqakh par ben baqar tamim vekhiteita 'et hamiqdash. ezekiel 45:19	velaqakh hakohen midam hakhatat venatan 'el mezuzat habayit ve'el 'arba' pinot ha'azarah lamizbeiakh ve'al mezuzat sha'ar hekhazer hapenimit. ezekiel 45:20	vekhen ta'aseh beshib'ah bakhodesh mei'ish shogeh umipeti vekhipartem 'et habayit. ezekiel 45:21	barishon be'arba'ah 'asar yom lakhodesh yihyeh lakhem hapasakh khag shebu'ot yamim mazot yei'akhel. ezekiel 45:22	ve'asah hanasi bayom hahu ba'ado ube'ad kal 'am ha'arez par khatat. ezekiel 45:23	veshib'at yemei hekhag ya'aseh 'olah yhvh shib'at parim veshib'at 'eilim temimim layom shib'at hayamim vekhatat se'ir 'izim layom. ezekiel 45:24	uminkhah 'eifah lapar ve'eifah la'ayil ya'aseh veshemen hin la'eifah. ezekiel 45:25	bashebi'i bakhamishah 'asar yom lakhodesh bekhag ya'aseh kha'eleh shib'at hayamim kakhatat ka'olah vekhaminkhah vekhashamen. ezekiel 46:1	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh sha'ar hekhazer hapenimit haponeh qadim yihyeh sagur sheishet yemei hama'aseh ubeyom hashabat yipateiakh ubeyom hakhodesh yipateiakh. ezekiel 46:2	uba hanasi derekh 'ulam hasha'ar mikhuz ve'amad 'al mezuzat hasha'ar ve'asu hakohanim 'et 'olato ve'et shelamav vehishtakhavah 'al miftan hasha'ar veyaza vehasha'ar lo yisager 'ad ha'areb. ezekiel 46:3	vehishtakhavu 'am ha'arez petakh hasha'ar hahu bashabatot ubekhodashim lifnei yhvh. ezekiel 46:4	veha'olah 'asher yaqrib hanasi yhvh beyom hashabat shishah khebasim temimim ve'ayil tamim. ezekiel 46:5	uminkhah 'eifah la'ayil velakebasim minkhah matat yado veshemen hin la'eifah. ezekiel 46:6	ubeyom hakhodesh par ben baqar temimim vesheishet kebasim va'ayil temimim yihyu. ezekiel 46:7	ve'eifah lapar ve'eifah la'ayil ya'aseh minkhah velakebasim ka'asher tasig yado veshemen hin la'eifah. ezekiel 46:8	ubebo hanasi derekh 'ulam hasha'ar yabo ubedarko yeizei. ezekiel 46:9	ubebo 'am ha'arez lifnei yhvh bamo'adim haba derekh sha'ar zafon lehishtakhavot yeizei derekh sha'ar negeb vehaba derekh sha'ar negeb yeizei derekh sha'ar zafonah lo yashub derekh hasha'ar 'asher ba bo ki nikhkho yeize'u yeizei. ezekiel 46:10	vehanasi betokham bebo'am yabo ubezeitam yeizei'u. ezekiel 46:11	ubakhagim ubamo'adim tihyeh haminkhah 'eifah lapar ve'eifah la'ayil velakebasim matat yado veshemen hin la'eifah. ezekiel 46:12	vekhi ya'aseh hanasi nedabah 'olah 'o shelamim nedabah yhvh ufatakh lo 'et hasha'ar haponeh qadim ve'asah 'et 'olato ve'et shelamav ka'asher ya'aseh beyom hashabat veyaza vesagar 'et hasha'ar 'akharei zeito. ezekiel 46:13	vekhebes ben shenato tamim ta'aseh 'olah layom yhvh baboqer baboqer ta'aseh 'oto. ezekiel 46:14	uminkhah ta'aseh 'alav baboqer baboqer shishit ha'eifah veshemen shelishit hahin laros 'et hasolet minkhah yhvh khuqot 'olam tamid. ezekiel 46:15	va'asu ya'asu 'et hakebes ve'et haminkhah ve'et hashemen baboqer baboqer 'olat tamid. ezekiel 46:16	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh ki yiten hanasi matanah le'ish mibanav nakhalato hi lebanav tihyeh 'akhuzatam hi benakhalah. ezekiel 46:17	vekhi yiten matanah minakhalato le'akhad mei'abadav vehayetah lo 'ad shenat haderor veshabat lanasi 'akh nakhalato banav lahem tihyeh. ezekiel 46:18	velo yiqakh hanasi minakhalat ha'am lehonotam mei'akhuzatam mei'akhuzato yankhil 'et banav lema'an 'asher lo yafuzu 'ami 'ish mei'akhuzato. ezekiel 46:19	vaybi'eini bamabo 'asher 'al ketef hasha'ar 'el halishkhot haqodesh 'el hakohanim haponot zafonah vehineh sham maqom bayarkhotim bayarkhatayim yamah. ezekiel 46:20	vayomer 'eilai zeh hamaqom 'asher yebashelu sham hakohanim 'et ha'asham ve'et hakhatat 'asher yofu 'et haminkhah lebilti hozi 'el hekhazer hakhizonah leqadesh 'et ha'am. ezekiel 46:21	vayozi'eini 'el hekhazer hakhizonah vaya'abireini 'el 'arba'at miqzo'ei hekhazer vehineh khazer bemiqzoa' hekhazer khazer bemiqzoa' hekhazer. ezekiel 46:22	be'arba'at miqzo'ot hekhazer khazeirot qeturot 'arba'im 'orekh usheloshim rokhab midah 'akhat le'arba'tam mehuqza'ot ezekiel 46:23	vetur sabib bahem sabib le'arba'tam umebashelot 'asui mitakhat hatirot sabib. ezekiel 46:24	vayomer 'eilai 'eleh bet hambashelim 'asher yebashelu sham mesharetei habayit 'et zebakh ha'am. ezekiel 47:1	vayshibeini 'el petakh habayit vehineh mayim yoze'im mitakhat miftan habayit qadimah ki fenei habayit qadim vehamayim yoredim mitakhat miketef habayit haymanit minegeb lamizbeiakh. ezekiel 47:2	vayozi'eini derekh sha'ar zafonah vaysibeini derekh khuz 'el sha'ar hakhuz derekh haponeh qadim vehineh mayim mefakim min hakatef haymanit. ezekiel 47:3	bezet ha'ish qadim veqav beyado vayamad 'elef ba'amah vaya'abireini bamayim mei 'afesayim. ezekiel 47:4	vayamad 'elef vaya'abireini bamayim mayim birkayim vayamad 'elef vaya'abireini mei matenayim. ezekiel 47:5	vayamad 'elef nakhal 'asher lo 'ukhal la'abor ki ga'u hamayim mei sakhu nakhal 'asher lo yei'aber. ezekiel 47:6	vayomer 'eilai hara'ita ben 'adam vayolikheini vayshibeini sefat hanakhal. ezekiel 47:7	beshubeini vehineh 'el sefat hanakhal 'ez rab me'od mizeh umizeh. ezekiel 47:8	vayomer 'eilai hamayim ha'eleh yoz'im 'el hagelilah haqadmonah veyaredu 'al ha'arabah uba'u hayamah 'el hayamah hamuza'im venirpe'u venirpu hamayim. ezekiel 47:9	vehayah khal nefesh khayah 'asher yishroz 'el kal 'asher yabo sham nakhalayim yikhyeh vehayah hadagah rabah me'od ki ba'u shamah hamayim ha'eleh veyeirafe'u vakhai kol 'asher yabo shamah hanakhal. ezekiel 47:10	vehayah ya'amdu 'amedu 'alav davagim mei'en gedi ve'ad 'en 'eglayim mishtoakh lakharamim yihyu leminah tihyeh degatam kidgat hayam hagadol rabah me'od. ezekiel 47:11	bizoto bizotav ugeba'av velo yeirafe'u lemelakh nitanu. ezekiel 47:12	ve'al hanakhal ya'aleh 'al sefato mizeh umizeh kal 'ez ma'akhal lo yibol 'aleihu velo yitom piryo lakhodashav yebaker ki meimav min hamiqdash hemah yoz'im vehayu vehayah firyo lema'akhal ve'aleihu litrufah. ezekiel 47:13	koh 'amar 'adonai yhvh geh gebul 'asher titnakhalu 'et ha'arez lishnei 'asar shibtei yisra'el yosef khabalim. ezekiel 47:14	unekhaltem 'otah 'ish ke'akhiv 'asher nasati 'et yadi letitah la'aboteikhem venafelah ha'arez hazot lakhem benakhalah. ezekiel 47:15	vezeh gebul ha'arez lif'at zafonah min hayam hagadol haderekh khetlon lebo zedadah. ezekiel 47:16	khamat beirotah sibrayim 'asher ben gebul dameseq uben gebul khamat khazer hatikhon 'asher 'el gebul khavran. ezekiel 47:17	vehayah gebul min hayam khazar 'einon gebul dameseq vezafon zafonah ugebul khamat ve'et pe'at zafon. ezekiel 47:18	ufe'at qadim miben khavran umiben dameseq umiben hagil'ad umiben 'erez yisra'el hayarden migebul 'al hayam haqadmoni tamodu ve'et pe'at qadimah. ezekiel 47:19	ufe'at negeb teimanah mitamar 'ad mei meribot qadesh nakhalah 'el hayam hagadol ve'et pe'at teimanah negbah. ezekiel 47:20	ufe'at yam hayam hagadol migebul 'ad nokhakh lebo khamat zot pe'at yam. ezekiel 47:21	vekhilaqtem 'et ha'arez hazot lakhem leshibtei yisra'el. ezekiel 47:22	vehayah tapilu 'otah benakhalah lakhem ulehageirim hagarim betokhkhem 'asher holidu banim betokhkhem vehayu lakhem ke'ezrakh bibnei yisra'el 'itekhem yipelu benakhalah betokh shibtei yisra'el. ezekiel 47:23	vehayah basheibet 'asher gar hager 'ito m titenu nakhalato ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 48:1	ve'eleh shemot hashebatim miqzeh zafonah 'el yad derekh khetlon lebo khamat khazar 'einan gebul dameseq zafonah 'el yad khamat vehayu lo fe'at qadim hayam dan 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:2	ve'al gebul dan mipe'at qadim 'ad pe'at yamah 'asher 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:3	ve'al gebul 'asher mipe'at qadimah ve'ad pe'at yamah naftali 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:4	ve'al gebul naftali mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah menasheh 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:5	ve'al gebul menasheh mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah 'efrayim 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:6	ve'al gebul 'efrayim mipe'at qadim ve'ad pe'at yamah re'uben 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:7	ve'al gebul re'uben mipe'at qadim 'ad pe'at yamah yehudah 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:8	ve'al gebul yehudah mipe'at qadim 'ad pe'at yamah tihyeh haterumah 'asher tarimu khamishah ve'esrim 'elef rokhab ve'orekh ke'akhad hakhalaqim mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah vehayah hamiqdash betokho. ezekiel 48:9	haterumah 'asher tarimu yhvh 'orekh khamishah ve'esrim 'elef verokhab 'aseret 'alafim. ezekiel 48:10	ule'eleh tihyeh terumat haqodesh lakohanim zafonah khamishah ve'esrim 'elef veyamah rokhab 'aseret 'alafim veqadimah rokhab 'aseret 'alafim venegbah 'orekh khamishah ve'esrim 'alef vehayah miqdash yhvh betokho. ezekiel 48:11	lakohanim hamqudash mibenei zadoq 'asher shameru mishmarti 'asher lo ta'u bit'ot benei yisra'el ka'asher ta'u halviyim. ezekiel 48:12	vehayetah lahem terumiyah miterumat ha'arez qodesh qadashim 'el gebul halviyim. ezekiel 48:13	vehalviyim le'umat gebul hakohanim khamishah ve'esrim 'elef 'orekh verokhab 'aseret 'alafim kal 'orekh khamishah ve'esrim 'elef verokhab 'aseret 'alafim. ezekiel 48:14	velo yimkeru mimenu velo yamer velo ya'abur ya'abir reishit ha'arez ki qodesh yhvh. ezekiel 48:15	vakhameishet 'alafim hanotar barokhab 'al penei khamishah ve'esrim 'elef khol hu la'ir lemoshab ulemigrash vehayetah ha'ir betokhoh betokho. ezekiel 48:16	ve'eleh midoteha pe'at zafon khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim ufe'at negeb khamesh khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim umipe'at qadim khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim ufe'at yamah khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim. ezekiel 48:17	vehayah migrash la'ir zafonah khamishim umatayim venegbah khamishim umatayim veqadimah khamishim umatayim veyamah khamishim umatayim. ezekiel 48:18	vehanotar ba'orekh le'umat terumat haqodesh 'aseret 'alafim qadimah va'aseret 'alafim yamah vehayah le'umat terumat haqodesh vehayetah tebu'atoh tebu'ato lelekhem le'obedei ha'ir. ezekiel 48:19	veha'obed ha'ir ya'abduhu mikol shibtei yisra'el. ezekiel 48:20	kal haterumah khamishah ve'esrim 'elef bakhamishah ve'esrim 'alef rebi'it tarimu 'et terumat haqodesh 'el 'akhuzat ha'ir. ezekiel 48:21	vehanotar lanasi mizeh umizeh litrumat haqodesh vela'akhuzat ha'ir 'el penei khamishah ve'esrim 'elef terumah 'ad gebul qadimah veyamah 'al penei khamishah ve'esrim 'elef 'al gebul yamah le'umat khalaqim lanasi vehayetah terumat haqodesh umiqdash habayit betokhoh betokho. ezekiel 48:22	umei'akhuzat halviyim umei'akhuzat ha'ir betokh 'asher lanasi yihyeh ben gebul yehudah uben gebul binyamin lanasi yihyeh. ezekiel 48:23	veyeter hashebatim mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah binyamin 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:24	ve'al gebul binyamin mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah shim'on 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:25	ve'al gebul shim'on mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah yisashkhar 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:26	ve'al gebul yisashkhar mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah zebulun 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:27	ve'al gebul zebulun mipe'at qadimah 'ad pe'at yamah gad 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:28	ve'al gebul gad 'el pe'at negeb teimanah vehayah gebul mitamar mei meribat qadesh nakhalah 'al hayam hagadol. ezekiel 48:29	zot ha'arez 'asher tapilu minakhalah leshibtei yisra'el ve'eleh makhleqotam ne'um 'adonai yhvh. ezekiel 48:30	ve'eleh toz'ot ha'ir mipe'at zafon khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim midah. ezekiel 48:31	vesha'arei ha'ir 'al shemot shibtei yisra'el she'arim sheloshah zafonah sha'ar re'uben 'ekhad sha'ar yehudah 'ekhad sha'ar leivi 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:32	ve'el pe'at qadimah khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim ushe'arim sheloshah vesha'ar yosef 'ekhad sha'ar binyamin 'ekhad sha'ar dan 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:33	ufe'at negbah khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim midah ushe'arim sheloshah sha'ar shim'on 'ekhad sha'ar yisashkhar 'ekhad sha'ar zebulun 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:34	pe'at yamah khamesh mei'ot ve'arba'at 'alafim sha'areihem sheloshah sha'ar gad 'ekhad sha'ar 'asher 'ekhad sha'ar naftali 'ekhad. ezekiel 48:35	sabib shemonah 'asar 'alef veshem ha'ir miyom yhvh shamah. 

hosea 1:1	debar yhvh 'asher hayah 'el hosheia' ben be'eiri bimei 'uziyah yotam 'akhaz yekhizqiyah malkhei yehudah ubimei yarabe'am ben yo'ash melekh yisra'el. hosea 1:2	tekhilat diber yhvh behosheia' vayomer yhvh 'el hosheia' lekh qakh lekha 'eishet zenunim veyaldei zenunim ki zanoh tizneh ha'arez mei'akharei yhvh. hosea 1:3	vayeilekh vayiqakh 'et gomer bat diblayim vatahar vateiled lo ben. hosea 1:4	vayomer yhvh 'eilav qera shemo yizre'el ki 'od me'at ufaqadti 'et demei yizre'el 'al bet yeihu vehishbati mamlekhut bet yisra'el. hosea 1:5	vehayah bayom hahu veshabarti 'et qeshet yisra'el be'eimeq yizre'el. hosea 1:6	vatahar 'od vateiled bat vayomer lo qera shemah lo rukhamah ki lo 'osif 'od 'arakhem 'et bet yisra'el ki naso 'esa lahem. hosea 1:7	ve'et bet yehudah 'arakhem vehosha'tim yhvh 'eloheihem velo 'oshi'em beqeshet ubekhereb ubemilkhamah besusim ubefarashim. hosea 1:8	vatigmol 'et lo rukhamah vatahar vateiled ben. hosea 1:9	vayomer qera shemo lo 'ami ki 'atem lo 'ami ve'anokhi lo 'ehyeh s hosea 1:10	vehayah mispar benei yisra'el kekhol hayam 'asher lo yimad velo yisafer vehayah bimqom 'asher yei'amer lahem lo 'ami 'atem yei'amer lahem benei 'el khai. hosea 1:11	veniqbezu benei yehudah ubenei yisra'el yakhdav vesamu lahem rosh 'ekhad ve'alu min ha'arez ki gadol yom yizre'el. hosea 2:1	'imru la'akheikhem 'ami vela'akhoteikhem rukhamah. hosea 2:2	ribu be'imekhem ribu ki hi lo 'ishti ve'anokhi lo 'ishah vetaser zenuneha mipaneh vena'afufeha miben shadeha. hosea 2:3	pen 'afshitenah 'arumah vehizagtiha keyom hivaledah vesamtiha khamidbar veshatiha ke'erez ziyah vahamitiha bazama. hosea 2:4	ve'et baneha lo 'arakhem ki benei zenunim hemah. hosea 2:5	ki zanetah 'imam hobishah horatam ki 'amerah 'eilekhah 'akharei me'ahabai notenei lakhmi umeimai zamri ufishti shamni veshiquyai. hosea 2:6	lakhen hini sakh 'et darkekh basirim vegadarti 'et gedeirah unetiboteha lo timza. hosea 2:7	veridefah 'et me'ahabeha velo tasig 'otam ubiqshatam velo timza ve'amerah 'eilekhah ve'ashubah 'el 'ishi harishon ki tob li 'az mei'atah. hosea 2:8	vehi lo yade'ah ki 'anokhi natati lah hadagan vehatirosh vehayizhar vekhesef hirbeiti lah vezahab 'asu laba'al. hosea 2:9	lakhen 'ashub velaqakhti degani be'ito vetiroshi bemo'ado vehizalti zamri ufishti lekhasot 'et 'ervatah. hosea 2:10	ve'atah 'agaleh 'et nablutah le'einei me'ahabeha ve'ish lo yazilenah miyadi. hosea 2:11	vehishbati kal mesosah khagah khadeshah veshabatah vekhol mo'adah. hosea 2:12	vahashimoti gafnah ute'einatah 'asher 'amerah 'etnah hemah li 'asher natenu li me'ahabai vesamtim leya'ar va'akhalatam khayat hasadeh. hosea 2:13	ufaqadti 'aleha 'et yemei habe'alim 'asher taqtir lahem vata'ad nizmah vekhelyatah vateilekh 'akharei me'ahabeha ve'oti shakhekhah ne'um yhvh. hosea 2:14	lakhen hineh 'anokhi mefateha veholakhtiha hamidbar vedibarti 'al libah. hosea 2:15	venatati lah 'et kerameha misham ve'et 'eimeq 'akhor lefetakh tiqvah ve'anetah shamah kimei ne'ureha vikhyom 'alotah mei'erez mizrayim. hosea 2:16	vehayah bayom hahu ne'um yhvh tiqre'i 'ishi velo tiqre'i li 'od ba'li. hosea 2:17	vahasiroti 'et shemot habe'alim mipiha velo yizakheru 'od bishmam. hosea 2:18	vekharati lahem berit bayom hahu 'im khayat hasadeh ve'im 'of hashamayim veremes ha'adamah veqeshet vekhereb umilkhamah 'eshbor min ha'arez vehishkabtim labetakh. hosea 2:19	ve'eirastikh li le'olam ve'eirastikh li bezedeq ubemishpat ubekhesed uberakhamim. hosea 2:20	ve'eirastikh li be'emunah veyada'at 'et yhvh. hosea 2:21	vehayah bayom hahu 'e'eneh ne'um yhvh 'e'eneh 'et hashamayim vehem ya'anu 'et ha'arez. hosea 2:22	veha'arez ta'aneh 'et hadagan ve'et hatirosh ve'et hayizhar vehem ya'anu 'et yizre'el. hosea 2:23	uzera'tiha li ba'arez verikhamti 'et lo rukhamah ve'amarti lelo 'ami 'ami 'atah vehu yomar 'elohai. hosea 3:1	vayomer yhvh 'eilai 'od lekh 'ehab 'ishah 'ahubat reia' umena'afet ke'ahabat yhvh 'et benei yisra'el vehem ponim 'el 'elohim 'akheirim ve'ohabei 'ashishei 'anabim. hosea 3:2	va'ekereha li bakhamishah 'asar kasef vekhomer se'orim veleitekh se'orim. hosea 3:3	va'omar 'eileha yamim rabim teishebi li lo tizni velo tihyi le'ish vegam 'ani 'eilayikh. hosea 3:4	ki yamim rabim yeishebu benei yisra'el 'en melekh ve'en sar ve'en zebakh ve'en mazeibah ve'en 'eifod uterafim. hosea 3:5	'akhar yashubu benei yisra'el ubiqshu 'et yhvh 'eloheihem ve'et david malkam ufakhadu 'el yhvh ve'el tubo be'akharit hayamim. hosea 4:1	shim'u debar yhvh benei yisra'el ki rib yhvh 'im yoshebei ha'arez ki 'en 'emet ve'en khesed ve'en da'at 'elohim ba'arez. hosea 4:2	'aloh vekhakhesh verazoakh veganob vena'of parazu vedamim bedamim naga'u. hosea 4:3	'al ken te'ebal ha'arez ve'umlal kal yosheb bah bekhayat hasadeh ube'of hashamayim vegam degei hayam yei'aseifu. hosea 4:4	'akh 'ish 'al yareb ve'al yokhakh 'ish ve'amekha kimribei khohen. hosea 4:5	vekhashalta hayom vekhashal gam nabi 'imekha layelah vedamiti 'imekha. hosea 4:6	nidmu 'ami mibeli hada'at ki 'atah hada'at ma'asta ve'em'asekha mikahen li vatishkakh torat 'elohekha 'eshkakh banekha gam 'ani. hosea 4:7	kerubam ken khate'u li kebodam beqalon 'amir. hosea 4:8	khatat 'ami yokheilu ve'el 'avonam yis'u nafsho. hosea 4:9	vehayah kha'am kakohen ufaqadti 'alav derakhav uma'alalav 'ashib lo. hosea 4:10	ve'akhelu velo yisba'u hiznu velo yifrozu ki 'et yhvh 'azebu lishmor. hosea 4:11	zenut veyayin vetirosh yiqakh leb. hosea 4:12	'ami be'eizo yish'al umaqlo yagid lo ki ruakh zenunim hit'ah vayiznu mitakhat 'eloheihem. hosea 4:13	'al rashei heharim yezabeikhu ve'al hageba'ot yeqateiru takhat 'alon velibneh ve'eilah ki tob zilah 'al ken tiznenah benoteikhem vekhaloteikhem tena'afnah. hosea 4:14	lo 'efqod 'al benoteikhem ki tiznenah ve'al kaloteikhem ki tena'afnah ki hem 'im hazonot yefareidu ve'im haqedeishot yezabeikhu ve'am lo yabin yilabet. hosea 4:15	'im zoneh 'atah yisra'el 'al ye'sham yehudah ve'al tabo'u hagilgal ve'al ta'alu bet 'aven ve'al tishabe'u khai yhvh. hosea 4:16	ki kefarah soreirah sarar yisra'el 'atah yir'em yhvh kekhebes bamerkhab. hosea 4:17	khabur 'azabim 'efrayim hanakh lo. hosea 4:18	sar sabe'am hazneh hiznu 'ahabu heibu qalon magineha. hosea 4:19	zarar ruakh 'otah bikhnafeha veyeiboshu mizibkhotam. hosea 5:1	shim'u zot hakohanim vehaqshibu bet yisra'el ubet hamelekh ha'azinu ki lakhem hamishpat ki fakh heyitem lemizpah vereshet perusah 'al tabor. hosea 5:2	veshakhatah seitim he'miqu va'ani musar lekhulam. hosea 5:3	'ani yada'ti 'efrayim veyisra'el lo nikhkhad mimeni ki 'atah hizneita 'efrayim nitma yisra'el. hosea 5:4	lo yitenu ma'aleihem lashub 'el 'eloheihem ki ruakh zenunim beqirbam ve'et yhvh lo yada'u. hosea 5:5	ve'anah ge'on yisra'el befanav veyisra'el ve'efrayim yikashelu ba'avonam kashal gam yehudah 'imam. hosea 5:6	bezonam ubibqaram yeilekhu lebaqesh 'et yhvh velo yimza'u khalaz meihem. hosea 5:7	yhvh bagadu ki banim zarim yaladu 'atah yokhelem khodesh 'et khelqeihem. hosea 5:8	tiq'u shofar bagib'ah khazozerah baramah hari'u bet 'aven 'akharekha binyamin. hosea 5:9	'efrayim leshamah tihyeh beyom tokheikhah beshibtei yisra'el hoda'ti ne'emanah. hosea 5:10	hayu sarei yehudah kemasigei gebul 'aleihem 'eshpokh kamayim 'ebrati. hosea 5:11	'ashuq 'efrayim rezuz mishpat ki ho'il halakh 'akharei zav. hosea 5:12	va'ani kha'ash le'efrayim vekharaqab lebet yehudah. hosea 5:13	vayar 'efrayim 'et khaleyo vihudah 'et mezoro vayeilekh 'efrayim 'el 'ashur vayishlakh 'el melekh yareb vehu lo yukhal lirpo lakhem velo yigheh mikem mazor. hosea 5:14	ki 'anokhi khashakhal le'efrayim vekhakefir lebet yehudah 'ani 'ani 'etrof ve'eilekh 'esa ve'en mazil. hosea 5:15	'eilekh 'ashubah 'el meqomi 'ad 'asher ye'shemu ubiqshu fanai bazar lahem yeshakharuni. hosea 6:1	lekhu venashubah 'el yhvh ki hu taraf veyirpa'einu yakh veyakhbesheinu. hosea 6:2	yekhayeinu miyomayim bayom hashelishi yeqimeinu venikhyeh lefanav. hosea 6:3	veneide'ah nirdefah lada'at 'et yhvh keshakhar nakhon moza'o veyabo khageshem lanu kemalqosh yoreh 'arez. hosea 6:4	mah 'e'eseh lekha 'efrayim mah 'e'eseh lekha yehudah vekhasdekhem ka'anan boqer vekhatal mashkim holekh. hosea 6:5	'al ken khazabti banebi'im haragtim be'imrei fi umishpatekha 'or yeizei. hosea 6:6	ki khesed khafazti velo zabakh veda'at 'elohim mei'olot. hosea 6:7	vehemah ke'adam 'aberu berit sham bagedu bi. hosea 6:8	gil'ad qiryat po'alei 'aven 'aqubah midam. hosea 6:9	ukhekhakei 'ish gedudim kheber kohanim derekh yerazekhu shekhmah ki zimah 'asu. hosea 6:10	bebet yisra'el ra'iti sha'aririyah sha'aruriyah m zenut le'efrayim nitma yisra'el. hosea 6:11	gam yehudah shat qazir lakh beshubi shebut 'ami. hosea 7:1	kerafe'i leyisra'el veniglah 'avon 'efrayim vera'ot shomeron ki fa'alu shaqer veganab yabo pashat gedud bakhuz. hosea 7:2	ubal yomeru lilbabam kal ra'atam zakhareti 'atah sebabum ma'aleihem neged panai hayu. hosea 7:3	bera'atam yesamekhu melekh ubekhakhasheihem sarim. hosea 7:4	kulam mena'afim kemo tanur bo'eirah mei'ofeh yishbot mei'ir milush bazeq 'ad khumzato. hosea 7:5	yom malkeinu hekhelu sarim khamat miyayin mashakh yado 'et lozezim. hosea 7:6	ki qeirebu khatanur libam be'arebam kal halaylah yashen 'ofeihem boqer hu bo'er ke'esh lehabah. hosea 7:7	kulam yeikhamu katanur ve'akhelu 'et shofeteihem kal malkheihem nafalu 'en qorei bahem 'eilai. hosea 7:8	'efrayim ba'amim hu yitbolal 'efrayim hayah 'ugah beli hafukhah. hosea 7:9	'akhelu zarim kokho vehu lo yada' gam seibah zareqah bo vehu lo yada'. hosea 7:10	ve'anah ge'on yisra'el befanav velo shabu 'el yhvh 'eloheihem velo biqshuhu bekhal zot. hosea 7:11	vayhi 'efrayim keyonah fotah 'en leb mizrayim qara'u 'ashur halakhu. hosea 7:12	ka'asher yeileikhu 'efros 'aleihem rishti ke'of hashamayim 'oridem 'aysirem kesheima' la'adatam. hosea 7:13	'o lahem ki nadedu mimeni shod lahem ki fashe'u bi ve'anokhi 'efdem vehemah diberu 'alai kezabim. hosea 7:14	velo za'aqu 'eilai belibam ki yeyeililu 'al mishkebotam 'al dagan vetirosh yitgoraru yasuru bi. hosea 7:15	va'ani yisarti khizaqti zero'otam ve'eilai yekhashebu ra'. hosea 7:16	yashubu lo 'al hayu keqeshet remiyah yipelu bakhereb sareihem miza'am leshonam zo la'gam be'erez mizrayim. hosea 8:1	'el khikekha shofar kanesher 'al bet yhvh ya'an 'aberu beriti ve'al torati pasha'u. hosea 8:2	li yiz'aqu 'elohai yeda'anukha yisra'el. hosea 8:3	zanakh yisra'el tob 'oyeb yirdefo hosea 8:4	hem himlikhu velo mimeni heisiru velo yada'eti kaspam uzehabam 'asu lahem 'azabim lema'an yikaret. hosea 8:5	zanakh 'eglekh shomeron kharah 'api bam 'ad matai lo yukhelu niqayon. hosea 8:6	ki miyisra'el vehu kharash 'asahu velo 'elohim hu ki shebabim yihyeh 'eigel shomeron. hosea 8:7	ki ruakh yizra'u vesufatah yiqzoru qamah 'en lo zemakh beli ya'aseh qemakh 'ulai ya'aseh zarim yibla'uhu. hosea 8:8	nibla' yisra'el 'atah hayu bagoyim kikhli 'en kheifez bo. hosea 8:9	ki hemah 'alu 'ashur pere boded lo 'efrayim hitnu 'ahabim. hosea 8:10	gam ki yitnu bagoyim 'atah 'aqabezem vayakhelu me'at mimasa melekh sarim. hosea 8:11	ki hirbah 'efrayim mizbekhot lakhato hayu lo mizbekhot lakhato. hosea 8:12	'ekhtob 'ekhtab lo ribo rubei torati kemo zar nekhshabu. hosea 8:13	zibkhei habhabai yizbekhu basar vayokheilu yhvh lo razam 'atah yizkor 'avonam veyifqod khatotam hemah mizrayim yashubu. hosea 8:14	vayishkakh yisra'el 'et 'oseihu vayiben heikhalot vihudah hirbah 'arim bezurot veshilakhti 'esh be'arav ve'akhelah 'armenoteha. hosea 9:1	'al tismakh yisra'el 'el gil ka'amim ki zanita mei'al 'elohekha 'ahabta 'etnan 'al kal garenot dagan. hosea 9:2	goren vayeqeb lo yir'em vetirosh yekhakhesh bah. hosea 9:3	lo yeishebu be'erez yhvh veshab 'efrayim mizrayim ube'ashur tamei yokheilu. hosea 9:4	lo yisekhu yhvh yayin velo ye'erbu lo zibkheihem kelekhem 'onim lahem kal 'okhelav yitama'u ki lakhmam lenafsham lo yabo bet yhvh. hosea 9:5	mah ta'asu leyom mo'ed uleyom khag yhvh. hosea 9:6	ki hineh halekhu mishod mizrayim teqabezem mof teqaberem makhmad lekhaspam qimos yirashem khoakh be'aholeihem. hosea 9:7	ba'u yemei hapequdah ba'u yemei hashilum yeide'u yisra'el 'evil hanabi meshuga' 'ish haruakh 'al rob 'avonekha verabah masteimah. hosea 9:8	zofeh 'efrayim 'im 'elohai nabi pakh yaqosh 'al kal derakhav masteimah bebet 'elohav. hosea 9:9	he'miqu shikheitu kimei hagib'ah yizkor 'avonam yifqod khatotam. hosea 9:10	ka'anabim bamidbar mazati yisra'el kebikurah bit'einah bereishitah ra'iti 'aboteikhem hemah ba'u ba'al pe'or vayinazeru laboshet vayihyu shiquzim ke'ahobam. hosea 9:11	'efrayim ka'of yit'ofef kebodam mileidah umibeten umeiheirayon. hosea 9:12	ki 'im yegadelu 'et beneihem veshikaltim mei'adam ki gam 'o lahem besuri meihem. hosea 9:13	'efrayim ka'asher ra'iti lezor shetulah benaveh ve'efrayim lehozi 'el horeg banav. hosea 9:14	ten lahem yhvh mah titen ten lahem rekhem mashkil veshadayim zomeqim. hosea 9:15	kal ra'atam bagilgal ki sham seneitim 'al roa' ma'aleihem mibeiti 'agareshem lo 'osef 'ahabatam kal sareihem sorerim. hosea 9:16	hukah 'efrayim sharesham yabesh peri beli bal ya'asun gam ki yeileidun veheimati makhamadei bitnam. hosea 9:17	yim'asem 'elohai ki lo shame'u lo veyihyu nodedim bagoyim. hosea 10:1	gefen boqeq yisra'el peri yeshaveh lo kerob lefiryo hirbah lamizbekhot ketob le'arzo heitibu mazeibot. hosea 10:2	khalaq libam 'atah ye'shamu hu ya'arof mizbekhotam yeshoded mazeibotam. hosea 10:3	ki 'atah yomeru 'en melekh lanu ki lo yareinu 'et yhvh vehamelekh mah ya'aseh lanu. hosea 10:4	diberu debarim 'alot shav karot berit ufarakh karosh mishpat 'al talmei sadai. hosea 10:5	le'eglot bet 'aven yaguru shekhan shomeron ki 'abal 'alav 'amo ukhemarav 'alav yagilu 'al kebodo ki galah mimenu. hosea 10:6	gam 'oto le'ashur yubal minkhah lemelekh yareb bashenah 'efrayim yiqakh veyeibosh yisra'el mei'azato. hosea 10:7	nidmeh shomeron malkah keqezef 'al penei mayim. hosea 10:8	venishmedu bamot 'aven khatat yisra'el qoz vedardar ya'aleh 'al mizbekhotam ve'ameru leharim kasunu velageba'ot niflu 'aleinu. hosea 10:9	mimei hagib'ah khatata yisra'el sham 'amadu lo tasigem bagib'ah milkhamah 'al benei 'alvah. hosea 10:10	be'avati ve'esorem ve'usefu 'aleihem 'amim be'aseram lishtei 'einotam 'onotam. hosea 10:11	ve'efrayim 'eglah melumadah 'ohabti ladush va'ani 'abarti 'al tub zavarah 'arkib 'efrayim yakharosh yehudah yesaded lo ya'aqob. hosea 10:12	zir'u lakhem lizdaqah qizru lefi khesed niru lakhem nir ve'et lidrosh 'et yhvh 'ad yabo veyoreh zedeq lakhem. hosea 10:13	kharashtem resha' 'avlatah qezartem 'akhaltem peri khakhash ki batakhta bedarkekha berob giborekha. hosea 10:14	veqam sha'on be'amekha vekhal mibzarekha yushad keshod shalman bet 'arbel beyom milkhamah 'em 'al banim rutashah. hosea 10:15	kakhah 'asah lakhem bet 'el mipenei ra'at ra'atkhem bashakhar nidmoh nidmah melekh yisra'el. hosea 11:1	ki na'ar yisra'el va'ohabeihu umimizrayim qarati libni. hosea 11:2	qare'u lahem ken halekhu mipeneihem labe'alim yezabeikhu velapesilim yeqateirun. hosea 11:3	ve'anokhi tirgalti le'efrayim qakham 'al zero'otav velo yade'u ki refatim. hosea 11:4	bekhablei 'adam 'emshekhem ba'abotot 'ahabah va'ehyeh lahem kimrimei 'ol 'al lekheihem ve'at 'eilav 'okhil. hosea 11:5	lo yashub 'el 'erez mizrayim ve'ashur hu malko ki mei'anu lashub. hosea 11:6	vekhalah khereb be'arav vekhiletah badav ve'akhalah mimo'azoteihem. hosea 11:7	ve'ami telu'im limshubati ve'el 'al yiqra'uhu yakhad lo yeromem hosea 11:8	'ekh 'etenkha 'efrayim 'amagenkha yisra'el 'ekh 'etenkha khe'admah 'asimekha kizboyim nehpakh 'alai libi yakhad nikhmeru nikhumai. hosea 11:9	lo 'e'eseh kharon 'api lo 'ashub leshakhet 'efrayim ki 'el 'anokhi velo 'ish beqirbekha qadosh velo 'abo be'ir. hosea 11:10	'akharei yhvh yeilekhu ke'aryeh yish'ag ki hu yish'ag veyekherdu banim miyam. hosea 11:11	yekherdu khezipor mimizrayim ukheyonah mei'erez 'ashur vehoshabtim 'al bateihem ne'um yhvh. hosea 11:12	sebabuni bekhakhash 'efrayim ubemirmah bet yisra'el vihudah 'od rad 'im 'el ve'im qedoshim ne'eman. hosea 12:1	'efrayim ro'eh ruakh verodef qadim kal hayom kazab vashod yarbeh uberit 'im 'ashur yikhrotu veshemen lemizrayim yubal. hosea 12:2	verib yhvh 'im yehudah velifqod 'al ya'aqob kidrakhav kema'alalav yashib lo. hosea 12:3	babeten 'aqab 'et 'akhiv ube'ono sarah 'et 'elohim. hosea 12:4	vayasar 'el mal'akh vayukhal bakhah vayitkhanen lo bet 'el yimza'enu vesham yedaber 'imanu. hosea 12:5	yhvh 'elohei hazeba'ot yhvh zikhro. hosea 12:6	ve'atah beilohekha tashub khesed umishpat shemor veqaveh 'el 'elohekha tamid. hosea 12:7	kena'an beyado mozenei mirmah la'ashoq 'aheb. hosea 12:8	vayomer 'efrayim 'akh 'asharti mazati 'on li kal yegi'ai lo yimze'u li 'avon 'asher khet. hosea 12:9	ve'anokhi yhvh 'elohekha mei'erez mizrayim 'od 'oshibekha ba'ohalim kimei mo'ed. hosea 12:10	vedibarti 'al hanebi'im ve'anokhi khazon hirbeiti ubeyad hanebi'im 'adameh. hosea 12:11	'im gil'ad 'aven 'akh shav hayu bagilgal shevarim zibeikhu gam mizbekhotam kegalim 'al talmei sadai. hosea 12:12	vayibrakh ya'aqob sedeh 'aram vaya'abod yisra'el be'ishah ube'ishah shamar. hosea 12:13	ubenabi he'elah yhvh 'et yisra'el mimizrayim ubenabi nishmar. hosea 12:14	hikh'is 'efrayim tamrurim vedamav 'alav yitosh vekherpato yashib lo 'adonav. hosea 13:1	kedaber 'efrayim retet nasa hu beyisra'el vaye'sham baba'al vayamot. hosea 13:2	ve'atah yosifu lakhato vaya'su lahem maseikhah mikaspam kitbunam 'azabim ma'aseh kharashim kuloh lahem hem 'omerim zobekhei 'adam 'agalim yishaqun. hosea 13:3	lakhen yihyu ka'anan boqer vekhatal mashkim holekh kemoz yeso'er migoren ukhe'ashan mei'arubah. hosea 13:4	ve'anokhi yhvh 'elohekha mei'erez mizrayim veilohim zulati lo teida' umoshia' 'ayin bilti. hosea 13:5	'ani yeda'tikha bamidbar be'erez tal'ubot. hosea 13:6	kemar'itam vayisba'u sabe'u vayaram libam 'al ken shekheikhuni. hosea 13:7	va'ehi lahem kemo shakhal kenamer 'al derekh 'ashur. hosea 13:8	'efgeshem kedob shakul ve'eqra' segor libam ve'okhelem sham kelabi khayat hasadeh tebaqe'em. hosea 13:9	shikhetkha yisra'el ki bi be'ezrekha. hosea 13:10	'ehi malkekha 'eifo veyoshi'akha bekhal 'arekha veshofetekha 'asher 'amarta tenah li melekh vesarim. hosea 13:11	'eten lekha melekh be'api ve'eqakh be'ebrati. hosea 13:12	zarur 'avon 'efrayim zefunah khatato. hosea 13:13	kheblei yoleidah yabo'u lo hu ben lo khakham ki 'et lo ya'amod bemishbar banim. hosea 13:14	miyad she'ol 'efdem mimavet 'eg'alem 'ehi debarekha mavet 'ehi qatabekha she'ol nokham yisater mei'einai. hosea 13:15	ki hu ben 'akhim yafri yabo qadim ruakh yhvh mimidbar 'oleh veyeibosh meqoro veyekherab ma'yano hu yishseh 'ozar kal keli khemdah. hosea 13:16	te'sham shomeron ki maretah beiloheha bakhereb yipolu 'oleleihem yerutashu vehariyotav yebuqa'u. hosea 14:1	ubah yisra'el 'ad yhvh 'elohekha ki khashalta ba'avonekha. hosea 14:2	qekhu 'imakhem debarim veshubu 'el yhvh 'imru 'eilav kal tisa 'avon veqakh tob uneshalemah farim sefateinu. hosea 14:3	'ashur lo yoshi'einu 'al sus lo nirkab velo nomar 'od 'eloheinu lema'aseh yadeinu 'asher bekha
