milkhamah vediber shalom lagoyim umashelo miyam 'ad yam uminahar 'ad 'afsei 'arez. zechariah 9:11	gam 'at bedam beritekh shilakhti 'asirayikh mibor 'en mayim bo. zechariah 9:12	ubu lebizaron 'asirei hatiqvah gam hayom magid mishneh 'ashib lakh. zechariah 9:13	ki darakhti li yehudah qeshet mileiti 'efrayim ve'orarti banayikh ziyon 'al banayikh yavan vesamtikh kekhereb gibor. zechariah 9:14	yhvh 'aleihem yeira'eh veyaza khabaraq khizo vadonai yhvh bashofar yitqa' vehalakh besa'arot teiman. zechariah 9:15	yhvh zeba'ot yagen 'aleihem ve'akhelu vekhabeshu 'abnei qela' veshatu hamu kemo yayin umale'u kamizraq kezaviyot mizbeiakh. zechariah 9:16	vehoshi'am yhvh 'eloheihem bayom hahu kezon 'amo ki 'abnei neizer mitnosot 'al 'admato. zechariah 9:17	ki mah tubo umah yafeyo dagan bakhurim vetirosh yenobeb betulot. zechariah 10:1	sha'alu yhvh matar be'et malqosh yhvh 'oseh khazizim umetar geshem yiten lahem le'ish 'eiseb basadeh. zechariah 10:2	ki haterafim diberu 'aven vehaqosmim khazu sheqer vakhalomot hashav yedabeiru hebel yenakheimun 'al ken nase'u khemo zon ya'anu ki 'en ro'eh. zechariah 10:3	'al haro'im kharah 'api ve'al ha'atudim 'efqod ki faqad yhvh zeba'ot 'et 'edro 'et bet yehudah vesam 'otam kesus hodo bamilkhamah. zechariah 10:4	mimenu finah mimenu yated mimenu qeshet milkhamah mimenu yeizei khal noges yakhdav. zechariah 10:5	vehayu khegiborim bosim betit khuzot bamilkhamah venilkhamu ki yhvh 'imam vehobishu rokhebei susim. zechariah 10:6	vegibarti 'et bet yehudah ve'et bet yosef 'oshia' vehoshebotim ki rikhamtim vehayu ka'asher lo zenakhtim ki 'ani yhvh 'eloheihem ve'e'enem. zechariah 10:7	vehayu khegibor 'efrayim vesamakh libam kemo yayin ubeneihem yir'u vesameikhu yagel libam yhvh. zechariah 10:8	'eshreqah lahem va'aqabezem ki feditim verabu kemo rabu. zechariah 10:9	ve'ezra'em ba'amim ubamerkhaqim yizkeruni vekhayu 'et beneihem vashabu. zechariah 10:10	vahashibotim mei'erez mizrayim umei'ashur 'aqabezem ve'el 'erez gil'ad ulebanon 'abi'em velo yimazei lahem. zechariah 10:11	ve'abar bayam zarah vehikah bayam galim vehobishu kol mezulot ye'or vehurad ge'on 'ashur vesheibet mizrayim yasur. zechariah 10:12	vegibartim yhvh ubishmo yithalakhu ne'um yhvh. zechariah 11:1	petakh lebanon delatekha vetokhal 'esh ba'arazekha. zechariah 11:2	heilel berosh ki nafal 'erez 'asher 'adirim shudadu heililu 'alonei bashan ki yarad ya'ar habazur habazir. zechariah 11:3	qol yilat haro'im ki shudedah 'adartam qol sha'agat kefirim ki shudad ge'on hayarden. zechariah 11:4	koh 'amar yhvh 'elohai re'eh 'et zon hahareigah. zechariah 11:5	'asher qoneihen yahargun velo ye'shamu umokhereihen yomar barukh yhvh va'shir vero'eihem lo yakhmol 'aleihen. zechariah 11:6	ki lo 'ekhmol 'od 'al yoshebei ha'arez ne'um yhvh vehineh 'anokhi mamzi 'et ha'adam 'ish beyad rei'eihu ubeyad malko vekhitetu 'et ha'arez velo 'azil miyadam. zechariah 11:7	va'er'eh 'et zon hahareigah lakhen 'aniyei hazon va'eqakh li shenei maqlot le'akhad qarati no'am ule'akhad qarati khobelim va'er'eh 'et hazon. zechariah 11:8	va'akhkhid 'et sheloshet haro'im beyerakh 'ekhad vatiqzar nafshi bahem vegam nafsham bakhalah bi. zechariah 11:9	va'omar lo 'er'eh 'etkhem hameitah tamut vehanikhkhedet tikakhed vehanish'arot tokhalnah 'ishah 'et besar re'utah. zechariah 11:10	va'eqakh 'et maqli 'et no'am va'egda' 'oto lehafer 'et beriti 'asher karati 'et kal ha'amim. zechariah 11:11	vatufar bayom hahu vayeide'u khen 'aniyei hazon hashomerim 'oti ki debar yhvh hu. zechariah 11:12	va'omar 'aleihem 'im tob be'eineikhem habu sekhari ve'im lo khadalu vayishqelu 'et sekhari sheloshim kasef. zechariah 11:13	vayomer yhvh 'eilai hashlikheihu 'el hayozer 'eder hayqar 'asher yaqarti mei'aleihem va'eqkhah sheloshim hakesef va'ashlikh 'oto bet yhvh 'el hayozer. zechariah 11:14	va'egda' 'et maqli hasheini 'et hakhobelim lehafer 'et ha'akhavah ben yehudah uben yisra'el. zechariah 11:15	vayomer yhvh 'eilai 'od qakh lekha keli ro'eh 'evili. zechariah 11:16	ki hineh 'anokhi meiqim ro'eh ba'arez hanikhkhadot lo yifqod hana'ar lo yebaqesh vehanishberet lo yerapei hanizabah lo yekhalkel ubesar haberi'ah yokhal ufarseihen yefareq. zechariah 11:17	ho ro'i ha'elil 'ozebi hazon khereb 'al zero'o ve'al 'en yemino zero'o yabosh tibash ve'en yemino kahoh tikhheh. zechariah 12:1	masa debar yhvh 'al yisra'el ne'um yhvh noteh shamayim veyosed 'arez veyozer ruakh 'adam beqirbo. zechariah 12:2	hineh 'anokhi sam 'et yerushalim saf ra'al lekhal ha'amim sabib vegam 'al yehudah yihyeh bamazor 'al yerushalim. zechariah 12:3	vehayah bayom hahu 'asim 'et yerushalim 'eben ma'amasah lekhal ha'amim kal 'omeseha sarot yisareitu vene'esfu 'aleha kol goyei ha'arez. zechariah 12:4	bayom hahu ne'um yhvh 'akeh khal sus batimahon verokhebo bashiga'on ve'al bet yehudah 'efqakh 'et 'einai vekhol sus ha'amim 'akeh ba'ivaron. zechariah 12:5	ve'ameru 'alufei yehudah belibam 'amzah li yoshebei yerushalim yhvh zeba'ot 'eloheihem. zechariah 12:6	bayom hahu 'asim 'et 'alufei yehudah kekhiyor 'esh be'eizim ukhelapid 'esh be'amir ve'akhelu 'al yamin ve'al semol 'et kal ha'amim sabib veyashebah yerushalim 'od takhteha birushalim. zechariah 12:7	vehoshia' yhvh 'et 'aholei yehudah barishonah lema'an lo tigdal tif'eret bet david vetif'eret yosheb yerushalim 'al yehudah. zechariah 12:8	bayom hahu yagen yhvh be'ad yosheb yerushalim vehayah hanikhshal bahem bayom hahu kedavid ubet david keilohim kemal'akh yhvh lifneihem. zechariah 12:9	vehayah bayom hahu 'abaqesh lehashmid 'et kal hagoyim haba'im 'al yerushalim. zechariah 12:10	veshafakhti 'al bet david ve'al yosheb yerushalim ruakh khen vetakhanunim vehibitu 'eilai 'et 'asher daqaru vesafedu 'alav kemisped 'al hayakhid vehamer 'alav kehamer 'al habekhor. zechariah 12:11	bayom hahu yigdal hamisped birushalim kemispad hadad rimon bebiq'at megidon. zechariah 12:12	vesafedah ha'arez mishpakhot mishpakhot lebad mishpakhat bet david lebad unesheihem lebad mishpakhat bet natan lebad unesheihem lebad. zechariah 12:13	mishpakhat bet leivi lebad unesheihem lebad mishpakhat hashim'i lebad unesheihem lebad. zechariah 12:14	kol hamishpakhot hanish'arot mishpakhot mishpakhot lebad unesheihem lebad. zechariah 13:1	bayom hahu yihyeh maqor niftakh lebet david uleyoshebei yerushalim lekhatat ulenidah. zechariah 13:2	vehayah bayom hahu ne'um yhvh zeba'ot 'akhrit 'et shemot ha'azabim min ha'arez velo yizakheru 'od vegam 'et hanebi'im ve'et ruakh hatum'ah 'a'abir min ha'arez. zechariah 13:3	vehayah ki yinabei 'ish 'od ve'ameru 'eilav 'abiv ve'imo yoledav lo tikhyeh ki sheqer dibarta beshem yhvh udeqaruhu 'abihu ve'imo yoledav behinabe'o. zechariah 13:4	vehayah bayom hahu yeiboshu hanebi'im 'ish meikhezyono behinabe'oto velo yilbeshu 'aderet sei'ar lema'an kakhesh. zechariah 13:5	ve'amar lo nabi 'anokhi 'ish 'obed 'adamah 'anokhi ki 'adam hiqnani mine'urai. zechariah 13:6	ve'amar 'eilav mah hamakot ha'eleh ben yadekha ve'amar 'asher hukeiti bet me'ahabai. zechariah 13:7	khereb 'uri 'al ro'i ve'al geber 'amiti ne'um yhvh zeba'ot hakh 'et haro'eh utefuzena hazon vahashiboti yadi 'al hazo'arim. zechariah 13:8	vehayah bekhal ha'arez ne'um yhvh pi shenayim bah yikaretu yigva'u vehashelishit yivater bah. zechariah 13:9	veheibeiti 'et hashelishit ba'esh uzeraftim kizrof 'et hakesef ubekhantim kibkhon 'et hazahab hu yiqra bishmi va'ani 'e'eneh 'oto 'amarti 'ami hu vehu yomar yhvh 'elohai. zechariah 14:1	hineh yom ba yhvh vekhulaq shelalekh beqirbekh. zechariah 14:2	ve'asafti 'et kal hagoyim 'el yerushalim lamilkhamah venilkedah ha'ir venashasu habatim vehanashim tishagalnah tishakhabnah veyaza khazi ha'ir bagolah veyeter ha'am lo yikaret min ha'ir. zechariah 14:3	veyaza yhvh venilkham bagoyim hahem keyom hilakhamo beyom qerab. zechariah 14:4	ve'amedu raglav bayom hahu 'al har hazeitim 'asher 'al penei yerushalim miqedem venibqa' har hazeitim meikhezyo mizrakhah vayamah gei gedolah me'od umash khazi hahar zafonah vekhezyo negbah. zechariah 14:5	venastem gei harai ki yagia' gei harim 'el 'azal venastem ka'asher nastem mipenei hara'ash bimei 'uziyah melekh yehudah uba yhvh 'elohai kal qedoshim 'imakh. zechariah 14:6	vehayah bayom hahu lo yihyeh 'or yeqarot yiqpe'un veqipa'on. zechariah 14:7	vehayah yom 'ekhad hu yivada' yhvh lo yom velo layelah vehayah le'et 'ereb yihyeh 'or. zechariah 14:8	vehayah bayom hahu yeize'u mayim khayim mirushalim khezyam 'el hayam haqadmoni vekhezyam 'el hayam ha'akharon baqayiz ubakhoref yihyeh. zechariah 14:9	vehayah yhvh lemelekh 'al kal ha'arez bayom hahu yihyeh yhvh 'ekhad ushemo 'ekhad. zechariah 14:10	yisob kal ha'arez ka'arabah migeba' lerimon negeb yerushalim vera'amah veyashebah takhteha lemisha'ar binyamin 'ad meqom sha'ar harishon 'ad sha'ar hapinim umigdal khanan'el 'ad yiqbei hamelekh. zechariah 14:11	veyashebu bah vekheirem lo yihyeh 'od veyashebah yerushalim labetakh. zechariah 14:12	vezot tihyeh hamageifah 'asher yigof yhvh 'et kal ha'amim 'asher zabe'u 'al yerushalim hameq besaro vehu 'omed 'al raglav ve'einav timaqnah bekhoreihen uleshono timaq befihem. zechariah 14:13	vehayah bayom hahu tihyeh mehumat yhvh rabah bahem vehekheziqu 'ish yad rei'eihu ve'aletah yado 'al yad rei'eihu. zechariah 14:14	vegam yehudah tilakhem birushalim ve'usaf khel kal hagoyim sabib zahab vakhesef ubegadim larob me'od. zechariah 14:15	vekhen tihyeh mageifat hasus hapered hagamal vehakhamor vekhal habeheimah 'asher yihyeh bamakhanot hahemah kamageifah hazot. zechariah 14:16	vehayah kal hanotar mikal hagoyim haba'im 'al yerushalim ve'alu midei shanah beshanah lehishtakhavot lemelekh yhvh zeba'ot velakhog 'et khag hasukot. zechariah 14:17	vehayah 'asher lo ya'aleh mei'et mishpekhot ha'arez 'el yerushalim lehishtakhavot lemelekh yhvh zeba'ot velo 'aleihem yihyeh hagashem. zechariah 14:18	ve'im mishpakhat mizrayim lo ta'aleh velo ba'ah velo 'aleihem tihyeh hamageifah 'asher yigof yhvh 'et hagoyim 'asher lo ya'alu lakhog 'et khag hasukot. zechariah 14:19	zot tihyeh khatat mizrayim vekhatat kal hagoyim 'asher lo ya'alu lakhog 'et khag hasukot. zechariah 14:20	bayom hahu yihyeh 'al mezilot hasus qodesh yhvh vehayah hasirot bebet yhvh kamizraqim lifnei hamizbeiakh. zechariah 14:21	vehayah kal sir birushalim ubihudah qodesh yhvh zeba'ot uba'u kal hazobekhim velaqekhu meihem ubishelu bahem velo yihyeh khena'ani 'od bebet yhvh zeba'ot bayom hahu. 

malachi 1:1	masa debar yhvh 'el yisra'el beyad mal'akhi. malachi 1:2	'ahabti 'etkhem 'amar yhvh va'amartem bamah 'ahabtanu halo 'akh 'eisav leya'aqob ne'um yhvh va'ohab 'et ya'aqob. malachi 1:3	ve'et 'eisav saneiti va'asim 'et harav shemamah ve'et nakhalato letanot midbar. malachi 1:4	ki tomar 'edom rushashnu venashub venibneh khorabot koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot hemah yibnu va'ani 'eheros veqare'u lahem gebul rish'ah veha'am 'asher za'am yhvh 'ad 'olam. malachi 1:5	ve'eineikhem tir'enah ve'atem tomeru yigdal yhvh mei'al ligbul yisra'el. malachi 1:6	ben yekhabed 'ab ve'ebed 'adonav ve'im 'ab 'ani 'ayeh khebodi ve'im 'adonim 'ani 'ayeh mora'i 'amar yhvh zeba'ot lakhem hakohanim bozei shemi va'amartem bameh bazinu 'et shemekha. malachi 1:7	magishim 'al mizbekhi lekhem mego'al va'amartem bameh gei'alnukha be'emarekhem shulkhan yhvh nibzeh hu. malachi 1:8	vekhi tagishun 'iver lizboakh 'en ra' vekhi tagishu piseiakh vekholeh 'en ra' haqribeihu na lefekhatekha hayirzekha 'o hayisa fanekha 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 1:9	ve'atah khalu na fenei 'el vikhaneinu miyedkhem hayetah zot hayisa mikem panim 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 1:10	mi gam bakhem veyisgor delatayim velo ta'iru mizbekhi khinam 'en li kheifez bakhem 'amar yhvh zeba'ot uminkhah lo 'erzeh miyedkhem. malachi 1:11	ki mimizrakh shemesh ve'ad mebo'o gadol shemi bagoyim ubekhal maqom muqtar mugash lishmi uminkhah tehorah ki gadol shemi bagoyim 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 1:12	ve'atem mekhalelim 'oto be'emarekhem shulkhan 'adonai mego'al hu venibo nibzeh 'akhelo. malachi 1:13	va'amartem hineh matela'ah vehipakhtem 'oto 'amar yhvh zeba'ot vahabeitem gazul ve'et hapiseiakh ve'et hakholeh vahabeitem 'et haminkhah ha'erzeh 'otah miyedkhem 'amar yhvh. malachi 1:14	ve'arur nokhel veyesh be'edro zakhar venoder vezobeiakh mashekhat ladonai ki melekh gadol 'ani 'amar yhvh zeba'ot ushemi nora bagoyim. malachi 2:1	ve'atah 'aleikhem hamizvah hazot hakohanim. malachi 2:2	'im lo tishme'u ve'im lo tasimu 'al leb latet kabod lishmi 'amar yhvh zeba'ot veshilakhti bakhem 'et hame'eirah ve'aroti 'et birkhoteikhem vegam 'arotiha ki 'einekhem samim 'al leb. malachi 2:3	hini go'er lakhem 'et hazera' vezeiriti feresh 'al peneikhem peresh khageikhem venasa 'etkhem 'eilav. malachi 2:4	vida'tem ki shilakhti 'aleikhem 'et hamizvah hazot lihyot beriti 'et leivi 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 2:5	beriti hayetah 'ito hakhayim vehashalom va'etenem lo mora vayira'eini umipenei shemi nikhat hu. malachi 2:6	torat 'emet hayetah befihu ve'avlah lo nimza bisfatav beshalom ubemishor halakh 'iti verabim heishib mei'avon. malachi 2:7	ki siftei khohen yishmeru da'at vetorah yebaqshu mipihu ki mal'akh yhvh zeba'ot hu. malachi 2:8	ve'atem sartem min haderekh hikhshaltem rabim batorah shikhatem berit haleivi 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 2:9	vegam 'ani natati 'etkhem nibzim ushefalim lekhal ha'am kefi 'asher 'einekhem shomerim 'et derakhai venose'im panim batorah. malachi 2:10	halo 'ab 'ekhad lekhulanu halo 'el 'ekhad bera'anu madua' nibgad 'ish be'akhiv lekhalel berit 'aboteinu. malachi 2:11	bagedah yehudah veto'eibah ne'estah beyisra'el ubirushalim ki khilel yehudah qodesh yhvh 'asher 'aheb uba'al bat 'el neikhar. malachi 2:12	yakhret yhvh la'ish 'asher ya'asenah 'er ve'oneh mei'aholei ya'aqob umagish minkhah yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 2:13	vezot sheinit ta'asu kasot dim'ah 'et mizbakh yhvh bekhi va'anaqah mei'en 'od penot 'el haminkhah velaqakhat razon miyedkhem. malachi 2:14	va'amartem 'al mah 'al ki yhvh hei'id beinekha uben 'eishet ne'urekha 'asher 'atah bagadtah bah vehi khabertekha ve'eishet beritekha. malachi 2:15	velo 'ekhad 'asah ushe'ar ruakh lo umah ha'ekhad mebaqesh zera' 'elohim venishmartem berukhakhem ube'eishet ne'urekha 'al yibgod. malachi 2:16	ki sanei shalakh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el vekhisah khamas 'al lebusho 'amar yhvh zeba'ot venishmartem berukhakhem velo tibgodu. malachi 2:17	hoga'tem yhvh bedibreikhem va'amartem bamah hoga'enu be'emarekhem kal 'oseh ra' tob be'einei yhvh ubahem hu khafez 'o 'ayeh 'elohei hamishpat. malachi 3:1	hini sholeiakh mal'akhi ufinah derekh lefanai ufit'om yabo 'el heikhalo ha'adon 'asher 'atem mebaqshim umal'akh haberit 'asher 'atem khafeizim hineh ba 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 3:2	umi mekhalkel 'et yom bo'o umi ha'omed beheira'oto ki hu ke'esh mezaref ukheborit mekhabesim. malachi 3:3	veyashab mezaref umetaher kesef vetihar 'et benei leivi veziqaq 'otam kazahab vekhakasef vehayu yhvh magishei minkhah bizdaqah. malachi 3:4	ve'arebah yhvh minkhat yehudah virushalim kimei 'olam ukheshanim qadmoniyot. malachi 3:5	veqarabti 'aleikhem lamishpat vehayiti 'ed memaher bamkhashefim ubamna'afim ubanishba'im lashaqer ube'osheqei sekharsa khir 'almanah veyatom umatei ger velo yerei'uni 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 3:6	ki 'ani yhvh lo shaniti ve'atem benei ya'aqob lo khelitem. malachi 3:7	lemimei 'aboteikhem sartem meikhuqai velo shemartem shubu 'eilai ve'ashubah 'aleikhem 'amar yhvh zeba'ot va'amartem bameh nashub. malachi 3:8	hayiqba' 'adam 'elohim ki 'atem qobe'im 'oti va'amartem bameh qeba'anukha hama'aser vehaterumah. malachi 3:9	bame'eirah 'atem nei'arim ve'oti 'atem qobe'im hago kulo. malachi 3:10	habi'u 'et kal hama'aser 'el bet ha'ozar vihi teref bebeiti ubekhanuni na bazot 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'im lo 'eftakh lakhem 'et 'arubot hashamayim vahariqoti lakhem berakhah 'ad beli dai. malachi 3:11	vega'arti lakhem ba'okhel velo yashkhit lakhem 'et peri ha'adamah velo teshakel lakhem hagefen basadeh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 3:12	ve'isheru 'etkhem kal hagoyim ki tihyu 'atem 'erez kheifez 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 3:13	khazequ 'alai dibreikhem 'amar yhvh va'amartem mah nidbarnu 'alekha. malachi 3:14	'amartem shav 'abod 'elohim umah beza' ki shamarnu mishmarto vekhi halakhnu qedoranit mipenei yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 3:15	ve'atah 'anakhnu me'asherim zeidim gam nibnu 'osei rish'ah gam bakhanu 'elohim vayimaleitu. malachi 3:16	'az nidberu yir'ei yhvh 'ish 'et rei'eihu vayaqsheb yhvh vayishma' vayikateb seifer zikaron lefanav leyir'ei yhvh ulekhoshebei shemo. malachi 3:17	vehayu li 'amar yhvh zeba'ot layom 'asher 'ani 'oseh segulah vekhamalti 'aleihem ka'asher yakhmol 'ish 'al beno ha'obed 'oto. malachi 3:18	veshabtem ure'item ben zadiq lerasha' ben 'obed 'elohim la'asher lo 'abado. malachi 4:1	ki hineh hayom ba bo'er katanur vehayu khal zeidim vekhal 'oseh rish'ah qash velihat 'otam hayom haba 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'asher lo ya'azob lahem shoresh ve'anaf. malachi 4:2	vezarekhah lakhem yir'ei shemi shemesh zedaqah umarpei bikhnafeha vizatem ufishtem ke'eglei marbeq. malachi 4:3	ve'asotem resha'im ki yihyu 'eifer takhat kapot ragleikhem bayom 'asher 'ani 'oseh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot. malachi 4:4	zikhru torat mosheh 'abdi 'asher ziviti 'oto bekhoreb 'al kal yisra'el khuqim umishpatim. malachi 4:5	hineh 'anokhi sholeiakh lakhem 'et 'eiliyah hanabi lifnei bo yom yhvh hagadol vehanora. malachi 4:6	veheishib leb 'abot 'al banim veleb banim 'al 'abotam pen 'abo vehikeiti 'et ha'arez kheirem. 

psalms 1:1	'ashrei ha'ish 'asher lo halakh ba'azat resha'im ubederekh khata'im lo 'amad ubemoshab leizim lo yashab. psalms 1:2	ki 'im betorat yhvh khefzo ubetorato yehgeh yomam valayelah. psalms 1:3	vehayah ke'ez shatul 'al palgei mayim 'asher piryo yiten be'ito ve'aleihu lo yibol vekhol 'asher ya'aseh yazliakh. psalms 1:4	lo khen haresha'im ki 'im kamoz 'asher tidefenu ruakh. psalms 1:5	'al ken lo yaqumu resha'im bamishpat vekhata'im ba'adat zadiqim. psalms 1:6	ki yodeia' yhvh derekh zadiqim vederekh resha'im tobed. psalms 2:1	lamah rageshu goyim ule'umim yehgu riq. psalms 2:2	yityazebu malkhei 'erez veroznim nosdu yakhad 'al yhvh ve'al meshikho. psalms 2:3	nenateqah 'et mosroteimo venashlikhah mimenu 'aboteimo. psalms 2:4	yosheb bashamayim yiskhaq 'adonai yil'ag lamo. psalms 2:5	'az yedaber 'eileimo be'apo ubakharono yebahaleimo. psalms 2:6	va'ani nasakhti malki 'al ziyon har qadshi psalms 2:7	'asaperah 'el khoq yhvh 'amar 'eilai beni 'atah 'ani hayom yelidtikha. psalms 2:8	she'al mimeni ve'etenah goyim nakhalatekha va'akhuzatekha 'afsei 'arez. psalms 2:9	tero'em besheibet barzel kikhli yozer tenapezem. psalms 2:10	ve'atah melakhim haskilu hivaseru shofetei 'arez. psalms 2:11	'ibdu 'et yhvh beyir'ah vegilu bir'adah. psalms 2:12	nashequ bar pen ye'enaf vetobedu derekh ki yib'ar kim'at 'apo 'ashrei kal khosei bo. psalms 3:1	mizmor ledavid bebarekho mipenei 'abshalom beno. yhvh mah rabu zarai rabim qamim 'alai. psalms 3:2	rabim 'omerim lenafshi 'en yeshu'atah lo beilohim selah. psalms 3:3	ve'atah yhvh magen ba'adi kebodi umeirim roshi. psalms 3:4	qoli 'el yhvh 'eqra vaya'aneini meihar qadesho selah. psalms 3:5	'ani shakhabti va'ishanah heqizoti ki yhvh yismekheini. psalms 3:6	lo 'ira meiribbot 'am 'asher sabib shatu 'alai. psalms 3:7	qumah yhvh hoshi'eini 'elohai ki hikita 'et kal 'oyebai lekhi shinei resha'im shibarta. psalms 3:8	yhvh hayshu'ah 'al 'amekha birkhatekha selah. psalms 4:1	lamnazeiakh binginot mizmor ledavid. beqare'i 'aneini 'elohei zidqi bazar hirkhabta li khaneini ushema' tefilati. psalms 4:2	benei 'ish 'ad meh khebodi likhlimah te'ehabun riq tebaqshu khazab selah. psalms 4:3	ude'u ki hiflah yhvh khasid lo yhvh yishma' beqare'i 'eilav. psalms 4:4	rigzu ve'al tekheta'u 'imru bilbabkhem 'al mishkabkhem vedomu selah. psalms 4:5	zibkhu zibkhei zedeq ubitkhu 'el yhvh. psalms 4:6	rabim 'omerim mi yar'einu tob nesah 'aleinu 'or panekha yhvh. psalms 4:7	natatah simkhah belibi mei'et deganam vetirosham rabu. psalms 4:8	beshalom yakhdav 'eshkebah ve'ishan ki 'atah yhvh lebadad labetakh toshibeini. psalms 5:1	lamnazeiakh 'el hanekhilot mizmor ledavid. 'amarai ha'azinah yhvh binah hagigi. psalms 5:2	haqshibah leqol shav'i malki veilohai ki 'eilekha 'etpalal. psalms 5:3	yhvh boqer tishma' qoli boqer 'e'erakh lekha va'azapeh. psalms 5:4	ki lo 'el khafez resha' 'atah lo yegurkha ra'. psalms 5:5	lo yityazebu holim leneged 'einekha neita kal po'alei 'aven. psalms 5:6	te'abed doberei khazab 'ish damim umirmah yeta'eb yhvh. psalms 5:7	va'ani berob khasdekha 'abo beitekha 'eshtakhaveh 'el heikhal qadshekha beyir'atekha. psalms 5:8	yhvh nekheini bezidqatekha lema'an shorrai hoshar hayshar lefanai darkekha. psalms 5:9	ki 'en befihu nekhonah qirbam havot qeber patuakh geronam leshonam yakhaliqun. psalms 5:10	ha'ashimem 'elohim yipelu mimo'azoteihem berob pish'eihem hadikheimo ki maru bakh. psalms 5:11	veyismekhu khal khosei bakh le'olam yeraneinu vetasekh 'aleimo veya'lezu bekha 'ohabei shemekha. psalms 5:12	ki 'atah tebarekh zadiq yhvh kazinah razon ta'terenu. psalms 6:1	lamnazeiakh binginot 'al hasheminit mizmor ledavid. yhvh 'al be'apekha tokhikheini ve'al bakhamatekha teyasereini. psalms 6:2	khaneini yhvh ki 'umlal 'ani refa'eini yhvh ki nibhalu 'azamai. psalms 6:3	venafshi nibhalah me'od ve'at ve'atah yhvh 'ad matai. psalms 6:4	shubah yhvh khalezah nafshi hoshi'eini lema'an khasdekha. psalms 6:5	ki 'en bamavet zikhrekha bish'ol mi yodeh lakh. psalms 6:6	yaga'ti be'ankhati 'askheh bekhal laylah mitati bedim'ati 'arsi 'amseh. psalms 6:7	'asheshah mika'as 'eini 'ateqah bekhal zorrai. psalms 6:8	suru mimeni kal po'alei 'aven ki shama' yhvh qol bikhyi. psalms 6:9	shama' yhvh tekhinati yhvh tefilati yiqakh. psalms 6:10	yeiboshu veyibahalu me'od kal 'oyebai yashubu yeiboshu raga'. psalms 7:1	shigayon ledavid 'asher shar yhvh 'al dibrei khush ben yemini. yhvh 'elohai bekha khasiti hoshi'eini mikal rodefai vehazileini. psalms 7:2	pen yitrof ke'aryeh nafshi poreq ve'en mazil. psalms 7:3	yhvh 'elohai 'im 'asiti zot 'im yesh 'avel bekhapai. psalms 7:4	'im gamalti sholmi ra' va'akhalezah zorri reiqam. psalms 7:5	yiradof 'oyeb nafshi veyaseg veyirmos la'arez khayai ukhebodi le'afar yashken selah. psalms 7:6	qumah yhvh be'apekha hinasei be'abrot zorrai ve'urah 'eilai mishpat zivita. psalms 7:7	va'adat le'umim tesobbeka ve'aleha lamarom shubah. psalms 7:8	yhvh yadin 'amim shafeteini yhvh kezidqi ukhetumi 'alai. psalms 7:9	yigmar na ra' resha'im utekhonen zadiq ubokhen libot ukhelayot 'elohim zadiq. psalms 7:10	magini 'al 'elohim moshia' yishrei leb. psalms 7:11	'elohim shofet zadiq ve'el zo'em bekhal yom. psalms 7:12	'im lo yashub kharbo yiltosh qashto darakh vaykhoneha. psalms 7:13	velo heikhin kelei mavet khizav ledoleqim yif'al. psalms 7:14	hineh yekhabel 'aven veharah 'amal veyalad shaqer. psalms 7:15	bor karah vayakhpereihu vayipol beshakhat yif'al. psalms 7:16	yashub 'amalo berosho ve'al qadeqodo khamaso yeired. psalms 7:17	'odeh yhvh kezidqo va'azamerah shem yhvh 'elyon. psalms 8:1	lamnazeiakh 'al hagitit mizmor ledavid. yhvh 'adoneinu mah 'adir mekha bekhal ha'arez 'asher tenah hodkha 'al hashamayim. psalms 8:2	mipi 'olim veyoneqim yisadta 'oz lema'an zorrekha lehashbit 'oyeb umitnaqem. psalms 8:3	ki 'er'eh mekha ma'asei 'ezbe'otekha yareiakh vekhokhabim 'asher konanetah. psalms 8:4	mah 'enosh ki tizkerenu uben 'adam ki tifqedenu. psalms 8:5	vatekhasereihu me'at mei'elohim vekhabod vehadar te'atereihu. psalms 8:6	tamshileihu bema'asei yadekha kol shatah takhat raglav. psalms 8:7	zoneh va'alafim kulam vegam bahamot sadai. psalms 8:8	zipor mayim udegei hayam 'ober 'arekhot yamim. psalms 8:9	yhvh 'adoneinu mah 'adir mekha bekhal ha'arez. psalms 9:1	lamnazeiakh 'almut laben mizmor ledavid. 'odeh yhvh bekhal libi 'asaperah kal nifle'otekha. psalms 9:2	'esmekhah ve'e'elzah bakh 'azamerah shimkha 'elyon. psalms 9:3	beshub 'oybai 'akhor yikashelu veyobedu mipanekha. psalms 9:4	ki 'asita mishpati vedini yashabta lekhisei shofet zedeq. psalms 9:5	ga'arta goyim 'ibadta rasha' shemam makhita le'olam va'ed. psalms 9:6	ha'oyeb tamu khorabot lanezakh ve'arim natashta 'abad zikhram hemah. psalms 9:7	yhvh le'olam yeisheb konen lamishpat kis'o. psalms 9:8	vehu yishpot teibel bezedeq yadin le'umim bemeisharim. psalms 9:9	vihi yhvh misgab ladakh misgab le'itot bazarah. psalms 9:10	veyibtekhu bekha yod'ei shemekha ki lo 'azabta doreshekha yhvh. psalms 9:11	zameru yhvh yosheb ziyon hagidu ba'amim 'alilotav. psalms 9:12	ki doresh damim 'otam zakhar losha khakh za'aqat 'aniyim 'anavim. psalms 9:13	khaneneini yhvh re'eh 'aneyi misone'ai meromi misha'arei mavet. psalms 9:14	lema'an 'asaperah kal tehilatekha besha'arei bat ziyon 'agilah bishu'atekha. psalms 9:15	tabe'u goyim beshakhat 'asu bereshet zu tamanu nilkedah raglam. psalms 9:16	noda' yhvh mishpat 'asah befo'al kapav noqesh rasha' higayon selah. psalms 9:17	yashubu resha'im lish'olah kal goyim shekheikhei 'elohim. psalms 9:18	ki lo lanezakh yishakhakh 'ebyon tiqvat 'anavim 'aniyim tobad la'ad. psalms 9:19	qumah yhvh 'al ya'oz 'enosh yishafetu goyim 'al panekha. psalms 9:20	shitah yhvh morah lahem yeide'u goyim 'enosh hemah selah. psalms 10:1	lamah yhvh ta'amod berakhoq ta'lim le'itot bazarah. psalms 10:2	bega'avat rasha' yidlaq 'ani yitafesu bimzimot zu khashabu. psalms 10:3	ki hilel rasha' 'al ta'avat nafsho ubozeia' beirekh ni'ez yhvh. psalms 10:4	rasha' kegobah 'apo bal yidrosh 'en 'elohim kal mezimotav. psalms 10:5	yakhilu darekv derakhav bekhal 'et marom mishpatekha minegdo kal zorrav yafiakh bahem. psalms 10:6	'amar belibo bal 'emot ledor vador 'asher lo bera'. psalms 10:7	'alah pihu malei umirmot vatokh takhat leshono 'amal va'aven. psalms 10:8	yeisheb bema'rab khazeirim bamistarim yaharog naqi 'einav lekheilekhah yizponu. psalms 10:9	ye'erob bamistar ke'aryeh besukoh ye'erob lakhatof 'ani yakhtof 'ani bemashekho berishto. psalms 10:10	vadakhah yidkeh yashoakh venafal ba'azumav khelka'im khel ka'im. psalms 10:11	'amar belibo shakhakh 'el histir panav bal ra'ah lanezakh. psalms 10:12	qumah yhvh 'el nesa yadekha 'al tishkakh 'aniyim 'anavim. psalms 10:13	'al meh ni'ez rasha' 'elohim 'amar belibo lo tidrosh. psalms 10:14	ra'itah ki 'atah 'amal vakha'as tabit latet beyadekha 'alekha ya'azob kheilekhah yatom 'atah hayita 'ozer. psalms 10:15	bor zeroa' rasha' vara' tidrosh rish'o bal timza. psalms 10:16	yhvh melekh 'olam va'ed 'abedu goyim mei'arzo. psalms 10:17	ta'avat 'anavim shama'ta yhvh takhin libam taqshib 'azenekha. psalms 10:18	lishpot yatom vadakh bal yosif 'od la'aroz 'enosh min ha'arez. psalms 11:1	lamnazeiakh ledavid yhvh khasiti 'ekh tomeru lenafshi nudu nudi harkhem zipor. psalms 11:2	ki hineh haresha'im yidrekhun qeshet konu khizam 'al yeter lirot bemo 'ofel leyishrei leb. psalms 11:3	ki hashatot yeihareisun zadiq mah pa'al. psalms 11:4	yhvh beheikhal qadesho yhvh bashamayim kis'o 'einav yekhezu 'af'apav yibkhanu benei 'adam. psalms 11:5	yhvh zadiq yibkhan verasha' ve'oheb khamas sane'ah nafsho. psalms 11:6	yamter 'al resha'im pakhim 'esh vegaferit veruakh zil'afot menat kosam. psalms 11:7	ki zadiq yhvh zedaqot 'aheb yashar yekhezu faneimo. psalms 12:1	lamnazeiakh 'al hasheminit mizmor ledavid. hoshi'ah yhvh ki gamar khasid ki fasu 'emunim mibenei 'adam. psalms 12:2	shav yedaberu 'ish 'et rei'eihu sefat khalaqot beleb valeb yedabeiru. psalms 12:3	yakhret yhvh kal siftei khalaqot lashon medaberet gedolot. psalms 12:4	'asher 'ameru lilshoneinu nagbir sefateinu 'itanu mi 'adon lanu. psalms 12:5	mishod 'aniyim mei'anqat 'ebyonim 'atah 'aqum yomar yhvh 'ashit beyeisha' yafiakh lo. psalms 12:6	'imarot yhvh 'amarot tehorot kesef zaruf ba'alil la'arez mezuqaq shib'atayim. psalms 12:7	'atah yhvh tishmerem tizerenu min hador zu le'olam. psalms 12:8	sabib resha'im yithalakhun kerum zulut libnei 'adam. psalms 13:1	lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. 'ad 'anah yhvh tishkakheini nezakh 'ad 'anah tastir 'et panekha mimeni. psalms 13:2	'ad 'anah 'ashit 'eizot benafshi yagon bilbabi yomam 'ad 'anah yarum 'oyebi 'alai. psalms 13:3	habitah 'aneini yhvh 'elohai ha'irah 'einai pen 'ishan hamavet. psalms 13:4	pen yomar 'oyebi yekhaletiv zarai yagilu ki 'emot. psalms 13:5	va'ani bekhasdekha batakhti yagel libi bishu'atekha psalms 13:6	'ashirah yhvh ki gamal 'alai. psalms 14:1	lamnazeiakh ledavid 'amar nabal belibo 'en 'elohim hishkhitu hit'ibu 'alilah 'en 'oseh tob. psalms 14:2	yhvh mishamayim hishqif 'al benei 'adam lir'ot hayesh maskil doresh 'et 'elohim. psalms 14:3	hakol sar yakhdav ne'elakhu 'en 'oseh tob 'en gam 'ekhad. psalms 14:4	halo yade'u kal po'alei 'aven 'okhelei 'ami 'akhelu lekhem yhvh lo qara'u. psalms 14:5	sham pakhadu fakhad ki 'elohim bedor zadiq. psalms 14:6	'azat 'ani tabishu ki yhvh makhseihu. psalms 14:7	mi yiten miziyon yeshu'at yisra'el beshub yhvh shebut 'amo yagel ya'aqob yismakh yisra'el psalms 15:1	mizmor ledavid yhvh mi yagur be'aholekha mi yishkon behar qadshekha psalms 15:2	holekh tamim ufo'el zedeq vedober 'emet bilbabo. psalms 15:3	lo ragal 'al leshono lo 'asah lerei'eihu ra'ah vekherpah lo nasa 'al qerobo. psalms 15:4	nibzeh be'einav nim'as ve'et yir'ei yhvh yekhabed nishba' lehara' velo yamir. psalms 15:5	kaspo lo natan beneshekh veshokhad 'al naqi lo laqakh 'oseh 'eleh lo yimot le'olam. psalms 16:1	mikhtam ledavid shamereini 'el ki khasiti bakh. psalms 16:2	'amart yhvh 'adonai 'atah tobati bal 'alekha. psalms 16:3	liqdoshim 'asher ba'arez hemah ve'adirei kal khefzi bam. psalms 16:4	yirbu 'azebotam 'akher maharu bal 'asikh niskeihem midam ubal 'esa 'etosh motam 'al sefatai. psalms 16:5	yhvh menat khelqi vekhosi 'atah tomikh gorali. psalms 16:6	khabalim nafelu li bane'imim 'af nakhalat shaferah 'alai. psalms 16:7	'abarekh 'et yhvh 'asher ye'azani 'af leilot yiseruni khilyotai. psalms 16:8	shiviti yhvh lenegdi tamid ki mimini bal 'emot. psalms 16:9	lakhen samakh libi vayagel kebodi 'af besari yishkon labetakh. psalms 16:10	ki lo ta'azob nafshi lish'ol lo titen khasidekha lir'ot shakhat psalms 16:11	todi'eini 'orakh khayim soba' makhot 'et panekha ne'imot biminekha nezakh. psalms 17:1	tefilah ledavid shim'ah yhvh zedeq haqshibah rinati ha'azinah tefilati belo siftei mirmah. psalms 17:2	milefanekha mishpati yeizei 'einekha tekhezenah meisharim. psalms 17:3	bakhanta libi paqadta qeratikha khi ta'aneini 'el hat 'azenekha li shema' 'imrati. psalms 17:7	hafleh khasadekha moshia' khosim mimitqomim biminekha. psalms 17:8	mereini ke'ishon bat 'ayin bezel kenafekha tastireini. psalms 17:9	mipenei resha'im zu shaduni 'oyebai benefesh yaqifu 'alai. psalms 17:10	khelbamo sageru pimo diberu begei'ut. psalms 17:11	'ashureinu 'atah sebabuni sebabunu 'eineihem yashitu lintot ba'arez. psalms 17:12	dimyono ke'aryeh yikhsof litrof vekhikhfir yosheb bemistarim. psalms 17:13	qumah yhvh qademah fanav hakhri'eihu paletah nafshi meirasha' kharbekha. psalms 17:14	mimtim yadekha 18:1	lamnazeiakh le'ebed yhvh ledavid 'asher diber yhvh 'et dibrei hashirah hazot beyom hizil yhvh 'oto mikaf kal 'oyebav umiyad sha'ul. vayomar 'erkhamekha yhvh khizqi. psalms 18:2	yhvh sal'i umezudati umefalti 'eili zuri 'ekheseh bo magini veqeren yish'i misgabi. psalms 18:3	mehulal 'eqra yhvh umin 'oyebai 'ivasheia'. psalms 18:4	'afafuni kheblei mavet venakhalei beliya'al yeba'atuni. psalms 18:5	kheblei she'ol sebabuni qidemuni moqshei mavet. psalms 18:6	bazar li 'eqra yhvh ve'el 'elohai 'ashaveia' yishma' meiheikhalo qoli veshav'ati lefanav tabo be'azenav. psalms 18:7	vatig'ash psalms 18:10	vayirkab 'al kerub vaya'of vayeide 'al kanfei ruakh. psalms 18:11	yashet khoshekh sitro sebibotav sukato kheshkhat mayim 'abei shekhaqim. psalms 18:12	minogah negdo 'abav 'aberu barad 18:21	kisha marti darkhei yhvh velo rasha'ti mei'elohai. psalms 18:22	ki khal mishpatav lenegdi vekhuqotav lo 'asir meni. psalms 18:23	va'ehi tamim 'imo va'eshtamer mei'avoni. psalms 18:24	vayasheb magen hu lekhol hakhosim bo. psalms 18:31	ki mi 'eloah mibal'adei yhvh umi zur zulati 'eloheinu. psalms 18:32	ha'el ham'azereini khayil vayiten tamim darki. psalms 18:33	meshaveh raglai ka'ayalot ve'al bamotai ya'amideini. psalms 18:34	melamed yadai lamilkhamah venikhatah qeshet nekhushah zero'otai. psalms 18:35	vatiten li magen yish'ekha viminekha tis'adeini ve'anvatkha tarbeini. psalms 18:36	tarkhib za'adi takhtai velo ma'adu qarsulai. psalms 18:37	'erdof 'oybai ve'asigem velo 'ashub 'ad kalotam. psalms 18:38	'emkhazem velo yukhlu qum yipelu takhat raglai. psalms 18:39	vate'azereini 18:45	benei neikhar yibolu veyakhregu mimisgeroteihem. psalms 18:46	khai yhvh ubarukh zuri veyarum 'elohei yish'i. psalms 18:47	ha'el hanoten neqamot li vayadber 'amim takhtai. psalms 18:48	mefaleti ulezar'o 'ad 'olam. psalms 19:1	lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. hashamayim mesaperim kebod 'el uma'aseh yadav magid haraqia'. psalms 19:2	yom leyom yabia' 'omer velaylah lelaylah yekhaveh da'at. psalms 19:3	'en 'omer ve'en debarim beli nishma' qolam. psalms 19:4	bekhal ha'arez yaza qavam ubiqzeh teibel mileihem lashemesh sam 'ohel bahem. psalms 19:5	vehu kekhatan yozei meikhupato yasis kegibor laruz zeba'ot hu melekh hakabod selah. psalms 25:1	ledavid 'eilekha yhvh nafshi 'esa. psalms 25:2	'elohai bekha batakhti 'al 'eiboshah 'al ya'alzu 'oyebai li. psalms 25:3	gam kal qoekha lo yeiboshu yeiboshu qivitikha. psalms 25:22	pedeh 'elohim 'et yisra'el mikol zarotav psalms 26:1	ledavid shafeteini yhvh ki 'ani betumi halakhti yhvh batakhti lo 'em'ad. psalms 26:2	bekhaneini yhvh venaseini zerofah mishkan kebodekha. psalms 26:9	'al te'esof 'im khata'im nafshi ve'im 'anshei damim khayai. psalms 26:10	'asher bideihem zimah viminam male'ah shokhad. psalms 26:11	va'ani betumi 'eilekh pedeini vekhaneini psalms 26:12	ragli 'amedah bemishor bemaqheilim 'abarekh yhvh. psalms 27:1	ledavid yhvh 'ori veyish'i mimi 'ira yhvh ma'oz khayai mimi 'efkhad. psalms 27:2	biqrob 'alai merei'im le'ekhol 'et besari zarai ve'oyebai li hemah khashelu venafalu. psalms 27:3	'im takhaneh 'alai makhaneh lo yira libi 'im taqum 'alai milkhamah bezot 'ani boteiakh. psalms 27:4	'akhat sha'alti mei'et yhvh 'otah 'abaqesh shibti bebet yhvh kal yemei khayai lakhazot beno'am yhvh ulebaqer beheikhalo. psalms 27:5	ki yizpeneini besukoh beyom ra'ah yastireini beseiter 'aholo bezur yeromeini. psalms 27:6	ve'atah yarum roshi 'al 'oyebai sebibotai ve'ezbekhah be'aholo zibkhei teru'ah 'ashirah va'azamerah yhvh. psalms 27:7	shema' yhvh qoli 'eqra vekhaneini va'aneini. psalms 27:8	lekha 'amar libi baqeshu fanai 'et panekha yhvh 'abaqesh. psalms 27:9	'al taster panekha mimeni 'al tat be'af 'abdekha 'ezrati hayita 'al titesheini ve'al ta'azbeini 'elohei yish'i. psalms 27:10	ki 'abi ve'imi 'azabuni yhvh ya'asfeini. psalms 27:11	horeini yhvh darkekha unekheini be'orakh mishor lema'an shorrai. psalms 27:12	'al titeneini benefesh zarai ki qamu bi 'eideishe qer vifeiakh khamas. psalms 27:13	lulei he'emanti lir'ot betub yhvh be'erez khayim. psalms 27:14	qaveh 'el yhvh khazaq veya'amez libekha veqaveh 'el yhvh. psalms 28:1	ledavid 'eilekha yhvh 'eqra zuri 'al tekherash mimeni pen tekhesheh mimeni venimshalti 'im yordei bor. psalms 28:2	shema' qol takhanunai beshave'i 'eilekha benase'i yadai 'el debir qadshekha psalms 28:3	'al timshekheini 'im resha'im ve'im po'alei 'aven doberei lom 'im rei'eihem vera'ah bilbabam. psalms 28:4	ten lahem kefa'olam ukheroa' ma'aleihem kema'aseh yedeihem ten lahem hasheb gemulam lahem. psalms 28:5	ki lo yabinu 'el pe'ulot yhvh ve'el ma'aseh yadav yehersem velo yibnem. psalms 28:6	barukh yhvh kisha ma' qol takhanunai. psalms 28:7	yhvh 'uzi umagini bo batakh libi vene'ezareti vaya'aloz libi umishiri 'ahodenu. psalms 28:8	yhvh 'oz lamo uma'oz yeshu'ot meshikho hu. psalms 28:9	hoshi'ah 'et 'amekha ubarekh 'et nakhalatekha ure'em venase'em 'ad ha'olam. psalms 29:1	mizmor ledavid habu yhvh benei 'eilim habu yhvh kabod va'oz. psalms 29:2	habu yhvh kebod shemo hishtakhavu yhvh behadrat qodesh. psalms 29:3	qol yhvh 'al hamayim 'el hakabod hir'im yhvh 'al mayim rabim. psalms 29:4	qol yhvh bakoakh qol yhvh behadar. psalms 29:5	qol yhvh shober 'arazim vayshaber yhvh 'et 'arzei halebanon. psalms 29:6	vayarqidem kemo 'eigel lebanon vesiryon kemo ben re'eimim. psalms 29:7	qol yhvh khozeb lahabot 'esh. psalms 29:8	qol yhvh yakhil midbar yakhil yhvh midbar qadesh. psalms 29:9	qol yhvh yekholel 'ayalot vayekhesof ye'arot ubeheikhalo kulo 'omer kabod. psalms 29:10	yhvh lamabul yashab vayeisheb yhvh melekh le'olam. psalms 29:11	yhvh 'oz le'amo yiten yhvh yebarekh 'et 'amo bashalom. psalms 30:1	mizmor shir khanukat habayit ledavid. 'aromimkha yhvh ki dilitani velo simakhta 'oyebai li. psalms 30:2	yhvh 'elohai shiva'ti 'eilekha vatirpa'eini. psalms 30:3	yhvh he'elita min she'ol nafshi khiyitani miyordei miyaredi bor. psalms 30:4	zameru yhvh khasidav vehodu lezeikher qadesho. psalms 30:5	ki rega' be'apo khayim birzono ba'ereb yalin bekhi velaboqer rinah. psalms 30:6	va'ani 'amarti beshalvi bal 'emot le'olam. psalms 30:7	yhvh birzonkha he'emadtah leharri 'oz histarta fanekha hayiti nibhal. psalms 30:8	'eilekha yhvh 'eqra ve'el 'adonai 'etkhanan. psalms 30:9	mah beza' bedami beridti 'el shakhat hayodkha 'afar hayagid 'amitekha. psalms 30:10	shema' yhvh vekhaneini yhvh heyeh 'ozer li. psalms 30:11	hafakhta mispedi lemakhol li pitakhta saqi vate'azereini simkhah. psalms 30:12	lema'an yezamerkha khabod velo yidom yhvh 'elohai le'olam 'odeka. psalms 31:1	lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. bekha yhvh khasiti 'al 'eiboshah le'olam bezidqatekha faleteini. psalms 31:2	hateh 'eilai 'azenekha meheirah hazileini heyeh li lezur ma'oz lebet mezudot lehoshi'eini. psalms 31:3	ki sal'i umezudati 'atah ulema'an mekha tankheini utenahaleini. psalms 31:4	tozi'eini meireshet zu tamenu li ki 'atah ma'uzi. psalms 31:5	beyadekha 'afqid rukhi paditah 'oti yhvh 'el 'emet. psalms 31:6	saneiti hashomerim hablei shav va'ani 'el yhvh batakheti. psalms 31:7	'agilah ve'esmekhah bekhasdekha 'asher ra'ita 'et 'aneyi yada'ta bezarot nafshi. psalms 31:8	velo hisgartani beyad 'oyeb he'emadta bamerkhab raglai. psalms 31:9	khaneini yhvh ki zar li 'asheshah bekha'as 'eini nafshi ubitni. psalms 31:10	ki khalu beyagon khayai ushenotai ba'anakhah kashal ba'avoni khokhi va'azamai 'asheishu. psalms 31:11	mikal zorerai hayiti kherpah velishakheinai me'od ufakhad limyuda'ai ro'ai bakhuz nadedu mimeni. psalms 31:12	nishkakhti kemet mileb hayiti kikhli 'obed. psalms 31:13	ki shama'ti dibat rabim magor misabib behivasedam yakhad 'alai laqakhat nafshi zamamu. psalms 31:14	va'ani 'alekha batakhti yhvh 'amarti 'elohai 'atah. psalms 31:15	beyadekha 'itotai hazileini miyad 'oybai umeirodefai. psalms 31:16	ha'irah fanekha 'al 'abdekha hoshi'eini bekhasdekha. psalms 31:17	yhvh 'al 'eiboshah ki qeratikha yeiboshu resha'im yidemu lish'ol. psalms 31:18	tei'alamnah siftei shaqer hadoberot 'al zadiq 'ataq bega'avah vabuz. psalms 31:19	mah rab tubekha 'asher zafanta lirei'ekha pa'alta lakhosim bakh neged benei 'adam psalms 31:20	tastirem beseiter panekha meirukhsei 'ish tizpenem besukah meirib leshonot. psalms 31:21	barukh yhvh ki hifli khasdo li be'ir mazor. psalms 31:22	va'ani 'amarti bekhafezi nigrazti mineged 'einekha 'akhen ma'ta qol takhanunai beshave'i 'eilekha. psalms 31:23	'ehebu 'et yhvh kal khasidav 'emunim nozer yhvh umeshalem 'al yeter 'oseh ga'avah. psalms 31:24	khizqu veya'amez lebabkhem kal hamyakhalim yhvh. psalms 32:1	ledavid maskil 'ashrei nesui pesha' kesui khata'ah. psalms 32:2	'ashrei 'adam lo yakhshob yhvh lo 'avon ve'en berukho remiyah psalms 32:3	ki hekherashti balu 'azamai besha'agati kal hayom. psalms 32:4	ki yomam valaylah tikhbad 'alai yadekha nehpakh leshadi bekharbonei qayiz selah. psalms 32:5	khatati 'odi'akha va'avoni lo khisiti 'amarti 'odeh 'alei fesha'ai yhvh ve'atah nasata 'avon khatati selah. psalms 32:6	'al zot yitpalel kal khasid 'eilekha le'et mezo raq lesheitef mayim rabim 'eilav lo yagi'u. psalms 32:7	'atah seiter li mizar tizereini ranei falet tesobbeini selah. psalms 32:8	'askilekha ve'orkha bederekh zu teilekh 'i'azah 'alekha 'eini. psalms 32:9	'al tihyu kesus kefered 'en habin bemeteg varesen 'edyo liblom bal qerob 'eilekha. psalms 32:10	rabim makh'obim larasha' vehaboteiakh yhvh khesed yesobbenu. psalms 32:11	simkhu yhvh vegilu zadiqim veharninu kal yishrei leb. psalms 33:1	ranenu zadiqim yhvh laysharim navah tehilah. psalms 33:2	hodu yhvh bekhinor beneibel 'asor zameru lo. psalms 33:3	shiru lo shir khadash heitibu nagen bitru'ah. psalms 33:4	ki yashar debar yhvh vekhal ma'aseihu be'emunah. psalms 33:5	'oheb zedaqah umishpat khesed yhvh male'ah ha'arez. psalms 33:6	bidbar yhvh shamayim na'asu uberuakh piv kal zeba'am. psalms 33:7	kones kaned mei hayam noten be'ozarot tehomot. psalms 33:8	yire'u yhvh kal ha'arez mimenu yaguru kal yoshebei teibel. psalms 33:9	ki hu 'amar vayehi hu zivah vaya'amod. psalms 33:10	yhvh heifir 'azat goyim heini makhshebot 'amim. psalms 33:11	'azat yhvh le'olam ta'amod makhshebot libo ledor vador. psalms 33:12	'ashrei hago 'asher yhvh 'elohav ha'am bakhar lenakhalah lo. psalms 33:13	mishamayim hibit yhvh ra'ah 'et kal benei ha'adam. psalms 33:14	mimekhon shibto hishgiakh 'el kal yoshebei ha'arez. psalms 33:15	hayozer yakhad libam hameibin 'el kal ma'aseihem. psalms 33:16	'en hamelekh nosha' berab khayil gibor lo yinazel berab koakh. psalms 33:17	sheqer hasus litshu'ah uberob kheilo lo yemalet. psalms 33:18	hineh 'en yhvh 'el yerei'av lamyakhalim lekhasdo. psalms 33:19	lehazil mimavet nafsham ulekhayotam bara'ab. psalms 33:20	nafsheinu khiketah yhvh 'ezreinu umagineinu hu. psalms 33:21	ki bo yismakh libeinu ki beshem qadesho batakhenu. psalms 33:22	yehi khasdekha yhvh 'aleinu ka'asher yikhalnu lakh. psalms 34:1	ledavid beshanoto 'et ta'mo lifnei 'abimelekh vaygarasheihu vayeilakh. 'abarakhah 'et yhvh bekhal 'et tamid tehilato befi. psalms 34:2	yhvh tithalel nafshi yishme'u 'anavim veyismakhu. psalms 34:3	gadelu yhvh 'iti uneromah shemo yakhdav. psalms 34:4	darashti 'et yhvh ve'anani umikal megurotai hizilani. psalms 34:5	hibitu 'eilav venaharu ufeneihem 'al yekhparu. psalms 34:6	zeh 'ani qara yhvh shameia' umikal zarotav hoshi'o. psalms 34:7	khoneh mal'akh yhvh sabib lirei'av vaykhalezem. psalms 34:8	ta'amu ure'u ki tob yhvh 'ashrei hageber yekheseh bo. psalms 34:9	yer'u 'et yhvh qedoshav ki 'en makhsor lirei'av. psalms 34:10	kefirim rashu vera'eibu vedoreshei yhvh lo yakhseru khal tob. psalms 34:11	lekhu banim shim'u li yir'at yhvh 'alamedkhem. psalms 34:12	mi ha'ish hekhafez khayim 'oheb yamim lir'ot tob. psalms 34:13	nezor leshonkha meira' usefatekha midaber mirmah. psalms 34:14	sur meira' va'aseh tob baqesh shalom veradefeihu. psalms 34:15	'einei yhvh 'el zadiqim ve'azenav 'el shav'atam. psalms 34:16	penei yhvh be'osei ra' lehakhrit mei'erez zikhram. psalms 34:17	za'aqu yhvh shameia' umikal zarotam hizilam. psalms 34:18	qarob yhvh lenishberei leb ve'et dake'ei ruakh yoshia'. psalms 34:19	rabot ra'ot zadiq umikulam yazilenu yhvh. psalms 34:20	shomer kal 'azmotav 'akhat meihenah lo nishbarah. psalms 34:21	temotet rasha' ra'ah vesone'ei zadiq ye'shamu. psalms 34:22	podeh yhvh nefesh 'abadav velo ye'shemu kal hakhosim bo. psalms 35:1	ledavid ribah yhvh 'et yeribai lekham 'et lokhamai. psalms 35:2	hakhazeq magen vezinah vequmah be'ezrati. psalms 35:3	vehareq khanit usegor liqrat rodefai 'emor lenafshi yeshu'atekh 'ani. psalms 35:4	yeiboshu veyikalemu mebaqshei nafshi yisogu 'akhor veyakhperu khoshebei ra'ati. psalms 35:5	yihyu kemoz lifnei ruakh umal'akh yhvh dokheh. psalms 35:6	yehi darkam khoshekh vakhalaqlaqot umal'akh yhvh rodefam. psalms 35:7	ki khinam tamenu li shakhat rishtam khinam khaferu lenafshi. psalms 35:8	tebo'eihu sho'ah lo yeida' verishto 'asher taman tilkedo besho'ah yipal bah. psalms 35:9	venafshi tagil yhvh tasis bishu'ato. psalms 35:10	kal 'azmotai tomarnah yhvh mi khamokha mazil 'ani meikhazaq mimenu ve'ani ve'ebyon migozelo. psalms 35:11	yequmun 'eidei khamas 'asher lo yada'ti yish'aluni. psalms 35:12	yeshalemuni ra'ah takhat tobah shekhol lenafshi. psalms 35:13	va'ani bakhalotam lebushi saq 'ineiti bazom nafshi utefilati 'al kheiqi tashub. psalms 35:14	kereia' ke'akh li hithalakheti ka'abel 'em qoder shakhoti. psalms 35:15	ubezal'i samekhu vene'esafu ne'esfu 'alai neikhim velo yada'ti qare'u velo damu. psalms 35:16	bekhanfei la'agei ma'og kharoq 'alai shineimo. psalms 35:17	'adonai kamah tir'eh hashibah nafshi misho'eihem mikefirim yekhidati. psalms 35:18	'odkha beqahal rab be'am 'azum 'ahaleka. psalms 35:19	'al yismekhu li 'oyebai sheqer sone'ai khinam yiqrezu 'ayin. psalms 35:20	ki lo shalom yedabeiru ve'al rig'ei 'erez dibrei mirmot yakhashobun. psalms 35:21	vayarkhibu 'alai pihem 'ameru he'akh he'akh ra'atah 'eineinu. psalms 35:22	ra'itah yhvh 'al tekherash 'adonai 'al tirkhaq mimeni. psalms 35:23	ha'irah vehaqizah lemishpati 'elohai vadonai leribi. psalms 35:24	shafeteini khezidqekha yhvh 'elohai ve'al yismekhu li. psalms 35:25	'al yomeru belibam he'akh nafsheinu 'al yomeru bila'anuhu. psalms 35:26	yeiboshu veyakhperu yakhdav semeikhei ra'ati yilbeshu boshet ukhelimah hamagdilim 'alai. psalms 35:27	yaronu veyismekhu khafeizei zidqi veyomeru tamid yigdal yhvh hekhafez shelom 'abdo. psalms 35:28	uleshoni tehgeh zidqekha kal hayom tehilatekha. psalms 36:1	lamnazeiakh le'ebed yhvh ledavid. ne'um pesha' larasha' beqereb libi 'en pakhad 'elohim leneged 'einav. psalms 36:2	ki hekheliq 'eilav be'einav limzo 'avono lisno. psalms 36:3	dibrei fiv 'aven umirmah khadal lehaskil leheitib. psalms 36:4	'aven yakhshob 'al mishkabo yityazeb 'al derekh lo tob ra' lo yim'as. psalms 36:5	yhvh behashamayim khasdekha 'emunatekha 'ad shekhaqim. psalms 36:6	zidqatekha keharrei 'el mishpatekha tehom rabah 'adam ubeheimah toshia' yhvh. psalms 36:7	mah yaqar khasdekha 'elohim ubenei 'adam bezel kenafekha yekhesayun. psalms 36:8	yirveyun mideshen beitekha venakhal 'adanekha tashqem. psalms 36:9	ki 'imekha meqor khayim be'orkha nir'eh 'or. psalms 36:10	meshokh khasdekha leyode'ekha vezidqatekha leyishrei leb. psalms 36:11	'al tebo'eini regel ga'avah veyad resha'im 'al tenideini. psalms 36:12	sham nafelu po'alei 'aven dokhu velo yakhelu qum. psalms 37:1	ledavid 'al titkhar bamerei'im 'al teqanei be'osei 'avlah. psalms 37:2	ki khekhazir meheirah yimalu ukheyereq deshe yibolun. psalms 37:3	betakh yhvh va'aseh tob shekhan 'erez ure'eh 'emunah. psalms 37:4	vehit'anag 'al yhvh veyiten lekha mish'alot libekha. psalms 37:5	gol 'al yhvh darkekha ubetakh 'alav vehu ya'aseh. psalms 37:6	vehozi kha'or zidqekha umishpatekha kazahorayim. psalms 37:7	dom yhvh vehitkholel lo 'al titkhar bemazliakh darko be'ish 'oseh mezimot. psalms 37:8	heref mei'af va'azob kheimah 'al titkhar 'akh lehareia'. psalms 37:9	ki merei'im yikareitun veqoei yhvh hemah yireshu 'arez. psalms 37:10	ve'od me'at ve'en rasha' vehitbonanta 'al meqomo ve'einenu. psalms 37:11	va'anavim yireshu 'arez vehit'anegu 'al rob shalom. psalms 37:12	zomem rasha' lazadiq vekhoreq 'alav shinav. psalms 37:13	'adonai yiskhaq lo ki ra'ah ki yabo yomo. psalms 37:14	khereb patekhu resha'im vedarekhu qashtam lehapil 'ani ve'ebyon litboakh yishrei darekh. psalms 37:15	kharbam tabo belibam veqashetotam tishabarnah. psalms 37:16	tob me'at lazadiq meihamon resha'im rabim. psalms 37:17	ki zero'ot resha'im tishabarnah vesomekh zadiqim yhvh. psalms 37:18	yodeia' yhvh yemei temimim venakhalatam le'olam tihyeh. psalms 37:19	lo yeiboshu be'et ra'ah ubimei re'abon yisba'u. psalms 37:20	ki resha'im yobeidu ve'oyebei yhvh kiqar karim kalu be'ashan kalu. psalms 37:21	loeh rasha' velo yeshalem vezadiq khonen venoten. psalms 37:22	ki meborakhav yireshu 'arez umequlalav yikareitu. psalms 37:23	yhvh miz'adei geber konanu vedarko yekhpaz. psalms 37:24	ki yipol lo yutal ki yhvh somekh yado. psalms 37:25	na'ar hayiti gam zaqanti velo ra'iti zadiq ne'ezab vezar'o mebaqesh lakhem. psalms 37:26	kal hayom khonen umalveh vezar'o librakhah. psalms 37:27	sur meira' va'aseh tob ushekhon le'olam. psalms 37:28	ki yhvh 'oheb mishpat velo ya'azob 'et khasidav le'olam nishmaru vezera' resha'im nikhrat. psalms 37:29	zadiqim yireshu 'arez veyishkenu la'ad 'aleha. psalms 37:30	pi zadiq yehgeh khakhmah uleshono tedaber mishpat. psalms 37:31	torat 'elohav belibo lo tim'ad 'ashurav. psalms 37:32	zofeh rasha' lazadiq umebaqesh lahamito psalms 37:33	yhvh lo ya'azbenu beyado velo yarshi'enu behishafeto. psalms 37:34	qaveh 'el yhvh ushemor darko viromimkha lareshet 'arez behikaret resha'im tir'eh. psalms 37:35	ra'iti rasha' 'ariz umit'areh ke'ezrakh ra'anan. psalms 37:36	vaya'abor vehineh 'einenu va'abaqsheihu velo nimza. psalms 37:37	shemar tam ure'eh yashar ki 'akharit le'ish shalom. psalms 37:38	ufoshe'im nishmedu yakhdav 'akharit resha'im nikhratah. psalms 37:39	uteshu'at zadiqim yhvh ma'uzam be'et zarah. psalms 37:40	vaya'zerem yhvh vayfaletem yefaletem meiresha'im veyoshi'em ki khasu bo. psalms 38:1	mizmor ledavid lehazkir. yhvh 'al beqezpekha tokhikheini ubakhamatekha teyasereini. psalms 38:2	ki khizekha nikhatu bi vatinkhat 'alai yadekha. psalms 38:3	'en metom bibsari mipenei za'mekha 'en shalom ba'azamai mipenei khatati. psalms 38:4	ki 'avonotai 'aberu roshi kemasa khabed yikhbedu mimeni. psalms 38:5	hib'ishu namaqu khaburotai mipenei 'ivalti. psalms 38:6	na'aveiti shakhoti 'ad me'od kal hayom qoder hilakheti. psalms 38:7	ki khesalai male'u niqleh ve'en metom bibsari. psalms 38:8	nefugoti venidkeiti 'ad me'od 'agti minahamat libi. psalms 38:9	'adonai negdekha khal ta'avati ve'ankhati mimekha lo nistarah. psalms 38:10	libi sekharkhar 'azabani khokhi ve'or 'einai gam hem 'en 'iti. psalms 38:11	'ohabai verei'ai mineged nig'i ya'amodu uqerobai meirakhoq 'amadu. psalms 38:12	vaynaqshu mebaqshei nafshi vedoreshei ra'ati diberu havot umirmot kal hayom yehgu. psalms 38:13	va'ani khekheiresh lo 'eshma' ukhe'ilem lo yiftakh piv. psalms 38:14	va'ehi ke'ish 'asher lo shomeia' ve'en befiv tokhakhot. psalms 38:15	ki lekha yhvh hokhaleti 'atah ta'aneh 'adonai 'elohai. psalms 38:16	ki 'amarti pen yismekhu li bemot ragli 'alai higdilu. psalms 38:17	ki 'ani lezela' nakhon umakh'obi negdi tamid. psalms 38:18	ki 'avoni 'agid 'ed'ag meikhatati. psalms 38:19	ve'oyebai khayim 'azeimu verabu sone'ai shaqer. psalms 38:20	umeshalemei ra'ah takhat tobah yistenuni takhat redofi radefi tob. psalms 38:21	'al ta'azbeini yhvh 'elohai 'al tirkhaq mimeni. psalms 38:22	khushah le'ezrati 'adonai teshu'ati. psalms 39:1	lamnazeiakh liditun lidutun mizmor ledavid. 'amarti 'eshmerah derakhai meikhato bilshoni 'eshmerah lefi makhsom be'od rasha' lenegdi. psalms 39:2	ne'elamti dumiyah hekhesheiti mitob ukhe'eibi ne'kar. psalms 39:3	kham libi beqirbi bahagigi tib'ar 'esh dibarti bilshoni. psalms 39:4	hodi'eini yhvh qizi umidat yamai mah hi 'eide'ah meh khadel 'ani. psalms 39:5	hineh tefakhot natatah yamai vekheldi khe'ayin negdekha 'akh kal hebel kal 'adam nizab selah. psalms 39:6	'akh bezelem yithalekh 'ish 'akh hebel yehemayun yizbor velo yeida' mi 'osefam. psalms 39:7	ve'atah mah qiviti 'adonai tokhalti lekha hi. psalms 39:8	mikal pesha'ai hazileini kherpat nabal 'al tesimeini. psalms 39:9	ne'elamti lo 'eftakh pi ki 'atah 'asita. psalms 39:10	haser mei'alai nig'ekha mitigrat yadekha 'ani khaliti. psalms 39:11	betokhakhot 'al 'avon yisarta 'ish vatemes ka'ash khamudo 'akh hebel kal 'adam selah. psalms 39:12	shim'ah tefilati yhvh veshav'ati ha'azinah 'el dim'ati 'al tekherash ki ger 'anokhi 'imakh toshab kekhal 'abotai. psalms 39:13	hasha' mimeni ve'abligah beterem 'eilekh ve'eineni. psalms 40:1	lamnazeiakh ledavid mizmor. qavoh qiviti yhvh vayet 'eilai vayishma' shav'ati. psalms 40:2	vaya'aleini mibor sha'on mitit hayaven vayaqem 'al sela' raglai konen 'ashurai. psalms 40:3	vayiten befi shir khadash tehilah leiloheinu yir'u rabim veyira'u veyibtekhu yhvh. psalms 40:4	'ashrei hageber 'asher sam yhvh mibtakho velo fanah 'el rehabim vesatei khazab. psalms 40:5	rabot 'asita 'atah yhvh 'elohai nifle'otekha umakhshebotekha 'eileinu 'en 'arokh 'eilekha 'agidah va'adabeirah 'azemu misaper. psalms 40:6	zebakh uminkhah lo khafazta 'azenayim karita li 'olah vakhata'ah lo sha'aleta. psalms 40:7	'az 'amarti hineh bati bimgilat seifer katub 'alai. psalms 40:8	la'asot rezonkha 'elohai khafazeti vetoratekha betokh mei'ai. psalms 40:9	bisarti zedeq beqahal rab hineh fatai lo 'ekhla yhvh 'atah yada'eta. psalms 40:10	zidqatekha lo khisiti betokh libi 'emunatekha uteshu'atekha 'amareti lo khikhadti khasdekha va'amitekha leqahal rab. psalms 40:11	'atah yhvh lo tikhla rakhamekha mimeni khasdekha va'amitekha tamid yizeruni. psalms 40:12	ki 'afefu 'alai ra'ot 'ad 'en mispar hisiguni 'avonotai velo yakholeti lir'ot 'azemu misa'arot roshi velibi 'azabani. psalms 40:13	rezeh yhvh lehazileini yhvh le'ezrati khushah. psalms 40:14	yeiboshu veyakhperu yakhad mebaqshei nafshi lispotah yisogu 'akhor veyikalemu khafeizei ra'ati. psalms 40:15	yashomu 'al 'eiqeb bashetam ha'omerim li he'akh he'akh. psalms 40:16	yasisu veyismekhu bekha kal mebaqshekha yomeru tamid yigdal yhvh 'ohabei teshu'atekha. psalms 40:17	va'ani 'ani ve'ebyon 'adonai yakhashab li 'ezrati umefalti 'atah 'elohai 'al te'akhar. psalms 41:1	lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. 'ashrei maskil 'el dal beyom ra'ah yemaleteihu yhvh. psalms 41:2	yhvh yishmereihu vikhayeihu ye'shor ve'ushar ba'arez ve'al titeneihu benefesh 'oyebav. psalms 41:3	yhvh yis'adenu 'al 'eres devai kal mishkabo hafakhta bekhaleyo. psalms 41:4	'ani 'amarti yhvh khaneini refa'ah nafshi ki khatati lakh. psalms 41:5	'oybai yomeru ra' li matai yamut ve'abad shemo. psalms 41:6	ve'im ba lir'ot shav yedaber libo yiqbaz 'aven lo yeizei lakhuz yedaber. psalms 41:7	yakhad 'alai yitlakhashu kal sone'ai 'alai yakhshebu ra'ah li. psalms 41:8	debar beliya'al yazuq bo va'asher khab lo yosif laqum. psalms 41:9	gam 'ish shelomi 'asher batakhti bo 'okhel lakhmi higdil 'alai 'aqeb. psalms 41:10	ve'atah yhvh khaneini vahaqimeini va'ashalemah lahem. psalms 41:11	bezot yada'ti ki khafazta bi ki lo yaria' 'oyebi 'alai. psalms 41:12	va'ani betumi tamakhta bi vatazibeini lefanekha le'olam. psalms 41:13	barukh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el meiha'olam ve'ad ha'olam 'amen ve'amen. psalms 42:1	lamnazeiakh maskil libnei qorakh. ke'ayal ta'arog 'al 'afiqei mayim ken nafshi ta'arog 'eilekha 'elohim. psalms 42:2	zame'ah nafshi leilohim le'el khai matai 'abo ve'eira'eh penei 'elohim. psalms 42:3	hayetah li dim'ati lekhem yomam valayelah be'emor 'eilai kal hayom 'ayeh 'elohekha. psalms 42:4	'eleh 'ezkerah ve'eshpekhah 'alai nafshi ki 'e'ebor basakh 'edadem 'ad bet 'elohim beqol rinah vetodah hamon khogeg. psalms 42:5	mah tishtokhakhi nafshi vatehemi 'alai hokhili leilohim ki 'od 'odenu yeshu'ot panav. psalms 42:6	'elohai 'alai nafshi tishtokhakh 'al ken 'ezkarekha mei'erez yarden vekhermonim meihar miz'ar. psalms 42:7	tehom 'el tehom qorei leqol zinorekha kal mishbarekha vegalekha 'alai 'abaru. psalms 42:8	yomam yezaveh yhvh khasdo ubalaylah shirah shiro 'imi tefilah le'el khayai. psalms 42:9	'omrah le'el sal'i lamah shekhakhtani lamah qoder 'eilekh belakhaz 'oyeb. psalms 42:10	berezakh be'azmotai kheirefuni zorrai be'ameram 'eilai kal hayom 'ayeh 'elohekha. psalms 42:11	mah tishtokhakhi nafshi umah tehemi 'alai hokhili leilohim ki 'od 'odenu yeshu'ot panai veilohai. psalms 43:1	shafeteini 'elohim veribah ribi migo lo khasid mei'ish mirmah ve'avlah tefaleteini. psalms 43:2	ki 'atah 'elohei ma'uzi lamah zenakhtani lamah qoder 'ethalekh belakhaz 'oyeb. psalms 43:3	shelakh 'orkha va'amitekha hemah yankhuni yebi'uni 'el har qadshekha ve'el mishkenotekha. psalms 43:4	ve'abo'ah 'el mizbakh 'elohim 'el 'el simkhat gili ve'odkha bekhinor 'elohim 'elohai. psalms 43:5	mah tishtokhakhi nafshi umah tehemi 'alai hokhili leilohim ki 'od 'odenu yeshu'ot panai veilohai. psalms 44:1	lamnazeiakh libnei qorakh maskil. 'elohim be'azeneinu shama'nu 'aboteinu siperu lanu po'al pa'alta bimeihem bimei qedem. psalms 44:2	'atah yadekha goyim horashta vatita'em tara' le'umim vateshalekhem. psalms 44:3	ki lo bekharbam yareshu 'arez uzero'am lo hoshi'ah lamo ki yeminekha uzero'akha ve'or panekha ki rezitam. psalms 44:4	'atah hu malki 'elohim zaveh yeshu'ot ya'aqob. psalms 44:5	bekha zareinu nenageiakh beshimkha nabus qameinu. psalms 44:6	ki lo beqashti 'ebtakh vekharbi lo toshi'eini. psalms 44:7	ki hosha'tanu mizareinu umesan'einu hebishota. psalms 44:8	beilohim hilalnu khal hayom veshimkha le'olam nodeh selah. psalms 44:9	'af zanakhta vatakhlimeinu velo teizei bezib'oteinu. psalms 44:10	teshibeinu 'akhor mini zar umesan'einu shasu lamo. psalms 44:11	titeneinu kezon ma'akhal ubagoyim zeiritanu. psalms 44:12	timkor 'amekha belo hon velo ribita bimkhireihem. psalms 44:13	tesimeinu kherpah lishkheineinu la'ag vaqeles lisbiboteinu. psalms 44:14	tesimeinu mashal bagoyim menod rosh bal 'umim. psalms 44:15	kal hayom kelimati negdi uboshet panai kisateni. psalms 44:16	miqol mekharef umegadef mipenei 'oyeb umitnaqem. psalms 44:17	kal zot ba'atnu velo shekhakhanukha veloshi qarnu bibritekha. psalms 44:18	lo nasog 'akhor libeinu vatet 'ashureinu mini 'arekhekha. psalms 44:19	ki dikitanu bimqom tanim vatekhas 'aleinu bezalmavet. psalms 44:20	'imosha khakhnu shem 'eloheinu vanifros kapeinu le'el zar. psalms 44:21	halo 'elohim yakhaqar zot ki hu yodeia' ta'alumot leb. psalms 44:22	ki 'alekha horagnu khal hayom nekhshabnu kezon tibkhah. psalms 44:23	'urah lamah tishan 'adonai haqizah 'al tiznakh lanezakh. psalms 44:24	lamah fanekha tastir tishkakh 'aneyeinu velakhazeinu. psalms 44:25	ki shakhah le'afar nafsheinu dabeqah la'arez bitneinu. psalms 44:26	qumah 'ezratah lanu ufedeinu lema'an khasdekha. psalms 45:1	lamnazeiakh 'alosho shanim libnei qorakh maskil shir yedidot. rakhash libi dabar tob 'omer 'ani ma'asai lemelekh leshoni 'et sofer mahir. psalms 45:2	yafeyafita mibenei 'adam huzaq khen besefetotekha 'al ken beirakhkha 'elohim le'olam. psalms 45:3	khagor kharbekha 'al yarekh gibor hodkha vahadarekha. psalms 45:4	vahadarekha zelakh rekhab 'al debar 'emet ve'anvah zedeq vetorkha nora'ot yeminekha. psalms 45:5	khizekha shenunim 'amim takhtekha yipelu beleb 'oybei hamelekh. psalms 45:6	kis'akha 'elohim 'olam va'ed sheibet mishor sheibet malkhutekha. psalms 45:7	'ahabta zedeq vatisna resha' 'al ken meshakhakha 'elohim 'elohekha shemen sason meikhabeirekha. psalms 45:8	mor va'ahalot qezi'ot kal bigdotekha min heikhelei n mini simekhukha. psalms 45:9	benot melakhim beyiqerotekha nizebah sheigal liminekha bekhetem 'ofir. psalms 45:10	shim'i bat ure'i vehati 'azenekh veshikhkhi 'amekh ubet 'abikh. psalms 45:11	veyit'av hamelekh yafeyekh ki hu 'adonayikh vehishtakhavi lo. psalms 45:12	ubat zor beminkhah panayikh yekhalu 'ashirei 'am. psalms 45:13	kal kebudah bat melekh penimah mimishbezot zahab lebushah. psalms 45:14	lirqamot tubal lamelekh betulot 'akhareha rei'oteha muba'ot lakh. psalms 45:15	tubalnah bismakhot vagil tebo'enah beheikhal melekh. psalms 45:16	takhat 'abotekha yihyu banekha teshiteimo lesarim bekhal ha'arez. psalms 45:17	'azkirah mekha bekhal dor vador 'al ken 'amim yehodukha le'olam va'ed. psalms 46:1	lamnazeiakh libnei qorakh 'al 'alamot shir. 46:4	nahar pelagav yesamekhu 'ir 'elohim qedosh mishkenei 'elyon. psalms 46:5	'elohim beqirbah bal timot ya'zereha 'elohim lifnot boqer. psalms 46:6	hamu goyim matu mamlakhot natan beqolo tamug 'arez. psalms 46:7	yhvh zeba'ot 'imanu misgab lanu 'elohei ya'aqob selah. psalms 46:8	lekhu khazu mif'alot yhvh 'asher sam shamot ba'arez. psalms 46:9	mashbit milkhamot 'ad qezeh ha'arez qeshet yeshaber 47:1	lamnazeiakh libnei qorakh mizmor. kal ha'amim tiq'u khaf hari'u leilohim beqol rinah. psalms 47:2	ki yhvh 'elyon nora melekh gadol 'al kal ha'arez. psalms 47:3	yadber 'amim takhteinu ule'umim 'abraham ki leilohim maginei 'erez me'od na'alah. psalms 48:1	shir mizmor libnei qorakh. gadol yhvh umehulal me'od be'ir 'eloheinu har qadesho. psalms 48:2	yefeh nof mesos kal ha'arez har ziyon 48:6	re'adah 'akhazatam sham khil kayoleidah. psalms 48:7	beruakh qadim teshaber 'oniyot tarshish. psalms 48:8	ka'asher shama'nu ken ra'inu be'ir yhvh zeba'ot be'ir 'eloheinu 'elohim yekhoneha 'ad 'olam selah. psalms 48:9	diminu 'elohim khasdekha beqereb heikhalekha. psalms 48:10	keshimkha 'elohim ken tehilatekha 'al qazvei 'erez zedeq male'ah yeminekha. psalms 48:11	yismakh har ziyon 48:14	ki zeh 'elohim 'eloheinu 'olam va'ed hu yenahageinu 'al mut. psalms 49:1	lamnazeiakh libnei qorakh mizmor. shim'u zot kal ha'amim ha'azinu kal yoshebei khaled. psalms 49:2	gam benei 'adam gam 49:9	vikhi 'od lanezakh lo yir'eh hashakhat. psalms 49:10	ki yir'eh khakhamim yamutu yakhad kesil vaba'ar yobeidu ve'azebu la'akheirim kheilam. psalms 49:11	qirbam bateimo le'olam mishkenotam ledor 'ish ki yirbeh kebod beito. psalms 49:17	ki lo bemoto yiqakh hakol lo yeired 'akharav kebodo. psalms 49:18	ki nafsho bekhayav yebarekh veyodukha ki teitib lakh. psalms 49:19	tabo 'ad dor 'abotav 'ad neizakh lo yir'u 'or. psalms 49:20	'adam biqar velo yabin nimshal kabeheimot nidmu. psalms 50:1	mizmor le'asaf 'el 'elohim yhvh diber vayiqra 'arez mimizrakhoshe mesh 'ad mebo'o. psalms 50:2	miziyon 50:8	lo 'al zebakhekha 'okhikhekha ve'olotekha lenegdi tamid. psalms 50:9	lo 'eqakh mibeitekha far mimikhle'otekha 'atudim. psalms 50:10	ki li khal khayto ya'ar beheimot beharrei 'alef. psalms 50:17	ve'atah saneita musar vatashlekh debarai 'akharekha. psalms 50:18	'im ra'ita ganab vatirez 'imo ve'im mena'afim khelqekha. psalms 50:19	pikha shalakhta bera'ah uleshonkha tazmid mirmah. psalms 50:20	teisheb be'akhikha tedaber beben 'imekha titen dofi. psalms 50:21	'eleh 'asita vehekherashti dimita heyot 'ehyeh khamokha 'okhikhakha ve'e'erkhah le'einekha. psalms 50:22	binu na zot shokhekhei 'eloah pen 'etrof ve'en mazil. psalms 50:23	zobeiakh todah yekhabedaneni vesam derekh 'ar'enu beyeisha' 'elohim. psalms 51:1	lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. bebo 'eilav natan hanabi ka'asher ba 'el bat shaba'. khaneini 'elohim kekhasdekha kerob rakhamekha mekheh fesha'ai. psalms 51:2	harbeh hereb kabeseini mei'avoni umeikhatati tahareini. psalms 51:3	ki fesha'ai 'ani 'eida' vekhatati negdi tamid. psalms 51:4	lekha lebadekha khatati vehara' be'einekha 'asiti lema'an tizdaq bedaberekha tizkeh beshafetekha. psalms 51:5	hen be'avon kholaleti ubekhet yekhematni 'imi. psalms 51:6	hen 'emet khafazta batukhot ubesatum khakhmah todi'eini. psalms 51:7	tekhate'eini be'eizob ve'ethar tekhabeseini umisheleg 'albin. psalms 51:8	tashmi'eini sason vesimkhah tageilenah 'azamot dikita. psalms 51:9	haster
