psalms 51:12	hashibah li seson yish'ekha veruakh nedibah tismekheini. psalms 51:13	'alamedah foshe'im derakhekha vekhata'im 'eilekha yashubu. psalms 51:14	hazileini midamim 'elohim 'elohei teshu'ati teranen leshoni zidqatekha. psalms 51:15	'adonai sefatai tiftakh ufi yagid tehilatekha. psalms 51:16	ki lo takhpoz zebakh ve'eteinah 'olah lo tirzeh. psalms 51:17	zibkhei 'elohim ruakh nishbarah leb nishbar venidkeh 'elohim lo tibzeh. psalms 51:18	heitibah birzonkha 'et ziyon tibneh khomot yerushalim. psalms 51:19	'az takhpoz zibkhei zedeq 'olah vekhalil 'az ya'alu 'al mizbakhakha farim. psalms 52:1	lamnazeiakh maskil ledavid. bebo do'eg ha'adomi vayaged lesha'ul vayomer lo ba david 'el bet 'akhimelekh. mah tithalel bera'ah hagibor khesed 'el kal hayom. psalms 52:2	havot takhshob leshonekha keta'ar melutash 'oseh remiyah. psalms 52:3	'ahabta ra' mitob sheqer midaber zedeq selah. psalms 52:4	'ahabta khal dibrei bala' leshon mirmah. psalms 52:5	gam 'el yitazekha lanezakh yakhtekha veyisakhakha mei'ohel vesheireshkha mei'erez khayim selah. psalms 52:6	veyir'u zadiqim veyira'u ve'alav yiskhaqu. psalms 52:7	hineh hageber lo yasim 'elohim ma'uzo vayibtakh berob 'ashero ya'oz behavato. psalms 52:8	va'ani kezayit ra'anan bebet 'elohim batakhti bekhesed 'elohim 'olam va'ed. psalms 52:9	'odkha le'olam ki 'asita va'aqaveh shimkha khi tob neged khasidekha. psalms 53:1	lamnazeiakh 'al makhalat maskil ledavid. 'amar nabal belibo 'en 'elohim hishkhitu vehit'ibu 'avel 'en 'oseh tob. psalms 53:2	'elohim mishamayim hishqif 'al benei 'adam lir'ot hayesh maskil doresh 'et 'elohim. psalms 53:3	kulo sag yakhdav ne'elakhu 'en 'oseh tob 'en gam 'ekhad. psalms 53:4	halo yade'u po'alei 'aven 'okhelei 'ami 'akhelu lekhem 'elohim lo qara'u. psalms 53:5	sham pakhadu fakhad lo hayah fakhad ki 'elohim pizar 'azmot khonakh hebishotah ki 'elohim me'asam. psalms 53:6	mi yiten miziyon yeshu'ot yisra'el beshub 'elohim shebut 'amo yagel ya'aqob yismakh yisra'el. psalms 54:1	lamnazeiakh binginot maskil ledavid. bebo hazifim vayomeru lesha'ul halo david mistater 'imanu. 'elohim beshimkha hoshi'eini ubigburatekha tedineini. psalms 54:2	'elohim shema' tefilati ha'azinah le'imrei fi. psalms 54:3	ki zarim qamu 'alai ve'arizim biqshu nafshi lo samu 'elohim lenegdam selah. psalms 54:4	hineh 'elohim 'ozer li 'adonai besomekhei nafshi. psalms 54:5	yashob yashib hara' leshorerai ba'amitekha hazmitem. psalms 54:6	bindabah 'ezbekhah lakh 'odeh shimkha yhvh ki tob. psalms 54:7	ki mikal zarah hizilani ube'oyebai ra'atah 'eini. psalms 55:1	lamnazeiakh binginot maskil ledavid. ha'azinah 'elohim tefilati ve'al tit'alam mitekhinati. psalms 55:2	haqshibah li va'aneini 'arid besikhi ve'ahimah. psalms 55:3	miqol 'oyeb mipenei 'aqat rasha' ki yamitu 'alai 'aven ube'af yistemuni. psalms 55:4	libi yakhil beqirbi ve'eimot mavet nafelu 'alai. psalms 55:5	yir'ah vara'ad yabo bi vatekhaseini palazut. psalms 55:6	va'omar mi yiten li 'eiber kayonah 'a'ufah ve'eshkonah. psalms 55:7	hineh 'arkhiq nedod 'alin bamidbar selah. psalms 55:8	'akhishah miflat li meiruakh so'ah misa'ar. psalms 55:9	bala' 'adonai palag leshonam ki ra'iti khamas verib ba'ir. psalms 55:10	yomam valaylah yesobbuha 'al khomoteha ve'aven ve'amal beqirbah. psalms 55:11	havot beqirbah velo yamish meirekhobah tokh umirmah. psalms 55:12	ki lo 'oyeb yekharefeini ve'esa lo mesan'i 'alai higdil ve'esater mimenu. psalms 55:13	ve'atah 'enosh ke'erki 'alufi umeyuda'i. psalms 55:14	'asher yakhdav namtiq sod bebet 'elohim nehalekh beragesh. psalms 55:15	yashimavet yashi mavet 'aleimo yeiredu she'ol khayim ki ra'ot bimguram beqirbam. psalms 55:16	'ani 'el 'elohim 'eqra yhvh yoshi'eini. psalms 55:17	'ereb vaboqer vezahorayim 'asikhah ve'ehemeh vayishma' qoli. psalms 55:18	padah beshalom nafshi miqarab li ki berabim hayu 'imadi. psalms 55:19	yishma' 'el veya'anem veyosheb qedem selah 'asher 'en khalifot lamo velo yare'u 'elohim. psalms 55:20	shalakh yadav bishlomav khilel berito. psalms 55:21	khalequ makhma'ot piv uqarab libo raku debarav mishemen vehemah fetikhot. psalms 55:22	hashlekh 'al yhvh yehabekha vehu yekhalkelekha lo yiten le'olam mot lazadiq. psalms 55:23	ve'atah 'elohim toridem lib'er shakhat 'anshei damim umirmah lo yekhezu yemeihem va'ani 'ebtakh bakh. psalms 56:1	lamnazeiakh 'al yonat 'eilem rekhoqim ledavid mikhtam be'ekhoz 'oto felishtim begat. khaneini 'elohim ki she'afani 'enosh kal hayom lokhem yilkhazeini. psalms 56:2	sha'afu vrrai kal hayom ki rabim lokhamim li marom. psalms 56:3	yom 'ira 'ani 'eilekha 'ebtakh. psalms 56:4	beilohim 'ahalel debaro beilohim batakhti lo 'ira mah ya'aseh basar li. psalms 56:5	kal hayom debarai ye'azeibu 'alai kal makhshebotam lara'. psalms 56:6	yaguru yazpinu yizponu hemah 'aqeibai yishmoru ka'asher qivu nafshi. psalms 56:7	'al 'aven palet lamo be'af 'amim hored 'elohim. psalms 56:8	nodi safartah 'atah simah dim'ati benodekha halo besifratekha. psalms 56:9	'az yashubu 'oybai 'akhor beyom 'eqra zeh yada'ti ki 'elohim li. psalms 56:10	beilohim 'ahalel dabar yhvh 'ahalel dabar. psalms 56:11	beilohim batakhti lo 'ira mah ya'aseh 'adam li. psalms 56:12	'alai 'elohim nedarekha 'ashalem todot lakh. psalms 56:13	ki hizalta nafshi mimavet halo raglai midekhi lehithalekh lifnei 'elohim be'or hakhayim. psalms 57:1	lamnazeiakh 'al tashkhet ledavid mikhtam bebarekho mipeneisha 'ul bame'arah. khaneini 'elohim khaneini ki bekha khasayah nafshi ubezel kenafekha 'ekhseh 'ad ya'abor havot. psalms 57:2	'eqra leilohim 'elyon la'el gomer 'alai. psalms 57:3	yishlakh mishamayim veyoshi'eini kheiref sho'afi selah yishlakh 'elohim khasdo va'amito. psalms 57:4	nafshi betokh leba'im 'eshkebah lohatim benei 'adam neihem khanit vekhizim uleshonam khereb khadah. psalms 57:5	rumah 'al hashamayim 'elohim 'al kal ha'arez kebodekha. psalms 57:6	reshet heikhinu lif'amai kafaf nafshi karu lefanai shikhah nafelu betokhah selah. psalms 57:7	nakhon libi 'elohim nakhon libi 'ashirah va'azameirah. psalms 57:8	'urah khebodi 'urah haneibel vekhinor 'a'irah shakhar. psalms 57:9	'odkha ba'amim 'adonai 'azamerkha bal 'umim. psalms 57:10	ki gadol 'ad shamayim khasdekha ve'ad shekhaqim 'amitekha. psalms 57:11	rumah 'al shamayim 'elohim 'al kal ha'arez kebodekha. psalms 58:1	lamnazeiakh 'al tashkhet ledavid mikhtam. ha'umnam 'eilem zedeq tedabeirun meisharim tishpetu benei 'adam. psalms 58:2	'af beleb 'olot tif'alun ba'arez khamas yedeikhem tefaleisun. psalms 58:3	zoru resha'im meirakhem ta'u mibeten doberei khazab. psalms 58:4	khamat lamo kidmut khamat nakhash kemo feten kheiresh ya'tem 'azeno. psalms 58:5	'asher lo yishma' leqol melakhashim khober khabarim mekhukam. psalms 58:6	'elohim haras shineimo befimo malte'ot kefirim netoz yhvh. psalms 58:7	yima'asu khemo mayim yithalekhu lamo yidrokh khizo khizav kemo yitmolalu. psalms 58:8	kemo belul temes yahalokh neifel 'eishet bal khazu shamesh. psalms 58:9	beterem yabinu siroteikhem 'atad kemo khai kemo kharon yis'arenu. psalms 58:10	yismakh zadiq ki khazah naqam pe'amav yirkhaz bedam harasha'. psalms 58:11	veyomar 'adam 'akh peri lazadiq 'akh yesh 'elohim shofetim ba'arez. psalms 59:1	lamnazeiakh 'al tashkhet ledavid mikhtam bishloakh sha'ul vayishmeru 'et habayit lahamito. hazileini mei'oyebai 'elohai mimitqomai tesagebeini. psalms 59:2	hazileini mipo'alei 'aven umei'anshei damim hoshi'eini. psalms 59:3	ki hineh 'arebu lenafshi yaguru 'alai 'azim lo fish'i velo khatati yhvh. psalms 59:4	beli 'avon yeruzun veyikonanu 'urah liqrati ure'eh. psalms 59:5	ve'atah yhvh 'elohim zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el haqizah lifqod kal hagoyim 'al takhon kal bogedei 'aven selah. psalms 59:6	yashubu la'ereb yehemu khakaleb visobbu 'ir. psalms 59:7	hineh yabi'un befihem kharabot besiftoteihem ki mi shomeia'. psalms 59:8	ve'atah yhvh tiskhaq lamo til'ag lekhal goyim. psalms 59:9	'uzo 'eilekha 'eshmorah ki 'elohim misgabi. psalms 59:10	'elohei khasdo khasdi yeqademeini 'elohim yar'eini beshorerai. psalms 59:11	'al tahargem pen yishkekhu 'ami hani'eimo bekheilekha vehorideimo magineinu 'adonai. psalms 59:12	khatat pimo debar sefateimo veyilakhedu big'onam umei'alah umikakhash yesapeiru. psalms 59:13	kaleh bekheimah kaleh ve'eineimo veyeide'u ki 'elohim moshel beya'aqob le'afsei ha'arez selah. psalms 59:14	veyashubu la'ereb yehemu khakaleb visobbu 'ir. psalms 59:15	hemah yenu'un yeni'un le'ekhol 'im lo yisbe'u vayalinu. psalms 59:16	va'ani 'ashir 'uzekha va'aranen laboqer khasdekha ki hayita misgab li umanos beyom zar li. psalms 59:17	'uzi 'eilekha 'azameirah ki 'elohim misgabi 'elohei khasdi. psalms 60:1	lamnazeiakh 'al shushan 'eidut mikhtam ledavid lelamed. behazoto 'et 'aram naharayim ve'et 'aram zobah vayashab yo'ab vayakh 'et 'edom begei melakh shenem 'asar 'alef. 'elohim zenakhtanu feraztanu 'anafta teshobeb lanu. psalms 60:2	hir'ashtah 'erez pezamtah refah shebareha khi matah. psalms 60:3	hir'itah 'amekha qashah hishqitanu yayin tar'eilah. psalms 60:4	natatah lirei'ekha nes lehitnoses mipenei qoshet selah. psalms 60:5	lema'an yeikhalezun yedidekha hoshi'ah yeminekha va'aneinu va'aneini. psalms 60:6	'elohim diber beqadesho 'e'lozah 'akhaleqah shekhem ve'eimeq sukot 'amaded. psalms 60:7	li gil'ad veli menasheh ve'efrayim ma'oz roshi yehudah mekhoqeqi. psalms 60:8	mo'ab sir rakhzi 'al 'edom 'ashlikh na'ali 'alai peleshet hitro'a'i. psalms 60:9	mi yobileini 'ir mazor mi nakhani 'ad 'edom. psalms 60:10	halo 'atah 'elohim zenakhtanu velo teizei 'elohim bezib'oteinu. psalms 60:11	habah lanu 'ezrat mizar veshav teshu'at 'adam psalms 60:12	beilohim na'aseh khayil vehu yabus zareinu. psalms 61:1	lamnazeiakh 'al neginat ledavid. shim'ah 'elohim rinati haqshibah tefilati. psalms 61:2	miqzeh ha'arez 'eilekha 'eqra ba'atof libi bezur yarum mimeni tankheini. psalms 61:3	ki hayita makhseh li migdal 'oz mipenei 'oyeb. psalms 61:4	'agurah be'ahalekha 'olamim 'ekheseh beseiter kenafekha selah. psalms 61:5	ki 'atah 'elohim shama'ta lindarai natata yerushat yir'ei shemekha. psalms 61:6	yamim 'al yemei melekh tosif notav kemo dor vador. psalms 61:7	yeisheb 'olam lifnei 'elohim khesed ve'emet man yinzeruhu. psalms 61:8	ken 'azamerah shimkha la'ad leshalemi nedarai yom yom. psalms 62:1	lamnazeiakh 'al yedutun mizmor ledavid. 'akh 'el 'elohim dumiyah nafshi mimenu yeshu'ati. psalms 62:2	'akh hu zuri vishu'ati misgabi lo 'emot rabah. psalms 62:3	'ad 'anah tehotu 'al 'ish terazekhu khulekhem keqir natui gader hadekhuyah. psalms 62:4	'akh mise'eito ya'azu lehadiakh yirzu khazab befiv yebareikhu ubeqirbam yeqalu selah. psalms 62:5	'akh leilohim domi nafshi ki mimenu tiqvati. psalms 62:6	'akh hu zuri vishu'ati misgabi lo 'emot. psalms 62:7	'al 'elohim yish'i ukhebodi zur 'uzi makhsi beilohim. psalms 62:8	bitkhu bo bekhal 'et 'am shifkhu lefanav lebabkhem 'elohim makhaseh lanu selah. psalms 62:9	'akh hebel benei 'adam kazab benei 'ish bemozenayim la'alot hemah meihebel yakhad. psalms 62:10	'al tibtekhu be'osheq ubegazel 'al tehbalu khayil ki yanub 'al tashitu leb. psalms 62:11	'akhat diber 'elohim shetayim zu shama'eti ki 'oz leilohim. psalms 62:12	ulekha 'adonai khased ki 'atah teshalem le'ish kema'aseihu. psalms 63:1	mizmor ledavid bihyoto bemidbar yehudah. 'elohim 'eili 'atah 'ashakhareka zame'ah lekha nafshi kamah lekha besari be'erez ziyah ve'ayef beli mayim. psalms 63:2	ken baqodesh khazitikha lir'ot 'uzekha ukhebodekha. psalms 63:3	ki tob khasdekha meikhayim sefatai yeshabekhunekha. psalms 63:4	ken 'abarekhkha bekhayai beshimkha 'esa khapai. psalms 63:5	kemo kheileb vadeshen tisba' nafshi vesiftei renanot yehalel pi. psalms 63:6	'im zekhartikha 'al yezu'ai be'ashmurot 'ehgeh bakh. psalms 63:7	ki hayita 'ezratah li ubezel kenafekha 'aranen. psalms 63:8	dabeqah nafshi 'akharekha bi tamekhah yeminekha. psalms 63:9	vehemah lesho'ah yebaqshu nafshi yabo'u betakhtiyot ha'arez. psalms 63:10	yagiruhu 'al yedei khareb menat shu'alim yihyu. psalms 63:11	vehamelekh yismakh beilohim yithalel kal hanishba' bo ki yisakher pi dobrei shaqer. psalms 64:1	lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. shema' 'elohim qoli besikhi mipakhad 'oyeb tizor khayai. psalms 64:2	tastireini misod merei'im meirigshat po'alei 'aven. psalms 64:3	'asher shanenu khakhereb leshonam darekhu khizam dabar mar. psalms 64:4	lirot bamistarim tam pit'om yoruhu velo yira'u. psalms 64:5	yekhazequ lamo dabar ra' yesaperu litmon moqshim 'ameru mi yir'eh lamo. psalms 64:6	yakhpesu 'olot tamnu kheifes mekhupas veqereb 'ish veleb 'amoq. psalms 64:7	vayorem 'elohim khez pit'om hayu makotam. psalms 64:8	vayakhshiluhu 'aleimo leshonam yitnodadu kal ro'eh bam. psalms 64:9	vayire'u kal 'adam vayagidu po'al 'elohim uma'aseihu hiskilu. psalms 64:10	yismakh zadiq yhvh vekhasah bo veyithalu kal yishrei leb. psalms 65:1	lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid shir. lekha dumiyah tehilah 'elohim beziyon ulekha yeshulam neder. psalms 65:2	shomeia' tefilah 'adekha kal basar yabo'u. psalms 65:3	dibrei 'avonot gaberu meni pesha'einu 'atah tekhaperem. psalms 65:4	'ashrei tibkhar uteqareb yishkon khazeirekha nisbe'ah betub beitekha qedosh heikhalekha. psalms 65:5	nora'ot bezedeq ta'aneinu 'elohei yish'einu mibtakh kal qazvei 'erez veyam rekhoqim. psalms 65:6	meikhin harim bekhokho ne'zar bigburah. psalms 65:7	mashbiakh she'on yamim she'on galeihem vahamon le'umim. psalms 65:8	vayire'u yoshebei qezavot mei'ototekha moza'ei boqer va'ereb tarnin. psalms 65:9	paqadta ha'arez vateshoqeqeha rabat ta'sherenah peleg 'elohim malei mayim takhin deganam ki khen tekhineha. psalms 65:10	telameha raveh nakhet gedudeha birbibim temogegenah zimkhah tebarekh. psalms 65:11	'itarta shenat tobatekha uma'galekha yir'afun dashen. psalms 65:12	yir'afu ne'ot midbar vegil geba'ot takhgorenah. psalms 65:13	labeshu kharim hazon va'amaqim ya'atfu bar yitro'a'u 'af yashiru. psalms 66:1	lamnazeiakh shir mizmor hari'u leilohim kal ha'arez. psalms 66:2	zameru khebod shemo simu khabod tehilato. psalms 66:3	'imru leilohim mah nora ma'asekha berob 'uzekha yekhakhashu lekha 'oyebekha. psalms 66:4	kal ha'arez yishtakhavu lekha vizameru lakh yezameru shimkha selah. psalms 66:5	lekhu ure'u mif'alot 'elohim nora 'alilah 'al benei 'adam. psalms 66:6	hafakh yam leyabashah banahar ya'abru beragel m nismekhah bo. psalms 66:7	moshel bigburato 'olam 'einav bagoyim tizpenah hasorrim 'al yarimu yarumu lamo selah. psalms 66:8	barekhu 'amim 'eloheinu vehashmi'u qol tehilato. psalms 66:9	hasam nafsheinu bakhayim velo natan lamot ragleinu. psalms 66:10	ki bekhantanu 'elohim zeraftanu kizraf kasef. psalms 66:11	habeitanu bamezudah samta mu'aqah bemateneinu. psalms 66:12	hirkabta 'enosh lerosheinu banu ba'esh ubamayim vatozi'einu larevayah. psalms 66:13	'abo beitekha be'olot 'ashalem lekha nedarai. psalms 66:14	'asher pazu sefatai vediber pi bazar li. psalms 66:15	'olot meikhim 'a'aleh lakh 'im qetoret 'eilim 'e'eseh baqar 'im 'atudim selah. psalms 66:16	lekhu shim'u va'asaperah kal yir'ei 'elohim 'asher 'asah lenafshi. psalms 66:17	'eilav pi qarati veromam takhat leshoni. psalms 66:18	'aven 'im ra'iti belibi lo yishma' 'adonai. psalms 66:19	'akhen shama' 'elohim hiqshib beqol tefilati. psalms 66:20	barukh 'elohim 'asher lo heisir tefilati vekhasdo mei'iti. psalms 67:1	lamnazekh binginot mizmor shir. 'elohim yekhaneinu vibarekheinu ya'er panav 'itanu selah. psalms 67:2	lada'at ba'arez darkekha bekhal goyim yeshu'atekha. psalms 67:3	yodukha 'amim 'elohim yodukha 'amim kulam. psalms 67:4	yismekhu viranenu le'umim ki tishpot 'amim mishor ule'umim ba'arez tankhem selah. psalms 67:5	yodukha 'amim 'elohim yodukha 'amim kulam. psalms 67:6	'erez natenah yebulah yebarekheinu 'elohim 'eloheinu. psalms 67:7	yebarekheinu 'elohim veyire'u 'oto kal 'afsei 'arez. psalms 68:1	lamnazeiakh ledavid mizmor shir. yaqum 'elohim yafuzu 'oybav veyanusu mesan'av mipanav. psalms 68:2	kehindof 'ashan tindof kehimes donag mipenei 'esh yobedu resha'im mipenei 'elohim. psalms 68:3	vezadiqim yismekhu ya'alzu lifnei 'elohim veyasisu besimkhah. psalms 68:4	shiru leilohim zameru shemo solu larokheb ba'arabot beyah shemo ve'ilzu lefanav. psalms 68:5	'abi yetomim vedayan 'almanot 'elohim bim'on qadesho. psalms 68:6	'elohim moshib yekhidim baytah mozi 'asirim bakosharot 'akh sorarim shakhenu zekhikhah. psalms 68:7	'elohim bezeitekha lifnei 'amekha beza'dekha bishimon selah. psalms 68:8	'erez ra'ashah 'af shamayim natefu mipenei 'elohim zeh sinai mipenei 'elohim 'elohei yisra'el. psalms 68:9	geshem nedabot tanif 'elohim nakhalatekha venil'ah 'atah khonantah. psalms 68:10	khayatekha yashebu bah takhin betobatekha le'ani 'elohim. psalms 68:11	'adonai yiten 'omer hambaserot zaba rab. psalms 68:12	malkhei zeba'ot yidodun yidodun unevat bayit tekhaleq shalal. psalms 68:13	'im tishkebun ben shefatayim kanfei yonah nekhpah bakesef ve'ebroteha biraqraq kharuz. psalms 68:14	befares shadai melakhim bah tashleg bezalmon. psalms 68:15	har 'elohim har bashan har gabnunim har bashan. psalms 68:16	lamah terazedun harim gabnunim hahar khamad 'elohim leshibto 'af yhvh yishkon lanezakh. psalms 68:17	rekheb 'elohim ribotayim 'alfei shin'an 'adonai bam sinai baqodesh. psalms 68:18	'alita lamarom shabita shebi laqakhta matanot ba'adam ve'af sorrim lishkon yah 'elohim. psalms 68:19	barukh 'adonai yom yom ya'amas lanu ha'el yeshu'ateinu selah. psalms 68:20	ha'el lanu 'el lemosha'ot yhvh 'adonai lamavet toza'ot. psalms 68:21	'akh 'elohim yimkhaz rosh 'oyebav qadeqod sei'ar mithalekh ba'ashamav. psalms 68:22	'amar 'adonai mibashan 'ashib 'ashib mimezulot yam. psalms 68:23	lema'an timkhaz raglekha bedam leshon kelabekha mei'oyebim mineihu. psalms 68:24	ra'u halikhotekha 'elohim halikhot 'eili malki baqodesh. psalms 68:25	qidemu rim 'akhar nogenim betokh 'alamot tofeifot. psalms 68:26	bemaqheilot barekhu 'elohim yhvh mimeqor yisra'el. psalms 68:27	sham binyamin za'ir rodem sarei yehudah rigmatam sarei zebulun sarei naftali. psalms 68:28	zivah 'elohekha 'uzekha 'uzah 'elohim zu pa'alta lanu. psalms 68:29	meiheikhalekha 'al yerushalim lekha yobilu melakhim shai. psalms 68:30	ge'ar khayat qaneh 'adat 'abirim be'eglei 'amim mitrapes berazei khasef bizar 'amim qerabot yekhpazu. psalms 68:31	ye'etayu khashmanim mini mizrayim kush tariz yadav leilohim. psalms 68:32	mamlekhot ha'arez shiru leilohim zameru 'adonai selah. psalms 68:33	larokheb bishmei shemei qedem hen yiten beqolo qol 'oz. psalms 68:34	tenu 'oz leilohim 'al yisra'el ga'avato ve'uzo bashekhaqim. psalms 68:35	nora 'elohim mimiqdashekha 'el yisra'el hu noten 'oz veta'azumot la'am barukh 'elohim. psalms 69:1	lamnazeiakh 'al shoshanim ledavid. hoshi'eini 'elohim ki ba'u mayim 'ad nafesh. psalms 69:2	taba'ti biven mezulah ve'en ma'omad bati bema'amaqei mayim veshibolet shetafateni. psalms 69:3	yaga'ti beqare'i nikhar geroni kalu 'einai meyakhel leilohai. psalms 69:4	rabu misa'arot roshi sone'ai khinam 'azemu mazmitai 'oyebai sheqer 'asher lo gazalti 'az 'ashib. psalms 69:5	'elohim 'atah yada'ta le'ivalti ve'ashmotai mimekha lo nikhkhadu. psalms 69:6	'al yeiboshu bi qoekha 'adonai yhvh zeba'ot 'al yikalemu bi mebaqshekha 'elohei yisra'el. psalms 69:7	ki 'alekha nasati kherpah kisetah khelimah fanai. psalms 69:8	muzar hayiti le'ekhai venakheri libnei 'imi. psalms 69:9	ki qin'at beitekha 'akhalateni vekherpot khorfekha nafelu 'alai. psalms 69:10	va'ebkeh bazom nafshi vatehi lakharafot li. psalms 69:11	va'etenah lebushi saq va'ehi lahem lemashal. psalms 69:12	yasikhu bi yoshebei sha'ar uneginot shotei sheikhar. psalms 69:13	va'ani tefilati lekha yhvh 'et razon 'elohim berab khasdekha 'aneini be'emet yish'ekha. psalms 69:14	hazileini mitit ve'al 'etba'ah 'inazelah misone'ai umima'amaqei mayim. psalms 69:15	'al tishtefeini shibolet mayim ve'al tibla'eini mezulah ve'al te'tar 'alai be'er piha. psalms 69:16	'aneini yhvh ki tob khasdekha kerob rakhamekha peneh 'eilai. psalms 69:17	ve'al taster panekha mei'abdekha ki zar li maher 'aneini. psalms 69:18	qarebah 'el nafshi ge'alah lema'an 'oyebai pedeini. psalms 69:19	'atah yada'ta kherpati ubasheti ukhelimati negdekha kal zorrai. psalms 69:20	kherpah shaberah libi va'anushah va'aqaveh lanud va'ayin velamnakhamim velo mazati. psalms 69:21	vayitenu bebaruti rosh velizma'i yashquni khomez. psalms 69:22	yehi shulkhanam lifneihem lefakh velishlomim lemoqesh. psalms 69:23	tekhshakhnah 'eineihem meire'ot umateneihem tamid ham'ad. psalms 69:24	shefakh 'aleihem za'mekha vakharon 'apekha yasigem. psalms 69:25	tehi tiratam neshamah be'aholeihem 'al yehi yosheb. psalms 69:26	ki 'atah 'asher hikita radafu ve'el makh'ob khalalekha yesapeiru. psalms 69:27	tenah 'avon 'al 'avonam ve'al yabo'u bezidqatekha. psalms 69:28	yimakhu miseifer khayim ve'im zadiqim 'al yikateibu. psalms 69:29	va'ani 'ani vekho'eb yeshu'atekha 'elohim tesagebeini. psalms 69:30	'ahalah shem 'elohim beshir va'agadelenu betodah. psalms 69:31	vetitab yhvh mishor par maqrin mafris. psalms 69:32	ra'u 'anavim yismakhu doreshei 'elohim vikhi lebabkhem. psalms 69:33	ki shomeia' 'el 'ebyonim yhvh ve'et 'asirav lo bazah. psalms 69:34	yehaluhu shamayim va'arez yamim vekhal romes bam. psalms 69:35	ki 'elohim yoshia' ziyon veyibneh 'arei yehudah veyashebu m vireishuha. psalms 69:36	vezera' 'abadav yinkhaluha ve'ohabei mo yishkenu bah. psalms 70:1	lamnazeiakh ledavid lehazkir. psalms 71:1	bekha yhvh khasiti 'al 'eiboshah le'olam. psalms 71:2	bezidqatekha tazileini utefaleteini hateh 'eilai 'azenekha vehoshi'eini. psalms 71:3	heyeh li lezur ma'on labo tamid zivita 'asher 'asita gedolot 'elohim mi khamokha. psalms 71:20	'asher hir'itanu hir'itani zarot rabot vera'ot tashub tekhayeinu tekhayeini umitehomot ha'arez tashub ta'aleini. psalms 71:21	tereb gedulati psalms 78:69	vayiben kemo ramim miqdasho ke'erez yesadah le'olam. psalms 78:70	vayibkhar bedavid 'abdo vayiqakheihu mimikhle'ot zon. psalms 78:71	mei'akhar 'alot hebi'o lir'ot beya'aqob 'amo ubeyisra'el nakhalato. psalms 78:72	vayir'em ketom lebabo ubitbunot kapav yankhem. psalms 79:1	mizmor le'asaf 'elohim ba'u goyim benakhalatekha time'u 'et heikhal qadshekha samu 'et yerushalim le'iyim. psalms 79:2	natenu 'et niblat 'abadekha ma'akhal le'of hashamayim besar khasidekha lekhayto 'arez. psalms 79:3	shafekhu damam kamayim sebibot yerushalim ve'en qober. psalms 79:4	hayinu kherpah lishkheineinu la'ag vaqeles lisbiboteinu. psalms 79:5	'ad mah yhvh te'enaf lanezakh tib'ar kemo 'esh qin'atekha. psalms 79:6	shefokh khamatekha 'el hagoyim 'asher lo yeda'ukha ve'al mamlakhot 'asher beshimkha lo qara'u. psalms 79:7	ki 'akhal 'et ya'aqob ve'et naveihu heishamu. psalms 79:8	'al tizkar lanu 'avonot rishonim maher yeqademunu rakhamekha ki dalonu me'od. psalms 79:9	'azereinu 'elohei yish'einu 'al debar kebod shemekha vehazileinu vekhaper 'al khatoteinu lema'an shemekha. psalms 79:10	lamah yomeru hagoyim 'ayeh 'eloheihem yivada' bagiyim bagoyim le'eineinu niqmat dam 'abadekha hashafukh. psalms 79:11	tabo lefanekha 'enqat 'asir kegodel zero'akha hoter benei temutah. psalms 79:12	vehasheb lishkheineinu be'atayim 'el kheiqam kherpatam 'asher kheirefukha 'adonai. psalms 79:13	va'anakhnu 'amekha vezon mar'itekha nodeh lekha le'olam ledor vador nesaper tehilatekha. psalms 80:1	lamnazeiakh 'el shoshanim 'eidut le'asaf mizmor. ro'eh yisra'el ha'azinah noheg kazon yosef yosheb hakerubim hofi'ah. psalms 80:2	lifnei 'efrayim ubinyamin umenasheh 'orrah 'et geburatekha ulekhah lishu'atah lanu. psalms 80:3	'elohim hashibeinu veha'er panekha venivashei'ah. psalms 80:4	yhvh 'elohim zeba'ot 'ad matai 'ashanta bitfilat 'amekha. psalms 80:5	he'ekhaltam lekhem dim'ah vatashqeimo bidma'ot shalish. psalms 80:6	tesimeinu madon lishkheineinu ve'oyebeinu yil'agu lamo. psalms 80:7	'elohim zeba'ot hashibeinu veha'er panekha venivashei'ah. psalms 80:8	gefen mimizrayim tasia' tegaresh goyim vatita'eha. psalms 80:9	pinita lefaneha vatashresh rasheha vatemalei 'arez. psalms 80:10	kasu harim zilah va'anafeha 'arzei 'el. psalms 80:11	teshalakh qezireha 'ad yam ve'el nahar yonqoteha. psalms 80:12	lamah parazta gedeireha ve'aruha kal 'oberei darekh. psalms 80:13	yekharsemenah khazir miya'ar veziz sadai yir'enah. psalms 80:14	'elohim zeba'ot shub na habet mishamayim ure'eh ufeqod gefen zot. psalms 80:15	vekhanah 'asher nate'ah yeminekha ve'al ben 'imaztah lakh. psalms 80:16	serufah ba'esh kesukhah miga'arat panekha yobeidu. psalms 80:17	tehi yadekha 'al 'ish yeminekha 'al ben 'adam 'imazta lakh. psalms 80:18	velo nasog mimeka tekhayeinu ubeshimkha niqra. psalms 80:19	yhvh 'elohim zeba'ot hashibeinu ha'er panekha venivashei'ah. psalms 81:1	lamnazeiakh 'al hagitit le'asaf. harninu leilohim 'uzeinu hari'u leilohei ya'aqob. psalms 81:2	se'u zimrah utenu tof kinor na'im 'im nabel. psalms 81:3	tiq'u bakhodesh shofar bakeiseh leyom khageinu. psalms 81:4	ki khoq leyisra'el hu mishpat leilohei ya'aqob. psalms 81:5	'eidut bihosef samo bezeito 'al 'erez mizrayim sefat lo yada'ti 'eshma'. psalms 81:6	hasiroti miseibel shikhmo kapav midud ta'aborenah. psalms 81:7	bazarah qarata va'akhalezeka 'e'enkha beseiter ra'am 'ebkhanekha 'al mei meribah selah. psalms 81:8	shema' 'ami ve'a'idah bakh yisra'el 'im tishma' li. psalms 81:9	lo yihyeh bekha 'el zar velo tishtakhaveh le'el neikhar. psalms 81:10	'anokhi yhvh 'elohekha hama'alkha mei'erez mizrayim harkheb pikha va'amal'eihu. psalms 81:11	velo shama' 'ami leqoli veyisra'el lo 'abah li. psalms 81:12	va'ashalekheihu bishrirut libam yeilekhu bemo'azoteihem. psalms 81:13	lu 'ami shomeia' li yisra'el bidrakhai yehaleikhu. psalms 81:14	kim'at 'oybeihem 'akhnia' ve'al zareihem 'ashib yadi. psalms 81:15	mesan'ei yhvh yekhakhashu lo vihi 'itam le'olam. psalms 81:16	vaya'akhileihu meikheileb khitah umizur debash 'asbi'ekha. psalms 82:1	mizmor le'asaf 'elohim nizab ba'adat 'el beqereb 'elohim yishpot. psalms 82:2	'ad matai tishpetu 'avel ufenei resha'im tis'u selah. psalms 82:3	shiftu dal veyatom 'ani varash hazdiqu. psalms 82:4	paletu dal ve'ebyon miyad resha'im hazilu. psalms 82:5	lo yade'u velo yabinu bakhasheikhah yithalakhu yimotu kal mosdei 'arez. psalms 82:6	'ani 'amarti 'elohim 'atem ubenei 'elyon kulekhem. psalms 82:7	'akhen ke'adam temutun ukhe'akhad hasarim tipolu. psalms 82:8	qumah 'elohim shafetah ha'arez ki 'atah tinkhal bekhal hagoyim. psalms 83:1	shir mizmor le'asaf. 83:4	'ameru lekhu venakhkhidem migo velo yizakher shem yisra'el 'od. psalms 83:5	ki no'azu leb yakhdav 'alekha berit yikhrotu. psalms 83:6	'aholei 'edom veyishme'eilim mo'ab vehagrim. psalms 83:16	malei feneihem qalon vibaqshu shimkha yhvh. psalms 83:17	yeiboshu veyibahalu 'adei 'ad veyakhperu veyobeidu. psalms 83:18	veyeide'u ki 'atah shimkha yhvh lebadekha 'elyon 'al kal ha'arez. psalms 84:1	lamnazeiakh 'al hagitit libnei qorakh mizmor. mah yedidot mishkenotekha yhvh zeba'ot. psalms 84:2	nikhsefah vegam kaletah nafshi lekhazrot yhvh libi ubesari yeranenu 'el 'el khai. psalms 84:3	gam zipor maze'ah bayit uderor qen lah 'asher shatah 'efrokheha 'et mizbekhotekha yhvh zeba'ot malki veilohai. psalms 84:4	'ashrei yoshebei beitekha 'od yehalukha selah. psalms 84:5	'ashrei 'adam 'oz lo bakh mesilot bilbabam. psalms 84:6	'oberei be'eimeq habakha ma'yan yeshituhu gam berakhot ya'teh moreh. psalms 84:7	yeilekhu meikhayil 'el khayil yeira'eh 'el 'elohim beziyon. psalms 84:8	yhvh 'elohim midur be'aholei resha'. psalms 84:11	ki shemesh umagen yhvh 'elohim khen vekhabod yiten yhvh lo yimna' tob laholekhim betamim. psalms 84:12	yhvh zeba'ot 'ashrei 'adam boteiakh bakh. psalms 85:1	lamnazeiakh libnei qorakh mizmor. razita yhvh 'arzekha beta shebut shebit ya'aqob. psalms 85:2	nasata 'avon 'amekha kisita khal khatatam selah. psalms 85:3	'asafta khal 'ebratekha heshibota ve'oseh nifla'ot 'atah 'elohim lebadekha. psalms 86:11	horeini yhvh darkekha 'ahalekh ba'amitekha yakhed lebabi leyir'ah shemekha. psalms 86:12	'odkha 'adonai 'elohai bekhal lebabi va'akhabedah shimkha le'olam. psalms 86:13	ki khasdekha gadol 'alai vehizalta nafshi mishe'ol takhtiyah. psalms 86:14	'elohim zeidim qamu 'alai va'adat 'arizim biqshu nafshi velo samukha lenegdam. psalms 86:15	ve'atah 'adonai 'el rakhum vekhanun 'erekh 'apayim verab khesed ve'emet. psalms 86:16	peneh 'eilai vekhaneini tenah 'uzekha le'abdekha vehoshi'ah leben 'amatekha. psalms 86:17	'aseh 'imi 'ot letobah veyir'u sone'ai veyeiboshu ki 'atah yhvh 'azartani venikhamtani. psalms 87:1	libnei qorakh mizmor shir yesudato beharrei qodesh. psalms 87:2	'oheb yhvh sha'arei ziyon mikol mishkenot ya'aqob. meshikhekha. psalms 89:52	barukh yhvh le'olam 'amen ve'amen. psalms 90:1	tefilah lemosheh 'ish ha'elohim 'adonai ma'on 'atah hayita lanu bedor vador. psalms 90:2	beterem harim yuladu vatekholel 'erez 90:5	zeramtam sheinah yihyu baboqer kekhazir yakhalof. psalms 90:6	baboqer yaziz vekhalaf la'ereb yemolel veyabesh. psalms 90:7	ki khalinu be'apekha ubakhamatekha nibhalenu. psalms 90:8	shata shatah 'el 'abadekha fa'olekha vahadarekha 'al beneihem. psalms 90:17	vihi no'am 'adonai 'eloheinu 'aleinu uma'aseh yadeinu konah 'aleinu uma'aseh yadeinu koneihu. psalms 91:1	yosheb beseiter 'elyon bezel dai yitlonan. psalms 91:2	'omar yhvh makhsi umezudati 'elohai 'ebtakh bo. psalms 91:3	ki hu yazilekha mipakh yaqush mideber havot. psalms 91:4	be'ebrato yasekh lakh vetakhat kenafav tekhseh zinah 'eilekha lo yigash. psalms 91:8	raq be'einekha tabit veshilumat resha'im tir'eh. psalms 91:9	ki 'atah yhvh makhsi 'elyon samta me'onekha. psalms 91:10	lo te'uneh 'eilekha ra'ah venega' lo yiqrab be'aholekha. psalms 91:11	ki mal'akhav yezaveh lakh lishmarekha bekhal derakhekha. psalms 91:12	'al kapayim yisa'unekha pen tigof ba'eben raglekha. psalms 91:13	'al shakhal vafeten tidrokh tirmos kefir vetanin. psalms 91:14	ki bi khashaq va'afaleteihu 'asagebeihu ki yada' shemi. psalms 91:15	yiqra'eini ve'e'eneihu 'imo 'anokhi bezarah 'akhalezeihu va'akhabedeihu. psalms 91:16	'orekh yamim 'asbi'eihu ve'ar'eihu bishu'ati. psalms 92:1	mizmor shir leyom hashabat. tob lehodot yhvh ulezamer leshimkha 'elyon. psalms 92:2	lehagid baboqer khasdekha ve'emunatekha baleilot. psalms 92:3	'alei 'asor va'alei nabel 'alei higayon bekhinor. psalms 92:4	ki simakhtani yhvh befa'olekha bema'asei yadekha 'aranen. psalms 92:5	mah gadelu ma'asekha yhvh me'od 'amequ makhshebotekha. psalms 92:6	'ish ba'ar lo yeida' ukhesil lo yabin 'et zot. psalms 92:7	bifroakh resha'im kemo 'eiseb vayazizu kal po'alei 'aven lehishamedam 'adei 'ad. psalms 92:8	ve'atah marom le'olam yhvh. psalms 92:9	ki hineh 'oyebekha yhvh ki hineh 'oyebekha yobeidu yitparedu kal po'alei 'aven. psalms 92:10	vatarem kir'em qarni baloti beshemen ra'anan. psalms 92:11	vatabet 'eini beshurai baqamim 'alai merei'im tishma'nah batehomot kamidbar. psalms 106:10	vayoshi'em miyad sonei vayig'alem miyad 'oyeb. psalms 106:11	vaykhasu mayim zareihem 'ekhad meihem lo notar. psalms 106:12	vaya'aminu bidbarav yashiru tehilato. psalms 106:13	miharu shakhekhu ma'asav lo khiku la'azato. psalms 106:14	vayit'avu ta'avah bamidbar vaynasu 'el bishimon. psalms 106:15	vayiten lahem she'elatam vayshalakh razon benafsham. psalms 106:16	vayqan'u lemosheh bamakhaneh le'aharon qedosh yhvh. psalms 106:17	tiftakh 'erez vatibla' datan vatekhas 'al 'adat 'abiram. psalms 106:18	vatib'ar 'esh ba'adatam lehabah telahet resha'im. psalms 106:19	ya'asu 'eigel bekhoreb vayishtakhavu lemaseikhah. psalms 106:20	vayamiru 'et kebodam betabnit vr 'okhel 'eiseb. psalms 106:21	khekhu 'el moshi'am 'oseh gedolot bemizrayim. psalms 106:22	nifla'ot be'erez kham nora'ot 'al yam suf. psalms 106:23	vayomer lehashmidam lulei mosheh bekhiro 'amad baperez lefanav lehashib khamato meihashkhit. psalms 106:24	vayim'asu be'erez khemdah lo he'eminu lidbaro. psalms 106:25	vayeiragenu be'aholeihem lo me'u beqol yhvh. psalms 106:26	vayisa yado lahem lehapil 'otam bamidbar. psalms 106:27	ulehapil zar'am bagoyim ulezarotam ba'arazot. psalms 106:28	vayizamedu leba'al pe'or vayokhelu zibkhei meitim. psalms 106:29	vayakh'isu bema'aleihem vatifraz bam mageifah. psalms 106:30	vaya'amod pinekhas vayfalel vatei'azar hamageifah. psalms 106:31	vateikhasheb lo lizdaqah ledor vador 'ad 'olam. psalms 106:32	vayaqzifu 'al mei meribah vayeira' lemosheh ba'aburam. psalms 106:33	ki himru 'et rukho vaybatei bisfatav. psalms 106:34	lo psalms 119:11	belibi zafanti 'imratekha lema'an lo 'ekheta lakh. psalms 119:12	barukh 'atah yhvh lamedeini khuqekha. psalms 119:13	bisfatai siparti kol mishpetei fikha. psalms 119:14	bederekh bekhal 'et. psalms 119:21	ga'arta zeidim 'arurim hashogim mimizvotekha. psalms 119:22	gal mei'alai kherpah vabuz ki 'eidotekha nazareti. psalms 119:23	gam yashebu rim bi nidbaru 'abdekha yasiakh bekhuqekha. psalms 119:24	gam 'eidotekha sha'ashu'ai 'anshei 'azati. psalms 119:25	dabeqah le'afar nafshi khayeini kidbarekha. psalms 119:26	derakhai siparti vata'aneini lamedeini khuqekha. psalms 119:27	derekh piqudekha habineini ve'asikhah benifle'otekha. psalms 119:28	dalefah nafshi mitugah qayemeini kidbarekha. psalms 119:29	derekhoshe qer haser mimeni vetoratekha khaneini psalms 119:30	derekh 'emunah bakhareti mishpatekha shiviti. psalms 119:31	dabaqti be'eidevotekha yhvh 'al tebisheini. psalms 119:32	derekh mizvotekha 'aruz ki tarkhib libi. psalms 119:33	horeini yhvh derekh khuqekha ve'ezerenah 'eiqeb. psalms 119:34	habineini ve'ezerah toratekha ve'eshmerenah bekhal leb. psalms 119:35	hadrikheini bintib mizvotekha ki bo khafazeti. psalms 119:36	hat libi 'el 'eidevotekha ve'al 'el baza'. psalms 119:37	ha'aber 'einai meire'ot shav bidrakhekha khayeini. psalms 119:38	haqem le'abdekha 'imratekha 'asher leyir'atekha. psalms 119:39	ha'aber kherpati 'asher yagoreti ki mishpatekha tobim. psalms 119:40	hineh ta'abti lefiqudekha bezidqatekha khayeini. psalms 119:41	vibo'uni khasadekha yhvh teshu'atekha ke'imratekha. psalms 119:42	ve'e'eneh khorefi dabar ki batakhti bidbarekha. psalms 119:43	ve'al tazel mipi debar 'emet 'ad me'od ki lemishpatekha yikhaleti. psalms 119:44	ve'eshmerah toratekha tamid le'olam va'ed. psalms 119:45	ve'ethalekhah barekhabah ki fiqudekha darasheti. psalms 119:46	va'adaberah be'eidotekha neged melakhim velo 'eibosh. psalms 119:47	ve'eshta'asha' bemizvotekha 'asher 'ahabeti. psalms 119:48	ve'esa khapai 'el mizvotekha 'asher 'ahabeti ve'asikhah bekhuqekha. psalms 119:49	zekhor dabar le'abdekha 'al 'asher yikhaltani. psalms 119:50	zot nekhamati be'aneyi ki 'imratekha khiyateni. psalms 119:51	zeidim helizuni 'ad me'od mitoratekha lo natiti. psalms 119:52	zakharti mishpatekha mei'olam yhvh va'etnekham. psalms 119:53	zal'afah 'akhazatni meiresha'im 'ozebei toratekha. psalms 119:54	zemirot hayu li khuqekha bebet megurai. psalms 119:55	zakharti balaylah shimkha yhvh va'eshmerah toratekha. psalms 119:56	zot hayetah li ki fiqudekha nazareti. psalms 119:57	khelqi yhvh 'amarti lishmor debarekha. psalms 119:58	khiliti fanekha bekhal leb khaneini ke'imratekha. psalms 119:59	khishabti derakhai va'ashibah raglai 'el 'eidotekha. psalms 119:60	khashti velo hitmahmaheti lishmor mizvotekha. psalms 119:61	kheblei resha'im 'iveduni toratekha lo shakhakheti. psalms 119:62	khazot laylah 'aqum lehodot lakh 'al mishpetei zidqekha. psalms 119:63	khaber 'ani lekhal 'asher yerei'ukha uleshomerei piqudekha. psalms 119:64	khasdekha yhvh male'ah ha'arez khuqekha lamedeini. psalms 119:65	tob 'asita 'im 'abdekha yhvh kidbarekha. psalms 119:66	tub ta'am vada'at lamedeini ki bemizvotekha he'emaneti. psalms 119:67	terem 'e'eneh 'ani shogeg ve'atah 'imratekha shamareti. psalms 119:68	tob 'atah umeitib lamedeini khuqekha. psalms 119:69	tafelu 'alai sheqer zeidim 'ani bekhal leb 'ezor piqudekha. psalms 119:70	tafash kakheileb libam 'ani toratekha shi'asha'eti. psalms 119:71	tob li khi 'uneiti lema'an 'elmad khuqekha. psalms 119:72	tob li torat pikha mei'alfei zahab vakhasef. psalms 119:73	yadekha 'asuni vaykhonuni habineini ve'elmedah mizvotekha. psalms 119:74	yerei'ekha yir'uni veyismakhu ki lidbarekha yikhaleti. psalms 119:75	yada'ti yhvh ki zedeq mishpatekha ve'emunah 'initani. psalms 119:76	yehi na khasdekha lenakhameini ke'imratekha le'abdekha. psalms 119:77	yebo'uni rakhamekha ve'ekhyeh ki toratekha sha'ashu'ai. psalms 119:78	yeiboshu zeidim ki sheqer 'ivetuni 'ani 'asiakh befiqudekha. psalms 119:79	yashubu li yerei'ekha veyade'u veyode'ei 'eidotekha. psalms 119:80	yehi libi tamim bekhuqekha lema'an lo 'eibosh. psalms 119:81	kaletah litshu'atekha nafshi lidbarekha yikhaleti. psalms 119:82	kalu 'einai le'imratekha leimor matai tenakhameini. psalms 119:83	ki hayiti kenod beqitor khuqekha lo shakhakheti. psalms 119:84	kamah yemei 'abdekha matai ta'aseh berodefai mishpat. psalms 119:85	karu li zeidim shikhot 'asher lo khetoratekha. psalms 119:86	kal mizvotekha 'emunah sheqer redafuni 'azereini. psalms 119:87	kim'at kiluni ba'arez va'ani lo 'azabti fiquvdekha psalms 119:88	kekhasdekha khayeini ve'eshmerah 'eidut pikha. psalms 119:89	le'olam yhvh debarekha nizab bashamayim. psalms 119:90	ledor vador 'emunatekha konanta 'erez vata'amod. psalms 119:91	lemishpatekha 'amedu hayom ki hakol 'abadekha. psalms 119:92	lulei toratekha sha'ashu'ai 'az 'abadti be'aneyi. psalms 119:93	le'olam lo 'eshkakh piqudekha ki bam khiyitani. psalms 119:94	lekha 'ani hoshi'eini ki fiqudekha darasheti. psalms 119:95	li qivu resha'im le'abedeini 'eidotekha 'etbonan. psalms 119:96	lekhal tikhlah ra'iti qez rekhabah mizvatekha me'od. psalms 119:97	mah 'ahabti toratekha kal hayom hi sikhati. psalms 119:98	mei'oyebai tekhakemeini mizvotekha ki le'olam hi li. psalms 119:99	mikal melamedai hiskalti ki 'eidevotekha sikhah lyi. psalms 119:100	mizeqeinim 'etbonan ki fiqudekha nazareti. psalms 119:101	mikal 'orakh ra' kaliti raglai lema'an 'eshmor debarekha. psalms 119:102	mimishpatekha lo sareti ki 'atah horeitani. psalms 119:103	mah nimlezu lekhiki 'imratekha midebash lefi. psalms 119:104	mipiqudekha 'etbonan 'al ken saneiti kal 'orakh shaqer. psalms 119:105	ner leragli debarekha ve'or lintibati. psalms 119:106	nishba'ti va'aqayeimah lishmor mishpetei zidqekha. psalms 119:107	na'aneiti 'ad me'od yhvh khayeini khidbarekha. psalms 119:108	nidbot pi rezeh na yhvh umishpatekha lamedeini. psalms 119:109	nafshi bekhapi tamid vetoratekha lo shakhakheti. psalms 119:110	natenu resha'im pakh li umipiqudekha lo ta'iti. psalms 119:111	nakhalti 'eidevotekha le'olam ki seson libi hemah. psalms 119:112	natiti libi la'asot khuqekha le'olam 'eiqeb. psalms 119:113	sei'afim saneiti vetoratekha 'ahabeti. psalms 119:114	sitri umagini 'atah lidbarekha yikhaleti. psalms 119:115	suru mimeni merei'im ve'ezerah mizvot 'elohai. psalms 119:116	samekheini khe'imratekha ve'ekhyeh ve'al tebisheini misibri. psalms 119:117	se'adeini ve'ivashei'ah ve'esh'ah bekhuqekha tamid. psalms 119:118	salita kal shogim meikhuqekha kishe qer tarmitam. psalms 119:119	sigim hishbata khal rish'ei 'arez lakhen 'ahabti 'eidotekha. psalms 119:120	samar mipakhdekha besari umimishpatekha yareiti. psalms 119:121	'asiti mishpat vazedeq bal tanikheini le'osheqai. psalms 119:122	'arob 'abdekha letob 'al ya'ashquni zeidim. psalms 119:123	'einai kalu lishu'atekha ule'imrat zidqekha. psalms 119:124	'aseh 'im 'abdekha khekhasdekha vekhuqekha lamedeini. psalms 119:125	'abdekha 'ani habineini ve'eide'ah 'eidotekha. psalms 119:126	'et la'asot yhvh heifeiru toratekha. psalms 119:127	'al ken 'ahabti mizvotekha mizahab umipaz. psalms 119:128	'al ken kal piqudei khol yishareti kal 'orakh sheqer saneiti. psalms 119:129	pela'ot 'eidevotekha 'al ken nezaratam nafshi. psalms 119:130	peitakh debarekha ya'ir meibin petayim. psalms 119:131	pi fa'arti va'esh'afah ki lemizvotekha ya'abeti. psalms 119:132	peneh 'eilai vekhaneini kemishpat le'ohabei shemekha. psalms 119:133	pe'amai hakhen be'imratekha ve'al tashlet bi khal 'aven. psalms 119:134	pedeini mei'osheq 'adam ve'eshmerah piqudekha. psalms 119:135	panekha ha'er be'abdekha velamedeini 'et khuqekha. psalms 119:136	palgei mayim yaredu 'einai 'al lo shameru toratekha. psalms 119:137	zadiq 'atah yhvh veyashar mishpatekha. psalms 119:138	zivita zedeq 'eidotekha ve'emunah me'od. psalms 119:139	zimetatni qin'ati ki shakhekhu debarekha zarai. psalms 119:140	zerufah 'imratekha me'od ve'abdekha 'aheibah. psalms 119:141	za'ir 'anokhi venibzeh piqudekha lo shakhakheti. psalms 119:142	zidqatekha zedeq le'olam vetoratekha 'emet. psalms 119:143	zar umazoq meza'uni mizvotekha sha'ashu'ai. psalms 119:144	zedeq 'eidevotekha le'olam habineini ve'ekhyeh. psalms 119:145	qarati bekhal leb 'aneini yhvh khuqekha 'ezorah. psalms 119:146	qeratikha hoshi'eini ve'eshmerah 'eidotekha. psalms 119:147	qidamti baneshef va'ashavei'ah lidbarekha lidbarekha yikhaleti. psalms 119:148	qidemu 'einai 'ashmurot lasiakh be'imratekha. psalms 119:149	qoli shim'ah khekhasdekha yhvh kemishpatekha khayeini. psalms 119:150	qarebu rodefei zimah mitoratekha rakhaqu. psalms 119:151	qarob 'atah yhvh vekhal mizvotekha 'emet. psalms 119:152	qedem yada'ti mei'eidotekha ki le'olam yesadtam. psalms 119:153	re'eh 'aneyi vekhalezeini ki toratekha lo shakhakheti. psalms 119:154	ribah ribi uge'aleini le'imratekha khayeini. psalms 119:155	rakhoq meiresha'im yeshu'ah ki khuqekha lo darashu. psalms 119:156	rakhamekha rabim yhvh kemishpatekha khayeini. psalms 119:157	rabim rodefai vezarai mei'eidevotekha lo natiti. psalms 119:158	ra'iti bogedim va'etqotatah 'asher 'imratekha lo shamaru. psalms 119:159	re'eh ki fiqudekha 'ahabeti yhvh kekhasdekha khayeini. psalms 119:160	rosh debarekha 'emet ule'olam kal mishpat zidqekha. psalms 119:161	rim redafuni khinam umidebarekha umidebarekha pakhad libi. psalms 119:162	sas 'anokhi 'al 'imratekha kemozei shalal rab. psalms 119:163	sheqer neiti va'ata'eibah toratekha 'ahabeti. psalms 119:164	sheba' bayom hilaltikha 'al mishpetei zidqekha. psalms 119:165	shalom rab le'ohabei toratekha ve'en lamo mikhshol. psalms 119:166	sibarti lishu'atekha yhvh umizvotekha 'asiti. psalms 119:167	shamerah nafshi 'eidotekha va'ohabem me'od. psalms 119:168	shamarti fiqudekha ve'eidotekha ki khal derakhai negdekha. psalms 119:169	tiqrab rinati lefanekha yhvh kidbarekha habineini. psalms 119:170	tabo tekhinati lefanekha ke'imratekha hazileini. psalms 119:171	taba'nah sefatai tehilah ki telamedeini khuqekha. psalms 119:172	ta'an leshoni 'imratekha ki khal mizvotekha zedeq. psalms 119:173	tehi yadekha le'azereini ki fiqudekha bakhareti. psalms 119:174	ta'abti lishu'atekha yhvh vetoratekha sha'ashu'ai. psalms 119:175	tekhi nafshi utehaleka umishpatekha ya'azruni. psalms 119:176	ta'iti keseh 'obed baqesh 'abdekha ki mizvotekha lo shakhakheti. psalms 120:1	shir hama'alot 'el yhvh bazaratah li qarati vaya'aneini. psalms 120:2	yhvh hazilah nafshi misefat sheqer milashon remiyah. psalms 120:3	mah yiten lekha umah yosif lakh lashon remiyah. psalms 120:4	khizei gibor shenunim 'im gakhalei retamim. psalms 120:5	'oyah li ki garti meshekh khanti 'im 'aholei qeidar. psalms 120:6	rabat shakhenah lah nafshi 'im sonei shalom. psalms 120:7	'anisha lom vekhi 'adaber hemah lamilkhamah. psalms 121:1	shir lama'alot 'esa 'einai 'el heharim mei'ayin yabo 'ezri. psalms 121:2	'ezri mei'im yhvh 'oseh shamayim va'arez. psalms 121:3	'al yiten lamot raglekha 'al yanum shomerekha. psalms 121:4	hineh lo yanum velo yishan vmer yisra'el. psalms 121:5	yhvh shomerekha yhvh zilekha 'al yad yeminekha. psalms 121:6	yomam hashemesh lo yakekah veyareiakh balayelah. psalms 121:7	yhvh yishmarekha mikal ra' yishmor 'et nafshekha. psalms 121:8	yhvh yishmar zeitekha ubo'ekha mei'atah ve'ad 'olam. psalms 122:1	shir hama'alot ledavid makhti be'omerim li bet yhvh neilekh. psalms 122:2	'omedot hayu ragleinu bish'arayikh yerushalim. psalms 122:3	yerushalim habenuyah ke'ir shekhuberah lah yakhdav. psalms 122:4	shesham 'alu shebatim shibtei yah 'eidut leyisra'el lehodot leshem yhvh. psalms 122:5	ki shamah yashebu khis'ot lemishpat kis'ot lebet david. psalms 122:6	'alu shelom yerushalim yishlayu 'ohabayikh. psalms 122:7	yehi shalom bekheilekh levah be'armenotayikh. psalms 122:8	lema'an 'akhai verei'ai 'adaberah na shalom bakh. psalms 122:9	lema'an bet yhvh 'eloheinu 'abaqshah tob lakh. psalms 123:1	shir hama'alot 'eilekha nasati 'et 'einai hayoshebi bashamayim. psalms 123:2	hineh khe'einei 'abadim 'el yad 'adoneihem ke'einei shifkhah 'el yad gebirtah ken 'eineinu 'el yhvh 'eloheinu 'ad sheyekhaneinu. psalms 123:3	khaneinu 'al nafsheinu hamayim hazeidonim. psalms 124:6	barukh yhvh shelo netananu teref leshineihem. psalms 124:7	nafsheinu kezipor nimletah mipakh yoqshim hapakh nishbar va'anakhnu nimlatenu. psalms 124:8	'ezreinu beshem yhvh 'oseh shamayim va'arez. psalms 125:1	shir hama'alot habotekhim yhvh kehar ziyon lo yimot le'olam yeisheb. psalms 125:2	yerushalim harim sabib lah yhvh sabib le'amo mei'atah ve'ad 'olam. psalms 125:3	ki lo yanuakh sheibet haresha' 'al goral hazadiqim lema'an lo yishlekhu hazadiqim be'avlatah yedeihem. psalms 125:4	heitibah yhvh latobim velisharim belibotam. psalms 125:5	vehamatim 'aqalqalotam yolikhem yhvh 'et po'alei ha'aven lom 'al yisra'el. psalms 126:1	shir hama'alot beshub yhvh 'et shibat ziyon hayinu kekholemim. psalms 126:2	'az yimalei sekhoq pinu uleshoneinu rinah 'az yomeru bagoyim higdil yhvh la'asot 'im 'eleh. psalms 126:3	higdil yhvh la'asot 'imanu hayinu semeikhim. psalms 126:4	shubah yhvh 'et shebuteinu shebiteinu ka'afiqim banegeb. psalms 126:5	hazore'im bedim'ah berinah yiqzoru. psalms 126:6	halokh yeilekh ubakhoh nosei meshekh hazara' bo yabo berinah nosei 'alumotav. psalms 127:1	shir hama'alot lishlomoh 'im yhvh lo yibneh nakhalat yhvh banim khar peri habaten. psalms 127:4	kekhizim beyad gibor ken benei hane'urim. psalms 127:5	'ashrei hageber 'asher milei 'et 'ashpato meihem lo yeiboshu ki yedaberu 'et 'oybim basha'ar. psalms 128:1	shir hama'alot 'ashrei kal yerei yhvh haholekh bidrakhav. psalms 128:2	yegia' kapekha ki tokhel 'ashrekha vetob lakh. psalms 128:3	'eshtekha kegefen poriyah beyarketei beitekha banekha banim lebanekha lom 'al yisra'el. psalms 129:1	shir hama'alot rabat zeraruni mine'urai yomar na yisra'el. psalms 129:2	rabat zeraruni mine'urai gam lo yakhelu li. psalms 129:3	'al gabi khareshu yabesh. psalms 129:7	shelo milei khapo qozer vekhizno me'amer. psalms 129:8	velo 'ameru ha'oberim birkat yhvh 'aleikhem beirakhnu 'etkhem beshem yhvh. psalms 130:1	shir hama'alot mima'amaqim qeratikha psalms 130:5	qiviti yhvh qivetah nafshi velidbaro hokhaleti. psalms 130:6	nafshi ladonai mishomerim laboqer shomerim laboqer. psalms 130:7	yakhel yisra'el 'el yhvh ki 'im yhvh hakhesed veharbeh 'imo fedut. psalms 130:8	vehu yifdeh 'et yisra'el mikol 'avonotav. psalms 131:1	shir hama'alot ledavid yhvh lo gabah libi velo ramu 'einai velo hilakhti bigdolot ubenifla'ot mimeni. psalms 131:2	'im lo shiviti vedomamti nafshi kegamul 'alei 'imo kagamul 'alai nafshi. psalms 131:3	yakhel yisra'el 'el yhvh mei'atah ve'ad 'olam. psalms 132:1	shir hama'alot zekhor yhvh ledavid 'et kal 'unoto. psalms 132:2	'asher nishba' yhvh nadar la'abir ya'aqob. psalms 132:3	'im 'abo be'ohel beiti 'im 'e'eleh 'al 'eres yezu'ai. psalms 132:4	'im 'eten shenat le'einai le'af'apai tenumah. psalms 132:5	'ad 'emza maqom yhvh mishkanot la'abir ya'aqob. psalms 132:6	hineh shema'anuha be'efratah mezanuha bisdei ya'ar. psalms 132:7	nabo'ah lemishkenotav nishtakhaveh lahadom raglav. psalms 132:8	qumah yhvh limnukhatekha 'atah va'aron 'uzekha. psalms 132:9	kohanekha yilbeshu zedeq vakhasidekha yeraneinu. psalms 132:10	ba'abur david 'abdekha 'al tasheb penei meshikhekha. psalms 132:11	nishba' yhvh ledavid 'emet lo yashub mimenah miperi bitnekha 'ashit lekhisei lakh. psalms 132:12	'im yishmeru banekha beriti ve'eidoti zo 'alamedem gam beneihem 'adei 'ad yeishebu lekhisei lakh. psalms 132:13	ki bakhar yhvh beziyon 'ivah lemoshab lo. psalms 132:14	zot menukhati 'adei 'ad poh 'eisheb ki 'ivitiha. psalms 132:15	zeidah barekh 'abarekh 'ebyoneha 'asbia' lakhem. psalms 132:16	vekhohaneha 'albish yesha' vakhasideha ranen yeraneinu. psalms 132:17	sham 'azmiakh qeren ledavid 'arakhti ner limshikhi. psalms 132:18	'oybav 'albish boshet ve'alav yaziz nizro. psalms 133:1	shir hama'alot ledavid hineh mah tob umah na'im shebet 'akhim gam yakhad. psalms 133:2	kashemen hatob 'al harosh yored 'al hazaqan zeqan 'aharon yored 'al pi midotav. psalms 133:3	ketal khermon sheyored 'al harrei ziyon ki sham zivah yhvh 'et haberakhah khayim 'ad ha'olam. psalms 134:1	shir hama'alot hineh barakhu 'et yhvh kal 'abdei yhvh ha'omedim bebet yhvh baleilot. psalms 134:2	se'u yedeikhem qodesh ubarakhu 'et yhvh. psalms 134:3	yebarekhkha yhvh miziyon 'oseh shamayim va'arez. psalms 135:1	halu yah halu 'et shem yhvh halu 'abdei yhvh. psalms 135:2	'omedim bebet yhvh bekhazrot bet 'eloheinu. psalms 135:3	halu yah ki tob yhvh zameru lishmo ki na'im. psalms 135:4	ki ya'aqob bakhar lo yah yisra'el lisgulato. psalms 135:5	ki 'ani yada'ti ki gadol yhvh va'adoneinu mikal 'elohim. psalms 135:6	kol 'asher khafez yhvh 'asah bashamayim uba'arez bayamim vekhal tehomot. psalms 135:7	ma'aleh nesi'im miqzeh ha'arez beraqim lamatar 'asah mozei ruakh mei'ozrotav. psalms 135:8	hikah bekhorei mizrayim mei'adam 'ad beheimah. psalms 135:9	shalakh 'otot umofetim betokheikhi mizrayim befar'oh ubekhal 'abadav. psalms 135:10	hikah goyim rabim veharag melakhim 'azumim. psalms 135:11	lesikhon melekh ha'emori ule'og melekh habashan ulekhol mamlekhot kena'an. psalms 135:12	venatan 'arzam nakhalah nakhalah leyisra'el 'amo. psalms 135:13	yhvh shimkha le'olam yhvh zikhrekha ledor vador. psalms 135:14	ki yadin yhvh 'amo ve'al 'abadav yitnekham. psalms 135:15	'azabei hagoyim kesef vezahab ma'aseh yedei 'adam. psalms 135:16	peh lahem velo yedabeiru 'einayim lahem velo yir'u. psalms 135:17	'azenayim lahem velo ya'azinu 'af 'en yesh ruakh befihem. psalms 135:18	kemohem yihyu 'oseihem kol 'asher boteiakh bahem. psalms 135:19	bet yisra'el barakhu 'et yhvh bet 'aharon barakhu 'et yhvh. psalms 135:20	bet haleivi barakhu 'et yhvh yir'ei yhvh barakhu 'et yhvh. psalms 135:21	barukh yhvh miziyon shokhen yerushalim halu yah. psalms 136:1	hodu yhvh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:2	hodu leilohei ha'elohim ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:3	hodu la'adonei ha'adonim ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:4	le'oseh nifla'ot gedolot lebado ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:5	le'oseh hashamayim bitbunah ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:6	leroqa' ha'arez 'al hamayim ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:7	le'oseh 'orim gedolim ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:8	'et hashemesh lememshelet bayom ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:9	'et hayareiakh vekhokhabim lememshelot balayelah ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:10	lemakeh mizrayim bibkhoreihem ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:11	vayozei yisra'el mitokham ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:12	beyad khazaqah ubizroa' netuyah ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:13	legozer yam suf ligzarim ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:14	vehe'ebir yisra'el betokho ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:15	veni'er par'oh vekheilo beyam suf ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:16	lemolikh 'amo bamidbar ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:17	lemakeh melakhim gedolim ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:18	vayaharog melakhim 'adirim ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:19	lesikhon melekh ha'emori ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:20	ule'og melekh habashan ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:21	venatan 'arzam lenakhalah ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:22	nakhalah leyisra'el 'abdo ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:23	beshifleinu zakhar lanu ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:24	vayifreqeinu mizareinu ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:25	noten lekhem lekhal basar ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 136:26	hodu le'el hashamayim ki le'olam khasdo. psalms 137:1	'al naharot babel sham yashabnu gam bakhinu bezakhereinu 'et ziyon. psalms 137:2	'al 'arabim betokhah talinu kinoroteinu. psalms 137:3	ki sham she'eilunu shobeinu dibreishi r vetolaleinu simkhah shiru lanu mishir ziyon. psalms 137:4	'ekh nashir 'et shir yhvh 'al 'admat neikhar. psalms 137:5	'im 'eshkakhekh yerushalim tishkakh yemini. psalms 137:6	tidbaq leshoni lekhiki 'im lo 'ezkereikhi 'im lo 'a'aleh 'et yerushalim 'al rosh simkhati. psalms 137:7	zekhor yhvh libnei 'edom 'et yom yerushalim ha'omerim 'aru 'aru 'ad haysod bah. psalms 137:8	bat babel hashedudah 'ashrei sheyshalem lakh 'et gemulekh shegamalt lanu. psalms 137:9	'ashrei sheyokhez venipez 'et 'olalayikh 'el hasala'. psalms 138:1	ledavid 'odkha bekhal libi neged 'elohim 'azamereka. psalms 138:2	'eshtakhaveh 'el heikhal qadshekha ve'odeh 'et shemekha 'al khasdekha ve'al 'amitekha ki higdalta 'al kaloshi mekha 'imratekha. psalms 138:3	beyom qarati vata'aneini tarhibeini benafshi 'oz. psalms 138:4	yodukha yhvh kal malkhei 'arez ki me'u 'imrei fikha. psalms 138:5	veyashiru bedarkhei yhvh ki gadol kebod yhvh. psalms 138:6	ki ram yhvh veshafal yir'eh vegaboah mimerkhaq yeyeida'. psalms 138:7	'im 'eilekh beqereb zarah tekhayeini 'al 'af 'oyebai tishlakh yadekha vetoshi'eini yeminekha. psalms 138:8	yhvh yigmor ba'adi yhvh khasdekha le'olam ma'asei yadekha 'al teref. psalms 139:1	lamnazeiakh ledavid mizmor yhvh khaqartani vateida'. psalms 139:2	'atah yada'ta shibti vequmi bantah lerei'i meirakhoq. psalms 139:3	'arekhi verib'i zeirita vekhal derakhai hiskantah. psalms 139:4	ki 'en milah bilshoni hen yhvh yada'ta khulah. psalms 139:5	'akhor vaqedem zartani vatashet 'alai kapekhah. psalms 139:6	pil'iyah peli'ah da'at mimeni nisgebah lo 'ukhal lah. psalms 139:7	'anah 'eilekh meirukhekha ve'anah mipanekha 'ebrakh. psalms 139:8	'im 'esaq mayim sham 'atah ve'azi'ah she'ol hineka. psalms 139:9	'esa khanfei shakhar 'eshkenah be'akharit yam. psalms 139:10	gamosha m yadekha tankheini vetokhazeini yeminekha. psalms 139:11	va'omar 'akh khoshekh yeshufeini velaylah 'or ba'adeini. psalms 139:12	gam khoshekh lo yakhshikh mimekha velaylah kayom ya'ir kakhasheikhah ka'orah. psalms 139:13	ki 'atah qanita khilyotai tesukeini bebeten 'imi. psalms 139:14	'odkha 'al ki nora'ot nifleiti nifla'im ma'asekha venafshi yoda'at me'od. psalms 139:15	lo nikhkhad 'azemi mimeka 'asher 'useiti baseiter ruqamti betakhtiyot 'arez. psalms 139:16	galemi ra'u 'einekha ve'al sifrekha kulam yikateibu yamim yuzaru velo velo 'ekhad bahem. psalms 139:17	veli mah yaqeru rei'ekha 'el meh 'azemu rasheihem. psalms 139:18	'esperem meikhol yirbun heqizoti ve'odi 'imakh. psalms 139:19	'im tiqtol 'eloah rasha' ve'anshei damim suru meni. psalms 139:20	'asher yomerukha limzimah nasu lashav 'arekha. psalms 139:21	halo mesan'ekha yhvh 'esna ubitqomekha 'etqotat. psalms 139:22	takhlit sin'ah seneitim le'oybim hayu li. psalms 139:23	khaqereini 'el veda' lebabi bekhaneini veda' sar'apai. psalms 139:24	ure'eh 'im derekh 'ozeb bi unekheini bederekh 'olam. psalms 140:1	lamnazeiakh mizmor ledavid. khalezeini yhvh mei'adam ra' mei'ish khamasim tinzereini. psalms 140:2	'asher khashebu ra'ot beleb kal yom yaguru milkhamot. psalms 140:3	shananu leshonam kemo nakhash khamat 'akhshub takhat sefateimo selah. psalms 140:4	shamereini yhvh midei rasha' mei'ish khamasim tinzereini 'asher khashebu lidkhot pe'amai. psalms 140:5	tamenu gei'im pakh li vakhabalim paresu reshet leyad ma'gal moqeshim shatu li selah. psalms 140:6	'amarti yhvh 'eili 'atah ha'azinah yhvh qol takhanunai. psalms 140:7	yhvh 'adonai 'oz yeshu'ati sakotah leroshi beyom nasheq. psalms 140:8	'al titen yhvh ma'avayei rasha' zemamo 'al tafeq yarumu selah. psalms 140:9	rosh mesibai 'amal sefateimo yekhasumo yekhaseimo psalms 140:10	yamitu yimotu 'aleihem gekhalim ba'esh yapilem bemahamorot bal yaqumu. psalms 140:11	'ish lashon bal yikon ba'arez 'ish khamas ra' yezudenu lemadkheifot. psalms 140:12	yada'ta yada'ti ki ya'aseh yhvh din 'ani mishpat 'ebyonim. psalms 140:13	'akh zadiqim yodu lishmekha yeishebu yesharim 'et panekha. psalms 141:1	mizmor ledavid yhvh qeratikha khushah li ha'azinah qoli beqare'i lakh. psalms 141:2	tikon tefilati qetoret lefanekha mas'at kapai minkhat 'areb. psalms 141:3	shitah yhvh shamerah lefi nizerah 'al dal sefatai. psalms 141:4	'al tat libi ledabar ra' lehit'olel 'alilot beresha' 'et 'ishim po'alei 'aven ubal 'elkham beman'ameihem. psalms 141:5	yehelmeini zadiq khesed veyokhikheini shemen rosh 'al yani roshi ki 'od utefilati bera'oteihem. psalms 141:6	nishmetu bidei sela' shofeteihem veshame'u 'amarai ki na'eimu. psalms 141:7	kemo foleiakh uboqeia' ba'arez nifzeru 'azameinu lefi she'ol. psalms 141:8	ki 'eilekha yhvh 'adonai 'einai bekhah khasiti 'al te'ar nafshi. psalms 141:9	shamereini midei fakh yaqeshu li umoqeshot po'alei 'aven. psalms 141:10	yipelu bemakhmorav resha'im yakhad 'anokhi 'ad 'e'ebor. psalms 142:1	maskil ledavid bihyoto bame'arah tefilah. qoli 'el yhvh 'ez'aq qoli 'el yhvh 'etkhanan. psalms 142:2	'eshpokh lefanav sikhi zarati lefanav 'agid. psalms 142:3	behit'atef 'alai rukhi ve'atah yada'ta netibati be'orakh zu 'ahalekh tamenu fakh li. psalms 142:4	habet yamin ure'eh ve'en li makir 'abad manos mimeni 'en doresh lenafshi. psalms 142:5	za'aqti 'eilekha yhvh 'amarti 'atah makhsi khelqi be'erez hakhayim. psalms 142:6	haqshibah 'el rinati ki daloti me'od hazileini meirodefai ki 'amezu mimeni. psalms 142:7	hozi'ah mimasger nafshi lehodot 'et shemekha bi yakhtiru zadiqim ki tigmol 'alai. psalms 143:1	mizmor ledavid yhvh shema' tefilati ha'azinah 'el takhanunai be'emunatekha 'aneini bezidqatekha. psalms 143:2	ve'al tabo bemishpat 'et 'abdekha ki lo yizdaq lefanekha khal khai. psalms 143:3	ki radaf 'oyeb nafshi dika la'arez khayati hoshibani bemakhashakim kemeitei 'olam. psalms 143:4	vatit'atef 'alai rukhi betokhi yishtomem libi. psalms 143:5	zakharti yamim miqedem hagiti bekhal pa'olekha bema'aseh yadekha 'asokheiakh. psalms 143:6	peirasti yadai 'eilekha nafshi ke'erez 'ayeifah lekha selah. psalms 143:7	maher 'aneini yhvh kaletah rukhi 'al taster panekha mimeni venimshalti 'im yoredei bor. psalms 143:8	hashmi'eini baboqer khasdekha ki bekha batakheti hodi'eini derekh zu 'eilekh ki 'eilekha nasati nafshi. psalms 143:9	hazileini mei'oyebai yhvh 'eilekha khisiti. psalms 143:10	lamedeini la'asot rezonekha ki 'atah 'elohai rukhakha tobah tankheini be'erez mishor. psalms 143:11	lema'an shimkha yhvh tekhayeini bezidqatekha tozi mizarah nafshi. psalms 143:12	ubekhasdekha tazmit 'oyebai veha'abadta kal zorarei nafshi ki 'ani 'abdekha. psalms 144:1	ledavid barukh yhvh zuri hamlamed yadai laqrab 'ezbe'otai lamilkhamah. psalms 144:2	khasdi umezudati misgabi umefalti li magini ubo khasiti haroded 'ami takhtai. psalms 144:3	yhvh mah 'adam vateida'eihu ben 'enosh vatekhashebeihu. psalms 144:4	'adam lahebel damah yamav kezel 'ober. psalms 144:5	yhvh hat shamekha veteired ga' beharim veye'eshanu. psalms 144:6	beroq baraq utefizem shelakh khizekha utehumem. psalms 144:7	shelakh yadekha mimarom pezeini vehazileini mimayim rabim miyad benei neikhar. psalms 144:8	'asher pihem diber shav viminam yemin shaqer. psalms 144:9	'elohim shir khadash 'ashirah lakh beneibel 'asor 'azamerah lakh. psalms 144:10	hanoten teshu'ah lamelakhim hapozeh 'et david 'abdo meikhereb ra'ah. psalms 144:11	pezeini vehazileini miyad benei neikhar 'asher pihem diber shav viminam yemin shaqer. psalms 144:12	'asher baneinu kinti'im megudalim bin'ureihem benoteinu khezaviyot mekhutabot tabnit heikhal. psalms 144:13	mezaveinu melei'im mefiqim mizan 'el zan zoneinu ma'alifot merubabot bekhuzoteinu. psalms 144:14	'alufeinu mesubalim 'en perez ve'en yozet ve'en zevakhah birkhoboteinu. psalms 144:15	'ashrei ha'am shekakhah lo 'ashrei ha'am yhvh 'elohav. psalms 145:1	tehilah ledavid 'aromimkha 'elohai hamelekh va'abarakhah mekha le'olam va'ed. psalms 145:2	bekhal yom 'abarakheka va'ahalah mekha le'olam va'ed. psalms 145:3	gadol yhvh umehulal me'od veligdulato 'en kheiqer. psalms 145:4	dor ledor yeshabakh ma'asekha ugeburotekha yagidu. psalms 145:5	hadar kebod hodekha vedibrei nifle'otekha 'asikhah. psalms 145:6	ve'ezuz nor'otekha yomeiru ugedulotekha ugedulatekha 'asaperenah. psalms 145:7	zeikher rab tubekha yabi'u vezidqatekha yeraneinu. psalms 145:8	khanun verakhum yhvh 'erekh 'apayim ugedal khased. psalms 145:9	tob yhvh lakol verakhamav 'al kal ma'asav. psalms 145:10	yodukha yhvh kal ma'asekha vakhasidekha yebarakhukhah. psalms 145:11	kebod malkhutekha yomeiru ugeburatekha yedabeiru. psalms 145:12	lehodia' libnei ha'adam geburotav ukhebod hadar malkhuto. psalms 145:13	malkhutekha malkhut kal 'olamim umemsheltekha bekhal dor vador. psalms 145:14	somekh yhvh lekhal hanofelim vezoqef lekhal hakefufim. psalms 145:15	'einei khol 'eilekha yesabeiru ve'atah noten lahem 'et 'akhelam be'ito. psalms 145:16	poteiakh 'et yadekha umasbia' lekhal khai razon. psalms 145:17	zadiq yhvh bekhal derakhav vekhasid bekhal ma'asav. psalms 145:18	qarob yhvh lekhal qore'av lekhol 'asher yiqra'uhu be'emet. psalms 145:19	rezon yerei'av ya'aseh ve'et shav'atam yishma' veyoshi'em. psalms 145:20	shomer yhvh 'et kal 'ohabav ve'et kal haresha'im yashmid. psalms 145:21	tehilat yhvh yedaber pi vibarekh kal basar shem qadesho le'olam va'ed. psalms 146:1	halu yah hali nafshi 'et yhvh. psalms 146:2	'ahalah yhvh bekhayai 'azamerah leilohai be'odi. psalms 146:3	'al tibtekhu bindibim beben 'adam she'en lo teshu'ah. psalms 146:4	teizei rukho yashub le'admato bayom hahu 'abedu 'eshtonotav. psalms 146:5	'ashrei she'el ya'aqob be'ezro bero 'al yhvh 'elohav. psalms 146:6	'oseh shamayim va'arez 'et hayam ve'et kal 'asher bam hashomer 'emet le'olam. psalms 146:7	'oseh mishpat la'ashuqim noten lekhem lare'eibim yhvh matir 'asurim. psalms 146:8	yhvh poqeiakh 'ivrim yhvh zoqef kefufim yhvh 'oheb zadiqim. psalms 146:9	yhvh shomer 'et geirim yatom ve'almanah ye'oded vederekh resha'im ye'avet. psalms 146:10	yimlokh yhvh le'olam 'elohayikh ziyon ledor vador halu yah. psalms 147:1	halu yah ki tob zamerah 'eloheinu ki na'im navah tehilah. psalms 147:2	boneh yerushalim yhvh nidkhei yisra'el yekhanes. psalms 147:3	harofei lishburei leb umekhabesh le'azebotam. psalms 147:4	moneh mispar lakokhabim lekhulam sheimot yiqra. psalms 147:5	gadol 'adoneinu verab koakh litbunato 'en mispar. psalms 147:6	me'oded 'anavim yhvh mashpil resha'im 'adei 'arez. psalms 147:7	'enu yhvh betodah zameru leiloheinu bekhinor. psalms 147:8	hamkhaseh shamayim be'abim hameikhin la'arez matar hamazmiakh harim khazir. psalms 147:9	noten libheimah lakhmah libnei 'oreb 'asher yiqra'u. psalms 147:10	lo bigburat hasus yekhpaz lo beshoqei ha'ish yirzeh. psalms 147:11	rozeh yhvh 'et yerei'av 'et hamyakhalim lekhasdo. psalms 147:12	shabekhi yerushalim 'et yhvh hali 'elohayikh ziyon. psalms 147:13	ki khizaq berikhei she'arayikh beirakh banayikh beqirbekh. psalms 147:14	hasam gebulekh shalom kheileb khitim yasbi'ekh. psalms 147:15	hasholeiakh 'imrato 'arez 'ad meheirah yaruz debaro. psalms 147:16	hanoten sheleg kazamer kefor ka'eifer yefazer. psalms 147:17	mashlikh qarkho khefitim lifnei qarato mi ya'amod. psalms 147:18	yishlakh debaro veyamsem yasheb rukho yizelu mayim. psalms 147:19	magid debaro debarav leya'aqob khuqav umishpatav leyisra'el. psalms 147:20	lo 'asah khen lekhal go umishpatim bal yeda'um halu yah. psalms 148:1	halu yah halu 'et yhvh min hashamayim haluhu bameromim. psalms 148:2	haluhu khal mal'akhav haluhu kal zeba'o zeba'av. psalms 148:3	haluhu shemesh veyareiakh haluhu kal kokhbei 'or. psalms 148:4	haluhu shemei hashamayim vehamayim 'asher mei'al hashamayim. psalms 148:5	yehalu 'et shem yhvh ki hu zivah venibra'u. psalms 148:6	vaya'amidem la'ad le'olam khaq natan velo ya'abor. psalms 148:7	halu 'et yhvh min ha'arez taninim vekhal tehomot. psalms 148:8	'esh ubarad sheleg veqitor ruakh se'arah 'osah debaro. psalms 148:9	heharim vekhal geba'ot 'ez peri vekhal 'arazim. psalms 148:10	hakhayah vekhal beheimah remes vezipor kanaf. psalms 148:11	malkhei 'erez vekhal le'umim rim vekhal shofetei 'arez. psalms 148:12	bakhurim vegam betulot zeqeinim 'im ne'arim. psalms 148:13	yehalu 'et shem yhvh ki nisgab shemo lebado hodo 'al 'erez veshamayim. psalms 148:14	vayarem qeren le'amo tehilah lekhal khasidav libnei yisra'el 'am qerobo halu yah. psalms 149:1	halu yah shiru yhvh shir khadash tehilato biqhal khasidim. psalms 149:2	yismakh yisra'el be'osav benei ziyon yagilu bemalkam. psalms 149:3	yehalu shemo bemakhol betof vekhinor yezameru lo. psalms 149:4	ki rozeh yhvh be'amo yefa'er 'anavim bishu'ah. psalms 149:5	ya'lezu khasidim bekhabod yeranenu 'al mishkebotam. psalms 149:6	romot 'el bigronam vekhereb pifiyot beyadam. psalms 149:7	la'asot neqamah bagoyim tokheikhot bal 'umim. psalms 149:8	le'sor malkheihem beziqim venikhbedeihem bekhablei barzel. psalms 149:9	la'asot bahem mishpat katub hadar hu lekhal khasidav halu yah. psalms 150:1	halu yah halu 'el beqadesho haluhu birqia' 'uzo. psalms 150:2	haluhu bigburotav haluhu kerob gudlo. psalms 150:3	haluhu beteiqa' shofar haluhu beneibel vekhinor. psalms 150:4	haluhu betof umakhol haluhu beminim ve'ugab. psalms 150:5	haluhu bezilzelei shama' haluhu bezilzelei teru'ah. psalms 150:6	kol haneshamah tehalel yah halu yah. 

proverbs 1:1	mishlei shelomoh ben david melekh yisra'el. proverbs 1:2	lada'at khakhmah umusar lehabin 'imrei binah. proverbs 1:3	laqakhat musar haskel zedeq umishpat umeisharim. proverbs 1:4	latet liftayim 'aremah lena'ar da'at umezimah. proverbs 1:5	yishma' khakham veyosef leqakh venabon takhbulot yiqneh. proverbs 1:6	lehabin mashal umelizah dibrei khakhamim vekhidotam. proverbs 1:7	yir'at yhvh reishit da'at khakhmah umusar 'evilim bazu. proverbs 1:8	shema' beni musar 'abikha ve'al titosh torat 'imekha. proverbs 1:9	ki livyat khen hem leroshekha va'anaqim legargerotekha. proverbs 1:10	beni 'im yefatukha khata'im 'al tobei. proverbs 1:11	'im yomeru lekhah 'itanu ne'erbah ledam nizpenah lenaqi khinam. proverbs 1:12	nibla'em kish'ol khayim utemimim keyordei bor. proverbs 1:13	kal hon yaqar nimza nemalei bateinu shalal. proverbs 1:14	goralekha tapil betokheinu kis 'ekhad yihyeh lekhulanu. proverbs 1:15	beni 'al teilekh bederekh 'itam mena' raglekha minetibatam. proverbs 1:16	ki ragleihem lara' yaruzu vimaharu lishpakh dam. proverbs 1:17	ki khinam mezorah harashet be'einei khal ba'al kanaf. proverbs 1:18	vehem ledamam ye'erobu yizpenu lenafshotam. proverbs 1:19	ken 'arekhot kal bozeia' baza' 'et nefesh be'alav yiqakh. proverbs 1:20	khakhemot bakhuz taronah barekhobot titen qolah. proverbs 1:21	berosh homiyot tiqra befitkhei she'arim ba'ir 'amareha tomer. proverbs 1:22	'ad matai petayim te'eihabu feti veleizim lazon khamedu lahem ukhesilim yisne'u da'at. proverbs 1:23	tashubu letokhakhti hineh 'abi'ah lakhem rukhi 'odi'ah debarai 'etkhem. proverbs 1:24	ya'an qarati vatema'einu natiti yadi ve'en maqshib. proverbs 1:25	vatifre'u khal 'azati vetokhakhti lo 'abitem. proverbs 1:26	gam 'ani be'eidekhem 'eskhaq 'el'ag bebo fakhdekhem. proverbs 1:27	bebo khesha'avah khesho'ah pakhdekhem ve'eidekhem kesufah ye'eteh bebo 'aleikhem zarah vezuqah. proverbs 1:28	'az yiqra'uni velo 'e'eneh yeshakharuni velo yimza'uni. proverbs 1:29	takhat ki sane'u da'at veyir'at yhvh lo bakharu. proverbs 1:30	lo 'abu la'azati na'azu kal tokhakhti. proverbs 1:31	veyokhelu miperi darkam umimo'azoteihem yisba'u. proverbs 1:32	ki meshubat petayim tahargem veshalvat kesilim te'abedem. proverbs 1:33	veshomeia' li yishkan betakh vesha'anan mipakhad ra'ah. proverbs 2:1	beni 'im tiqakh 'amarai umizvotai tizpon 'itakh. proverbs 2:2	lehaqshib lakhakhemah 'azenekha yishmor. proverbs 2:9	'az tabin zedeq umishpat umeisharim kal ma'gal tob. proverbs 2:10	ki tabo khakhmah belibekha veda'at lenafshekha yin'am. proverbs 2:11	mezimah tishmor 'alekha tebunah tinzerekah. proverbs 3:4	umeza khen veseikhel tob be'einei 'elohim ve'adam. proverbs 3:5	betakh 'el yhvh bekhal libekha ve'el binatekha 'al tisha'en. proverbs 3:6	bekhal derakhekha da'eihu vehu yeyasher khaf remiyah veyad kharuzim ta'ashir. proverbs 10:5	'oger baqayiz ben maskil nirdam baqazir ben meibish. proverbs 10:6	berakhot lerosh zadiq ufi resha'im yekhaseh khamas. proverbs 10:7	zeikher zadiq librakhah veshem resha'im yirqab. proverbs 10:8	khakham leb yiqakh mizvot ve'evil fatayim yilabet. proverbs 10:9	holekh batom yeilekh betakh ume'aqesh derakhav yivadeia'. proverbs 10:10	qorez 'ayin yiten 'azabet ve'evil fatayim yilabet. proverbs 10:11	meqor khayim pi zadiq ufi resha'im yekhaseh khamas. proverbs 10:12	ne'ah te'orer medanim ve'al kal pesha'im tekhaseh 'ahabah. proverbs 10:13	besiftei nabon timazei khakhmah vesheibet legev khasar leb. proverbs 10:14	khakhamim yizpenu da'at ufi 'evil mekhitah qerobah. proverbs 10:15	hon 'ashir qiryat 'uzo mekhitat dalim reisham. proverbs 10:16	pe'ulat zadiq lekhayim tebu'at rasha' lekhatat. proverbs 10:17	'orakh lekhayim shomer musar ve'ozeb tokhakhat mat'eh. proverbs 10:18	mekhaseh ne'ah siftei shaqer umozi dibah hu khesil. proverbs 10:19	berob debarim lo yekhdal pasha' vekhosekh sefatav maskil. proverbs 10:20	kesef nibkhar leshon zadiq leb resha'im kim'at. proverbs 10:21	siftei zadiq yir'u rabim ve'evilim bakhasar leb yamutu. proverbs 10:22	birkat yhvh hi ta'ashir velo yosif 'ezeb 'imah. proverbs 10:23	kiskhoq likhsil 'asot zimah vekhakhemah le'ish tebunah. proverbs 10:24	megorat rasha' hi tebo'enu veta'avat zadiqim yiten. proverbs 10:25	ka'abor sufah ve'en rasha' vezadiq yesod 'olam. proverbs 10:26	kakhomez lashinayim vekhe'ashan la'einayim ken he'azel lesholekhav. proverbs 10:27	yir'at yhvh tosif yamim ushenot resha'im tiqzorenah. proverbs 10:28	tokhelet zadiqim simkhah vetiqvat resha'im tobed. proverbs 10:29	ma'oz latom derekh yhvh umekhitah lefo'alei 'aven. proverbs 10:30	zadiq le'olam bal yimot uresha'im lo yishkenu 'arez. proverbs 10:31	pi zadiq yanub khakhmah uleshon tahpukhot tikaret. proverbs 10:32	siftei zadiq yeide'un razon ufi resha'im tahpukhot. proverbs 11:1	mozenei mirmah to'abat yhvh ve'eben sheleimah rezono. proverbs 11:2	ba zadon vayabo qalon ve'et zenu'im khakhmah proverbs 11:3	tumat yesharim tankhem veselef bogdim veshadam yeshadem. proverbs 11:4	lo yo'il hon beyom 'ebrah uzedaqah tazil mimavet. proverbs 11:5	zidqat tamim teyasher darko uberish'ato yipol rasha'. proverbs 11:6	zidqat yesharim tazilem ubehavat bogedim yilakheidu. proverbs 11:7	bemot 'adam rasha' tobad tiqvah vetokhelet 'onim 'abadah. proverbs 11:8	zadiq mizarah nekhelaz vayabo rasha' takhtav. proverbs 11:9	befeh khanef yashkhit rei'eihu ubeda'at zadiqim yeikhaleizu. proverbs 11:10	betub zadiqim rakhil megaleh sod vene'eman ruakh mekhaseh dabar. proverbs 11:14	be'en takhbulot yipal 'am uteshu'ah berob yo'ez. proverbs 11:15	ra' yeiroa' ki 'arab zar vesonei toqe'im boteiakh. proverbs 11:16	'eishet khen titmokh kabod ve'arizim yitmekhu 'osher. proverbs 11:17	gomel nafsho 'ish khased ve'okher 'eiro 'akhzari. proverbs 11:18	rasha' 'oseh fe'ulat shaqer vezoreia' zedaqah sekher 'emet. khakham. proverbs 11:31	hen zadiq ba'arez yeshulam 'af ki rasha' vekhotei. proverbs 12:1	'oheb musar 'oheb da'at vesonei tokhakhat ba'ar. proverbs 12:2	tob yafiq razon yhvh ve'ish mezimot yarshia'. proverbs 12:3	lo yikon 'adam beresha' veshoresh zadiqim bal yimot. proverbs 12:4	'eishet khayil 'ateret ba'lah ukheraqab be'azmotav mebishah. proverbs 12:5	makhshebot zadiqim mishpat takhbulot labuz. proverbs 12:9	tob niqleh ve'ebed lo mimetakabed vakhasar lakhem. proverbs 12:10	yodeia' zadiq nefesh behemto verakhamei resha'im 'akhzari. proverbs 12:11	'obed 'admato yisba' lakhem umeradef proverbs 13:25	zadiq 'okhel lesoba' nafsho ubeten resha'im tekhsar. proverbs 14:1	khakhmot nashim banetah beitah ve'ivelet beyadeha tehersenu. proverbs 14:2	holekh beyashero yerei yhvh uneloz derakhav mishpato. proverbs 17:1	tob pat khareibah veshalvah bah mibayit malei zibkhei rib. proverbs 17:2	'ebed maskil yimshol beben meibish ubetokh 'akhim yakhaloq nakhalah. proverbs 17:3	mazref lakesef vekhur lazahab ubokhen libot yhvh. proverbs 17:4	meira' maqshib 'al sefat 'aven sheqer meizin 'al leshon havot. proverbs 17:5	lo'eg larash kheiref 'oseihu sameiakh le'ed lo yinaqeh. proverbs yifneh yaskil. proverbs 17:9	mekhaseh pesha' mebaqesh 'ahabah veshoneh bedabar mafrid 'aluf. proverbs 17:10	teikhat ge'arah bemeibin meihakot kesil mei'ah. proverbs 17:11	'akh meri yebaqesh ra' 17:17	bekhal 'et 'oheb hareia' ve'akh lezarah yivaled. proverbs 17:18	'adam khasar leb toqeia' kaf 'oreb 'arubah lifnei rei'eihu. proverbs 17:19	'oheb pesha' 'oheb mazah magbiah pitkho mebaqesh shaber. proverbs 17:20	'iqesh leb lo yimza tob venehpakh bilshono yipol bera'ah. proverbs 17:21	yoled kesil letugah lo velo yismakh 'abi nabal. proverbs 17:22	leb meiakh yeitib geihah veruakh nekhei'ah teyabesh garem. proverbs 17:23	shokhad meikheq rasha' yiqakh lehatot 'arekhot mishpat. proverbs 17:24	'et penei meibin khakhmah ve'einei khesil biqzeh 'arez. proverbs 17:25	ka'as le'abiv ben kesil umemer leyoladto. proverbs 17:26	gam 'anosh lazadiq lo tob lehakot nedibim 'al yosher. proverbs 17:27	khosekh 'amarav yodeia' da'at veqar yeqar 'ish tebunah. proverbs 17:28	gam 'evil makharish khakham yeikhasheb 'otem sefatav nabon. proverbs 18:1	leta'avah yebaqesh nifrad bekhal tushiyah yitgala'. proverbs 18:2	lo yakhpoz kesil bitbunah ki 'im behitgalot libo. proverbs 18:3	bebo rasha' ba gam buz ve'im qalon kherpah. proverbs 18:4	mayim 'amuqim dibrei fi 'ish nakhal nobeia' meqor khakhmah proverbs 18:5	se'et penei rasha' lo tob lehatot zadiq bamishpat. proverbs 18:6	siftei khesil yabo'u berib ufiv lemahalumot yiqra. proverbs 18:7	pi khesil mekhitah lo usefatav moqesh nafsho. proverbs 18:8	dibrei nirgan kemitlahamim vehem yaredu khadrei baten. proverbs 18:9	gam mitrapeh bimlakhto 'akh hu leba'al mashkhit. proverbs 18:10	migdal 'oz shem yhvh bo yaruz zadiq venisgab. proverbs 18:11	hon 'ashir qiryat 'uzo ukhekhomah nisgabah bemaskito. proverbs 18:12	lifneishe ber yigbah leb 'ish velifnei khabod 'anavah. proverbs 18:13	meishib dabar beterem yishma' 'ivelet hi lo ukhelimah. proverbs 18:14	ruakh 'ish yekhalkel makhaleihu veruakh nekhei'ah mi yisa'enah. proverbs 18:15	leb nabon yiqneh da'at ve'ozen khakhamim tebaqesh da'at. proverbs 18:16	matan 'adam yarkhib lo velifnei gedolim yankhenu. proverbs 18:17	zadiq harishon beribo yabo uba vakhaqaro. proverbs
