26:27	korehosha khat bah yipol vegolel 'eben 'eilav tashub. proverbs 26:28	leshonoshe qer yisna dakav ufeh khalaq ya'aseh midkheh. proverbs 27:1	'al tithalel beyom makhar ki lo teida' mah yeiled yom. proverbs 27:2	yehalelkha zar velo fikha nakheri ve'al sefatekha. proverbs 27:3	kobed 'eben veneitel hakhol vekha'as 'evil kabed misheneihem. proverbs 27:4	'akhzeriyut kheimah veshetef 'af umi ya'amod lifnei qin'ah. proverbs 27:5	tobah tokhakhat megulah mei'ahabah mesutaret. proverbs 27:6	ne'emanim piz'ei 'oheb vena'tarot neshiqot sonei. proverbs 27:7	nefesh bei'ah tabus nofet venefesh re'eibah kal mar matoq. proverbs 27:8	kezipor nodedet min qinah ken 'ish noded mimeqomo. proverbs 27:9	shemen uqetoret yesamakh leb umeteq rei'eihu mei'azat nafesh. proverbs 27:10	rei'akha verei'eh vereia' 'abikha 'al ta'azob ubet 'akhikha 'al tabo beyom 'eidekha tob shakhen qarob mei'akh rakhoq. proverbs 27:11	khakham beni vesamakh libi ve'ashibah khorefi dabar. proverbs 27:12	'arum ra'ah ra'ah nistar petayim 'aberu ne'enashu. proverbs 27:13	qakh bigdo ki 'arab zar ube'ad nakheriyah khableihu. proverbs 27:14	mebarekh rei'eihu beqol gadol baboqer hashkem qelalah teikhasheb lo. proverbs 27:15	delef tored beyom sagrir ve'eishet midonim midyanim nishtavah. proverbs 27:16	zofeneha zafan ruakh veshemen yemino yiqra. proverbs 27:17	barzel bebarzel yakhad ve'ish yakhad penei rei'eihu. proverbs 27:18	nozer te'einah yokhal piryah veshomer 'adonav yekhubad. proverbs 27:19	kamayim hapanim lapanim ken leb ha'adam la'adam. proverbs 27:20	she'ol va'abadoh va'abado lo tisba'nah ve'einei ha'adam lo tisba'nah. proverbs 27:21	mazref lakesef vekhur lazahab ve'ish lefi mahalalo. proverbs 27:22	'im tikhtosh 'et ha'evil bamakhtesh betokh harifot ba'eli lo tasur mei'alav 'ivalto. proverbs 27:23	yadoa' teida' penei zonekha shit libekha la'adarim. proverbs 27:24	ki lo le'olam khosen ve'im neizer ledor dor vador. proverbs 27:25	galah khazir venir'ah deshe vene'esfu 'isebot harim. proverbs 27:26	kebasim lilbushekha umekhir deh 'atudim. proverbs 27:27	vedei khaleb 'izim lelakhmekha lelekhem beitekha vekhayim lena'arotekha. proverbs 28:1	nasu ve'en rodef rasha' vezadiqim kikhfir yibtakh. proverbs 28:2	befesha' 'erez rabim sareha ube'adam meibin yodeia' ken ya'arikh. proverbs 28:3	geber rash ve'osheq dalim matar sokhef ve'en lakhem. proverbs 28:4	'ozebei torah yehalu rasha' veshomerei torah yitgaru bam. proverbs 28:5	'anshei ra' lo yabinu mishpat umebaqshei yhvh yabinu khol. proverbs 28:6	tob rash holekh betumo mei'iqesh derakhayim vehu 'ashir. proverbs 28:7	nozer torah ben meibin vero'eh zolim yakhlim 'abiv. proverbs 28:8	marbeh hono beneshekh ubetarbit vetarbit lekhonen dalim yiqbezenu. proverbs 28:9	meisir 'azeno mishemoa' torah gam tefilato to'eibah. proverbs 28:10	mashgeh yesharim bederekh ra' bishkhuto hu yipol utemimim yinkhalu tob. proverbs 28:11	khakham be'einav 'ish 'ashir vedal meibin yakhqerenu. proverbs 28:12	ba'aloz zadiqim rabah tif'aret ubequm resha'im yekhupas 'adam. proverbs 28:13	mekhaseh fesha'av lo yazliakh umodeh ve'ozeb yerukham. proverbs 28:14	'ashrei 'adam mefakhed tamid umaqsheh libo yipol bera'ah. proverbs 28:15	'ari nohem vedob shoqeq moshel rasha' 'al 'am dal. proverbs 28:16	nagid khasar tebunot verab ma'ashaqot sone'ei sonei beza' ya'arikh yamim. proverbs 28:17	'adam 'ashuq bedam nafesh 'ad bor yanus 'al yitmekhu bo. proverbs 28:18	holekh tamim yivasheia' vene'qash derakhayim yipol be'ekhat. proverbs 28:19	'obed 'admato yisba' lakhem umeradef reiqim yisba' rish. proverbs 28:20	'ish 'emunot rab berakhot ve'az leha'ashir lo yinaqeh. proverbs 28:21	haker panim lo tob ve'al pat lekhem yifsha' gaber. proverbs 28:22	nibohal lahon 'ish ra' 'ayin velo yeida' ki kheser yebo'enu. proverbs 28:23	mokhiakh 'adam 'akharai khen yimza mimakhaliq lashon. proverbs 28:24	gozel 'abiv ve'imo ve'omer 'en pasha' khaber hu le'ish mashkhit. proverbs 28:25	rekhab nefesh yegareh madon uboteiakh 'al yhvh yedushan. proverbs 28:26	boteiakh belibo hu khesil veholekh bekhakhemah hu yimalet. proverbs 28:27	noten larash 'en makhsor uma'lim 'einav rab me'eirot. proverbs 28:28	bequm resha'im yisater 'adam ube'abedam yirbu zadiqim. proverbs 29:1	'ish tokhakhot maqsheh 'oref peta' yishaber ve'en marpei. proverbs 29:2	birbot zadiqim yismakh ha'am ubimshol rasha' yei'anakh 'am. proverbs 29:3	'ish 'oheb khakhmah yesamakh 'abiv vero'eh zonot ye'abed hon. proverbs 29:4	melekh bemishpat ya'amid 'arez ve'ish terumot yehersenah. proverbs 29:5	geber makhaliq 'al rei'eihu reshet pores 'al pe'amav. proverbs 29:6	befesha' 'ish ra' moqesh vezadiq yarun vesameiakh. proverbs 29:7	yodeia' zadiq din dalim rasha' lo yabin da'at. proverbs 29:8	'anshei lazon yafikhu qiryah vakhakhamim yashibu 'af. proverbs 29:9	'ish khakham nishpat 'et 'ish 'evil veragaz vesakhaq ve'en nakhat. proverbs 29:10	'anshei damim yisne'u tam visharim yebaqshu nafsho. proverbs 29:11	kal rukho yozi khesil vekhakham be'akhor yeshabekhenah. proverbs 29:12	moshel maqshib 'al debar shaqer kal mesharetav resha'im. proverbs 29:13	rash ve'ish tekhakhim nifgashu mei'ir 'einei sheneihem yhvh. proverbs 29:14	melekh shofet be'emet dalim kis'o la'ad yikon. proverbs 29:15	sheibet vetokhakhat yiten khakhmah vena'ar meshulakh meibish 'imo. proverbs 29:16	birbot resha'im yirbeh pasha' vezadiqim bemapaltam yir'u. proverbs 29:17	yaser binkha vinikhekha veyiten ma'adanim lenafshekha. proverbs 29:18	be'en khazon yipara' 'am veshomer torah 'ashreihu. proverbs 29:19	bidbarim lo yivaser 'abed ki yabin ve'en ma'aneh. proverbs 29:20	khazita 'ish 'az bidbarav tiqvah likhsil mimenu. proverbs 29:21	mefaneq mino'ar 'abdo ve'akharito yihyeh manon. proverbs 29:22	'ish 'af yegareh madon uba'al kheimah rab pasha'. proverbs 29:23	ga'avat 'adam tashpilenu ushefal ruakh yitmokh kabod. proverbs 29:24	kholeq 'im ganab sonei nafsho 'alah yishma' velo yagid. proverbs 29:25	kherdat 'adam yiten moqesh uboteiakh yhvh yesugab. proverbs 29:26	rabim mebaqshim penei moshel yhvh mishpat 'ish. proverbs 29:27	to'abat zadiqim 'ish 'avel veto'abat rasha' yeshar darekh. proverbs 30:1	dibrei 'agur bin yaqeh hamasa ne'um hageber le'iti'el le'iti'el ve'ukhal. proverbs 30:2	ki ba'ar 'anokhi mei'ish velo binat 'adam li. proverbs 30:3	velo lamadti khakhmah veda'at qedoshim 'eida'. proverbs 30:4	mi 'alah shamayim vayeirad mi 'asaf ruakh bekhafenav mi zarar mayim basimlah mi heiqim kal 'afsei 'arez mah shemo umah shem beno ki teida'. proverbs 30:5	kal 'imrat 'eloah zerufah magen hu lakhosim bo. proverbs 30:6	'al tosp 'al debarav pen yokhiakh bekha venikhzabeta. proverbs 30:7	tayim sha'alti mei'itakh 'al timna' mimeni beterem 'amut. proverbs 30:8	shav udebar kazab harkheq mimeni resh va'osher 'al titen li hatrifeini lekhem khuqi. proverbs 30:9	pen 'esba' vekhikhashti ve'amarti mi yhvh ufen 'ivaresh veganabti vetafasti shem 'elohai. proverbs 30:10	'al talshen 'ebed 'el 'adono 'adonav pen yeqalelkha ve'ashameta. proverbs 30:11	dor 'abiv yeqalel ve'et 'imo lo yebarekh. proverbs 30:12	dor tahor be'einav umizo'ato lo rukhaz. proverbs 30:13	dor mah ramu 'einav ve'af'apav yinasei'u. proverbs 30:14	dor kharabot shinav uma'akhalot metale'otav le'ekhol 'aniyim mei'erez ve'ebyonim mei'adam. proverbs 30:15	la'aluqah shetei banot hab hab shalosh henah lo tisba'nah 'arba' lo 'ameru hon. proverbs 30:16	she'ol ve'ozer rakham 'erez lo sabe'ah mayim ve'esh lo 'amerah hon. proverbs 30:17	'ayin til'ag le'ab vetabuz liqahat 'em yiqeruha 'orebei nakhal veyokheluha benei nasher. proverbs 30:18	sheloshah hemah nifle'u mimeni ve'arba' ve'arba'ah lo yeda'tim. proverbs 30:19	derekh hanesher bashamayim derekh nakhash 'alei zur derekh 'oniyah beleb yam vederekh geber be'almah. proverbs 30:20	ken derekh 'ishah mena'afet 'akhelah umakhatah fiha ve'amerah lo fa'alti 'aven. proverbs 30:21	takhat losh ragezah 'erez vetakhat 'arba' lo tukhal se'et. proverbs 30:22	takhat 'ebed ki yimlokh venabal ki yisba' lakhem. proverbs 30:23	takhat nu'ah ki tiba'el veshifkhah ki tirash gebirtah. proverbs 30:24	'arba'ah hem qetanei 'arez vehemah khakhamim mekhukamim. proverbs 30:25	hanemalim 'am lo 'az vayakhinu baqayiz lakhmam. proverbs 30:26	fanim 'am lo 'azum vayasimu basela' beitam. proverbs 30:27	melekh 'en la'arbeh vayeizei khozez kulo. proverbs 30:28	mamit beyadayim tetapes vehi beheikhelei melekh. proverbs 30:29	sheloshah hemah meitibei za'ad ve'arba'ah meitibei lakhet. proverbs 30:30	layish gibor babeheimah velo yashub mipenei khol. proverbs 30:31	zarzir matenayim 'o tayish umelekh 'alqum 'imo. proverbs 30:32	'im nabalta behitnasei ve'im zamota yad lefeh. proverbs 30:33	ki miz khalab yozi khem'ah umiz 'af yozi dam umiz 'apayim yozi rib. proverbs 31:1	dibrei lemu'el melekh masa 'asher yiseratu 'imo. proverbs 31:2	mah beri umah bar bitni umeh bar nedarai. proverbs 31:3	'al titen lanashim kheilekha uderakhekha lamkhot melakhin. proverbs 31:4	'al lamlakhim lemo'el 'al lamlakhim sheto yayin uleroznim 'o 'ei sheikhar. proverbs 31:5	pen yishteh veyishkakh mekhuqaq vishaneh din kal benei 'oni. proverbs 31:6	tenu sheikhar le'obed veyayin lemarei nafesh. proverbs 31:7	yishteh veyishkakh risho va'amalo lo yizkar 'od. proverbs 31:8	petakh pikha le'ilem 'el din kal benei khalof. proverbs 31:9	petakh pikha shefat zedeq vedin 'ani ve'ebyon. proverbs 31:10	'eishet khayil mi yimza verakhoq mipeninim mikhrah. proverbs 31:11	batakh bah leb ba'lah veshalal lo yekhsar. proverbs 31:12	gemalathu tob velo ra' kol yemei khayeh proverbs 31:13	dareshah zemer ufishtim vata'as bekheifez kapeha. proverbs 31:14	hayetah ka'oniyot sokher mimerkhaq tabi lakhmah. proverbs 31:15	vataqam be'od laylah vatiten teref lebeitah vekhoq lena'aroteha. proverbs 31:16	zamemah deh vatiqakheihu miperi khapeha neta' nate'ah karem. proverbs 31:17	khagerah be'oz mateneha vate'amez zero'oteha. proverbs 31:18	ta'amah ki tob sakhrah lo yikhbeh balayil balaylah neirah. proverbs 31:19	yadeha shilekhah bakishor vekhapeha tamekhu falekh. proverbs 31:20	kapah paresah le'ani veyadeha shilekhah la'ebyon. proverbs 31:21	lo tira lebeitah mishaleg ki khal beitah labush shanim. proverbs 31:22	marbadim 'asetah lah shesh ve'argaman lebushah. proverbs 31:23	noda' bashe'arim ba'lah beshibto 'im ziqnei 'arez. proverbs 31:24	sadin 'asetah vatimkor vakhagor natenah lakena'ani. proverbs 31:25	'oz vehadar lebushah vatiskhaq leyom 'akharon. proverbs 31:26	piha patekhah bekhakhemah vetorat khesed 'al leshonah. proverbs 31:27	zofiyah halikhot beitah velekhem 'azlut lo tokhel. proverbs 31:28	qamu baneha vai'asheruha ba'lah vayhalah. proverbs 31:29	rabot banot 'asu khayil ve'at 'alit 'al kulanah. proverbs 31:30	sheqer hakhen vehebel hayofi 'ishah yir'at yhvh hi tithalal. proverbs 31:31	tenu lah miperi yadeha vihaluha bashe'arim ma'aseha. 

job 1:1	'ish hayah be'erez 'uz 'iyob shemo vehayah ha'ish hahu tam veyashar virei 'elohim vesar meira'. job 1:2	vayivaledu lo shib'ah banim veshalosh banot. job 1:3	vayhi miqneihu shib'at 'alfei zon usheloshet 'alfei gemalim vakhamesh mei'ot zemed baqar vakhamesh mei'ot 'atonot va'abudah rabah me'od vayhi ha'ish hahu gadol mikal benei qedem. job 1:4	vehalekhu banav ve'asu mishteh bet 'ish yomo veshalekhu veqare'u lishloshet 'akhyoteihem 'akhyoteihem le'ekhol velishtot 'imahem. job 1:5	vayhi ki hiqifu yemei hamishteh vayishlakh 'iyob vayqadeshem vehishkim baboqer vehe'elah 'olot mispar kulam ki 'amar 'iyob 'ulai khate'u banai ubeirakhu 'elohim bilbabam kakhah ya'aseh 'iyob kal hayamim. job 1:6	vayhi hayom vayabo'u benei ha'elohim lehityazeb 'al yhvh vayabo gam hasatan betokham. job 1:7	vayomer yhvh 'el hasatan mei'ayin tabo vaya'an hasatan 'et yhvh vayomar mishut ba'arez umeihithalekh bah. job 1:8	vayomer yhvh 'el hasatan hasamta libekha 'al 'abdi 'iyob ki 'en kamohu ba'arez 'ish tam veyashar yerei 'elohim vesar meira'. job 1:9	vaya'an hasatan 'et yhvh vayomar hakhinam yarei 'iyob 'elohim. job 1:10	halo 'at 'atah sakhta ba'ado ube'ad beito ube'ad kal 'asher lo misabib ma'aseh yadav beirakhta umiqneihu paraz ba'arez. job 1:11	ve'ulam shelakh na yadekha vega' bekhal 'asher lo 'im lo 'al panekha yebarakheka. job 1:12	vayomer yhvh 'el hasatan hineh khal 'asher lo beyadekha raq 'eilav 'al tishlakh yadekha vayeizei hasatan mei'im penei yhvh. job 1:13	vayhi hayom ubanav ubenotav 'okhelim veshotim yayin bebet 'akhihem habekhor. job 1:14	umal'akh ba 'el 'iyob vayomar habaqar hayu khoreshot veha'atonot ro'ot 'al yedeihem. job 1:15	vatipol sheba vatiqakhem ve'et hane'arim hiku lefi khareb va'imaletah raq 'ani lebadi lehagid lakh. job 1:16	'od zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar 'esh 'elohim nafelah min hashamayim vatib'ar bazon ubane'arim vatokhelem va'imaletah raq 'ani lebadi lehagid lakh. job 1:17	'od zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar kasdim samu sheloshah rashim vayifshetu 'al hagemalim vayiqakhum ve'et hane'arim hiku lefi khareb va'imaletah raq 'ani lebadi lehagid lakh. job 1:18	'ad zeh medaber vezeh ba vayomar banekha ubenotekha 'okhelim veshotim yayin bebet 'akhihem habekhor. job 1:19	vehineh ruakh gedolah ba'ah mei'eiber hamidbar vayiga' be'arba' pinot habayit vayipol 'al hane'arim vayamutu va'imaletah raq 'ani lebadi lehagid lakh. job 1:20	vayaqam 'iyob vayiqra' 'et me'ilo vayagaz 'et rosho vayipol 'arzah vayishtakhu. job 1:21	vayomer 'arom yazati yazati mibeten 'imi ve'arom 'ashub shamah yhvh natan yhvh laqakh yehi shem yhvh meborakh. job 1:22	bekhal zot lo khata 'iyob velo natan tiflah leilohim. job 2:1	vayhi hayom vayabo'u benei ha'elohim lehityazeb 'al yhvh vayabo gam hasatan betokham lehityazeb 'al yhvh. job 2:2	vayomer yhvh 'el hasatan 'ei mizeh tabo vaya'an hasatan 'et yhvh vayomar mishut ba'arez umeihithalekh bah. job 2:3	vayomer yhvh 'el hasatan hasamta libekha 'el 'abdi 'iyob ki 'en kamohu ba'arez 'ish tam veyashar yerei 'elohim vesar meira' ve'odenu makhaziq betumato vatesiteini bo lebale'o khinam. job 2:4	vaya'an hasatan 'et yhvh vayomar 'or be'ad 'or vekhol 'asher la'ish yiten be'ad nafsho. job 2:5	'ulam shelakh na yadekha vega' 'el 'azmo ve'el besaro 'im lo 'el panekha yebarakheka. job 2:6	vayomer yhvh 'el hasatan hino beyadekha 'akh 'et nafsho shemor. job 2:7	vayeizei hasatan mei'et penei yhvh vayakh 'et 'iyob bishkhin ra' mikaf raglo 'ad ve'ad qadeqodo. job 2:8	vayiqakh lo kheres lehitgared bo vehu yosheb betokh ha'eifer. job 2:9	vatomer lo 'ishto 'odekha makhaziq betumatekha barekh 'elohim vamut. job 2:10	vayomer 'eileha kedaber 'akhat hanebalot tedabeiri gam 'et hatob neqabel mei'et ha'elohim ve'et hara' lo neqabel bekhal zot lo khata 'iyob bisfatav. job 2:11	vayishme'u sheloshet rei'ei 'iyob 'et kal hara'ah hazot haba'ah 'alav vayabo'u 'ish mimeqomo 'elifaz hateimani ubildad hashukhi vezofar hana'amati vayiva'adu yakhdav labo lanud lo ulenakhamo. job 2:12	vayis'u 'et 'eineihem meirakhoq velo hikiruhu vayis'u qolam vayibku vayiqre'u 'ish me'ilo vayizrequ 'afar 'al rasheihem hashamayemah. job 2:13	vayeishebu 'ito la'arez shib'at yamim veshib'at leilot ve'en dober 'eilav dabar ki ra'u ki gadal hake'eb me'od. job 3:1	'akharei khen patakh 'iyob 'et pihu vayqalel 'et yomo. job 3:2	vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. job 3:3	yobad yom 'ivaled bo vehalaylah 'amar horah gaber. job 3:4	hayom hahu yehi khoshekh 'al yidresheihu 'eloah mima'al ve'al tofa' 'alav neharah. job 3:5	yig'aluhu khoshekh vezalmavet tishkan 'alav 'ananah yeba'atuhu kimrirei yom. job 3:6	halaylah hahu yiqakheihu 'ofel 'al yikhad bimei shanah bemispar yerakhim 'al yabo. job 3:7	hineh halaylah hahu yehi galmud 'al tabo renanah bo. job 3:8	yiqebuhu 'orerei yom ha'atidim 'orer livyatan. job 3:9	yekhshekhu kokhbei nishpo yeqav le'or va'ayin ve'al yir'eh be'af'apei shakhar. job 3:10	ki lo sagar daltei bitni vayaster 'amal mei'einai. job 3:11	lamah lo meirekhem 'amut mibeten yazati ve'egva'. job 3:12	madua' qidemuni birkayim umahosha dayim ki 'inaq. job 3:13	ki 'atah shakhabti ve'eshqot yashanti 'az yanuakh li. job 3:14	'im melakhim veyo'azei 'arez habonim khorabot lamo. job 3:15	'o 'imsa rim zahab lahem hamal'im bateihem kasef. job 3:16	'o kheneifel tamun lo 'ehyeh ke'olelim lo ra'u 'or. job 3:17	sham resha'im khadelu rogez vesham yanukhu yegi'ei khoakh. job 3:18	yakhad 'asirim sha'ananu lo me'u qol noges. job 3:19	qaton vegadol sham hu ve'ebed khafeshi mei'adonav. job 3:20	lamah yiten le'amel 'or vekhayim lemarei nafesh. job 3:21	hamkhakim lamavet ve'einenu vayakhperuhu mimatmonim. job 3:22	hasemeikhim 'elei gil yasisu ki yimze'u qaber. job 3:23	legeber 'asher darko nistarah vayasekh 'eloah ba'ado. job 3:24	ki lifnei lakhmi 'ankhati tabo vayitekhu khamayim sha'agotai. job 3:25	ki fakhad pakhadti vaye'etayeini va'asher yagoreti yabo li. job 3:26	lo shalavti velo shaqati velo nakheti vayabo rogez. job 4:1	vaya'an 'elifaz hateimani vayomar. job 4:2	hanisah dabar 'eilekha til'eh va'zor bemilin mi yukhal. job 4:3	hineh yisarta rabim veyadayim rafot tekhazeq. job 4:4	koshel yeqimun milekha ubirkayim kore'ot te'amez. job 4:5	ki 'atah tabo 'eilekha vateile tiga' 'adekha vatibahel. job 4:6	halo yir'atekha kislatekha tiqvatekha vetom derakhekha. job 4:7	zekhar na mi hu naqi 'abad ve'eifoh yesharim nikhkhadu. job 4:8	ka'asher ra'iti khoreshei 'aven vezore'ei 'amal yiqzeruhu. job 4:9	minishmat 'eloha yobeidu umeiruakh 'apo yikhlu. job 4:10	sha'agat 'aryeh veqol shakhal veshinei khefirim nita'u. job 4:11	layish 'obed mibeli taref ubenei labi yitparadu. job 4:12	ve'eilai dabar yegunab vatiqakh 'azeni sheimez menhu. job 4:13	bis'ipim meikhezyonot layelah binfol tardeimah 'al 'anashim. job 4:14	pakhad qera'ani ure'adah verob 'azmotai hifkhid. job 4:15	veruakh 'al panai yakhalof tesamer sa'arat besari. job 4:16	ya'amod velo 'akir mar'eihu temunah leneged 'einai demamah vaqol 'eshma'. job 4:17	ha'enosh mei'eloha yizdaq 'im mei'oseihu yithar gaber. job 4:18	hen ba'abadav lo ya'amin ubemal'akhav yasim taholah. job 4:19	'af shokhenei batei khomer 'asher be'afar yesodam yedake'um lifnei 'ash. job 4:20	miboqer la'ereb yukatu mibeli meisim lanezakh yobeidu. job 4:21	halo nisa' yitram bam yamutu velo bekhakhemah. job 5:1	qera na hayesh 'oneka ve'el mi miqedoshim tifneh. job 5:2	ki le'evil yaharag ka'as ufoteh tamit qin'ah. job 5:3	'ani ra'iti 'evil mashrish va'eqob naveihu fit'om. job 5:4	yirkhaqu banav miyesha' veyidake'u basha'ar ve'en mazil. job 5:5	'asher qeziro ra'eb yokhel ve'el mizinim yiqakheihu vesha'af zamim kheilam. job 5:6	ki lo yeizei mei'afar 'aven umei'adamah lo yizmakh 'amal. job 5:7	ki 'adam le'amal yulad ubenei reshef yagbihu 'uf. job 5:8	'ulam 'ani 'edrosh 'el 'el ve'el 'elohim 'asim dibrati. job 5:9	'oseh gedolot ve'en kheiqer nifla'ot 'ad 'en mispar. job 5:10	hanoten matar 'al penei 'arez vesholeiakh mayim 'al penei khuzot. job 5:11	lasum shefalim lemarom veqoderim sagebu yesha'. job 5:12	meifer makhshebot 'arumim velo ta'asenah yedeihem tushiyah. job 5:13	lokhed khakhamim be'aremam va'azat niftalim nimharah. job 5:14	yomam yefageshu khoshekh vekhalaylah yemashu bazahorayim. job 5:15	vayosha' meikhereb mipihem umiyad khazaq 'ebyon. job 5:16	vatehi ladal tiqvah ve'olatah qafezah piha. job 5:17	hineh 'ashrei 'enosh yokhikhenu 'eloah umusar dai 'al tim'as. job 5:18	ki hu yakh'ib veyekhbash yimkhaz veyado veyadav tirpenah. job 5:19	beshesh zarot yazileka ubesheba' lo yiga' bekha ra'. job 5:20	bera'ab padekha mimavet ubemilkhamah midei khareb. job 5:21	beshot lashon teikhabei velo tira mishod ki yabo. job 5:22	leshod ulekhafan tiskhaq umeikhayat ha'arez 'al tira. job 5:23	ki 'im 'abnei hasadeh beritekha vekhayat hasadeh hashelemah lakh. job 5:24	veyada'ta ki shalom 'aholekha ufaqadta navekha velo tekheta. job 5:25	veyada'ta ki rab zar'ekha veze'eza'ekha ke'eiseb ha'arez. job 5:26	tabo bekhelakh 'elei qaber ka'alot gadish be'ito. job 5:27	hineh zot khaqarnuha ken hi ma'enah ve'atah da' lakh. job 6:1	vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. job 6:2	lu shaqol yishaqel ka'si vehayati vehavati bemozenayim yis'u yakhad. job 6:3	ki 'atah meikhol yamim yikhbad 'al ken debarai la'u. job 6:4	ki khizei shadai 'imadi 'asher khamatam shotah rukhi bi'utei 'eloah ya'arkhuni. job 6:5	hayinhaq pere 'alei deshe 'im yig'ehosho vr 'al belilo. job 6:6	hayei'akhel tafel mibeli melakh 'im yesh ta'am berir khalamut. job 6:7	mei'anah lingoa' nafshi hemah kidvei lakhmi. job 6:8	mi yiten tabo she'elati vetiqvati yiten 'eloah. job 6:9	veyo'el 'eloah vidake'eini yater yado vibaze'eini. job 6:10	utehi 'od nekhamati va'asaledah bekhilah lo yakhmol ki lo khikhadti 'imrei qadosh. job 6:11	mah kokhi khi 'ayakhel umah qizi ki 'a'arikh nafshi. job 6:12	'im koakh 'abanim kokhi 'im besari nakhush. job 6:13	ha'im 'en 'ezrati bi vetushiyah nidekhah mimeni. job 6:14	lamas meirei'eihu khased veyir'at shadai ya'azob. job 6:15	'akhai bagedu khemo nakhal ka'afiq nekhalim ya'aboru. job 6:16	haqoderim mini qarakh 'aleimo yit'alem shaleg. job 6:17	be'et yezorebu nizmatu bekhumo nid'akhu mimeqomam. job 6:18	yilafetu 'arekhot darkam ya'alu batohu veyobeidu. job 6:19	hibitu 'arekhot teima halikhot ba qivu lamo. job 6:20	boshu ki batakh ba'u 'adeha vayekhparu. job 6:21	ki 'atah heyitem lo lo tir'u khatat vatira'u. job 6:22	hakhi 'amarti habu li umikokhakhem shikhadu ba'adi. job 6:23	umaletuni miyad zar umiyad 'arizim tifduni. job 6:24	horuni va'ani 'akharish umahosha giti habinu li. job 6:25	mah nimrezu 'imrei yosher umah yokhiakh hokheiakh mikem. job 6:26	halhokhakh milim takhshobu uleruakh 'imrei no'ash. job 6:27	'af 'al yatom tapilu vetikhru 'al rei'akhem. job 6:28	ve'atah ho'ilu fenu bi ve'al peneikhem 'im 'akhazeb. job 6:29	shubu na 'al tehi 'avlah veshubi veshubu 'od zidqi bah. job 6:30	hayesh bilshoni 'avlah 'im khiki lo yabin havot. job 7:1	halo zaba le'enosh 'al 'alei 'arez vekhimei sakhir yamav. job 7:2	ke'ebed yish'af zel ukhesakhir yeqaveh fa'olo. job 7:3	ken hanekhalti li yarkhei shav veleilot 'amal minu li. job 7:4	'im shakhabti ve'amarti matai 'aqum umidad 'areb vesaba'ti nedudim 'adei nashef. job 7:5	labash besari rimah vegish vegush 'afar 'ori raga' vayima'es. job 7:6	yamai qalu mini 'areg vayikhlu be'efes tiqvah. job 7:7	zekhor ki ruakh khayai lo tashub 'eini lir'ot tob. job 7:8	lo teshureini 'en ro'i 'einekha bi ve'eineni. job 7:9	kalah 'anan vayeilakh ken yored 'ol lo ya'aleh. job 7:10	lo yashub 'od lebeito velo yakirenu 'od meqomo. job 7:11	gam 'ani lo 'ekhesakh pi 'adaberah bezar rukhi 'asikhah bemar nafshi. job 7:12	hayam 'ani 'im tanin ki tasim 'alai mishmar. job 7:13	ki 'amarti tenakhameini 'arsi yisa besikhi mishkabi. job 7:14	vekhitatani bakhalomot umeikhezyonot teba'atani. job 7:15	vatibkhar makhanaq nafshi mavet mei'azmotai. job 7:16	ma'asti lo le'olam 'ekhyeh khadal mimeni ki hebel yamai. job 7:17	mah 'enosh ki tegadelenu vekhi tashit 'eilav libekha. job 7:18	vatifqedenu libqarim lirga'im tibkhanenu. job 7:19	kamah lo tish'eh mimeni lo tarpeini 'ad bil'i ruqi. job 7:20	khatati mah 'ef'al lakh nozer ha'adam lamah samtani lemifga' lakh va'ehyeh 'alai lemasa. job 7:21	umeh lo tisa fish'i veta'abir 'et 'avoni ki 'atah le'afar 'eshkab veshikhartani ve'eineni. job 8:1	vaya'an bildad hashukhi vayomar job 8:2	'ad 'an temalel 'eleh veruakh kabir 'imrei fikha. job 8:3	ha'el ye'avet mishpat ve'imosha dai ye'avet zedeq. job 8:4	'im banekha khate'u lo vayshalekhem beyad pish'am. job 8:5	'im 'atah teshakher 'el 'el ve'elosha dai titkhanan. job 8:6	'im zakh veyashar 'atah ki 'atah ya'ir 'alekha veshilam nevat zidqekha. job 8:7	vehayah reishitekha miz'ar ve'akharitekha yisgeh me'od. job 8:8	ki she'al na ledor rishon vekhonen lekheiqer 'abotam. job 8:9	ki temol 'anakhnu velo neida' ki zel yameinu 'alei 'arez. job 8:10	halo hem yorukha yomeru lakh umilibam yozi'u milim. job 8:11	hayig'eh gome belo bizah yisgeh 'akhu beli mayim. job 8:12	'odenu be'ibo lo yiqatef velifnei khal khazir yibash. job 8:13	ken 'arekhot kal shokhekhei 'el vetiqvat khanef tobed. job 8:14	'asher yaqot kislo ubet 'akabish mibtakho. job 8:15	yisha'en 'al beito velo ya'amod yakhaziq bo velo yaqum. job 8:16	ratob hu lifnei shamesh ve'al ganato yonaqto teizei. job 8:17	'al gal sharashav yesubakhu bet 'abanim yekhezeh. job 8:18	'im yebale'enu mimeqomo vekhikhesh bo lo re'itikha. job 8:19	hen hu mesos darko umei'afar 'akher yizmakhu. job 8:20	hen 'el lo yim'as tam velo yakhaziq beyad merei'im. job 8:21	'ad yemaleh sekhoq pikha usefatekha teru'ah. job 8:22	sone'ekha yilbeshu boshet ve'ohel resha'im 'einenu. job 9:1	vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. job 9:2	'amenam yada'ti khi khen umah yizdaq 'enosh 'im 'el. job 9:3	'im yakhpoz larib 'imo lo ya'anenu 'akhat mini 'alef. job 9:4	khakham leibab ve'amiz koakh mi hiqshah 'eilav vayishlam. job 9:5	hama'tiq harim velo yada'u 'asher hafakham be'apo. job 9:6	hamargiz 'erez mimeqomah ve'amudeha yitfalazun job 9:7	ha'omer lakheres velo yizrakh ube'ad kokhabim yakhtom. job 9:8	noteh shamayim lebado vedorekh 'al bamotei yam. job 9:9	'oseh 'ash kesil vekhimah vekhadrei teiman. job 9:10	'oseh gedolot 'ad 'en kheiqer venifla'ot 'ad 'en mispar. job 9:11	hen ya'abor 'alai velo 'er'eh veyakhalof velo 'abin lo. job 9:12	hen yakhtof mi yeshibenu mi yomar 'eilav mah ta'aseh. job 9:13	'eloah lo yashib 'apo takhato takhtav khakhu 'ozerei rahab. job 9:14	'af ki 'anokhi 'e'enenu 'ebkharah debarai 'imo. job 9:15	'asher 'im zadaqti lo 'e'eneh limshofeti 'etkhanan. job 9:16	'im qarati vaya'aneini lo 'a'amin ki ya'azin qoli. job 9:17	'asher bis'arah yeshufeini vehirbah feza'ai khinam. job 9:18	lo yiteneini hasheb rukhi ki yasbi'ani mamerorim. job 9:19	'im lekhoakh 'amiz hineh ve'im lemishpat mi yo'ideini. job 9:20	'im 'ezdaq pi yarshi'eini tam 'ani vaya'qesheini. job 9:21	tam 'ani lo 'eida' nafshi 'em'as khayai. job 9:22	'akhat hi 'al ken 'amarti tam verasha' hu mekhaleh. job 9:23	'imosho vt yamit pit'om lemasat neqiyim yil'ag. job 9:24	'erez nitenah beyad rasha' penei shofeteha yekhaseh 'im lo 'eifo mi hu. job 9:25	veyamai qalu mini raz barekhu lo ra'u tobah. job 9:26	khalefu 'im 'oniyot 'eibeh kenesher yatus 'alei 'okhel. job 9:27	'im 'ameri 'eshkekhah sikhi 'e'ezbah fanai ve'abligah. job 9:28	yagoreti khal 'azebotai yada'ti ki lo tenaqeini. job 9:29	'anokhi 'ersha' lamah zeh hebel 'iga'. job 9:30	'im hitrakhazti bemo bemei shaleg vahazikoti bebor kapai. job 9:31	'az bashakhat titbeleini veti'abuni salmotai. job 9:32	ki lo 'ish kamoni 'e'enenu nabo yakhdav bamishpat. job 9:33	lo yesh beineinu mokhiakh yashet yado 'al sheneinu. job 9:34	yaser mei'alai shibto ve'eimato 'al teba'atani. job 9:35	'adaberah velo 'ira'enu ki lo khen 'anokhi 'imadi. job 10:1	naqetah nafshi bekhayai 'e'ezbah 'alai sikhi 'adaberah bemar nafshi. job 10:2	'omar 'el 'eloah 'al tarshi'eini hodi'eini 'al mah teribeini. job 10:3	hatob lekha ki ta'ashoq ki tim'as yegia' kapekha ve'al 'azat resha'im hofa'eta. job 10:4	ha'einei basar lakh 'im kir'ot 'enosh tir'eh. job 10:5	hakhimei 'enosh yamekha 'imosh notekha kimei gaber. job 10:6	ki tebaqesh la'avoni ulekhatati tidrosh. job 10:7	'al da'tekha ki lo 'ersha' ve'en miyadekha mazil. job 10:8	yadekha 'izebuni vaya'asuni yakhad sabib vatebale'eini. job 10:9	zekhar na ki khakhomer 'asitani ve'el 'afar teshibeini. job 10:10	halo khekhalab tatikheini vekhagebinah taqpi'eini. job 10:11	'or ubasar talbisheini uba'azamot vegidim tesokhekheini. job 10:12	khayim vakhesed 'asita 'imadi ufequdatekha shamerah rukhi. job 10:13	ve'eleh zafanta bilbabekha yada'ti ki zot 'imakh. job 10:14	'im 10:17	tekhadesh 'eidekha negdi vetereb ka'askha 'imadi khalifot vezaba 'imi. job 10:18	velamah meirekhem hozeitani 'egva' ve'ayin lo tir'eini. job 10:19	ka'asher lo hayiti 'ehyeh mibeten laqeber 'ubal. job 10:20	halo me'at yamai yekhdal vakhadal yashit veshit mimeni ve'abligah me'at. job 10:21	beterem 'eilekh velo 'ashub 'el 'erez khoshekh vezalmavet. job 10:22	'erez 'eifatah kemo 'ofel zalmavet velo sedarim vatofa' kemo 'ofel. job 11:1	vaya'an zofar hana'amati vayomar. job 11:2	harob debarim lo yei'aneh ve'im 'ish sefatayim yizdaq. job 11:3	badekha metim yakharishv vatil'ag ve'en makhlim. job 11:4	vatomer zakh liqkhi ubar hayiti be'einekha. job 11:5	ve'ulam mi yiten 'eloah daber veyiftakh sefatav 'imakh. job 11:6	veyaged lekha ta'alumot khakhmah ki khiflayim letushiyah veda' ki yasheh lekha 'eloha mei'avonekha. job 11:7	hakheiqer 'eloha timza 'im 'ad takhlit shadai timza. job 11:8	gabehei mayim mah tif'al 'amuqah mishe'ol mah teida'. job 11:9	'arukah mei'erez midah urekhabah mini yam. job 11:10	'im yakhalof veyasgir veyaqhil umi yeshibenu. job 11:11	ki hu yada' metei shav vayar 'aven velo yitbonan. job 11:12	ve'ish nabub yilabeb ve'ayir pere 'adam yivaled. job ve'en makharid vekhilu fanekha rabim. job 11:20	ve'einei resha'im tikhlenah umanos 'abad minhem vetiqvatam mapakh nafesh. job 12:1	vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. job 12:2	'amenam ki 'atem 'am ve'imakhem tamut khakhmah job 12:3	gam li leibab kemokhem lo nofel 'anokhi mikem ve'et mi 'en kemo 'eleh. job 12:4	sekhoq lerei'eihu 'ehyeh qorei le'eloah vaya'aneihu khoq zadiq tamim. job 12:5	lapid buz le'ashtut sha'anan nakhon lemo'adei ragel. job 12:6	yishlayu 'ohalim leshodedim ubatukhot lemargizei 'el la'asher heibi 'eloah beyado. job 12:7	ve'ulam she'al na beheimot vetoreka ve'of hashamayim veyaged lakh. job 12:8	'o siakh la'arez vetoreka visaperu lekha degei hayam. job 12:9	mi lo yada' bekhal 'eleh ki yad yhvh 'asetah zot. job 12:10	'asher beyado nefesh kal khai veruakh kal besar 'ish. job 12:11	halo 'ozen milin tibkhan vekhekh 'okhel yit'am lo. job 12:12	bishishim khakhmah ve'orekh yamim tebunah. job 12:13	'imo khakhmah ugeburah lo 'eizah utebunah. job 12:14	hen yaharos velo yibaneh yisgor 'al 'ish velo yipateiakh. job 12:15	hen ya'zor bamayim veyibashu vishalekhem veyahafkhu 'arez. job 12:16	'imo 'oz vetushiyah lo shogeg umashgeh. job 12:17	molikh yo'azim sholal veshofetim yeholel. job 12:18	musar melakhim piteiakh vaye'sor 'eizor bemateneihem. job 12:19	molikh kohanim sholal ve'eitanim yesalef. job 12:20	meisir fah lene'emanim veta'am zeqeinim yiqakh. job 12:21	shofekh buz 'al nedibim umeziakh 'afiqim ripah. job 12:22	megaleh 'amuqot mini khoshekh vayozei la'or zalmavet. job 12:23	masgi lagoyim vai'abedem shoteiakh lagoyim vayankhem. job 12:24	meisir leb rashei 'am ha'arez vayat'em betohu lo darekh. job 12:25	yemashu khoshekh velo 'or vayat'em kashikor. job 13:1	hen kol ra'atah 'eini shame'ah 'azeni vataben lah. job 13:2	keda'tekhem yada'ti gam 'ani lo nofel 'anokhi lekhakhemah. job 13:6	shim'u na tokhakhti veribot sefatai haqshibu. job 13:7	hal'el tedaberu 'avlah velo tedaberu remiyah. job 13:8	hafanav tisa'un 'im la'el teribun. job 13:9	hatob ki yakhqor 'etkhem 'im kehatel be'enosh tehatelu bo. job 13:10	hokheiakh yokhiakh 'etkhem 'im baseiter panim tisa'un. job 13:11	halo 'eito teba'et 'etkhem ufakhdo yipol 'aleikhem. job 13:12	zikhroneikhem mishlei 'eifer legabei khomer gabeikhem. job 13:13	hakharishu mimeni va'adaberah 'ani veya'abor 'alai mah. job 13:14	'al mah 'esa besari beshinai venafshi 'asim bekhapi. job 13:15	hen yiqteleini lo lo 'ayakhel 'akh derakhai 'el panav 'okhiakh. job 13:16	gam hu li lishu'ah ki lo lefanav khanef yabo. job 13:17	shim'u moa' milati ve'akhavati be'azeneikhem. job 13:18	hineh na 'arakhti mishpat yada'ti ki 'ani 'ezdaq. job 13:19	mi hu yarib 'imadi ki 'atah 'akharish ve'egva'. job 13:20	'akhosh tayim 'al ta'as 'imadi 'az mipanekha lo 'esater. job 13:21	kapekha mei'alai harkhaq ve'eimatekha 'al teba'atani. job 13:22	uqera ve'anokhi 'e'eneh 'o 'adaber vahashibeini. job 13:23	kamah li 'avonot vekhata'ot pish'i vekhatati hodi'eini job 13:24	lamah fanekha tastir vetakhshebeini le'oyeb lakh. job 13:25	he'aleh nidaf ta'aroz ve'et qash yabesh tirdof. job 13:26	ki tikhtob 'alai merorot vetorisheini 'avonot ne'urai. job 13:27	vetasem basad raglai vetishmor kal 'arekhotai 'al shareshei raglai titkhaqeh. job 13:28	vehu keraqab yibleh kebeged 'akhalo 'ash. job 14:1	'adam yelud 'ishah qezar yamim useba' rogez. job 14:2	keziz yaza vayimal vayibrakh kazel velo ya'amod. job 14:3	'af 'al zeh paqakhta 'einekha ve'oti tabi bemishpat 'imakh. job 14:4	mi yiten tahor mitamei lo 'ekhad. job 14:5	'im kharuzim yamav mispar khodashav 'itakh khuqo khuqav 'asita velo ya'abor. job 14:6	she'eh mei'alav veyekhdal 'ad yirzeh kesakhir yomo. job 14:7	ki yesh la'ez tiqvah 'im yikaret ve'od yakhalif veyonaqto lo tekhdal. job 14:8	'im yazqin ba'arez sharesho ube'afar yamut giz'o. job 14:9	meireiakh mayim yafriakh ve'asah qazir kemo nata'. job 14:10	vegeber yamut vayekhelash vayigva' 'adam ve'ayo. job 14:11	'azelu mayim mini yam venahar yekherab veyabesh. job 14:12	ve'ish shakhab velo yaqum 'ad bilti mayim lo yaqizu velo yei'oru mishenatam. job 14:13	mi yiten bish'ol tazpineini tastireini 'ad shub 'apekha tashit li khoq vetizkereini. job 14:14	'im yamut geber hayikhyeh kal yemei zeba'i 'ayakhel 'ad bo khalifati. job 14:15	tiqra ve'anokhi 'e'eneka lema'aseh yadekha tikhsof. job 14:16	ki 'atah ze'adai tispor lo tishmor 'al khatati. job 14:17	khatum bizror pish'i vatitpol 'al 'avoni. job 14:18	ve'ulam har nofel yibol vezur ye'taq mimeqomo. job 14:19	'abanim shakhaqu mayim tishtof sefikheha 'afar 'arez vetiqvat 'enosh he'ebadta. job 14:20	titqefeihu lanezakh vayahalokh meshaneh fanav vateshalekheihu. job 14:21	yikhbedu banav velo yeida' veyiz'aru velo yabin lamo. job 14:22	'akh besaro 'alav yikh'ab venafsho 'alav te'ebal. job 15:1	vaya'an 'elifaz hateimani vayomar. job 15:2	hekhakham ya'aneh da'at ruakh vimalei qadim bitno. job 15:3	hokheiakh bedabar lo yiskon umilim lo yo'il bam. job 15:4	'af 'atah tafer yir'ah vetigra' khah lifnei 'el. job 15:5	ki ye'alef 'avonekha fikha vetibkhar leshon 'arumim. job 15:6	yarshi'akha fikha velo 'ani usefatekha ya'anu bakh. job 15:7	hariyoshon 'adam tivaled velifnei geba'ot kholaleta. job 15:8	habsod 'eloha tishma' vetigra' 'eilekha khakhmah job 15:9	mah yada'ta velo neida' tabin velo 'imanu hu. job 15:10	gam sab gam yashish banu kabir mei'abikha yamim. job 15:11	ham'at mimekha tankhumot 'el vedabar la'at 'imakh. job 15:12	mah yiqakhakha libekha umah yirzemun 'einekha. job 15:13	ki tashib 'el 'el rukhekha vehozeita mipikha milin. job 15:14	mah 'enosh ki yizkeh vekhi yizdaq yelud 'ishah. job 15:15	hen biqdosho biqdoshav lo ya'amin veshamayim lo zaku be'einav. job 15:16	'af ki nit'ab vene'elakh 'ish shoteh khamayim 'avlah. job 15:17	'akhavkha shema' li vezeh khaziti va'asapeirah. job 15:18	'asher khakhamim yagidu velo khikhadu mei'abotam. job 15:19	lahem lebadam nitenah ha'arez velo 'abar zar betokham. job 15:20	kal yemei rasha' hu mitkholel umispar nim nizpenu le'ariz. job 15:21	qol pekhadim be'azenav bashalom shoded yebo'enu. job 15:22	lo ya'amin ub mini khoshekh vezafu vezafui hu 'elei khareb. job 15:23	noded hu lalekhem 'ayeh yada' ki nakhon beyado yom khoshekh. job 15:24	yeba'atuhu zar umezuqah titqefeihu kemelekh 'atid lakidor. job 15:25	ki natah 'el 'el yado ve'elosha dai yitgabar. job 15:26	yaruz 'eilav bezavar ba'abi gabei maginav. job 15:27	ki khisah fanav bekhelbo vaya'as pimah 'alei khasel. job 15:28	vayishkon 'arim nikhkhadot batim lo yeishebu lamo 'asher hit'atedu legalim. job 15:29	lo ye'shar velo yaqum kheilo velo yiteh la'arez minlam. job 15:30	lo yasur mini khoshekh yonaqto teyabesh shalhabet veyasur beruakh piv. job 15:31	'al ya'amen basho bashav nit'ah kisha v tihyeh temurato. job 15:32	belo yomo timalei vekhipato lo ra'ananah. job 15:33	yakhmos kagefen bisro veyashlekh kazayit nizato. job 15:34	ki 'adat khanef galmud ve'esh 'akhelah 'aholei shokhad. job 15:35	haroh 'amal veyalod 'aven ubitnam takhin mirmah. job 16:1	vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. job 16:2	shama'ti khe'eleh rabot menakhamei 'amal kulekhem. job 16:3	haqez ledibrei ruakh 'o mah yamrizekha ki ta'aneh. job 16:4	gam 'anokhi kakhem 'adabeirah lu yesh nafshekhem takhat nafshi 'akhbirah 'aleikhem bemilim ve'ani'ah 'aleikhem bemo roshi. job 16:5	'a'amizkhem bemo fi venid sefatai yakhsokh. job 16:6	'im 'adaberah lo yeikhasekh ke'eibi ve'akhdelah mah mini yahalokh. job 16:7	'akh 'atah hel'ani hashimota kal 'adati. job 16:8	vatiqmeteini le'ed hayah vayaqam bi khakhashi befanai ya'aneh. job 16:9	'apo taraf vayistemeini kharaq 'alai beshinav zari yiltosh 'einav li. job 16:10	pa'aru 'alai befihem bekherpah hiku lekhayai yakhad 'alai yitmala'un. job 16:11	yasgireini 'el 'el 'avil ve'al yedei resha'im yirteini. job 16:12	shalev hayiti vayfarpereini ve'akhaz be'arepi vayfazpezeini vayqimeini lo lematarah. job 16:13	yasobu 'alai rabav yefalakh kilyotai velo yakhmol yishpokh la'arez mereirati. job 16:14	yifrezeini ferez 'al penei farez yaruz 'alai kegibor. job 16:15	saq tafarti 'alei gildi ve'olalti be'afar qarni. job 16:16	panai khomarmerah khomarmeru mini bekhi ve'al 'af'apai zalmavet. job 16:17	'al lo khamas bekhapai utefilati zakah. job 16:18	'erez 'al tekhasi dami ve'al yehi maqom leza'aqati. job 16:19	gam 'atah hineh bashamayim 'eidi vesahadi bameromim. job 16:20	melizai rei'ai 'el 'eloha dalefah 'eini. job 16:21	veyokhakh legeber 'im 'eloah uben 'adam lerei'eihu. job 16:22	ki shenot mispar ye'etayu ve'orakh lo 'ashub 'ehelokh. job 17:1	rukhi khubalah yamai niz'akhu qebarim li. job 17:2	'im lo hatulim 'imadi ubehamerotam talan 'eini. job 17:3	simah na 'arebeini 'imakh mi hu leyadi yitaqeia'. job 17:4	ki libam zafanta misakhel 'al ken lo teromem. job 17:5	lekheileq yagid rei'im ve'einei banav tikhlenah. job 17:6	vehizigani limshol 'amim vetofet lefanim 'ehyeh. job 17:7	vateikhah mika'as 'eini vizurai kazel kulam. job 17:8	yashomu yesharim 'al zot venaqi 'al khanef yit'orar. job 17:9	veyokhez zadiq darko utohar yadayim yosif 'omez. job 17:10	ve'ulam kulam tashubu ubo'u na velo 'emza bakhem khakham. job 17:11	yamai 'aberu zimotai nitequ morashei lebabi. job 17:12	laylah leyom yasimu 'or qarob mipenei khoshekh. job 17:13	'im 'aqaveh she'ol beiti bakhoshekh ripadti yezu'ai. job 17:14	lashakhat qarati 'abi 'atah 'imi va'akhoti larimah. job 17:15	ve'ayeh 'eifo tiqvati vetiqvati mi yeshurenah. job 17:16	badei she'ol teiradnah 'im yakhad 'al 'afar nakhat. job 18:1	vaya'an bildad hashukhi vayomar. job 18:2	'ad 'anah tesimun qinzei lemilin tabinu ve'akhar nedaber. job 18:3	madua' nekhshabnu khabeheimah nitminu be'eineikhem. job 18:4	toref nafsho be'apo halma'ankha tei'azab 'arez veye'taq zur mimeqomo. job 18:5	gam 'or resha'im yid'akh velo yigah shebib 'isho. job 18:6	'or khashakh be'aholo veneiro 'alav yid'akh. job 18:7	yeizeru za'adei 'ono vetashlikheihu 'azato. job 18:8	ki shulakh bereshet beraglav ve'als bakhah yithalakh. job 18:9	yokhez be'aqeb pakh yakhazeq 'alav zamim. job 18:10	tamun ba'arez khablo umalkudto 'alei natib. job 18:11	sabib bi'atuhu balahot vehefizuhu leraglav. job 18:12	yehi ra'eb 'ono ve'ed nakhon lezal'o. job 18:13	yokhal badei 'oro yokhal badav bekhor mavet. job 18:14	yinateq mei'aholo mibtakho vetaz'ideihu lemelekh balahot. job 18:15	tishkon be'aholo mibeli lo yezoreh 'al naveihu gaferit. job 18:16	mitakhat sharashav yibashu umima'al yimal qeziro. job 18:17	zikhro 'abad mini 'arez velo shem lo 'al penei khuz. job 18:18	yehdefuhu mei'or 'el khoshekh umiteibel yeniduhu. job 18:19	lo nin lo velo nekhed be'amo ve'en rid bimgurav. job 18:20	'al yomo nashamu 'akharonim veqadmonim 'akhazu sa'ar. job 18:21	'akh 'eleh mishkenot 'aval vezeh meqom lo yada' 'el. job 19:1	vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. job 19:2	'ad 'anah togyun nafshi utedake'unani bemilim. job 19:3	zeh 'eser pe'amim takhlimuni lo teiboshu tahkeru li. job 19:4	ve'af 'amenam shagiti 'iti talin meshugati. job 19:5	'im 'amenam 'alai tagdilu vetokhikhu 'alai kherpati job 19:6	de'u 'eifo ki 'eloah 'ivetani umezudo 'alai hiqif. job 19:7	hen 'ez'aq khamas velo 'ei'aneh 'ashava' ve'en mishpat. job 19:8	'arekhi gadar velo 'e'ebor ve'al netibotai khoshekh yasim. job 19:9	kebodi mei'alai hifshit vayasar 'ateret roshi. job 19:10	yitezeini sabib va'eilakh vayasa' ka'ez tiqvati. job 19:11	vayakhar 'alai 'apo vayakhshebeini lo khezarav. job 19:12	yakhad yabo'u gedudav vayasolu 'alai darkam vayakhanu sabib le'aholi. job 19:13	'akhai mei'alai hirkhiq veyode'ai 'akh zaru mimeni. job 19:14	khadelu qerobai umeyuda'ai shekheikhuni. job 19:15	garei beiti ve'amhotai lezar takhshebuni nakheri hayiti be'eineihem. job 19:16	le'abdi qarati velo ya'aneh bemo fi 'etkhanen lo. job 19:17	rukhi zarah le'ishti vekhanoti libnei bitni. job 19:18	gam 'avilim ma'asu bi 'aqumah vaydaberu bi. job 19:19	ti'abuni kal metei sodi vezeh 'ahabti nehpekhu bi. job 19:20	be'ori ubibsari dabeqah 'azmi va'etmaletah be'or shinai. job 19:21	khanuni khanuni 'atem rei'ai ki yad 'eloah nage'ah bi. job 19:22	lamah tirdefuni khemo 'el umibesari lo tisba'u. job 19:23	mi yiten 'eifo veyikatebun milai mi yiten baseifer veyukhaqu. job 19:24	be'et barzel ve'ofaret la'ad bazur yeikhazebun. job 19:25	va'ani yada'ti go'ali khai ve'akharon 'al 'afar yaqum. job 19:26	ve'akhar 'ori niqefu zot umibesari 'ekhezeh 'eloah. job 19:27	'asher 'ani 'ekhezeh li ve'einai ra'u velo zar kalu khilyotai bekheiqi. job 19:28	ki tomeru mah nirdaf lo veshoresh dabar nimza bi. job 19:29	guru lakhem mipenei khereb ki kheimah 'avonot khareb lema'an teide'un shadin shadun. job 20:1	vaya'an zofar hana'amati vayomar. job 20:2	lakhen se'ipai yeshibuni uba'abur khushi bi. job 20:3	musar kelimati 'eshma' veruakh mibinati ya'aneini. job 20:4	hazot yada'ta mini 'ad mini sim 'adam 'alei 'arez. job 20:5	ki rinat resha'im miqarob vesimkhat khanef 'adei raga'. job 20:6	'im ya'aleh lashamayim si'o verosho la'ab yagia'. job 20:7	kegelalo lanezakh yobed ro'av yomeru 'ayo. job 20:8	kakhalom ya'uf velo yimza'uhu veyudad kekhezyon layelah. job 20:9	'ayin zafatu velo tosif velo 'od teshurenu meqomo. job 20:10	banav yerazu dalim veyadav tasheibenah 'ono. job 20:11	'azmotav male'u 'alumo 'alumav ve'imo 'al 'afar tishkab. job 20:12	'im tamtiq befiv ra'ah yakhkhidenah takhat leshono. job 20:13	yakhmol 'aleha velo ya'azbenah veyimna'enah betokh khiko. job 20:14	lakhmo bemei'av nehpakh merorat petanim beqirbo. job 20:15	khayil bala' vayqi'enu mibitno yorishenu 'el. job 20:16	rosh petanim yinaq tahargeihu leshon 'ef'eh. job 20:17	'al yeire biflagot naharei nakhalei debash vekhem'ah. job 20:18	meishib yaga' velo yakhil tubo. job 20:22	bimlot feqo yeizer lo kal yad 'amel tebo'enu. job 20:23	yehi lemalei bitno yeshalakh bo kharon 'apo veyamter 'aleimo bilkhumo. job 20:24	yibrakh mineisheq barzel takhlefeihu qeshet nekhushah. job 20:25	shalaf vayeizei migeivah ubaraq mimerorato yahalokh 'alav 'eimim. job 20:26	kal khoshekh tamun lizpunav te'akheleihu 'esh lo nupakh yeira' sarid be'aholo. job 20:27	yegalu shamayim 'avono ve'erez mitqomamah lo. job 20:28	yigel yebul beito nigarot beyom 'apo. job 20:29	zeh kheileq 'adam rasha' mei'elohim venakhalat 'imro mei'el. job 21:1	vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. job 21:2	shim'u moa' milati utehi zot tankhumoteikhem. job 21:3	'uni ve'anokhi 'adaber ve'akhar daberi tal'ig. job 21:4	he'anokhi le'adam sikhi ve'im madua' lo tiqzar rukhi. job 21:5	penu 'eilai vehashamu vesimu yad 'al peh. job 21:6	ve'im zakharti venibhaleti ve'akhaz besari palazut. job 21:7	madua' resha'im yikhyu 'atequ gam gaberu khayil. job 21:8	zar'am nakhon lifneihem 'imam veze'eza'eihem le'eineihem. job 21:9	bateihem shalom mipakhad velo sheibet 'eloah 'aleihem. job 21:10	shoro 'ibar velo yag'il tefalet parato velo teshakel. job 21:11	yeshalekhu khazon 'avileihem veyaldeihem yeraqeidun. job 21:12	yis'u ketof vekhinor veyismekhu leqol 'ugab. job 21:13	yebalu yekhalu batob yemeihem uberega' she'ol yeikhatu. job 21:14	vayomeru la'el sur mimenu veda'at derakhekha lo khafazenu. job 21:15	mah shadai ki na'abdenu umah no'il ki nifga' bo. job 21:16	hen lo beyadam tubam 'azat resha'im rakhaqah meni. job 21:17	kamah ner resha'im yid'akh veyabo 'aleimo 'eidam khabalim yekhaleq be'apo. job 21:18	yihyu keteben lifnei ruakh ukhemoz genabatu sufah. job 21:19	'eloah yizpon lebanav 'ono yeshalem 'eilav veyeida'. job 21:20	yir'u 'eino 'einav kido umeikhamat shadai yishteh. job 21:21	ki mah khefzo bebeito 'akharav umispar khodashav khuzazu. job 21:22	hal'el yelamed da'at vehu ramim yishpot. job 21:23	zeh yamut be'ezem tumo kulo shal'anan veshalev. job 21:24	'atinav male'u khalab umoakh 'azmotav yeshuqeh. job 21:25	vezeh yamut benefesh marah velo 'akhal batobah. job 21:26	yakhad 'al 'afar yishkabu verimah tekhaseh 'aleihem. job 21:27	hen yada'ti makhsheboteikhem umezimot 'alai takhmosu. job 21:28	ki tomeru 'ayeh bet nadib ve'ayeh 'ohel mishkenot resha'im. job 21:29	halo 'eltem 'obrei darekh ve'ototam lo tenakeiru. job 21:30	ki leyom 'ed yeikhasekh ra' leyom 'abarot yubalu. job 21:31	mi yagid 'al panav darko vehu 'asah mi yeshalem lo. job 21:32	vehu liqbarot yubal ve'al gadish yishqod. job 21:33	matequ lo rigbei nakhal ve'akharav kal 'adam yimshokh ulefanav 'en mispar. job 21:34	ve'ekh tenakhamuni habel uteshuboteikhem nish'ar ma'al. job 22:1	vaya'an 'elifaz hateimani vayomar. job 22:2	hal'el yiskan gaber ki yiskon 'aleimo maskil. job 22:3	hakheifez leshadai ki tizdaq ve'im beza' ki tatem derakhekha. job 22:4	hamiyir'atekha yokhikhekha yabo 'imekha bamishpat. job 22:5	halo ra'atekha rabah ve'en qez la'avonotekha. job 22:6	ki kokhabim ki ramu. job 22:13	ve'amarta mah yada' 'el hab'ad 'arafel yishpot. job 22:14	'abim seiter lo velo yir'eh vekhug mayim yithalakh. job 22:15	ha'orakh 'olam tishmor 'asher darekhu metei 'aven. bilbabekha. job 22:23	'im tashub 'adosha dai tibaneh tarkhiq 'avlah mei'aholekha. job 22:24	veshit 'al 'afar bazer ubezur nekhalim 'ofir. job 22:25	vehayah shadai bezarekha vekhesef to'afot lakh. job veshadai hibhilani. job 23:17	ki lo nizmati mipenei khoshekh umipanai kisah 'ofel. job 24:1	madua' mishadai lo nizpenu 'itim veyode'o veyode'av lo khazu yamav. job 24:2	gebulot yasigu 'eider gazelu khibequ zur. job 24:9	yigzelu mishod yatom ve'al 'ani yakhbolu. job 24:10	'arom hilekhu beli lebush ure'eibim nase'u 'omer. job 24:11	ben shurotam yazhiru yeqabim darekhu vayizma'u. job 24:12	mei'ir ubalaylah yehi khaganab. job 24:15	ve'en no'ef shamerah neshef leimor lo teshureini 'ayin veseiter panim yasim. job 24:16	khatar bakhoshekh batim yomam khitemu lamo lo yade'u 'or. job 24:17	ki yakhdav boqer lamo zalmavet ki yakir balhot zalmavet. job 24:18	qal hu 'al penei mayim tequlal khelqatam ba'arez lo yifneh derekh keramim. job 24:19	ziyah gam khom yigzelu meimei sheleg she'ol khata'u. job 24:20	yishkakheihu rekhem metaqo rimah 'od lo yizakher vatishaber ka'ez 'avlah. job 24:21	ro'eh 'aqarah lo teiled ve'almanah lo yeyeitib. job 24:22	umashakh 'abirim bekhokho yaqum velo ya'amin bakhayin. job 24:23	yiten lo labetakh veyisha'en ve'eineihu 'al darkheihem. job 24:24	romu me'at ve'einenu vehumekhu kakol yiqafezun ukherosh shibolet yimalu. job 24:25	ve'im lo 'eifo mi yakhzibeini veyasem le'al milati. job 25:1	vaya'an bildad hashukhi vayomar. job 25:2	hamshel vafakhad 'imo 'oseh lom bimromav. job 25:3	hayesh mispar ligdudav ve'al mi lo yaqum 'oreihu. job 25:4	umah yizdaq 'enosh 'im 'el umah yizkeh yelud 'ishah. job 25:5	hen 'ad yareiakh velo ya'ahil vekhokhabim lo zaku be'einav. job 25:6	'af ki 'enosh rimah uben 'adam tolei'ah. job 26:1	vaya'an 'iyob vayomar. job 26:2	meh 'azarta lelo khoakh hosha'ta zeroa' lo 'oz. job 26:3	mah ya'azta lelo khakhmah vetushiyah larob hoda'eta. job 26:4	'et mi higadta milin venishmat mi yaze'ah mimeka. job 26:5	harefa'im yekholalu mitakhat mayim veshokheneihem. job 26:6	'arom she'ol negdo ve'en kesut la'abadon. job 26:7	noteh zafon 'al tohu toleh 'erez 'al beli mah. job 26:8	zorer mayim be'abav velo nibqa' 'anan takhtam. job 26:9	me'akhez penei khiseh parshez 'alav 'anano. job 26:10	khoq khag 'al penei mayim 'ad takhlit 'or 'im khoshekh. job 26:11	'amudei shamayim yerofafu veyitmehu miga'arato. job 26:12	bekhokho raga' hayam ubitubenato ubitbunato makhaz rahab. job 26:13	berukho shamayim shifrah kholalah yado nakhash bariakh. job 26:14	hen 'eleh qezot darko derakhav umah sheimez dabar nishma' bo vera'am geburato geburotav mi yitbonan. job 27:1	vayosef 'iyob se'et meshalo vayomar. job 27:2	khai 'el heisir mishpati veshadai heimar nafshi. job 27:3	ki khal 'od nishmati bi veruakh 'eloah be'api. job 27:4	'im tedabeirenah sefatai 'avlah uleshoni 'im yehgeh remiyah. job 27:5	khalilah li 'im 'azdiq 'etkhem 'ad 'egva' lo 'asir tumati mimeni. job 27:6	bezidqati hekhezaqti velo 'arpeha lo yekheraf lebabi miyamai. job 27:7	yehi kherasha' 'oyebi umitqomi khe'aval. job 27:8	ki mah tiqvat khanef ki yibza' ki yeishel 'eloah nafsho. job 27:9	haza'aqato yishma' 'el ki tabo 'alav zarah. job 27:10	'im 'al shadai yit'anag yiqra 'eloah bekhal 'et. job 27:11	'oreh 'etkhem beyad 'el 'asher 'imosha dai lo 'akhakhed. job 27:12	hen 'atem kulekhem khazitem velamah zeh hebel tehbalu. job 27:13	zeh kheileq 'adam rasha' 'im 'el venakhalat 'arizim mishadai yiqakhu. job 27:14	'im yirbu banav lemo khareb veze'eza'av lo yisbe'u lakhem. job 27:15	serido ridav bamavet yiqabeiru ve'almenotav lo tibkenah. job 27:16	'im yizbor ke'afar kasef vekhakhomer yakhin malbush. job 27:17	yakhin vezadiq yilbash vekhesef naqi yakhaloq. job 27:18	banah kha'ash beito ukhesukah 'asah nozer. job 27:19	'ashir yishkab velo yei'asef 'einav paqakh ve'einenu. job 27:20	tasigeihu khamayim balahot laylah genabatu sufah. job 27:21	yisa'eihu qadim veyeilakh visa'areihu mimeqomo. job 27:22	veyashlekh 'alav velo yakhmol miyado baroakh yibrakh. job 27:23	yispoq 'aleimo khapeimo veyishroq 'alav mimeqomo. job 28:1	ki yesh lakesef moza umaqom lazahab yazoqu. job 28:2	barzel mei'afar yuqakh ve'eben yazuq nekhushah. job 28:3	qez sam lakhoshekh ulekhal takhlit hu khoqer 'eben 'ofel vezalmavet. job 28:4	paraz nakhal mei'im gar hanishkakhim mini ragel dalu mei'enosh na'u. job 28:5	'erez mimenah yeizei lakhem vetakhteha nehpakh kemo 'esh. job 28:6	meqom sapir 'abaneha ve'afrot zahab lo. job 28:7	natib lo yeda'o 'ayit velo zafatu 'en 'ayah. job 28:8	lo hidrikhuhu benei shakhaz lo 'adah 'alav shakhal. job 28:9	bakhalamish shalakh yado hafakh mishoresh harim. job 28:10	bazurot ye'orim biqeia' vekhal yeqar ra'atah 'eino. job 28:11	mibekhi neharot khibesh veta'alumah yozi 'or. job 28:12	vehakhakhemah mei'ayin timazei ve'ei zeh meqom binah. job 28:13	lo yada' 'enosh 'erkah velo timazei be'erez hakhayim. job 28:14	tehom 'amar lo bi hi veyam 'amar 'en 'imadi. job 28:15	lo yutan segor takhteha velo yishaqel kesef mekhirah. job 28:16	lo tesuleh bekhetem 'ofir beshoham yaqar vesapir. job 28:17	lo ya'arkhenah zahab uzekhokhit utemuratah keli faz. job 28:18	ramot vegabish lo yizakher umeshekh khakhmah mipeninim. job 28:19	lo ya'arkhenah pitdat kush bekhetem tahor lo tesuleh. job 28:20	vehakhakhemah mei'ayin tabo ve'ei zeh meqom binah. job 28:21	vene'elmah mei'einei khal khai umei'of hashamayim nistarah. job 28:22	'abadon vamavet 'ameru be'azeneinu shama'nu shim'ah. job 28:23	'elohim heibin darkah vehu yada' 'et meqomah. job 28:24	ki hu liqzot ha'arez yabit takhat kal hashamayim yir'eh. job 28:25	la'asot laruakh mishqal umayim tiken bemidah. job 28:26	ba'asto lamatar khoq vederekh lakhaziz qolot. job 28:27	'az ra'ah vaysaperah hekhinah vegam khaqarah. job 28:28	vayomer la'adam hen yir'at 'adonai hi khakhmah vesur meira' binah. job 29:1	vayosef 'iyob se'et meshalo vayomar. job 29:2	mi yiteneini kheyarkhei qedem kimei 'eloah yishmereini. job 29:3	behilo neiro 'alei roshi le'oro 'eilekh khoshekh. job 29:4	ka'asher hayiti bimei kharepi besod 'eloah 'alei 'aholi. job 29:5	be'od dai 'imadi sebibotai ne'arai. job 29:6	birkhoz halikhai bekheimah vezur yazuq 'imadi palgei shamen. job 29:7	bezeiti sha'ar 'alei qaret barekhob 'akhin moshabi. job 29:8	ra'uni ne'arim venekhba'u vishishim qamu 'amadu. job 29:9	rim 'azeru bemilim vekhaf yasimu lefihem. job 29:10	qol negidim nekhba'u uleshonam lekhikam dabeiqah. job 29:11	ki 'ozen me'ah vate'ashereini ve'ayin ra'atah vate'ideini. job 29:12	ki 'amalet 'ani meshaveia' veyatom velo 'ozer lo. job 29:13	birkat 'obed 'alai tabo veleb 'almanah 'arnin. job 29:14	zedeq labashti vayilbasheini kim'il vezanif mishpati. job 29:15	'einayim hayiti la'iver veraglayim lapiseiakh 'ani. job 29:16	'ab 'anokhi la'ebyonim verib lo yada'ti 'ekhqereihu. job 29:17	va'ashaberah metale'ot 'aval umishinav 'ashlikh taref. job 29:18	va'omar 'im qini 'egva' vekhakhol 'arbeh yamim. job 29:19	shareshi fatuakh 'elei mayim vetal yalin biqziri. job 29:20	kebodi khadash 'imadi veqashti beyadi takhalif. job 29:21	li shame'u veyikhelu veyidemu lemo 'azati. job 29:22	'akharei debari lo yishnu ve'aleimo titof milati. job 29:23	veyikhalu khamatar li ufihem pa'aru lemalqosh. job 29:24	'eskhaq 'aleihem lo ya'aminu ve'or panai lo yapilun. job 29:25	'ebakhar darkam ve'eisheb rosh ve'eshkon kemelekh bagedud ka'asher 'abeilim yenakhem. job 30:1	ve'atah sakhaqu 'alai ze'irim mimeni leyamim 'asher ma'asti 'abotam lashit 'im kalbei zoni. job 30:2	gam koakh yedeihem lamah li 'aleimo 'abad kalakh. job 30:3	bekheser ubekhafan galmud ha'oreqim ziyah 'emesh sho'ah umesho'ah. job 30:4	haqotefim maluakh 'alei siakh veshoresh retamim lakhmam. job 30:5	min gev yegorashu yari'u 'aleimo kaganab. job 30:6	ba'aruz nekhalim lishkon khorei 'afar vekheifim. job 30:7	ben sikhim yinhaqu takhat kharul yesupakhu. job 30:8	benei nabal gam benei beli shem nike'u min ha'arez. job 30:9	ve'atah neginatam hayiti va'ehi lahem lemilah. job 30:10	ti'abuni rakhaqu meni umipanai lo khasekhu roq. job 30:11	ki yitro yitri fitakh vai'aneini veresen mipanai shileikhu. job 30:12	'al yamin pirkhakh yaqumu raglai shileikhu vayasolu 'alai 'arekhot 'eidam. job 30:13	natesu netibati lehavati yo'ilu lo 'ozer lamo. job 30:14	keferez rakhab ye'etayu takhat 'ah hitgalgalu. job 30:15	hahepakh 'alai balahot tirdof karuakh nedibati ukhe'ab 'aberah yeshu'ati. job 30:16	ve'atah 'alai tishtapekh nafshi yokhazuni yemei 'oni. job 30:17	laylah 'azamai niqar mei'alai ve'oreqai lo yishkabun. job 30:18	berab koakh yitkhapes lebushi kefi khutaneti ya'azreini. job 30:19	horani lakhomer va'etmashel ke'afar va'eifer. job 30:20	'ashava' 'eilekha velo ta'aneini 'amadti vatitbonen bi. job 30:21	teihafekh le'akhzar li be'ozem yadekha tistemeini. job 30:22	tisa'eini 'el ruakh tarkibeini utemogegeini teshuveh tushiyah. job 30:23	ki yada'ti mavet teshibeini ubet mo'ed lekhal khai. job 30:24	'akh lo be'i yishlakh yad 'im befido lahen shua'. job 30:25	'im lo bakhiti liqsheh yom 'agemah nafshi la'ebyon. job 30:26	ki tob qiviti vayabo ra' va'ayakhalah le'or vayabo 'ofel. job 30:27	mei'ai rutekhu velo damu qidemuni yemei 'oni. job 30:28	qoder hilakhti belo khamah qamti baqahal 'ashaveia'. job 30:29	'akh hayiti letanim vereia' libnot ya'anah. job 30:30	'ori shakhar mei'alai ve'azmi kharah mini khoreb. job 30:31	vayhi le'eibel kinori ve'ugabi leqol bokhim. job 31:1	berit karati le'einai umah 'etbonen 'al betulah. job 31:2	umeh kheileq 'eloah mima'al venakhalat dai mimeromim. job 31:3	halo 'ed le'aval veneikher lefo'alei 'aven. job 31:4	halo hu yir'eh derakhai vekhal ze'adai yispor. job 31:5	'im halakhti 'im shav vatakhash 'al mirmah ragli. job 31:6	yishqeleini bemozenei zedeq veyeida' 'eloah tumati. job 31:7	'im titeh 'ashuri mini hadarekh ve'akhar 'einai halakh libi ubekhapai dabaq mu'um job 31:8	'ezre'ah ve'akher yokhel veze'eza'ai yeshorashu. job 31:9	'im niftah libi 'al 'ishah ve'al petakh rei'i 'arabeti. job 31:10	titkhan le'akher 'ishti ve'aleha yikhre'un 'akheirin. job 31:11	ki hu hi zimah vehi vehu 'avon pelilim. job 31:12	ki 'esh hi 'ad 'abadon tokhel ubekhal tebu'ati tesharesh. job 31:13	'im 'em'as mishpat 'abdi va'amati beribam 'imadi. job 31:14	umah 'e'eseh ki yaqum 'el vekhi yifqod mah 'ashibenu. job 31:15	halo babeten 'oseini 'asahu vaykhunenu barekhem 'ekhad. job 31:16	'im 'emna' meikheifez dalim ve'einei 'almanah 'akhaleh. job 31:17	ve'okhal piti lebadi velo 'akhal yatom mimenah. job 31:18	ki mine'urai gedeilani khe'ab umibeten 'imi 'ankhenah. job 31:19	'im 'er'eh 'obed mibeli lebush ve'en kesut la'ebyon. job 31:20	'im lo beirakhuni khalazo khalazav umigez kebasai yitkhamam. job 31:21	'im hanifoti 'al yatom yadi ki 'er'eh basha'ar 'ezrati. job 31:22	keteifi mishikhmah tipol ve'ezro'i miqanah tishaber. job 31:23	ki fakhad 'eilai 'ed 'el umise'eito lo 'ukhal. job 31:24	'im samti zahab kisli velaketem 'amarti mibtakhi. job 31:25	'im 'esmakh ki rab kheili vekhi khabir maze'ah yadi. job 31:26	'im 'er'eh 'or ki yahel veyareiakh yaqar holekh. job 31:27	vayift baseiter libi vatishaq yadi lefi. job 31:28	gam hu 'avon pelili ki khikhashti la'el mima'al. job 31:29	'im 'esmakh befid mesan'i vehit'orarti ki meza'o ra'. job 31:30	velo natati lakhato khiki lish'ol be'alah nafsho. job 31:31	'im lo 'ameru metei 'aholi mi yiten mibesaro lo nisba'. job 31:32	bakhuz lo yalin ger delatai la'orakh 'eftakh. job 31:33	'im kisiti khe'adam pesha'ai litmon bekhubi 'avoni. job 31:34	ki 'e'eroz hamon rabah ubuz mishpakhot yekhiteini va'edom lo 'eizei fatakh. job 31:35	mi yiten li shomeia' li hen tavi shadai ya'aneini veseifer katab 'ish ribi. job 31:36	'im lo 'aloshi khemi 'esa'enu 'e'endenu 'atarot li. job 31:37	mispar ze'adai 'agidenu kemo nagid 'aqarabenu. job 31:38	'im 'alai 'admati tiz'aq veyakhad telameha yibkayun. job 31:39	'im kokhah 'akhalti beli khasef venefesh be'aleha hipakheti. job 31:40	takhat khitah yeizei khoakh vetakhat se'orah ba'eshah tamu dibrei 'iyob. job 32:1	vayishbetu sheloshet ha'anashim ha'eleh mei'anot 'et 'iyob ki hu zadiq be'einav. job 32:2	vayikhar 'af 'elihu ben barakh'el habuzi mimishpakhat ram be'iyob kharah 'apo 'al zadeqo nafsho mei'elohim. job 32:3	ubishloshet rei'av kharah 'apo 'al 'asher lo maze'u ma'aneh vayarshi'u 'et 'iyob. job 32:4	ve'elihu khikah 'et 'iyob bidbarim ki zeqeinim hemah mimenu leyamim. job 32:5	vayar 'elihu ki 'en ma'aneh befi sheloshet ha'anashim vayikhar 'apo. job 32:6	vaya'an 'elihu ben barakh'el habuzi vayomar za'ir 'ani leyamim ve'atem yeshishim 'al ken zakhalti va'ira meikhavot dei'i 'etkhem. job 32:7	'amarti yamim yedabeiru verob nim yodi'u khakhmah job 32:8	'akhen ruakh hi be'enosh venishmat shadai tebinem. job 32:9	lo rabim yekhkamu uzeqeinim yabinu mishpat. job 32:10	lakhen 'amarti shim'ah li 'akhaveh dei'i 'af 'ani. job 32:11	hen hokhalti ledibreikhem 'azin 'ad tebunoteikhem 'ad takhqerun milin. job 32:12	ve'adeikhem 'etbonan vehineh 'en le'iyob mokhiakh 'oneh 'amarav mikem. job 32:13	pen tomeru mazanu khakhmah 'el yidefenu lo 'ish. job 32:14	velo 'arakh 'eilai milin ube'imreikhem lo 'ashibenu. job 32:15	khatu lo 'anu 'od he'tiqu meihem milim. job 32:16	vehokhalti ki lo yedabeiru ki 'amedu lo 'anu 'od. job 32:17	'a'aneh 'af 'ani khelqi 'akhaveh dei'i 'af 'ani. job 32:18	ki maleiti milim heziqatni ruakh bitni. job 32:19	hineh bitni keyayin lo yipateiakh ke'obot khadashim yibaqeia'. job 32:20	'adaberah veyirvakh li 'eftakh sefatai ve'e'eneh. job 32:21	'al na 'esa fenei 'ish ve'el 'adam lo 'akhaneh. job 32:22	ki lo yada'ti 'akhaneh kim'at yisa'eini 'oseini. job 33:1	ve'ulam shema' na 'iyob milai vekhal debarai ha'azinah. job 33:2	hineh na patakhti fi diberah leshoni bekhiki. job 33:3	yosher libi 'amarai veda'at fatai barur mileilu. job 33:4	ruakh 'el 'asateni venishmat shadai tekhayeini. job 33:5	'im tukhal hashibeini 'erkhah lefanai hityazabah. job 33:6	hen 'ani khefikha la'el meikhomer qorazti gam 'ani. job 33:7	hineh 'eimati lo teba'ateka ve'akhpi 'alekha lo yikhbad. job 33:8	'akh 'amarta be'azenai veqol milin 'eshma'. job 33:9	zakh 'ani beli fasha' khaf 'anokhi velo 'avon li. job 33:10	hen tenu'ot 'alai yimza yakhshebeini le'oyeb lo. job 33:11	yasem basad raglai yishmor kal 'arekhotai. job 33:12	hen zot lo zadaqta 'e'eneka ki yirbeh 'eloha mei'enosh. job 33:13	madua' 'eilav ribota ki khal debarav lo ya'aneh. job 33:14	ki be'akhat yedaber 'el ubishtayim lo yeshurenah. job 33:15	bakhalom khezyon laylah binfol tardeimah 'al 'anashim bitnumot 'alei mishkab. job 33:16	'az yigleh 'ozen 'anashim ubemosaram yakhtom. job 33:17	lehasir 'adam ma'aseh vegeivah migeber yekhaseh. job 33:18	yakhsokh nafsho mini shakhat vekhayato mei'abor bashalakh. job 33:19	vehukhakh bemakh'ob 'al mishkabo verib verob 'azamav 'eitan. job 33:20	vezihamatu khayato lakhem venafsho ma'akhal ta'avah. job 33:21	yikhel besaro meiro'i ushefi veshupu 'azmotav lo ru''u. job 33:22	vatiqrab lashakhat nafsho vekhayato lamitim. job 33:23	'im yesh 'alav mal'akh meiliz 'ekhad mini 'alef lehagid le'adam yashero. job 33:24	vaykhunenu vayomer peda'eihu meiredet shakhat mazati khofer. job 33:25	rutafash besaro mino'ar yashub limei 'alumav. job 33:26	ye'tar 'el 'eloah vayirzeihu vayar panav bitru'ah vayasheb le'enosh zidqato. job 33:27	yashor 'al 'anashim vayomer khatati veyashar he'eveiti velo shavah li. job 33:28	padah nafshi nafsho mei'abor bashakhat vekhayati vekhayato ba'or tir'eh. job 33:29	hen kal 'eleh yif'al 'el pa'amayim shalosh 'im gaber. job 33:30	lehashib nafsho mini shakhat lei'or be'or hakhayim. job 33:31	haqsheb 'iyob shema' li hakharesh ve'anokhi 'adaber. job 33:32	'im yesh milin hashibeini daber ki khafazti zadeqeka. job 33:33	'im 'ayin 'atah shema' li hakharesh va'a'alefkha khakhmah job 34:1	vaya'an 'elihu vayomar. job 34:2	shim'u khakhamim milai veyode'im ha'azinu li. job 34:3	ki 'ozen milin tibkhan vekhekh yit'am le'ekhol. job 34:4	mishpat nibkharah lanu neide'ah beineinu mah tob. job 34:5	ki 'amar 'iyob zadaqti ve'el heisir mishpati. job 34:6	'al mishpati 'akhazeb 'anush khizi beli fasha'. job 34:7	mi geber ke'iyob yishteh la'ag kamayim. job 34:8	ve'arakh lekhebrah 'im po'alei 'aven velalekhet 'im 'anshei resha'. job 34:9	ki 'amar lo yiskan gaber birzoto 'im 'elohim. job 34:10	lakhen 'anashei leibab shim'u li khalilah la'el meiresha' veshadai mei'avel. job 34:11	ki fo'al 'adam yeshalem lo ukhe'orakh 'ish yamzi'enu. job 34:12	'af 'amenam 'el lo yarshia' veshadai lo ye'avet mishpat. job 34:13	mi faqad 'alav 'arezah umi m teibel kulah. job 34:14	'im yasim 'eilav libo rukho venishmato 'eilav ye'esof. job 34:15	yigva' kal basar yakhad ve'adam 'al 'afar yashub. job 34:16	ve'im binah shim'ah zot ha'azinah leqol milai. job 34:17	ha'af sonei mishpat yakhabosh ve'im zadiq kabir tarshia'. job 34:18	ha'amor lemelekh beliya'al rasha' 'el nedibim. job 34:19	'asher lo nasa penei sarim velo nikar shoa' lifnei dal ki ma'aseh yadav kulam. job 34:20	rega' yamutu vakhazot layelah yego'ashu 'am veya'aboru veyasiru 'abir lo beyad. job 34:21	ki 'einav 'al darkhei 'ish vekhal ze'adav yir'eh. job 34:22	'en khoshekh ve'en zalmavet lehisater m po'alei 'aven. job 34:23	ki lo 'al 'ish yasim 'od lahalokh 'el 'el bamishpat. job 34:24	yaroa' kabirim lo kheiqer vaya'amed 'akheirim takhtam. job 34:25	lakhen yakir ma'badeihem vehafakh laylah veyidaka'u. job 34:26	takhat resha'im sefaqam bimqom ro'im. job 34:27	'asher 'al ken saru mei'akharav vekhal derakhav lo hiskilu. job 34:28	lehabi 'alav za'aqat dal veza'aqat 'aniyim yishma'. job 34:29	vehu yashqit umi yarshia' veyaster panim umi yeshurenu ve'al go ve'al 'adam yakhad. job 34:30	mimelokh 'adam khanef mimoqeshei 'am. job 34:31	ki 'el 'el he'amar nasati lo 'ekhbol. job 34:32	bil'adei 'ekhezeh 'atah horeini 'im 'avel pa'alti lo 'osif. job 34:33	hamei'imekha yeshalmenah ki ma'asta ki 'atah tibkhar velo 'ani umah yada'ta daber. job 34:34	'anshei leibab yomeru li vegeber khakham shomeia' li. job 34:35	'iyob lo beda'at yedaber udebarav lo behaskel. job 34:36	'abi yibakhen 'iyob 'ad nezakh 'al teshubot be'anshei 'aven. job 34:37	ki yosif 'al khatato fesha' beineinu yispoq veyereb 'amarav la'el. job 35:1	vaya'an 'elihu vayomar. job 35:2	hazot khashabta lemishpat 'amarta zidqi mei'el. job 35:3	ki tomar mah yiskan lakh mah 'o'il meikhatati. job 35:4	'ani 'ashibekha milin ve'et rei'ekha 'imakh. job 35:5	habet shamayim ure'eh veshur khaqim gabehu mimeka. job 35:6	'im khatata mah tif'al bo verabu fesha'ekha mah ta'aseh lo. job 35:7	'im zadaqta mah titen lo 'o mah miyadekha yiqakh. job 35:8	le'ish kamokha rish'ekha uleben 'adam zidqatekha. job 35:9	meirob 'ashuqim yaz'iqu yeshave'u mizeroa' rabim. job 35:10	velo 'amar 'ayeh 'eloah 'osai noten zemirot balayelah. job 35:11	malefeinu mibahamot 'arez umei'of hashamayim yekhakemeinu. job 35:12	sham yiz'aqu velo ya'aneh mipenei ge'on ra'im. job 35:13	'akhosha v lo yishma' 'el veshadai lo yeshurenah. job 35:14	'af ki tomar lo teshurenu din lefanav utekholel lo. job 35:15	ve'atah ki 'ayin paqad 'apo velo yada' bapash me'od. job 35:16	ve'iyob hebel yifzeh pihu bibli da'at milin yakhbir. job 36:1	vayosef 'elihu vayomar. job 36:2	katar li ze'er va'akhaveka ki 'od le'eloah milim. job 36:3	'esa dei'i lemeirakhoq ulefo'ali 'eten zedeq. job 36:4	ki 'amenam lo sheqer milai temim dei'ot 'imakh. job 36:5	hen 'el kabir velo yim'as kabir koakh leb. job 36:6	lo yekhayeh rasha' umishpat 'aniyim yiten. job 36:7	lo yigra' mizadiq 'einav ve'et melakhim lakisei vayoshibem lanezakh vayigbahu. job 36:8	ve'im 'asurim baziqim yilakhedun bekhablei 'oni. job 36:9	vayaged lahem pa'olam ufish'eihem ki yitgabaru. job 36:10	vayigel 'azenam lamusar vayomer ki yeshubun mei'aven. job 36:11	'im yishme'u veya'abodu yekhalu yemeihem batob usheneihem bane'imim. job 36:12	ve'im lo yishme'u beshelakh ya'aboru veyigve'u kibli da'at job 36:13	vekhanfei leb yasimu 'af lo yeshave'u ki 'asaram. job 36:14	tamot bano'ar nafsham vekhayatam baqedeishim. job 36:15	yekhalez 'ani be'aneyo veyigel balakhaz 'azenam. job 36:16	ve'af hasitekha mipi zar rakhab lo muzaq takhteha venakhat lekhanekha malei dashen. job 36:17	vedin rasha' maleita din umishpat yitmokhu. job 36:18	ki kheimah pen yesitekha besafeq verab kofer 'al yateka. job 36:19	haya'arokh shu'akha lo bezar vekhol ma'amazei khoakh. job 36:20	'al tish'af halayelah la'alot 'amim takhtam. job 36:21	hishamer 'al teifen 'el 'aven ki 'al zeh bakharta mei'oni. job 36:22	hen 'el yasgib bekhokho mi khamohu moreh. job 36:23	mi faqad 'alav darko umi 'amar pa'alta 'avlah. job 36:24	zekhor ki tasgi fa'olo 'asher shoreru 'anashim. job 36:25	kal 'adam khazu bo 'enosh yabit meirakhoq. job 36:26	hen 'el gi velo neida' mispar shanav velo kheiqer. job 36:27	ki yegara' nitfei mayim yazoqu matar le'eido. job 36:28	'asher yizelu shekhaqim yir'afu 'alei 'adam rab. job 36:29	'af 'im yabin mifresei 'ab teshu'ot sukato. job 36:30	hen paras 'alav 'oro veshareshei hayam kisah. job 36:31	ki bam yadin 'amim yiten 'okhel lemakhbir. job 36:32	'al kapayim kisah 'or vayzav 'aleha bemafgia'. job 36:33	yagid 'alav rei'o miqneh 'af 'al 'oleh. job 37:1	'af lezot yekherad libi veyitar mimeqomo. job 37:2	shim'u shamoa' berogez qolo vehegeh mipiv yeizei. job 37:3	takhat job 37:6	ki lashelag yomar hevei 'arez vegeshem matar vegeshem mitrot 'uzo. job 37:7	beyad kal 'adam yakhtom lada'at kal 'anshei ma'aseihu. job 37:8	vatabo khayah bemo 'areb ubim'onoteha tishkon. job 37:9	min hakheder tabo sufah umimezarim qarah. job 37:10	minishmat 'el yiten qarakh verokhab mayim bemuzaq. job 37:11	'af beri yatriakh 'ab yafiz 'anan 'oro. job 37:12	vehu mesibot mithapekh betakhbulato betakhbulotav lefa'olam kol 'asher yezavem 'al penei teibel 'arezah. job 37:13	'im lesheibet 'im le'arzo 'im lekhesed yamzi'eihu. job 37:14	ha'azinah zot 'iyob 'amod vehitbonen nifle'ot 37:18	tarqia' 'imo lishkhaqim khazaqim kir'i muzaq. job 37:19	hodi'einu mah nomar lo lo na'arokh mipenei khoshekh. job 37:20	haysupar lo ki 'adaber 'im 'amar 'ish ki yebula'. job 37:21	ve'atah lo ra'u yerei'uhu 'anashim lo yir'eh kal khakhmei leb. job 38:1	vaya'an yhvh 'et 'iyob min hase'arah min hase'arah vayomar. job 38:2	mi zeh makhshikh 'eizah bemilin beli da'at. job 38:3	'ezar na khegeber yeladav 'el 'el yeshavei'u yit'u libli 'okhel. job 39:1	hayada'ta 'et ledet ya'alei sala' kholel 'ayalot tishmor. job 39:2	tispor yerakhim temalenah veyada'ta 'et lidtanah. job 39:3	tikhra'nah job 41:1	timshokh livyatan bekhakah ubekhebel tashqia' leshono. job 41:2	hatasim 'agmon be'apo ubekhoakh tiqob lekheyo. job 41:3	hayarbeh 'eilekha takhanunim 'im yedaber 'eilekha rakot. job 41:4	hayikhrot berit 'imakh tiqakhenu le'ebed 'olam. job 41:5	hatsakheq bo kazipor vetiqsherenu lena'arotekha. job 41:6	yikhru 'alav khabarim yekhezuhu ben kena'anim. job 41:7	hatmalei besukot 'oro ubezilzal dagim rosho. job 41:8	sim 'alav kapekha zekhor milkhamah 'al tosaf. job 41:9	hen tokhalto nikhzabah hagam 'el mar'av yutal. job 41:10	lo 'akhzar ki ye'urenu umi hu lefanai yityazab. job 41:11	mi hiqdimani va'ashalem takhat kal hashamayim li hu. job 41:12	lo lo 'akharish badav udebar geburot vekhin 'erko. job 41:13	mi gilah penei lebusho bekhefel risno mi yabo. job 41:14	daltei fanav mi fiteiakh sebibot shinav 'eimah. job 41:15	ga'avah 'afiqei maginim sagur khotam zar. job 41:16	'ekhad be'ekhad yigashu veruakh lo yabo beineihem. job 41:17	'ish be'akhihu yedubaqu yitlakedu velo yitparadu. job 41:18	'atishotav tahel 'or ve'einav ke'af'apei shakhar. job 41:19	mipiv lapidim yahalokhu kidodei 'esh yitmalatu. job 41:20	minekhirav yeizei 'ashan kedud nafuakh ve'agmon. job 41:21	nafsho gekhalim telahet velahab mipiv yeizei. job 41:22	bezavaro yalin 'oz ulefanav taduz de'abah. job 41:23	mapelei besaro dabeiqu yazuq 'alav bal yimot. job 41:24	libo yazuq kemo 'aben veyazuq kefelakh takhtit. job 41:25	miseito yaguru 'eilim mishebarim yitkhata'u. job 41:26	masigeihu khereb beli taqum khanit masa' veshiryah. job 41:27	yakhshob leteben barzel le'ez riqabon nekhushah. job 41:28	lo yabrikhenu ben qashet leqash nehpekhu lo 'abnei qala'. job 41:29	keqash nekhshebu totakh veyiskhaq lera'ash kidon. job 41:30	takhtav khadudei khares yirpad kharuz 'alei tit. job 41:31	yartiakh kasir mezulah yam yasim kamerqakhah. job 41:32	'akharav ya'ir natib yakhshob tehom leseibah. job 41:33	'en 'al 'afar mashelo he'asu libli khat. job 41:34	'et kal gaboah yir'eh hu melekh 'al kal benei shakhaz. job 42:1	vaya'an 'iyob 'et yhvh vayomar. job 42:2	yada'ta yada'ti ki khol tukhal velo yibazer mimekha mezimah. job 42:3	mi zeh ma'lim 'eizah beli da'at lakhen higadti velo 'abin nifla'ot mimeni velo 'eida'. job 42:4	shema' na ve'anokhi 'adaber 'esh'alekha vehodi'eini. job 42:5	lesheima' 'ozen shema'tikha ve'atah 'eini ra'atekha. job 42:6	'al ken 'em'as venikhamti 'al 'afar va'eifer. job 42:7	vayhi 'akhar diber yhvh 'et hadebarim ha'eleh 'el 'iyob vayomer yhvh 'el 'elifaz hateimani kharah 'api bekha ubishnei rei'ekha ki lo dibartem 'eilai nekhonah ke'abdi 'iyob. job 42:8	ve'atah qekhu lakhem shib'ah farim veshib'ah 'eilim ulekhu 'el 'abdi 'iyob veha'alitem 'olah ba'adkhem ve'iyob 'abdi yitpalel 'aleikhem ki 'im panav 'esa lebilti 'asot 'imakhem nebalah ki lo dibartem 'eilai nekhonah ke'abdi 'iyob. job 42:9	vayeilekhu 'elifaz hateimani ubildad hashukhi zofar hana'amati vaya'asu ka'asher diber 'aleihem yhvh vayisa yhvh 'et penei 'iyob. job 42:10	yhvh b 'et shebit shebut 'iyob behitpalo be'ad rei'eihu vayosef yhvh 'et kal 'asher le'iyob lemishneh. job 42:11	vayabo'u 'eilav kal 'ekhav vekhal 'akhyotav 'akhyotav vekhal yode'av lefanim vayokhelu 'imo lekhem bebeito vayanudu lo vaynakhamu 'oto 'al kal hara'ah 'asher heibi yhvh 'alav vayitenu lo 'ish qesitah 'ekhat ve'ish nezem zahab 'ekhad. job 42:12	yhvh beirakh 'et 'akharit 'iyob meireishito vayhi lo 'arba'ah 'asar 'elef zon vesheishet 'alafim gemalim ve'elef zemed baqar ve'elef 'atonot. job 42:13	vayhi lo shib'anah banim veshalosh banot. job 42:14	vayiqra shem ha'akhat yemimah veshem hasheinit qezi'ah veshem hashelishit qeren hapukh. job 42:15	velo nimza nashim yafot kibnot 'iyob bekhal ha'arez vayiten lahem 'abihem nakhalah betokh 'akheihem. job 42:16	vaykhi 'iyob 'akharei zot mei'ah ve'arba'im shanah vayar vayir'eh 'et banav ve'et benei banav 'arba'ah dorot. job 42:17	vayamat 'iyob zaqen useba' yamim.

1:4	mashekheini 'akharekha naruzah hebi'ani hamelekh khadarav nagilah venismekhah bakh nazkirah dodekha miyayin meisharim 'aheibukha. songs 1:5	shekhorah 'ani venavah benot yerushalim ke'aholei qeidar kiri'ot shelomoh. songs 1:6	'al tir'uni she'ani shekharkhoret sheshezafatni hashamesh benei 'imi nikharu bi samuni noteirah 'et hakeramim karmi sheli lo natareti. songs 1:7	hagidah li she'ahabah mishkenot haro'im. songs 1:9	lesusati berikhbei far'oh dimitikh ra'yati. songs 1:10	navu lekhayayikh batorim zavarekh bakharuzim. songs 1:11	torei zahab na'aseh lakh 'im nequdot hakasef. songs 'im peri megadim kefarim 'im neradim. songs 4:14	neired vekharkom qaneh veqinamon 'im kal 'azei lebonah mor va'ahalot 'im kal rashei besamim. songs 4:15	ma'yan ganim be'er mayim khayim venozelim min lebanon. songs 4:16	'uri zafon ubo'i teiman hafikhi gani yizelu besamav yabo dodi legano veyokhal peri megadav. songs 5:1	bati legani 'akhoti khalah 'ariti mori 'im besami 'akhalti ya'ri 'im dibshi shatiti yeini 'im khalabi 'ikhlu rei'im shetu veshikhru dodim. songs 5:2	'ani yesheinah velibi 'er qol dodi dofeq pitkhi li 'akhoti ra'yati yonati tamati sherroshi nimla tal qevuzotai resisei layelah. songs 5:3	pashati 'et kutaneti 'eikhakhah 'elbashenah rakhazti 'et raglai 'eikhakhah 'atanefem. songs 5:4	dodi shalakh yado min hakhor umei'ai hamu 'alav. songs 5:5	qamti 'ani liftoakh ledodi veyadai natefu mor ve'ezbe'otai mor 'ober 'al kapot haman'ul. songs 5:6	patakhti 'ani ledodi vedodi khamaq 'abar nafshi yaze'ah bedabero biqashtihu velo mezatihu qerativ velo 'anani. songs 5:7	meza'uni hashomerim hasobebim ba'ir hikuni feza'uni nase'u 'et redidi mei'alai shomerei hakhomot. songs 5:8	hishba'ti 'etkhem benot yerushalim 'im timze'u 'et dodi mah tagidu lo shekholat 'ahabah 'ani. songs 5:9	mah dodekh midod hayafah banashim mah dodekh midod shekakhah hishba'tanu. songs 5:10	dodi zakh ve'adom dagul meirebabah. songs 5:11	rosho ketem paz qevzotav taltalim shekhorot ka'oreb. songs 5:12	'einav keyonim 'al 'afiqei mayim rokhazot bekhalab yoshebot 'al milet. songs 5:13	lekhayav ka'arugat habosem migdelot merqakhim siftotav shoshanim notefot mor 'ober. songs 5:14	yadav gelilei zahab memula'im batarshish mei'av 'eshet shen me'ulefet sapirim. songs 5:15	shoqav 'amudei shesh meyusadim 'al 'adnei faz mar'eihu kalebanon bakhur ka'arazim. songs 5:16	khiko mamtaqim vekhulo makhamadim zeh dodi vezeh rei'i benot yerushalim. songs 6:1	'anah halakh dodekh hayafah banashim 'anah panah dodekh unebaqshenu 'imakh. songs 6:2	dodi yarad legano la'arugot habosem lir'ot baganim velilqot shoshanim. songs 6:3	'ani ledodi vedodi li haro'eh bashoshanim. songs 6:4	yafah 'at ra'yati ketirzah navah kirushalim 'ayumah kanidgalot. songs 6:5	hasebi 'einayikh minegdi shehem hirhibuni sa'rekh ke'eider ha'izim shegaleshu min hagil'ad. songs 6:6	shinayikh ke'eider harekheilim she'alu min harakhzah shekulam mat'imot veshakulah 'en bahem. songs 6:7	kefelakh harimon raqatekh miba'ad lezamatekh. songs 6:8	shishim hemah melakhot ushemonim pilagshim va'alamot 'en mispar. songs 6:9	'akhat hi yonati tamati 'akhat hi le'imah barah hi leyoladtah ra'uha banot vai'asheruha melakhot ufilagshim vayhaluha. songs 6:10	mi zot hanishqafah kemo shakhar yafah khalebanah barah kakhamah 'ayumah kanidgalot. songs 6:11	'el ginat 'egoz yaradti lir'ot be'ibei hanakhal lir'ot hafarekhah hagefen heineizu harimonim. songs 6:12	lo yada'ti nafshi samatni markebot 'ami nadib. songs 6:13	shubi shubi hashulamit shubi shubi venekhezeh bakh mah tekhezu bashulamit kimkholat hamakhanayim. songs 7:1	mah yafu fe'amayikh bane'alim bat nadib khamuqei yereikhayikh kemo khala'im ma'aseh yedei 'aman. songs 7:2	sharerekh 'agan hasahar 'al yekhsar hamazeg bitnekh 'areimat khitim sugah bashoshanim. songs 7:3	shenei shadayikh kishnei 'ofarim ta'omei zebiyah. songs 7:4	zavarekh kemigdal hashen 'einayikh bereikhot bekheshbon 'al sha'ar bat rabim 'apekh kemigdal halebanon zofeh penei damaseq. songs 7:5	roshekh 'alayikh kakarmel vedalat roshekh ka'argaman melekh 'asur barehatim. songs 7:6	mah yafit umah na'amt 'ahabah bata'anugim. songs 7:7	zot qomatekh dametah letamar veshadayikh le'ashkolot. songs 7:8	'amarti 'e'eleh betamar 'okhazah besansinav veyihyu na shadayikh ke'eshkelot hagefen vereiakh 'apekh katapukhim. songs 7:9	vekhikekh keyen hatob holekh ledodi lemeisharim dobeb siftei yesheinim. songs 7:10	'ani ledodi ve'alai teshuqato. songs 7:11	lekhah dodi neizei hasadeh nalinah bakefarim. songs 7:12	nashkimah lakeramim nir'eh 'im parekhah hagefen pitakh hasemadar heineizu harimonim sham 'eten 'et dodai lakh. songs 7:13	haduda'im natenu reiakh ve'al petakheinu kal megadim khadashim gam yeshanim dodi zafanti lakh. songs 8:1	mi yitenkha ke'akh li yoneq shedei 'imi 'emza'akha bakhuz 'eshaqekha gam lo yabuzu li. songs 8:2	'enhagakha 'abi'akha 'el bet 'imi telamedeini 'ashqekha miyayin hareqakh mei'asis rimoni. songs 8:3	semolo takhat roshi vimino tekhabeqeini. songs 8:4	hishba'ti 'etkhem benot yerushalim mah ta'iru umah te'oreru 'et ha'ahabah 'ad shetekhpaz. songs 8:5	mi zot 'olah min hamidbar mitrapeqet 'al dodah takhat hatapuakh 'orartikha mah khibelatkha 'imekha shamah khibelah yeladatkha. songs 8:6	simeini khakhotam 'al libekha kakhotam 'al zero'ekha ki 'azah khamavet 'ahabah qashah khish'ol qin'ah reshafeha rishpei 'esh shalhebetyah. songs 8:7	mayim rabim lo yukhelu lekhabot 'et ha'ahabah uneharot lo yishtefuha 'im yiten 'ish 'et kal hon beito ba'ahabah boz yabuzu lo. songs 8:8	'akhot lanu qetanah veshadayim 'en lah mah na'aseh la'akhoteinu bayom sheyedubar bah. songs 8:9	'im khomah hi nibneh 'aleha tirat kasef ve'im delet hi nazur 'aleha luakh 'arez. songs 8:10	'ani khomah veshadai kamigdalot 'az hayiti be'einav kemoz'et shalom. songs 8:11	kerem hayah lishlomoh beba'al hamon natan 'et hakerem lanoterim 'ish yabi befiryo 'elef kasef. songs 8:12	karmi sheli lefanai ha'elef lekha shelomoh umatayim lenoterim 'et piryo. songs 8:13	hayoshebet baganim khabeirim maqshibim leqolekh hashmi'ini. songs 8:14	berakh dodi udemeh lekha lizbi 'o le'ofer ha'ayalim 'al harei besamim. 

ruth 1:1	vayhi bimei shefot hashofetim vayhi ra'ab ba'arez vayeilekh 'ish mibet lekhem yehudah lagur bisdei mo'ab hu ve'ishto ushenei banav. ruth 1:2	veshem ha'ish 'elimelekh veshem 'ishto na'omi veshem shenei banav makhlon vekhilyon 'efratim mibet lekhem yehudah vayabo'u sedei mo'ab vayihyu sham. ruth 1:3	vayamat 'elimelekh 'ish na'omi vatisha'er hi ushenei baneha. ruth 1:4	vayis'u lahem nashim mo'abiyot shem ha'akhat 'arepah veshem hasheinit rut vayeishebu sham ke'eser shanim. ruth 1:5	vayamutu gam sheneihem makhlon vekhilyon vatisha'er ha'ishah mishenei yeladeha umei'ishah. ruth 1:6	vataqam hi vekhaloteha vatashab misedei mo'ab ki shame'ah bisdeh mo'ab ki faqad yhvh 'et 'amo latet lahem lakhem. ruth 1:7	vateizei min hamaqom 'asher hayetah shamah ushetei khaloteha 'imah vateilakhnah baderekh lashub 'el 'erez yehudah. ruth 1:8	vatomer na'omi lishtei khaloteha leikhenah shobenah 'ishah lebet 'imah ya'aseh ya'as yhvh 'imakhem khesed ka'asher 'asitem 'im hameitim ve'imadi. ruth 1:9	yiten yhvh lakhem umezena menukhah 'ishah bet 'ishah vatishaq lahen vatisenah qolan vatibkenah. ruth 1:10	vatomarnah lah ki 'itakh nashub le'amekh. ruth 1:11	vatomer na'omi shobenah benotai lamah teilakhnah 'imi ha'od li banim bemei'ai vehayu lakhem la'anashim. ruth 1:12	shobenah benotai leikhena ki zaqanti mihyot le'ish ki 'amarti yesh li tiqvah gam hayiti halaylah le'ish vegam yaladti banim. ruth 1:13	halahen tesabeirenah 'ad 'asher yigdalu halahen tei'ageinah lebilti heyot le'ish 'al benotai ki mar li me'od mikem ki yaze'ah bi yad yhvh. ruth 1:14	vatisenah qolan vatibkenah 'od vatishaq 'arepah lakhamotah verut dabeqah bah. ruth 1:15	vatomer hineh shabah yebimtekh 'el 'amah ve'el 'eloheha shubi 'akharei yebimtekh. ruth 1:16	vatomer rut 'al tifge'i bi le'azebekh lashub mei'akharayikh ki 'el 'asher teilekhi 'eilekh uba'asher talini 'alin 'amekh 'ami veilohayikh 'elohai. ruth 1:17	ba'asher tamuti 'amut vesham 'eqaber koh ya'aseh yhvh li vekhoh yosif ki hamavet yafrid beini ubeinekh. ruth 1:18	vateire ki mit'amezet hi lalekhet 'itah vatekhdal ledaber 'eileha. ruth 1:19	vateilakhnah sheteihem 'ad bo'anah bet lakhem vayhi kebo'anah bet lekhem vateihom kal ha'ir 'aleihen vatomarnah hazot na'omi. ruth 1:20	vatomer 'aleihen 'al tiqrenah li na'omi qerena li mara ki heimar shadai li me'od. ruth 1:21	'ani melei'ah halakhti vereiqam heshibani yhvh lamah tiqrenah li na'omi yhvh 'anah bi veshadai heira' li. ruth 1:22	vatashab na'omi verut hamo'abiyah khalatah 'imah hashabah misedei mo'ab vehemah ba'u bet lekhem bitkhilat qezir se'orim. ruth 2:1	ulena'omi meyuda' moda' le'ishah 'ish gibor khayil mimishpakhat 'elimelekh ushemo bo'az. ruth 2:2	vatomer rut hamo'abiyah 'el na'omi 'eilekhah na hasadeh va'alaqotah bashibolim 'akhar 'asher 'emza khen be'einav vatomer lah lekhi biti. ruth 2:3	vateilekh vatabo vatelaqet basadeh 'akharei haqozerim vayiqer miqreha khelqat hasadeh lebo'az 'asher mimishpakhat 'elimelekh. ruth 2:4	vehineh bo'az ba mibet lekhem vayomer laqozrim yhvh 'imakhem vayomeru lo yebarekhkha yhvh. ruth 2:5	vayomer bo'az lena'aro hanizab 'al haqozrim lemi hana'arah hazot. ruth 2:6	vaya'an hana'ar hanizab 'al haqozrim vayomar na'arah mo'abiyah
