hi hashabah 'im na'omi misedeh mo'ab. ruth 2:7	vatomer 'alaqotah na ve'asafti ba'omarim 'akharei haqozrim vatabo vata'amod mei'az haboqer ve'ad 'atah zeh shibtah habayit me'at. ruth 2:8	vayomer bo'az 'el rut halo shama'at biti 'al teilekhi lilqot besadeh 'akher vegam lo ta'aburi mizeh vekhoh tidbaqin 'im na'arotai. ruth 2:9	'einayikh basadeh 'asher yiqzorun vehalakht 'akhareihen halo ziviti 'et hane'arim lebilti nage'ekh vezamit vehalakht 'el hakeilim veshatit mei'asher yish'abun hane'arim. ruth 2:10	vatipol 'al paneha vatishtakhu 'arezah vatomer 'eilav madua' mazati khen be'einekha lehakireini ve'anokhi nakheriyah. ruth 2:11	vaya'an bo'az vayomer lah huged hugad li kol 'asher 'asit 'et khamotekh 'akharei mot 'ishekh vata'azbi 'abikh ve'imekh ve'erez moladtekh vateilekhi 'el 'am 'asher lo yada'at temol shilshom. ruth 2:12	yeshalem yhvh pa'olekh utehi maskurtekh sheleimah mei'im yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher bat lakhasot takhat kenafav. ruth 2:13	vatomer 'emza khen be'einekha 'adoni ki nikhamtani vekhi dibarta 'al leb shifkhatekha ve'anokhi lo 'ehyeh ke'akhat shifkhotekha. ruth 2:14	vayomer lah bo'az le'et ha'okhel goshi halom ve'akhalt min halekhem vetabalt pitekh bakhomez vateisheb mizad haqozrim vayizbat lah qali vatokhal vatisba' vatotar. ruth 2:15	vataqam lelaqet vayzav bo'az 'et ne'arav leimor gam ben ha'omarim telaqet velo takhlimuha. ruth 2:16	vegam shol tasholu lah min hazebatim va'azabtem veliqetah velo tig'aru bah. ruth 2:17	vatelaqet basadeh 'ad ha'areb vatakhbot 'et 'asher liqeitah vayhi ke'eifah se'orim. ruth 2:18	vatisa vatabo ha'ir vateire khamotah 'et 'asher liqeitah vatozei vatiten lah 'et 'asher hotirah misabe'ah. ruth 2:19	vatomer lah khamotah 'eifoh liqat hayom ve'anah 'asit yehi makirekh barukh vataged lakhamotah 'et 'asher 'asetah 'imo vatomer shem ha'ish 'asher 'asiti 'imo hayom bo'az. ruth 2:20	vatomer na'omi lekhalatah barukh hu yhvh 'asher lo 'azab khasdo 'et hakhayim ve'et hameitim vatomer lah na'omi qarob lanu ha'ish migo'aleinu hu. ruth 2:21	vatomer rut hamo'abiyah gam ki 'amar 'eilai 'im hane'arim 'asher li tidbaqin 'ad 'im kilu 'et kal haqazir 'asher li. ruth 2:22	vatomer na'omi 'el rut kalatah tob biti ki teize'i 'im na'arotav velo yifge'u bakh besadeh 'akher. ruth 2:23	vatidbaq bena'arot bo'az lelaqet 'ad kelot qezir hase'orim uqezir hakhitim vateisheb 'et khamotah. ruth 3:1	vatomer lah na'omi khamotah biti halo 'abaqesh lakh manoakh 'asher yitab lakh. ruth 3:2	ve'atah halo bo'az moda'tanu 'asher hayit 'et na'arotav hineh hu zoreh 'et goren hase'orim halayelah. ruth 3:3	verakhazt vasakht vesamt simlotekh simlotayikh 'alayikh veyaradti veyaradt hagoren 'al tivade'i la'ish 'ad kaloto le'ekhol velishtot. ruth 3:4	vihi beshakhebo veyada'at 'et hamaqom 'asher yishkab sham ubat vegilit margelotav veshakhabeti veshakhabet vehu yagid lakh 'et 'asher ta'asin. ruth 3:5	vatomer 'eileha kol 'asher tomeri 'eilai 'e'eseh. ruth 3:6	vateired hagoren vata'as kekhol 'asher zivatah khamotah. ruth 3:7	vayokhal bo'az vayeishet vayitab libo vayabo lishkab biqzeh ha'areimah vatabo balat vategal margelotav vatishkab. ruth 3:8	vayhi bakhazi halaylah vayekherad ha'ish vayilafet vehineh 'ishah shokhebet margelotav. ruth 3:9	vayomer mi 'at vatomer 'anokhi rut 'amatekha ufarasta khenafekha 'al 'amatekha ki go'el 'atah. ruth 3:10	vayomer berukhah 'at yhvh biti heitabt khasdekh ha'akharon min harishon lebilti lekhet 'akharei habakhurim 'im dal ve'im 'ashir. ruth 3:11	ve'atah biti 'al tire'i kol 'asher tomeri 'e'eseh lakh ki yodeia' kal sha'ar 'ami ki 'eishet khayil 'at. ruth 3:12	ve'atah ki 'amenam ki 'im go'el 'anokhi vegam yesh go'el qarob mimeni. ruth 3:13	lini halaylah vehayah baboqer 'im yig'alekh tob yig'al ve'im lo yakhpoz lega'olekh uge'altikh 'anokhi khai yhvh shikhbi 'ad haboqer. ruth 3:14	vatishkab margelatav margelotav 'ad haboqer vataqam bitrom beterem yakir 'ish 'et rei'eihu vayomer 'al yivada' ki ba'ah ha'ishah hagoren. ruth 3:15	vayomer habi hamitpakhat 'asher 'alayikh ve'ekhozi bah vatokhez bah vayamad shesh se'orim vayashet 'aleha vayabo ha'ir. ruth 3:16	vatabo 'el khamotah vatomer mi 'at biti vataged lah 'et kal 'asher 'asah lah ha'ish. ruth 3:17	vatomer shesh hase'orim ha'eleh natan li ki 'amar 'eilai 'al tabo'i reiqam 'el khamotekh. ruth 3:18	vatomer shebi biti 'ad 'asher teide'in 'ekh yipol dabar ki lo yishqot ha'ish ki 'im kilah hadabar hayom. ruth 4:1	ubo'az 'alah hasha'ar vayeisheb sham vehineh hago'el 'ober 'asher diber bo'az vayomer surah shebah poh peloni 'almoni vayasar vayeisheb. ruth 4:2	vayiqakh 'asarah 'anashim miziqnei ha'ir vayomer shebu foh vayeisheibu. ruth 4:3	vayomer lago'el khelqat hasadeh 'asher le'akhinu le'elimelekh makherah na'omi hashabah misedeh mo'ab. ruth 4:4	va'ani 'amarti 'egleh 'azenekha leimor qeneh neged hayoshebim veneged ziqnei 'ami 'im tig'al ge'al ve'im lo yig'al hagidah li ve'eida' ve'eide'ah ki 'en zulatekha lig'ol ve'anokhi 'akharekha vayomer 'anokhi 'eg'al. ruth 4:5	vayomer bo'az beyom qenotkha hasadeh miyad na'omi umei'et rut hamo'abiyah 'eishet hamet qaniti qanitah lehaqim shem hamet 'al nakhalato. ruth 4:6	vayomer hago'el lo 'ukhal lig'ol lig'al pen 'ashkhit 'et nakhalati ge'al lekha 'atah 'et ge'ulati ki lo 'ukhal lig'ol. ruth 4:7	vezot lefanim beyisra'el 'al hage'ulah ve'al hatemurah leqayem kal dabar shalaf 'ish na'alo venatan lerei'eihu vezot hate'udah beyisra'el. ruth 4:8	vayomer hago'el lebo'az qeneh lakh vayishlof na'alo. ruth 4:9	vayomer bo'az lazeqeinim vekhal ha'am 'eidim 'atem hayom ki qaniti 'et kal 'asher le'elimelekh ve'et kal 'asher lekhilyon umakhlon miyad na'omi. ruth 4:10	vegam 'et rut hamo'abiyah 'eishet makhlon qaniti li le'ishah lehaqim shem hamet 'al nakhalato velo yikaret shem hamet mei'im 'ekhav umisha'ar meqomo 'eidim 'atem hayom. ruth 4:11	vayomeru kal ha'am 'asher basha'ar vehazeqeinim 'eidim yiten yhvh 'et ha'ishah haba'ah 'el beitekha kerakhel ukhelei'ah 'asher banu sheteihem 'et bet yisra'el va'aseh khayil be'efratah uqera shem bebet lakhem. ruth 4:12	vihi beitekha kebet perez 'asher yaledah tamar lihudah min hazera' 'asher yiten yhvh lekha min hana'arah hazot. ruth 4:13	vayiqakh bo'az 'et rut vatehi lo le'ishah vayabo 'eileha vayiten yhvh lah heirayon vateiled ben. ruth 4:14	vatomarnah hanashim 'el na'omi barukh yhvh 'asher lo hishbit lakh go'el hayom veyiqarei shemo beyisra'el. ruth 4:15	vehayah lakh lemeishib nefesh ulekhalkel 'et seibatekh ki khalatekh 'asher 'aheibatekh yeladatu 'asher hi tobah lakh mishib'ah banim. ruth 4:16	vatiqakh na'omi 'et hayeled vateshiteihu bekheiqah vatehi lo le'omenet. ruth 4:17	vatiqrenah lo hashekheinot shem leimor yulad ben lena'omi vatiqrenah shemo 'obed hu 'abi yishai 'abi david. ruth 4:18	ve'eleh toldot parez perez holid 'et khezron. ruth 4:19	vekhezron holid 'et ram veram holid 'et 'aminadab. ruth 4:20	ve'aminadab holid 'et nakhshon venakhshon holid 'et salmah. ruth 4:21	vesalmon holid 'et bo'az ubo'az holid 'et 'obed. ruth 4:22	ve'obed holid 'et yishai veyishai holid 'et david. 

lamentations 1:1	'eikhah yashebah badad ha'ir rabati 'am hayetah ke'almanah rabati bagoyim sarati bamedinot hayetah lamas. lamentations 1:2	bakho tibkeh balaylah vedim'atah 'al lekheyah 'en lah menakhem mikal 'ohabeha kal rei'eha bagedu bah hayu lah le'oyebim. lamentations 1:3	galetah yehudah mei'oni umeirob 'abodah hi yashebah bagoyim lo maze'ah manoakh kal rodefeha hisiguha ben hamezarim. lamentations 1:4	darkhei ziyon 'abeilot mibeli ba'ei mo'ed kal she'areha shomeimin kohaneha ne'enakhim betuloteha nugot vehi mar lah. lamentations 1:5	hayu zareha lerosh 'oyebeha shalu ki yhvh hogah 'al rob pesha'eha 'olaleha halekhu shebi lifnei zar. lamentations 1:6	vayeizei min bat mibat ziyon kal hadarah hayu sareha ke'ayalim lo maze'u mir'eh vayeilekhu belo khoakh lifnei rodef. lamentations 1:7	zakherah yerushalim yemei 'aneyah umerudeha kol makhamudeha 'asher hayu mimei qedem binfol 'amah beyad zar ve'en 'ozer lah ra'uha zarim sakhaqu 'al mishbateha. lamentations 1:8	khet khate'ah yerushalim 'al ken lenidah hayatah kal mekhabedeha hiziluha ki ra'u 'ervatah gam hi ne'enkhah vatashab 'akhor. lamentations 1:9	tum'atah beshuleha lo zakherah 'akharitah vateired pela'im 'en menakhem lah re'eh yhvh 'et 'aneyi ki higdil 'oyeb. lamentations 1:10	yado paras zar 'al kal makhamadeha ki ra'atah goyim ba'u miqdashah 'asher zivitah lo yabo'u baqahal lakh. lamentations 1:11	kal 'amah ne'enakhim mebaqeshim lekhem natenu makhamodeihem makhamadeihem be'okhel lehashib nafesh re'eh yhvh vehabitah ki hayiti zoleilah. lamentations 1:12	lo 'aleikhem kal 'oberei derekh habitu ure'u 'im yesh makh'ob kemakh'obi 'asher 'olal li 'asher hogah yhvh beyom kharon 'apo. lamentations 1:13	mimarom shalakh 'esh be'azmotai vayirdenah paras reshet leraglai heshibani 'akhor netanani shomeimah kal hayom davah. lamentations 1:14	nisqad 'ol pesha'ai beyado yistaregu 'alu 'al zavari hikhshil kokhi netanani 'adonai bidei lo 'ukhal qum. lamentations 1:15	silah khal 'abirai 'adonai beqirbi qara 'alai mo'ed lishbor bakhurai gat darakh 'adonai libtulat bat yehudah. lamentations 1:16	'al 'eleh 'ani bokhiyah 'eini 'eini yoredah mayim ki rakhaq mimeni menakhem meishib nafshi hayu banai shomeimim ki gabar 'oyeb. lamentations 1:17	peiresah ziyon beyadeha 'en menakhem lah zivah yhvh leya'aqob sebibav zarav hayetah yerushalim lenidah beineihem. lamentations 1:18	zadiq hu yhvh ki fihu mariti shim'u na khal 'amim ha'amim ure'u makh'obi betulotai ubakhurai halekhu bashebi. lamentations 1:19	qarati lam'ahabai hemah rimuni kohanai uzeqeinai ba'ir gava'u ki biqshu 'okhel lamo veyashibu 'et nafsham. lamentations 1:20	re'eh yhvh ki zar li mei'ai khomarmaru nehpakh libi beqirbi ki maro mariti mikhuz shikelah khereb babayit kamavet. lamentations 1:21	shame'u ki ne'enakhah 'ani 'en menakhem li kal 'oyebai shame'u ra'ati sasu ki 'atah 'asita heibeita yom qarata veyihyu khamoni. lamentations 1:22	tabo khal ra'atam lefanekha ve'olel lamo ka'asher 'olalta li 'al kal pesha'ai ki rabot 'ankhotai velibi davai. lamentations 2:1	'eikhah ya'ib be'apo 'adonai 'et bat ziyon hishlikh mishamayim 'erez tif'eret yisra'el velo zakhar hadom raglav beyom 'apo. lamentations 2:2	bila' 'adonai lo velo khamal 'et kal ne'ot ya'aqob haras be'ebrato mibzerei bat yehudah higia' la'arez khilel mamlakhah vesareha. lamentations 2:3	gada' bakhori 'af kol qeren yisra'el heishib 'akhor yemino mipenei 'oyeb vayib'ar beya'aqob ke'esh lehabah 'akhelah sabib. lamentations 2:4	darakh qashto ke'oyeb nizab yemino kezar vayaharog kol makhamadei 'ayin be'ohel bat ziyon shafakh ka'esh khamato. lamentations 2:5	hayah 'adonai ke'oyeb bila' yisra'el bila' kal 'armenoteha shikhet mibzarav vayereb bebat yehudah ta'aniyah va'aniyah. lamentations 2:6	vayakhmos kagan suko shikhet mo'ado shikakh yhvh beziyon mo'ed veshabat vayin'az beza'am 'apo melekh vekhohen. lamentations 2:7	zanakh 'adonai mizbekho ni'er miqdasho hisgir beyad 'oyeb khomot 'armenoteha qol natenu bebet yhvh keyom mo'ed. lamentations 2:8	khashab yhvh lehashkhit khomat bat ziyon natah qav lo heishib yado mibaleia' vaya'abel khel vekhomah yakhdav 'umlalu. lamentations 2:9	tabe'u ba'arez she'areha 'ibad veshibar berikheha malkah vesareha bagoyim 'en torah gam nebi'eha lo maze'u khazon yhvh. lamentations 2:10	yeishebu la'arez yidemu ziqnei bat ziyon he'elu 'afar 'al rosham khageru saqim horidu la'arez roshan betulot yerushalim. lamentations 2:11	kalu badema'ot 'einai khomarmeru mei'ai nishpakh la'arez kebeidi 'al sheber bat 'ami bei'atef 'olel veyoneq birkhobot qiryah. lamentations 2:12	le'imotam yomeru 'ayeh dagan vayayin behit'atefam kekhalal birkhobot 'ir behishtapekh nafsham 'el kheq 'imotam. lamentations 2:13	mah 'a'idekh mah 'adameh lakh habat yerushalim mah 'ashveh lakh va'anakhamekh betulat bat ziyon ki gadol kayam shibrekh mi yirpa lakh. lamentations 2:14	nebi'ayikh khazu lakh shav vetafel velo gilu 'al 'avonekh lehashib shebitekh shebutekh vayekhezu lakh mas'ot shav umadukhim. lamentations 2:15	safequ 'alayikh kapayim kal 'oberei derekh sharequ vayani'u rosham 'al bat yerushalim hazot ha'ir sheyomeru kelilat yofi masos lekhal ha'arez. lamentations 2:16	pazu 'alayikh pihem kal 'oybayikh sharequ vayakharqu shen 'ameru bila'enu 'akh zeh hayom sheqivinuhu mazanu ra'inu. lamentations 2:17	'asah yhvh 'asher zamam biza' 'emrato 'asher zivah mimei qedem haras velo khamal vaysamakh 'alayikh 'oyeb heirim qeren zarayikh. lamentations 2:18	za'aq libam 'el 'adonai khomat bat ziyon horidi khanakhal dim'ah yomam valaylah 'al titeni fugat lakh 'al tidom bat 'einekh. lamentations 2:19	qumi roni balayil balaylah lerosh 'ashmurot shifkhi khamayim libekh nokhakh penei 'adonai se'i 'eilav kapayikh 'al nefesh 'olalayikh ha'atufim bera'ab berosh kal khuzot. lamentations 2:20	re'eh yhvh vehabitah lemi 'olalta koh 'im tokhalnah nashim piryam 'olalei tipukhim 'im yeihareg bemiqdash 'adonai kohen venabi. lamentations 2:21	shakhebu la'arez khuzot na'ar vezaqen betulotai ubakhurai nafelu bekhareb haragta beyom 'apekha tabakhta lo khamaleta. lamentations 2:22	tiqra kheyom mo'ed megurai misabib velo hayah beyom 'af yhvh palit vesarid 'asher tipakhti veribiti 'oyebi khilam. lamentations 3:1	'ani hageber ra'ah 'oni besheibet 'ebrato. lamentations 3:2	'oti nahag vayolakh khoshekh velo 'or. lamentations 3:3	'akh bi yashub yahafokh yado kal hayom. lamentations 3:4	bilah besari ve'ori shibar 'azmotai. lamentations 3:5	banah 'alai vayaqaf rosh utela'ah. lamentations 3:6	bemakhashakim hoshibani kemeitei 'olam. lamentations 3:7	gadar ba'adi velo 'eizei hikhbid nekhasheti. lamentations 3:8	gam ki 'ez'aq va'ashaveia' satam tefilati. lamentations 3:9	gadar derakhai begazit netibotai 'ivah. lamentations 3:10	dob 'oreb hu li 'aryeh 'ari bemistarim. lamentations 3:11	derakhai sorer vayfashekheini samani shomem. lamentations 3:12	darakh qashto vayazibeini kamatara lakhez. lamentations 3:13	heibi bekhilyotai benei 'ashpato. lamentations 3:14	hayiti sekhoq lekhal 'ami neginatam kal hayom. lamentations 3:15	hisbi'ani bamerorim hirvani la'anah. lamentations 3:16	vayagres bekhazaz shinai hikhpishani ba'eifer. lamentations 3:17	vatiznakh mishalom nafshi nashiti tobah. lamentations 3:18	va'omar 'abad nizkhi vetokhalti yhvh. lamentations 3:19	zekhar 'aneyi umerudi la'anah varosh. lamentations 3:20	zakhor tizkor vetashiakh vetashoakh 'alai nafshi. lamentations 3:21	zot 'ashib 'el libi 'al ken 'okhil. lamentations 3:22	khasdei yhvh ki lo tamenu ki lo khalu rakhamav. lamentations 3:23	khadashim labeqarim rabah 'emunatekha. lamentations 3:24	khelqi yhvh 'amerah nafshi 'al ken 'okhil lo. lamentations 3:25	tob yhvh leqoav lenefesh tidreshenu. lamentations 3:26	tob veyakhil vedumam litshu'at yhvh. lamentations 3:27	tob lageber ki yisa 'ol bin'urav. lamentations 3:28	yeisheb badad veyidom ki natal 'alav. lamentations 3:29	yiten be'afar pihu 'ulai yesh tiqvah. lamentations 3:30	yiten lemakeihu lekhi yisba' bekherpah. lamentations 3:31	ki lo yiznakh le'olam 'adonai. lamentations 3:32	ki 'im hogah verikham kerob khasdo khasadav. lamentations 3:33	ki lo 'inah milibo vayageh benei 'ish. lamentations 3:34	ledakei takhat raglav kol 'asirei 'arez. lamentations 3:35	lehatot mishpat gaber neged penei 'elyon. lamentations 3:36	le'avet 'adam beribo 'adonai lo ra'ah. lamentations 3:37	mi zeh 'amar vatehi 'adonai lo zivah. lamentations 3:38	mipi 'elyon lo teizei hara'ot vehatob. lamentations 3:39	mah yit'onen 'adam khai geber 'al khet'o khata'av. lamentations 3:40	nakhpesah derakheinu venakhqorah venashubah 'ad yhvh. lamentations 3:41	nisa lebabeinu 'el kapayim 'el 'el bashamayim. lamentations 3:42	nakhnu fasha'nu umarinu 'atah lo salakheta. lamentations 3:43	sakotah ba'af vatirdefeinu haragta lo khamaleta. lamentations 3:44	sakotah be'anan lakh mei'abor tefilah. lamentations 3:45	sekhi uma'os tesimeinu beqereb ha'amim. lamentations 3:46	pazu 'aleinu pihem kal 'oyebeinu. lamentations 3:47	pakhad vafakhat hayah lanu hashet vehashaber. lamentations 3:48	palgei mayim teirad 'eini 'al sheber bat 'ami. lamentations 3:49	'eini nigerah velo tidmeh mei'en hafugot. lamentations 3:50	'ad yashqif veyeire yhvh mishamayim. lamentations 3:51	'eini 'olah lenafshi mikol benot 'iri. lamentations 3:52	zod zaduni kazipor 'oyebai khinam. lamentations 3:53	zametu babor khayai vayadu 'eben bi. lamentations 3:54	zafu mayim 'al roshi 'amarti nigzareti. lamentations 3:55	qarati shimkha yhvh mibor takhtiyot. lamentations 3:56	qoli shama'eta 'al ta'lem 'azenekha leravkhati leshav'ati. lamentations 3:57	qarabta beyom 'eqra'eka 'amarta 'al tira. lamentations 3:58	rabta 'adonai ribei nafshi ga'alta khayai. lamentations 3:59	ra'itah yhvh 'avatati shafetah mishpati. lamentations 3:60	ra'itah kal niqmatam kal makhshebotam li. lamentations 3:61	shama'ta kherpatam yhvh kal makhshebotam 'alai. lamentations 3:62	siftei qamai vehegyonam 'alai kal hayom. lamentations 3:63	shibtam veqimatam habitah 'ani manginatam. lamentations 3:64	tashib lahem gemul yhvh kema'aseh yedeihem. lamentations 3:65	titen lahem meginat leb ta'alatekha lahem. lamentations 3:66	tirdof be'af vetashmidem mitakhat shemei yhvh. lamentations 4:1	'eikhah yu'am zahab yishne haketem hatob tishtapeikhenah 'abnei qodesh berosh kal khuzot. lamentations 4:2	benei ziyon hayqarim hamsula'im bapaz 'eikhah nekhshebu leniblei kheres ma'aseh yedei yozer. lamentations 4:3	gam tanin tanim khalezu shad heiniqu gureihen bat 'ami le'akhzar ki 'einim kai'einim bamidbar. lamentations 4:4	dabaq leshon yoneq 'el khiko bazama 'olalim sha'alu lekhem pores 'en lahem. lamentations 4:5	ha'okhelim lema'adanim nashamu bakhuzot ha'emunim 'alei tola' khibequ 'ashpatot. lamentations 4:6	vayigdal 'avon bat 'ami meikhatat sedom hahafukhah khemo raga' velo khalu bah yadayim. lamentations 4:7	zaku nezireha misheleg zakhu meikhalab 'ademu 'ezem mipeninim sapir gizratam. lamentations 4:8	khashakh mishekhor ta'oram lo nikeru bakhuzot zafad 'oram 'al 'azmam yabesh hayah kha'ez. lamentations 4:9	tobim hayu khalei khereb meikhalei ra'ab shehem yazubu meduqarim mitenubot sadai. lamentations 4:10	yedei nashim rakhamaniyot bishelu yaldeihen hayu lebarot lamo besheber bat 'ami. lamentations 4:11	kilah yhvh 'et khamato shafakh kharon 'apo vayazet 'esh beziyon vatokhal yesodoteha. lamentations 4:12	lo he'eminu malkhei 'erez vekhol kol yoshebei teibel ki yabo zar ve'oyeb besha'arei yerushalim. lamentations 4:13	meikhatot nebi'eha 'avonot kohaneha hashofekhim beqirbah dam zadiqim. lamentations 4:14	na'u 'ivrim bakhuzot nego'alu badam belo yukhelu yige'u bilbusheihem. lamentations 4:15	suru tamei qare'u lamo suru suru 'al tiga'u ki nazu gam na'u 'ameru bagoyim lo yosifu lagur. lamentations 4:16	penei yhvh khileqam lo yosif lehabitam penei khohanim lo nasa'u zeqeinim uzeqeinim lo khananu. lamentations 4:17	'odeinah 'odeinu tikhlenah 'eineinu 'el 'ezrateinu habel bezipiyateinu zipinu 'el go lo yoshia'. lamentations 4:18	zadu ze'adeinu milekhet birkhoboteinu qarab qizeinu male'u yameinu ki ba qizeinu. lamentations 4:19	qalim hayu rodefeinu minishrei shamayim 'al heharim delaqunu bamidbar 'arebu lanu. lamentations 4:20	ruakh 'apeinu meshiakh yhvh nilkad bishkhitotam 'asher 'amarnu bezilo nikhyeh bagoyim. lamentations 4:21	sisi vesimkhi bat 'edom yoshabti yoshebet be'erez 'uz gam 'alayikh ta'abar kos tishkeri vetit'ari. lamentations 4:22	tam 'avonekh bat ziyon lo yosif lehaglotekh paqad 'avonekh bat 'edom gilah 'al khatotayikh. lamentations 5:1	zekhor yhvh meh hayah lanu habet habitah ure'eh 'et kherpateinu. lamentations 5:2	nakhalateinu nehefkhah lezarim bateinu lenakherim. lamentations 5:3	yetomim hayinu 'en ve'en 'ab 'imoteinu ke'almanot. lamentations 5:4	meimeinu bekhesef shatinu 'eizeinu bimkhir yabo'u. lamentations 5:5	'al zavareinu nirdafenu yaga'nu lo velo hunakh lanu. lamentations 5:6	mizrayim natanu yad 'ashur lisboa' lakhem. lamentations 5:7	'aboteinu khate'u 'einam ve'einam 'anakhnu va'anakhnu 'avonoteihem sabalenu. lamentations 5:8	'abadim mashelu banu poreq 'en miyadam. lamentations 5:9	benafsheinu nabi lakhmeinu mipenei khereb hamidbar. lamentations 5:10	'oreinu ketanur nikhmaru mipenei zal'afot ra'ab. lamentations 5:11	nashim beziyon 'inu betulot be'arei yehudah. lamentations 5:12	sarim beyadam nitlu penei zeqeinim lo nehdaru. lamentations 5:13	bakhurim tekhon nasa'u une'arim ba'ez kashalu. lamentations 5:14	zeqeinim misha'ar shabatu bakhurim mineginatam. lamentations 5:15	shabat mesos libeinu nehpakh le'eibel mekholeinu. lamentations 5:16	nafelah 'ateret rosheinu 'o na lanu ki khatanu. lamentations 5:17	'al zeh hayah daveh libeinu 'al 'eleh khashekhu 'eineinu. lamentations 5:18	'al har ziyon sheshamem shu'alim hilekhu bo. lamentations 5:19	'atah yhvh le'olam teisheb kis'akha ledor vador. lamentations 5:20	lamah lanezakh tishkakheinu ta'azbeinu le'orekh yamim. lamentations 5:21	hashibeinu yhvh 'eilekha venashub venashubah khadesh yameinu keqedem. lamentations 5:22	ki 'im ma'os me'astanu qazafta 'aleinu 'ad me'od. 

ecclesiastes 1:1	dibrei qohelet ben david melekh birushalim. ecclesiastes 1:2	habel habalim 'amar qohelet habel habalim hakol habel. ecclesiastes 1:3	mah yitron la'adam bekhal 'amalo sheya'amol takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 1:4	dor holekh vedor ba veha'arez le'olam 'omadet. ecclesiastes 1:5	vezarakh hashemesh uba hashamesh ve'el meqomo sho'ef zoreiakh hu sham. ecclesiastes 1:6	holekh 'el darom vesobeb 'el zafon sobeb sobeb holekh haruakh ve'al sebibotav shab haruakh. ecclesiastes 1:7	kal hanekhalim holekhim 'el hayam vehayam 'einenu malei 'el meqom shehanekhalim holekhim sham hem shabim lalakhet. ecclesiastes 1:8	kal hadebarim yegei'im lo yukhal 'ish ledaber lo tisba' 'ayin lir'ot velo timalei 'ozen mishemoa'. ecclesiastes 1:9	mah shehayah hu sheyihyeh umah shena'asah hu sheyei'aseh ve'en kal khadash takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 1:10	yesh dabar sheyomar re'eh zeh khadash hu kebar hayah le'olamim 'asher hayah milefaneinu. ecclesiastes 1:11	'en zikhron larishonim vegam la'akharonim sheyihyu lo yihyeh lahem zikaron 'im sheyihyu la'akharonah. ecclesiastes 1:12	'ani qohelet hayiti melekh 'al yisra'el birushalim. ecclesiastes 1:13	venatati 'et libi lidrosh velatur bakhakhemah 'al kal 'asher na'asah takhat hashamayim hu 'inyan ra' natan 'elohim libnei ha'adam la'anot bo. ecclesiastes 1:14	ra'iti 'et kal hama'asim shena'asu takhat hashamesh vehineh hakol hebel ure'ut ruakh. ecclesiastes 1:15	me'uvat lo yukhal litqon vekhesron lo yukhal lehimanot. ecclesiastes 1:16	dibarti 'ani 'im libi leimor 'ani hineh higdalti vehosafti khakhmah 'al kal 'asher hayah lefanai 'al yerushalim velibi ra'ah harbeh khakhmah vada'at. ecclesiastes 1:17	va'etenah libi lada'at khakhmah veda'at holeilot vesikhlut yada'ti shegam zeh hu ra'yon ruakh. ecclesiastes 1:18	ki berob khakhmah rab ka'as veyosif da'at yosif makh'ob. ecclesiastes 2:1	'amarti 'ani belibi lekhah na 'anasekhah besimkhah ure'eh betob vehineh gam hu habel. ecclesiastes 2:2	liskhoq 'amarti meholal ulesimkhah mah zoh 'osah. ecclesiastes 2:3	tarti belibi limshokh bayayin 'et besari velibi noheg bakhakhemah vele'ekhoz besikhlut 'ad 'asher 'er'eh 'ei zeh tob libnei ha'adam 'asher ya'asu takhat hashamayim mispar yemei khayeihem. ecclesiastes 2:4	higdalti ma'asai baniti li batim nata'ti li keramim. ecclesiastes 2:5	'asiti li ganot ufardeisim venata'ti bahem 'ez kal peri. ecclesiastes 2:6	'asiti li bereikhot mayim lehashqot meihem ya'ar zomeiakh 'eizim. ecclesiastes 2:7	qaniti 'abadim ushefakhot ubenei bayit hayah li gam miqneh baqar vazon harbeh hayah li mikol shehayu lefanai birushalim. ecclesiastes 2:8	kanasti li gam kesef vezahab usegulat melakhim vehamedinot 'asiti li sharim vesharot veta'anugot benei ha'adam shidah veshidot. ecclesiastes 2:9	vegadalti vehosafti mikol shehayah lefanai birushalim 'af khakhemati 'amedah li. ecclesiastes 2:10	vekhol 'asher sha'alu 'einai lo 'azalti meihem lo mana'ti 'et libi mikal simkhah ki libi sameiakh mikal 'amali vezeh hayah khelqi mikal 'amali. ecclesiastes 2:11	ufaniti 'ani bekhal ma'asai she'asu yadai ube'amal she'amalti la'asot vehineh hakol hebel ure'ut ruakh ve'en yitron takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 2:12	ufaniti 'ani lir'ot khakhmah veholeilot vesikhlut ki meh ha'adam sheyabo 'akharei hamelekh 'et 'asher kebar 'asuhu. ecclesiastes 2:13	vera'iti 'ani sheyesh yitron lakhakhemah min hasikhlut kiteron ha'or min hakhoshekh. ecclesiastes 2:14	hekhakham 'einav berosho vehakesil bakhoshekh holekh veyada'ti gam 'ani shemiqreh 'ekhad yiqreh 'et kulam. ecclesiastes 2:15	ve'amarti 'ani belibi kemiqreh hakesil gam 'ani yiqreini velamah khakhamti 'ani 'az yoter vedibarti belibi shegam zeh habel. ecclesiastes 2:16	ki 'en zikhron lekhakham 'im hakesil le'olam beshekebar hayamim haba'im hakol nishkakh ve'ekh yamut hekhakham 'im hakesil. ecclesiastes 2:17	vesaneiti 'et hakhayim ki ra' 'alai hama'aseh shena'asah takhat hashamesh ki hakol hebel ure'ut ruakh. ecclesiastes 2:18	vesaneiti 'ani 'et kal 'amali she'ani 'amel takhat hashamesh she'anikhenu la'adam sheyihyeh 'akharai. ecclesiastes 2:19	umi yodeia' hekhakham yihyeh 'o sakhal veyishlat bekhal 'amali she'amalti veshekhakhamti takhat hashamesh gam zeh habel. ecclesiastes 2:20	vesaboti 'ani leya'esh 'et libi 'al kal he'amal she'amalti takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 2:21	ki yesh 'adam she'amalo bekhakhemah ubeda'at ubekhishron ule'adam shelo 'amal bo yitenenu khelqo gam zeh hebel vera'ah rabah. ecclesiastes 2:22	ki meh hoeh la'adam bekhal 'amalo ubera'yon libo shehu 'amel takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 2:23	ki khal yamav makh'obim vakha'as 'inyano gam balaylah lo shakhab libo gam zeh hebel hu. ecclesiastes 2:24	'en tob ba'adam sheyokhal veshatah veher'ah 'et nafsho tob ba'amalo gam zoh ra'iti 'ani ki miyad ha'elohim hi. ecclesiastes 2:25	ki mi yokhal umi yakhush khuz mimeni. ecclesiastes 2:26	ki le'adam shetob lefanav natan khakhmah veda'at vesimkhah velakhote natan 'inyan le'esof velikhnos latet letob lifnei ha'elohim gam zeh hebel ure'ut ruakh. ecclesiastes 3:1	lakol zeman ve'et lekhal kheifez takhat hashamayim. ecclesiastes 3:2	'et laledet ve'et lamut 'et lata'at ve'et la'aqor natua'. ecclesiastes 3:3	'et laharog ve'et lirpo 'et lifroz ve'et libnot. ecclesiastes 3:4	'et libkot ve'et liskhoq 'et sefod ve'et reqod. ecclesiastes 3:5	'et lehashlikh 'abanim ve'et kenos 'abanim 'et lakhaboq ve'et lirkhoq meikhabeq. ecclesiastes 3:6	'et lebaqesh ve'et le'abed 'et lishmor ve'et lehashlikh. ecclesiastes 3:7	'et liqroa' ve'et litpor 'et lakhashot ve'et ledaber. ecclesiastes 3:8	'et le'ehob ve'et lisno 'et milkhamah ve'et shalom. ecclesiastes 3:9	mah yitron ha'oseh ba'asher hu 'amel. ecclesiastes 3:10	ra'iti 'et ha'inyan 'asher natan 'elohim libnei ha'adam la'anot bo. ecclesiastes 3:11	'et hakol 'asah yafeh be'ito gam 'et ha'olam natan belibam mibeli 'asher lo yimza ha'adam 'et hama'aseh 'asher 'asah ha'elohim meirosh ve'ad sof. ecclesiastes 3:12	yada'ti ki 'en tob bam ki 'im lismoakh vela'asot tob bekhayav. ecclesiastes 3:13	vegam kal ha'adam sheyokhal veshatah vera'ah tob bekhal 'amalo matat 'elohim hi. ecclesiastes 3:14	yada'ti ki kal 'asher ya'aseh ha'elohim hu yihyeh le'olam 'alav 'en lehosif umimenu 'en ligroa' veha'elohim 'asah sheyir'u milefanav. ecclesiastes 3:15	mah shehayah kebar hu va'asher lihyot kebar hayah veha'elohim yebaqesh 'et nirdaf. ecclesiastes 3:16	ve'od ra'iti takhat hashamesh meqom hamishpat shamah haresha' umeqom hazedeq shamah harasha'. ecclesiastes 3:17	'amarti 'ani belibi 'et hazadiq ve'et harasha' yishpot ha'elohim ki 'et lekhal kheifez ve'al kal hama'aseh sham. ecclesiastes 3:18	'amarti 'ani belibi 'al dibrat benei ha'adam lebaram ha'elohim velir'ot shehem beheimah hemah lahem. ecclesiastes 3:19	ki miqreh benei ha'adam umiqreh habeheimah umiqreh 'ekhad lahem kemot zeh ken mot zeh veruakh 'ekhad lakol umotar ha'adam min habeheimah 'ayin ki hakol habel. ecclesiastes 3:20	hakol holekh 'el maqom 'ekhad hakol hayah min he'afar vehakol shab 'el he'afar. ecclesiastes 3:21	mi yodeia' ruakh benei ha'adam ha'olah hi lema'elah veruakh habeheimah hayoredet hi lematah la'arez. ecclesiastes 3:22	vera'iti ki 'en tob mei'asher yismakh ha'adam bema'asav ki hu khelqo ki mi yebi'enu lir'ot bemeh sheyihyeh 'akharav. ecclesiastes 4:1	veshabti 'ani va'er'eh 'et kal ha'ashuqim 'asher na'asim takhat hashamesh vehineh dim'at ha'ashuqim ve'en lahem menakhem umiyad 'osheqeihem koakh ve'en lahem menakhem. ecclesiastes 4:2	veshabeiakh 'ani 'et hameitim shekebar meitu min hakhayim 'asher hemah khayim 'adenah. ecclesiastes 4:3	vetob misheneihem 'et 'asher 'aden lo hayah 'asher lo ra'ah 'et hama'aseh hara' 'asher na'asah takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 4:4	vera'iti 'ani 'et kal 'amal ve'et kal kishron hama'aseh ki hi qin'at 'ish meirei'eihu gam zeh hebel ure'ut ruakh. ecclesiastes 4:5	hakesil khobeq 'et yadav ve'okhel 'et besaro. ecclesiastes 4:6	tob melo khaf nakhat mimelo khafenayim 'amal ure'ut ruakh. ecclesiastes 4:7	veshabti 'ani va'er'eh hebel takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 4:8	yesh 'ekhad ve'en sheini gam ben va'akh 'en lo ve'en qez lekhal 'amalo gam 'einav 'eino lo tisba' 'osher ulemi 'ani 'amel umekhaser 'et nafshi mitobah gam zeh hebel ve'inyan ra' hu. ecclesiastes 4:9	tobim hashenayim min ha'ekhad 'asher yesh lahem sakhar tob ba'amalam. ecclesiastes 4:10	ki 'im yipolu ha'ekhad yaqim 'et khabeiro ve'ilo ha'ekhad sheyipol ve'en sheini lahaqimo. ecclesiastes 4:11	gam 'im yishkebu shenayim vekham lahem ule'ekhad 'ekh yeikham. ecclesiastes 4:12	ve'im yitqefo ha'ekhad hashenayim ya'amdu negdo vehakhut hamshulash lo bimheirah yinateq. ecclesiastes 4:13	tob yeled misken vekhakham mimelekh zaqen ukhesil 'asher lo yada' lehizaher 'od. ecclesiastes 4:14	ki mibet hasurim yaza limlokh ki gam bemalkhuto nolad rash. ecclesiastes 4:15	ra'iti 'et kal hakhayim hamhalekhim takhat hashamesh 'im hayeled hasheini 'asher ya'amod takhtav. ecclesiastes 4:16	'en qez lekhal ha'am lekhol 'asher hayah lifneihem gam ha'akharonim lo yismekhu bo ki gam zeh hebel vera'yon ruakh. ecclesiastes 5:1	shemor raglekha raglekha ka'asher teilekh 'el bet ha'elohim veqarob lishmoa' mitet hakesilim zabakh ki 'einam yod'im la'asot ra'. ecclesiastes 5:2	'al tebahel 'al pikha velibekha 'al yemaher lehozi dabar lifnei ha'elohim ki ha'elohim bashamayim ve'atah 'al ha'arez 'al ken yihyu debarekha me'atim. ecclesiastes 5:3	ki ba hakhalom berob 'inyan veqol kesil berob debarim. ecclesiastes 5:4	ka'asher tidor neder leilohim 'al te'akher leshalemo ki 'en kheifez bakesilim 'et 'asher tidor shalem. ecclesiastes 5:5	tob 'asher lo tidor mishetidor velo teshalem. ecclesiastes 5:6	'al titen 'et pikha lakhati 'et besarekha ve'al tomar lifnei hamal'akh ki shegagah hi lamah yiqzof ha'elohim 'al qolekha vekhibel 'et ma'aseh yadekha. ecclesiastes 5:7	ki berob khalomot vahabalim udebarim harbeh ki 'et ha'elohim yera. ecclesiastes 5:8	'im 'osheq rash vegeizel mishpat vazedeq tir'eh bamedinah 'al titmah 'al hakheifez ki gaboah mei'al gaboah shomer ugebohim 'aleihem. ecclesiastes 5:9	veyitron 'erez bakol hi hu melekh lesadeh ne'ebad. ecclesiastes 5:10	'oheb kesef lo yisba' kesef umi 'oheb behamon lo tebu'ah gam zeh habel. ecclesiastes 5:11	birbot hatobah rabu 'okhleha umah kishron lib'aleha ki 'im re'iyat re'ut 'einav. ecclesiastes 5:12	metuqah shenat ha'obed 'im me'at ve'im harbeh yokhel vehasaba' le'ashir 'einenu maniakh lo lishon. ecclesiastes 5:13	yesh ra'ah kholah ra'iti takhat hashamesh 'osher shamur lib'alav lera'ato. ecclesiastes 5:14	ve'abad ha'osher hahu be'inyan ra' veholid ben ve'en beyado me'umah. ecclesiastes 5:15	ka'asher yaza mibeten 'imo 'arom yashub lalekhet kesheba ume'umah lo yisa ba'amalo sheyolekh beyado. ecclesiastes 5:16	vegam zoh ra'ah kholah kal 'umat sheba ken yeilekh umah yitron lo sheya'amol laruakh. ecclesiastes 5:17	gam kal yamav bakhoshekh yokhel vekha'as harbeh vekhaleyo vaqazef. ecclesiastes 5:18	hineh 'asher ra'iti 'ani tob 'asher yafeh le'ekhol velishtot velir'ot tobah bekhal 'amalo sheya'amol takhat hashemesh mispar yemei khayav khayav 'asher natan lo ha'elohim ki hu khelqo. ecclesiastes 5:19	gam kal ha'adam 'asher natan lo ha'elohim 'osher unekhasim vehishlito le'ekhol mimenu velaset 'et khelqo velismoakh ba'amalo zoh matat 'elohim hi. ecclesiastes 5:20	ki lo harbeh yizkor 'et yemei khayav ki ha'elohim ma'aneh besimkhat libo. ecclesiastes 6:1	yesh ra'ah 'asher ra'iti takhat hashamesh verabah hi 'al ha'adam. ecclesiastes 6:2	'ish 'asher yiten lo ha'elohim 'osher unekhasim vekhabod ve'einenu khaser lenafsho mikol 'asher yit'aveh velo yashlitenu ha'elohim le'ekhol mimenu ki 'ish nakheri yokhalenu zeh hebel vakholi ra' hu. ecclesiastes 6:3	'im yolid 'ish mei'ah veshanim rabot yikhyeh verab sheyihyu yemei shanav venafsho lo tisba' min hatobah vegam qeburah lo hayetah lo 'amarti tob mimenu hanafel. ecclesiastes 6:4	ki bahebel ba ubakhoshekh yeilekh ubakhoshekh shemo yekhuseh. ecclesiastes 6:5	gam shemesh lo ra'ah velo yada' nakhat lazeh mizeh. ecclesiastes 6:6	ve'ilu khayah 'elef shanim pa'amayim vetobah lo ra'ah halo 'el maqom 'ekhad hakol holekh. ecclesiastes 6:7	kal 'amal ha'adam lefihu vegam hanefesh lo timalei. ecclesiastes 6:8	ki mah yoter lekhakham min hakesil mah le'ani yodeia' lahalokh neged hakhayim. ecclesiastes 6:9	tob mar'eh 'einayim meihalakh nafesh gam zeh hebel ure'ut ruakh. ecclesiastes 6:10	mah shehayah kebar niqra shemo venoda' 'asher hu 'adam velo yukhal ladin 'im shehatqif shetaqif mimenu. ecclesiastes 6:11	ki yesh debarim harbeh marbim habel mah yoter la'adam. ecclesiastes 6:12	ki mi yodeia' mah tob la'adam bakhayim mispar yemei khayei heblo veya'asem kazel 'asher mi yagid la'adam mah yihyeh 'akharav takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 7:1	tob shem mishemen tob veyom hamavet miyom hivaledo. ecclesiastes 7:2	tob lalekhet 'el bet 'eibel milekhet 'el bet mishteh ba'asher hu sof kal ha'adam vehakhai yiten 'el libo. ecclesiastes 7:3	tob ka'as misekhoq ki beroa' panim yitab leb. ecclesiastes 7:4	leb khakhamim bebet 'eibel veleb kesilim bebet simkhah. ecclesiastes 7:5	tob lishmoa' ga'arat khakham mei'ish shomeia' shir kesilim. ecclesiastes 7:6	ki kheqol hasirim takhat hasir ken sekhoq hakesil vegam zeh habel. ecclesiastes 7:7	ki ha'osheq yeholel khakham vi'abed 'et leb matanah. ecclesiastes 7:8	tob 'akharit dabar meireishito tob 'erekh ruakh migebah ruakh. ecclesiastes 7:9	'al tebahel berukhakha likh'os ki kha'as bekheq kesilim yanuakh. ecclesiastes 7:10	'al tomar meh hayah shehayamim harishonim hayu tobim mei'eleh ki lo meikhakhemah sha'alta 'al zeh. ecclesiastes 7:11	tobah khakhmah 'im nakhalah veyoter lero'ei hashamesh. ecclesiastes 7:12	ki bezel hakhakhemah bezel hakasef veyitron da'at hakhakhemah tekhayeh be'aleha. ecclesiastes 7:13	re'eh 'et ma'aseh ha'elohim ki mi yukhal letaqen 'et 'asher 'iveto. ecclesiastes 7:14	beyom tobah heyeh betob ubeyom ra'ah re'eh gam 'et zeh le'umat zeh 'asah ha'elohim 'al dibrat shelo yimza ha'adam 'akharav me'umah. ecclesiastes 7:15	'et hakol ra'iti bimei hebli yesh zadiq 'obed bezidqo veyesh rasha' ma'arikh bera'ato. ecclesiastes 7:16	'al tehi zadiq harbeh ve'al titkhakam yoter lamah tishomem. ecclesiastes 7:17	'al tirsha' harbeh ve'al tehi sakhal lamah tamut belo 'itekha. ecclesiastes 7:18	tob 'asher te'ekhoz bazeh vegam mizeh 'al tanakh 'et yadekha ki yerei 'elohim yeizei 'et kulam. ecclesiastes 7:19	hakhakhemah ta'oz lekhakham mei'asarah shalitim 'asher hayu ba'ir. ecclesiastes 7:20	ki 'adam 'en zadiq ba'arez 'asher ya'aseh tob velo yekheta. ecclesiastes 7:21	gam lekhal hadebarim 'asher yedabeiru 'al titen libekha 'asher lo tishma' 'et 'abdekha meqalekha. ecclesiastes 7:22	ki gam pe'amim rabot yada' libekha 'asher gam 'at 'atah qilalta 'akheirim. ecclesiastes 7:23	kal zoh nisiti bakhakhemah 'amarti 'ekhkamah vehi rekhoqah mimeni. ecclesiastes 7:24	rakhoq mah shehayah ve'amoq 'amoq mi yimza'enu. ecclesiastes 7:25	saboti 'ani velibi lada'at velatur ubaqesh khakhmah vekheshbon velada'at resha' kesel vehasikhlut holeilot. ecclesiastes 7:26	umoze 'ani mar mimavet 'et ha'ishah 'asher hi mezodim vakharamim libah 'asurim yadeha tob lifnei ha'elohim yimalet mimenah vekhotei yilakhed bah. ecclesiastes 7:27	re'eh zeh mazati 'amerah qohelet 'akhat le'akhat limzo kheshbon. ecclesiastes 7:28	'asher 'od biqshah nafshi velo mazati 'adam 'ekhad mei'elef mazati ve'ishah bekhal 'eleh lo mazati. ecclesiastes 7:29	lebad re'eh zeh mazati 'asher 'asah ha'elohim 'et ha'adam yashar vehemah biqshu khishebonot rabim. ecclesiastes 8:1	mi kehekhakham umi yodeia' peisher dabar khakhemat 'adam ta'ir panav ve'oz panav yeshune. ecclesiastes 8:2	'ani pi melekh shemor ve'al dibrat shebu'at 'elohim. ecclesiastes 8:3	'al tibahel mipanav teilekh 'al ta'amod bedabar ra' ki kal 'asher yakhpoz ya'aseh. ecclesiastes 8:4	ba'asher debar melekh shilton umi yomar lo mah ta'aseh. ecclesiastes 8:5	shomer mizvah lo yeida' dabar ra' ve'et umishpat yeida' leb khakham. ecclesiastes 8:6	ki lekhal kheifez yesh 'et umishpat ki ra'at ha'adam rabah 'alav. ecclesiastes 8:7	ki 'einenu yodeia' mah sheyihyeh ki ka'asher yihyeh mi yagid lo. ecclesiastes 8:8	'en 'adam shalit baruakh likhlo 'et haruakh ve'en shilton beyom hamavet ve'en mishlakhat bamilkhamah velo yemalet resha' 'et be'alav. ecclesiastes 8:9	'et kal zeh ra'iti venaton 'et libi lekhal ma'aseh 'asher na'asah takhat hashamesh 'et 'asher shalat ha'adam be'adam lera' lo. ecclesiastes 8:10	ubekhen ra'iti resha'im qeburim vaba'u umimeqom qadosh yehaleikhu veyishtakekhu ba'ir 'asher ken 'asu gam zeh habel. ecclesiastes 8:11	'asher 'en na'asah fitgam ma'aseh hara'ah meheirah 'al ken malei leb benei ha'adam bahem la'asot ra'. ecclesiastes 8:12	'asher khote 'oseh ra' me'at uma'arikh lo ki gam yodeia' 'ani 'asher yihyeh tob leyir'ei ha'elohim 'asher yire'u milefanav. ecclesiastes 8:13	vetob lo yihyeh larasha' velo ya'arikh yamim kazel 'asher 'einenu yarei milifnei 'elohim. ecclesiastes 8:14	yesh hebel 'asher na'asah 'al ha'arez 'asher yesh zadiqim 'asher magia' 'aleihem kema'aseh haresha'im veyesh resha'im shemagia' 'aleihem kema'aseh hazadiqim 'amarti shegam zeh habel. ecclesiastes 8:15	veshibakhti 'ani 'et hasimkhah 'asher 'en tob la'adam takhat hashemesh ki 'im le'ekhol velishtot velismoakh vehu yilvenu ba'amalo yemei khayav 'asher natan lo ha'elohim takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 8:16	ka'asher natati 'et libi lada'at khakhmah velir'ot 'et ha'inyan 'asher na'asah 'al ha'arez ki gam bayom ubalaylah sheinah be'einav 'einenu ro'eh. ecclesiastes 8:17	vera'iti 'et kal ma'aseh ha'elohim ki lo yukhal ha'adam limzo 'et hama'aseh 'asher na'asah takhat hashemesh beshel 'asher ya'amol ha'adam lebaqesh velo yimza vegam 'im yomar hekhakham lada'at lo yukhal limzo. ecclesiastes 9:1	ki 'et kal zeh natati 'el libi velabur 'et kal zeh 'asher hazadiqim vehakhakhamim va'abadeihem beyad ha'elohim gam 'ahabah gam sin'ah 'en yodeia' ha'adam hakol lifneihem. ecclesiastes 9:2	hakol ka'asher lakol miqreh 'ekhad lazadiq velarasha' latob velatahor velatamei velazobeiakh vela'asher 'einenu zobeiakh katob kakhote hanishba' ka'asher shebu'ah yarei. ecclesiastes 9:3	zeh ra' bekhol 'asher na'asah takhat hashemesh ki miqreh 'ekhad lakol vegam leb benei ha'adam malei ra' veholeilot bilbabam bekhayeihem ve'akharav 'el hameitim. ecclesiastes 9:4	ki mi 'asher yibakher yekhubar 'el kal hakhayim yesh bitakhon ki lekheleb khai hu tob min ha'aryeh hamet. ecclesiastes 9:5	ki hakhayim yod'im sheyamutu vehameitim 'einam yod'im me'umah ve'en 'od lahem sakhar ki nishkakh zikhram. ecclesiastes 9:6	gam 'ahabatam gam sin'atam gam qin'atam kebar 'abadah vekheileq 'en lahem 'od le'olam bekhol 'asher na'asah takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 9:7	lekh 'ekhol besimkhah lakhmekha ushateh beleb tob yeinekha ki khebar razah ha'elohim 'et ma'asekha. ecclesiastes 9:8	bekhal 'et yihyu begadekha lebanim veshemen 'al roshekha 'al yekhsar. ecclesiastes 9:9	re'eh khayim 'im 'ishah 'asher 'ahabta kal yemei khayei heblekha 'asher natan lekha takhat hashemesh kol yemei heblekha ki hu khelqekha bakhayim uba'amalekha 'asher 'atah 'amel takhat hashamesh. ecclesiastes 9:10	kol 'asher timza yadekha la'asot bekhokhakha 'aseh ki 'en ma'aseh vekheshbon veda'at vekhakhemah bish'ol 'asher 'atah holekh shamah. ecclesiastes 9:11	shabti vera'oh takhat hashemesh ki lo laqalim hameiroz velo lagiborim hamilkhamah vegam lo lakhakhamim lekhem vegam lo lanebonim 'osher vegam lo layode'im khen ki 'et vafega' yiqreh 'et kulam. ecclesiastes 9:12	ki gam lo yeida' ha'adam 'et 'ito kadagim shene'ekhazim bimzodah ra'ah vekhaziporim ha'akhuzot bapakh kahem yuqashim benei ha'adam le'et ra'ah keshetipol 'aleihem pit'om. ecclesiastes 9:13	gam zoh ra'iti khakhmah takhat hashamesh ugedolah hi 'eilai. ecclesiastes 9:14	'ir qetanah va'anashim bah me'at uba 'eileha melekh gadol vesabab 'otah ubanah 'aleha mezodim gedolim. ecclesiastes 9:15	umaza bah 'ish misken khakham umilat hu 'et ha'ir bekhakhemato ve'adam lo zakhar 'et ha'ish hamisken hahu. ecclesiastes 9:16	ve'amarti 'ani tobah khakhmah migeburah vekhakhemat hamisken bezuyah udebarav 'einam nishma'im. ecclesiastes 9:17	dibrei khakhamim benakhat nishma'im miza'aqat moshel bakesilim. ecclesiastes 9:18	tobah khakhmah mikelei qerab vekhote 'ekhad ye'abed tobah harbeh. ecclesiastes 10:1	zebubei mavet yab'ish yabia' shemen roqeiakh yaqar meikhakhemah mikabod sikhlut me'at. ecclesiastes 10:2	leb khakham limino veleb kesil lismolo. ecclesiastes 10:3	vegam baderekh keshehasakhal keshesakhal holekh libo khaser ve'amar lakol sakhal hu. ecclesiastes 10:4	'im ruakh hamoshel ta'aleh 'alekha meqomkha 'al tanakh ki marpei yaniakh khata'im gedolim. ecclesiastes 10:5	yesh ra'ah ra'iti takhat hashamesh kishgagah sheyoza milifnei hashalit. ecclesiastes 10:6	nitan hasekhel bameromim rabim va'ashirim basheifel yeisheibu. ecclesiastes 10:7	ra'iti 'abadim 'al susim vesarim holekhim ka'abadim 'al ha'arez. ecclesiastes 10:8	khofer gumaz bo yipol uforez gader yishekhenu nakhash. ecclesiastes 10:9	masia' 'abanim yei'azeb bahem boqeia' 'eizim yisakhen bam. ecclesiastes 10:10	'im qeihah habarzel vehu lo fanim qilqal vakhayalim yegaber veyitron hakhsher khakhmah ecclesiastes 10:11	'im yishokh hanakhash belo lakhash ve'en yitron leba'al halashon. ecclesiastes 10:12	dibrei fi khakham khen vesiftot kesil tebale'enu. ecclesiastes 10:13	tekhilat dibrei fihu sikhlut ve'akharit pihu holeilut ra'ah. ecclesiastes 10:14	vehasakhal yarbeh debarim lo yeida' ha'adam mah sheyihyeh va'asher yihyeh mei'akharav mi yagid lo. ecclesiastes 10:15	'amal hakesilim teyage'enu 'asher lo yada' lalekhet 'el 'ir. ecclesiastes 10:16	'i lakh 'erez shemalkekh na'ar vesarayikh baboqer yokheilu. ecclesiastes 10:17	'ashrekh 'erez shemalkekh ben khorim vesarayikh ba'et yokheilu bigburah velo basheti. ecclesiastes 10:18	ba'azaltayim yimakh hameqareh ubeshiflut yadayim yidlof habayit. ecclesiastes 10:19	liskhoq 'osim lekhem veyayin yesamakh khayim vehakesef ya'aneh 'et hakol. ecclesiastes 10:20	gam bemada'akha melekh 'al teqalel ubekhadrei mishkabekha 'al teqalel 'ashir ki 'of hashamayim yolikh 'et haqol uba'al hakenafayim kenafayim yaged dabar. ecclesiastes 11:1	shalakh lakhmekha 'al penei hamayim ki berob hayamim timza'enu. ecclesiastes 11:2	ten kheileq leshib'ah vegam lishmonah ki lo teida' mah yihyeh ra'ah 'al ha'arez. ecclesiastes 11:3	'im yimale'u he'abim geshem 'al ha'arez yariqu ve'im yipol 'ez badarom ve'im bazafon meqom sheyipol ha'ez sham yehu. ecclesiastes 11:4	shomer ruakh lo yizra' vero'eh be'abim lo yiqzor. ecclesiastes 11:5	ka'asher 'einekha yodeia' mah derekh haruakh ka'azamim bebeten hamelei'ah kakhah lo teida' 'et ma'aseh ha'elohim 'asher ya'aseh 'et hakol. ecclesiastes 11:6	baboqer zera' 'et zar'ekha vela'ereb 'al tanakh yadekha ki 'einekha yodei' 'ei zeh yikhshar hazeh 'o zeh ve'im sheneihem ke'ekhad tobim. ecclesiastes 11:7	umatoq ha'or vetob la'einayim lir'ot 'et hashamesh. ecclesiastes 11:8	ki 'im shanim harbeh yikhyeh ha'adam bekhulam yismakh veyizkor 'et yemei hakhoshekh ki harbeh yihyu kal sheba habel. ecclesiastes 11:9	semakh bakhur beyaldutekha vitibekha libekha bimei bekhurotekha vehalekh bedarkhei libekha ubemar'ei 'einekha veda' ki 'al kal 'eleh yebi'akha ha'elohim bamishpat. ecclesiastes 11:10	vehaser ka'as milibekha veha'aber ra'ah mibesarekha ki hayaldut vehashakharut habel. ecclesiastes 12:1	uzekhor 'et bor'ekha bimei bekhurotekha 'ad 'asher lo yabo'u yemei hara'ah vehigi'u shanim 'asher tomar 'en li bahem kheifez. ecclesiastes 12:2	'ad 'asher lo tekhshakh hashemesh veha'or vehayareiakh vehakokhabim veshabu he'abim 'akhar hagashem. ecclesiastes 12:3	bayom sheyazu'u shomerei habayit vehit'avetu 'anshei hekhayil ubatelu hatokhanot ki mi'eitu vekhashekhu haro'ot ba'arubot. ecclesiastes 12:4	vesugeru delatayim bashuq bishfal qol hatakhanah veyaqum leqol hazipor veyishakhu kal benot hashir. ecclesiastes 12:5	gam migaboah yira'u vekhatkhatim baderekh veyanez hashaqed veyistabel hekhagab vetafer ha'abiyonah ki holekh ha'adam 'el bet 'olamo vesabebu bashuq hasofedim. ecclesiastes 12:6	'ad 'asher lo yirkhaq yeirateq khebel hakesef vetaruz gulat hazahab vetishaber kad 'al hamabua' venaroz hagalgal 'el habor. ecclesiastes 12:7	veyashob he'afar 'al ha'arez keshehayah veharuakh tashub 'el ha'elohim 'asher netanah. ecclesiastes 12:8	habel habalim 'amar haqohelet hakol habel. ecclesiastes 12:9	veyoter shehayah qohelet khakham 'od limad da'at 'et ha'am ve'izen vekhiqer tiqen meshalim harbeh. ecclesiastes 12:10	biqesh qohelet limzo dibrei kheifez vekhatub yosher dibrei 'emet. ecclesiastes 12:11	dibrei khakhamim kadarebonot ukhemasmerot netu'im ba'alei 'asupot nitenu meiro'eh 'ekhad. ecclesiastes 12:12	veyoter meihemah beni hizaher 'asot sefarim harbeh 'en qez velahag harbeh yegi'at basar. ecclesiastes 12:13	sof dabar hakol nishma' 'et ha'elohim yera ve'et mizvotav shemor ki zeh kal ha'adam. ecclesiastes 12:14	ki 'et kal ma'aseh ha'elohim yabi bemishpat 'al kal ne'lam 'im tob ve'im ra'. 

esther 1:1	vayhi bimei 'akhashveirosh hu 'akhashveirosh hamolekh meihodu ve'ad kush sheba' ve'esrim umei'ah medinah. esther 1:2	bayamim hahem keshebet hamelekh 'akhashveirosh 'al kisei malkhuto 'asher beshushan habirah. esther 1:3	bishnat shalosh lemalekho 'asah mishteh lekhal sarav va'abadav khel paras umadai hapartemim vesarei hamedinot lefanav. esther 1:4	behar'oto 'et 'osher kebod malkhuto ve'et yeqar tif'eret gedulato yamim rabim shemonim ume'at yom. esther 1:5	ubimlot hayamim ha'eleh 'asah hamelekh lekhal ha'am hanimze'im beshushan habirah lemigadol ve'ad qatan mishteh shib'at yamim bakhazar ginat bitan hamelekh. esther 1:6	khur karpas utekheilet 'akhuz bekhablei buz ve'argaman 'al gelilei khesef ve'amudei shesh mitot zahab vakhesef 'al rizfat bahat vashesh vedar vesokharet. esther 1:7	vehashqot bikhlei zahab vekheilim mikeilim shonim veyen malkhut rab keyad hamelekh. esther 1:8	vehashetiyah khadat 'en 'ones ki khen yisad hamelekh 'al kal rab beito la'asot kirzon 'ish va'ish. esther 1:9	gam vashti hamalkah 'asetah mishteh nashim bet hamalkhut 'asher lamelekh 'akhashveirosh. esther 1:10	bayom hashebi'i ketob leb hamelekh bayayin 'amar limhuman bizeta kharbona bigta va'abagta zeitar vekharkas shib'at hasarisim hamsharetim 'et penei hamelekh 'akhashveirosh. esther 1:11	lehabi 'et vashti hamalkah lifnei hamelekh bekheter malkhut lehar'ot ha'amim vehasarim 'et yafeyah ki tobat mar'eh hi. esther 1:12	vatema'en hamalkah vashti labo bidbar hamelekh 'asher beyad hasarisim vayiqzof hamelekh me'od vakhamato ba'arah bo. esther 1:13	vayomer hamelekh lakhakhamim yode'ei ha'itim ki khen debar hamelekh lifnei kal yode'ei dat vadin. esther 1:14	vehaqarob 'eilav karshena sheitar 'admata tarshish meres marsena memukhan shib'at sarei paras umadai ro'ei penei hamelekh hayoshebim rishonah bamalkhut. esther 1:15	kedat mah la'asot bamalkah vashti 'al 'asher lo 'asetah 'et ma'amar hamelekh 'akhashveirosh beyad hasarisim. esther 1:16	vayomer mumekhan memukhan lifnei hamelekh vehasarim lo 'al hamelekh lebado 'avetah vashti hamalkah ki 'al kal hasarim ve'al kal ha'amim 'asher bekhal medinot hamelekh 'akhashveirosh. esther 1:17	ki yeizei debar hamalkah 'al kal hanashim lehabzot ba'leihen be'eineihen be'ameram hamelekh 'akhashveirosh 'amar lehabi 'et vashti hamalkah lefanav velo ba'ah. esther 1:18	vehayom hazeh tomarnah sarot paras umadai 'asher shame'u 'et debar hamalkah lekhol sarei hamelekh ukhedai bizayon vaqazef. esther 1:19	'im 'al hamelekh tob yeizei debar malkhut milefanav veyikateb bedatei faras umadai velo ya'abor 'asher lo tabo vashti lifnei hamelekh 'akhashveirosh umalkhutah yiten hamelekh lir'utah hatobah mimenah. esther 1:20	venishma' pitgam hamelekh 'asher ya'aseh bekhal malkhuto ki rabah hi vekhal hanashim yitenu yeqar leba'leihen lemigadol ve'ad qatan. esther 1:21	vayitab hadabar be'einei hamelekh vehasarim vaya'as hamelekh kidbar memukhan. esther 1:22	vayishlakh sefarim 'el kal medinot hamelekh 'el medinah umedinah kikhtabah ve'el 'am va'am kilshono lihyot kal 'ish sorer bebeito umedaber kilshon 'amo. esther 2:1	'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh keshokh khamat hamelekh 'akhashveirosh zakhar 'et vashti ve'et 'asher 'asatah ve'et 'asher nigzar 'aleha. esther 2:2	vayomeru na'arei hamelekh mesharetav yebaqshu lamelekh ne'arot betulot tobot mar'eh. esther 2:3	veyafqed hamelekh peqidim bekhal medinot malkhuto veyiqbezu 'et kal na'arah betulah tobat mar'eh 'el shushan habirah 'el bet hanashim 'el yad heige seris hamelekh shomer hanashim venaton tamruqeihen. esther 2:4	vehana'arah 'asher titab be'einei hamelekh timlokh takhat vashti vayitab hadabar be'einei hamelekh vaya'as ken. esther 2:5	'ish yehudi hayah beshushan habirah ushemo maredokhai ben ya'ir ben shim'i ben qish 'ish yemini. esther 2:6	'asher hagelah mirushalayim 'im hagolah 'asher hageletah 'im yekhaneyah melekh yehudah 'asher heglah nebukhadnezar melekh babel. esther 2:7	vayhi 'omen 'et hadasah hi 'ester bat dodo ki 'en lah 'ab va'em vehana'arah yefat to'ar vetobat mar'eh ubemot 'abiha ve'imah leqakhah maredokhai lo lebat. esther 2:8	vayhi behishama' debar hamelekh vedato ubehiqabez ne'arot rabot 'el shushan habirah 'el yad heigai vatilaqakh 'ester 'el bet hamelekh 'el yad heigai shomer hanashim. esther 2:9	vatitab hana'arah be'einav vatisa khesed lefanav vaybahel 'et tamruqeha ve'et manoteha latet lah ve'et sheba' hane'arot hare'uyot latet lah mibet hamelekh vayshaneha ve'et na'aroteha letob bet hanashim. esther 2:10	lo higidah 'ester 'et 'amah ve'et moladtah ki maredokhai zivah 'aleha 'asher lo tagid. esther 2:11	ubekhal yom vayom maredokhai mithalekh lifnei khazar bet hanashim lada'at 'et shelom 'ester umah yei'aseh bah. esther 2:12	ubehagia' tor na'arah vena'arah labo 'el hamelekh 'akhashveirosh miqez heyot lah kedat hanashim shenem 'asar khodesh ki ken yimle'u yemei meruqeihen shishah khodashim beshemen hamor veshishah khodashim babesamim ubetamruqei hanashim. esther 2:13	ubazeh hana'arah ba'ah 'el hamelekh 'et kal 'asher tomar yinaten lah labo 'imah mibet hanashim 'ad bet hamelekh. esther 2:14	ba'ereb hi ba'ah ubaboqer hi shabah 'el bet hanashim sheini 'el yad sha'ashgaz seris hamelekh shomer hapilagshim lo tabo 'od 'el hamelekh ki 'im khafez bah hamelekh veniqre'ah beshem. esther 2:15	ubehagia' tor 'ester bat 'abikhayil dod maredokhai 'asher laqakh lo lebat labo 'el hamelekh lo biqshah dabar ki 'im 'et 'asher yomar heigai seris hamelekh shomer hanashim vatehi 'ester noset khen be'einei kal ro'eha. esther 2:16	vatilaqakh 'ester 'el hamelekh 'akhashveirosh 'el bet malkhuto bakhodesh ha'asiri hu khodesh teibet bishnat sheba' lemalkhuto. esther 2:17	vaye'ehab hamelekh 'et 'ester mikal hanashim vatisa khen vakhesed lefanav mikal habetulot vayasem keter malkhut beroshah vayamlikheha takhat vashti. esther 2:18	vaya'as hamelekh mishteh gadol lekhal sarav va'abadav 'et mishteh 'ester vahanakhah lamedinot 'asah vayiten mas'et keyad hamelekh. esther 2:19	ubehiqabez betulot sheinit umaredokhai yosheb besha'ar hamelekh. esther 2:20	'en 'ester magedet moladtah ve'et 'amah ka'asher zivah 'aleha maredokhai ve'et ma'amar maredokhai 'ester 'osah ka'asher hayetah be'amenah 'ito. esther 2:21	bayamim hahem umaredokhai yosheb besha'ar hamelekh qazaf bigtan vateresh shenei sarisei hamelekh mishomerei hasaf vaybaqshu lishloakh yad bamelekh 'akhashveirosh. esther 2:22	vayivada' hadabar lemaredokhai vayaged le'ester hamalkah vatomer 'ester lamelekh beshem maredokhai. esther 2:23	vaybuqash hadabar vayimazei vayitalu sheneihem 'al 'ez vayikateb beseifer dibrei hayamim lifnei hamelekh. esther 3:1	'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh gidal hamelekh 'akhashveirosh 'et haman ben hamedata ha'agagi vaynase'eihu vayasem 'et kis'o mei'al kal hasarim 'asher 'ito. esther 3:2	vekhal 'abdei hamelekh 'asher besha'ar hamelekh kore'im umishtakhavim lehaman ki khen zivah lo hamelekh umaredokhai lo yikhra' velo yishtakhaveh. esther 3:3	vayomeru 'abdei hamelekh 'asher besha'ar hamelekh lemaredokhai madua' 'atah 'ober 'et mizvat hamelekh. esther 3:4	vayhi be'ameram ke'ameram 'eilav yom vayom velo shama' 'aleihem vayagidu lehaman lir'ot haya'amdu dibrei maredokhai ki higid lahem 'asher hu yehudi. esther 3:5	vayar haman ki 'en maredokhai koreia' umishtakhaveh lo vayimalei haman kheimah. esther 3:6	vayibez be'einav lishlokh yad bemaredokhai lebado ki higidu lo 'et 'am maredokhai vaybaqesh haman lehashmid 'et kal hayehudim 'asher bekhal malkhut 'akhashveirosh 'am maredokhai. esther 3:7	bakhodesh harishon hu khodesh nisan bishnat shetem 'esreh lamelekh 'akhashveirosh hipil pur hu hagoral lifnei haman miyom leyom umeikhodesh lekhodesh shenem 'asar hu khodesh 'adar. esther 3:8	vayomer haman lamelekh 'akhashveirosh yeshno 'am 'ekhad mefuzar umeforad ben ha'amim bekhol medinot malkhutekha vedateihem shonot mikal 'am ve'et datei hamelekh 'einam 'osim velamelekh 'en shoeh lehanikham. esther 3:9	'im 'al hamelekh tob yikateb le'abedam va'aseret 'alafim kikar kesef 'eshqol 'al yedei 'osei hamelakhah lehabi 'el ginzei hamelekh. esther 3:10	vayasar hamelekh 'et taba'to mei'al yado vayitenah lehaman ben hamedata ha'agagi zorer hayehudim. esther 3:11	vayomer hamelekh lehaman hakesef natun lakh veha'am la'asot bo katob be'einekha. esther 3:12	vayiqare'u soferei hamelekh bakhodesh harishon bishloshah 'asar yom bo vayikateb kekhal 'asher zivah haman 'el 'akhashdarpenei hamelekh ve'el hapakhot 'asher 'al medinah umedinah ve'el sarei 'am va'am medinah umedinah kikhtabah ve'am va'am kilshono beshem hamelekh 'akhashveirosh nikhtab venekhtam betaba'at hamelekh. esther 3:13	venishloakh sefarim beyad harazim 'el kal medinot hamelekh lehashmid laharog ule'abed 'et kal hayehudim mina'ar ve'ad zaqen taf venashim beyom 'ekhad bishloshah 'asar lekhodesh shenem 'asar hu khodesh 'adar ushelalam laboz. esther 3:14	patshegen haketab lehinaten dat bekhal medinah umedinah galui lekhal ha'amim lihyot 'atidim layom hazeh. esther 3:15	harazim yaze'u dekhufim bidbar hamelekh vehadat nitenah beshushan habirah vehamelekh vehaman yashebu lishtot veha'ir shushan nabokhah. esther 4:1	umaredokhai yada' 'et kal 'asher na'asah vayiqra' maredokhai 'et begadav vayilbash saq va'eifer vayeizei betokh ha'ir vayiz'aq ze'aqah gedolah umarah. esther 4:2	vayabo 'ad lifnei sha'ar hamelekh ki 'en labo 'el sha'ar hamelekh bilbush saq. esther 4:3	ubekhal medinah umedinah meqom 'asher debar hamelekh vedato magia' 'eibel gadol layehudim vezom ubekhi umisped saq va'eifer yuza' larabim. esther 4:4	vatebo'enah na'arot 'ester vesariseha vayagidu lah vatitkhalkhal hamalkah me'od vatishlakh begadim lehalbish 'et maredokhai ulehasir saqo mei'alav velo qibel. esther 4:5	vatiqra 'ester lahatakh misarisei hamelekh 'asher he'emid lefaneha vatezaveihu 'al maredokhai lada'at mah zeh ve'al mah zeh. esther 4:6	vayeizei hatakh 'el maredokhai 'el rekhob ha'ir 'asher lifnei sha'ar hamelekh. esther 4:7	vayaged lo maredokhai 'et kal 'asher qarahu ve'et parashat hakesef 'asher 'amar haman lishqol 'al ginzei hamelekh bayehudiyim bayehudim le'abedam. esther 4:8	ve'et patshegen ketab hadat 'asher nitan beshushan lehashmidam natan lo lehar'ot 'et 'ester ulehagid lah ulezavot 'aleha labo 'el hamelekh lehitkhanen lo ulebaqesh milefanav 'al 'amah. esther 4:9	vayabo hatakh vayaged le'ester 'et dibrei maredokhai. esther 4:10	vatomer 'ester lahatakh vatezaveihu 'el maredokhai. esther 4:11	kal 'abdei hamelekh ve'am medinot hamelekh yod'im 'asher kal 'ish ve'ishah 'asher yabo 'el hamelekh 'el hekhazer hapenimit 'asher lo yiqarei 'akhat dato lehamit lebad mei'asher yoshit lo hamelekh 'et sharbit hazahab vekhayah va'ani lo niqreiti labo 'el hamelekh zeh sheloshim yom. esther 4:12	vayagidu lemaredokhai 'et dibrei 'ester. esther 4:13	vayomer maredokhai lehashib 'el 'ester 'al tedami benafshekh lehimalet bet hamelekh mikal hayehudim. esther 4:14	ki 'im hakharesh takharishi ba'et hazot revakh vehazalah ya'amod layehudim mimaqom 'akher ve'at ubet 'abikh tobeidu umi yodeia' 'im le'et kazot higa'at lamalkhut. esther 4:15	vatomer 'ester lehashib 'el maredokhai. esther 4:16	lekh kenos 'et kal hayehudim hanimze'im beshushan vezumu 'alai ve'al tokhelu ve'al tishtu sheloshet yamim laylah vayom gam 'ani vena'arotai 'azum ken ubekhen 'abo 'el hamelekh 'asher lo khadat vekha'asher 'abadti 'abadeti. esther 4:17	vaya'abor maredokhai vaya'as kekhol 'asher zivetah 'alav 'ester. esther 5:1	vayhi bayom hashelishi vatilbash 'ester malkhut vata'amod bakhazar bet hamelekh hapenimit nokhakh bet hamelekh vehamelekh yosheb 'al kisei malkhuto bebet hamalkhut nokhakh petakh habayit. esther 5:2	vayhi khir'ot hamelekh 'et 'ester hamalkah 'omedet bekhazer nase'ah khen be'einav vayoshet hamelekh le'ester 'et sharbit hazahab 'asher beyado vatiqrab 'ester vatiga' berosh hasharbit. esther 5:3	vayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh 'ester hamalkah umah baqashatekh 'ad khazi hamalkhut veyinaten lakh. esther 5:4	vatomer 'ester 'im 'al hamelekh tob yabo hamelekh vehaman hayom 'el hamishteh 'asher 'asiti lo. esther 5:5	vayomer hamelekh maharu 'et haman la'asot 'et debar 'ester vayabo hamelekh vehaman 'el hamishteh 'asher 'asetah 'ester. esther 5:6	vayomer hamelekh le'ester bemishteh hayayin mah she'eilatekh veyinaten lakh umah baqashatekh 'ad khazi hamalkhut vetei'as. esther 5:7	vata'an 'ester vatomar she'eilati ubaqashati. esther 5:8	'im mazati khen be'einei hamelekh ve'im 'al hamelekh tob latet 'et she'eilati vela'asot 'et baqashati yabo hamelekh vehaman 'el hamishteh 'asher 'e'eseh lahem umakhar 'e'eseh kidbar hamelekh. esther 5:9	vayeizei haman bayom hahu sameiakh vetob leb vekhir'ot haman 'et maredokhai besha'ar hamelekh velo qam velo za' mimenu vayimalei haman 'al maredokhai kheimah. esther 5:10	vayit'apaq haman vayabo 'el beito vayishlakh vayabei 'et 'ohabav ve'et zeresh 'ishto. esther 5:11	vaysaper lahem haman 'et kebod 'ashero verob banav ve'et kal 'asher gidelo hamelekh ve'et 'asher nise'o 'al hasarim ve'abdei hamelekh. esther 5:12	vayomer haman 'af lo heibi'ah 'ester hamalkah 'im hamelekh 'el hamishteh 'asher 'asatah ki 'im 'oti vegam lemakhar 'ani qaru lah 'im hamelekh. esther 5:13	vekhal zeh 'einenu shoeh li bekhal 'et 'asher 'ani ro'eh 'et maredokhai hayehudi yosheb besha'ar hamelekh. esther 5:14	vatomer lo zeresh 'ishto vekhal 'ohabav ya'asu 'ez gaboah khamishim 'amah ubaboqer 'emor lamelekh veyitlu 'et maredokhai 'alav ubo 'im hamelekh 'el hamishteh sameiakh vayitab hadabar lifnei haman vaya'as ha'ez. esther 6:1	balaylah hahu nadedah shenat hamelekh vayomer lehabi 'et seifer hazikhronot dibrei hayamim vayihyu niqra'im lifnei hamelekh. esther 6:2	vayimazei khatub 'asher higid maredokhai 'al bigtana vateresh shenei sarisei hamelekh mishomerei hasaf 'asher biqshu lishloakh yad bamelekh 'akhashveirosh. esther 6:3	vayomer hamelekh mah na'asah yeqar ugedulah lemaredokhai 'al zeh vayomeru na'arei hamelekh mesharetav lo na'asah 'imo dabar. esther 6:4	vayomer hamelekh mi bekhazer vehaman ba lakhazar bet hamelekh hakhizonah leimor lamelekh litlot 'et maredokhai 'al ha'ez 'asher heikhin lo. esther 6:5	vayomeru na'arei hamelekh 'eilav hineh haman 'omed bekhazer vayomer hamelekh yabo. esther 6:6	vayabo haman vayomer lo hamelekh mah la'asot ba'ish 'asher hamelekh khafez biqaro vayomer haman belibo lemi yakhpoz hamelekh la'asot yeqar yoter mimeni. esther 6:7	vayomer haman 'el hamelekh 'ish 'asher hamelekh khafez biqaro. esther 6:8	yabi'u lebush malkhut 'asher labash bo hamelekh vesus 'asher rakhab 'alav hamelekh va'asher nitan keter malkhut berosho. esther 6:9	venaton halebush vehasus 'al yad 'ish misarei hamelekh hapartemim vehilbishu 'et ha'ish 'asher hamelekh khafez biqaro vehirkibuhu 'al hasus birkhob ha'ir veqare'u lefanav kakhah yei'aseh la'ish 'asher hamelekh khafez biqaro. esther 6:10	vayomer hamelekh lehaman maher qakh 'et halebush ve'et hasus ka'asher dibarta va'aseh khen lemaredokhai hayehudi hayosheb besha'ar hamelekh 'al tapel dabar mikol 'asher dibarta. esther 6:11	vayiqakh haman 'et halebush ve'et hasus vayalbesh 'et maredokhai vayarkibeihu birkhob ha'ir vayiqra lefanav kakhah yei'aseh la'ish 'asher hamelekh khafez biqaro. esther 6:12	vayashab maredokhai 'el sha'ar hamelekh vehaman nidkhaf 'el beito 'abel vakhafui rosh. esther 6:13	vaysaper haman lezeresh 'ishto ulekhal 'ohabav 'et kal 'asher qarahu vayomeru lo khakhamav vezeresh 'ishto 'im mizera' hayehudim maredokhai 'asher hakhilota linpol lefanav lo tukhal lo ki nafol tipol lefanav. esther 6:14	'odam medaberim 'imo vesarisei hamelekh higi'u vayabhilu lehabi 'et haman 'el hamishteh 'asher 'asetah 'ester. esther 7:1	vayabo hamelekh vehaman lishtot 'im 'ester hamalkah. esther 7:2	vayomer hamelekh le'ester gam bayom hasheini bemishteh hayayin mah she'eilatekh 'ester hamalkah vetinaten lakh umah baqashatekh 'ad khazi hamalkhut vetei'as. esther 7:3	vata'an 'ester hamalkah vatomar 'im mazati khen be'einekha hamelekh ve'im 'al hamelekh tob tinaten li nafshi bish'eilati ve'ami bebaqashati. esther 7:4	ki nimkarnu 'ani ve'ami lehashmid laharog ule'abed ve'ilu la'abadim velishfakhot nimkarnu hekherashti ki 'en hazar shoeh beneizeq hamelekh. esther 7:5	vayomer hamelekh 'akhashveirosh vayomer le'ester hamalkah mi hu zeh ve'ei zeh hu 'asher mela'o libo la'asot ken. esther 7:6	vatomer 'ester 'ish zar ve'oyeb haman hara' hazeh vehaman nib'at milifnei hamelekh vehamalkah. esther 7:7	vehamelekh qam bakhamato mimishteh hayayin 'el ginat habitan vehaman 'amad lebaqesh 'al nafsho mei'ester hamalkah ki ra'ah ki khaletah 'eilav hara'ah mei'et hamelekh. esther 7:8	vehamelekh shab miginat habitan 'el bet mishteh hayayin vehaman nofel 'al hamitah 'asher 'ester 'aleha vayomer hamelekh hagam likhbosh 'et hamalkah 'imi babayit hadabar yaza mipi hamelekh ufenei haman khafu. esther 7:9	vayomer kharbonah 'ekhad min hasarisim lifnei hamelekh gam hineh ha'ez 'asher 'asah haman lemaredokhai 'asher diber tob 'al hamelekh 'omed bebet haman gaboah khamishim 'amah vayomer hamelekh teluhu 'alav. esther 7:10	vayitlu 'et haman 'al ha'ez 'asher heikhin lemaredokhai vakhamat hamelekh shakhakhah. esther 8:1	bayom hahu natan hamelekh 'akhashveirosh le'ester hamalkah 'et bet haman zorer hayehudiyim hayehudim umaredokhai ba lifnei hamelekh ki higidah 'ester mah hu lah. esther 8:2	vayasar hamelekh 'et taba'to 'asher he'ebir meihaman vayitenah lemaredokhai vatasem 'ester 'et maredokhai 'al bet haman. esther 8:3	vatosef 'ester vatedaber lifnei hamelekh vatipol lifnei raglav vateibek vatitkhanen lo leha'abir 'et ra'at haman ha'agagi ve'et makhashabto 'asher khashab 'al hayehudim. esther 8:4	vayoshet hamelekh le'ester 'et sharbit hazahab vataqam 'ester vata'amod lifnei hamelekh. esther 8:5	vatomer 'im 'al hamelekh tob ve'im mazati khen lefanav vekhasher hadabar lifnei hamelekh vetobah 'ani be'einav yikateb lehashib 'et hasefarim makhashebet haman ben hamedata ha'agagi 'asher katab le'abed 'et hayehudim 'asher bekhal medinot hamelekh. esther 8:6	ki 'eikhakhah 'ukhal vera'iti bara'ah 'asher yimza 'et 'ami ve'eikhakhah 'ukhal vera'iti be'abedan moladti. esther 8:7	vayomer hamelekh 'akhashveirosh le'ester hamalkah ulemaredokhai hayehudi hineh bet haman natati le'ester ve'oto talu 'al ha'ez 'al 'asher shalakh yado bayehudiyim bayehudim. esther 8:8	ve'atem kitbu 'al hayehudim katob be'eineikhem beshem hamelekh vekhitmu betaba'at hamelekh ki khetab 'asher nikhtab beshem hamelekh venakhtom betaba'at hamelekh 'en lehashib. esther 8:9	vayiqare'u soferei hamelekh ba'et hahi bakhodesh hashelishi hu khodesh sivan bishloshah ve'esrim bo vayikateb kekhal 'asher zivah maredokhai 'el hayehudim ve'el ha'akhashdarpenim vehapakhot vesarei hamedinot 'asher meihodu ve'ad kush sheba' ve'esrim umei'ah medinah medinah umedinah kikhtabah ve'am va'am kilshono ve'el hayehudim kikhtabam vekhilshonam. esther 8:10	vayikhtob beshem hamelekh 'akhashveirosh vayakhtom betaba'at hamelekh vayishlakh sefarim beyad harazim basusim rokhebei harekhesh ha'akhashteranim benei haramakhim. esther 8:11	'asher natan hamelekh layehudim 'asher bekhal 'ir va'ir lehiqahel vela'amod 'al nafsham lehashmid velaharog ule'abed 'et kal khel 'am umedinah hazarim 'otam taf venashim ushelalam laboz. esther 8:12	beyom 'ekhad bekhal medinot hamelekh 'akhashveirosh bishloshah 'asar lekhodesh shenem 'asar hu khodesh 'adar. esther 8:13	patshegen haketab lehinaten dat bekhal medinah umedinah galui lekhal ha'amim velihyot hayehudiyim hayehudim 'atudim 'atidim layom hazeh lehinaqem mei'oyebeihem. esther 8:14	harazim rokhebei harekhesh ha'akhashteranim yaze'u mebohalim udekhufim bidbar hamelekh vehadat nitenah beshushan habirah. esther 8:15	umaredokhai yaza milifnei hamelekh bilbush malkhut tekheilet vakhur va'ateret zahab gedolah vetakhrikh buz ve'argaman veha'ir shushan zahalah vesameikhah. esther 8:16	layehudim hayetah 'orah vesimkhah vesason viqar. esther 8:17	ubekhal medinah umedinah ubekhal 'ir va'ir meqom 'asher debar hamelekh vedato magia' simkhah vesason layehudim mishteh veyom tob verabim mei'amei ha'arez mityahadim ki nafal pakhad hayehudim 'aleihem. esther 9:1	ubishnem 'asar khodesh hu khodesh 'adar bishloshah 'asar yom bo 'asher higia' debar hamelekh vedato lehei'asot bayom 'asher siberu 'oyebei hayehudim lishlot bahem venahafokh hu 'asher yishletu hayehudim hemah besone'eihem. esther 9:2	niqhalu hayehudim be'areihem bekhal medinot hamelekh 'okhashveirosh lishloakh yad bimbaqshei ra'atam ve'ish lo 'amad lifneihem ki nafal pakhdam 'al kal ha'amim. esther 9:3	vekhal sarei hamedinot veha'akhashdarpenim vehapakhot ve'osei hamelakhah 'asher lamelekh menase'im 'et hayehudim ki nafal pakhad maredokhai 'aleihem. esther 9:4	ki gadol maredokhai bebet hamelekh veshame'o holekh bekhal hamedinot ki ha'ish maredokhai holekh vegadol. esther 9:5	vayaku hayehudim bekhal 'oyebeihem makat khereb vehereg ve'abdan vaya'asu besone'eihem kirzonam. esther 9:6	ubeshushan habirah haregu hayehudim ve'abed khamesh mei'ot 'ish. esther 9:7	ve'et parshandata ve'et dalfon ve'et 'aspata. esther 9:8	ve'et porata ve'et 'adalya ve'et 'aridata. esther 9:9	ve'et parmashta ve'et 'arisai ve'et 'aridai ve'et vayzata. esther 9:10	'aseret benei haman ben hamedata zorer hayehudim haragu ubabizah lo shalekhu 'et yadam. esther 9:11	bayom hahu ba mispar haharugim beshushan habirah lifnei hamelekh. esther 9:12	vayomer hamelekh le'ester hamalkah beshushan habirah haregu hayehudim ve'abed khamesh mei'ot 'ish ve'et 'aseret benei haman bish'ar medinot hamelekh meh 'asu umah she'eilatekh veyinaten lakh umah baqashatekh 'od vetei'as. esther 9:13	vatomer 'ester 'im 'al hamelekh tob yinaten gam makhar layehudim 'asher beshushan la'asot kedat hayom ve'et 'aseret benei haman yitlu 'al ha'ez. esther 9:14	vayomer hamelekh lehei'asot ken vatinaten dat beshushan ve'et 'aseret benei haman talu. esther 9:15	vayiqahalu hayehudiyim hayehudim 'asher beshushan gam beyom 'arba'ah 'asar lekhodesh 'adar vayahargu beshushan shelosh mei'ot 'ish ubabizah lo shalekhu 'et yadam. esther 9:16	ushe'ar hayehudim 'asher bimdinot hamelekh niqhalu ve'amod 'al nafsham venoakh mei'oyebeihem veharog besone'eihem khamishah veshib'im 'alef ubabizah lo shalekhu 'et yadam. esther 9:17	beyom sheloshah 'asar lekhodesh 'adar venoakh be'arba'ah 'asar bo ve'asoh 'oto yom mishteh vesimkhah. esther 9:18	vehayehudiyim vehayehudim 'asher beshushan niqhalu bishloshah 'asar bo ube'arba'ah 'asar bo venoakh bakhamishah 'asar bo ve'asoh 'oto yom mishteh vesimkhah. esther 9:19	'al ken hayehudim haperozim haperazim hayoshebim be'arei haperazot 'osim 'et yom 'arba'ah 'asar lekhodesh 'adar simkhah umishteh veyom tob umishloakh manot 'ish lerei'eihu. esther 9:20	vayikhtob maredokhai 'et hadebarim ha'eleh vayishlakh sefarim 'el kal hayehudim 'asher bekhal medinot hamelekh 'akhashveirosh haqerobim veharekhoqim. esther 9:21	leqayem 'aleihem lihyot 'osim 'et yom 'arba'ah 'asar lekhodesh 'adar ve'et yom khamishah 'asar bo bekhal shanah veshanah. esther 9:22	kayamim 'asher nakhu bahem hayehudim mei'oybeihem vehakhodesh 'asher nehpakh lahem miyagon lesimkhah umei'eibel leyom tob la'asot 'otam yemei mishteh vesimkhah umishloakh manot 'ish lerei'eihu umatanot la'ebyonim. esther 9:23	veqibel hayehudim 'et 'asher heikhelu la'asot ve'et 'asher katab maredokhai 'aleihem. esther 9:24	ki haman ben hamedata ha'agagi zorer kal hayehudim khashab 'al hayehudim le'abedam vehipil pur hu hagoral lehumam ule'abedam. esther 9:25	ubebo'ah lifnei hamelekh 'amar 'im haseifer yashub makhashabto hara'ah 'asher khashab 'al hayehudim 'al rosho vetalu 'oto ve'et banav 'al ha'ez. esther 9:26	'al ken qare'u layamim ha'eleh furim 'al shem hapur 'al ken 'al kal dibrei ha'igeret hazot umah ra'u 'al kakhah umah higia' 'aleihem. esther 9:27	qiyemu veqibel veqibelu hayehudim 'aleihem ve'al zar'am ve'al kal hanilvim 'aleihem velo ya'abor lihyot 'osim 'et shenei hayamim ha'eleh kikhtabam vekhizmanam bekhal shanah veshanah. esther 9:28	vehayamim ha'eleh nizkarim vena'asim bekhal dor vador mishpakhah umishpakhah medinah umedinah ve'ir va'ir vimei hapurim ha'eleh lo ya'abru mitokh hayehudim vezikhram lo yasuf mizar'am. esther 9:29	vatikhtob 'ester hamalkah bat 'abikhayil umaredokhai hayehudi 'et kal toqef leqayem 'et 'igeret hapurim hazot hasheinit. esther 9:30	vayishlakh sefarim 'el kal hayehudim 'el sheba' ve'esrim umei'ah medinah malkhut 'akhashveirosh dibrei shalom ve'emet. esther 9:31	leqayem 'et yemei hapurim ha'eleh bizmaneihem ka'asher qiyam 'aleihem maredokhai hayehudi ve'ester hamalkah vekha'asher qiyemu 'al nafsham ve'al zar'am dibrei hazomot veza'aqatam. esther 9:32	uma'amar 'ester qiyam dibrei hapurim ha'eleh venikhtab baseifer. esther 10:1	vayasem hamelekh 'akhasheirosh 'akhashveirosh mas 'al ha'arez ve'iyei hayam. esther 10:2	vekhal ma'aseh taqepo ugeburato ufarashat gedulat maredokhai 'asher gidelo hamelekh halo hem ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim lemalkhei madai ufaras. esther 10:3	ki maredokhai hayehudi mishneh lamelekh 'akhashveirosh vegadol layehudim verazui lerob 'ekhav doresh tob le'amo vedober shalom lekhal zar'o. 

daniel 1:1	bishnat shalosh lemalkhut yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ba nebukhadnezar melekh babel yerushalim vayazar 'aleha. daniel 1:2	vayiten 'adonai beyado 'et yehoyaqim melekh yehudah umiqzat kelei bet ha'elohim vaybi'em 'erez shin'ar bet 'elohav ve'et hakeilim heibi bet 'ozar 'elohav. daniel 1:3	vayomer hamelekh le'ashpenaz rab sarisav lehabi mibenei yisra'el umizera' hamelukhah umin hapartemim. daniel 1:4	yeladim 'asher 'en bahem kal me'um mum vetobei mar'eh umaskilim bekhal khakhmah veyode'ei da'at umebinei mada' va'asher koakh bahem la'amod beheikhal hamelekh ulalamedam seifer uleshon kasdim. daniel 1:5	vayman lahem hamelekh debar yom beyomo mipat bag hamelekh umiyen mishtav ulegadelam shanim shalosh umiqzatam ya'amdu lifnei hamelekh. daniel 1:6	vayhi bahem mibenei yehudah daniyel khananyah misha'el va'azaryah. daniel 1:7	vayasem lahem sar hasarisim sheimot vayasem ledaniyel beileteshazar velakhananyah shadrakh ulemisha'el meishakh vela'azaryah 'abed nego. daniel 1:8	vayasem daniyel 'al libo 'asher lo yitga'al befatbag hamelekh ubeyen mishtav vaybaqesh misar hasarisim 'asher lo yitga'al. daniel 1:9	vayiten ha'elohim 'et daniyel lekhesed ulerakhamim lifnei sar hasarisim. daniel 1:10	vayomer sar hasarisim ledaniyel yarei 'ani 'et 'adoni hamelekh 'asher minah 'et ma'akhalkhem ve'et mishteikhem 'asher lamah yir'eh 'et peneikhem zo'afim min hayladim 'asher kegilekhem vekhiyabtem 'et roshi lamelekh. daniel 1:11	vayomer daniyel 'el hamelzar 'asher minah sar hasarisim 'al daniyel khananyah misha'el va'azaryah. daniel 1:12	nas na 'et 'abadekha yamim 'asarah veyitenu lanu min hazeiro'im venokhelah umayim venishteh. daniel 1:13	veyeira'u lefanekha mar'einu umar'eh hayladim ha'okhelim 'et patbag hamelekh vekha'asher tir'eh 'aseh 'im 'abadekha. daniel 1:14	vayishma' lahem ladabar hazeh vaynasem yamim 'asarah. daniel 1:15	umiqzat yamim 'asarah nir'ah mar'eihem tob uberi'ei basar min kal hayladim ha'okhelim 'et patbag hamelekh. daniel 1:16	vayhi hamelzar nosei 'et patbagam veyen mishteihem venoten lahem zeire'onim. daniel 1:17	vehayladim ha'eleh 'arba'tam natan lahem ha'elohim mada' vehaskel bekhal seifer vekhakhemah vedaniyel heibin bekhal khazon vakhalomot. daniel 1:18	ulemiqzat hayamim 'asher 'amar hamelekh lahabi'am vaybi'em sar hasarisim lifnei nebukhadnezar. daniel 1:19	vaydaber 'itam hamelekh velo nimza mikulam kedaniyel khananyah misha'el va'azaryah vaya'amdu lifnei hamelekh. daniel 1:20	vekhol debar khakhemat binah 'asher biqesh meihem hamelekh vayimza'em 'eser yadot 'al kal hakhartumim ha'ashafim 'asher bekhal malkhuto. daniel 1:21	vayhi daniyel 'ad shenat 'akhat lekhoresh hamelekh. daniel 2:1	ubishnat shetayim lemalkhut nebukhadnezar khalam nebukhadnezar khalomot vatitpa'em rukho ushenato nihyetah 'alav. daniel 2:2	vayomer hamelekh liqro lakhartumim vela'ashafim velamkhashefim velakasdim lehagid lamelekh khalomotav vayabo'u vaya'amdu lifnei hamelekh. daniel 2:3	vayomer lahem hamelekh khalom khalameti vatipa'em rukhi lada'at 'et hakhalom. daniel 2:4	vaydaberu hakasdim lamelekh 'aramit malka le'alemin kheyi 'emar khelma le'abdayikh le'abdakh ufishra nekhavei. daniel 2:5	'aneh malka ve'amar lekhasdayei lekhasda'ei mileta mini 'azda hen la tehod'unani khelma ufishreh hadamin tit'abdun ubateikhon nevali yitesamun. daniel 2:6	vehen khelma ufishreh tehakhavon matenan unebizbah viqar sagi teqabelun min qodamai lahen khelma ufishreh hakhavoni. daniel 2:7	'ano tinyanut ve'amerin malka khelma yeimar le'abdohi ufishrah nehakhaveh. daniel 2:8	'aneh malka ve'amar min yazib yada' 'anah di 'idana 'antun zabenin kal qobel di khazeiton di 'azda mini mileta. daniel 2:9	di hen khelma la tehod'unani khadah hi datekhon umilah khidbah ushekhitah hazmintun hizdemintun lemeimar qadamai 'ad di 'idana yishtanei lahen khelma 'emaru li ve'inda' di fishreh tehakhavunani. daniel 2:10	'ano khasdayei khasda'ei qodam malka ve'amerin la 'itai 'anash 'al yabeshta di milat malka yukhal lehakhavayah kal qobel di kal melekh rab veshalit milah khidnah la she'el lekhal khartom ve'ashaf vekhasdai. daniel 2:11	umileta di malkah sha'el yaqirah ve'akhoran la 'itai di yekhavinah qodam malka lahen 'elahin di medarehon 'im bisra la 'itohi. daniel 2:12	kal qobel denah malka benas uqezaf sagi va'amar lehobadah lekhol khakimei babel. daniel 2:13	vedata nefqat vekhakimaya mitqatelin ube'o daniyel vekhabrohi lehitqetalah. daniel 2:14	beidayin daniyel hatib 'eita ute'em le'aryokh rab tabakhaya di malka di nefaq leqatalah lekhakimei babel. daniel 2:15	'aneh ve'amar le'aryokh shalita di malka 'al mah data mehakhzefah min qodam malka 'edayin mileta hoda' 'aryokh ledaniyel. daniel 2:16	vedaniyel 'al ube'ah min malka di zeman yinten leh ufishra lehakhavayah lemalka. daniel 2:17	'edayin daniyel lebayteh 'azal velakhananyah misha'el va'azaryah khabrohi mileta hoda'. daniel 2:18	verakhamin lemib'ei min qodam 'elah shemaya 'al razah denah di la yehobedun daniyel vekhabrohi 'im she'ar khakimei babel. daniel 2:19	'edayin ledaniyel bekhezva di leileya razah gali 'edayin daniyel barikh le'elah shemaya. daniel 2:20	'aneh daniyel ve'amar lehevei shemeh di 'elaha mebarakh min 'alema ve'ad 'alema di khakhemeta ugebureta di leh hi. daniel 2:21	vehu mehashnei 'idanaya vezimnaya meha'deh malkhin umehaqem malkhin yaheb khakhemeta lekhakimin umande'a leyade'ei binah. daniel 2:22	hu galei 'amiqata umesaterata yada' mah bakhashokha unehira unehora 'imeh sherei. daniel 2:23	lakh 'elah 'abahati mehodei umeshabakh 'anah di khakhemeta ugebureta yehabt li ukhe'an hoda'tani di be'eina minakh di milat malka hoda'tena. daniel 2:24	kal qobel denah daniyel 'al 'al 'aryokh di mani malka lehobadah lekhakimei babel 'azal vekhen 'amar leh lekhakimei babel 'al tehobed ha'eileni qodam malka ufishra lemalka 'akhavei. daniel 2:25	'edayin 'aryokh behitbehalah han'el ledaniyel qodam malka vekhen 'amar leh di hashkakhat gebar min benei galuta di yehud di fishra lemalka yehoda'. daniel 2:26	'aneh malka ve'amar ledaniyel di shemeh beileteshazar ha'itayikh ha'itakh kahel lehoda'utani khelma di khazet ufishreh. daniel 2:27	'aneh daniyel qodam malka ve'amar razah di malka sha'el la khakimin 'ashefin khartumin gazerin yakhelin lehakhavayah lemalka. daniel 2:28	beram 'itai 'elah bishmaya galei razin vehoda' lemalka nebukhadnezar mah di lehevei be'akharit yomaya khelmakh vekhezvei reishakh 'al mishkebakh denah hu. daniel 2:29	'antah malka ra'yonakh 'al mishkebakh seliqu mah di lehevei 'akharei denah vegalei razaya hod'akh mah di lehevei. daniel 2:30	va'anah la bekhakhemah di 'itai bi min kal khayaya raza denah geli li lahen 'al dibrat di fishra lemalka yehod'un vera'yonei libbakh tinda'. daniel 2:31	'antah malka khazeh havayta va'alu zelem khad sagi zalma diken rab veziveh yatir qa'em leqabelakh vereiveh dekhil. daniel 2:32	hu zalma reisheh di dehab tab khadohi udera'ohi di khesaf me'ohi veyarkhateh di nekhash. daniel 2:33	shaqohi di farzel raglohi minehon minehen di farzel uminehon uminehen di khasaf. daniel 2:34	khazeh havayta 'ad di hitgezeret 'eben di la bidayin umekhat lezalma 'al raglohi di farzela vekhaspa vehadeiqet himon. daniel 2:35	beidayin daqu khakhadah parzela khaspa nekhasha kaspa vedahaba vahavo ke'ur min 'iderei qayit unesa himon rukha vekhal 'atar la hishtakhakh lehon ve'abna di mekhat lezalma havat letur rab umelat kal 'ar'a. daniel 2:36	denah khelma ufishreh neimar qodam malka. daniel 2:37	'antah malka melekh malkhaya di 'elah shemaya malkhuta khisna vetaqepa viqara yehab lakh. daniel 2:38	ubekhal di da'arin dayerin benei 'anasha kheivat bara ve'of shemaya yehab bidakh vehashletakh bekhalehon 'antah hu reishah di dahaba. daniel 2:39	ubaterakh tequm malkhu 'akhori 'ara' minakh umalkhu telitaya telita'ah 'akhori di nekhasha di tishlat bekhal 'ar'a. daniel 2:40	umalkhu rebi'ayah rebi'a'ah tehevei taqifah kefarzela kal qobel di farzela mehadeq vekhashel kola ukhefarzela di mera'a' kal 'ilen tadiq veteiroa'. daniel 2:41	vedi khazaytah raglaya ve'ezbe'ata minehon minehen khasaf di fekhar uminehon uminehen parzel malkhu feligah teheveh umin nizbeta di farzela lehevei bah kal qobel di khazaytah parzela me'arab bakhasaf tina. daniel 2:42	ve'ezbe'at raglaya minehon minehen parzel uminehon uminehen khasaf min qezat malkhuta teheveh taqifah uminah teheveh tebirah. daniel 2:43	di vedi khazayta parzela me'arab bakhasaf tina mit'arebin lehevon bizra' 'anasha vela lehevon dabeqin denah 'im denah hei khedi farzela la mit'arab 'im khaspa. daniel 2:44	ubeyomeihon di malkhaya 'inun yeqim 'elah shemaya malkhu di le'alemin la titkhabal umalkhutah le'am 'akhoran la tishtebiq tadiq vetasef kal 'ilen malkhevata vehi tequm le'alemaya. daniel 2:45	kal qobel di khazayta di mitura 'itgezeret 'eben di la bidayin vehadeqet parzela nekhasha khaspa kaspa vedahaba 'elah rab hoda' lemalka mah di lehevei 'akharei denah veyazib khelma umeheiman pishreh. daniel 2:46	beidayin malka nebukhadnezar nefal 'al 'anpohi uledaniyel segid uminkhah venikhokhin 'amar lenasakhah leh. daniel 2:47	'aneh malka ledaniyel ve'amar min qeshot di 'elahakhon hu 'elah 'elahin umarei malkhin vegaleh razin di yekheileta lemiglei razah denah. daniel 2:48	'edayin malka ledaniyel rabi umatenan rabreban sagi'an yehab leh vehashleteh 'al kal medinat babel verab signin 'al kal khakimei babel. daniel 2:49	vedaniyel be'a min malka umani 'al 'abideta di medinat babel leshadrakh meishakh va'abed nego vedaniyel bitra' malka. daniel 3:1	nebukhadnezar malka 'abad zelem di dehab rumeh 'amin shitin petayeh 'amin shit 'aqimeh bebiq'at dura bimdinat babel. daniel 3:2	unebukhadnezar malka shelakh lemikhnash la'akhashdarpenaya signaya ufakhavata 'adargazeraya gedaberaya detaberaya tiftayei vekhol shiltonei medinata lemeitei lakhanukat zalma di haqem nebukhadnezar malka. daniel
