3:3	beidayin mitkaneshin 'akhashdarpenaya signaya ufakhavata 'adargazeraya gedaberaya detaberaya tiftayei vekhol shiltonei medinata lakhanukat zalma di haqem nebukhadnezar malka veqa'amin veqayemin laqobel zalma di haqem nebukhadnezar. daniel 3:4	vekharoza qarei bekhayil lekhon 'amerin 'amaya 'umaya velishanaya. daniel 3:5	be'idana di tishme'un qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin sumeponeyah vekhol zenei zemara tipelun vetisgedun lezelem dahaba di haqem nebukhadnezar malka. daniel 3:6	uman di la yipel veyisgud bah sha'ata yitremei lego 'atun nura yaqidta. daniel 3:7	kal qobel denah beh zimna kedi shame'in kal 'amaya qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin vekhol zenei zemara nafelin kal 'amaya 'umaya velishanaya sagedin lezelem dahaba di haqem nebukhadnezar malka. daniel 3:8	kal qobel denah beh zimna qeribu gubrin kasda'in va'akhalu qarzeihon di yehudayei. daniel 3:9	'ano ve'amerin linbukhadnezar malka malka le'alemin kheyi. daniel 3:10	'antah 'ant malka sameta te'em di khal 'enash di yishma' qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha fesanteirin vesiponeyah vesuponeyah vekhol zenei zemara yipel veyisgud lezelem dahaba. daniel 3:11	uman di la yipel veyisgud yitremei lego 'atun nura yaqidta. daniel 3:12	'itai gubrin yehudayin di manita yatehon 'al 'abidat medinat babel shadrakh meishakh va'abed nego gubraya 'ilekh la samu 'alayikh 'alakh malka te'em leilahayikh leilahakh la falekhin ulezelem dahaba di haqeimeta la sagedin. daniel 3:13	beidayin nebukhadnezar birgaz vakhamah 'amar lehaytayah leshadrakh meishakh va'abed nego beidayin gubraya 'ilekh heitayu qodam malka. daniel 3:14	'aneh nebukhadnezar ve'amar lehon hazda shadrakh meishakh va'abed nego leilahai la 'iteikhon palekhin ulezelem dahaba di haqeimet la sagedin. daniel 3:15	ke'an hen 'iteikhon 'atidin di be'idana di tishme'un qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin vesumeponeyah vekhol zenei zemara tipelun vetisgedun lezalma di 'abdet vehen la tisgedun bah sha'atah titremon lego 'atun nura yaqidta uman hu 'elah dei yesheizebinkhon min yedai. daniel 3:16	'ano shadrakh meishakh va'abed nego ve'amerin lemalka nebukhadnezar la khashkhin 'anakhnah 'al denah pitgam lahatabutakh. daniel 3:17	hen 'itai 'elahana di 'anakhna falekhin yakhil lesheizabutana min 'atun nura yaqidta umin yedakh malka yesheizib. daniel 3:18	vehen la yedia' lehevei lakh malka di leilahayikh la 'itayna 'itana falekhin ulezelem dahaba di haqeimeta la nisgud. daniel 3:19	beidayin nebukhadnezar hitmeli khema uzelem 'anpohi 'eshtanu 'eshtani 'al shadrakh meishakh va'abed nego 'aneh ve'amar lemeizei le'atuna khad shib'ah 'al di khazeh lemeizeyeh. daniel 3:20	ulegubrin gibarei khayil di bekhayleh 'amar lekhapatah leshadrakh meishakh va'abed nego lemirmei le'atun nura yaqidta. daniel 3:21	beidayin gubraya 'ilekh kefitu besarbaleihon patisheihon patesheihon vekharbelatehon ulebusheihon uremiv lego 'atun nura yaqidta. daniel 3:22	kal qobel denah min di milat malka makhzefah ve'atuna 'eizeh yatira gubraya 'ilekh di hasiqu leshadrakh meishakh va'abed nego qatil himon shebiba di nura. daniel 3:23	vegubraya 'ilekh telateihon shadrakh meishakh va'abed nego nefalu lego 'atun nura yaqidta mekhapetin. daniel 3:24	'edayin nebukhadnezar malka tevah veqam behitbehalah 'aneh ve'amar lehadaberohi hala gubrin telata remeina lego nura mekhapetin 'anayin ve'amerin lemalka yaziba malka. daniel 3:25	'aneh ve'amar ha 'anah khazeh gubrin 'arbe'ah sherayin mahlekhin bego nura vakhabal la 'itai behon vereiveh di rebi'aya rebi'a'ah dameh lebar 'elahin. daniel 3:26	beidayin qereb nebukhadnezar litra' 'atun nura yaqidta 'aneh ve'amar shadrakh meishakh va'abed nego 'abdohi di 'elaha 'ilaya 'ila'ah puqu ve'eto beidayin nafeqin shadrakh meishakh va'abed nego min go nura. daniel 3:27	umitkaneshin 'akhashdarpenaya signaya ufakhavata vehadaberei malka khazayin legubraya 'ilekh di la shelet nura begeshmehon use'ar reishehon la hitkharakh vesarebaleihon la sheno vereiakh nur la 'adat behon. daniel 3:28	'aneh nebukhadnezar ve'amar berikh 'elahahon di shadrakh meishakh va'abed nego di shelakh mal'akheh vesheizib le'abdohi di hitrekhizu 'alohi umilat malka shaniv vihabu geshmeihon geshmehon di la yiflekhun vela yisgedun lekhal 'elah lahen leilahahon. daniel 3:29	umini sim te'em di khal 'am 'umah velishan di yeimar sheilah shalu 'al 'elahahon di shadrakh meishakh va'abed nego hadamin yit'abed ubayteh nevali yishtaveh kal qobel di la 'itai 'elah 'akhoran di yikul lehazalah kidnah. daniel 3:30	beidayin malka hazlakh leshadrakh meishakh va'abed nego bimdinat babel. daniel 4:1	nebukhadnezar malka lekhal 'amaya 'umaya velishanaya di da'arin dayerin bekhal 'ar'a shelamekhon yisgei. daniel 4:2	'ataya vetimhaya di 'abad 'imi 'elaha 'ilaya 'ila'ah shefar qadamai lehakhavayah. daniel 4:3	'atohi kemah rabrebin vetimhohi kemah taqifin malkhuteh malkhut 'alam veshaletaneh 'im dar vedar. daniel 4:4	'anah nebukhadnezar sheleh havet bebeiti vera'nan beheikheli. daniel 4:5	kheilem khazet vidakhalinani veharhorin 'al mishkebi vekhezvei reishi yebahalunani. daniel 4:6	umini sim te'em lehan'alah qadamai lekhol khakimei babel di feshar khelma yehod'unani. daniel 4:7	beidayin 'alalin 'alin khartumaya 'ashefaya kasdayei kasda'ei vegazeraya vekhelma 'amar 'anah qodameihon ufishreh la mehod'in li. daniel 4:8	ve'ad 'akhoren 'al qadamai daniyel di shemeh beileteshazar keshum 'elahi vedi ruakh 'elahin qadishin beh vekhelma qadamohi 'amret. daniel 4:9	beileteshazar rab khartumaya di 'anah yid'et di ruakh 'elahin qadishin bakh vekhal raz la 'anes lakh khezvei khelmi di khazet ufishreh 'emar. daniel 4:10	vekhezvei reishi 'al mishkebi khazeh havet va'alu 'ilan bego 'ar'a verumeh sagi. daniel 4:11	rebah 'ilana uteqif verumeh yimtei lishmaya vakhazoteh lesof kal 'ar'a. daniel 4:12	'afeyeh shapir ve'inbeh sagi umazon lekhola beh tekhotohi tatlel kheivat bara ube'anfohi yedurun yeduran ziparei shemaya umineh yitezin kal bisra. daniel 4:13	khazeh havet bekhezvei reishi 'al mishkebi va'alu 'ir veqadish min shemaya nakhit. daniel 4:14	qarei bekhayil vekhen 'amar godu 'ilana veqazizu 'anfohi 'ataru 'afeyeh ubadaru 'inbeh tenud kheiveta min takhtohi veziperaya min 'anfohi. daniel 4:15	beram 'iqar shareshohi be'ar'a shebuqu ube'esur di farzel unekhash bedit'a di bara ubetal shemaya yiztaba' ve'im kheiveta khalaqeh ba'asab 'ar'a. daniel 4:16	libbeh min 'enosha 'anasha yeshanon ulebab kheivah yityehib leh veshib'ah 'idanin yakhlefun 'alohi. daniel 4:17	bigzeirat 'irin pitgama umeimar qadishin she'eileta 'ad dibrat di yinde'un khayaya di shalit 'ilaya 'ila'ah bemalkhut 'enosha 'anasha uleman di yizbei yiteninah ushefal 'anashim yeqim 'alayah 'alah. daniel 4:18	denah khelma khazet 'anah malka nebukhadnezar ve'antah ve'ant beileteshazar pishrei 'emar kal qobel di kal khakimei malkhuti la yakhelin pishra lehoda'utani ve'antah ve'ant kahel di ruakh 'elahin qadishin bakh. daniel 4:19	'edayin daniyel di shemeh beileteshazar 'eshtomam kesha'ah khadah vera'yonohi yebahaluneh 'aneh malka ve'amar beileteshazar khelma ufishrei 'al yebahalakh 'aneh beileteshazar ve'amar mare'i mari khelma lesane'ayikh lesane'akh ufishreh le'arayikh le'arakh daniel 4:20	'ilana di khazayta di rebah uteqif verumeh yimtei lishmaya vakhazoteh lekhal 'ar'a. daniel 4:21	ve'afeyeh shapir ve'inbeh sagi umazon lekhola beh tekhotohi tedur kheivat bara ube'anfohi yishkenan ziparei shemaya. daniel 4:22	'antah 'ant hu malka di rebayt uteqeifet urebutakh rebat umetat lishmaya veshaletanakh lesof 'ar'a. daniel 4:23	vedi khazah malka 'ir veqadish nakhit min shemaya ve'amar godu 'ilana vekhabeluhi beram 'iqar shareshohi be'ar'a shebuqu ube'esur di farzel unekhash bedit'a di bara ubetal shemaya yiztaba' ve'im kheivat bara khalaqeh 'ad di shib'ah 'idanin yakhlefun 'alohi. daniel 4:24	denah fishra malka ugezeirat 'ilaya 'ila'ah hi di metat 'al mar'i mari malka. daniel 4:25	velakh taredin min 'anasha ve'im kheivat bara leheveh medorakh ve'isba khetorin lakh yeta'amun umital shemaya lakh mezabe'in veshib'ah 'idanin yakhlefun 'alayikh 'ad di tinda' di shalit 'ilaya bemalkhut 'anasha uleman di yizbei yiteninah. daniel 4:26	vedi 'amaru lemishbaq 'iqar shareshohi di 'ilana malkhutakh lakh qayamah min di tinda' di shalitin shemaya. daniel 4:27	lahen malka milki yishpar 'alayikh 'alakh vakhatayakh vakhata'akh bezidqah feruq va'avayatakh bemikhan 'anayin hen tehevei 'arkhah lishleivetakh. daniel 4:28	kola meta 'al nebukhadnezar malka. daniel 4:29	liqzat yarkhin terei 'asar 'al heikhal malkhuta di babel mehalekh havah. daniel 4:30	'aneh malka ve'amar hala da hi babel rabeta di 'anah benaytah lebet malkhu bitqaf khisni veliqar hadri. daniel 4:31	'od mileta befum malka qal min shemaya nefal lakh 'amerin nebukhadnezar malka malkhutah 'adat minakh. daniel 4:32	umin 'anasha lakh taredin ve'im kheivat bara medorakh 'isba khetorin lakh yeta'amun veshib'ah 'idanin yakhlefun 'alayikh 'alakh 'ad di tinda' di shalit 'ilaya bemalkhut 'anasha uleman di yizbei yiteninah. daniel 4:33	bah sha'ata mileta safat 'al nebukhadnezar umin 'anasha terid ve'isba khetorin yeikhul umital shemaya gishmeh yiztaba' 'ad di sa'reh kenishrin rebah vetifrohi kheziperin. daniel 4:34	veliqzat yomayah 'anah nebukhadnezar 'aynai lishmaya nitlet umande'i 'alai yetub ule'ilaya ule'ila'ah barekhet ulekhai 'alema shabekhet vehaderet di shaletaneh shaletan 'alam umalkhuteh 'im dar vedar. daniel 4:35	vekhal da'arei dayerei 'ar'a kelah khashibin ukhemizbeyeh 'abed bekhel shemaya veda'arei vedayerei 'ar'a vela 'itai di yemakhei bideh veyeimar leh mah 'abadt. daniel 4:36	beh zimna mande'i yetub 'alai veliqar malkhuti hadri vezivi yetub 'alai veli hadaberai verabrebanai yeba'on ve'al malkhuti hateqenat urebu yatirah husefat li. daniel 4:37	ke'an 'anah nebukhadnezar meshabakh umeromem umehadar lemelekh shemaya di khal ma'abadohi qeshot ve'orekhateh din vedi mahlekhin begeivah yakhil lehashpalah. daniel 5:1	beileshazar malka 'abad lekhem rab lerabrebanohi 'alaf velaqobel 'alpa khamra shateh. daniel 5:2	beileshazar 'amar bit'em khamra lehaytayah lemanei dahaba vekhaspa di hanpeq nebukhadnezar 'abuhi min heikhela di birushelem veyishton behon malka verabrebanohi sheigelateh ulekheinateh. daniel 5:3	beidayin haytiv manei dahaba di hanpiqu min heikhela di bet 'elaha di birushelem ve'ishtiv behon malka verabrebanohi sheigelateh ulekheinateh. daniel 5:4	'ishtiv khamra veshabakhu leilahei dahaba vekhaspa nekhasha farzela 'a'a ve'abna. daniel 5:5	bah sha'atah nefaqu nefaqah 'ezbe'an di yad 'enash vekhateban laqobel nebrashta 'al gira di khetal heikhela di malka umalka khazeh pas yedah di khatebah. daniel 5:6	'edayin malka ziyohi shenohi vera'yonohi yebahaluneh veqitrei kharzeh mishtarayin ve'arkhubateh da leda naqeshan. daniel 5:7	qarei malka bekhayil lehe'alah le'ashefaya kasdayei kasda'ei vegazeraya 'aneh malka ve'amar lekhakimei babel di khal 'enash di yiqreh ketabah denah ufishreh yekhavinani 'argevana yilbash vehamonkha vehamnikha di dahaba 'al zavereh vetalti bemalkhuta yishlat. daniel 5:8	'edayin 'alalin 'alin kol khakimei malka vela khahalin ketaba lemiqrei ufishra ufishreh lehoda'ah lemalka. daniel 5:9	'edayin malka beileshazar sagi mitbahal veziyohi shanayin 'alohi verabrebanohi mishtabeshin. daniel 5:10	malketa laqobel milei malka verabrebanohi lebet mishteya 'alalat 'alat 'anat malketa va'ameret malka le'alemin kheyi 'al yebahalukh ra'yonakh vezivaykh 'al yishtano. daniel 5:11	'itai gebar bemalkhutakh di ruakh 'elahin qadishin beh ubeyomei 'abukh nahiru vesakheletanu vekhakhemah kekhakhemat 'elahin hishtekhakhat beh umalka nebukhadnezar 'abukh rab khartumin 'ashefin kasda'in gazerin haqimeh 'abukh malka. daniel 5:12	kal qobel di ruakh yatirah umanda' vesakheletanu mefashar khelmin va'akhavayat 'akhidan umesharei qitrin hishtekhakhat beh bedaniyel di malka sam shemeh beileteshazar ke'an daniyel yitqerei ufishrah yehakhaveh. daniel 5:13	beidayin daniyel hu'al qodam malka 'aneh malka ve'amar ledaniyel 'antah 'ant hu daniyel di min benei galuta di yehud di hayti malka 'abi min yehud. daniel 5:14	veshim'et 'alayikh 'alakh di ruakh 'elahin bakh venahiru vesakheletanu vekhakhemah yatirah hishtekhakhat bakh. daniel 5:15	ukhe'an hu'alu qadamai khakimaya 'ashefaya di khetabah denah yiqron ufishreh lehoda'utani vela khahalin peshar mileta lehakhavayah. daniel 5:16	va'anah shim'et 'alayikh 'alakh di tukhal tikul pishrin lemifshar veqitrin lemishrei ke'an hen tukhal tikhul ketaba lemiqrei ufishreh lehoda'utani 'argevana tilbash vehamonkha vehamnikha di dahaba 'al zaverakh vetalta bemalkhuta tishlat. daniel 5:17	beidayin 'aneh daniyel ve'amar qodam malka matenatakh lakh lehevyan unebazebeyatakh le'akhoran hab beram ketaba 'eqrei lemalka ufishra 'ahod'ineh. daniel 5:18	'antah 'ant malka 'elaha 'ilaya 'ila'ah malkhuta urebuta viqara vehadrah yehab linbukhadnezar 'abukh. daniel 5:19	umin rebuta di yehab leh kol 'amaya 'umaya velishanaya havo za'a'in zaye'in vedakhalin min qodamohi di havah zabei hava qatel vedi havah zabei havah makhei vedi havah zabei havah marim vedi havah zabei havah mashpil. daniel 5:20	ukhedi rim libbeh verukheh tiqfat lahazadah hanekhat min karesei malkhuteh viqarah he'diyu mineh. daniel 5:21	umin benei 'anasha terid velibbeh 'im kheiveta shevi shaviyv ve'im 'aradaya medoreh 'isba khetorin yeta'amuneh umital shemaya gishmeh yiztaba' 'ad di yeda' di shalit 'elaha 'ilaya 'ila'ah bemalkhut 'anasha uleman di yizbeh yehaqem 'alayeh 'alah. daniel 5:22	ve'antah ve'ant bereh beileshazar la hashpeilet libbakh kal qobel di khal denah yeda'ta. daniel 5:23	ve'al marei shemaya hitromamta ulemanaya di bayteh haytiv qadamayikh qadamakh ve'antah ve'ant verabrebanayikh verabrebanakh sheigelatakh ulekheinatakh khamra shatayin behon veleilahei khaspa vedahaba nekhasha farzela 'a'a ve'abna di la khazayin vela shame'in vela yade'in shabakhta veleilaha di nishmetakh bideh vekhal 'orekhatakh leh la hadarta. daniel 5:24	beidayin min qodamohi sheliyaakh pasa di yeda ukhetaba denah reshim. daniel 5:25	udenah khetaba di reshim menei menei teqel ufarsin. daniel 5:26	denah peshar mileta menei menah 'elaha malkhutakh vehashlemah. daniel 5:27	teqel teqiletah bemozanya vehishtekhakhat khasir. daniel 5:28	peres perisat malkhutakh vihibat lemadai ufaras. daniel 5:29	beidayin 'amar beileshazar vehalbishu ledaniyel 'argevana vehamonkha vehamnikha di dahaba 'al zavereh vehakhrizu 'alohi di lehevei shalit talta bemalkhuta. daniel 5:30	beh beleileya qetil beileshazar malka khasdaya khasda'ah. daniel 5:31	vedareyavesh madaya qabel malkhuta kebar shenin shitin vetarten. daniel 6:1	shefar qodam dareyavesh vahaqim 'al malkhuta la'akhashdarpenaya me'ah ve'esrin di lehevon bekhal malkhuta. daniel 6:2	ve'ela minehon sarekhin telata di daniyel khad minehon di lehevon 'akhashdarpenaya 'ilen yahabin lehon ta'ma umalka la lehevei naziq. daniel 6:3	'edayin daniyel denah hava mitnazakh 'al sarekhaya va'akhashdarpenaya kal qobel di ruakh yatira beh umalka 'ashit lahaqamuteh 'al kal malkhuta. daniel 6:4	'edayin sarekhaya va'akhashdarpenaya havo ba'ayin 'ilah lehashkakhah ledaniyel mizad malkhuta vekhal 'ilah ushekhitah la yakhelin lehashkakhah kal qobel di meheiman hu vekhal shalu ushekhitah la hishtekhakhat 'alohi. daniel 6:5	'edayin gubraya 'ilekh 'amerin di la nehashkakh ledaniyel denah kal 'ila lahen hashkakhnah 'alohi bedat 'elaheh. daniel 6:6	'edayin sarekhaya va'akhashdarpenaya 'ilen hargishu 'al malka vekhen 'amerin leh dareyavesh malka le'alemin kheyi. daniel 6:7	'itya'atu kol sarekhei malkhuta signaya va'akhashdarpenaya hadaberaya ufakhavata leqayamah qeyam malka uletaqafah 'esar di khal di yib'eh ba'u min kal 'elah ve'enash 'ad yomin telatin lahen minakh malka yitremei legob 'aryavata. daniel 6:8	ke'an malka teqim 'esara vetirshum ketaba di la lehashnayah kedat madai ufaras di la te'dei. daniel 6:9	kal qobel denah malka dareyavesh resham ketaba ve'esara. daniel 6:10	vedaniyel kedi yeda' di reshim ketaba 'al lebayteh vekhavin petikhan leh be'iliteh neged yerushelem vezimnin telatah beyoma hu barekh 'al birkhohi umezalei umodei qodam 'elaheh kal qobel di hava 'abed min qadmat denah. daniel 6:11	'edayin gubraya 'ilekh hargishu vehashkakhu ledaniyel ba'ei umitkhanan qodam 'elaheh. daniel 6:12	beidayin qeribu ve'amerin qodam malka 'al 'esar malka hala 'esar reshamta di khal 'enash di yib'eh min kal 'elah ve'enash 'ad yomin telatin lahen minakh malka yitremei legob 'aryavta 'aneh malka ve'amar yaziba mileta kedat madai ufaras di la te'dei. daniel 6:13	beidayin 'ano ve'amerin qodam malka di daniyel di min benei galuta di yehud la sam 'alayikh 'alakh malka te'em ve'al 'esara di reshamta vezimnin telatah beyoma ba'ei ba'uteh. daniel 6:14	'edayin malka kedi mileta shema' sagi be'esh 'alohi ve'al daniyel sam bal lesheizabuteh ve'ad me'alei shimsha hava mishtadar lehazaluteh. daniel 6:15	beidayin gubraya 'ilekh hargishu 'al malka ve'amerin lemalka da' malka di dat lemadai ufaras di khal 'esar uqeyam di malka yehaqem la lehashnayah. daniel 6:16	beidayin malka 'amar vehaytiv ledaniyel uremo leguba di 'aryavata 'aneh malka ve'amar ledaniyel 'elahakh di 'antah 'ant palakh leh bitdira hu yesheizebinakh. daniel 6:17	veheitayit 'eben khadah vesumat 'al pum guba vekhatmah malka be'izqeteh ube'izqat rabrebanohi di la tishnei zebu bedaniyel. daniel 6:18	'edayin 'azal malka leheikheleh ubat tevat vedakhavan la han'el qadamohi veshinteh nadat 'alohi. daniel 6:19	beidayin malka bishparpara yequm benageha ubehitbehalah leguba di 'aryavata 'azal. daniel 6:20	ukhemiqrebeh leguba ledaniyel beqal 'azib ze'iq 'aneh malka ve'amar ledaniyel daniyel 'abed 'elaha khaya 'elahakh di 'antah 'ant palakh leh bitdira haykhil lesheizabutakh min 'aryavata. daniel 6:21	'edayin daniyel 'im malka malil malka le'alemin kheyi. daniel 6:22	'elahi shelakh mal'akheh usagar pum 'aryavata vela khabeluni kal qobel di qadamohi zakhu hishtekhakhat li ve'af qadamayikh qadamakh malka khabulah la 'abdet. daniel 6:23	beidayin malka sagi te'eb 'alohi uledaniyel 'amar lehansaqah min guba vehusaq daniyel min guba vekhal khabal la hishtekhakh beh di heimin beilaheh. daniel 6:24	va'amar malka vehaytiv gubraya 'ilekh di 'akhalu qarzohi di daniyel ulegob 'aryavata remo 'inun beneihon unesheihon vela meto le'ar'it guba 'ad di shelitu behon 'aryavata vekhal garmeihon hadiqu. daniel 6:25	beidayin dareyavesh malka ketab lekhal 'amaya 'umaya velishanaya di da'arin dayerin bekhal 'ar'a shelamekhon yisgei. daniel 6:26	min qodamai sim te'em di bekhal shaletan malkhuti lehevon za'a'in zaye'in vedakhalin min qodam 'elaheh di daniyel di hu 'elaha khaya veqayam le'alemin umalkhuteh di la titkhabal veshaletaneh 'ad sofa. daniel 6:27	mesheizib umazil ve'abed 'atin vetimhin bishmaya ube'ar'a di sheizib ledaniyel min yad 'aryavata. daniel 6:28	vedaniyel denah hazlakh bemalkhut dareyavesh ubemalkhut koresh paresaya paresa'ah. daniel 7:1	bishnat khadah lebeileshazar melekh babel daniyel kheilem khazah vekhezvei reisheh 'al mishkebeh beidayin khelma khetab resh milin 'amar. daniel 7:2	'aneh daniyel ve'amar khazeh havet bekhezvi 'im leileya va'aru 'arba' rukhei shemaya megikhan leyama raba. daniel 7:3	ve'arba' kheivan rabreban saleqan min yama shaneyan da min da. daniel 7:4	qadmayeta khe'aryeh vegapin di neshar lah khazeh havet 'ad di meritu gapayh unetilat min 'ar'a ve'al raglayin ke'enash hoqimat ulebab 'enash yehib lah. daniel 7:5	va'aru kheivah 'akhori tinyanah dameyah ledob velistar khad hoqimat utelat 'il'in befumah ben shinayah shinah vekhen 'amerin lah qumi 'akhuli besar sagi. daniel 7:6	batar denah khazeh havet va'aru 'akhori kinmar velah gapin 'arba' di 'of 'al gabayah gabah ve'arbe'ah reishin lekheiveta veshaletan yehib lah. daniel 7:7	batar denah khazeh havet bekhezvei leileya va'aru kheivah rebi'ayah rebi'a'ah dekhilah ve'eimetani vetaqifa yatira veshinayin di farzel lah rabreban 'akhelah umadeqah ushe'ara beraglayah beraglah rafesah vehi meshaneyah min kal kheivata di qadamayh veqarnayin 'asar lah. daniel 7:8	mistakal havet beqarnaya va'alu qeren 'akhori ze'eirah silqat beineihon beineihen utelat min qarnaya qadmayata 'et'aqaru 'et'aqarah min qodamayah qodamah va'alu 'aynin ke'aynei 'anasha beqarna da ufum memalil rabreban. daniel 7:9	khazeh havet 'ad di kharesavan remiv ve'atiq yomin yetib lebusheh kitlag khivar use'ar reisheh ka'amar neqei kareseyeh shebibin di nur galgilohi nur daliq. daniel 7:10	nehar di nur naged venafeq min qodamohi 'elef 'alfayim 'alfin yeshameshuneh veribo rabevan ribban qadamohi yequmun dina yetib vesifrin petikhu. daniel 7:11	khazeh havet beidayin min qal milaya rabrebata di qarna memalelah khazeh havet 'ad di qetilat kheiveta vehubad gishmah vihibat liqeidat 'esha. daniel 7:12	ushe'ar kheivata he'div shaletanehon ve'arkhah bekhayin yehibat lehon 'ad zeman ve'idan. daniel 7:13	khazeh havet bekhezvei leileya va'aru 'im 'ananei shemaya kebar 'enash 'ateh havah ve'ad 'atiq yomaya metah uqedamohi haqrebuhi. daniel 7:14	veleh yehib shaletan viqar umalkhu vekhol 'amaya 'umaya velishanaya leh yiflekhun shaletaneh shaletan 'alam di la ye'deh umalkhuteh di la titkhabal. daniel 7:15	'etkeriyat rukhi 'anah daniyel bego nidneh vekhezvei reishi yebahalunani. daniel 7:16	qirbet 'al khad min qa'amaya veyaziba 'eb'ei mineh 'al kal denah va'amar li ufeshar milaya yehod'inani. daniel 7:17	'ilen kheivata rabrebata di 'inin 'arba' 'arbe'ah malkhin yequmun min 'ar'a. daniel 7:18	viqabelun malkhuta qadishei 'elyonin veyakhsenun malkhuta 'ad 'alema ve'ad 'alam 'alemaya. daniel 7:19	'edayin zebit leyazaba 'al kheiveta rebi'ayeta di havat shaneyah min kalehon kalehen dekhilah yatirah shinayah shinah di farzel vetifrayh di nekhash 'akhelah madaqah ushe'ara beraglayh rafesah. daniel 7:20	ve'al qarnaya 'asar di bereishah ve'akhori di silqat unefalu unefalah min qodamayah qodamah telat veqarna diken ve'aynin lah vefum memalil rabreban vekhezvah rab min khabratah. daniel 7:21	khazeh havet veqarna diken 'abedah qerab 'im qadishin veyakhelah lehon. daniel 7:22	'ad di 'atah 'atiq yomaya vedina yehib leqadishei 'elyonin vezimna metah umalkhuta hekhesinu qadishin. daniel 7:23	ken 'amar kheiveta rebi'ayeta malkhu rebi'aya rebi'a'ah tehevei be'ar'a di tishnei min kal malkhevata veteikhul kal 'ar'a utedushinah vetadeqinah. daniel 7:24	veqarnaya 'asar minah malkhutah 'asrah malkhin yequmun ve'akhoran yequm 'akhareihon vehu yishnei min qadmayei utelatah malkhin yehashpil. daniel 7:25	umilin lezad 'ilaya 'ila'ah yemalil uleqadishei 'elyonin yebalei veyisbar lehashnayah zimnin vedat veyityahabun bideh 'ad 'idan ve'idanin ufelag 'idan. daniel 7:26	vedina yitib veshaletaneh yeha'don lehashmadah ulehobadah 'ad sofa. daniel 7:27	umalkhutah veshaletana urebuta di malkhevat tekhot kal shemaya yehibat le'am qadishei 'elyonin malkhuteh malkhut 'alam vekhol shaletanaya leh yiflekhun veyishtame'un. daniel 7:28	'ad kah sofa di mileta 'anah daniyel sagi ra'yonai yebahalunani vezivai yishtanon 'alai umileta belibi nitret. daniel 8:1	bishnat shalosh lemalkhut beileshazar hamelekh khazon nir'ah 'eilai 'ani daniyel 'akharei hanir'ah 'eilai batekhilah. daniel 8:2	va'er'eh bekhazon vayhi bir'oti va'ani beshushan habirah 'asher be'eilam hamedinah va'er'eh bekhazon va'ani hayiti 'al 'ubal 'ulai. daniel 8:3	va'esa 'einai va'er'eh vehineh 'ayil 'ekhad 'omed lifnei ha'ubal velo qeranayim vehaqeranayim gebohot veha'akhat gebohah min hasheinit vehagebohah 'olah ba'akharonah. daniel 8:4	ra'iti 'et ha'ayil menageiakh yamah vezafonah vanegbah vekhal khayot lo ya'amdu lefanav ve'en mazil miyado ve'asah khirzono vehigdil. daniel 8:5	va'ani hayiti meibin vehineh zefir ha'izim ba min hama'arab 'al penei khal ha'arez ve'en nogeia' ba'arez vehazafir qeren khazut ben 'einav. daniel 8:6	vayabo 'ad ha'ayil ba'al haqeranayim 'asher ra'iti 'omed lifnei ha'ubal vayaraz 'eilav bakhamat kokho. daniel 8:7	ure'itiv magia' 'eizel ha'ayil vayitmarmar 'eilav vayakh 'et ha'ayil vayshaber 'et shetei qeranav velo hayah khoakh ba'ayil la'amod lefanav vayashlikheihu 'arzah vayirmeseihu velo hayah mazil la'ayil miyado. daniel 8:8	uzefir ha'izim higdil 'ad me'od ukhe'azemo nishberah haqeren hagedolah vata'alenah khazut 'arba' takhteha le'arba' rukhot hashamayim. daniel 8:9	umin ha'akhat meihem yaza qeren 'akhat mize'irah vatigdal yeter 'el hanegeb ve'el hamizrakh ve'el hazebi. daniel 8:10	vatigdal 'ad zeba hashamayim vatapel 'arzah min hazaba umin hakokhabim vatirmesem. daniel 8:11	ve'ad sar hazaba higdil umimenu heirim huram hatamid vehushlakh mekhon miqdasho. daniel 8:12	vezaba tinaten 'al hatamid befasha' vetashlekh 'emet 'arzah ve'asetah vehizlikhah. daniel 8:13	va'eshme'ah 'ekhad qadosh medaber vayomer 'ekhad qadosh lapalmoni hamdaber 'ad matai hekhazon hatamid vehapesha' shomem tet veqodesh vezaba mirmas. daniel 8:14	vayomer 'eilai 'ad 'ereb boqer 'alpayim ushelosh mei'ot venizdaq qodesh. daniel 8:15	vayhi bir'oti 'ani daniyel 'et hekhazon va'abaqshah binah vehineh 'omed lenegdi kemar'eh gaber. daniel 8:16	va'eshma' qol 'adam ben 'ulai vayiqra vayomar gabri'el haben lehalaz 'et hamar'eh. daniel 8:17	vayabo 'eizel 'amedi ubebo'o nib'ati va'epelah 'al panai vayomer 'eilai haben ben 'adam ki le'et qez hekhazon. daniel 8:18	ubedabero 'imi nirdamti 'al panai 'arezah vayiga' bi vaya'amideini 'al 'amedi. daniel 8:19	vayomer hini modi'akha 'et 'asher yihyeh be'akharit haza'am ki lemo'ed qez. daniel 8:20	ha'ayil 'asher ra'ita ba'al haqeranayim malkhei madai ufaras. daniel 8:21	vehazafir hasa'ir melekh yavan vehaqeren hagedolah 'asher ben 'einav hu hamelekh harishon. daniel 8:22	vehanishberet vata'amodenah 'arba' takhteha 'arba' malkhuyot migo ya'amodenah velo bekhokho. daniel 8:23	ube'akharit malkhutam kehatem haposhe'im ya'amod melekh 'az panim umeibin khidot. daniel 8:24	ve'azam kokho velo bekhokho venifla'ot yashkhit vehizliakh ve'asah vehishkhit 'azumim ve'am qedoshim. daniel 8:25	ve'al sikhlo vehizliakh mirmah beyado ubilbabo yagdil ubeshalvah yashkhit rabim ve'al sar sarim ya'amod ube'efes yad yishaber. daniel 8:26	umar'eh ha'ereb vehaboqer 'asher ne'emar 'emet hu ve'atah setom hekhazon ki leyamim rabim. daniel 8:27	va'ani daniyel nihyeiti venekheleiti yamim va'aqum va'e'eseh 'et melekhet hamelekh va'eshtomem 'al hamar'eh ve'en meibin. daniel 9:1	bishnat 'akhat ledareyavesh ben 'akhashveirosh mizera' madai 'asher hamelakh 'al malkhut kasdim. daniel 9:2	bishnat 'akhat lemalekho 'ani daniyel binoti basefarim mispar hashanim 'asher hayah debar yhvh 'el yirmiyah hanabi lemalot lekharebot yerushalim shib'im shanah. daniel 9:3	va'etenah 'et panai 'el 'adonai ha'elohim lebaqesh tefilah vetakhanunim bezom vesaq va'eifer. daniel 9:4	va'etpalah yhvh 'elohai va'etvadeh va'omerah 'ana 'adonai ha'el hagadol vehanora shomer haberit vehakhesed le'ohabav uleshomerei mizvotav. daniel 9:5	khatanu ve'avinu vehirsha'nu hirsha'nu umaradenu vesor mimizvotekha umimishpatekha. daniel 9:6	velo shama'nu 'el 'abadekha hanebi'im 'asher diberu beshimkha 'el melakheinu sareinu va'aboteinu ve'el kal 'am ha'arez. daniel 9:7	lekha 'adonai hazedaqah velanu boshet hapanim kayom hazeh le'ish yehudah uleyoshebei yerushalim ulekhal yisra'el haqerobim veharekhoqim bekhal ha'arazot 'asher hidakhtam sham bema'alam 'asher ma'alu bakh. daniel 9:8	yhvh lanu boshet hapanim limlakheinu lesareinu vela'aboteinu 'asher khatanu lakh. daniel 9:9	ladonai 'eloheinu harakhamim vehaselikhot ki maradnu bo. daniel 9:10	velo shama'nu beqol yhvh 'eloheinu lalekhet betorotav 'asher natan lefaneinu beyad 'abadav hanebi'im. daniel 9:11	vekhal yisra'el 'aberu 'et toratekha vesor lebilti shemoa' beqolekha vatitakh 'aleinu ha'alah vehashebu'ah 'asher ketubah betorat mosheh 'ebed ha'elohim ki khatanu lo. daniel 9:12	vayaqem 'et debarav debaro 'asher diber 'aleinu ve'al shofeteinu 'asher shefatunu lehabi 'aleinu ra'ah gedolah 'asher lo ne'estah takhat kal hashamayim ka'asher ne'estah birushalim. daniel 9:13	ka'asher katub betorat mosheh 'et kal hara'ah hazot ba'ah 'aleinu velo khilinu 'et penei yhvh 'eloheinu lashub mei'avoneinu ulehaskil ba'amitekha. daniel 9:14	vayishqod yhvh 'al hara'ah vaybi'eha 'aleinu ki zadiq yhvh 'eloheinu 'al kal ma'asav 'asher 'asah velo shama'nu beqolo. daniel 9:15	ve'atah 'adonai 'eloheinu 'asher hozeita 'et 'amekha mei'erez mizrayim beyad khazaqah vata'as lekha shem kayom hazeh khatanu rasha'enu. daniel 9:16	'adonai kekhal zidqotekha yashab na 'apekha vakhamatekha mei'irekha yerushalim har qadshekha ki bakhata'einu uba'avonot 'aboteinu yerushalim ve'amekha lekherpah lekhal sebiboteinu. daniel 9:17	ve'atah shema' 'eloheinu 'el tefilat 'abdekha ve'el takhanunav veha'er panekha 'al miqdashekha hashamem lema'an 'adonai. daniel 9:18	hateh 'elohai 'azenekha ushama' piqkhah peqakh 'einekha ure'eh shomemoteinu veha'ir 'asher niqra shimkha 'aleha ki lo 'al zidqoteinu 'anakhnu mapilim takhanuneinu lefanekha ki 'al rakhamekha harabim. daniel 9:19	'adonai shema'ah 'adonai selakhah 'adonai haqashibah va'aseh 'al te'akhar lema'ankha 'elohai ki shimkha niqra 'al 'irekha ve'al 'amekha. daniel 9:20	ve'od 'ani medaber umitpalel umitvadeh khatati vekhatat 'ami yisra'el umapil tekhinati lifnei yhvh 'elohai 'al har qodesh 'elohai. daniel 9:21	ve'od 'ani medaber batefilah veha'ish gabri'el 'asher ra'iti bekhazon batekhilah mu'af bi'af nogeia' 'eilai ke'et minkhat 'areb. daniel 9:22	vayaben vaydaber 'imi vayomar daniyel 'atah yazati lehaskilekha binah. daniel 9:23	bitkhilat takhanunekha yaza dabar va'ani bati lehagid ki khamudot 'atah ubin badabar vehaben bamar'eh. daniel 9:24	shabu'im shib'im nekhtakh 'al 'amekha ve'al 'ir qadshekha lekhalei hapesha' ulakhtom ulehatem khata'ot khatat ulekhaper 'avon ulehabi zedeq 'olamim velakhtom khazon venabi velimshoakh qodesh qadashim. daniel 9:25	veteida' vetaskel min moza dabar lehashib velibnot yerushalim 'ad mashiakh nagid shabu'im shib'ah veshabu'im shishim ushenayim tashub venibnetah rekhob vekharuz ubezoq ha'itim. daniel 9:26	ve'akharei hashabu'im shishim ushenayim yikaret mashiakh ve'en lo veha'ir vehaqodesh yashkhit 'am nagid haba veqizo bashetef ve'ad qez milkhamah nekherezet shomeimot. daniel 9:27	vehigbir berit larabim shabua' 'ekhad vakhazi hashabua' yashbit zebakh uminkhah ve'al kenaf shiquzim meshomem ve'ad kalah venekherazah titakh 'al shomem. daniel 10:1	bishnat shalosh lekhoresh melekh paras dabar niglah ledaniyel 'asher niqra shemo beileteshazar ve'emet hadabar vezaba gadol ubin 'et hadabar ubinah lo bamar'eh. daniel 10:2	bayamim hahem 'ani daniyel hayiti mit'abel sheloshah shabu'im yamim. daniel 10:3	lekhem khamudot lo 'akhalti ubasar vayayin lo ba 'el pi vesokh lo sakheti 'ad melot sheloshet shabu'im yamim. daniel 10:4	ubeyom 'esrim ve'arba'ah lakhodesh harishon va'ani hayiti 'al yad hanahar hagadol hu khidaqel. daniel 10:5	va'esa 'et 'einai va'eire vehineh 'ish 'ekhad labush badim umatenav khagurim bekhetem 'ufaz. daniel 10:6	ugeviyato khetarshish ufanav kemar'eh baraq ve'einav kelapidei 'esh uzero'otav umargelotav ke'en nekhoshet qalal veqol debarav keqol hamon. daniel 10:7	vera'iti 'ani daniyel lebadi 'et hamar'ah veha'anashim 'asher hayu 'imi lo ra'u 'et hamar'ah 'abal kharadah gedolah nafelah 'aleihem vayibrekhu beheikhabei. daniel 10:8	va'ani nish'arti lebadi va'er'eh 'et hamar'ah hagedolah hazot velo nish'ar bi kokh vehodi nehpakh 'alai lemashkhit velo 'azarti koakh. daniel 10:9	va'eshma' 'et qol debarav ukheshame'i 'et qol debarav va'ani hayiti nirdam 'al panai ufanai 'arezah. daniel 10:10	vehineh yad nage'ah bi vateni'eini 'al birkai vekhapot yadai. daniel 10:11	vayomer 'eilai daniyel 'ish khamudot haben badebarim 'asher 'anokhi dober 'eilekha va'amod 'al 'amedekha ki 'atah shulakhti 'eilekha ubedabero 'imi 'et hadabar hazeh 'amadti mar'id. daniel 10:12	vayomer 'eilai 'al tira daniyel ki min hayom harishon 'asher natata 'et libekha lehabin ulehit'anot lifnei 'elohekha nishme'u debarekha va'ani bati bidbarekha. daniel 10:13	vesar malkhut paras 'omed lenegdi 'esrim ve'ekhad yom vehineh mikha'el 'akhad hasarim harishonim ba le'azereini va'ani notarti sham 'eizel malkhei faras. daniel 10:14	ubati lahabinekha 'et 'asher yiqrah le'amekha be'akharit hayamim ki 'od khazon layamim. daniel 10:15	ubedabero 'imi kadebarim ha'eleh natati fanai 'arzah vene'elameti. daniel 10:16	vehineh kidmut benei 'adam nogeia' 'al sefatai va'eftakh pi va'adaberah va'omerah 'el ha'omed lenegdi 'adoni bamar'ah nehefkhu zirai 'alai velo 'azarti koakh. daniel 10:17	vehekh yukhal 'ebed 'adoni zeh ledaber 'im 'adoni zeh va'ani mei'atah lo ya'amad bi khoakh uneshamah lo nish'arah bi. daniel 10:18	vayosef vayiga' bi kemar'eh 'adam vaykhazeqeini. daniel 10:19	vayomer 'al tira 'ish khamudot shalom lakh khazaq vakhazaq ukhedabero 'imi hitkhazaqti va'omerah yedaber 'adoni ki khizaqtani. daniel 10:20	vayomer hayada'ta lamah bati 'eilekha ve'atah 'ashub lehilakhem 'im sar paras va'ani yozei vehineh sar yavan ba. daniel 10:21	'abal 'agid lekha 'et harashum bikhtab 'emet ve'en 'ekhad mitkhazeq 'imi 'al 'eleh ki 'im mikha'el sarkhem. daniel 11:1	va'ani bishnat 'akhat ledareyavesh hamadi 'amedi lemakhaziq ulema'oz lo. daniel 11:2	ve'atah 'emet 'agid lakh hineh 'od sheloshah melakhim 'omedim lefaras veharebi'i ya'ashir 'osher gadol mikol ukhekhezqato be'ashero ya'ir hakol 'et malkhut yavan. daniel 11:3	ve'amad melekh gibor umashal mimshal rab ve'asah kirzono. daniel 11:4	ukhe'amedo tishaber malkhuto veteikhaz le'arba' rukhot hashamayim velo le'akharito velo khemashelo 'asher mashal ki tinatesh malkhuto vela'akheirim milebad 'eleh. daniel 11:5	veyekhezaq melekh hanegeb umin sarav veyekhezaq 'alav umashal mimshal rab memshalto. daniel 11:6	uleqez shanim yitkhabaru ubat melekh hanegeb tabo 'el melekh hazafon la'asot meisharim velo ta'zor koakh hazeroa' velo ya'amod uzero'o vetinaten hi umebi'eha vehayoledah umakhaziqah ba'itim. daniel 11:7	ve'amad mineizer sharasheha kano veyabo 'el hakhayil veyabo bema'oz melekh hazafon ve'asah bahem vehekheziq. daniel 11:8	vegam 'eloheihem 'im nesikheihem 'im kelei khemdatam kesef vezahab bashebi yabi mizrayim vehu shanim ya'amod mimelekh hazafon daniel 11:9	uba bemalkhut melekh hanegeb veshab 'el 'admato. daniel 11:10	ubeno ubanav yitgaru ve'asefu hamon khayalim rabim uba bo veshataf ve'abar veyashob veyitgaru veyitgareh 'ad ma'uzah ma'uzo. daniel 11:11	veyitmarmar melekh hanegeb veyaza venilkham 'imo 'im melekh hazafon vehe'emid hamon rab venitan hehamon beyado. daniel 11:12	venisa hehamon yarum veram lebabo vehipil ribo'ot velo ya'oz. daniel 11:13	veshab melekh hazafon vehe'emid hamon rab min harishon uleqez ha'itim shanim yabo bo bekhayil gadol ubirkhush rab. daniel 11:14	uba'itim hahem rabim ya'amdu 'al melekh hanegeb ubenei parizei 'amekha yinase'u leha'amid khazon venikhshalu. daniel 11:15	veyabo melekh hazafon veyishpokh solalah velakhad 'ir mibzarot uzero'ot hanegeb lo ya'amodu ve'am mibkharav ve'en koakh la'amod. daniel 11:16	veya'as haba 'eilav kirzono ve'en 'omed lefanav veya'amod be'erez hazebi vekhalah beyado. daniel 11:17	veyasem panav labo betoqef kal malkhuto visharim 'imo ve'asah ubat hanashim yiten lo lehashkhitah velo ta'amod velo lo tihyeh. daniel 11:18	veyasheb veyasem panav le'iyim velakhad rabim vehishbit qazin kherpato lo bilti kherpato yashib lo. daniel 11:19	veyasheb panav lema'uzei 'arzo venikhshal venafal velo yimazei. daniel 11:20	ve'amad 'al kano ma'abir noges heder malkhut ubeyamim 'akhadim yishaber velo be'apayim velo bemilkhamah. daniel 11:21	ve'amad 'al kano nibzeh velo natenu 'alav hod malkhut uba beshalvah vehekheziq malkhut bakhalaqlaqot. daniel 11:22	uzero'ot hashetef yishatefu milefanav veyishabeiru vegam negid berit. daniel 11:23	umin hitkhaberut 'eilav ya'aseh mirmah ve'alah ve'azam bim'at go. daniel 11:24	beshalvah ubemishmanei medinah yabo ve'asah 'asher lo 'asu 'abotav va'abot 'abotav bizah veshalal urekhush lahem yibzor ve'al mibzarim yekhasheb makhshebotav ve'ad 'et. daniel 11:25	veya'er kokho ulebabo 'al melekh hanegeb bekhayil gadol umelekh hanegeb yitgareh lamilkhamah bekhayil gadol ve'azum 'ad me'od velo ya'amod ki yakhshebu 'alav makhashabot. daniel 11:26	ve'okhelei fat bago yishberuhu vekheilo yishtof venafelu khalalim rabim. daniel 11:27	usheneihem hamelakhim lebabam lemeira' ve'al shulkhan 'ekhad kazab yedabeiru velo tizlakh ki 'od qez lamo'ed. daniel 11:28	veyashob 'arzo birkhush gadol ulebabo 'al berit qodesh ve'asah veshab le'arzo. daniel 11:29	lamo'ed yashub uba banegeb velo tihyeh kharishonah vekha'akharonah. daniel 11:30	uba'u bo ziyim kitim venikh'ah veshab veza'am 'al berit qodesh ve'asah veshab veyaben 'al 'ozebei berit qodesh. daniel 11:31	uzero'im mimenu ya'amodu vekhilelu hamiqdash hama'oz veheisiru hatamid venatenu hashiquz meshomem. daniel 11:32	umarshi'ei berit yakhanif bakhalaqot ve'am yode'ei 'elohav yakhaziqu ve'asu. daniel 11:33	umaskilei 'am yabinu larabim venikhshelu bekhereb ubelehabah bishbi ubebizah yamim. daniel 11:34	ubehikashelam yei'azeru 'eizer me'at venilvu 'aleihem rabim bakhalaqlaqot. daniel 11:35	umin hamaskilim yikashelu lizrof bahem ulebarer velalben 'ad 'et qez ki 'od lamo'ed. daniel 11:36	ve'asah khirzono hamelekh veyitromem veyitgadel 'al kal 'el ve'al 'el 'eilim yedaber nifla'ot vehizliakh 'ad kalah za'am ki nekherazah ne'esatah. daniel 11:37	ve'al 'elohei 'abotav lo yabin ve'al khemdat nashim ve'al kal 'eloah lo yabin ki 'al kol yitgadal. daniel 11:38	vele'eloah ma'uzim 'al kano yekhabed vele'eloah 'asher lo yeda'uhu 'abotav yekhabed bezahab ubekhesef ube'eben yeqarah ubakhamudot. daniel 11:39	ve'asah lemibzerei ma'uzim 'im 'eloah neikhar 'asher hikir yakir yarbeh khabod vehimshilam barabim va'adamah yekhaleq bimkhir. daniel 11:40	ube'et qez yitnagakh 'imo melekh hanegeb veyista'er 'alav melekh hazafon berekheb ubefarashim uba'oniyot rabot uba ba'arazot veshataf ve'abar. daniel 11:41	uba be'erez hazebi verabot yikasheilu ve'eleh yimaletu miyado 'edom umo'ab vereishit benei 'amon. daniel 11:42	veyishlakh yado ba'arazot ve'erez mizrayim lo tihyeh lifleitah. daniel 11:43	umashal bemikhmanei hazahab vehakesef ubekhol khamudot mizrayim velubim vekhushim bemiz'adav. daniel 11:44	ushemu'ot yebahaluhu mimizrakh umizafon veyaza bekheima gedolah lehashmid ulehakharim rabim. daniel 11:45	veyita' 'ahole 'apadno ben yamim lehar zebi qodesh uba 'ad qizo ve'en 'ozer lo. daniel 12:1	uba'et hahi ya'amod mikha'el hasar hagadol ha'omed 'al benei 'amekha vehayetah 'et zarah 'asher lo nihyetah mihyot go 'ad ha'et hahi uba'et hahi yimalet 'amekha kal hanimza katub baseifer. daniel 12:2	verabim miyesheinei 'admat 'afar yaqizu 'eleh lekhayei 'olam ve'eleh lakharafot ledir'on 'olam. daniel 12:3	vehamaskilim yazhiru kezohar haraqia' umazdiqei harabim kakokhabim le'olam va'ed. daniel 12:4	ve'atah daniyel setom hadebarim vakhatom haseifer 'ad 'et qez yeshotetu rabim vetirbeh hada'at. daniel 12:5	vera'iti 'ani daniyel vehineh shenayim 'akheirim 'omedim 'ekhad henah lisfat hai'or ve'ekhad henah lisfat hai'or. daniel 12:6	vayomer la'ish lebush habadim 'asher mima'al lemeimei hai'or 'ad matai qez hapela'ot. daniel 12:7	va'eshma' 'et ha'ish lebush habadim 'asher mima'al lemeimei hai'or vayarem yemino usemolo 'el hashamayim vayishaba' bekhei ha'olam ki lemo'ed mo'adim vakheizi ukhekhalot napez yad 'am qodesh tikhlenah khal 'eleh. daniel 12:8	va'ani shama'ti velo 'abin va'omerah 'adoni mah 'akharit 'eleh. daniel 12:9	vayomer lekh daniyel ki setumim vakhatumim hadebarim 'ad 'et qez. daniel 12:10	yitbararu veyitlabenu veyizarefu rabim vehirshi'u resha'im velo yabinu kal resha'im vehamaskilim yabinu. daniel 12:11	umei'et husar hatamid velatet shiquz shomem yamim 'elef matayim vetish'im. daniel 12:12	'ashrei hamkhakeh veyagia' leyamim 'elef shelosh mei'ot sheloshim vakhamishah. daniel 12:13	ve'atah lekh laqez vetanuakh veta'amod legoralekha leqez hayamin. 

ezra 1:1	ubishnat 'akhat lekhoresh melekh paras likhlot debar yhvh mipi yirmeyah hei'ir yhvh 'et ruakh koresh melekh paras vaya'aber qol bekhal malkhuto vegam bemikhtab leimor. ezra 1:2	koh 'amar koresh melekh paras kol mamlekhot ha'arez natan li yhvh 'elohei hashamayim vehu faqad 'alai libnot lo bayit birushalim 'asher bihudah. ezra 1:3	mi bakhem mikal 'amo yehi 'elohav 'imo veya'al lirushalim 'asher bihudah veyiben 'et bet yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hu ha'elohim 'asher birushalim. ezra 1:4	vekhal hanish'ar mikal hameqomot 'asher hu gar sham yenase'uhu 'anshei meqomo bekhesef ubezahab ubirkhush ubibheimah 'im hanedabah lebet ha'elohim 'asher birushalim. ezra 1:5	vayaqumu rashei ha'abot lihudah ubinyamin vehakohanim vehalviyim lekhol hei'ir ha'elohim 'et rukho la'alot libnot 'et bet yhvh 'asher birushalim. ezra 1:6	vekhal sebiboteihem khizequ bideihem bikhlei khesef bazahab barekhush ubabeheimah ubamigdanot lebad 'al kal hitnadeb. ezra 1:7	vehamelekh koresh hozi 'et kelei bet yhvh 'asher hozi nebukhadnezar mirushalim vayitenem bebet 'elohav. ezra 1:8	vayozi'em koresh melekh paras 'al yad mitredat hagizbar vayisperem lesheishebazar hanasi lihudah. ezra 1:9	ve'eleh misparam 'agartelei zahab sheloshim 'agartelei khesef 'alef makhalafim tish'ah ve'esrim. ezra 1:10	keforei zahab sheloshim keforei khesef mishnim 'arba' mei'ot va'asarah keilim 'akheirim 'alef. ezra 1:11	kal keilim lazahab velakesef khameishet 'alafim ve'arba' mei'ot hakol he'elah sheishebazar 'im hei'alot hagolah mibabel lirushalim. ezra 2:1	ve'eleh benei hamedinah ha'olim mishebi hagolah 'asher heglah nebukhadnezor nebukhadnezar melekh babel lebabel vayashubu lirushalim vihudah 'ish le'iro. ezra 2:2	'asher ba'u 'im zerubabel yeishua' nekhemyah serayah re'eilayah maredokhai bilshan mispar bigvai rekhum ba'anah mispar 'anshei 'am yisra'el. ezra 2:3	benei far'osh 'alpayim mei'ah shib'im ushenayim. ezra 2:4	benei shefatyah shelosh mei'ot shib'im ushenayim. ezra 2:5	benei 'arakh sheba' mei'ot khamishah veshib'im. ezra 2:6	benei fakhat mo'ab libnei yeishua' yo'ab 'alpayim shemoneh mei'ot ushenem 'asar. ezra 2:7	benei 'eilam 'elef matayim khamishim ve'arba'ah. ezra 2:8	benei zatu tesha' mei'ot ve'arba'im vakhamishah. ezra 2:9	benei zakai sheba' mei'ot veshishim. ezra 2:10	benei bani shesh mei'ot 'arba'im ushenayim. ezra 2:11	benei beibai shesh mei'ot 'esrim usheloshah. ezra 2:12	benei 'azgad 'elef matayim 'esrim ushenayim. ezra 2:13	benei 'adoniqam shesh mei'ot shishim veshishah. ezra 2:14	benei bigvai 'alpayim khamishim veshishah. ezra 2:15	benei 'adin 'arba' mei'ot khamishim ve'arba'ah. ezra 2:16	benei 'ater likhizqiyah tish'im ushemonah. ezra 2:17	benei beizai shelosh mei'ot 'esrim usheloshah. ezra 2:18	benei yorah mei'ah ushenem 'asar. ezra 2:19	benei khashum matayim 'esrim usheloshah. ezra 2:20	benei gibar tish'im vakhamishah. ezra 2:21	benei bet lakhem mei'ah 'esrim usheloshah. ezra 2:22	'anshei netofah khamishim veshishah. ezra 2:23	'anshei 'anatot mei'ah 'esrim ushemonah. ezra 2:24	benei 'azmavet 'arba'im ushenayim. ezra 2:25	benei qiryat 'arim kefirah ube'eirot sheba' mei'ot ve'arba'im usheloshah. ezra 2:26	benei haramah vagaba' shesh mei'ot 'esrim ve'ekhad. ezra 2:27	'anshei mikhmas mei'ah 'esrim ushenayim. ezra 2:28	'anshei bet 'el veha'ai matayim 'esrim usheloshah. ezra 2:29	benei nebo khamishim ushenayim. ezra 2:30	benei magbish mei'ah khamishim veshishah. ezra 2:31	benei 'eilam 'akher 'elef matayim khamishim ve'arba'ah. ezra 2:32	benei kharim shelosh mei'ot ve'esrim. ezra 2:33	benei lod khadid ve'ono sheba' mei'ot 'esrim vakhamishah. ezra 2:34	benei yereikho shelosh mei'ot 'arba'im vakhamishah. ezra 2:35	benei sena'ah sheloshet 'alafim veshesh mei'ot usheloshim. ezra 2:36	hakohanim benei yeda'yah lebet yeishua' tesha' mei'ot shib'im usheloshah. ezra 2:37	benei 'imer 'elef khamishim ushenayim. ezra 2:38	benei fashkhur 'elef matayim 'arba'im veshib'ah. ezra 2:39	benei kharim 'elef veshib'ah 'asar. ezra 2:40	halviyim benei yeishua' veqadmi'el libnei hodavyah shib'im ve'arba'ah. ezra 2:41	hamshorerim benei 'asaf mei'ah 'esrim ushemonah. ezra 2:42	benei hasho'arim benei shalum benei 'ater benei talmon benei 'aqub benei khatita benei shobai hakol mei'ah sheloshim vetish'ah. ezra 2:43	hanetinim benei zikha benei khasufa benei taba'ot. ezra 2:44	benei qeiros benei si'aha benei fadon. ezra 2:45	benei lebanah benei khagabah benei 'aqub. ezra 2:46	benei khagab benei shamlai shalmai benei khanan. ezra 2:47	benei gidel benei gakhar benei re'ayah. ezra 2:48	benei rezin benei neqoda benei gazam. ezra 2:49	benei 'uza benei faseiakh benei beisai. ezra 2:50	benei 'asnah benei me'inim me'unim benei nefisim nefusim. ezra 2:51	benei baqbuq benei khaqufa benei kharkhur. ezra 2:52	benei bazlut benei mekhida benei kharsha. ezra 2:53	benei barqos benei sisera benei tamakh. ezra 2:54	benei neziakh benei khatifa. ezra 2:55	benei 'abdei shelomoh benei sotai benei hasoferet benei feruda. ezra 2:56	benei ya'lah benei darqon benei gidel. ezra 2:57	benei shefatyah benei khatil benei pokheret hazebayim benei 'ami. ezra 2:58	kal hanetinim ubenei 'abdei shelomoh shelosh mei'ot tish'im ushenayim. ezra 2:59	ve'eleh ha'olim mitel melakh tel kharsha kerub 'adan 'imer velo yakhelu lehagid bet 'abotam vezar'am 'im miyisra'el hem. ezra 2:60	benei delayah benei tobiyah benei neqoda shesh mei'ot khamishim ushenayim. ezra 2:61	umibenei hakohanim benei khobayah benei haqoz benei barzilai 'asher laqakh mibenot barzilai hagil'adi 'ishah vayiqarei 'al shemam. ezra 2:62	'eleh biqshu khetabam hamityakhsim velo nimza'u vaygo'alu min hakehunah. ezra 2:63	vayomer hatirshata lahem 'asher lo yokhelu miqodesh haqodashim 'ad 'amod kohen le'urim uletumim. ezra 2:64	kal haqahal ke'ekhad 'arba' ribo 'alpayim shelosh mei'ot shishim. ezra 2:65	milebad 'abdeihem ve'amhoteihem 'eleh shib'at 'alafim shelosh mei'ot sheloshim veshib'ah velahem meshorerim umeshorerot matayim. ezra 2:66	suseihem sheba' mei'ot sheloshim veshishah pirdeihem matayim 'arba'im vakhamishah. ezra 2:67	gemaleihem 'arba' mei'ot sheloshim vakhamishah khamorim sheishet 'alafim sheba' mei'ot ve'esrim. ezra 2:68	umeirashei ha'abot bebo'am lebet yhvh 'asher birushalim hitnadebu lebet ha'elohim leha'amido 'al mekhono. ezra 2:69	kekhokham natenu le'ozar hamelakhah zahab darkemonim shesh ribot va'elef vekhesef manim khameishet 'alafim vekhatenot kohanim mei'ah. ezra 2:70	vayeishebu hakohanim vehalviyim umin ha'am vehamshorerim vehasho'arim vehanetinim be'areihem vekhal yisra'el be'areihem. ezra 3:1	vayiga' hakhodesh hashebi'i ubenei yisra'el be'arim vayei'asefu ha'am ke'ish 'ekhad 'el yerushalim. ezra 3:2	vayaqam yeishua' ben yozadaq ve'ekhav hakohanim uzerubabel ben she'alti'el ve'ekhav vayibnu 'et mizbakh 'elohei yisra'el leha'alot 'alav 'olot kakatub betorat mosheh 'ish ha'elohim. ezra 3:3	vayakhinu hamizbeiakh 'al mekhonotav ki be'eimah 'aleihem mei'amei ha'arazot vaya'al vaya'alu 'alav 'olot yhvh 'olot laboqer vela'areb. ezra 3:4	vaya'asu 'et khag hasukot kakatub ve'olat yom beyom bemispar kemishpat debar yom beyomo. ezra 3:5	ve'akhareikhen 'olat tamid velekhodashim ulekhal mo'adei yhvh hamqudashim ulekhol mitnadeb nedabah yhvh. ezra 3:6	miyom 'ekhad lakhodesh hashebi'i heikhelu leha'alot 'olot yhvh veheikhal yhvh lo yusad. ezra 3:7	vayitenu khesef lakhozebim velekharashim uma'akhal umishteh vashemen lazidonim velazorim lehabi 'azei 'arazim min halebanon 'el yam yafo kerishyon koresh melekh paras 'aleihem. ezra 3:8	ubashanah hasheinit lebo'am 'el bet ha'elohim lirushalim bakhodesh hasheini heikhelu zerubabel benosh 'alti'el veyeishua' ben yozadaq ushe'ar 'akheihem hakohanim vehalviyim vekhal haba'im meihashebi yerushalim vaya'amidu 'et halviyim miben 'esrim shanah vama'lah lenazeiakh 'al melekhet bet yhvh. ezra 3:9	vaya'amod yeishua' banav ve'ekhav qadmi'el ubanav benei yehudah ke'ekhad lenazeiakh 'al 'oseh hamelakhah bebet ha'elohim benei kheinadad beneihem va'akheihem halviyim. ezra 3:10	veyisedu habonim 'et heikhal yhvh vaya'amidu hakohanim melubashim bakhazozerot vehalviyim benei 'asaf bamziltayim lehalel 'et yhvh 'al yedei david melekh yisra'el. ezra 3:11	vaya'anu behalel ubehodot yhvh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo 'al yisra'el vekhal ha'am heiri'u teru'ah gedolah behalel yhvh 'al husad bet yhvh. ezra 3:12	verabim meihakohanim vehalviyim verashei ha'abot hazeqeinim 'asher ra'u 'et habayit harishon beyasedo zeh habayit be'eineihem bokhim beqol gadol verabim bitru'ah besimkhah leharim qol. ezra 3:13	ve'en ha'am makirim qol teru'at hasimkhah leqol bekhi ha'am ki ha'am meri'im teru'ah gedolah vehaqol nishma' 'ad lemeirakhoq. ezra 4:1	vayishme'u zarei yehudah ubinyamin ki benei hagolah bonim heikhal yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. ezra 4:2	vayigeshu 'el zerubabel ve'el rashei ha'abot vayomeru lahem nibneh 'imakhem ki khakhem nidrosh leiloheikhem velo velo 'anakhnu zobekhim mimei 'eisar khadon melekh 'ashur hama'aleh 'otanu poh. ezra 4:3	vayomer lahem zerubabel veyeishua' ushe'ar rashei ha'abot leyisra'el lo lakhem valanu libnot bayit leiloheinu ki 'anakhnu yakhad nibneh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el ka'asher zivanu hamelekh koresh melekh paras. ezra 4:4	vayhi 'am ha'arez merapim yedei 'am yehudah umebalahim umebahalim 'otam libnot. ezra 4:5	vesokherim 'aleihem yo'azim lehafer 'azatam kal yemei koresh melekh paras ve'ad malkhut dareyavesh melekh paras. ezra 4:6	ubemalkhut 'akhashveirosh bitkhilat malkhuto katebu sitnah 'al yoshebei yehudah virushalim. ezra 4:7	ubimei 'artakhshasta katab bishlam mitredat tabe'el ushe'ar kenavoto kenavotav 'al 'artakhshasta 'artakhshast melekh paras ukhetab hanishtevan katub 'aramit umeturgam 'aramit. ezra 4:8	rekhum be'el te'em veshimshai safera ketabu 'igerah khadah 'al yerushelem le'artakhshast malka keneima. ezra 4:9	'edayin rekhum be'el te'em veshimshai safera ushe'ar kenavatehon dinayei va'afarsatkhayei tarpelayei 'afaresayei 'arkevai 'arkevayei babelayei shushankhayei dihu dehayei 'eilemayei. ezra 4:10	ushe'ar 'umaya di hagli 'asenapar raba veyaqira vehoteb himo beqiryah di shamerayin ushe'ar 'abar naharah ukhe'enet. ezra 4:11	denah parshegen 'igarta di shelakhu 'alohi 'al 'artakhshast malka 'abdayikh 'enash 'abar naharah ukhe'enet. ezra 4:12	yedia' lehevei lemalka di yehudayei di seliqu min levatakh 'alena 'ato lirushelem qiryeta maradeta ubiyosheta veshuraya veshuraya 'eshkhelilu shakhlilu ve'ushaya yakhitu. ezra 4:13	ke'an yedia' lehevei lemalka di hen qiryeta dakh titbenei veshurayah yishtakhlelun mindah belo vahalakh la yintenun ve'apetom malkhim tehanziq. ezra 4:14	ke'an kal qobel di melakh heikhela melakhna ve'arvat malka la 'arikh lana lemekhezei 'al denah shelakhna vehoda'na lemalka. ezra 4:15	di yebaqar bisfar dakheranaya di 'abahatakh utehashkakh bisfar dakheranaya vetinda' di qiryeta dakh qirya marada umehanzeqat malkhin umedinan ve'eshtadur 'abedin begavah min yomat 'alema 'al denah qiryeta dakh hakharebat. ezra 4:16	mehod'in 'anakhnah lemalka di hen qiryeta dakh titbenei veshurayah yishtakhlelun laqobel denah khalaq ba'abar nahara la 'itai lakh. ezra 4:17	pitgama shelakh malka 'al rekhum be'el te'em veshimshai safera ushe'ar kenavatehon di yatebin beshamerayin ushe'ar 'abar naharah shelam ukhe'et. ezra 4:18	nishtevana di shelakhtun 'alena mefarash qeri qadamai. ezra 4:19	umini sim te'em ubaqaru vehashkakhu di qiryeta dakh min yomat 'alema 'al malkhin mitnase'ah umerad ve'eshtadur mit'abed bah. ezra 4:20	umalkhin taqifin havo 'al yerushelem veshalitin bekhol 'abar naharah umidah belo vahalakh mityeheb lehon. ezra 4:21	ke'an simu te'em lebatala gubraya 'ilekh veqiryeta dakh la titbenei 'ad mini ta'ma yitesam. ezra 4:22	uzehirin hevo shalu leme'bad 'al denah lemah yisgei khabala lehanzaqat malkhin. ezra 4:23	'edayin min di parshegen nishtevana di 'artakhshasta 'artakhshast malka qeri qodam rekhum veshimshai safera ukhenavatehon 'azalu bibhilu lirushelem 'al yehudayei ubatilu himo be'edra' vekhayil. ezra 4:24	beidayin beteilat 'abidat bet 'elaha di birushelem vahavat batela 'ad shenat tarten lemalkhut dareyavesh melekh paras. ezra 5:1	vehitnabi khagai nebi'ah nebiya uzekharyah bar 'ido nebi'aya nebiyaya 'al yehudayei di bihud ubirushelem beshum 'elah yisra'el 'aleihon. ezra 5:2	beidayin qamu zerubabel bar she'alti'el veyeishua' bar yozadaq veshariv lemibnei bet 'elaha di birushelem ve'imehon nebi'aya nebiyaya di 'elaha mesa'adin lehon ezra 5:3	beh zimna 'ata 'aleihon tatenai pakhat 'abar naharah ushetar boznai ukhenavatehon vekhen 'amerin lehom man sam lekhom te'em bayta denah libenei ve'usharna denah leshakhlalah. ezra 5:4	'edayin keneima 'amarna lehom man 'inun shemahat gubraya di denah binyana banayin. ezra 5:5	ve'en 'elahahom havat 'al sabei yehudayei vela batilu himo 'ad ta'ma ledareyavesh yehakh ve'edayin yetibun nishtevana 'al denah. ezra 5:6	parshegen 'igarta di shelakh tatenai pakhat 'abar naharah ushetar boznai ukhenavateh 'afarsekhayei di ba'abar naharah 'al dareyavesh malka. ezra 5:7	pitgama shelakhu 'alohi vekhidnah ketib begaveh ledareyavesh malka shelama khola. ezra 5:8	yedia' lehevei lemalka di 'azalna lihud medineta lebet 'elaha raba vehu mitbenei 'eben gelal ve'a' mitesam bekhutlaya va'abideta dakh 'aseparna mit'abda umazlakh beyedhom. ezra 5:9	'edayin she'eilena lesabaya 'ilekh keneima 'amarna lehom man sam lekhom te'em bayta denah lemibneyah ve'usharna denah leshakhlalah. ezra 5:10	ve'af shemahatehom she'eilena lehom lehoda'utakh di nikhtub shum gubraya di berasheihom. ezra 5:11	ukheneima fitgama hatibuna lemeimar 'anakhna himo 'abdohi di 'elah shemaya ve'ar'a ubanayin bayta di hava beneh miqadmat denah shenin sagi'an umelekh leyisra'el rab benahi veshakhleleh. ezra 5:12	lahen min di hargizu 'abahotana le'elah shemaya yehab himo beyad nebukhadnezar melekh babel kasdaya kasda'ah ubaytah denah satreh ve'amah hagli lebabel. ezra 5:13	beram bishnat khadah lekhoresh malka di babel koresh malka sam te'em bet 'elaha denah libenei. ezra 5:14	ve'af manaya di bet 'elaha di dahabah vekhaspa di nebukhadnezar hanpeq min heikhela di birushelem veheibel himo leheikhela di babel hanpeq himo koresh malka min heikhela di babel vihibu lesheishebazar shemeh di fekhah sameh. ezra 5:15	va'amar leh 'eleh 'el manaya se 'eizel 'akhet himo beheikhela di birushelem ubet 'elaha yitbenei 'al 'atreh. ezra 5:16	'edayin sheishebazar dekh 'ata yehab 'ushaya di bet 'elaha di birushelem umin 'edayin ve'ad ke'an mitbenei vela shelim. ezra 5:17	ukhe'an hen 'al malka tab yitbaqar bebet ginzaya di malka tamah di bebabel hen 'itai di min koresh malka sim te'em lemibnei bet 'elaha dekh birushelem ure'ut malka 'al denah yishlakh 'alena. ezra 6:1	beidayin dareyavesh malka sam te'em ubaqaru bebet sifraya di ginzaya mehakhatin tamah bebabel. ezra 6:2	vehishtekhakh be'akhmeta bebireta di bemadai medinetah megilah khadah vekhen ketib begavah dikhronah. ezra 6:3	bishnat khadah lekhoresh malka koresh malka sam te'em bet 'elaha birushelem bayta yitbenei 'atar di dabekhin dibkhin ve'ushohi mesoblin rumeh 'amin shitin petayeh 'amin shitin. ezra 6:4	nidbakhin di 'eben gelal telata venidbakh di 'a' khadat venifqeta min bet malka tityehib. ezra 6:5	ve'af manei bet 'elaha di dahabah vekhaspa di nebukhadnezar hanpeq min heikhela di birushelem veheibel lebabel yahatibun vihakh leheikhela di birushelem le'atreh vetakhet bebet 'elaha. ezra 6:6	ke'an tatenai pakhat 'abar naharah shetar boznai ukhenavatehon 'afarsekhayei di ba'abar naharah rakhiqin havo min tamah. ezra 6:7	shebuqu la'abidat bet 'elaha dekh pakhat yehudayei ulesabei yehudayei bet 'elaha dekh yibnon 'al 'atreh. ezra 6:8	umini sim te'em lema di ta'abdun 'im sabei yehudayei 'ilekh lemibnei bet 'elaha dekh uminikhsei malka di midat 'abar naharah 'aseparna nifqeta tehevei mityahaba legubraya 'ilekh di la lebatala. ezra 6:9	umah khashkhan ubenei torin vedikhrin ve'imerin la'alavan le'elah shemaya khintin melakh khamar umeshakh kemeimar kahanaya di birushelem lehevei mityeheb lehom yom beyom di la shalu. ezra 6:10	di lehevon mehaqrebin nikhokhin le'elah shemaya umezalayin lekhayei malka ubenohi. ezra 6:11	umini sim te'em di khal 'enash di yehashnei pitgama denah yitnesakh 'a' min bayteh uzeqif yitmekhei 'alohi ubayteh nevalu yit'abed 'al denah. ezra 6:12	veilaha di shakin shemeh tamah yemagar kal melekh ve'am di yishlakh yedeh lehashnayah lekhabalah bet 'elaha dekh di birushelem 'anah dareyavesh samet te'em 'aseparna yit'abid. ezra 6:13	'edayin tatenai pakhat 'abar naharah shetar boznai ukhenavatehon laqobel di shelakh dareyavesh malka keneima 'aseparna 'abadu. ezra 6:14	vesabei yehudayei banayin umazlekhin binbu'at khagai nebi'ah nebiya uzekharyah bar 'ido ubeno veshakhlilu min ta'am 'elah yisra'el umite'em koresh vedareyavesh ve'artakhshast melekh paras. ezra 6:15	vesheizi baytah denah 'ad yom telatah lirakh 'adar di hi shenat shet lemalkhut dareyavesh malka. ezra 6:16	va'abadu benei yisra'el kahanaya veleivayei ushe'ar benei galuta khanukat bet 'elaha denah bekhedvah. ezra 6:17	vehaqribu lakhanukat bet 'elaha denah torin me'ah dikhrin matayin 'imerin 'arba' me'ah uzefirei 'izin lekhataya lekhata'ah 'al kal yisra'el terei 'asar leminyan shibtei yisra'el. ezra 6:18	vahaqimu khahanaya biflugatehon veleivayei bemakhleqatehon 'al 'abidat 'elaha di birushelem kikhtab sefar mosheh. ezra 6:19	vaya'asu benei hagolah 'et hapasakh be'arba'ah 'asar lakhodesh harishon. ezra 6:20	ki hitaharu hakohanim vehalviyim ke'ekhad kulam tehorim vayishkhatu hapesakh lekhal benei hagolah vela'akheihem hakohanim velahem. ezra 6:21	vayokhelu benei yisra'el hashabim meihagolah vekhol hanibdal mitum'at goyei ha'arez 'aleihem lidrosh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. ezra 6:22	vaya'asu khag mazot shib'at yamim besimkhah ki simekham yhvh veheiseb leb melekh 'ashur 'aleihem lekhazeq yedeihem bimlekhet bet ha'elohim 'elohei yisra'el. ezra 7:1	ve'akhar hadebarim ha'eleh bemalkhut 'artakhshast melekh paras 'ezra ben serayah ben 'azaryah ben khilqiyah. ezra 7:2	ben shalum ben zadoq ben 'akhitub. ezra 7:3	ben 'amaryah ben 'azaryah ben merayot. ezra 7:4	ben zerakhyah ben 'uzi ben buqi. ezra 7:5	ben 'abishua' ben pinekhas ben 'el'azar ben 'aharon hakohen harosh. ezra 7:6	hu 'ezra 'alah mibabel vehu sofer mahir betorat mosheh 'asher natan yhvh 'elohei yisra'el vayiten lo hamelekh keyad yhvh 'elohav 'alav kol baqashato. ezra 7:7	vaya'alu mibenei yisra'el umin hakohanim vehalviyim vehamshorerim vehasho'arim vehanetinim 'el yerushalim bishnat sheba' le'artakhshast hamelekh. ezra 7:8	vayabo yerushalim bakhodesh hakhamishi hi shenat hashebi'it lamelekh. ezra 7:9	ki be'ekhad lakhodesh harishon hu yesud hama'alah mibabel ube'ekhad lakhodesh hakhamishi ba 'el yerushalim keyad 'elohav hatobah 'alav. ezra 7:10	ki 'ezra heikhin lebabo lidrosh 'et torat yhvh vela'asot ulelamed beyisra'el khoq umishpat. ezra 7:11	vezeh parshegen hanishtevan 'asher natan hamelekh 'artakhshast le'ezra hakohen hasofer sofer dibrei mizvot yhvh vekhuqav 'al yisra'el. ezra 7:12	'artakhshast melekh malkhaya le'ezra khahana safar data di 'elah shemaya gemir ukhe'enet. ezra 7:13	mini sim te'em di khal mitnadab bemalkhuti min 'amah yisra'el vekhahanohi veleivayei limhakh lirushelem 'imakh yehakh. ezra 7:14	kal qobel di min qodam malka veshib'at ya'atohi sheliakh lebaqara 'al yehud velirushelem bedat 'elahakh di bidakh. ezra 7:15	uleheibalah kesaf udehab di malka veya'atohi hitnadabu le'elah yisra'el di birushelem mishkeneh. ezra 7:16	vekhol kesaf udehab di tehashkakh bekhol medinat babel 'im hitnadabut 'ama vekhahanaya mitnadebin lebet 'elahahom di birushelem. ezra 7:17	kal qobel denah 'aseparna tiqnei bekhaspa denah torin dikhrin 'imerin uminkhatehon veniskeihon uteqareb himo 'al madbekhah di bet 'elahakhom di birushelem. ezra 7:18	umah di 'alayikh 'alakh ve'al 'ekhayikh 'ekhakh yitab bish'ar kaspa vedahabah leme'bad kir'ut 'elahakhom ta'abdun. ezra 7:19	umanaya di mityahabin lakh lefalekhan bet 'elahakh hashlem qodam 'elah yerushelem. ezra 7:20	ushe'ar khashkhut bet 'elahakh di yipel lakh lemintan tinten min bet ginzei malka. ezra 7:21	umini 'anah 'artakhshast malka sim te'em lekhol gizabraya di ba'abar naharah di khal di yish'alenkhon 'ezra khahanah safar data di 'elah shemaya 'aseparna yit'abid. ezra 7:22	'ad kesaf kakerin me'ah ve'ad khintin korin me'ah ve'ad khamar batin me'ah ve'ad batin meshakh me'ah umelakh di la khetab. ezra 7:23	kal di min ta'am 'elah shemaya yit'abed 'adrazda lebet 'elah shemaya di lemah lehevei qezaf 'al malkhut malka ubenohi. ezra 7:24	ulekhom mehod'in di khal kahanaya veleivayei zamaraya tara'aya netinaya ufalekhei bet 'elaha denah mindah belo vahalakh la shalit lemirmei 'aleihom. ezra 7:25	ve'ant 'ezra kekhakhemat 'elahakh di bidakh meni shafetin vedayanin di lehevon da'anin dayenin lekhal 'amah di ba'abar naharah lekhal yade'ei datei 'elahakh vedi la yada' tehod'un. ezra 7:26	vekhal di la lehevei 'abed data di 'elahakh vedata di malka 'aseparna dinah lehevei mit'abed mineh hen lemot hen lishroshu lishroshi hen la'anash nikhsin vele'esurin. ezra 7:27	barukh yhvh 'elohei 'aboteinu 'asher natan kazot beleb hamelekh lefa'er 'et bet yhvh 'asher birushalim. ezra 7:28	ve'alai hitah khesed lifnei hamelekh veyo'azav ulekhal sarei hamelekh hagiborim va'ani hitkhazaqti keyad yhvh 'elohai 'alai va'eqbezah miyisra'el rashim la'alot 'imi. ezra 8:1	ve'eleh rashei 'aboteihem vehityakhsam ha'olim 'imi bemalkhut 'artakhshast hamelekh mibabel. ezra 8:2	mibenei finekhas geireshom mibenei 'itamar daniyel mibenei david khatush. ezra 8:3	mibenei shekhanyah mibenei far'osh zekharyah ve'imo hityakhes lizkharim mei'ah vakhamishim. ezra 8:4	mibenei pakhat mo'ab 'elyeho'einai ben zerakhyah ve'imo matayim hazekharim. ezra 8:5	mibenei shekhanyah ben yakhazi'el ve'imo shelosh mei'ot hazekharim. ezra 8:6	umibenei 'adin 'ebed ben yonatan ve'imo khamishim hazekharim. ezra 8:7	umibenei 'eilam yesha'yah ben 'atalyah ve'imo shib'im hazekharim. ezra 8:8	umibenei shefatyah zebadyah ben mikha'el ve'imo shemonim hazekharim. ezra 8:9	mibenei yo'ab 'obadyah ben yekhi'el ve'imo matayim ushemonah 'asar hazekharim. ezra 8:10	umibenei shelomit ben yosifyah ve'imo mei'ah veshishim hazekharim. ezra 8:11	umibenei beibai zekharyah ben beibai ve'imo 'esrim ushemonah hazekharim. ezra 8:12	umibenei 'azgad yokhanan ben haqatan ve'imo mei'ah va'asarah hazekharim. ezra 8:13	umibenei 'adoniqam 'akharonim ve'eleh shemotam 'elifelet ye'i'el ushema'yah ve'imahem shishim hazekharim. ezra 8:14	umibenei bigvai 'utai vezabud vezakur ve'imo shib'im hazekharim. ezra 8:15	va'eqbezem 'el hanahar haba 'el 'ahava vanakhaneh sham yamim sheloshah va'abinah ba'am ubakohanim umibenei leivi lo mazati sham. ezra 8:16	va'eshlekhah le'eli'ezer la'ari'el lishma'yah ule'elnatan uleyarib ule'elnatan ulenatan velizkharyah velimshulam rashim uleyoyarib ule'elnatan mebinim ezra 8:17	va'ozi'ah va'azaveh 'otam 'al 'ido harosh bekhasifya hamaqom va'asimah befihem debarim ledaber 'el 'ido 'akhiv hanetunim hanetinim bekhasifya hamaqom lehabi lanu mesharetim lebet 'eloheinu. ezra 8:18	vayabi''u lanu keyad 'eloheinu hatobah 'aleinu 'ish sekhel mibenei makhli ben leivi ben yisra'el vesheireibeyah ubanav ve'ekhav shemonah 'asar. ezra 8:19	ve'et khashabyah ve'ito yesha'yah mibenei merari 'ekhav ubeneihem 'esrim. ezra 8:20	umin hanetinim shenatan david vehasarim la'abodat halviyim netinim matayim ve'esrim kulam niqebu besheimot. ezra 8:21	va'eqra sham zom 'al hanahar 'ahava lehit'anot lifnei 'eloheinu lebaqesh mimenu derekh yesharah lanu uletapeinu ulekhal rekhusheinu. ezra 8:22	ki bosheti lish'ol min hamelekh khayil ufarashim le'azereinu mei'oyeb badarekh ki 'amarnu lamelekh leimor yad 'eloheinu 'al kal mebaqshav letobah ve'uzo ve'apo 'al kal 'ozebav. ezra 8:23	vanazumah vanebaqshah mei'eloheinu 'al zot vayei'ater lanu. ezra 8:24	va'abdilah misarei hakohanim shenem 'asar lesheireibeyah khashabyah ve'imahem mei'akheihem 'asarah. ezra 8:25	va'eshqolah va'eshqolah lahem 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab ve'et hakeilim terumat bet 'eloheinu haheirimu hamelekh veyo'azav vesarav vekhal yisra'el hanimza'im. ezra 8:26	va'eshqalah 'al yadam kesef kikarim shesh mei'ot vakhamishim ukhelei khesef mei'ah lekhikarim zahab mei'ah khikar. ezra 8:27	ukheforei zahab 'esrim la'adarkhonim 'alef ukhelei nekhoshet muzhab tobah shenayim khamudot kazahab. ezra 8:28	va'omerah 'aleihem 'atem qodesh yhvh vehakeilim qodesh vehakesef vehazahab nedabah yhvh 'elohei 'aboteikhem. ezra 8:29	shiqdu veshimru 'ad tishqelu lifnei sarei hakohanim vehalviyim vesarei ha'abot leyisra'el birushalim halishkhot bet yhvh. ezra 8:30	veqibelu hakohanim vehalviyim mishqal hakesef vehazahab vehakeilim lehabi lirushalim lebet 'eloheinu. ezra 8:31	vanis'ah minehar 'ahava bishnem 'asar lakhodesh harishon lalekhet yerushalim veyad 'eloheinu hayetah 'aleinu vayazileinu mikaf 'oyeb ve'oreb 'al hadarekh. ezra 8:32	vanabo yerushalim vaneisheb sham yamim sheloshah. ezra 8:33	ubayom harebi'i nishqal hakesef vehazahab vehakeilim bebet 'eloheinu 'al yad mereimot ben 'uriyah hakohen ve'imo 'el'azar ben pinekhas ve'imahem yozabad ben yeishua' veno'adyah ben binui halviyim. ezra 8:34	bemispar bemishqal lakol vayikateb kal hamishqal ba'et hahi. ezra 8:35	haba'im meihashebi benei hagolah hiqribu 'olot leilohei yisra'el parim shenem 'asar 'al kal yisra'el 'eilim tish'im veshishah kebasim shib'im veshib'ah zefirei khatat shenem 'asar hakol 'olah yhvh. ezra 8:36	vayitenu 'et datei hamelekh la'akhashdarpenei hamelekh ufakhavot 'eiber hanahar venise'u 'et ha'am ve'et bet ha'elohim. ezra 9:1	ukhekhalot 'eleh nigeshu 'eilai hasarim leimor lo nibdelu ha'am yisra'el vehakohanim vehalviyim mei'amei ha'arazot keto'aboteihem lakena'ani hakhiti haperizi haybusi ha'amoni hamo'abi hamizri veha'emori. ezra 9:2	ki nase'u mibenoteihem lahem velibneihem vehit'arebu zera' haqodesh be'amei ha'arazot veyad hasarim vehaseganim hayetah bama'al hazeh rishonah. ezra 9:3	ukheshame'i 'et hadabar hazeh qara'ti 'et bigdi ume'ili va'emretah mise'ar roshi uzeqani va'eishebah meshomem. ezra 9:4	ve'eilai yei'asefu kol khared bedibrei 'elohei yisra'el 'al ma'al hagolah va'ani yosheb meshomem 'ad leminkhat ha'areb. ezra 9:5	ubeminkhat ha'ereb qamti mita'aniti ubeqare'i bigdi ume'ili va'ekhre'ah 'al birkai va'efresah khapai 'el yhvh 'elohai. ezra 9:6	va'omerah 'elohai bosheti venikhlamti leharim 'elohai panai 'eilekha ki 'avonoteinu rabu lema'lah rosh ve'ashmateinu gadelah 'ad lashamayim. ezra 9:7	mimei 'aboteinu 'anakhnu be'ashmah gedolah 'ad hayom hazeh uba'avonoteinu nitanu 'anakhnu melakheinu khohaneinu beyad malkhei ha'arazot bakhereb bashebi ubabizah ubeboshet panim kehayom hazeh. ezra 9:8	ve'atah kim'at rega' hayetah tekhinah mei'et yhvh 'eloheinu lehash'ir lanu peleitah velatet lanu yated bimqom qadesho leha'ir 'eineinu 'eloheinu uletiteinu mikhyah me'at be'abduteinu. ezra 9:9	ki 'abadim 'anakhnu ube'abduteinu lo 'azabanu 'eloheinu vayat 'aleinu khesed lifnei malkhei faras latet lanu mikhyah leromem 'et bet 'eloheinu uleha'amid 'et kharebotav velatet lanu gader bihudah ubirushalim. ezra 9:10	ve'atah mah nomar 'eloheinu 'akharei zot ki 'azabnu mizvotekha. ezra 9:11	'asher zivita beyad 'abadekha hanebi'im leimor ha'arez 'asher 'atem ba'im lerishtah 'erez nidah hi benidat 'amei ha'arazot beto'aboteihem 'asher mil'uha mipeh 'el peh betum'atam. ezra 9:12	ve'atah benoteikhem 'al titenu libneihem ubenoteihem 'al tis'u libneikhem velo tidreshu shelomam vetobatam 'ad 'olam lema'an tekhezqu va'akhaltem 'et tub ha'arez vehorashtem libneikhem 'ad 'olam. ezra 9:13	ve'akharei kal haba 'aleinu bema'aseinu hara'im ube'ashmateinu hagedolah ki 'atah 'eloheinu khasakhta lematah mei'avoneinu venatatah lanu peleitah kazot. ezra 9:14	hanashub lehafer mizvotekha ulehitkhaten be'amei hato'eibot ha'eleh halo te'enaf banu 'ad kaleh le'en she'eirit ufeleitah. ezra 9:15	yhvh 'elohei yisra'el zadiq 'atah ki nish'arnu feleitah kehayom hazeh hinu lefanekha be'ashmateinu ki 'en la'amod lefanekha 'al zot. ezra 10:1	ukhehitpalel 'ezra ukhehitvadoto bokheh umitnapel lifnei bet ha'elohim niqbezu 'eilav miyisra'el qahal rab me'od 'anashim venashim viladim ki bakhu ha'am harbeh bekheh. ezra 10:2	vaya'an shekhanyah ben yekhi'el mibenei 'olam 'eilam vayomer le'ezra 'anakhnu ma'alnu beiloheinu vanosheb nashim nakheriyot mei'amei ha'arez ve'atah yesh miqveh leyisra'el 'al zot. ezra 10:3	ve'atah nikhrat berit leiloheinu lehozi khal nashim vehanolad meihem ba'azat 'adonai vehakhareidim bemizvat 'eloheinu vekhatorah yei'aseh. ezra 10:4	qum ki 'alekha hadabar va'anakhnu 'imakh khazaq va'aseh. ezra 10:5	vayaqam 'ezra vayashba' 'et sarei hakohanim halviyim vekhal yisra'el la'asot kadabar hazeh vayishabei'u. ezra 10:6	vayaqam 'ezra milifnei bet ha'elohim vayeilekh 'el lishkat yehokhanan ben 'elyashib vayeilekh sham lekhem lo 'akhal umayim lo shatah ki mit'abel 'al ma'al hagolah. ezra 10:7	vaya'abiru qol bihudah virushalim lekhol benei hagolah lehiqabez yerushalim. ezra 10:8	vekhol 'asher lo yabo lishloshet hayamim ka'azat hasarim vehazeqeinim yakhoram kal rekhusho vehu yibadel miqehal hagolah. ezra 10:9	vayiqabezu khal 'anshei yehudah ubinyamin yerushalim lishloshet hayamim hu khodesh hateshi'i be'esrim bakhodesh vayeishebu khal ha'am birkhob bet ha'elohim mar'idim 'al hadabar umeihageshamim. ezra 10:10	vayaqam 'ezra hakohen vayomer 'aleihem 'atem me'altem vatoshibu nashim nakheriyot lehosif 'al 'ashmat yisra'el. ezra 10:11	ve'atah tenu todah yhvh 'elohei 'aboteikhem va'asu rezono vehibadelu mei'amei ha'arez umin hanashim hanakheriyot. ezra 10:12	vaya'nu khal haqahal vayomeru qol gadol ken kedibrekha kidbarekha 'aleinu la'asot. ezra 10:13	'abal ha'am rab veha'et geshamim ve'en koakh la'amod bakhuz vehamelakhah lo leyom 'ekhad velo lishnayim ki hirbinu lifshoa' badabar hazeh. ezra 10:14	ya'amdu na reinu lekhal haqahal vekhol 'asher be'areinu hahoshib nashim nakheriyot yabo le'itim mezumanim ve'imahem ziqnei 'ir va'ir veshofeteha 'ad lehashib kharon 'af 'eloheinu mimenu 'ad ladabar hazeh. ezra 10:15	'akh yonatan ben 'asah'el veyakhzeyah ben tiqvah 'amedu 'al zot umeshulam veshabetai haleivi 'azarum. ezra 10:16	vaya'asu khen benei hagolah vayibadelu 'ezra hakohen 'anashim rashei ha'abot lebet 'abotam vekhulam besheimot vayeishebu beyom 'ekhad lakhodesh ha'asiri ledaryosh hadabar. ezra 10:17	vaykhalu bakol 'anashim hahoshibu nashim nakheriyot 'ad yom 'ekhad lakhodesh harishon. ezra 10:18	vayimazei mibenei hakohanim 'asher hoshibu nashim nakheriyot mibenei yeishua' ben yozadaq ve'ekhav ma'aseiyah ve'eli'ezer veyarib ugedalyah. ezra 10:19	vayitenu yadam lehozi nesheihem va'asheimim 'el zon 'al 'ashmatam. ezra 10:20	umibenei 'imer khanani uzebadyah. ezra 10:21	umibenei kharim ma'aseiyah ve'eiliyah ushema'yah vikhi'el ve'uziyah. ezra 10:22	umibenei pashkhur 'elyo'einai ma'aseiyah yishma'el netan'el yozabad ve'el'asah. ezra 10:23	umin halviyim yozabad veshim'i veqeilayah hu qelita petakhyah yehudah ve'eli'ezer. ezra 10:24	umin hamshorerim 'elyashib umin hasho'arim shalum vatelem ve'uri. ezra 10:25	umiyisra'el mibenei far'osh ramyah veyiziyah umalkiyah umiyamin ve'el'azar umalkiyah ubenayah. ezra 10:26	umibenei 'eilam matanyah zekharyah vikhi'el ve'abdi vireimot ve'eiliyah. ezra 10:27	umibenei zatu 'elyo'einai 'elyashib matanyah vireimot vezabad va'aziza. ezra 10:28	umibenei beibai yehokhanan khananyah zabai 'atlai. ezra 10:29	umibenei bani meshulam malukh va'adayah yashub ushe'al yereimot veramot. ezra 10:30	umibenei pakhat mo'ab 'adna ukhelal benayah ma'aseiyah matanyah bezal'el ubinui umenasheh. ezra 10:31	ubenei kharim 'eli'ezer yishiyah malkiyah shema'yah shim'on. ezra 10:32	beneyamin malukh shemaryah. ezra 10:33	mibenei khashum matenai matatah zabad 'elifelet yereimai menasheh shim'i. ezra 10:34	mibenei bani ma'adai 'amram ve'u'el. ezra 10:35	benayah beideyah kelahai keluhu. ezra 10:36	vanyah mereimot 'elyashib. ezra 10:37	matanyah matenai veya'aso veya'asai. ezra 10:38	ubani ubinui shim'i. ezra 10:39	veshelemyah venatan va'adayah. ezra 10:40	makhnadbai shashai sharai. ezra 10:41	'azar'el veshelemyahu shemaryah. ezra 10:42	shalum 'amaryah yosef. ezra 10:43	mibenei nebo ye'i'el matityah zabad zebina yado yadai veyo'el benayah. ezra 10:44	kal 'eleh nase'u nase'u nashim nakheriyot veyesh meihem nashim vayasimu banim. 

nehemiah 1:1	dibrei nekhemyah ben khakhalyah vayhi bekhodesh kislev kislev shenat 'esrim va'ani hayiti beshushan habirah. nehemiah 1:2	vayabo khanani 'ekhad mei'akhai hu va'anashim mihudah va'esh'alem 'al hayehudim hapeleitah 'asher nish'aru min hashebi ve'al yerushalim. nehemiah 1:3	vayomeru li hanish'arim 'asher nish'aru min hashebi sham bamedinah bera'ah gedolah ubekherpah vekhomat yerushalim meforazet ushe'areha nizetu ba'esh. nehemiah 1:4	vayhi keshame'i 'et hadebarim ha'eleh yashabti va'ebkeh va'et'abelah yamim va'ehi zam umitpalel lifnei 'elohei hashamayim. nehemiah 1:5	va'omar 'ana yhvh 'elohei hashamayim ha'el hagadol vehanora shomer haberit vakhesed le'ohabav uleshomerei mizvotav. nehemiah 1:6	tehi na 'azenekha qashebet ve'einekha fetuvkhot lishmoa' 'el tefilat 'abdekha 'asher 'anokhi mitpalel lefanekha hayom yomam valaylah 'al benei yisra'el 'abadekha umitvadeh 'al khatot benei yisra'el 'asher khatanu lakh va'ani ubet 'abi khatanu. nehemiah 1:7	khabol khabalnu lakh velo shamarnu 'et hamizvot ve'et hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim 'asher zivita 'et mosheh 'abdekha. nehemiah 1:8	zekhar na 'et hadabar 'asher zivita 'et mosheh 'abdekha leimor 'atem tim'alu 'ani 'afiz 'etkhem ba'amim. nehemiah 1:9	veshabtem 'eilai ushemartem mizvotai va'asitem 'otam 'im yihyeh nidakhakhem biqzeh hashamayim misham 'aqabezem vahabo'otim vahabi'otim 'el hamaqom 'asher bakharti leshaken 'et shemi sham. nehemiah 1:10	vehem 'abadekha ve'amekha 'asher padita bekhokhakha hagadol ubeyadekha hakhazaqah. nehemiah 1:11	'ana 'adonai tehi na 'azenekha qashebet 'el tefilat 'abdekha ve'el tefilat 'abadekha hakhafeizim leyir'ah 'et shemekha vehazlikhah na le'abdekha hayom uteneihu lerakhamim lifnei ha'ish hazeh va'ani hayiti mashqeh lamelekh. nehemiah 2:1	vayhi bekhodesh nisan shenat 'esrim le'artakhshast hamelekh yayin lefanav va'esa 'et hayayin va'etenah lamelekh velo hayiti ra' lefanav. nehemiah 2:2	vayomer li hamelekh madua' panekha ra'im ve'atah 'einekha kholeh 'en zeh ki 'im roa' leb va'ira harbeh me'od. nehemiah 2:3	va'omar lamelekh hamelekh le'olam yikhyeh madua' lo yeire'u fanai 'asher ha'ir bet qibrot 'abotai khareibah ushe'areha 'ukelu ba'esh. nehemiah 2:4	vayomer li hamelekh 'al mah zeh 'atah mebaqesh va'etpalel 'el 'elohei hashamayim. nehemiah 2:5	va'omar lamelekh 'im 'al hamelekh tob ve'im yitab 'abdekha lefanekha 'asher tishlakheini 'el yehudah 'el 'ir qibrot 'abotai ve'ebnenah. nehemiah 2:6	vayomer li hamelekh vehasheigal yoshebet 'ezlo 'ad matai yihyeh mahalakhakha umatai tashub vayitab lifnei hamelekh vayishlakheini va'etenah lo zeman. nehemiah 2:7	va'omar lamelekh 'im 'al hamelekh tob 'igerot yitenu li 'al pakhavot 'eiber hanahar 'asher ya'abiruni 'ad 'asher 'abo 'el yehudah. nehemiah 2:8	ve'igeret 'el 'asaf shomer hapardes 'asher lamelekh 'asher yiten li 'eizim leqarot 'et sha'arei habirah 'asher labayit ulekhomat ha'ir velabayit 'asher 'abo 'eilav vayiten li hamelekh keyad 'elohai hatobah 'alai. nehemiah 2:9	va'abo 'el pakhavot 'eiber hanahar va'etenah lahem 'et 'igerot hamelekh vayishlakh 'imi hamelekh sarei khayil ufarashim. nehemiah 2:10	vayishma' sanbalat hakhoroni vetobiyah ha'ebed ha'amoni vayeira' lahem ra'ah gedolah 'asher ba 'adam lebaqesh tobah libnei yisra'el. nehemiah 2:11	va'abo 'el yerushalim va'ehi sham yamim sheloshah. nehemiah 2:12	va'aqum laylah 'ani va'anashim me'at 'imi velo higadti le'adam mah 'elohai noten 'el libi la'asot lirushalim ubeheimah 'en 'imi ki 'im habeheimah 'asher 'ani rokheb bah. nehemiah 2:13	va'eize'ah besha'ar hagai laylah ve'el penei 'en hatanin ve'el sha'ar ha'ashpot va'ehi sober bekhomot yerushalim 'asher hamforvazim hem peruzim ushe'areha 'ukelu ba'esh. nehemiah 2:14	va'e'ebor 'el sha'ar ha'ayin ve'el bereikhat hamelekh ve'en maqom labeheimah la'abor takhtai. nehemiah 2:15	va'ehi 'oleh banakhal laylah va'ehi sober bakhomah va'ashub va'abo besha'ar hagai va'ashub. nehemiah 2:16	vehaseganim lo yade'u 'anah halakhti umah 'ani 'oseh velayehudim velakohanim velakhorim velaseganim uleyeter 'oseh hamelakhah 'ad ken lo higadti. nehemiah 2:17	va'omar 'aleihem 'atem ro'im hara'ah 'asher 'anakhnu bah 'asher yerushalim khareibah ushe'areha nizetu ba'esh lekhu venibneh 'et khomat yerushalim velo nihyeh 'od kherpah. nehemiah 2:18	va'agid lahem 'et yad 'elohai 'asher hi tobah 'alai ve'af dibrei hamelekh 'asher 'amar li vayomeru naqum ubaninu vaykhazequ yedeihem latobah. nehemiah 2:19	vayishma' sanbalat hakhoroni vetobiyah ha'ebed ha'amoni vegeshem ha'arbi vayal'igu lanu vayibzu 'aleinu vayomeru mah hadabar hazeh 'asher 'atem 'osim ha'al hamelekh 'atem moredim. nehemiah 2:20	va'ashib 'otam dabar va'omar lahem 'elohei hashamayim hu yazliakh lanu va'anakhnu 'abadav naqum ubaninu velakhem 'en kheileq uzedaqah vezikaron birushalim. nehemiah 3:1	vayaqam 'elyashib hakohen hagadol ve'ekhav hakohanim vayibnu 'et sha'ar hazon hemah qideshuhu vaya'amidu daltotav ve'ad migdal hamei'ah qideshuhu 'ad migdal khanan'el. nehemiah 3:2	ve'al yado banu 'anshei yereikho ve'al yado banah zakur ben 'imri. nehemiah 3:3	ve'et sha'ar hadagim banu benei hasena'ah hemah qeiruhu vaya'amidu daltotav man'ulav uberikhav. nehemiah 3:4	ve'al yadam hekheziq mereimot ben 'uriyah ben haqoz ve'al yadam hekheziq meshulam ben berekhyah ben mesheizab'el ve'al yadam hekheziq zadoq ben ba'ana. nehemiah 3:5	ve'al yadam hekheziqu hateqo'im ve'adireihem lo heibi'u zavaram ba'abodat 'adoneihem. nehemiah 3:6	ve'et sha'ar hayshanah hekheziqu yoyada' ben paseiakh umeshulam ben besodyah hemah qeiruhu vaya'amidu daltotav uman'ulav uberikhav. nehemiah 3:7	ve'al yadam hekheziq melatyah hagib'oni veyadon hameironoti 'anshei gib'on vehamizpah lekhisei pakhat 'eiber hanahar. nehemiah 3:8	'al yado hekheziq 'uzi'el ben kharhayah zorfim ve'al yado hekheziq khananyah ben haraqakhim vaya'azbu yerushalim 'ad hakhomah harekhabah. nehemiah 3:9	ve'al yadam hekheziq refayah ben khur sar khazi pelekh yerushalim. nehemiah 3:10	ve'al yadam hekheziq yedayah ben kharumaf veneged beito ve'al yado hekheziq khatush ben khashabneyah. nehemiah 3:11	midah sheinit hekheziq malkiyah ben kharim vekhashub ben pakhat mo'ab ve'et migdal hatanurim. nehemiah 3:12	ve'al yado hekheziq shalum ben halokhesh sar khazi pelekh yerushalim hu ubenotav. nehemiah 3:13	'et sha'ar hagai hekheziq khanun veyoshebei zanoakh hemah banuhu vaya'amidu daltotav man'ulav uberikhav ve'elef 'amah bakhomah 'ad sha'ar hashafot. nehemiah 3:14	ve'et sha'ar ha'ashpot hekheziq malkiyah ben reikhab sar pelekh bet hakarem hu yibnenu veya'amid daltotav man'ulav uberikhav. nehemiah 3:15	ve'et sha'ar ha'ayin hekheziq shalun ben kal khozeh sar pelekh hamizpah hu yibnenu vitalenu veya'amidu veya'amid daltotav man'ulav uberikhav ve'et khomat bereikhat hashelakh legan hamelekh ve'ad hama'alot hayordot mei'ir david. nehemiah 3:16	'akharav hekheziq nekhemyah ben 'azbuq sar khazi pelekh bet zur 'ad neged qibrei david ve'ad habereikhah ha'asuyah ve'ad bet hagiborim. nehemiah 3:17	'akharav hekheziqu halviyim rekhum ben bani 'al yado hekheziq khashabyah sar khazi felekh qe'ilah lefilko. nehemiah 3:18	'akharav hekheziqu 'akheihem bavai ben kheinadad sar khazi pelekh qe'ilah. nehemiah 3:19	vaykhazeq 'al yado 'eizer ben yeishua' sar hamizpah midah sheinit mineged 'alot hanesheq hamiqzoa'. nehemiah 3:20	'akharav hekherah hekheziq barukh ben zabai zakai midah sheinit min hamiqzoa' 'ad petakh bet 'elyashib hakohen hagadol. nehemiah 3:21	'akharav hekheziq mereimot ben 'uriyah ben haqoz midah sheinit mipetakh bet 'elyashib ve'ad takhlit bet 'elyashib. nehemiah 3:22	ve'akharav hekheziqu hakohanim 'anshei hakikar. nehemiah 3:23	'akharav hekheziq binyamin vekhashub neged beitam 'akharav hekheziq 'azaryah ben ma'aseiyah ben 'ananeyah 'eizel beito. nehemiah 3:24	'akharav hekheziq binui ben kheinadad midah sheinit mibet 'azaryah 'ad hamiqzoa' ve'ad hapinah. nehemiah 3:25	palal ben 'uzai mineged hamiqzoa' vehamigdal hayozei mibet hamelekh ha'elyon 'asher lakhazar hamatarah 'akharav pedayah ben par'osh. nehemiah 3:26	vehanetinim hayu yoshebim ba'ofel 'ad neged sha'ar hamayim lamizrakh vehamigdal hayozei. nehemiah 3:27	'akharav hekheziqu hateqo'im midah sheinit mineged hamigdal hagadol hayozei ve'ad khomat ha'ofel. nehemiah 3:28	mei'al sha'ar hasusim hekheziqu hakohanim 'ish leneged beito. nehemiah 3:29	'akharav hekheziq zadoq ben 'imer neged beito ve'akharav hekheziq shema'yah ben shekhanyah shomer sha'ar hamizrakh. nehemiah 3:30	'akharei 'akharav hekheziq khananyah ben shelemyah vekhanun ben zalaf hashishi midah sheini 'akharav hekheziq meshulam ben berekhyah neged nishkato. nehemiah
