3:31	'akharei 'akharav hekheziq malkiyah ben hazorefi 'ad bet hanetinim veharokhelim neged sha'ar hamifqad ve'ad 'aliyat hapinah. nehemiah 3:32	uben 'aliyat hapinah lesha'ar hazon hekheziqu hazorefim veharokhelim. nehemiah 4:1	yehi ka'asher shama' sanbalat ki 'anakhnu bonim 'et hakhomah vayikhar lo vayikh'as harbeh vayal'eg 'al hayehudim. nehemiah 4:2	vayomer lifnei 'ekhav vekhel shomeron vayomer mah hayehudim ha'ameilalim 'osim haya'azbu lahem hayizbakhu haykhalu bayom haykhayu 'et ha'abanim mei'areimot he'afar vehemah serufot. nehemiah 4:3	vetobiyah ha'amoni 'ezlo vayomer gam 'asher hem bonim 'im ya'aleh shu'al ufaraz khomat 'abneihem. nehemiah 4:4	shema' 'eloheinu ki hayinu buzah vehasheb kherpatam 'el rosham utenem lebizah be'erez shibyah. nehemiah 4:5	ve'al tekhas 'al 'avonam vekhatatam milefanekha 'al timakheh ki hikh'isu leneged habonim. nehemiah 4:6	vanibneh 'et hakhomah vatiqasher kal hakhomah 'ad khezyah vayhi leb la'am la'asot. nehemiah 4:7	vayhi kha'asher shama' sanbalat vetobiyah veha'arbim veha'amonim veha'ashdodim ki 'aletah 'arukhah lekhomot yerushalim ki heikhelu haperuzim lehisatem vayikhar lahem me'od. nehemiah 4:8	vayiqsheru khulam yakhdav labo lehilakhem birushalim vela'asot lo to'ah. nehemiah 4:9	vanitpalel 'el 'eloheinu vana'amid mishmar 'aleihem yomam valaylah mipeneihem. nehemiah 4:10	vayomer yehudah kashal koakh hasabal vehe'afar harbeh va'anakhnu lo nukhal libnot bakhomah. nehemiah 4:11	vayomeru zareinu lo yeide'u velo yir'u 'ad 'asher nabo 'el tokham vaharagnum vehishbatnu 'et hamelakhah. nehemiah 4:12	vayhi ka'asher ba'u hayehudim hayoshebim 'ezlam vayomeru lanu 'eser pe'amim mikal hameqomot 'asher tashubu 'aleinu. nehemiah 4:13	va'a'amid mitakhtiyot lamaqom mei'akharei lakhomah bazekhikhiyim bazekhikhim va'a'amid 'et ha'am lemishpakhot 'im kharboteihem ramekheihem veqashetoteihem. nehemiah 4:14	va'eire va'aqum va'omar 'el hakhorim ve'el haseganim ve'el yeter ha'am 'al tire'u mipeneihem 'et 'adonai hagadol vehanora zekhoru vehilakhamu 'al 'akheikhem beneikhem ubenoteikhem nesheikhem ubateikhem. nehemiah 4:15	vayhi ka'asher shame'u 'oybeinu ki noda' lanu vayafer ha'elohim 'et 'azatam vanashub vanashab kulanu 'el hakhomah 'ish 'el melakhto. nehemiah 4:16	vayhi min hayom hahu khazi ne'arai 'osim bamelakhah vekhezyam makhaziqim veharemakhim hamaginim vehaqeshatot vehashiryonim vehasarim 'akharei kal bet yehudah. nehemiah 4:17	habonim bakhomah vehanose'im basebel 'omesim be'akhat yado 'oseh bamelakhah ve'akhat makhazeqet hashalakh. nehemiah 4:18	vehabonim 'ish kharbo 'asurim 'al matenav ubonim vehatoqeia' bashofar 'ezli. nehemiah 4:19	va'omar 'el hakhorim ve'el haseganim ve'el yeter ha'am hamelakhah harbeh urekhabah va'anakhnu nifradim 'al hakhomah rekhoqim 'ish mei'akhiv. nehemiah 4:20	bimqom 'asher tishme'u 'et qol hashofar shamah tiqabezu 'eileinu 'eloheinu yilakhem lanu. nehemiah 4:21	va'anakhnu 'osim bamelakhah vekhezyam makhaziqim baremakhim mei'alot hashakhar 'ad zet hakokhabim. nehemiah 4:22	gam ba'et hahi 'amarti la'am 'ish vena'aro yalinu betokh yerushalim vehayu lanu halaylah mishmar vehayom melakhah. nehemiah 4:23	ve'en 'ani ve'akhai une'arai ve'anshei hamishmar 'asher 'akharai 'en 'anakhnu foshetim begadeinu 'ish shilkho hamayim. nehemiah 5:1	vatehi za'aqat ha'am unesheihem gedolah 'el 'akheihem hayehudim. nehemiah 5:2	veyesh 'asher 'omerim baneinu ubenoteinu 'anakhnu rabim veniqkhah dagan venokhelah venikhyeh. nehemiah 5:3	veyesh 'asher 'omerim sedoteinu ukherameinu ubateinu 'anakhnu 'orebim veniqkhah dagan bara'ab. nehemiah 5:4	veyesh 'asher 'omerim lavinu khesef lemidat hamelekh sedoteinu ukherameinu. nehemiah 5:5	ve'atah kibsar 'akheinu besareinu kibneihem baneinu vehineh 'anakhnu khobeshim 'et baneinu ve'et benoteinu la'abadim veyesh mibenoteinu nikhbashot ve'en le'el yadeinu usedoteinu ukherameinu la'akheirim. nehemiah 5:6	vayikhar li me'od ka'asher shama'ti 'et za'aqatam ve'et hadebarim ha'eleh. nehemiah 5:7	vayimalekh libi 'alai va'aribah 'et hakhorim ve'et haseganim va'omerah lahem masha 'ish be'akhiv 'atem noshim va'eten 'aleihem qehilah gedolah. nehemiah 5:8	va'omerah lahem 'anakhnu qaninu 'et 'akheinu hayehudim hanimkarim lagoyim kedei banu vegam 'atem timkeru 'et 'akheikhem venimkeru lanu vayakharishu velo maze'u dabar. nehemiah 5:9	vayomer va'omar lo tob hadabar 'asher 'atem 'osim halo beyir'at 'eloheinu teileikhu meikherpat hagoyim 'oybeinu. nehemiah 5:10	vegam 'ani 'akhai une'arai noshim bahem kesef vedagan na'azbah na 'et hamasha hazeh. nehemiah 5:11	hashibu na lahem kehayom sedoteihem karmeihem zeiteihem ubateihem ume'at hakesef vehadagan hatirosh vehayizhar 'asher 'atem noshim bahem. nehemiah 5:12	vayomeru nashib umeihem lo nebaqesh ken na'aseh ka'asher 'atah 'omer va'eqra 'et hakohanim va'ashbi'em la'asot kadabar hazeh. nehemiah 5:13	gam khazeni na'arti va'omerah kakhah yena'er ha'elohim 'et kal ha'ish 'asher lo yaqim 'et hadabar hazeh mibeito umigi'o vekhakhah yihyeh na'ur vareq vayomeru khal haqahal 'amen vayhalu 'et yhvh vaya'as ha'am kadabar hazeh. nehemiah 5:14	gam miyom 'asher zivah 'oti lihyot pekham be'erez yehudah mishenat 'esrim ve'ad shenat sheloshim ushetayim le'artakhshast hamelekh shanim shetem 'esreh 'ani ve'akhai lekhem hapekhah lo 'akhalti. nehemiah 5:15	vehapakhot harishonim 'asher lefanai hikhbidu 'al ha'am vayiqkhu meihem belekhem vayayin 'akhar kesef sheqalim 'arba'im gam na'areihem shaletu 'al ha'am va'ani lo 'asiti khen mipenei yir'at 'elohim. nehemiah 5:16	vegam bimlekhet hakhomah hazot hekhezaqti vesadeh lo qaninu vekhal ne'arai qebuzim sham 'al hamelakhah. nehemiah 5:17	vehayehudim vehaseganim mei'ah vakhamishim 'ish vehaba'im 'eileinu min hagoyim 'asher sebiboteinu 'al shulkhani. nehemiah 5:18	va'asher hayah na'aseh leyom 'ekhad shor 'ekhad zon shesh berurot veziporim na'asu li uben 'aseret yamim bekhal yayin leharbeh ve'im zeh lekhem hapekhah lo biqashti ki khabedah ha'abodah 'al ha'am hazeh. nehemiah 5:19	zakherah li 'elohai letobah kol 'asher 'asiti 'al ha'am hazeh. nehemiah 6:1	vayhi kha'asher nishma' lesanbalat vetobiyah ulegeshem ha'arbi uleyeter 'oyebeinu ki baniti 'et hakhomah velo notar bah parez gam 'ad ha'et hahi delatot lo he'emadti bashe'arim. nehemiah 6:2	vayishlakh sanbalat vegeshem 'eilai leimor lekhah veniva'adah yakhdav bakefirim bebiq'at 'ono vehemah khoshebim la'asot li ra'ah. nehemiah 6:3	va'eshlekhah 'aleihem mal'akhim leimor melakhah gedolah 'ani 'oseh velo 'ukhal laredet lamah tishbat hamelakhah ka'asher 'arpeha veyaradti 'aleikhem. nehemiah 6:4	vayishlekhu 'eilai kadabar hazeh 'arba' pe'amim va'ashib 'otam kadabar hazeh. nehemiah 6:5	vayishlakh 'eilai sanbalat kadabar hazeh pa'am khamishit 'et na'aro ve'igeret petukhah beyado. nehemiah 6:6	katub bah bagoyim nishma' vegashmu 'omer 'atah vehayehudim khoshebim limrod 'al ken 'atah boneh hakhomah ve'atah hoeh lahem lemelekh kadebarim ha'eleh. nehemiah 6:7	vegam nebi'im he'emadta liqro 'alekha birushalim leimor melekh bihudah ve'atah yishama' lamelekh kadebarim ha'eleh ve'atah lekhah veniva'azah yakhdav. nehemiah 6:8	va'eshlekhah 'eilav leimor lo nihyah kadebarim ha'eleh 'asher 'atah 'omer ki milibekha 'atah bodam nehemiah 6:9	ki khulam meyare'im 'otanu leimor yirpu yedeihem min hamelakhah velo tei'aseh ve'atah khazeq 'et yadai. nehemiah 6:10	va'ani bati bet shema'yah ben delayah ben meheitab'el vehu 'azur vayomer niva'ed 'el bet ha'elohim 'el tokh haheikhal venisgerah daltot haheikhal ki ba'im leharegekha velaylah ba'im leharegekha. nehemiah 6:11	va'omerah ha'ish kamoni yibrakh umi khamoni 'asher yabo 'el haheikhal vakhai lo 'abo. nehemiah 6:12	va'akirah vehineh lo 'elohim shelakho ki hanebu'ah diber 'alai vetobiyah vesanbalat sekharo. nehemiah 6:13	lema'an sakhur hu lema'an 'ira ve'e'eseh ken vekhatati vehayah lahem leshem ra' lema'an yekharefuni. nehemiah 6:14	zakherah 'elohai letobiyah ulesanbalat kema'asav 'eleh vegam leno'adyah hanebi'ah uleyeter hanebi'im 'asher hayu meyare'im 'oti. nehemiah 6:15	vatishlam hakhomah be'esrim vakhamishah le'elul lakhamishim ushenayim yom. nehemiah 6:16	vayhi ka'asher shame'u kal 'oybeinu vayir'u kal hagoyim 'asher sebiboteinu vayipelu me'od be'eineihem vayeide'u ki mei'et 'eloheinu ne'estah hamelakhah hazot. nehemiah 6:17	gam bayamim hahem marbim khorei yehudah 'igeroteihem holkhot 'al tobiyah va'asher letobiyah ba'ot 'aleihem. nehemiah 6:18	ki rabim bihudah ba'alei shebu'ah lo ki khatan hu lishkhanyah ben 'arakh vihokhanan beno laqakh 'et bat meshulam ben berekhyah. nehemiah 6:19	gam tobotav hayu 'omerim lefanai udebarai hayu mozi'im lo 'igerot shalakh tobiyah leyare'eini. nehemiah 7:1	vayhi ka'asher nibnetah hakhomah va'a'amid hadelatot vayipaqedu hasho'arim vehamshorerim vehalviyim. nehemiah 7:2	va'azaveh 'et khanani 'akhi ve'et khananyah sar habirah 'al yerushalim ki hu ke'ish 'emet veyarei 'et ha'elohim meirabim. nehemiah 7:3	vayomer va'omar lahem lo yipatekhu sha'arei yerushalim 'ad khom hashemesh ve'ad hem 'omedim yagifu hadelatot ve'ekhozu veha'amed mishmerot yoshebei yerushalim 'ish bemishmaro ve'ish neged beito. nehemiah 7:4	veha'ir rakhabat yadayim ugedolah veha'am me'at betokhah ve'en batim benuyim. nehemiah 7:5	vayiten 'elohai 'el libi va'eqbezah 'et hakhorim ve'et haseganim ve'et ha'am lehityakhes va'emza seifer hayakhas ha'olim barishonah va'emza katub bo. nehemiah 7:6	'eleh benei hamedinah ha'olim mishebi hagolah 'asher heglah nebukhadnezar melekh babel vayashubu lirushalim velihudah 'ish le'iro. nehemiah 7:7	haba'im 'im zerubabel yeishua' nekhemyah 'azaryah ra'amyah nakhamani maredokhai bilshan misperet bigvai nekhum ba'anah mispar 'anshei 'am yisra'el. nehemiah 7:8	benei far'osh 'alpayim mei'ah veshib'im ushenayim. nehemiah 7:9	benei shefatyah shelosh mei'ot shib'im ushenayim. nehemiah 7:10	benei 'arakh shesh mei'ot khamishim ushenayim. nehemiah 7:11	benei fakhat mo'ab libnei yeishua' veyo'ab 'alpayim ushemoneh mei'ot shemonah 'asar. nehemiah 7:12	benei 'eilam 'elef matayim khamishim ve'arba'ah. nehemiah 7:13	benei zatu shemoneh mei'ot 'arba'im vakhamishah. nehemiah 7:14	benei zakai sheba' mei'ot veshishim. nehemiah 7:15	benei binui shesh mei'ot 'arba'im ushemonah. nehemiah 7:16	benei beibai shesh mei'ot 'esrim ushemonah. nehemiah 7:17	benei 'azgad 'alpayim shelosh mei'ot 'esrim ushenayim. nehemiah 7:18	benei 'adoniqam shesh mei'ot shishim veshib'ah. nehemiah 7:19	benei bigvai 'alpayim shishim veshib'ah. nehemiah 7:20	benei 'adin shesh mei'ot khamishim vakhamishah. nehemiah 7:21	benei 'ater lekhizqiyah tish'im ushemonah. nehemiah 7:22	benei khashum shelosh mei'ot 'esrim ushemonah. nehemiah 7:23	benei beizai shelosh mei'ot 'esrim ve'arba'ah. nehemiah 7:24	benei kharif mei'ah shenem 'asar. nehemiah 7:25	benei gib'on tish'im vakhamishah. nehemiah 7:26	'anshei bet lekhem unetofah mei'ah shemonim ushemonah. nehemiah 7:27	'anshei 'anatot mei'ah 'esrim ushemonah. nehemiah 7:28	'anshei bet 'azmavet 'arba'im ushenayim. nehemiah 7:29	'anshei qiryat ye'arim kefirah ube'eirot sheba' mei'ot 'arba'im usheloshah. nehemiah 7:30	'anshei haramah vagaba' shesh mei'ot 'esrim ve'ekhad. nehemiah 7:31	'anshei mikhmas mei'ah ve'esrim ushenayim. nehemiah 7:32	'anshei bet 'el veha'ai mei'ah 'esrim usheloshah. nehemiah 7:33	'anshei nebo 'akher khamishim ushenayim. nehemiah 7:34	benei 'eilam 'akher 'elef matayim khamishim ve'arba'ah. nehemiah 7:35	benei kharim shelosh mei'ot ve'esrim. nehemiah 7:36	benei yereikho shelosh mei'ot 'arba'im vakhamishah. nehemiah 7:37	benei lod khadid ve'ono sheba' mei'ot ve'esrim ve'ekhad. nehemiah 7:38	benei sena'ah sheloshet 'alafim tesha' mei'ot usheloshim. nehemiah 7:39	hakohanim benei yeda'yah lebet yeishua' tesha' mei'ot shib'im usheloshah. nehemiah 7:40	benei 'imer 'elef khamishim ushenayim. nehemiah 7:41	benei fashkhur 'elef matayim 'arba'im veshib'ah. nehemiah 7:42	benei kharim 'elef shib'ah 'asar. nehemiah 7:43	halviyim benei yeishua' leqadmi'el libnei lehodvah shib'im ve'arba'ah. nehemiah 7:44	hamshorerim benei 'asaf mei'ah 'arba'im ushemonah. nehemiah 7:45	hasho'arim benei shalum benei 'ater benei talmon benei 'aqub benei khatita benei shobai mei'ah sheloshim ushemonah. nehemiah 7:46	hanetinim benei zikha benei khasufa benei taba'ot. nehemiah 7:47	benei qeiros benei si'a benei fadon. nehemiah 7:48	benei lebanah benei khagabah benei shalmai. nehemiah 7:49	benei khanan benei gidel benei gakhar. nehemiah 7:50	benei re'ayah benei rezin benei neqoda. nehemiah 7:51	benei gazam benei 'uza benei faseiakh. nehemiah 7:52	benei beisai benei me'unim benei nefushesim nefishesim. nehemiah 7:53	benei baqbuq benei khaqufa benei kharkhur. nehemiah 7:54	benei bazlit benei mekhida benei kharsha. nehemiah 7:55	benei barqos benei sisera benei tamakh. nehemiah 7:56	benei neziakh benei khatifa. nehemiah 7:57	benei 'abdei shelomoh benei sotai benei soferet benei ferida. nehemiah 7:58	benei ya'la benei darqon benei gidel. nehemiah 7:59	benei shefatyah benei khatil benei pokheret hazebayim benei 'amon. nehemiah 7:60	kal hanetinim ubenei 'abdei shelomoh shelosh mei'ot tish'im ushenayim. nehemiah 7:61	ve'eleh ha'olim mitel melakh tel kharsha kerub 'adon ve'imer velo yakhelu lehagid bet 'abotam vezar'am 'im miyisra'el hem. nehemiah 7:62	benei delayah benei tobiyah benei neqoda shesh mei'ot ve'arba'im ushenayim. nehemiah 7:63	umin hakohanim benei khobayah benei haqoz benei barzilai 'asher laqakh mibenot barzilai hagil'adi 'ishah vayiqarei 'al shemam. nehemiah 7:64	'eleh biqshu khetabam hamityakhsim velo nimza vaygo'alu min hakehunah. nehemiah 7:65	vayomer hatirshata lahem 'asher lo yokhelu miqodesh haqodashim 'ad 'amod hakohen le'urim vetumim. nehemiah 7:66	kal haqahal ke'ekhad 'arba' ribo 'alpayim shelosh mei'ot veshishim. nehemiah 7:67	milebad 'abdeihem ve'amhoteihem 'eleh shib'at 'alafim shelosh mei'ot sheloshim veshib'ah velahem meshorarim umeshorarot matayim ve'arba'im vakhamishah. nehemiah 7:68	gemalim 'arba' mei'ot sheloshim vakhamishah khamorim sheishet 'alafim sheba' mei'ot ve'esrim. nehemiah 7:69	umiqzat rashei ha'abot natenu lamelakhah hatirshata natan la'ozar zahab darkemonim 'elef mizraqot khamishim katenot kohanim sheloshim vakhamesh mei'ot. nehemiah 7:70	umeirashei ha'abot natenu le'ozar hamelakhah zahab darkemonim shetei ribot vekhesef manim 'alpayim umatayim. nehemiah 7:71	va'asher natenu she'eirit ha'am zahab darkemonim shetei ribo vekhesef manim 'alpayim vekhatenot kohanim shishim veshib'ah. nehemiah 7:72	vayeishebu hakohanim vehalviyim vehasho'arim vehamshorerim umin ha'am vehanetinim vekhal yisra'el be'areihem vayiga' hakhodesh hashebi'i ubenei yisra'el be'areihem. nehemiah 8:1	vayei'asefu khal ha'am ke'ish 'ekhad 'el harekhob 'asher lifnei sha'ar hamayim vayomeru le'ezra hasofer lehabi 'et seifer torat mosheh 'asher zivah yhvh 'et yisra'el. nehemiah 8:2	vayabi 'ezra hakohen 'et hatorah lifnei haqahal mei'ish ve'ad 'ishah vekhol meibin lishmoa' beyom 'ekhad lakhodesh hashebi'i. nehemiah 8:3	vayiqra bo lifnei harekhob 'asher lifnei sha'ar hamayim min ha'or 'ad makhazit hayom neged ha'anashim vehanashim vehamebinim ve'azenei khal ha'am 'el seifer hatorah. nehemiah 8:4	vaya'amod 'ezra hasofer 'al migdal 'ez 'asher 'asu ladabar vaya'amod 'ezlo matityah veshema' va'anayah ve'uriyah vekhilqiyah uma'aseiyah 'al yemino umisemolo pedayah umisha'el umalkiyah vekhashum vekhashbadanah zekharyah meshulam. nehemiah 8:5	vayiftakh 'ezra haseifer le'einei khal ha'am ki mei'al kal ha'am hayah ukhefitkho 'amedu khal ha'am. nehemiah 8:6	vaybarekh 'ezra 'et yhvh ha'elohim hagadol vaya'anu khal ha'am 'amen 'amen bemo'al yedeihem vayiqedu vayishtakhavu yhvh 'apayim 'arezah. nehemiah 8:7	veyeishua' ubani vesheireibeyah yamin 'aqub shabetai hodiyah ma'aseiyah qelita 'azaryah yozabad khanan pelayah vehalviyim mebinim 'et ha'am latorah veha'am 'al 'amedam. nehemiah 8:8	vayiqre'u baseifer betorat ha'elohim meforash vesom sekhel vayabinu bamiqra. nehemiah 8:9	vayomer nekhemyah hu hatirshata ve'ezra hakohen hasofer vehalviyim hamebinim 'et ha'am lekhal ha'am hayom qadosh hu yhvh 'eloheikhem 'al tit'abelu ve'al tibku ki bokhim kal ha'am keshame'am 'et dibrei hatorah. nehemiah 8:10	vayomer lahem lekhu 'ikhlu mashmanim ushetu mamtaqim veshilkhu manot le'en nakhon lo ki qadosh hayom la'adoneinu ve'al tei'azeibu ki khedvat yhvh hi ma'uzekhem. nehemiah 8:11	vehalviyim makhshim lekhal ha'am leimor hasu ki hayom qadosh ve'al tei'azeibu. nehemiah 8:12	vayeilekhu khal ha'am le'ekhol velishtot uleshalakh manot vela'asot simkhah gedolah ki heibinu badebarim 'asher hodi'u lahem. nehemiah 8:13	ubayom hasheini ne'esfu rashei ha'abot lekhal ha'am hakohanim vehalviyim 'el 'ezra hasofer ulehaskil 'el dibrei hatorah. nehemiah 8:14	vayimze'u katub batorah 'asher zivah yhvh beyad mosheh 'asher yeishebu benei yisra'el basukot bekhag bakhodesh hashebi'i. nehemiah 8:15	va'asher yashmi'u veya'abiru qol bekhal 'areihem ubirushalim leimor ze'u hahar vehabi'u 'alei zayit va'alei 'ez shemen va'alei hadas va'alei temarim va'alei 'ez 'abot la'asot sukot kakatub. nehemiah 8:16	vayeize'u ha'am vayabi'u vaya'asu lahem sukot 'ish 'al gago ubekhazroteihem ubekhazrot bet ha'elohim ubirkhob sha'ar hamayim ubirkhob sha'ar 'efrayim. nehemiah 8:17	vaya'asu khal haqahal hashabim min hashebi sukot vayeishebu basukot ki lo 'asu mimei yeishua' bin nun ken benei yisra'el 'ad hayom hahu vatehi simkhah gedolah me'od. nehemiah 8:18	vayiqra beseifer torat ha'elohim yom beyom min hayom harishon 'ad hayom ha'akharon vaya'asu khag shib'at yamim ubayom hashemini 'azeret kamishpat. nehemiah 9:1	ubeyom 'esrim ve'arba'ah lakhodesh hazeh ne'esfu benei yisra'el bezom ubesaqim va'adamah 'aleihem. nehemiah 9:2	vayibadelu zera' yisra'el mikol benei neikhar vaya'amdu vayitvadu 'al khatoteihem va'avonot 'aboteihem. nehemiah 9:3	vayaqumu 'al 'amedam vayiqre'u beseifer torat yhvh 'eloheihem rebi'it hayom urebi'it mitvadim umishtakhavim yhvh 'eloheihem. nehemiah 9:4	vayaqam 'al ma'aleh halviyim yeishua' ubani qadmi'el shebanyah buni sheireibeyah bani khenani vayiz'aqu beqol gadol 'el yhvh 'eloheihem. nehemiah 9:5	vayomeru halviyim yeishua' veqadmi'el bani khashabneyah sheireibeyah hodiyah shebanyah fetakhyah qumu barakhu 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem min ha'olam 'ad ha'olam vibarekhu shem kebodekha umeromam 'al kal berakhah utehilah. nehemiah 9:6	'atah hu yhvh lebadekha 'at 'atah 'asita 'et hashamayim shemei hashamayim vekhal zeba'am ha'arez vekhal 'asher 'aleha hayamim vekhal 'asher bahem ve'atah mekhayeh 'et kulam uzeba hashamayim lekha mishtakhavim. nehemiah 9:7	'atah hu yhvh ha'elohim 'asher bakharta be'abram vehozeito mei'ur kasdim vesamta shemo 'abraham. nehemiah 9:8	umazata 'et lebabo ne'eman lefanekha vekharot 'imo haberit latet 'et 'erez hakena'ani hakhiti ha'emori vehaperizi vehaybusi vehagirgashi latet lezar'o vataqem 'et debarekha ki zadiq 'atah. nehemiah 9:9	vateire 'et 'oni 'aboteinu bemizrayim ve'et za'aqatam shama'ta 'al yam suf. nehemiah 9:10	vatiten 'otot umofetim befar'oh ubekhal 'abadav ubekhal 'am 'arzo ki yada'ta ki heizidu 'aleihem vata'as lekha shem kehayom hazeh. nehemiah 9:11	vehayam baqa'ta lifneihem vaya'abru betokh hayam bayabashah ve'et rodefeihem hishlakhta bimzolot kemo 'eben bemayim 'azim. nehemiah 9:12	ube'amud 'anan hinkhitam yomam ube'amud 'esh laylah leha'ir lahem 'et haderekh 'asher yeilekhu bah. nehemiah 9:13	ve'al har sinai yaradta vedaber 'imahem mishamayim vatiten lahem mishpatim yesharim vetorot 'emet khuqim umizvot tobim. nehemiah 9:14	ve'et shabat qadshekha hoda'ata lahem umizvot vekhuqim vetorah zivita lahem beyad mosheh 'abdekha. nehemiah 9:15	velekhem mishamayim natatah lahem lir'abam umayim misela' hozeita lahem lizma'am vatomer lahem labo lareshet 'et ha'arez 'asher nasata 'et yadekha latet lahem. nehemiah 9:16	vehem va'aboteinu heizidu vayaqshu 'et 'arepam velo shame'u 'el mizvotekha. nehemiah 9:17	vayma'anu lishmoa' velo zakheru nifle'otekha 'asher 'asita 'imahem vayaqshu 'et 'arepam vayitenu rosh lashub le'abdutam bemiryam ve'atah 'eloah selikhot khanun verakhum 'erekh 'apayim verab vekhesed khesed velo 'azabtam. nehemiah 9:18	'af ki 'asu lahem 'eigel maseikhah vayomeru zeh 'elohekha 'asher he'elkha mimizrayim vaya'asu ne'azot gedolot. nehemiah 9:19	ve'atah berakhamekha harabim lo 'azabtam bamidbar 'et 'amud he'anan lo sar mei'aleihem beyomam lehankhotam behaderekh ve'et 'amud ha'esh belaylah leha'ir lahem ve'et haderekh 'asher yeilekhu bah. nehemiah 9:20	verukhakha hatobah natata lehaskilam umankha lo mana'ta mipihem umayim natatah lahem lizma'am. nehemiah 9:21	ve'arba'im shanah kilkaltam bamidbar lo khaseiru salmoteihem lo balu veragleihem lo bazeiqu. nehemiah 9:22	vatiten lahem mamlakhot va'amamim vatakhleqem lefei'ah vayireshu 'et 'erez sikhon ve'et 'erez melekh kheshbon ve'et 'erez 'og melekh habashan. nehemiah 9:23	ubeneihem hirbita kekhokhebei hashamayim vatebi'em 'el ha'arez 'asher 'amarta la'aboteihem labo larashet. nehemiah 9:24	vayabo'u habanim vayireshu 'et ha'arez vatakhna' lifneihem 'et yoshebei ha'arez hakena'anim vatitenem beyadam ve'et malkheihem ve'et 'amei ha'arez la'asot bahem kirzonam. nehemiah 9:25	vayilkedu 'arim bezurot va'adamah shemeinah vayireshu batim melei'im kal tub borot khazubim keramim vezeitim ve'ez ma'akhal larob vayokhelu vayisbe'u vayashminu vayit'adenu betubekha hagadol. nehemiah 9:26	vayamru vayimredu bakh vayashlikhu 'et toratekha 'akharei gavam ve'et nebi'ekha haragu 'asher hei'idu bam lahashibam 'eilekha vaya'asu ne'azot gedolot. nehemiah 9:27	vatitenem beyad zareihem vayazeiru lahem ube'et zaratam yiz'aqu 'eilekha ve'atah mishamayim tishma' ukherakhamekha harabim titen lahem moshi'im veyoshi'um miyad zareihem. nehemiah 9:28	ukhenoakh lahem yashubu la'asot ra' lefanekha vata'azbem beyad 'oyebeihem vayirdu bahem vayashubu vayiz'aqukha ve'atah mishamayim tishma' vetazilem kerakhamekha rabot 'itim. nehemiah 9:29	vata'ad bahem lahashibam 'el toratekha vehemah heizidu velo shame'u lemizvotekha ubemishpatekha khate'u bam 'asher ya'aseh 'adam vekhayah bahem vayitenu khatef soreret ve'arepam hiqshu velo shamei'u. nehemiah 9:30	vatimshokh 'aleihem shanim rabot vata'ad bam berukhakha beyad nebi'ekha velo he'ezinu vatitenem beyad 'amei ha'arazot. nehemiah 9:31	uberakhamekha harabim lo 'asitam kalah velo 'azabtam ki 'el khanun verakhum 'atah. nehemiah 9:32	ve'atah 'eloheinu ha'el hagadol hagibor vehanora shomer haberit vehakhesed 'al yim'at lefanekha 'et kal hatela'ah 'asher meza'atnu limlakheinu lesareinu ulekhohaneinu velinbi'einu vela'aboteinu ulekhal 'amekha mimei malkhei 'ashur 'ad hayom hazeh. nehemiah 9:33	ve'atah zadiq 'al kal haba 'aleinu ki 'emet 'asita va'anakhnu hirsha'enu. nehemiah 9:34	ve'et melakheinu sareinu kohaneinu va'aboteinu lo 'asu toratekha velo hiqshibu 'el mizvotekha ule'eidevotekha 'asher ha'idota bahem. nehemiah 9:35	vehem bemalkhutam ubetubekha harab 'asher natata lahem ube'erez harekhabah vehashemeinah 'asher natata lifneihem lo 'abadukha velo shabu mima'aleihem hara'im. nehemiah 9:36	hineh 'anakhnu hayom 'abadim veha'arez 'asher natatah la'aboteinu le'ekhol 'et piryah ve'et tubah hineh 'anakhnu 'abadim 'aleha. nehemiah 9:37	utebu'atah marbah lamelakhim 'asher natatah 'aleinu bekhatoteinu ve'al geviyoteinu moshelim ubibhemteinu kirzonam ubezarah gedolah 'anakhenu. nehemiah 9:38	ubekhal zot 'anakhnu koretim 'amanah vekhotebim ve'al hekhatum sareinu leviyeinu kohaneinu. nehemiah 10:1	ve'al hakhatumim nekhemyah hatirshata ben khakhalyah vezidqiyah. nehemiah 10:2	serayah 'azaryah yirmeyah. nehemiah 10:3	pashkhur 'amaryah malkiyah. nehemiah 10:4	khatush shebanyah malukh. nehemiah 10:5	kharim mereimot 'obadyah. nehemiah 10:6	daniyel gineton barukh. nehemiah 10:7	meshulam 'abiyah miyamin. nehemiah 10:8	ma'azyah bilgai shema'yah 'eleh hakohanim. nehemiah 10:9	vehalviyim veyeishua' ben 'azanyah binui mibenei kheinadad qadmi'el. nehemiah 10:10	va'akheihem shebanyah hodiyah qelita pelayah khanan. nehemiah 10:11	mikha rekhob khashabyah. nehemiah 10:12	zakur sheireibeyah shebanyah. nehemiah 10:13	hodiyah bani beninu. nehemiah 10:14	rashei ha'am par'osh pakhat mo'ab 'eilam zatu bani. nehemiah 10:15	buni 'azgad beibai. nehemiah 10:16	'adoniyah bigvai 'adin. nehemiah 10:17	'ater khizqiyah 'azur. nehemiah 10:18	hodiyah khashum beizai. nehemiah 10:19	kharif 'anatot nobai neibai. nehemiah 10:20	magpi'ash meshulam kheizir. nehemiah 10:21	mesheizab'el zadoq yadua'. nehemiah 10:22	pelatyah khanan 'anayah. nehemiah 10:23	hosheia' khananyah khashub. nehemiah 10:24	halokhesh pilkha shobeq. nehemiah 10:25	rekhum khashabnah ma'aseiyah. nehemiah 10:26	va'akhiyah khanan 'anan. nehemiah 10:27	malukh kharim ba'anah. nehemiah 10:28	ushe'ar ha'am hakohanim halviyim hasho'arim hamshorerim hanetinim vekhal hanibdal mei'amei ha'arazot 'el torat ha'elohim nesheihem beneihem ubenoteihem kol yodeia' meibin. nehemiah 10:29	makhaziqim 'al 'akheihem 'adireihem uba'im be'alah ubishbu'ah lalekhet betorat ha'elohim 'asher nitenah beyad mosheh 'ebed ha'elohim velishmor vela'asot 'et kal mizvot yhvh 'adoneinu umishpatav vekhuqav. nehemiah 10:30	va'asher lo niten benoteinu le'amei ha'arez ve'et benoteihem lo niqakh lebaneinu. nehemiah 10:31	ve'amei ha'arez hambi'im 'et hamaqakhot vekhal sheber beyom hashabat limkor lo niqakh meihem bashabat ubeyom qodesh venitosh 'et hashanah hashebi'it umasha khal yad. nehemiah 10:32	vehe'emadnu 'aleinu mizvot latet 'aleinu shelishit hasheqel bashanah la'abodat bet 'eloheinu. nehemiah 10:33	lelekhem hama'arekhet uminkhat hatamid ule'olat hatamid hashabatot hekhodashim lamo'adim velaqodashim velakhata'ot lekhaper 'al yisra'el vekhol melekhet bet 'eloheinu. nehemiah 10:34	vehagoralot hipalnu 'al qurban ha'eizim hakohanim halviyim veha'am lehabi lebet 'eloheinu lebet 'aboteinu le'itim mezumanim shanah beshanah leba'er 'al mizbakh yhvh 'eloheinu kakatub batorah. nehemiah 10:35	ulehabi 'et bikurei 'admateinu ubikurei kal peri khal 'ez shanah beshanah lebet yhvh. nehemiah 10:36	ve'et bekhorot baneinu ubehemteinu kakatub batorah ve'et bekhorei beqareinu vezoneinu lehabi lebet 'eloheinu lakohanim hamsharetim bebet 'eloheinu. nehemiah 10:37	ve'et reishit 'arisoteinu uterumoteinu uferi khal 'ez tirosh veyizhar nabi lakohanim 'el lishkhot bet 'eloheinu uma'sar 'admateinu lalviyim vehem halviyim ham'aserim bekhol 'arei 'abodateinu. nehemiah 10:38	vehayah hakohen ben 'aharon 'im halviyim ba'ser halviyim vehalviyim ya'alu 'et ma'asar hama'aser lebet 'eloheinu 'el haleshakhot lebet ha'ozar. nehemiah 10:39	ki 'el haleshakhot yabi'u benei yisra'el ubenei haleivi 'et terumat hadagan hatirosh vehayizhar vesham kelei hamiqdash vehakohanim hamsharetim vehasho'arim vehamshorerim velo na'azob 'et bet 'eloheinu. nehemiah 11:1	vayeishebu sarei ha'am birushalim ushe'ar ha'am hipilu goralot lehabi 'ekhad min ha'asarah lashebet birushalim 'ir haqodesh veteisha' hayadot be'arim. nehemiah 11:2	vaybarakhu ha'am lekhol ha'anashim hamitnadebim lashebet birushalim. nehemiah 11:3	ve'eleh rashei hamedinah 'asher yashebu birushalim ube'arei yehudah yashebu 'ish ba'akhuzato be'areihem yisra'el hakohanim vehalviyim vehanetinim ubenei 'abdei shelomoh. nehemiah 11:4	ubirushalim yashebu mibenei yehudah umibenei binyamin mibenei yehudah 'atayah ben 'uziyah ben zekharyah ben 'amaryah ben shefatyah ben mahalal'el mibenei farez. nehemiah 11:5	uma'aseiyah ben barukh ben kal khozeh ben khazayah ben 'adayah ben yoyarib ben zekharyah ben hashiloni nehemiah 11:6	kal benei ferez hayoshebim birushalim 'arba' mei'ot shishim ushemonah 'anshei khayil. nehemiah 11:7	ve'eleh benei binyamin salu ben meshulam ben yo'ed ben pedayah ben qolayah ben ma'aseiyah ben 'iti'el ben yesha'yah. nehemiah 11:8	ve'akharav gabai salai tesha' mei'ot 'esrim ushemonah. nehemiah 11:9	veyo'el ben zikhri paqid 'aleihem vihudah ben hasenu'ah 'al ha'ir mishneh. nehemiah 11:10	min hakohanim yeda'yah ben yoyarib yakhin. nehemiah 11:11	serayah ben khilqiyah ben meshulam ben zadoq ben merayot ben 'akhitub negid bet ha'elohim. nehemiah 11:12	va'akheihem 'osei hamelakhah labayit shemoneh mei'ot 'esrim ushenayim va'adayah ben yerokham ben pelalyah ben 'amzi ben zekharyah ben pashkhur ben malkiyah. nehemiah 11:13	ve'ekhav rashim le'abot matayim 'arba'im ushenayim va'amashsai ben 'azar'el ben 'akhzai ben meshileimot ben 'imer. nehemiah 11:14	va'akheihem giborei khayil mei'ah 'esrim ushemonah ufaqid 'aleihem zabdi'el ben hagedolim. nehemiah 11:15	umin halviyim shema'yah ben khashub ben 'azriqam ben khashabyah ben buni. nehemiah 11:16	veshabetai veyozabad 'al hamelakhah hakhizonah lebet ha'elohim meirashei halviyim. nehemiah 11:17	umatanyah ben mikhah ben zabdi ben 'asaf rosh hatekhilah yehodeh latefilah ubaqbuqyah mishneh mei'ekhav ve'abda ben shamua' ben galal ben yeditun yedutun. nehemiah 11:18	kal halviyim be'ir haqodesh matayim shemonim ve'arba'ah. nehemiah 11:19	vehasho'arim 'aqub talmon va'akheihem hashomerim bashe'arim mei'ah shib'im ushenayim. nehemiah 11:20	ushe'ar yisra'el hakohanim halviyim bekhal 'arei yehudah 'ish benakhalato. nehemiah 11:21	vehanetinim yoshebim ba'ofel vezikha vegishpa 'al hanetinim. nehemiah 11:22	ufeqid halviyim birushalim 'uzi ben bani ben khashabyah ben matanyah ben mikha mibenei 'asaf hamshorerim leneged melekhet bet ha'elohim. nehemiah 11:23	ki mizvat hamelekh 'aleihem va'amanah 'al hamshorerim debar yom beyomo. nehemiah 11:24	ufetakhyah ben mesheizab'el mibenei zerakh ben yehudah leyad hamelekh lekhal dabar la'am. nehemiah 11:25	ve'el hakhazeirim bisdotam mibenei yehudah yashebu beqiryat ha'arba' ubenoteha ubedibon ubenoteha ubiqabze'el vakhazeireha. nehemiah 11:26	ubeyeishua' ubemoladah ubebet palet. nehemiah 11:27	ubakhazar shu'al ubib'er sheba' ubenoteha. nehemiah 11:28	ubeziqlag ubimkhonah ubibnoteha. nehemiah 11:29	ube'en rimon ubezare'ah ubeyarmut. nehemiah 11:30	zanoakh 'adulam vekhazreihem lakhish usedoteha 'azeiqah ubenoteha vayakhanu mibe'er sheba' 'ad gei hinom. nehemiah 11:31	ubenei binyamin migaba' mikhmas ve'ayah ubet 'el ubenoteha. nehemiah 11:32	'anatot nob 'ananeyah. nehemiah 11:33	khazor ramah gitayim. nehemiah 11:34	khadid zebo'im nebalat. nehemiah 11:35	lod ve'ono gei hakharashim. nehemiah 11:36	umin halviyim makhleqot yehudah lebinyamin. nehemiah 12:1	ve'eleh hakohanim vehalviyim 'asher 'alu 'im zerubabel ben she'alti'el veyeishua' serayah yirmeyah 'ezra. nehemiah 12:2	'amaryah malukh khatush. nehemiah 12:3	shekhanyah rekhum mereimot. nehemiah 12:4	'ido gineto 'abiyah. nehemiah 12:5	miyamin ma'adyah bilgah. nehemiah 12:6	shema'yah veyoyarib yeda'yah. nehemiah 12:7	salu 'amoq khilqiyah yeda'yah 'eleh rashei hakohanim va'akheihem bimei yeishua'. nehemiah 12:8	vehalviyim yeishua' binui qadmi'el sheireibeyah yehudah matanyah 'al hyedot hu ve'ekhav nehemiah 12:9	ubaqbuqyah ve'uno ve'uni 'akheihem lenegdam lemishmarot. nehemiah 12:10	veyeishua' holid 'et yoyaqim veyoyaqim holid 'et 'elyashib ve'elyashib 'et yoyada'. nehemiah 12:11	veyoyada' holid 'et yonatan veyonatan holid 'et yadua'. nehemiah 12:12	ubimei yoyaqim hayu khohanim rashei ha'abot lisrayah merayah leyirmeyah khananyah. nehemiah 12:13	le'ezra meshulam la'amaryah yehokhanan. nehemiah 12:14	limlukhi limlikhu yonatan lishbanyah yosef. nehemiah 12:15	lekharim 'adna limrayot khelqai. nehemiah 12:16	la'adaya le'ido zekharyah legineton meshulam. nehemiah 12:17	la'abiyah zikhri leminyamin lemo'adyah piltai. nehemiah 12:18	lebilgah shamua' lishma'yah yehonatan. nehemiah 12:19	uleyoyarib matenai lida'yah 'uzi. nehemiah 12:20	lesalai qalai le'amoq 'eiber. nehemiah 12:21	lekhilqiyah khashabyah lida'yah netan'el. nehemiah 12:22	halviyim bimei 'elyashib yoyada' veyokhanan veyadua' ketubim rashei 'abot vehakohanim 'al malkhut dareyavesh haparesi. nehemiah 12:23	benei leivi rashei ha'abot ketubim 'al seifer dibrei hayamim ve'ad yemei yokhanan ben 'elyashib. nehemiah 12:24	verashei halviyim khashabyah sheireibeyah veyeishua' ben qadmi'el va'akheihem lenegdam lehalel lehodot bemizvat david 'ish ha'elohim mishmar le'umat mishmar. nehemiah 12:25	matanyah ubaqbuqyah 'obadyah meshulam talmon 'aqub shomerim sho'arim mishmar ba'asupei hashe'arim. nehemiah 12:26	'eleh bimei yoyaqim ben yeishua' ben yozadaq ubimei nekhemyah hapekhah ve'ezra hakohen hasofer. nehemiah 12:27	ubakhanukat khomat yerushalim biqshu 'et halviyim mikal meqomotam lahabi'am lirushalim la'asot khanukah vesimkhah ubetodot ubeshir meziltayim nebalim ubekhinorot. nehemiah 12:28	vayei'asefu benei hamshorerim umin hakikar sebibot yerushalim umin khazrei netofati. nehemiah 12:29	umibet hagilgal umisedot geba' ve'azmavet ki khazeirim banu lahem hamshorarim sebibot yerushalim. nehemiah 12:30	vayitaharu hakohanim vehalviyim vaytaharu 'et ha'am ve'et hashe'arim ve'et hakhomah. nehemiah 12:31	va'a'aleh 'et sarei yehudah mei'al lakhomah va'a'amidah shetei todot gedolot vetahalukhot layamin mei'al lakhomah lesha'ar ha'ashpot. nehemiah 12:32	vayeilekh 'akhareihem hosha'yah vakhazi sarei yehudah. nehemiah 12:33	va'azaryah 'ezra umeshulam. nehemiah 12:34	yehudah ubinyamin ushema'yah veyirmeyah. nehemiah 12:35	umibenei hakohanim bakhazozerot zekharyah ben yonatan ben shema'yah ben matanyah ben mikhayah ben zakur ben 'asaf. nehemiah 12:36	ve'ekhav shema'yah va'azar'el milalai gilalai ma'ai netan'el vihudah khanani bikhlei shir david 'ish ha'elohim ve'ezra hasofer lifneihem. nehemiah 12:37	ve'al sha'ar ha'ayin venegdam 'alu 'al ma'alot 'ir david bama'aleh lakhomah mei'al lebet david ve'ad sha'ar hamayim mizrakh. nehemiah 12:38	vehatodah hasheinit haholekhet lemol va'ani 'akhareha vakhazi ha'am mei'al lehakhomah mei'al lemigdal hatanurim ve'ad hakhomah harekhabah. nehemiah 12:39	umei'al lesha'ar 'efrayim ve'al sha'ar hayshanah ve'al sha'ar hadagim umigdal khanan'el umigdal hamei'ah ve'ad sha'ar hazon ve'amedu besha'ar hamatarah. nehemiah 12:40	vata'amodenah shetei hatodot bebet ha'elohim va'ani vakhazi haseganim 'imi. nehemiah 12:41	vehakohanim 'elyaqim ma'aseiyah minyamin mikhayah 'elyo'einai zekharyah khananyah bakhazozerot. nehemiah 12:42	uma'aseiyah ushema'yah ve'el'azar ve'uzi vihokhanan umalkiyah ve'eilam va'azer vayashmi'u hamshorerim veyizrakhyah hapaqid. nehemiah 12:43	vayizbekhu bayom hahu zebakhim gedolim vayismakhu ki ha'elohim simekham simkhah gedolah vegam hanashim vehayladim sameikhu vatishama' simkhat yerushalim meirakhoq. nehemiah 12:44	vayipaqedu bayom hahu 'anashim 'al haneshakhot la'ozarot laterumot lareishit velama'asrot likhnos bahem lisdei he'arim mena'ot hatorah lakohanim velalviyim ki simkhat yehudah 'al hakohanim ve'al halviyim ha'omedim. nehemiah 12:45	vayishmeru mishmeret 'eloheihem umishmeret hatahorah vehamshorerim vehasho'arim kemizvat david shelomoh beno. nehemiah 12:46	ki bimei david ve'asaf miqedem rosh rashei hamshorerim veshir tehilah vehodot leilohim. nehemiah 12:47	vekhal yisra'el bimei zerubabel ubimei nekhemyah notenim menayot hamshorerim vehasho'arim debar yom beyomo umaqdishim lalviyim vehalviyim maqdishim libnei 'aharon. nehemiah 13:1	bayom hahu niqra beseifer mosheh be'azenei ha'am venimza katub bo 'asher lo yabo 'amoni umo'abi biqhal ha'elohim 'ad 'olam. nehemiah 13:2	ki lo qidemu 'et benei yisra'el balekhem ubamayim vayiskor 'alav 'et bil'am leqalo vayahafokh 'eloheinu haqelalah librakhah. nehemiah 13:3	vayhi keshame'am 'et hatorah vayabdilu khal 'eireb miyisra'el. nehemiah 13:4	velifnei mizeh 'elyashib hakohen natun belishkat bet 'eloheinu qarob letobiyah. nehemiah 13:5	vaya'as lo lishkah gedolah vesham hayu lefanim notenim 'et haminkhah halebonah vehakeilim uma'sar hadagan hatirosh vehayizhar mizvat halviyim vehamshorerim vehasho'arim uterumat hakohanim. nehemiah 13:6	ubekhal zeh lo hayiti birushalim ki bishnat sheloshim ushetayim le'artakhshast melekh babel bati 'el hamelekh uleqez yamim nish'alti min hamelekh. nehemiah 13:7	va'abo lirushalim va'abinah bara'ah 'asher 'asah 'elyashib letobiyah la'asot lo nishkah bekhazrei bet ha'elohim. nehemiah 13:8	vayeira' li me'od va'ashlikhah 'et kal kelei bet tobiyah hakhuz min halishkah. nehemiah 13:9	va'omerah vaytaharu haleshakhot va'ashibah sham kelei bet ha'elohim 'et haminkhah vehalebonah. nehemiah 13:10	va'eide'ah ki menayot halviyim lo nitanah vayibrekhu 'ish lesadeihu halviyim vehamshorerim 'osei hamelakhah. nehemiah 13:11	va'aribah 'et haseganim va'omerah madua' ne'ezab bet ha'elohim va'eqbezem va'a'amidem 'al 'amedam. nehemiah 13:12	vekhal yehudah heibi'u ma'sar hadagan vehatirosh vehayizhar la'ozarot. nehemiah 13:13	va'ozrah 'al 'ozarot shelemyah hakohen vezadoq hasofer ufedayah min halviyim ve'al yadam khanan ben zakur ben matanyah ki ne'emanim nekhshabu va'aleihem lakhaloq la'akheihem. nehemiah 13:14	zakherah li 'elohai 'al zot ve'al temakh khasadai 'asher 'asiti bebet 'elohai ubemishmarav. nehemiah 13:15	bayamim hahemah ra'iti bihudah dorekhim gitot bashabat umebi'im ha'areimot ve'omesim 'al hakhamorim ve'af yayin 'anabim ute'einim vekhal masa umebi'im yerushalim beyom hashabat va'a'id beyom mikhram zayid. nehemiah 13:16	vehazorim yashebu bah mebi'im dag vekhal mekher umokherim bashabat libnei yehudah ubirushalim. nehemiah 13:17	va'aribah 'et khorei yehudah va'omerah lahem mah hadabar hara' hazeh 'asher 'atem 'osim umekhalelim 'et yom hashabat. nehemiah 13:18	halo khoh 'asu 'aboteikhem vayabei 'eloheinu 'aleinu 'et kal hara'ah hazot ve'al ha'ir hazot ve'atem mosifim kharon 'al yisra'el lekhalel 'et hashabat. nehemiah 13:19	vayhi ka'asher zalalu sha'arei yerushalim lifnei hashabat va'omerah vayisageru hadelatot va'omerah 'asher lo yiftakhum 'ad 'akhar hashabat umine'arai he'emadti 'al hashe'arim lo yabo masa beyom hashabat. nehemiah 13:20	vayalinu harokhelim umokherei khal mimkar mikhuz lirushalim pa'am ushetayim. nehemiah 13:21	va'a'idah bahem va'omerah 'aleihem madua' 'atem leinim neged hakhomah 'im tishnu yad 'eshlakh bakhem min ha'et hahi lo ba'u bashabat. nehemiah 13:22	va'omerah lalviyim 'asher yihyu mitaharim uba'im shomerim hashe'arim leqadesh 'et yom hashabat gam zot zakherah li 'elohai vekhusah 'alai kerob khasdekha. nehemiah 13:23	gam bayamim hahem ra'iti 'et hayehudim hoshibu nashim 'ashdodiyot 'ashdodiyot 'amoniyot 'amoniyot mo'abiyot. nehemiah 13:24	ubeneihem khazi medaber 'ashdodit ve'einam makirim ledaber yehudit vekhilshon 'am va'am. nehemiah 13:25	va'arib 'imam va'aqalem va'akeh meihem 'anashim va'emretem va'ashbi'em beilohim 'im titenu benoteikhem libneihem ve'im tis'u mibenoteihem libneikhem velakhem. nehemiah 13:26	halo 'al 'eleh khata shelomoh melekh yisra'el ubagoyim harabim lo hayah melekh kamohu ve'ahub leilohav hayah vayiteneihu 'elohim melekh 'al kal yisra'el gam 'oto hekheti'u hanashim hanakheriyot. nehemiah 13:27	velakhem hanishma' la'asot 'et kal hara'ah hagedolah hazot lim'ol beiloheinu lehoshib nashim nakheriyot. nehemiah 13:28	umibenei yoyada' ben 'elyashib hakohen hagadol khatan lesanbalat hakhoroni va'abrikheihu mei'alai. nehemiah 13:29	zakherah lahem 'elohai 'al ga'olei hakehunah uberit hakehunah vehalviyim. nehemiah 13:30	vetihartim mikal neikhar va'a'amidah mishmarot lakohanim velalviyim 'ish bimlakhto. nehemiah 13:31	ulequrban ha'eizim be'itim mezumanot velabikurim zakherah li 'elohai letobah.

umagog umadai veyavan vetubal umeshekh vetiras. 1_chronicles 1:6	ubenei gomer 'ashkanaz vedifat vetogarmah. 1_chronicles 1:7	ubenei yavan 'elishah vetarshishah kitim verodanim. 1_chronicles 1:8	benei kham kush umizrayim put ukhena'an. 1_chronicles 1:9	ubenei khush seba vakhavilah vesabta vera'ma vesabtekha ubenei ra'ma sheba udedan. 1_chronicles 1:10	vekhush yalad 'et nimrod hu heikhel lihyot gibor ba'arez. 1_chronicles 1:11	umizrayim yalad 'et ludiyim ludim ve'et 'anamim ve'et lehabim ve'et naftukhim. 1_chronicles 1:12	ve'et patrusim ve'et kaslukhim 'asher yaze'u misham pelishtim ve'et kaftorim. 1_chronicles 1:13	ukhena'an yalad 'et zidon bekhoro ve'et khet. 1_chronicles 1:14	ve'et haybusi ve'et ha'emori ve'et hagirgashi. 1_chronicles 1:15	ve'et hakhivi ve'et ha'arqi ve'et hasini. 1:18	ve'arpakhshad yalad 'et shalakh veshelakh yalad 'et 'eiber. 1_chronicles 1:19	ule'eiber yulad shenei banim shem ha'ekhad peleg ki beyamav niflegah ha'arez veshem 'akhiv yaqetan. 1_chronicles 1:20	veyaqetan yalad 'et 'almodad ve'et shalef ve'et khazarmavet ve'et yarakh. 1_chronicles 1:21	ve'et hadoram ve'et 'uzal ve'et diqlah. 1_chronicles 1:22	ve'et 'eibal ve'et 'abima'el ve'et sheba. 1_chronicles 1:23	ve'et 'ofir ve'et khavilah ve'et yobab kal 'eleh benei yaqetan. 1_chronicles 1:24	shem 'arpakhshad shalakh. 1_chronicles 1:25	'eiber peleg re'u. 1_chronicles 1:26	serug nakhor tarakh. 1_chronicles 1:27	'abram hu 'abraham. 1_chronicles 1:28	benei 'abraham yizkhaq veyishma'el. 1_chronicles 1:29	'eleh toledotam bekhor yishma'el nebayot veqeidar ve'adbe'el umibsam. 1_chronicles 1:30	mishma' vedumah masa khadad veteima. 1_chronicles 1:31	yetur nafish vaqeidemah 'eleh hem benei yishma'el. 1_chronicles 1:32	ubenei qeturah pilegesh 'abraham yaledah 'et zimran veyaqeshan umedan umidyan veyishbaq veshuakh ubenei yaqeshan sheba udedan. 1_chronicles 1:33	ubenei midyan 'eifah va'eifer vakhanokh va'abida' ve'elda'ah kal 'eleh benei qeturah. 1_chronicles 1:34	vayoled 'abraham 'et yizkhaq benei yizkhaq 'eisav veyisra'el. 1_chronicles 1:35	benei 'eisav 'elifaz re'u'el vi'ush veya'lam veqorakh. 1_chronicles 1:36	benei 'elifaz teiman ve'omar zefi vega'tam qenaz vetimna' va'amaleq. 1_chronicles 1:37	benei re'u'el nakhat zerakh shamah umizah. 1_chronicles 1:38	ubenei sei'ir lotan veshobal vezib'on va'anah vedishon ve'eizer vedishan. 1_chronicles 1:39	ubenei lotan khori vehomam va'akhot lotan timna'. 1_chronicles 1:40	benei shobal 'alyan umanakhat ve'eibal shefi ve'onam ubenei zib'on 'ayah va'anah. 1_chronicles 1:41	benei 'anah dishon ubenei dishon khamran ve'eshban veyitran ukheran. 1_chronicles 1:42	benei 'eizer bilhan veza'avan ya'aqan benei dishon 'uz va'aran. 1_chronicles 1:43	ve'eleh hamelakhim 'asher malekhu be'erez 'edom lifnei melakh melekh libnei yisra'el bela' ben be'or veshem 'iro dinhabah. 1_chronicles 1:44	vayamat bala' vayimlokh takhtav yobab ben zerakh mibazerah. 1_chronicles 1:45	vayamat yobab vayimlokh takhtav khusham mei'erez hateimani. 1_chronicles 1:46	vayamat khusham vayimlokh takhtav hadad ben bedad hamakeh 'et midyan bisdeh mo'ab veshem 'iro 'ayot 'avit. 1_chronicles 1:47	vayamat hadad vayimlokh takhtav samlah mimasreiqah. 1_chronicles 1:48	vayamat samlah vayimlokh takhtav sha'ul meirekhobot hanahar. 1_chronicles 1:49	vayamat sha'ul vayimlokh takhtav ba'al khanan ben 'akhbor. 1_chronicles 1:50	vayamat ba'al khanan vayimlokh takhtav hadad veshem 'iro pa'i veshem 'ishto meheitab'el bat matred bat mei zahab. 1_chronicles 1:51	vayamat hadad vayihyu 'alufei 'edom 'aluf timna' 'aluf 'alyah 'alvah 'aluf yetet. 1_chronicles 1:52	'aluf 'aholibamah 'aluf 'eilah 'aluf pinon. 1_chronicles 1:53	'aluf qenaz 'aluf teiman 'aluf mibzar. 1_chronicles 1:54	'aluf magdi'el 'aluf 'iram 'eleh 'alufei 'edom. 1_chronicles 2:1	'eleh benei yisra'el re'uben shim'on leivi vihudah yisashkhar uzebulun. 1_chronicles 2:2	dan yosef ubinyamin naftali gad ve'asher. 1_chronicles 2:3	benei yehudah 'er ve'onan vesheilah sheloshah nolad lo mibat shua' hakena'anit vayhi 'er bekhor yehudah ra' be'einei yhvh vaymiteihu. 1_chronicles 2:4	vetamar kalato yaledah lo 'et perez ve'et zarakh kal benei yehudah khamishah. 1_chronicles 2:5	benei ferez khezron vekhamul. 1_chronicles 2:6	ubenei zerakh zimri ve'eitan veheiman vekhalkol vadara' kulam khamishah. 1_chronicles 2:7	ubenei karmi 'akhar 'okher yisra'el 'asher ma'al bakheirem. 1_chronicles 2:8	ubenei 'eitan 'azaryah. 1_chronicles 2:9	ubenei khezron 'asher nolad lo 'et yerakhme'el ve'et ram ve'et kelubai. 1_chronicles 2:10	veram holid 'et 'aminadab ve'aminadab holid 'et nakhshon nesi benei yehudah. 1_chronicles 2:11	venakhshon holid 'et salma vesalma holid 'et bo'az. 1_chronicles 2:12	ubo'az holid 'et 'obed ve'obed holid 'et yishai. 1_chronicles 2:13	ve'ishai holid 'et bekhoro 'et 'eli'ab va'abinadab hasheini veshim'a hashelishi. 1_chronicles 2:14	netan'el harebi'i radai hakhamishi. 1_chronicles 2:15	'ozem hashishi david hashebi'i. 1_chronicles 2:16	ve'akhyoteihem ve'akhyoteihem zeruyah va'abigayil ubenei zeruyah 'abshai veyo'ab va'asah 'el sheloshah. 1_chronicles 2:17	va'abigayil yaledah 'et 'amasa va'abi 'amasa yeter hayishme'eili. 1_chronicles 2:18	vekhaleb ben khezron holid 'et 'azubah 'ishah ve'et yeri'ot ve'eleh baneha yeisher veshobab ve'ardon. 1_chronicles 2:19	vatamat 'azubah vayiqakh lo khaleb 'et 'efrat vateiled lo 'et khur. 1_chronicles 2:20	vekhur holid 'et 'uri ve'uri holid 'et bezal'el. 1_chronicles 2:21	ve'akhar ba khezron 'el bat makhir 'abi gil'ad vehu leqakhah vehu ben shishim shanah vateiled lo 'et segub. 1_chronicles 2:22	usegub holid 'et ya'ir vayhi lo 'esrim veshalosh 'arim be'erez hagil'ad. 1_chronicles 2:23	vayiqakh geshur va'aram 'et khavot ya'ir mei'itam 'et qenat ve'et benoteha shishim 'ir kal 'eleh benei makhir 'abi gil'ad. 1_chronicles 2:24	ve'akhar mot khezron bekhaleb 'efratah ve'eishet khezron 'abiyah vateiled lo 'et 'ashkhur 'abi teqoa'. 1_chronicles 2:25	vayihyu benei yerakhme'el bekhor khezron habekhor ram ubunah va'oren va'ozem 'akhiyah. 1_chronicles 2:26	vatehi 'ishah 'akheret lirakhme'el ushemah 'atarah hi 'em 'onam. 1_chronicles 2:27	vayihyu benei ram bekhor yerakhme'el ma'az veyamin va'eiqer. 1_chronicles 2:28	vayihyu benei 'onam shamai veyada' ubenei shamai nadab va'abishur. 1_chronicles 2:29	veshem 'eishet 'abishur 'abihayil vateiled lo 'et 'akhban ve'et molid. 1_chronicles 2:30	ubenei nadab seled ve'apayim vayamat seled lo banim. 1_chronicles 2:31	ubenei 'apayim yish'i ubenei yish'i sheishan ubenei sheishan 'akhlai. 1_chronicles 2:32	ubenei yada' 'akhi shamai yeter veyonatan vayamat yeter lo banim. 1_chronicles 2:33	ubenei yonatan pelet vezaza 'eleh hayu benei yerakhme'el. 1_chronicles 2:34	velo hayah lesheishan banim ki 'im banot ulesheishan 'ebed mizri ushemo yarkha'. 1_chronicles zebulun 'et rimono ve'et migrasheha 'et tabor ve'et migrasheha. 1_chronicles 6:78	umei'eiber leyarden yereikho lemizrakh hayarden mimateh re'uben 'et bezer bamidbar ve'et migrasheha ve'et yahzah ve'et migrasheha. 1_chronicles 6:79	ve'et qedeimot ve'et migrasheha ve'et meifa'at ve'et migrasheha. 1_chronicles 6:80	umimateh gad 'et ramot bagil'ad ve'et migrasheha ve'et makhanayim ve'et migrasheha. 1_chronicles 6:81	ve'et kheshbon ve'et migrasheha ve'et ya'zer ve'et migrasheha. 1_chronicles 7:1	velibnei yisashkhar tola' ufu'ah yashib yashub veshimron 'arba'ah. 1_chronicles 7:2	ubenei tola' 'uzi urefayah viri'el veyakhmai veyibsam ushemu'el rashim lebet 'abotam letola' giborei khayil letoledotam misparam bimei david 'esrim ushenayim 'elef veshesh mei'ot. 1_chronicles 7:3	ubenei 'uzi yizrakhyah ubenei yizrakhyah mikha'el ve'obadyah veyo'el yishiyah khamishah rashim kulam. 1_chronicles 7:4	va'aleihem letoledotam lebet 'abotam gedudei zeba milkhamah sheloshim veshishah 'alef ki hirbu nashim ubanim. 1_chronicles 7:5	va'akheihem lekhol mishpekhot yisashkhar giborei khayalim shemonim veshib'ah 'elef hityakhsam lakol. 1_chronicles 7:6	binyamin bela' vabekher vidi'a'el sheloshah. 1_chronicles 7:7	ubenei bela' 'ezbon ve'uzi ve'uzi'el virimot ve'iri khamishah rashei bet 'abot giborei khayalim vehityakhsam 'esrim ushenayim 'elef usheloshim ve'arba'ah. 1_chronicles 7:8	ubenei bekher zemirah veyo'ash ve'eli'ezer ve'elyo'einai ve'ameri vireimot va'abiyah va'anatot ve'alamet kal 'eleh benei bakher. 1_chronicles 7:9	vehityakhsam letoledotam rashei bet 'abotam giborei khayil 'esrim 'elef umatayim. 1_chronicles 7:10	ubenei yedi'a'el bilhan ubenei bilhan ye'ish ye'ush ubinyamin ve'eihud ukhena'anah vezeitan vetarshish va'akhishakhar. 1_chronicles 7:11	kal 'eleh benei yakhazi'el veguni veyeizer veshalum benei bilhah. 1_chronicles 7:14	benei menasheh 'asri'el 'asher yaladah pilagsho ha'aramiyah yaledah 'et makhir 'abi gil'ad. 1_chronicles 7:15	umakhir laqakh 'ishah ubanav 'ulam varaqem. 1_chronicles 7:17	ubenei 'ulam bedan 'eleh benei gil'ad ben makhir ben menasheh. 1_chronicles 7:18	va'akhoto hamolekhet yaledah 'et 'ishehod ve'et 'abi'ezer ve'et makhlah. 1_chronicles 7:19	vayihyu benei shemida' 'akhyan vashekhem veliqkhi va'ani'am. 1_chronicles 7:20	ubenei 'efrayim shutalakh ubered beno vetakhat beno ve'el'adah beno vetakhat beno. 1_chronicles 7:21	vezabad beno veshutelakh beno ve'eizer ve'el'ad vaharagum 'anshei gat hanoladim ba'arez ki yaredu laqakhat 'et miqneihem. 1_chronicles 7:22	vayit'abel 'efrayim 'abihem yamim rabim vayabo'u 'ekhav beno. 1_chronicles 7:28	va'akhuzatam umoshebotam bet 'el ubenoteha velamizrakh na'aran velama'arab gezer ubenoteha ushekhem ubenoteha 'ad 'ayah ubenoteha. 1_chronicles 7:29	ve'al yedei benei menasheh 1_chronicles 7:31	ubenei beri'ah kheber umalki'el hu 'abi birzot birzayit. 1_chronicles 7:32	vekheber holid 'et yaflet ve'et shomer ve'et khotam ve'et shu'a 'akhotam. 1_chronicles 7:33	ubenei yaflet 8:40	vayihyu benei 'ulam 'anashim giborei khayil dorekhei qeshet umarbim banim ubenei banim mei'ah vakhamishim kal 'eleh mibenei binyamin. 1_chronicles 9:1	vekhal yisra'el hityakhsu vehinam ketubim 11:7	vayeisheb david bamzad 'al ken qare'u lo 'ir david. 1_chronicles 11:8	vayiben ha'ir misabib min hamilo ve'ad hasabib veyo'ab yekhayeh 'et she'ar ha'ir. 1_chronicles 11:9	vayeilekh david halokh 1_chronicles 11:14	vayityazebu betokh hakhelqah vayaziluha vayaku 'et pelishtim vayosha' yhvh teshu'ah gedolah. 1_chronicles 11:15	vayeiredu sheloshah min hasheloshim rosh 'al hazur 'el david 'el me'arat 'adulam umakhaneh felishtim khonah be'eimeq refa'im. 1_chronicles 11:16	vedavid 'az bamezudah unezib pelishtim 'az bebet lakhem. 1_chronicles 11:17	vayit'av vayit'av david vayomar mi yashqeini mayim mibor bet lekhem 'asher basha'ar. 1_chronicles 11:18	vayibqe'u hasheloshah bemakhaneh felishtim vayish'abu mayim mibor bet lekhem 'asher basha'ar vayis'u vayabi'u 'el david velo 'abah david lishtotam vaynasekh 'otam yhvh. 1_chronicles 11:19	vayomer khalilah li mei'elohai mei'asot zot hadam ha'anashim ha'eleh 'eshteh benafshotam ki benafshotam hebi'um velo 'abah lishtotam 'eleh 'asu sheloshet hagiborim. 1_chronicles 11:20	ve'abshai 'akhi yo'ab hu hayah rosh hasheloshah vehu 'orer 'et khanito 'al shelosh mei'ot khalal velo velo shem basheloshah. 1_chronicles 11:21	min hasheloshah bashenayim nikhbad vayhi lahem lesar ve'ad hasheloshah lo ba. 1_chronicles 11:22	benayah ben yehoyada' ben 'ish khayil rab pe'alim min qabze'el hu hikah 'et shenei 'ari'el mo'ab vehu yarad vehikah 'et ha'ari betokh habor beyom hashaleg. 1_chronicles 11:23	vehu hikah 'et ha'ish hamizri 'ish midah khamesh ba'amah ubeyad hamizri khanit kimnor 'oregim vayeired 'eilav bashabet vayigzol 'et hakhanit miyad hamizri vayahargeihu bakhanito. 1_chronicles 11:24	'eleh 'asah benayahu ben yehoyada' velo shem bishloshah hagiborim. 1_chronicles 11:25	min hasheloshim hino nikhbad hu ve'el hasheloshah lo ba vaysimeihu david 'al mishma'to. 1_chronicles 11:26	vegiborei hakhayalim 'asah 'el 'akhi yo'ab 'elkhanan ben dodo mibet lakhem. 1_chronicles 11:27	shamot haharori khelez hapeloni. 1_chronicles 11:28	'ira ben 'iqesh hateqo'i 'abi'ezer ha'anetoti. 1_chronicles 11:29	sibekhai hakhushati 'ilai ha'akhokhi. 1_chronicles 11:30	mahrai hanetofati kheiled ben ba'anah hanetofati. 1_chronicles 11:31	'itai ben ribai migib'at benei binyamin benayah hapir'atoni. 1_chronicles 11:32	khurai minakhalei ga'ash 'abi'el ha'arbati. 1_chronicles 11:33	'azmavet habakharumi 'elyakhba hasha'alboni. 1_chronicles 11:34	benei hashem hagizoni yonatan ben shageh haharari. 1_chronicles 11:35	'akhi'am ben sakhar haharari 'elifal ben 'ur. 1_chronicles 11:36	kheifer hamekheirati 'akhiyah hapeloni. 1_chronicles 11:37	khezro hakarmeli na'arai ben 'ezbai. 1_chronicles 11:38	yo'el 'akhi natan mibkhar ben hagri. 1_chronicles 11:39	zeleq ha'amoni nakhrai habeiroti nosei kelei yo'ab ben zeruyah. 1_chronicles 11:40	'ira hayitri gareb hayitri. 1_chronicles 11:41	'uriyah hakhiti zabad ben 'akhlai. 1_chronicles 11:42	'adina ben shiza har'ubeini rosh lar'ubeini ve'alav sheloshim. 1_chronicles 11:43	khanan ben ma'akhah veyoshafat hamitni. 1_chronicles 11:44	'uziya ha'ashterati shama' vi'u'el vi'i'el benei khotam ha'aro'eiri. 1_chronicles 11:45	yedi'a'el ben shimri veyokha 'akhiv hatizi. 1_chronicles 11:46	'eli'el hamakhavim viribai veyoshavyah benei 'elna'am veyitmah hamo'abi. 1_chronicles 11:47	'eli'el ve'obed veya'asi'el hamezobayah. 1_chronicles 12:1	ve'eleh haba'im 'el david leziqelag 'od 'azur mipenei sha'ul ben qish vehemah bagiborim 'ozerei hamilkhamah. 1_chronicles 12:2	nosheqei qeshet mayminim umasmilim ba'abanim ubakhizim baqashet mei'akhei sha'ul mibinyamin. 1_chronicles 12:3	harosh 'akhi'ezer veyo'ash benei hashema'ah hagib'ati vizu'el vizi'el vafelet benei 'azmavet uberakhah veyeihu ha'anetoti. 1_chronicles 12:4	veyishma'yah hagib'oni gibor basheloshim ve'al hasheloshim. 1_chronicles 12:5	veyirmeyah veyakhazi'el veyokhanan veyozabad hagedeirati. 1_chronicles 12:6	'el'uzai virimot ube'alyah ushemaryahu ushefatyahu hakharifi hakharufi. 1_chronicles 12:7	'elqanah veyishiyahu va'azar'el veyo'ezer veyashabe'am haqarekhim. 1_chronicles 12:8	veyo'eilah uzebadyah benei yerokham min hagedor. 1_chronicles 12:9	umin hagadi nibdelu 'el david lamzad midbarah giborei hakhayil 'anshei zaba lamilkhamah 'orekhei zinah varomakh ufenei 'aryeh peneihem vekhizbayim 'al heharim lemaher. 1_chronicles 12:10	'eizer harosh 'obadyah hasheini 'eli'ab hashelishi. 1_chronicles 12:11	mishmanah harebi'i yirmeyah hakhamishi. 1_chronicles 12:12	'atai hashishi 'eli'el hashebi'i. 1_chronicles 12:13	yokhanan hashemini 'elzabad hateshi'i. 1_chronicles 12:14	yirmeyahu ha'asiri makhbanai 'ashtei 'asar. 1_chronicles 12:15	'eleh mibenei gad rashei hazaba 'ekhad lemei'ah haqatan vehagadol le'alef. 1_chronicles 12:16	'eleh hem 'asher 'aberu 'et hayarden bakhodesh harishon vehu memalei 'al kal gidyotav gedotav vayabrikhu 'et kal ha'amaqim lamizrakh velama'arab. 1_chronicles 12:17	vayabo'u min benei binyamin vihudah 'ad lamzad ledavid. 1_chronicles 12:18	vayeizei david lifneihem vaya'an vayomer lahem 'im leshalom batem 'eilai le'azereini yihyeh li 'aleikhem leibab leyakhad ve'im leramotani lezarai belo khamas bekhapai yeire 'elohei 'aboteinu veyokhakh. 1_chronicles 12:19	veruakh labeshah 'et 'amasai rosh hasheloshim hashalishim lekha david ve'imekha ben yishai shalom shalom lekha veshalom le'ozerekha ki 'azarekha 'elohekha vayqabelem david vayitenem berashei hagedud. 1_chronicles 12:20	umimenasheh nafelu 'al david bebo'o 'im pelishtim 'al sha'ul lamilkhamah velo 'azarum ki be'eizah shilekhuhu sarnei felishtim leimor berasheinu yipol 'el 'adonav sha'ul. 1_chronicles 12:21	belekhto 'el ziqelag nafelu 'alav mimenasheh 'adnakh veyozabad vidi'a'el umikha'el veyozabad ve'elihu veziletai rashei ha'alafim 'asher limnasheh. 1_chronicles 12:22	vehemah 'azeru 'im david 'al hagedud ki giborei khayil kulam vayihyu sarim bazaba. 1_chronicles 12:23	ki le'et yom beyom yabo'u 'al david le'azero 'ad lemakhaneh gadol kemakhaneh 'elohim. 1_chronicles 12:24	ve'eleh misperei rashei hekhaluz lazaba ba'u 'al david khebronah lehaseb malkhut sha'ul 'eilav kefi yhvh. 1_chronicles 12:25	benei yehudah nose'ei zinah varomakh sheishet 'alafim ushemoneh mei'ot khaluzei zaba. 1_chronicles 12:26	min benei shim'on giborei khayil lazaba shib'at 'alafim umei'ah. 1_chronicles 12:27	min benei haleivi 'arba'at 'alafim veshesh mei'ot. 1_chronicles 12:28	vihoyada' hanagid le'aharon ve'imo sheloshet 'alafim usheba' mei'ot. 1_chronicles 12:29	vezadoq na'ar gibor khayil ubet 'abiv sarim 'esrim ushenayim. 1_chronicles 12:30	umin benei binyamin 'akhei sha'ul sheloshet 'alafim ve'ad henah marbitam shomerim mishmeret bet sha'ul. 1_chronicles 12:31	umin benei 'efrayim 'esrim 'elef ushemoneh mei'ot giborei khayil 'anshei sheimot lebet 'abotam. 1_chronicles 12:32	umeikhazi mateh menasheh shemonah 'asar 'alef 'asher niqebu besheimot labo lehamlikh 'et david. 1_chronicles 12:33	umibenei yisashkhar yod'ei binah la'itim lada'at mah ya'aseh yisra'el rasheihem matayim vekhal 'akheihem 'al pihem. 1_chronicles 12:34	mizebulun yoz'ei zaba 'orekhei milkhamah bekhal kelei milkhamah khamishim 'alef vela'ador belo leb valeb. 1_chronicles 12:35	uminaftali sarim 'alef ve'imahem bezinah vakhanit sheloshim veshib'ah 'alef. 1_chronicles 12:36	umin hadani 'orekhei milkhamah 'esrim ushemonah 'elef veshesh mei'ot. 1_chronicles 12:37	umei'asher yoz'ei zaba la'arokh milkhamah 'arba'im 'alef. 1_chronicles 12:38	umei'eiber layarden min har'ubeini vehagadi vakhazi sheibet menasheh bekhol kelei zeba milkhamah mei'ah ve'esrim 'alef. 1_chronicles 12:39	kal 'eleh 'anshei milkhamah 'oderei ma'arakhah beleibab shalem ba'u khebronah lehamlikh 'et david 'al kal yisra'el vegam kal sheirit yisra'el leb 'ekhad lehamlikh 'et david. 1_chronicles 12:40	vayihyu sham 'im david yamim sheloshah 'okhelim veshotim ki heikhinu lahem 'akheihem. vegam haqerobim 'aleihem 'ad yisashkhar uzebulun venaftali mebi'im lekhem bakhamorim ubagemalim ubaperadim ubabaqar ma'akhal qemakh debeilim vezimuqim veyayin veshemen ubaqar vezon larob ki simkhah beyisra'el. 1_chronicles 13:1	vayiva'az david 'im sarei ha'alafim vehamei'ot lekhal nagid. 1_chronicles 13:2	vayomer david lekhol qehal yisra'el 'im 'aleikhem tob umin yhvh 'eloheinu nifrezah nishlekhah 'al 'akheinu hanish'arim bekhol 'arzot yisra'el ve'imahem hakohanim vehalviyim be'arei migresheihem veyiqabezu 'eileinu. 1_chronicles 13:3	venasebah 'et 'aron 'eloheinu 'eileinu ki lo derashnuhu bimei sha'ul. 1_chronicles 13:4	vayomeru khal haqahal la'asot ken ki yashar hadabar be'einei khal ha'am. 1_chronicles 13:5	vayaqhel david 'et kal yisra'el min shikhor mizrayim ve'ad lebo khamat lehabi 'et 'aron ha'elohim miqiryat ye'arim. 1_chronicles 13:6	vaya'al david vekhal yisra'el ba'alatah 'el qiryat ye'arim 'asher lihudah leha'alot misham 'et 'aron ha'elohim yhvh yosheb hakerubim 'asher niqra shem. 1_chronicles 13:7	vayarkibu 'et 'aron ha'elohim 'al 'agalah khadashah mibet 'abinadab ve'uza ve'akhyo nohagim ba'agalah. 1_chronicles 13:8	vedavid vekhal yisra'el mesakhaqim lifnei ha'elohim bekhal 'oz ubeshirim ubekhinorot ubinbalim ubetupim ubimziltayim ubakhazozerot. 1_chronicles 13:9	vayabo'u 'ad goren kidon vayishlakh 'uza 'et yado le'ekhoz 'et ha'aron ki shametu habaqar. 1_chronicles 13:10	vayikhar 'af yhvh be'uza vayakeihu 'al 'asher shalakh yado 'al ha'aron vayamat sham lifnei 'elohim. 1_chronicles 13:11	vayikhar ledavid ki faraz yhvh perez be'uza vayiqra lamaqom hahu perez 'uza 'ad hayom hazeh. 1_chronicles 13:12	vayira david 'et ha'elohim bayom hahu leimor hekh 'abi 'eilai 'et 'aron ha'elohim. 1_chronicles 13:13	velo heisir david 'et ha'aron 'eilav 'el 'ir david vayateihu 'el bet 'obed 'edom hagiti. 1_chronicles 13:14	vayeisheb 'aron ha'elohim 'im bet 'obed 'edom bebeito sheloshah khodashim vaybarekh yhvh 'et bet 'obed 'edom ve'et kal 'asher lo. 1_chronicles 14:1	vayishlakh khiram khuram melekh zor mal'akhim 'el david va'azei 'arazim ha'elohim vayet lo 'ohel. 1_chronicles 15:2	'az 'amar david lo laset 'et 'aron ha'elohim ki 'im halviyim ki bam bakhar yhvh laset 'et 'aron yhvh uleshareto 'ad 'olam. 1_chronicles 15:3	vayaqhel david 1_chronicles 15:17	vaya'amidu halviyim 'et heiman ben yo'el umin 'ekhav 'asaf ben berekhyahu umin benei merari 'akheihem 'eitan ben qushayahu. 1_chronicles 15:18	ve'imahem 'akheihem hamishnim 15:21	umatityahu ve'elifeleihu umiqneiyahu ve'obed 'edom vi'i'el va'azazyahu bekhinorot 'al hasheminit lenazeiakh. 1_chronicles 15:22	ukhenanyahu sar halviyim bemasa yasor bamasa ki meibin hu. 1_chronicles 15:23	uberekhyah ve'elqanah sho'arim la'aron. 1_chronicles 15:24	ushebanyahu veyoshafat unetan'el va'amasai uzekharyahu ubenayahu ve'eli'ezer hakohanim makhazozerim makhzerim bakhazozerot besimkhah. 1_chronicles 15:26	vayhi be'zor ha'elohim 'et halviyim nose'ei 'aron berit yhvh vayizbekhu shib'ah farim veshib'ah 'eilim. 1_chronicles 15:27	vedavid mekhurbal bim'il buz vekhal halviyim ubimziltayim mashmi'im binbalim vekhinorot. 1_chronicles 15:29	vayhi 'aron berit yhvh ba 'ad 'ir david umikhal bat sha'ul nishqefah be'ad hakhalon vateire 'et hamelekh david meraqed umesakheq vatibez lo belibah. 1_chronicles 16:1	vayabi'u 'et 'aron ha'elohim vayazigu 'oto betokh ha'ohel 'asher natah lo david vayaqribu 'olot ushelamim lifnei ha'elohim. 1_chronicles 16:2	vaykhal david meiha'alot 16:7	bayom hahu 'az natan david barosh lehodot yhvh beyad 'asaf ve'ekhav. 1_chronicles 16:8	hodu yhvh qir'u bishmo hodi'u ba'amim 'alilotav. 1_chronicles 16:9	shiru lo zameru lo sikhu bekhal 16:24	saperu bagoyim 'et kebodo bekhal ha'amim nifle'otav. 1_chronicles 16:25	ki gadol yhvh umehulal me'od venora hu 'al kal 'elohim. 1_chronicles 16:26	ki kal 'elohei ha'amim 'elilim yhvh shamayim tob ki le'olam khasdo. 1_chronicles 16:35	ve'imru hoshi'einu 'elohei yish'einu veqabezeinu vehazileinu min hagoyim lehodot leshem qadshekha lehishtabeiakh bithilatekha. 1_chronicles 16:36	barukh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el min ha'olam ve'ad ha'olam vayomeru khal ha'am 'amen vehalel yhvh. 1_chronicles 16:37	vaya'azab sham lifnei 'aron berit yhvh le'asaf ule'ekhav lesharet lifnei ha'aron tamid lidbar yom beyomo. 1_chronicles 16:38	ve'obed 'edom va'akheihem shishim ushemonah ve'obed 'edom ben yeditun vekhosah lesho'arim. 1_chronicles 16:39	ve'et zadoq hakohen ve'ekhav hakohanim lifnei mishkan yhvh babamah 'asher begib'on. 1_chronicles 16:40	leha'alot 'olot yhvh 'al mizbakh ha'olah tamid laboqer vela'areb ulekhal hakatub betorat yhvh 'asher zivah 'al yisra'el. 1_chronicles 16:41	ve'imahem heiman vidutun ushe'ar haberurim 'asher niqebu besheimot lehodot yhvh ki le'olam khasdo. 1_chronicles 16:42	ve'imahem heiman vidutun khazozerot umeziltayim lemashmi'im ukhelei shir ha'elohim ubenei yedutun lasha'ar. 1_chronicles 16:43	vayeilekhu khal ha'am 'ish lebeito vayisob david lebarekh 'et beito. 1_chronicles 17:1	vayhi ka'asher yashab david bebeito vayomer david 'el natan hanabi hineh 'anokhi yosheb bebet ha'arazim va'aron berit yhvh takhat yeri'ot. 1_chronicles 17:2	vayomer natan 'el david kol 'asher bilbabekha 'aseh ki ha'elohim 'imakh. 1_chronicles 17:3	vayhi balaylah hahu vayhi debar 'elohim 'el natan leimor. 1_chronicles 17:4	lekh ve'amarta 'el david 'abdi koh 'amar yhvh lo 'atah tibneh li habayit lashabet. 1_chronicles 17:5	ki lo yashabti bebayit min hayom 'asher he'eleiti 'et yisra'el 'ad hayom hazeh va'ehyeh mei'ohel 'el 'ohel umimishkan. 1_chronicles 17:6	bekhol 'asher hithalakhti bekhal yisra'el hadabar dibarti 'et 'akhad shofetei yisra'el 'asher ziviti lir'ot 'et 'ami leimor lamah lo benitem li bet 'arazim. 1_chronicles 17:7	ve'atah koh tomar le'abdi ledavid koh 'amar yhvh zeba'ot 'ani leqakhtikha min hanaveh min 'akharei hazon lihyot nagid 'al 'ami yisra'el. 1_chronicles 17:8	va'ehyeh 'imekha bekhol 'asher halakhta va'akhrit 'et kal 'oybekha mipanekha ve'asiti lekha shem keshem hagedolim 'asher ba'arez. 1_chronicles 17:9	vesamti maqom le'ami yisra'el uneta'tihu veshakhan takhtav velo yirgaz 'od velo yosifu benei 'avlah lebaloto ka'asher barishonah. 1_chronicles 17:10	ulemiyamim 'asher ziviti shofetim 'al 'ami yisra'el vehikhna'ti 'et kal 'oybekha va'agid lakh ubayit yibneh lekha yhvh. 1_chronicles 17:11	vehayah ki male'u yamekha lalekhet 'im 'abotekha vahaqimoti 'et zar'akha 'akharekha 'asher yihyeh mibanekha vahakhinoti 'et malkhuto. 1_chronicles 17:12	hu yibneh li bayit vekhonanti 'et kis'o 'ad 'olam. 1_chronicles 17:13	'ani 'ehyeh lo le'ab vehu yihyeh li leben vekhasdi lo 'asir mei'imo ka'asher hasiroti mei'asher hayah lefanekha. 1_chronicles 17:14	veha'amadtihu bebeiti ubemalkhuti 'ad ha'olam vekhis'o yihyeh nakhon 'ad 'olam. 1_chronicles 17:15	kekhol hadebarim ha'eleh ukhekhol hekhazon hazeh ken diber natan 'el david. 1_chronicles 17:16	vayabo hamelekh david vayeisheb lifnei yhvh vayomer mi 'ani yhvh 'elohim umi beiti ki habi'otani 'ad halom. 1_chronicles 17:17	vatiqtan zot be'einekha 'elohim vatedaber 'al bet 'abdekha lemeirakhoq ure'itani ketor ha'adam hama'alah yhvh 'elohim. 1_chronicles 17:18	mah yosif 'od david 'eilekha lekhabod 'et 'abdekha ve'atah 'et 'abdekha yada'eta. 1_chronicles 17:19	yhvh ba'abur 'abdekha ukhelibekha 'asita 'et kal hagedulah hazot lehodia' 'et kal hagedulot. 1_chronicles 17:20	yhvh 'en kamokha ve'en 'elohim zulatekha bekhol 'asher shama'nu be'azeneinu. 1_chronicles 17:21	umi ke'amekha yisra'el go 'ekhad ba'arez 'asher halakh ha'elohim lifdot lo 'am lasum lekha m gedulot venora'ot legaresh mipenei 'amekha 'asher padita mimizrayim goyim. 1_chronicles 17:22	vatiten 'et 'amekha yisra'el lekha le'am 'ad 'olam ve'atah yhvh hayita lahem leilohim. 1_chronicles 17:23	ve'atah yhvh hadabar 'asher dibarta 'al 'abdekha ve'al beito yei'amen 'ad 'olam va'aseh ka'asher dibarta. 1_chronicles 17:24	veyei'amen veyigdal shimkha 'ad 'olam leimor yhvh zeba'ot 'elohei yisra'el 'elohim leyisra'el ubet david 'abdekha nakhon lefanekha. 1_chronicles 17:25	ki 'atah 'elohai galita 'et 'ozen 'abdekha libnot lo bayit 'al ken maza 'abdekha lehitpalel lefanekha. 1_chronicles 17:26	ve'atah yhvh 'atah hu ha'elohim vatedaber 'al 'abdekha hatobah hazot. 1_chronicles 17:27	ve'atah ho'alta lebarekh 'et bet 'abdekha lihyot le'olam lefanekha ki 'atah yhvh beirakhta umeborakh le'olam. 1_chronicles 18:1	vayhi 'akharei khen vayakh david 'et pelishtim vayakhni'em vayiqakh 'et gat ubenoteha miyad pelishtim. 1_chronicles 18:2	vayakh 'et mo'ab vayihyu mo'ab 'abadim ledavid nose'ei minkhah. 1_chronicles 18:3	vayakh david 'et hadad'ezer melekh zobah khamatah belekhto lehazib yado binhar perat. 1_chronicles 18:4	vayilkod david mimenu 'elef rekheb veshib'at 'alafim parashim ve'esrim 'elef 'ish ragli vai'aqer david 'et kal harekheb vayoter mimenu mei'ah rakheb. 1_chronicles 18:5	vayabo 'aram darmeseq la'zor lahadad'ezer melekh zobah vayakh david ba'aram 'esrim ushenayim 'elef 'ish. 1_chronicles 18:6	vayasem david ba'aram darmeseq vayhi 'aram ledavid 'abadim nose'ei minkhah vayosha' yhvh ledavid bekhol 'asher halakh. 1_chronicles 18:7	vayiqakh david 'et shiltei hazahab 'asher hayu 'al 'abdei hadad'azer vaybi'em yerushalim. 1_chronicles 18:8	umitibkhat umikun 'arei hadad'ezer laqakh david nekhoshet rabah me'od bah 'asah shelomoh 'et yam hanekhoshet ve'et ha'amudim ve'et kelei hanekhoshet. 1_chronicles 18:9	vayishma' to'u melekh khamat ki hikah david 'et kal khel hadad'ezer melekh zobah. 1_chronicles 18:10	vayishlakh 'et hadoram beno 'el hamelekh david lish'ol lish'al lo leshalom ulebarakho 'al 'asher nilkham bahadad'ezer vayakeihu ki 'ish milkhamot to'u hayah hadad'azer vekhol kelei zahab vakhesef unekhoshet. 1_chronicles 18:11	gam 'otam hiqdish hamelekh david yhvh 'im hakesef vehazahab 'asher nasa mikal hagoyim mei'edom umimo'ab umibenei 'amon umipelishtim umei'amaleq. 1_chronicles 18:12	ve'abshai ben zeruyah hikah 'et 'edom begei hamelakh shemonah 'asar 'alef. 1_chronicles 18:13	vayasem be'edom nezibim vayihyu khal 'edom 'abadim ledavid vayosha' yhvh 'et david bekhol 'asher halakh. 1_chronicles 18:14	vayimlokh david 'al kal yisra'el vayhi 'oseh mishpat uzedaqah lekhal 'amo. 1_chronicles 18:15	veyo'ab ben zeruyah 'al hazaba vihoshafat ben 'akhilud mazkir. 1_chronicles 18:16	vezadoq ben 'akhitub va'abimelekh ben 'ebyatar kohanim veshavsha sofer. 1_chronicles 18:17	ubenayahu ben yehoyada' 'al hakereiti vehapeleiti ubenei david harishonim leyad hamelekh. 1_chronicles 19:1	vayhi 'akharei khen vayamat nakhash melekh benei 'amon vayimlokh beno takhtav. 1_chronicles 19:2	vayomer david 'e'eseh khesed 'im khanun ben nakhash ki 'asah 'abiv 'imi khesed vayishlakh david mal'akhim lenakhamo 'al 'abiv vayabo'u 'abdei david 'el 'erez benei 'amon 'el khanun lenakhamo. 1_chronicles 19:3	vayomeru sarei benei 'amon lekhanun hamkhabed david 'et 'abikha be'einekha ki shalakh lekha menakhamim halo ba'abur lakhqor velahafokh uleragel ha'arez ba'u 'abadav 'eilekha. 1_chronicles 19:4	vayiqakh khanun 'et 'abdei david vaygalekhem vayikhrot 'et madveihem bakheizi 'ad hamifsa'ah vayshalekhem. 1_chronicles 19:5	vayeilekhu vayagidu ledavid 'al ha'anashim vayishlakh liqratam ki hayu ha'anashim nikhlamim me'od vayomer hamelekh shebu bireikho 'ad 'asher yezamakh zeqankhem veshabtem. 1_chronicles 19:6	vayir'u benei 'amon ki hitba'ashu 'im david vayishlakh khanun ubenei 'amon 'elef kikar kesef liskor lahem min 'aram naharayim umin 'aram ma'akhah umizobah rekheb ufarashim. 1_chronicles 19:7	vayiskeru lahem shenayim usheloshim 'elef rekheb ve'et melekh ma'akhah ve'et 'amo vayabo'u vayakhanu lifnei meideba ubenei 'amon ne'esfu mei'areihem vayabo'u lamilkhamah 1_chronicles 19:8	vayishma' david vayishlakh 'et yo'ab ve'et kal zaba hagiborim. 1_chronicles 19:9	vayeize'u benei 'amon vaya'arkhu milkhamah petakh ha'ir vehamelakhim 'asher ba'u lebadam basadeh. 1_chronicles 19:10	vayar yo'ab ki hayetah fenei hamilkhamah 'eilav panim ve'akhor vayibkhar mikal bakhur beyisra'el vaya'arokh liqrat 'aram. 1_chronicles 19:11	ve'et yeter ha'am natan beyad 'abshai 'akhiv vaya'arkhu liqrat benei 'amon. 1_chronicles 19:12	vayomer 'im tekhezaq mimeni 'aram vehayita li litshu'ah ve'im benei 'amon yekhezqu mimekha vehosha'tikha. 1_chronicles 19:13	khazaq venitkhazeqah be'ad 'ameinu ube'ad 'arei 'eloheinu yhvh hatob be'einav ya'aseh. 1_chronicles 19:14	vayigash yo'ab veha'am 'asher 'imo lifnei 'aram lamilkhamah vayanusu mipanav. 1_chronicles 19:15	ubenei 'amon ra'u ki nas 'aram vayanusu gam hem mipenei 'abshai 'akhiv vayabo'u ha'irah vayabo yo'ab yerushalim. 1_chronicles 19:16	vayar 'aram ki nigefu lifnei yisra'el vayishlekhu mal'akhim vayozi'u 'et 'aram 'asher mei'eiber hanahar veshofakh sar zeba hadad'ezer lifneihem. 1_chronicles 19:17	vayugad ledavid vaye'esof 'et kal yisra'el vaya'abor hayarden vayabo 'aleihem vaya'arokh 'aleihem vaya'arokh david liqrat 'aram milkhamah vayilakhamu 'imo. 1_chronicles 19:18	vayanas 'aram milifnei yisra'el vayaharog david mei'aram shib'at 'alafim rekheb ve'arba'im 'elef 'ish ragli ve'et shofakh sar hazaba heimit. 1_chronicles 19:19	vayir'u 'abdei hadad'ezer ki nigefu lifnei yisra'el vayashlimu 'im david vaya'abduhu velo 'abah 'aram lehoshia' 'et benei 'amon 'od. 1_chronicles 20:1	vayhi le'et teshubat hashanah le'et zet hamelakhim vayinhag yo'ab 'et khel hazaba vayashkhet 'et 'erez benei 'amon vayabo vayazar 'et rabah vedavid yosheb birushalim vayakh yo'ab 'et rabah vayeherseha. 1_chronicles 20:2	vayiqakh david 'et 'ateret malkam mei'al rosho vayimza'ah mishqal kikar zahab ubah 'eben yeqarah vatehi 'al rosh david ushelal ha'ir hozi harbeh me'od. 1_chronicles 20:3	ve'et ha'am 'asher bah hozi vayasar bamegeirah ubakharizei habarzel ubamegeirot vekhen ya'aseh david lekhol 'arei benei 'amon vayashab david vekhal ha'am yerushalim. 1_chronicles 20:4	vayhi 'akhareikhen vata'amod milkhamah begezer 'im pelishtim 'az hikah sibekhai hakhushati 'et sipai milidei harefa'im vayikanei'u. 1_chronicles 20:5	vatehi 'od milkhamah 'et pelishtim vayakh 'elkhanan ben ya'ur ya'ir 'et lakhmi 'akhi galeyat hagiti ve'ez khanito kimnor 'oregim. 1_chronicles 20:6	vatehi 'od milkhamah begat vayhi 'ish midah ve'ezbe'otav shesh vashesh 'esrim ve'arba' vegam hu nolad leharafa. 1_chronicles 20:7	vaykharef 'et yisra'el vayakeihu yehonatan ben shim'a 'akhi david. 1_chronicles 20:8	'el nuledu leharafa begat vayipelu beyad david ubeyad 'abadav. 1_chronicles 21:1	vaya'amod satan 'al yisra'el vayaset 'et david limnot 'et yisra'el. 1_chronicles 21:2	vayomer david 'el yo'ab ve'el sarei ha'am lekhu sifru 'et yisra'el mibe'er sheba' ve'ad dan vehabi'u 'eilai ve'eide'ah 'et misparam. 1_chronicles 21:3	vayomer yo'ab yosef yhvh 'al 'amo kahem mei'ah fe'amim halo 'adoni hamelekh kulam ladoni la'abadim lamah yebaqesh zot 'adoni lamah yihyeh le'ashmah leyisra'el. 1_chronicles 21:4	udebar hamelekh khazaq 'al yo'ab vayeizei yo'ab vayithalekh bekhal yisra'el vayabo yerushalim. 1_chronicles 21:5	vayiten yo'ab 'et mispar mifqad ha'am 'el david vayhi khal yisra'el 'elef 'alafim umei'ah 'elef 'ish sholef khereb vihudah 'arba' mei'ot veshib'im 'elef 'ish sholef khareb. 1_chronicles 21:6	veleivi ubinyamin lo faqad betokham ki nit'ab debar hamelekh 'et yo'ab. 1_chronicles 21:7	vayeira' be'einei ha'elohim 'al hadabar hazeh vayakh 'et yisra'el. 1_chronicles 21:8	vayomer david 'el ha'elohim khatati me'od 'asher 'asiti 'et hadabar hazeh ve'atah ha'aber na 'et 'avon 'abdekha ki niskalti me'od. 1_chronicles 21:9	vaydaber yhvh 'el gad khozeh david leimor. 1_chronicles 21:10	lekh vedibarta 'el david leimor koh 'amar yhvh shalosh 'ani noteh 'alekha bekhar lekha 'akhat meihenah ve'e'eseh lakh. 1_chronicles 21:11	vayabo gad 'el david vayomer lo koh 'amar yhvh qabel lakh. 1_chronicles 21:12	'im shalosh shanim ra'ab ve'im sholekhi dabar. 1_chronicles 21:13	vayomer david 'el gad zar li me'od 'epelah na beyad yhvh ki rabim rakhamav me'od ubeyad 'adam 'al 'epol. 1_chronicles 21:14	vayiten yhvh deber beyisra'el vayipol yadekha umal'akh yhvh 'omed 'im goren 'arenan haybusi. 1_chronicles 21:16	vayisa david 'et 'einav vayar 'et mal'akh yhvh 'omed ben ha'arez uben hashamayim vekharbo shelufah beyado netuyah 'al yerushalim vayipol david vehazeqeinim mekhusim basaqim 'al peneihem. 1_chronicles 21:17	vayomer david 'el ha'elohim halo 'ani 'amarti limnot ba'am va'ani hu 'asher khatati vehareia' harei'oti ve'eleh hazon meh 'asu yhvh 'elohai tehi na yadekha bi ubebet 'abi ube'amekha lo lemageifah. 1_chronicles 21:18	umal'akh yhvh 'amar 'el gad leimor ledavid ki ya'aleh david lehaqim mizbeiakh yhvh begoren 'arenan haybusi. 1_chronicles 21:19	vaya'al david bidbar gad 'asher diber beshem yhvh. 1_chronicles 21:20	vayashab 'arenan vayar 'et hamal'akh ve'arba'at banav 'imo mitkhabe'im ve'arenan dash khitim. natati habaqar la'olot vehamorigim la'eizim vehakhitim laminkhah hakol natati. 1_chronicles 21:24	vayomer hamelekh david le'arenan lo ki qanoh 'eqneh bekhesef malei ki lo 'esa 'asher lekha yhvh yhvh vaya'aneihu ba'esh min hashamayim 'al mizbakh ha'olah. 1_chronicles 21:27	vayomer yhvh lamal'akh vayasheb kharbo 'el nedanah. 1_chronicles 21:28	ba'et hahi bir'ot david ki 'anahu yhvh begoren 'arenan haybusi vayizbakh sham. 1_chronicles 21:29	umishkan yhvh 'asher 'asah mosheh bamidbar umizbakh ha'olah ba'et hahi babamah begib'on. 1_chronicles 21:30	velo yakhol david lalekhet lefanav lidrosh 'elohim ki nib'at mipenei khereb mal'akh yhvh. 1_chronicles 22:1	vayomer david zeh hu bet yhvh ha'elohim vezeh mizbeiakh le'olah leyisra'el. 1_chronicles 22:2	vayomer david likhnos 'et hageirim 'asher be'erez yisra'el vaya'amed khozebim lakhzob 'abnei gazit libnot bet ha'elohim. 1_chronicles 22:3	ubarzel larob lamismerim ledaltot hashe'arim velamkhaberot heikhin david unekhoshet larob 'en mishqal. 1_chronicles 22:4	va'azei 'arazim le'en mispar ki heibi'u hazidonim vehazorim 'azei 'arazim larob ledavid. 1_chronicles 22:5	vayomer david shelomoh beni na'ar varakh vehabayit libnot yhvh lehagdil lema'lah leshem uletif'eret lekhal ha'arazot 'akhinah na lo vayakhen david larob lifnei moto. 1_chronicles 22:6	vayiqra lishlomoh beno vayzaveihu libnot bayit yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. 1_chronicles 22:7	vayomer david lishlomoh beno beni 'ani hayah 'im lebabi libnot bayit leshem yhvh 'elohai. 1_chronicles 22:8	vayhi 'alai debar yhvh leimor dam larob shafakhta umilkhamot gedolot 'asita lo tibneh bayit lishmi ki damim rabim shafakhta 'arzah lefanai. 1_chronicles 22:9	hineh ben nolad lakh hu yihyeh 'ish menukhah vahanikhoti lo mikal 'oybav misabib ki shelomoh yihyeh shemo veshalom vasheqet 'eten 'al yisra'el beyamav. 1_chronicles 22:10	hu yibneh bayit lishmi vehu yihyeh li leben va'ani lo le'ab vahakhinoti kisei malkhuto 'al yisra'el 'ad 'olam. 1_chronicles 22:11	'atah beni yehi yhvh 'imakh vehizlakhta ubanita bet yhvh 'elohekha ka'asher diber 'alekha. 1_chronicles 22:12	'akh yiten lekha yhvh seikhel ubinah vizavekha 'al yisra'el velishmor 'et torat yhvh 'elohekha. 1_chronicles 22:13	'az tazliakh 'im tishmor la'asot 'et hakhuqim ve'et hamishpatim 'asher zivah yhvh 'et mosheh 'al yisra'el khazaq ve'emaz 'al tira ve'al teikhat. 1_chronicles 22:14	vehineh be'aneyi hakhinoti lebet yhvh zahab kikarim mei'ah 'elef vekhesef 'elef 'alafim kikarim velanekhoshet velabarzel 'en mishqal ki larob hayah ve'eizim va'abanim hakhinoti va'aleihem tosif. 1_chronicles 22:15	ve'imekha larob 'osei melakhah khozebim vekharashei 'eben va'ez vekhal khakham bekhal melakhah. 1_chronicles 22:16	lazahab lakesef velanekhoshet velabarzel 'en mispar qum va'aseh yhvh ukhelei qodesh ha'elohim labayit hanibneh leshem yhvh. 1_chronicles 23:1	vedavid zaqen vesaba' yamim vayamlekh 'et shelomoh beno 'al yisra'el. 1_chronicles 23:2	vaye'esof 'et kal sarei yisra'el 1_chronicles 23:6	vayekhaleqem david makhleqot libnei leivi legeireshon qehat umerari. 1_chronicles 23:7	lageireshuni la'dan veshim'i. 1_chronicles 23:8	benei la'dan harosh yekhi'el vezeitam veyo'el sheloshah. 1_chronicles 23:9	benei shim'i shelomot shelomit vakhazi'el veharan sheloshah 'eleh rashei ha'abot lela'dan. 1_chronicles 23:10	ubenei shim'i yakhat zina vi'ush uberi'ah 'eleh benei shim'i
