'arba'ah. 1_chronicles 23:13	benei 'amram 'aharon umosheh vayibadel 'aharon lehaqdisho qodesh qadashim hu ubanav 'ad 'olam lehaqtir lifnei yhvh leshareto ulebarekh bishmo 'ad 'olam. 1_chronicles 23:14	umosheh 'ish ha'elohim banav yiqare'u 'al sheibet haleivi. 1_chronicles 23:15	benei mosheh geireshom ve'eli'ezer. 1_chronicles 23:16	benei geireshom shebu'el harosh. 1_chronicles 23:17	vayihyu benei 'eli'ezer rekhabyah harosh velo hayah le'eli'ezer banim 'akheirim ubenei rekhabyah rabu lema'elah. 1_chronicles 23:18	benei yizhar shelomit harosh. 1_chronicles 23:19	benei khebron yeriyahu harosh 'amaryah hasheini yakhazi'el hashelishi viqam'am harebi'i. 1_chronicles 23:20	benei 'uzi'el mikhah harosh veyishiyah hasheini. 1_chronicles 23:21	benei merari makhli umushi benei makhli 'el'azar veqish. 1_chronicles 23:22	vayamat 'el'azar velo hayu lo banim ki 'im banot vayisa'um benei qish 'akheihem. 1_chronicles 23:23	benei mushi makhli ve'eider vireimot sheloshah. 1_chronicles 23:24	'eleh benei leivi lebet 'aboteihem rashei ha'abot lifqudeihem bemispar sheimot legulgelotam 'oseh hamelakhah la'abodat bet yhvh miben 'esrim shanah vama'elah. 1_chronicles 23:25	ki 'amar david heiniakh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el le'amo vayishkon birushalim 'ad le'olam. 1_chronicles 23:26	vegam lalviyim 'en laset 'et hamishkan ve'et kal keilav la'abodato. 1_chronicles 23:27	ki bedibrei david ha'akharonim hemah mispar benei leivi miben 'esrim shanah ulema'elah. 1_chronicles 23:28	ki ma'amadam leyad benei 'aharon la'abodat bet yhvh 'al hakhazeirot ve'al haleshakhot ve'al tahorat lekhal qodesh uma'aseh 'abodat bet ha'elohim. 1_chronicles 23:29	ulelekhem hama'arekhet ulesolet leminkhah velirqiqei hamazot velamakhabat velamurbakhet ulekhal mesurah umidah. 1_chronicles 23:30	vela'amod baboqer baboqer lehodot ulehalel yhvh vekhen la'areb. 1_chronicles 23:31	ulekhol ha'alot 'olot yhvh lashabatot lekhodashim velamo'adim bemispar kemishpat 'aleihem tamid lifnei yhvh. 1_chronicles 23:32	veshameru 'et mishmeret 'ohel mo'ed ve'et mishmeret haqodesh umishmeret benei 'aharon 'akheihem la'abodat bet yhvh. 1_chronicles 24:1	velibnei 'aharon makhleqotam benei 'aharon nadab va'abihu 'el'azar ve'itamar. 1_chronicles 24:2	vayamat nadab va'abihu lifnei 'abihem ubanim lo hayu lahem vaykhahanu 'el'azar ve'itamar. 1_chronicles 24:3	vayekhaleqem david vezadoq min benei 'el'azar va'akhimelekh min benei 'itamar lifqudatam ba'abodatam. 1_chronicles 24:4	vayimaze'u benei 'el'azar rabim lerashei hagebarim min benei 'itamar vayakhlequm libnei 'el'azar rashim lebet 'abot shishah 'asar velibnei 'itamar lebet 'abotam shemonah. 1_chronicles 24:5	vayakhlequm begoralot 'eleh 'im 'eleh ki hayu sarei qodesh vesarei ha'elohim mibenei 'el'azar ubibnei 'itamar. 1_chronicles 24:6	vayikhtebem shema'yah ben netan'el hasofer min haleivi lifnei hamelekh vehasarim vezadoq hakohen va'akhimelekh ben 'ebyatar verashei ha'abot lakohanim velalviyim bet 'ab 'ekhad 'akhuz le'el'azar ve'akhuz 'akhuz le'itamar. 1_chronicles 24:7	vayeizei hagoral harishon lihoyarib lida'yah hasheini. 1_chronicles 24:8	lekharim hashelishi lis'orim harebi'i. 1_chronicles 24:9	lemalkiyah hakhamishi lemiyamin hashishi. 1_chronicles 24:10	lehaqoz hashebi'i la'abiyah hashemini. 1_chronicles 24:11	leyeishua' hateshi'i lishkhanyahu ha'asiri. 1_chronicles 24:12	le'elyashib 'ashtei 'asar leyaqim shenem 'asar. 1_chronicles 24:13	lekhupah sheloshah 'asar leyesheb'ab 'arba'ah 'asar. 1_chronicles 24:14	lebilgah khamishah 'asar le'imer shishah 'asar. 1_chronicles 24:15	lekheizir shib'ah 'asar lehapizez shemonah 'asar. 1_chronicles 24:16	liftakhyah tish'ah 'asar likhezqel ha'esrim. 1_chronicles 24:17	leyakhin 'ekhad ve'esrim legamul shenayim ve'esrim. 1_chronicles 24:18	lidlayahu sheloshah ve'esrim lema'azyahu 'arba'ah ve'esrim. 1_chronicles 24:19	'eleh fequdatam la'abodatam labo lebet yhvh kemishpatam beyad 'aharon 'abihem ka'asher zivahu yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. 1_chronicles 24:20	velibnei leivi 1_chronicles 25:1	vayabdel david vesarei hazaba la'abodah libnei 'asaf veheiman vidutun hanebi'im hanibe'im bekhinorot binbalim ubimziltayim vayhi misparam 'anshei melakhah la'abodatam. 1_chronicles 25:2	libnei 'asaf zakur veyosef unetanyah va'asar'eilah benei 'asaf 'al yad 'asaf haniba 'al yedei hamelekh. 1_chronicles 25:3	lidutun benei yedutun gedalyahu uzeri visha'yahu khashabyahu umatityahu veromamti 'ezer yashebeqashah maloti hotir makhazi'ot. 1_chronicles 25:5	kal 'eleh banim leheiman khozeh hamelekh bedibrei ha'elohim leharim qaren vayiten ha'elohim leheiman banim 'arba'ah 'asar ubanot shalosh. 1_chronicles 25:6	kal 'eleh 'al yedei 'abihem bashir bet yhvh bimziltayim nebalim vekhinorot la'abodat bet ha'elohim 'al yedei hamelekh 'asaf vidutun veheiman. 1_chronicles 25:7	vayhi 1_chronicles 26:2	velimshelemyahu banim zekharyahu habekhor yedi'a'el hasheini zebadyahu hashelishi yatni'el harebi'i. 1_chronicles 26:3	'eilam hakhamishi yehokhanan hashishi 'elyeho'einai hashebi'i. 26:9	velimshelemyahu banim ve'akhim benei khayil shemonah 'asar. 1_chronicles 26:10	ulekhosah min benei merari banim shimri harosh ki lo hayah bekhor vaysimeihu 'abihu lerosh. 1_chronicles lakhebroni letoledotav le'abot bishnat ha'arba'im lemalkhut david nidrashu vayimazei bahem giborei khayil beya'zer gil'ad. 1_chronicles 26:32	ve'ekhav benei khayil 'alpayim usheba' mei'ot rashei ha'abot vayafqidem david hamelekh 'al har'ubeini vehagadi vakhazi sheibet hamnashi lekhal debar ha'elohim udebar hamelekh. 1_chronicles 27:1	ubenei yisra'el lemisparam rashei ha'abot vesarei ha'alafim 27:2	'al hamakhaloqet harishonah lakhodesh harishon yashabe'am ben zabdi'el ve'al makhaluqto 'esrim ve'arba'ah 'alef. 1_chronicles 27:3	min benei ferez harosh lekhal sarei hazeba'ot lakhodesh 1_chronicles 27:28	ve'al hazeitim vehashiqmim 'asher bashefeilah ba'al khanan hagedeiri ve'al 'ozerot hashemen yo'ash. 1_chronicles 27:29	ve'al habaqar haro'im basharon shitrai shirtai hasharoni ve'al habaqar ba'amaqim shafat ben 'adlai. 1_chronicles 27:30	ve'al hagemalim 'obil hayishme'eili ve'al ha'atonot yekhdeyahu hameironoti. 1_chronicles 27:31	ve'al hazon yaziz hahagri kal 'eleh sarei ha'arki reia' hamelekh. 1_chronicles 27:34	ve'akharei 'akhitofel yehoyada' ben benayahu ve'ebyatar vesar zaba lamelekh yo'ab. 1_chronicles 28:1	vayaqhel david 'et kal sarei yisra'el sarei hashebatim vesarei hamakhleqot hamsharetim 'et hamelekh vesarei ha'alafim vesarei hamei'ot vesarei khal rekhush umiqneh lamelekh ulebanav 'im hasarisim vehagiborim ulekhal gibor khayil 'el yerushalim. 1_chronicles 28:2	vayaqam david hamelekh 'al raglav vayomer shema'uni 'akhai ve'ami 'ani 'im lebabi libnot bet menukhah la'aron berit yhvh velahadom raglei 'eloheinu vahakhinoti libnot. 1_chronicles 28:3	veha'elohim 'amar li lo tibneh bayit lishmi ki 'ish milkhamot 'atah vedamim shafakheta. 1_chronicles 28:4	vayibkhar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el bi mikol bet 'abi lihyot lemelekh 'al yisra'el le'olam ki bihudah bakhar lenagid ubebet yehudah bet 'abi ubibnei 'abi bi razah lehamlikh 'al kal yisra'el. 1_chronicles 28:5	umikal banai ki rabim banim natan li yhvh vayibkhar bishlomoh beni lashebet 'al kisei malkhut yhvh 'al yisra'el. 1_chronicles 28:6	vayomer li shelomoh binkha hu yibneh beiti vakhazeirotai ki bakharti bo li leben va'ani 'ehyeh lo le'ab. 1_chronicles 28:7	vahakhinoti 'et malkhuto 'ad le'olam 'im yekhezaq la'asot mizvotai umishpatai kayom hazeh. 1_chronicles 28:8	ve'atah le'einei khal yisra'el qehal yhvh ube'azenei 'eloheinu shimru vedirshu kal mizvot yhvh 'eloheikhem lema'an tireshu 'et ha'arez hatobah vehinkhaltem libneikhem 'akhareikhem 'ad 'olam. 1_chronicles 28:9	ve'atah shelomoh beni da' 'et 'elohei 'abikha ve'abedeihu beleb shalem ubenefesh khafeizah ki khal lebabot doresh yhvh vekhal yeizer makhashabot meibin 'im tidreshenu yimazei lakh ve'im ta'azbenu yaznikhakha la'ad. 1_chronicles 28:10	re'eh 'atah ki yhvh bakhar bekha libnot bayit lamiqdash khazaq va'aseh. 1_chronicles 28:11	vayiten david lishlomoh beno 'et tabnit ha'ulam ve'et batav veganzakav va'aliyotav vakhadarav hapenimim ubet hakaporet. 1_chronicles 28:12	vetabnit kol 'asher hayah baruakh 'imo lekhazrot bet yhvh ulekhal haleshakhot sabib le'ozerot bet ha'elohim ule'ozerot haqodashim. 1_chronicles 28:13	ulemakhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim ulekhal melekhet 'abodat bet yhvh ulekhal kelei 'abodat bet yhvh. 1_chronicles 28:14	lazahab bamishqal lazahab lekhal kelei 'abodah va'abodah lekhol kelei hakesef bemishqal lekhal kelei 'abodah va'abodah. 1_chronicles 28:15	umishqal limnorot hazahab veneiroteihem zahab bemishqal menorah umenorah veneiroteha velimnorot hakesef bemishqal limnorah veneiroteha ka'abodat menorah umenorah. 1_chronicles 28:16	ve'et hazahab mishqal leshulkhanot hama'arekhet leshulkhan veshulkhan vekhesef leshulkhanot hakasef. 1_chronicles 28:17	vehamizlagot vehamizraqot vehaqesavot zahab tahor velikhforei hazahab bemishqal likhfor ukhefor velikhforei hakesef bemishqal likhfor ukhefor. 1_chronicles 28:18	ulemizbakh haqetoret zahab mezuqaq bamishqal uletabnit hamerkabah hakerubim zahab leforesim vesokhekhim 'al 'aron berit yhvh. 1_chronicles 28:19	hakol bikhtab miyad yhvh 'alai hiskil kol mal'akhot hatabnit. 1_chronicles 28:20	vayomer david lishlomoh beno khazaq ve'emaz va'aseh 'al tira ve'al teikhat ki yhvh 'elohim 'elohai 'imakh lo yarpekha velo ya'azbeka 'ad likhlot kal melekhet 'abodat bet yhvh. 1_chronicles 28:21	vehineh makhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim lekhal 'abodat bet ha'elohim ve'imekha bekhal melakhah lekhal nadib bakhakhemah lekhal 'abodah vehasarim vekhal ha'am lekhal debarekha. 1_chronicles 29:1	vayomer david hamelekh lekhal haqahal shelomoh beni 'ekhad bakhar bo 'elohim na'ar varakh vehamelakhah gedolah ki lo le'adam habirah ki yhvh 'elohim. 1_chronicles 29:2	ukhekhal kokhi hakhinoti lebet 'elohai hazahab lazahab vehakesef lakesef vehanekhoshet lanekhoshet habarzel labarzel veha'eizim la'eizim 'abnei shoham umilu'im 'abnei fukh veriqmah vekhol 'eben yeqarah ve'abnei shayish larob. 1_chronicles 29:3	ve'od birzoti bebet 'elohai yesh li segulah zahab vakhasef natati lebet 'elohai lema'lah mikal hakhinoti lebet haqodesh. 1_chronicles 29:4	sheloshet 'alafim kikerei zahab mizehab 'ofir veshib'at 'alafim kikar kesef mezuqaq latuakh qirot habatim. 1_chronicles 29:5	lazahab lazahab velakesef lakesef ulekhal melakhah beyad kharashim umi mitnadeb lemalot yado hayom yhvh. 1_chronicles 29:6	vayitnadebu sarei ha'abot vesarei shibtei yisra'el vesarei ha'alafim vehamei'ot ulesarei melekhet hamelekh. 1_chronicles 29:7	vayitenu la'abodat bet ha'elohim zahab kikarim khameishet 'alafim va'adarkhonim ribo vekhesef kikarim 'aseret 'alafim unekhoshet ribo ushemonat 'alafim kikarim ubarzel mei'ah 'elef kikarim. 1_chronicles 29:8	vehanimza 'ito 'abanim natenu le'ozar bet yhvh 'al yad yekhi'el hageireshuni. 1_chronicles 29:9	vayismekhu ha'am 'al hitnadebam ki beleb shalem hitnadebu yhvh vegam david hamelekh samakh simkhah gedolah. 1_chronicles 29:10	vaybarekh david 'et yhvh le'einei kal haqahal vayomer david barukh 'atah yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'abinu mei'olam ve'ad 'olam. 1_chronicles 29:11	lekha yhvh hagedulah vehageburah vehatif'eret vehaneizakh vehahod ki khol bashamayim uba'arez lekha yhvh hamamlakhah vehamitnasei lekhol lerosh. 1_chronicles 29:12	veha'osher vehakabod milefanekha ve'atah moshel bakol ubeyadekha koakh ugeburah ubeyadekha legadel ulekhazeq lakol. 1_chronicles 29:13	ve'atah 'eloheinu modim 'anakhnu lakh umehalim leshem tif'artekha. 1_chronicles 29:14	vekhi mi 'ani umi 'ami ki na'zor koakh lehitnadeb kazot ki mimekha hakol umiyadekha natanu lakh. 1_chronicles 29:15	ki geirim 'anakhnu lefanekha vetoshabim kekhal 'aboteinu kazel yameinu 'al ha'arez ve'en miqveh. 1_chronicles 29:16	yhvh 'eloheinu khol hehamon hazeh 'asher hakhinonu libnot lekha bayit leshem qadshekha miyadekha hi hu ulekha hakol. 1_chronicles 29:17	veyada'ti 'elohai ki 'atah bokhen leibab umeisharim tirzeh 'ani beyosher lebabi hitnadabti khal 'eleh ve'atah 'amekha hanimze'u foh ra'iti besimkhah lehitnadeb lakh. 1_chronicles 29:18	yhvh 'elohei 'abraham yizkhaq veyisra'el 'aboteinu shomrah zot le'olam leyeizer makhshebot lebab 'amekha vehakhen lebabam 'eilekha. 1_chronicles 29:19	velishlomoh beni ten leibab shalem lishmor mizvotekha 'eidevotekha vekhuqekha vela'asot hakol velibnot habirah 'asher hakhinoti. 1_chronicles 29:20	vayomer david lekhal haqahal barekhu na 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem vaybarakhu khal haqahal yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem vayiqedu vayishtakhavu yhvh velamelekh. 1_chronicles 29:21	vayizbekhu yhvh zebakhim vaya'alu 'olot yhvh lemakhorat hayom hahu parim 'elef 'eilim 'elef kebasim 'elef veniskeihem uzebakhim larob lekhal yisra'el. 1_chronicles 29:22	vayokhelu vayishtu lifnei yhvh bayom hahu besimkhah gedolah vayamlikhu sheinit lishlomoh ben david vayimshekhu yhvh lenagid ulezadoq lekhohen. 1_chronicles 29:23	vayeisheb lomoh 'al kisei yhvh lemelekh takhat david 'abiv vayazlakh vayishme'u 'eilav kal yisra'el. 1_chronicles 29:24	vekhal hasarim vehagiborim vegam kal benei hamelekh david natenu yad takhat shelomoh hamelekh. 1_chronicles 29:25	vaygadel yhvh 'et shelomoh lema'lah le'einei kal yisra'el vayiten 'alav hod malkhut 'asher lo hayah 'al kal melekh lefanav 'al yisra'el. 1_chronicles 29:26	vedavid ben yishai malakh 'al kal yisra'el. 1_chronicles 29:27	vehayamim 'asher malakh 'al yisra'el 'arba'im shanah bekhebron malakh sheba' shanim ubirushalim malakh sheloshim veshalosh. 1_chronicles 29:28	vayamat beseibah tobah seba' yamim 'osher vekhabod vayimlokh shelomoh beno takhtav. 1_chronicles 29:29	vedibrei david hamelekh harishonim veha'akhronim hinam ketubim 'al dibrei shemu'el haro'eh ve'al dibrei natan hanabi ve'al dibrei gad hakhozeh. 1_chronicles 29:30	'im kal malkhuto ugeburato veha'itim 'asher 'aberu 'alav ve'al yisra'el ve'al kal mamlekhot ha'arazot. 

2_chronicles 1:1	vayitkhazeq shelomoh ben david 'al malkhuto yhvh 'elohav 'imo vaygadeleihu lema'elah. 2_chronicles 1:2	vayomer shelomoh lekhal yisra'el lesarei ha'alafim vehamei'ot velashofetim ulekhol nasi lekhal yisra'el rashei ha'abot. 2_chronicles 1:3	vayeilekhu shelomoh vekhal haqahal 'imo labamah 'asher begib'on ki sham hayah 'ohel mo'ed ha'elohim 'asher 'asah mosheh 'ebed yhvh bamidbar. 2_chronicles 1:4	'abal 'aron ha'elohim he'elah david miqiryat ye'arim baheikhin lo david ki natah lo 'ohel birushalim. 2_chronicles 1:5	umizbakh hanekhoshet 'asher 'asah bezal'el ben 'uri ben khur sam lifnei mishkan yhvh vayidresheihu shelomoh vehaqahal. 2_chronicles 1:6	vaya'al shelomoh sham 'al mizbakh hanekhoshet lifnei yhvh 'asher le'ohel mo'ed vaya'al 'alav 'olot 'alef. 2_chronicles 1:7	balaylah hahu nir'ah 'elohim lishlomoh vayomer lo she'al mah 'eten lakh. 2_chronicles 1:8	vayomer shelomoh leilohim 'atah 'asita 'im david 'abi khesed gadol vehimlakhtani takhtav. 2_chronicles 1:9	'atah yhvh 'elohim yei'amen debarekha 'im david 'abi ki 'atah himlakhtani 'al 'am rab ka'afar ha'arez. 2_chronicles 1:10	'atah khakhmah umada' ten li ve'eize'ah lifnei ha'am hazeh ve'abo'ah ki mi yishpot 'et 'amekha hazeh hagadol. 2_chronicles 1:11	vayomer 'elohim lishlomoh ya'an 'asher hayetah zot 'im lebabekha velosha 'alta 'osher nekhasim vekhabod ve'et nefesh sone'ekha vegam yamim rabim lo sha'aleta vatish'al lekha khakhmah umada' 'asher tishpot 'et 'ami 'asher himlakhtikha 'alav. 2_chronicles 1:12	hakhakhemah vehamada' natun lakh ve'osher unekhasim vekhabod 'eten lakh 'asher lo hayah khen lamelakhim 'asher lefanekha ve'akharekha lo yihyeh ken. 2_chronicles 1:13	vayabo shelomoh labamah 'asher begib'on yerushalim milifnei 'ohel mo'ed vayimlokh 'al yisra'el. 2_chronicles 1:14	vaye'esof shelomoh rekheb ufarashim vayhi lo 'elef ve'arba' mei'ot rekheb ushenem 'asar 'elef parashim vayanikhem be'arei harekheb ve'im hamelekh birushalim. 2_chronicles 1:15	vayiten hamelekh 'et hakesef ve'et hazahab birushalim ka'abanim ve'et ha'arazim natan kashiqmim 'asher bashefeilah larob. 2_chronicles 1:16	umoza hasusim 'asher lishlomoh mimizrayim umiqvei sokharei hamelekh miqvei yiqkhu bimkhir. 2_chronicles 1:17	vaya'alu vayozi'u mimizrayim merkabah beshesh mei'ot kesef vesus bakhamishim umei'ah vekhen lekhal malkhei hakhitim umalkhei 'aram beyadam yozi'u. 2_chronicles 2:1	vayomer shelomoh libnot bayit leshem yhvh ubayit lemalkhuto. 2_chronicles 2:2	vayispor shelomoh shib'im 'elef 'ish sabal ushemonim 'elef 'ish khozeb bahar umenazekhim 'aleihem sheloshet 'alafim veshesh mei'ot. 2_chronicles 2:3	vayishlakh shelomoh 'el khuram melekh zor leimor ka'asher 'asita 'im david 'abi vatishlakh lo 'arazim libnot lo bayit lashebet bo. 2_chronicles 2:4	hineh 'ani boneh bayit leshem yhvh 'elohai lehaqdish lo lehaqtir lefanav qetoret samim uma'arekhet tamid ve'olot laboqer vela'ereb lashabatot velekhodashim ulemo'adei yhvh 'eloheinu le'olam zot 'al yisra'el. 2_chronicles 2:5	vehabayit 'asher 'ani boneh gadol ki gadol 'eloheinu mikal ha'elohim. 2_chronicles 2:6	umi ya'azar koakh libnot lo bayit ki hashamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkeluhu umi 'ani 'asher 'ebneh lo bayit ki 'im lehaqtir lefanav. 2_chronicles 2:7	ve'atah shelakh li 'ish khakham la'asot bazahab ubakesef ubanekhoshet ubabarzel uba'argevan vekharmil utekheilet veyodeia' lefateiakh pitukhim 'im hakhakhamim 'asher 'imi bihudah ubirushalim 'asher heikhin david 'abi. 2_chronicles 2:8	ushelakh li 'azei 'arazim beroshim ve'algumim meihalebanon ki 'ani yada'ti 'asher 'abadekha yod'im likhrot 'azei lebanon vehineh 'abadai 'im 'abadekha. 2_chronicles 2:9	ulehakhin li 'eizim larob ki habayit 'asher 'ani boneh gadol vehaflei. 2_chronicles 2:10	vehineh lakhotebim lekhoretei ha'eizim natati khitim makot la'abadekha korim 'esrim 'elef use'orim korim 'esrim 'alef veyayin batim 'esrim 'elef veshemen batim 'esrim 'alef. 2_chronicles 2:11	vayomer khuram melekh zor bikhtab vayishlakh 'el shelomoh be'ahabat yhvh 'et 'amo netanekha 'aleihem melekh. 2_chronicles 2:12	vayomer khuram barukh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher 'asah 'et hashamayim ve'et ha'arez 'asher natan ledavid hamelekh ben khakham yodeia' seikhel ubinah 'asher yibneh bayit yhvh ubayit lemalkhuto. 2_chronicles 2:13	ve'atah shalakhti 'ish khakham yodeia' binah lekhuram 'abi. 2_chronicles 2:14	ben 'ishah min benot dan ve'abiv 'ish zori yodeia' la'asot bazahab ubakesef banekhoshet babarzel ba'abanim uba'eizim ba'argaman batekheilet ubabuz ubakarmil ulefateiakh kal pituakh velakhshob kal makhashabet 'asher yinaten lo 'im khakhamekha vekhakhmei 'adoni david 'abikha. 2_chronicles 2:15	ve'atah hakhitim vehase'orim hashemen vehayayin 'asher 'amar 'adoni yishlakh la'abadav. 2_chronicles 2:16	va'anakhnu nikhrot 'eizim min halebanon kekhal zarekekha unebi'em lekha rafsodot 'al yam yafo ve'atah ta'aleh 'otam yerushalim. 2_chronicles 2:17	vayispor shelomoh kal ha'anashim hageirim 'asher be'erez yisra'el 'akharei hasefar 'asher sefaram david 'abiv vayimaze'u mei'ah vakhamishim 'elef usheloshet 'alafim veshesh mei'ot. 2_chronicles 2:18	vaya'as meihem shib'im 'elef sabal ushemonim 'elef khozeb bahar usheloshet 'alafim veshesh mei'ot menazekhim leha'abid 'et ha'am. 2_chronicles 3:1	vayakhel shelomoh libnot 'et bet yhvh birushalim behar hamoriyah 'asher nir'ah ledavid 'abihu 'asher heikhin bimqom david begoren 'arenan haybusi. 2_chronicles 3:2	vayakhel libnot bakhodesh hasheini basheini bishnat 'arba' lemalkhuto. 2_chronicles 3:3	ve'eleh husad shelomoh libnot 'et bet ha'elohim ha'orekh 'amot bamidah harishonah 'amot shishim verokhab 'amot 'esrim. 2_chronicles 3:4	veha'ulam 'asher 'al penei ha'orekh 'al penei rokhab habayit 'amot 'esrim vehagobah mei'ah ve'esrim vayzapeihu mipenimah zahab tahor. 2_chronicles 3:5	ve'et habayit hagadol khipah 'ez beroshim vaykhapeihu zahab tob vaya'al 'alav timorim vesharsherot. 2_chronicles 3:6	vayzaf 'et habayit 'eben yeqarah letif'aret vehazahab zehab parvayim. 2_chronicles 3:7	vaykhaf 'et habayit haqorot hasipim veqirotav vedaltotav zahab ufitakh kerubim 'al haqirot. 2_chronicles 3:8	vaya'as 'et bet qodesh haqodashim 'areko 'al penei rokhab habayit 'amot 'esrim verakhebo 'amot 'esrim vaykhapeihu zahab tob lekhikarim shesh mei'ot. 2_chronicles 3:9	umishqal lemismerot lishqalim khamishim zahab veha'aliyot khipah zahab. 2_chronicles 3:10	vaya'as bebet qodesh haqodashim kerubim shenayim ma'aseh za'azu'im vayzapu 'otam zahab. 2_chronicles 3:11	vekhanfei hakerubim 'arekam 'amot 'esrim kenaf ha'ekhad le'amot khamesh maga'at leqir habayit vehakanaf ha'akheret 'amot khamesh magia' likhnaf hakerub ha'akher. 2_chronicles 3:12	ukhenaf hakerub ha'ekhad 'amot khamesh magia' leqir habayit vehakanaf ha'akheret 'amot khamesh debeiqah likhnaf hakerub ha'akher. 2_chronicles 3:13	kanfei hakerubim ha'eleh poresim 'amot 'esrim vehem 'omedim 'al ragleihem ufeneihem labayit. 2_chronicles 3:14	vaya'as 'et haparokhet tekheilet ve'argaman vekharmil ubuz vaya'al 'alav kerubim. 2_chronicles 3:15	vaya'as lifnei habayit 'amudim shenayim 'amot sheloshim vekhamesh 'orekh vehazefet 'asher 'al rosho 'amot khamesh. 2_chronicles 3:16	vaya'as sharsherot badebir vayiten 'al rosh ha'amudim vaya'as rimonim mei'ah vayiten basharsherot. 2_chronicles 3:17	vayaqem 'et ha'amudim 'al penei haheikhal 'ekhad miyamin ve'ekhad meihasemol vayiqra shem haymini haymani yakhin veshem hasemali bo'az. 2_chronicles 4:1	vaya'as mizbakh nekhoshet 'esrim 'amah 'areko ve'esrim 'amah rakhebo ve'eser 'amot qomato. 2_chronicles 4:2	vaya'as 'et hayam muzaq 'eser ba'amah misefato 'el sefato 'agol sabib vekhamesh ba'amah qomato veqav sheloshim ba'amah yasob 'oto sabib. 2_chronicles 4:3	udemut beqarim takhat lo sabib sabib sobbim 'oto 'eser ba'amah maqifim 'et hayam sabib shenayim turim habaqar yezuqim bemuzaqto. 2_chronicles 4:4	'omed 'al shenem 'asar baqar sheloshah fonim zafonah usheloshah fonim yamah usheloshah ponim negbah usheloshah ponim mizrakhah vehayam 'aleihem milma'elah vekhal 'akhoreihem bayetah. 2_chronicles 4:5	ve'abeyo tefakh usefato kema'aseh sefat kos perakh shoshanah makhaziq batim sheloshet 'alafim yakhil. 2_chronicles 4:6	vaya'as kiyorim 'asarah vayiten khamishah miyamin vakhamishah misemol lerakhezah bahem 'et ma'aseh ha'olah yadikhu bam vehayam lerakhezah lakohanim bo. 2_chronicles 4:7	vaya'as 'et menorot hazahab 'eser kemishpatam vayiten baheikhal khamesh miyamin vekhamesh misemol. 2_chronicles 4:8	vaya'as shulkhanot 'asarah vayanakh baheikhal khamishah miyamin vakhamishah misemol vaya'as mizreqei zahab mei'ah. 2_chronicles 4:9	vaya'as khazar hakohanim veha'azarah hagedolah udelatot la'azarah vedaltoteihem zipah nekhoshet. 2_chronicles 4:10	ve'et hayam natan miketef haymanit qeidemah mimul negbah. 2_chronicles 4:11	vaya'as khuram 'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizraqot vaykhal khyram khuram la'asot 'et hamelakhah 'asher 'asah lamelekh shelomoh bebet ha'elohim. 2_chronicles 4:12	'amudim shenayim vehagulot vehakotarot 'al rosh ha'amudim shetayim vehasebakhot shetayim lekhasot 'et shetei gulot hakotarot 'asher 'al rosh ha'amudim. 2_chronicles 4:13	ve'et harimonim 'arba' mei'ot lishtei hasebakhot shenayim turim rimonim lasebakhah ha'ekhat lekhasot 'et shetei gulot hakotarot 'asher 'al penei ha'amudim. 2_chronicles 4:14	ve'et hamekhonot 'asah ve'et hakiyorot 'asah 'al hamekhonot. 2_chronicles 4:15	'et hayam 'ekhad ve'et habaqar shenem 'asar takhtav. 2_chronicles 4:16	ve'et hasirot ve'et haya'im ve'et hamizlagot ve'et kal keleihem 'asah khuram 'abiv lamelekh shelomoh lebet yhvh nekhoshet maruq. 2_chronicles 4:17	bekhikar hayarden yezaqam hamelekh ba'abi ha'adamah ben sukot uben zereidatah. 2_chronicles 4:18	vaya'as shelomoh kal hakeilim ha'eleh larob me'od ki lo nekhqar mishqal hanekhoshet. 2_chronicles 4:19	vaya'as shelomoh 'et kal hakeilim 'asher bet ha'elohim ve'et mizbakh hazahab ve'et hashulkhanot va'aleihem lekhem hapanim. 2_chronicles 4:20	ve'et hamenorot veneiroteihem leba'aram kamishpat lifnei hadebir zahab sagur. 2_chronicles 4:21	vehaperakh vehaneirot vehamelqakhayim zahab hu mikhlot zahab. 2_chronicles 4:22	vehamzamerot vehamizraqot vehakapot vehamakhtot zahab sagur ufetakh habayit daltotav hapenimiyot leqodesh haqodashim vedaltei habayit laheikhal zahab. 2_chronicles 5:1	vatishlam kal hamelakhah 'asher 'asah shelomoh lebet yhvh vayabei shelomoh 'et qadeshei david 'abiv ve'et hakesef ve'et hazahab ve'et kal hakeilim natan be'ozerot bet ha'elohim. 2_chronicles 5:2	'az yaqhel shelomoh 'et ziqnei yisra'el ve'et kal rashei hamatot nesi'ei ha'abot libnei yisra'el 'el yerushalim leha'alot 'et 'aron berit yhvh mei'ir david hi ziyon. 2_chronicles 5:3	vayiqahalu 'el hamelekh kal 'ish yisra'el bekhag hu hakhodesh hashebi'i. 2_chronicles 5:4	vayabo'u kol ziqnei yisra'el vayis'u halviyim 'et ha'aron. 2_chronicles 5:5	vaya'alu 'et ha'aron ve'et 'ohel mo'ed ve'et kal kelei haqodesh 'asher ba'ohel he'elu 'otam hakohanim halviyim. 2_chronicles 5:6	vehamelekh shelomoh vekhal 'adat yisra'el hano'adim 'alav lifnei ha'aron mezabekhim zon ubaqar 'asher lo yisaferu velo yimanu meirob. 2_chronicles 5:7	vayabi'u hakohanim 'et 'aron berit yhvh 'el meqomo 'el debir habayit 'el qodesh haqedashim 'el takhat kanfei hakerubim. 2_chronicles 5:8	vayihyu hakerubim poresim kenafayim 'al meqom ha'aron vaykhasu hakerubim 'al ha'aron ve'al badav milma'elah. 2_chronicles 5:9	vaya'arikhu habadim vayeira'u rashei habadim min ha'aron 'al penei hadebir velo yeira'u hakhuzah vayhi sham 'ad hayom hazeh. 2_chronicles 5:10	'en ba'aron raq shenei halukhot 'asher natan mosheh bekhoreb 'asher karat yhvh 'im benei yisra'el bezeitam mimizrayim. 2_chronicles 5:11	vayhi bezet hakohanim min haqodesh ki kal hakohanim hanimze'im hitqadashu 'en lishmor lemakhleqot. 2_chronicles 5:12	vehalviyim hamshorarim lekhulam le'asaf leheiman lidutun velibneihem vela'akheihem melubashim buz bimziltayim ubinbalim vekhinorot 'omedim mizrakh lamizbeiakh ve'imahem kohanim lemei'ah ve'esrim makhzeririm makhzerim bakhazozerot. 2_chronicles 5:13	vayhi khe'ekhad lamakhazozerim lamkhazerim velamshorarim lehashmia' qol 'ekhad lehalel ulehodot yhvh ukheharim qol bakhazozerot ubimziltayim ubikhlei hashir ubehalel yhvh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo vehabayit malei 'anan bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 5:14	velo yakhelu hakohanim la'amod lesharet mipenei he'anan ki malei khebod yhvh 'et bet ha'elohim. 2_chronicles 6:1	'az 'amar shelomoh yhvh 'amar lishkon ba'arafel. 2_chronicles 6:2	va'ani baniti bet zebul lakh umakhon leshibtekha 'olamim. 2_chronicles 6:3	vayaseb hamelekh 'et panav vaybarekh 'et kal qehal yisra'el vekhal qehal yisra'el 'omed. 2_chronicles 6:4	vayomer barukh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'asher diber befiv 'et david 'abi ubeyadav milei leimor. 2_chronicles 6:5	min hayom 'asher hozeiti 'et 'ami mei'erez mizrayim lo bakharti be'ir mikol shibtei yisra'el libnot bayit lihyot shemi sham velo bakharti be'ish lihyot nagid 'al 'ami yisra'el. 2_chronicles 6:6	va'ebkhar birushalim lihyot shemi sham va'ebkhar bedavid lihyot 'al 'ami yisra'el. 2_chronicles 6:7	vayhi 'im lebab david 'abi libnot bayit leshem yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 6:8	vayomer yhvh 'el david 'abi ya'an 'asher hayah 'im lebabekha libnot bayit lishmi hetibota ki hayah 'im lebabekha. 2_chronicles 6:9	raq 'atah lo tibneh habayit ki binkha hayozei meikhalazekha hu yibneh habayit lishmi. 2_chronicles 6:10	vayaqem yhvh 'et debaro 'asher diber va'aqum takhat david 'abi va'eisheb 'al kisei yisra'el ka'asher diber yhvh va'ebneh habayit leshem yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 6:11	va'asim sham 'et ha'aron 'asher sham berit yhvh 'asher karat 'im benei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 6:12	vaya'amod lifnei mizbakh yhvh neged kal qehal yisra'el vayifros kapav. 2_chronicles 6:13	ki 'asah shelomoh kiyor nekhoshet vayiteneihu betokh ha'azarah khamesh 'amot 'areko vekhamesh 'amot rakhebo ve'amot shalosh qomato vaya'amod 'alav vayibrakh 'al birkav neged kal qehal yisra'el vayifros kapav hashamayemah. 2_chronicles 6:14	vayomar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'en kamokha 'elohim bashamayim uba'arez shomer haberit vehakhesed la'abadekha haholekhim lefanekha bekhal libam. 2_chronicles 6:15	'asher shamarta le'abdekha david 'abi 'et 'asher dibarta lo vatedaber befikha ubeyadekha mileita kayom hazeh. 2_chronicles 6:16	ve'atah yhvh 'elohei yisra'el mor le'abdekha david 'abi 'et 'asher dibarta lo leimor lo yikaret lekha 'ish milefanai yosheb 'al kisei yisra'el raq 'im yishmeru banekha 'et darkam lalekhet betorati ka'asher halakhta lefanai. 2_chronicles 6:17	ve'atah yhvh 'elohei yisra'el yei'amen debarekha 'asher dibarta le'abdekha ledavid. 2_chronicles 6:18	ki ha'umnam yeisheb 'elohim 'et ha'adam 'al ha'arez hineh shamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkelukha 'af ki habayit hazeh 'asher baniti. 2_chronicles 6:19	ufanita 'el tefilat 'abdekha ve'el tekhinato yhvh 'elohai lishmoa' 'el harinah ve'el hatefilah 'asher 'abdekha mitpalel lefanekha. 2_chronicles 6:20	lihyot 'einekha fetukhot 'el habayit hazeh yomam valaylah 'el hamaqom 'asher 'amarta lasum shimkha sham lishmoa' 'el hatefilah 'asher yitpalel 'abdekha 'el hamaqom hazeh. 2_chronicles 6:21	veshama'ta 'el takhanunei 'abdekha ve'amekha yisra'el 'asher yitpalu 'el hamaqom hazeh ve'atah tishma' mimeqom shibtekha min hashamayim veshama'ta vesalakheta. 2_chronicles 6:22	'im yekheta 'ish lerei'eihu venasha bo 'alah leha'aloto uba 'alah lifnei mizbakhakha babayit hazeh. 2_chronicles 6:23	ve'atah tishma' min hashamayim ve'asita veshafata 'et 'abadekha lehashib lerasha' latet darko berosho ulehazdiq zadiq latet lo kezidqato. 2_chronicles 6:24	ve'im yinagef 'amekha yisra'el lifnei 'oyeb ki yekhet'u lakh veshabu vehodu 'et shemekha vehitpalu vehitkhanenu lefanekha babayit hazeh. 2_chronicles 6:25	ve'atah tishma' min hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat 'amekha yisra'el vahasheibotam 'el ha'adamah 'asher natatah lahem vela'aboteihem. 2_chronicles 6:26	behei'azer hashamayim velo yihyeh matar ki yekhet'u lakh vehitpalu 'el hamaqom hazeh vehodu 'et shemekha meikhatatam yeshubun ki ta'anem. 2_chronicles 6:27	ve'atah tishma' hashamayim vesalakhta lekhatat 'abadekha ve'amekha yisra'el ki torem 'el haderekh hatobah 'asher yeilekhu bah venatatah matar 'al 'arzekha 'asher natatah le'amekha lenakhalah. 2_chronicles 6:28	ra'ab ki yihyeh ba'arez deber ki yihyeh shidafon veyeiraqon 'arbeh vekhasil ki yihyeh ki yazar lo 'oybav be'erez she'arav kal nega' vekhal makhalah. 2_chronicles 6:29	kal tefilah khal tekhinah 'asher yihyeh lekhal ha'adam ulekhol 'amekha yisra'el 'asher yeide'u 'ish nig'o umakh'obo ufaras kapav 'el habayit hazeh. 2_chronicles 6:30	ve'atah tishma' min hashamayim mekhon shibtekha vesalakhta venatatah la'ish kekhal derakhav 'asher teida' 'et lebabo ki 'atah lebadekha yada'ta 'et lebab benei ha'adam. 2_chronicles 6:31	lema'an yira'ukha lalekhet bidrakhekha kal hayamim 'asher hem khayim 'al penei ha'adamah 'asher natatah la'aboteinu. 2_chronicles 6:32	vegam 'el hanakheri 'asher lo mei'amekha yisra'el hu uba mei'erez rekhoqah lema'an shimkha hagadol veyadekha hakhazaqah uzero'akha hanetuyah uba'u vehitpalu 'el habayit hazeh. 2_chronicles 6:33	ve'atah tishma' min hashamayim mimekhon shibtekha ve'asita kekhol 'asher yiqra 'eilekha hanakheri lema'an yeide'u khal 'amei ha'arez 'et shemekha uleyir'ah 'otekha ke'amekha yisra'el velada'at ki shimkha niqra 'al habayit hazeh 'asher baniti. 2_chronicles 6:34	ki yeizei 'amekha lamilkhamah 'al 'oybav baderekh 'asher tishlakhem vehitpalu 'eilekha derekh ha'ir hazot 'asher bakharta bah vehabayit 'asher baniti lishmekha. 2_chronicles 6:35	veshama'ta min hashamayim 'et tefilatam ve'et tekhinatam ve'asita mishpatam. 2_chronicles 6:36	ki yekhet'u lakh ki 'en 'adam 'asher lo yekheta ve'anafta bam unetatam lifnei 'oyeb veshabum shobeihem 'el 'erez rekhoqah 'o qerobah. 2_chronicles 6:37	veheishibu 'el lebabam ba'arez 'asher nishbu sham veshabu vehitkhanenu 'eilekha be'erez shibyam leimor khatanu he'evinu verasha'enu. 2_chronicles 6:38	veshabu 'eilekha bekhal libam ubekhal nafsham be'erez shibyam 'asher shabu 'otam vehitpalu derekh 'arzam 'asher natatah la'abotam veha'ir 'asher bakharta velabayit 'asher baniti lishmekha. 2_chronicles 6:39	veshama'ta min hashamayim mimekhon shibtekha 'et tefilatam ve'et tekhinoteihem ve'asita mishpatam vesalakhta le'amekha 'asher khate'u lakh. 2_chronicles 6:40	'atah 'elohai yihyu na 'einekha petukhot ve'azenekha qashubot litfilat hamaqom hazeh. 2_chronicles 6:41	ve'atah qumah yhvh 'elohim lenukhekha 'atah va'aron 'uzekha kohanekha yhvh 'elohim yilbeshu teshu'ah vakhasidekha yismekhu batob. 2_chronicles 6:42	yhvh 'elohim 'al tasheb penei meshikhekha zakherah lekhasdei david 'abdekha. 2_chronicles 7:1	ukhekhalot shelomoh lehitpalel veha'esh yaredah meihashamayim vatokhal ha'olah vehazebakhim ukhebod yhvh malei 'et habayit. 2_chronicles 7:2	velo yakhelu hakohanim labo 'el bet yhvh ki malei khebod yhvh 'et bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 7:3	vekhol benei yisra'el ro'im beredet ha'esh ukhebod yhvh 'al habayit vayikhre'u 'apayim 'arzah 'al harizfah vayishtakhavu vehodot yhvh ki tob ki le'olam khasdo. 2_chronicles 7:4	vehamelekh vekhal ha'am zobekhim zebakh lifnei yhvh. 2_chronicles 7:5	vayizbakh hamelekh shelomoh 'et zebakh habaqar 'esrim ushenayim 'elef vezon mei'ah ve'esrim 'alef vayakhnekhu 'et bet ha'elohim hamelekh vekhal ha'am. 2_chronicles 7:6	vehakohanim 'al mishmerotam 'omedim vehalviyim bikhlei shir yhvh 'asher 'asah david hamelekh lehodot yhvh ki le'olam khasdo behalel david beyadam vehakohanim makhazozerim makhzerim negdam vekhal yisra'el 'omedim. 2_chronicles 7:7	vayqadesh shelomoh 'et tokh hekhazer 'asher lifnei bet yhvh ki 'asah sham ha'olot ve'et khelbei hashelamim ki mizbakh hanekhoshet 'asher 'asah shelomoh lo yakhol lehakhil 'et ha'olah ve'et haminkhah ve'et hakhalabim. 2_chronicles 7:8	vaya'as shelomoh 'et hekhag ba'et hahi shib'at yamim vekhal yisra'el 'imo qahal gadol me'od milebo khamat 'ad nakhal mizrayim. 2_chronicles 7:9	vaya'asu bayom hashemini 'azaret ki khanukat hamizbeiakh 'asu shib'at yamim vehekhag shib'at yamim. 2_chronicles 7:10	ubeyom 'esrim usheloshah lakhodesh hashebi'i shilakh 'et ha'am le'aholeihem semeikhim vetobei leb 'al hatobah 'asher 'asah yhvh ledavid velishlomoh uleyisra'el 'amo. 2_chronicles 7:11	vaykhal shelomoh 'et bet yhvh ve'et bet hamelekh ve'et kal haba 'al leb shelomoh la'asot bebet yhvh ubebeito hizliakh. 2_chronicles 7:12	vayeira yhvh 'el shelomoh balayelah vayomer lo shama'ti 'et tefilatekha ubakharti bamaqom hazeh li lebet zabakh. 2_chronicles 7:13	hen 'e'ezor hashamayim velo yihyeh matar vehen 'azaveh 'al khagab le'ekhol ha'arez ve'im 'ashalakh deber be'ami. 2_chronicles 7:14	veyikane'u 'ami 'asher niqra shemi 'aleihem veyitpalu vibaqshu fanai veyashubu midarkheihem hara'im va'ani 'eshma' min hashamayim ve'eslakh lekhatatam ve'erpa 'et 'arzam. 2_chronicles 7:15	'atah 'einai yihyu fetukhot ve'azenai qashubot litfilat hamaqom hazeh. 2_chronicles 7:16	ve'atah bakharti vehiqdashti 'et habayit hazeh lihyot shemi sham 'ad 'olam vehayu 'einai velibi sham kal hayamim. 2_chronicles 7:17	ve'atah 'im teilekh lefanai ka'asher halakh david 'abikha vela'asot kekhol 'asher zivitikha vekhuqai umishpatai tishmor. 2_chronicles 7:18	vahaqimoti 'et kisei malkhutekha ka'asher karati ledavid 'abikha leimor lo yikaret lekha 'ish moshel beyisra'el. 2_chronicles 7:19	ve'im teshubun 'atem va'azabtem khuqotai umizvotai 'asher natati lifneikhem vahalakhtem va'abadtem 'elohim 'akheirim vehishtakhavitem lahem. 2_chronicles 7:20	unetashtim mei'al 'admati 'asher natati lahem ve'et habayit hazeh 'asher hiqdashti lishmi 'ashlikh mei'al panai ve'etenenu lemashal velishninah bekhal ha'amim. 2_chronicles 7:21	vehabayit hazeh 'asher hayah 'elyon lekhal 'ober 'alav yishom ve'amar bameh 'asah yhvh kakhah la'arez hazot velabayit hazeh. 2_chronicles 7:22	ve'ameru 'al 'asher 'azebu 'et yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem 'asher hozi'am mei'erez mizrayim vayakhaziqu beilohim 'akheirim vayishtakhavu lahem vaya'abdum 'al ken heibi 'aleihem 'et kal hara'ah hazot. 2_chronicles 8:1	vayhi miqez 'esrim shanah 'asher banah shelomoh 'et bet yhvh ve'et beito. 2_chronicles 8:2	vehe'arim 'asher natan khuram lishlomoh banah shelomoh 'otam vayosheb sham 'et benei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 8:3	vayeilekh shelomoh khamat zobah vayekhezaq 'aleha. 2_chronicles 8:4	vayiben 'et tadmor bamidbar ve'et kal 'arei hamiskenot 'asher banah bakhamat. 2_chronicles 8:5	vayiben 'et bet khoron ha'elyon ve'et bet khoron hatakhton 'arei mazor khomot delatayim uberiakh. 2_chronicles 8:6	ve'et ba'alat ve'et kal 'arei hamiskenot 'asher hayu lishlomoh ve'et kal 'arei harekheb ve'et 'arei haparashim ve'et kal kheisheq shelomoh 'asher khashaq libnot birushalim ubalebanon ubekhol 'erez memshalto. 2_chronicles 8:7	kal ha'am hanotar min hakhiti veha'emori vehaperizi vehakhivi vehaybusi 'asher lo miyisra'el hemah. 2_chronicles 8:8	min beneihem 'asher notru 'akhareihem ba'arez 'asher lo khilum benei yisra'el vaya'alem shelomoh lemas 'ad hayom hazeh. 2_chronicles 8:9	umin benei yisra'el 'asher lo natan shelomoh la'abadim limlakhto ki hemah 'anshei milkhamah vesarei shalishav vesarei rikhbo ufarashav. 2_chronicles 8:10	ve'eleh sarei hanezibim hanizabim 'asher lamelekh shelomoh khamishim umatayim harodim ba'am. 2_chronicles 8:11	ve'et bat par'oh he'elah shelomoh mei'ir david labayit 'asher banah lah ki 'amar lo teisheb 'ishah li bebet david melekh yisra'el ki qodesh hemah 'asher ba'ah 'aleihem 'aron yhvh. 2_chronicles 8:12	'az he'elah shelomoh 'olot yhvh 'al mizbakh yhvh 'asher banah lifnei ha'ulam. 2_chronicles 8:13	ubidbar yom beyom leha'alot kemizvat mosheh lashabatot velekhodashim velamo'adot shalosh pe'amim bashanah bekhag hamazot ubekhag hashabu'ot ubekhag hasukot. 2_chronicles 8:14	vaya'amed kemishpat david 'abiv 'et makhleqot hakohanim 'al 'abodatam vehalviyim 'al mishmerotam lehalel ulesharet neged hakohanim lidbar yom beyomo vehasho'arim bemakhleqotam lesha'ar vasha'ar ki khen mizvat david 'ish ha'elohim. 2_chronicles 8:15	velo saru mizvat hamelekh 'al hakohanim vehalviyim lekhal dabar vela'ozarot. 2_chronicles 8:16	vatikon kal melekhet shelomoh 'ad hayom musad bet yhvh ve'ad keloto shalem bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 8:17	'az halakh shelomoh le'ezyon geber ve'el 'eilot 'al sefat hayam be'erez 'edom. 2_chronicles 8:18	vayishlakh lo khuram beyad 'abadav 'oniyot 'oniyot va'abadim yod'ei yam vayabo'u 'im 'abdei shelomoh 'ofirah vayiqkhu misham 'arba' mei'ot vakhamishim kikar zahab vayabi'u 'el hamelekh shelomoh. 2_chronicles 9:1	umalkat sheba shame'ah 'et sheima' shelomoh vatabo lenasot 'et shelomoh bekhidot birushalim bekhayil kabed me'od ugemalim nose'im besamim vezahab larob ve'eben yeqarah vatabo 'el shelomoh vatedaber 'imo 'et kal 'asher hayah 'im lebabah. 2_chronicles 9:2	vayaged lah shelomoh 'et kal debareha velo ne'lam dabar mishelomoh 'asher lo higid lah. 2_chronicles 9:3	vateire malkat sheba 'et khakhemat shelomoh vehabayit 'asher banah. 2_chronicles 9:4	uma'akhal shulkhano umoshab 'abadav uma'amad mesharetav umalbusheihem umashqav umalbusheihem va'aliyato 'asher ya'aleh bet yhvh velo hayah 'od bah ruakh. 2_chronicles 9:5	vatomer 'el hamelekh 'emet hadabar 'asher shama'ti be'arzi 'al debarekha ve'al khakhematekha. 2_chronicles 9:6	velo he'emanti ledibreihem 'ad 'asher bati vatir'enah 'einai vehineh lo hugad li khazi marbit khakhematekha yasafta 'al hashemu'ah 'asher shama'eti. 2_chronicles 9:7	'ashrei 'anashekha ve'ashrei 'abadekha 'eleh ha'omedim lefanekha tamid veshome'im 'et khakhematekha. 2_chronicles 9:8	yehi yhvh 'elohekha barukh 'asher khafez bekha letitekha 'al kis'o lemelekh yhvh 'elohekha be'ahabat 'elohekha 'et yisra'el leha'amido le'olam vayitenkha 'aleihem lemelekh la'asot mishpat uzedaqah. 2_chronicles 9:9	vatiten lamelekh mei'ah ve'esrim kikar zahab ubesamim larob me'od ve'eben yeqarah velo hayah kabosem hahu 'asher natenah malkat sheba lamelekh shelomoh. 2_chronicles 9:10	vegam 'abdei khiram khuram ve'abdei shelomoh 'asher heibi'u zahab mei'ofir heibi'u 'azei 'algumim ve'eben yeqarah. 2_chronicles 9:11	vaya'as hamelekh 'et 'azei ha'algumim mesilot lebet yhvh ulebet hamelekh vekhinorot unebalim lasharim velo nir'u khahem lefanim be'erez yehudah. 2_chronicles 9:12	vehamelekh shelomoh natan lemalkat sheba 'et kal khefzah 'asher sha'alah milebad 'asher heibi'ah 'el hamelekh vatahafokh vateilekh le'arzah hi va'abadeha. 2_chronicles 9:13	vayhi mishqal hazahab 'asher ba lishlomoh beshanah 'ekhat shesh mei'ot veshishim vashesh kikerei zahab. 2_chronicles 9:14	lebad mei'anshei hatarim vehasokharim mebi'im vekhal malkhei 'arab ufakhot ha'arez mebi'im zahab vakhesef lishlomoh. 2_chronicles 9:15	vaya'as hamelekh shelomoh matayim zinah zahab shakhut shesh mei'ot zahab shakhut ya'aleh 'al hazinah ha'ekhat. 2_chronicles 9:16	ushelosh mei'ot maginim zahab shakhut shelosh mei'ot zahab ya'aleh 'al hamagen ha'ekhat vayitenem hamelekh bebet ya'ar halebanon. 2_chronicles 9:17	vaya'as hamelekh kisei shen gadol vayzapeihu zahab tahor. 2_chronicles 9:18	veshesh ma'alot lakisei vekhebesh bazahab lakisei ma'okhazim veyadot mizeh umizeh 'al meqom hashabet ushenayim 'arayot 'omedim 'eizel hayadot. 2_chronicles 9:19	ushenem 'asar 'arayot 'omedim sham 'al shesh hama'alot mizeh umizeh lo na'asah khen lekhal mamlakhah. 2_chronicles 9:20	vekhol kelei mashqeh hamelekh shelomoh zahab vekhol kelei bet ya'ar halebanon zahab sagur 'en kesef nekhshab bimei shelomoh lim'umah. 2_chronicles 9:21	ki 'oniyot lamelekh holekhot tarshish 'im 'abdei khuram 'akhat leshalosh shanim tabonah 'oniyot tarshish nose'ot zahab vakhesef shenhabim veqofim vetukiyim. 2_chronicles 9:22	vayigdal hamelekh shelomoh mikol malkhei ha'arez le'osher vekhakhemah. 2_chronicles 9:23	vekhol malkhei ha'arez mebaqshim 'et penei shelomoh lishmoa' 'et khakhemato 'asher natan ha'elohim belibo. 2_chronicles 9:24	vehem mebi'im 'ish minkhato kelei khesef ukhelei zahab uselamot neisheq ubesamim susim uferadim debar shanah beshanah. 2_chronicles 9:25	vayhi lishlomoh 'arba'at 'alafim 'uryot susim umarkabot ushenem 'asar 'elef parashim vayanikhem be'arei harekheb ve'im hamelekh birushalim. 2_chronicles 9:26	vayhi moshel bekhal hamelakhim min hanahar ve'ad 'erez pelishtim ve'ad gebul mizrayim. 2_chronicles 9:27	vayiten hamelekh 'et hakesef birushalim ka'abanim ve'et ha'arazim natan kashiqmim 'asher bashefeilah larob. 2_chronicles 9:28	umozi'im susim mimizrayim lishlomoh umikal ha'arazot. 2_chronicles 9:29	ushe'ar dibrei shelomoh harishonim veha'akharonim halo hem ketubim 'al dibrei natan hanabi ve'al nebu'at 'akhiyah hashiloni ubakhazot ye'di ye'do hakhozeh 'al yarabe'am ben nebat. 2_chronicles 9:30	vayimlokh shelomoh birushalim 'al kal yisra'el 'arba'im shanah. 2_chronicles 9:31	vayishkab shelomoh 'im 'abotav vayiqberuhu be'ir david 'abiv vayimlokh rekhab'am beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 10:1	vayeilekh rekhab'am shekhemah ki shekhem ba'u khal yisra'el lehamlikh 'oto. 2_chronicles 10:2	vayhi kishmoa' yarabe'am ben nebat vehu bemizrayim 'asher barakh mipenei shelomoh hamelekh vayashab yarabe'am mimizrayim. 2_chronicles 10:3	vayishlekhu vayiqre'u lo vayabo yarabe'am vekhal yisra'el vaydaberu 'el rekhab'am leimor. 2_chronicles 10:4	'abikha hiqshah 'et 'uleinu ve'atah haqel mei'abodat 'abikha haqashah umei'ulo hakabed 'asher natan 'aleinu vena'abdeka. 2_chronicles 10:5	vayomer 'aleihem 'od sheloshet yamim veshubu 'eilai vayeilekh ha'am. 2_chronicles 10:6	vayiva'az hamelekh rekhab'am 'et hazeqeinim 'asher hayu 'omedim lifnei shelomoh 'abiv bihyoto khai leimor 'ekh 'atem no'azim lehashib la'am hazeh dabar. 2_chronicles 10:7	vaydaberu 'eilav leimor 'im tihyeh letob leha'am hazeh urezitam vedibarta 'aleihem debarim tobim vehayu lekha 'abadim kal hayamim. 2_chronicles 10:8	vaya'azob 'et 'azat hazeqeinim 'asher ye'azuhu vayiva'az 'et hayladim 'asher gadelu 'ito ha'omedim lefanav. 2_chronicles 10:9	vayomer 'aleihem mah 'atem no'azim venashib dabar 'et ha'am hazeh 'asher diberu 'eilai leimor haqel min ha'ol 'asher natan 'abikha 'aleinu. 2_chronicles 10:10	vaydaberu 'ito hayladim 'asher gadelu 'ito leimor koh tomar la'am 'asher diberu 'eilekha leimor 'abikha hikhbid 'et 'uleinu ve'atah haqel mei'aleinu koh tomar 'aleihem qatani 'abah mimatenei 'abi. 2_chronicles 10:11	ve'atah 'abi he'mis 'aleikhem 'ol kabed va'ani 'osif 'al 'ulekhem 'abi yisar 'etkhem bashotim va'ani ba'aqrabim. 2_chronicles 10:12	vayabo yarabe'am vekhal ha'am 'el rekhab'am bayom hashelishi ka'asher diber hamelekh leimor shubu 'eilai bayom hashelishi. 2_chronicles 10:13	vaya'anem hamelekh qashah vaya'azob hamelekh rekhab'am 'et 'azat hazeqeinim. 2_chronicles 10:14	vaydaber 'aleihem ka'azat hayladim leimor 'akhbid 'et 'ulekhem va'ani 'osif 'alav 'abi yisar 'etkhem bashotim va'ani ba'aqrabim. 2_chronicles 10:15	velo shama' hamelekh 'el ha'am ki hayetah nesibah mei'im ha'elohim lema'an haqim yhvh 'et debaro 'asher diber beyad 'akhiyahu hashiloni 'el yarabe'am ben nebat. 2_chronicles 10:16	vekhal yisra'el ki lo shama' hamelekh lahem vayashibu ha'am 'et hamelekh leimor mah lanu kheileq bedavid velo nakhalah beben yishai 'ish le'ohalekha yisra'el 'atah re'eh beitekha david vayeilekh kal yisra'el le'ohalav. 2_chronicles 10:17	ubenei yisra'el hayoshebim be'arei yehudah vayimlokh 'aleihem rekhab'am. 2_chronicles 10:18	vayishlakh hamelekh rekhab'am 'et hadoram 'asher 'al hamas vayirgemu bo benei yisra'el 'eben vayamot vehamelekh rekhab'am hit'amez la'alot bamerkabah lanus yerushalim. 2_chronicles 10:19	vayifshe'u yisra'el bebet david 'ad hayom hazeh. 2_chronicles 11:1	vayabo rekhab'am yerushalim vayaqhel 'et bet yehudah ubinyamin mei'ah ushemonim 'elef bakhur 'oseh milkhamah lehilakhem 'im yisra'el lehashib 'et hamamlakhah lirkhab'am. 2_chronicles 11:2	vayhi debar yhvh 'el shema'yahu 'ish ha'elohim leimor. 2_chronicles 11:3	'emor 'el rekhab'am ben shelomoh melekh yehudah ve'el kal yisra'el bihudah ubinyamin leimor. 2_chronicles 11:4	koh 'amar yhvh lo ta'alu velo tilakhamu 'im 'akheikhem ubu 'ish lebeito ki mei'iti nihyah hadabar hazeh vayishme'u 'et dibrei yhvh vayashubu milekhet 'el yarabe'am. 2_chronicles 11:5	vayeisheb rekhab'am birushalim vayiben 'arim lemazor bihudah. 2_chronicles 11:6	vayiben 'et bet lekhem ve'et 'eitam ve'et teqoa'. 2_chronicles 11:7	ve'et bet zur ve'et sokho ve'et 'adulam. 2_chronicles 11:8	ve'et gat ve'et mareishah ve'et zif. 2_chronicles 11:9	ve'et 'adorayim ve'et lakhish ve'et 'azeiqah. 2_chronicles 11:10	ve'et zare'ah ve'et 'ayalon ve'et khebron 'asher bihudah ubebinyamin 'arei mezurot. 2_chronicles 11:11	vaykhazeq 'et hamezurot vayiten bahem negidim ve'ozerot ma'akhal veshemen vayayin. 2_chronicles 11:12	ubekhal 'ir va'ir zinot uremakhim vaykhazeqem leharbeh me'od vayhi lo yehudah ubinyamin. 2_chronicles 11:13	vehakohanim vehalviyim 'asher bekhal yisra'el hityazebu 'alav mikal gebulam. 2_chronicles 11:14	ki 'azebu halviyim 'et migresheihem va'akhuzatam vayeilekhu lihudah velirushalim ki hiznikham yarabe'am ubanav mikahen yhvh. 2_chronicles 11:15	vaya'amed lo kohanim labamot velase'irim vela'agalim 'asher 'asah. 2_chronicles 11:16	ve'akhareihem mikol shibtei yisra'el hanotenim 'et lebabam lebaqesh 'et yhvh 'elohei yisra'el ba'u yerushalim lizboakh yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem. 2_chronicles 11:17	vaykhazequ 'et malkhut yehudah vai'amezu 'et rekhab'am ben shelomoh leshanim shalosh ki halekhu bederekh david ushelomoh leshanim shalosh. 2_chronicles 11:18	vayiqakh lo rekhab'am 'ishah 'et makhalat ben bat yerimot ben david 'abihayil bat 'eli'ab ben yishai. 2_chronicles 11:19	vateiled lo banim 'et ye'ush ve'et shemaryah ve'et zaham. 2_chronicles 11:20	ve'akhareha laqakh 'et ma'akhah bat 'abshalom vateiled lo 'et 'abiyah ve'et 'atai ve'et ziza ve'et shelomit. 2_chronicles 11:21	vaye'ehab rekhab'am 'et ma'akhah bat 'abshalom mikal nashav ufilagshav ki nashim shemoneh 'esreh nasa ufilagshim shishim vayoled 'esrim ushemonah banim veshishim banot. 2_chronicles 11:22	vaya'amed larosh rekhab'am 'et 'abiyah ben ma'akhah lenagid be'ekhav ki lehamlikho. 2_chronicles 11:23	vayaben vayifroz mikal banav lekhal 'arzot yehudah ubinyamin lekhol 'arei hamezurot vayiten lahem hamazon larob vayish'al hamon nashim. 2_chronicles 12:1	vayhi kehakhin malkhut rekhab'am ukhekhezqato 'azab 'et torat yhvh vekhal yisra'el 'imo. 2_chronicles 12:2	vayhi bashanah hakhamishit lamelekh rekhab'am 'alah shishaq melekh mizrayim 'al yerushalim ki ma'alu yhvh. 2_chronicles 12:3	be'elef umatayim rekheb ubeshishim 'elef parashim ve'en mispar la'am 'asher ba'u 'imo mimizrayim lubim sukiyim vekhushim. 2_chronicles 12:4	vayilkod 'et 'arei hamezurot 'asher lihudah vayabo 'ad yerushalim. 2_chronicles 12:5	ushema'yah hanabi ba 'el rekhab'am vesarei yehudah 'asher ne'esfu 'el yerushalim mipenei shishaq vayomer lahem koh 'amar yhvh 'atem 'azabtem 'oti ve'af 'ani 'azabti 'etkhem beyad shishaq. 2_chronicles 12:6	vayikane'u sarei yisra'el vehamelekh vayomeru zadiq yhvh. 2_chronicles 12:7	ubir'ot yhvh ki nikhna'u hayah debar yhvh 'el shema'yah leimor nikhne'u lo 'ashkhitem venatati lahem kim'at lifleitah velo titakh khamati birushalim beyad shishaq. 2_chronicles 12:8	ki yihyu lo la'abadim veyeide'u 'abodati va'abodat mamlekhot ha'arazot. 2_chronicles 12:9	vaya'al shishaq melekh mizrayim 'al yerushalim vayiqakh 'et 'ozerot bet yhvh ve'et 'ozerot bet hamelekh 'et hakol laqakh vayiqakh 'et maginei hazahab 'asher 'asah shelomoh. 2_chronicles 12:10	vaya'as hamelekh rekhab'am takhteihem maginei nekhoshet vehifqid 'al yad sarei harazim hashomerim petakh bet hamelekh. 2_chronicles 12:11	vayhi midei bo hamelekh bet yhvh ba'u harazim unesa'um veheshibum 'el ta harazim. 2_chronicles 12:12	ubehikane'o shab mimenu 'af yhvh velo lehashkhit lekhalah vegam bihudah hayah debarim tobim. 2_chronicles 12:13	vayitkhazeq hamelekh rekhab'am birushalim vayimlokh ki ben 'arba'im ve'akhat shanah rekhab'am bemalekho ushaba' 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim ha'ir 'asher bakhar yhvh lasum 'et shemo sham mikol shibtei yisra'el veshem 'imo na'amah ha'amonit. 2_chronicles 12:14	vaya'as hara' ki lo heikhin libo lidrosh 'et yhvh. 2_chronicles 12:15	vedibrei rekhab'am harishonim veha'akharonim halo hem ketubim bedibrei shema'yah hanabi ve'ido hakhozeh lehityakhes umilkhamot rekhab'am veyarabe'am kal hayamim. 2_chronicles 12:16	vayishkab rekhab'am 'im 'abotav vayiqaber be'ir david vayimlokh 'abiyah beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 13:1	bishnat shemoneh 'esreh lamelekh yarabe'am vayimlokh 'abiyah 'al yehudah. 2_chronicles 13:2	shalosh shanim malakh birushalim veshem 'imo mikhayahu bat 'uri'el min gib'ah umilkhamah hayetah ben 'abiyah uben yarabe'am. 2_chronicles 13:3	vaye'sor 'abiyah 'et hamilkhamah bekhayil giborei milkhamah 'arba' mei'ot 'elef 'ish bakhur veyarabe'am 'arakh 'imo milkhamah bishmoneh mei'ot 'elef 'ish bakhur gibor khayil. 2_chronicles 13:4	vayaqam 'abiyah mei'al lehar zemarayim 'asher behar 'efrayim vayomer shema'uni yarabe'am vekhal yisra'el. 2_chronicles 13:5	halo lakhem lada'at ki yhvh 'elohei yisra'el natan mamlakhah ledavid 'al yisra'el le'olam lo ulebanav berit melakh. 2_chronicles 13:6	vayaqam yarabe'am ben nebat 'ebed shelomoh ben david vayimrod 'al 'adonav. 2_chronicles 13:7	vayiqabezu 'alav 'anashim reiqim benei beliya'al vayit'amezu 'al rekhab'am ben shelomoh urekhab'am hayah na'ar verakh leibab velo hitkhazaq lifneihem. 2_chronicles 13:8	ve'atah 'atem 'omerim lehitkhazeq lifnei mamlekhet yhvh beyad benei david ve'atem hamon rab ve'imakhem 'eglei zahab 'asher 'asah lakhem yarabe'am leilohim. 2_chronicles 13:9	halo hidakhtem 'et kohanei yhvh 'et benei 'aharon vehalviyim vata'asu lakhem kohanim ke'amei ha'arazot kal haba lemalei yado befar ben baqar ve'eilim shib'ah vehayah khohen lelo 'elohim. 2_chronicles 13:10	va'anakhnu yhvh 'eloheinu velo 'azabnuhu vekhohanim mesharetim yhvh benei 'aharon vehalviyim bamlakhet. 2_chronicles 13:11	umaqtirim yhvh 'olot baboqer baboqer uba'ereb ba'ereb uqetoret samim uma'arekhet lekhem 'al hashulkhan hatahor umenorat hazahab veneiroteha leba'er ba'ereb ba'ereb ki shomerim 'anakhnu 'et mishmeret yhvh 'eloheinu ve'atem 'azabtem 'oto. 2_chronicles 13:12	vehineh 'imanu barosh ha'elohim vekhohanav vakhazozerot hateru'ah leharia' 'aleikhem benei yisra'el 'al tilakhamu 'im yhvh 'elohei 'aboteikhem ki lo tazlikhu. 2_chronicles 13:13	veyarabe'am heiseb 'et hama'rab labo mei'akhareihem vayihyu lifnei yehudah vehama'rab mei'akhareihem. 2_chronicles 13:14	vayifnu yehudah vehineh lahem hamilkhamah panim ve'akhor vayiz'aqu yhvh vehakohanim makhazozerim makhzerim bakhazozerot. 2_chronicles 13:15	vayari'u 'ish yehudah vayhi beharia' 'ish yehudah veha'elohim nagaf 'et yarabe'am vekhal yisra'el lifnei 'abiyah vihudah. 2_chronicles 13:16	vayanusu benei yisra'el mipenei yehudah vayitenem 'elohim beyadam. 2_chronicles 13:17	vayaku bahem 'abiyah ve'amo makah rabah vayipelu khalalim miyisra'el khamesh mei'ot 'elef 'ish bakhur. 2_chronicles 13:18	vayikane'u benei yisra'el ba'et hahi vaye'emzu benei yehudah ki nish'anu 'al yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem. 2_chronicles 13:19	vayirdof 'abiyah 'akharei yarabe'am vayilkod mimenu 'arim 'et bet 'el ve'et benoteha ve'et yeshanah ve'et benoteha ve'et 'efron 'efrayin ubenoteha. 2_chronicles 13:20	velo 'azar koakh yarabe'am 'od bimei 'abiyahu vayigefeihu yhvh vayamot. 2_chronicles 13:21	vayitkhazeq 'abiyahu vayisa lo nashim 'arba' 'esreh vayoled 'esrim ushenayim banim veshesh 'esreh banot. 2_chronicles 13:22	veyeter dibrei 'abiyah uderakhav udebarav ketubim bemidrash hanabi 'ido. 2_chronicles 14:1	vayishkab 'abiyah 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto be'ir david vayimlokh 'asa beno takhtav beyamav shaqetah ha'arez 'eser shanim. 2_chronicles 14:2	vaya'as 'asa hatob vehayashar be'einei yhvh 'elohav. 2_chronicles 14:3	vayasar 'et mizbekhot haneikhar vehabamot vayshaber 'et hamazeibot vaygada' 'et ha'asheirim. 2_chronicles 14:4	vayomer lihudah lidrosh 'et yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem vela'asot hatorah vehamizvah. 2_chronicles 14:5	vayasar mikal 'arei yehudah 'et habamot ve'et hakhamanim vatishqot hamamlakhah lefanav. 2_chronicles 14:6	vayiben 'arei mezurah bihudah ki shaqetah ha'arez ve'en 'imo milkhamah bashanim ha'eleh ki heiniakh yhvh lo. 2_chronicles 14:7	vayomer lihudah nibneh 'et he'arim ha'eleh venaseb khomah umigdalim delatayim uberikhim 'odenu ha'arez lefaneinu ki darashnu 'et yhvh 'eloheinu darashnu vayanakh lanu misabib vayibnu vayazlikhu. 2_chronicles 14:8	vayhi le'asa khayil nosei zinah varomakh mihudah shelosh mei'ot 'elef umibinyamin nose'ei magen vedorekhei qeshet matayim ushemonim 'alef kal 'eleh giborei khayil. 2_chronicles 14:9	vayeizei 'aleihem zerakh hakushi bekhayil 'elef 'alafim umarkabot shelosh mei'ot vayabo 'ad mareishah. 2_chronicles 14:10	vayeizei 'asa lefanav vaya'arkhu milkhamah begei zefatah lemareishah. 2_chronicles 14:11	vayiqra 'asa 'el yhvh 'elohav vayomar yhvh 'en 'imekha la'zor ben rab le'en koakh 'azereinu yhvh 'eloheinu ki 'alekha nish'anu ubeshimkha banu 'al hehamon hazeh yhvh 'eloheinu 'atah 'al ya'zor 'imekha 'enosh. 2_chronicles 14:12	vayigof yhvh 'et hakushim lifnei 'asa velifnei yehudah vayanusu hakushim. 2_chronicles 14:13	vayirdefem 'asa veha'am 'asher 'imo 'ad ligrar vayipol mikushim le'en lahem mikhyah ki nishberu lifnei yhvh velifnei makhaneihu vayis'u shalal harbeh me'od. 2_chronicles 14:14	vayaku 'et kal he'arim sebibot gerar ki hayah fakhad yhvh 'aleihem vayabozu 'et kal he'arim ki bizah rabah hayetah bahem. 2_chronicles 14:15	vegam 'aholei miqneh hiku vayishbu zon larob ugemalim vayashubu yerushalim. 2_chronicles 15:1	va'azaryahu ben 'oded hayetah 'alav ruakh 'elohim. 2_chronicles 15:2	vayeizei lifnei 'asa vayomer lo shema'uni 'asa vekhal yehudah ubinyamin yhvh 'imakhem bihyotkhem 'imo ve'im tidreshuhu yimazei lakhem ve'im ta'azbuhu ya'azob 'etkhem. 2_chronicles 15:3	veyamim rabim leyisra'el lelo 'elohei 'emet ulelo kohen moreh ulelo torah. 2_chronicles 15:4	vayashab bazar lo 'al yhvh 'elohei yisra'el vaybaqshuhu vayimazei lahem. 2_chronicles 15:5	uba'itim hahem 'en shalom layozei velaba ki mehumot rabot 'al kal yoshebei ha'arazot. 2_chronicles 15:6	vekhutetu go bego ve'ir be'ir ki 'elohim hamamam bekhal zarah. 2_chronicles 15:7	ve'atem khizqu ve'al yirpu yedeikhem ki yesh sakhar lif'ulatkhem. 2_chronicles 15:8	vekhishmoa' 'asa hadebarim ha'eleh vehanebu'ah 'oded hanabi hitkhazaq vaya'aber hashiquzim mikal 'erez yehudah ubinyamin umin he'arim 'asher lakhad meihar 'efrayim vaykhadesh 'et mizbakh yhvh 'asher lifnei 'ulam yhvh. 2_chronicles 15:9	vayiqboz 'et kal yehudah ubinyamin vehagarim 'imahem mei'efrayim umenasheh umishim'on ki nafelu 'alav miyisra'el larob bir'otam ki yhvh 'elohav 'imo. 2_chronicles 15:10	vayiqabezu yerushalim bakhodesh hashelishi lishnat khamesh 'esreh lemalkhut 'asa. 2_chronicles 15:11	vayizbekhu yhvh bayom hahu min hashalal heibi'u baqar sheba' mei'ot vezon shib'at 'alafim. 2_chronicles 15:12	vayabo'u baberit lidrosh 'et yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem bekhal lebabam ubekhal nafsham. 2_chronicles 15:13	vekhol 'asher lo yidrosh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el yumat lemin qaton ve'ad gadol lemei'ish ve'ad 'ishah. 2_chronicles 15:14	vayishabe'u yhvh beqol gadol ubitru'ah ubakhazozerot ubeshofarot. 2_chronicles 15:15	vayismekhu khal yehudah 'al hashebu'ah ki bekhal lebabam nishba'u ubekhal rezonam biqshuhu vayimazei lahem vayanakh yhvh lahem misabib. 2_chronicles 15:16	vegam ma'akhah 'em 'asa hamelekh hesirah migebirah 'asher 'asetah la'asheirah miflazet vayikhrot 'asa 'et miflaztah vayadeq vayisrof benakhal qidron. 2_chronicles 15:17	vehabamot lo saru miyisra'el raq lebab 'asa hayah shalem kal yamav. 2_chronicles 15:18	vayabei 'et qadeshei 'abiv veqadashav bet ha'elohim kesef vezahab vekheilim. 2_chronicles 15:19	umilkhamah lo hayatah 'ad shenat sheloshim vekhamesh lemalkhut 'asa. 2_chronicles 16:1	bishnat sheloshim vashesh lemalkhut 'asa 'alah ba'sha melekh yisra'el 'al yehudah vayiben 'et haramah lebilti tet yozei vaba le'asa melekh yehudah. 2_chronicles 16:2	vayozei 'asa kesef vezahab mei'ozerot bet yhvh ubet hamelekh vayishlakh 'el ben hadad melekh 'aram hayosheb bedarmeseq leimor. 2_chronicles 16:3	berit beini ubeinekha uben 'abi uben 'abikha hineh shalakhti lekha kesef vezahab lekh hafer beritekha 'et ba'sha melekh yisra'el veya'aleh mei'alai. 2_chronicles 16:4	vayishma' ben hadad 'el hamelekh 'asa vayishlakh 'et sarei hakhayalim 'asher lo 'el 'arei yisra'el vayaku 'et 'iyon ve'et dan ve'et 'abel mayim ve'et kal miskenot 'arei naftali. 2_chronicles 16:5	vayhi kishmoa' ba'sha vayekhdal mibenot 'et haramah vayashbet 'et melakhto. 2_chronicles 16:6	ve'asa hamelekh laqakh 'et kal yehudah vayis'u 'et 'abnei haramah ve'et 'eizeha 'asher banah ba'sha vayiben bahem 'et geba' ve'et hamizpah. 2_chronicles 16:7	uba'et hahi ba khanani haro'eh 'el 'asa melekh yehudah vayomer 'eilav behisha'enkha 'al melekh 'aram velo nish'anta 'al yhvh 'elohekha 'al ken nimlat khel melekh 'aram miyadekha. 2_chronicles 16:8	halo hakushim vehalubim hayu lekhayil larob lerekheb ulefarashim leharbeh me'od ubehisha'enkha 'al yhvh netanam beyadekha. 2_chronicles 16:9	ki yhvh 'einav meshotetot bekhal ha'arez lehitkhazeq 'im lebabam shalem 'eilav niskalta 'al zot ki mei'atah yesh 'imekha milkhamot. 2_chronicles 16:10	vayikh'as 'asa 'el haro'eh vayiteneihu bet hamahpekhet ki beza'af 'imo 'al zot vayrazez 'asa min ha'am ba'et hahi. 2_chronicles 16:11	vehineh dibrei 'asa harishonim veha'akharonim hinam ketubim 'al seifer hamelakhim lihudah veyisra'el. 2_chronicles 16:12	vayekhele 'asa bishnat sheloshim vateisha' lemalkhuto beraglav 'ad lema'lah khaleyo vegam bekhaleyo lo darash 'et yhvh ki barofe'im. 2_chronicles 16:13	vayishkab 'asa 'im 'abotav vayamat bishnat 'arba'im ve'akhat lemalekho. 2_chronicles 16:14	vayiqberuhu beqibrotav 'asher karah lo be'ir david vayashkibuhu bamishkab 'asher milei besamim uzenim meruqakhim bemirqakhat ma'aseh vayisrefu lo sereifah gedolah 'ad lim'od. 2_chronicles 17:1	vayimlokh yehoshafat beno takhtav vayitkhazeq 'al yisra'el. 2_chronicles 17:2	vayiten khayil bekhal 'arei yehudah habezurot vayiten nezibim be'erez yehudah ube'arei 'efrayim 'asher lakhad 'asa 'abiv. 2_chronicles 17:3	vayhi yhvh 'im yehoshafat ki halakh bedarkhei david 'abiv harishonim velo darash labe'alim. 2_chronicles 17:4	ki leilohei 'abiv darash ubemizvotav halakh velo kema'aseh yisra'el. 2_chronicles 17:5	vayakhen yhvh 'et hamamlakhah beyado vayitenu khal yehudah minkhah lihoshafat vayhi lo 'osher vekhabod larob. 2_chronicles 17:6	vayigbah libo bedarkhei yhvh ve'od heisir 'et habamot ve'et ha'asheirim mihudah. 2_chronicles 17:7	ubishnat shalosh lemalekho shalakh lesarav leben khayil ule'obadyah velizkharyah velintan'el ulemikhayahu lelamed be'arei yehudah. 2_chronicles 17:8	ve'imahem halviyim shema'yahu unetanyahu uzebadyahu va'asah'el ushemirimot ushemiramot vihonatan va'adoniyahu vetobiyahu vetob 'adoniyah halviyim ve'imahem 'elishama' vihoram hakohanim. 2_chronicles 17:9	vaylamedu bihudah ve'imahem seifer torat yhvh vayasobu bekhal 'arei yehudah vaylamedu ba'am. 2_chronicles 17:10	vayhi pakhad yhvh 'al kal mamlekhot ha'arazot 'asher sebibot yehudah velo nilkhamu 'im yehoshafat. 2_chronicles 17:11	umin pelishtim mebi'im lihoshafat minkhah vekhesef masa gam ha'arbi'im mebi'im lo zon 'eilim shib'at 'alafim usheba' mei'ot uteyashim shib'at 'alafim usheba' mei'ot. 2_chronicles 17:12	vayhi yehoshafat holekh vegadel 'ad lema'elah vayiben bihudah biraniyot ve'arei miskenot. 2_chronicles 17:13	umelakhah rabah hayah lo be'arei yehudah ve'anshei milkhamah giborei khayil birushalim. 2_chronicles 17:14	ve'eleh fequdatam lebet 'aboteihem lihudah sarei 'alafim 'adnah hasar ve'imo giborei khayil shelosh mei'ot 'alef. 2_chronicles 17:15	ve'al yado yehokhanan hasar ve'imo matayim ushemonim 'alef. 2_chronicles 17:16	ve'al yado 'amasyah ben zikhri hamitnadeb yhvh ve'imo matayim 'elef gibor khayil. 2_chronicles 17:17	umin binyamin gibor khayil 'elyada' ve'imo nosheqei qeshet umagen matayim 'alef. 2_chronicles 17:18	ve'al yado yehozabad ve'imo mei'ah ushemonim 'elef khaluzei zaba. 2_chronicles 17:19	'eleh hamsharetim 'et hamelekh milebad 'asher natan hamelekh be'arei hamibzar bekhal yehudah. 2_chronicles 18:1	vayhi lihoshafat 'osher vekhabod larob vayitkhaten le'akh'ab. 2_chronicles 18:2	vayeired leqez shanim 'el 'akh'ab leshomeron vayizbakh lo 'akh'ab zon ubaqar larob vela'am 'asher 'imo vaysiteihu la'alot 'el ramot gil'ad. 2_chronicles 18:3	vayomer 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat melekh yehudah hateilekh 'imi ramot gil'ad vayomer lo kamoni khamokha ukhe'amekha 'ami ve'imekha bamilkhamah. 2_chronicles 18:4	vayomer yehoshafat 'el melekh yisra'el derash na khayom 'et debar yhvh. 2_chronicles 18:5	vayiqboz melekh yisra'el 'et hanebi'im 'arba' mei'ot 'ish vayomer 'aleihem haneilekh 'el ramot gil'ad lamilkhamah 'im 'ekhdal vayomeru 'aleh veyiten ha'elohim beyad hamelekh. 2_chronicles 18:6	vayomer yehoshafat ha'en poh nabi yhvh 'od venidreshah mei'oto. 2_chronicles 18:7	vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat 'od 'ish 'ekhad lidrosh 'et yhvh mei'oto va'ani seneitihu ki 'einenu mitnabei 'alai letobah ki khal yamav lera'ah hu mikhayehu ben yimla vayomer yehoshafat 'al yomar hamelekh ken. 2_chronicles 18:8	vayiqra melekh yisra'el 'el saris 'ekhad vayomer maher mikhahu mikhayehu ben yimla. 2_chronicles 18:9	umelekh yisra'el vihoshafat melekh yehudah yoshebim 'ish 'al kis'o melubashim begadim veyoshebim begoren petakh sha'ar shomeron vekhal hanebi'im mitnabe'im lifneihem. 2_chronicles 18:10	vaya'as lo zidqiyahu ben kena'anah qarnei barzel vayomer koh 'amar yhvh be'eleh tenagakh 'et 'aram 'ad kalotam. 2_chronicles 18:11	vekhal hanebi'im nibe'im ken leimor 'aleh ramot gil'ad vehazlakh venatan yhvh beyad hamelekh. 2_chronicles 18:12	vehamal'akh 'asher halakh liqro lemikhayehu diber 'eilav leimor hineh dibrei hanebi'im peh 'ekhad tob 'el hamelekh vihi na debarekha ke'akhad meihem vedibarta tob. 2_chronicles 18:13	vayomer mikhayehu khai yhvh ki 'et 'asher yomar 'elohai 'oto 'adaber. 2_chronicles 18:14	vayabo 'el hamelekh vayomer hamelekh 'eilav mikhah haneilekh 'el ramot gil'ad lamilkhamah 'im 'ekhdal vayomer 'alu vehazlikhu veyinatenu beyedkhem. 2_chronicles 18:15	vayomer 'eilav hamelekh 'ad kameh fe'amim 'ani mashbi'ekha 'asher lo tedaber 'eilai raq 'emet beshem yhvh. 2_chronicles 18:16	vayomer ra'iti 'et kal yisra'el nefozim 'al heharim kazon 'asher 'en lahen ro'eh vayomer yhvh lo 'adonim la'eleh yashubu 'ish lebeito beshalom. 2_chronicles 18:17	vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat halo 'amarti 'eilekha lo yitnabei 'alai tob ki 'im lera'. 2_chronicles 18:18	vayomer lakhen shim'u debar yhvh ra'iti 'et yhvh yosheb 'al kis'o vekhal zeba hashamayim 'omedim 'al yemino usemolo. 2_chronicles 18:19	vayomer yhvh mi yefateh 'et 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el veya'al veyipol beramot gil'ad vayomer zeh 'omer kakhah vezeh 'omer kakhah. 2_chronicles 18:20	vayeizei haruakh vaya'amod lifnei yhvh vayomer 'ani 'afatenu vayomer yhvh 'eilav bamah. 2_chronicles 18:21	vayomer 'eizei vehayiti leruakh sheqer befi kal nebi'av vayomer tefateh vegam tukhal zei va'aseh khen. 2_chronicles 18:22	ve'atah hineh natan yhvh ruakh sheqer befi nebi'ekha 'eleh yhvh diber 'alekha ra'ah. 2_chronicles 18:23	vayigash zidqiyahu ben kena'anah vayakh 'et mikhayehu 'al halekhi vayomer 'ei zeh haderekh 'abar ruakh yhvh mei'iti ledaber 'otakh. 2_chronicles 18:24	vayomer mikhayehu hinekha ro'eh bayom hahu 'asher tabo kheder bekheder leheikhabei. 2_chronicles 18:25	vayomer melekh yisra'el qekhu 'et mikhayehu vahashibuhu 'el 'amon sar ha'ir ve'el yo'ash ben hamelekh. 2_chronicles 18:26	va'amartem koh 'amar hamelekh simu zeh bet hakele veha'akhiluhu lekhem lakhaz umayim lakhaz 'ad shubi beshalom. 2_chronicles 18:27	vayomer mikhayehu 'im shob tashub beshalom lo diber yhvh bi vayomer shim'u 'amim kulam. 2_chronicles 18:28	vaya'al melekh yisra'el vihoshafat melekh yehudah 'el ramot gil'ad. 2_chronicles 18:29	vayomer melekh yisra'el 'el yehoshafat hitkhapes vabo bamilkhamah ve'atah lebash begadekha vayitkhapes melekh yisra'el vayabo'u bamilkhamah. 2_chronicles 18:30	umelekh 'aram zivah 'et sarei harekheb 'asher lo leimor lo tilakhamu 'et haqaton 'et hagadol ki 'im 'et melekh yisra'el lebado. 2_chronicles 18:31	vayhi kir'ot sarei harekheb 'et yehoshafat vehemah 'ameru melekh yisra'el hu vayasobu 'alav lehilakhem vayiz'aq yehoshafat yhvh 'azaro vaysitem 'elohim mimenu. 2_chronicles 18:32	vayhi kir'ot sarei harekheb ki lo hayah melekh yisra'el vayashubu mei'akharav. 2_chronicles 18:33	ve'ish mashakh baqeshet letumo vayakh 'et melekh yisra'el ben hadebaqim uben hashiryan vayomer larakab hafokh yadekha yadekha vehozeitani min hamakhaneh ki hakholeiti. 2_chronicles 18:34	vata'al hamilkhamah bayom hahu umelekh yisra'el hayah ma'amid bamerkabah nokhakh 'aram 'ad ha'areb vayamat le'et bo hashamesh. 2_chronicles 19:1	vayashab yehoshafat melekh yehudah 'el beito beshalom lirushalim. 2_chronicles 19:2	vayeizei 'el panav yeihu ben khanani hakhozeh vayomer 'el hamelekh yehoshafat halarasha' la'zor ulesone'ei yhvh te'ehab ubazot 'alekha qezef milifnei yhvh. 2_chronicles 19:3	'abal debarim tobim nimze'u 'imakh ki bi'arta ha'asheirot min ha'arez vahakhinota lebabekha lidrosh ha'elohim. 2_chronicles 19:4	vayeisheb yehoshafat birushalim vayashab vayeizei ba'am mibe'er sheba' 'ad har 'efrayim vayshibem 'el yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem. 2_chronicles 19:5	vaya'amed shofetim ba'arez bekhal 'arei yehudah habezurot le'ir va'ir. 2_chronicles 19:6	vayomer 'el hashofetim re'u mah 'atem 'osim ki lo le'adam tishpetu ki yhvh ve'imakhem bidbar mishpat. 2_chronicles 19:7	ve'atah yehi fakhad yhvh 'aleikhem shimru va'asu ki 'en 'im yhvh 'eloheinu 'avlah umaso fanim umiqakh shokhad. 2_chronicles 19:8	vegam birushalim he'emid yehoshafat min halviyim vehakohanim umeirashei ha'abot leyisra'el lemishpat yhvh velarib vayashubu yerushalim. 2_chronicles 19:9	vayzav 'aleihem leimor koh ta'asun beyir'at yhvh be'emunah ubeleibab shalem. 2_chronicles 19:10	vekhal rib 'asher yabo 'aleikhem mei'akheikhem hayoshebim be'areihem ben dam ledam ben torah lemizvah lekhuqim ulemishpatim vehizhartem 'otam velo ye'shemu yhvh vehayah qezef 'aleikhem ve'al 'akheikhem koh ta'asun velo te'shamu. 2_chronicles 19:11	vehineh 'amaryahu khohen harosh 'aleikhem lekhol debar yhvh uzebadyahu ben yishma'el hanagid lebet yehudah lekhol debar hamelekh veshoterim halviyim lifneikhem khizqu va'asu vihi yhvh 'im hatob. 2_chronicles 20:1	vayhi 'akhareikhen ba'u benei mo'ab ubenei 'amon ve'imahem meiha'amonim 'al yehoshafat lamilkhamah. 2_chronicles 20:2	vayabo'u vayagidu lihoshafat leimor ba 'alekha hamon rab mei'eiber layam mei'aram vehinam bekhazon tamar hi 'en gedi. 2_chronicles 20:3	vayira vayiten yehoshafat 'et panav lidrosh yhvh vayiqra zom 'al kal yehudah. 2_chronicles 20:4	vayiqabezu yehudah lebaqesh yhvh gam mikal 'arei yehudah ba'u lebaqesh 'et yhvh. 2_chronicles 20:5	vaya'amod yehoshafat biqhal yehudah virushalim bebet yhvh lifnei hekhazer hakhadashah. 2_chronicles 20:6	vayomar yhvh 'elohei 'aboteinu halo 'atah hu 'elohim bashamayim ve'atah moshel bekhol mamlekhot hagoyim ubeyadekha koakh ugeburah ve'en 'imekha lehityazeb. 2_chronicles 20:7	halo 'atah 'eloheinu horashta 'et yoshebei ha'arez hazot milifnei 'amekha yisra'el vatitenah lezera' 'abraham 'ohabkha le'olam. 2_chronicles 20:8	vayeishebu bah vayibnu lekha bah miqdash leshimkha leimor. 2_chronicles 20:9	'im tabo 'aleinu ra'ah khereb shefot vedeber vera'ab na'amdah lifnei habayit hazeh ulefanekha ki shimkha babayit hazeh veniz'aq 'eilekha mizarateinu vetishma' vetoshia'. 2_chronicles 20:10	ve'atah hineh benei 'amon umo'ab vehar sei'ir 'asher lo natatah leyisra'el labo bahem bebo'am mei'erez mizrayim ki saru mei'aleihem velo hishmidum. 2_chronicles 20:11	vehineh hem gomelim 'aleinu labo legaresheinu miyerushatekha 'asher horashtanu. 2_chronicles 20:12	'eloheinu halo tishpat bam ki 'en banu koakh lifnei hehamon harab hazeh haba 'aleinu va'anakhnu lo neida' mah na'aseh ki 'alekha 'eineinu. 2_chronicles 20:13	vekhol yehudah 'omedim lifnei yhvh gam tapam nesheihem ubeneihem. 2_chronicles 20:14	veyakhazi'el ben zekharyahu ben benayah ben ye'i'el ben matanyah haleivi min benei 'asaf hayetah 'alav ruakh yhvh betokh haqahal. 2_chronicles 20:15	vayomer haqshibu khal yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim vehamelekh yehoshafat koh 'amar yhvh lakhem 'atem 'al tire'u ve'al teikhatu mipenei hehamon harab hazeh ki lo lakhem hamilkhamah ki leilohim. 2_chronicles 20:16	makhar redu 'aleihem hinam 'olim bema'aleh haziz umezatem 'otam besof hanakhal penei midbar yeru'el. 2_chronicles 20:17	lo lakhem lehilakhem bazot hityazebu 'imdu ure'u 'et yeshu'at yhvh 'imakhem yehudah virushalim 'al tire'u ve'al teikhatu makhar ze'u lifneihem yhvh 'imakhem. 2_chronicles 20:18	vayiqod yehoshafat 'apayim 'arezah vekhal yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim nafelu lifnei yhvh lehishtakhavot yhvh. 2_chronicles 20:19	vayaqumu halviyim min benei haqehatim umin benei haqarekhim lehalel yhvh 'elohei yisra'el beqol gadol lema'elah. 2_chronicles 20:20	vayashkimu baboqer vayeize'u lemidbar teqoa' ubezeitam 'amad yehoshafat vayomer shema'uni yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim ha'aminu yhvh 'eloheikhem vetei'ameinu ha'aminu binbi'av vehazlikhu. 2_chronicles 20:21	vayiva'az 'el ha'am vaya'amed meshorarim yhvh umehalim lehadrat qodesh bezet lifnei hekhaluz ve'omerim hodu yhvh ki le'olam khasdo. 2_chronicles 20:22	ube'et heikhelu berinah utehilah natan yhvh me'arebim 'al benei 'amon mo'ab vehar sei'ir haba'im lihudah vayinageifu. 2_chronicles 20:23	vaya'amdu benei 'amon umo'ab 'al yoshebei har sei'ir lehakharim ulehashmid ukhekhalotam beyoshebei sei'ir 'azeru 'ish berei'eihu lemashkhit. 2_chronicles 20:24	vihudah ba 'al hamizpeh lamidbar vayifnu 'el hehamon vehinam pegarim nofelim 'arzah ve'en peleitah. 2_chronicles 20:25	vayabo yehoshafat ve'amo laboz 'et shelalam vayimze'u bahem larob urekhush ufegarim ukhelei khamudot vaynazelu lahem le'en masa vayihyu yamim sheloshah bozezim 'et hashalal ki rab hu. 2_chronicles 20:26	ubayom harebi'i niqhalu le'eimeq berakhah ki sham beirakhu 'et yhvh 'al ken qare'u 'et shem hamaqom hahu 'eimeq berakhah 'ad hayom. 2_chronicles 20:27	vayashubu kal 'ish yehudah virushalim vihoshafat berosham lashub 'el yerushalim besimkhah ki simekham yhvh mei'oybeihem. 2_chronicles 20:28	vayabo'u yerushalim binbalim ubekhinorot ubakhazozerot 'el bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 20:29	vayhi pakhad 'elohim 'al kal mamlekhot ha'arazot beshame'am ki nilkham yhvh 'im 'oybei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 20:30	vatishqot malkhut yehoshafat vayanakh lo 'elohav misabib. 2_chronicles 20:31	vayimlokh yehoshafat 'al yehudah ben sheloshim vekhamesh shanah bemalekho ve'esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'azubah bat shilkhi. 2_chronicles 20:32	vayeilekh bederekh 'abiv 'asa velo sar mimenah la'asot hayashar be'einei yhvh. 2_chronicles 20:33	'akh habamot lo saru ve'od ha'am lo heikhinu lebabam leilohei 'aboteihem. 2_chronicles 20:34	veyeter dibrei yehoshafat harishonim veha'akharonim hinam ketubim bedibrei yeihu ben khanani 'asher ho'alah 'al seifer malkhei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 20:35	ve'akhareikhen 'etkhabar yehoshafat melekh yehudah 'im 'akhazyah melekh yisra'el hu hirshia' la'asot. 2_chronicles 20:36	vaykhabereihu 'imo la'asot 'oniyot lalekhet tarshish vaya'asu 'oniyot be'ezyon gaber. 2_chronicles 20:37	vayitnabei 'eli'ezer ben dodavahu mimareishah 'al yehoshafat leimor kehitkhaberkha 'im 'akhazyahu paraz yhvh 'et ma'asekha vayishaberu 'oniyot velo 'azeru lalekhet 'el tarshish. 2_chronicles 21:1	vayishkab yehoshafat 'im 'abotav vayiqaber 'im 'abotav be'ir david vayimlokh yehoram beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 21:2	velo 'akhim benei yehoshafat 'azaryah vikhi'el uzekharyahu va'azaryahu umikha'el ushefatyahu kal 'eleh benei yehoshafat melekh yisra'el. 2_chronicles 21:3	vayiten lahem 'abihem matanot rabot lekhesef ulezahab ulemigdanot 'im 'arei mezurot bihudah ve'et hamamlakhah natan lihoram ki hu habekhor. 2_chronicles 21:4	vayaqam yehoram 'al mamlekhat 'abiv vayitkhazaq vayaharog 'et kal 'ekhav bekhareb vegam misarei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 21:5	ben sheloshim ushetayim shanah yehoram bemalekho ushemoneh shanim malakh birushalim. 2_chronicles 21:6	vayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra'el ka'asher 'asu bet 'akh'ab ki bat 'akh'ab hayetah lo 'ishah vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh. 2_chronicles 21:7	velo 'abah yhvh lehashkhit 'et bet david lema'an haberit 'asher karat ledavid vekha'asher 'amar latet lo nir ulebanav kal hayamim. 2_chronicles 21:8	beyamav pasha' 'edom mitakhat yad yehudah vayamlikhu 'aleihem melekh. 2_chronicles 21:9	vaya'abor yehoram 'im sarav vekhal harekheb 'imo vayhi qam laylah vayakh 'et 'edom hasobeb 'eilav ve'et sarei harakheb. 2_chronicles 21:10	vayifsha' 'edom mitakhat yad yehudah 'ad hayom hazeh 'az tifsha' libnah ba'et hahi mitakhat yado ki 'azab 'et yhvh 'elohei 'abotav. 2_chronicles 21:11	gam hu 'asah bamot beharei yehudah vayezen 'et yoshebei yerushalim vayadakh 'et yehudah. 2_chronicles 21:12	vayabo 'eilav mikhtab mei'eiliyahu hanabi leimor koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei david 'abikha takhat 'asher lo halakhta bedarkhei yehoshafat 'abikha ubedarkhei 'asa melekh yehudah. 2_chronicles 21:13	vateilekh bederekh malkhei yisra'el vatazneh 'et yehudah ve'et yoshebei yerushalim kehaznot bet 'akh'ab vegam 'et 'akhekha bet 'abikha hatobim mimekha harageta. 2_chronicles 21:14	hineh yhvh nogef mageifah gedolah be'amekha ubebanekha ubenashekha ubekhal rekhushekha. 2_chronicles 21:15	ve'atah bakholayim rabim bemakhaleh mei'ekha 'ad yeize'u mei'ekha min hakholi yamim 'al yamim. 2_chronicles 21:16	vaya'ar yhvh 'al yehoram 'et ruakh hapelishtim veha'arbim 'asher 'al yad kushim. 2_chronicles 21:17	vaya'alu bihudah vayibqa'uha vayishbu 'et kal harekhush hanimza lebet hamelekh vegam banav venashav velo nish'ar lo ben ki 'im yeho'akhaz qeton banav. 2_chronicles 21:18	ve'akharei kal zot negafo yhvh bemei'av lakholi le'en marpei. 2_chronicles 21:19	vayhi leyamim miyamim ukhe'et zet haqez leyamim shenayim yaze'u mei'av 'im khaleyo vayamat betakhalu'im ra'im velo 'asu lo 'amo sereifah kisreifat 'abotav. 2_chronicles 21:20	ben sheloshim ushetayim hayah bemalekho ushemoneh shanim malakh birushalim vayeilekh belo khemdah vayiqberuhu be'ir david velo beqibrot hamelakhim. 2_chronicles 22:1	vayamlikhu yoshebei yerushalim 'et 'akhazyahu beno haqaton takhtav ki khal harishonim harag hagedud haba ba'arbim lamakhaneh vayimlokh 'akhazyahu ben yehoram melekh yehudah. 2_chronicles 22:2	ben 'arba'im ushetayim shanah 'akhazyahu bemalekho veshanah 'akhat malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'atalyahu bat 'ameri. 2_chronicles 22:3	gam hu halakh bedarkhei bet 'akh'ab ki 'imo hayetah yo'azto leharshia'. 2_chronicles 22:4	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh kebet 'akh'ab ki hemah hayu lo yo'azim 'akharei mot 'abiv lemashkhit lo. 2_chronicles 22:5	gam ba'azatam halakh vayeilekh 'et yehoram ben 'akh'ab melekh yisra'el lamilkhamah 'al khaza'el melekh 'aram beramot gil'ad vayaku haramim 'et yoram. 2_chronicles 22:6	vayashab lehitrapei beyizre'el ki hamakim 'asher hikuhu baramah behilakhamo 'et khazah'el melekh 'aram va'azaryahu ben yehoram melekh yehudah yarad lir'ot 'et yehoram ben 'akh'ab beyizre'el ki kholeh hu. 2_chronicles 22:7	umei'elohim hayetah tebusat 'akhazyahu labo 'el yoram ubebo'o yaza 'im yehoram 'el yeihu ben nimshi 'asher meshakho yhvh lehakhrit 'et bet 'akh'ab. 2_chronicles 22:8	vayhi kehishafet yeihu 'im bet 'akh'ab vayimza 'et sarei yehudah ubenei 'akhei 'akhazyahu mesharetim la'akhazyahu vayahargem. 2_chronicles 22:9	vaybaqesh 'et 'akhazyahu vayilkeduhu vehu mitkhabei beshomeron vaybi'uhu 'el yeihu vaymituhu vayiqberuhu ki 'ameru ben yehoshafat hu 'asher darash 'et yhvh bekhal lebabo ve'en lebet 'akhazyahu la'zor koakh lemamlakhah. 2_chronicles 22:10	va'atalyahu 'em 'akhazyahu ra'atah ki met benah vataqam vatedaber 'et kal zera' hamamlakhah lebet yehudah. 2_chronicles 22:11	vatiqakh yehoshab'at bat hamelekh 'et yo'ash ben 'akhazyahu vatignob 'oto mitokh benei hamelekh hamumatim vatiten 'oto ve'et meiniqto bakhadar hamitot vatastireihu yehoshab'at bat hamelekh yehoram 'eishet yehoyada' hakohen ki hi hayetah 'akhot 'akhazyahu mipenei 'atalyahu velo hemitatehu. 2_chronicles 22:12	vayhi 'itam bebet ha'elohim mitkhabei shesh shanim va'atalyah molekhet 'al ha'arez. 2_chronicles 23:1	ubashanah hashebi'it hitkhazaq yehoyada' vayiqakh 'et sarei hamei'ot la'azaryahu ben yerokham uleyishma'el ben yehokhanan vela'azaryahu ben 'obed ve'et ma'aseiyahu ben 'adayahu ve'et 'elishafat ben zikhri 'imo baberit. 2_chronicles 23:2	vayasobu bihudah vayiqbezu 'et halviyim mikal 'arei yehudah verashei ha'abot leyisra'el vayabo'u 'el yerushalim. 2_chronicles 23:3	vayikhrot kal haqahal berit bebet ha'elohim 'im hamelekh vayomer lahem hineh ben hamelekh yimlokh ka'asher diber yhvh 'al benei david. 2_chronicles 23:4	zeh hadabar 'asher ta'asu hashelishit mikem ba'ei hashabat lakohanim velalviyim lesho'arei hasipim. 2_chronicles 23:5	vehashelishit bebet hamelekh vehashelishit besha'ar haysod vekhal ha'am bekhazrot bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 23:6	ve'al yabo bet yhvh ki 'im hakohanim vehamsharetim lalviyim hemah yabo'u ki qodesh hemah vekhal ha'am yishmeru mishmeret yhvh. 2_chronicles 23:7	vehiqifu halviyim 'et hamelekh sabib 'ish vekheilav beyado vehaba 'el habayit yumat vihyu 'et hamelekh bebo'o ubezeito. 2_chronicles 23:8	vaya'asu halviyim vekhal yehudah kekhol 'asher zivah yehoyada' hakohen vayiqkhu 'ish 'et 'anashav ba'ei hashabat 'im yoz'ei hashabat ki lo fatar yehoyada' hakohen 'et hamakhleqot. 2_chronicles 23:9	vayiten yehoyada' hakohen lesarei hamei'ot 'et hakhanitim ve'et hamaginot ve'et hashelatim 'asher lamelekh david 'asher bet ha'elohim. 2_chronicles 23:10	vaya'amed 'et kal ha'am ve'ish shilkho beyado miketef habayit haymanit 'ad ketef habayit hasemalit lamizbeiakh velabayit 'al hamelekh sabib. 2_chronicles 23:11	vayozi'u 'et ben hamelekh vayitenu 'alav 'et haneizer ve'et ha'eidut vayamlikhu 'oto vayimshakhuhu yehoyada' ubanav vayomeru yekhi hamelekh. 2_chronicles 23:12	vatishma' 'atalyahu 'et qol ha'am harazim vehamhalim 'et hamelekh vatabo 'el ha'am bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 23:13	vateire vehineh hamelekh 'omed 'al 'amudo bamabo vehasarim vehakhazozerot 'al hamelekh vekhal 'am ha'arez sameiakh vetoqeia' bakhazozerot vehamshorarim bikhlei hashir umodi'im lehalel vatiqra' 'atalyahu 'et begadeha vatomer qesher qasher. 2_chronicles 23:14	vayozei yehoyada' hakohen 'et sarei hamei'ot pequdei hakhayil vayomer 'aleihem hozi'uha 'el mibet hasedeirot vehaba 'akhareha yumat bekhareb ki 'amar hakohen lo temituha bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 23:15	vayasimu lah yadayim vatabo 'el mebo sha'ar hasusim bet hamelekh vaymituha sham. 2_chronicles 23:16	vayikhrot yehoyada' berit beino uben kal ha'am uben hamelekh lihyot le'am yhvh.
