2_chronicles 23:17	vayabo'u khal ha'am bet haba'al vayitezuhu ve'et mizbekhotav ve'et zelamav shibeiru ve'et matan kohen haba'al haregu lifnei hamizbekhot. 2_chronicles 23:18	vayasem yehoyada' pequdot bet yhvh beyad hakohanim halviyim 'asher khalaq david 'al bet yhvh leha'alot 'olot yhvh kakatub betorat mosheh besimkhah ubeshir 'al yedei david. 2_chronicles 23:19	vaya'amed hasho'arim 'al sha'arei bet yhvh velo yabo tamei lekhal dabar. 2_chronicles 23:20	vayiqakh 'et sarei hamei'ot ve'et ha'adirim ve'et hamoshelim ba'am ve'et kal 'am ha'arez vayored 'et hamelekh mibet yhvh vayabo'u betokh sha'ar ha'elyon bet hamelekh vayoshibu 'et hamelekh 'al kisei hamamlakhah. 2_chronicles 23:21	vayismekhu khal 'am ha'arez veha'ir shaqatah ve'et 'atalyahu heimitu bekhareb. 2_chronicles 24:1	ben sheba' shanim yo'ash bemalekho ve'arba'im shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo zibyah mibe'er shaba'. 2_chronicles 24:2	vaya'as yo'ash hayashar be'einei yhvh kal yemei yehoyada' hakohen. 2_chronicles 24:3	vayisa lo yehoyada' nashim shetayim vayoled banim ubanot. 2_chronicles 24:4	vayhi 'akhareikhen hayah 'im leb yo'ash lekhadesh 'et bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 24:5	vayiqboz 'et hakohanim vehalviyim vayomer lahem ze'u le'arei yehudah veqibzu mikal yisra'el kesef lekhazeq 'et bet 'eloheikhem midei shanah beshanah ve'atem temaharu ladabar velo miharu halviyim. 2_chronicles 24:6	vayiqra hamelekh lihoyada' harosh vayomer lo madua' lo darashta 'al halviyim lehabi mihudah umirushalim 'et mas'at mosheh 'ebed yhvh vehaqahal leyisra'el le'ohel ha'eidut. 2_chronicles 24:7	ki 'atalyahu hamirsha'at baneha farezu 'et bet ha'elohim vegam kal qadeshei bet yhvh 'asu labe'alim. 2_chronicles 24:8	vayomer hamelekh vaya'asu 'aron 'ekhad vayitenuhu besha'ar bet yhvh khuzah. 2_chronicles 24:9	vayitenu qol bihudah ubirushalim lehabi yhvh mas'at mosheh 'ebed ha'elohim 'al yisra'el bamidbar. 2_chronicles 24:10	vayismekhu khal hasarim vekhal ha'am vayabi'u vayashlikhu la'aron 'ad lekhaleh. 2_chronicles 24:11	vayhi be'et yabi 'et ha'aron 'el pequdat hamelekh beyad halviyim vekhir'otam ki rab hakesef uba sofer hamelekh ufeqid kohen harosh vi'aru 'et ha'aron veyisa'uhu vishibuhu 'el meqomo koh 'asu leyom beyom vaya'asfu khesef larob. 2_chronicles 24:12	vayiteneihu hamelekh vihoyada' 'el 'oseh melekhet 'abodat bet yhvh vayihyu sokherim khozebim vekharashim lekhadesh bet yhvh vegam lekharashei barzel unekhoshet lekhazeq 'et bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 24:13	vaya'asu 'osei hamelakhah vata'al 'arukhah lamelakhah beyadam vaya'amidu 'et bet ha'elohim 'al matkunto vai'amezuhu. 2_chronicles 24:14	ukhekhalotam heibi'u lifnei hamelekh vihoyada' 'et she'ar hakesef vaya'aseihu kheilim lebet yhvh kelei sharet veha'alot vekhapot ukhelei zahab vakhasef vayihyu ma'alim 'olot bebet yhvh tamid kol yemei yehoyada'. 2_chronicles 24:15	vayizqan yehoyada' vayisba' yamim vayamot ben mei'ah usheloshim shanah bemoto. 2_chronicles 24:16	vayiqberuhu be'ir david 'im hamelakhim ki 'asah tobah beyisra'el ve'im ha'elohim ubeito. 2_chronicles 24:17	ve'akharei mot yehoyada' ba'u sarei yehudah vayishtakhavu lamelekh 'az shama' hamelekh 'aleihem. 2_chronicles 24:18	vaya'azbu 'et bet yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem vaya'abdu 'et ha'asheirim ve'et ha'azabim vayhi qezef 'al yehudah virushalim be'ashmatam zot. 2_chronicles 24:19	vayishlakh bahem nebi'im lahashibam 'el yhvh vaya'idu bam velo he'ezinu. 2_chronicles 24:20	veruakh 'elohim labeshah 'et zekharyah ben yehoyada' hakohen vaya'amod mei'al la'am vayomer lahem koh 'amar ha'elohim lamah 'atem 'oberim 'et mizvot yhvh velo tazlikhu ki 'azabtem 'et yhvh vaya'azob 'etkhem. 2_chronicles 24:21	vayiqsheru 'alav vayirgemuhu 'eben bemizvat hamelekh bakhazar bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 24:22	velo zakhar yo'ash hamelekh hakhesed 'asher 'asah yehoyada' 'abiv 'imo vayaharog 'et beno ukhemoto 'amar yeire yhvh veyidrosh. 2_chronicles 24:23	vayhi litqufat hashanah 'alah 'alav khel 'aram vayabo'u 'el yehudah virushalim vayashkhitu 'et kal sarei ha'am mei'am vekhal shelalam shilekhu lemelekh darmaseq. 2_chronicles 24:24	ki bemiz'ar 'anashim ba'u khel 'aram yhvh natan beyadam khayil larob me'od ki 'azebu 'et yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem ve'et yo'ash 'asu shefatim. 2_chronicles 24:25	ubelekhtam mimenu ki 'azebu 'oto bemakhaliyim bemakhaluyim rabim hitqasheru 'alav 'abadav bidmei benei yehoyada' hakohen vayaharguhu 'al mitato vayamot vayiqberuhu be'ir david velo qebaruhu beqibrot hamelakhim. 2_chronicles 24:26	ve'eleh hamitqasherim 'alav zabad ben shim'at ha'amonit vihozabad ben shimrit hamo'abit. 2_chronicles 24:27	ubanav verob yireb hamasa 'alav visod bet ha'elohim hinam ketubim 'al midrash seifer hamelakhim vayimlokh 'amazyahu beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 25:1	ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah malakh 'amazyahu ve'esrim vateisha' shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yeho'adan mirushalayim. 2_chronicles 25:2	vaya'as hayashar be'einei yhvh raq lo beleibab shalem. 2_chronicles 25:3	vayhi ka'asher khazeqah hamamlakhah 'alav vayaharog 'et 'abadav hamakim 'et hamelekh 'abiv. 2_chronicles 25:4	ve'et beneihem lo heimit ki khakatub batorah beseifer mosheh 'asher zivah yhvh leimor lo yamutu 'abot 'al banim ubanim lo yamutu 'al 'abot ki 'ish bekhet'o yamutu. 2_chronicles 25:5	vayiqboz 'amazyahu 'et yehudah vaya'amidem lebet 'abot lesarei ha'alafim ulesarei hamei'ot lekhal yehudah ubinyamin vayifqedem lemiben 'esrim shanah vama'lah vayimza'em shelosh mei'ot 'elef bakhur yozei zaba 'okhez romakh vezinah. 2_chronicles 25:6	vayiskor miyisra'el mei'ah 'elef gibor khayil bemei'ah khikar kasef. 2_chronicles 25:7	ve'ish ha'elohim ba 'eilav leimor hamelekh 'al yabo 'imekha zeba yisra'el ki 'en yhvh 'im yisra'el kol benei 'efrayim. 2_chronicles 25:8	ki 'im bo 'atah 'aseh khazaq lamilkhamah yakhshilekha ha'elohim lifnei 'oyeb ki yesh koakh beilohim la'zor ulehakhshil. 2_chronicles 25:9	vayomer 'amazyahu le'ish ha'elohim umah la'asot lim'at hakikar 'asher natati ligdud yisra'el vayomer 'ish ha'elohim yesh yhvh latet lekha harbeh mizeh. 2_chronicles 25:10	vayabdilem 'amazyahu lehagedud 'asher ba 'eilav mei'efrayim lalekhet limqomam vayikhar 'apam me'od bihudah vayashubu limqomam bakhori 'af. 2_chronicles 25:11	va'amazyahu hitkhazaq vayinhag 'et 'amo vayeilekh gei hamelakh vayakh 'et benei sei'ir 'aseret 'alafim. 2_chronicles 25:12	va'aseret 'alafim khayim shabu benei yehudah vaybi'um lerosh hasala' vayashlikhum meirosh hasela' vekhulam nibqa'u. 2_chronicles 25:13	ubenei hagedud 'asher heishib 'amazyahu milekhet 'imo lamilkhamah vayifshetu be'arei yehudah mishomeron ve'ad bet khoron vayaku meihem sheloshet 'alafim vayabozu bizah rabah. 2_chronicles 25:14	vayhi 'akharei bo 'amazyahu meihakot 'et 'adomim vayabei 'et 'elohei benei sei'ir vaya'amidem lo leilohim velifneihem yishtakhaveh velahem yeqater. 2_chronicles 25:15	vayikhar 'af yhvh ba'amazyahu vayishlakh 'eilav nabi vayomer lo lamah darashta 'et 'elohei ha'am 'asher lo hizilu 'et 'amam miyadekha. 2_chronicles 25:16	vayhi bedabero 'eilav vayomer lo halyo'ez lamelekh netanukha khadal lekha lamah yakukha vayekhdal hanabi vayomer yada'ti ki ya'az 'elohim lehashkhitekha ki 'asita zot velo shama'ta la'azati. 2_chronicles 25:17	vayiva'az 'amazyahu melekh yehudah vayishlakh 'el yo'ash ben yeho'akhaz ben yeihu melekh yisra'el leimor lekha lekhah nitra'eh fanim. 2_chronicles 25:18	vayishlakh yo'ash melekh yisra'el 'el 'amazyahu melekh yehudah leimor hakhoakh 'asher balebanon lakh 'el ha'erez 'asher balebanon leimor tenah 'et bitekha libni le'ishah vata'abor khayat hasadeh 'asher balebanon vatirmos 'et hakhoakh. 2_chronicles 25:19	'amarta hineh hikita 'et 'edom unesa'akha libekha lehakhbid 'atah shebah bebeitekha lamah titgareh bera'ah venafalta 'atah vihudah 'imakh. 2_chronicles 25:20	velo shama' 'amazyahu ki meiha'elohim hi lema'an titam beyad ki dareshu 'et 'elohei 'edom. 2_chronicles 25:21	vaya'al yo'ash melekh yisra'el vayitra'u fanim hu va'amazyahu melekh yehudah bebet shemesh 'asher lihudah. 2_chronicles 25:22	vayinagef yehudah lifnei yisra'el vayanusu 'ish le'ohalav. 2_chronicles 25:23	ve'et 'amazyahu melekh yehudah ben yo'ash ben yeho'akhaz tafas yo'ash melekh yisra'el bebet shamesh vaybi'eihu yerushalim vayifroz bekhomat yerushalim misha'ar 'efrayim 'ad sha'ar haponeh 'arba' mei'ot 'amah. 2_chronicles 25:24	vekhal hazahab vehakesef ve'et kal hakeilim hanimze'im bebet ha'elohim 'im 'obed 'edom ve'et 'ozerot bet hamelekh ve'et benei hata'arubot vayashab shomeron. 2_chronicles 25:25	vaykhi 'amazyahu ben yo'ash melekh yehudah 'akharei mot yo'ash ben yeho'akhaz melekh yisra'el khamesh 'esreh shanah. 2_chronicles 25:26	veyeter dibrei 'amazyahu harishonim veha'akharonim halo hinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra'el. 2_chronicles 25:27	umei'et 'asher sar 'amazyahu mei'akharei yhvh vayiqsheru 'alav qesher birushalim vayanas lakhishah vayishlekhu 'akharav lakhishah vaymituhu sham. 2_chronicles 25:28	vayisa'uhu 'al hasusim vayiqberu 'oto 'im 'abotav be'ir yehudah. 2_chronicles 26:1	vayiqkhu kal 'am yehudah 'et 'uziyahu vehu ben shesh 'esreh shanah vayamlikhu 'oto takhat 'abiv 'amazyahu. 2_chronicles 26:2	hu banah 'et 'eilot vayshibeha lihudah 'akharei shekhab hamelekh 'im 'abotav. 2_chronicles 26:3	ben shesh 'esreh shanah 'uziyahu bemalekho vakhamishim ushetayim shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yekhileyah yekhaleyah min yerushalim. 2_chronicles 26:4	vaya'as hayashar be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asah 'amazyahu 'abiv. 2_chronicles 26:5	vayhi lidrosh 'elohim bimei zekharyahu hameibin bir'ot ha'elohim ubimei daresho 'et yhvh hizlikho ha'elohim. 2_chronicles 26:6	vayeizei vayilakhem bapelishtim vayifroz 'et khomat gat ve'et khomat yabneh ve'et khomat 'ashdod vayibneh 'arim be'ashdod ubapelishtim. 2_chronicles 26:7	vaya'zereihu ha'elohim 'al pelishtim ve'al ha'arbiyim ha'arbim hayoshebim begur ba'al vehame'unim. 2_chronicles 26:8	vayitenu ha'amonim minkhah le'uziyahu vayeilekh shemo 'ad lebo mizrayim ki hekheziq 'ad lema'elah. 2_chronicles 26:9	vayiben 'uziyahu migdalim birushalim 'al sha'ar hapinah ve'al sha'ar hagai ve'al hamiqzoa' vaykhazeqem. 2_chronicles 26:10	vayiben migdalim bamidbar vayakhzob borot rabim ki miqneh rab hayah lo ubashefeilah ubamishor 'ikarim vekhoremim beharim ubakarmel ki 'oheb 'adamah hayah. 2_chronicles 26:11	vayhi le'uziyahu khayil 'oseh milkhamah yoz'ei zaba ligdud bemispar pequdatam beyad ye'u'el ye'i'el hasofer uma'aseiyahu hashoter 'al yad khananyahu misarei hamelekh. 2_chronicles 26:12	kol mispar rashei ha'abot legiborei khayil 'alpayim veshesh mei'ot. 2_chronicles 26:13	ve'al yadam khel zaba shelosh mei'ot 'elef veshib'at 'alafim vakhamesh mei'ot 'osei milkhamah bekhoakh khayil la'zor lamelekh 'al ha'oyeb. 2_chronicles 26:14	vayakhen lahem 'uziyahu lekhal hazaba maginim uremakhim vekhoba'im veshiryonot uqeshatot ule'abnei qela'im. 2_chronicles 26:15	vaya'as birushalim khishebonot makhashebet khosheb lihyot 'al hamigdalim ve'al hapinot liro bakhizim uba'abanim gedolot vayeizei shemo 'ad lemeirakhoq ki hifli lehei'azer 'ad ki khazaq. 2_chronicles 26:16	ukhekhezqato gabah libo 'ad lehashkhit vayim'al yhvh 'elohav vayabo 'el heikhal yhvh lehaqtir 'al mizbakh haqetoret. 2_chronicles 26:17	vayabo 'akharav 'azaryahu hakohen ve'imo kohanim yhvh shemonim benei khayil. 2_chronicles 26:18	vaya'amdu 'al 'uziyahu hamelekh vayomeru lo lo lekha 'uziyahu lehaqtir yhvh ki lakohanim benei 'aharon hamqudashim lehaqtir zei min hamiqdash ki ma'alta velo lekha lekhabod yhvh 'elohim. 2_chronicles 26:19	vayiz'af 'uziyahu ubeyado miqteret lehaqtir ubeza'po 'im hakohanim vehazara'at zarekhah bemizkho lifnei hakohanim bebet yhvh mei'al lemizbakh haqetoret. 2_chronicles 26:20	vayifen 'eilav 'azaryahu khohen harosh vekhal hakohanim vehineh hu mezora' bemizkho vayabhiluhu misham vegam hu nidkhaf lazet ki nige'o yhvh. 2_chronicles 26:21	vayhi 'uziyahu hamelekh mezora' 'ad yom moto vayeisheb bet hakhafeshut hakhafeshit mezora' ki nigzar mibet yhvh veyotam beno 'al bet hamelekh shofet 'et 'am ha'arez. 2_chronicles 26:22	veyeter dibrei 'uziyahu harishonim veha'akharonim katab yesha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi. 2_chronicles 26:23	vayishkab 'uziyahu 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto 'im 'abotav bisdeh haqeburah 'asher lamelakhim ki 'ameru mezora' hu vayimlokh yotam beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 27:1	ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah yotam bemalekho veshesh 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo yerushah bat zadoq. 2_chronicles 27:2	vaya'as hayashar be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asah 'uziyahu 'abiv raq lo ba 'el heikhal yhvh ve'od ha'am mashkhitim. 2_chronicles 27:3	hu banah 'et sha'ar bet yhvh ha'elyon ubekhomat ha'ofel banah larob. 2_chronicles 27:4	ve'arim banah behar yehudah ubekhorashim banah biraniyot umigdalim. 2_chronicles 27:5	vehu nilkham 'im melekh benei 'amon vayekhezaq 'aleihem vayitenu lo benei 'amon bashanah hahi mei'ah kikar kesef va'aseret 'alafim korim khitim use'orim 'aseret 'alafim zot heishibu lo benei 'amon ubashanah hasheinit vehashelishit. 2_chronicles 27:6	vayitkhazeq yotam ki heikhin derakhav lifnei yhvh 'elohav. 2_chronicles 27:7	veyeter dibrei yotam vekhal milkhamotav uderakhav hinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yisra'el vihudah. 2_chronicles 27:8	ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah hayah bemalekho veshesh 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim. 2_chronicles 27:9	vayishkab yotam 'im 'abotav vayiqberu 'oto be'ir david vayimlokh 'akhaz beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 28:1	ben 'esrim shanah 'akhaz bemalekho veshesh 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim velo 'asah hayashar be'einei yhvh kedavid 'abiv. 2_chronicles 28:2	vayeilekh bedarkhei malkhei yisra'el vegam maseikhot 'asah labe'alim. 2_chronicles 28:3	vehu hiqtir begei ben hinom vayab'er 'et banav ba'esh keto'abot hagoyim 'asher horish hashem mipenei benei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 28:4	vayzabeiakh vayqater babamot ve'al hageba'ot vetakhat kal 'ez ra'anan. 2_chronicles 28:5	vayiteneihu yhvh 'elohav beyad melekh 'aram vayaku bo vayishbu mimenu shibyah gedolah vayabi'u darmaseq vegam beyad melekh yisra'el nitan vayakh bo makah gedolah. 2_chronicles 28:6	vayaharog peqakh ben remalyahu bihudah mei'ah ve'esrim 'elef beyom 'ekhad hakol benei khayil be'azebam 'et yhvh 'elohei 'abotam. 2_chronicles 28:7	vayaharog zikhri gibor 'efrayim 'et ma'aseiyahu ben hamelekh ve'et 'azriqam negid habayit ve'et 'elqanah mishneh hamelekh. 2_chronicles 28:8	vayishbu benei yisra'el mei'akheihem matayim 'elef nashim banim ubanot vegam shalal rab bazezu meihem vayabi'u 'et hashalal leshomeron. 2_chronicles 28:9	vesham hayah nabi yhvh 'oded shemo vayeizei lifnei hazaba haba leshomeron vayomer lahem hineh bakhamat yhvh 'elohei 'aboteikhem 'al yehudah netanam beyedkhem vatahargu bam beza'af 'ad lashamayim higia'. 2_chronicles 28:10	ve'atah benei yehudah virushalim 'atem 'omerim likhbosh la'abadim velishfakhot lakhem halo raq 'atem 'imakhem 'ashamot yhvh 'eloheikhem. 2_chronicles 28:11	ve'atah shema'uni vehashibu hashibyah 'asher shebitem mei'akheikhem ki kharon 'af yhvh 'aleikhem. 2_chronicles 28:12	vayaqumu 'anashim meirashei benei 'efrayim 'azaryahu ben yehokhanan berekhyahu ben meshileimot vikhizqiyahu ben shalum va'amasa ben khadlai 'al haba'im min hazaba. 2_chronicles 28:13	vayomeru lahem lo tabi'u 'et hashibyah henah ki le'ashmat yhvh 'aleinu 'atem 'omerim lehosif 'al khatoteinu ve'al 'ashmateinu ki rabah 'ashmah lanu vakharon 'af 'al yisra'el. 2_chronicles 28:14	vaya'azob hekhaluz 'et hashibyah ve'et habizah lifnei hasarim vekhal haqahal. 2_chronicles 28:15	vayaqumu ha'anashim 'asher niqebu besheimot vayakhaziqu bashibyah vekhal ma'arumeihem hilbishu min hashalal vayalbishum vayan'ilum vaya'akhilum vayashqum vaysukhum vaynahalum bakhamorim lekhal koshel vaybi'um yereikho 'ir hatemarim 'eizel 'akheihem vayashubu shomeron. 2_chronicles 28:16	ba'et hahi shalakh hamelekh 'akhaz 'al malkhei 'ashur la'zor lo. 2_chronicles 28:17	ve'od 'adomim ba'u vayaku bihudah vayishbu shebi. 2_chronicles 28:18	ufelishtim pashetu be'arei hashefeilah vehanegeb lihudah vayilkedu 'et bet shemesh ve'et 'ayalon ve'et hagedeirot ve'et sokho ubenoteha ve'et timnah ubenoteha ve'et gimzo ve'et benoteha vayeishebu sham. 2_chronicles 28:19	ki hikhnia' yhvh 'et yehudah ba'abur 'akhaz melekh yisra'el ki hifria' bihudah uma'ol ma'al yhvh. 2_chronicles 28:20	vayabo 'alav tilegat pilne'eser melekh 'ashur vayazar lo velo khazaqo. 2_chronicles 28:21	ki khalaq 'akhaz 'et bet yhvh ve'et bet hamelekh vehasarim vayiten lemelekh 'ashur velo le'ezrah lo. 2_chronicles 28:22	ube'et hazer lo vayosef lim'ol yhvh hu hamelekh 'akhaz. 2_chronicles 28:23	vayizbakh leilohei darmeseq hamakim bo vayomer ki 'elohei malkhei 'aram hem ma'zerim 'otam lahem 'azabeiakh veya'zeruni vehem hayu lo lehakhshilo ulekhal yisra'el. 2_chronicles 28:24	vaye'esof 'akhaz 'et kelei bet ha'elohim vayqazez 'et kelei bet ha'elohim vayisgor 'et daltot bet yhvh vaya'as lo mizbekhot bekhal pinah birushalim. 2_chronicles 28:25	ubekhal 'ir va'ir lihudah 'asah bamot leqater leilohim 'akheirim vayakh'es 'et yhvh 'elohei 'abotav. 2_chronicles 28:26	veyeter debarav vekhal derakhav harishonim veha'akharonim hinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra'el. 2_chronicles 28:27	vayishkab 'akhaz 'im 'abotav vayiqberuhu ba'ir birushalim ki lo hebi'uhu leqibrei malkhei yisra'el vayimlokh yekhizqiyahu beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 29:1	yekhizqiyahu malakh ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah ve'esrim vateisha' shanah malakh birushalim veshem 'imo 'abiyah bat zekharyahu. 2_chronicles 29:2	vaya'as hayashar be'einei yhvh kekhol 'asher 'asah david 'abiv. 2_chronicles 29:3	hu bashanah harishonah lemalekho bakhodesh harishon patakh 'et daltot bet yhvh vaykhazeqem. 2_chronicles 29:4	vayabei 'et hakohanim ve'et halviyim vaya'asfem lirkhob hamizrakh. 2_chronicles 29:5	vayomer lahem shema'uni halviyim 'atah hitqadeshu veqadeshu 'et bet yhvh 'elohei 'aboteikhem vehozi'u 'et hanidah min haqodesh. 2_chronicles 29:6	ki ma'alu 'aboteinu ve'asu hara' be'einei yhvh 'eloheinu vaya'azbuhu vayasebu feneihem mimishkan yhvh vayitenu 'oref. 2_chronicles 29:7	gam sageru daltot ha'ulam vaykhabu 'et haneirot uqetoret lo hiqtiru ve'olah lo he'elu baqodesh leilohei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 29:8	vayhi qezef yhvh 'al yehudah virushalim vayitenem lizva'ah leza'avah leshamah velishreiqah ka'asher 'atem ro'im be'eineikhem. 2_chronicles 29:9	vehineh nafelu 'aboteinu bekhareb ubaneinu ubenoteinu venasheinu bashebi 'al zot. 2_chronicles 29:10	'atah 'im lebabi likhrot berit yhvh 'elohei yisra'el veyashob mimenu kharon 'apo. 2_chronicles 29:11	banai 'atah 'al tishalu ki bakhem bakhar yhvh la'amod lefanav leshareto velihyot lo mesharetim umaqtirim. 2_chronicles 29:12	vayaqumu halviyim makhat ben 'amasai veyo'el ben 'azaryahu min benei haqehati umin benei merari qish ben 'abdi va'azaryahu ben yehalel'el umin hageireshuni yo'akh ben zimah ve'eiden ben yo'akh. 2_chronicles 29:13	umin benei 'elizafan shimri vi'u'el vi'i'el umin benei 'asaf zekharyahu umatanyahu. 2_chronicles 29:14	umin benei heiman yekhu'el yekhi'el veshim'i umin benei yedutun shema'yah ve'uzi'el. 2_chronicles 29:15	vaya'asfu 'et 'akheihem vayitqadeshu vayabo'u khemizvat hamelekh bedibrei yhvh letaher bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 29:16	vayabo'u hakohanim lifnimah bet yhvh letaher vayozi'u 'et kal hatum'ah 'asher maze'u beheikhal yhvh lakhazar bet yhvh vayqabelu halviyim lehozi lenakhal qidron khuzah. 2_chronicles 29:17	vayakhelu be'ekhad lakhodesh harishon leqadesh ubeyom shemonah lakhodesh ba'u le'ulam yhvh vayqadeshu 'et bet yhvh leyamim shemonah ubeyom shishah 'asar lakhodesh harishon kilu. 2_chronicles 29:18	vayabo'u fenimah 'el khizqiyahu hamelekh vayomeru tiharnu 'et kal bet yhvh 'et mizbakh ha'olah ve'et kal keilav ve'et shulkhan hama'arekhet ve'et kal keilav. 2_chronicles 29:19	ve'et kal hakeilim 'asher hizniakh hamelekh 'akhaz bemalkhuto bema'alo heikhanu vehiqdashenu vehinam lifnei mizbakh yhvh. 2_chronicles 29:20	vayashkem yekhizqiyahu hamelekh vaye'esof 'et sarei ha'ir vaya'al bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 29:21	vayabi'u farim shib'ah ve'eilim shib'ah ukhebasim shib'ah uzefirei 'izim shib'ah lekhatat 'al hamamlakhah ve'al hamiqdash ve'al yehudah vayomer libnei 'aharon hakohanim leha'alot 'al mizbakh yhvh. 2_chronicles 29:22	vayishkhatu habaqar vayqabelu hakohanim 'et hadam vayizrequ hamizbeikhah vayishkhatu ha'eilim vayizrequ hadam hamizbeikhah vayishkhatu hakebasim vayizrequ hadam hamizbeikhah. 2_chronicles 29:23	vayagishu 'et se'irei hakhatat lifnei hamelekh vehaqahal vayismekhu yedeihem 'aleihem. 2_chronicles 29:24	vayishkhatum hakohanim vaykhate'u 'et damam hamizbeikhah lekhaper 'al kal yisra'el ki lekhal yisra'el 'amar hamelekh ha'olah vehakhatat. 2_chronicles 29:25	vaya'amed 'et halviyim bet yhvh bimziltayim binbalim ubekhinorot bemizvat david vegad khozeh hamelekh venatan hanabi ki beyad yhvh hamizvah beyad nebi'av. 2_chronicles 29:26	vaya'amdu halviyim bikhlei david vehakohanim bakhazozerot. 2_chronicles 29:27	vayomer khizqiyahu leha'alot ha'olah lehamizbeiakh ube'et heikhel ha'olah heikhel shir yhvh vehakhazozerot ve'al yedei kelei david melekh yisra'el. 2_chronicles 29:28	vekhal haqahal mishtakhavim vehashir meshorer vehakhazozerot makhazozerim makhzerim hakol 'ad likhlot ha'olah. 2_chronicles 29:29	ukhekhalot leha'alot kare'u hamelekh vekhal hanimze'im 'ito vayishtakhavu. 2_chronicles 29:30	vayomer yekhizqiyahu hamelekh vehasarim lalviyim lehalel yhvh bedibrei david ve'asaf hakhozeh vayhalu 'ad lesimkhah vayiqedu vayishtakhavu. 2_chronicles 29:31	vaya'an yekhizqiyahu vayomer 'atah mileitem yedkhem yhvh goshu vehabi'u zebakhim vetodot lebet yhvh vayabi'u haqahal zebakhim vetodot vekhal nedib leb 'olot. 2_chronicles 29:32	vayhi mispar ha'olah 'asher heibi'u haqahal baqar shib'im 'eilim mei'ah kebasim matayim le'olah yhvh kal 'eleh. 2_chronicles 29:33	vehaqodashim baqar shesh mei'ot vezon sheloshet 'alafim. 2_chronicles 29:34	raq hakohanim hayu lim'at velo yakhelu lehafshit 'et kal ha'olot vayekhazequm 'akheihem halviyim 'ad kelot hamelakhah ve'ad yitqadeshu hakohanim ki halviyim yishrei leibab lehitqadesh meihakohanim. 2_chronicles 29:35	vegam 'olah larob bekhelbei hashelamim ubanesakhim la'olah vatikon 'abodat bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 29:36	vayismakh yekhizqiyahu vekhal ha'am 'al haheikhin ha'elohim la'am ki befit'om hayah hadabar. 2_chronicles 30:1	vayishlakh yekhizqiyahu 'al kal yisra'el vihudah vegam 'igerot katab 'al 'efrayim umenasheh labo lebet yhvh birushalim la'asot pesakh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 30:2	vayiva'az hamelekh vesarav vekhal haqahal birushalim la'asot hapesakh bakhodesh hasheini. 2_chronicles 30:3	ki lo yakhelu la'asoto ba'et hahi ki hakohanim lo hitqadeshu lemadai veha'am lo ne'esfu lirushalim. 2_chronicles 30:4	vayishar hadabar be'einei hamelekh ube'einei kal haqahal. 2_chronicles 30:5	vaya'amidu dabar leha'abir qol bekhal yisra'el mibe'er sheba' ve'ad dan labo la'asot pesakh yhvh 'elohei yisra'el birushalim ki lo larob 'asu kakatub. 2_chronicles 30:6	vayeilekhu harazim ba'igerot miyad hamelekh vesarav bekhal yisra'el vihudah ukhemizvat hamelekh leimor benei yisra'el shubu 'el yhvh 'elohei 'abraham yizkhaq veyisra'el veyashob 'el hapeleitah hanish'eret lakhem mikaf malkhei 'ashur. 2_chronicles 30:7	ve'al tihyu ka'aboteikhem vekha'akheikhem 'asher ma'alu yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem vayitenem leshamah ka'asher 'atem ro'im. 2_chronicles 30:8	'atah 'al taqshu 'arepekhem ka'aboteikhem tenu yad yhvh ubo'u lemiqdasho 'asher hiqdish le'olam ve'ibdu 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem veyashob mikem kharon 'apo. 2_chronicles 30:9	ki beshubekhem 'al yhvh 'akheikhem ubeneikhem lerakhamim lifnei shobeihem velashub la'arez hazot ki khanun verakhum yhvh 'eloheikhem velo yasir panim mikem 'im tashubu 'eilav. 2_chronicles 30:10	vayihyu harazim 'oberim mei'ir la'ir be'erez 'efrayim umenasheh ve'ad zebulun vayihyu maskhiqim 'aleihem umal'igim bam. 2_chronicles 30:11	'akh 'anashim mei'asher umenasheh umizebulun nikhne'u vayabo'u lirushalim. 2_chronicles 30:12	gam bihudah hayetah yad ha'elohim latet lahem leb 'ekhad la'asot mizvat hamelekh vehasarim bidbar yhvh. 2_chronicles 30:13	vayei'asefu yerushalim 'am rab la'asot 'et khag hamazot bakhodesh hasheini qahal larob me'od. 2_chronicles 30:14	vayaqumu vayasiru 'et hamizbekhot 'asher birushalim ve'et kal hamqaterot heisiru vayashlikhu lenakhal qidron. 2_chronicles 30:15	vayishkhatu hapesakh be'arba'ah 'asar lakhodesh hasheini vehakohanim vehalviyim nikhlemu vayitqadeshu vayabi'u 'olot bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 30:16	vaya'amdu 'al 'amedam kemishpatam ketorat mosheh 'ish ha'elohim hakohanim zoreqim 'et hadam miyad halviyim. 2_chronicles 30:17	ki rabat baqahal 'asher lo hitqadashu vehalviyim 'al shekhitat hapesakhim lekhol lo tahor lehaqdish yhvh. 2_chronicles 30:18	ki marbit ha'am rabat mei'efrayim umenasheh yisashkhar uzebulun lo hiteharu ki 'akhelu 'et hapesakh belo khakatub ki hitpalel yekhizqiyahu 'aleihem leimor yhvh hatob yekhaper be'ad. 2_chronicles 30:19	kal lebabo heikhin lidrosh ha'elohim yhvh 'elohei 'abotav velo ketahorat haqodesh. 2_chronicles 30:20	vayishma' yhvh 'el yekhizqiyahu vayirpa 'et ha'am. 2_chronicles 30:21	vaya'asu benei yisra'el hanimze'im birushalim 'et khag hamazot shib'at yamim besimkhah gedolah umehalim yhvh yom beyom halviyim vehakohanim bikhlei 'oz yhvh. 2_chronicles 30:22	vaydaber yekhizqiyahu 'al leb kal halviyim hamaskilim seikhel tob yhvh vayokhelu 'et hamo'ed shib'at hayamim mezabekhim zibkhei shelamim umitvadim yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem. 2_chronicles 30:23	vayiva'azu kal haqahal la'asot shib'at yamim 'akheirim vaya'asu shib'at yamim simkhah. 2_chronicles 30:24	ki khizqiyahu melekh yehudah heirim laqahal 'elef parim veshib'at 'alafim zon vehasarim heirimu laqahal parim 'elef vezon 'aseret 'alafim vayitqadeshu khohanim larob. 2_chronicles 30:25	vayismekhu kal qehal yehudah vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal haqahal haba'im miyisra'el vehageirim haba'im mei'erez yisra'el vehayoshebim bihudah. 2_chronicles 30:26	vatehi simkhah gedolah birushalim ki mimei shelomoh ben david melekh yisra'el lo khazot birushalim. 2_chronicles 30:27	vayaqumu hakohanim halviyim vaybarakhu 'et ha'am vayishama' beqolam vatabo tefilatam lim'on qadesho lashamayim. 2_chronicles 31:1	ukhekhalot kal zot yaze'u kal yisra'el hanimze'im le'arei yehudah vayshaberu hamazeibot vaygade'u ha'asheirim vaynatezu 'et habamot ve'et hamizbekhot mikal yehudah ubinyamin ube'efrayim umenasheh 'ad lekhaleh vayashubu kal benei yisra'el 'ish la'akhuzato le'areihem. 2_chronicles 31:2	vaya'amed yekhizqiyahu 'et makhleqot hakohanim vehalviyim 'al makhleqotam 'ish kefi 'abodato lakohanim velalviyim le'olah velishlamim lesharet ulehodot ulehalel besha'arei makhanot yhvh. 2_chronicles 31:3	umenat hamelekh min rekhusho la'olot le'olot haboqer veha'ereb veha'olot lashabatot velekhodashim velamo'adim kakatub betorat yhvh. 2_chronicles 31:4	vayomer la'am leyoshebei yerushalim latet menat hakohanim vehalviyim lema'an yekhezqu betorat yhvh. 2_chronicles 31:5	vekhifroz hadabar hirbu benei yisra'el reishit dagan tirosh veyizhar udebash vekhol tebu'at sadeh uma'sar hakol larob heibi'u. 2_chronicles 31:6	ubenei yisra'el vihudah hayoshebim be'arei yehudah gam hem ma'sar baqar vazon uma'sar qadashim hamqudashim yhvh 'eloheihem heibi'u vayitenu 'areimot 'areimot. 2_chronicles 31:7	bakhodesh hashelishi heikhelu ha'areimot leyisod ubakhodesh hashebi'i kilu. 2_chronicles 31:8	vayabo'u yekhizqiyahu vehasarim vayir'u 'et ha'areimot vaybarakhu 'et yhvh ve'et 'amo yisra'el. 2_chronicles 31:9	vayidrosh yekhizqiyahu 'al hakohanim vehalviyim 'al ha'areimot. 2_chronicles 31:10	vayomer 'eilav 'azaryahu hakohen harosh lebet zadoq vayomer meihakhel haterumah labi bet yhvh 'akhol vesaboa' vehoter 'ad larob ki yhvh beirakh 'et 'amo vehanotar 'et hehamon hazeh. 2_chronicles 31:11	vayomer yekhizqiyahu lehakhin leshakhot bebet yhvh vayakhinu. 2_chronicles 31:12	vayabi'u 'et haterumah vehama'aser vehaqodashim be'emunah va'aleihem nagid konanyahu kananyahu haleivi veshim'i 'akhihu mishneh. 2_chronicles 31:13	vikhi'el va'azazyahu venakhat va'asah'el virimot veyozabad ve'eli'el veyismakhyahu umakhat ubenayahu peqidim miyad kavnanyahu kananyahu veshim'i 'akhiv bemifqad yekhizqiyahu hamelekh va'azaryahu negid bet ha'elohim. 2_chronicles 31:14	veqorei ben yimnah haleivi hasho'er lamizrakhah 'al nidbot ha'elohim latet terumat yhvh veqadeshei haqodashim. 2_chronicles 31:15	ve'al yado 'eiden uminyamin veyeishua' ushema'yahu 'amaryahu ushekhanyahu be'arei hakohanim be'emunah latet la'akheihem bemakhleqot kagadol kaqatan. 2_chronicles 31:16	milebad hityakhsam lizkharim miben shalosh shanim ulema'lah lekhal haba lebet yhvh lidbar yom beyomo la'abodatam bemishmerotam kemakhleqoteihem. 2_chronicles 31:17	ve'et hityakhes hakohanim lebet 'aboteihem vehalviyim miben 'esrim shanah ulema'elah bemishmeroteihem bemakhleqoteihem. 2_chronicles 31:18	ulehityakhes bekhal tapam nesheihem ubeneihem ubenoteihem lekhal qahal ki be'emunatam yitqadeshu qodesh. 2_chronicles 31:19	velibnei 'aharon hakohanim bisdei migrash 'areihem bekhal 'ir va'ir 'anashim 'asher niqebu besheimot latet manot lekhal zakhar bakohanim ulekhal hityakhes balviyim. 2_chronicles 31:20	vaya'as kazot yekhizqiyahu bekhal yehudah vaya'as hatob vehayashar veha'emet lifnei yhvh 'elohav. 2_chronicles 31:21	ubekhal ma'aseh 'asher heikhel ba'abodat bet ha'elohim ubatorah ubamizvah lidrosh leilohav bekhal lebabo 'asah vehizliakh. 2_chronicles 32:1	'akharei hadebarim veha'emet ha'eleh ba sankheirib melekh 'ashur vayabo bihudah vayikhan 'al he'arim habezurot vayomer lebiq'am 'eilav. 2_chronicles 32:2	vayar yekhizqiyahu ki ba sankheirib ufanav lamilkhamah 'al yerushalim. 2_chronicles 32:3	vayiva'az 'im sarav vegiborav listom 'et meimei ha'ayanot 'asher mikhuz la'ir vaya'zeruhu. 2_chronicles 32:4	vayiqabezu 'am rab vayistemu 'et kal hama'yanot ve'et hanakhal hashotef betokh ha'arez leimor lamah yabo'u malkhei 'ashur umaze'u mayim rabim. 2_chronicles 32:5	vayitkhazaq vayiben 'et kal hakhomah haperuzah vaya'al 'al hamigdalot velakhuzah hakhomah 'akheret vaykhazeq 'et hamilo 'ir david vaya'as shelakh larob umaginim. 2_chronicles 32:6	vayiten sarei milkhamot 'al ha'am vayiqbezem 'eilav 'el rekhob sha'ar ha'ir vaydaber 'al lebabam leimor. 2_chronicles 32:7	khizqu ve'imzu 'al tire'u ve'al teikhatu mipenei melekh 'ashur umilifnei kal hehamon 'asher 'imo ki 'imanu rab mei'imo. 2_chronicles 32:8	'imo zeroa' basar ve'imanu yhvh 'eloheinu le'azereinu ulehilakhem milkhamoteinu vayisamekhu ha'am 'al dibrei yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah. 2_chronicles 32:9	'akhar zeh lakh sankheirib melekh 'ashur 'abadav yerushalaymah vehu 'al lakhish vekhal memshalto 'imo 'al yekhizqiyahu melekh yehudah ve'al kal yehudah 'asher birushalim leimor. 2_chronicles 32:10	koh 'amar sankheirib melekh 'ashur 'al mah 'atem botekhim veyoshebim bemazor birushalim. 2_chronicles 32:11	halo yekhizqiyahu masit 'etkhem latet 'etkhem lamut bera'ab ubezama leimor yhvh 'eloheinu yazileinu mikaf melekh 'ashur. 2_chronicles 32:12	halo hu yekhizqiyahu heisir 'et bamotav ve'et mizbekhotav vayomer lihudah velirushalim leimor lifnei mizbeiakh 'ekhad tishtakhavu ve'alav taqtiru. 2_chronicles 32:13	halo teide'u meh 'asiti 'ani va'abotai lekhol 'amei ha'arazot hayakhol yakhelu 'elohei goyei ha'arazot lehazil 'et 'arzam miyadi. 2_chronicles 32:14	mi bekhal 'elohei hagoyim ha'eleh 'asher hekherimu 'abotai 'asher yakhol lehazil 'et 'amo miyadi ki yukhal 'eloheikhem lehazil 'etkhem miyadi. 2_chronicles 32:15	ve'atah 'al yashi 'etkhem khizqiyahu ve'al yasit 'etkhem kazot ve'al ta'aminu lo ki lo yukhal kal 'eloha kal go umamlakhah lehazil 'amo miyadi umiyad 'abotai 'af ki 'eloheikhem lo yazilu 'etkhem miyadi. 2_chronicles 32:16	ve'od diberu 'abadav 'al yhvh ha'elohim ve'al yekhizqiyahu 'abdo. 2_chronicles 32:17	usefarim katab lekharef yhvh 'elohei yisra'el veleimor 'alav leimor keilohei goyei ha'arazot 'asher lo hizilu 'amam miyadi ken lo yazil 'elohei yekhizqiyahu 'amo miyadi. 2_chronicles 32:18	vayiqre'u beqol gadol yehudit 'al 'am yerushalim 'asher 'al hakhomah leyare'am ulebahalam lema'an yilkedu 'et ha'ir. 2_chronicles 32:19	vaydaberu 'el 'elohei yerushalim ke'al 'elohei 'amei ha'arez ma'aseh yedei ha'adam. 2_chronicles 32:20	vayitpalel yekhizqiyahu hamelekh visha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi 'al zot vayiz'aqu hashamayim. 2_chronicles 32:21	vayishlakh yhvh mal'akh vayakhkhed kal gibor khayil venagid vesar bemakhaneh melekh 'ashur vayashab beboshet panim le'arzo vayabo bet 'elohav umizi'o umizi'ei mei'av sham hipiluhu bekhareb. 2_chronicles 32:22	vayosha' yhvh 'et yekhizqiyahu ve'et yoshebei yerushalim miyad sankheirib melekh 'ashur umiyad kol vaynahalem misabib. 2_chronicles 32:23	verabim mebi'im minkhah yhvh lirushalim umigdanot likhizqiyahu melekh yehudah vayinasei le'einei khal hagoyim mei'akharei khen. 2_chronicles 32:24	bayamim hahem khalah yekhizqiyahu 'ad lamut vayitpalel 'el yhvh vayomer lo umofet natan lo. 2_chronicles 32:25	velo khigmul 'alav heishib yekhizqiyahu ki gabah libo vayhi 'alav qezef ve'al yehudah virushalim. 2_chronicles 32:26	vayikana' yekhizqiyahu begobah libo hu veyoshebei yerushalim velo ba 'aleihem qezef yhvh bimei yekhizqiyahu. 2_chronicles 32:27	vayhi likhizqiyahu 'osher vekhabod harbeh me'od ve'ozarot 'asah lo lekhesef ulezahab ule'eben yeqarah velibsamim ulemaginim ulekhol kelei khemdah. 2_chronicles 32:28	umiskenot litbu'at dagan vetirosh veyizhar ve'uravot lekhal beheimah ubeheimah va'adarim la'aveirot. 2_chronicles 32:29	ve'arim 'asah lo umiqneh zon ubaqar larob ki natan lo 'elohim rekhush rab me'od. 2_chronicles 32:30	vehu yekhizqiyahu satam 'et moza meimei gikhon ha'elyon vayaysherem lematah ma'rabah le'ir david vayazlakh yekhizqiyahu bekhal ma'aseihu. 2_chronicles 32:31	vekhen bimlizei sarei babel hamshalekhim 'alav lidrosh hamofet 'asher hayah ba'arez 'azabo ha'elohim lenasoto lada'at kal bilbabo. 2_chronicles 32:32	veyeter dibrei yekhizqiyahu vakhasadav hinam ketubim bakhazon yesha'yahu ben 'amoz hanabi 'al seifer malkhei yehudah veyisra'el. 2_chronicles 32:33	vayishkab yekhizqiyahu 'im 'abotav vayiqberuhu bema'aleh qibrei benei david vekhabod 'asu lo bemoto kal yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim vayimlokh menasheh beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 33:1	ben shetem 'esreh shanah menasheh bemalekho vakhamishim vekhamesh shanah malakh birushalim. 2_chronicles 33:2	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh keto'abot hagoyim 'asher horish yhvh mipenei benei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 33:3	vayashab vayiben 'et habamot 'asher nitaz yekhizqiyahu 'abiv vayaqem mizbekhot labe'alim vaya'as 'asheirot vayishtakhu lekhal zeba hashamayim vaya'abod 'otam. 2_chronicles 33:4	ubanah mizbekhot bebet yhvh 'asher 'amar yhvh birushalim yihyeh shemi le'olam. 2_chronicles 33:5	vayiben mizbekhot lekhal zeba hashamayim bishtei khazrot bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 33:6	vehu he'ebir 'et banav ba'esh begei ben hinom ve'onen venikhesh vekhishef ve'asah 'ob veyide'oni hirbah la'asot hara' be'einei yhvh lehakh'iso. 2_chronicles 33:7	vayasem 'et pesel hasemel 'asher 'asah bebet ha'elohim 'asher 'amar 'elohim 'el david ve'el shelomoh beno babayit hazeh ubirushalim 'asher bakharti mikol shibtei yisra'el 'asim 'et shemi le'eilom. 2_chronicles 33:8	velo 'osif lehasir 'et regel yisra'el mei'al ha'adamah 'asher he'emadti la'aboteikhem raq 'im yishmeru la'asot 'et kal 'asher zivitim lekhal hatorah vehakhuqim vehamishpatim beyad mosheh. 2_chronicles 33:9	vayeta' menasheh 'et yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim la'asot ra' min hagoyim 'asher hishmid yhvh mipenei benei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 33:10	vaydaber yhvh 'el menasheh ve'el 'amo velo hiqshibu. 2_chronicles 33:11	vayabei yhvh 'aleihem 'et sarei hazaba 'asher lemelekh 'ashur vayilkedu 'et menasheh bakhokhim vaya'asruhu bankhushtayim vayolikhuhu babelah. 2_chronicles 33:12	ukhehazer lo khilah 'et penei yhvh 'elohav vayikana' me'od milifnei 'elohei 'abotav. 2_chronicles 33:13	vayitpalel 'eilav vayei'ater lo vayishma' tekhinato vayshibeihu yerushalim lemalkhuto vayeida' menasheh ki yhvh hu ha'elohim. 2_chronicles 33:14	ve'akharei khen banah khomah khizonah le'ir david ma'rabah legikhon banakhal velabo besha'ar hadagim vesabab la'ofel vayagbiheha me'od vayasem sarei khayil bekhal he'arim habezurot bihudah. 2_chronicles 33:15	vayasar 'et 'elohei haneikhar ve'et hasemel mibet yhvh vekhal hamizbekhot 'asher banah behar bet yhvh ubirushalim vayashlekh khuzah la'ir. 2_chronicles 33:16	vayakhen vayiben 'et mizbakh yhvh vayizbakh 'alav zibkhei shelamim vetodah vayomer lihudah la'abod 'et yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 33:17	'abal 'od ha'am zobekhim babamot raq yhvh 'eloheihem. 2_chronicles 33:18	veyeter dibrei menasheh utefilato 'el 'elohav vedibrei hakhozim hamdaberim 'eilav beshem yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hinam 'al dibrei malkhei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 33:19	utefilato vehei'ater lo vekhal khatato uma'lo vehameqomot 'asher banah bahem bamot vehe'emid ha'asheirim vehapesilim lifnei hikane'o hinam ketubim 'al dibrei khozai. 2_chronicles 33:20	vayishkab menasheh 'im 'abotav vayiqberuhu beito vayimlokh 'amon beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 33:21	ben 'esrim ushetayim shanah 'amon bemalekho ushetayim shanim malakh birushalim. 2_chronicles 33:22	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh ka'asher 'asah menasheh 'abiv ulekhal hapesilim 'asher 'asah menasheh 'abiv zibakh 'amon vaya'abdem. 2_chronicles 33:23	velo nikhna' milifnei yhvh kehikana' menasheh 'abiv ki hu 'amon hirbah 'ashmah. 2_chronicles 33:24	vayiqsheru 'alav 'abadav vaymituhu bebeito. 2_chronicles 33:25	vayaku 'am ha'arez 'et kal haqosherim 'al hamelekh 'amon vayamlikhu 'am ha'arez 'et yoshiyahu beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 34:1	ben shemoneh shanim yoshiyahu bemalekho usheloshim ve'akhat shanah malakh birushalim. 2_chronicles 34:2	vaya'as hayashar be'einei yhvh vayeilekh bedarkhei david 'abiv velo sar yamin usemol. 2_chronicles 34:3	ubishmoneh shanim lemalekho vehu 'odenu na'ar heikhel lidrosh leilohei david 'abiv ubishtem 'esreh shanah heikhel letaher 'et yehudah virushalim min habamot veha'asheirim vehapesilim vehamaseikhot. 2_chronicles 34:4	vaynatezu lefanav 'et mizbekhot habe'alim vehakhamanim 'asher lema'lah mei'aleihem gideia' veha'asheirim vehapesilim vehamaseikhot shibar veheidaq vayizroq 'al penei haqebarim hazobekhim lahem. 2_chronicles 34:5	ve'azmot kohanim saraf 'al mizbekhotaym mizbekhotam vaytaher 'et yehudah ve'et yerushalim. 2_chronicles 34:6	ube'arei menasheh ve'efrayim veshim'on ve'ad naftali bahar bateihem bekharboteihem sabib. 2_chronicles 34:7	vaynatez 'et hamizbekhot ve'et ha'asheirim vehapesilim kitat leheidaq vekhal hakhamanim gida' bekhal 'erez yisra'el vayashab lirushalim. 2_chronicles 34:8	ubishnat shemoneh 'esreh lemalekho letaher ha'arez vehabayit lakh 'et shafan ben 'azalyahu ve'et ma'aseiyahu sar ha'ir ve'et yo'akh ben yo'akhaz hamazkir lekhazeq 'et bet yhvh 'elohav. 2_chronicles 34:9	vayabo'u 'el khilqiyahu hakohen hagadol vayitenu 'et hakesef hamuba bet 'elohim 'asher 'asefu halviyim shomerei hasaf miyad menasheh ve'efrayim umikol she'eirit yisra'el umikal yehudah ubinyamin veyoshebei vayashubu yerushalim. 2_chronicles 34:10	vayitenu 'al yad 'oseh hamelakhah hamufqadim bebet yhvh vayitenu 'oto 'osei hamelakhah 'asher 'osim bebet yhvh libdoq ulekhazeq habayit. 2_chronicles 34:11	vayitenu lekharashim velabonim liqnot 'abnei makhzeb ve'eizim lamkhaberot uleqarot 'et habatim 'asher hishkhitu malkhei yehudah. 2_chronicles 34:12	veha'anashim 'osim be'emunah bamelakhah va'aleihem mufqadim yakhat ve'obadyahu halviyim min benei merari uzekharyah umeshulam min benei haqehatim lenazeiakh vehalviyim kal meibin bikhlei shir. 2_chronicles 34:13	ve'al hasabalim umenazekhim lekhol 'oseh melakhah la'abodah va'abodah umeihalviyim sofrim veshoterim vesho'arim. 2_chronicles 34:14	ubehozi'am 'et hakesef hamuba bet yhvh maza khilqiyahu hakohen 'et seifer torat yhvh beyad mosheh. 2_chronicles 34:15	vaya'an khilqiyahu vayomer 'el shafan hasofer seifer hatorah mazati bebet yhvh vayiten khilqiyahu 'et haseifer 'el shafan. 2_chronicles 34:16	vayabei shafan 'et haseifer 'el hamelekh vayasheb 'od 'et hamelekh dabar leimor kol 'asher nitan beyad 'abadekha hem 'osim. 2_chronicles 34:17	vayatikhu 'et hakesef hanimza bebet yhvh vayitenuhu 'al yad hamufqadim ve'al yad 'osei hamelakhah. 2_chronicles 34:18	vayaged shafan hasofer lamelekh leimor seifer natan li khilqiyahu hakohen vayiqra bo shafan lifnei hamelekh. 2_chronicles 34:19	vayhi kishmoa' hamelekh 'et dibrei hatorah vayiqra' 'et begadav. 2_chronicles 34:20	vayzav hamelekh 'et khilqiyahu ve'et 'akhiqam benosha fan ve'et 'abdon ben mikhah ve'et shafan hasofer ve'et 'asayah 'ebed hamelekh leimor. 2_chronicles 34:21	lekhu dirshu 'et yhvh ba'adi ube'ad hanish'ar beyisra'el ubihudah 'al dibrei haseifer 'asher nimza ki gedolah khamat yhvh 'asher nitekhah banu 'al 'asher lo shameru 'aboteinu 'et debar yhvh la'asot kekhal hakatub 'al haseifer hazeh. 2_chronicles 34:22	vayeilekh khilqiyahu va'asher hamelekh 'el khuldah hanebi'ah 'eishet shalum ben toqhat taqehat ben khasrah shomer habegadim vehi yoshebet birushalim bamishneh vaydaberu 'eileha kazot. 2_chronicles 34:23	vatomer lahem koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el 'imru la'ish 'asher shalakh 'etkhem 'eilai. 2_chronicles 34:24	koh 'amar yhvh hini meibi ra'ah 'al hamaqom hazeh ve'al yoshebav 'et kal ha'alot haketubot 'al haseifer 'asher qare'u lifnei melekh yehudah. 2_chronicles 34:25	takhat 'asher 'azabuni vayaqtiru vayqateru leilohim 'akheirim lema'an hakh'iseini bekhol ma'asei yedeihem vetitakh khamati bamaqom hazeh velo tikhbeh. 2_chronicles 34:26	ve'el melekh yehudah hasholeiakh 'etkhem lidrosh yhvh koh tomeru 'eilav koh 'amar yhvh 'elohei yisra'el hadebarim 'asher shama'eta. 2_chronicles 34:27	ya'an rakh lebabekha vatikana' milifnei 'elohim beshame'akha 'et debarav 'al hamaqom hazeh ve'al yoshebav vatikana' lefanai vatiqra' 'et begadekha vateibek lefanai vegam 'ani shama'ti ne'um yhvh. 2_chronicles 34:28	hini 'osifkha 'el 'abotekha vene'esafta 'el qibrotekha beshalom velo tir'enah 'einekha bekhol hara'ah 'asher 'ani meibi 'al hamaqom hazeh ve'al yoshebav vayashibu 'et hamelekh dabar. 2_chronicles 34:29	vayishlakh hamelekh vaye'esof 'et kal ziqnei yehudah virushalim. 2_chronicles 34:30	vaya'al hamelekh bet yhvh vekhal 'ish yehudah veyoshebei yerushalim vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal ha'am migadol ve'ad qatan vayiqra be'azeneihem 'et kal dibrei seifer haberit hanimza bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 34:31	vaya'amod hamelekh 'al 'amedo vayikhrot 'et haberit lifnei yhvh lalekhet 'akharei yhvh velishmor 'et mizvotav ve'eidevotav vekhuqav bekhal lebabo ubekhal nafsho la'asot 'et dibrei haberit haketubim 'al haseifer hazeh. 2_chronicles 34:32	vaya'amed 'et kal hanimza birushalim ubinyamin vaya'asu yoshebei yerushalim kibrit 'elohim 'elohei 'aboteihem. 2_chronicles 34:33	vayasar yoshiyahu 'et kal hato'eibot mikal ha'arazot 'asher libnei yisra'el vaya'abed 'et kal hanimza beyisra'el la'abod 'et yhvh 'eloheihem kal yamav lo saru mei'akharei yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem. 2_chronicles 35:1	vaya'as yoshiyahu birushalim pesakh yhvh vayishkhatu hapesakh be'arba'ah 'asar lakhodesh harishon. 2_chronicles 35:2	vaya'amed hakohanim 'al mishmerotam vaykhazeqem la'abodat bet yhvh. 2_chronicles 35:3	vayomer lalviyim hamebunim hamebinim lekhal yisra'el haqedoshim yhvh tenu 'et 'aron haqodesh babayit 'asher banah shelomoh ben david melekh yisra'el 'en lakhem masa bakatef 'atah 'ibdu 'et yhvh 'eloheikhem ve'et 'amo yisra'el. 2_chronicles 35:4	vehikonu lebet 'aboteikhem kemakhleqoteikhem bikhtab david melekh yisra'el ubemikhtab shelomoh beno. 2_chronicles 35:5	ve'imdu baqodesh liflugot bet ha'abot la'akheikhem benei ha'am vakhaluqat bet 'ab lalviyim. 2_chronicles 35:6	veshakhatu hapasakh vehitqadeshu vehakhinu la'akheikhem la'asot kidbar yhvh beyad mosheh. 2_chronicles 35:7	vayarem yoshiyahu libnei ha'am zon kebasim ubenei 'izim hakol lapesakhim lekhal hanimza lemispar sheloshim 'elef ubaqar sheloshet 'alafim 'eleh meirekhush hamelekh. 2_chronicles 35:8	vesarav lindabah la'am lakohanim velalviyim heirimu khilqiyah uzekharyahu vikhi'el negidei bet ha'elohim lakohanim natenu lapesakhim 'alpayim veshesh mei'ot ubaqar shelosh mei'ot. 2_chronicles 35:9	vekhavnanyahu vekhananyahu ushema'yahu unetan'el 'ekhav vakhashabyahu vi'i'el veyozabad sarei halviyim heirimu lalviyim lapesakhim khameishet 'alafim ubaqar khamesh mei'ot. 2_chronicles 35:10	vatikon ha'abodah vaya'amdu hakohanim 'al 'amedam vehalviyim 'al makhleqotam kemizvat hamelekh. 2_chronicles 35:11	vayishkhatu hapasakh vayizrequ hakohanim miyadam vehalviyim mafshitim. 2_chronicles 35:12	vayasiru ha'olah letitam lemiflagot lebet 'abot libnei ha'am lehaqrib yhvh kakatub beseifer mosheh vekhen labaqar. 2_chronicles 35:13	vaybashelu hapesakh ba'esh kamishpat vehaqodashim bishelu basirot ubadevadim ubazeilakhot vayarizu lekhal benei ha'am. 2_chronicles 35:14	ve'akhar heikhinu lahem velakohanim ki hakohanim benei 'aharon beha'alot ha'olah vehakhalabim 'ad layelah vehalviyim heikhinu lahem velakohanim benei 'aharon. 2_chronicles 35:15	vehamshorarim benei 'asaf 'al ma'amadam kemizvat david ve'asaf veheiman vidutun khozeh hamelekh vehasho'arim lesha'ar vasha'ar 'en lahem lasur mei'al 'abodatam ki 'akheihem halviyim heikhinu lahem. 2_chronicles 35:16	vatikon kal 'abodat yhvh bayom hahu la'asot hapesakh veha'alot 'olot 'al mizbakh yhvh kemizvat hamelekh yoshiyahu. 2_chronicles 35:17	vaya'asu benei yisra'el hanimze'im 'et hapesakh ba'et hahi ve'et khag hamazot shib'at yamim. 2_chronicles 35:18	velo na'asah fesakh kamohu beyisra'el mimei shemu'el hanabi vekhal malkhei yisra'el lo 'asu kapesakh 'asher 'asah yoshiyahu vehakohanim vehalviyim vekhal yehudah veyisra'el hanimza veyoshebei yerushalim. 2_chronicles 35:19	bishmoneh 'esreh shanah lemalkhut yoshiyahu na'asah hapesakh hazeh. 2_chronicles 35:20	'akharei khal zot 'asher heikhin yoshiyahu 'et habayit 'alah nekho melekh mizrayim lehilakhem bekharkemish 'al perat vayeizei liqrato yoshiyahu. 2_chronicles 35:21	vayishlakh 'eilav mal'akhim leimor mah li valakh melekh yehudah lo 'alekha 'atah hayom ki 'el bet milkhamti veilohim 'amar lebahaleini khadal lekha mei'elohim 'asher 'imi ve'al yashkhitekha. 2_chronicles 35:22	velo heiseb yoshiyahu fanav mimenu ki lehilakhem bo hitkhapes velo shama' 'el dibrei nekho mipi 'elohim vayabo lehilakhem bebiq'at megido. 2_chronicles 35:23	vayoru hayorim lamelekh yoshiyahu vayomer hamelekh la'abadav ha'abiruni ki hakholeiti me'od. 2_chronicles 35:24	vaya'abiruhu 'abadav min hamerkabah vayarkibuhu 'al rekheb hamishneh 'asher lo vayolikhuhu yerushalim vayamat vayiqaber beqibrot 'abotav vekhal yehudah virushalim mit'abelim 'al yoshiyahu. 2_chronicles 35:25	vayqonen yirmeyahu 'al yoshiyahu vayomeru khal hasharim vehasharot beqinoteihem 'al yoshiyahu 'ad hayom vayitenum lekhoq 'al yisra'el vehinam ketubim 'al haqinot. 2_chronicles 35:26	veyeter dibrei yoshiyahu vakhasadav kakatub betorat yhvh. 2_chronicles 35:27	udebarav harishonim veha'akharonim hinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yisra'el vihudah. 2_chronicles 36:1	vayiqkhu 'am ha'arez 'et yeho'akhaz ben yoshiyahu vayamlikhuhu takhat 'abiv birushalim. 2_chronicles 36:2	ben shalosh ve'esrim shanah yo'akhaz bemalekho usheloshah khodashim malakh birushalim. 2_chronicles 36:3	vaysireihu melekh mizrayim birushalim vaya'anosh 'et ha'arez mei'ah khikar kesef vekhikar zahab. 2_chronicles 36:4	vayamlekh melekh mizrayim 'et 'elyaqim 'akhiv 'al yehudah virushalim vayaseb 'et shemo yehoyaqim ve'et yo'akhaz 'akhiv laqakh nekho vaybi'eihu mizrayemah. 2_chronicles 36:5	ben 'esrim vekhamesh shanah yehoyaqim bemalekho ve'akhat 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh 'elohav. 2_chronicles 36:6	'alav 'alah nebukhadnezar melekh babel vaya'asreihu bankhushtayim leholikho babelah. 2_chronicles 36:7	umikelei bet yhvh heibi nebukhadnezar lebabel vayitenem beheikhalo bebabel. 2_chronicles 36:8	veyeter dibrei yehoyaqim veto'abotav 'asher 'asah vehanimza 'alav hinam ketubim 'al seifer malkhei yisra'el vihudah vayimlokh yehoyakhin beno takhtav. 2_chronicles 36:9	ben shemoneh shanim yehoyakhin bemalekho usheloshah khodashim va'aseret yamim malakh birushalim vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh. 2_chronicles 36:10	velitshubat hashanah shalakh hamelekh nebukhadnezar vaybi'eihu babelah 'im kelei khemdat bet yhvh vayamlekh 'et zidqiyahu 'akhiv 'al yehudah virushalim. 2_chronicles 36:11	ben 'esrim ve'akhat shanah zidqiyahu bemalekho ve'akhat 'esreh shanah malakh birushalim. 2_chronicles 36:12	vaya'as hara' be'einei yhvh 'elohav lo nikhna' milifnei yirmeyahu hanabi mipi yhvh. 2_chronicles 36:13	vegam bamelekh nebukhadnezar marad 'asher hishbi'o beilohim vayeqesh 'et 'arepo vai'amez 'et lebabo mishub 'el yhvh 'elohei yisra'el. 2_chronicles 36:14	gam kal sarei hakohanim veha'am hirbu lim'al ma'al kekhol to'abot hagoyim vaytame'u 'et bet yhvh 'asher hiqdish birushalim. 2_chronicles 36:15	vayishlakh yhvh 'elohei 'aboteihem 'aleihem beyad mal'akhav hashkem veshaloakh ki khamal 'al 'amo ve'al me'ono. 2_chronicles 36:16	vayihyu mal'ibim bemal'akhei ha'elohim ubozim debarav umita'te'im binbi'av 'ad 'alot khamat yhvh be'amo 'ad le'en marpei. 2_chronicles 36:17	vaya'al 'aleihem 'et melekh kasdiyim kasdim vayaharog bakhureihem bakhereb bebet miqdasham velo khamal 'al bakhur ubetulah zaqen veyashesh hakol natan beyado. 2_chronicles 36:18	vekhol kelei bet ha'elohim hagedolim vehaqetanim ve'ozerot bet yhvh ve'ozerot hamelekh vesarav hakol heibi babel. 2_chronicles 36:19	vayisrefu 'et bet ha'elohim vaynatezu 'et khomat yerushalim vekhal 'armenoteha sarefu ba'esh vekhal kelei makhamadeha lehashkhit. 2_chronicles 36:20	vayegel hashe'eirit min hakhereb 'el babel vayihyu lo ulebanav la'abadim 'ad melokh malkhut paras. 2_chronicles 36:21	lemalot debar yhvh befi yirmeyahu 'ad razetah ha'arez 'et shabetoteha kal yemei hashamah shabatah lemalot shib'im shanah. 2_chronicles 36:22	ubishnat 'akhat lekhoresh melekh paras likhlot debar yhvh befi yirmeyahu hei'ir yhvh 'et ruakh koresh melekh paras vaya'aber qol bekhal malkhuto vegam bemikhtab leimor. 2_chronicles 36:23	koh 'amar koresh melekh paras kal mamlekhot ha'arez natan li yhvh 'elohei hashamayim vehu faqad 'alai libnot lo bayit birushalim 'asher bihudah mi bakhem mikal 'amo yhvh 'elohav 'imo veya'al.
